Chinese pairs.original: 红樱桃、湿地、雪松和矿物次第展开，单宁柔和，口感相当优雅，有焦糖和皮革的风味，余韵悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Cherry, wet earth, pine and minerals unfold in sequence, with soft tannins and a refined texture, flavors of caramel and leather, and a long, lingering finish.

Western reviews.review: A bit shy, with notes of tight black fruit and herb. The medium-weight mouth offers a decent structure with firm tannins and a solid close. Give it a good decant before drinking now.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒略带羞怯，带有紧密的黑果和香草的味道。口感中等，结构合理，坚实的口感和结尾。建议在饮用前好好脱颖。

Chinese pairs.original: 草莓和黑莓的香气，并有淡淡的香草气息，中等酒体，充满水果的味道和较长的回味。
Chinese pairs.new: Strawberry and blackberry aromas, with a hint of subtle vanilla, medium-bodied, full of fruity flavors and a long finish.

Western reviews.review: Another of the many Pessac-Léognan properties in the hands of the Lurton family, this up-and-coming estate is run by Laurent Cogombles, husband of Sophie Lurton. This white is fresh, straightforward, but with a great balance between herbaceous flavors and more weighty white fruits. It is the style of white that opens slowly, satisfyingly, and could even be decanted.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶由卢尔顿家族（Lurton family）掌控的佩萨克-莱奥纳（Pessac-Léognan）葡萄酒产区的葡萄酒。该酒庄由劳伦特·科戈姆布（Laurent Cogombles）经营，他是索菲·卢尔顿（Sophie Lurton）的丈夫。这瓶白葡萄酒清新、直接，但具有良好的香草风味和丰富白果的平衡。这种风格的白葡萄酒会在打开后逐渐展现出满意的口感，甚至可以进行分装。

Chinese pairs.original: 紫红色，红色水果香气，如红莓、樱桃、醋栗伴着植物香料香，酸度适中，单宁表现力不强，酒体中等，但整体顺滑，简单易饮。
Chinese pairs.new: Deep purple color, aromas of red fruit such as raspberry, cherry, and cranberry accompanied by herbal notes. Medium acidity, moderate tannins, and a smooth, medium-bodied texture make for an easy-drinking wine.

Western reviews.review: Flavors of blackberry and blueberry compote lead the nose of this dense wine, followed by whiffs of bittersweet chocolate and peppery spice. Medium weight and lush on the palate, it has good acidic lift that keeps the finish clean and vibrant.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中，黑莓和蓝莓酱的风味占据了主导地位，伴随着苦巧克力和辣椒调味的微妙气息。口感中等，富有滋味，酸度适宜，保持了清新活泼的尾韵。

Chinese pairs.original: 咖啡，烟草和果酱的香味，口感适中，单宁柔和，回味带有淡淡的果香。
Chinese pairs.new: Flavors of coffee, tobacco, and jam, with a medium body, soft tannins, and a finish with subtle fruit notes.

Western reviews.review: Medium depth of ruby-red color with quite dark pigmentation. Delicate dark fruit aromas are a little weedy/leafy. On the palate the same leafy dark fruit is fresh & simple. The alcohol is balanced & length reasonable. The wine is balanced but lacks any real spark or intensity. 11/07 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深度为中等的红色，带有较深的色调。

香气：酒中有细微的黑果香气，带有草本和叶子的味道。

口感：口感清新简单，黑果香气仍然带有草本和叶子的味道。酒精平衡，持久性一般。整体来说，酒的平衡度较高，但缺乏真正的活力和强度。

Chinese pairs.original: 坚果，红色水果和牛奶巧克力的香味，人口圆润，带有成熟水果的味道，单宁柔滑。
Chinese pairs.new: Hazelnut, red fruit, and milk chocolate aromas, smooth and rounded palate, flavors of mature fruit, with smooth tannins.

Western reviews.review: Austere, rustic and lean, the medium-bodied wine is on the bright red, cranberry side of the style range with strong green accents. I suppose lovers of old-school classics will like this more than I did. 86 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒风格严谨、原始、瘦削，体积中等，呈现出亮丽的红色和草莓色，带有强烈的绿色调。可能那些喜欢老派经典风格的人会更喜欢这款红酒。评分86分。

Western reviews.review: Spicy, weedy, black olive, coffee, cassis, vanilla, tobacco, saddle leather, barnyard aromas - solid if on the green side. Dry, light, hollow entry with light, lean tannins. Delicate with earthy, prune, cassis, tobacco leaf, meaty, green pepper, leather, coffee, resin, Band-Aid, barnyard flavours with a green tea finish. Solid but light and green. Not a great year for St. Estephe. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的口感是：

有辣椒、草本、黑橄榄、咖啡、黑currant、香草、烟草、马鞍皮革、农场气味的香气，口感坚实但略带青涩。

入口干净、轻薄、空虚，口感轻薄、紧致的纹理。口感细腻，有泥土、浆果、黑currant、烟草叶、肉类、青椒、皮革、咖啡、树脂、绷带、农场气味，尾部有绿茶味。整体口感坚实但轻薄和青涩。圣埃斯泰夫地区今年的红酒品质不佳。

Chinese pairs.original: 牛奶巧克力和浆果香味，中等酒体，单宁如丝般柔滑，有点瘦，良好的结构。
Chinese pairs.new: Milk chocolate and fruity aromas, medium-bodied, silky smooth tannins, a bit lean, good structure.

Western reviews.review: Good purity on the nose, red and dark berries, blackcurrant and some herbal notes, the palate shows classic structure with good freshness, tannic backbone and notes of freshly crushed berries, well balanced, still slightly youthful with a long finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气清澈纯粹，带有红色和黑色浆果的味道，黑currant和一些草药的味道。口感典型的结构，带有清新感，坚果味和新鲜浆果的味道，平衡好，仍然有一点年轻的感觉，长长的尾部。

Chinese pairs.original: 果酱，樱桃和浆果的味道，伴有烤香草的香气。成熟优雅，回味带有奶油巧克力的味道。
Chinese pairs.new: Jammy flavors of cherry and plum, accompanied by a warm hint of vanilla. Mellow and mature, with a lingering finish of creamy chocolate.

Western reviews.review: Ready to go, medium bodied wine, with a ripe, licorice, smoke, espresso bean and dark, red fruit nose, round textures and a soft, fruity, finish. The wine was made from a blend of 45% Merlot, 45% Cabernet Sauvignon and 10% Petit Verdot.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感丰富，体积适中，酒香中有熟透的黑醋栗、烟草、咖啡豆和黑红果的味道，口感圆润，尾部果香柔和。该酒由45%梅洛、45%卡波弗雷希诺和10%佩蒂·韦尔多三种葡萄品种混合酿造。

Western reviews.review: A wine that relishes its juicy fruit and acidity. The tannins, by contrast, are light. Close to Macau, south of Margaux, Gironville is in a fresh, black currant-fruit style, not for aging.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒以其丰富的果味和酸度而闻名。相比之下，苦味很轻。靠近澳门，南边的马格努（Margaux），吉龙维尔（Gironville）以新鲜的黑currant风格而闻名，不适合长时间陈酿。

Western reviews.review: Deep, still youthful red. Pleasant fruity nose flirting with strawberry coulis with a spicy, vegetal touch. On the palate, an honest wine framed by ripe tannins. Medium-bodied, delivering pleasant aromas punctuated by spices on the finish.
Western reviews.translation: 深度、稳定的红酒，仍然具有青春感。酒香中有令人愉悦的水果味，特别是草莓酱，伴有少量的辣椒和蔬菜味。口感中，酒体诚实，坚实的果实味和圆润的口感。酒体中等，酒尾中有令人愉悦的香气，伴有少量的香料。

Chinese pairs.original: 干果、鲜花和泥土的气息，酒体饱满，非常柔滑的单宁，充满坚果和水果味道。
Chinese pairs.new: Dried fruit, floral, and earthy aromas, full-bodied with very smooth tannins, packed with nutty and fruity flavors.

Western reviews.review: Medium/full bodied, fresh, crisp red fruit, licorice, herbs, and floral notes are easy to find. Soft, silky and fresh, with a bright, red berry and dark cherry finish. This is fully developed and ready for prime time drinking. 91 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的体积适中到丰富，清新果香，清脆的红果味， licorice、香草和花香的味道很容易被发现。口感软滑，清新，带有亮丽的红果和黑樱桃的尾韵。这款红酒已经成熟，准备好享用了。评分：91分。

champagne jacquinot et fils harmonie mil.name: champagne jacquinot et fils harmonie millesime 2000

Chinese pairs.original: 酒体呈现中等偏下的金黄色泽，香气甜美，蕴含甘草、黄油、烤吐司、苹果及柑橘气息，入口展现青苹果、酸橙和些微矿物质滋味，气泡如奶油般柔顺，中等余韵。
Chinese pairs.new: The wine presents a medium-low golden hue, with a sweet aroma that includes notes of honey, butter, toasted bread, apple, and citrus. On the palate, it reveals flavors of green apple, citrus, and subtle minerality, with a creamy texture and a medium finish.

English pairs.original: Medium- gold color, the wine had mellow aromas of liquorice, butter, toast, apple and citrus, green apple, lime and subtle mineral notes on the palate, creamy and smooth bubbles, with a medium finish.
English pairs.new:
颜色：中等金色

香气：酒香、奶油、烤面包、苹果、柑橘、绿苹果、lime和微妙的矿物质味道

口感：奶油般的、滑顺的气泡，中等长度的尾韵

Western reviews.review: Golden hue. Open nose blending candied lemon and pineapple, fresh butter and a delicate almond touch. The palate shows seductive fullness, mellow character and aromatic expression (ripe fruits, pastries) nicely balanced by freshness.
Western reviews.translation: 金色色泽。开瓶后，酒香中融合了糖果柠檬、金菠萝、新鲜黄油和细微的杏仁味。口感丰富、柔和、香气丰富（成熟水果、甜点）并被清新感所平衡。

Chinese pairs.original: 这款白葡萄酒的香气散发出典型的蜜饯味及微微的桶味。口中富有大量成熟、甜美的果干及热带水果滋味，伴有多矿物的收尾。
Chinese pairs.new: This white wine boasts a typical honeyed aroma with subtle oak notes. The palate is rich with mature, sweet fruit and tropical fruit flavors, finishing with a minerally note.

English pairs.original: The preserved fruits on nose was quite typical for this white wine, with a tinge of oaks. Lots of sweet and ripe fruits such as dried fruits and exotic fruits on palate followed by a mineral-inflected finale.
English pairs.new: 这款白酒的鼻子中有典型的保留水果味道，伴有轻微的橡木味。口感上充满了甜蜜的和成熟的水果，如干果和异国风味，最后以矿物质味道的尾韵结束。

Western reviews.review: So much licorice and fennel seed on the nose with lemon and dried pear undertones. Full body, bright acidity and lots of stone, apple skin and citrus undertones. A solid and serious dry white that will deliver pleasure now but will improve for many years ahead.
Western reviews.translation: 酒 nose 上充满了 licorice 和 fennel seed 的香气，伴有柠檬和干梨的底调。酒体丰富，酸度清晰，酒中充满石果、苹果皮和柑橘的底调。是一款坚实而严肃的干白酒，目前可以享受，但未来几年会有所改善。

Western reviews.review: This wine is all herbal fruits, with spice from the wood-aging and lively acidity. It has considerable potential, full of its nervy texture, minerality and tight acidity. Wait at least into 2020. Tristan and Loïc Kressmann now run the family estate.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒充满了草药和水果的味道，木桶陈化的香气和生动的酸度。它有很大的潜力，充满了紧张的口感、矿物质和紧密的酸度。建议至少等到2020年再饮用。克雷斯曼家族的新一代，特里斯坦和洛伊克·克雷斯曼，现在掌管家族庄园。

Western reviews.review: From the beginning of my wine career, I have always enjoyed distinctive Pessac-Léognan Blanc wines from the Bordeaux region of France but felt that the marketplace never gave these wines their just due. I recall in the mid-1980s tasting and savoring the 1966 Château La Louvière, which was nearly 20 years old—that wine was bright, delicious, and complex. Since that magic moment, I have always been on the lookout for Pessac. The 2013 Château LaTour-Martillac is active and delectable. The wine exhibits excellent brightness and flavors of dried citrus and herbs. Long and crisp on the palate and drinking well now, this would be a great match with raw oysters. In the meantime, I will be hunting down more Pessac-Léognan and living life to the fullest. (Tasted: October 21, 2016, San Francisco, CA)
Western reviews.translation: 自从我开始从事葡萄酒行业以来，我一直钟爱于法国波尔多地区佩萨克-莱奥涅冈白酒的独特风格，但我觉得市场上从未给这些酒足够的认可。 我还记得在20世纪80年代中期品尝并享受了1966年夏特奥·拉·卢维埃的经历，那时酒龄已近20年——那杯酒是明亮、美味、复杂的。 自那一刻起，我一直在寻找佩萨克的酒。 2013年夏特奥·拉·图尔-马蒂卡克是活跃而美味的。 酒展现出出色的明亮度和干燥柑橘和香草的风味。 口感长而清脆，当前饮用良好，这将是美味的配对与生蚝。 在此期间，我将继续寻找佩萨克-莱奥涅冈的酒，并尽情生活。 (品尝时间：2016年10月21日，美国加州旧金山)

Western reviews.review: The 2013 LaTour Martillac Blanc has a grassy, lime and gooseberry-scented bouquet, the Sauvignon Blanc in charge and driving the aromatics. The palate is crisp and fresh on the entry with a pleasant saline entry, a touch of bitter lemon and a vibrant, quite sustained finish that just attenuates slightly, though I suspect that will be addressed with bottle age. Bunker this in your cellar for 3 or 4 years before reaching for the waiter's friend.
Western reviews.translation: 2013 年的拉图尔马蒂拉克白酒（LaTour Martillac Blanc）具有草地、柠檬和 gooseberry 的香气，Sauvignon Blanc 的风格占主导地位，驱动着酒的香气。酒口入口清新、生动，带有pleasant 的盐味，略带苦柠檬味，酒尾振奋，持续时间较长，只是稍微有些减弱，尽管我认为随着时间的推移，这个问题会得到解决。建议将酒存放在冰箱中，等待 3 到 4 年后再享用。

Western reviews.review: Stylish, with an alluring brioche edge underscoring the white peach, verbena and straw flavors. Stays racy through the finish, presenting a lingering whiff of toast.
Western reviews.translation: 风格独特，具有诱人的面包香（brioche）和白桃、迷你兰（verbena）和干草的风味。酒尾保持清爽，留下一丝烤面包的余味。

Chinese pairs.original: 颜色有些浑浊。此酒的香气展示出大量三级香气，比如红茶叶、咸矿物、蘑菇和仓库。所幸口感依然鲜活，伴有轻盈但富有单宁的回味。
Chinese pairs.new: The wine has a slightly hazy color. The aroma showcases a rich array of tertiary notes, including red tea leaves, salty minerals, mushrooms, and cellar. Fortunately, the palate remains lively, with a light yet tannic finish.

English pairs.original: Faintly muddy color. The nose revealed loads of tertiary aromas such as black tea leaf, savoury-mineral, mushroom and barnyard. The taste was luckily still fresh and lively, with a light but very tannic finish.
English pairs.new: 酒色微带浑浊。鼻子中充满了次级香气，如黑茶叶、咸矿物质、蘑菇和谷仓。口感幸好仍然新鲜活泼，口感轻盈但非常苦。

Western reviews.review: Quite a firm, tannic, almost strict character here. There is more interest in the nose, with its floral, earthy, red and black fruits, tobacco, truffle and plum, than on the palate. Give this at least a decade, and it could soften, but it is not a lot of fun to drink today.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感坚实、苦涩，几乎是严格的。虽然在口感上没有太多吸引力，但在香气中却有很多有趣的元素，如花香、土味、红黑果实、烟草、松露和浆果。建议至少再存放十年，这样它可能会变得更加柔和，但现在它并不容易让人享受。

Western reviews.review: A wonderfully firm wine, which balances extraction with pure sweet fruit. It moves comfortably within its tannic structure, the ripe Merlot allowed plenty of play to show off its black jelly and plum flavors.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶非常有力的红酒，完美地平衡了提取和纯甜的果味。它舒适地在其坚实的结构中移动，成熟的梅洛葡萄充分展现了其黑果冻和浆果风味。

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Rubingranat, violette Randaufhellung. In der Nase feine florale Nuancen, nach Veilchen, frische Kirschen, zart nach Cassis. Am Gaumen saftig, fruchtbetont und elegant, charmant, zart nach Mandarinen, leichtfüßig, feste Tannine, rotbeerig-kirschige Frucht im Nachhall. Delikater Speisenbegleiter.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

深红色葡萄酒色，酒液边缘有紫色光泽。酒香中有细微的花朵香气，闻起来像百合花、鲜红樱桃和黑加思（一种黑色浆果）。口感丰富、果味浓郁、优雅、迷人，带有柑橘味，轻盈、柔和，口感坚实，余味中有红酒和樱桃的风味。这种红酒适合与精致的食物配对。

Western reviews.review: (2007) A touch of meaty, earthy charm here with plenty of gout de terroir. The palate has plenty of depth and structure, with a solid underpinning of ripe, black fruits. Comes together really very nicely with coffee oak and elegance.
Western reviews.translation: 2007年：这款红酒带有浓郁的土壤和肉类香气，充满了地理特征的风味。口感丰富深邃，结构坚实，黑果成熟充满韵味。与咖啡和橡木的完美结合，呈现出典雅的风格。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark, virtually opaque ruby-red color. The rich, dark-fruit on the nose has plenty of chocolate, fig & currant aromas. Rich black fruit on the palate is high-toned & juicy. The mid-palate has a silky-smooth texture & lovely concentration. Alcohol is a touch warming, the acid is quite soft, could be a little fresher on the finish, but lasts well. 11/10 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的红酒色，几乎透不见光。酒鼻中充满了浓郁的黑果、巧克力、浆果和浆果香气。口感上黑果的味道高昂、水果味浓郁。中口滑顺、浓郁。酒精有一点温暖感，酸度较软，可能在尾部稍微清新一下，但持久性不错。评分：11/10

Chinese pairs.original: 1.5 升的大瓶装。清晰的金色。此酒的香气充满了贝壳味以及少许果仁、蜂蜜和香料味。口感富有绵密的甜味，但中段口感和回味却缺乏集中度同时酸度感觉也不太够。
Chinese pairs.new: A 1.5-liter magnum bottle. Crystal clear golden color. The aroma is full of shell notes, along with a hint of nuts, honey, and spices. The palate is rich and sweet, but the mid-palate and finish lack focus, and the acidity feels somewhat underwhelming.

English pairs.original: Magnum. Gold color with good precision. It showed a shell-imbued aroma intermixed with nuts, honey and spices. Densely sweet, somewhat lacking the concentration on its mid-palate and finish meanwhile the acid was insufficient.
English pairs.new: 大瓶装。金色酒液，色泽清晰。酒中有坚果、蜂蜜和香料的气味。酒口甜度高，但中口和尾部略显稀薄，酸度不足。

Western reviews.review: Notes of honeyed apricot, ripe and overripe pineapples with assorted tropical fruits are found in the nose and the palate. There is a line of bracing acidity that keeps everything here alive, adding freshness and length.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中带有蜂蜜般的杏子、成熟和过熟的菠萝以及各种热带水果的味道。口感中有清新的酸度线条，保持着整个口感的活力，带来新鲜感和持久感。

Western reviews.review: As is often the case, a poor red wine vintage in Bordeaux is a good year for sweet wines. This unctuous wine, still young and dominated by 95% Sémillon, is beautifully balanced. Its honey and botrytis flavors give it a dry edge that comfortably contrasts with the opulent sweetness. The acidity, a source of freshness, gives the wine the lift it needs. Drink this serious and major wine from 2023.
Western reviews.translation: 像往常一样，波尔多地区的糟糕红酒年份往往是甜酒的好年份。这款醇厚的白酒，仍然年轻，95%的塞米隆占主导地位，美丽地平衡。它的蜂蜜和霉菌感染的味道给了它干燥的边缘，舒适地与丰富的甜度形成对比。酸度，来源于新鲜感，给了酒精所需的升力。从2023年开始饮用这个严肃而重要的酒。

Western reviews.review: Light to medium deep golden colour. Layered nose showing fine oak, almond, pastry, yellow fruit and fine wood. The palate has good bite, dense but with a vital acidity, good oak and toastiness, fresh acidity, notes of lemon confit, earl grey and a long lingering finish, already delicious but with great potential. Really what great Sauternes is all about.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的颜色是浅到中等深的金色。酒香层次丰富，展现出细致的橡木、杏仁、蛋糕、黄色水果和细致的木头。口感强劲，密度高但带有活跃的酸度，橡木和烘烤味都很好，新鲜的酸度，柠檬果酱、红茶和长长的尾部留香，已经很好喝，但未来发展巨大。简直就是典型的好萨旺酒。

Western reviews.review: (2007) Gentle nose with some leaf tea and honeyed nuances and very nice fruit. The palate is poised and charming, though the Botrytis is modest. It is silky and elegant, with lovely fruit and balance and a cleansing tangerine acidity.
Western reviews.translation: 2007年：这款红酒的鼻子很轻柔，带有茶叶和蜂蜜的细微味道，果味也很好。口感平衡，迷人，但Botrytis的味道不太强烈。口感滑顺，优雅，果味美丽，平衡好，带有清新的柑橘酸味。

Western reviews.review: 90-92 Barrel sample. A ripe, creamy wine, which has great poise and freshness. There's just a touch of caramel, but the fruit—sweet apples and crisp pears—is dominant. A pure pleasure to taste.
Western reviews.translation: 90-92 瓶装样品。 这是一款成熟的、奶油般的红酒，具有优雅的风格和新鲜的口感。 有一点点焦糖味，但果味占主导地位——甜苹果和脆梨。 品尝起来是一种纯粹的享受。

Chinese pairs.original: 半支装。酒体饱满、迷人，深沉近黑色泽，富含浓郁的黑醋栗、树莓、泥土、青椒、桉树及甜香料气息，入口散发肉豆蔻和烟熏味道，单宁细腻柔和，酸度怡人，余韵很干，且充满木桶滋味。
Chinese pairs.new: Full-bodied and alluring, this wine boasts a deep, nearly black hue. Rich aromas of blackberry, raspberry, earth, green pepper, eucalyptus, and sweet spices fill the senses. On the palate, notes of cardamom and smokiness emerge, complemented by refined tannins and a refreshing acidity. The finish is dry and lingering, with a pronounced oak character.

English pairs.original: Half bottle. This full-bodied wine was pretty good, revealed a dark even close to black color, aromas of black currant, raspberry, earth, capsicum, eucalyptus and sweet spices, flavour of nutmeg and smoke on the palate, finely acidic and tannic, with a very dry and woody finish.
English pairs.new: 半瓶。这种充满体力的红酒很不错，呈现出深黑色，气味中有黑加仑、草莓、泥土、辣椒、桉树和甜香料，口感中有肉豆蔻和烟味，口感酸度和苦度均衡，干爽且木质的尾韵。

Western reviews.review: Classic in style, the wine is on the bright, crisp, leafy, cassis and tobacco side. There is more freshness than depth, more acidity than fruit and the wine is more complex and enjoyable on the nose, than on the medium bodied palate. This is probably drinking at peak. Very little air is needed here, just pop and pour.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒以经典的风格呈现，具有明亮、清脆、叶绿、黑加仑和烟草的特征。酒中有更多的新鲜感，而不是深度，有更多的酸度，而不是果味。酒在鼻子上更复杂和愉悦，而在中等体积的口感上则不如。可能这瓶酒正处于最佳饮用时期。这里几乎不需要空气，只需轻轻打开即可享用。

Western reviews.review: Medium ruby-red, the color is quite bright. The nose displays a medium intensity of Redcurrant fruit & sweet vanilla oak. The palate is lively & the red-fruit is seamlessly integrated with smooth. ripe tannins & notes of new oak. Acidity is good but not sharp & alcohol is warming, but balanced. The length of flavor is excellent & the finish is harmonious - a nice wine. 11/03 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色，非常亮丽。酒香中有中等强度的红果味和甜的香橼木味。口感活泼，红果味与细腻的成熟橡木味和新橡木味完美融合。酸度适中但不刺激，酒精温暖但平衡。口感持久，尾韵和谐，非常好喝。评分：11/03 DCAMW。

Western reviews.review: Clearly the best value in Pauillac today, this is classic in all the right ways. Expressive, yet stoic, the wine is full-bodied, concentrated, tannic and filled with tobacco-drenched creme de cassis, red plums, cedar, wet earth, cigar wrapper and forest leaf. Youthful, fresh and still waiting for its prime time window, two hours of decanting or 3-4 years in the cellar will do the trick. 95 Points
Western reviews.translation: 目前来说，巴约（Pauillac）地区最值得推荐的红酒是这个。它在所有方面都表现出典型的风格。表达丰富，然而又很稳重。酒体丰富浓郁，具有坚实的纹理，充满了烟熏的黑加拿大浆果、红李子、红松、潮湿的土壤、雪茄纸和森林叶的风味。年轻、清新，仍在等待最佳品尝时机。两小时的脱颖或3-4年在酒窖中储存将会带来最佳效果。评分95分。

Western reviews.review: Tiefdunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, breitere Randaufhellung, in der Nase feine, tabakig unterlegte rotbeerige Frucht. Am Gaumen elegant und frisch, saftige Tannine, Kirsche im Nachhall, zarter Mokka-Anklang, feiner Schokotouch, sehr gutes Lagerpotenzial. Finessenreich, mit fester Struktur. - BEST BUY
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫红色反光，酒液边缘有较宽的光环。酒香中有细微的烟草味和红酒果味。口感优雅，新鲜，果实丰富，口感柔和，余味中有樱桃和微微的咖啡味，末端有轻微的巧克力味。酒体结构坚实，储存潜力极好。 - 强烈推荐。

Western reviews.review: Deep, ruby-red color, is virtually opaque. Lovely cassis aromas are typically dusty. On the palate pure cassis fruit has good acidity & a very firm, fine tannic structure. Flavors last well & the wine finishes beautifully balanced. A beautiful wine. 11/09 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，几乎透明。酒中有典型的黑currant气味，带有尘土味。口感上，黑currant果味清晰，酸度好，坚实的、细腻的纤维结构。酒味持久，完美平衡的口感。是一瓶美味的酒。评分：11/09 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 黑莓和无花果的味道，单宁集中圆润，带有草本和浆果的味道，中等酒体，回味中等。
Chinese pairs.new: Flavors of blackberry and fig, with concentrated tannins that are smooth and herbal, with notes of fruit. Medium-bodied, with a medium finish.

Western reviews.review: This estate belongs to Cos d'Estournel, and the style and vinification recall the richness of that wine. Along with that richness are firm tannins, allied to some astringency. But the intense blackberry and black fig flavors give it a polished feel and a New World-style, fairly heavy finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶酒属于Cos d'Estournel酒庄，风格和酿造方法都与该酒庄的风格相似，富有厚重感。酒中有坚实的橡皮质感和略带干涩感，但黑莓和黑枣的浓郁风味让它具有光滑感和新世界风格的厚重尾韵。

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Rubingranat, violette Randaufhellung, in der Nase saftige, kräuterwürzig unterlegte reife Frucht. Am Gaumen pfeffrig unterlegte Zwetschkenanklänge, mittlere Textur, festes Tanninrückgrat, das noch etwas rau wirkt, gut anhaltend, mittlere Länge, einiges Entwicklungspotenzial.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

深红色，紫色边缘，酒香中有浓郁的果味和草药味。口感中有辣椒味的浆果风味，中等的口感，坚实的牙齿结构，仍然有些粗糙，持久，中等长度，具有很好的发展潜力。

Le Petit Mouton De Mouton Rothschild 200.name: Le Petit Mouton De Mouton Rothschild 2002

Chinese pairs.original: 有着烟草和焦油味，草本的香气，中等酒体，混合着黑莓和蓝莓的收尾，回味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Smoky and tar notes, herbal aromas, medium-bodied, with a finish of blackberry and blueberry, lingering flavors.

Western reviews.review: (2003) A very deep inky hue. Dense plummy nose. The palate has dry tannins with a muscular grip. A bit brutish and coarse with aggressive tannic finish. Moderate length. Lacks charm and finesse.
Western reviews.translation: 2003年：深度的紫黑色。酒香浓郁，带有浓郁的黑杏味。口感干涩，具有强烈的纽扣感。酒体粗犷，结尾带有强烈的苦味，持续时间中等。缺乏魅力和细腻感。

Chinese pairs.original: 李子和红莓的香气，酒体适中，柔滑的单宁和短的回味，不是特别好。
Chinese pairs.new: The wine has aromas of plum and raspberry, a medium body, smooth tannins, and a short finish, which isn't particularly impressive.

Western reviews.review: Segundo vinho do mítico Châtea u Lafite, esse tinto é composto a partir de uvas 51% Cabernet Sauvignon, 46% Merlot, 2% Petit Verdot e 1% Cabernet Franc, cultivadas em Pauillac, com estágio entre 16 e 20 meses em barricas de carvalho francês, sendo 10% novas. Chama atenção pelos taninos firmes e de grãos finos e pela acidez vibrante, que envolvem suas frutas vermelhas e negras de perfil mais fresco, conferindo verticalidade ao vinho. Impressiona pela tipicidade, pela precisão e pela finesse do conjunto. Fluido e gostoso de beber, tem final cheio e persistente, com toques terrosos, de ameixas, de tabaco, de couro, de grafite e de ervas frescas. Não aparenta ter mais de 20 anos. Está ótimo agora, mas deve se manter assim, pelo menos, por mais uma década. Álcool 12,5%.
Western reviews.translation:
来自传奇的Château Lafite的第二瓶红酒，酒精含量为12.5%。该酒由51%的卡波弗雷蒙、46%的梅洛、2%的佩蒂·维多和1%的卡波弗雷蒙葡萄制成，种植在帕乌拉克地区。酒龄在16到20个月之间，使用10%的新法国橡木桶。酒精含量为12.5%。

该酒以坚实的果皮和细粒的颜料而闻名，具有清新的酸度，包围着鲜红和黑色的果实，给人以清新的感觉，酒体垂直。酒的典型性、准确性和细致的结合令人印象深刻。酒体流畅，口感舒适，酒尾丰富持久，带有泥土、杏仁、烟草、皮革、铅笔和新鲜香草的味道。酒的年龄不超过20岁，目前酒体非常好，但至少可以维持10年以上。

Western reviews.review: (2003) A very light nose; seems to lack a bit of vitality and depth. Notes of anis and biscuit. The palate had good ripeness, low tannins and not much grip. Tarry fruits on the finish. This will make fine early drinking.
Western reviews.translation: 2003年：酒香非常轻微，似乎缺乏活力和深度，闻到有 licorice 和饼干的味道。口感上有良好的成熟度，低度的苦味和不够的抓握力。酒尾有焦糖般的果味。这瓶酒适合早期饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 口感丰富柔顺且极具深度，香料味突出，伴有独特的浆果风味，单宁成熟紧实，适合长期保存。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich and smooth texture with great depth, prominent spice flavors accompanied by a unique fruitiness, well-ripened tannins that are firm and suitable for long-term aging.

Western reviews.review:
in speyer an 3 aufeinander folg. tagen probiert- am 2.Tag am besten
aufhellender rand mit deutlich orange
heller fassbrand, rote früchte, kirsche,
schöne fruchtigkeit, leichte adstr und gute länge
am 3. tag viel zwetschge aber auch rel. säurebetont 16,5/20
Western reviews.translation:
在斯佩尔（Speyer）进行了3天的品酒测试，第二天的效果最佳。

第二天的颜色：光亮的边缘，明显的橙色。

颜色：清澈的酒液，红色果实，草莓，美好的果味，轻微的酸度，良好的持久性。

第三天的颜色：大量的浆果味道，但也略带酸度。

评分：16.5/20

Chinese pairs.original: 咖啡，烤橡木和成熟的水果香味，中等浓郁，具有很好的结构，单宁细腻，回味较长。
Chinese pairs.new: Coffee, toasted oak, and mature fruit aromas, medium-bodied, with good structure, fine tannins, and a long finish.

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Rubingranat, tiefer Farbkern, zart aufgeockert, Randaufhellung, in der Nase kräftige Dörrobstanklänge, zart marmeladig, Zwetschkenröster, am Gaumen sehr harmonisch und elegant, festes Tanninrückgrat, das gut integriert ist, zeigt eine gute Reife und Länge, Zwetschken im Abgang. Bereits gut einsetzbar. (Top 12)
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，深色核心，边缘微微发亮，酒色渐深。酒香浓郁，带有浓郁的果酱和浆果味，特别是熟透的浆果味。口感非常和谐，细腻，坚实的果皮回味，酒中果酱和浆果味浓郁，酒尾留有浆果味。酒已经成熟，适合现在饮用。 (评分：Top 12)

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark, ruby-red color is not quite opaque. The aromas are an intense combination of cedar, chocolate, coffee & tobacco-leaf, leading to notes of cocoa. The dark-fruit on the palate is tightly structured & but shows watery touches. The wine is astringent at present, but is not over-extracted. Acidity is lively, alcohol is balanced & the fruit is closed, leaving the finish short, however there is clearly  intense fruit that is will open with time. 11/01 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深红色的酒液，颜色不完全透明。酒中的香气是强烈的，混合了松木、巧克力、咖啡和烟草的味道，最后带有可可的味道。口感中的黑果味道紧密结构化，但有轻微的水分感。酒目前略带苦味，但没有过度提取。酸度活跃，酒精平衡，果味封闭，留下短暂的尾韵，但明显有强烈的果味会随着时间的推移而打开。 评分：11/01 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 这支酒呈现浓郁甜美的熏烤木桶味道，以及浑厚的黑莓和李子的香气，结实的单宁骨架造就了干燥口感，酸度怡人，余韵尽显单宁的强劲。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine presents a rich, sweet, smoky oak flavor, along with a full-bodied blackberry and plum aroma. A robust tannin structure creates a dry finish, with refreshing acidity and a lingering aftertaste that showcases the tannins' intensity.

English pairs.original: A lot of sweetly smoky oaks and over dense blackberry and plum fruits, the wine was very dry on the palate with a firm and tannic backbone, and good acidity, there was a ‘big’ and tannin-infused finish.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的口感非常干爽，带有坚实的橡木味和果实味，特别是黑莓和浆果的味道非常浓郁。口感中还有一定的酸度，尾部则是坚实的橡木味和果实味的余韵。

Western reviews.review: One of the top successes of the vintage, this blend of 50% Cabernet Sauvignon, 45% Merlot and the rest Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot was harvested between October 8 and 24. The late harvest ensured perfect ripeness as evidenced by the sweet bouquet of black cherries, lead pencil shavings, cassis and subtle barbecue smoke. Well-balanced with good acidity, ripe tannins, medium to full body and a layered mouthfeel.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒是当年最好的产量之一，混合了50%卡波内尔·萨维尼翁、45%梅洛和其他卡波内尔·法兰克和佩蒂·维多的葡萄。酒庄在10月8日至24日之间收获了葡萄，晚收获确保了葡萄成熟，酒的香气中充满了黑樱桃的甜味、铅笔削片、黑加仑和微妙的烧烤烟味。酒口平衡，酸度好，苦味成熟，体积中等到中等以上，口感丰富多层次。

Western reviews.review: This is an impressive wine, packed with toast, yellow fruits, spice and richness. There is structure as well, the fruit layered with wood. Great balance and great potential.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶令人印象深刻的红酒，充满了 Toast、黄色水果、香料和丰富的口感。酒中还有一定的结构，水果和木头的味道交织在一起。酒的平衡很好，未来发展的潜力也很大。

Western reviews.review: Striking aromas of currants, sweet oak and toasted brioche are followed up here by deeply fruited, wholly like-minded flavors whose early plumpness and clear bent to ripeness remind just a bit of top-flight Cabernet from closer to home. Its latter-palate structure, however, is very much that of younger claret, and, if arguably a little grippy and austere at the finish just now, this is a wine with great places to go.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有浓郁的黑葡萄、甜橡木和烤面包的香气。口感丰富，果实充足，酿造风格与当地顶级卡贝网相似。然而，后期口感结构更像年轻的克莱雷特，目前可能略带坚韧和严谨，但这款酒仍有很大的发展潜力。

Western reviews.review: A solid 2008 with subtle berry, currants and light vanilla bean character that turns to chocolate. Full body, with fine tannins and a long, long finish. Best after 2013.
Western reviews.translation: 2008年的这款红酒具有细微的黑berry、葡萄干和轻微的香草豆香，随后转变为巧克力。酒体丰富，具有细致的橡皮质和长长的尾部。建议在2013年后享用。

Western reviews.review: Smoky, toasty oak notes take the lead in this powerful red, framing a core of dark flavors, with cassis, espresso and tar. Bold, with muscular tannins and chewy extract. Best from 2013 through 2020.
Western reviews.translation: 浓郁的烟熏、-toast oak香气占据了这款红酒的主导地位，围绕着一系列深色风味，包括黑加仑、浓缩咖啡和焦油。强烈的口感，肌肉发达的纤维和厚重的提取物。建议在2013年至2020年期间饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 香料、甘草，甜美的水果香味，结构丰富，单宁较少，回味持久并伴有水果的气息。
Chinese pairs.new: Spices, honey, sweet fruit aromas, rich structure, moderate tannins, long finish with fruity notes.

Western reviews.review: Hugel has always made a benchmark Pinot Noir. This has weight and richness. It does have a strong wood content that provides some bitterness, though it is rounded out by the note of ripe red plum, lifted by final acidity.
Western reviews.translation: 赫格（Hugel）一直以其品质的波尔多红酒而闻名。这款酒有着丰富的口感和厚实的体积。虽然它的木质成分较强，带有苦味，但却被成熟的红杏和最后的酸度所圆润。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有黑加仑和黑巧克力的香味，浓郁的水果和烟草味道，有嚼劲的单宁，结构丰富。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich fruit flavors and smoky notes, with hints of blackcurrant and dark chocolate, firm tannins and a complex structure.

domaine bouchard pere et fils echezeaux.name: domaine bouchard pere et fils echezeaux 2006

Chinese pairs.original: 这是一支结构完整的葡萄酒，陈年赋予了此酒少许颜色上的砖色调以及微微的马厩气味，然而新鲜的红果味依旧主导着香气，同时些许的巧克力味赋予了层次，回味中填满了钢铁般的矿物质，且暗藏着一丝冬枣的果味。
Chinese pairs.new: This is a well-structured wine, with aging imparting a subtle brick hue and a hint of horse stable aroma. However, fresh red fruit flavors still dominate the nose, with a touch of chocolate adding depth. The finish is filled with iron-like minerality, and a subtle hint of quince fruit.

English pairs.original: This was a wine with complete structure, it has indicated some bricky bue on color and brett hints on nose with age, whereas the fresh (red) fruit was still the dominate elements here, whilst the layer was added by the subtle chocolaty notes, its finish was crammed with steely-minerals and the suggestion of winter date fruit.
English pairs.new: 这是一瓶结构完整的红酒，酒色呈现出一些红砖色的调性，酒香中带有老化的 Brett 气味，而新鲜的红果味仍然是主导元素，细微的巧克力味道则为酒体添加了新的层次，酒尾则充满了钢铁矿物质和冬季水果的味道。

Western reviews.review: Smoky, rich, this wine packs a powerful punch of vibrant black cherry fruits, and generous sweet tannins. It is big, muscular, the structure wide and open. It shows richness and opulence, brought into line by a firm, youthful structure that needs five years or more to age.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有浓郁的烟熏味，富有黑樱桃果味，具有强烈的甜度和丰富的口感。它的体积大，肌肉丰满，结构宽广开阔。它展现出丰富的富贵感和奢华感，但由年轻的结构所带来的刚性，需要五年或以上的时间来成熟。

domaine des lambrays clos des lambrays 2.name: domaine des lambrays clos des lambrays 2015

Chinese pairs.original: 桶边试饮。此酒紧实、多香料的香气中夹杂着森林地、成熟黑莓、灌木和咸矿物，延续到其富有张力且带有通透酸度及绵密、结实单宁的口感中。
Chinese pairs.new: Tasting notes from the barrel. This wine boasts a tight, aromatic bouquet with notes of forest floor, ripe blackberry, bramble, and saline mineral, which carry through to its tense, transparent acidity and dense, solid tannins.

English pairs.original: Barrel tasting. A tight, spices-suffused bouquet intermixed with forest floor, ripe blackberry, undergrowth and savoury-mineral that continued onto the tension-filled palate that possessed bright acidity and densely firm tannins building the structure of this wine.
English pairs.new: 酒庄品尝。酒香紧致，充满了香料、森林地面、成熟黑莓、林下植物和矿物质的味道，延续到紧张的口感中，具有明亮的酸度和坚实的纽扣，构建了这瓶酒的结构。

Western reviews.review: Black fruits dominate this dense wine with a rich texture and a structure packed with ripe tannins. It is an impressive bottling from this single-owner Grand Cru. Dark and firm it will need aging. Drink from 2022.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒以浓郁的黑果味为主，具有丰富的口感和充满成熟的橡皮质的结构。它是来自单一所有者的格兰克鲁酒庄的出色产物。酒体黑暗坚实，需要长时间陈酵。建议2022年后饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有黑醋栗、可可豆、摩卡咖啡的气息，伴有精妙的橡木味，单宁柔顺，结构均衡，余味持久。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of black prune, cocoa bean, and mocha coffee, complemented by refined oak notes, smooth tannins, balanced structure, and a long-lasting finish.

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, jugendliche Reflexe, violetter Rand. In der Nase süßes Brombeerkonfit, mit etwas Orangenzesten. Am Gaumen saftig, intensive Kirsch-Preiselbeer-Frucht, wirkt kraftvoll und komplex, feine Tannine, hat eine gute Länge, feine Zwetschkennote im Rückgeschmack.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，年轻的光泽，紫色边缘。鼻子中有甜的浆果味，带有橙子皮的味道。口感丰富，浓郁的樱桃和甜菜子味，感觉强烈复杂，细腻的橡皮感，持久的口感，回味中有杏仁的味道。

Chinese pairs.original: 黑莓，樱桃的香气，黑醋栗和轻微的烤橡木味道。酒体丰满，单宁新鲜，干净，非常精致，回味有点短。
Chinese pairs.new: Blackberry and cherry aromas, with notes of black walnut and subtle oak. Full-bodied with fresh tannins, clean and refined, with a slightly short finish.

Western reviews.review: Cantenac-Brown has been tending to classic Margaux delicacy in recent years, but this 2003 is an exception. It is round and full of ripe blackberry fruits, with good tannins and is likely to develop well. Imported by Diageo Chateau & Estates.
Western reviews.translation: 坎坦克-布朗（Cantenac-Brown）近年来一直致力于传统的马格努（Margaux）风格，但2003年的这款红酒却是例外。它富有圆润感，充满成熟的黑莓果味，口感良好，且有足够的坚果味和酸度，预计会有很好的发展前景。

Chinese pairs.original: 黑醋莓，黑樱桃，花香，甘草和香草的香气，中等酒体，大量的香料味道，天鹅绒般的单宁。
Chinese pairs.new: Blackberry, black cherry, floral, honey, and herbal aromas. Medium-bodied, with a plethora of spice flavors and silky tannins.

Western reviews.review: Medium bodied, refined, soft and perhaps best described as elegant, there is a nice, floral, earthy, cigar box and cherry character here, that you find from start to finish. 90 Points
Western reviews.translation: 体积中等，细腻，柔和，甚至可以说是优雅的。酒中有一个美好的花香、泥土、雪茄盒和樱桃的特征，从头到尾都能感受到。评分：90分。

Western reviews.review: Bright red, very young colour. Pleasant, ripe, almost jammy nose. Dense, silky mouthfeel with lots of well-balanced mellowness. A Château in the midst of a rebirth which is a constant source of amazement.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色的，非常年轻。酒香甜美，果实成熟，几乎像果酱一样。口感丰富细腻，平衡充分，非常舒适。这个酒庄正处于复兴的时期，令人惊叹。

Western reviews.review: Tiefdunkles Rubingranat, jugendliche Reflexe, violetter Rand. In der Nase mit Kakao und Nougatanklängen unterlegte dunkle Beerenfrucht, zarte Gewürznoten. Am Gaumen stoffig, angenehme Süße, zart nach Kokos, etwas exotischer Stil, integrierte Tannine, süße Kirschenfrucht im Nachhall.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，年轻的反光，紫色边缘。鼻子里有巧克力和牛奶糖的香味，覆盖着黑色浆果的味道，微妙的香料味道。口感厚重，甜度适中，微微带有椰子味，风格有些异国情调，整合了坚果的味道，余味中有甜的樱桃味。

Chinese pairs.original: 此酒带有迷人的烟熏木桶以及甜美的黑色森林水果及黑醋栗香气，入口味道十分相似，相比以往的年份更加成熟甜美，中段红色和黑色莓果相互交融，并带有黑巧克力的微苦滋味，单宁浓厚、圆润，余韵微干，却展现坚实、奶油般的滑爽。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts alluring smoky oak and sweet black forest fruit and blackberry notes, with a palate that mirrors the nose. Compared to previous vintages, it's even more mature and luscious. The mid-palate is a harmonious blend of red and black berries, with a subtle bitterness of dark chocolate. The tannins are dense and velvety, with a dry finish that showcases a rich, creamy texture.

English pairs.original: Beautiful bouquets with smoky oaks, sweet black forest fruits and cassis, and the same feeling on the palate, more sweetness than usual, but still a beautiful wine with ripe black as well as some red berry fruits and chocolate bitterness on mid-palate, the tannin was dense, round and creamy, but firm and a little bit drying on the finish.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的香气非常美丽，带有烟熏的橡木、甜黑森林水果和黑加思（一种黑berry果酱）的味道。口感上也同样美丽，甜度比平常高，但仍然是一瓶美丽的酒，带有成熟的黑果和一些红果的味道，以及中口的巧克力苦味。酒中的纤维素（tanin）浓密、圆润、奶油般的，但在尾部则坚硬且略带干涩。

Western reviews.review: From a blend of 65% Cabernet Sauvignon, 20% Merlot, 13% Cabernet Franc and 2%Petit Verdot, this medium bodied, round, ripe, blackberry, cedar wood, tobacco and earth infused wine is ready to drink. 90 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒由65%卡波内尔·萨维尼诺、20%梅洛、13%卡波内尔·法兰克和2%佩蒂·维多特混合而成。它是一款中等体积、圆润、成熟的黑莓、松木、烟草和泥土味的红酒，已经成熟到可以直接饮用。评分：90分。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark ruby-red - not opaque. Aromas are rich, with red-fruit and a slightly odd leafy note. The palate has freshness, but is a little hollow, lacking a ripe fruit core. Acidity and alcohol are in balance but rthe finish comes up a bit short. 11/07 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，透明度不高。酒香浓郁，带有红果味和略带奇怪的叶绿味。口感清新，但略显空洞，缺乏成熟的果肉核心。酸度和酒精平衡，但尾韵略短。评分：11/07 DCAMW。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung. Intensive schwarze Beerenfrucht, Nuancen von Brombeeren, Cassis und etwas Kirsche, ein Hauch von Holz und kandierten Orangenzesten. Mittlerer Körper, wirkt süffig und etwas weich, dezente Süße im Kern, bereits gut entwickelt und gut antrinkbar, etwas Nougat im Nachhall. Peter Moser
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。强烈的黑色浆果风味，带有浆果风味的黑莓、黑莓和一些草莓，伴有木头和糖浆橙子片的微妙。中等体积，口感顺滑和柔和，核心中有细微的甜度，已经很成熟，口感很好，余味中有奶油味。- 彼得·莫瑟 (Peter Moser)

Western reviews.review: Soft, silky, forward and medium bodied, there is verve, sweet fruit and lift. The wine remains focused on earthy nuances, dark red fruits, cassis, spice and licorice. You can age this for 7-10 years before popping a cork. 92 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感柔和细腻，中等体积，带有活力和甜美的果味。酒中保留了土质的细微差别，黑红色果味，黑加仑，香料和甘草。可以将酒储存7-10年后再打开。评分92分。

Western reviews.review: This wine is firm, almost classically Pauillac in its black currants and acidity. The tannins are present behind the bright fruit and crisp texture. This wine has a dry core that will need to soften. Drink from 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒坚实，几乎典型的波亚克风格，黑currant和酸度都很典型。酒中的纤维素在鲜果和清爽的口感后面隐隐可见。这瓶酒有一个干的核心，需要时间来软化。建议2025年后饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 散发出铅笔屑，潮湿的泥土，森林的地面，甜黑醋栗和浆果的香气，接着有烟雾和香草的香气，中等浓郁，新鲜，可口，柔软质感的单宁，余味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine offers notes of pencil shavings, damp earth, forest floor, sweet black currant and fruit aromas, followed by smoky and herbal scents. It has a medium intensity, is fresh, palatable, and has soft, velvety tannins with a long finish.

Western reviews.review: There is a high proportion of Merlot in this wine, and it shows in its ripe softness, with a depth of sweetness that goes all the way through. The tannins are there, but only just discernible.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒中含有大量的梅洛葡萄，体现出其成熟的柔顺性，甜度也非常深入。虽然有轻微的苦味，但几乎不易察觉。

Western reviews.review: Tiefdunkles Rubingranat, fast schwarzer Kern, violetter Rand. In der Nase feine Kirschenfrucht, aber sonst recht verhalten und scheu. Am Gaumen knackig und frisch, feine Zitrusfruchtanklänge, feste Tannine, die gut eingebunden sind, rassig, bleibt ganz gut haften, mittlere Länge, wirkt insgesamt eher schlank.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，近乎黑色的核桃色，紫色边缘。鼻子里有细微的樱桃果味，但其他方面则比较谨慎。口感坚实清新，细微的柑橘果味余韵，坚实的果皮，紧密结合，优雅，留下较好的印象，中等长度，整体感觉较瘦。

Western reviews.review:
Acidité enfin fondue !!avec le fruit de baie rouge bien présent ce qui le rend harmonieux et plaisant à boire ce qui n’était pas le cas il ya 2 ans
Belle longueur en bouche 
Nez à la fois minéral, terreux et frais
Western reviews.translation:
酸度终于消失了！与红果味道浓郁的存在使得它变得和谐而令人愉悦，两年前的情况并不是这样。

口感持久

香气既有矿物质的清新，又有泥土的深度和清新的味道。

Chinese pairs.original: 这款酒带有明显的黑胡椒、蓝莓、烟熏及经典的泥土香气，黑莓、桑树的滋味中略显蓝莓和青椒味道，酒体饱满，酒质顺滑，中等偏上的酸度与柔软、丝滑的单宁相呼应，中等余韵。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts prominent notes of black pepper, blueberry, smokiness, and classic earthy undertones. Flavors of blackberry and mulberry are subtly accompanied by hints of blueberry and green pepper. The full-bodied wine has a smooth texture, balanced acidity, and soft, silky tannins, with a moderate finish.

English pairs.original: The wine had notable black pepper, blueberry, smoke, classical earth on the nose, and blackberry, mulberry, hint of blueberry, capsicum notes on the palate, full-bodied with a very smooth texture, showed medium+ acidity and soft and silky tannin followed by a medium length.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的香气中有着显著的黑胡椒、蓝莓、烟熏和典型的土壤味道。口感上有黑莓、桑葚、蓝莓的余味，以及一丝辣椒的味道。酒体丰富，口感非常滑顺，酸度中等以上，纤维柔软细腻，余味持久中等。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, jugendliche Reflexe, violetter Rand. In der Nase reife Dörrobstnote, zart nach süßen Gewürzen, Nelken. Am Gaumen frisch, finessenreich strukturiert, elegant, feiner Schokotouch, zarte Kirschenfrucht, dezent nach Bitterschokolade im Abgang.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，年轻的光泽，紫色边缘。鼻子中有成熟的枣子味，轻微的甜香料和丁香味。口感清新，结构精致，优雅，细微的巧克力味，轻微的樱桃果味，尾部有轻微的苦巧克力味。

Western reviews.review: Fully mature, soft textured, medium bodied wine with loads of cedar and tobacco surrounding the bright, red, spicy, earthy fruits. There is no need to age this any longer, but it will be around for at least another 5-8 more years. 87 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒已经完全成熟，口感柔和，体积中等，满满的柯尼利亚斯和烟草味包围着鲜艳的红色、辣椒、泥土的果味。没有必要再继续陈化了，但它至少还能维持5-8年。评分87分。

Western reviews.review: Peppery, olive, leather, floral, barnyard, black cherry, rooty, menthol and mineral aromas. Dry, elegant but slightly lean and fresh with grainy tannins. Cherry, plum, spicy, tobacco, earthy, olive, cassis, and leather flavours. Fresh, youthful palate needs 2-4 years. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的香气中包含了以下元素：胡椒、橄榄、皮革、花朵、农场、黑樱桃、根部、薄荷和矿物质。

口感干净、优雅但略微瘦削，具有沙粒般的苦味。口感中包含了黑樱桃、浆果、辣味、烟草、泥土、橄榄、黑加仑和皮革等元素。

这瓶红酒的口感新鲜、年轻，建议在2-4年后再次品尝。

Western reviews.review: (2007) Nice meaty, slightly animal quality to the nose, with solid berry fruit. Appealing fruitiness on the palate, with robust but quite elegant and nicely-weighted tannins and good balance if only moderate length.
Western reviews.translation: 2007年：酒香中有浓郁的肉质和略带动物的质感，伴有坚实的浆果风味。口感上有着吸引人的果香，搭配着强劲但又优雅、平衡的口感和适中的长度。

Western reviews.review: Leuchtendes Rubingranat, dunkler Kern, violetter Rand, in der Nase feines dunkles Beerenkonfit, etwas Nougat, reif wirkend. Am Gaumen zart vegetal unterlegt, rotbeerige Frucht, feine Tannine, mittlere Textur, frische Struktur, bereits antrinkbar, zitroniges Finish, vielseitiger, fruchtbetonter Speisenbegleiter von einiger Finesse.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一瓶美酒的评论。翻译成中文如下：

亮丽的红色葡萄酒色，深色的葡萄核，紫色的边缘，酒鼻中有细微的黑berry果酱和一点点牛奶糖的味道，给人一种成熟的感觉。口感上，轻微的植物味道，红色果酱味道，细微的坚果感，中等的口感，清新的结构，已经可以饮用，酒尾有柠檬味，适合各种菜肴的配酒，具有细腻的风格。

Chinese pairs.original: 丰富的黑醋栗，樱桃和湿土地的气息，酒体适中，单宁柔滑，回味持久。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich blackberry, cherry, and earthy aromas, medium-bodied with smooth tannins and a long finish.

Western reviews.review: A bright, ripe style, with very fresh crushed plum, raspberry and blackberry fruit wrapped in silky tannins and laced with hints of anise and black tea. The rounded finish has modest grip for mid-term cellaring. Drink now through 2020.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒呈现出明亮、成熟的风格，具有新鲜的浆果风味，如浆果、黑莓和黑berries，包裹在细滑的纤维素中，带有黑茶和丁香的微妙气味。圆润的尾部具有适度的抓握力，适合中期陈化。建议立即饮用至2020年。

Chinese pairs.original: 深宝石红色，呈现出相当丰富优雅的乌梅香，花果香十足，有一点新桶带来的奶油香，柔软，迷人的和复杂的葡萄酒，风格轻柔，回味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich, velvety garnet in color, presenting a richly elegant umami flavor, with pronounced floral and fruity notes, and a hint of creamy oak from new barrels. Soft, alluring, and complex, this wine is characterized by a light, refined style and a long, lingering finish.

Western reviews.review: Another brilliant effort from the Frey family, the 2007 La Lagune reveals a beautiful layered mouthfeel with lots of plum, black cherry, and kirsch liqueur-like notes intermixed with a spicy character. Medium-bodied, broad, and savory with beautiful purity and overall equilibrium, this beauty should be drunk over the next 7-8 years.
Western reviews.translation: 弗雷家族再次展现出精彩的作品，2007年拉拉古纳红酒呈现出丰富的口感层次，带有浓郁的浆果、黑樱桃和可可酒香味，混合着一丝辛辣的特质。口感中等，宽广而丰富，具有优美的纯粹度和整体平衡，这个美酒应在未来7-8年内享用。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有熏烤，黑莓和樱桃的香气和味道。中等至浓郁，具有良好的单宁，中等甜美的果实回味。
Chinese pairs.new: Smoky, blackberry, and cherry aromas and flavors. Medium to full-bodied, with good tannins and a medium sweet fruit finish.

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark, ruby-red color is not quite opaque. Dark fruit aromas are framed by notes of coffee & tobacco leaf. The black fruits on the palate are a little flat & are closed up by drying leafy notes. Acid is at best balanced & the alcohol is a touch warming, but the finish is short & lacks fruit. 11/07 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深红色的葡萄酒，颜色不完全透明。酒中有浓郁的黑果味，伴有咖啡和烟草叶的香气。口感上，黑果味有些平淡，被干燥的叶绿味所盖过。酸度平衡，但酒精略微带有暖意，口感短暂，缺乏果味。评分：11/07 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 此酒散发精致的矿石水果香气，略带香蕉（幸亏只有一点点）及白胡椒气息，入口彰显活泼的水果滋味，结构感强，舌尖能感到明显的酸度，支撑起整个酒体的骨架。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine exudes a refined minerality and fruit aroma, with subtle hints of banana (thankfully just a touch) and white pepper. Upon entry, lively fruit flavors are revealed, with a strong structure and a pronounced acidity that provides a solid backbone to the wine.

English pairs.original: This had a nicely polished white stone fruits nose, with a touch of banana (thankfully subtle) and white pepper too, an interesting palate, showing lively fruit, with some structural elements behind it that I rather like, this was a wine with a bit of substance and grip too, the acidity exist in a rather light backbone but they were certainly there at the tip of the tongue.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒有着优雅的白石果香气，伴有香蕉的微妙味道（幸好不明显）和白胡椒的味道，口感丰富生动，结构清晰，酒中有着一定的实力和持久感，酸度虽然不强，但在舌尖处却清晰可感。

Western reviews.review: Sweet yellow fruits with a touch of honey open the wine. On the palate, the wine is rich, lush and sweet, while being balanced out by acidity. The wine is fully mature at this point and drinking great.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感非常甜美，入口时有黄果和蜂蜜的味道。口感丰富、富有层次，酸度适宜，平衡得很好。目前这款红酒已经成熟，品质非常出色。

Chinese pairs.original: 这支中等酒体的酒款，呈深红色泽，富含奔放的李子与黑加仑香气，夹杂泥土般的草药气息赐予层次感，多汁的黑加仑与树梅滋味中，带有迷人的薄荷及木桶香料味道；怡人的酸度与成熟果香，及略显强劲的年轻单宁达到完美平衡，悠长的余韵中带有烤面包与香草气息。
Chinese pairs.new: This medium-bodied wine boasts a deep red hue, with exuberant plum and blackcurrant aromas, intertwined with earthy herbal notes that add depth. Luscious blackcurrant and blackberry flavors are complemented by alluring hints of mint and oak spice, while a refreshing acidity and mature fruit notes are perfectly balanced by a subtle yet robust youthfulness. The finish is long and lingering, with whispers of toasted bread and subtle herbal undertones.

English pairs.original: A medium-bodied wine had a deep red color with fragrant aromas of plums, black currants and layers of earthy green herbs, flavors of juicy black currants and raspberries dominated the palate with overtones of mint and woody spice. Bright acidity balanced the ripe fruit as the aggressive grip of young tannins built throughout a long toasty, vanilla laced finish.
English pairs.new: 这款中等体积的红酒呈现深红色，具有浓郁的果香，包括浆果、黑加仑和土壤中的青草味。口感上，浓郁的黑加仑和莓果味占据主导地位，伴有薄荷和木质香料的余味。酒中的酸度清晰，完美平衡了成熟的果味，而年轻的天然纤维素则在长长的、带有焦糖和香草味的尾部不断增强。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, jugendliche Reflexe, violetter Rand. In der Nase reife Dörrobstnote, zart nach süßen Gewürzen, Nelken. Am Gaumen frisch, finessenreich strukturiert, elegant, feiner Schokotouch, zarte Kirschenfrucht, dezent nach Bitterschokolade im Abgang.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，年轻的光泽，紫色边缘。鼻子中有成熟的枣子味，轻微的甜香料和丁香味。口感清新，结构精致，优雅，细微的巧克力味，轻微的樱桃果味，尾部有轻微的苦巧克力味。

Western reviews.review: Fully mature, soft textured, medium bodied wine with loads of cedar and tobacco surrounding the bright, red, spicy, earthy fruits. There is no need to age this any longer, but it will be around for at least another 5-8 more years. 87 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒已经完全成熟，口感柔和，体积中等，满满的柯尼利亚斯和烟草味包围着鲜艳的红色、辣椒、泥土的果味。没有必要再继续陈化了，但它至少还能维持5-8年。评分87分。

Western reviews.review: Peppery, olive, leather, floral, barnyard, black cherry, rooty, menthol and mineral aromas. Dry, elegant but slightly lean and fresh with grainy tannins. Cherry, plum, spicy, tobacco, earthy, olive, cassis, and leather flavours. Fresh, youthful palate needs 2-4 years. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的口感特点包括:

有荞麦般的辣味、橄榄、皮革、花朵、农场、黑樱桃、根茎、薄荷和矿物质的气味。

口感干净、优雅但略微瘦削且新鲜，有细粒的橡胶质感。

口感中有樱桃、浆果、辣味、烟草、泥土、橄榄、黑加斯和皮革的味道。

这瓶红酒的口感新鲜、年轻，需要2-4年才能达到最佳状态。

Western reviews.review: (2007) Nice meaty, slightly animal quality to the nose, with solid berry fruit. Appealing fruitiness on the palate, with robust but quite elegant and nicely-weighted tannins and good balance if only moderate length.
Western reviews.translation: 2007年：酒香中有厚实的肉质和略带动物的质感，伴有坚实的浆果风味。口感上有着吸引人的果香，搭配着强劲但又优雅、平衡的口感和适中的长度。

Western reviews.review: Leuchtendes Rubingranat, dunkler Kern, violetter Rand, in der Nase feines dunkles Beerenkonfit, etwas Nougat, reif wirkend. Am Gaumen zart vegetal unterlegt, rotbeerige Frucht, feine Tannine, mittlere Textur, frische Struktur, bereits antrinkbar, zitroniges Finish, vielseitiger, fruchtbetonter Speisenbegleiter von einiger Finesse.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一瓶美酒的评论。翻译如下：

酒色深红色，中间深色，边缘紫色，酒香中有细微的黑berry果酱味，略带奶油味，酒味成熟。口感轻微的草味，红色果味，细微的苦味，中等的口感，清新的结构，已经可以饮用，酒尾有柠檬味，酒味丰富，适合搭配各种菜肴，尤其是富有细腻感的菜肴。

Chinese pairs.original: 酒体呈深红宝石色泽，馥郁的奶油巧克力、烟草、桂皮、桑莓、黑醋栗、西莓干与焦糖香气，入口集中体现蘑菇与泥土滋味，酒体中等偏上，酸度较高，单宁结实微苦柔，整体结构柔顺，伴随着中等余韵。
Chinese pairs.new: Deep ruby-red hue, with aromas of rich chocolate, tobacco, cinnamon, blackberry, black truffle, dried cranberry, and caramel. The palate is concentrated, showcasing earthy and mushroom flavors. Medium to full-bodied, with high acidity and firm, slightly bitter tannins. Smooth texture and a moderate finish.

English pairs.original: Deep ruby color, the wine revealed focused aromas of cream chocolate, tobacco, cinnamon, prune, black currant, mulberry and caramel, intense flavours of mushroom and earth on the smooth palate, medium+ body with high acidity and firmly bitter tannin, followed by a medium length.
English pairs.new: 深红色葡萄酒，酒中展现出焦点的香气，包括奶油巧克力、烟草、肉桂、浆果、黑加仑、黑莓和焦糖等，口感平滑，味道浓郁，含有蘑菇和泥土的味道，酒体中等以上，酸度高，苦味坚定，尾部中等长度。

Western reviews.review: Dark garnet, purple reflections, broad ochre rim. Delicate notes of liquorice and blackberries, candied orange zest, some nougat, a hint of black olive, tobacco spice. Medium body, fine fruit expression, fresh acidity, balanced, mineral, lingers long, subtle spice in the finish, an approachable food wine. (Drink/+15).
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，紫色反射，橙色边缘。酒中有薄荷糖味的橙子皮、黑莓、薄荷糖、黑橄榄、烟草香味。酒体中等，果味细腻，酸度清新，平衡，矿物质，余味持久，尾部有微妙的香味，适合与食物搭配的酒。 (建议饮用时间：+15年)

Western reviews.review: Time has been good to this wine. The fresh, red berries, tobacco, cigar box and earth are really shining. Soft, medium bodied and with all its tannins resolved, now is a great time to be enjoying this wine. 92 Points
Western reviews.translation: 时间对这瓶红酒很友好。新鲜的红果、烟草、雪茄盒和泥土的味道非常鲜明。口感柔和，中等体积，所有的苦味都已经消失，现在是享受这瓶红酒的最佳时机。评分：92分。

Western reviews.review: A great success, with its concentration, solid tannins and black, bitter cherry fruit flavors. The wine has spice, licorice and some layers of wood. Certainly, this would be worth aging for 4–5 years.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶极好的红酒，酒中浓郁的口感、坚实的橡皮质感和黑色、苦涩的樱桃果味。酒中还带有香料、甘草和一些木头的复杂层次。毫无疑问，这瓶红酒值得在4-5年后再次品尝。

Western reviews.review: (2008) Quite forward, gamy nose, with solid, sweet black fruit. The palate has a silky weight, with quite a refined tannin structure. Quite dark, juicy plum and cherry skin fruit. Good quality.
Western reviews.translation: 2008年：这款红酒的气味相当直接，带有强烈的动物味，伴随着浓郁的黑果味。口感丰富细腻，纤维结构精致。口味中有浓郁的黑桃和樱桃皮果味。品质良好。

Chinese pairs.original: 浆果和矿物的香味，中等单宁，中等偏丰满的酒体，良好的回味，微辛辣。
Chinese pairs.new: Fruity and mineral aromas, moderate tannins, full-bodied with a good finish, and a hint of spice.

Western reviews.review: Lively, bright, fresh, red and dark red fruits, licorice, flowers, truffle, smoke and coffee bean aromas create the complex nose. The wine hovers between medium/full body, with soft, textures, fennel, plums and freshness in the finish. This is probably fully mature. If I had any bottles, I'd drink them over the next few years, as the wine will probably fade from here.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的气味复杂多样，包含了鲜红和深红的水果、 licorice、花朵、松露、烟雾和咖啡豆的香气。酒体在中等到中等以上的范围，口感细腻，余味中包含了丁香、李子和清新感。这瓶红酒可能已经完全成熟。如果我有这瓶酒，我会建议在未来几年内饮用，因为酒味可能会在此之后逐渐消退。

Western reviews.review: Red wine with a quite developed colour here. It still has a quite dense ruby-red centre, but towards the rim it is rather tawny. Starting to fading a little bit, so it indicates a certain age. Really fine nose here it is certainly indicating maturity here, and I would first of all say complex. It is actually blending a lot of different things together here. I pick up some damp tobacco, cedar wood, almost like cigar box, with some leather, some earthy notes, smoke, truffle. There is also quite vigorous fruit. Still have a lot of wild berry notes in there. We still have a good density on the palate. Finely distributed tannin. So plenty of extract, but a good maturity here. A lot of those wild berry notes, with those fine spices; spice box, with tobacco and wood. So quite sophisticated I would say at this stage. It should probably reach twelve, fifteen years somewhere in that direction. So complex and layered, with a very long finish. I think the strength here is really that it starts out here quite powerful with copious amount of fruit, but it truly has a very long finish with nuance and spiciness. So a mature and sophisticated wine to enjoy today.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色已经相当发达了。虽然它仍然有一个密集的红宝石中心，但靠近边缘的颜色已经变得较为金黄。酒色开始变淡，这表明它已经有一定的年份了。酒香非常精致，表明它已经成熟了，而且非常复杂。它实际上是融合了很多不同元素。 我闻到了一些潮湿的烟草、松木、几乎像雪茄盒一样的味道，以及一些皮革、泥土、烟雾和松露。酒中还有一些非常丰富的果味。酒中仍然有很多野生莓果的味道。口感仍然很浓密。纤维素分布得很均匀。所以酒中有很多提取物，但酒已经很成熟了。酒中有很多野生莓果的味道，以及那些精致的香料；香料盒、烟草和木头。所以我认为它已经相当成熟和复杂了。它应该在12到15年之间达到巅峰。所以酒非常复杂和层次分明，口感非常长。 我认为这瓶酒的强项在于它开始时非常强烈，果味非常丰富，但它真正的强项在于它有一个非常长的尾部，具有细腻和香料的味道。所以这是一瓶成熟和复杂的酒，值得今天享用。

Chinese pairs.original: 雪松、香料以及黑色水果香气，酒体偏轻，酸度愉悦，中等水果粘感，回味夹带淡淡黑胡椒。
Chinese pairs.new: Pine, spice, and dark fruit aromas. Light-bodied with a pleasant acidity, moderate fruit texture, and a subtle black pepper finish.

Western reviews.review: Medium deep ruby red color. Gently roasted nose with hints of coffee, cassis and red berries, there are also some herbal notes to it. The palate is on the lighter side, yet quite elegant, fresh with a medium to long finish, still youthful and restrained.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒。酒香中带有轻微烤味，带有咖啡、黑加仑和红果的味道，还有些草药味。口感轻盈，优雅，新鲜，中等到长的尾部，仍然年轻且克制。

Chinese pairs.original: 散发着黑醋栗，咖啡，香草的气味，香气复杂，有天鹅绒般的单宁，酒体饱满，黑色水果的风味，回味中长。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts aromas of black prune, coffee, and subtle herbs, with a complex bouquet and silky tannins. The full-bodied palate is rich in dark fruit flavors, with a lingering finish.

Western reviews.review: Medium-bodied, bright, crisp red fruits are at the core of the wine. On the secondary side, the tobacco, forest leaf, earth, peppery spice and herbs add color the piquant red berry notes. Frim and crisp, with a sharp cherry/cranberry, spice and tobacco note in the finish, the wine reqires drinking. 90 Points
Western reviews.translation: 本酒的口感中等，果香清新，果味鲜美。酒中还带有烟草、森林叶、泥土、辣椒和香草等复杂的香气，完美地与果味相结合。酒尾清新果香，带有樱桃、蔓越莓、辣椒和烟草的味道，酒的风格鲜明，需要尽快品尝。评分：90分。

Western reviews.review: (2004) Almost opaque. Vigorous nose: tar, ink, blackcurrant & soot. Very tannic & full-bodied palate. Damsons. But harmonious and smooth. Like an 86 - very Cabernet Sauvignon dominated. Liquorice/coffee notes on the finish. Opulent stylish Las Cases - the best of the 70's.
Western reviews.translation: 2004年：几乎完全不透明。强烈的鼻子：焦油、墨水、黑currant和烟灰。口感非常坚实且充满体积。浆果味道浓郁。然而，口感和平衡，非常顺滑。类似于86分，非常典型的卡波涅尔（Cabernet Sauvignon）。口感结束时有焦糖和咖啡的味道。奢华的风格，拉斯卡斯（Las Cases）是70年代的最佳之一。

Chinese pairs.original: 酒庄采用新派的酿酒技术：酒精发酵、乳酸发酵及陈年，均在全新的法国橡木桶内进行。长时间的浸渍赋予此酒深邃的颜色。香气展现香料（桂皮、甘草），成熟的红色水果（树莓、山楂）、泥土、灌木、碎岩石和雪茄盒。酒体饱满，口感滑爽、柔和，伴有紧实、活泼的回味。
Chinese pairs.new: The winery employs modern winemaking techniques: fermentation, malolactic fermentation and aging, all taking place in brand new French oak barrels. Prolonged maceration lends this wine its deep color. Aromas reveal spices (cinnamon, licorice), mature red fruits (raspberries, blackberries), earth, underbrush, pebbles and cigar box. The full-bodied wine has a smooth, velvety texture and a lively, persistent finish.

English pairs.original: The estate follows the modern vinification: the fermentation, MLF and maturation all take place in 100% new French oak barrels. The long maceration gave the wine a deep color. It smelled of spices (cinnamon, liquorice), ripe red fruits (raspberry, hawthorn), earth, underbrush, crushed rock and cigar box. Full-bodied, polished and supple, with a tight and vivid finish.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒采用现代的酿造方法：发酵、乳酸化和成熟均在100%的新法兰克尔橡木桶中进行。长时间的浸泡使得酒液呈现出深色的外观。酒香中充满了香料（丁香、甘草）、成熟的红果（草莓、山楂）、泥土、灌木丛、碎石和雪茄盒的味道。酒体丰富、光滑、柔韧，口感紧致、生动。

Western reviews.review: The production is always tiny, but with the combination of only 20% of the vineyard being replanted and a difficult vintage, less than 500 cases will be made of the 2011. From 70% Merlot, 25% Cabernet Franc and 5% Cabernet Sauvignon, the wine is aged in 100% new oak. Coffee, floral, black plum, earth and smoky barbecue aromas open to a supple-textured, round, sweet, black cherry-filled wine. 91-93
Western reviews.translation: 产量一直很小，但由于只有20%的葡萄园被重新种植，并且是难得的好酒年，2011年的产量将不足500箱。由70%梅洛、25%卡波弗朗奇和5%卡波斯维涅组成的酒精，全部陈酿于新橡木桶中。咖啡、花香、黑浆果、泥土和烟熏烧烤香气开启到一种柔软的质地、圆润、甜美的黑浆果充满的酒。评分：91-93。

Chinese pairs.original: 黑浆果，红李子，巧克力和香草的香气。单宁良好，活泼的水果味道，美味多汁，回味中等。
Chinese pairs.new: Dark fruit, plum, chocolate, and vanilla aromas. Good tannins, lively fruit flavors, luscious and full-bodied, moderate finish.

Western reviews.review: Fine wood flavors, balancing with black berry fruits, red plums and some soft chocolate and vanilla. The tannins play a fine supporting role, leaving the vivacious fruit, with its delicious juicy character, to have the final word.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感丰富，木质风味与黑莓、红杏和软化的巧克力和香草完美融合。酒中的天然纤维素（tanins）起到了辅助作用，让果味的鲜美和醇厚的口感占据了主导地位。

Chinese pairs.original: 这个年份采用了特别的黑色酒标。充满糖渍味的香气同样深邃。口感展现新鲜的果味、丝滑的单宁以及轮廓清晰的矿物质感，一并延续到那相当严肃的收尾中。
Chinese pairs.new: This vintage features a distinctive black label. The nose is equally profound, with a rich, syrupy quality. The palate showcases fresh fruit flavors, silky tannins, and a clear mineral profile, all of which persist through to the serious finish.

English pairs.original: The special black label is used in this vintage for the double celebration. The candied nose was also deep. Fresh fruit combined with silky tannin and defined minerality, all concluding in a fairly austere end.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的特别黑标是为了纪念双重庆典而特别设计的。酒鼻子清晰，深度感强。酒中融合了新鲜水果和细滑的苦味，矿物质味道清晰，结尾干净清晰。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, opaker Kern, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung, attraktives dunkles Beerenkonfit, Edelholz, reife Pflaumen, zarte Kräuterwürze, kandierte Orangenzesten. Komplex, schwarze Kirschen, präsente, kraftvolle Tannine, etwas Nougat im Abgang, ein stoffiger Wein mit süßem Finale, braucht noch Zeit. Peter Moser
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，透明的葡萄核，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮，吸引人的深红色浓果酱，高档木头，成熟的浆果，微妙的草药香味，糖浆橙子。复杂的黑杏，强烈的存在，坚实的苦味，尾部有奶油味，厚实的口感，甜尾，需要时间来成熟。- Peter Moser

Western reviews.review: With a depth of color impossible to miss, the wine opens with smoke, licorice, blackberry, cassis, and wet forest aromatics. Rich, fleshy and concentrated with all the right stuff, the wine is ripe, sensuous, silky and polished, The finish delivers smoked fruits, ripe tannins and length of flavor, which keeps right on going. This will age seamlessly for decades. With bottle age, this could score higher, as it develops.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色深度令人难以忽视，酒体中充满了烟熏、甘草、黑莓、黑加仑和湿润森林的香气。酒体丰富、肉感、浓郁，所有的元素都完美融合，酒体成熟、诱人、滑顺、光滑。酒尾呈现烟熏的果味、成熟的苦味和持久的口感，持续时间长达数秒。酒体有着极强的年龄潜力，随着瓶龄的增长，酒体会逐渐完美，甚至可能会获得更高的评分。

Western reviews.review: This wine is dense in expressive, dark fruit and solid tannins which give it a rich, enveloping feel. With its spicy score and crisp acidity, there is great potential for aging. Drink from 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒浓郁而丰富，展现出黑色果实的深度和坚实的苦味，给人一种丰富而包围感。伴随着辛辣的香气和清脆的酸度，这款红酒有着很好的陈化潜力。建议2025年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: Profound, limpid and beautiful ruby .color. It opens up with an amazingly delicious coconut note, followed by ripe and elegant dark fruits, like blackberries and plums. There’s a liquorice note too. Palate very round, balanced and elegant. Firm but very polished tannins. Succulent and very pleasant
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色深红润，清澈透明。酒体开启后，首先是令人惊艳的椰子味，随后是成熟的黑莓和浓郁的黑枣，口感圆润、平衡、优雅。酒中的木糖醇味也很明显。口感非常圆润，质地平衡，坚实但又非常光滑。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, dezente Randaufhellung, feine dunkle Beerenfrucht, zart rauchig unterlegt, dezente Kräuterwürze. Mittlerer Körper, gute Komplexität, zart nach Brombeeren, gut eingebundene Tannine, frisch strukturiert, schwarze Kirschen im Abgang, mineralisch und anhaltend, verfügt über Entwicklungspotenzial.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色泽，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮，细致的黑色浆果味道，微微的烟熏味和淡淡的草药味。中等体积，复杂性好，微微的黑莓味，柔和的果皮，新鲜的结构，黑杏在尾部，矿物质和持久，具有发展潜力。

Chinese pairs.original: 泥土的香气，烟熏的味道与黑色水果， 焦油沥青的味道浓郁的果香，极好的丰富感，多层次的口感，纯净，新鲜和成熟的单宁
Chinese pairs.new: Earthy aromas, smoky flavors and black fruit, rich and intense notes of tar and asphalt, excellent depth, complex texture, pure, fresh and mature tannins.

Western reviews.review: Color is a medium to deep ruby-red. Dark -fruit aromas are concentrated with liquorice notes overlaid by a slight dustiness. On the palate the underlying dark fruit is concentrated but displays green notes. Acidity is fresh & alcohol is balanced. There are touches of new oak, but these are quite subtle. The finish lasts well & is pleasantly balanced. 11/10 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深红色，中度至深红色。

香气：浓郁的黑果味，伴有 licorice（甘草）和轻微的尘土味。

口感：黑果味浓郁，但带有青柠的味道。酸度新鲜，酒精平衡。有新橡木的味道，但很轻微。尾韵持久，平衡舒适。评分：11/10

Chinese pairs.original: 浆果、烤面包、焦糖、咖啡喝石榴的香气。醇厚的酒体，天鹅绒般的单宁，回味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Fruity and toasted bread aromas with hints of caramel and pomegranate. A rich, velvety texture with soft tannins and a long, lingering finish.

Western reviews.review: The wine has a good deep ruby-red color, that is not quite opaque. On the nose a good intensity of attractive rich, dark plum fruit is overlaid with cedar & coffee. The palate shows rich, warm, dark-fruit, backed by firm, drying & slightly astringent tannins which come to dominate the mid-palate. Acidity is soft & alcohol is slightly warming. The finish has passable length & is soft with velvety textured fruit. 11/01 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色，透明度不算太高。在鼻子里，酒体散发着浓郁的黑浆果香气，伴有松木和咖啡的味道。口感丰富，暖洋洋的黑果味道占据主导地位，后味的干酪感和略带苦涩的味道逐渐占据中口。酸度较软，酒精略带温暖。酒尾长度一般，口感软滑，黑果味道丰富。评分：11/01 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 酒体呈中等红宝石色泽，带有黑色光晕，集中体现奶油香草、太妃糖、树莓、黑樱桃、李子、烘培咖啡、动物皮毛、泥土及些许草药和甘草香料气息，中等偏上的酒体，中上酸度与单宁完美相融，偏长的余韵带有香草滋味。但对于一支玛格堡来说，这款酒过于甜美。
Chinese pairs.new: The wine has a medium garnet color with a hint of black undertones. It showcases a concentrated nose of vanilla, caramel, raspberry, black cherry, plum, roasted coffee, leather, earth, and subtle herbal and licorice notes. The medium-full body is balanced by moderate acidity and smooth tannins. The finish is long and lingers with a sweet vanilla flavor. However, for a Margaux, this wine is overly sweet.

English pairs.original: Medium ruby color with dark hue, intense bouquets of vanilla cream, toffee, raspberry, dark cherry, plum, toast coffee, animal fur, earth, subtle herb and liquorice spices, medium+ body, medium+ acidity&tannin, with a medium+ vanilla length. It's too mellow for a Chateau Margaux.
English pairs.new:
颜色：深红色，带有深色调。

香气：浓郁的香气，带有香草奶油、糖浆、草莓、黑樱桃、浆果、-toast咖啡、动物皮毛、泥土、微妙的香草和 licorice调味。

口感：中等体积，中等酸度和苦度，口感持久，带有香草味。

评价：虽然品质不错，但略显温和，不符合Chateau Margaux的标准。

Western reviews.review: Definite richness alongside classic elegance. It’s a stylish wine, the fruit integrated into a beautiful structure. It’s not all refinement, because there is also a weight to the black plum skin and dark berry character. A wine that will age over many decades.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有典雅黑的典雅风格，果味与结构完美融合。虽然它有着优雅的风格，但也有一定的重量感，黑浆果和黑莓的特征让人印象深刻。这是一款可以长期陈年的佳酿。

Western reviews.review: This is a stunning Chateau Margaux, made in a sexy, up-front, elegant style, with deep creme de cassis fruit intermixed with spring flowers, a solid inner core of richness and depth, but again, very sweet tannins as well as striking minerality and elegance. One of the most seductive Chateau Margauxs given its recent bottling, this blend of 87% Cabernet Sauvignon, 10% Merlot, and the rest tiny quantities of Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot should drink beautifully for the next 25-30 years. Remarkably, a mere 36% of the entire production was selected for the 2008 Chateau Margaux.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一个惊人的沙勒罗瓦酒庄，采用性感、直接、优雅的风格，深度的黑加仑果实与春天的花朵相混，富有实力和深度的内核，但又很甜的橡果和出色的矿物质和优雅。最近的装瓶中，这个由87%卡波弗雷蒙、10%梅洛和少量卡波弗朗和佩蒂维多特组成的酒庄是最诱人的沙勒罗瓦酒之一。该酒的美味将在接下来的25-30年内保持完美。值得注意的是，仅有36%的产量被选中制作2008年的沙勒罗瓦酒庄。

Western reviews.review: Shows a lightly sinewy edge, with coiled notes of damson plum, red currant preserves, rooibos tea, singed balsa wood and iron, lacking the vintage's typical crisp edge. The fine-grained finish is approachable already, but this will age gracefully and should develop a more perfumed than rich profile.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒展现出轻微的筋道感，带有浓缩的浆果味，如浆果酱、红葡萄、红茶、焦木和铁味。与典型的清爽口感相比，这款红酒略显不足。然而，细致的口感已经很接近成熟，随着时间的推移，它将会展现出更香艳而非丰富的风格。

Western reviews.review: Ruby in color, the wine offers truffle, cigar box and red fruits. This is all about the secondary nuances and the soft, silky, elegant textures. Medium bodied, but with charming, red fruit characteristics, this is at full maturity. This is not a Margaux to make old bones, but in a blind tasting, no one is going to think this is from 2007. It's surprisingly much better than anticipated. 93 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒呈现出深红色，酒中带有松露、雪茄盒和红果的香气。这是所有关于次级细微差别和柔软、丝滑、优雅的质感。酒体中等，但具有迷人的红果特征，这瓶酒已经达到成熟。这种玛格朗酒不适合长期储存，但在无视酒标签的品酒中，很难猜出这瓶酒是2007年的产物。令人惊讶的是，这瓶酒比预期要好得多。评分93分。

Western reviews.review: Schon der erste aromatische Eindruck haut einen buchstäblich aus den Socken, Die winken unglaublich delikae Noten von Flieder, Himbeere, Moschus, Sauerkirsche, man reibt sich die Nase und glaubt an ein Trugbild, da muss ein Clos du Tart oder so was Ähnliches im Glas sein - doch nein, es ist ein Margaux, versichert Paul Pontallier und ist selber erstaunt und hingerissen vom Charme seines Kindes, das auch im Mund ungemein delikat, elegant und feingliederig daher kommt, voller Liebreiz, dabei auch dicht und sehr lang und komplett; selten so ausgewogen in diesem Stadium und kann doch dauern. Entweder ganz jung geniessen (11/12) oder sechs Jahre reifen lassen. (16/20)
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的第一印象就像一记重击，令人惊艳不已。酒中的芳香令人难以置信地优雅，带有百合花、蓝莓、麝香、山核桃等细腻的香味。闻到后，你会以为这是一个高级葡萄酒，可能是像Clos du Tart这样的顶级葡萄酒，但实际上，这是玛格朗红酒（Margaux）。Paul Pontallier表示，他自己也被这个葡萄酒的魅力所吸引。口感细腻、优雅、精致，充满魅力，口感丰富、持久，非常平衡。这种平衡在这种年龄阶段非常罕见。这个葡萄酒可以选择两种方式来享受：一是尽快品尝（11-12年），二是将其储存六年（16/20）。

Chinese pairs.original: 这支十分惊艳的酒款呈石榴红色泽，墨水和皮革味气息较为丰盈，同时香草、烘培咖啡、松仁、谷物、雪茄、雪松、花朵与黑色水果味道分明，入口充满新鲜蓝色水果滋味，与木桶气息相平衡，且隐约感到玛歌村特有的花香，口感丝滑，酒体中等，单宁中等偏上，酸度清新怡人，悠长的余韵伴随香草和烘培咖啡气息。
Chinese pairs.new: This stunning wine boasts a pomegranate red hue, with rich, velvety notes of ink and leather. Aromas of lavender, toasted coffee, hazelnut, grains, cigar, pine, flowers, and black fruit are distinct, while the palate is filled with fresh blue fruit flavors, balanced by oakiness. A hint of the region's signature floral notes can be detected, with a smooth texture, medium-bodied wine, moderate tannins, and crisp acidity. The finish is long and refreshing, with lingering notes of lavender and toasted coffee.

English pairs.original: The surprising wine featured garnet color, quite inky and leathery bouquets of vanilla, roasted coffee, pine nut, kernel, cigar, cedar, flowers and dark fruits, fresh blue fruits notes balanced with oaky notes on the palate, hint of Margaux's floral characters, silky texture, medium body, medium+ tannin, refreshing acidity, with a long length of vanilla and roasted coffee notes.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒令人惊讶，呈现出深红色，浓郁的墨色，具有香味的皮革、香草、烤咖啡、松果、核桃、雪茄、松木、花朵和黑果的复杂气味。口感上，新鲜的蓝果味与橡木味相互平衡，带有马格努（Margaux）地区独特的花朵特征，口感细滑，体积中等，纤维度中等以上，酸度清新，长尾中带有香草和烤咖啡的余味。

Western reviews.review: I can’t say enough about how beautifully classic, racy, and gracious the wines of Brane Cantenac have become over the last decade. The stunningly elegant 2006 exhibits a sweet, subtle smoke note intermixed with creme de cassis in its medium-bodied style with superb nobility, concentration, and sweet tannin. Possessing a complex, luscious personality with strikingly beautiful, velvety tannins, it should be at its finest between 2012-2025+.
Western reviews.translation: 布兰·卡滕纳克（Brane Cantenac）的红酒在过去十年里变得越来越经典、越来越有风度。2006年的这款红酒令人惊艳，具有典型的中等体积风格，带有甜美的烟熏味和黑加仑浆果味，具有优雅的风度、浓郁的质地和甜美的橡木味。它的复杂而丰富的性格，带有细腻的橡木味，应该在2012-2025年左右达到最佳状态。

Western reviews.review: Displays plum jam and currant bush on the nose. Full-bodied, with sweet, ripe fruit, soft, round tannins and a long finish. Slightly loose knit at the moment, but will come together with bottle age. Builds on your palate. Needs time. Best after 2013. Tasted twice, with consistent notes.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中有浓郁的浆果和黑currant的味道。口感丰富，果实甜美，纤维软绵，尾部长而持久。目前还略显松散，但随着瓶龄的增长会变得更加完美。口感丰富，需要时间来发酵。建议在2013年后喝。

Western reviews.review: Already incredible to drink, the wine is concentrated, rich, sensuous, and packed with layers of fruit that does not quit. Even though it is early days, it is difficult not to be seduced by the complex aromatics and if that does not grab you, the velvet-textured opulence in the finish will. If you prefer exuberant, youthful fruits, with decadent textures, and a finish packed with fruit and glycerin, try a bottle now, If you desire more secondary notes, wait a few more years. Either way, this is a superb wine and a clear candidate for the best vintage of Brane Cantenac ever produced! Drink from 2024-2055.
Western reviews.translation: 这个红酒已经非常值得品尝，酒精浓度高，富有感官体验，果味丰富，层次感强。即使是初期品尝，也很难抵抗其复杂的香气。如果你不喜欢这种香气，那么酒尾的细腻、丰富的口感也会让你着迷。如果你喜欢果味丰富、年轻、豪放的红酒，带有丰富的口感和果味，建议现在就喝。如果你更喜欢成熟的红酒，带有更多的次级香气，建议再等几年。无论如何，这是一款出色的红酒，是布兰·卡南（Brane Cantenac）历史上最好的产季之一！建议在2024-2055年之间饮用。

Western reviews.review: Garantiert der grösste Brane, der je auf die Flasche gekommen ist, enorme aromatische Komplexität, mit einer nie gesehenen Balance von Reife und Frische, Blumigkeit und Fruchtigkeit, perfekt reifes Tannin absoluter Klasse, unaufdringliche Dichte und Tiefe, nicht enden wollende Länge: das absolute Must in diesem Jahr.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒保证了最大的酒庄生产的酒量，带来极大的芳香复杂性，具有从未见过的成熟和新鲜的平衡，花香和果香的完美结合，品质极高的成熟的橡木味，优雅的厚度和深度，持续不绝的长尾：今年的绝对必备之选。

Western reviews.review: Rich, fruity and with great potential, this ripe wine is also dense with firm tannins. Its juicy fruits are a part of a package with the concentrated tannins and smoky wood flavors that allow for long aging. This is an impressive wine from one of the Margaux properties owned by the Lurton family. Drink from 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒富有成熟的果味，具有巨大的潜力。酒体丰富，坚实的橡木味和浓郁的果味相互融合。酒中浓郁的橡木味和坚实的果味使其具有长期陈化的潜力。这是一款出自卢尔顿家族（Lurton family）所有的马格努（Margaux）产区的出色红酒。建议2025年后饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 酒体呈中等偏上的红宝石色泽，香气中等偏上，散发干花、树莓、草莓、雪松、咖啡、焦糖、太妃、黑巧克力及微微茴香、甘草和奶油香草气息，入口相当顺滑，中等偏上的单宁与酸度，酒体平衡，余韵持久，但对我来说还不够优雅。
Chinese pairs.new: The wine has a medium to full-bodied garnet color. The aroma is medium to full-bodied, with notes of dried flowers, raspberry, strawberry, pine, coffee, caramel, butterscotch, dark chocolate, and subtle anise, licorice, and vanilla. The palate is smooth and silky, with medium to full-bodied tannins and acidity, a balanced body, and a long finish. However, it falls short of being elegant to my taste.

English pairs.original: Medium+ ruby color, medium+ aromas of dried flower, raspberry, strawberry, cedar, coffee, caramel, toffee, dark chocolate, hint of fennel, liquorice and vanilla cream, quite smooth on the palate, medium+ tannin balanced medium+ acidity with a long length, but it's not elegant enough for me.
English pairs.new:
颜色：深红色

香气：花香、干果、草莓、草莚、红木、咖啡、焦糖、糖浆、黑巧克力、丁香、甘草和香草奶油

口感：口感平滑，中等的苦味和酸度，长长的尾部，但我觉得它不够优雅。

Western reviews.review: A gem from the Left Bank is the 2008 Château Ducru Beaucaillou, which comes from just one-third of the total production and is 85% Cabernet Sauvignon and 15% Merlot. This brilliant Saint-Julien boasts a still vivid ruby/purple color as well as a head-turning bouquet of crème de cassis, high-class smoke tobacco, truffle, and some gravelly, rocky minerality. Possessing medium to full-bodied richness, silky tannins, and thrilling purity of fruit, it’s just at the early stages of its drink window and has an easy two decades or more of prime drinking.
Western reviews.translation: 左岸的珍品是2008年杜克鲁白石庄园（Château Ducru Beaucaillou），产量仅为总产量的三分之一，85%卡波涅（Cabernet Sauvignon）和15%梅洛（Merlot）。这座圣朱利安（Saint-Julien）的精英酒庄，呈现出仍然生动的红紫色，配上令人惊艳的黑加香酱（crème de cassis）、高级烟草烟气、松露和一些岩石矿物质的芳香。酒中富有中等到中高的厚度，细滑的纹理和令人惊叹的果实纯度，正处于饮用窗口的早期阶段，预计有两十年以上的顶级饮用时间。

Western reviews.review: This has real depth of flavour, with an extremely good quality, juicy slate and mineral-filled finish. The emphasis, however, is upfront and all about the brambly blackberry and bilberry fruits, edged with liquorice, eucalyptus and hedgerow. It's hugely enjoyable to see such different personalities from vintage to vintage.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有真正的深度口感，口感丰富，矿物质和石灰质的尾韵非常出色。然而，重点仍然放在果实上，特别是浓郁的黑莓和蓝莓，带有 licorice、桉树和灌木丛的味道。不同年份的个性差异非常明显，令人非常愉快。

Western reviews.review: Chocolate, coffee and sweet plum notes give this wine great richness. It has wood that needs time to integrate, although the main character is beautiful, velvet-textured, ripe fruit and plenty of sweet tannins.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感丰富，带有巧克力、咖啡和甜浆果的味道。虽然它还需要一些时间来融合木质味，但它的主要特点是丰富的、细腻的果味和丰富的甜苦味。

Western reviews.review: Deep garnet colored, the 2008 Ducru-Beaucaillou begins a little broody, giving up glimpses of tar, chargrill, moss covered tree bark and fungi scents over a core of baked plums, warm cassis and blackberry compote plus a touch of unsmoked cigars. Medium-bodied, the palate has firm, ripe, grainy tannins and bold freshness supporting the earth laced black fruit layers, finishing minerally.
Western reviews.translation: 2008年杜克鲁-博卡略（Ducru-Beaucaillou）红酒呈现深红色。初步尝试时，酒体略显沉闷，释放出焦炭、焦烧、树皮和蘑菇的香气，伴随着烤石榴、黑加拿大浆果和黑莓酱的味道，最后带有未点燃的雪茄烟味。酒体中等，口感坚实，口感丰富，细颗粒的橡木味和清新气息支持着泥土味浓郁的黑果层，酒尾矿物质味浓郁。

Western reviews.review: Wow. This is really impressive for the vintage, with a solid core of raspberry, currants and spices. Full and round, with velvety tannins and a long, long finish. Superb winemaking for the vintage.
Western reviews.translation: 哇！这款酒的品质非常出色，尤其是考虑到它的产年。它的核心是浓郁的莓果、黑枣和香料的味道。酒体丰富圆润，纤维柔软，尾部长长。酒庄的酿造技艺非常出色，值得称赞。

Chinese pairs.original: 深宝石色，伴随着清晰而且经典、充满烤吐司的香气，夹杂着新鲜香草、香料、泥土、动物皮毛、烟熏矿物质及少许黑布林的香味。中等酒体，入口淡同时富有高酸度，厚度和平衡感稍显不足；严肃、多矿物的回味具有良好的浓度。
Chinese pairs.new: Deep garnet color, accompanied by a clear and classic nose of toasted bread, with notes of fresh herbs, spices, earth, animal hide, smoky minerals, and a hint of black pepper. Medium-bodied, with a delicate entry and high acidity, though the texture and balance are somewhat lacking; the finish is serious and mineral-driven, with good concentration.

English pairs.original: Deep ruby followed by a precise and classical, toast-suffused bouquet intermixed with fresh herb, spices, earth, animal fur, smoky-mineral and black plum undertone. Medium-bodied, quite light and acidic on the entry, somewhat lacking the weight and balance; it had an austere, mineral-driven finish that offered good density.
English pairs.new: 深红色葡萄酒，精确典雅的香气，带有新鲜香草、香料、土壤、动物皮毛、烟熏矿物质和黑浆果的底调。口感中等，入口轻盈酸爽，缺乏重量和平衡；尾部矿物质驱动，呈现出良好的密度。

Western reviews.review: Medium bodied, firm, stoic, not quite austere, but close. Better on the nose, with its red fruits, cedar, herbs and forest floor, scents than on the palate. Mature and ready to drink. 88 Points
Western reviews.translation: 体积中等，坚实，沉着，虽然不算严肃，但很接近。更适合在鼻子里闻，带有红果、松木、香草和森林地板的香气，而不是在口中。成熟且可立即饮用。评分88分。

Western reviews.review: (2004) This still has a vivid ruby colour, with a little browning. Very attractive on the nose, it has plenty of full, earthy spice and a rich, ripe raspberry and redcurrant fruitiness. It seems very harmonious, if a touch one-dimensional. On the palate it has a good attack of keen, crisp raspberry fruit that is quite lean and sinewy, with plenty of acidity and incisive tannins. Perhaps this lacks a little flesh, especially on the mid-palate, but there is plenty more spice, tobacco and stuffing on the finish.
Western reviews.translation: 2004年，这款红酒仍然呈现出鲜红色的颜色，略带微微的褐色。酒香非常吸引人，满满的泥土香气和丰富的浓郁红莓和红 gooseberry 的果香。整体感觉非常和谐，但略带单调。口感上，果香清脆果香，非常瘦长，带有丰富的酸度和锐利的纤维。可能这款红酒略缺乏肉感，尤其是在中口感上，但在尾部仍然有丰富的香气，包括烟草和其他复杂的成分。

Western reviews.review: The wine is a deep ruby-red, the pigmentation is deep, but not opaque. The aromas are of restrained dark fruit with cedary touches. The palate displays lovely open, cassis alongside clean cedar on the palate. Good acidity lifts the fruit nicely. Alcohol is balanced and the fruit on the finish is rounded & ripe. 11/98 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒呈现深红色，色泽深厚但不透明。酒中的香气以抑制的黑果味为主，伴有松木的味道。口感上，黑果味和松木味并存，清晰而干净。酒中的酸度适宜，果味被酸度提升，酒精平衡，余味果味圆润且成熟。评分：11/98。

Western reviews.review: Medium-bodied, close or at full maturity, the wine is soft, polished, round and charming. Instead of power, it offers a measured dose of ripe plums, licorice and espresso. Drink this over the next 5 years or so before the fruit fades. 91 Points
Western reviews.translation: 体积适中，接近或达到成熟期，酒精软、光滑、圆润、迷人。它不提供力量，而是提供成熟的浆果、 licorice 和咖啡的平衡剂。建议在果味消失前在5年左右饮用。评分：91分。

Western reviews.review: A powerful, extracted wine, very concentrated. The tannins are dense, giving a sense of tight texture, while underneath the ripe fruits are pulsing with fresh acidity as well as sweet berry flavors.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶强劲的、提取度高的红酒，非常浓郁。酒中的天然橡皮质感非常紧密，然而在这种紧密的质感下，成熟的水果味道却依然充满生动的酸度和甜美的浆果风味。

Chinese pairs.original: 红黑水果、干花、烟草等香气，酒体中等，单宁偏轻但柔顺，酸度适中，整体属平衡圆润。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of red and black fruit, dried flowers, and tobacco, with a medium-bodied texture, moderate tannins that are smooth, balanced acidity, and a rounded overall impression.

Western reviews.review: (2007) Quite pure, with a mineral earthiness and a racy impression on the nose. Lacks a little flesh this one, although the fruit is very sweet and attractive. Tannins are quite refined and fine, and with nice acidity and a hint of coffee emerging in the finish, an attractive wine in a lighter style.
Western reviews.translation: 2007年：这款红酒非常纯粹，带有矿物质和泥土的气味，口感清脆。虽然这款红酒略显瘦削，但果味甜美诱人。它的纤维非常细腻，口感清新，尾部带有微微的咖啡味，呈现出一种轻质的风格。

Western reviews.review: Medium to deep ruby-red color, is almost opaque. Red-fruit on the nose is extremely reductive. On the palate there is soft red-fruit character, but little tannic structure, the plate seems quite washed-out. Acidity is soft, alcohol is balanced to low & the finish is relatively short. The wine is not impressive. 11/09 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深红色，几乎透明。

香气：红果味极其浓郁，但有明显的氧化不足感。

口感：口感软滑，红果味清晰，但结构紧致度较低，口感略显稀薄。酸度较低，酒精平衡，尾部较短。整体印象不佳。评分：2星（11月9日，DCAMW评分）

Chinese pairs.original: 此酒深厚的香气中透出铅笔屑、泥土、香料、黑巧克力、岩石、薄荷糖、黑醋栗、荸荠和少许花香，引领其富有干浸出物的清晰、活泼口感及甜美、结实的回味。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts a rich aroma that reveals notes of pencil shavings, earth, spices, dark chocolate, stone, peppermint, black currants, taro and a hint of floral, leading to a crisp, lively palate with a sweet, full-bodied finish.

English pairs.original: A profound bouquet of pencil shavings, earth, spices, black chocolate, stone, mint candy, cassis, water-chestnut and flowers undertone that led to precise and energetic flavours that brim with an abundance of dry extract on the sweet and burly finish.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的香气深邃，带有木屑、泥土、香料、黑巧克力、石头、薄荷糖、黑加仑、水芽菜和花朵的底调。口感精确、充满活力，带有丰富的干干的提取物，结束于甜美的厚重口感。

Western reviews.review: Lots of easy drinking charm here. The wine is medium bodied, with mature notes of tobacco, flowers, espresso, cedar and red fruits. Soft, with a smooth, polished feeling to the tannins, the wine,with its red plum and cassis profile is fully ready to drink. 90 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒非常容易入口，口感中等。酒中有成熟的烟草、花朵、咖啡、红木和红果的味道。口感柔和，苦味细腻光滑。酒中有红枣和黑加仑的风味，完全成熟，适合立即饮用。评分：90分。

Western reviews.review: Impressively ripe fruit, with smoky flavors from wood, the texture sweet and fleshy. The wine has juicy berry flavors, with the freshest acidity, livened with spice from the fruit and the oak aging. Worth aging for 5–10 years.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感非常饱满，果味成熟，木质烟熏味道浓郁，口感甜滑。酒中充满了新鲜的浆果味道，酸度清新，果味和橡木陈化的香气相互融合，带来一股醉人的香气。值得推荐的酒龄是5-10年。
