Western reviews.review: Beautiful deep colour. Ripe nose with fruity, spicy accents and a candied note. Well-structured with clearly-defined aromas and a nice tannic framework on the finish. A wine with a bright future.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色深红。酒香浓郁，带有浓郁的果香、辣味和糖果味。口感结构良好，酒香清晰，尾部有明显的苦味。未来前景光明。

Chinese pairs.original: 山楂糕和雪茄盒的香气组合非常讨喜，摇杯之后还带着独特的檀香气息。入口清澈多汁，单宁丝滑柔顺。虽然中段没有太多的味觉变化，但依旧十分讨喜，是一款比较宜饮的圣埃美隆美乐混酿（88%美乐）。
Chinese pairs.new: The aroma combination of dried apricot cake and cigar box is delightful, with a unique sandalwood note lingering after swirling the glass. The palate is clear and juicy, with smooth and silky tannins. Although the mid-palate lacks significant flavor changes, it remains enjoyable, making this a pleasant drink for a Saint-Émilion Merlot blend (88% Merlot).

English pairs.original: The aroma combination of hawthorn and humidor is very adorable, emitting a distinctive fragrance of sandalwood after swirling the glass. It is pure and juicy on the palate, and the tannins are silky and soft. Although not many changes are found in the mid-palate, this wine is still charming. This wine is a fairly pleasant Saint-Emilion blend (88% Merlot).
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的香气组合非常可爱，混合了 Hawthorn 和 Humidor 的味道，摇晃玻璃后释放出独特的 Sandalwood 香气。口感清澈果甜，纤维素柔软细腻。虽然中口没有太多变化，但这款酒依然很有魅力。这款酒是一款 Saint-Emilion 混合酒（88% Merlot），口感平和舒适。

Western reviews.review: Medium bodied, finesse expression of St. Emilion leaves you with a soft, silky textured wine, sweet, ripe, juicy cherries and kirsch and a silky, smooth finish. The wine was made from a blend of 80% Merlot, 15% Cabernet Franc and 5% Cabernet Sauvignon.
Western reviews.translation: 体积中等的圣埃米利翁葡萄酒，展现出细致的风格，带来柔软、丝滑的口感，甜美的熟透的樱桃和威士忌的风味，以及丝滑光滑的尾韵。该酒由80%梅洛、15%卡波弗朗克和5%卡波萨维宁的混合酿造而成。

Western reviews.review: 91–93. Barrel sample. This spicy wine, aged in new wood, is rich and full with blackberry flavors. It's opulent in texture with layers of new oak that reverberate through the wine.
Western reviews.translation: 91-93分。酒桶样品。这款带有辣味的红酒，-aged在新橡木桶中，具有浓郁的黑莓风味。酒体丰富饱满，新橡木的层次感在酒中回荡。

Chinese pairs.original: 瓶醒三小时。这款酒体呈深宝石色的酒散发出烤吐司、清咖、泥土、香料矿物质和紫罗兰干花的香气。充满矿物质的滑爽、清晰口感具有宜人的浓度、阴柔的气质以及成熟、甜美的单宁——为其活泼、干净的回味增添了圆润、精美的质地。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine has been decanted for three hours. The full-bodied wine emits aromas of toasted bread, clear coffee, earth, mineral spices, and dried lavender. It has a smooth, mineral-rich texture with a pleasant density, subtle nuances, and mature, sweet tannins that add a round, elegant quality to its lively, clean finish.

English pairs.original: Aeration in bottle for three hours. This dark ruby-colored wine exhibited toast, black coffee, earth, spicy-mineral and dried violet scents. There was admirable density to the polished, precise and mineral-inflected flavours that possessed feminine charm and ripely sweet tannins that provided delicacy and texture to its vibrantly clean finish.
English pairs.new: 瓶内放置三个小时进行氧化。 这款深红宝石色的红酒展现出 Toast、黑咖啡、土壤、矿物质和干燥紫罗兰的香气。 这款酒的精致、精确和矿物质的味道令人印象深刻，具有女性化的魅力和成熟的甜度，提供了清晰干净的口感。

Western reviews.review: You start to feel the dial turning up the power as this travels through the palate. Even at 10 years old, the tannins go in deep around the fruit, with luscious menthol notes on the finish. This is one of the juiciest of the Pauillacs, with layers of plum fruits, tobacco and melted tannins. It's totally firing on all cylinders, although not a blockbuster, reflective of this vintage. But that means you can drink this now, or you can wait; either way you can enjoy what is going on here.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的味道逐渐变得更加强烈，通过口腔传递。即使是10年后的酒，也能感受到坚果的深度和果酱的滋味，口感中还带有清新的薄荷味。这种酒是巴约克地区最富有滋味的之一，口感中充满了浓郁的黑桃果味、烟草味和融化的坚果味。它的所有方面都在发挥着最佳状态，虽然不是一个爆炸性的酒，但它的品质反映了这一年的特点。因此，无论你选择现在品尝还是将来品尝，都能享受到这款酒的美味。

Western reviews.review: A beautiful, classic wine, the 2008 Château Grand-Puy-Lacoste has an old school nose of currants, saddle leather, ground herbs, cherries, hints of dried flowers and just a touch of cedar. It's ripe, medium-bodied, lightly textured, and has true Pauillac character. Drink it over the coming decade or more.
Western reviews.translation: 一款典雅黑的红酒，2008年产的Château Grand-Puy-Lacoste拥有典雅黑的香气，带有黑currants、马鞍革、草本植物、樱桃、干花和一点点松木的味道。它的口感丰富，中等体积，轻微的质地，具有典雅黑的特征。建议在未来十年或更长时间内饮用。

Western reviews.review: Classic in style, the wine is on the bright, crisp, leafy, cassis and tobacco side. There is more freshness than depth, more acidity than fruit and the wine is more complex and enjoyable on the nose, than on the medium bodied palate. This is probably drinking at peak. Very little air is needed here, just pop and pour.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒以经典的风格呈现，具有明亮、清脆、叶绿、黑加仑和烟草的特征。酒中有更多的新鲜感，而不是深度，有更多的酸度，而不是果味。酒在鼻子上更复杂和愉悦，而在中等体积的口感上则不如。可能这瓶酒正处于最佳饮用时期。这里几乎不需要空气，只需轻轻打开即可享用。

Western reviews.review: Medium ruby-red, the color is quite bright. The nose displays a medium intensity of Redcurrant fruit & sweet vanilla oak. The palate is lively & the red-fruit is seamlessly integrated with smooth. ripe tannins & notes of new oak. Acidity is good but not sharp & alcohol is warming, but balanced. The length of flavor is excellent & the finish is harmonious - a nice wine. 11/03 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色，非常亮丽。酒香中有中等强度的红果味和甜的香橼木味。口感活泼，红果味与细腻的成熟橡木味和新橡木味完美融合。酸度适中但不刺激，酒精温暖但平衡。口感持久，尾韵和谐，非常好喝。评分：11/03 DCAMW。

Western reviews.review: Clearly the best value in Pauillac today, this is classic in all the right ways. Expressive, yet stoic, the wine is full-bodied, concentrated, tannic and filled with tobacco-drenched creme de cassis, red plums, cedar, wet earth, cigar wrapper and forest leaf. Youthful, fresh and still waiting for its prime time window, two hours of decanting or 3-4 years in the cellar will do the trick. 95 Points
Western reviews.translation: 目前来说，巴约（Pauillac）地区最值得推荐的红酒是这个。它在所有方面都表现出典型的风格。表达丰富，然而又很稳重。酒体丰富浓郁，具有坚实的纹理，充满了烟熏的黑加拿大浆果、红李子、松木、潮湿的土壤、雪茄纸和森林叶的风味。年轻、清新，仍在等待最佳品尝时机。两小时的脱颖或3-4年在酒窖中储存将会带来最佳效果。评分95分。

Chinese pairs.original: 柔软的单宁和鲜甜的口感已经成为Chateau Beaumont的标志性特点。在温度并不太高的2023年份，这款酒用意料之外的浓度让我记住了它。对于面积高达113公顷的大型酒庄而言，能够做到这么好的品控，实在是难能可贵。
Chinese pairs.new: Soft tannins and a fresh, fruity taste have become the hallmark of Chateau Beaumont. The 2023 vintage, which was not particularly hot, surprised me with its unexpected density. For a large estate of 113 hectares, achieving such precise control is truly commendable.

English pairs.original: Soft tannins and a “sweet” taste have become the hallmark of Chateau Beaumont. In the relatively cool 2023 vintage, this wine’s unexpected concentration left a lasting impression on me. For a large estate spanning 113 hectares, achieving such great quality control is truly respectable.
English pairs.new: 查泰aux 贝蒙特的特点是软的苦味和甜的口感。在2023年的相对凉爽的产季，这款酒的意外浓度给我留下了深刻的印象。考虑到这座大型庄园占地113公顷，能够实现如此出色的质量控制实属可贵。

Western reviews.review: This wine bursts with intense blackberry flavours, with a crunchy and vivacious palate. Its chewy tannins contribute to a firm mid-palate and solid structure, while the finish is relatively long-lasting. Overall, it presents a vibrant and dynamic profile that is sure to leave a lasting impression.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒爆发出强烈的黑莓风味，口感清脆活泼。它的坚韧的苦味物质使得中口坚实，结构稳固，而尾部持久。整体上，这款红酒呈现出生动的、充满活力的风格，绝对会留下深刻的印象。

Western reviews.review: Medium intensity of dark ruby-red color. The slightly jammy red-fruit is a little confected. Ripe black-plum fruit on the palate is rounded & ripe. The wine has nice fresh acidity. The palate is of mid-weight. The black fruit-is open & juicy on the mid-palate. Alcohol is balanced but enhances sweet cedary spices on the back palate & the finish. The wine has fair length. 04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深红色，中度浓密。

口感：果香浓郁，略带甜腻的红果味。口中有熟黑杏子的味道，圆润且成熟。酒中有清新的酸度，口感中等。黑果味在中口处开朗且 juicy。酒中酒精度合适，但在后口和尾韵中增强了甜木质香料。酒的持久度一般。评分：4/24（ep）DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 此酒华丽的香气充满了烘培咖啡豆的香味及少许香料、黑色水果和矿物味。口感清晰、坚实，展现出优雅的矿物质结构和纹理细致的单宁质地。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts a lavish aroma filled with notes of roasted coffee beans, subtle spices, black fruit, and mineral undertones. The palate is crisp and robust, showcasing an elegant mineral structure and a silky texture with refined tannins.

English pairs.original: The plush bouquet was full of roasted coffee bean intermixed with spices, black fruits and mineral overtone. The precise and faintly firm palate revealed elegant mineral structure and fine-grained tannins that provided delightful texture.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的香气丰富醇厚，带有烤咖啡豆、香料、黑果和矿物质的味道。口感精致细腻，矿物质结构优雅，细致的纤维素提供了愉悦的口感。

Western reviews.review: Licorice, cherry, espresso and cocoa on the nose, and soft textures segue into a sweet and tart finish filled with cherry griotte. Blending 86% Merlot and 14% Cabernet Franc, the wine reached 13.6% alcohol. The yields were 30 hectoliters per hectare. The wine is aging in 60% new French oak. 88-90
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中有 licorice、樱桃、咖啡和可可的味道，口感柔软，甜度和酸度相互平衡，樱桃果酱的味道充满整个口感。该酒由86%梅洛和14%卡波弗朗克混合而成，酒精含量13.6%，产量为每公顷30公升。酒瓶中有60%的新法兰克酒桶。评分：88-90分。

Chinese pairs.original: 醒酒后是浓郁的橡木、松露、黑色樱桃芳香入鼻，口感酒体肥沃粘稠，单宁成熟厚实，有纯黑巧克力的甘苦，余味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: After breathing, the nose is filled with the rich aromas of oak, truffles, and black cherries. The palate is full-bodied and velvety, with mature tannins and a rich, sweet flavor of dark chocolate, lingering finish.

Western reviews.review: EN PRIMEUR - Deep garnet-red. Nose of ultra ripe fruit, ripe plum, cherries in brandy and subtle oak. Concentrated palate with very evident, ripe tannins framed by fat. Harmoniously powerful. Wonderful classic style.
Western reviews.translation: 新酒 - 深红色。酒香中充满了超级成熟的水果、熟透的李子、白兰地浸泡的樱桃和微妙的橡木味。口感浓郁，很明显的成熟的橡胶味被丰富的脂肪所包围。和谐而强大的口感。典型的经典风格。

Chinese pairs.original: 因为更长时间的橡木桶陈年（12-14月的橡木桶陈酿），现在果香显然还未完全舒展，但如果专注于结构和深度，你会发现这款酒更具层次感，对单宁的打磨也相当精湛。再加上2019年份高酸度的加持，相信这款酒会在瓶成5-8年之后绽放。
Chinese pairs.new: With longer oak aging (12-14 months in oak barrels), the fruit aromas are still unfolding, but if you focus on structure and depth, you'll find this wine has a layered complexity and a refined tannin texture. Plus, the high acidity of the 2019 vintage will likely shine through in 5-8 years after bottling.

English pairs.original: Due to the prolonged aging process in oak barrels (12-14 months of aging), the fruity aromas are obviously not fully developed. But if you focus on structure and depth, you will find that this wine has richer layers, and the tannins are very skilfully polished. Coupled with the high acidity of the 2019 vintage, I believe this wine will bloom after 5-8 years of bottle aging.
English pairs.new: 由于在橡木桶中进行了长时间的陈化（12-14个月的陈化），果香的气味并没有完全发育出来。但是，如果你专注于结构和深度，你会发现这个酒有更丰富的层次，且橡皮味很巧妙地被打磨。结合2019年的高酸度，我相信这个酒会在5-8年瓶陈后开花。

Western reviews.review: Dark garnet colour. Fragrant nose showing violet, blackberry, plum and mild spices with discreet oak notes. Harmoniuos palate, soft texture with a fresh backbone and layers of wild berries, mildly spicy with a long and smooth finish.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒。酒香中带有紫罗兰、黑莓、浆果和温和的香料，伴有轻微的橡木味。口感和谐，软滑的口感，带有清新的骨架和野生黑莓的多层次，带有温和的香料，长长的平滑的尾部。

Chinese pairs.original: Montviel 2019 是一款芬芳柔和、能够大口“顿顿顿”的Pomerol混酿。因为砂土和小砾石的风土特性，这款酒更偏向于花果香气的表达而不是深邃的结构感。口感清透多汁、鲜甜爽口，伴随着流水般的单宁缓缓结束。
Chinese pairs.new: Montviel 2019 是一款芬芳柔和、能够大口“顿顿顿”的Pomerol混酿。它以砂土和小砾石的风土特性而闻名，展现出花果香气的特点，而不是深邃的结构感。口感清透多汁、鲜甜爽口，伴随着流水般的单宁缓缓结束。

English pairs.original: Montiel 2019 is an aromatic and gentle type of Pomerol that you can gulp without any difficulty. Because of its gravel and sandy soils, the wine is rather a fruit-driven wine than a structural one. Its palate is succulent and juicy, coupled with flowing tannins on the finish
English pairs.new: 蒙蒂埃2019是一款具有芳香和温和的波美罗（Pomerol）红酒，喝起来非常舒适。由于其岩石和沙质土壤，酒体更注重果味而非结构。口感丰富、水嫩，尾部有流畅的纤维。

Western reviews.review: Loaded with chocolate covered plums, spice, smoke. earth and truffle, the wine is soft, polished, fresh, medium-bodied, elegant and rich. The earthy, fruit-packed, dark chocolate accented finish seals the deal. Give it a year or two in the bottle and it should be even better. This is the best vintage of Montviel I have ever tasted. Drink from 2023-2032.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒充满了覆盖着巧克力和浆果的味道，带有烟熏、泥土和松露的香气。酒体柔和、光滑、新鲜、中等体积、优雅且丰富。泥土、浆果和黑巧克力的余味让人印象深刻。放置一两年后，酒味会更加出色。这是我尝过的最好的蒙维尔（Montviel）年份。建议在2023-2032年内饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 醒酒两小时。此酒深厚的香气中透出黑豆、皮革、寿司、草药、橡木桶（香草、药材、可可）、香料矿物质及少许的石墨香。口感很好地体现了这个波尔多伟大年份的精髓：集中度无疑是绝佳，轮廓清晰的风味完全覆盖了口腔并留下了些许的干浸出物，一直延续到其宛如添加了滑石粉般的浓郁黑巧克力回味中。
Chinese pairs.new:
Aroma: 2小时后醒酒。酒中深厚的香气中包含黑豆、皮革、寿司、草药、橡木桶（香草、药材、可可）、香料矿物质和少量的石墨香。

口感：酒体完美地展现了波尔多的精髓。酒的集中度出色，清晰的风味覆盖了口腔并留下了干酪感，一直延续到浓郁黑巧克力的回味中。

English pairs.original: Decanted for two hours. It showcased profound bouquets of black bean, leather, sushi, herb, oaks (vanilla, medicine, cocoa), spicy-mineral with a suggestion of graphite. The taste impeccably reflected the greatness of this magnificent vintage: there was fine concentration to the mineral-driven, intense and well-delineated medium weight plus flavours that coated the palate with dry extract before culminating in a talc-like, rich and (black) chocolaty finish.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒经过两小时的脱颖，展现出深刻的香气，包括黑豆、皮革、寿司、香草、橡木（香草、药膏、可可）、矿物质和带有石墨的辛辣味道。口感完美地体现了这瓶精美的佳酿：矿物质驱动的口感浓郁、强烈、清晰，中等重量以上的味道在舌头上留下干燥的余味，最终以滑腻、丰富且带有黑巧克力的口感结束。

Western reviews.review:
More dense and compact than the 2009, the 2010 Feytit-Clinet offers a huge, rich, backward style in its smoked dark fruits, graphite, crushed rock, violet, and truffle aromas and flavors. Like the 2009, it's a massive, rich, incredibly concentrated wine. Hide bottles for 4-5 years and enjoy over the following two to three decades.

Rating: 98+
Western reviews.translation: 2010年费伊蒂-克林特红酒比2009年更浓密和紧凑，呈现出一股烟熏黑果、石墨、碎石、紫罗兰和松露的强烈气味和口感。与2009年一样，它是一种巨大的、丰富的、极度浓缩的酒。建议将酒瓶存放4-5年后，享用两到三十年的时间。评分：98+.

Western reviews.review: A wine with beautiful balance of blackberries, dark chocolate and flowers. Full body, with very refined tannins and a glorious finish. Speechless. Best wine ever from here. Better after 2017.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒具有黑莓、黑巧克力和花朵的完美平衡。酒体丰富，具有非常细腻的橡皮质和辉煌的尾部。无话可说。从这里来的最好的红酒。2017年之后更好。

Western reviews.review: As I have indicated in previous reports, Feytit-Clinet is a property on the rise. The 2010 comes from a tiny vineyard of about 18+ acres just across the street from Trotanoy and Latour a Pomerol. A blend of 95% Merlot and 5% Cabernet Franc reaching 14.5% natural alcohol (a nearly standard level of alcohol in most Pomerols and St.-Emilions in 2010), this wine sports a dense purple color and a sweet nose of mulberries, blueberry liqueur, cassis and licorice as well as hints of mocha and white chocolate. Full-bodied, dense, and rich, with sweet tannin and good acidity giving it a laser-like precision and freshness on the palate, this wine should drink nicely for 15+ years.
Western reviews.translation: 费伊蒂-克林特（Feytit-Clinet）是一家正在崛起的葡萄酒庄园。2010年的葡萄酒来自一块面积约18英亩的小型葡萄园，位于图罗诺（Trotanoy）和拉图尔（Latour a Pomerol）对面。该酒的组成比例为95%梅洛（Merlot）和5%卡波弗朗克（Cabernet Franc），酒精含量为14.5%，这是2010年普罗旺斯（Pomerols）和圣埃米利昂（St.-Emilions）的大部分葡萄酒的标准酒精含量。该酒呈现出浓密的紫色，酒香甜美，带有蓝莓、蓝莓酒、黑加仑和Licorice等果香，伴有巧克力和白巧克力等调味。口感丰富、浓密、富有滋味，甜度适中，酸度良好，酒体精确、清新，应能在15年以上的时间内保持最佳口感。

Western reviews.review: This takes a structured approach, with graphite and sage leading the way for a still-backward core of dark plum, fig and black currant paste notes. Dense and muscular on the finish, offering ganache and smoldering tobacco accents, closing with a tarry thread that kicks in for extra length.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒采用结构化的方法，图形和山药的风味领先，暗紫色浆果、浆果和黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑

Chinese pairs.original: 成熟的水果，烟熏和木材的香气，口感甜美多汁，新鲜的酸度，回味带有香料和橡木的味道。
Chinese pairs.new: Ripe fruit, smoky and woody aromas, sweet and juicy flavors, fresh acidity, and a lingering finish with notes of spice and oak.

Western reviews.review: Lots of easy drinking charm here. The wine is medium bodied, with mature notes of tobacco, flowers, espresso, cedar and red fruits. Soft, with a smooth, polished feeling to the tannins, the wine,with its red plum and cassis profile is fully ready to drink. 90 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒非常容易入口，口感中等。酒中有成熟的烟草、花朵、咖啡、红木和红果的味道。口感柔和，苦味细腻光滑。酒中有红枣和黑加仑的风味，完全成熟，适合立即饮用。评分：90分。

Western reviews.review: Impressively ripe fruit, with smoky flavors from wood, the texture sweet and fleshy. The wine has juicy berry flavors, with the freshest acidity, livened with spice from the fruit and the oak aging. Worth aging for 5–10 years.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感非常饱满，果味成熟，木质烟熏味道浓郁，口感甜滑。酒中充满了新鲜的浆果味道，酸度清新，果味和橡木陈化的香气相互融合，带来一股醉人的香气。值得推荐的酒龄是5-10年。

Western reviews.review: Beautiful deep colour. Ripe nose with fruity, spicy accents and a candied note. Well-structured with clearly-defined aromas and a nice tannic framework on the finish. A wine with a bright future.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色深红。酒香浓郁，带有浓郁的果香、辣味和糖果味。口感结构良好，酒香清晰，尾部有明显的苦味。未来前景光明。

Chinese pairs.original: 适合佐餐畅饮的柔和型中级庄。如果你喜欢强劲感，这款酒绝对不是你的菜；但如果你偏爱多汁柔软，这款充满青春气息的葡萄酒是非常不错的选择。
Chinese pairs.new: A smooth, mid-range wine perfect for sipping with meals. If you prefer bold flavors, this isn't the wine for you; but if you prefer rich, velvety textures, this youthful wine is a great choice.

English pairs.original: It is an easy-drinking Crus Bourgeois. If you like power or strength, this wine is definitely not for you; but if you prefer softness and juiciness, this youthful wine is a nice choice.
English pairs.new: 这是一款易于饮用的克鲁斯勋爵级红酒。如果你喜欢强劲的口感，这款酒可能不是你的最佳选择；但如果你更喜欢柔和和果香的口感，这款年轻的红酒会是一个不错的选择。

Western reviews.review: Owned by the Fayat construction company, this estate, with a fantastical 19th-century chateau, offers a richly textured wine, ripe tannins and plenty of potential. This black-fruited wine will be ready from 2026. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒由 Fayat 建筑公司所有，这座拥有19世纪奇幻般的城堡的庄园，提供了丰富的口感、成熟的橡胶和丰富的潜力。这瓶黑果味的红酒将于2026年成熟。 - 罗杰·沃斯

Western reviews.review: Tobacco leaf, cedar, earth, herbs and savory red fruits with a hint of smoke and cocoa are on the nose and palate. A bit reserved at the moment, it will take a year or two to open. Drink from 2023-2033.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中包含了烟草叶、红 cedar、泥土、香草和浓郁的红果味，伴有轻微的烟和巧克力味。虽然目前还比较保留，但经过一到两年的陈化后会更加开朗。建议在2023年至2033年内饮用。

2020 Chateau Lilian Ladouys La Devise de.name: 2020 Chateau Lilian Ladouys La Devise de Lilian

Chinese pairs.original: 干净纯粹、清新舒爽，La Devise de Lilian 2020所表现出的精致感正牌一脉相承，收尾时的单宁略显草率，但酒体结构依旧平衡有加，稍加醒酒就可以大口畅饮。
Chinese pairs.new: "Clean and crisp, with a refreshing finish, La Devise de Lilian 2020 showcases its refined character. While the tannins feel a bit abrupt at the end, the overall structure remains balanced and poised. A brief decanting will allow for easy sipping."

English pairs.original: Clean and pure, refreshing and soothing, La Devise de Lilian 2020 shows the ever-lasting delicacy of the Grand Vin. Although the tannins on the finish are not compact enough, the body structure still maintains good balance. It is ideal for drinking with quick decanting.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的口感清澈纯粹，带有清新和舒缓的感觉，2020年的La Devise de Lilian展现了Grand Vin的永恒细腻。虽然尾部的苦味不够紧凑，但酒体结构仍然保持着良好的平衡。快速倒酒后，适合立即饮用。

Western reviews.review: Medium-bodied, forward, fresh, early drinking, soft, fresh, bright, red berry and spearmint filled wine with a touch of spice in the endnote. Enjoy this while waiting for the Grand Vin to develop. Drink from 2022-2029.
Western reviews.translation: 中等体积的红酒，前端鲜明，新鲜，适合早期饮用，口感柔和，新鲜，明亮，红果和薄荷味充满其中，末尾带有微量的香料。可以先享用，等待Grand Vin成熟。建议饮用时间：2022-2029年。

Chinese pairs.original: 老实说，我并不中意这支酒充满蜜饯、甜香料和岩石味的香气。然而，此酒的口感确实让我感到非常吃惊，尤其是那异常优雅的酸度和那多汁、清澈的回味。
Chinese pairs.new: To be honest, I'm not a fan of this wine's overpowering aroma of honey, sweet spices and stone. However, the taste of this wine has truly surprised me, especially the exceptionally elegant acidity and the juicy, crisp finish.

English pairs.original: Honestly, I didn't so much appreciate its aromas that consist of preserved fruits, sweet spices and rock. However, the taste of this wine really amazed me by the very elegant acidity as well as the succulent and lucid finish.
English pairs.new: 诚实地说，我并没有太喜欢这瓶酒的香气，它带有保存的水果、甜香料和岩石的味道。但是，这瓶酒的味道却让我惊艳了，它的酸度非常优雅，口感丰富而清晰。

Western reviews.review: Tiefe, reiffruchtige Nase, Leder, Teer, dunkle Frucht, viel Würze, getrocknete Kräuter. Im Gaumen fleischig, füllig, sehr gut strukturiert, zeigt Volumen und Kraft, bleibt dabei ausgewogen und offenbart im Abgang eine wunderbare Frische. Rassig und mit guten Reserven. 2026-2042 (Verkostet am 21. Juni 2021 im Rahmen der UGCB Probe in Genf)
Western reviews.translation: 深度、成熟的果香，皮革、焦糖、黑色果实、丰富的香料、干燥的香草。口感丰富、饱满、结构完美、展现出体积和力量，但仍保持平衡，尾部展现出令人惊艳的清新。品质优良，储存潜力大。推荐储存期：2026-2042（2021年6月21日在日内瓦的UGCB品酒会中品尝）。

Western reviews.review: The Audoy family has produced a structured wine, dense with tannins and backed by dark plum and berry fruits. It is rich, with a good future ahead of it, textured with richness as well as initial dryness. Drink the wine from 2026. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 奥杜伊家族出品的这款红酒具有结构紧凑的特点，充满了坚果味和黑浆果的风味。酒体丰富，未来前景广阔，口感丰富且初期干爽。建议2026年后饮用。- 罗杰·沃斯

Western reviews.review: Medium bodied, fresh, bright, lifted red fruits, spice and earth pop up in the nose easily. The wine has energy, elegance and loads of red currants, red plums and herbs on the palate. The finish delivers more of those gorgeous red, sweet, chewy fruits. This is a big step up from previous vintages. I am liking it a lot!
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的体积适中，清新、明亮、果香丰富，带有香料和泥土的气息。口感充满活力，优雅，满满的红葡萄、红李子和香草味。尾部带有更多的那些美味的红果，甜美、口感丰富。这瓶红酒比之前的几年更出色，我非常喜欢！

Western reviews.review: Deep ruby, purple glints, faintly lighter at the rim. A bouquet of ripe cherries underlaid with fine savoury woody notes, followed by gentle hints of liquorice and candied violets, as well as a dash of orange zest. Juicy, elegant, fresh red fruit, integrated, supportive tannins, mineral, pithy style. Will benefit from bottle ageing. (2022-2040)߭.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，紫色光泽，边缘略微浅色。酒中充满了成熟的樱桃的香气，伴有细微的木质调味料，接着是轻微的甘草和糖化紫罗兰的味道，以及橙子皮的味道。酒口丰富、优雅、清新，果味浓郁，纤维素柔和，矿物质质地，干净利落。酒会在瓶中陈化后得到改善。 (2022-2040)

Western reviews.review: Helles Rubin, leicht wässeriger Rand, kühle, intensive Nase, rotfruchtig, rauch, getrocknete Kräuter, schönes Aromenspiel, komplex ohne zu überfordern, am Gaumen straff, gradlinig, wieder rote beeren, dazu auch Brombeeren und einiges an würzigen Noten, die Gerbstoffe sind markant, die säure lebhaft, das ist trinkanimierend, im Abgang von schöner Länge, endet auf Gewürznelken, ein sehr guter Wein, braucht essen und kann reifen, 2018-2034
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

酒体呈现为浅红色，边缘略微清澈。酒香清新、持久，带有红果味、烟熏味、干燥的香草味，酒香丰富多样，既不复杂又不单调。口感紧致、平衡，入口有红果味和浆果味，伴有浓郁的果香和一些香料味。酒中的鞣质和酸度都很明显，酒的口感很活跃，非常适合饮用。酒尾长而持久，留有温和的香料味。总体来说，这是一瓶很好的红酒，需要与食物搭配，且有很好的储存潜力，推荐饮用时间为2018-2034年。

Chinese pairs.original: 作为一款以沙土地为主导的波美侯酒庄，Mazeyres在2021年份展现出的温润感绝对有说服力。不但花果芬芳清晰可见，酒体也充盈丰满。口感舒畅自由，单宁精致平和，是2021年份波美侯西边沙地风土与生物动力理念完美结合的优秀之作。
Chinese pairs.new: As a Pomerol estate dominated by sandy soils, Mazeyres convincingly showcased its velvety texture in the 2021 vintage. Not only are the floral and fruity aromas clear and defined, but the wine's body is also full and generous. The palate is smooth and effortless, with refined and harmonious tannins, making it an outstanding example of the 2021 Pomerol's west-facing sandy soils and biodynamic philosophy.

English pairs.original: As a Pomerol winery dominated by sandy soils, the warmness shown by Mazeyres in the vintage of 2021 is absolutely convincing. Not only are the floral and fruity notes clearly visible, but the body is rich and plumpy. The palate is refreshing and unrestrained, and the tannins are delicate and gentle, making this wine an ideal interpretation of the happy marriage between the sandy terroir in west Pomerol and the biodynamic philosophy.
English pairs.new: 2021年马泽雷斯（Mazeyres）红酒展现出了一种令人信服的温暖风格。除了花香和果香的清晰表现外，这款红酒的体积丰富饱满。口感清新放松，纤维柔和细腻，使得这款红酒成为西普罗旺斯（Pomerol）沙质土壤和生物动力学哲学（biodynamic philosophy）完美结合的典型代表。

Western reviews.review: Slightly agitated in main profile shows notes of wet red flowers, tangerine peel, pink grapefruit and guarana. Medium-full body, drying in the sip closes simple and lacks some personality. A blend of 72% Merlot, 25% Cabernet Franc and 3% Petit Verdot. Drink now.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感略微激动，主调中表现出湿红花、橙子皮、粉红葡萄柚和可可豆的香气。口感中等至中厚，入口后逐渐干涸，简单而缺乏个性。酒中混合了72%梅洛、25%卡波弗朗克和3%佩蒂·韦尔多特。建议立即饮用。

Western reviews.review: Mittleres Rubinrot. Faszinierende Nase, reine, klare Frucht, Veilchen, Rosen, Himbeeren, Kräuter, burgundisch anmutend. Mittelkräftiger Gaumen, knackige Frucht, keinerlei Holz spürbar, sehr elegant, feminin und mit einer spannenden, an Blutorangen erinnernden Aromatik im Finale. Kein Blockbuster, sondern ein charaktervoller Wein mit delikater Frucht und einer anregenden Herbe. 2025-2038 (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2022. Grand Cercle des Vins de Bordeaux)
Western reviews.translation: 深红色。迷人的鼻子，清澈的果香，紫罗兰、玫瑰、蓝莓、草本植物，具有布尔戈尼酒的风格。中等口感，果香清脆，木头味不明显，非常优雅，女性化，最后有一个令人惊讶的，似血橙的香气。不是一个爆炸性的酒，而是一个有特色的酒，具有细腻的果香和刺激的苦味。推荐饮用时间：2025-2038（2022年4月在布ordeaux Grand Cercle des Vins de Bordeaux进行了“En Primeur”品鉴）。

Chinese pairs.original: 这家酒庄酒质相当稳定，酒体十分迷人，奔放的香气可感黑醋栗、矿物、钢铁、烟草叶、雪松和黑樱桃气息，入口较为严肃，但非常平衡，尽显圆润、顺滑、优雅及美妙口感，单宁遍布口腔。
Chinese pairs.new: This winery produces wines with consistent quality, with a captivating texture. The nose is full of exuberant aromas of black walnut, minerals, steel, tobacco leaves, pine and black cherry. The palate is serious but very balanced, showcasing a smooth, elegant and delightful mouthfeel, with tannins present throughout the mouth.

English pairs.original: Made by a winery with very stable quality, this nice claret had expressive noses of cassis, mineral, iron, tobacco leaf, cedar and black cherry, austere structure with a nice balance, round, smooth, elegant and delicious with mouth-coating tannins.
English pairs.new: 来自品质稳定的酒庄，这款好酒的气味丰富，带有黑加仑、矿物质、铁、烟草叶、红木和黑樱桃的特征。酒体结构严谨，平衡好，圆润、滑顺、优雅，口感丰富，具有绵密的口感。

Western reviews.review: (2003) A closed muted nose. But the palate has good concentration and acidity with firm tannins and lots of plummy/cassis fruits. Quite chewy and full-bodied: this is certainly one of the superior Margaux wines. Excellent.
Western reviews.translation: 2003年：封闭的、沉默的鼻子。但是口感浓郁，酸度适宜，坚实的橡木味和大量的浆果/黑加拿大醋栗风味。口感很有嚼头，体积很大：这绝对是马尔戈斯（Margaux）中的一款顶级红酒。非常出色。

Western reviews.review: (2005) Vivid, deep purple/black. Fragrant nose, with floral scents and lightness and sweetness of blackcurrant and cherry. The palate here has a silkiness and full-bodied texture, with a very pure core of black fruit that runs through the mid-palate and into the finish. There is a dry, plum-skin grip of tannin and deeper fruit, and a very nice, crisp, lively acid structure. Quite long, and harmonious.
Western reviews.translation: 2005年：深紫黑色。酒香浓郁，带有花香和黑currant和樱桃的轻甜气息。口感细腻，体积充足，黑果的纯正核心贯穿中口和尾部。酒中有干的黑枣皮般的坚果感和更深的果味，酸度结构清晰、生动。酒尾较长，和谐。

Western reviews.review: Medium to deep ruby-red color. The nose is a classic combination of cedar & cassis. The cassis fruit on the nose is supported by good fresh acidity. The tannins provide some grip & cedary notes overlay the more redcurrant-natured mid-palate. The wine is fresh & lively rather than concentrated. Alcohol is balanced, there is some bitterness on the finish that gives the wine good length & adds an extra dimension at the end. 11/08 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深红色至深红色。

香气：典型的红酒香气，混合了松木和黑加仑的味道。黑加仑的果香在香气中占据主导地位，受到新鲜酸度的支持。酒中的纤维素提供了些许抓握感，松木味道覆盖了中口的红果味。酒体清新活泼，未达到浓郁的程度。酒精平衡，酒尾有些苦味，给酒带来了长长的尾巴，并在最后添加了一个新的维度。评分：11/08 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Yon Figeac 2014 虽然香气并不浓郁，但酒体松脆而爽朗。这款酒很好地诠释了波尔多的传统审美：轮廓分明，线条舒展，不善言辞的外表下藏着一颗温柔的内心，桂皮和八角的辛香气息仿佛在轻轻唤醒你对它的好奇与期待。这款酒凭借出众的清新感给我留下了不错的深刻。
Chinese pairs.new:
Chateau Yon Figeac 2014 

Although the aroma is not intense, the palate is light and refreshing. This wine beautifully embodies the traditional style of Bordeaux: defined contours, elegant lines, and a subtle exterior that hides a gentle soul. The warm, spicy notes of cinnamon and cardamom seem to whisper to you, piquing your curiosity and anticipation. This wine has left me with a lasting impression of its crispness.

English pairs.original: Chateau Yon Figeac 2014, while not boasting an intense aroma, exhibits a vibrant and refreshing body. It captures the essence of Bordeaux’s traditional aesthetic: precise delineation, elegant contours, and a subdued exterior that hides a gentle core. The subtle notes of cinnamon and star anise gently awaken curiosity and anticipation. This wine has left a lasting impression on me with good freshness.
English pairs.new: 查泰aux 约恩菲加 2014，虽然没有强烈的香气，但展现出生动的和新鲜的体验。它捕捉到了波尔多传统风格的精髓：精确的轮廓，优雅的线条和低调的外表，掩盖着温和的核心。细微的丁香和八角茴香的味道轻轻地唤醒了我的好奇心和期待。这瓶酒留下了深刻的印象，带来了一种良好的新鲜感。

Western reviews.review: Medium deep ruby red colour. Fresh nose of plum and red berries, very gentle oak. The palate is medium-bodied with fresh red fruit, rather soft texture and integrated tannin, elegant and classic style that should still develop.
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深红色，中等深度。

香气：新鲜的浆果和红果味，非常轻微的橡木味。

口感：中等体积，新鲜的红果味，软糯的口感，纤维素很好融合，典雅黑的风格，应该还会有发展空间。

Chinese pairs.original: 瓶醒三小时。集中、深邃的紫红色。此酒高雅且富有层次的香气展现出松露、皮革、咸香、东南亚香料、香草、薄荷脑、岩石、牛轧糖、黑樱桃、红醋栗蜜饯和些许泥土味。滑爽、严肃的中等酒体口感充满了清晰、浓郁而且多汁的果味——被那刺激性的新鲜酸度所中和。
Chinese pairs.new:
This wine has been decanted for three hours. It presents a concentrated and profound plum-red color. The refined and layered aromas reveal notes of truffle, leather, saltiness, Southeast Asian spices, herbs, menthol, stone, caramel, black cherry, red plum jam and a hint of earthiness.

The smooth and serious medium-bodied palate is filled with clear, rich and juicy fruit flavors, balanced by a refreshing acidity.

English pairs.original: Aeration in bottle for three hours. Intensely deep purple-red. The refined and layered scent exhibited the noses of truffle, leather, savoury, South-East Asian spices, vanilla, menthol, stone, nougat, black cherry, preserved red currant and earth undertone. The polished, austere and medium-bodied palate was full of defined, rich and succulent fruitiness that was offset by the fresh and tangy acidity.
English pairs.new: 瓶内放置三小时进行氧化。酒液呈深紫红色。酒香精致复杂，展现出松露、皮革、咸味、东南亚香料、香草、薄荷、石头、核桃糖、黑樱桃、红currant和泥土底调。酒口光滑、严谨、中等体积，充满了清晰、丰富、滋润的果味，酸度新鲜、清脆，平衡了果味。

Western reviews.review:
Big and powerful, this is a wine that is supported by dense tannins. The feeling is dry and firm, with a brooding black-currant character. 
Barrel Sample: 94-96 Points
Western reviews.translation:
这款红酒强大而深刻，受到厚实的橡胶质的支持。口感干净且坚实，带有浓郁的黑加仑果香。

酒样评分：94-96分。

Western reviews.review:
Another brilliant wine of great nobility and finesse, the 2011 Beausejour-Duffau reveals a saturated chalky minerality as well as plenty of blue and black fruits, and fabulous precision and purity. It possesses a medium to full-bodied mouthfeel and a distinctive/singular style only possessed by the greatest wines. Give it 4-5 years of cellaring and drink it over the following two decades. It promises to be one of the longest lived wines of the vintage. At 14.7% alcohol, this is a blend of 80% Merlot and 20% Cabernet Franc.

Rating: 94+ Points
Western reviews.translation: 2011 年贝苏日-杜法（Beausejour-Duffau）是一款品质卓越的红酒，展现出浓郁的 chalky 矿物质 minerality 和丰富的蓝紫色和黑色果实，精确和纯粹的风格令人惊叹。口感中等到中厚，独特的风格只有最顶级的红酒才能拥有的。建议在 4-5 年后陈酿，之后可以持续两十年享用。酒精含量为 14.7%，酒款以 80% 美丽托和 20% 卡波弗朗克为主。评分：94+ 分。

Western reviews.review: A hedonist's delight, this brings a wide range of enticing plum, raspberry, blueberry and boysenberry confiture flavors together, keeping them fresh and driven, with well-embedded acidity and a dense yet polished structure. A seductive spice and black tea edge emerges on the finish. Best from 2017 through 2027.
Western reviews.translation: 一款让人沉醉的红酒，融合了丰富的浓郁果酱风味，包括浓郁的李子、莓果、蓝莓和牛油果风味，保持着清新和活力，具有良好的酸度和紧密而光滑的结构。酒尾带有诱人的香料和黑茶味。建议在2017年至2027年期间饮用。

Western reviews.review: What a beautiful nose of forest floor, dark fruits, sweet tobacco, and blackberries. Full body, with firm and silky tannins and a minerally refined finish. Very polished and well made.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气非常美丽，带有森林地板、黑色水果、甜烟草和黑莓的味道。酒体丰富，口感坚实而细滑，尾部矿物质精致。整体非常光滑和精致。

Chinese pairs.original: 大量的黑色水果和可可香料的味道，酒体饱满但酒缺乏纯度，醇厚但不精致。
Chinese pairs.new: Aroma of abundant black fruits and cocoa spices, full-bodied but lacking in purity, rich but unrefined.

Western reviews.review: Last tasted by me in 2018, and tasting even better today. High Cabernet Franc levels give a violet and raspberry leaf edge, set against liquorice, blueberry and raspberry fruits. This has the Angélus characteristic of generosity along with the elegance and sculpting of the vintage. There is almost no 2001 left at the estate, so this is becoming a real treat to taste, and it richly rewarded a good hour or so in the glass, unrolling and deepening. A brilliant wine. Drinking Window 2020 - 2040
Western reviews.translation: 我在2018年品尝过这瓶红酒，今天的口感更加出色。高含量的卡波弗兰克（Cabernet Franc）赋予了这瓶酒紫罗兰和莓叶的边缘，搭配着 licorice、蓝莓和莓果的风味。这瓶酒展现了安杰卢斯（Angélus）的慷慨和典雅，结合了当年的雕刻般的风格。酒庄几乎没有2001年的酒存留了下来，所以品尝这瓶酒已经成为一种难得的享受。酒在玻璃中放置一小时左右，展现出丰富的口感和深度。是一瓶出色的红酒。推荐饮用时间：2020-2040年。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有咖啡豆，肉和浆果的香气。酒体饱满，柔顺的单宁和中等回味。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of coffee beans, meat, and fruit. Full-bodied with smooth tannins and a medium finish.

Western reviews.review: This 7,500-case blend of 62% Merlot and 38% Cabernet Franc is one of the strongest wines of the vintage. A deep blue/purple hue is accompanied by classic aromas of smoky blueberries and blackberries as well as incense and floral notes in the background. A beautiful texture, opulence, flamboyance, and purity characterize this stunningly deep, full-bodied effort, another great success from proprietor Hubert de Bouard. Anticipated maturity: 2009-2022.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒是由 7,500 桶的混合酒，含有 62% 的梅洛和 38% 的卡波弗朗克。它是当年最强劲的酒之一。酒液呈深蓝紫色，气味中有典型的烟熏蓝莓和黑莓香味，以及背景中的香烟和花香。酒体丰富、华丽、纯粹，酒口深厚、饱满，这是这款酒的又一大成功。酒庄老板 Hubert de Bouard 的又一杰作。预计成熟年份：2009-2022。

Chinese pairs.original: 深宝石红色泽，富有黑醋栗和烟熏气味，丹宁圆润，混合着浓郁的黑樱桃，丰富黑醋栗、巧克力和橡木口感，中厚度酒体优雅，余韵充满甘草味道，持久悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich, deep garnet color, with aromas of blackberry and smoky notes, rounded tannins blending with intense black cherry, rich blackberry, chocolate, and oak flavors, full-bodied wine with a smooth texture, lingering finish with hints of honey, long-lasting.

Western reviews.review: Smoky red fruits, vanilla, tobacco and earthy aromatics create the nose. On the palate, the wine has soft, fresh, elegant characteristics, polished tannins and sweetness in the fruits on the back end. This has aged quite nicely.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中融合了烟熏的红果、香草、烟草和泥土的气息。口感上，酒体柔和、清新、优雅，口感圆润，果实的甜度在后端呈现。酒龄已经相当不错。

Western reviews.review: 92-94 Barrel sample. Rich and creamy, showing ripe Sauvignon fruits, hinting at tropical. The fruit is certainly ripe, full in the mouth, but has preserved a good, tight structure and freshness
Western reviews.translation: 92-94 桶样评分。酒体丰富、奶油般的口感，展现出成熟的萨伯涅松果味，带有热带风味。果味确实成熟，口感丰富，但保留了良好的紧致结构和清新感。

Chinese pairs.original: 100% 赤霞珠赋予了这款酒亮眼的精气神儿，透过酒杯能够感受它喷薄而出的能量感。作为一款没有任何“帮手”(Merlot)的单一品种酒款，做到这么平衡的口感着实不易。看得出酒庄对浸渍的处理十分讲究。喜欢尝鲜的朋友可以试试。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine shines with a vibrant energy, bursting with vitality that can be felt through the glass. As a solo varietal without any Merlot assistance, achieving such balance is no easy feat. The winery's attention to maceration is evident. Adventurous wine enthusiasts, give it a try.

English pairs.original: This wine has a vibrant, polished flavor that can be felt through the glass as it flows out with energy, owing to the 100% Cabernet Sauvignon. It is challenging to get such a balanced palate in a single varietal wine that does not contain Merlot. It is obvious that the winemaker used extreme caution throughout the maceration. If you enjoy the unique taste, give it a try.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒具有活力十足的、光滑的口感，通过玻璃可以感受到它的能量流动，完全是由100%卡波内尔·萨旺吉翁（Cabernet Sauvignon）酿造的。单一品种的红酒不含梅洛（Merlot），难以达到如此平衡的口感。显然，酿酒师在发酵过程中非常谨慎。如果你喜欢这种独特的口感，值得一试。

Western reviews.review: Roasted red fruits, plums and flowers create the perfume. On the palate, the wine is medium-bodied, fresh and savory with loads of sweet, ripe, salty, currants and fresh, spicy plums with a nice hit of spearmint on the backend. Drink from 2023-2040.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中充满了烤红果、浆果和花朵的芬芳。口感中，酒体中等，清新、有嚼头，带有大量的甜、熟、咸的浆果和新鲜、辣的浆果，后端还有一丝薄荷的味道。建议从2023年到2040年饮用。

Western reviews.review: Dark core with a purple hue. Pure and fragrant nose offering black currant, dark cherry and some herbal notes with mild oak underneath. The palate has medium body with dense young fruit and fine persistency, savoury dark fruit flavours, youthful texture but balanced with ripe tannin and excellent ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 深色红酒，带有紫色光泽。酒香清澈芬芳，带有黑加仑、黑杏和一些草药味，底层有轻微的橡木味。口感中等，果实丰富，坚果味浓郁，年轻的果实味道持久，口感柔滑，但又有充足的果实酸和坚果味，酒龄潜力极佳。

Chinese pairs.original: 此酒的香气属于少见的深邃与成熟并存，动物皮毛和岩石气息在晃杯后变得更为明显。口感的主旨在于成熟的果味和粉末状的单宁，一并延续到那咸香、活泼的回味中。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts a rare and profound bouquet, with animal hide and stony notes becoming more pronounced after swirling. The palate focuses on mature fruit flavors and powdery tannins, which persist through the salty, lively finish.

English pairs.original: The sniff was a rare combination of depth and ripeness, the animal fur and stone notes became more pronounced after swirling the glass. The keystone of the taste were the ripe fruit and powdery tannin that continued onto the saline and vivid finish.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的鼻香非常独特，深度和成熟的气味相结合，闻起来像动物皮毛和石头。摇晃玻璃后，动物皮毛和石头的味道更加浓郁。口感的核心是成熟的水果和粉末状的苦味，延续到盐味和生动的尾部。

Western reviews.review: « Dark-hued with young, vibrant red highlights. Very elegant, intense nose of ripe red and black fruits with a lick of cacao and fresh truffle. The palate is seductively mouth-filling with racy, persistent aromas. A wine with an excellent pedigree, just starting out in life. »
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色，带有年轻的鲜红色光泽。酒香优雅、强烈，带有成熟的红黑果味，伴有巧克力和新鲜松露的味道。口感丰富醇厚，持久的果香味。是一瓶品质优良的红酒，刚刚开始展现其风采。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, opaker Kern, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung, süße Gewürze, dunkles Waldbeerkonfit, noch etwas verschlossen. Süß, gute Komplexität, schokoladiger Touch, tragende Tannine, etwas zu säurearm, um als finessenreich gelten zu können, trocknet im Finale tendenziell etwas aus. Peter Moser
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色调，透明的核心，紫色反光，轻微的边缘光泽。酒中有甜的香料、黑莓果酱的味道，仍然有一些封闭感。酒口甜，复杂性良好，带有巧克力味，坚实的苦味，略微缺乏酸度，才能被认为是精致的。酒尾略微干燥。- Peter Moser

Western reviews.review: Lascombes demonstriert mit diesem Jahrgang auf beeindruckende Art den Spagat zwischen Stiltreue – seiner vollmundigen, poppigen Art – und Margaux-Typizität – mehr Eleganz und Fruchtigkeit, Tannine mit Schliff und Frische. Trinkig schon jung und doch mit Reifepotenzial.
Western reviews.translation: 拉斯科姆（Lascombes）在这个年份的红酒中，表现出惊人的平衡，既保留了其典型的豪放风格，也展现出马格努（Margaux）地区的典型特征——更为优雅和果香的风格，具有锋利的坚果和新鲜的口感。可以在年轻时即可品尝，也具有成熟的潜力。

Western reviews.review: Dark in color the wine is deep in color, the fruits are dark, there is flesh, sweetness and oak, but the texture is voluptuous, and with all that ripe fruit, everything works, coming together nicely. 94 Points
Western reviews.translation: 酒色深黑，果味浓郁，带有肉感、甜度和橡木味，但酒体丰富饱满，所有成熟的果味都融合得非常和谐。评分：94分。

Western reviews.review: This is a powerful wine, with wood aging that adds richness to the dense tannins. Some tough extraction has not detracted from the ripe fruit or structure and will go as the wine matures. It should be ready to drink from 2026.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一个强劲的红酒，木桶陈化使其厚重的苦味更为丰富。虽然提取度较高，但并未影响到成熟的果味和结构。随着酒的成熟，这些苦味会逐渐消失。预计2026年左右该酒将达到最佳饮用状态。

Chinese pairs.original: 在Saint-Julien的副牌酒里，Connetable Talbot 2021拥有更加醇厚的酒体，以及超越该年份的圆润感。果香并不复杂，但胜在口感平顺自如。松果和檀香的气息营造出理想的清新感，收尾时的一抹摩卡粉气息给人淡淡的暖意。
Chinese pairs.new: In the second wine of Saint-Julien, Connetable Talbot 2021 boasts a richer texture and a rounder feel that surpasses the vintage. The fruit aromas are straightforward but deliver a smooth and effortless palate. A subtle hint of pine and sandalwood creates a refreshing nuance, while a whisper of mocha at the finish leaves a gentle warmth.

English pairs.original: In the realm of second-label wines from Saint-Julien, Connetable Talbot 2021 stands out with a more substantial body and an exceptional roundness that surpasses my expectiong from this vintage. While the fruit aromas are not overly complex, they excel in creating a smooth and effortless mouth feeling. The fragrance of pine cones and sandalwood builds an ideally refreshing ambience. And the finish, graced with a hint of mocha powder, leaves a gentle warmth, making this wine a notable choice among its peers.
English pairs.new: 在圣朱利安地区的第二标签葡萄酒中，康内塔布尔酒庄2021年产的酒表现出了更为丰富的口感和出色的圆润度，远远超出了我对这一年份的预期。虽然果香并不是非常复杂，但它却能轻松地创造出一种平滑而不费力的口感。松果和沉香的香气营造出一种清新而宜人的氛围。酒尾带有一丝巧克力粉的味道，留下了一种温暖的感觉，使得这款酒在同类中脱颖而出。

Western reviews.review: Ripe and rich in sensory profile shows notes of black plums, blackberries, incense, white pepper, cinnamon and gunpowder. Full body, soft tannins and a nicely laid-back finish that lacks a bit of bite. A blend of 40% Cabernet Sauvignon and 60% Merlot. Drink now.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感丰富饱满，具有黑浆果、黑莓、香烟、白胡椒、肉桂和火药的复杂香气。口感丰富，纤维软滑，尾部平稳舒缓，没有太强的刺激感。酒中含有40%卡波涅尔和60%梅洛的混合。建议立即饮用。

Western reviews.review: Offene Nase, zeigt eine feine Frucht, etwas Kräuter. Im Gaumen cremig, schöne Frucht, gut verpackte Gerbstoffe. Im Abgang von mittlerer Länge, endet auf Cassisaromen. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2022. Dourthe)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一份红酒评论。翻译成中文后如下：

开口时，酒呈现出清晰的果香，带有些许草药味。口感丰富，果香清晰，酒中有着完美的橡木味。尾部中等长度，结束于黑currant的香气。 (2022年4月在Dourthe酒庄品尝的“En Primeur”版。)

Chinese pairs.original: 充满贵腐气息，香气浓郁集中，带有新鲜蜂蜜、杏子、杏仁、香料和些微蘑菇味道。作为一支年轻的Climens，口感上非常甜蜜，有点黏滞，极好的集中度，散发甜芒果、荔枝、草药和龙眼滋味，中段口感有点油质，一直延续到强劲的余韵。可以在年轻时享用，但这支酒还是需要时间来发展。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine is full of rich, earthy aromas, with intense scents of fresh honey, apricot, almond, spices, and a hint of mushroom. As a young Climens, it's incredibly sweet and slightly viscous, with excellent concentration, showcasing flavors of sweet mango, lychee, herbs, and longan. The mid-palate has a slightly oily texture, which persists through the wine's long, powerful finish. Enjoyable now, but this wine still needs time to develop.

English pairs.original: Rich in botrytis noses, very powerful and intense aromas of fresh honey, apricot, almond, spices and a touch of mushroom as well. As expected for a young Climens, this was very sweet, viscous on the mouth with superb concentration and intensity that formed by the sweet mango, lychee, longan and herb, a little bit oily after the mid-palate that continued on the bold, powerful finish. Approachable young but it still needed times to develop.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的鼻子里充满了霉菌感的气味，非常强烈和浓郁的香气，带有新鲜蜂蜜、杏子、杏仁、香料和一丝蘑菇的味道。像年轻的克莱门斯酒一样，这款酒非常甜，口感浓稠，具有超凡的浓度和强度，形成了由甜蜜的芒果、荔枝、龙眼和香草的味道，中口略带油腻，持续到强烈的、强有力的尾部。虽然年轻的酒容易入口，但仍需要时间来发酵。

Western reviews.review: Medium bodied and lacking the sweetness and levels of richness, as well as botrytis found in the best vintage, there is a lot of charm to be had with the sweet, honeyed tropical fruit, forward, styled wine. For people seeking to match Sauternes with a meal, this is a good choice. 92 Points
Western reviews.translation: 体积中等，缺乏甜度和丰富度，以及最佳年份中的霉菌感染，这款酒仍然具有很多魅力，带有甜蜜的蜂蜜般的热带水果味道，前端风格的酒。对于寻找与餐食匹配的萨特恩酒的人来说，这是一款不错的选择。评分：92分。

Western reviews.review: Mittleres Gelbgold, Silberreflexe. Feine Trockenkräuterwürze, reife Birnenfrucht, Nuancen von Mandarinenzesten, zart nach Karamell. Mittlere Komplexität, frisch und lebendig strukturiert, mineralischer Touch, insgesamt schlank, die Botrytis nicht ganz perfekt, kann auch als Aperitif hergenommen werden, mittlere Länge.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是中等的金黄色，闪烁着银色的光泽。酒中有细微的干燥草药味，成熟的苹果果味，橘子皮的香气，微微的糖浆味。酒的复杂度中等，结构清新活泼，矿物质味道，整体上瘦长，虽然有些葡萄酒霉味，但不是非常完美。可以作为开胃酒饮用，酒的长度中等。

Western reviews.review: Pale straw/gold color. Aromas are quite curious, combining intense rotten fruit with sulphury/mineral notes The palate is fully sweet & high-toned, with stone-frut flavors & touches of acetone. The wine is medium to full-bodied, alcohol is balanced & the finish is relatively short. 11/12 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的颜色是浅金色。酒香独特，融合了强烈的陈腐水果味和硫磺矿物质的气味。口感甜度高，石果味浓郁，伴有少量的醋酸味。酒体中等到中厚，酒精平衡，尾部相对较短。评分：11/12

Chinese pairs.original: 丝滑的单宁、清澈的口感、轻柔的花果芬芳，这款酒是非常适合畅饮的大众型Medoc葡萄酒。我喜欢它大黄果酱的甜美以及甘草的辛香，洒落在柔柔的酒体表面，很温馨、很舒畅。
Chinese pairs.new: Smooth tannins, a clear palate, and delicate fruit and floral aromas make this a perfect crowd-pleasing Medoc wine for sipping. I adore its sweet apricot jam flavors and licorice spice, which dance across the soft, velvety texture, leaving a warm and comforting finish.

English pairs.original: With its silky tannins, crystal-clear palate, and light floral aroma, this Medoc wine is the perfect choice for a relaxing drink. I particularly appreciate its sweet and juicy notes of rhubarb jam and the spicy undertones of licorice that blend seamlessly with the wine’s soft body, making every sip a warm and enjoyable experience.
English pairs.new: 这款美度克地区的红酒，具有细腻的橡皮质感、清澈的口感和轻柔的花香，是放松饮酒的理想选择。特别值得一提的是，这款红酒的口感中有甜美的草莓酱和浓郁的甘草味，完美融合在酒体的柔和中，让每一口都像享受温暖的舒适感。

Western reviews.review: The blend of herbs, espresso and red currants works well here on the nose and on the medium-bodied, soft, fresh, cherry filled palate. You can enjoy this on release. Drink from 2023-2028.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中，草药、咖啡和红莓的混合效果很好，口感中等体积，软滑，新鲜，满满的樱桃味。可以在发布时即刻享用。建议饮用时间：2023-2028年。

Chinese pairs.original: 和我印象中的Le Marquis de Calon Segur 相比，2023年份的单宁质感较为突出，原本软糯的口感明显变得扎实了许多（该年份的赤霞珠上升到48%，美乐下降到50%，）。尽管如此，这款酒的香气表现仍然出众。奶油蓝莓和地中海香料的气息清晰可辨，既保持了经典的甜美，也带来了清新的口感，年轻时饮用依然轻松。
Chinese pairs.new: 相比我对Le Marquis de Calon Segur的印象，2023年份的口感更为扎实，单宁质感更突出。尽管赤霞珠比例上升到48%，美乐比例下降到50%，这款酒的香气仍然出色。它带有清晰可辨的奶油蓝莓和地中海香料气息，既保持了经典的甜美，又带来了清新的口感，适合年轻时饮用。

English pairs.original: In comparison to my memory of Le Marquis de Calon Segur, the 2023 vintage reveals a more pronounced tannin structure, as the Cabernet Sauvignon rises to 48% while the Merlot declines to 50%. Nevertheless, the aromatic profile of this wine remains outstanding. Notes of creamy blueberries and Mediterranean spices are discernible, maintaining both classic “sucrosite” and a refreshing palate, making it effortlessly enjoyable in its youth.
English pairs.new: 相比我对卡隆塞古尔（Calon Segur）马克西斯（Le Marquis）的记忆，2023年产的红酒展现出更为明显的坚果结构，卡波网（Cabernet Sauvignon）比例上升至48%，而梅洛（Merlot）比例下降至50%。然而，这款红酒的香气仍然出色，蓝莓和地中海香料的风味清晰可辨，保持了经典的“糖果味”（sucrosite）和清新口感，使其在年轻时期轻松享受。

Western reviews.review: The wine is a deep, dark ruby-red color. The  nose displays ripe, slightly raisined dark-fruit with aromas of cedary oak spice. The palate initially shows ripe red-fruit that is lifted by lovely fresh acidity. The fruit opens up to noted of red to black cherries & dark plum. Warming alcohol is balanced by concentrated fruit on the mid-palate. The wine finishes with dark red-plum fruit & exotic oak spices. 04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒呈现深暗的红宝石色。酒鼻中充满了成熟的黑果味，带有松木香和干酪香。口感上，初期呈现成熟的红果味，受到清新酸度的提振。随着时间的推移，果味逐渐展现出红到黑的樱桃和黑浆果。酒中酒精的暖意被浓郁的果味所平衡。酒尾呈现黑红浆果和异国风味的松木香。评分：04/24 (ep) DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 香气比较轻盈，散发着清脆的西梅和纯熟的黑李子芬芳。石墨的感觉蔓延于口中，伴随着绒毛一般的单宁缓缓涌向收尾。是一款品质不错的Medoc Cru Bourgeois。
Chinese pairs.new: The aroma is light and airy, with crisp notes of fresh plum and rich blackberry. A smooth graphite sensation lingers on the palate, accompanied by a soft, velvety tannin that unfolds to a satisfying finish. A well-crafted Medoc Cru Bourgeois.

English pairs.original: The aroma is delicate, offering crisp prunes and ripe black plums. The graphite spreads on the palate, coupled with velvet tannins towards the finish. A good quality Medoc Cru Bourgeois.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的香气非常轻盈，带有干酪般的干果和成熟的黑杏。口感上，矿物质的味道逐渐展开，伴随着细腻的橡皮质感，直到尾部。是一瓶优质的梅多克地区的堡地酒庄。

Western reviews.review: Much better with age, now, you find a wealth of red and black currants, leafy herbs, peppery spices, and wet earth, with a forward approach, allowing this wine to be enjoyed with pleasure today. Drink from 2023-2032.
Western reviews.translation: 随着时间的推移，这款红酒会变得越来越好。现在，你会发现它的味道丰富多样，包括红葡萄、黑葡萄、草本香味、辣椒味和潮湿的泥土味。这种前向的风格使得这款酒可以在今天就享受。建议在2023-2032年之间饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 2013年份Coufran的产量要远低于绝大多数其它年份，原因在于酒庄在分拣时格外严格，只为了挑选出最好的葡萄。此酒的香气充满草莓味，夹杂烟熏、岩石、红茶和草药的香味。口感怡人、干净而且异常新鲜。适合在年轻时享用的一款美酒。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2013 vintage of Coufran is significantly lower in yield than most other vintages, as the winery was extremely selective during the sorting process to only choose the best grapes. This wine is full of strawberry aromas, with subtle notes of smoked, stone, red tea, and herbs. The palate is delightful, clean, and exceptionally fresh. A perfect wine to enjoy in its youth.

English pairs.original: The production of the 2013 Coufran was much lower than most of the other vintages, because the estate sorted the grapes strictly so as to the select the best fruits. Loads of strawberry filled the aroma intermixed with smoke, rock, black tea and herb. It's delightfully clean and utterly fresh on the aftertaste. Approachable young.
English pairs.new: 2013年库弗兰（Coufran）红酒的产量远低于其他年份，因为庄园严格挑选葡萄，以选择最好的果实。酒中充满了浓郁的草莓香气，混合着烟火、岩石、黑茶和草药的味道。酒尾清新、干净，令人愉悦。这种年份的红酒非常适合年轻人品尝。

Western reviews.review: Château Coufran, an oddity on the Left Bank because of its high proportion of Merlot, combines a leafy earthy component with fine tannins in their 2014. It’s a steal. And just because Coufran is not a “classified growth” (that is, it was not classified as Grand Cru Classé in 1855) do not dismiss its ability to develop with age. I recently had a bottle of the 1982 Coufran, which was wonderfully fresh and complex.---- Michael Apstein
Western reviews.translation: 左岸的一个奇怪之处是，沙吕-科夫兰酒庄（Château Coufran）中梅洛（Merlot）的比例非常高。2014年的沙吕-科夫兰酒庄，结合了丰富的土壤和矿物质味道，以及细致的橡木味。它的价格非常便宜。即使沙吕-科夫兰酒庄不是“分类级别”（Grand Cru Classé）酒庄（1855年没有被评为一级酒庄），也不要忽视它的年龄发育能力。最近我品尝了1982年的沙吕-科夫兰酒庄，酒精度非常高，复杂性十足。——迈克尔·阿普斯坦（Michael Apstein）

Western reviews.review: 90–92. Barrel Sample. Smoky fruit aromas and flavors bring a ripe, creamy nature to this wine. It shows balance, offering room for freshness, acidity and a dark core of dry tannins.
Western reviews.translation: 90-92分。酒桶样品。酒中有烟熏的水果香气和口感，呈现出成熟、丰富的性质。酒呈现平衡，留有空间让新鲜度、酸度和干燥的坚果味展现。

Western reviews.review: Chocolate, currants, peppery spices and dried flowers come to the front of the perfume. Soft, round, medium-bodied, and fruity with a focus on its drinkability, red polished fruits and the hint of chocolate overtones in the finish. Drink from 2023-2036.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中，巧克力、葡萄干、辣椒样香料和干花味最为突出。口感柔和圆润，中等体积，果味丰富，注重口感舒适。酒尾有红果味和巧克力余韵。建议从2023年到2036年饮用。

Western reviews.review: Expressive Nase, dunkle Cassisfrucht, Brombeeren, ein Hauch Vanille. Im Gaumen dicht, saftig und konzentriert, wirkt nicht überladen, ausgwogen, mit feinmaschigem Tannine, guter Säure und einer tollen Würze, baut aus, zieht sich im Abgang angenehm lange hin und endet auf dunkle und rote Beeren sowie Röstaromen. Ein gelungener, klassischer Wein der auch reifen kann. 2025-2040 (April/Mai 2021)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

酒精表达丰富，黑加仑果、浆果、轻微的香草味。口感浓密、富有水分、集中，感觉不腻，平衡，细腻的橡皮感、酸度佳、味道浓郁，口感逐渐平稳，余味舒适地延续，最后留下黑和红浆果的味道以及烤焦的香气。是一款成功的、典型的红酒，随着时间的推移也会更好。推荐饮用时间：2025-2040（2021年4月-5月）。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Plain-Point 是2020年份我品鉴的所有Fronsac葡萄酒里颜色最深的一个。口感纯透爽朗，香气醇熟浓郁，刚开瓶后的烘焙的气息非常明显，并且带着铺天盖地的香料气息。从我个人的角度来说，如果莓果的芬芳能够更加清晰，并在收尾时把石灰岩风土的矿物感拉长一些，想必会更加出色。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau Plain-Point 是我品尝的2020年Fronsac葡萄酒中颜色最深的一款。口感清新、透明、爽朗，香气浓郁、醇熟，刚打开瓶盖时有明显的烘焙气息和香料味道。从我个人角度来说，如果莓果的香味更加清晰，并在尾部延长石灰岩风土的矿物感，可能会更出色。

English pairs.original: Chateau Plain-Point is the darkest wine of all the Fronsac I tasted in the vintage of 2020. Pure and crisp on the palate, rich and intense on the nose. The toasted scents and the saturated spicy notes are distinct when the bottle is just opened. Personally, it think it would be better to have a more distinct fruitiness and a more profound limestone minerality towards the finish.
English pairs.new: 2020年弗朗萨克（Fronsac）系列中，普莱恩-波因特（Chateau Plain-Point）是最深色的酒。口感清新纯粹，鼻子上富有丰富的香气。瓶子刚打开时，焦糖香和浓郁的辣味立即显现。个人感觉，如果酒尾有更明显的果味和更深的石灰矿味会更好。

Western reviews.review: With notes of chocolate, licorice, flowers, plums and salt in the perfume, the wine is lush, silky, fresh and polished on the palate with ample, sweet and mildly, salty cherries in the finish. Drink from 2023-2037.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中带有巧克力、 licorice、花朵、浆果和盐的味道。口感丰富、滑顺、清新、光滑，余味中有充足的甜浆果和轻微的盐味。建议从2023年到2037年饮用。

Western reviews.review: Le nez est fruité et offre une certaine intensité, une richesse maitrisée, une jolie finesse dans son grain ainsi qu’une certaine pureté. On y retrouve des notes de mûre écrasée, de fraise écrasée et plus légèrement de graphite associées à des touches de myrtille, de bleuet, de poivre ainsi qu’à de fines pointes de minéralité racée, de bosquet local sec et de thé. La bouche est minérale, juteuse, fraiche, gourmande et offre un joli caractère aérien, une trame acidulée ainsi qu’une jolie crémosité avec un côté aérien et étiré, tout en finesse. En bouche ce vin exprime des notes de mûre crémeuse, de cassis crémeux et plus légèrement de prune violette fraiche associées à des touches de chocolat, de noisette toasté et de vanille. Bonne longueur. Une discrète pointe de cardamone et de tabac blond sucré. Un bon travail sur les amers. Félicitations !
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的香气丰富，具有强烈的气味，富有层次感，细腻的口感和纯粹的味道。酒中有浓郁的黑berry、浓郁的草莓和轻微的石墨味，伴随着蓝莓、山蓝、胡椒和矿物质的微妙味道，以及干燥的当地林地和茶的味道。

口感矿物质、丰富、清新、丰富，具有美好的空气感，酸度清晰，具有美好的乳白色质感，具有空气感和延展感，细腻。口感中有浓郁的黑berry、浓郁的黑berry和轻微的紫色浆果味，伴随着巧克力、烤杏仁和香料的微妙味道。

酒的持久性很好，有一种微妙的卡达木和淡淡的白烟糖味。酒的苦味处理得很好，祝贺！

Chinese pairs.original: 香气整体比较简单，但粉末状的单宁和圆润的口感还是很好地诠释了圣爱美隆石灰岩黏土的风土个性（有一部分砂土土壤）。口感紧实浓郁，单宁醇厚绵密，收尾时不缺紧致的结构。期待陈年后的表现。
Chinese pairs.new: The aroma is relatively straightforward, but the powdery tannins and smooth texture effectively convey the terroir of Saint-Émilion limestone clay soils (with a portion of sandy soil). The palate is dense and concentrated, with rich, velvety tannins and a tightly structured finish. A promising wine for aging.

English pairs.original: The overall aromas are relatively simple, but the powdery tannins and rounded mouthfeel are still a wonderful expression of the Saint-Emilion clay-limestone soil (with a bit of sandy soil). The palate is compact and dense, with mellow, creamy tannins, and a firm structure at the finish. I’m expecting a good performance after aging.
English pairs.new: 总体来说，这款红酒的香气相对简单，但粉状的橡质和圆润的口感仍然是圣埃米利翁地区的粘土岩石土壤（带有一点沙质土壤）的美好体现。口感紧凑而浓密，口感柔和、奶油般的橡质，尾部结构坚实。经过陈化后，我预计这款红酒会表现出良好的效果。

Western reviews.review: Subtle in sensory profile it shows notes of geraniums, hawthorn, blueberries, plums and hyacinth. Full-bodied, harmonious and balanced, it shows precision of execution and a modern, flowing and genuine character. Well made. 100% Merlot. Drink now.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感细腻，带有玫瑰花香、山楂、蓝莓、李子和百合花的气味。酒体丰富、和谐、平衡，展现出精确的制作和现代、流畅、真实的性格。制作得很好。100% 梅洛葡萄。建议立即饮用。

Western reviews.review: Kräftige Farbe, steinig-krautige Nase, ein Hauch grüne Paprika zwischen dunkler Beerenfrucht und feinen Röstnoten. Im Gaumen rund im Auftakt, packt dann zu, zeigt etwas körnige, kräftige Gerbstoffe, einen mittleren Körper und eine gute Länge, hat Charakter. Dürfte früh Spass machen. 2025-2035+ (Verkostet im November 2023 in Zürich bei UGCB)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一瓶红酒的评论。翻译成中文如下：

浓郁的颜色，石头和草的鼻子，微微的绿色胡椒味在黑色浆果和细微的烤味之间。口感圆润，开始时很顺滑，然后变得强烈，展现出粗糙的、浓郁的颜色，中等的体积和良好的长度，具有独特的个性。应该会很快就让人满意。推荐储存时间：2025-2035年（2023年11月在瑞士的UGCB品尝）。

Western reviews.review: 90–92. Barrel Sample. A juicy wine with a smooth and easy texture. Blackberry flavors are likely to dominate as the wine undergoes wood aging. A light spiciness comes through at the end. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 90-92分。酒桶样品。口感丰富、滑顺，易于入口。黑莓的风味可能会在酒桶陈化过程中占据主导地位。酒尾带有轻微的香料味。- 罗杰·沃斯

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby, opaque core and purple hues. Fresh wild berries, a hint of plums, subtle touch of figs, chocolatey note. Medium-bodied, hints of plums, salty-minerality, vivid tannins finish a little dry.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，透明的核心和紫色调。新鲜的野生莓果，浓郁的浆果，略带杏仁的味道，巧克力味。中等体积，浓郁的浆果，矿物质味道，清晰的坚果味，干净的口感。

Western reviews.review: Flowers and black cherries come through on the nose. Soft, round and polished, with a nice sweetness to the fruits on the medium-bodied palate, and in the soft, creamy finish leaving you with a solid wave of cherries and dark chocolate. Things are definitely on the upswing here. Drink from 2024-2040. 90-92
Western reviews.translation: 酒香中有花朵和黑樱桃的气息。口感圆润、细腻，果味甜美，体积中等。余味软绵、奶油般，留下一波黑樱桃和巧克力的味道。酒品正在上升。建议2024-2040年饮用。评分：90-92分。

Chinese pairs.original: 新鲜黑加仑、丁香、樱桃香错综复杂。口感强劲有力，果香馥郁，酸度清脆，成熟度高。
Chinese pairs.new: Fresh blackcurrant, cloves, and cherry notes intertwine in complexity. The palate is robust and full-bodied, with intense fruit aromas, crisp acidity, and high maturity.

Western reviews.review: Although this big, boldly-styled Kirwan is less concentrated than some recent vintages have been, it is an impressive effort revealing a dense ruby/purple color as well as aromas of new oak, black currants, roasted herbs, and graphite. Full and rich with plenty of tannin to shed, although the tannins are melted and unaggressive (fondu as the French would say), this 2008 should evolve for two decades or more.  Range:  88-90
Western reviews.translation: 这款大胆风格的凯伦红酒虽然比最近几年更为稀释，但仍然是一款令人印象深刻的酒品。它呈现出浓郁的深红色，气味中充满了新橡木、黑加仑、烤香草和石墨的香气。酒体丰富饱满，含有足够的纤维酸，但纤维酸柔和温和，随着时间的推移，这款2008年的凯伦红酒将在20年以上的时间内不断演变。评分：88-90分。

Western reviews.review:
Caramel new wood aromas are followed by spice and toast flavors. The fruit seems thin by comparison, hard to feel under all that polished toast.

Barrel Sample: 88-90 Points
Western reviews.translation:
这款红酒的香气中有焦糖和新橡木的味道，接着是香料和烤面包的风味。相比之下，果味似乎较为稀薄，难以在所有的光滑烤面包味道下感受到。

酒评：88-90分（酒桶样品）

Chinese pairs.original: 1985年的酒香中蕴含着丰富的陈年中草药味道，看得出赤霞珠的成熟度未能达到最佳水平。尽管香气略显疲态，口感却展现出“老当益壮”的风采，贯穿始终的酸度和独特的野性皮革味道相得益彰。酒体略显单薄，中空的结构少了一些“肉欲”，多了一些“骨感”，单宁显得更为突出。好在这款酒的口感十分柔顺，收尾时还带着丝丝甜意。建议即刻开瓶享用。
Chinese pairs.new: This 1985 wine boasts a rich, aged herbal character, but unfortunately, the Cabernet Sauvignon's maturity hasn't quite reached its peak. The aroma may be slightly tired, but the palate shines with a "maturity that comes with age" charm, with a persistent acidity and a unique wild leather note that complements each other perfectly. The body is slightly lean, with a hollow structure that lacks some "flesh" but gains some "bone," and the tannins are more pronounced. Fortunately, the texture is very smooth, with a hint of sweetness at the finish. I recommend drinking it immediately.

English pairs.original: The aroma of the 1985 vintage encompasses a rich array of aged herbal notes, revealing that the ripeness of the Cabernet Sauvignon did not reach its optimal level. Though the fragrance may seem a bit tired, the palate showcases a “old tough guy’s” character, with a consistent acidity and a unique wild leather flavor complementing each other. The body of this wine is somewhat thin, with a hollow structure that lacks a bit of “fleshiness”, making the tannins stand out more. Fortunately, the wine has a very smooth mouthfeel, ending with a hint of sweetness. It is recommended to open the bottle and enjoy it now.
English pairs.new: 1985年产的这瓶红酒，气味丰富，带有成熟的草药味，表明卡布塞尔·索维涅的成熟度没有达到最佳状态。虽然香气可能有些疲倦，但口感却展现出“老硬汉”的特质，酸度保持一致，独特的野生皮革味道与之相互呼应。酒体略薄，结构空虚，没有足够的“丰满感”，使得苦味更为突出。幸运的是，酒口感非常顺滑，最后带有微微的甜味。建议打开瓶子，尽快享用。

Western reviews.review: Fully mature, the seductive nose offers hints of truffle, tobacco, spice box, licorice, blackberry, cedar wood and smoke. Smooth and round with a little dust in the tannins, the wine ends with a sweet and sour cherry finish.
Western reviews.translation: 完全成熟的酒香诱人，带有松露、烟草、香料盒、 licorice、黑莓、红木和烟雾的味道。口感平滑圆润，略带干涩感，酒尾以甜酸的樱桃味结束。

Western reviews.review: (1997) Very full, deep crimson colour. Leafy cabernet nose, hint of toasted oak and burnt rubber. Medium bodied, very pure, clean blackcurrant fruit and soft, integrated oak. Nice long, peppery finish with firm tannins. Good length. Just below my top 3.
Western reviews.translation: 1997年：酒液充满，深红色。有浓郁的木叶气味，略带焦炭和烧焦橡胶的味道。中等体积，非常纯粹，清澈的黑currant果味和柔和的融合橡木味。有长长的辣椒味，坚实的纽扣。酒尾长。仅次于我的前三名。

Chinese pairs.original: 作为一款以Semillon为主的波尔多干白葡萄酒，我能透过糖果般甜美的口感感受到其丰满和圆润的气质。微微咸鲜质地的矿物感让收尾变得紧致收敛，是夏季与朋友畅饮的好搭档。
Chinese pairs.new: This Semillon-based dry white Bordeaux wine exudes a full-bodied and rounded charm through its sweet, candy-like texture. A subtle salty freshness and mineral quality add a crisp finish, making it a perfect companion for carefree summer sipping with friends.

English pairs.original: As a Semillon-based white wine, I can feel its roundness and sweetness through a candy-like flavor. Its salty mineral notes improve the tension and clarity towards the finish. As an easy-drinking wine, it is very suitable for sharing with friends during summertime.
English pairs.new: 作为一款基于塞缪隆白酒的白酒，我可以感受到它的圆润和甜度通过糖果味的风味。它的咸矿物质味道提高了酒尾的张力和清晰度。作为一种易于饮用的酒，它非常适合在夏季与朋友分享。

Western reviews.review: With a high proportion of Sémillon in the blend, this is a ripe, creamy wine. It has a background tang of acidity, with citrus a focus initially. As the wine matures further, the richness and yellow-fruit flavors will come through strongly. Drink from 2023. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒中，塞米隆(Sémillon)占比较高，呈现出浓郁的、奶油般的口感。酒中有着微妙的酸度，初期 citrus 的风味占据主导地位。随着酒的成熟，酒中的丰富感和黄果风味会更加明显。建议从2023年开始饮用。 - 罗杰·沃斯(Roger Voss)

Western reviews.review: Pale lemon yellow colour with greenish hints. Lovely, classic aromas of asparagus, pea-pod & cats-pee with sulphide notes. The palate is dry, soft & rounded with ripe fruit & balanced alcohol - acid is a little low & the finish of mid-length. 6/20 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是浅黄色，带有绿色调。酒香典雅，类似新鲜的芦笋、豌豆和猫尿，伴有硫化物的味道。口感干净，软滑，果味成熟，酒精和酸度平衡，但酸度略低，口感持久度中等。评分6/20。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Le Bon Pasteur 2021能够在凉年份展现出这么好的成熟度着实不易。虽然蓝莓与樱桃的果香在装瓶后有所收敛，烘焙的香气也愈发突显，但依然巧妙地维持了优雅的平衡。单宁醇厚富有嚼劲，包裹在圆润之中，让整个味蕾都显得富有弹性。倘若收尾时能够更加柔和将会更加喜人。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau Le Bon Pasteur 2021的成熟度令人惊叹，尤其是在凉年份。虽然蓝莓和樱桃的果香在瓶装后有所减弱，烘焙的香气变得更加突出，但仍然保持着优雅的平衡。酒中的单宁丰富而厚实，具有嚼劲，包裹在圆润的口感中，使整个口感变得富有弹性。如果尾部更加柔和会更令人满意。

English pairs.original: Chateau Le Bon Pasteur 2021 remarkably showcases impressive maturity, especially notable in a cool vintage. Although the fruit aromas of blueberries and cherries have become more restrained after bottling, with toasted scents becoming increasingly prominent, the wine still skillfully maintains an good balance. The tannins are rich and chewy, enveloped in smoothness, lending an overall resilient character to the palate. If having a softer finish, this wine would be even more delightful.
English pairs.new: 查泰乌堡莱波纳帕斯特尔 2021 年的红酒表现出令人印象深刻的成熟度，尤其是在冷季的葡萄成熟期。虽然在瓶装后，蓝莓和樱桃的果香变得更加克制，但 Toasted 的香气变得更加突出，酒精仍然保持着良好的平衡。酒中的纤维素丰富而有嚼头，融入了细腻的滑感，使口感更加坚韧。如果酒精更软一些，这款酒将更加令人愉悦。

Western reviews.review: Esse Château foi fundado em 1920 pelos avós do famoso Michel Rolland, que realizou grandes inovações desde que assumiu a propriedade em 1979. Mesmo após vender a propriedade em 2013, permanece como enólogo-consultor junto com sua esposa Dany. Os apenas 6,2 hectares de vinhedos são formados por 80% de Merlot e 20% de Cabernet Franc. A fruta é vermelha e suculenta. Muito límpida. Em boca, tem enorme equilíbrio. Madeira que enobrece o vinho ainda é bem presente, como esperado de seus mais de 15 meses em estágio em barricas de carvalho francês, sendo 80% novas. Notas de cedro e ervas. Acidez e taninos vibrantes. Pimenta branca em um prenúncio de desenvolvimento para estábulo. Delicioso hoje, será ainda melhor no fim desta década.
Western reviews.translation:
这个红酒评论翻译成中文如下：

这个酒庄成立于1920年，由著名葡萄酒制作师迈克尔·罗兰德的祖父母创立。自1979年迈克尔·罗兰德接管酒庄以来，进行了许多革新。即使在2013年将酒庄出售后，他仍然担任葡萄酒制作师顾问，并与妻子丹尼一起工作。酒庄的葡萄园面积仅有6.2公顷，主要种植梅洛（80%）和卡波弗朗克（20%）。酒的口感是鲜红的、浓郁的、清澈的。在口中，酒有着巨大的平衡感。陈年的木头味道仍然很浓郁，这是因为酒在法国橡木桶中陈化了超过15个月，占80%是新桶。酒中有松柏和香草的味道。酸度和坚果味的味道非常活跃。酒中有白胡椒的味道，这预示着酒的发展潜力。酒现在已经很好喝，但在本世纪末会更加出色。

Western reviews.review: Ripe and essential shows notes of plums, black plums, blackberries, incense and green tea leaves. Medium body, soft tannins and an easy finish. A blend of 80% Merlot and 20% Cabernet Franc. Drink now.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感丰富，具有浓郁的果香，展现出浓郁的浆果味，如浆果、黑浆果、黑莓、香烟和绿茶叶。口感中等，纤维软，易于入口。酒中含有80%梅洛和20%卡波弗朗克。建议立即饮用。

Western reviews.review: Leicht rauchige Nase, strahlt Terroir aus, zeigt mineralische Noten, dunkle Beeren, etwas Tabak. Im Gaumen straff, ordentlich konzentriert, die Gerbstoffe markieren, sind jedoch feiner, als ich sie en Primeur wahrgenommen, habe. Im Abgang würzig, mit dunkler Frucht und sehr guter Länge. Hat sich positiv entwickelt! 2028-2040 (Verkostet im November 2023 in Zürich bei UGCB)
Western reviews.translation: 轻微的烟熏味，酒香中透露着地理特征，带有矿物质的味道，黑色浆果和一点点烟草。口感紧致，浓缩度适中，酒中的鞣质成分清晰可辨，但比初次品尝时更为细腻。尾部有着浓郁的香气，带有黑色浆果和非常持久的余韵。酒在陈化过程中表现出明显的改善。推荐储存时间：2028-2040（2023年11月在瑞士Zürich的UGCB品酒会中品尝）。

Western reviews.review: Deep garnet fading to purple at the rim. Subtle noble wood spices, a touch of vanilla, black forest berries and liquorice. Slender, black berry fruit, fine tannins, mineral, delicate leafy nuances on the finish.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色渐变至紫色边缘。细微的高贵木质香气，带有一点香草味，黑森林莓和甘草。细长的黑莓果味，细致的纤维素，矿物质，细微的叶绿色细节在尾部。

Western reviews.review: Black cherries, incense, espresso, flowers and red fruits show with ease in the nose and in the round, soft, medium-bodied, elegant, plummy palate. The wine will take a year or two for the oak to fully integrate. Drink from 2024-2040. 91-93
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中充满了黑樱桃、香烟、咖啡、花朵和红果的味道，口感圆润、柔软、中等体积、优雅、浓郁的黑果味。酒中橡木味需要一到两年才能完全融合。建议从2024年到2040年饮用。评分：91-93分。

Chinese pairs.original: 淡淡的草药，有黑莓，迷迭香和薄荷的香气，酒体适中，单宁强劲但是质感特别好，余味较长。
Chinese pairs.new: Delicate herbal notes, with hints of blackberry, thyme, and mint, a medium-bodied wine with robust tannins and a silky texture, with a long finish.

Western reviews.review: Medium to deep ruby-red color. Medium intensity of earthy, dark-fruit & tobacco-leaf aromas. The palate is restrained & balanced, its ripe fruits are supported by grainy tannins. Alcohol is balanced & the finish has good length. The wine has plentiful fruit but it needs time to gain suppleness. 11/02 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深红色至深红色。

香气：浓郁的泥土、黑果和烟草味。

口感：口感平衡，果味丰富，纤维性坚果味。

酒精度：酒精度适中。

尾部：尾部持久。

评语：酒中有丰富的果味，但需要时间来使其更加柔和。

2020 Vignobles Meyre Chateau Cap Leon Ve.name: 2020 Vignobles Meyre Chateau Cap Leon Veyrin

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Cap Leon Veyrin 2020 的香气主要表现为成熟的浆果和潮湿的花生壳，复杂度并不突出，但醇厚集中的口感还是给我留下了不错的印象。考虑到它老道稳重的个性，相信稍加陈年之后就能散发出湿壁炉和烟草的经典气息。
Chinese pairs.new: The aroma of Chateau Cap Leon Veyrin 2020 is primarily characterized by mature plum and damp peanut shells, with a relatively subtle complexity. However, the rich and concentrated palate still left a good impression on me. Considering its mature and balanced personality, I believe it will release classic notes of damp fireplace and tobacco after a bit of aging.

English pairs.original: The primary aromas of Chateau Cap Leon Veyrin 2020 are ripe cherries and wet peanut shells, with little complexity, yet the full-bodied and intense palate nonetheless made a good impression on me. With a little age, I think it will release the traditional notes of wet fireplace and tobacco because of its traditional and sturdy attitude.
English pairs.new: 查塔欧莱昂韦林 2020 的主要香气是熟透的樱桃和湿润的花生壳，虽然没有太多的复杂性，但其丰富的口感和强烈的味道仍然给我留下了深刻的印象。随着一点点的陈化，我认为它会释放出湿润的壁炉和烟草的传统香气，因为它的传统和坚韧的性格。

Western reviews.review: (58% Merlot, 39% Cabernet Sauvignon, 3% Petit Verdot) Staubige, kühle, würzige Nase, spannend, dunkle Beeren Cassis, Eukalyptus. Im Auftakt saftig, gradlinig, knackige Frucht, mittlerer Körper, markante, reife Tannine, sehr balanciert, frisch und lebendig, im Abgang von mittlerer Länge. Ein Wein mit Charakter und Eleganz. Dürfte gut reifen. 2026-2038+ (April/Mai 2021)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一瓶混合红酒，主要成分为：

* 58% 美丽托（Merlot）
* 39% 卡波弗雷（Cabernet Sauvignon）
* 3% 小皮多（Petit Verdot）

酒的气味是：

* 烟雾感
* 冷却感
* 有香料味
* 有浓郁的黑berry和卡西斯味
* 有薄荷味

酒的口感是：

* 在入口时，酒口感丰富，果味清晰，结构紧致
* 酒体中等，口感平衡，果味成熟，纤维性强
* 酒尾中等长度，余味清新，生动

这是一瓶有特点和优雅的红酒，应该会在未来几年内逐渐成熟。建议在2026-2038年之间饮用。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby, opaque core, purple reflections, brightening on the rim. Discreet blackberry nuances, black cherries, candied orange zest, inviting bouquet. Medium body, fine fruit expression, integrated tannins, elegant and balanced, fine mocha and toast notes on the finish.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，透明核心，紫色反射，杯口明亮。细微的黑莓和黑杏果味，糖化橙皮，诱人的香气。中等体积，细致的果味表达，融合的纤维，优雅平衡，口感中有细微的巧克力和-toast味。

Chinese pairs.original: 香气很成熟而柔和，不需要摇杯就散发着蔓越莓、蓝莓果粒以及淡淡的黑松露气息。菌菇和雪茄盒的痕迹十分突出，回甘时还带着铁锈和金属粉末的味道。口感松软，结构轻柔，非常适合喜欢温柔型葡萄酒的朋友。
Chinese pairs.new: The aroma is mature and smooth, releasing subtle hints of raspberry, blueberry, and a touch of black truffle without needing to swirl the glass. The earthy and tobacco notes are prominent, with a lingering finish of rust and metallic dust. The palate is soft and silky, with a delicate structure that makes it perfect for those who prefer a gentle wine.

English pairs.original: The aroma is mature and gentle, effortlessly releasing notes of cranberries, blueberry morsels, and a subtle hint of black truffle without the need for swirling. The presence of mushrooms and a cigar box is pretty good, while the finish carries a trace of metallic dust. The texture is supple, and the structure is delicate, making it well-suited for those who appreciate tenderness.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的香气成熟而温和，轻松释放出草莓、蓝莓和黑松露的香味，甚至不需要摇晃。蘑菇和雪茄盒的存在很不错，而尾部带有金属灰尘的余味。口感细腻，结构轻盈，适合那些喜欢柔和口感的人。

Western reviews.review: like this, good Bordeaux traits with black fruit and tannins. not as much leather and tobacco as Pauillac and Pessac Leognan, our favourites but still a very good wine at £30 ish a bottle.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的风格与波尔多的典型特征相似，带有黑果和坚果的味道。虽然不如我们喜爱的波尔多地区（如巴约克和佩萨克-莱奥贡南）那样具有皮革和烟草的味道，但仍然是一款非常好的红酒，价格大约在30英镑左右。

2019 Le Clementin du Chateau Pape Clemen.name: 2019 Le Clementin du Chateau Pape Clement

Chinese pairs.original: 香气主要表现为黄桃罐头和成熟的白杏，隐约中透着些许菠萝蜜和佛手柑的清香。浑圆的酒体让人误以为是高比例Semillon（其实是78% Sauvignon Blanc），成熟年份白葡萄酒的气质彰显无遗。
Chinese pairs.new: The aroma is predominantly characterized by apricot jam and mature white peach, with subtle hints of pineapple and bergamot. The full-bodied wine has a rounded texture that might lead one to believe it's a high proportion of Semillon (in reality, it's 78% Sauvignon Blanc), exuding the elegance of a mature white wine.

English pairs.original: The nose features ripe yellow peach and apricots, with hints of jackfruit and bergamot after swirling the glass. The round body and oily made me mistakenly think it was a high proportion of Semillon blend (78% Sauvignon Blanc); it explains well the charisma of white wine in a hot and ripe vintage.
English pairs.new: 酒 nose 上呈现成熟黄桃和杏子的香气，搖晃酒杯后还能闻到 jackfruit 和 bergamot 的味道。酒体圆润，油腻的口感让我误以为是 Semillon 的比例较高（实际上是 78% Sauvignon Blanc），这也解释了白酒在炎热和成熟的葡萄成熟季节中魅力十足的原因。

Western reviews.review: Sweet and smoky with tobacco leaf, espresso, lead pencil and ripe, dark red berry notes create the aromatic profile. On the palate, the wine is soft, round, polished, sweet and fruity. There is lift, character and a load of ripe red berries in the finish. Enjoy this while waiting for the Grand Vin to develop. Drink from 2023-2034. 91 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中融合了烟熏的味道、烟草叶、浓缩咖啡、铅笔和成熟的黑红色浆果的香气。口感上，酒体柔和、圆润、光滑、甜蜜且果香。酒尾有升华、个性和成熟黑红色浆果的余韵。建议在等待大酒庄成熟的同时享用。建议饮用时间：2023-2034年。评分：91分。

Western reviews.review: Sweet and smoky with tobacco leaf, espresso, lead pencil and ripe, dark red berry notes create the aromatic profile. On the palate, the wine is soft, round, polished, sweet and fruity. There is lift, character and a load of ripe red berries in the finish. Enjoy this while waiting for the Grand Vin to develop. Drink from 2023-2034. 91 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中融合了烟熏的味道、烟草叶、浓缩咖啡、铅笔和成熟的黑红色浆果的香气。口感上，酒体柔和、圆润、光滑、甜蜜和果香。酒尾有升华、个性和成熟黑红色浆果的余味。建议在等待大酒庄成熟的同时享用。建议饮用时间为2023-2034年。评分：91分。

Western reviews.review: Sweet and smoky with tobacco leaf, espresso, lead pencil and ripe, dark red berry notes create the aromatic profile. On the palate, the wine is soft, round, polished, sweet and fruity. There is lift, character and a load of ripe red berries in the finish. Enjoy this while waiting for the Grand Vin to develop. Drink from 2023-2034. 91 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中融合了烟熏的味道、烟草叶、浓缩咖啡、铅笔和成熟的黑红色浆果的香气。口感上，酒体柔和、圆润、光滑、甜蜜且果香。酒尾有升华、个性和成熟黑红色浆果的余韵。建议在等待大酒庄成熟的同时享用。建议饮用时间：2023-2034年。评分：91分。

Western reviews.review: Sweet and smoky with tobacco leaf, espresso, lead pencil and ripe, dark red berry notes create the aromatic profile. On the palate, the wine is soft, round, polished, sweet and fruity. There is lift, character and a load of ripe red berries in the finish. Enjoy this while waiting for the Grand Vin to develop. Drink from 2023-2034. 91 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中融合了烟熏的味道、烟草叶、浓缩咖啡、铅笔和成熟的黑红色浆果的香气。口感上，酒体柔和、圆润、光滑、甜蜜且果香。酒尾有升华、个性和成熟黑红色浆果的余韵。建议在等待大酒庄成熟的过程中享用。建议饮用时间：2023-2034年。评分：91分。

Western reviews.review: Offene, reife anmutende Nase, erinnert an eingekochte Kirschen, zeigt auch Aromen von Zedernholz und Weihnachtsgebäck. Im Gaumen zugänglich, rund, die Frucht ist delikat, eine mittlere Struktur stützt, im Abgang allerdings leicht trocknend und nicht sonderlich lang. 2024-2030. (Juni 2020)
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气开放、成熟，带有熟透的樱桃的味道，伴有松木和圣诞饼干的香气。口感圆润，果味细腻，中等结构支撑，尾部略微干涩，持久性不长。推荐饮用时间：2024-2030年。评分时间：2020年6月。

Chinese pairs.original: 飞卓酒庄属于独一无二的淡雅风格。这是支不同寻常的以赤霞珠为主的右岸葡萄酒，带有优雅馥郁的花香、果香和辛香料滋味，入口弥漫黑巧克力滋味，伴随着粉末状的结构及余韵。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine is a unique expression of elegance. It's an extraordinary right bank Bordeaux dominated by Cabernet Franc, with refined floral, fruit and spice aromas, and a rich, velvety texture that unfolds with notes of dark chocolate, supported by a silky, powdery structure and a lingering finish.

English pairs.original: Figeac is always unique, light and elegant. This is an unusual, Cabernets predominately right bank Bordeaux red, gracefully floral on nose with nicely balanced fruits and spices, extremely (dark) chocolaty on palate with powdery structure&aftertaste.
English pairs.new: 菲盖阿克酒一直是独特的，轻盈的，优雅的。这是一种不寻常的，来自右岸波尔多的卡贝网酒，具有优雅的花香，口感丰富的果实和香料，口感极其浓郁的巧克力味，结构坚实，余味持久。

Western reviews.review: Intense aromas of wet earth, leaves, sweet berries and cinnamon follow through to a full body, velvety and dense tannins and a long and flavorful finish. Opulent style. Just opening now, but this shows lots of stuffing, even if it does tighten down on the palate. Integrated and fine. Drink or hold.
Western reviews.translation: 强烈的气味，带有泥土、叶子、甜水果和肉桂的香气，延续到厚实的口感，细腻的和密集的苦味和长而丰富的尾部。奢华的风格。刚刚打开，尽管在口感上会变得紧绷，但仍然表现出丰富的内容。整合和细致。可 immediate饮用或储存。

Western reviews.review: Deep garnet colored, the 2010 Figeac bursts from the glass with gregarious scents of baked blueberries, black cherry compote and chocolate box with hints of camphor, pencil lead and iron ore. Medium to full-bodied, the palate has beautifully ripe, velvety tannins and bold freshness supporting the generous fruit, finishing long and layered.
Western reviews.translation: 2010年菲热克红酒呈现深红色，酒香丰富，带有烤蓝莓、黑杏酱和巧克力盒的香气，伴有樟脑、铅笔和铁矿石的微妙气息。口感中等到中厚，口感丰富细腻，果实丰富，带有明亮的新鲜感，长长的尾部，层次丰富。

Western reviews.review:
This Cabernet Sauvignon-dominated wine always stands out as a powerhouse of impressive tannins. In 2010, it is complex with a dense structure, tight mineral texture and dense wood. Underneath, the ripe black fruits bring the promise for the long-term future. Give this wine at least 10 years.

Cellar Selection
Western reviews.translation: 这款以卡贝内特·索维涅为主的红酒始终以其出色的坚果感而闻名。2010年版的酒精含量高达14.5%，复杂的结构、紧密的矿物质质感和浓郁的木质味让人印象深刻。酒中的成熟黑果味道隐隐约约地透露着长期储存的潜力。建议至少储存10年。

Western reviews.review: This is very tight, showing a prominent roasted apple wood and bittersweet cocoa frame more today, though the core of dense currant paste, blackberry pâte de fruit and plum sauce waits in reserve. Gorgeous singed spice, anise and toasted fig bread notes flitter through the finish, though this needs some time in the cellar to resolve itself fully. A very distinctive, structured expression of St.-Emilion. Best from 2016 through 2035.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒非常紧致，今天更显著的是烤苹果木和苦巧克力框架，但浓郁的黑currant果酱、黑莓果酱和浓浓的浓果酱仍在等待发挥。美丽的焦糖香料、荳蔻和烤烤的枫糖面包香味在尾部飞舞，但这需要在酒窖中放置一段时间才能完全发挥。圣埃米利昂地区独特的结构化表达。建议从2016年到2035年最佳。

Western reviews.review: Another brilliant wine, where you start to get lulled into a false sense of security that Bordeaux always tastes like this. But it doesn't. Okay, Figeac does more often than most, but even here this is exceptional. The silky texture is evident, but overall this Cabernet dominant is packed with dark berry fruits, firm tannins and a menthol wash through the finish. Liquorice, cassis, blackberry, chocolate, all knitted together and ready to go. They have stepped up another level in recent years, but this gives ample evidence of why Figeac has always been an estate to take extremely seriously.
Western reviews.translation: 又是一瓶精彩的红酒，让人误以为波尔多酒总是如此美味。但并非如此。虽然菲加克(Figeac)的酒品确实经常如此，但即使在这里，这也是一种特殊的例子。细致的口感是显而易见的，但整体来说，这种以卡波网(Cabernet)为主的酒品充满了深色的浆果风味、坚实的苦味和一丝薄荷的余味。酒中包含了 licorice、cassis、黑莓、巧克力等各种风味，所有的元素都被巧妙地融合在一起，准备好享用。近年来，他们的酒品水平已经有了显著的提高，但这瓶酒充分证明了为什么菲加克一直是一个值得非常重视的酒庄。

Chinese pairs.original: 这款酒生动且充满活力，展示给我非常明亮的玫瑰花香和清晰的混合红色水果香气。但遗憾的是，如此精彩的酒在摇了几次酒杯之后结构稍显松动，如此一来，口中的单宁感就显得没有那么平衡了。期待在装瓶后再次品尝一看究竟。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine is vibrant and full of life, showcasing extremely bright rose petal aromas and crisp mixed red fruit scents. Unfortunately, such a great wine loses its structure slightly after being swirled in the glass a few times, resulting in a less balanced tannin sensation in the mouth. I look forward to tasting it again after bottling to see if it improves.

English pairs.original: This wine is lively, vigorous, sanding out brilliant rose petal and fresh red berries. However, after swirling the glass, this beautiful bouquet fades a bit. Hence, the tannins are exposed immediately to the palate without modification. I hope to taste it one more time after bottling.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒生动活泼，展现出鲜艳的玫瑰花瓣和新鲜的红果味。然而，当我们在杯子里搅拌时，这美丽的香气会逐渐减弱。因此，酒中的苦味成分会立即呈现在口中，没有经过任何调和。希望有一天能再次品尝到瓶装后的这瓶酒。

Western reviews.review: Flowers, pine trees, spice and black cherries pop in the nose. On the palate, the wine is opulent, polished with a core of ripe, sweet, fresh, black plums, blueberry and mint that hold your attention from start to finish. As I wrote when tasted this from the barrel, this is clearly a new level of quality at Rochebelle. Much of that credit deservedly goes to their new consultant, Thomas Duclos. Drink from 2024-2040.
Western reviews.translation: 酒香中充满了鲜花、松树、香料和黑樱桃的芬芳。口感丰富、光滑，核心是成熟的甜黑杏、蓝莓和薄荷，始终保持着你的注意力。就像我在从酒桶中品尝时写的那样，这显然是罗什贝尔(Rochebelle)品质的新高度。很大一部分的功劳应该归功于他们的新顾问托马斯·杜克洛斯(Thomas Duclos)。建议2024-2040年饮用。

Western reviews.review: Deep ruby, opaque core, purple reflections, brightening at the rim. Delicate floral notes under black wild berries, fresh cherries, candied orange zest. Juicy, good complexity, elegant, dark fruit, freshly structured, ripe tannins, shows good length. Harmonious, with ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，透明核心，紫色反射，边缘加亮。细微的花香，黑野莓，新鲜樱桃，糖化橙皮。 juicy，复杂性好，优雅，黑色水果，新鲜结构，成熟的鞣质，展现出良好的长度。和谐，具有成熟潜力。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有李子、黑莓和蓝莓的浓郁果味。余味绵长醇厚，带有丰沛的烤面包味，给人以坚实绵密的感觉。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich fruit flavors of plum, blackberry, and blueberry. A long, velvety finish with a full-bodied toasted bread note, conveying a sense of solid, dense texture.
