Western reviews.review: (2001) Nice, bright black fruits on the nose; cherries and bold, crunchy blackcurrant. A fresh character. Much riper and more fruit driven on the palate, with bold, racy flavours against a background of oak. Good concentration.
Western reviews.translation: 2001年：酒香中有明亮的黑色水果，特别是黑樱桃和坚果的黑currant。酒体清新。口感上更成熟，更多的水果味道，强烈的、清脆的黑currant味道在橡木的背景下。酒精度高。

Western reviews.review: 4-1/2 stars actually! Only a wine that has seen significant sunshine can give this type of experience. More like a classy new world Syraz than a Pessac Leognan GCC. Deep old cherry red. Animal tones, red fruits, black currants, womderful nose. Soft and silky, distinguished tannins, red fruit, cherry
Western reviews.translation: 4.5星！只有在阳光充足的葡萄园中才能酿造出这样的红酒。更像是一款高级新世界的西拉（Syrah）红酒，而不是白朗格（Pessac Leognan）地区的格罗纳克（GCC）。深红色，类似于老年樱桃。动物气息、红果、黑樱桃，闻起来非常美妙。口感柔软细腻，具有特征性的纤维，红果、樱桃。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Lanessan 2022 中奇妙的奶香气息让我想起了童年时光里的喜之郎果冻。这款酒在口中表现相当亮眼，醇厚的酒体中隐藏着丰富而细腻的单宁；柔滑的酒液中流淌着和谐的酸度。虽然期酒阶段的香气显得略为低调，但我坚信装瓶之后它会表现的更好。
Chinese pairs.new:
Chateau Lanessan 2022

This wine has a charming, milky aroma that reminds me of childhood memories of lychee jelly. It shines in the mouth, with a rich, velvety texture hiding a wealth of refined tannins; smooth, harmonious acidity flows through the liquid. Although the nose is a bit subdued at this stage, I'm confident it will improve after bottling.

English pairs.original: The intriguing milky aroma of Chateau Lanessan 2022 evokes memories of the cherished childhood delight of fruit jelly. This wine exhibits a lively performance on the palate, with a good richness veiling an abundance of tannins, and a harmonious acidity courses through the body. Although the fragrance appears somewhat subdued during the En Primeurs, I am confident that it will flourish after bottling.
English pairs.new: 2022年夏娃酒庄的迷人奶白香气，让人回忆起童年时的果冻美味。这款酒在口感上展现出活泼的表现，富有丰富的口感掩盖了丰富的苦味，酸度则在整个口感中流动和谐。尽管在En Primeurs期间香气似乎有些低调，但我相信它会在瓶装后茁壮成长。

Western reviews.review: Blackberries, currants, tobacco leaf, underbrush, and fennel on the nose let you know the wine is going to be good. And with the first sip, you are not disappointed due to all the currants, roundness, and ripe, sweet, blackberries with freshness on display. Drink from 2026-2047. 91-93 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中有浓郁的黑莓、黑加仑、烟草叶、灌木丛和丁香的味道，让你预感这酒会很好。第一口喝下后，你不会失望，因为黑莓的甜味、圆润的口感和新鲜的味道都在展示。建议从2026年到2047年饮用。评分：91-93分。

Western reviews.review: Feiner Duft, eher verhalten, schwarze Johannisbeere, pfeffrige Würze. Im Gaumen stukturiert, mit viel Tannin, dieses wirkt etwas trocknend, überlagert die Frucht zu diesem Zeitupunkt. Mittellanges Finale, wiederum dunkelfruchtig geprägt. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / Grand Cercle / Château la Dauphine) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论，翻译如下：

芬芳清晰，略为谨慎，黑莓味浓郁，带有胡椒味的调味。口感结构良好，含有大量的苦味物质，这使得口感略为干涩，覆盖了果味。中等长度的尾部，仍然带有深色果味。

注：这篇评论是2023年4月在Grand Cercle / Château la Dauphine进行的“En Primeur”品鉴。

Western reviews.review: Le nez a de l’élégance avec une certaine petite puissance, de la tension et des notes de violette et de lilas. Plus légèrement on retrouve des notes de petites baies rouges fraîches mûres associées à des touches de mûres ainsi qu’à des pointes de muscade et à une discrète note de poivre gris. La bouche est fruitée avec de la jutosité et de la fraîcheur. Il y a de la minéralité et une trame acidulée avec de l’énergie. On a des notes de mûres juteuses fraîches, de framboises éclatantes et plus légèrement de cerises acérola juteuses associées à des touches de badiane, de bergamote et une subtile pointe d’iris et d’amande toastée. Il y a une jolie fraîcheur avec des tannins racés et enfin moelleux.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气优雅而有力，带有紫罗兰和百合花的气息。轻微地闻到的是新鲜的红果子和熟透的黑果子，伴有丁香和灰胡椒的微妙气息。口感果香浓郁，带有清新和果实的感觉。酒中有矿物质和酸度的平衡，充满活力。口感中有新鲜的黑果子、爆发的蓝莓和浓郁的酸橙，伴有丁香、柑橘和微妙的百里香和杏仁的气息。酒中有清新的感觉，带有有力而细腻的口感。

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby, opaque core, purple reflections, subtle brightening on the rim. Fresh wild red berries, subtle herbal notes, sweet cherries in the background. Medium body, red berry notes, present tannins, leafy finish.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，透明的核心，紫色反射，酒杯边缘微微发亮。新鲜的野生红果，微妙的草药味，背景中的甜樱桃。中等体积，红果味，存在的苦味，叶状的尾韵。

Chinese pairs.original: 与Adrien Bernard一同品鉴。厚实、经典的苏玳香气，散发着奶油杏子、贵腐、蜂蜜、香料、菠萝蜜饯，略带矿物和金银花香。酿造得非常出色的口感中具有微微的奶油质感--能够被严峻回味中的干净酸度以及轮廓清晰的矿物质给很好地中和掉。
Chinese pairs.new: Tasted alongside Adrien Bernard. Rich, classic Sauternes aromas unfold with notes of buttery peach, botrytis, honey, spice, and pineapple jam, with subtle mineral and jasmine flower hints. The palate is beautifully crafted, with a hint of creamy texture, balanced by crisp acidity and a clear mineral profile that lingers on the finish.

English pairs.original: Tasted with Adrien Bernard. A thick, stylized Sauternes perfume characterized with cream apricot, botrytis, honey, spices, preserved pineapple, hints of mineral and honeysuckle. The well-made palate possessed tiny creaminess that was nicely moderated by its neat acid and defined minerality on its astringent finish.
English pairs.new: 与Adrien Bernard一起品尝。厚重的、典型的萨旺酒香气，具有奶油杏仁、霉菌、蜂蜜、香料、罐头菠萝、矿物质和honeysuckle的味道。精心制作的口感中带有细微的奶油感，受到其清晰的酸度和明确的矿物质特征的调节，结束于干爽的矿物质后味。

Western reviews.review: (2002) Opulent nose of vanilla, peach, pineapple and coconut with just a hint of tea and honey. Full-bodied and very luscious, with peach syrup and nectarine fruit and a core of mineral acidity to lengthen the finish.
Western reviews.translation: 2002年：这款红酒的香气丰富多样，带有香草、桃子、菠萝和椰子味，微微带有茶和蜂蜜的味道。口感丰富醇厚，桃子糖浆和nectarine水果味道浓郁，矿物酸的核心使得尾部更加持久。

Western reviews.review: Fully developed, medium-bodied, fresh, vibrant, and focused on its core of dried apricots, marmalade, buttery orange rind spice, and butterscotch. While not deep, the wine remained fresh, vibrant, and aromatic, with a butterscotch and candied orange edge to the finish. Drink from 2022-2032.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒已达到成熟，口感中等，新鲜、活泼、集中在干枣、橘子酱、黄油橙皮香料和糖浆糖的核心上。虽然不是很深，但酒精仍然保持新鲜、活泼和芳香，酒尾带有糖浆糖和糖化橙子的边缘。建议从2022年到2032年饮用。

Western reviews.review: A decade of additional aging has created a sweet, beauty. Rich, lush, and a touch spicy, you also enjoy a wealth of candied orange rind, apricots, vanilla bean, roasted nuts, and overripe pineapples coated with honey in every sniff and sip. This is a rich style, but it comes along with ample acidity so the wine always feels lifted and never cloying. Drink from 2023-2040.
Western reviews.translation: 十年后，红酒成为了甜美的美丽。富有丰富的口感，略带香辣，伴随着橙子皮糖浆、枣子、香草豆、烤坚果和蜂蜜浸泡的熟透的菠萝的香气和口感。这种风格的红酒很丰富，但它带来了充足的酸度，使得酒精始终感觉轻盈而不腻。建议从2023年到2040年饮用。

Western reviews.review: Mittleres Goldgelb. Rauchig, etwas rustikale Botrytiswürze, zart nach Ananas und Litschi, dezent nussig unterlegte Karamellnote. Kraftvoll, saftig, elegant und durchaus ausgewogen, mineralisch, frisch strukturiert, reife gelbe Tropenfrucht im Abgang, verfügt über Zukunftspotenzial.
Western reviews.translation: 深金黄色。烟熏味，带有略微的陈腐味，淡淡的香蕉和荔枝味，轻微的坚果味和糖浆味。强烈、丰富、优雅、平衡，矿物质、清新、结构良好，黄色成熟热带果味在尾部，具有未来发展潜力。

Western reviews.review: A pale to medium intensity of straw/gold color. Vivid aromas of pineapple & honey on the nose. The palate is very sweet with honeyed notes combining with pineapple peach & ripe mango fruit notes. Acidity is fresh, alcohol is balanced & sweetness on the finish is clean, 11/12 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是浅到中度的金黄色。酒鼻中充满了鲜明的菠萝和蜂蜜的香气。口感非常甜，蜂蜜的味道与菠萝、桃子和成熟的芒果的果味融合在一起。酒的酸度清新，酒精平衡，甜度在尾部干净清爽，评分11/12。

Chinese pairs.original: 咖啡豆、杂交草莓、甘草糖汁及雪茄等香气，酒体属中等且平衡，口感顺畅让人愉悦，结尾有樱桃气息。
Chinese pairs.new: Notes of coffee beans, hybrid strawberries, licorice syrup, and cigar, a medium-bodied wine with balanced texture, smooth and pleasant finish, ending with hints of cherry.

Chinese pairs.original: 2020年份的Livran非常符合年轻消费者的审美，果香轻盈，口感清爽，单宁丝滑，收尾干净，每一个细节散发着成熟稳重，还能在圆润的外表下感受到一股能量感。整体来说，是一款十分亲民的Medoc产区葡萄酒。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2020 Livran is a perfect fit for young consumers, with a delicate fruit aroma, a crisp taste, smooth tannins, and a clean finish. Every detail exudes maturity and stability, and beneath its rounded exterior lies a sense of energy. Overall, it's a very approachable wine from the Medoc region.

English pairs.original: With light fruitiness, fresh palate, smooth tannins, and a clean finish, Chateau Livran 2020 is very much in accordance with the aesthetics of youthful consumers. Each feature exudes maturity and stability, as well as a sense of vitality beneath the rounded appearance. Overall, it is a wine from the Medoc appellation that is highly approachable.
English pairs.new: 这款2020年产的Chateau Livran红酒，具有轻微的果味、清新口感、平滑的苦味和干净的尾韵。它非常符合年轻消费者的审美标准，每个特点都展现出成熟和稳定的气质，以及圆润外表下的生机勃勃的活力。总体来说，这是一款来自Medoc产区的极其亲和的红酒。

Western reviews.review: Le vin a une couleur rubis d’une intensité moyenne. Le nez offre de la concentration et de la fraicheur : il exprime les notes de cassis juteux, de griotte, une côté sucré de fraise de bois, une fine acidité de cerise rouge. On retrouve ensuite les notes épicées : de vanille de réglisse, de cannelle, une touche boisée subtile et intégrée (toasté, noix de coco, une pointe de caramel). Le nez exprime aussi des notes florales (bleuet, violette) et une délicate touche herbacée (feuille de cassis, menthe), et une pointe de minéralité (graves). EN bouche, le vin est droit, ciselé, et en même temps juteux et fruité. Il exprime les saveurs de cerise rouge acidulée, de cassis écrasé, de griotte, de fraise et de framboise juteuse, associées à des fines notes de fleurs sauvages séchées, toasté, de vanille grillée, de réglisse, de clou de girofle et de cumin. Les tannins sont fermes, mais fins. Belle acidité salivante et une finale persistante avec une subtile note de viande fumée et d’épices douces rôties. Un vin gourmand et structuré.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色，中等浓度。酒香中有浓郁的果香和清新感，展现出浓郁的黑currant、黑莓、木莓的味道，以及一丝甜的草莓味和红樱桃的酸味。接着是香料的味道：糖浆的香草、蜂蜜、细微的木质味（烤面包、椰子、一点点焦糖）。酒香中还有一丝花香（蓝莓、紫罗兰）和微妙的草香（黑currant叶、薄荷），以及一点点矿物质味（岩石）。在口感上，这瓶红酒是直率、清晰的，同时又富有滋味和果香。它展现出酸性红樱桃的味道、挤压的黑currant、黑莓、草莓和浓郁的黑莓的味道，伴随着干燥的野花味、烤面包、焦糖、糖浆的香草、蜂蜜、丁香和孜然的味道。酒中的纤维是坚实的，但细致。酒液中有清晰的酸性和持久的尾韵，伴随着微妙的烟熏味和温和的烤肉味。是一瓶丰富且结构良好的红酒。

Western reviews.review: Medium deep garnet colour. Youthful aromas of fresh red berries, plum, some herbal and tobacco notes with mild oak. Medium weight with a dense texture, some tannic grip and certain restraint, fresh acidity and discreet young fruit leading to a fairly long finish. A classic age worhty texture to drink from 2024.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色泽。新酒的香气中充满了新鲜的红果、浆果、一些草药和烟草的味道，轻微的橡木味。中等重量的口感，密度的质地，略带坚果的感觉，新鲜的酸度和隐约的年轻果味，持续时间较长。这种典型的品质适合从2024年开始饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 此酒的香气略显紧闭，带有些微奶油巧克力、香料、花朵、矿物和红色水果（杨梅、野莓、李子）香气，入口充盈纯净、悠长的矿物味道，余韵很有质地且富有典型的黑巧克力滋味。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine has a slightly closed nose, with subtle notes of milk chocolate, spices, flowers, minerals, and red fruit (loquats, wild berries, plums). The palate is filled with a pure, long-lasting mineral flavor, with a lingering finish and a rich, typical black chocolate taste.

English pairs.original: A bit tight on nose, some cream chocolate, spices, flowers, mineral and red fruits (waxberry, wild berry, plum), very pure and persistently mineral-driven palate, with a textured finish that showed hallmark dark chocolate notes.
English pairs.new: 酒 nose 上有紧绷感，带有奶油巧克力、香料、花朵、矿物质和红果味（红果、野果、李子），口感非常纯粹和持久矿物质驱动，尾部有纹理感，展现出典型的黑巧克力味。

Western reviews.review: An intensely perfumed, almost exotic wine. The fruit is ripe, rich, packed with black cherries, spice and concentration. It is big on structure, a powerhouse of a wine, surprisingly dense for 2006.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一款浓郁的香气，几乎是异国情调的红酒。酒中的果实是成熟的，丰富的，黑杏、香料和浓度都非常丰富。它的结构非常强大，是一款强大的红酒，令人惊讶的是，2006年产的酒竟然如此浓密。

Chinese pairs.original: 和过往年份一样，Chateau d’Agassac 2020 的香气依旧还原。今年的入口很流畅，娟柔的酒体表面附着层层细密的单宁。面对高温的2020年份，这款酒始终保持清新多汁的莓果芳香和平衡柔和的口感。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2020 Chateau d'Agassac retains its classic character, with a smooth entry and a delicate texture adorned with fine tannins. Despite the hot 2020 vintage, this wine remains fresh and fruity, with a balanced and approachable palate.

English pairs.original: The fragrances of Chateau d’Agassac 2020 are as reduced as in prior vintages. In this vintage, the palate is smooth, on the surface of the body is covered with layers of creamy tannins. The wine retains its crisp, juicy aromas of cherry fruit and a well-balanced, soft palate despite the high temperatures of the 2020 vintage.
English pairs.new: 查托阿加萨克2020的香气与之前的几年相比，更加低调。 在这个年份，口感平滑，酒体表面覆盖着丰富的奶油质感的苦味。 该酒保留了其清脆的、水果般的樱桃香气，以及在高温年份2020中保持平衡的、柔和的口感。

Western reviews.review: This impressive crus bourgeois wine is dense and rich, while always balanced. Its black-plum density is layered with acidity and firm tannins. The wine has a fine future; drink from 2026.
Western reviews.translation: 这款出色的克鲁斯布尔格红酒浓郁而丰富，始终保持平衡。其黑浆果的浓度与酸度和坚实的橡胶质相得益彰。酒有着光明的前景，建议2026年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: Black cherries, smoke, cocoa, espresso, and licorice aromatics fill the perfume. hit the nose. On the palate, you find sweet, black currants, cherries and creamy tannins, with accents of espresso and chocolate and a touch of chalk on the backend. The estate was recently sold, so this is the finial vintage for the previous owner. Drink from 2023-2035.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中充满了黑樱桃、烟草、可可、咖啡和甘草的味道。口感上，甜黑葡萄、樱桃和奶油般的苦味纤维融合在一起，伴有咖啡和巧克力的调味，尾部带有石灰的味道。这瓶红酒是前主人最后一瓶，酒庄最近刚刚更换了主人。建议从2023年到2035年饮用。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby, purple reflections, deep core, brightening on the rim. Inviting dark fruit of blueberries, ripe cherries, some liquorice and nougat, fine oak notes in the background. Juicy, elegant, fresh plums, fine acidity, integrated tannins, mineral-salty, chocolate touch on the finish. Remains well lasting, already accessible, has certain ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation:
深红色，紫色反射，深色核心，边缘明亮。 请注意，以下翻译是适合中国消费者理解的：

深红色，紫色光泽，深色中心，边缘明亮。 优雅的黑色水果，蓝莓，熟透的樱桃，少量的 licorice 和 nougat，背景中的精致的橡木味。 饱满的，优雅的，新鲜的石榴，精致的酸度，融合的纤维素，矿物质的咸味，巧克力味的尾部。 余味持久，已经可以享用，具有某种程度的陈化潜力。

Western reviews.review: Dark inky core and a purple hue. Fine oak, ripe dark berries, cassis, plum and ripe herbal notes. Dense structure with a fresh backbone, layered dark berry flavours with finely tuned oak, savoury dark fruit and a long pure finish.
Western reviews.translation: 深色酒液，紫红色。有细致的橡木味，成熟的黑berry、黑加仑、黑桃和成熟的草药味。酒体结构紧密，带有清新的骨架，黑berry味道层次丰富，橡木味精致，咸味的黑果和长而纯净的尾韵。

Chinese pairs.original: 花香四溢，余味中散发着浓郁的红色水果，如醋栗、樱桃及覆盆子的味道，并伴有怡人的香料味。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of flowers abound, with lingering notes of rich, red fruit such as persimmon, cherry, and pomegranate, accompanied by soothing spice undertones.

Chinese pairs.original: 在葡萄酒中尝到豆腐脑是种什么感觉？Chateau La Tour de Bessan 2020 给了我答案。虽然刚装瓶后的香气略显封闭，但入口之后鲜果和花瓣的芬芳便缓缓伸开。我很喜欢那些藏在圆润酒体中的单宁，给人一种 “羞涩的美”。
Chinese pairs.new: Tasting a creamy texture in wine is what? Chateau La Tour de Bessan 2020 gave me the answer. Although the aroma is slightly closed after bottling, the freshness of fruits and flowers slowly unfolds after entering. I love the tannins hidden in the round body, giving a sense of "shy beauty".

English pairs.original: What is it like to taste tofu pudding in wine? The 2020 vintage of Chateau La Tour de Bessan gave me the answer to this question. Although the aromas are slightly reserved after bottling, the fragrance of fresh fruit and petals slowly unfolds on the entry of the palate. I love those tannins hidden in the round body, for they show a “beautiful shyness”.
English pairs.new: 品尝豆腐布丁般的红酒是什么样的体验？2020年版的夏特劳德贝桑给我带来了答案。虽然瓶装后香气略为保留，但入口时新鲜水果和花朵的香味缓缓展开。 我喜欢那些融入圆润体的坚果味，表现出一种“美丽的羞涩”。

Western reviews.review: Fresh, bright, forward wine with a lean to its tobacco, red currants, mocha and spicy side. The wine is medium-bodied, energetic and floral with ample, juicy red fruits and savory herbs on the palate and in the finish. This is a solid value wine from the Margaux appellation. Drink from 2023-2036.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有清新、明亮、前置的风格，带有烟草、红currants、摩卡和辣味的特征。酒体中等，充满活力和花香，口感和尾部都有丰富的、 juicy的红果和调味香草。来自马格努阿克(Margaux)产区的这款红酒是一款实惠的好酒。建议在2023-2036年内饮用。

Western reviews.review: Intriguing with good complexity showing notes of lavender, hibiscus, linden, camphor, mandarin rind and plums. Medium bodied, tasty and truly elegant on the palate showing equilibrium and sensuality. Drink now or hold.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒令人着迷，具有丰富的复杂性，展现出紫罗兰、红花、白蜡树、樟脑、橘子皮和李子的香气。口感中等，味道丰富，真正优雅，口感平衡，充满魅力。可以立即饮用，也可以保留。

Western reviews.review: Noble, zurückhaltende Nase, florale Töne, Kiesel, Brombeere und Cassis. Im Gaumen gradlinig, frisch, knackige Frucht, hat Druck aber Finesse, wirkt sehr balanciert, mit qualitativ sehr guten Gerbstoffen und einem langen, feinwürzigen Abgang mit floralen Retroaromen. Ein sehr schöner Margaux. 2025-2040 (April/Mai 2021)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论，翻译如下：

这是一瓶优雅的红酒，酒鼻子回味深长，带有花香、石子、黑莓和黑加仑的味道。口感平衡，新鲜果味丰富，具有压力但又细腻，非常平衡，质地优良的颜料和长长的、细腻的尾部，带有花香的回味。是一瓶非常美丽的马格努（Margaux）。推荐饮用时间：2025-2040（2021年4月-5月）。

Western reviews.review: Deep ruby, opaque core, purple reflections, brightening on the rim. Delicate tobacco, fresh cassis, red cherries, a hint of tangerine zest, fine noble wood spices. Juicy, elegant, fine nougat, ripe cherries, integrated tannins, fresh and well balanced, will certainly mature with age.߭.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，透明的核心，紫色反射，边缘加亮。细腻的烟草，新鲜的黑加仑，红樱桃，柑橘皮的微妙香气，精致的高贵木头香气。 juicy，优雅，精致的果冻，成熟的樱桃，融合的纤维，新鲜和平衡，肯定会随着年龄的增长而成熟。

Western reviews.review: Aromas of some new oak and butterscotch with red and dark berries. Medium weight on the palate with grippy tannin, generous fruit, quite long with a tight and restrained finish that should soften from further elevage and bottle ageing.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中带有新橡木和糖浆糖的味道，伴随着红色和黑色浆果的气息。口感中等，口感中有紧绷的橡木味和丰富的果味，口感长且结尾紧致，但随着时间的推移和瓶子陈化，应该会变得更加柔和。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有雪松木，烤香草，黑樱桃和黑醋栗的香气，中等浓郁，单宁柔滑。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of cedarwood, toasted vanilla, black cherry, and black walnut, with a medium intensity and smooth tannins.

Western reviews.review: Tasting older than its true age, this medium bodied, black cherry tobacco scented, earthy, soft wine is in its prime time, drinking window. The oak is not obtrusive. This is not a wine for long term again. No hurry to drink it, but I'd finish any bottles over the next 7-10 years. 91 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感比实际年龄更成熟，体积中等，黑樱桃烟草香气，泥土味，柔和的口感。橡木味不显著。这不是一个长期储存的红酒。没有急着喝的必要，但建议在7-10年内喝完。评分：91分。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe. Zunächst zart flüchtiger Touch, reife Beerenfrucht, mit zartem Nougat unterlegt. Frische Textur, elegant, tragfähige Tannine, reife Kirschenfrucht, noch etwas hart, Weichselfrucht im Abgang, salzige Mineralik im Rückgeschmack.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光。初次尝试时，轻微的触感，成熟的浆果味，带有轻微的牛奶糖味。清新的口感，优雅，持久的坚果味，成熟的樱桃味，仍然略带坚硬，奶油味在尾部，矿物质味在回味中。

Western reviews.review: (2001) Finely-wrought, tight, blue/black fruit, cherry and a mineral core. Concentrated palate thats a little hard and unyielding at present, but plenty of fruit and good tannins. Theres quite a lot to this Lascombes, with deep, sinewy structure and good length.
Western reviews.translation: 2001年拉斯科姆（Lascombes）红酒：精致的口感，紧密的黑紫色果实，樱桃和矿物质核心。口感浓郁，但目前略硬且刚性，但仍有丰富的果实和良好的天然纤维。拉斯科姆有着深刻的肌肉结构和良好的长度。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark ruby-red with a purple rim. The brooding cedary nose gives little away. Initially there is a nice red fruit on the palate but it lacks the acidity to lift the fruit as a result it finishes flat & cedary. Alcohol is balanced and the length is unexceptional. 11/04 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，带有紫色边缘。酒鼻子沉闷，带有松柏味，很难察觉到什么。口感上初期有红果味，但由于酸度不足，导致果味无法升华，最后口感平淡，带有松柏味。酒精平衡，但长度不突出。评分：11/04 DCAMW。

Western reviews.review: Agree with the review by DCAMW in 2021. Dominated by cedar but also quite green - herbaceous and capsicum. A disappointing wine from this vintage. Have had many wines from 2000 in the last 12 months and this doesn’t measure up to any
Western reviews.translation: 与DCAMW在2021年的评论一致。这个红酒被松木香味所主导，但也带有清新的草本和辣椒味。这个年份的红酒令人失望。过去一年里，我品尝了很多2000年的红酒，但这个红酒都无法与之相比。

Chinese pairs.original: 和很多2013年份的葡萄酒相比，Chateau de Malleret 不但没有任何生青感，还透着一股淡淡的清甜气息。香气轻柔怡人，摇杯后散发着罗勒叶、迷迭香以及淡淡的松脂清凉。与我在6年前的品鉴相比，此时的单宁更加婉约，隐约中透着些许茶梗的清凉。整体来说，是一支很轻巧的葡萄酒，适合现在饮用。
Chinese pairs.new: Compared to many 2013 wines, Chateau de Malleret not only lacks any greenness, but also exudes a subtle sweetness. The aroma is soft and pleasant, releasing rosemary leaves, thyme, and a hint of refreshing pine after swirling. Compared to my tasting six years ago, the tannins are now more refined, with a subtle hint of tea-like freshness. Overall, it's a very light-bodied wine, perfect for drinking now.

English pairs.original: Compared with other wines from the vintage of 2013, Chateau de Malleret doesn’t have any greenness but a hint of sweetness. After swirling the glass, the gentle nose reveals basil, rosemary, and a hint of pine resin-like freshness. Compared with my tasting six years ago, the tannins at this time are more graceful, coupled with a faint tea stems’ freshness. Overall, a very light wine that is ready to drink now.
English pairs.new: 相比2013年产的其他红酒，马勒雷特庄园没有任何青涩的味道，而是带有一丝甜味。  在旋转酒杯后，轻柔的鼻子展现出薄荷、罗勒和松脂般的新鲜感。  与六年前的品尝相比，这次的苦味更优雅，伴随着一丝茶叶的新鲜感。  总体来说，这是一款非常轻薄的酒，已经准备好现在就饮用。

Western reviews.review: Young garnet. Refined cocoa-like oak backed by ripe currants. A soft, supple and profound Haut-Médoc that is as precise as it is charming. Lovely aromatic balance of oak and fruit framed by fine-grain tannins. A stellar wine.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色。精致的巧克力味的橡木与成熟的黑currant相结合。细腻柔和深刻的波尔多地区红酒，精确又迷人。橡木和果实的芳香平衡，由细致的纤维素构成。是一瓶出色的红酒。

Chinese pairs.original: 紫罗兰芳香中带有一丝葡萄干的味道。中度至厚身酒体，结构良好的单宁，柔滑的单宁，余韵悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Deep plum and dried grape notes complement the rich, velvety purple hue. A full-bodied wine with well-structured tannins, smooth texture, and a long, lingering finish.

Western reviews.review: Medium bodied, with more going on with the nose with its tobacco edged, forest floor and leafy quality than on the bright, firm, quite fresh, bright, red berry filled palate. You can drink this now. Holding it for more aging is probably not going to change things for the better. 89 Points
Western reviews.translation: 体积中等，酒香上有更多的内容，带有烟草味、林地和叶子质感。口感则是鲜艳、坚实、清新、红果味充满。可以立即饮用。将其储存更长时间可能不会带来更好的效果。评分：89分。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark & virtually opaque ruby-red in color. A hugely concentrated ripe nose of black-cherry notes, figs & cocoa. The palate is rounded & full with wonderfully punchy blackcurrant fruit, chocolatey notes & seamlessly integrated cedar oak. Acidity is soft, so the fruit lacks a little lift and energy. Alcohol is balanced, length is pretty good & there is good tannic grip at the finish. 11/03 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色，几乎透不见光。酒香浓郁，带有黑浆果、干枣和巧克力味。口感丰富圆润，黑浆果味浓郁，巧克力味和橡木味融合得很好。酸度较低，果味缺乏一些活力和能量。酒精平衡，持久度不错，尾部有很好的纤维感。评分：11/03 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: Branas Grand Poujeaux 2021混合着墨汁和玫瑰花的香气非常抢眼，幽香徐徐还不失力量。入口相当有集中度，带着丰满圆润的质感以及多层次的香料芬芳。如果能够把收尾时的单宁质感处理地更加细腻将会更加优秀。
Chinese pairs.new: The Branas Grand Poujeaux 2021 boasts a striking aroma of dark fruit and rose petals, with subtle yet persistent depth. The palate is concentrated and full-bodied, with a rich texture and complex spice notes. With a bit more finesse in handling the tannins at the finish, it would be truly exceptional.

English pairs.original: Branas Grand Poujeaux 2021 presents some striking mixed aromas of ink and rose, lingering, elegant, and powerful. It is quite concentrated, with a lush and rounded texture and multi-layered spice notes. If the tannins are more refined on the finish, this wine will be more delightful.
English pairs.new: 布拉纳斯格兰德普热奥 2021展现出浓郁的墨色和玫瑰花香，持久优雅强烈。酒体浓郁，质地丰富圆润，复杂的香料味道层次丰富。如果酒中的苦味更细腻，酒的完美度将会更高。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby, purple tinge to narrow rim. Black cherries, tobacco nuances, blackberry compote, mineral notes. Juicy, elegant, plum fruit, delicate fruit sweetness, ripe, integrated tannins, balanced, a touch of nougat on the finish; open and forward.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，紫色边缘。黑樱桃、烟草细节、黑莓酱、矿物质味道。果香浓郁、优雅、浆果甜度细腻、成熟、柔和的苦味、平衡、尾部有轻微的核桃味；开阔、前置。

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Rubinrot. Die Nase ist ein Traum, sehr finessenreich, frisch und mit einem Mix aus dunklen und roten Beeren, dazu eine subtile Röstnote, florale Töne, mineralische Unterklänge. Im Gaumen gradlinig und sehr frisch, was für ein Balanceakt aus Struktur und Frucht, das wirkt ungemein lebendig, die Tannine sind sehr hochwertig, der Wein ist vertikal, top ausgewogen, zieht im mittleren Gaumen durch und endet langanhaltend und mit feiner Würze. Ein ausgezeichneter Tropfen, Bravo! 2026-2045 (Verkostet "En Primeur" im Mai 2022. Windisch)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

深红色。酒鼻子非常出色，精致、清新，混合了黑色和红色浆果的味道，伴有微妙的烤味、花香和矿物质底调。口感平衡，非常清新，结构和果味之间的平衡非常出色，感觉非常生动，坚果味非常好，酒体向上延伸，口感平衡，中口经过，尾部长久持久，带有细微的辛辣味。是一瓶非常出色的红酒， Bravo! 评分：2026-2045（2022年5月在原酒庄品尝，Windisch）。

Chinese pairs.original: 这款酒拥有2021年份少有的浓郁度，不但颜色深紫，结构也十分扎实。4周的轻柔浸渍带来了柔和的单宁，回味时还带着淡淡的奶质感。整体来说，是2021年份该产区表现尚佳的酒款。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts an uncommon richness for its 2021 vintage, with a deep purple color and a robust structure. Four weeks of gentle maceration have imparted soft tannins and a subtle creaminess that lingers on the palate. Overall, it's a standout wine from the 2021 vintage in this region.

English pairs.original: This wine boasts an unusual richness for the vintage of 2021, with a deep purple color and a solid structure. The four-week gentle maceration provides soft tannins, and there’s a hint of creaminess on the aftertaste. Overall, it is one of the better-performing wines from the 2021 vintage in Blaye Cotes de Bordeaux.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒在2021年产季中表现出非凡的丰富度，呈现深紫色，结构坚实。四周的轻微浸泡使得它具有柔和的苦味，余味中带有轻微的奶油感。总体来说，这是2021年产季布莱-科特-德-博尔多的表现较好的葡萄酒之一。

Western reviews.review: Fine oak and butterscotch paired with fresh fruit, red currant, cranberry and plum. Balanced palate, medium weight, modest extraction and ripe extract, crushed berries with rather fine length, still youthful with a slight firmness but well balanced for the vintage.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感非常平衡，体积中等，提取度适中，果实成熟，口感丰富。酒中有典型的橡木和糖浆香气，伴随着新鲜水果、红葡萄、蔓越莓和李子的风味。酒尾长而细长，仍然充满青春活力，略带坚韧感，但与酒龄相符。

Western reviews.review: Fine oak and butterscotch paired with fresh fruit, red currant, cranberry and plum. Balanced palate, medium weight, modest extraction and ripe extract, crushed berries with rather fine length, still youthful with a slight firmness but well balanced for the vintage.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感非常平衡，体积中等，提取度适中，果实成熟，口感丰富。酒中有典型的橡木和糖浆香气，伴随着新鲜水果、红葡萄、蔓越莓和李子的风味。酒尾长而细长，仍然充满青春活力，略带坚韧感，但与酒龄相符。

Chinese pairs.original: 果香依旧纯净，酒体依旧清透、咸感依旧清晰，口感依旧舒畅。和其他热年份相比，2020年份的Chateau l’Isle Fort有种特别的“还原型”气息，让整个香气线条显得比较内秀。但以我对Chateau l’Isle Fort的理解，这款稍显内向的葡萄酒会在陈年3-5年后睁开睡眼，透过它的瞳孔望到碧波荡漾的湖水。
Chinese pairs.new: The fruit aromas remain crisp and pure, the body remains clear and transparent, and the saltiness remains distinct. Compared to other hot vintages, the 2020 Chateau l'Isle Fort has a unique "reduced" quality that makes the entire aroma profile seem more subtle. However, based on my understanding of Chateau l'Isle Fort, this slightly introverted wine will come alive after 3-5 years of aging, revealing a serene and tranquil lake scene through its depths.

English pairs.original: The fruity aroma is still pure, the body is still pristine, the saltiness is still clear, and the palate is still smooth. Compared with other hot vintages, Chateau l’Isle Fort 2020 has a special “reductive” note, making the line of the fragrance relatively reserved. But with my understanding of this wine, this shy beauty will open its sleepy eyes after 3-5 years of aging. At that time, you will feel like seeing a pure and rippling lake through its pupils.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的香气依然清澈果香，口感依然细腻平滑，余味依然清晰明显。与其他热年份相比，2020年夏特酒庄的“伊斯福特”有一个特殊的“还原性”特征，使得香气线条相对保守。但是，根据我的理解，这个谦逊的美女会在3-5年陈酿后睁开睡眼。届时，你会觉得它的口感像透明的湖水一样清澈流动。

Western reviews.review: Very juicy with lots of dark fruit notes. A bit herbaceous on the finish but overall it flows well. Limited complexity but quite pleasing with its juiciness and freshness. Drink on release and up to 3 years.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒非常浓郁，带有大量的黑果味。口感中略带草药味，但整体来说口感流畅。虽然复杂度有限，但它的浓郁和新鲜感让人很满意。建议在购买时即饮，或者保存至3年。

Western reviews.review: Medium towards deep ruby colour. Pure nose, elegant red fruit, some floral notes and mild butterscotch. Savoury and digest palate, rather burgundian texture with mild tannin and supple red fruit, mildly spicy finish with fine persistency.
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深红色至深红色。

香气：清澈的红酒香气，优雅的红果味，伴有花香和轻微的奶油糖浆。

口感：口感清新，易于消化，类似于布尔干酒的质地，轻微的苦味和柔软的红果味，口感温和，持久。

Chinese pairs.original: 浓郁的黑莓和烟草的香气。饱满的酒体，良好的单宁，细腻圆润口感，悠长的回味，精致。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich blackberry and smoky aromas. Full-bodied with good tannins, smooth and velvety texture, long finish, refined.

Western reviews.review: At the Union des Grands Crus tasting in 2005, this was elegant red ambrosia; it showed beautifully sweet and ripe at our recent tasting in New York. A gracious pillow of merlot with mineral tannins to make it mouthwatering and lengthen the finish, this only gets better with air. Oak adds to the elegance of the wine and it seems destined to drink well over the course of the next ten years or more. The château was upgraded to Premier Grand Cru Classé status in 2006.
Western reviews.translation: 在2005年的Union des Grands Crus品酒会上，这款红酒是优雅的佳酿；在我们最近的纽约品酒会上，它展现出美丽的甜美和成熟。 这款美酒以优雅的梅洛风格为主，矿物质的苦味使其口感丰富，延长了尾部。随着时间的推移，这款美酒会越来越好。木桶的添加使得这款美酒更加优雅，似乎注定会在未来十年以上的时间内保持品质。 该酒庄在2006年被提升为首级大酒庄（Premier Grand Cru Classé）地位。

Western reviews.review: Aromas of blackberry, with hints of tobacco. Full-bodied, with fine tannins, good length and a delicate, fruity aftertaste. Much more refined than I remember from barrel. Caressing.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的气味是黑莓的，带有烟草的味道。口感丰富，纤维细腻，持久感强，余味清新果香。与我之前在酒桶中品尝时相比，这瓶红酒更加细腻。

Chinese pairs.original: 沙土土壤的芬芳花果以及黏土土壤的紧致结构在这款酒中很好的诠释了出来。虽然复杂度并不是特别突出，但黑巧克力般的微苦感能够带来理想的长度和层次感。
Chinese pairs.new: The earthy aroma of clay soil and the taut structure of loam soil are beautifully expressed in this wine. While complexity is not particularly notable, the subtle bitterness reminiscent of dark chocolate adds an ideal length and depth.

English pairs.original: The sand soil offers fragrance, and the gravel clay soil contributes compact structure. Even if the flavors’ complexity is not that much prominent, a touch of black chocolate bitterness provides ideal length and layers.
English pairs.new: 沙土提供了芳香，而砾石粘土则贡献了紧密的结构，即使风味的复杂性不够突出，一点点黑巧克力苦味也提供了理想的长度和层次。

Western reviews.review: Le nez est aromatique, élégant avec un côté solaire de la concentration tout en équilibre et en justesse. Il y a des notes de violette, de framboise et plus légèrement de rose associée à des touches de cassis éclatants acidulés ainsi qu’à des pointes de petits fruits bleus acidulés mûrs et à des pointes de poivre. La bouche est fruitée avec de la minéralité et une trame acidulée. Une perçoit de la justesse et de la tension, du gras et de l’énergie. Il y a des notes de cassis acidulé et juteux, de framboises pulpeuses et plus légèrement de petites baies rouges pulpeuses acidulées associées à des touches de Bleuets, de fève tonka, de chocolat, de vanille et à une pointe de tabac blond. Il y a de la souplesse et de la gourmandise dans ce vin.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气优雅、典雅，带有阳光般的浓郁感，平衡而准确。酒中有紫罗兰、草莓和轻微的玫瑰花香，伴随着闪亮的黑currant酸味和少量成熟的蓝berries酸味，以及少量的黑胡椒。口感果香，矿物质和酸味的纹理。酒中有准确的平衡和紧张感，油腻感和能量。酒中有酸性和浓郁的黑currant味道，草莓的果肉和轻微的酸性红berries味道，伴随着少量的蓝berries，豆蔻，巧克力，香草和少量的金黄色烟草味道。酒中有柔软和丰富的口感。

Western reviews.review: Dark, plummy fruit, espresso, black cherries and licorice nuances open the wine. On the palate the wine is concentrated, round, polished and glossy, with an oaky edge to the ripe, showy fruits. Drink from 2023-2038.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感丰富，深度浓郁，果香浓郁，口感圆润，细腻，光泽丰富，带有橡木味的成熟水果。建议从2023年到2038年饮用。

Western reviews.review: Eine spannende Nase, einerseits Schwarzbrot, Kümmel, dann auch reife Frucht, Brombeere. Im Gaumen weich, zugänglich, packt dann zu, zeigt Struktur und Körper, feine Gerbstoffe und eine milde Säure, baut aus, wirkt balanciert und zeigt im Abgang viel Würze. 2026-2040 (April/Mai 2021)
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶有趣的红酒，口感丰富。酒鼻中有黑面包、孜然和熟透的果实，特别是蓝莓的味道。口感柔和，容易入口，随后变得丰富，展现出结构和体积，细微的橡木味和轻微的酸度，口感平衡，余味丰富，带有许多香气。推荐饮用时间：2026-2040年（2021年4-5月）。

Western reviews.review: Deep ruby, opaque core, purple reflections, narrow bright rim. Fresh plum and blackberry fruit, a hint of herbal spiciness and orange zest. Medium body, ripe cherries, fresh acid structure, broad fruity texture, mineral, ripe tannins, notes of nougat on the finish. Clearly has ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，透明核心，紫色反射，细窄的亮边缘。新鲜的浆果和黑莓果味，带有少量的草药香和橙子皮的味道。中等体积，熟透的樱桃，新鲜的酸性结构，广泛的浓郁果味，矿物质，熟透的鞣质，尾部有杏仁的味道。明显有陈化潜力。

Western reviews.review: Very high ripeness, floral violet and rose notes with crème de cassis, dark cherry and present but not dominant oak. Dense with plenty of weight and finely grained tannin, layers of fresh dark fruit, dark chocolate notes and a very long muscular finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的成熟度非常高，具有花香的紫罗兰和玫瑰味，伴有黑加仑浆果和现存但不占主导地位的橡木味。酒体浓密，重量丰富，纤维素细腻，展现出新鲜黑果的多层次，黑巧克力味和非常长且肌肉丰富的尾部。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Haut-Brisson 2023 的入口柔嫩，成熟的树莓和草莓营造出了不错的甜美感。但是这款酒的单宁有些抢戏，尤其是在中段的时候有些发力过猛。好在它的平衡性依然在线，只要在相对低温的情况下品鉴，就不会有太多破绽。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau Haut-Brisson 2023 的入口柔和，成熟的树莓和草莓带来了一种甜美的感觉。但是，这款酒的单宁有些突出，尤其是在中段时有些过于强烈。幸运的是，它仍然保持着平衡，只要在较低的温度下品尝，就不会有太多问题。

English pairs.original: Chateau Haut-Brisson 2023 greets the palate with tenderness, offering a pleasant sweetness from ripe raspberries and strawberries. However, the tannins of this wine steal the spotlight, particularly exerting force in the mid-palate. Fortunately, it emains balanced, as long as it is tasted at relatively low temperatures, avoiding any noticeable flaws.
English pairs.new: 夏特奥哈布里松 2023 年红酒温柔地迎接舌头，带来浓郁的甜度，来自成熟的红莓和草莓。然而，这款酒的苦味成分却抢了风头，尤其是在口感的中期表现出强烈的力量。幸运的是，它仍然保持平衡，只要在较低的温度下品尝，避免任何明显的缺陷。

Western reviews.review: Verführerischer Duft, expressiv, mit Brombeergelée und Cassis; delikat am Gaumen, was für ein zauberhaftes Fruchtbündel; kreidiges Tannin, sehr gute Säure; im Abgang saftig, lang, frisch. Ein niveauvoller Wein für alle Tage. (En Primeur Tasting April 2024)
Western reviews.translation: 迷人的香气，浓郁的浆果味道，带有浆果果酱和黑加仑的味道；口感轻盈，果味丰富，令人惊艳；口感清晰，酸度适宜，尾部果香持久，清新持久。适合日常饮用的一款高品质红酒。 (2024年4月初发售评分)

Western reviews.review: This wine is exceptionally expressive on the fruit front, offering a rich array of flavours. Its texture is silky and lingers on the palate, underscored by a distinct minerality that adds depth. The mouthfeel is luxurious, with a round quality that enhances the overall experience. A floral note graces the finish, contributing to its elegance. The tannins are delicate yet present, imparting a refined structure. Notably, the Cabernet Franc remains in contact with the skin for an extended period during post-alcoholic fermentation maceration.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒在果味方面表现出色，展现出丰富的风味。其口感细腻，余味悠长，矿物质的特点增添了深度。口感优雅，圆润质感使整个体验更加舒适。酒尾带有花香，增添了它的典雅。酒中的天然苦味物质细腻而有存在感，构建了优雅的结构。值得注意的是，卡贝网（Cabernet Franc）在酒精发酵后浸泡时间较长，这使得酒的风味更加丰富。

Western reviews.review: Verführerischer Duft, expressiv, mit Brombeergelee und Cas sis; delikat am Gaumen, was für ein zauberhaftes Fruchtbündel; kreidiges Tannin, sehr gute Säure; im Abgang saftig, lang, frisch. Ein niveauvoller Wein für alle Tage.
Western reviews.translation: 迷人的香气，浓郁的果香，带有浓郁的莓果和柠檬味；口感轻盈，果味丰富，令人惊艳；口感清晰，酸度适宜，尾部果香持久，清新持久。适合日常饮用的一款高品质红酒。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有大量的无花果，李子，黑樱桃，黑醋栗的香气，中等浓郁口感，酸度低，单宁细腻甜美，柔软，丰满，圆润。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts aromas of abundant figs, plums, black cherries, and black currants. It has a medium-full body, low acidity, and fine, smooth tannins that are sweet and velvety, with a soft, full, and rounded texture.

Western reviews.review: Ready to drink and showing well with its soft, round textures, earthy, dark red and black fruits, smoke and spicy profile. Medium bodied and charming, this is quite nice and is probably the best wine I recall tasting from the property. It really shows how great 2003 is for St. Estephe .
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒已经可以直接饮用，表现出其柔软、圆润的口感，带有泥土、黑红色和黑色水果、烟熏和辣椒的风味。中等体积，迷人，这是一瓶很不错的酒，也许是该产区我记忆中品尝过的最好的酒。这瓶酒真正展现了2003年是圣埃斯泰夫（St. Estephe）产区的最佳年份。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark ruby, is opaque. The nose has blackcurrant aromas & earthy notes. The palate had lovely vivid fresh blackcurrant flavors, the fruit is ripe & the tannins soft & rounded - they are plentiful, but the structure is not huge. Alcohol is in balance & length is quite good. The fruit on the finish has earthy & meaty characteristics. 11/07 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的红色葡萄酒，几乎透不见光。酒鼻中充满了黑currant的香气和泥土的味道。口感上，黑currant的鲜味非常清晰，果实成熟，苦味柔和圆润，虽然苦味丰富，但结构并不强烈。酒精与果实的平衡很好，口感持久。酒尾留有泥土和肉类的特征。评分：11/07 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 酒体呈现深沉的金黄色泽，香气中等集中，富含核果、柠檬、蜂蜜、贵腐、干杏、无花果及少许香草气息，入口充满水果干的味道，酒体中等偏上，略带奶油质感，精力充沛的酸度新鲜、干净，余韵持久。
Chinese pairs.new: The wine presents a deep golden hue, with a medium concentration of aromas featuring notes of stone fruit, lemon, honey, truffle, dried apricot, quince, and a hint of herbal undertones. The palate is filled with a rich, fruity flavor, with a medium-plus body and a subtle creamy texture. The acidity is lively and refreshing, with a clean and crisp finish that lingers nicely.

English pairs.original: Deep golden color, medium aromas of stone fruits, lemon, honey, botrytis, dried apricot, fig and slight vanilla, full of dried fruit flavors, medium+ body, hints of creaminess, its vigorous acidity was also fresh and clean, with a lingering length.
English pairs.new: 深金色，中等的石果、柠檬、蜂蜜、霉菌、干枳实、枣和轻微的香草的气味。干果味浓郁，中等体积，带有奶油般的质感，具有强烈的酸度，清新且干净，余味悠长。

Western reviews.review: (2002) Opulent nose of vanilla, peach, pineapple and coconut with just a hint of tea and honey. Full-bodied and very luscious, with peach syrup and nectarine fruit and a core of mineral acidity to lengthen the finish.
Western reviews.translation: 2002年：这款红酒的香气丰富多样，带有香草、桃子、菠萝和椰子味，微微带有茶和蜂蜜的味道。口感丰富醇厚，桃子糖浆和nectarine水果味道浓郁，矿物酸的核心使得尾部更加持久。

Western reviews.review: Fully developed, medium-bodied, fresh, vibrant, and focused on its core of dried apricots, marmalade, buttery orange rind spice, and butterscotch. While not deep, the wine remained fresh, vibrant, and aromatic, with a butterscotch and candied orange edge to the finish. Drink from 2022-2032.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒已达到成熟，口感中等，新鲜、生动、集中在干枣、橘子酱、黄油橙皮香料和糖浆糖的核心上。虽然不是很深，但酒精仍然保持新鲜、生动和芳香，酒尾带有糖浆糖和糖化橙子的边缘。建议从2022年到2032年饮用。

Western reviews.review: A decade of additional aging has created a sweet, beauty. Rich, lush, and a touch spicy, you also enjoy a wealth of candied orange rind, apricots, vanilla bean, roasted nuts, and overripe pineapples coated with honey in every sniff and sip. This is a rich style, but it comes along with ample acidity so the wine always feels lifted and never cloying. Drink from 2023-2040.
Western reviews.translation: 十年后，红酒成为了甜美的美丽。富有丰富的口感，略带香辣，伴随着橙子皮糖浆、枣子、香草豆、烤坚果和蜂蜜浸泡的熟透的菠萝的香气和口感。这种风格的红酒很丰富，但它带来了充足的酸度，使得酒精始终感觉轻盈而不腻。建议从2023年到2040年饮用。

Western reviews.review: Mittleres Goldgelb. Rauchig, etwas rustikale Botrytiswürze, zart nach Ananas und Litschi, dezent nussig unterlegte Karamellnote. Kraftvoll, saftig, elegant und durchaus ausgewogen, mineralisch, frisch strukturiert, reife gelbe Tropenfrucht im Abgang, verfügt über Zukunftspotenzial.
Western reviews.translation: 中等金黄色。烟熏味，略带田园风味的霉味，淡淡的香蕉和荔枝味，轻微的坚果味伴随着糖浆味。强劲、丰富、优雅、平衡，矿物质、清新、结构良好，黄色成熟热带果味在尾部，具有未来发展潜力。

Western reviews.review: A pale to medium intensity of straw/gold color. Vivid aromas of pineapple & honey on the nose. The palate is very sweet with honeyed notes combining with pineapple peach & ripe mango fruit notes. Acidity is fresh, alcohol is balanced & sweetness on the finish is clean, 11/12 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是浅到中度的金黄色。酒鼻中充满了鲜明的菠萝和蜂蜜的香气。口感非常甜，蜂蜜的味道与菠萝、桃子和成熟的芒果的果味融合在一起。酒的酸度清新，酒精平衡，甜度在尾部干净清爽，评分11/12。

Chinese pairs.original: 与同级别的Haut-Medoc相较，Chateau Doyac 2022两大优势令人称道：首先，尽管复杂度未能脱颖而出，但它拥有清澈透明的香气表达；其次，得益于它明亮的酸度，让原本浓厚的2022年份柔美了不少。期酒品鉴时，成熟的黑果香气占据主导，期待装瓶之后能呈现出更多丰富的层次。
Chinese pairs.new: Compared to its peers in Haut-Medoc, Chateau Doyac 2022 stands out in two ways: first, while it may not have the most complex nose, it has a bright and transparent aroma expression; second, thanks to its lively acidity, it has softened the originally rich 2022 vintage. During the aging process, mature black fruit aromas take center stage, with the expectation that more layers of complexity will emerge after bottling.

English pairs.original: In comparison to its Haut-Medoc counterparts, Chateau Doyac 2022 possesses two commendable advantages: firstly, although its complexity does not stand out, it boasts a crystal-clear aromatic expression; secondly, thanks to its bright acidity, the otherwise intense 2022 vintage is softened considerably. During the En Primeurs tasting, mature black fruit aromas dominate, and it is anticipated that further complexity will emerge after bottling.
English pairs.new: 相比于其同级的波尔多地区红酒，查托杜亚克2022年版有两个值得称赞的优势：首先，它虽然没有表现出复杂的特点，但却具有清晰的香气表达；其次，由于其明亮的酸度，使得原本强烈的2022年酒庄变得更加柔和。 在En Primeurs品酒会上，成熟的黑色水果香气占据了主导地位，预计在瓶装后会有更多的复杂性出现。

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby, opaque core, purple reflections, brightening on the rim. Ripe black cherries, inviting plums, some nougat, hints of violets, tangerine zest. Juicy, elegant, fine fruit expression, freshly structured, chocolate touch on the finish, remains well lasting, a good food wine with certain ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，浓密的核心，紫色反射，边缘明亮。成熟的黑杏子，邀请的浆果，少量的果仁，丁香花的微妙气息，柑橘的柑橘皮。水果清新，优雅，精致的水果表达，新鲜的结构，口感中有巧克力味，余味持久，适合与食物搭配的佳酿，具有某种程度的陈化潜力。

Chinese pairs.original: 2021年份的装瓶酒往往没有期酒时那么芬芳，而La Chenade 是少数装瓶后表现更加开放的酒款。香甜的莓果芬芳中透着几分牛肉干的气息。单宁虽然比较单薄，但质地十分柔和，含在口中还带着网状的轻盈感。适合在年轻时饮用。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2021 vintage wines often lack the complexity of their barrel-aged counterparts, but La Chenade is an exception. It offers a sweet, fruity aroma with a subtle hint of beef jerky. The tannins are relatively light, but the texture is silky smooth, leaving a web-like sensation on the palate. Best enjoyed in its youth.

English pairs.original: Unlike many 2021’s wines, which tend to lose some fragrance after bottling compared to their En Primeurs, La Chenade is among the few that show a more open character after bottling. Its aroma is a delightful mix of sweet berries with a hint of beef jerky. While the tannins are on the lighter side, their texture is soft, offering a net-like lightness in the mouth. This makes it well-suited for enjoyment while young.
English pairs.new: 与2021年许多酒相比，它们在瓶装后会失去一些香气，相比于En Primeurs，拉尚德（La Chenade）是其中少数几个在瓶装后展现出更开放性质的酒。它的香气是一种甜美的浓郁果实香气，带有少量的牛肉干味。虽然它的苦味较轻，但其质地柔软，口感轻盈，像网一样轻盈。这使得它适合在年轻时享用。

Western reviews.review: Cocoa topped plums with flowers on the nose are perfect to form the backdrop for all the medium-bodied, soft-textured, forward, sweet, juicy, red pit fruits on the palate. Produced from 100% Merlot, 13.5% ABV, drink from 2023-2034. 88-90
Western reviews.translation: 酒体中等，口感细腻，果香甜美，口感丰富，呈现典型的红果风味。酒中可闻到浓郁的巧克力和浆果香气，配上花朵的芬芳，完美地展现了酒的风格。酒用100%梅洛葡萄制成，13.5%的酒精度，建议饮用时间为2023-2034年，评分88-90分。

Western reviews.review: Cocoa topped plums with flowers on the nose are perfect to form the backdrop for all the medium-bodied, soft-textured, forward, sweet, juicy, red pit fruits on the palate. Produced from 100% Merlot, 13.5% ABV, drink from 2023-2034. 88-90
Western reviews.translation: 酒体中等，口感细腻，果香甜美，水果味浓郁，口感丰富。酒中可闻到浓郁的巧克力和鲜花香味，配上熟透的红果，完美的搭配。酒用100%梅洛特葡萄制成，13.5%酒精度，推荐饮用时间为2023-2034年。评分88-90分。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Maillet 2022在单宁萃取方面称得上一流。在缺水的沙土地上依然保持柔润口感实属难得，轻柔的单宁萃取是制胜的法宝。这款酒的香气犹如粉扑扑的绒球，如同在口中含着一颗多汁的桑果。若未来的年份都能有如此出色表现，那就太让人开心了！
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau Maillet 2022是一款出色的红酒，单宁萃取的提取度非常高。即使是在干旱的沙土地上，它仍然保持着柔润的口感，这是非常难得的。轻柔的单宁萃取是它的胜利之道。这款酒的香气像粉扑扑的绒球，入口时像含着一颗多汁的桑果。未来若能持续这样的表现，那就太令人高兴了！

English pairs.original: Chateau Maillet 2022 stands out for its exceptional tannin extraction. Maintaining a soft and smooth mouthfeel on sandy soil with little water is a rare feat, and gentle tannin extraction is the key to success. The wine’s aroma is like a fluffy and juicy mulberry as if holding a soft velvet ball on your palate. If future vintages can perform as outstandingly as this one, it will be a delightful experience.
English pairs.new: 夏多梅伊莱特2022年红酒以其出色的纽维提取而闻名。 在沙质土壤中，保持柔软和光滑的口感，尤其是在水分较少的情况下，这是一种罕见的成就，轻柔的纽维提取是成功的关键。 这款红酒的香气像柔软的桑葚一样，像在口腔中握着一块软绵绵的绒毛。 如果未来几年能够像这次一样出色地表现，那么这将是一种令人愉悦的体验。

Western reviews.review: Flowers, incense, cherries, chocolate and plums resonate in the nose, and on the palate. However, it is on the palate, with its creamy, rich, supple, fresh and silky freshness where the wine really shows best. Drink from 2024-2042. 93-95 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中充满了花朵、香烟、樱桃、巧克力和石榴的味道。然而，在口感上，酒精的丰富、丰富、柔软、新鲜和丝滑的清新才是真正的亮点。建议从2024年到2042年饮用。评分93-95分。

Western reviews.review: Herrlich diese Nase, sehr floral, super expressiv, dunkle und rote Beeren, Veilchen, nochmals Veilchen. Im Gaumen cremig, rund, mit zupackenden Gerbstoffen, einem frischen Kern und einer sehr guten Länge. Bravo, das ist ein sehr gelungener Wein der früh Spass machen wird und gut reifen kann. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / Grand Cercle / Château la Dauphine) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶美妙的红酒，酒香非常花香，非常浓郁，带有深红和红色的浆果、Forget-me-not和Forget-me-not的味道。口感丰富、圆润，具有强烈的果酸和坚果味，中间有一个清新的核心，酒尾非常长。非常棒，这是一瓶成功的红酒，很快会让人感到愉快，并且有很好的储存潜力。 (评分时间：2023年4月/Grand Cercle/Château la Dauphine)

Western reviews.review: Le nez est frais et séveux. On y retrouve des notes de petites baies noires denses/fraiches, de cassis concentré et plus légèrement de fleurs de cerisier, d’iris associées à des touches de petits fruits bleus frais, de safran (en don cote fleurie), de sève fraiche ainsi qu’à une pointe de graphite et de thé. La bouche est fleurie, équilibrée et offre de la fraicheur, de la minéralité, une trame fraiche/juteuse, une certaine tension, de la justesse, un fin gras, de la rondeur ainsi qu’une bonne définition. En bouche ce vin exprime des notes de mûre fraiche, de violette/iris et plus légèrement de sève associées à des touches de cassis écrasé, de cerise pulpeuse ainsi qu’à des touches de petits fruits acidulés/juteux et de poivre frais. Bonne longueur. Belle fraicheur.
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的香气清新而浓郁。它带有黑berry的新鲜果香、浓缩的黑currant、轻微的樱花和鸢尾花香气，以及新鲜蓝berry、沙法兰、清新的树汁和一点点石墨和茶的味道。

口感清新、平衡，带有花香，具有清新的感觉、矿物质感、清新的纹理、轻微的紧张感、准确的感觉、细腻的质感、圆润的感觉和清晰的定义。

在口中，这瓶红酒展现出新鲜黑berry、紫罗兰和鸢尾花的香气，以及轻微的树汁、浓缩的黑currant、鲜红的樱桃和酸甜的蓝berry和新鲜的胡椒的味道。酒尾长，清新。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark, opaque purple-black color holds well to a purple rim. Very rich, dark-fruit aromas are overlaid by chocolate, raisin, cassis & exotic oak spicesk. Intense, lifted, high-toned black-cherry notes lead to savory, black olive touches. Acicdity lifts the fruit nicely. Alcohol ads warmth. The mid-palate is toasty with a good tannic bite which balances the opulent, juicy fruit. An enduring finish is structured, savory & drying 04/23 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的紫黑色，持久的紫色边缘。酒中富有深色果实的香气，覆盖着巧克力、葡萄干、黑加仑和异国风味的橡木香。高调的黑樱桃香气引领着咸味的黑橄榄触感。酸度使果实更为鲜美。酒中酒精的味道带来温暖。中口是酥酪味的，具有良好的纤维结构，平衡了丰富的果实。酒尾持久，结构紧致，咸味且干燥。评分：DCAMW 04/23

2020 Chateau Prieure Sainte-Anne Cadilla.name: 2020 Chateau Prieure Sainte-Anne Cadillac Cotes de Bordeaux

Chinese pairs.original: Sainte Anne 2020 拥有理想的果香，平和的酒体以及醇厚的口感。收尾时的结构感要比该产区其他酒款强劲不少，令收尾拥有了更多的深度。建议适饮窗口：2023-2028。
Chinese pairs.new: Sainte Anne 2020 boasts ideal fruit aromas, a smooth texture, and a rich mouthfeel. The finish has a more robust structure than other wines from the region, giving it a deeper finish. Recommended drinking window: 2023-2028.

English pairs.original: Sainte Anne 2020 expresses an ideal fruity fragrance, a balanced body and a mellow palate. On the finish, stronger than other wines in this region, the structure deepens the length. Suggested drinking window: 2023-2028.
English pairs.new: 圣安妮红酒2020展现出典型的果香，平衡的口感和柔和的口味。酒尾强劲，结构深入，延长了口感。建议饮用时间：2023-2028年。

Western reviews.review: Medium-bodied, soft, fresh, sweet and supple, with a focus on its silky red fruits and spice, the wine is forward and already accessible. This should be fun to taste on release. 92-93 Pts
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感中等，柔软、清新、甜美且富有弹性，主要展现出细腻的红果和香料，酒体前端、即刻可享。酒评人认为这款酒在发布时将会非常有趣。评分：92-93分。

Chinese pairs.original: 使用的是旧橡木桶。长相思占80%的比例。微微的还原气息无法掩盖香气中清新、冰凉的热带水果（榴莲、菠萝）、酸橙、香料、薄荷和岩石味。多少有些严肃的中等酒体口感展示引人入胜的清澈感及活力。
Chinese pairs.new: Aged in old oak barrels, Longan and Pineapple dominate at 80%. A hint of reduction can't mask the refreshing, icy tropical fruit aromas of rambutan, pineapple, orange, spices, mint and stone. A serious, medium-bodied palate displays an engaging clarity and liveliness.

English pairs.original: 100% old oak barrels. 80% Sauvignon Blanc. The slight reduction didn't hide the freshly cool noses consist of tropical fruits (durian, pineapple), lime, spices, mint and stone. There was appealing lucidness to the medium-bodied flavours that were somewhat austere but beautifully vivid.
English pairs.new: 100% 使用老橡木桶 aging。80% Sauvignon Blanc。酒精度减少后，酒精的清新气味依然存在，带有热带水果（菠萝、榴莲）、柠檬、香料、薄荷和石头的味道。酒体中等，风格清晰明了，中性但又富有活力。

Western reviews.review: From a blend of 80% Sauvignon Blanc and 20% Semillon, the wine is filled with fresh citrus, crushed stone and floral notes. The fruit is sweet and there is good acidity giving the wine lift and keeping it fresh.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒是由80%萨伯涅特白葡萄和20%塞米隆葡萄混合而成。酒中充满了新鲜柑橘的香气、碎石和花朵的味道。酒中的水果味甜美，酸度适中，给酒带来了轻盈和新鲜感。

Chinese pairs.original: 这支酒含蓄但清晰的香气引领其滑爽、活泼的口感，口中大量干净的果味延续到那强劲的收尾中。如同2016年份，需要陈年。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts a subtle yet clear aroma that leads to its smooth and lively texture, with a plethora of clean fruit flavors that persist through to the robust finish, much like the 2016 vintage, which benefits from aging.

English pairs.original: A restrained but precise aroma that led to the glossy and vivid flavours that had lots of defined fruitiness that concluded in a forceful finale. Like the 2016, the cellaring was required.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的气味虽然不夸张，但却精确到位，展现出光泽鲜明的口感，充满了清晰的果味，最后以强烈的结尾。与2016年一样，这瓶红酒需要陈酿。

Western reviews.review: In der Nase vom Holz geprägt, die Frucht dahinter ist ein Mix aus roten und dunklen Beeren, ein Hauch Sahne schwingt mit, fein und mit Luft immer schöner werdend. Im Auftakt gradlinig, mit genau der richtigen Konzentration, gute Struktur, markante, leicht trocknende Gerbstoffe, der Wein ist lebhaft und frisch, zeigt einen rotfruchtigen, angenehm langen Abgang. Kann reifen. 2026-2038 (April 2021)
Western reviews.translation: 在鼻子里，酒的气味是木质的，之后是红色和黑色浆果的混合，轻微的奶油味也在其中，酒越来越好，越来越香。酒的开头是直接的，酒精度合适，结构良好，酒中的颜料味道明显，略带干燥，酒是活泼的，新鲜的，酒尾是红色浆果的味道，很长，很舒服。酒可以继续陈化。推荐陈化时间：2026-2038（2021年4月评估）。

Western reviews.review: Floral and fresh, the black raspberries, spice and plums already show really well today. Medium-bodied, soft, polished and silky, the wine tastes and feels great. There is good freshness and energy here. 92 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感非常鲜美，黑莓、花香、香料和浆果的味道已经非常明显。酒体中等，口感柔和、光滑、细腻，非常舒适。酒中有着很好的新鲜感和活力。评分：92分。

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Karmingranat, violette Reflexe, breitere Ockerrandaufhellung. Tabakig unterlegte frische Kirschfrucht, Nuancen von Lakritze, rotbeeriger Touch, etwas Edelholz. Mittlere Komplexität, rote Frucht, integrierte, noch etwas spröde Tannine, mineralisch im Abgang, zartes Nougat im Finish.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一份红酒评论，翻译成中文如下：

深红色葡萄酒色，紫色光泽，橙色边缘。烟熏味的新鲜樱桃果味，薄荷糖味，啤酒色的味道，少量的高档木头味。中等复杂度，红果味，整合良好，尚有些坚韧的苦味，矿物质味在尾部，轻微的奶油味在尾部。

注意：我在翻译过程中尽量保留原文的风格和结构，避免过度解释或添加个人意见，以便让中国消费者更好地理解和欣赏这份红酒评论。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, dezente Randaufhellung, reife Herzkirschen, feine Kräuterwürze, tabakige Nuancen, rauchiger Touch. Mittlerer Körper, seidige Textur, etwas verwässert, zarte Tannine, dezente Extraktsüße im Abgang, wirkt bereits gut antrinkbar, bietet unkompliziertes Trinkvergnügen.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮，熟透的樱桃味，细微的香草味，烟熏味，烟草味。中等体积，细滑的口感，略微稀释，细微的苦味，尾部有轻微的果汁甜味，口感已经相当顺滑，提供简单舒适的饮用体验。

Western reviews.review: Dark young ruby with a purple hue. A youthful nose with some meaty and leathery notes, some new oak, wild berries and dry spices. The palate shows medium weight, a young and firm backbone, juicy ripe fruit, a slight tannic presence and fresh acidity, medium to long finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色，带有紫色调。酒香中有年轻的气息，带有肉类和皮革的味道，新橡木的味道，野生莓果和干香料。口感中等，年轻且坚实的骨架， juicy 的成熟果肉，轻微的苦味和新鲜的酸度，中等到长的尾部。

Chinese pairs.original: 2023年份的Chateau Beau-Site 展现了一种柔美风格的赤霞珠。尽管赤霞珠的比例高达70%，但单宁却始终保持着粉末状，它不仅保持了酒体的醇厚，还带着几分经典的咸感，是一款兼具理想层次和维度的友好型Saint-Estephe。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2023 vintage of Chateau Beau-Site showcases a refined style of Cabernet Sauvignon. Despite its high 70% proportion, the tannins remain powdery, not only maintaining the wine's full-bodied texture but also carrying a hint of classic saltiness, making it a friendly Saint-Estephe with ideal depth and dimension.

English pairs.original: The 2023 vintage of Chateau Beau-Site presents a graceful style of Cabernet Sauvignon. Despite the Cabernet Sauvignon accounting for as much as 70%, the tannins remain powdery throughout, preserving not only the wine’s richness but also a touch of classic salinity. It is a friendly Saint-Estephe that combines ideal layers and dimensions.
English pairs.new: 2023年沙特奥贝奥（Chateau Beau-Site）的新酒呈现出优雅的卡波涅（Cabernet Sauvignon）风格。即使卡波涅占据了70%的比例，酒中的纤维素仍保持细致柔和，既保留了酒的丰富感，又带有经典的海盐味。它是一款友善的圣埃斯泰夫酒（Saint-Estephe），完美地结合了各层次和空间。

Western reviews.review: The wine has a deep, dark, almost opaque purple-red color. The dark fruit aromas are restrained with a touch of earthiness. The palate has notes of concentrated dark plum & elderberry fruit, it is a touch earthy & has gripping tannins with a little mouth-watering bitterness & some cedar. Acidity is quite fresh. The wine is medium-bodied & alcohol adds a touch of warmth & richness to the mid-palate. The finish has slightly earthy, drying touches. 04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色深暗，几乎是透明的紫红色。酒中的浓郁果香味被一些土壤味道所抑制。口感中有浓郁的紫枣和 elderberry 果味，略带土壤味道，口感中有抓人的纤维素质和一些柯木味道。酒中的酸度较为新鲜。酒体中等，酒精在中口中带来了一些温暖和丰富的感觉。酒尾略带土壤味道和干燥感。 评分：04/24 (ep) DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 在凉爽的年份，这款酒拥有不错的深度，看得出来，葡萄的筛选+萃取方式都比较用心。香气维度一般，话梅、红果的芬芳平静而小巧。口感平顺宜饮。整体算是一款品质中上的100% Merlot 窖藏，期待未来更多年份的表现。
Chinese pairs.new: In cooler vintages, this wine has impressive depth, showcasing thoughtful grape selection and extraction methods. The aroma is moderately dimensional, with subtle notes of cherry and red fruit. The palate is smooth and approachable. Overall, this is a solid 100% Merlot with potential for future vintages to shine.

English pairs.original: In a cool vintage, this wine demonstrates nice depth, a clear indication of thoughtful grape selection and extraction methods. The aromatic dimension is moderate, offering calm and delicate scents of preserved plum and red fruit. The palate is smooth and easy to drink. Overall, it stands as an above-average quality 100% Merlot, and I look forward to its performance in future vintages.
English pairs.new: 在一个凉爽的产季，这款红酒展现出深度，表明了对葡萄的精心选择和提取方法的重视。酒香层次适中，呈现出清新的和细致的梅子和红果香。口感平滑，易于饮用。总体来说，这是一款高于平均水平的100%梅洛红酒，值得期待未来产季的表现。

Western reviews.review: This wine, from selected fruit, is still structured and firm. The freshness of the vintage is apparent in the wine's layer of acidity. That is balanced by a fine polished texture from wood aging. Drink from 2027.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒来自精选的果实，仍然保持着结构和刚性。酒中的酸度层显现出当年的新鲜感，而木桶陈化则为酒带来了细腻的光滑质感。建议2027年后饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 瓶醒四小时。此酒属于少见的成熟、清新和优雅并存的美酒，颜色很深，迷人的香气透出成熟黑莓、可露丽、皮革、泥土、香料、薄荷脑和微微的花香。口感展现大量黑色水果滋味，但被那成线性的酸度所穿透；略带草本芬芳的轻盈、干净回味增强了高雅及可饮性。
Chinese pairs.new: Aged for four hours. This wine is a rare gem that perfectly balances maturity, freshness, and elegance. Its deep color is accompanied by an alluring aroma of ripe blackberries, violets, leather, earth, spices, mint, and subtle floral notes. The palate showcases a rich black fruit flavor, yet it's cut through by a linear acidity; a delicate, herbaceous finish with a hint of grassiness adds to its sophistication and drinkability.

English pairs.original: Aeration in bottle for four hours. Displaying a rare combination of ripeness, refreshment and elegance, this deeply colored wine exhibited attractive smells of ripe blackberry, canele, leather, earth, spices, menthol and subtle flowers. The polished palate revealed a wealth of black fruit pierced by a fine line of acid; the faintly herbal, ethereal and clean aftertaste underlined the refinement and drinkability.
English pairs.new: 瓶内四小时氧化。 这款深色葡萄酒展现出罕见的成熟度、清新感和优雅感，具有诱人的黑莓、杏仁、皮革、泥土、香料、薄荷和微妙花朵的香气。 精致的口感展现出丰富的黑果，酸度线条细致；清新的、微妙的草药味和清澈的余味，突出了这款酒的精致和可饮性。

Western reviews.review: (2003) A closed muted nose. But the palate has good concentration and acidity with firm tannins and lots of plummy/cassis fruits. Quite chewy and full-bodied: this is certainly one of the superior Margaux wines. Excellent.
Western reviews.translation: 2003年：封闭的、沉默的鼻子。但是口感浓郁，酸度适宜，坚实的橡木味和大量的浆果/黑加拿大醋栗风味。口感很有嚼头，体积很大：这绝对是马尔戈斯（Margaux）中的一款顶级红酒。非常出色。

Western reviews.review: (2005) Vivid, deep purple/black. Fragrant nose, with floral scents and lightness and sweetness of blackcurrant and cherry. The palate here has a silkiness and full-bodied texture, with a very pure core of black fruit that runs through the mid-palate and into the finish. There is a dry, plum-skin grip of tannin and deeper fruit, and a very nice, crisp, lively acid structure. Quite long, and harmonious.
Western reviews.translation: 2005年：深紫黑色。酒香浓郁，带有花香和黑currant和樱桃的轻甜气息。口感细腻，体积充足，黑果的纯正核心贯穿中口和尾部。酒中有干的黑枣皮般的坚果感和更深的果味，酸度结构清晰、活泼。酒尾较长，和谐。

Western reviews.review: Medium to deep ruby-red color. The nose is a classic combination of cedar & cassis. The cassis fruit on the nose is supported by good fresh acidity. The tannins provide some grip & cedary notes overlay the more redcurrant-natured mid-palate. The wine is fresh & lively rather than concentrated. Alcohol is balanced, there is some bitterness on the finish that gives the wine good length & adds an extra dimension at the end. 11/08 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深红色至深红色。

香气：典型的红酒香气，混合了松木和黑加仑的味道。黑加仑的果香在香气中占据主导地位，受到新鲜酸度的支持。酒中的纤维素提供了些许抓握感，松木味道覆盖了中口的红果味。酒体清新活泼，未达到浓郁的程度。酒精平衡，酒尾有些苦味，给酒带来了长长的尾巴，并在最后添加了一个新的维度。评分：11/08 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 黑加仑等黑果、烤面包、香料香气，口感非常平衡，单宁平滑厚实，果香复杂，余味优雅持久。
Chinese pairs.new: Dark plum, blackberry, toasted bread, and aromatic spices on the nose. The palate is incredibly balanced, with smooth and rich tannins, complex fruit flavors, and a refined, lingering finish.

Western reviews.review:
90-92 Barrel sample. Balanced, open wine, full of ripe blackcurrant fruits. It has a fine, rich density which shows well alongside the acidity of a young wine. It finishes with delicious black fruits. 

Barrel Sample: 90-92 Points
Western reviews.translation: 90-92 分。酒桶样品。平衡，开阔的酒，充满了成熟的黑currant水果。它有着细致的、丰富的密度，展现了年轻酒的酸度。酒尾留有美味的黑水果。

Western reviews.review: Although unevolved, the fresh, medium-bodied 2008 d’Armailhac is a more elegant, delicate take on this vintage than some of the more concentrated wines from the Medoc and the right bank. Fresh cranberry, sweet cherry, and spicy notes are present in this wine. While it does not appear to be one of the stars of the vintage, it possesses brilliant delineation as well as an exceptionally pretty style somewhat reminiscent of the 1996 vintage. The blend is 54% Cabernet Sauvignon, 29% Merlot, and the rest Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot. This wine may put on weight and flesh out given its late malolactic fermentation and retarded harvest.  Range: 88-90
Western reviews.translation: 虽然2008年达马伊拉克（d’Armailhac）尚未成熟，但它仍然是一款优雅、细致的葡萄酒，尤其是在对比一些来自梅多克和右岸的浓缩葡萄酒时。 这款葡萄酒中有新鲜的草莓、甜的樱桃和辣味的香气。 虽然它可能不是当年最出色的葡萄酒，但它仍然具有出色的分辨率和极具魅力的风格，类似于1996年的一款葡萄酒。 该葡萄酒的混合比例为54%卡波弗雷（Cabernet Sauvignon）、29%梅洛（Merlot）和其他卡波弗雷（Cabernet Franc）和佩蒂·维多（Petit Verdot）。 这款葡萄酒可能会在晚期的乳酸发酵和延迟收获后变得更加丰满和丰富。 评分：88-90。

Chinese pairs.original: 带着红色水果、矿物质、香料和咖啡的味道。酒体适中，单宁精致，回味持久。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of red fruit, minerals, spices, and coffee. Medium-bodied with refined tannins and a long finish.

Western reviews.review: Medium bodied, soft tannins, forward with an open, black cherry, cassis, licorice and earthy, espresso bean character, this is already fun to drink with a little bit of air. Bringing in the team of Alfred Tesseron has really upped the game for Senejac.
Western reviews.translation: 体积中等，柔软的苦味，前端开朗，黑樱桃、黑加仑、甘草和土壤的咖啡豆味道，已经可以在轻微通风下享受。阿尔弗雷德·特塞龙团队的加入，真正提升了塞内雅克的品质。

Western reviews.review: The nose seems ripe and green at the same time, rather light and angular palate with pronounced tannins and high acidity, medium length - should improve from ageing but appears somewhat angular today.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气既有成熟的味道，又有青涩的感觉，口感轻薄，具有明显的苦味和高酸度，中等长度。虽然它有潜力通过陈化而改善，但目前它似乎有些尖锐。

Chinese pairs.original: 酒体呈浅红宝石色泽，散发香草、成熟的樱桃、土壤以及些微陈腐的松露与烟熏皮革的气息，开瓶后，需与空气接触一段时间后，才逐渐绽放丰富香气，丝滑的口感，带出黑加仑与成熟水果滋味，与酸度达到良好平衡，但单宁不够强劲，酒体香气体现略微零散，呈现中等余韵。
Chinese pairs.new: The wine has a pale ruby hue, with aromas of grass, ripe cherry, earth, and subtle notes of mushroom and smoked leather. After opening, it requires some airtime to unfurl its rich bouquet. The silky texture reveals flavors of blackcurrant and mature fruit, with a good balance of acidity. However, the tannins are somewhat lacking in intensity, and the wine's aroma is slightly diffuse, with a moderate finish.

English pairs.original: Light ruby color, nose of vanilla, ripe cherry, earth, hint of musty truffle and smoky leather, the wine needed some time for revealing its layers of personality, silky palate with cassis and ripe fruit that nicely balanced with the acid, but the tannin was not aggressive and the structure was not very concentrated, with a medium finish.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的颜色是浅红色，酒香中有香草、熟樱桃、泥土、霉菌蘑菇和烟熏皮革的味道，需要一些时间才能展现出它的多层次性。口感滑顺，口味中有黑加斯和熟果味，酸度和口感很好地平衡，虽然有些坚果味，但结构并不集中，口感持久度中等。

Western reviews.review: Medium-bodied, forward, fresh, elegant and refined, you can always find secondary development with its tobacco, herb and herbal nuances. The fruits show sweet ripe, red berries with good purity, You can always enjoy this soft, elegant Pauillac.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶酒的体积适中，前端鲜明，清新，优雅，细致。酒中有烟草、草本和草药的复杂性，随着时间的推移会有更多的发展。酒中的水果呈现出甜熟的红果味，具有良好的纯度。您可以始终享受这瓶优雅的巴约讷酒。

Western reviews.review: This second wine of Lafite comes from young vines and wines selected during the blending. The result is a wine with the structure and nobility of the Lafite character but one that will age more quickly. It has great layers of black-currant fruits and acidity, with firm tannins as a background and rich potential. Drink from 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 拉菲二线酒是拉菲的第二款酒，来自年轻的葡萄园和在混合过程中选择的葡萄。结果是一款具有拉菲风格结构和高贵感的酒，但会更快地成熟。酒中有丰富的黑加仑果味和酸度，背景是坚实的橡胶质，潜力巨大。建议2025年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung, zart tabakig-kräuterwürzig unterlegte reife Kirschenfrucht, etwas verhalten, kandierte Orangenzesten. Straff, engmaschige Textur, feste Tannine, finessenreiche Struktur, schwarze Beerenfrucht im Abgang, bleibt gut haften, mineralischer Nachhall.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮，轻微的烟草和香草味伴随着成熟的樱桃果味，略为保留，糖浆橙子皮。结构紧致，纤维密集，坚实的苦味，精致的结构，黑berry果味在尾部留下，留有良好的持久感，矿物质回音。

Chinese pairs.original: 香气极端成熟，但却不失优雅怡人，馥郁的蓝莓、雪松、香草、甘草及黑醋栗气息，入口赐予惊人的浓稠感，富含泥土、草药及果味，单宁坚实，酸度怡人，是一款经典的优雅酒款。
Chinese pairs.new: The aroma is extremely mature yet retains its elegance and charm, with notes of blueberry, pine, lavender, vanilla, and blackberry. The palate is rich and full-bodied, offering a dense texture, with flavors of earth, herbs, and fruit, firm tannins, and a refreshing acidity, making it a classic elegant wine.

English pairs.original: Extremely ripe but joyful and graceful on the nose with aromas of blueberry, cedar, vanilla, licorice and black currant, surprisingly dense and extracted flavor with earth and herb driven fruit lashed by firm tannins and acidity, it's an elegant and classical wine.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的香气极其成熟但又充满欢乐和优雅，带有蓝莓、红檜、香草、甘草和黑加仑的香味，令人惊讶的是它的口感非常浓郁和提取，带有土壤和草本植物的果味，被坚实的纤维和酸度所包围，整体上是一瓶优雅和典雅的红酒。

Western reviews.review: In the powerful style of Lynch-Bages, although perhaps less exuberant than usual. Instead the concentration comes from juicy fruit, which gives it the a softer quality. Even so, it still has solid tannins, dense texture and always the promise of good aging.
Western reviews.translation: 在林奇-巴日斯（Lynch-Bages）风格的强烈中，尽管可能不如平常那么豪放。相反，来自丰富果肉的浓度使其具有更柔和的质感。即使如此，它仍然具有坚实的苦味、密集的质地和良好的陈年潜力。

Western reviews.review: A sensational effort for the vintage, this textured, opulent, superb Lynch Bages is already strutting its stuff and should easily last for 20 years. Medium to full-bodied with an opaque dense purple color, notes of flowers and cassis, a layered texture that builds incrementally in the mouth and tremendous purity and depth, it can be drunk now or cellared for two decades or more. Bravo!
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶酒是当年最出色的作品，具有丰富的口感和优雅的风格，已经展现出其优质的品质，预计可以持续20年。酒体中等到中厚，颜色深紫透明，具有花香和黑加仑的气味，口感层次丰富，逐渐在口中展现，酒质纯粹深邃，既可以立即享用，也可以储存20年以上。

Western reviews.review: Our love affair with Lynch-Bages stretches back a good many years, and, while we have frankly been disappointed with the property in more recent harvests, the 2008 is back in top form and offers up a stunning measure of deep, very confident and wonderfully extracted blackcurrant fruit. It is full and supple and fit with perfectly ripe tannins, and there is no question that it will age famously for years to come. It is, in our minds, one of the stars of the vintage.
Western reviews.translation: 我们与拉什-巴日斯(Lynch-Bages)的爱情故事已经延续了很长时间了，而在近年来的收获季节中，我们对该产区的评价并不理想。但是，2008年的拉什-巴日斯却重新回归了顶级状态，展现出深度丰富、自信满满、黑currant果香的惊人魅力。酒体丰富、柔韧，搭配完美成熟的纤维素，毫无疑问，它将在未来多年中逐渐成熟并成为经典。我们认为，它是当年最出色的之一。

Western reviews.review: Very solid, with a super beam of dark currant, tobacco and iron pushed by charcoal, melted fig and cocoa notes. This has a nicely rounded feel, but there's plenty of grip in reserve.
Western reviews.translation: 非常坚实，带有超级浓密的黑葡萄、烟草和铁的味道，伴有焦炭、融化的枣子和可可的香气。这瓶酒有着圆润的口感，但仍然保留了足够的嚼劲。

Western reviews.review: Forest floor, wet earth, mushroom, cassis, cedar and red fruits are the main component of this fully developed wine. Medium bodied, and just about ready to gently begin to slowly fade. To enjoy most of the fruit and freshness, the wine requires drinking sooner than later. 87 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的主要成分包括森林地面、湿润土壤、蘑菇、黑加斯、红松和红果。酒体中等，正处于成熟期，接近衰退的阶段。为了享受酒中的果味和清新感，最好尽早饮用。评分87分。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Cissac向来以纯净自然著称，这在干热的2022年份自然是加分项。得益于富含黏土石灰岩的土壤，葡萄并没有受到干旱的影响；舞动酒杯，营造出浓郁诱人的蓝莓与黑李子芬芳。需要留意的是，这个年份的单宁结构略显突出，经典的“畅饮感”稍嫌欠缺，饮用前建议醒酒一个小时。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau Cissac is renowned for its purity and naturalness, which is particularly evident in the dry 2022 vintage. Thanks to the soil rich in clay limestone, the grapes were not affected by the drought; swirling the glass creates a richly alluring aroma of blueberries and black plums. Note that the tannin structure in this vintage is slightly more pronounced, and the classic "drinking feel" is somewhat lacking; we recommend letting the wine breathe for an hour before drinking.

English pairs.original: Chateau Cissac is known for its pure and natural wines, which is a bonus in the hot and dry 2022 vintage. Thanks to the soil rich in clay and limestone, the grapes were not affected by the drought, and the wine has a rich aroma of blueberries and blackcurrants. However, the tannins in this vintage are slightly pronounced, so it is recommended to let the wine breathe for an hour before drinking to enhance the classic “easy-drinking feel”.
English pairs.new: 查托塞斯卡（Chateau Cissac）以其纯正自然的葡萄酒而闻名，尤其是在炎热干燥的2022年葡萄采收季节中，这是一大福气。由于土壤富含黏土和石灰质，葡萄受到干旱的影响不大，酒中充满了蓝莓和黑加仑的香气。然而，这个葡萄采收季节的苦味酸度略微增强，因此建议在饮用前让酒瓶放置一小时，以便酒味更好地展现出典型的“轻松饮用”风格。

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby, opaque core, purple reflections, brightening on the rim. Some nougat, dark cherries, some cassis, candied violets, ripe plums on the finish. Medium body, dark berries, vivid tannins, spicy finish, subtle vegetal nuances in the aftertaste.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，浓密的核心，紫色反射，杯口略微发亮。口感中有杏仁、黑樱桃、黑加仑、糖化紫罗兰、熟透的李子。酒体中等，黑berry味道浓郁，明显的苦味，辣味尾韵，后味中有微妙的植物性质感。

Western reviews.review: Soft, fresh, and polished, here you find layers of ripe, black cherries, and spice that already show well in this earthy, medium-bodied, vibrant, chewy wine. This is a nice step-up for the wine produced here. Drink from 2025-2040. 89-91 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒呈现出柔软、清新、光滑的口感，内蕴丰富的黑樱桃和香料，展现出地道的中等体积、生动、嚼劲十足的风格。这是该酒庄出品的又一升级。建议2025-2040年饮用。评分：89-91分。

Western reviews.review: Le nez est fruité et offre un certain éclat, un petit côté épicé/poivré, un fin côté velouté. Il exprime les notes de cassis sauvage pulpeux/mûr, de violette et plus légèrement – de poivre de Sichuan associées à des touches de mûre, de petits fruits rouges écrasés ainsi qu’à de fines pointes de bleuet et de badiane. La bouche est fruitée et offre de la minéralité, de l’énergie, une trame minérale, une bonne définition, de la jutosité, de l’harmonie, de la souplesse, de la délicatesse dans sa puissance, un côté étiré/tendu. Le vin exprime les notes de mûre pulpeuse/juteuse, de cerise noire pulpeuse/juteuse, et plus légèrement de prune noire pulpeuse associées à une touche de cerise bigarreau ainsi qu’à des pointes de camphre, de graphite et à des discrètes pointes de muscade et de toasté. Jolie fraicheur et minéralité.
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的香气丰富多彩，带有果香和一点点的辛辣味道，口感细腻。它展现出野生黑currant的浓郁果香、紫罗兰的香气和轻微的四川白胡椒味，伴随着浆果、红果和蓝莓的香气，以及细微的丁香和黑胡椒的味道。

口感丰富果香，带有矿物质感、能量和清晰的结构，具有柔韧性、细腻感和平衡的口感，酒力强大但又细腻。酒中展现出浆果的浓郁果香、黑草莓的浓郁果香和轻微的黑葡萄的果香，伴随着杏仁味、焦糖味和细微的胡椒和香烟味。

这瓶红酒具有清新感和矿物质感。

Western reviews.review: Inky dark purple core and hue. Pure and aromatic with violet, cassis and dark fruit with mild oak, fine tobacco, sage and bay leaf. Dense young fruit in a medim body, a classic structure, yet with fine grain and high ripeness, pure dark berry flavours with a mild oak underneath with a long and fresh finish.
Western reviews.translation: 深紫色酒液，气味清新，带有紫罗兰、黑加仑和浓郁的黑果味，伴有轻微的橡木、细致的烟草、sage和bay叶。酒体中充满了浓郁的果实，典型的结构，细腻的口感和高度成熟，纯粹的黑果味，轻微的橡木底调，长而新鲜的尾韵。

Chinese pairs.original: 鲜甜多汁，紧致细腻，甜美的口感中暗藏着一缕缕清晰的香气线条，10%赤霞珠给予了宝贵的草本清凉，让成熟的莓果芬芳也穿上了清凉的纱裙。
Chinese pairs.new: Luscious and juicy, with a tight and velvety texture, the sweet flavors hide subtle hints of crisp, clean lines. 10% Cabernet Sauvignon adds a precious herbal freshness, while the mature berry aromas are draped in a refreshing veil.

English pairs.original: Fresh and juicy, firm and tender, the sweet taste hides a wisp of clear aroma, 10% Cabernet Sauvignon gives a precious sense of herbal freshness, so that the ripe berry fragrance is also dressed in a cool gauze skirt.
English pairs.new: 新鲜而又浓郁的口感，坚实而又柔软的体感，甜美的味道中隐约带有清新的香气，10%的卡波内尔萨文（Cabernet Sauvignon）贡献了清新的草药味，成熟的浆果香气也被一层清凉的薄纱裹住。

Western reviews.review: From a 16-hectare vineyard on sandy soils on the plain, the 2019 Fonbel is a Merlot-dominant blend complemented by some Cabernet Sauvignon and, since 2004, Carmenère. Offering up aromas of blueberries, raspberries and loamy soil, it's a medium to full-bodied, ample and succulent wine with delicate tannins and a supple, giving profile. Fully 70% is matured in tank to keep the fruit in the foreground. Best after 2021.
Western reviews.translation: 来自一片16公顷的沙质平原葡萄园，2019年Fonbel是一款以梅洛为主的葡萄酒，搭配一些卡波涅和自2004年起的卡门埃雷。酒中展现出蓝莓、草莓和土壤的香气，是一款中等到中等以上的体积，丰富且滋润的葡萄酒，具有细致的橡皮质和柔和的口感。其中70%的葡萄酒在钢缸中成熟，以保持果味在前景。建议2021年后饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 这款酒的香气严肃但清晰，透出灌木、泥土、森林地、木桶香料、黑巧克力、碎岩石、花香和黑色水果（黑莓、黑樱桃）的香味。顺滑的单宁给予其滑爽、细腻口感微微的圆润感，而那干净、紧实而且悠长的回味则带有些许庄严感。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine's aroma is serious but clear, revealing notes of underbrush, earth, forest floor, oak spices, black chocolate, crushed stone, floral hints, and black fruit (blackberry, black cherry). Smooth tannins give it a silky, refined texture with a subtle roundness, while its clean, tight, and lingering finish conveys a sense of gravitas.

English pairs.original: The nose was serious but defined, sniffing of underbrush, earth, forest floor, oaks spices, black chocolate, crushed rock, flowers and black fruits (blackberry, black cherry). The smooth tannins provided subtle roundness to its polished and delicate palate that had faint austerity on a clean, tight and lengthy aftertaste.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的香气很严肃但清晰，闻起来有灌木丛、土壤、林地、橡树、香料、黑巧克力、碎石、花朵和黑色水果（黑莓、黑樱桃）的味道。它的光滑的橡胶质提供了细微的圆润感，口感光滑细腻，略带干涩的后味清晰、紧致、持久。

Western reviews.review: Broad and creamy, with plum, boysenberry and blackberry fruit carried by seamless, polished structure. Despite the lush flavors, this is serious a wine, boasting a strong graphite spine that strides through the finish and lovely flecks of anise and black tea hanging in the background for added range. Should age well. Best from 2015 through 2030.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感丰富、滑顺，展现出浓郁的浆果风味，如浆果、黑莓和黑currant。酒体结构光滑细致，充满层次感。尽管口感丰富，但这是一款严肃的红酒，具有强烈的石墨骨架，贯穿整个尾部，并在背景中留下了迷人的丁香和黑茶的点缀。酒龄良好，建议从2015年到2030年最佳饮用。

Western reviews.review: Wonderful charming nose with wild strawberries, milk chocolate and raspberries. Opens up with eucalyptus and licorice. So soft and velvety on the palate with a beautiful finesse-driven texture. Full and with silky tannins. Long and very enjoyable. Drink from 2016.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气非常迷人，带有野莓、牛奶巧克力和草莓的味道。打开瓶盖后，会有柠檬香和甘草的味道。口感非常柔软细腻，具有优雅的质感。口感丰富，纤维软且滑顺。口感持久，非常令人愉悦。建议从2016年开始饮用。

Western reviews.review:
One of the more impressive examples from this estate (normally a light, fruity but seductive styled wine), the 2010 possesses more weight and richness while not losing any of its seductive powers. Its deep ruby/purple color is followed by copious notes of kirsch, raspberries and loamy soil undertones. Medium to full-bodied, pure, soft and opulent, this impressive Pomerol will drink well young and last for a decade.

Barrel Sample: 90-92 Points
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶2010年产的波美罗酒，是这家酒庄出品的酒中较为出色的作品。通常来说，这家酒庄的酒风格是轻盈、果香但又有诱惑力，但这瓶2010年的酒却拥有更丰富的体积和更丰富的口感，而不会失去其诱惑力。酒的颜色是深红色，带有紫色调，酒中有大量的果香，如枫糖和红莓，底部有泥土的气息。酒的口感是中等到中等以上的体积，纯正、柔和、丰富，这瓶波美罗酒在年轻时就能享用，并且可以保存十年。

评分：90-92分（酒桶样本）

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Larrivaux 2020 的香气非常讨喜，初闻时感觉有一大堆甜果向你扑来。酒体圆润丝滑，含在口中还带着一股咸咸的矿物质感，再加上收尾时的紫罗兰芬芳，品鉴时我脑中总是浮现出圣埃美隆的影子。这是一款不需要陈年就可以饮用的亲民型葡萄酒。
Chinese pairs.new: The aroma of Chateau Larrivaux 2020 is incredibly appealing, with a wave of sweet fruit hitting you upfront. The smooth, rounded texture coats the palate, leaving a subtle salty mineral note, before finishing with a hint of lavender. This wine always reminds me of Saint-Émilion, and it's a great option to enjoy now, without the need for aging.

English pairs.original: The nose of Chateau Larrivaux 2020 is very pleasant, with first sniff it seems like a wall of sweet fruit flood on me face. The wine has a smooth, silky body, a saline minerality on the palate, and a violet scent on the finish that always reminds me of St. Emilion when I taste it. This wine is of the accessible type and does not require aging.
English pairs.new: 查特奥拉里瓦克斯2020的鼻子非常令人愉悦，初次闻时似乎是一道甜美的果实洪流扑面而来。酒体光滑细腻，口感中带有矿物质的盐味，尾部有紫罗兰的香气，总是让我想起在品尝圣埃米利昂时的感觉。这款酒属于易于接触的类型，不需要长时间陈酿。

Western reviews.review: Cherries, dried flowers, savory herbs, and currants create the core of this medium-bodied charmer. Fresh and polished, with ample, sweet, red fruits, soft-textures and loads of red pit fruits with a touch of chalk in the endnote. This is a superb example of a Bordeaux value wine. Drink from 2023-2035.
Western reviews.translation: 这款中等体积的红酒以浆果、干花、香草和黑加仑为核心。它的口感新鲜、光滑，富有丰富的甜红果味，软糯的口感和大量的红果味，最后留下了一丝矿物质的余韵。这是一款出色的波尔多价值红酒。建议在2023-2035年内饮用。

Western reviews.review: Classic and elegant in the glass showing notes of lavender, hawthorn, linden flowers and mandarin blossom. Medium bodied, very fine grain tannins and a precise, essential finale of a slender nature but decidedly fine and radiant. Better from 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 在玻璃中展现典雅优雅的风格，带有紫罗兰、山楂、白蜡花和橙花的香气。中等体积，细致的纤维素和精确的结尾，细长而精致，明亮而光彩照人。建议2025年后品尝。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有些许林茨蛋糕、醋栗、樱桃蜜饯的味道，并伴有甘草、香料的气息。余味不是很悠长，但很清新。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine has hints of Linzer cake, persimmon, and cherry jam flavors, accompanied by notes of licorice and spices. The finish is crisp but not particularly long-lasting.

Western reviews.review: From a blend of 66% Cabernet Sauvignon, 25% Merlot and 9% Cabernet Franc, the wine is medium bodied, fresh and round, with a floral and blackberry character. This drinks well young, especially for a 2010.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒由66%卡波内尔·萨维尼诺、25%梅洛和9%卡波内尔·法兰克混合而成。酒体中等，口感清新圆润，具有花香和黑莓的特征。这种酒适合年轻饮用，尤其是2010年的品种。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, dezente Randaufhellung, feine Nuancen von Herzkirschen, unterlegt mit Velourleder, etwas Nougat, schwarze Beerenfrucht im Hintergrund. Komplex, rund und extraktsüß, gut eingebundene Tannine, harmonisch, bleibt gut haften, etwas moderne Stilistik, balanciert, ein vielseitiger Speisenbegleiter.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮，心杏和黑杏的细微差别，底层有软绵的皮革味，伴有奶油味，黑莓果味在后面。复杂、圆润、浓郁甜，柔和的橡皮味，和谐，留下深刻的印象，现代风格，平衡，适合多种菜肴的搭配。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark, but not opaque ruby-red color. Restrained dark fruit is dominated by toasty oak & bitter liquorice on the nose. On the palate juicy red berry fruit is accompanied by drying cedary oak. Acidity is good, alcohol is balanced & length is fair. 11/14 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，颜色深沉但不透明。酒鼻中，深色的果味被烟熏的橡木和苦的甘草所主导。口感中， juicy 的红果味伴随着干燥的橡木味。酸度良好，酒精平衡，持久度一般。评分：11/14

Chinese pairs.original: 带有巧克力，黑醋栗的香气，酒体平衡，单宁细滑，风味以黑色浆果为主。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of chocolate and black truffle, balanced body, smooth tannins, flavors dominated by black fruit.

Western reviews.review:
13/10/2017
Kruidig koffie toets  rijpe cassis in de neus
Bordeaux rood met licht waterrandje
In de mond mooie versmolten rijp rood fruit 
Met lichte kirsch toets op het einde
Afdronk 15 sec
Super voor wijn van 24 jaar oud
Prijs aankoop 50€
Nu 99)
Western reviews.translation:
2017年10月13日

酒香中有浓郁的咖啡和成熟的黑加思（一种黑果酱）味道

酒色为深红色，带有轻微的水边

口感上有美妙的成熟红果味，最后留下了一丝轻微的杏仁味

尾韵15秒

对于24岁的红酒来说，非常出色

购买价格50欧元，现价99欧元。

Chinese pairs.original: 很开心能够同时品鉴Chateau La Pointe 2011和2012两个年份，如果说2011年赢在集中度，那2012则在清雅感上更胜一筹。鼠尾草、橄榄菜以及些许百里香的草本清香为整个酒杯营造出理想的清新感。而浮在味蕾上的点点单宁又在收尾时平添了一抹丝滑。如果能够增加更多的圆润度将会更加出色。
Chinese pairs.new: I'm thrilled to taste both the 2011 and 2012 vintages of Chateau La Pointe. While the 2011 excels in concentration, the 2012 takes the lead in its refined quality. The subtle herbal notes of mint, olive and a hint of thyme create a refreshing and crisp atmosphere in the glass. The delicate tannins that dance on the palate add a silky touch at the finish. With a bit more roundness, this wine would be truly exceptional.

English pairs.original: It was a pleasure to taste both the 2011 and 2012 vintages of Chateau La Pointe at the same time. The 2011 vintage is the winner in concentration while 2012 is superior in terms of elegance. The herbal fragrance of sage, kale borecole, and mild thyme creates an ideal freshness in the glass. Moreover, a touch of tannins that are scattered on the taste buds adds some silkiness towards the finish. If more roundness can be added to the aftertaste, this wine will be even more remarkable.
English pairs.new: 品尝2011年和2012年的沙特劳波因特（Chateau La Pointe）红酒是一种享受。2011年产量以浓度而闻名，而2012年产量则以优雅而著称。酒中含有香草、生菜和温和的迷迭香的香气，营造出玻璃中的理想清新感。另外，酒中的轻微苦味让口感更加丝滑。如果酒尾的余味可以更加圆润，这款红酒将更加出色。

Western reviews.review: La Pointe is on a roll after their successful 2010. This new vintage is deep in color with coffee bean, licorice and ripe, juicy plums. On the palate, the wine is filled with lush, sexy black raspberries, chocolate and a hint of coffee bean to complicate matters. 91-93
Western reviews.translation: 拉波因特酒庄的新一瓶红酒非常出色。酒液呈深色，具有咖啡豆、甘草和成熟的浓郁浓果味。口感丰富，黑莓、巧克力和微妙的咖啡豆味让人难以抵挡。评分：91-93分。

Chinese pairs.original: 2020年份的Chateau Siaurac 保持了清润的口感，闻杯时感觉被大把大把的奶油草莓所包裹。鲜甜感是这款酒最大的特点，虽然没有宏大的结构，也可以轻松俘获你的味蕾。这款酒绝对是波尔多高性价比葡萄酒的代表作，非常适合年轻时饮用。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2020 Chateau Siaurac retains a crisp and refreshing texture, enveloping the nose with generous helpings of buttery strawberry.
