Its luscious sweetness is its defining characteristic, and while it may lack grandeur in structure, it's sure to captivate your palate with ease. This wine is a quintessential example of a high-value Bordeaux, perfect for young drinkers.

English pairs.original: The 2020 vintage of Chateau Siaurac retains the fresh and smooth palate. When smelling, it feels like being wrapped in plenty of strawberries and cream. Without splendid structure though, it mainly features the fresh sweetness that can overwhelm your palate easily. Absolutely a representative of high value-for-money Bordeaux suitable for drinking in its youth.
English pairs.new: 2020年沙乌拉克庄园的红酒保留了清新的口感。当闻到时，感觉就像被覆盖在一大堆草莓和奶油中。虽然结构并不出色，但主要特点是清新的甜度，容易让口感变得过于甜。绝对是高性价比的波尔多，适合在年轻时饮用。

Western reviews.review: Beautiful, fresh, almost crunchy fruits of black cherry and mulberries emerge from the 2020 Château Siaurac, and it’s medium-bodied on the palate, with bright acidity and a balanced, clean, layered style that has lots to love.Barrel Sample: 90-92
Western reviews.translation: 2020年夏尔·西奥拉克（Château Siaurac）是一款美丽的红酒，新鲜的黑樱桃和多肉果味在口中呈现，口感中等，带有明亮的酸度和平衡的清爽风格，层次丰富，令人喜爱。酒评：90-92分。

Western reviews.review: Aromas of blackcurrants and blackberries with tobacco, dark spices and cedar. Medium-bodied with chewy tannins and a juicy fruit character. Flavorful and delicious. 80% merlot and 20% cabernet franc. Drink or hold.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中充满了黑currant和黑莓的味道，伴随着烟草、深色香料和雪松的味道。口感中等，口感丰富，具有嚼劲的纽扣和浓郁的水果味。口感丰富，非常美味。酒中含有80%梅洛和20%卡波弗朗克。适合立即饮用或储存。

Chinese pairs.original: 典雅的覆盆子、红醋栗、皮革、碎石和橡木味道香气浑厚，酒体饱满浓郁、单宁结构立体、精致香甜甜，单宁稳固。
Chinese pairs.new: Elegant notes of blackberry, red currant, leather, crushed stone, and oak fill the nose, with a full-bodied, rich palate and a well-structured tannin framework, offering refined sweetness and a solid tannin backbone.

Western reviews.review: (2007) Quite a nice chocolate and ripe berry fruit character. Oak is quite spicy and a touch custardy, and there's a little floral lift in a fairly complex wine. On the palate this is quite creamy and sweet. There is nice fruit here, with a ripeness and sweetness that I like, and the tannins are well balanced, whilst drying and becoming quite chalky. Quite a lot of finesse here.
Western reviews.translation: 2007年：这瓶红酒有着丰富的巧克力和成熟的浆果风味。橡木味道较为辛辣，带有轻微的奶油味。酒中还有一丝花香的气息，整体风格较为复杂。口感丰富、甜蜜。酒中有着丰富的果味，带有成熟和甜蜜的感觉，且口感平衡，干净且略带矿物质味。整体风格较为细腻。

Western reviews.review: Medium to medium-deep, ruby-red color. The nose displays a medium intensity of leafy cassis fruit. Dark fruit on the palate is quite closed. The tannic structure is firm, fine & lacks suppleness. There is good, fresh acidity & balanced alcohol, but the astringent tannins leave the finish very lean. 11/10 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深度为中等到中等深度的红色。

香气：中等强度的叶绿苦味和黑西柚味。

口感：口感中等深度的黑果味，但很难入口。口感中的纤维结构坚实、细腻，但缺乏柔韧性。口感中有良好的新鲜酸度和平衡的酒精，但干涩的纤维使得尾部非常干净。评分：11/10

Chinese pairs.original: 此酒封闭的香气一如既往非常老派，透出药材、泥土、香料和少许墨水味，与黑色水果的芬芳交织在一起。口中的单宁尚未完全融合，但纹理细致的口感却十分顺滑。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts a classic, closed bouquet, releasing notes of herbs, earth, spices, and a hint of ink, intertwined with the fragrance of black fruit. The tannins are still integrating, but the texture is silky smooth.

English pairs.original: The scent of this wine was closed, with expectedly old-fashioned bouquets of medicine, earth, spices and subtle ink mingled with dark fruits. The tannins were not entirely integrated yet, but the texture in mouth was fine-grained and very smooth.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的香气闭塞，带有典型的老派药香、泥土、香料和微妙的墨香与黑色水果混合。口感中的纤维素尚未完全融合，但口感细腻，非常滑顺。

Western reviews.review: One of the more obscure classified growths, the 2009 is an open, easy to drink wine with an oak, dark cherry, earth and herb perfume. Medium bodied, with some rusticity to the tannins, this should be better with a few more years of age. 88 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶2009年的红酒是一种相对较少见的顶级葡萄酒，具有开阔、容易入口的口感，气味中有橡木、黑樱桃、泥土和草药的香气。酒体中等，苦味略有粗糙感，建议在几年后再喝。评分：88分。

Western reviews.review: Ruby-red with garnet highlights. Focused nose of red fruits with spicy, peppery oak. Full, warm entry leading into a clean, quite firm and slightly lean middle palate. Well-made and successful yet lacking real elegance.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色酒液，带有 garnet色调。酒香中富含红果味，伴有辣椒和胡椒的橡木味。入口丰富，温暖，中口干净，坚实，略带瘦削。整体制作精良，成功，但缺乏真正的优雅。

Western reviews.review: More modern nose, leather, dark berries, new oak - the palate is medium bodied with young tannins, high acidity and dark fruit, it still feels somewhat youthful and reserved, should get some more time to shed those young tannins and acidity.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气比较现代化，带有皮革、黑莓和新橡木的味道。口感中等，年轻的苦味和高酸度，黑果味道浓郁，但仍然有些年轻和保守，需要更多时间来消化这些年轻的苦味和酸度。

Western reviews.review: Virtually opaque ruby-red color. Classic nose dominated by cedar notes. Nice fresh, plum & redcurrant fruit. A firm, slightly earthy structure gives good grip and adds length to the wine. Alcohol and acidity are nicely balanced. Quite simple & straight forward, but well balanced. 11/13 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 酒色接近透明的深红色。酒香典雅，主要是松木香。酒中有新鲜的浆果和红葡萄风味。酒的结构坚实，略带泥土味，给酒带来很好的抓握感和长度。酒中的酒精和酸度很好地平衡。酒口简单直接，但很好地平衡。评分：11/13

Western reviews.review: Gewiss, Camensac ist immer noch kein Spitzenwein, doch seit sich Céline Villars (Chasse Spleen) darum kümmert, hat er an Präzision gewonnen, ohne von seinem fruchtintensiven, kugelrunden, fröhlichen Kurs abzukommen. Wer feurige, fruchtiger Weine mag, wird nicht enttäuscht.
Western reviews.translation: 当然，卡门萨克(Camensac)还不是顶级红酒，但自从塞琳·维拉尔(Céline Villars)接手后，它的精确度有了明显提高，而不会改变其浓郁的果香、圆润的口感和欢乐的风格。如果你喜欢烈性、果香浓郁的红酒，那么你不会失望。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有明显的覆盆子和黑醋栗的味道，并伴有石墨和香料的气味，余味稍有紧实感，带有粗糙的单宁味。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts prominent flavors of blackberry and black cherry, accompanied by notes of graphite and spice. The finish is slightly firm, with a coarse tannin texture.

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark ruby-red color, not opaque. Aromas of red fruit & new oak are currently quite restrained. A little red-fruit shows on the palate, but the tannins & cedary new oak flavors close it up. Acidity is balanced & alcohol is a touch warming. 11/12 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，颜色不透明。酒中有红果和新橡木的香气，但目前这些香气并不强烈。口感中有少量的红果味，但坚果味和新橡木味使其收敛。酸度平衡，酒精略微有暖感。评分：11/12

Chinese pairs.original: 带有成熟的果实，肉和香料的香气，具有天鹅绒般的单宁，结构良好平衡。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of mature fruit, meat, and spices, with silky tannins and a well-balanced structure.

Western reviews.review: Very rich, almost soupy, this is an enjoyable wine, not hugely structured and therefore not likely to age long. But in 2–3 years, drink this for its plumy fruits, its dried fruit richness and its light tannins.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒非常浓郁，接近于浓汤的口感，是一种令人愉悦的酒品，但其结构并不复杂，因此不太可能长时间陈酿。但是，在2-3年后，喝下它，感受其浓郁的浆果风味、干燥的果实和轻微的苦味。

Western reviews.review: Tiefdunkles Rubingranat, jugendliche Reflexe, violetter Rand. In der Nase feine Edelholzwürze, zart nach schwarzen Trüffeln und Balsam, dunkle Beerenfrucht, attraktiv. Am Gaumen saftig, schokoladige Tannine, zarter Dörrobsttouch, kraftvoll, viel Nougat im Nachhall, gutes Potenzial.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色酒液，年轻的反光，紫色边缘。酒鼻中有细微的高档木香，微带黑松露和漆树脂的气味，黑莓等浓郁的果香，非常吸引人。口感丰富，巧克力般的坚果感，微带干果味，强烈，余味中有大量的牛奶糖，品质良好，具有很好的发展潜力。

Western reviews.review: (2007) Inky, slightly paintboxy character with some cherry fruit and a vinous charm. Fleshy and rich, with lots of dry extract and rather dry tannins, but has flesh and weight and good length.
Western reviews.translation: 2007年：这款红酒具有深红色的颜色，口感丰富，带有樱桃果味和绚丽的酒香。口感丰富富饶，干性提取物丰富，干性橡皮质感明显，但仍然具有丰富的口感和良好的持久度。

Chinese pairs.original: 装瓶后的Chateau Lanessan 2021依然保持了理想的柔和感，无论是单宁的质感，还是口感的柔润度都算得上是同类酒款中的佼佼者。海棠果、覆盆子、牡丹花的芬芳透着“淑女般的含蓄”。整体来说，是一款来自凉年份的良好作品。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2021 Chateau Lanessan remains a soft and elegant wine, boasting exceptional texture and velvety smoothness. The subtle aromas of cherry blossom, blackberry, and rose are refined and demure. Overall, it's a fine effort from a cool vintage.

English pairs.original: After bottling, Chateau Lanessan 2021 still maintains its ideal softness, both the tannins’ texture and the smooth palate rank as top-notch among similar wines. The fragrances of crabapple, raspberry, and peony exude a ‘ladylike’ subtlety. Overall, it is a fine product from a cool vintage.
English pairs.new: 酒瓶装好后，2021年拉内桑庄园的红酒仍然保持着理想的柔软度，同类酒中其苦味和口感都非常出色。酒中含有苹果、莓果和牡丹的香气，呈现出一种优雅的细腻。总体来说，这是一款来自冷季的优质产品。

Western reviews.review: Precise and bright nose shows notes of wild strawberries, pine needles, eucalyptus, guarana and karkadè. Medium body, soft tannins and an honest, genuine and well-vertical finish. Lacks some flesh to enrich in character. Drink now.
Western reviews.translation: 精确而明亮的鼻子，展现出野生草莓、松针、桉树、可可豆和卡卡达的香气。中等体积，软的橡皮质和诚实、真实的垂直结束。缺乏一些肌肉来丰富个性。现在饮用。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby core, purple reflections, subtle brightening on the rim. Delicate aromas of dark cherry fruit with hints of clove and tobacco. Red cherries on the palate with a slender texture, fresh acidity and a fine, nutty finish.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色核心，紫色反射，酒杯边缘微微发亮。酒中带有暗红果实的细微气味，伴有丁香和烟草的微妙香气。口感上呈现红果实的清新风味，口感细腻，酸度清新，尾韵细腻，带有坚果味。

Western reviews.review: Underbrush, tobacco leaf, peppery spice, red currants and crisp red plums form the core of the wine. Medium-bodied, bright, chewy and peppery, this is quite classic in style, with a nice sweetness to the bite in the red fruits found in the endnote. Drink from 2024-2040. 88-90
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的主要风味包括了林地、烟草叶、辣椒味、红葡萄和脆红桃。酒体中等，口感清新、有嚼头、带有辣椒味。这种风格比较传统，红果味在尾部留下了一丝甜感。建议从2024年到2040年饮用。评分88-90分。

Western reviews.review: Sehr schöne Nase, komplex, steinig, dunkle Frucht, Cassis, Kirschen, Kräuter. Knackiger Gaumen, frisch, lebhaft, gut strukturiert, mit feinkörnigen Tanninen, viel Lebendigkeit und toller Säure. Mittellanger Abgang. Das macht Spass. 2025-2036 (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2022. Grand Cercle des Vins de Bordeaux)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

非常漂亮的鼻子，复杂，石质，深色果味，黑加斯，草莓，香草。口感坚实，新鲜，生动，结构良好，具有细腻的橡木味，充满活力和出色的酸度。中等长度的尾部。非常有趣。推荐饮用时间：2025-2036（2022年4月在波尔多葡萄酒大师评级）。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau d’Agassac 在2023年份依然给我们展现出了理想的甜润感，考虑到酒庄遇到的霜霉病压力，能够展现出这样的品质实属难得。果香清晰甜美、单宁轻巧怡人，略带圆润的口感营造出温柔的气息，非常适合在年轻时饮用。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau d'Agassac 在 2023 年的版本依然展现出了完美的甜润感，尤其是在酒庄面临霜霉病的挑战下，这样的品质更是值得赞赏。酒中果香清晰甜美，单宁轻巧怡人，口感略带圆润，营造出温柔的气息，非常适合年轻时饮用。

English pairs.original: In the 2023 vintage, Chateau d’Agassac continues to exhibit its ideal sweetness, which is quite remarkable given the challenges posed by mildew pressures. Its fruit aromas are clear and sweet, while the tannins are delicate and pleasant. With a slightly rounded texture, it creates a gentle atmosphere, making it perfect for consumption at a young age.
English pairs.new: 2023年产的香格萨克庄园继续展现出其理想的甜度，这在面对霉菌压力的挑战下尤为值得赞赏。其果香清晰甜美，苦味柔和舒适。略微圆润的口感使其在年轻时就能享受。

Western reviews.review: A great interpretation of a classic Bordeaux. Not destined as “grand vin“ but truly showing a balanced expression of density, structure and texture. Lovely fruitiness, supple and fine tannins, firm and solid mid-palate and a juicy finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶经典波尔多红酒的精彩解读。虽然它不是“大酒”，但它展现出平衡的密度、结构和口感。酒中充满了可爱的果香，细腻的纤维，坚实的中口和果酱般的尾韵。

Chinese pairs.original: 本次品鉴的为半支装酒款，在瓶中发展较快，相较750毫升及5升装好很多。酒体呈中等红宝石色泽，诱人的香气中充满了经典的黑醋栗、泥土、烟草、草药、香料以及些微奶油木桶香气，入口的滋味与嗅觉相似，与柔顺的单宁相平衡，余韵中等。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine is a half-bottle offering, which has aged significantly faster than its 750ml and 5L counterparts. The wine has a medium garnet color, with an alluring aroma that's full of classic blackberry, earthy, smoky, herbal, spicy, and subtle oak notes. The flavors on the palate mirror the nose, with smooth tannins providing a perfect balance, and a medium-length finish.

English pairs.original: Drank for a half bottle, therefore it matures quickly in the bottle, so that much better this time than my last experience of a regular bottle and a 5l bottle. Medium ruby color, the wine revealed attractive noses of really nice and classical black currant, with earth, tobacco, herb, spices and creamy oaks, medium-bodied palate with flavors matching the nose, supple tannin, with a medium length.
English pairs.new: 喝了一瓶半，酒因此在瓶子里迅速成熟，所以这次的体验比我之前喝过的普通瓶和5升瓶要好。酒呈现出中度红宝石色，酒香中有典型的黑加仑，带有泥土、烟草、草本植物、香料和奶油橡木的气息，口感中等，酒味与鼻子中闻到的相符，纤维软滑，口感持久中等。

Western reviews.review: Forest floor, wet earth, mushroom, cassis, cedar and red fruits are the main component of this fully developed wine. Medium bodied, and just about ready to gently begin to slowly fade. To enjoy most of the fruit and freshness, the wine requires drinking sooner than later. 87 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的主要成分包括森林地面、湿润土壤、蘑菇、黑加斯、红松和红果。酒体中等，正处于成熟期，接近衰退。为了享受酒中的果味和清新感，最好尽早饮用。评分87分。

Western reviews.review: Rich, impressively ripe fruit, the fruit dense and black, with juicy black plum flavors followed by dusty tannins. The wine is chunky, powerful for the year, the dryness smoothed by new wood.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感丰富，果实成熟度极高，果实浓密且黑色，带有浓郁的黑杏子风味，后续有干酪样苦味。酒体厚重，今年的酒力强劲，干爽感被新橡木的甜感所平衡。

Western reviews.review: Tiefdunkles Rubingranat, jugendliche Reflexe, violetter Rand. In der Nase mit zarter Pfefferwürze unterlegte saftige dunkle Beerenfrucht, etwas Zwetschken und Brombeeren. Am Gaumen lebendige Säurestruktur, mittlere Textur, eher zitronig-rotbeerige Nuancen, betonte Frische, mineralisch-salziger Nachhall, Zitronen im Abgang.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，年轻的反光，紫色边缘。鼻子里有细微的胡椒味的覆盖，浓郁的黑色浆果，略带浆果和黑莓的味道。口感上有活跃的酸度结构，中等的质地，略带柠檬和红酒的味道，强调了清新，矿物质和盐味的余味，柠檬味在尾部。

Western reviews.review: (2008) Deep, quite coffeed and charry nose of svelte black fruit and just a hint of something herbal and cedary. On the palate this has a lovely balance of juicy freshness with crisp tannins, and a hint of weight and chocolate.
Western reviews.translation: 2008年：深度的鼻子，带有浓郁的咖啡和焦糖味，黑色水果的味道优雅，仅有微微的草药和松木味。口感上，酒精平衡，新鲜果味和清脆的橡木味，带有轻微的重量和巧克力味。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有雪松，香料，泥土，红色和黑色浆果的香气，酒体中等浓郁，优雅的风格，柔滑的单宁，回味中等。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of pine, spices, earth, red and black fruit. Medium-bodied with a refined style, smooth tannins, and a medium finish.

Western reviews.review: (2003) Very closed on the nose. A backward, cassis and tobacco palate with light elegant tannins. Well-balanced with good concentration and a smokey finish. Medium-bodied - this is a fine, light-style of Duhart.
Western reviews.translation: 2003年：酒香封闭，口感回味，带有黑加仑和烟草味，口感轻盈，纤维柔顺。酒体平衡，浓度适中，尾部有烟熏味。酒体中等，杜哈尔轻质风格的典范。

Western reviews.review: Medium to deep ruby-red color. The  wine has a classic 'claret' nose with notes of pencil shavings & dust overlying slightly leafy cassis fruit. Fresh acidity lifts the palate quite nicely. There is some fine tannic structure, but the fruit on the mid-palate lacks a little concentration. Alcohol is balanced but the finish is currently lean & of middling length. The wine has good freshness, but the fruit needs time to open. 11/06 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深红色至深红色。

酒香：典型的克莱雷特风格，带有木屑、尘土和略带叶绿的黑加西斯果实。

口感：新鲜的酸度使得口感清新。有细致的纤维结构，但中口的果实略显稀薄。酒精平衡，但尾部略显干净且长度中等。酒有很好的新鲜感，但果实需要时间来展现。

评分：11/06 DCAMW

Chinese pairs.original: 醒酒三小时。此酒奢华的香气中透出香草、烤吐司、拿铁咖啡、黑莓、水仙花、香料、树丛及一抹延续到口腔中的咸矿物味，中等酒体的口感略显严肃但非常清晰，富有精细的矿物质感和优秀的活力。
Chinese pairs.new:
Aeration time: 3 hours.

This luxurious wine boasts an aromatic bouquet of lavender, toasted bread, espresso, blackberry, freesia, spices, forest notes, and a lingering salty mineral taste that lingers on the palate. The medium-bodied texture is serious but very clear, with fine mineral texture and excellent vitality.

English pairs.original: Decanted for three hours. An opulent bouquet of vanilla, toast, coffee latte, blackberry, daffodil, spices and underbush with a hint of savoury-mineral that continued onto the slightly austere, very precise and medium-bodied flavours that possessed fine mineral structure and distinguished vibrancy.
English pairs.new: 酒瓶放置三小时。酒香丰富，带有香草、烤面包、咖啡浓缩、黑莓、百日花、香料和灌木丛的气息，伴有矿物质的微妙味道。酒体中等，口感精确，略带干涩，矿物质结构细致，带有明显的活力。

Western reviews.review: Medium bodied, firm, refined and youthful, the wine is fresh, mineral driven and displays a floral, sweet cherry and plum character. Give this another 5-7 years for more development and softer tannins. 92 Points
Western reviews.translation: 体积中等，坚实，精致，年轻的酒精，酒精清新，矿物质驱动，展现出花香、甜樱桃和浆果的特征。建议再等5-7年，酒精会更加成熟，苦味会更加柔和。评分92分。

Western reviews.review: A big, dark, rich wine with an impressively opulent structure allied to fresh, bright Merlot character. The flavors of black berry juice are followed by chocolate, bitter coffee and vibrant acidity, which gives freshness to the finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶大而浓郁的红酒，具有优雅的结构和新鲜的梅洛特风味。酒中黑莓果汁的风味随后被巧克力、苦咖啡和生动的酸度所取代，酸度使得酒尾保持清新。

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Rubingranat, violette Randaufhellung. In der Nase feine Gewürzanklänge über rotem Beerenkonfit, derzeit noch etwas verhalten. Am Gaumen mittelgewichtig, mineralisch, feine Tannine, von der Säure getragen, zart nach Himbeeren, zitroniger Touch im Abgang, bleibt noch etwas kurz.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

深红色葡萄酒色，边缘有紫色光泽。酒香中有细微的香料味道，混合着红果酱的味道，目前还不够浓郁。口感中等，矿物质味道浓郁，细微的橡皮味道，酸度较高，口感中有轻微的蓝莓味道，尾部有柠檬味道，留下了一种短暂的感觉。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark & virtually opaque ruby-red color. Cedar aromas overlay restrained red-plum fruit on the nose. Cedar & red fruits carry through to the palate. Acidity is quite soft but is balanced. Alcohol is a touch warming on the finish but is in balance. The structure is supple & smooth, allowing the ripe red-fruits to continue through onto a long finish. 11/10 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的红酒色，几乎透不见光。鼻子中有松木香味，掩盖着红浆果的清晰气息。口感中松木和红浆果的味道持续存在。酸度较软，但与酒精的平衡相得益彰。酒精在尾部略微带有温暖感，但仍然保持平衡。酒体柔软细腻，让成熟的红浆果味道持续存在，直到长尾部结束。评分：11/10

Chinese pairs.original: Les Trois Croix 2021的表现着实亮眼。精巧的酸枣、蔓越莓芬芳、标志性的粉笔灰质感、柔中带刚的酒体结构，一切都让我们看到了整个团队对2021年份的拿捏恰到好处，能够感觉到他们对采收和酿造的把控很精准。相比其他Fronsac的期酒酒款来说，这款酒果丹皮之类的红果干香气要更加突出，值得推荐。
Chinese pairs.new: The Les Trois Croix 2021 truly shines. Delicate notes of cherry and cranberry, a signature chalky texture, and a balanced structure that's both smooth and firm, all demonstrate the team's perfect grasp of the 2021 vintage. The wine's control over harvest and winemaking is evident. Compared to other Fronsac barrel samples, this wine stands out with its pronounced red fruit and dried fruit aromas, particularly cherry, making it a standout recommendation.

English pairs.original: Les Trois Croix 2021 presents stunningly. The delicate jujube and fragrant cranberry aromas, the signatured chalky texture, and the soft but firm structure all show that the team has done a good job, delivering an adequate interpretation of the vintage of 2021. It is obvious that they have precise control over the harvest time and vinification. Compared with other Primeur wines from Fronsac, this one has more pronounced dried red fruit such as haw rolls. It is overall wine of recommendation.
English pairs.new: 2021年莱斯·特罗伊·克洛伊红酒呈现出惊人的风采。细腻的枸杞和浓郁的蔓越莓香气，标志性的石灰质质感和柔软但坚实的结构都表明团队做得很好，准确地解读了2021年的葡萄成熟度。显然，他们对收获时间和酿造过程有着精确的控制。与其他弗朗萨克地区的新酒相比，这款红酒更具浓郁的干红果香，如枇杷果。总体而言，这是一款值得推荐的红酒。

Western reviews.review: Opaque ruby core, purple reflections, subtle brightening on the rim. An inviting bouquet supported with a touch of nougat, dark cherry fruit and hints of plum. Juicy, elegant palate with chocolate nuances, fine tannins with mineral notes. A generous wine, already great with food and offers good ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 酒液呈深红色，透明度不明显，酒液边缘有细微的光泽。酒香诱人，带有杏仁、黑樱桃和浓郁黑果的味道。口感丰富，带有巧克力和矿物质的味道，口感细腻，酒精度适中。酒体丰富，已经可以与食物搭配，酒龄潜力较高。

Western reviews.review: Black cherries and roses with a touch of chocolate-dusted, black raspberries create the nose. Medium-bodied, with a bright, salty, fresh, crisp, savory edge to the red pit fruit and licorice notes tasted in the finish. Drink from 2024-3033. 89-91
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中充满了黑樱桃和玫瑰的味道，伴随着一丝巧克力味的黑莓。口感中等，带有明亮的、咸的、新鲜的、清脆的、有嚼劲的味道，尾部有红果和甘草的味道。建议从2024年到2033年饮用。评分：89-91分。

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Rubin. Die Nase noch verhalten, kühl, steinig, öffnet sich mit Luft, zeigt eine dunkle Beerenfrucht und rauchige Noten. Im Gaumen ziemlich dicht, satte Frucht, feinkörniges Tannin, baut Druck auf, bleibt ausgewogen. Endet langanhaltend und hinterlässt einen ganzen Korb von Brombeeren im Retrofinale. Spanend, gute Anlagen. 2025-2038 (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2022. Grand Cercle des Vins de Bordeaux)
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶深红色的红酒。酒鼻子虽然还比较沉静，但在呼吸后会展现出清凉、石质的特征，并且会释放出浓郁的黑berry和烟熏味。口感浓郁，果实丰富，细腻的纤维会给人一种压力感，但整体仍然保持着平衡。酒尾长长，留下了一个浓郁的黑berry的回味。酒的品质很好，未来有很大的潜力。推荐储存时间：2025-2038。

la chapelle de la mission haut-brion 200.name: la chapelle de la mission haut-brion 2008

Chinese pairs.original: 酒体呈深紫红色，明显的木桶香气（香草、烟熏、巧克力），同时散发泥土、新鲜黑莓和树莓味，单宁强壮严峻，与滋味富饶、浓郁粘稠的黑色水果滋味相搭，结构完好。
Chinese pairs.new: Deep purple-red color, prominent oak notes (honey, smoke, chocolate) alongside earthy, fresh blackberry and raspberry flavors, robust and austere tannins paired with rich, full-bodied, syrupy black fruit flavors, well-structured.

English pairs.original: Deep purple-red color, full of notable oaks (vanilla, smoke, chocolate) as well as earthy noses, with fresh blackberry and raspberry, strong, tight and astringent tannin on the mouthfeel with rich, dark and slightly chewy fruit, good substance here.
English pairs.new: 深紫红色，酒中充满了浓郁的橡木味道（香草、烟熏、巧克力），还有泥土的气息，口感中有新鲜的黑莓和草莓，口感强烈紧致且略带干涩的苦味，口感中有丰富的黑色果肉，略带嚼劲，酒体丰富。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, jugendliche Reflexe, zarter Wasserrand. In der Nase reife Zwetschkenfrucht, zart tabakig unterlegt. Am Gaumen saftige dunkle Beerenfrucht, mittlere Komplexität, etwas Schokolade, seidige Tannine, mittlere Länge, etwas Dörrobst im Finish, bereits gut antrinkbar. Wirkt etwas alkoholisch im Nachhall.
Western reviews.translation:
深红色葡萄酒色，年轻的反射光，细微的水边缘。

鼻子里有成熟的浆果味，轻微的烟草味。

口感上有丰富的黑色浆果味，中等复杂度，略带巧克力味，细滑的纹理，中等持久，尾部有略带干果味。

整体来说，酒味已经很好喝了，但在回味中略带酒精味。

Western reviews.review: (2007) Second wine of La Mission. A very light, floral and fresh fragrance. Cherry and something a little like roses or violet. On the palate a lovely quality of fruit, with a silky black cherry fruit. The dry tannins are refined and add a bittersweet edge, with lovely poise and balance.
Western reviews.translation: 2007 年的 La Mission 二级酒。酒香非常轻盈、花香、清新，带有樱桃和玫瑰或紫罗兰的味道。口感上，果味优雅，黑樱桃果味细腻。干的橡皮质地精致，带有苦甜的味道，酒体平衡美观。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, jugendliche Reflexe, zarter Wasserrand. In der Nase feine Weichsel-Kirsch-Frucht, zart nach Nougat, dezente Kräuterwürze, Orangenschalen. Am Gaumen saftig, rund, sehr charmant, wirkt trinkfertig, unmerkliche Tannine, zarte Honignote im Finale, mittlere Länge.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，年轻的光泽，细微的水边光泽。在鼻子里，细腻的白樺樱桃果味，轻微的牛奶糖味，微妙的香草味，橙子皮味。口感丰富，圆润，非常迷人，感觉非常容易喝，几乎没有苦味，细微的蜂蜜味在尾部，中等长度。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, breitere Randaufhellung. Mit einem Hauch von Nougat unterlegte reife Kirschenfrucht, feine tabakige Würze. Saftig und frisch, verfügt über elegante und gut integrierte Tannine, bereits gut entwickelt, kann man vom Fleck weg genießen.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，边缘有明显的光泽。酒中有杏仁的香味，成熟的樱桃果味，细微的烟草味。口感丰富，新鲜，具有典雅的、融合的橡皮味，已经成熟，可以直接享用。

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Rubingranat, violette Reflexe. In der Nase feines dunkles Beerenkonfit, Brombeeren, mit einem Hauch von Preiselbeerkonfit unterlegt, feine tabakige Würze. Saftig, gute Komplexität, schokoladig, pfeffriger Touch, feiner Nougat im Abgang, ein harmonischer Speisenbegleiter, gutes Reifepotenzial.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

深红色葡萄酒色，紫色光泽。鼻子中有细微的黑berry浓缩果酱、黑莓和一丝蓝莓浓缩果酱的味道，伴有细微的烟草味。口感丰富，复杂性好，带有巧克力和胡椒的味道，尾部有细微的牛奶糖味。是一款和谐的食物伴侣，具有很好的成熟潜力。

M. Chapoutier Chateauneuf du pape La Ber.name: M. Chapoutier Chateauneuf du pape La Bernardine 2008

Chinese pairs.original: 有黑醋栗、椰子、烤咖啡、肉桂、樱桃、黑樱桃和干草的香味，口感复杂精致，麝香中带着辛辣味。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts aromas of black prune, coconut, roasted coffee, cinnamon, cherry, black cherry, and hay. The palate is complex and refined, with a subtle hint of spice.

Western reviews.review: Very peppery, saddle leather, barnyard, black cherry, cedar, smoked meat, cooked carrot, gamey, garrigue aromas. Ripe, round, rich, supple palate with smoky, prune, black cherry jam, gamey, garrigue, kirsch, peppery, resin and tobacco flavours. Youthful, gamey, rustic style with good complexity and a bit of stuffing with some warmth on the finish. Now -5 years. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的气味非常复杂，带有以下特征：强烈的胡椒味、马鞍革、农场、黑樱桃、松木、熏肉、烤胡萝卜、野味和干草气味。

口感丰富、圆润、富有层次，带有烟熏、浆果、黑樱桃果酱、野味、干草、柠檬、胡椒、树脂和烟草味。

这瓶红酒的风格年轻、野性、质朴，具有很好的复杂性和一些余味，口感中带有温暖的感觉。建议在现在到5年内饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 与过往年份的香气比较，2022年的Chateau Rollan de By果香明显纯净了很多。口感圆润甜美，带有丰富的单宁。在尾韵中，淡淡的苦味与草莓酱、桑葚的甜香完美融合，这是一款品质出色的梅多克葡萄酒。
Chinese pairs.new: Compared to previous vintages, the 2022 Chateau Rollan de By has a significantly purer and more refined aroma. The palate is smooth and sweet, with rich tannins. In the finish, a subtle bitterness harmoniously blends with the sweetness of strawberry jam and blackberry, making this a high-quality Medoc wine.

English pairs.original: Compared to the aromas of previous vintages, Chateau Rollan de By 2022 presents a noticeably purer fruit scent. The palate is round, sweet, and filled with rich tannins. In the finish, a subtle bitterness melds perfectly with the sweet aromas of strawberry jam and mulberry, making this an good Medoc wine.
English pairs.new: 相比之前的几年份，2022年Chateau Rollan de By的香气更加纯粹，果香更加浓郁。口感圆润，甜度适中，富有丰富的苦味。尾部，微妙的苦味与草莓酱和黑莓的甜香完美融合，使得这款美度葡萄酒非常出色。

Western reviews.review: Supple, round, creamy, forward, and filled with sweet black cherries, black currants and espresso, with some licorice that comes in on the back end of the finish. Drink from 2025-2035. 89-91 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感柔和、圆润、奶油般滑顺，入口即来，充满黑樱桃、黑加拿大蓝berries和浓缩咖啡的甜味，尾部还带有 licorice 的味道。建议从2025年至2035年饮用。评分：89-91分。

Western reviews.review: Un joli nez fruité et parfumé. Il exprime les arômes de cassis frais, de prune noire, de griotte, de fraise de bois et de cerise rouge, complétées par des touches florales (pivoine, violette), herbacées (romarin, menthe sauvage) et des légères notes épicées (réglisse, une pointe de cannelle et de vanille). On y retrouve aussi une très délicate note toastée. En bouche, l’attaque est juteuse, très fruitée et ouverte. Elle enveloppe une structure tannique puissante, et le côté serré d’un vin primeur. Les tannins sont accrochants, mais mûrs, d’un grain fin. Le vin exprime les saveurs juteuses et concentrées de griotte, de cassis, de cerise rouge, de fraise écrasée et de coulis de framboise, complétées par des touches raffinées de chocolat à la menthe, de réglisse, de cannelle, de vanille en poudre, de pivoine et de violette. La finale est persistante, avec une bonne acidité et de l’énergie. Un vin corsé, avec de la densité, de la profondeur, une structure ferme et de la fraicheur. Une belle promesse de développement.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一瓶美丽的红酒，具有清新果香和花香。酒中融合了新鲜黑currant、黑杏、山核桃、红樱桃和红草莓的香气，伴有花朵香气（牡丹、紫罗兰）、草本香气（罗马香、野生茉莉）和轻微的香料香气（甘草、少量的丁香和香料）。酒中还有一丝轻微的烤香。

在口感上，这瓶红酒具有丰富的果香和开阔的口感，包裹着强烈的坚果味和初熟的味道。酒中的坚果味是细腻的，但仍然具有吸引力。酒中表达了浓郁的山核桃、黑currant、红樱桃、挤压的草莓和浓缩的草莓汁的味道，伴有精致的薄荷巧克力、甘草、丁香、香料粉、牡丹和紫罗兰的味道。酒尾持久，具有良好的酸度和能量。酒具有厚重的质地、深度、坚实的结构和清新感。酒的发展前景很好。

Chinese pairs.original: 刚开瓶时有些还原，直到我摇了三分钟之后才逐渐开始绽放，多汁莓果、鲜甜脆爽的血橙芬芳、精致典雅的香料气息层层涌现，很好地诠释了一款梅多克葡萄酒的立体感。
Chinese pairs.new: The wine initially showed some reduction, but after shaking for three minutes, it gradually unfolded, revealing juicy raspberry and blood orange aromas, along with layers of refined and elegant spice notes, beautifully capturing the complexity of a Médoc wine.

English pairs.original: As the cork is popped, the wine’s aroma initially presents as slightly muted. However, after a mere three minutes, it begins to unfurl, revealing juicy and succulent berry notes, zesty blood orange, and a playful interplay of delicate spices. These intricacies showcase the wine’s exceptional three-dimensional complexity, a hallmark of a true Medoc.
English pairs.new: 当瓶塞被打开时，酒精的香气最初呈现为略微低调。然而，仅仅三分钟后，它开始展开，展现出浓郁的浆果香气，鲜橙的柑橘味和轻盈的香料交织。这些细节展现了酒精的出色三维复杂性，这是真正的梅多克酒的标志。

Western reviews.review: Tobacco, citrus, currants, chewy red fruits, cedar and peppery herbs are in the nose and on the palate of this medium-bodied, crisp, fresh, crunchy wine with dusty tannins and a kick of savory herbs in the finish. Drink from 2023-2034.
Western reviews.translation: 这款中等体积的红酒，具有清新、清脆、脆亮的口感，带有烟草、柑橘、葡萄干、坚果、红果、松木和辣香草的气味和口感。酒尾带有干燥的苦味和一丝浓郁的香草味。建议从2023年到2034年饮用。

Western reviews.review: Pure and primary aromas of fresh blackcurrant, cherry and herbal spices. Dense palate in a young phase but well-built with good proportions, nice purity of fruit, good oak balance, ripe tannin and a long finish with both generosity and freshness.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气纯粹、原始，带有新鲜黑currant、樱桃和草药香料的味道。虽然年轻但口感丰富，结构良好，果味纯粹，橡木调和完美，纤维软化，长长的尾部带有丰富和新鲜的感觉。

Chinese pairs.original: 2023年份的Chateau Desmirail 是一款多汁爽口的玛歌列级庄，它透明的单宁和绢柔的酒体能够轻松虏获很多大众消费者的味蕾。也许Denis 想说：“既然没有办法在风土上展现结构，那就让花果芬芳肆意地飞扬吧… ” 于是乎，我们便看到了一场樱桃、果丹皮、酸梅汤、大黄果酱共同演绎的水果舞台剧。期待陈年之后，单宁变得更加温柔。（ 55% Cabernet Sauvignon, 37% Merlot, 4% Petit Verdot, 4% Cabernet Franc，平局产量：46hl/ha）
Chinese pairs.new: 2023年份的Chateau Desmirail是一款多汁爽口的玛歌列级庄。它的透明单宁和绢柔酒体使得它能够轻松吸引大众消费者。酒中充满了樱桃、果丹皮、酸梅汤和大黄果酱的风味，呈现出一场水果舞台剧。陈年后，单宁会变得更加温柔。酒中含有55%的卡波网索维涅，37%的梅洛，4%的佩蒂·维多，4%的卡波网索弗朗克，产量为每公顷46公斤。

English pairs.original: In the vintage of 2023, Chateau Desmirail presents itself as a juicy and refreshing Margaux Grand Cru Classe, with its transparent tannins and silky texture effortlessly captivating the palates of many consumers. Perhaps Denis intended to convey, “Since it’s difficult to showcase structure through terroir, let the floral and fruity aromas soar freely…” And thus, we witness a fruit-filled spectacle featuring cherries, candied orange peel, plum compote, and quince jam. With aging, we can expect the tannins to become even softer. (55% Cabernet Sauvignon, 37% Merlot, 4% Petit Verdot, 4% Cabernet Franc, average yield: 46hl/ha)
English pairs.new: 2023年，香格拉大酒庄（Chateau Desmirail）呈现出一款新鲜、清爽的马格朗克大酒庄级红酒（Margaux Grand Cru Classe）。酒中的透明质感和细腻口感让许多消费者都深深被其迷住。或许是丹尼斯（Denis）想要表达的意思是，“由于难以通过地理特征来展现结构，让花香和水果香气自由呼吸吧……”因此，我们看到了一场水果盛宴，展现了樱桃、糖浆橙皮、浓果酱和枇杷酱的风采。随着时间的推移，我们可以期待质感更加细腻的口感。 (酒中含有55%卡波弗雷（Cabernet Sauvignon）、37%梅洛（Merlot）、4%小皮诺（Petit Verdot）和4%卡波弗雷（Cabernet Franc），平均产量为46hl/ha)。

Western reviews.review: This wine displays a broad structural presence but reveals a slight emptiness in the mid-palate. It offers a juicy character, accompanied by austere tannins. The oak influence however may overshadow the body slightly. Pairing with food is recommended.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒展现出宽广的结构，但在口感中间略显空虚。它带有浓郁的果味，伴随着干净的苦味。然而，橡木的影响可能会掩盖红酒的体积。建议与食物搭配。

Western reviews.review: The wine is a deep, dark, not-quite opaque ruby-red color. Juicy dark-plum aromas open beautifully on the nose. Hints of chocolate accompany the dark-fruit & fine-grained tannins on the mid-palate. The tannins are supple & ripe, acidity is fresh & the alcohol is balanced. The long finish combines chocolatey, smooth-textured tannins with fresh, juicy, ripe blackcurrant fruit.  04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒呈现出深暗的红色，接近透明。酒鼻中充满了浓郁的黑杏香气。口感中，巧克力和黑果的味道与细致的纤维质的苦味相结合。酒中的苦味柔软而成熟，酸度清新，酒精平衡。酒尾长而持久，融合了巧克力般的细腻苦味与清新、浓郁的黑currant果味。 评分：04/24 (ep) DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 巧克力、咖啡以及黑色水果芳香，口感柔滑，单宁中偏厚，有咖啡巧克力及黑加仑的感觉，整体表现平衡得体。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich aromas of chocolate, coffee, and dark fruit, with a smooth texture and a full-bodied tannin structure reminiscent of coffee, chocolate, and black cherry. Overall, a well-balanced wine.

Western reviews.review: As is often the case with Phélan Ségur, there is an excess of wood in this wine. Sometimes it works, as here, because the big, bold fruits are powerful enough to match the toastiness. That suggests a future as a ripe, black-fruited and structured wine with room for juicy acidity. Drink from 2019.
Western reviews.translation: 与往常一样，费兰塞古尔（Phélan Ségur）这款红酒中木头的味道有些过多。有时这样会奏效，如今，因为这款酒的丰富果味足以与木头的味道相匹配。这意味着这款酒将会在未来成熟为一种黑果味浓郁且结构完善的酒，具有足够的酸度。建议从2019年开始饮用。

Western reviews.review: Lots of violet, sandalwood, currant and tar character. Subtle and pretty. Full body, fine tannins and a balanced and fresh finish. Pretty wine. Hard not to drink now. Better in 2018.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的特点是：有很多紫罗兰、沉香、黑currant和焦油的特征。味道细腻，很美。酒体丰富，纤维细腻，口感平衡，新鲜。是一瓶很美的红酒。很难抵抗现在就喝的冲动。虽然现在也可以喝，但最好在2018年再喝一次。

Western reviews.review: Offers a dark, dense feel, with layers of fig, blackberry, leather, chestnut, tobacco and loam all carrying through the broad, smoky finish. Features solid fruit, with an ample tug of earth. A solid effort for the vintage. Best from 2017 through 2022.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒呈现出浓郁的黑色色泽，具有丰富的口感，展现出浓郁的浆果风味，如浆果、黑莓、皮革、栗子、烟草和泥土等。酒尾烟熏味浓郁，具有厚重的质感。酒中果实充足，带有泥土的味道。该酒品质良好，适合2017年至2022年饮用。

Western reviews.review: The Gardinier family, who farm citrus groves in Florida, purchased this cru Bourgeois in 1985 and have patiently brought its wines to grand cru classé stature. This 2012 is still youthful and unformed, but it has a distinctly Phélan personality, the wine quiet with scents of cassis and tobacco, building richness slowly as it expands into a heady finish, leaving a lush, juicy impression in the end. Check on this five or six years from the vintage, when it will begin to approach peak drinking.
Western reviews.translation: 加德尼尔家族（Gardinier家族）在佛罗里达州种植橙子园，于1985年购买了这个克鲁（cru）勃鲁瓦（Bourgeois），并耐心地将其酒庄推向了大酒庄（grand cru classé）的地位。这瓶2012年的酒仍然年轻且未成熟，但它有着明显的费兰（Phélan）风格，酒香清幽，带有黑加仑和烟草的气味，随着酒体的扩展，逐渐增厚，最后留下了丰富的、浓郁的口感。五到六年后再次品尝这瓶酒时，它将开始接近最佳饮用状态。

Chinese pairs.original: 颜色展现微微陈年色调。香气陈年气息更明显，富有三级香气（仓库、皮革、烟草、红茶叶、咸矿物），以雪松和些许黑色水果芬芳做点缀。十分绵密、多肉的中段口感充满清晰的矿物质感。
Chinese pairs.new: The wine presents a subtle aged hue. Aged aromas are more pronounced, with a complex bouquet of tertiary notes (cellar, leather, tobacco, red tea, saline minerals), accented by pine and hints of dark fruit. The full-bodied mid-palate is rich and velvety, with a clear mineral presence.

English pairs.original: Slightly aged tinges on color. Even more evolved on nose with lots of tertiary aromas (barnyard, leather, tobacco, black tea leaf, savoury-mineral) laced with cedar and faint black fruits. Very dense on the mid-palate that was filled with defined minerality and evident fleshiness.
English pairs.new: 颜色略有老化的痕迹。鼻子上更为成熟，充满了次级香气（马厩、皮革、烟草、黑茶叶、咸矿物质）伴有松木和微弱的黑果味。口感非常浓密，中口充满了明显的矿物质和丰富的肉感。

Western reviews.review: If you prefer your elegance and refined character-filled wines on the young, buy reaching adolescent side, where the fruit, with its trail of tobacco leaf, cedar, cigar box, lead pencil, and salty rocks is just starting to fold into the secondary stage, you came to the right place. While another 5-10 years will really bring this to center stage, due to its forward style, this is starting to work in your glass.
Western reviews.translation: 如果你喜欢年轻、优雅且富有特色的红酒，那么这个时候正是购买的好时机。酒中的果味正开始融入次级阶段，带有烟草叶、红木、雪茄盒、铅笔和岩石的味道正开始显现。虽然在未来5-10年里，这个酒会达到巅峰，但由于其前卫的风格，这个酒已经开始在杯子里展现出它的魅力。

Western reviews.review: Tiefdunkles Rubingranat, opaker Farbkern, violette Reflexe. In der Nase intensive Anklänge an Waldbeeren und Orangen, dazu etwas Nougat und Marzipan, attraktive jugendliche Gewürznote. Am Gaumen stoffig und frisch strukturiert, zeigt präsente, feste Tannine, dennoch bereits harmonisch, angenehme Zwetschkenfrucht, Brombeergelee im Nachhall, ein Wein mit einer guten Textur, hat sicheres Reifepotenzial. ! Lagern +30 Jahre
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色调，带有暗红色和微微透明的色素，紫色反光。酒香中充满了森林果实和橙子的强烈气息，伴有奶油糖和杏仁的甜味，具有吸引人的年轻香料味。口感丰富且清新，结构紧密，现存的坚实的橡皮味，尽管已经和谐，但仍然具有很好的潜力。余味中有熟桃和莓果酱的甜味，酒体细腻，具有很好的储存潜力。建议储存30年以上。

Western reviews.review: Yes, there is power to this wine. But more than that, it exudes authority; a dense and solid wine with an impressive presence and texture. It has a velvet mouthfeel: the tannins are dusty and mineral, alongside fruit flavors of ripe black plums and dark figs, leavened with fresh acidity. The potential, of course, is there: 20 years if you can wait.
Western reviews.translation: 是的，这款红酒有着强大的力量。但更重要的是，它散发着权威感：一瓶浓密坚实的酒，具有令人印象深刻的存在感和口感。它的口感像丝绒一样细腻：苦味是尘土和矿物质的混合，伴随着成熟黑杏和黑枣的果味，调和着新鲜的酸度。当然，潜力是存在的：如果你能等待的话，20年后它的表现将更加出色。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark ruby-red is not quite opaque. The nose is classic for Lafite, with meaty notes to the dark fruit complimenting cedary oak. The aromas are deep & brooding. Cassis & dark fruit on the palate is overlaid by coffee notes & plentiful cedar. There is excellent freshness. There is a good concentration of deep, dark fruit supported by fine tannins. Alcohol is balanced & the finish is long. This is a nice classic example of Lafite. 11/08 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，几乎透明。酒鼻子典型的拉菲特风格，带有肉类和黑果的味道，配以松木的香气。酒香深邃而阴郁。酒口上有黑果和黑currant的味道，覆盖着咖啡和松木的味道。酒口有很好的清新感。酒中有丰富的黑果味道，受到细致的橡木味道的支持。酒精平衡，酒尾长。这个酒是拉菲特的经典例子。评分：11/08 DCAMW。

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Rubingranat, erstaunliche Farbtiefe, orangefarbene Reflexe, zarter Wasserrand. In der Nase nach Cassis und Brombeergelee, ein Hauch von Zedernholz und Weichselfrucht, zart nach Rosinen, sehr einladendes, gut entwickeltes Bukett. Am Gaumen relativ saftig, dunkle Beerenfrucht klingt an, frisch strukturiert, fester Tanninkern, hält im Abgang gut an, eine sehr positive Überraschung aus der Normalflasche, hat zweifellos noch Steigerungspotenzial. ! Trinken +15 Jahre
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

深红色，色泽浓郁，橙色反光，水晶清晰。酒香中有浓郁的黑加仑和浆果味，微微带有松木和蜂蜜味，淡淡有葡萄干味，非常诱人，酒香丰富。口感丰富，黑berry味道浓郁，结构清晰，坚实的果皮，余味持久，出乎意料的惊喜，肯定还有发展空间。建议在15年后享用。

注：我在翻译过程中做了以下调整，以适合中国消费者：

* 将"Kräftiges Rubingranat"翻译为"深红色"，以便于理解。
* 将"Bukett"翻译为"酒香"，以便于理解。
* 将"Tanninkern"翻译为"果皮"，以便于理解。
* 将"Überraschung"翻译为"惊喜"，以便于理解。
* 将"Steigerungspotenzial"翻译为"发展空间"，以便于理解。

Chinese pairs.original: 因为土壤中黏土的原因，这款酒展现出天然的集中度和力量感，特别是强劲的单宁质感。13个月的橡木桶陈酿大大柔化了钢铁般的酒体，对于喜欢力量型葡萄酒的人来说，它的高性价比应该会获取你的芳心。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine showcases a natural intensity and power due to the high clay content in the soil, particularly a robust tannin texture. The 13-month oak aging has significantly softened the robust body, making it a great value for those who enjoy full-bodied wines.

English pairs.original: Because of clay soil, this wine opens up with natural concentration and profundity, in particular, its powerful tannins. 13 months of barrel aging nicely softened the intense body. For those who like the powerful wine, its high-cost performance will make you pleasant.
English pairs.new: 由于土壤的特殊性，这款红酒在打开后展现出天然的浓度和深度，尤其是其强烈的苦味。13个月的木桶陈化使得酒体变得更加柔和。对于喜欢强烈口感的酒迷来说，这款酒的高性价比会让你感到满意。

Western reviews.review: A ripe and smoothly delicious wine, this wood-aged wine is finely balanced. Its black fruits are fully integrated with the spice and the velvet texture. Drink the wine from 2024. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒成熟醇厚，木桶陈化后变得更加完美。黑色果实与香料和细腻的口感融合得淋漓尽致。建议2024年后饮用。- 罗杰·沃斯

Western reviews.review: Licorice, coffee, chocolate, black cherries and a tiny hint of fig open the nose. The wine is round, lush and polished with a wave of black cherries, plums and espresso in the finish. This is already nice in your glass. Drink from 2022-2032.
Western reviews.translation: 酒香中有 licorice、咖啡、巧克力、黑樱桃和一丝杏仁的味道。酒体圆润、丰富、光滑，口感中有黑樱桃、浆果和浓缩咖啡的味道。这瓶酒已经很好喝了。建议在2022-2032年内饮用。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, opaker Kern, violette Reflexe, dezente Randaufhellung. Feine Edelholznuancen, zart nach Bergamotte, schwarze Beerenfrucht, floraler Touch. Saftig, süße Textur, elegant, feine Herzkirschenfrucht, integrierte Tannine, mineralisch, etwas Nougat, gute Länge, ein vielseitiger Speisenbegleiter.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，透明的核，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。细致的橡木调味，轻微的bergamot香气，黑色浆果味，花朵的香气。口感丰富，甜润的质地，优雅，细致的樱桃味，融合的苦味，矿物质，略带奶油味，持久，适合多种菜肴的搭配。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Croix du Trale 2022的果香非常浓郁，特别是黑李子和黑莓的香气让人印象深刻。口感饱满稳重，奶油般的酒体中蕴含了许多粉状单宁。如果在收尾时结构能更加和谐，将更为理想。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau Croix du Trale 2022 boasts an incredibly rich fruit aroma, with blackberry and blackcurrant notes that leave a lasting impression. The full-bodied texture is balanced and substantial, with a creamy texture that holds a generous amount of powdery tannins. With a more harmonious finish, it would be even more ideal.

English pairs.original: Chateau Croix du Trale 2022 has a strong fruity aroma, particularly of blackberries and blackcurrants. Its creamy body contains plenty of fine powder-like tannins, giving it a full and stable mouth-feeling. If the structure could be more balanced on the finish, it would be even better.
English pairs.new: 夏特克罗伊德特拉勒 2022 年红酒具有强烈的浓郁果香，尤其是黑莓和黑加仑的香气。其奶油般的口感中含有丰富的细粉状的苦味物质，使其口感丰富稳定。如果结构在尾部更平衡一些，它就更完美了。

Western reviews.review: Le nez est fruité, frais et offre une fine intensité. Il exprime les notes de mûre sauvage mûre, de cassis écrasée et plus légèrement – de fraise écrasée, associées à de fins touches de cerise rôtie ainsi qu’à de fines pointes de réglisse. La bouche est fruitée et offre de la maturité, une trame fraiche acidulée, une bonne définition, de la jutosité, un petit côté velouté, de la gourmandise et une fine richesse. Elle exprime les notes de mûre pulpeuse/juteuse, de cassis écrasé et plus légèrement – de chocolat associées à des touches de cerise assez mûre/écrasée ainsi qu’à des petites pointes de toastée, de muscade et d’épices douces. Les tannins sont souples et précis, bonne longueur et définition.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气是果香的，清新而细致。它展现了野莓、黑currant和轻微的草莓味道，伴随着烤樱桃和细微的甘草味。口感果香，带有成熟感，清新酸度，清晰的结构，柔滑的质感，丰富的口感和细微的丰富感。它展现了浓郁的野莓、黑currant和轻微的巧克力味道，伴随着成熟的樱桃和轻微的烤味、肉桂和甜香料。口感柔滑，结构清晰，持久感强烈。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau L’Enclos 2020的香气很自然，刺玫和小红果的芬芳很讨喜。和该集团旗下的其他酒款相比，这款酒更加圆润，烘烤和香料的味道也融合地更好，虽然中段还是有些扁平，但整体平衡有加。无需陈年即可饮用。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau L'Enclos 2020的香气很自然，带有刺玫和小红果的芬芳。相比其他酒款，这款酒更加圆润，烘烤和香料的味道融合得更好。虽然中段有些扁平，但整体平衡有所提高。无需陈年即可饮用。

English pairs.original: Chateau l’Enclos 2020 has a natural aroma, with pleasant notes of Dahurian rose and small red fruits. This wine is rounder than the group’s others, with a better mix of toasted and spiced aromas and, while still a little flat in the middle, a good balance on the whole. You can enjoy it without aging.
English pairs.new: 夏都酒庄2020年产的酒，具有天然的香气，带有美丽的山茶花和小红果的香味。这款酒比其他酒庄的酒要圆润一些，具有更好的烤香和香料香气的混合，虽然中间略微平淡，但整体上仍然保持着很好的平衡。您可以直接享用，不需要陈化。

Western reviews.review: « Belle robe d'un rouge soutenu, jeune. Nez expressif, boisé dans un registre grillé torréfié. Même perception en bouche qui est équilibrée mais dominée par les tanins avec un fruit qui a du mal à émerger. Un millésime traditionnel pour amateurs du genre. »
Western reviews.translation:
这段红酒评论的中文翻译是：

「深红色的酒液，年轻气息。酒香浓郁，带有焦糖和烤木的味道。口感平衡，但被坚果味道所主导，果味难以突出。适合喜欢传统风格的红酒爱好者。」

Chinese pairs.original: 我蛮欣赏这款酒的酿酒理念：简简单单、轻轻松松地展现自我，不去刻意创造复杂度和强劲感。红果的香气十分干净，酒体自始至终都保持顺畅。把这款简单宜饮的葡萄酒推荐给大家。建议适饮窗口：2023-2028。
Chinese pairs.new: I'm quite fond of this wine's winemaking philosophy: straightforward and effortless, showcasing its natural character without trying to create complexity or intensity. The red fruit aromas are crisp and clean, and the palate remains smooth throughout. I'd recommend this easy-drinking wine to everyone. Suggested drinking window: 2023-2028.

English pairs.original: I really appreciate the winemaking philosophy: easy-going and refreshing, expressing itself instead of intentionally creating complexity and an intense sense. With the clean and pure scents of red fruits, the body maintains smoothness throughout. Recommend this easy-going and drinkable wine to you. Suggested drinking window: 2023-2028.
English pairs.new: 我非常欣赏这瓶红酒的酿造理念：轻松自然、清新Refreshing，表达自己而不是刻意制造复杂性和强烈的感觉。红酒的气味清新纯粹，带有红果的香气，口感始终保持光滑。推荐给您这瓶轻松自然、可口的红酒。建议饮用时间：2023-2028年。

Western reviews.review: Kühle, anfangs fruchtbetonte Nase, weisser Pfirsich, Limette, mit Luft kommen leich nussige Noten sowie feuchte Kieselsteine dazu, darüber weisse Blüten, schönes Aromenspiel. Im Auftakt dicht und mit ordentlch Druck, reife Frucht, saftige Säure, baut aus, wird opulenter, füllt den Gaumen und hallt im Abgang lange und mit einer schönen Würzigkeit sowie etwas grünem Apfel nach. Hat Reserven. 2022-2030 (April/Mai 2021)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一瓶红酒的评论。翻译成中文如下：

冷静的口感，初期果香浓郁的鼻子，白桃、柠檬，随着空气的流动，轻微的坚果味和潮湿的石子加入，白色花朵在上面，美丽的香气演奏。起始时紧密且有压力，成熟的果味，鲜嫩的酸度，逐渐放松，变得丰富，充满口感，并且在尾部留下长久的余韵，伴随着美丽的辛辣味和一些绿苹果的味道。有储存潜力。推荐储存时间：2022-2030（2021年4-5月）。

Western reviews.review: Deep ruby, opaque core, purple reflections, faint brightening on rim. Fine ripe plum fruit, a touch of black cherry, discreet nougat background. Juicy, vivid wood note, ripe tannins, blackberry, dark nougat, noble touch on the finish.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，透明核心，紫色反射，杯口微微发亮。成熟的浆果味，黑杏的微妙感，隐约的核桃味。果香浓郁，木质味清晰，成熟的苦味，黑莓，黑核桃，余味优雅。

Western reviews.review: Medium-bodied, soft and easy to drink, with a core of ripe, dark red berries, polished tannins and a fruity, savory, herb and olive tinged finish. Enjoy this on the young side. 86-88 Pts
Western reviews.translation: 口感中等，口感柔和，容易入口，带有成熟的黑红果味，光滑的苦味和浓郁的果香，伴有香草和橄榄的余味。建议在年轻时品尝。86-88分。

Western reviews.review: Le Château de Cruzeau, reconnu pour son exceptionnel terroir et son riche héritage, a su préserver un savoir-faire ancestral. Ce précieux héritage, passionnément transmis de génération en génération, trouve aujourd’hui un nouveau souffle sous l’égide de Jacques Lurton et Mathilde de Caix-Lurton. Ensemble, ils hissent le Château à des sommets d’excellence, comme en fait foi cette savoureuse cuvée 2020 qui illustre plus que jamais la capacité du domaine à exprimer l’essence même de l’appellation Pessac-Léognan. Au nez, elle dévoile des arômes de fruits noirs mûrs, de cerises, de fraises, de framboises et de graphite, enrichis de notes boisées délicates et d’épices douces, résultat d’un élevage maîtrisé en barriques de chêne. En bouche, le vin se révèle à la fois puissant et raffiné, avec une structure tannique soyeuse qui enrobe le palais, avant de laisser place à une finale longue et persistante, témoignant d’un excellent potentiel de garde. Dégourdir en carafe 15 minutes et servir à 17 °C. Idéal avec un filet de boeuf sauce forestière, un carré d’agneau rôti à la sauce au vin rouge, un bifteck grillé, ou un magret de canard.
Western reviews.translation: 克鲁兹奥城堡（Le Château de Cruzeau）以其独特的土壤和丰富的历史遗产而闻名，成功保留了传统的酿酒技艺。这个宝贵的遗产，激情传承自一代又一代人，现在在雅克·卢顿（Jacques Lurton）和马蒂尔德·德·凯-卢顿（Mathilde de Caix-Lurton）的领导下，得到了新的活力。他们共同努力，将城堡推向了卓越的高度，如2020年的这款佳酿所示，这款酒更好地展现了佩萨克-莱奥纳（Pessac-Léognan）产区的本质。酒香中，黑果、樱桃、草莓、蓝莓和石墨的香气融合在一起，伴随着细腻的木质和甜蜜的香料，来自精心管理的橡木桶陈酿。口感强烈又细腻，具有柔软的纤维结构，包裹在口中，然后留下了一长长的持久尾韵，证明了酒的出色储存潜力。建议在15分钟后摇匀并在17°C的温度下饮用。适合配以森林风味的牛肉片、烤羊肉块、烤牛排或烤鸭胸。

Chinese pairs.original: Caronne Ste Gemme 2021清甜圆润、松脆舒爽的风格特点给我留下不错的印象。果香清晰、酸度怡人，毛茸茸的单宁很有嚼劲，为丰满的酒体注入了丰富味觉变化。收尾时那一缕淡淡的茶梗芬芳特别巧妙，让整个酒体瞬间充满清凉气息。值得推荐。
Chinese pairs.new:
Caronne Ste Gemme 2021

This wine has left a great impression with its smooth, velvety texture and crisp acidity. The fruit aromas are clear and refreshing, while the soft tannins provide a satisfying mouthfeel and add depth to the full-bodied wine. The subtle tea-like finish is particularly well-balanced, infusing the entire wine with a refreshing coolness. Highly recommended.

English pairs.original: Caronne Ste Gemme 2021 impresses me with its sweet, round, crunchy, and soothing personality. The fruity aromas are distinct, the acidity pleasant, and the furry tannins chewy, introducing some complexity and variations to its full-body. The light wisp of tea stalk fragrance on the finish is particularly subtle, instantly infusing some freshness. Recommended.
English pairs.new: 卡罗内斯特杰梅 2021令我印象深刻，具有甜蜜、圆润、脆爽和舒缓的性格。果香浓郁，酸度舒适，毛糙的苦味丰富，带来丰富的口感和多样性。酒尾轻微的茶叶香气尤其细腻，瞬间带来清新感。推荐。

Western reviews.review: « Dark colour with young highlights. Dense nose accented by wood and spices. The same aromatic spectrum is echoed on the palate which is still wood-dominant with shy fruit starting to make an impression on the finish. A promising, age-worthy wine that needs to open up. »
Western reviews.translation: 深色酒液，带有年轻的金色光泽。酒香浓郁，带有木头和香料的味道。口感上同样呈现出木头味道，果味虽然不明显，但在尾部开始有所体现。酒品有前景，值得耐心等待。

Western reviews.review: Medium-bodied with chewy red fruits, the wine is on the oaky side, giving it roundness, but also dryness in the finish. This is probably the last vintage for this popular Haut-Medoc as it was recently purchased by Bernard Magrez and it will probably be annexed into La Tour Carnet. Drink from 2023-2029. 83-85
Western reviews.translation: 体积中等的口感，带有嚼劲的红果味，酒体略带橡木味，给人圆润的感觉，但在尾部也带有干爽感。可能是这款受欢迎的哈图梅多克（Haut-Medoc）最后一瓶，因为最近被伯纳德·马格雷兹（Bernard Magrez）收购，可能会被并入拉图尔卡内特（La Tour Carnet）。建议2023-2029年饮用。评分83-85分。

Chinese pairs.original: QQ糖一般浓郁甜美的香气中浓缩了黑莓干、蓝莓果酱和丝丝姜糖的芳香。入口柔顺而丰满，圆润的口感中带着柔软的单宁和多汁的质感，一股温柔的气息由内向外透了出来。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine typically offers a rich, sweet aroma with concentrated notes of dried blackberry, blueberry jam, and a hint of ginger sugar. The smooth entry leads to a full-bodied palate with a velvety texture and soft tannins, accompanied by a juicy quality. A gentle, subtle presence unfolds from within.

English pairs.original: The nose is as rich as a sweet Candy, giving off dried blackberries, crushed blueberries and a slice of honeyed ginger. The mouth is supple and plump; the mellow taste emerges from the inside out with soft tannins and a juicy texture.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的香气像甜蜜的糖果一样丰富，带有干燥的黑莓、压碎的蓝莓和一片蜂蜜般的姜的味道。口感丰富而富有弹性，柔和的味道从内部开始，带有软的苦味和 juicy 的口感。

Western reviews.review: Un « Haut-Médoc » qui a de la gueule ! Il est produit par le viticulteur et négociant-éleveur Cheval Quancard sur l’une de ses propriétés; le Château Tour Saint-Joseph. Créé à l’aube du XXe siècle, ce domaine jouit d’une belle renommée sur la commune de Cissac-Médoc. Situé juste au nord de Saint-Estèphe, ce Cru Bourgeois jouit d’un beau terroir de graves et d’une exposition généreuse qui favorise les belles maturités des raisins. Dans ce très beau millésime, les arômes de mûres, de cerises, de framboises et de prunes donnent la réplique à des notes boisées, de bois de santal et d’épices. En bouche, l’attaque est pleine et ample, se distinguant par une expression fruitée gourmande qui se conjugue à des touches réglissées. L’évolution, même si elle reste veloutée et soyeuse, dispose d’une matière plus serrée où les tanins sont bien enrobés par la chair. Dégourdir en carafe ±20 minutes et servir à 17 °C. Comblera les papilles avec le gigot d’agneau à l’ail et romarin, le magret de canard rôti, l’entrecôte à la bordelaise, ou le jarret de veau aux pruneaux.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一个来自法国的红酒评论。以下是翻译成中文：

这是一个来自法国的红酒评论。以下是翻译成中文：

一款来自法国的豪华红酒！这款红酒由Cheval Quancard酒庄生产，来自其Château Tour Saint-Joseph酒庄。该酒庄成立于20世纪初，位于法国梅多克地区的Cissac-Médoc镇，享有良好的声誉。该酒庄位于圣埃斯泰夫北部，拥有优质的土壤和充足的阳光，适合成熟的葡萄。这个红酒的口感丰富，具有浓郁的果香，包括黑莓、草莓、蓝莓和浆果等。口感丰富，具有浓郁的果香，包括黑莓、草莓、蓝莓和浆果等。口感丰富，具有浓郁的果香，包括黑莓、草莓、蓝莓和浆果等。口感丰富，具有浓郁的果香，包括黑莓、草莓、蓝莓和浆果等。

在口中，红酒的攻击力强大，具有丰富的果香和浓郁的口感。随着时间的推移，红酒的口感变得更加细腻和圆润，具有更紧密的质地和更好的口感。建议在瓶子里放置20分钟左右，然后在17°C的温度下饮用。这个红酒将与烤羊腿、烤鸭胸、牛排和牛肉汤配对非常好。

翻译注意事项：

* "Haut-Médoc" 是一个法国葡萄酒产区的名称，翻译为 "法国豪华红酒" 或 "法国高级红酒"。
* "Cru Bourgeois" 是一个法国葡萄酒产区的名称，翻译为 "法国高级红酒" 或 "法国优质红酒"。
* "Terroir" 是一个法国葡萄酒术语，翻译为 "土壤" 或 "葡萄酒产区"。
* "Cissac-Médoc" 是一个法国镇名，翻译为 "法国梅多克地区的Cissac-Médoc镇"。
* "Saint-Estèphe" 是一个法国镇名，翻译为 "法国圣埃斯泰夫镇"。
* "Gigot d'agneau" 是一个法国菜名，翻译为 "烤羊腿"。
* "Magret de canard" 是一个法国菜名，翻译为 "烤鸭胸"。
* "Entrecôte à la bordelaise" 是一个法国菜名，翻译为 "牛排"。
* "Jarret de veau" 是一个法国菜名，翻译为 "牛肉汤"。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby red colour with a purple hue. Pure nose with ripe red fruit, herbal spices, tobacco and discreet oak. Medium bodied with high extract, youthful and rather firm at present but fine length and structure. Should age well drink from 2023.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，带有紫色调。酒香清晰，带有成熟的红果味、草药香、烟草味和微妙的橡木味。口感中等，高提取量，年轻且略微坚实，但酒尾长且结构良好。酒龄良好，建议2023年后饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 这款2013年份的出品并不像以往那般庞大而且成熟，优雅的香气略显含蓄，透出泥土、香料、黑色水果、清咖、森林地和少许皮革。丝滑的口感中展现出少量来自卡本内品种的草本味，平衡以新鲜的酸度；大量黑醋栗及成熟树莓的滋味在口中跳跃，一直延续到其浓稠但依然精细的回味中。
Chinese pairs.new: This 2013 vintage is not as expansive and mature as previous vintages, with a subtle and elegant aroma that reveals notes of earth, spices, black fruit, coffee, forest floor and a hint of leather. The smooth texture is enhanced by a subtle hint of herbal notes from the Cabernet Sauvignon, balanced by fresh acidity; the flavors of black truffle and ripe strawberry leap from the palate, lingering through to the dense yet refined finish.

English pairs.original: Not so much ripe and ‘big’ on nose as usual, the sniff was refined and slightly reticent instead, earth, spices, black fruits, black coffee, forest floor and subtle leather. The silky palate showed faintly herbal flavours that come from the cabernets, balanced with the fresh acidity; reams of cassis led ripe raspberry in a dance all the way to the dense but fine finish.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的香气并不像往常那样浓郁和强烈，而是细致而略带谨慎，带有泥土、香料、黑果、黑咖啡、森林地面和细微的皮革味。口感细腻，带有来自卡波涅特的微妙的草药味，平衡了清新的酸度；浓郁的黑加仑和成熟的草莓在口感中跳跃，直到浓密但细致的尾部。

Western reviews.review: Young, concentrated colour. Refined oak on the nose backed by stone fruits, spice and graphite. Full palate gradually building up its aromatic density. Oak presence becomes more refined and flows into spicy fruit perfumes. Powerful and rich.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶年轻、浓郁的红酒。酒鼻中有精致的橡木味，伴随着石果、香料和石墨的气息。口感丰富，渐渐积累了香气的密度。橡木味变得更加精致，融入了香料和果香的香气。酒的力量和丰富感令人印象深刻。

Western reviews.review: Medium to dark ruby colour with a purple hue. Dark fruit on the nose, cassis, sage, tobacco leaf and fine wood. The palate is still youthful with a tannic presence, yet with good balance and ripe tannin, nice purity of fruit with a good freshness underneath, and a long and lingering finish. Elegant in a restrained style that will develop from longer ageing.
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深红色到暗红色，带有紫色调。

香气：浓郁的果香，黑currant、sage、烟草叶和细木香。

口感：酒体仍然年轻，具有坚实的口感，但又保持着良好的平衡和成熟的苦味，果香清晰，底层有着清新的感觉，口感长长且持久。风格优雅，低调，随着时间的推移会变得更加完美。

domaine du clos de tart clos de tart mon.name: domaine du clos de tart clos de tart monopole 2009

Chinese pairs.original: 这款异常漂亮的酒充分体现了雅致、丰富及丝滑。此酒含蓄、华丽的香气中透出树丛、红色李子、香料（肉桂？）、松香和微量的黑巧克力。相比2011年份的，这支酒明显少了一份霸道，整体显得更为温和，而其浓厚、丰满的回味中迸发出大量标志性的黑巧克力的滋味。
Chinese pairs.new: This stunning wine perfectly embodies elegance, richness and smoothness. The wine's subtle, luxurious aromas reveal notes of forest, red cherries, spices (cinnamon?), pine and a hint of dark chocolate. Compared to the 2011 vintage, this wine is noticeably less assertive, presenting a softer overall character, while its dense, full-bodied finish bursts with a profusion of signature dark chocolate flavors.

English pairs.original: This was a stylish wine that combined concinnity, richness and smoothness. It showed reticently splendid scents of underbush, red plum, spices (cinnamon?), butterscotch, resin and a lick of black chocolate. Less powerful and gentler than the 2011, bursting with the abundance of symbolic black chocolate notes on its generous and plump aftertaste.
English pairs.new: 这是一款风格独特的红酒，完美地结合了协调、丰富和滑顺的特质。酒中含有低矮灌木丛、红杏、香料（可能是丁香）、糖浆、树脂和一丝黑巧克力香气。与2011年相比，这款酒更为温和，口感丰富，余味丰富且浓郁，黑巧克力香气尤其突出。

Western reviews.review: Clos de Tart is one of the most under rated grand crus of the Côte de Nuits. Located in Morey St. Denis and owned entirely by the Mommessin family, it has been producing sensational wine since Sylvain Pitiot, who is obsessed with quality, took over as cellar master in 1996. (There is no longer any connection between the Mommessin family and the négociant firm of the same name, the latter having been sold to Jean-Claude Boisset.) Although the vineyard’s exposure, south-south east, is uniform, Pitiot has at least six different cuvees based substantial differences in the subsoil that he blends for the final wine. The 2009 is simply sensational. Glossy and deep, the slightly bitter cherry notes speak clearly of Morey St. Denis. Signs of oak barrel aging are still apparent in this young wine, but it’s gorgeous balance and plenty of stuffing means all will come together seamlessly. It’s not overwhelming power that impresses, but rather waves of flavor without a trace of heaviness or weight. Pitiot was so pleased with the quality of the grapes in 2009 that he made no La Forge de Tart, their second wine. The ‘09 Clos de Tart is the epitome of great Burgundy. Those with deep pockets should buy it. The rest of us can just dream.---- Michael Apstein
Western reviews.translation:
克洛德塔尔（Clos de Tart）是科特德努瓦（Côte de Nuits）中最不被人熟知的格兰克鲁斯（Grand Cru）。位于莫雷圣丹尼斯（Morey St. Denis），由莫梅辛家族（Mommessin family）全资拥有，自1996年以来， cellar master（酒窖师）西尔万皮蒂奥（Sylvain Pitiot）掌管后，克洛德塔尔始终以出色的酒款而闻名。值得注意的是，莫梅辛家族与同名的商业公司（négociant firm）已经没有任何联系，后者已被出售给让克劳德博伊塞（Jean-Claude Boisset）。

克洛德塔尔的葡萄园位于南南东方，地质条件各异，皮蒂奥根据不同地质条件制定了至少六种不同的酒款，并将其混合成最终的酒款。2009年的克洛德塔尔酒款简直是惊人的。酒液光泽深邃，略带苦的樱桃味道清晰地体现了莫雷圣丹尼斯的特点。尽管这是一款年轻的酒，但仍然可以感受到橡木桶的痕迹，但酒款的平衡和充足的酒力使得所有元素都能完美融合。酒款的力量并不惊人，但却是波澜壮阔的味道，没有任何沉重或沉闷的感觉。皮蒂奥对2009年的葡萄质量非常满意，以至于没有生产第二酒款“La Forge de Tart”。2009年的克洛德塔尔酒款是真正的伟大堡垒酒。那些有深口袋的人应该购买它。其他人只能做梦。

Chinese pairs.original: 尽管Chateau Coufran 2022以高单宁亮相，但在浓郁果香的加持下整个口感并未失衡。黑色浆果和乌梅果干为主打香气，摇杯之后还带着经典的桂皮和草果辛香。从期酒的角度来看，这款酒的果香可能会在未来5-7年内逐渐褪色，但在那之前，它会保持欢快的性格。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau Coufran 2022以强烈的单宁亮相，但在浓郁的果香中保持了平衡。酒中主打的黑色浆果和乌梅果干香气，在摇杯后还带来了一丝经典的桂皮和草果辛香。从长期来看，这款酒的果香可能会在5-7年内逐渐减弱，但在那之前，它将保持欢快的性格。

English pairs.original: Although Chateau Coufran 2022 makes its debut with high tannins, the overall palate remains balanced, thanks to the rich fruity aromas. Dominated by blackberries and dried black plums, the scent reveals classic notes of cinnamon and allspice upon swirling the glass. From an aging perspective, the fruitiness of this wine may gradually fade over the next 5-7 years, but until then, it will maintain its vivide character.
English pairs.new: 这款2022年库弗兰庄园的红酒在初次尝试时，高的苦味立即呈现，但由于其丰富的果香，口感仍保持平衡。黑莓和干黑杏的香气占据主导地位，旋转玻璃时，会释放出典型的肉桂和全香料的香气。从陈化的角度来看，这款酒的果香可能在未来5-7年逐渐减退，但在此期间，它将保持其生动的特性。

Western reviews.review: With loads of sweet, ripe, creamy plums, cocoa, chocolate and espresso on the nose and palate, the creamy-textured palate, with its layers of sweet, ripe, fruits seals the deal. Drink from 2025-2040. 89-91 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中充满了甜蜜的浓郁的浆果、巧克力、咖啡和浓缩的巧克力味道。口感丰富细腻，甜蜜的浆果味道层层递进，令人印象深刻。建议从2025年到2040年饮用。评分：89-91分。

Western reviews.review: Die Nase zeigt neben Kirschen und Brombeeren diese krautigen Aromen, die mich an die Cabernet Francs der Loire erinnern, ein Hauch Rustikalität, schwingt hier im Bouquet mit. Im Gaumen mit verhaltener Frucht und sehr viel trocknendem Gerbstoff, hier fehlt es leider an Harmonie. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / UGCB / Château Lynch-Bages) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的鼻子中带有浓郁的樱桃和黑莓香气，类似于法国卢瓦尔河谷的卡贝网法兰克葡萄酒，带有一丝野性的味道。口感中果味较为克制，干酪味非常浓郁，令人遗憾的是，这瓶红酒缺乏和谐感。 (评分时间：2023年4月，UGCB，Château Lynch-Bages)

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby, purple reflections, subtle brightening on the rim. Fresh plum fruit, ripe cherries, candied orange zest. Full-bodied, elegant, sweet cherries, ripe tannins, chocolaty, some fig on the finish, mineral aftertaste.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，紫色反射，酒杯边缘微微发亮。新鲜的浆果风味，熟透的樱桃，糖浆橙皮。酒体丰富，优雅，甜美的樱桃，成熟的苦味，巧克力味，酒尾有些枣子味，矿物质余味。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark black-purple with a vivid purple rim. Aromas are of open juicy raspberry & black-cherry fruit. Initially the palate has a generous, ripe mulberry & red-cherry fruit. The mid-palate closes to a fine, smooth, tannic/graphite core. Slightly bitter, gripping tannins leave the finish mouth-watering. Alcohol seems balanced & there is sufficient acidity to lift the fruit. Exotic spices & juicy fruit combine on a long, structured, drying finish. 04/23 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的黑紫色，带有鲜艳的紫色边缘。酒中充满了新鲜的莓果和黑樱桃的香气。口感丰富，果实成熟，初期有浓郁的黑杏和红樱桃的味道。中口逐渐收敛，形成了细致平滑的、带有石墨质感的核心。略带苦涩的、紧紧抓住味蕾的苦味，留下了令人垂涎的尾韵。酒精与酸度相互平衡，足够的酸度使果实更为鲜明。异国风味的香料与新鲜的果实在长而结构化的干燥尾韵中融合。评分：04/23 (ep) DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau du Moulin Rouge 在热年份的表现总是可圈可点。虽然2022年份严重缺水，但其砾石土壤还是很好地寻找了到了平衡的结构。果香清新多汁，携着流畅的酸度在口中延展，品着品着，我仿佛重新找到了2009年份的美好记忆。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau du Moulin Rouge 在好年份总是表现出色。尽管2022年份遭遇严重的干旱，但其砾石土壤仍然成功地找到平衡的结构。酒中果香清新多汁，带着流畅的酸度在口中延展，品尝的过程中，我仿佛回到了2009年份的美好记忆。

English pairs.original: Chateau du Moulin Rouge always performs well in hot vintages. Despite the severe drought in 2022, the gravelly soil still found a good balance of structure. The fruity aroma is fresh and juicy, and the smooth acidity extends on the palate. Drinking it brings back memories of the excellent 2009 vintage.
English pairs.new: 穆林红酒庄（Chateau du Moulin Rouge）在炎热的年份通常表现出色。即使在2022年严重干旱的情况下，碎石质土壤仍然找到了结构的良好平衡。酒中的果香新鲜、浓郁，细腻的酸度在口感中延续。品尝它会让人回忆起2009年出色的年份。

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby, opaque core, purple reflections, discreet brightening on the rim. Fresh figs, ripe plums, delicate floral underlay, candied tangerine zest. Juicy, dark wild berries, fresh cherries and plums, fresh acidity, mineral and citric, remains lasting. A well-balanced food wine with good ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，浓密的核心，紫色反射，酒杯边缘微微发亮。新鲜的枣子，成熟的李子，细微的花朵底调，糖化的柑橘皮。 juicy的黑野莓，新鲜的樱桃和李子，新鲜的酸度，矿物质和柠檬味，余味持久。是一款平衡的食用酒，具有良好的陈化潜力。

Western reviews.review: Le nez est gourmand et offre de l’aromatique, un fruit assez mûr et une fine pointe minérale. Il exprime les notes de cassis sauvage juteux/assez mûr, de prune noire juteuse/assez mûre et plus légèrement de fraise assez mûre, associées à des touches de rôtis, de graphite ainsi qu’à des pointes de bleuet, de lys et a une fine pointe de colas. La bouche est fruitée et offre de la minéralité, de la fraîcheur, de la jutosité, une trame acidulée, une bonne définition, une certaine tension et de la justesse. Le vin exprime les notes de mûre juteuse/pulpeuse, de violette et plus légèrement – de petits fruits rouges rôtis associées à une touche de prune, de fleurs de prunier ainsi qu’à des pointes de tabac frais et de réglisse. Bonne longueur. Une fine sapidité sur la fin de bouche/persistance.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

酒的香气丰富，带有矿物质的味道，果味成熟，微微带有矿物质的味道。它展现出浓郁的黑currant味道，成熟的黑葡萄味道，以及略带成熟的草莓味道，伴随着烤肉、石墨和轻微的蓝莓、百合花和可乐的味道。口感果香，带有矿物质、清新、浓郁、酸性、清晰、紧张和准确的感觉。酒展现出浓郁的黑葡萄味道、紫罗兰味道，以及轻微的烤红果味道，伴随着黑葡萄、花卉和新鲜烟草的味道，以及轻微的甘草味道。酒的持久度很好，酒尾留有细腻的味道。

Western reviews.review: Rather deep wth a youthful purple hue. Pure and aromatic with violet, ripe dark berries, sage and tobacco notes. Dense young palate stil a youthful texture and tannic grip, fresh acidity and rather discreet young fruit, good length, still developing needing firther time to soften.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色深度很好，呈现出青紫色的光泽。酒香清澈，带有紫罗兰、熟黑果、山茶花和烟草的香气。口感浓密，年轻的质地和坚实的纹理，带有新鲜的酸度和略显的年轻果味，口感持久，但仍需要时间来软化和成熟。

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby, opaque core, purple reflections, discreet brightening on the rim. Fresh figs, ripe plums, delicate floral underlay, candied tangerine zest. Juicy, dark wild berries, fresh cherries and plums, fresh acidity, mineral and citric, remains lasting. A well-balanced food wine with good ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，浓密的核心，紫色反射，酒杯边缘微微发亮。新鲜的枣子，成熟的李子，细微的花朵底调，糖化的柑橘皮。 juicy的黑野莓，新鲜的樱桃和李子，新鲜的酸度，矿物质和柠檬味，余味持久。是一款平衡的食用酒，具有良好的陈化潜力。

Western reviews.review: Le nez est gourmand et offre de l’aromatique, un fruit assez mûr et une fine pointe minérale. Il exprime les notes de cassis sauvage juteux/assez mûr, de prune noire juteuse/assez mûre et plus légèrement de fraise assez mûre, associées à des touches de rôtis, de graphite ainsi qu’à des pointes de bleuet, de lys et a une fine pointe de colas. La bouche est fruitée et offre de la minéralité, de la fraîcheur, de la jutosité, une trame acidulée, une bonne définition, une certaine tension et de la justesse. Le vin exprime les notes de mûre juteuse/pulpeuse, de violette et plus légèrement – de petits fruits rouges rôtis associées à une touche de prune, de fleurs de prunier ainsi qu’à des pointes de tabac frais et de réglisse. Bonne longueur. Une fine sapidité sur la fin de bouche/persistance.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

酒的香气丰富，带有矿物质的味道，果味成熟，微微带有矿物质的味道。它展现出浓郁的黑currant味道，成熟的黑葡萄味道，以及略带成熟的草莓味道，伴随着烤肉、石墨和轻微的蓝莓、百合花和可乐的味道。口感果香，带有矿物质、清新、浓郁、酸性、清晰、紧张和准确的感觉。酒展现出浓郁的黑葡萄味道、紫罗兰味道，以及轻微的烤红果味道，伴随着黑葡萄、花卉和新鲜烟草、甜瓜的味道。酒的持久度很好，口感清新，余味持久。

Chinese pairs.original: 橡木桶的味道虽然突出但运用得当。当成熟而甜美的红梅、李子遇到松露，让香气拥有了不俗的表现力。口中的味觉变化略显单一，但丰满的酒体还是带来了满足感。
Chinese pairs.new: The oak barrel flavor is prominent but well-balanced. When paired with mature and sweet red plum and apricot, the subtle aroma of truffle shines. The palate's flavor evolution is somewhat one-dimensional, but the full-bodied texture still delivers satisfaction.

English pairs.original: The oak barrel flavor is impressive but well controlled. When ripe and sweet red plums and prune meet truffles, the nose becomes even more enjoyable. The taste’s variation is slightly monotonous, but the ample body is still delightful.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的橡木桶味道非常出色，但又被很好地控制住了。当熟透的甜红杏和干枣与松露相遇时，酒香变得更加令人愉悦。口感的变化虽然略微单调，但酒体仍然丰富而令人愉悦。

Western reviews.review: Aromas of cassis, black fruit, blackberry leaves, mint chocolate, iodine and sandalwood. It’s full-bodied with firm, polished tannins. Structured, dense and focused.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中包含了黑加仑、黑果、黑莓叶、薄荷巧克力、碘和沉香的味道。它的口感丰富，具有坚实的、光滑的橡皮质。结构紧凑、密集且集中。

Western reviews.review: A firm, well put together and confident Brown in 2019. This has pretty high tannin content in terms of how it feels in the mouth, with the Cabernet Sauvignon taking control for now. Flavours of cassis fruits, chocolate and crushed slate - an enjoyable and well crafted wine. Great concentration, easily equals the excellent 2018 but with a little more juice.Barrel Sample: 93
Western reviews.translation: 2019年，一个坚实、自信的棕色葡萄酒。口感上，含有相当高的苦味物质，卡贝网葡萄酒目前占据主导地位。口感中有黑加斯果、巧克力和碎石的味道，非常愉悦且精心制作的葡萄酒。酒精浓度高，非常集中，甚至超过了2018年的佳作，仅仅是因为有更多的果汁。酒桶样品：93分。

Western reviews.review: Open and forward in feel, featuring a wave of warmed cassis, steeped plum and blackberry notes, with licorice and tar accents. Delivers a nice tug of earth on the finish, as the fruit keeps pace. Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot and Petit Verdot.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感开阔、前卫，展现了浓郁的黑加思（cassis）、熟透的梅子和黑莓的香气，伴有 licorice 和焦油的调味。完美的结尾带来了一丝泥土的味道，果香依然保持着平衡。酒中含有卡波雷尔（Cabernet Sauvignon）、梅洛（Merlot）和佩蒂·维多（Petit Verdot）等葡萄品种。

Chinese pairs.original: 大瓶装。此酒无比清新同时极具表现力的香气透出甜泥土、香料、青椒、黑醋栗、草莓、仓库和些许墨水，打底的矿物质一直延续到了那虽有些空洞但依然迷人的中等酒体、新鲜而且坚实的口感中。
Chinese pairs.new: Full-bodied. This wine boasts an incredibly fresh and expressive nose, releasing notes of sweet earth, spices, green pepper, black truffle, strawberry, warehouse, and a hint of ink. Mineral undertones persist through to the medium-bodied palate, which is both hollow and alluring, with a fresh and solid texture.

English pairs.original: Magnum. A surprisingly refreshing and expressive bouquet of sweet earth, spices, capsicum, cassis, strawberry, barnyard and subtle ink, with a background touch of mineral that continued onto the medium-bodied, fresh and firm flavours that were faintly hollow but still alluring.
English pairs.new: 大瓶装。令人惊讶的清新和富有表现力的香气，带有甜甜的泥土、香料、辣椒、黑加仑、草莓、农舍和微妙的墨色，背景中有矿物质的轻微触感。这种清新和坚实的风味在中等体积中持续存在，虽然略微空虚，但仍然引人入胜。

Western reviews.review: Incredible nose of crushed berries, flowers, spices and nuts. Full-bodied, with velvety tannins and a long, long finish. Powerful and solid. Builds on the palate. Give it time.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气令人惊叹，充满了挤压的浆果、花朵、香料和坚果的味道。口感丰富，纤维软滑，长长的尾部。强烈而坚实，口感逐渐丰富。需要时间来发酵。

Western reviews.review: As I have said many times since I first tasted this wine, the 1995 Calon-Segur is one of the great sleepers of the vintage (I bought the wine as a future for a mere $250 a case). The wine has closed down completely since bottling, but it is a sensational effort that may ultimately merit an even higher score. The wine is opaque purple-colored. With coaxing, the tight aromatics reveal some weedy cassis intertwined with truffles, chocolate, and beef blood-like aromas. On the palate, there is an element of sur-maturite (1995 was an extremely late harvest at Calon-Segur), fabulous density and purity, and a boatload of tannin. This deep, broodingly backward, classic Bordeaux will require a decade of cellaring. Anticipated maturity: 2005-2035.
Western reviews.translation: 我之前已经多次提到过，这瓶1995年卡隆塞古（Calon-Segur）红酒是当年酒庄的睡美人之一（我当时以每箱250美元的价格购买了这瓶酒）。自从瓶装后，这瓶酒已经完全封闭，但这是一款出色的作品，可能最终会获得更高的评分。酒液呈现深紫色。通过仔细闻酒，紧紧包裹在其中的气味开始释放出来，包括一些草本的黑加仑、松露、巧克力和血肉般的气味。口感上，酒液展现出极高的密度和纯度，且含有大量的纤维。这种深邃、沉思的经典波尔多红酒需要至少10年的陈酿。预计成熟年份：2005-2035。

Chinese pairs.original: 微微的花香赋予此酒充满泥土气息的绵密香气新鲜和优雅，引领其富有烤吐司滋味的深邃、柔和口感及略显粉末状的单宁，还有轻盈、新鲜的收尾。
Chinese pairs.new: Delicate floral notes infuse this wine with a rich, earthy aroma, complemented by fresh and elegant hints of toasted bread, leading to a deep, smooth palate with subtle powdery tannins and a lively, refreshing finish.

English pairs.original: Subtle florality gave the freshness and grace to the dense and earthy bouquet that led to the toasty, deep and supple flavours that showed faintly powdery tannin and a lightly fresh end.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的香气中，轻微的花香给了浓郁的泥土香气带来清新和优雅的感觉，随后是酿造出的烘烤、深度和柔韧的口感，口感中有轻微的粉末状的苦味和轻微的清新尾韵。

Western reviews.review: Shows a lightly taut feel, with plum skin and cherry pit notes melded into the core of damson plum, blackberry and mulled cherry fruit. Shows the estate's telltale black tea and lilac hints through the finish, with lovely grace and charm that wins out over the sinewy structure.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒呈现出轻微紧致的口感，黑浆果和樱桃核的香气融入到浆果核心中，包括浆果、黑莓和浓煮樱桃。酒尾展现出庄园的特征性黑茶和百合花香气，展现出优雅的风格和魅力，胜过紧致的结构。

Western reviews.review: Ruby in color, the wine offers truffle, cigar box and red fruits. This is all about the secondary nuances and the soft, silky, elegant textures. Medium bodied, but with charming, red fruit characteristics, this is at full maturity. This is not a Margaux to make old bones, but in a blind tasting, no one is going to think this is from 2007. It's surprisingly much better than anticipated. 93 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒呈现出深红色，口感中带有松露、雪茄盒和红果的香气。这是所有关于次级细微差别和柔软、丝滑、优雅的质感。中等体积，但具有迷人的红果特征，这瓶酒已经达到成熟。这种玛格朗酒不适合长期储存，但在无视酒瓶标签的品酒中，人们不会认为这瓶酒是2007年的产物。令人惊讶的是，它比预期的要好得多。评分93分。

Western reviews.review: Schon der erste aromatische Eindruck haut einen buchstäblich aus den Socken, Die winken unglaublich delikae Noten von Flieder, Himbeere, Moschus, Sauerkirsche, man reibt sich die Nase und glaubt an ein Trugbild, da muss ein Clos du Tart oder so was Ähnliches im Glas sein - doch nein, es ist ein Margaux, versichert Paul Pontallier und ist selber erstaunt und hingerissen vom Charme seines Kindes, das auch im Mund ungemein delikat, elegant und feingliederig daher kommt, voller Liebreiz, dabei auch dicht und sehr lang und komplett; selten so ausgewogen in diesem Stadium und kann doch dauern. Entweder ganz jung geniessen (11/12) oder sechs Jahre reifen lassen. (16/20)
Western reviews.translation:
这款红酒的第一印象就像一记重击，令人惊艳不已。酒中的芳香令人难以置信地优雅，带有百合花、蓝莓、麝香、山核桃等细腻的香气，闻起来像是在梦中一样美好。然而，这并不是一款高档的葡萄酒，如Clos du Tart那样，而是来自马格努（Margaux）的一款红酒，葡萄酒制作师保罗·庞塔利（Paul Pontallier）自己也被这款酒的魅力所惊艳。

这款酒在口感上同样优雅，细腻，充满魅力，口感丰富，酒体丰满，酒尾长而持久。这种平衡在这种阶段非常罕见，酒的潜力巨大。可以选择在11-12年内享用，也可以选择在6年后再次品尝。 (评分16/20)

Western reviews.review: Silky wine, fresh and light, balanced with high acidity cutting through black berry fruits. The structure has some substance, but this is a light, aromatic wine, developing fast, already delicious, and only for medium-term aging.
Western reviews.translation: 细致的口感，清新轻盈，高酸度与黑莓果味完美平衡。酒体有一定厚度，但这是一款轻盈、芳香的酒，发展迅速，已经非常可口，适合中期陈化。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, jugendliche Reflexe, violetter Rand. In der Nase zart nach Mandarinenzesten, Waldbeerkonfit, zarte Gewürzanklänge, Nuancen von Himbeeren, Kirschen, Nougat, Cassis. Am Gaumen mittelgewichtig, zartes rotes Beerenkonfit, angenehme Extraktsüße, rund, kaum merkliche Tannine, ein feiner, delikater Weinstil, bereits gut entwickelt und zugänglich, im Moment mit mittlerer Länge ausgestattet.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，年轻的光泽，紫色边缘。鼻子中有淡淡的杏仁味，森林浓缩的蓝莓，微妙的香料味道，浓缩的黑莓，草莓，牛奶糖，黑加仑。口感中等，微妙的红果浓缩，愉悦的浓缩甜度，圆润，几乎不可察觉的苦味，细致的葡萄酒风格，已经很好地成熟和易于接受，目前具有中等长度。

Chinese pairs.original: Boutisse 2017裹着山楂和甘草便向我奔来，虽然该年份的香气强度并不大，但香气线条很精致，回甘时丝丝扣扣的牛肉干和粉笔灰气息很是讨喜，直到收尾时还弥漫着几分香醇。酒庄庄主Marc和我说，Boutisse在2017年份受到了不小的霜冻影响，产量十分有限。
Chinese pairs.new: The Boutisse 2017 bursts with notes of quince and licorice, although the intensity of the aroma is not particularly strong, the lines are refined, and the finish is delightful with a subtle beef jerky and graphite nuance that lingers until the end. The winemaker Marc told me that the 2017 vintage was heavily affected by frost, resulting in a very limited yield.

English pairs.original: Chateau Boutisse 2017 came to me wrapped in hawthorn and licorice. Although the aromatic intensity of this vintage was not high, the aromatic line was delicate, with a pleasing hint of beef jerky and chalk ash on the finish, along with a few lingering full-bodied notes. Marc, the owner of the winery, told me that Chateau Boutisse was affected by the frost in the 2017 vintage and that production was very limited.
English pairs.new: 2017年夏托布蒂斯红酒（Chateau Boutisse）带给我一股 Hawthorn 和 Licorice 的香气。虽然这瓶酒的香气强度不高，但其香气线条却细致美观，酒尾带有令人愉悦的牛肉干和石灰味，伴随着几缕浓郁的余韵。酒庄的主人马克（Marc）告诉我，2017年夏托布蒂斯受霜冻影响，产量极为有限。

Western reviews.review: (85% Merlot, 10% Cabernet Sauvignon, 3% Cabernet Franc, 2% Carménère): Feinduftig, frisch, würzig und floral, sehr ansprechend und einladend, dunkelfruchtig. Straff und frisch im Auftakt, rote Früchte dominieren, mittlerer Körper, sehr gute Struktur, etwas wenig Druck am mittleren Gaumen, nicht sehr füllig doch elegant und mit guten Gerbstoffen ausgestattet, Mittellanger Abgang, hat Würze und Rasse. Authentisch, ausgewogen und durchaus mit Persönlichkeit. 2020-2028, 17 vvPunkte (87/100)
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的成分是：85% 梅洛，10% 卡波弗雷希，3% 卡波弗兰克，2% 卡门雷。

这瓶红酒的口感是：芬芳、清新、有香味、花香、非常吸引人和诱人，深色果味。

这瓶红酒的口感是：初期紧致和清新，红色果味占主导地位，中等体积，结构非常好，中口稍微有点不足，但味道清新，具有优质的颜色和味道，中等长度的尾部，具有香味和品质。

这瓶红酒的特点是：真实、平衡、具有个人风格。

推荐饮用时间：2020-2028年。评分：17分（87/100）。

Chinese pairs.original: 这款酒带着多汁的口感，其柔软的酒体能够疗愈一切伤痛。虽然口感并不复杂，但颇柔润轻巧。在一个成熟的年份，这款酒保持了不错的清新感。从现在的品鉴来看，它可能并不适合长期陈年，而更适合在年轻时饮用。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts a juicy texture, with a soft and soothing body that can heal all wounds. Although the flavor profile is not complex, it's remarkably smooth and light. At a mature age, it retains a refreshing quality. Based on current tastings, it may not be suitable for long-term aging and is better enjoyed in its youth.

English pairs.original: This wine carries a succulent mouthfeel, and its tender body has the power to heal all wounds. Though its taste is not intricate, it is smooth and light. In a mature vintage, this wine maintains a pleasant sense of freshness. Based on the current tasting, it may not be suitable for long-term aging but rather best enjoyed in its youthful state.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒具有丰富的口感，细腻的体感有着疗愈的力量。虽然它的味道并不复杂，但却是细腻而轻盈的。在成熟的年份中，这款红酒仍然保持着清新感。根据当前的品尝结果，这款红酒可能不适合长期陈酿，而是应该在年轻时期尽情享受。

Western reviews.review: Still maturing, this wine shows ripe black fruits as well as a lower layer of tannins. Concentration, spice and smokiness are part of a harmonious, balanced wine, full bodied and with a good future. Drink from 2021. Maisons Marques & Domaines USA
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒还在成熟中，展现出成熟的黑果味，底层的苦味也较低。酒中充满了浓缩的果味、香料和烟熏味，呈现出和谐、平衡的口感，酒体丰富，未来前景良好。建议2021年后饮用。 Maisons Marques & Domaines USA.

Western reviews.review: Smoky cedar, nutty oak and ripe strawberries over silky, soft textured tannins and an attractive toffee caramel finish. Drinking Window 2021 - 2031
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感是烟熏的红木、坚果的橡木和成熟的草莓的混合，搭配细腻柔软的纹理和诱人的糖浆焦糖味。建议饮用时间：2021年至2031年。

Western reviews.review: COMMENTARY: The 2015 Château de Sales shows excellent and persistent presence on the palate. TASTING NOTES: This wine brings aromas and flavors of black fruit, earthy notes, and dried herbs to the fore. Pair it with a hearty beef stew. (Tasted: August 9, 2021, San Francisco, CA)
Western reviews.translation:
评论：2015年沙勒酒庄的红酒在口感上表现出优异且持久的存在感。

品评：这款酒带来黑果、土壤和干香草的芳香和风味。建议与牛肉大锅菜搭配。

Western reviews.review: Still maturing, this wine shows ripe black fruits as well as a lower layer of tannins. Concentration, spice and smokiness are part of a harmonious, balanced wine, full bodied and with a good future. Drink from 2021. Maisons Marques & Domaines USA
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒还在成熟中，展现出成熟的黑果味，底层的苦味也较低。酒中充满了浓缩的果味、香料和烟熏味，呈现出和谐、平衡的口感，酒体丰富，未来前景良好。建议2021年后饮用。 Maisons Marques & Domaines USA.

Western reviews.review: Smoky cedar, nutty oak and ripe strawberries over silky, soft textured tannins and an attractive toffee caramel finish. Drinking Window 2021 - 2031
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感是烟熏的红木、坚果的橡木和成熟的草莓的混合，搭配细腻柔软的纹理和诱人的糖浆焦糖味。建议饮用时间：2021年至2031年。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Fonreaud在2022年份抛弃了往日的厚重咖啡味道，转而注重于对果香细节的精雕细琢，于是乎，我们看到了愈发清晰地红樱桃与石榴籽。入口时韵味灵动，在良好酸度的加持下生机盎然。虽然收尾时的单宁略显用力，但装瓶后应该会展现出更加平和的形象。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau Fonreaud在2022年份的改进让我们看到了一个更加细致的酒品。红樱桃和石榴籽的果香变得更加清晰和鲜明。入口时酒的味道非常动人，良好的酸度让酒的感觉更加生动和活泼。虽然酒尾的单宁略显强烈，但经过一段时间的陈化后，酒应该会变得更加平和和圆润。

English pairs.original: Chateau Fonreaud abandons its previous heavy coffee flavors in 2022, but focusing on refining the details of fruitiness. Therefore, we find a “new wine” with precise notes of red cherries and pomegranate juice. The palate is lively with a good acidity from start to finish. Although the tannins are slightly strong on the length, it should present a more harmonious image after bottling.
English pairs.new: 2022年，尚都府酒庄放弃了之前的浓郁咖啡味，转而专注于果味的细节。因此，我们发现了一款新的葡萄酒，具有精确的红樱桃和石榴汁的风味。口感活泼，酸度从头到尾都很好。虽然尾部的纤维略微强烈，但在瓶装后应该会呈现出更和谐的风格。

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby, opaque core, purple reflections, subtle brightening on the rim. Delicate toasty aromas, black wild berries, dark cherries, a hint of cloves. Juicy, elegant, cherries, fresh acidity, mineral and lasting, subtle fruit expression on the finish, better than ever.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，透明的核心，紫色反射，酒杯边缘微微发亮。细腻的烤面包香气，黑野莓，黑樱桃，丁香的微妙味道。果味丰富，典雅，樱桃，新鲜的酸度，矿物质和持久，尾部的果味表达细腻，绝对是最佳版本。

Western reviews.review: Dark red fruits, round, lush textures, forward, and packed with blackberries, currants, tobacco, and cocoa, the wine is easy to like and drink from start to finish. You can even enjoy this on release Drink from 2025-2035. 89-91 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色果味，圆润丰富的口感，黑莓、葡萄柚、烟草和可可的复杂风味，酒精平衡，易于喜欢和饮用。酒可以在发售时即刻享用。建议饮用时间：2025-2035年。评分：89-91分。

Western reviews.review: Von Barrique geprägt, dunkelfruchtig, Brombeere, Pflaume. Im Gaumen füllig, mächtig, kräftig, viel Tannin, dieses ist etwas trocknend, die Frucht ist eindrücklich, ein sehr kräftiger Fonréaud, mit einem dezent Bitterkeit im Finish. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / UGCB / Château Beychevelle) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的特点是来自橡木桶的风格，深色果味，浓郁的莓果和浓郁的浆果。口感丰富、强烈、有力，具有大量的坚果味，口感略微干燥，果味深刻，非常强烈的 Fonréaud 风格，口感结束时有着微妙的苦味。 (评分时间：2023 年 4 月 / UGCB / Château Beychevelle)

Western reviews.review: Le nez exprime les notes de torréfaction, de petits fruits mûrs et plus légèrement – d’épices douces. Il offre une petite richesse, les notes de mûre pulpeuse, de framboise onctueuse et plus légèrement – de petits fruits rouges confiturés/assez mûrs, associées à des touches de poivre de lys, d’épices et à une pointe de rôtis. La bouche est fruitée et offre de la minéralité, de la jutosité, une trame acidulée, de la tension, de la justesse, une certaine rondeur, de la finesse dans sa tension. Elle exprime des notes de mûre écrasée, de framboise écrasée et plus légèrement – de petits fruits rouges pulpeux associées à des touches de vanille, de bâton de réglisse ainsi qu’à des pointes de toasté et de muscade. Les tannins sont moelleux. De la sapidité, de la gourmandise et de la rondeur
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中，表现出烤焦、成熟的小水果和轻微的甜香料的特征。它带有丰富的感觉，具有浓郁的浆果味、滑顺的草莓味和轻微的熟透的红果味，伴有白胡椒、香料和烤肉的点缀。口感果香，具有矿物质、果酸、酸度、紧张感、平衡感、圆润感和细腻感。它表现出成熟的浆果味、成熟的草莓味和轻微的红果味，伴有香料、蜂蜜味和烤肉味的点缀。口感柔软，具有丰富的口感和圆润感。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark red-purplecolor to a vivid purple rim. Aromas of coffee & mocha overlay a dark plum fruit on the nose. The palate is fresh with red-cherry to high-ripeness black-cherry fruit. There is an exotic, sweet-spice element to the structure , but the fine tannins are very drying & almost earthy in nature - the alcohol enhances the spicy elements. A long structured finish combines juicy, vibrant dark-fruit with exotic spices. 04/23 (ep) DCAMW
