Western reviews.translation: 深度的紫红色，酒液边缘呈现出鲜艳的紫色。鼻子上弥漫着咖啡和摩卡的香气，覆盖着黑浆果的气味。口感清新，红果和成熟黑果的风味相互融合。酒体结构中有着异国情调的甜香料元素，但细致的橡皮质非常干燥，接近土味。酒精增强了香料元素。酒尾结构长而完美，融合了鲜美的浓果和异国情调的香料。评分：04/23 (ep) DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 颇为有趣，在炎热的2022年份，Chateau La Rousselle却展现出水晶果冻般的清新口感，着实招人喜欢。石灰岩高地的粉末单宁巧妙地延续了回味，若能增添更多的果香表达，这款酒定会更加优秀。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine is quite intriguing, offering a refreshing crystal-like taste in the hot 2022 vintage. The limestone highlands' powdery tannins linger nicely, and with even more fruit expression, this wine would be truly exceptional.

English pairs.original: Interestingly, Chateau La Rousselle showed a refreshing and crystal-like texture in the hot 2022 vintage, which was quite enjoyable. The limestone terroir provided delicate tannins that lingered on the finish, but the wine could benefit from more fruit expression to enhance its overall excellence.
English pairs.new: 值得注意的是，2022年酿出的佳堡拉鲁塞尔（Chateau La Rousselle）红酒展现出清新、晶莹的口感，非常令人愉悦。该酒庄的石灰质土壤为酒液带来了细腻的苦味，余味持久，但酒液仍需要更多的果实风味来提升整体的品质。

Western reviews.review: Licorice, flowers and spice with black raspberries and plums fill up the nose and palate here. The wine is supple, medium-bodied, fresh and sweet, with accents of chocolate, licorice, and espresso. The wine blends 60% Merlot with 40% Cabernet Franc. 14.5% ABV. Drink from 2025-2035. 90-92 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中充满了 licorice、花朵和香料的味道，伴随着黑莓和浆果的味道。口感丰富，中等体积，新鲜甜美，带有巧克力、 licorice 和咖啡的味道。该酒的混合比例为 60% 美丽托和 40% 卡波弗朗克。酒精度为 14.5%。建议在 2025-2035 年饮用。评分 90-92 分。

Western reviews.review: Le nez est élégant, racé et offre de la gourmandise, du fruit, une petite richesse/concentration et des épices. Il exprime les notes de fraise des bois assez mûres, de cassis écrasé et plus légèrement – de violette associées à des touches de graphite, de violette ainsi qu’à des pointes d’épices douces. La bouche est fruitée et offre de la fraicheur, de la minéralité, une trame juteuse/fraiche, une bonne définition, une certaine gourmandise, de la jutosité. Elle exprime les notes de mûre pulpeuse/juteuse, de cerise pulpeuse/éclatante et plus légèrement – de violette, associées à des touches de fleurs de cerisier, de cardamone, de muscade et d’épices douces. Les tannins sont souples et sapides. De la finesse, de la fraicheur, du soyeux et de la gourmandise.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

酒香优雅、精致，带有丰富的口感、果味、少量浓缩度和香料。它表达了成熟的森林莓、压榨的黑currant和轻微的紫罗兰，伴随着图形、紫罗兰和温和的香料的点缀。口感果香，带有清新、矿物质、柔软的纹理、清晰的定义、丰富的口感和柔软的质地。它表达了浓郁的果肉、鲜红的果肉和轻微的紫罗兰，伴随着樱花、卡达木、肉豆蔻、肉桂和温和的香料的点缀。酒中的纤维柔软、丰富。它带有细致、清新、柔软和丰富的口感。

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby garnet colour with opaque core and purple reflections, delicate brightening on the rim. Dark berries, ripe plums, tobacco nuances. Juicy, elegant, with notes of red berries, fresh, lively structure, mineral and persistent, a versatile food wine.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，色泽浓郁，透明中心，紫色反射，酒杯边缘有细微的光泽。酒中有浓郁的黑berry、熟透的浆果、烟草的细微味道。口感丰富，优雅，带有红berry的清新味道，结构鲜活，矿物质和持久，适合多种菜肴搭配的佳酿。

Chinese pairs.original: 刚一闻杯，就被它清新的烟草和酸甜的杨梅所吸引，陈年14年后的Chateau Durfort-Vivens 2009 带着一抹淡淡的檀香气息和丝丝橙皮的清雅。虽然没有宏大的结构，但始终保持了温婉的气质。经过14年的岁月洗礼，它的单宁已经完全抛光。如果能够展现更多的深度将会更加出彩。
Chinese pairs.new: As soon as I poured the glass, I was drawn in by its crisp tobacco and sweet lychee aromas. The 14-year-old Chateau Durfort-Vivens 2009 exudes a subtle sandalwood note and a hint of citrus peel elegance. Although it lacks grand structure, it maintains a refined and delicate character. After 14 years of aging, its tannins have been polished to perfection. With a bit more depth, it would truly shine.

English pairs.original: Upon the first sniff, one is drawn in by the refreshing tobacco and tart bayberry aromas; the 14-year-old Chateau Durfort-Vivens 2009 exudes a subtle hint of sandalwood and delicate orange peel. While it may lack a grand structure, it maintains a gentle and elegant demeanor. After 14 years of aging, its tannins have become entirely polished. If it could display greater depth, it would be even more remarkable.
English pairs.new: 初一闻，酒香中带有清新烟草和酸甜海棠果的气味，14年陈酿的2009年杜尔福-维文酒庄（Chateau Durfort-Vivens）散发着细微的檀木和清脆橙皮的香气。虽然它可能缺乏宏伟的结构，但它仍保持着温柔和优雅的风格。经过14年的陈酿，其苦味已经变得光滑细致。如果它能展现更深入的层次，它将更加出色。

Western reviews.review: I highly recommend the second wines of the top estates in Bordeaux, especially as the prices of the grand vins make them unattainable for most of us. Vivens from Château Durfort-Vivens is an especially attractive one. Château Durfort-Vivens, classified as a 2nd growth in the Médoc classification of 1855, is regaining its former stature under the guidance of Gonzague Lurton, part of the family whose name implies excellence in Bordeaux. The 2009 Vivens delivers the ripeness of that vintage without being overdone or flamboyant. Enrobed in the plush tannins that are the signature of Margaux, it is “forward” and easy to enjoy now, yet has adequate structure so it doesn’t come across as a “fruit bomb.” It finishes with a hint of earthiness that adds complexity.---- Michael Apstein
Western reviews.translation: 我强烈推荐波尔多顶级庄园的第二酒款，尤其是因为顶级酒款的价格对于大多数人来说是不可承受的。  Château Durfort-Vivens 的 Vivens 是一个特别吸引人的选择。  Château Durfort-Vivens 根据 1855 年的梅多克分类被评为 2 级葡萄酒庄园，正是在 Gonzague Lurton 的指导下，Lurton 家族的成员，波尔多葡萄酒的代表性家族，重新恢复了其昔日的辉煌。  2009 年的 Vivens 给出了这一年酒的成熟度，没有过度或夸张。  它被富有细腻的橡木味的橡胶质纤维所包裹，这是马格朗区的标志性特征，易于享用，前景广阔，但结构合理，没有让人觉得是“果酱酒”。  酒尾带有泥土味，增加了复杂性。

Western reviews.review: 2009 Durfort Vivens is medium ruby. Blackberry and cassis scents fill the nose of this medium bodied wine. Although it has fresh, attractive flavors, the wine lacks concentration and structure. Made from a blend of 74% Cabernet Sauvignon, 21% Merlot and 5% Cabernet Franc, this should drink well young. 88/90
Western reviews.translation: 2009年杜尔福特维文斯红酒呈现出深红色。酒中充满了黑莓和黑加仑的香气。虽然这款中等体积的红酒具有新鲜、吸引人的口感，但它缺乏浓度和结构。由74%卡波内尔·萨夫诺、21%梅洛和5%卡波内尔·法兰克组成的混合物，这款红酒适合年轻时饮用。评分：88/90。

Western reviews.review: Elegant nose of dark berries and tobacco, very elegant palate, slightly lighter than the best examples but with plenty of elegance, freshness and length, dark fresh fruit, soft tannin and very good length, stylish and potent.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气优雅典雅，带有黑莓和烟草的味道。口感也非常优雅，虽然不如最好的例子那么浓郁，但仍然充满了新鲜感、长度和风格。黑莓的鲜味和柔软的苦味让人印象深刻，酒尾长而持久，风格优雅，味道强烈。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark, opaque ruby-red, holding its color well to the rim. The aromas are strangely volatile & meaty, the wine seems quite mature. The palate is quite closed with restrained red-fruit & a fine structure of lovely seamless tannins. There is good acidity, balanced alcohol and clean, well handled oak. This could open up to be quite a classic Margaux, but currently shows little. 11/13 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色深暗，几乎透不见光，酒液保持了深红色的颜色。酒香奇怪地volatile（易挥发）且带有肉类味道，酒的成熟度相当高。口感紧闭，红果味不明显，酒体结构紧致，纤维性质细腻。酒中酸度适宜，酒精度衡，橡木味干净清晰。虽然这瓶酒有潜力成为经典的马尔堡（Margaux）红酒，但目前表现并不突出。评分：11/13

Chinese pairs.original: 红醋栗、雪松、橄榄等香气，口感紧实，触感跟鼻子的香气对应，余味中长，此款酒的试饮期为3年后更佳。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts aromas of red currant, pine, and olive, with a firm texture that mirrors its nose. The finish is long-lasting, and we recommend cellaring this wine for 3 years to unlock its full potential.

Western reviews.review: This red shows some cassis, blueberries and floral notes on the nose. Some tar, too. Medium to full body, juicy tannins and a fruity finish. Enticing wine. Drink now or hold.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中有浓郁的黑currant、蓝莓和花朵的香味，还有些烟草味。口感中等到中等以上，口感丰富，果味浓郁，后味果香持久。非常诱人的一款红酒。可以立即饮用，也可以放置一段时间。

Western reviews.review: Cantemerle's ethereal elegance and racy, classy style are unmistakable in this understated yet pretty, dark ruby-colored 2012. Offering lots of cherry, raspberry and black currant fruit, this is a wine of unmistakable finesse and delicacy.Barrel Sample: 89-91 Points
Western reviews.translation: 康特梅尔勒的神秘优雅和风趣的风格在这个低调却美丽的2012年红酒中无可辩驳。它提供了大量的樱桃、草莓和黑加仑果味，这是一个不可或缺的细致和轻盈的葡萄酒。酒桶样品：89-91分。

2022 Bernard Magrez Chateau La Tour Carn.name: 2022 Bernard Magrez Chateau La Tour Carnet

Chinese pairs.original: 2022年份的Chateau La Tour Carnet (En Primeur) 比以往柔软了很多。这是我首次发现它不再依赖橡木桶烘焙来装饰，而是以丰满的浆果和明亮的辛香料来突显自己。虽然出自单宁数量爆表的2022年份，但是它的质地却比以往更加细腻。如果Chateau La Tour Carnet能够继续保持这个风格，无疑会赢得更多消费者的喜爱。当然，这个改变目前仅限于我期酒品鉴时的感受，具体情况还需根据装瓶品鉴来定夺。
Chinese pairs.new: 2022年份的Chateau La Tour Carnet (En Primeur) 比以往更加柔和。这是第一次我发现它不再依赖橡木桶烘焙来装饰，而是以丰满的浆果和明亮的辛香料来突显自己。尽管来自单宁数量爆表的2022年份，但是它的质地却比以往更加细腻。如果Chateau La Tour Carnet能够继续保持这个风格，无疑会赢得更多消费者的喜爱。当然，这个改变目前仅限于我期酒品鉴时的感受，具体情况还需根据装瓶品鉴来定夺。

English pairs.original: Chateau La Tour Carnet 2022 (En Primeur) is noticeably softer than previous vintages. For the first time, I discovered that it no longer relies on okay notes to embellish itself, but rather emphasizes its fruitiness and spices. Despite coming from the tannin-rich vintage of 2022, its texture is even more delicate. If Chateau La Tour Carnet can continue to maintain this style, it will undoubtedly win more consumers’ favor. Of course, this change is only based on my sensory experience during En Primeur tasting, and the conclusion still needs to be determined after bottling.
English pairs.new: 查塔窖酒庄拉图尔卡内特 2022（En Primeur）显著比之前的几年更柔和。第一次，我发现它不再依赖于苦味的味道来增添它的风格，而是更加强调其果香和香料。即使来自富含鞣质的2022年产季，它的质感也更加细腻。如果查塔窖酒庄拉图尔卡内特能够继续保持这种风格，它一定会赢得更多消费者的青睐。当然，这种变化仅基于我在En Primeur品酒会上的感官体验，结论仍需要在装瓶后确定。

Western reviews.review: 92-94 Barrel sample. This classed growth estate just outside Saint-Julien, produces a rich, dense wine. Its concentration and black fruits combine with acidity and a solid structure that will age well.
Western reviews.translation: 92-94 分数。 这个位于圣朱利安外围的顶级葡萄园，生产出一款浓郁、厚实的红酒。 它的浓度和黑色果味与酸度和坚实的结构相结合，能够很好地储存。

Western reviews.review: Blackberries, black cherries, flowers, tobacco leaf, cedar, and espresso nuances form the core of this wine. On the palate, the wine is creamy, lush, round, and packed with sweet, juicy, dark red fruits with notes of espresso and chocolate that come through on the finish. The wine blends 59% Merlot, 40% Cabernet Sauvignon, and 1% Cabernet Franc. You can enjoy this in its youth. Drink from 2025-2040. 91-93 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的主要特点是黑莓、黑樱桃、花朵、烟草叶、红檜和浓缩咖啡的复杂风味。口感丰富、滑顺、圆润，充满了甜美的、浓郁的黑红果实，口尾留有浓缩咖啡和巧克力的余味。该酒的组成比例为：梅洛59%，卡波弗朗克40%，卡波弗朗克1%。你可以在年轻时品尝这款酒。建议饮用时间为2025-2040年。评分：91-93分。

Western reviews.review: Viel Cassis in diesem Bouquet, dazu Schwarzkirsche und Rosenblüten. Im Gaumen zugänglich, mit knackiger Frucht, merklich Tannin, dieses ist von sehr guter Qualität, im Abgang würzig und frisch. Gelungen. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / CVBG / Château Belgrave) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中充满了黑加斯派酒和黑莓的味道，伴随着玫瑰花的芬芳。口感丰富，果味清脆，略带坚果味，这是非常出色的品质，余味清新，带有些许香气。非常成功。 (评分时间：2023年4月，来自CVBG/Château Belgrave)

Western reviews.review: Le nez est fruité avec une fine onctuosité en fraîcheur, de la minéralité et une bonne définition. Il a une certaine élégance avec des notes de cassis onctueux, de framboises écrasées et plus légèrement de bleuet associé à des touches de fraises des bois écrasés ainsi qu’à des pointes de poivre, de clou de girofle et à une discrète note de bergamote et de vanille. La bouche est minérale avec de la justesse et de la tension. Elle a une bonne définition, de la sapidité et un côté terrien en bouche avec une trame acidulée qui apporte une certaine petite droiture et de la justesse. On a des notes de mûres juteuses et pulpeuses, de cassis pulpeux et plus légèrement de bleuet associé à des touches de violette, de petits fruits bleus ainsi qu’à des pointes de tabac frais et de graphite. Il y a de la sapidité et de la gourmandise ainsi qu’un petit moelleux sur le grain des tanins.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

酒香清新果香，带有细腻的滑感，矿物质和清晰的定义。它有一种优雅的风格，带有浓郁的黑currant、挤压的草莓和轻微的蓝莓，伴有挤压的森林莓和一点点胡椒、丁香和隐约的柑橘和香草。口感矿物质，清晰和紧张，带有好定义、口感丰富和土味，口中有酸性纹理，给人一种小小的正直和清晰。有浓郁的熟透的黑berry、浓郁的黑currant和轻微的蓝莓，伴有挤压的紫罗兰、蓝色的小果实和一点点新鲜烟草和图形。有口感丰富和贪婪的感觉，以及在牙缝中的小小的软感。

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby garnet colour with opaque core and purple reflections, delicate brightening on the rim. Subtle noble oak nuances, some chocolate, dark wild berries, discreet herbal savouriness in the background. Juicy, ripe cherries, pleasant fruit sweetness, fresh acidity, nougat on the finish, a versatile food wine that will soon be accessible.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色调，透明中心，紫色反射，酒杯边缘有细微的光泽。酒中有细微的高级橡木味道，巧克力，黑野莓，背景中有微妙的草药风味。酒口中有新鲜的樱桃味，甜度适中，酸度清新，尾部有核桃味，适合多种口味的食用酒。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Reysson 是一款非常另类的梅多克混酿，不仅因为它来自黏土石灰岩土壤，还因它与众不同的混酿比例(88%美乐、9%小味多、3%品丽珠)。虽然果实的浓度不算突出，但樱桃与酸梅的香气清晰可辨，当酒液在味蕾流转，一抹咸咸的回甘让我感到十分满足。若想在梅多克体会高比例美乐葡萄酒的风采，Chateau Reysson 是很有代表性的选择。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau Reysson 是一款独特的梅多克红酒，不仅因为它来自黏土石灰岩土壤，还因其独特的混酿比例(88%美乐、9%小味多、3%品丽珠)。虽然果实的浓度不算突出，但樱桃和酸梅的香气清晰可辨，当酒液在味蕾流转，一抹咸咸的回甘让我感到十分满足。想体验梅多克高比例美乐葡萄酒的风采，Chateau Reysson 是一个很好的选择。

English pairs.original: Chateau Reysson is a special Medoc blend that stands out not only for its origins in clay-limestone soils but also for its unusual blend of 88% Merlot, 9% Petit Verdot, and 3% Cabernet Franc. While the fruit concentration is not pronounced, the aromas of cherry and plum are clearly discernible, and as the wine glides over the palate, a hint of saltiness brings great satisfaction. If you wish to experience the charm of high-percentage Merlot wines in the Medoc, Chateau Reysson is a representative and excellent choice.
English pairs.new: 雷西松庄园是一款特殊的梅多克葡萄酒，除了来自黏土和石灰质土壤的起源外，它的非凡的葡萄酒比例也值得注意：88%梅洛，9%小皮诺，3%卡波弗朗克。虽然果实浓度不明显，但樱桃和浆果的香气清晰可辨，酒精在口中流动时，带来一丝咸味的满足感。如果您想体验梅多克地区高比例梅洛葡萄酒的魅力，雷西松庄园是一款代表性和出色的选择。

Western reviews.review: Duftig, würzig, rotfruchtig, Kirschen dominieren das Duftbild. Im Gaumen straff, eher karg, wirkt leicht trocknend im Abgang, endet mineralisch. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / CVBG / Château Belgrave) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气丰富，带有浓郁的香草味和红果味，尤其是樱桃味。口感紧致，略带干涩，尾部矿物质味道浓郁。

Western reviews.review: Le nez est frais, fleuri et offre un petit côté variétal. On y retrouve des notes de lys, d’iris et plus légèrement de mûre fraiche associées à de fines touches de poivre. La bouche est minérale, équilibrée et offre une petite fraicheur ainsi qu’une fine tension. En bouche ce vin exprime des notes de mûre juteuse, de petits fruits rouges pulpeux et plus légèrement de violette associées à des touches de rose ainsi qu’à une pointe de toasté. Les tannins sont relativement extrais.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气清新、花香，带有一点品种特有的味道。酒中有百合、鸢尾花和新鲜黑berries的香气，伴随着细微的胡椒味。口感矿物质、平衡，带有一点清新感和细微的紧张感。在口中，这瓶红酒展现出浓郁的黑berries、红果肉质和轻微的紫罗兰花香，伴随着玫瑰花和轻微的烤焦味。酒中的纤维素相对较强。

Western reviews.review: Inky dark purple colour. Fragrant with wild berries, cassis, aromatic herbs and discreet oak notes. Medium weight, still a youthful tannic grip but no hard edges savoury red fruit flavours with a fresh backbone and fine length.
Western reviews.translation: 深紫色葡萄酒。酒中充满了野生莓果、黑加仑、芳香型香草和微妙的橡木味。口感中等，仍然保留着年轻的坚果感，但没有硬朗的边缘，呈现出鲜美的红果味和细长的尾韵。

Chinese pairs.original: 此酒的颜色呈深沉的红宝石色泽，恰当的醒酒时间使其展现出相当吸引人的香气，馥郁的红茶叶、黑豆浆、烟草及黑橄榄气息，并带细微的酱油咸味，入口可感厚实的果肉，余韵悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts a deep garnet hue, with a perfectly balanced aging process that releases an alluring aroma of fragrant red tea, black bean paste, tobacco, and black olive, accompanied by subtle soy sauce notes. The palate is rich and full-bodied, with a lingering finish.

English pairs.original: A dark ruby color, the nose showed some appealing evolution with appropriate time in the decanter, scenting of black tea leaf, black bean juice, tobacco and black olive with some salty and faintly suggestive of soy sauce, the palate revealed a moderate flesh at the very beginning, with a long finish.
English pairs.new: 深红色葡萄酒，瓶中陈化后，酒香逐渐展现出魅力，闻到黑茶叶、黑豆汁、烟草和黑橄榄的气息，伴有鹽味和微微的醬油味。口感丰富，初期略带中等厚度，长长的尾韵。

Western reviews.review:
A sweet, fruity, medium-bodied, surprisingly forward effort, the deep plum/purple-colored 2002 Gruaud Larose exhibits ripe aromas revealing herbaceous as well as spice notes. There is some potentially worrisome astringent tannin in the finish, but the wine’s depth augers well for this being ultimately resolved and integrated. Anticipated maturity: 2007-2018
Range 88-90
Western reviews.translation: 2002年格鲁阿德拉罗斯（Gruaud Larose）是一款甜蜜、果香、中等体积的红酒，呈深紫色。酒中展现出成熟的果香，带有草本和香料的香气。虽然酒尾有可能存在一些苦涩的苦味，但酒的深度表明这可能会在未来得到解决和融合。预计成熟期：2007-2018年。评分：88-90分。

Western reviews.review: Mittleres Rubinrot. Expressive Nase, feiner Duft, Kräuter, Pflaumen, Tabak. Der Gaumen ist zugänglich, frisch, zeigt Leben, einge gute Balance von Gerbstoff, Frucht und Säure, der Alkohol ist moderat, alles harmonisch, ohne Grösse. Mittellanger Abgang. Ein balancierter Wein der aktuell viel Trinkspass bietet. Jetzt bis 2035 (Verkostet am 25.3.2023 im Rahmen der Gruaud Larose Degustation bei Ruedi & Silvia Hintermann)
Western reviews.translation: 深红色。酒香丰富，细腻，带有草药、浆果和烟草的味道。口感轻松，新鲜，充满活力，具有良好的天然酸度和果味平衡，酒精度适中，所有元素和谐一致，没有过度的体积。尾部中等持久。目前这个酒的口感非常好，适合当前饮用。建议在2023年至2035年之间饮用（2023年3月25日在Ruedi & Silvia Hintermann的Gruaud Larose酒会中品尝）。

Western reviews.review: Showing a lightness of color, the wine offers sweet tobacco, red fruits, herbs, leaf, spice, barnyard, earth and pepper. Medium bodied, fresh, light, soft, with clean, red cherry and cassis finish. The wine was made blending 57% Cabernet Sauvignon, 34% Merlot and 9% Cabernet Franc.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒呈现出浅色的外观，口感中带有甜的烟草、红果、香草、叶子、香料、农舍、土壤和胡椒的味道。酒体中等，清新、轻盈、柔和，口感干净，余味中带有红樱桃和黑加仑的风味。该酒是通过将57%的卡波网索维涅、34%的梅洛和9%的卡波网法兰克混合酿造而成。

Western reviews.review: Medium to deep ruby-red color, with dark pigmentation. Fresh cassis aromas are mirrored on the palate where they are lifted by fresh acidity. There are nice toasty oak notes to the fruit. The wine has a fair structure & the alcohol is balanced & the finish has a fair length. The wine is a well-made, straight down the line St Julien, it is good, but doesn't thrill. 11/12 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色，带有深色的浓度。酒中有新鲜的黑加仑香味，口感上也能感受到这种香味，酒中还带有新鲜的酸度。酒中有烤橡木的香味与果味相互融合。酒的结构合理，酒精度合适，酒尾有较长的余味。整体来说，这瓶红酒是典型的圣朱利安风格，制作得很好，但并没有让人惊艳。评分：11/12

Western reviews.review: Dichtes Rubin. Die Nase ist reiffruchtig, zeigt eine feine Würze, dezent laktische Noten, Kirsche, schwarze Johannisbeeren. Im Gaumen rund, weich, top Frucht, feines Tannin, die Säure ist stimmig, der Alkohol überbordet nicht, der Wein hat Struktur, Dichte und Länge. Macht Spass, wie viele 09er am Anfang eines langen Trinkfensters. Jetzt bis 2040+ (Verkostet am 25.3.2023 im Rahmen der Gruaud Larose Degustation bei Ruedi & Silvia Hintermann)
Western reviews.translation: 深红色。酒 nose 呈现成熟的果味，带有细微的辣味和轻微的乳香味，伴有浆果和黑莓的香气。口感圆润，柔滑，顶级的果味，细微的苦味，酸度适中，酒精不突出，酒有结构，密度和持久感。非常适合作为长时间饮用红酒的开场白。建议在2023年至2040年之间饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 与Brigitte Rullier-Loussert一同品鉴。此酒清晰的香气充满可可、烤吐司和黑色水果的芬芳，与蘑菇和香料味交织在一起。干净感延续到了其坚实并且矿物感十足的口感中。
Chinese pairs.new: Tasted alongside Brigitte Rullier-Loussert. This wine boasts a clear aroma filled with notes of cocoa, toasted bread and dark fruit, intertwined with earthy and spicy undertones. Its clean sensation carries over to its robust and mineral-driven palate.

English pairs.original: Tasted with Brigitte Rullier-Loussert. The precise bouquet was full of cocoa, toast and dark fruits interwoven with mushroom and spices. The cleanness continued onto the palate that was firmly structured and mineral-suffused.
English pairs.new: 与Brigitte Rullier-Loussert一起品尝。精确的香气中充满了巧克力、烤面包和黑果，交织着蘑菇和香料。清晰的口感继续延续到口中，结构坚实，矿物质充盈。

Western reviews.review: Love the blackberry and dark-chocolate aromas with hints of sandalwood and almonds. Full-bodied, layered and very intense and powerful. So polished and long. Shows gorgeous length. Drink in 2022.
Western reviews.translation: 我非常喜欢这款红酒的黑莓和黑巧克力香气，伴有檀木和杏仁的微妙气息。口感丰富、层次分明、强烈而有力。非常光滑且持久。展现出优雅的长尾。建议2022年饮用。

Western reviews.review: Briary tannins push plum, raspberry and blackberry preserve flavors along. Light spice, singed apple wood and tobacco notes fill in the background. Best from 2019 through 2030.
Western reviews.translation: 浓郁的荆棘味道使黑莓、黑berries和黑berry果酱味道更加丰富。轻微的香料、焦糖苹果木和烟草味道在背景中弥漫。建议2019年至2030年最佳饮用。

Western reviews.review: Composed of 90% Merlot and 10% Cabernet Franc, the 2015 Dalem spent 18 months in part new and part one-year-old oak barrels. Medium to deep garnet-purple in color, it leaps from the glass with notions of chocolate-covered cherries, crushed blackberries and plum preserves with a cedar and Marmite toast undercurrent plus a touch of beef drippings. Full-bodied and packed to the gills with youthful, crunchy black fruits, it has a firm frame and finishes a little woody at this youthful stage, but it should emerge singing in 2-3 years.Rating: 91+
Western reviews.translation: 2015年达勒姆(Dalem)红酒，主要由90%梅洛(Merlot)和10%卡波弗朗(Cabernet Franc)组成，酒龄18个月，部分在新橡木桶中陈化，部分在一岁的橡木桶中陈化。酒色深红紫色，酒香浓郁，闻起来有巧克力浸果、黑莓、浆果和肉桂的香气，底层有松木和酱油的味道。口感丰富，黑果味浓郁，酒体紧致，酒尾略有木头味，但随着时间的推移，酒会越来越好。预计在2-3年后会达到最佳状态。评分：91+.

Western reviews.review: An incredibly successful Fronsac is the 2015 Château Dalem, which is a 90/10 split of Merlot and Cabernet Franc that saw 50% new oak. It’s a ripe, rounded, incredibly sexy Fronsac that offers notes of white truffles (which makes me think of limestone soils), licorice, chocolate, plums, and currants. It’s loaded with character, has terrific purity, and is going to deliver the goods for at least 10-15 years. This estate sits at the top of the Fronsac plateau, overlooking the Dordogne Valley, and covers 18 hectares plated mostly to Merlot, with 20% Cabernet Franc. The soils consist of a thin layer of clay sitting atop limestone subsoils. The estate is run by the Swiss Rullier family and readers looking for wines that overdeliver should remember this estate.
Western reviews.translation: 2015年夏特奥达莱姆是一款极其成功的弗朗萨克红酒，酒中以90%梅洛和10%卡波弗朗克为主，使用50%新橡木桶发酵。这种酒呈现出浓郁的口感，圆润而性感，酒中有白松露、 licorice、巧克力、浆果和黑枣的香气。这种酒充满个性，品质出色，能够为至少10-15年提供极好的口感。夏特奥达莱姆位于弗朗萨克高原的顶端，俯瞰多尔多涅河谷，总面积18公顷，主要种植梅洛，占比70%，卡波弗朗克占比20%。酒窖的土壤由薄层的粘土覆盖在石灰岩下层。酒窖由瑞士的鲁利埃家族管理，想要寻找超值的酒款的消费者们应该记住这个酒窖。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Doyac 2020 刚开瓶的时候完全是还原的，可等到晚上再品的时候突然容光焕发，我甚至能够在圆润舒畅的酒体中摸到颗颗饱满的黑醋栗和蓝莓果粒。细密的单宁下面藏着一层石墨和铅笔芯气息，不动声色地就提升了口感的层次。这款酒是我非常欣赏的生物动力酒庄，需要注意的是，刚开瓶的新年份一定要多多醒酒。
Chinese pairs.new:
Chateau Doyac 2020

When first opened, it was completely closed, but by evening, it suddenly blossomed, revealing plump black currants and blueberries in its smooth, rounded body. Hints of graphite and pencil lead lurk beneath the fine tannins, elevating the palate without drawing attention to itself. This is a wine I highly admire from a biodynamic estate, and it's worth noting that the new vintage requires ample decanting.

English pairs.original: It had been completely reductive when Chateau Doyac 2020 is just opened, but it unexpectedly came alive when I tried it again in the evening. I could even feel the depth of the cassis and blueberries in the smooth and silky body. Under the creamy tannins, there is a layer of graphite and pencil lead that enhances the flavor without altering it. It should be noted that this biodynamic wine that I appreciate a lot needs to be carafed more frequently when drunk at a young age.
English pairs.new: 当我第一次打开2020年的多雅克庄园时，感觉非常闭塞，但是在晚上再次品尝时，它却意外地活跃起来。 我甚至可以感受到在滑顺而细腻的身体中，黑加仑和蓝莓的深度。 在奶油般的苦味中，有一层石墨和铅笔的味道，增强了口感而不改变它。 需要注意的是，我非常喜欢的生态葡萄酒在年轻时需要经常倒杯饮用。

Western reviews.review: This structured, ripe wine comes from the northern part of the Haut-Médoc appellation. It has fine black fruits and rich tannins, both of which are sure to soften as the wine matures further. Drink from 2025. Organic and biodynamic.
Western reviews.translation: 这款结构紧凑、成熟的红酒来自于波尔多地区北部的 Haut-Médoc appellation。它具有细腻的黑果味和丰富的苦味，随着酒的成熟，这些特性会逐渐柔和。建议2025年后饮用。该酒采用有机和生物动力耕种方法。

Western reviews.review: Medium deep garnet colour. Some toast and new oak notes with sweet red fruit, plum and liquorice notes. The palate shows medium weight with a supple texture, well rounded with sweet red fruit, some herbal flavours a fresh backbone, mild oak and toast with a medium to long finish.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，中度浓密。酒中有烤面包和新橡木的香气，伴有甜红果、浆果和甘草的味道。口感中等，质地细滑，圆润，甜红果味浓郁，伴有草药味和清新后味，轻微的橡木和烤面包味，中等至长的尾韵。

Chinese pairs.original: 长相思Sauvignon Blanc的清爽个性在这款酒中以非常成熟的方式呈现出来，能够在清新的柑橘芬芳中找到一股特别的圆润感。得益于黏土石灰岩的土壤，即便面对干热的2019年份也保持流畅轻巧的酸度，以及收尾时一股清冽纯净的矿物感。
Chinese pairs.new: This Long Shang Si Sauvignon Blanc showcases its crisp personality in a mature and refined way, with a hint of roundness found in its fresh citrus aromas. Thanks to the clay limestone soil, it maintains a smooth and agile acidity even in the hot and dry 2019 vintage, finishing with a crisp and pure mineral note.

English pairs.original: The refreshing character of Sauvignon Blanc is illustrated in a riper way; that’s why I can find a sense of roundness inside the purely fresh citrus fruits. Thanks to its clay-limestone soil, this wine always maintains vibrant acidity and piercing minerality in the hot vintage of 2019.
English pairs.new: 萨伯涅 Blanc 的新鲜特质在这里展现得更加丰富；因此，我可以在清新的柑橘果味中感受到圆润的感觉。由於這瓶酒的土壤是黏土和石灰岩混合的，所以即使是在2019年的炎热年份，它也能保持清新的酸度和刺激的矿物质感。

Western reviews.review: The late founder Denis Dubourdieu was the master of white wine in Bordeaux. So it is pleasing that this wine should be so fine. Subtly rich, with generous white fruits, ripeness and concentration, the wine is developing well. Drink from 2022. AP Wine Imports. Editors’ Choice.
Western reviews.translation: 波尔多地区白酒的鼻祖丹尼斯·杜博迪（Denis Dubourdieu）去世后，这款酒的品质令人满意。酒体丰富细腻，白果味丰富，酒中充满成熟和浓度，酒的品质正在不断发展。建议2022年后饮用。AP酒业进口。编辑推荐。

Western reviews.review: A juicy, ripe red with plums, berries and chocolate. Some cloves. It’s medium-bodied. Softness with freshness.   Barrel Sample: 90-91
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒充满了浓郁的果实味道，带有浓郁的浆果和黑莓，伴有巧克力和丁香的香气。酒体中等，口感柔和又新鲜。酒评人预测：90-91分。

Western reviews.review: Packs a good, juicy mix of red and black currant fruit, wrapped in light tar and savory notes. Fresh, with good energy through the sanguine-tinged finish. Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot. Drink now.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒带有丰富的红黑葡萄果味，外加轻微的焦油和浓郁的口感。口感清新，带有活力，尾部带有深红色的余味。主要成分为卡波雷尔和梅洛。建议立即饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 2014年份的Prieure-Lichine在现阶段已经有些轻微的浮土落叶气息了，淡淡的森林清凉伴随着绵柔的酒体，有一种邻家女孩的亲切感。虽然山楂片和雪茄盒的组合着实特别，但摇杯之后的表现略显平淡。年轻时饮用可能会更加怡人。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2014 Prieure-Lichine is starting to show a hint of earthy, leafy aromas, with a subtle forest freshness and a silky texture that's reminiscent of a friendly next-door neighbor. While the combination of prune and cigar box notes is distinctive, the wine's finish is somewhat subdued. It may be more charming when young.

English pairs.original: Prieure-Lichine 2014 opens up with hints of forest floor and discreet fruitiness. The delicate freshness and mellow body show me an image of a lovely girl next door. The hawthorn candy and cigar box partner is pretty engaging but without much variation after swirling the glass. This wine is more attractive to drink at a younger age.
English pairs.new: 普里厄-利欣 2014 年的口感是森林地板和隐约的果香的混合。细致的清新和柔和的口感让我想起一个温柔的邻居。 Hawthorn 糖果和雪茄盒的搭配是很吸引人的，但在旋转玻璃后没有太多变化。这瓶酒更适合在年轻时喝。

Western reviews.review: (50% Cabernet Sauvignon, 45% Merlot, 5% Petit Verdot) Rubinrot, erste Reifetöne. In der Nase mit reifen, dunklen und roten Beeren, stark geröstete Kaffeebohne, auch Kirschen, schwarze Johannisbeere. Im Gaumen zugänglich, gut strukturiert, die Tannine sind noch markant, eine gute Säure stützt, die Frucht ist reif, die Balance stimmt, ein guter Prieuré-Lichine, der ab sofort Spass macht und dennoch gut reifen wird. Jetzt bis 2035.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一瓶红酒评论。翻译如下：

(50% 卡布塞尔, 45% 美乐, 5% 小皮多)

酒色深红，初期成熟。酒香中带有成熟的黑色和红色浆果，浓郁的烤咖啡豆味，樱桃和黑莓味。

口感顺滑，结构良好，仍有明显的坚果味，但酸度良好，果味成熟，平衡好。这是一瓶优质的普里奥-利希内酒，既可以立即享用，又可以长期陈酿。建议在2023年至2035年之间品尝。

Western reviews.review: Boysenberry, espresso, black cherry and licorice scents kick off the nose. Medium bodied, with a touch of too much oak at the moment, this needs time to develop, and integrate. While this is already better in bottle than barrel, in time, this should be an even better wine, as it continues to come together. 92 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中，含有 Boysenberry、Espresso、黑樱桃和Licorice的味道。酒体中等，目前有一点过度的橡木味，需要时间来发酵和融合。虽然瓶装时已经比酒桶好，但随着时间的推移，这款酒将会变得更加出色。评分：92分。

Western reviews.review: This is a concentrated wine, packed with tannins and black plum fruits. It has some of the fruity crispness of the vintage although with its dark structure and concentration it is obviously a wine that needs to soften over time. Rich and juicy at the end, it will be ready to drink from 2024.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一个浓郁的红酒，充满了坚果味和黑浆果的风味。虽然它保留了当年的果酱般的清新感，但其深沉的结构和浓度表明它需要经过时间来软化。酒尾丰富、浓郁，预计2024年将达到最佳饮用状态。

Western reviews.review: Dark, medium red-black in color with some color loss at the rim. The restrained aromas have a lifted perfume over cassis, redcurrant & graphite notes. On the palate lovely fresh, mouth-watering acidity helps release perfumed violet & pungent redcurrant fruit. The structure is very fine & almost milky-textured. Wine is medium-bodied, the alcohol is beautifully balanced & the finish is elegant & persistent. 08/22 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色至黑色，边缘有轻微的颜色减退。酒香清晰，带有轻微的香水味，混合了黑加仑、红樱桃和石墨的气味。口感清新，口水流涎，酸度适中，释放出紫罗兰和强烈的红樱桃果味。酒体结构细致，几乎是奶油般的质地。酒体中等，酒精平衡，尾部优雅持久。评分：08/22 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 如果让我在凉年份中间挑选一款能够充分展现Domaine de Chevalier 实力的年份，1997年份绝对是首选。虽然该年份有着明显的生青痕迹，但毫无违和感。看来9月和10月采收期间相对良好的天气帮了大忙。它的果香足够扎实，酒体足够紧致，单宁足够柔和。长期瓶陈之后还散发出讨喜的中草药气息，并在雪松、烟草、摩卡粉的衬托下平添了几分醇厚感。现在饮用非常合适。
Chinese pairs.new: If I had to choose a vintage from Domaine de Chevalier that showcases its full potential, I would undoubtedly choose the 1997 vintage. Despite its noticeable green tinge, it feels perfectly balanced. The good weather during the September and October harvests must have been a blessing. The fruit aromas are robust, the texture is taut, and the tannins are silky smooth. After long-term aging, it still emits a pleasant herbal note, accompanied by a rich, woody, and mocha-like complexity. It's perfectly drinkable now.

English pairs.original: If I had to choose a wine from a cooler vintage that shows how good Domaine de Chevalier is, I’d pick the 1997 vintage. Even though this vintage has noticeable signs of being underripe, it doesn’t feel out of place in this wine. Good weather during the harvest in September and October seems to help a lot. It has a robust fruit smell, a nice tight mouthfeel, and soft tannins. After being aged in the bottle for a long time, and it’s got even richer with a nice herbal scent and, with a touch of cedar, tobacco, and mocha powder. Now, it’s time to taste it.
English pairs.new: 如果我要从一个不太好的年份中选择一瓶Domaine de Chevalier的红酒，我会选择1997年的。虽然这个年份的葡萄采收时显然还没有成熟，但这并不影响这瓶酒的风格。九月和十月的好天气似乎帮助了很多。酒体中有着浓郁的果香，口感紧致，纤维软。经过长时间的陈酿，这瓶酒变得更加丰富，带有着香草的香气，伴有松木、烟草和巧克力粉的味道。现在是品尝的时候了。

Western reviews.review: Strong carmine garnet, broad ochre rim. Tobacco, damp undergrowth, some dried plums, a little damp wool, a delicate bouquet. Slender, some currant, fresh acidity, mineral, delicately leafy savouriness in the finish, remains short. (Drinking now).
Western reviews.translation: 深红色酒液，酒杯边缘有浅黄色。酒香中带有烟草、潮湿的林地、干燥的李子和羊毛味。酒口中带有淡雅的花香。口感细长，带有浆果味、清新酸度、矿物质和轻微的叶绿味。尾韵短暂，适合立即饮用。

Western reviews.review: Medium to deep ruby-red color with dark pigmentation. The fruit on the nose is a little dumb & cedar notes dominate. The mid-weight palate has a little lively red-fruit but cedary notes close the palate down quite quickly. A little fine, delicate fruit lasts quite well on the finish. Although currently closed this is a balanced elegant wine that should provide pleasant mid-term drinking. 11/01 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深红色，带有深色浓缩。

鼻子：酒中果味不明显，松木香味占据主导地位。

口感：中等重量，口感活泼，带有红果味，但松木香味很快就盖过了口感。酒尾留有细微的果味，持续时间较长。

虽然目前酒瓶还未开启，但这是一瓶平衡优雅的酒，适合中期饮用。评分：11/01 DCAMW。

Western reviews.review: Medium to deep ruby-red color with dark pigmentation. The fruit on the nose is a little dumb & cedar notes dominate. The mid-weight palate has a little lively red-fruit but cedary notes close the palate down quite quickly. A little fine, delicate fruit lasts quite well on the finish. Although currently closed this is a balanced elegant wine that should provide pleasant mid-term drinking. 11/01 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深红色，带有深色浓缩。

鼻子：酒中果味不明显，松木香味占据主导地位。

口感：中等重量，口感活泼，带有红果味，但松木香味很快就盖过了口感。酒尾留有细微的果味，持续时间较长。

虽然目前酒瓶封闭，但这是一款平衡优雅的酒，适合中期饮用。评分：11/01 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 橡木桶，矿物和葡萄干的香气，朴实，密集的单宁，极干的酒体，口感浓郁复杂，回味中等。
Chinese pairs.new: Oak barrel, mineral, and raisin aromas, straightforward, dense tannins, extremely dry texture, full-bodied and complex flavors, moderate finish.

Western reviews.review: Medium depth of ruby-red/garnet color. Aromas are of jammy black & red fruits. The palate is soft with juicy red fruits that are lifted by fresh acidity. The supple fruit contrasts with quite angular tannins,. The dark, ripe fruit continues onto the finish. Currently the wine is a little disjointed, but should harmonize with age. 11/12 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深度为中等的红宝石色， garnet色。

香气：浓郁的黑果和红果jam味。

口感：口感柔软，带有新鲜酸度的红果味。果肉的滑顺与坚硬的纤维相互矛盾。酒尾持续着浓郁的黑果味。

目前，酒的味道还不够统一，但随着时间的推移，应该会变得更加和谐。评分：11/12

Chinese pairs.original: 多汁的入口，明亮的酸度很快就打动了我，但是单宁的结构仍然需要通过后续的陈酿来逐步润色。香气中充满了轻盈的红色水果以及品丽珠和赤霞珠所赋予的独特绿茶茶香， 让整个酒从头到尾都散发着青春的活力。
Chinese pairs.new: Lush entry, bright acidity hits me right away, but the tannin structure still needs time to mature. The aroma is filled with light red fruit and a unique green tea note from Pinot Noir and Cabernet Franc, giving the wine a youthful energy from start to finish.

English pairs.original: The juicy entry and bright acidity capture me immediately, but the tannins’ structure still needs to be polished through a period of further aging. The bouquet is brimming with fresh red fruits and distinctive green tea notes, contributing a vibrant freshness from start to finish.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的入口果香丰富，酸度清新，但还需要经过一段时间的陈化来使其纤维结构更加光滑。酒香中充满了新鲜红果和独特的绿茶味，始终贡献着活力鲜明的新鲜感。

Western reviews.review: (39% Merlot, 10% Cabernet-Sauvignon, 39% Cabernet Franc, 12% Malbec) Dunkelfruchtige, noch vom Ausbau geprägte Nase, dunkelfruchtig, Brombeerkonfitüre. Der Auftakt ist weich und rund, erst füllig, wird dann immer schlanker und präziser, der Wein hat richtig gradliniger, zeigt Finesse, markante Gerbstoffe, diese sind fein gewoben und ergänzen die Frucht zu einem harmonischen Gesamtwerk. Dieser Wein bestätigt die gute Qualität des kürzlich verkosteten 2018ers. 2026-2040 (April/Mai 2021)
Western reviews.translation:
这款红酒的成分是：39% 梅洛，10% 卡波弗雷蒙，39% 卡波弗兰克，12% 马尔贝克。

这款红酒的香气是深色果味，浓郁的果酱味，特别是蓝莓酱。

口感柔和圆润，初期充满体积，随后逐渐变细变精致，酒体线条清晰，展现出细腻的质感和明显的橡木味，橡木味细致地与果味融合，形成了和谐的整体。

这款红酒的品质与之前品尝的2018年款相似，推荐储存时间为2026-2040年，最佳品尝时间为2021年4-5月。

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby, opaque core, purple reflections, brightening at the rim. Dark berry fruit and ripe plums are underpinned with notes of noble wood. Powerful, chocolaty, ripe cherry fruit, good freshness, integrated, vivid tannins, nougat finish, good length. Certain ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，透明的核心，紫色反射，边缘加亮。黑berry果味和成熟的李子味以高贵的木头味为底。强烈的巧克力味，成熟的樱桃果味，好新鲜感，融合的，生动的纽扣，核桃味的尾部，长时间的好长度。有明显的陈化潜力。

Western reviews.review: Medium-bodied, with notes of wet earth, espresso, licorice, dark red berries and cocoa on the nose. Soft, round, lush and polished, the wine is forward, fruity and a bit oaky at the moment. Give it a few years to come together and it will be an even better wine. 89-91
Western reviews.translation: 口感中等，鼻子中有泥土、咖啡、甘草、黑红果和巧克力等味道。酒体软滑圆润，富有层次，目前略带果味和橡木味。给它几年时间，让它成熟后会更好。评分：89-91分。

Western reviews.review: Sone new oak, dry spices, fresh red fruit with a mediu bodied structure, an age worhty style still remaining young and restrained yet finely built with fine length and tannic power.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的风格新颖，带有干燥的香料味道，具有中等体积的结构，果味清新，仍然保持着年轻和谦逊的风格，但细致入微，具有长长的尾部和坚实的苦味。

Chinese pairs.original: 使用了全新的法国桶。La Gomerie的平均年产量仅800箱。醒酒两小时。这款奢华、浓郁的梅洛展现出均衡的摩卡、黑巧克力、肉桂、薄荷脑、咸矿物和些许蓝莓的香味。口感顺滑、集中，纹理细致的单宁盖过了口中甜美的黑色水果滋味；此酒具有出色的浓度、质地及饱满度；回味虽然结构感十足但依然清晰、活泼。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine showcases a luxurious, full-bodied Merlot with balanced flavors of mocha, dark chocolate, cinnamon, eucalyptus, salt minerals, and subtle hints of blueberry. The smooth, concentrated texture is dominated by fine-grained tannins, which complement the sweet black fruit flavors in the mouth. This wine boasts excellent density, texture, and fullness, with a lingering finish that is both structured and refreshing.

English pairs.original: 100% new French oaks. The annual production of La Gomerie is small with an average of only 800 cases. Decanted for two hours. This opulent and rich Merlot exhibited poised bouquets of mocha, black chocolate, cinnamon, menthol, savoury-mineral and blueberry overtone. The palate was suave and focused, with fine-grained tannins cloaked its sweet core of dark fruit; there were stunning density, texture and plumpness; the finish was firmly structured but remained precise and lively.
English pairs.new: 100% 法国新橡木 barrels。拉戈梅里每年生产量极小，平均只有800瓶。酒瓶两小时后打开。这个奢华的美丽红酒展现出巧妙的咖啡、黑巧克力、肉桂、薄荷、矿物质和蓝莓的香气。口感细腻、集中，细致的纤维素包裹着甜美的黑果核心；酒体丰富、密度高、质地细腻，尾部结构坚实但仍保持精确和生动。

Western reviews.review: 2009 Gomerie, 100% Merlot, is filled with licorice, plums, coffee, chocolate, and black raspberries with hints of jam. Soft, sexy, and round, it blends elegance with opulence, finishing with rich sensations of black raspberries and dark cherries. 92-94
Western reviews.translation: 2009年格梅里(Gomerie) 100%梅洛特(Merlot)红酒，充满了 licorice、浆果、咖啡、巧克力和黑莓的味道，伴有果酱的余味。它的口感柔和、性感、圆润，融合了优雅与奢华，最后留下黑莓和黑杏的丰富感觉。评分：92-94分。

Western reviews.review: Still young and closed on the nose but with a fine purity, elegant oak, black truffle, spices and ripe dark berries, very full and unctuous on the palate, very structured with plenty of extract and rounded tannins, beautiful dark fruit, very long and persistent aftertaste, rich and powerful, yet with finesse and elegance, great potential here, a big wine.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒还很年轻，鼻子里封闭，但口感细腻，优雅的橡木味、黑松露、香料和成熟的黑果味，口感丰富醇厚，结构紧密，含有丰富的提取物和圆润的橡胶质，美丽的黑果味，长长的持久尾韵，富有豪华感和力量，但又带有细腻和优雅，未来发展巨大，这是一瓶大酒。

Chinese pairs.original: 2020年份的Chateau de Come拥有如水的肌肤，光滑细腻的入口让人满心欢喜。香气相当活泼，不用摇杯就能感受到酸枣、话梅以及大黄果酱的甜美气息。单宁是在收尾时才慢慢涌上来的，在增加层次感的同时并不会破坏平衡的口感。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2020 Chateau de Come has a silky smooth texture, with a delightful entry that's full of joy. The aromas are lively and expressive, offering notes of sweet apricot, cherry plum, and quince jam without needing to swirl the glass. Tannins emerge slowly at the finish, adding depth without disrupting the wine's balance.

English pairs.original: The 2020 vintage of Chateau de Come has skin as soft as water, with a smooth and refined entry that is a delight to the palate. The aromas are very lively, and without swirling the glass, you can smell the delicious notes of jujube, dried plum, and rhubarb jam. The tannins slowly reveal themselves on the finish, adding layers to the wine without ruining the balanced palate.
English pairs.new: 2020年夏特德科姆的红酒，口感如水般柔软，入口细腻，令人愉悦。酒香非常活跃，仅凭嗅觉就能闻到枸杞、干枣和草莓酱的美妙香气。酒尾中，纤维逐渐显现，增添了酒的层次，而不会破坏酒的平衡口感。

Western reviews.review: Medium-bodied, soft, fruity, creamy and already easy-to-like, the wine is loaded with sweet, ripe, spicy, red currants and plums with a nice endnote of freshness due to its minty accent. Drink from 2023-2032.
Western reviews.translation: 口感中等，软滑，果香浓郁，奶油般的口感，让人一口就喜欢上。酒中充满了甜蜜的、成熟的、带有辣味的红葡萄和熟透的李子，最后留下了一丝清新的mint味。建议2023-2032年饮用。

2023 Chateau Pichon-Longueville Baron Le.name: 2023 Chateau Pichon-Longueville Baron Les Tourelles de Longueville

Chinese pairs.original: 我常把Les Griffons 比作是男爵的皮夹克，将Les Tourelles 视为男爵的小棉袄。如果是年轻时饮用，Les Tourelles 往往会更加贴心。到了2023年份，Les Tourelles将美乐的比例提升至历史新高的72%（比以往提高了足足10%左右），但神奇的是，它的结构感并未削弱，反倒是酸感变得更为流畅了（pH值为3.7）。树莓、樱桃、杨梅的酸爽气息让整个品鉴显得更加清澈，如蜻蜓点水般轻巧。这绝对是Pierre 给我们所有人的一份厚礼。
Chinese pairs.new: I often liken Les Griffons to a baron's leather jacket, while Les Tourelles is like the baron's soft cardigan. If consumed during its youth, Les Tourelles tends to be more approachable. By 2023, Les Tourelles has increased its Merlot proportion to a historic high of 72% (a 10% increase from previous vintages), but miraculously, its structure remains intact, and its acidity has become even smoother (pH 3.7). The crisp aromas of raspberry, cherry, and mulberry make the tasting feel fresher and more agile, like a dragonfly landing on water. This is undoubtedly a gift from Pierre to all of us.

English pairs.original: I often liken Les Griffons to a baron’s leather jacket and Les Tourelles to a baron’s cozy sweater. When enjoyed in youth, Les Tourelles tends to be more comforting. In the 2023 vintage, Les Tourelles has elevated the proportion of Merlot to a historic high of 72% (an increase of about 10% from previous years), yet miraculously, its structural integrity remains intact, with acidity becoming even smoother (pH level of 3.7). The refreshing acidity of raspberries, cherries, and blueberries makes the entire palate more precise, akin to the light touch of a dragonfly skimming water. This is undoubtedly a generous gift from Pierre to all of us.
English pairs.new: 我经常将Les Griffons比作一位男爵的皮革夹克，而Les Tourelles则像一位男爵的温暖毛衣。当在年轻时品尝Les Tourelles时，它往往更有舒适感。在2023年产季，Les Tourelles将梅洛的比例提升到了历史最高的72%（比前几年增加了约10%），然而令人惊讶的是，其结构完整性仍然保持完好，酸度变得更加平滑（pH值为3.7）。红果味（如草莓、樱桃和蓝莓）带来的清新酸度使整个口感更加精确，就像一只轻轻一掠的蜻蜓在水面上飞过。这无疑是皮埃尔给我们的一个慷慨的礼物。

Western reviews.review: This wine is notably floral, characterised by pronounced honeysuckle notes. It is easy-drinking and gourmand, with a fruity and expressive palate. The finish is marked by great freshness, adding to its overall appeal.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有明显的花香，尤其是honeysuckle的香气。它口感轻松，适合品尝，口感丰富果香。酒尾清新，带来整体的魅力。

Western reviews.review: The wine's deep, dark black-red color is opaque. The aromas are of cassis & blackcurrant.  Indistinct cassis fruit on the palate combines with plentiful fine cedary tannins. The structure is a touch chalky. The wine is of mid-weight with good freshness and balanced alcohol. The structured finish has fair length & the dark fruit shows ceadry notes at the end. 04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色深暗黑红色，几乎透不见光。酒中的香气是黑加仑和黑currant。口感中，黑加仑的果味不明显，融合了丰富的细致木质味的苦味。酒的结构略带矿物质感。酒的重量适中，口感清新，酒精度合适。酒尾结构良好，酒尾长度一般，最后留下了黑果的木质味。评分：04/24 (ep) DCAMW。

Western reviews.review: This wine is notably floral, characterised by pronounced honeysuckle notes. It is easy-drinking and gourmand, with a fruity and expressive palate. The finish is marked by great freshness, adding to its overall appeal.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有明显的花香，尤其是honeysuckle的香气。它口感轻松，适合品尝，口感丰富果香。酒尾清新，带来整体的魅力。

Western reviews.review: The wine's deep, dark black-red color is opaque. The aromas are of cassis & blackcurrant.  Indistinct cassis fruit on the palate combines with plentiful fine cedary tannins. The structure is a touch chalky. The wine is of mid-weight with good freshness and balanced alcohol. The structured finish has fair length & the dark fruit shows ceadry notes at the end. 04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色深暗黑红色，几乎透不见光。酒中的香气是黑加仑和黑currant。口感中，黑加仑的果味不明显，融合了丰富的细致木质味的坚果感。酒的结构略带矿物质感。酒的重量适中，口感清新，酒精度合适。酒尾结构良好，酒尾长度一般，最后留下了黑果的木质味。评分：04/24 (ep) DCAMW。

Western reviews.review: This wine is notably floral, characterised by pronounced honeysuckle notes. It is easy-drinking and gourmand, with a fruity and expressive palate. The finish is marked by great freshness, adding to its overall appeal.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有明显的花香，尤其是honeysuckle的香气。它口感轻松，适合品尝，口感丰富果香。酒尾清新，带来整体的魅力。

Chinese pairs.original: 鲜爽多汁而又顺滑自如。成熟的美乐赋予了甜美的口感和柔顺的单宁。入口即化、如沐春风。口中层层叠叠的烤制化香气和香料芬芬很是讨巧，如果能够平衡收尾时的温热感将会更加优秀。
Chinese pairs.new: Crisp and juicy with a smooth, effortless texture. Ripe flavors impart a sweet taste and soft tannins. A refreshing entry, like a spring breeze. Layers of toasted oak and spice unfold in the mouth, cleverly done, but would be even better if the warmth at the finish were balanced.

English pairs.original: The wine is fresh, succulent, and smooth. Ripe Merlot offers sweetness on the palate as well as velvety tannins. Once it attacks your palate, it can disappear immediately, making you so delighted like bathing in the spring wind. The layered toasted aroma and ingredients are pretty adorable. If the warmness can be balanced on the finish, it can be more remarkable.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒新鲜、醇厚、滑顺。成熟的梅洛提供了口感上的甜度以及细腻的苦味。它一旦接触到你的味蕾，就会瞬间消失，让你感到非常愉悦，就像在春风中沐浴一样。层次丰富的烤香和成分非常可爱。如果尾韵的温暖可以得到平衡，它就更令人惊叹了。

Western reviews.review: Chocolate fudge, espresso, wet earth, flowers and cherries make up the bouquet. On the palate the wine is lushly textured, ripe, sweet, earthy and spicy, with layers of dark plums and cherries along with hints of blue fruit. Produced from blending 74% Merlot with equal parts Cabernet Sauvignon and Cabernet Franc , scoring at the top of the range, this is really quite nice and filled with personality. Drink from 2023 - 2034. 92 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中包含了巧克力浆果、浓缩咖啡、潮湿的土壤、花朵和樱桃的味道。口感丰富、成熟、甜美、泥土味和有辣味，伴随着黑杏和樱桃的层次感，以及蓝色水果的微妙味道。由74%梅洛和同等比例的卡波涅和法兰克红葡萄酒混合酿造，评分最高，这款红酒非常好喝，充满个性。建议从2023年到2034年饮用。评分92分。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, zarte Ockerrandaufhellung. Feine Nuancen von reifen Feigen und Nougat, süße schwarze Waldbeeren unterlegt, dezente Edelholzwürze. Saftig, reife Kirschen, gute Frische, stoffig, runde Tannine, mineralisch und elegant, verbindet Kraft und Harmonie, bleibt gut haften, sicheres Entwicklungspotenzial, salziger Rückgeschmack.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，微微的橙色边缘。细微的成熟葡萄和牛奶糖香气，甜黑莓底调，细微的高档木香。口感丰富，成熟樱桃，清新，质地厚实，圆润的苦味，矿物质和优雅，结合了力量和和谐，留下了深刻的印象，具有可靠的发展潜力，带有咸味的余味。

Western reviews.review: (75% Merlot, 13% Cabernet Franc, 13% Cabernet Sauvignon, 15%, verkostet im Dezember 2021 in Windisch). Kräftiges Rubin. Intensive Nase, dunkle Frucht, pfeffrige Würze, schwarze Schokolade, Tabak, Veilchen. Im Gaumen kräftig, opulent, die satte Frucht wird von reifen Gerbstoffen gekontert, der hohe Alkoholgrad ist wahrnehmbar doch erstaunlich gut verpackt. Der Abgang ist ausgewogen, dunkelfruchtig und hinterlässt einen Mix aus Gewürzen und Pflaumen. Sehr gute Qualität. 2023-2032.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一瓶红酒评论。以下是翻译成中文：

(75% 梅洛, 13% 卡波弗兰克, 13% 卡波萨维尼翁, 15%, 在德国威尼施进行评分，时间为2021年12月)。

酒色深红。

酒香浓郁，带有深色果味、胡椒味、黑巧克力、烟草和紫罗兰花香。

口感丰富，酒体丰满，酒中的果味被成熟的橡木味道所平衡，酒中的酒精度数明显，但却被巧妙地包装起来。酒尾平衡，带有深色果味，留下一股混合的香料和石榴味。

酒品质极佳。推荐饮用时间：2023-2032年。

Chinese pairs.original: 烟熏和奶糖的香气组合令人过目难忘，一闻即可辨认出这是Claire旗下葡萄酒的独特韵味。在干燥炎热的2022年，如何筛掉干葡萄是每位酿酒师都要面临的挑战。Chateau La Gurgue 采用“鼓风筛选机”成功地解决了这个难题。尽管单位产量仅为25hl/ha，但果香和酸度都展现出纯净流畅的特点。如果收尾时的单宁能更加柔和细腻，这款Margaux佳酿会更出彩。
Chinese pairs.new: 这款葡萄酒的烟熏和奶糖香气令人印象深刻，立即可以识别出这是Claire旗下葡萄酒的独特风格。干燥炎热的2022年，筛选干葡萄是一个巨大的挑战，但Chateau La Gurgue成功地使用“鼓风筛选机”解决了这个问题。尽管产量有限（仅25hl/ha），但这款葡萄酒展现出清澈的果香和酸度。如果收尾时的单宁更加柔和细腻，这款Margaux葡萄酒将会更加出色。

English pairs.original: The combination of smoky and toffee aromas is unforgettable, and one can easily recognize the unique character of Claire’s wines with just one sniff. In the dry and hot year of 2022, the challenge for every winemaker is how to sort out the dried grapes. Chateau La Gurgue has successfully tackled this problem by using a “blower sorting machine”. Although the yield is only 25hl/ha, the fruitiness and acidity exhibit pure and smooth characteristics. If the tannins in the finish were to become softer and more delicate, this Margaux wine would truly shine.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的烟熏和糖浆香气令人难忘，一口气就能辨别出克莱尔酒庄独特的风格。2022年是干旱炎热的一年，葡萄采摘时葡萄干枯的挑战让每个酒庄都感到头疼。克莱尔酒庄成功地解决了这个问题，采用了“气流分选机”来分选葡萄。尽管产量只有25hl/ha，但这款马格努红酒展现出清澈的果味和酸度，口感细腻。若能在后续的陈化过程中使其苦味更加柔和细腻，这款马格努红酒将会真正闪耀。

Western reviews.review: 90-92 Barrel sample. A ripe, smoky wine, this hasfine tannins and a texture that is soft and juicy. The black fruits, from a vineyard in the heart of Margaux are rounded while keeping structure.
Western reviews.translation: 90-92 桶样品。 这是一款成熟的烟熏红酒，具有细腻的橡皮质感和柔软的口感。 来自马格努（Margaux）中心葡萄园的黑色果实圆润而保持结构。

Western reviews.review: Spices, flowers, and crisp plum aromatics open the wine. On the palate, the wine is medium-bodied, bright and chewy, with a crunchy, red berry and peppery spice oriented finish. The wine is aged in 20% new, French oak, concrete eggs and foudres. The wine blends 53% Cabernet Sauvignon, 30% Merlot and 17% Petit Verdot. Drink from 2025-2037. 89-91 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中充满了香料、花朵和清脆的李子香。口感中体积中等，清新且有嚼头，口感结尾有坚果和辣椒味。酒龄20%采用法国橡木桶、混凝土蛋和大桶进行陈化。酒中混合了53%卡波网索维涅、30%梅洛和17%小皮特。建议2025-2037年饮用。评分89-91分。

Western reviews.review: Lots of peppery note, as expected from Petit Verdot. Great tension, marked energy, s ome chewy tannins at the finish. Good level of concentration and structured tannins, shows its good ageing potential. Note: grapes come from 70 years old Petit Verdot by massel selection.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感非常出色， Petit Verdot 的典型辣椒味道非常明显。酒体充满活力，结构紧密，口感丰富，尾部有坚果般的纤维感。酒精浓度高，结构紧密，展现出很好的陈年潜力。特别值得一提的是，这些葡萄来自 70 年的老 Petit Verdot，通过精心的选摘而获得。

Western reviews.review: Reiffruchtig und mit viel Weihnachtsgebäck, Lavendelblüten und Brombeeren in der Nase. Im Gaumen saftig, knackige Frucht, sehr gute Struktur, feinkörniges Tannin, der Wein zeigt Kraft und Druck, bleibt elegant, endet dunkelfruchtig und mit einem krautigen Touch. Hohes Niveau! (Verkostet im April 2023 auf Château Durfort-Vivens) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中充满了红果味和圣诞饼干的香味，伴随着紫罗兰花和黑莓的芬芳。口感丰富，果味清脆，结构良好，细腻的橡皮质感，酒体强劲有力，保持着优雅的风格，结尾是浓郁的果味和草本的余韵。品质极高！(2023年4月在Château Durfort-Vivens品鉴) #primeurs22

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby, opaque core, purple reflections, subtle brightening on the rim. Fine black cherries, subtle hints of liquorice, tobacco nuances and orange zest. Taut, ripe wild berries, integrated tannins, mineral, salty, herbal spiciness on the finish, fruity aftertaste.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，透明的核心，紫色反射，酒杯边缘微微发亮。细腻的黑樱桃，薄荷糖的暗示，烟草的细微差别和橙子皮。紧致的成熟野生果实，融合的鞣质，矿物质，咸味，草药香味的尾部，果味的余味。

Chinese pairs.original: 还是一样的晶莹透亮，还是一样的纯净轻盈，虽然果香略显内秀，但是在满满的东方香料包裹下变得富有活力。丝绒般的酒体通透而明亮，带着一股香甜可口的质感落下帷幕。
Chinese pairs.new: The wine remains crystal clear, its purity and lightness unchanged. Although the fruit aromas are subtle, they're invigorated by the abundance of Eastern spices. The silky texture is transparent and bright, with a sweet and approachable finish.

English pairs.original: Bright and purely precise as usual, even if the aromas are a bit discreet, the nose still shows a dynamism under plenty of oriental spices. The velvet body’s texture is smooth and lively and draws to a close with a wave of sweetness.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的气味清晰明亮，虽然香气不算强烈，但仍然带有丰富的东方香料味道。酒体的质感细腻柔滑，余味甜美。

Western reviews.review: Licorice, black cherries, vanilla, espresso bean and nuances of roses create the nose. Medium-bodied, forward and fruity, the wine is soft, round, and leaves you with a polished, red cherry finish. Drink from 2023-2032.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中包含了 licorice、黑樱桃、香草、咖啡豆和玫瑰花的细微气息。酒体中等，果味突出，口感软滑圆润，余味以红樱桃的清晰口感结束。建议从2023年至2032年饮用。

Western reviews.review: Lively and direct in the sensory profile showing notes of strawberries, red prunes, pink grapefruit, cut cedar and mandarin juice. Medium to full bodied, rounded tannins of good craftsmanship and a tasty finish with sweet tones. A blend of 90% Merlot and 10% Cabernet Sauvignon. Drink now.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感鲜活直接，具有草莓、红李子、粉红葡萄柚、切割的红松和橙汁的香气。酒体中等到中厚，具有良好的制胜手法和甜味的尾韵。酒款为90%梅洛和10%卡波雷尔。建议立即饮用。

Western reviews.review: (90% Merlot, 10% Cabernet Sauvignon, 13.17% Alkohol, PH 3.94) Würzige, grüne, krautige Noten, staubig, rotfruchtig. Im Gaumen weicher Auftakt, wird dann rasch karger, straffer, zeigt eine leicht krautige Note, hat Ecken und Kanten, Charakter und im Abgang einen widerum kräuterigen Nachhall. Authentisch, trinkanimierend. Braucht ein Stück FleisChâteau 2024-2033 (April/Mai 2021)
Western reviews.translation:
这款红酒的成分是90%梅洛（Merlot）和10%卡波内托（Cabernet Sauvignon），酒精含量13.17%，pH值为3.94。

口感上，酒体富有香气，带有青草、草本和土壤的味道，入口柔和，但随后变得干净、清晰，带有轻微的草本味道，具有明显的边缘和质感，酒尾留有草本的回味。

这款红酒的风格是真实的，非常适合饮用。推荐饮用时间为2024-2033年，最佳饮用期为2021年4月至5月。

注：pH值是衡量酒液酸度的指标，值越低，酒液越酸。

Western reviews.review: Deep ruby, purple reflections, broader brightening on rim. Delicately savoury background, nuances of strawberry and cherry compote, a hint of tangerine zest. Juicy, elegant, fine dark berry fruit, subtle chocolate, round tannins, a touch of nougat, already accessible.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，紫色反射，酒杯边缘广泛的光亮。细腻的咸味背景，草莓和樱桃酱的微妙之处，柑橘皮的微妙之处。 juicy、优雅、细致的黑berry果实，微妙的巧克力，圆润的苦味， nougat的微妙之处，已经可以享受。

Western reviews.review: Fruity with concentrated red fruits, refreshing, one-dimensional. Negligible note of herbaceousness at the very end. A pleasant and joyful wine. Would try to pair with finger food like cured meat, or red meat.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感是浓郁的红果味，非常清新，但略显单调。最后有微微的草本香气。整体来说是一种愉悦的酒，适合与一些小口味的食物配对，如腌肉或红肉。

Chinese pairs.original: 酒体呈深沉的红宝石色泽，中等集中、温和的香气，富含摩卡、泥土、香草、甘草、烟草、黑醋栗、烤吐司、草莓、橘子皮及微微花香、黑巧克力和茴香气息，酒体中等偏上，口感丝滑，中等偏上的酸度与高单宁相结合，温和轻柔的悠长余韵中带有香草及熏烤风味。
Chinese pairs.new: Deep, rich garnet color. Medium+ concentration, soft aromas with notes of mocha, earth, grass, licorice, tobacco, blackberry, toasted bread, strawberry, orange peel, subtle floral hints, dark chocolate, and anise. Medium+ body, smooth texture, balanced acidity and high tannins, with a long, gentle finish featuring herbal and smoky undertones.

English pairs.original: The wine had deep ruby color, medium intense and amiable bouquets of mocha, earth, vanilla, liquorice, tobacco, black currant, toast, strawberry, citrus peel, hint of blossom, dark chocolate and fennel, medium+ body with very silky texture, medium+ acidity, high tannin, with a mute and silky long length of vanilla and smoke notes.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的颜色深红，中度浓郁的香气，带有巧克力、土壤、香草、甘草、烟草、黑加仑、烤面包、草莓、柑橘皮、花香、巧克力和荜拌的气味。酒体中等厚度，质地细滑，酸度中等强度，苦味强度高，口感长达数秒，尾部留有香草和烟火味。

Western reviews.review: Quite a firm, tannic, almost strict character here. There is more interest in the nose, with its floral, earthy, red and black fruits, tobacco, truffle and plum, than on the palate. Give this at least a decade, and it could soften, but it is not a lot of fun to drink today.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感坚实、苦涩，几乎是严格的。虽然在口感上没有太多吸引力，但在香气中却有很多有趣的元素，如花香、土味、红黑果实、烟草、松露和浆果。建议至少再存放十年，这样它可能会变得更加柔和，但现在它并不容易让人享受。

Western reviews.review: A wonderfully firm wine, which balances extraction with pure sweet fruit. It moves comfortably within its tannic structure, the ripe Merlot allowed plenty of play to show off its black jelly and plum flavors.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶非常有力的红酒，完美地平衡了提取和纯甜的果味。它舒适地在其坚实的结构中移动，成熟的梅洛葡萄充分展现了其黑果冻和浆果风味。

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Rubingranat, violette Randaufhellung. In der Nase feine florale Nuancen, nach Veilchen, frische Kirschen, zart nach Cassis. Am Gaumen saftig, fruchtbetont und elegant, charmant, zart nach Mandarinen, leichtfüßig, feste Tannine, rotbeerig-kirschige Frucht im Nachhall. Delikater Speisenbegleiter.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

深红色葡萄酒色，酒液边缘有紫色光泽。酒香中有细微的花朵香气，闻起来像百合花、鲜红樱桃和黑加思（一种黑色浆果）。口感丰富，果味浓郁，优雅，迷人，略带橙子味，轻盈，坚实的橡皮味，余味中有红葡萄和樱桃的果香。是一种细腻的食物伴侣。

Western reviews.review: (2007) A touch of meaty, earthy charm here with plenty of gout de terroir. The palate has plenty of depth and structure, with a solid underpinning of ripe, black fruits. Comes together really very nicely with coffee oak and elegance.
Western reviews.translation: 2007年：这款红酒带有浓郁的土壤和肉类香气，充满了地理特征的风味。口感丰富深邃，结构坚实，黑果成熟充满韵味。与咖啡和橡木的完美结合，呈现出优雅的风格。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark, virtually opaque ruby-red color. The rich, dark-fruit on the nose has plenty of chocolate, fig & currant aromas. Rich black fruit on the palate is high-toned & juicy. The mid-palate has a silky-smooth texture & lovely concentration. Alcohol is a touch warming, the acid is quite soft, could be a little fresher on the finish, but lasts well. 11/10 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的红酒色，几乎透不见光。酒鼻中充满了浓郁的黑果、巧克力、浆果和浆果香气。口感上黑果的味道高昂、水果味浓郁。中口滑顺、浓郁。酒精有一点温暖感，酸度较软，可能在尾部稍微清新一些，但持久性不错。评分：11/10

Chinese pairs.original: 醒酒1个半小时。杯中呈浓稠的深黑色。此酒的香气在初时有些封闭，随后在典型的左岸酒的庄严芬芳中绽放，石墨、雪松、黑醋栗，亦有令人赞叹的香料矿物味、焦糖蛋糕、浓咖啡、灌木、烟熏、贝壳、桉树和紫罗兰干花香所增添的那一抹复杂度。口感厚实、粘稠并且异常润滑，而基石依旧是颗粒状的单宁和结构良好的矿物质；惊人的酸度确保了整款酒的魅力；浓郁的、如同利口酒般的回味中充满了咸矿物质及甜美的果味。
Chinese pairs.new: 醒酒1个半小时。杯中呈浓稠的深黑色。酒的香气在初时有些封闭，随后在典型的左岸酒的庄严芬芳中绽放，带有石墨、雪松、黑醋栗、香料矿物味、焦糖蛋糕、浓咖啡、灌木、烟熏、贝壳、桉树和紫罗兰干花香。口感厚实、粘稠并且异常润滑，基石依旧是颗粒状的单宁和结构良好的矿物质。惊人的酸度确保了整款酒的魅力，浓郁的回味中充满了咸矿物质及甜美的果味。

English pairs.original: Decanted for one hour and a half. Black in color with evident density. Initially faintly closed but started to open with classic left bank noses of graphite, cedar, cassis, with sublime complexity added by spicy-mineral, caramel cake, espresso, undergrowth, smoke, shell, eucalyptus and dried violet. It was thickly viscous and prodigiously polished in texture, the underpinning of palate was grainy tannins and well-structured minerality; plenty of astonishing acids ensured its appeal; the richly intense, liqueur-like finish was infused with savoury-minerals and sweet fruit.
English pairs.new: 酒瓶倒置一小时半。酒液呈黑色，显著的密度。初期略微封闭，但随后开始打开，展现出典型的左岸鼻子，包括石墨、红檜、黑currant、以及由香料矿物、焦糖蛋糕、咖啡、林地、烟雾、贝壳、桉树和干燥紫罗兰的复杂性。酒液厚重、光滑，口感粗糙的纤维和矿物质结构为其提供了基础；惊人的酸度使其更具吸引力；酒尾丰富浓郁，类似于液体，融入了咸矿物和甜果味。

Western reviews.review: Shows beautiful aromas of crushed berries and currant, with hints of mineral. Full-bodied, with lovely currant, licorice and mint. Long and caressing. Very refined and balanced. Another winner from Pontet-Canet.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒展现出美丽的果香，带有浓郁的黑莓和黑currant味道，伴有矿物质的微妙气息。口感丰富，带有黑currant、甘草和薄荷的风味。长长的尾部，柔和的口感。非常细腻和平衡。Pontet-Canet再次赢得了我们的认可。

Western reviews.review: foursquare, powerful wine that shows great ripeness, solid, firm red berry fruits, a touch of mint, and black, almost impenetrable tannins. Expect this impressive wine to age for 10–15 years.
Western reviews.translation: 四方广场红酒，具有强烈的酒力，展现出丰富的成熟度，坚实的果实，坚硬的红莓果味，薄荷的微妙气息，几乎不可穿透的黑色坚果。预计这瓶令人印象深刻的红酒将在10-15年内成熟。

Western reviews.review: Still vibrant ruby colored, the 2004 Pontet Canet offers a very classic, balanced, medium to full-bodied style as well as textbook notes of blackcurrants, cedar wood, dried tobacco, and a hint of graphite. Still firm and focused, yet nicely concentrated, with ripe tannin, it’s in the early stages of its drinking plateau and should easily keep for another two decades.
Western reviews.translation: 2004年波内特-卡内特红酒依然呈现出亮丽的红宝石色。它呈现出典型的、平衡的、中等到中等以上的体积风格，带有黑currant、雪松木、干燥烟草和微量石墨的典型香气。它依然坚实、集中，具有成熟的纤维，正处于饮用高峰的早期阶段，预计还能维持两十年。

Western reviews.review: Backward and powerful for the vintage, this blue/purple-colored 2004 exhibits classic creme de cassis, smoke, incense, and spring flower characteristics. Medium to full-bodied, dense, and excruciatingly tannic, this impressively endowed Pauillac is built for the long haul. However, patience will be required. Anticipated maturity: 2014-2025+. Rating: 90+
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶2004年的波尔多红酒颜色深紫红，展现出典型的黑加仑果酱、烟雾、香烟和春花的特征。酒体中等到中厚，密度高，口感非常坚实，需要耐心等待。预计成熟期：2014-2025年。评分：90+.

Western reviews.review: Medium/full bodied, showing age in its color, the wine has entered its secondary stage, with its tobacco, cassis, forest floor and cherry pipe tobacco aromatics. There is fruit in the finish, which has a bit of rusticity in the finish. Drinking well today, you can age it for a few more years if you like, or pop a cork to check it out 92 Points
Western reviews.translation: 体积中等到中等以上，酒色表明了它的年龄，已经进入了次级阶段，酒中有烟草、黑加仑、森林地板和红樱桃烟草的香气。酒尾有果味，但酒尾有一点原始的味道。酒现在喝得很好，如果你喜欢，可以再存几年，也可以现在就打开瓶子品尝。评分92分。

Chinese pairs.original: 装瓶之后的Chateau Grand Mayne 并没有出现我所期待的丰富果香，而且继续在柔和道路上进行到底。清澈的酸度、粉状的单宁、再加上收尾时紧致回甘，这款酒让我看到Grand Mayne团队在面对2021年份时的从容不迫。当然，如果能有更多复杂度肯定会更加出色。
Chinese pairs.new: After bottling, Chateau Grand Mayne didn't deliver the rich fruit aromas I was expecting, instead opting for a smooth and gentle ride. Crisp acidity, powdery tannins, and a satisfying finish all contribute to a sense of composure from the Grand Mayne team in the face of the 2021 vintage. More complexity would have elevated it even further.

English pairs.original: After bottling, Chateau Grand Mayne didn’t showcase the rich fruit aromas I anticipated, yet it persisted on a path of softness. Its clear acidity and powdery tannins, combined with a tight, sweet finish in the end, exemplify the Grand Mayne team’s composed response to the challenges of the 2021 vintage. While the wine is admirable in its current form, a greater complexity would undoubtedly elevate its stature further.
English pairs.new: 在瓶装后，尚宫大酒庄的酒并没有展现出我预期的丰富果香，然而它仍然坚持着一种柔和的风格。其清晰的酸度和细致的橡木味，结合了酒尾的紧致和甜美的结束，体现了尚宫大酒庄团队在面对2021年产季挑战时的沉着应对。虽然酒在当前的形式中令人钦佩，但更复杂的风格无疑会让它的品质更上一层楼。

Western reviews.review: Os 17 hectares de vinhedos deste Grand Cru Classé dividem-se em 75% de Merlot, 22% Cabernet Franc e 3% de Cabernet Sauvignon. O nariz é fruta cristalina e exuberante, sem concessão ao dulçor. Notas de especiaria e ameixas, e flores azuis. Em boca, é suculento e com bela picância que brilha sobre os taninos. A madeira da passagem entre 16 e 18 meses por barricas de carvalho francês, sendo 60% novas, está presente em segundo plano e aparece um iogurte ao fim de boca. Notas de pimenta e cravo.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒来自于17公顷的葡萄园，分为75%的梅洛、22%的卡波弗朗克和3%的卡波萨维尼昂。酒鼻中充满清晰的果香和浓郁的气味，没有甜腻的感觉。酒中有着香料和杏子的味道，伴随着蓝色的花香。口感丰富，带有美妙的果酸和坚果味，酒中的木头味来自于16-18个月的法国橡木桶中陈化，60%的桶是新木的，酒尾留有轻微的酸奶味和胡椒和丁香的味道。

Western reviews.review: Solid and centered shows notes of cherries, raspberries, pomegranate, lemon peel and ginger. Medium body, smooth in the sip closes juicy and sleek. Good sapidity. A blend of 75% Merlot and 25% Cabernet Franc. Drink now.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感坚实，中心偏向果香，展现出浓郁的樱桃、莓果、石榴、柠檬皮和姜的风味。口感中等，入口滑顺，余韵清爽。酒中有较好的口感。酒款为75%梅洛和25%卡波弗朗克的混合。建议立即饮用。

Western reviews.review: Deep garnet fading to purple on the narrow rim. Delicate cranberry and cassis alongside notes of fresh orange zest. Medium-bodied, red wild berries and cherries, subtle tannins, a touch of nougat on the finish, lemon-salty aftertaste.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色渐变为紫色，酒杯边缘狭窄。酒中有细微的樱桃和黑加仑的气味，伴有新鲜橙皮的香气。酒体中体积适中，含有红野果和樱桃的味道，口感细腻，余味中带有轻微的糖果和柠檬盐味。

Western reviews.review: Earthy, plums licorice, flowers and a touch of cocoa on the nose creates the enticing bouquet. The freshness in the bright red fruits shines in the soft, silky, vibrant, medium-bodied, savory-edged, coffee bean tinted palate. Drink from 2023-2045. 91-93
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中包含了泥土、浆果、 licorice、花朵和巧克力等元素，非常诱人。口感丰富，果味清新，口感细腻滑顺，体积中等，带有咖啡豆的味道，口感丰富而又有嚼劲。建议从2023年到2045年饮用。评分：91-93分。

Western reviews.review: Mittleres Rubinrot, schöner Glanz. Intensive Nase nach Tabak, dunklen Kirschen, Backpflaumen, auch rote Früchte, etwas Lakritze, aktuell recht stark vom Fass geprägt. Im Gaumen mit guter Struktur, einem markanten Gerbstoff-Rückgrat, das die auf den Punkt gereifte Frucht in Schach hält, der Wein hat durchaus Balance und eine gute, aromatische Länge. 2025-2040 (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2022.)
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，光泽美丽。酒香浓郁，带有烟草、黑杏、烤石榴、红果和少量 licorice，目前受到橡木桶的强烈影响。口感结构良好，具有明显的鞣质骨架，控制了成熟的果味，酒体平衡，香气持久。预计2025-2040年最佳饮用期。 (2022年4月在原酒庄品尝。)

Chinese pairs.original: 微微的还原气息遮挡不住此酒香气中所展现出的迷人薰衣草花香。绵密和顺滑构成了这款酒的味觉体验，一并在其异常活泼、干净而且多少有些强劲的回味中达到了顶点。
Chinese pairs.new: A subtle hint of reduction can't overpower the charming lavender notes that shine through in this wine's aroma. The wine's texture is rich and smooth, culminating in an exceptionally lively, clean, and slightly intense finish.

English pairs.original: The faint reduction on nose didn't hide the enchantingly floral fragrances (lavender). The density and smoothness made up the taste, all culminating in an exceedingly vivid, nicely clean and somewhat forceful finish.
English pairs.new: 酒香上有轻微的减少，但并未掩盖花香的魅力（如百日花）。酒体的密度和滑顺感使得口感更加丰富，最后的口感清晰明亮，略带力度。

Western reviews.review: This rich, full wine shows the chateau to be at the top of its form. It's finely balanced, pushing both its fruit and acidity, with the tannins taking the supporting role. With its power leashed, this shows the stylish side of Saint-Julien, although it will certainly age for many years.
Western reviews.translation: 这款充满魅力的红酒展现了庄园的顶级水平。它的平衡完美，既突出了果味，又突出了酸度，纤维素则在后面支持。酒中的力量得到控制，这使得这款酒展现出圣朱利安风格的优雅面貌，尽管它将会在多年后继续发酵。

Western reviews.review: The 2010 Branaire-Ducru has a lovely mélange of red and black fruit, hints of dried blood and autumn leaves suggesting that this is moving into its secondary phase. The palate is medium-bodied with supple tannins, a fine bead of acidity, good body and a fresh marine-tinged finish that is an absolute joy. There is an abiding symmetry about this wine and it is in for the long-haul. Tasted blind at Farr Vintners 10-Year On Bordeaux horizontal.
Western reviews.translation: 2010年布拉内-杜克鲁（Branaire-Ducru）红酒具有迷人的红黑果味，带有干燥血液和秋叶的暗示，表明这款酒正进入其次级阶段。口感中等体积，具有柔软的纹理，酸度清晰，体积充足，带有海风味的新鲜尾韵，绝对令人愉悦。这个酒具有持久的平衡感，值得长期收藏。

Western reviews.review: Very polished and stylish, with a velvety feel to the layers of crushed plum, currant and blackberry, while bittersweet cocoa and black licorice glide in on the gorgeous, black tea-infused finish. Features a lovely allure rather than raw power, making this possibly the prettiest St.-Julien of the vintage. There's plenty in the tank for cellaring as well. Best from 2014 through 2030.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒非常精致和时尚，具有细腻的质感，层次丰富的浓郁黑果味，如浆果、黑berries和黑葡萄，伴随着黑巧克力和黑甘草的苦甜味，完美的黑茶味在尾部留下了深刻的印象。它的魅力在于优雅而不在于强大，可能是该年份圣朱利安区最美丽的红酒之一。酒中有足够的潜力储存，适合长期陈化。建议在2014年至2030年之间品尝。

Western reviews.review: This wine is more backward than I would have normally expected, but nevertheless, it is very impressive. The 2010 Branaire-Ducru displays an inky bluish purple color and loads of mulberry, raspberry, black currant, graphite and floral notes in its intense aromatics. Medium to full-bodied , with sensational ripeness, purity, texture and length, the tannins are slightly more prominent than I remember from barrel, but they are sweet and ripe (as opposed to astringent and bitter). This beautiful wine needs 4-6 years of cellaring and should keep 25-30 years.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒比我预期的要保留得更久，但它仍然非常出色。2010年布拉奈-杜克鲁（Branaire-Ducru）展现出深紫红色的颜色和浓郁的香气，包括黑莓、草莓、黑葡萄、石墨和花朵的香味。口感中等到中等以上，酒液充满了成熟的甜度、纯粹度、质感和长度，纤维素略微比我记忆中的更突出，但它们是甜的和成熟的（而不是苦涩和苦涩的）。这美丽的酒需要4-6年的陈酿，并且可以保存25-30年。

Western reviews.review: A layered young red with lots of black olives and berries on the nose. Full body, with velvety and chewy tannins. It all comes together at the end with a lovely sweet fruit. Try after 2017.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶年轻的红酒，具有丰富的黑橄榄和浓郁的黑berries香味。酒体丰富，口感滑顺，纤维性坚果味。酒尾甜美的果味。建议在2017年后品尝。

Chinese pairs.original: 这款酒闻起来很有精气神儿，能够感受到非常集中的浓度。多汁的杨梅和淡淡的石墨清香浑然一体，摇杯之后还散发着柔柔的松柏芬芳。较轻柔的浸渍方式以及较少的全新桶陈酿让这款酒在入口的瞬间就展现出柔和的口感和爽朗的清新感，非常适合周末时与朋友分享。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine has a lively and energetic aroma, with a concentrated intensity that's immediately apparent. The luscious lychee and subtle graphite notes blend seamlessly together, releasing a soft pine fragrance after swirling the glass. The gentle extraction and minimal new oak aging allow the wine to showcase a smooth texture and refreshing crispness from the very first sip, making it perfect for sharing with friends on a weekend.

English pairs.original: This wine is vigorous with a concentrated richness. The succulent waxberries and a gentle fragrance of graphite blend together as a core. After swirling the glass, it releases a light scent of pines and cypresses. Because of gentler maceration and less oaky flavors, this wine offers me beautiful softness and freshness once it touches my palate. It’s a nice choice to share with your friends on the weekend!
English pairs.new: 这款红酒充满活力，富有浓郁的口感。酒中融合着浓郁的蜂蜜柚子和细致的石墨香。摇晃玻璃后，酒中释放出轻微的松柏和柏树香。由于使用了较轻的浸泡和较少的橡木味道，这款红酒在入口时呈现出柔软和新鲜的口感。周末与朋友共享是一种不错的选择！

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, dezente Randaufhellung, rauchig-kräuterwürzig unterlegte schwarze Beerenfrucht, zart nach Vanille und Edelholz, kandierte Orangenzesten. Mittlere Komplexität, reife schwarze Kirschfrucht, gut integrierte Tannine, frischer Säurebogen, zartes Nougat, wirkt bereits einigermaßen zugänglich, ein vielseitiger Speisenbegleiter. Peter Moser
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮，烟熏草药味的黑berry果味，微带香草和贵木香，糖浆橙子皮。中等复杂度，成熟的黑杏果味，柔和的苦味，清新的酸度，微带奶油味，口感已经相当友善，适合多种菜肴搭配。- 彼得·莫瑟（Peter Moser）

Chinese pairs.original: 这款酒“香甜”的个性很快就能勾起你味蕾的兴奋点。它刚刚瓶陈三年，就已经散发出浓郁的松露醇香，包裹着奶油蓝莓和黑枸杞的果香，像海浪一般不断翻滚着。数量众多的绵柔单宁，很好地填补了每一寸缝隙，把整个味蕾添补的满满当当。这样高品质的“超级波尔多”，价格还那么亲民，请给我来一打！
Chinese pairs.new: This wine's sweet and charming personality will quickly get your taste buds excited. With just three years of bottle aging, it's already released a rich truffle aroma, wrapped in creamy blueberry and blackberry fruit flavors, rolling like waves. The numerous soft tannins fill in every gap, making your palate feel full and complete. With such high-quality "super Bordeaux" at this affordable price, I'd love to buy a case!

English pairs.original: This wine’s “sweet and fragrant” personality will quickly awaken your taste buds. After only three years of aging, it has already exuded a rich truffle aroma, wrapped in the fruity fragrance of creamy blueberries and black goji berries, like rolling waves. The numerous soft tannins fill every inch of space, satisfying the entire palate. Such good-quality “Bordeaux Superieur” with such an affordable price, please give me a dozen!
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的“甜美馥郁”个性会迅速激发你的味蕾。仅仅经过三年陈酿，它已经释放出浓郁的松露香气，包裹在浓郁的蓝莓和黑枸杞的果香中，如滚滚波涛。大量的柔软的苦味物质充满了每一寸空间，满足了整个口腔。品质如此出色的“波尔多超级”酒，价格如此合理，求求你们给我一打！

Western reviews.review: Dense, with solid tannins, the wine has too much weight for its own good. It is unbalanced with extraction, dark cocoa and licorice flavors and a massive character. Drink from 2024. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒体积大，坚实的苦味太过沉重，导致整体平衡不佳。酒中有过度提取的黑巧克力和甘草味道，酒的性格也过于强烈。建议从2024年开始饮用。 - 罗杰·沃斯

Western reviews.review: Dark in color, the wine is rich, round, ripe and lush with layers of dark red fruits, spice and espresso bean on the nose, mid-palate and finish. This is a superb Bordeaux value wine. Drink from 2022-2034. 91 Points
Western reviews.translation: 酒色深红，酒味丰富、圆润、成熟、醇厚，鼻子、口感和尾部都有黑红果类、香料和咖啡豆的层次。 这是一瓶出色的波尔多红酒，价格合理。建议2022-2034年饮用。评分：91分。

Chinese pairs.original: 醒酒三小时。这款具备了高集中度、酒体呈深黑色的佳酿展现出均衡的木桶香料、甜美的果味、岩石、树丛和干花的香味。圆滑、甜美的单宁连同那优雅、干净的果味造就了此款易饮的美酒。
Chinese pairs.new: Aged for three hours, this full-bodied wine with a deep black color showcases a balanced oak flavor, sweet fruit notes, stone, forest, and floral hints. Smooth, sweet tannins combined with elegant and clean fruit flavors make this wine easy to drink.

English pairs.original: Decanted for three hours. This darkly colored and focused wine showed a poised bouquet of oak spices, sweet fruits, stone, underbush and dried flower. Sleek and sweet tannins along with the elegantly clean fruitiness made it drinkable.
English pairs.new: 酒瓶放置三个小时后，酒色深暗，风格集中。酒香中带有橡木香料、甜水果、石头、灌木和干花的优雅气息。酒中滑顺的甜度和清晰的果味使得它变得容易入口。

Western reviews.review: 92–94. Barrel sample. Solid, firm and tannic, this is a powerful success. It has equal weight of fruit and tannins and a palate that's intensely structured and complex. For long-term aging.
Western reviews.translation: 92-94分。酒桶样品。坚实、刚性和坚硬的口感，这是一款强劲的佳酿。酒中果味和坚果味的平衡，口感结构紧密复杂。适合长期陈酿。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark, almost opaque ruby red. Aromas are a lifted plum with a greengage/gooseberry edge. Palate is a zippy, fresh, modern style - a little green. There is good acidity & clean vanilla/cinnamon oak, balanced by warming alcohol. Lasts well but finish has green, zippy plum notes. 11/16 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的暗红色葡萄酒，几乎透不见光。酒香中有浓郁的浆果味，带有青柠和绿 gooseberry 的微妙调和。口感清新活泼，现代风格，略带青涩。酒中有适当的酸度和干净的香草/肉桂橡木味，平衡了温暖的酒精。酒尾持久，但尾韵中仍有青涩的浆果味。评分：11/16

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby, opaque core, purple reflections, delicate bright rim. Ripe plum fruit underlay with subtle nougat, fine tobacco notes, an inviting bouquet. Juicy, elegant, pronounced fruit core, fine tannins, chocolaty finish, persistent, it is a substantial food wine.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，透明核心，紫色反射，细致亮边。成熟的浆果底调，微妙的果仁，细致的烟草香气，令人垂涎的香气。果酱般的口感，优雅的风格，果实核心明显，细致的纤维，巧克力般的尾韵，持久，适合与丰盛食物配对的佳酿。

Western reviews.review: Surprisingly good, with soft, round textures and plenty of fresh, ripe plums, black cherry, dark chocolate and espresso. Drink this medium bodied, plush wine now, or age it a few years for more complexity. For Pomerol, where everything is expensive, this offers good value. 90 Points
Western reviews.translation: 惊喜！这款红酒的口感柔和细腻，充满新鲜的浓郁黑桃、黑杏、巧克力和咖啡的味道。这种中等体积的红酒现在就可以饮用，也可以放几年让它变得更加复杂。考虑到波美罗地区的高昂价格，这款红酒提供了很好的价值。评分：90分。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark black/red color, is pretty much opaque. Aromas are of ripe black-cherry and chocolate. Black fruits on the palate are ripe, there is balance acidity & rounded, supple tannins that become slightly drying on the mid palate. Alcohol is on the warm side & the finish has fair length. Currently the wine is slightly out of balance. 11/14 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的黑红色，几乎完全不透明。酒中有熟黑樱桃和巧克力的香气。口感上黑果熟透，酸度平衡，纤维柔软，中口略微干燥。酒精度温和，尾部持久。目前酒品略显失衡。评分：11/14

Chinese pairs.original: 温润甜美、清新爽朗是Fourcas Dupre 2019的主旋律。鲜甜多汁的莓果味道背后伴随着流畅的酸度，让本就柔和的酒体更显清爽雅致。可可粉般的单宁兼具质感和力量，陈年之后会更加适饮。
Chinese pairs.new: Smooth, sweet, and refreshing, Fourcas Dupre 2019 is the perfect harmony. Luscious, juicy flavors of ripe berries are balanced by a smooth acidity, making the already soft palate feel even fresher and more refined. The velvety tannins add texture and depth, and will only improve with age.

English pairs.original: Fourcas Dupre 2019’s main themes are roundness and freshness. The juicy berries are accompanied by fluent acidity, making the round body even more refined and cultivated. cocoa-like tannins have both texture and strength, providing more longevity and nuances of layers on the finish.
English pairs.new: 四克萨斯杜普雷2019的主要特点是圆润和新鲜。 juicy的浆果伴随着流畅的酸度，使圆润的身体更加细腻和文雅。 巧克力味的苦味有着既有质感又有力量的特点，提供了更长久的持久性和复杂的层次感。

Western reviews.review: This is a structured wine with fine tannins that will allow it to age. Black currant fruits and spice come together in a concentrated bond. The wine needs plenty of time, wait to drink until 2025. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 这是一个结构紧凑的红酒，具有细腻的橡皮质，能够耐久储存。黑currant果味和香料融合在一起，形成浓缩的味道。该酒需要充足的时间，建议等待2025年才能饮用。- 罗杰·沃斯

Western reviews.review: This superb value wine is really showing well. The fresh, fleshy wine is packed with sweet, ripe cassis, bright, crisp plums and black cherries. Round, soft and polished, with lift and energy in the long finish, this is one of the best buys for Cabernet Sauvignon Left Bank Bordeaux . Drink from 2022-2034. 91 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的价格非常合理，品质也非常出色。酒中充满了新鲜的黑加仑果、浓郁的黑樱桃和黑草莓的味道。酒口圆润、柔滑、光滑，尾部有明亮的感觉，这是左岸波尔多地区最好的卡贝网酒之一。建议在2022-2034年内饮用。评分：91分。

Western reviews.review: Inky bright purple core and hue. Pure nose is showing dark plum, cassis, liquorice and mild oak. Good grip and ripeness, savoury dark fruit flavours with sage, liquorice and tobacco, well-tuned oak, a fresh backbone, rounded tannin and a generous finish.
Western reviews.translation: 深紫色酒液，酒精浓度高。酒香清晰，展现出浓郁的浆果、黑加仑、甘草和轻微的橡木味。酒体丰富，口感圆润，带有烟草、甘草和黑加仑的复杂果味，橡木味平衡，酒尾长而圆润。

Chinese pairs.original: 此酒的香气具有微微的三级香气，比如红茶叶和仓库味，但整体依然出乎意料的新鲜和活泼。多矿物的口感亦充满多肉的果味及强劲的单宁。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine has a subtle tertiary aroma, reminiscent of tea leaves and a hint of warehouse notes, yet it remains surprisingly fresh and lively overall. The minerality is accompanied by rich fruit flavors and robust tannins.

English pairs.original: It had a tinge of tertiary aromas such as black tea leaf and barnyard, but overall it's unexpectedly fresh and lively on scent. Revealing lots of fleshy fruit on the tannic and mineral-inflected palate.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的气味中带有次级香气，如黑茶叶和谷仓的味道，但整体来说它的气味非常新鲜和活泼。口感上充满了丰富的果肉味，矿物质和苦味的味道也很明显。

Western reviews.review: In der Nase vom Holz geprägt, die Frucht dahinter ist ein Mix aus roten und dunklen Beeren, ein Hauch Sahne schwingt mit, fein und mit Luft immer schöner werdend. Im Auftakt gradlinig, mit genau der richtigen Konzentration, gute Struktur, markante, leicht trocknende Gerbstoffe, der Wein ist lebhaft und frisch, zeigt einen rotfruchtigen, angenehm langen Abgang. Kann reifen. 2026-2038 (April 2021)
Western reviews.translation: 在鼻子里，酒的气味是木质的，之后是红色和黑色浆果的混合，轻微的奶油味也在其中，酒越来越好，越来越香。酒的开头是直接的，酒精度合适，结构良好，酒中的颜料味道明显，略带干燥，酒是活泼的，新鲜的，酒尾是红色浆果的味道，很长，很舒服。酒可以继续陈化。推荐陈化时间：2026-2038（2021年4月评估）。

Western reviews.review: Floral and fresh, the black raspberries, spice and plums already show really well today. Medium-bodied, soft, polished and silky, the wine tastes and feels great. There is good freshness and energy here. 92 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感非常鲜美，黑莓、花香、香料和浆果的味道已经非常明显。酒体中等，口感柔和、光滑、细腻，非常舒适。酒中有着很好的新鲜感和活力。评分：92分。

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Karmingranat, violette Reflexe, breitere Ockerrandaufhellung. Tabakig unterlegte frische Kirschfrucht, Nuancen von Lakritze, rotbeeriger Touch, etwas Edelholz. Mittlere Komplexität, rote Frucht, integrierte, noch etwas spröde Tannine, mineralisch im Abgang, zartes Nougat im Finish.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一份红酒评论。以下是翻译成中文：

深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，橙色边缘。烟熏味的新鲜樱桃果味，薄荷糖味，啤酒色的味道，少量的高档木头味。中等复杂度，红果味，整合良好，尚有些坚韧的苦味，矿物质味在尾部，轻微的奶油味在尾部。

注：我尝试用更适合中国消费者的语言来描述红酒的特点，避免使用过于专业或陌生的术语。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, dezente Randaufhellung, reife Herzkirschen, feine Kräuterwürze, tabakige Nuancen, rauchiger Touch. Mittlerer Körper, seidige Textur, etwas verwässert, zarte Tannine, dezente Extraktsüße im Abgang, wirkt bereits gut antrinkbar, bietet unkompliziertes Trinkvergnügen.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮，熟透的樱桃味，细微的香草味，烟熏味，烟草味。中等体积，细滑的口感，略微稀释，细微的坚果味，尾部有轻微的果汁甜味，口感已经很好，提供简单舒适的饮用体验。

Western reviews.review: Dark young ruby with a purple hue. A youthful nose with some meaty and leathery notes, some new oak, wild berries and dry spices. The palate shows medium weight, a young and firm backbone, juicy ripe fruit, a slight tannic presence and fresh acidity, medium to long finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色，带有紫色调。酒香中有年轻的气息，带有肉类和皮革的味道，新橡木的味道，野生莓果和干香料。口感中等，年轻且坚实的骨架， juicy 的成熟果肉，略带苦味的存在和新鲜的酸度，中等到长的尾部。

Chinese pairs.original: 装瓶后的Le Dragon de Quintus 2020 特别活泼，透过酒杯能够看到樱桃和奶油蓝莓在翻滚。口感清透流畅，单宁精致到隐形，收尾时淡淡的咸感巧妙地优化了酒体的结构。如果收尾时的酒精度能够更加温和将会更加出色。
Chinese pairs.new: The Le Dragon de Quintus 2020 is particularly lively after bottling, with cherry and blueberry notes swirling through the glass. The palate is crisp and smooth, with refined tannins that are almost imperceptible, and a subtle salty finish that expertly balances the wine's structure. If the finish were slightly softer, it would be even more impressive.

English pairs.original: Le Dragon de Quintus 2020 after bottling shows great vitality, with cherries and cream blueberries dancing in the glass. Transparent and smooth on the palate, with delicate and invisible tannins, this wine has an improved body structure with the help of a hint of saltiness on the finish. It would be more outstanding if the alcohol content would be milder on the finish.
English pairs.new: 龙骑士2020年酒款在瓶装后展现出极佳的活力，酒中充满了鲜红的樱桃和蓝莓的风味。口感清澈细腻，口感柔和，细微的橡皮味几乎不可察觉。这款酒的体积结构得到了盐味的帮助，更加完美。然而，如果酒中酒精含量稍微减少，酒的完美度将更为突出。

Western reviews.review: Dunkelfruchtige Nase, kühl, nobel, ein Korb voll Kirschen, Zedernholz, Cassis, verspielt. Im Gaumen fruchtbetont, saftig, klar und rein, feine, satte Frucht, mittlerer bis kräftiger Körper, die Tannine sind von sehr guter Qualität, der Wein wirkt balanciert und zeigt im Abgang eine gute Länge, endet würzig und auf einen Mix aus dunklen und roten Kirschen. (April/Mai 2021)
Western reviews.translation: 深色果味的鼻子，冷清清，高贵，一个满满的樱桃篮子，松木，黑加仑，调皮。口感果味浓郁， juicy，清澈，纯粹，细腻，饱满的果味，中等至强壮的体积，苦味物质品质极好，酒体平衡，尾部展现出良好的长度，结束时有着香味和混合黑色和红色樱桃的味道。 (2021年4月/5月)

Western reviews.review: Deep ruby, opaque core, purple reflections, faint brightening on rim. Fresh black sweet cherry, a hint of plum, fine nougat, floral nuances. Juicy, elegant, ripe cherry good balance, freshly structured, ripe tannins, good length and ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，透明核心，紫色反射，杯口微微发亮。新鲜黑甜樱桃，浓郁的浆果味，细腻的果仁，花香细微。果香浓郁，典雅，成熟的樱桃，平衡好，结构新鲜，成熟的苦味，长尾和成熟潜力。

Western reviews.review: Opening with flowers, black cherries, black raspberries, plums and dark chocolate, the wine quickly moves to its core of soft, plush, dark red fruits. Fresh, silky and fruity, this is perfect to drink while waiting for the Grand Vin to develop. The wine is a blend of 85% Merlot and 15% Cabernet Franc, 15.2% ABV. 90-92
