Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的开头是花朵、黑樱桃、黑莓、黑杏和黑巧克力的香气，随后迅速转变为软绵、丰富的黑红果味。新鲜、丝滑、果香的口感，让人感觉非常舒适。这种酒适合在等待Grand Vin成熟的过程中饮用。酒精含量为15.2%，酒款为85%梅洛和15%卡波弗朗克。评分：90-92。

Western reviews.review: Ample fruits, evenly distributed and seemingly suspended on the palate. Moderate concentration, highly refreshing, lean, and savoury, giving a fairly long and lean finish. Oak is quite dominant at this stage, to be integrated.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感丰富，果味充足，均匀分布在口中。酒体中等，清新、干净、带有明显的矿物质味道，口感长而干净。现在的木头味道较为浓郁，需要在后期与酒体融合。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Fourcas Hosten 是2023年份Listrac Medoc 产区最具结构感的葡萄酒，单从力量感来考量，它甚至不逊色于列级庄。收尾时的单宁稍显倔强，会让品鉴它的人感受到一丝紧张。淡淡的咸感是这款酒的王牌，它如同云梯一般，将所有味道元素都提升到了更高的层次。再次强调，如果单宁能够更加细腻，这款酒无疑将更加出众。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau Fourcas Hosten 是2023年份Listrac Medoc 产区最具结构感的葡萄酒，单从力量感来看，它甚至不输给顶级庄园。收尾时的单宁略显坚韧，会让品尝者感到一丝紧张感。淡淡的咸味是这款酒的亮点，它像一座云梯，将所有味道元素提升到了更高的层次。再次强调，如果单宁更加细腻，这款酒无疑会更加出色。

English pairs.original: Chateau Fourcas Hosten in the 2023 vintage of the Listrac Medoc appellation stands out as one of the most structured wines, rivaling even the classified growths in terms of power. The lingering tannins at the finish may evoke a slight tension for those tasting it. However, the subtle saline touch serves as its ace in the hole, elevating all flavor components to a higher level, akin to a stairway to the heavens. It bears repeating that if the tannins were to become even smoother, this wine would undoubtedly excel even further.
English pairs.new: 2023年，Listrac Medoc产区的Chateau Fourcas Hosten红酒以其结构完善的特点而脱颖而出，甚至与被分类的葡萄园相比，拥有同等的力量。酒尾的持久口感可能会让品酒者感到轻微的紧张感。但是，微妙的盐味却成为它的绝招，提升了所有的风味成分，使其达到新的高度，犹如通往天堂的阶梯。如果口感更加平滑，这款红酒将无疑会更上一层楼。

Western reviews.review: This wine presents a blend of expressive fruitiness and subtle savouriness, creating complexity both on the nose and palate. It boasts great depth with layers of flavours, offering a juicy yet airy sensation. The finish is fairly long, leaving a lasting impression.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒呈现出丰富的果香和细微的干酪味，既在鼻子里又在口中展现出复杂的风味。它具有深度的层次结构，呈现出水果的清新感和空气感。酒尾较长，留下持久的印象。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark black-purple color is very nearly opaque. The pure blackcurrant fruit is quite restrained. The wine's blackcurrant fruit is overlaid by meaty touches, opening to a licoricey core. The wine is of mid-weight & the alcohol is balanced. Fine tannins give plentiful firm, cedary grip. The finish is quite drying with notes of graphite, cedar & black-fruit. 04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深暗的紫黑色，几乎透不见光。酒中的黑currant果味很有约束。酒中的黑currant果味被肉类的味道所覆盖，逐渐展现出一根焦糖的核心。酒的重量在中等偏上，酒精度量很好。细致的纤维素提供了丰富的坚实的松木味道。酒尾干燥，带有石墨、松木和黑果的味道。评分：4.24分（ep）DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Giscours 并没有出现2003年份“又熟又青”的问题，淡淡的松柏气息很好地融入到石榴和红枣的芬芳中。虽然这款酒的口感不够修长，但入口时展现出的爆发力还是很好地展现了Chateau Giscours 的经典特点。陈年21年后的单宁依然还有些硬朗，继续陈年10年左右，才能充分舒展开来。（60%赤霞珠，40%美乐）
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau Giscours 没有出现2003年份的熟又青问题，松柏气息轻微地融入到石榴和红枣的香气中。虽然口感不够长长，但入口时的爆发力仍然展现了Chateau Giscours 的经典特点。陈年21年后的单宁仍然有些硬朗，继续陈年10年左右，才能完全展开。

English pairs.original: Chateau Giscours avoids the overripe yet green issues often seen in 2003, integrating the scent of pine and cypress beautifully with the fragrances of pomegranate and red dates. While the palate may not be the most elongated, the burst of flavor upon entry splendidly showcases the classic traits of Chateau Giscours. Even after 21 years, the tannins are still a bit robust; about another decade of aging will allow it to fully unfold. (60% Cabernet Sauvignon, 40% Merlot)
English pairs.new: 格斯库尔酒庄（Chateau Giscours）成功避免了2003年常见的过熟但又带有青涩味的特点，巧妙地融合了松柏和柏树的香气与枣子和红枣的芳香。虽然口感可能不够长长，但酒庄的入口瞬间爆发出的风味却完美展现了格斯库尔酒庄的经典特征。即使经过21年的陈酿，酒中的天然纤维仍然略带坚韧，预计再过十年左右的陈酿时间，酒庄的风味将会完全展现出来。 (酒款：60%卡波弗列（Cabernet Sauvignon）+40%梅洛（Merlot）)

Western reviews.review: This is full and powerful, with loads of fruit and a tropical undertone of berries and mango. Loads of tannins in this big wine, but still very fresh. This needs more time than the 2000.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒充满力道，果味丰富，带有浓郁的莓果和芒果风味。这种大型红酒中含有大量的苦味物质，但仍然非常新鲜。这款红酒需要比2000年更长的时间来发酵。

Western reviews.review: Aromas of blackberry, black olives and licorice. Medium- to full-bodied, with velvety tannins and a fruity finish. Refined and nicely done.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中有黑莓、黑橄榄和甘草的味道。口感中等到丰富，具有细滑的口感和果香的尾韵。整体来说是精致且做得很好。

Western reviews.review: Giscours should be taken seriously by consumers as the quality has been ratcheted up over the last 7-8 years. The deep ruby/purple-hued 2003 offers complex, evolved aromatics of wood smoke, chocolate, charcoal, black cherry jam, and cassis. Lush, medium to full-bodied, and broad, with low acidity, copious glycerin, and a layered, persistent finish (it lasts for 40+ seconds), this beauty can be drunk now or cellared for 15 years.
Western reviews.translation: 吉斯库尔（Giscours）酒庄近7-8年来品质有了显著提高，消费者应该认真对待。深红紫色的2003年吉斯库尔酒展现出复杂的、进化的香气，包括木烟、巧克力、焦炭、黑樱桃酱和黑加仑等。酒体丰富、浓郁，口感宽广，酸度较低，含有丰富的甘油，持久的尾韵（持续40秒以上），这瓶美酒可以立即享用，也可以储存15年。

Western reviews.review: In normal vintages it's velvety and rich, but Giscours seems to have gone over the top in 2003. The fruit is certainly there, generally fresh, but there is an underlying sense of over-ripeness, which needs to be better integrated: Hopefully this will happen as time goes on. For the moment, it’s a question mark.
Western reviews.translation: 在正常年份下，吉斯库尔的红酒是细腻而丰富的，但是在2003年，它似乎已经走到了极限。果味确实存在，通常是新鲜的，但是在底层却有一个过熟的感觉，这需要更好地融合：希望随着时间的推移，这会发生。目前，它是一个问号。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Lamothe Bergeron 2023 在柔润度方面的良好表现有目共睹，精细的萃取加上良好的成熟度，让一款Haut-Medoc 享受到了Saint-Julien 才有的醇厚。该年份的烘焙香气比较突出，但考虑到其相对成熟的多酚，陈年1-2年之后，我们会看到盛开的花果芬芳。
Chinese pairs.new:
Chateau Lamothe Bergeron 2023

This wine shines in its velvety texture, with refined extraction and good maturity, giving a Haut-Medoc the richness of Saint-Julien. The baked aromas are prominent in this vintage, but considering its relatively mature tannins, we can expect a floral and fruity bouquet to bloom after 1-2 years of aging.

English pairs.original: Chateau Lamothe Bergeron 2023 has garnered widespread acclaim for its excellent smoothness, achieved through meticulous extraction and optimal ripeness, allowing this Haut-Medoc to rival the richness of a Saint-Julien. While the toasted aromas are prominent in this vintage, given its relatively mature polyphenols, we can expect blossoming floral and fruity aromas after aging for 1-2 years.
English pairs.new: 查托拉莫特贝格雷隆 2023 年红酒获得了广泛的赞誉，主要是因为其细腻的口感，这得益于精心的提取和最佳成熟度，使得这个黑地产能够与圣朱利安相媲美。虽然这个年份的烤香气味比较突出，但考虑到其相对成熟的多酚成分，我们可以预计在1-2年后，会有花香和水果香气的爆发。

Western reviews.review: Ausdrucksstark, noch von Röstnoten geprägt, dunkle Beeren frucht, strahlend, klar; darüber florale Noten; cremig am Gaumen, knackige Frucht, gestützt von perfekt reifem Tannin, sehr balanciert, hat Zug und Länge, endet rotfruchtig.
Western reviews.translation: 强烈的口感，仍然带有焦糖味，黑色浆果果味，闪闪发光，清澈；上面有花朵的香味；口感丰富，果味清脆，坚果味的支持，完美成熟的苦味，非常平衡，具有张力和长度，结尾是红色浆果味。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark purple-ruby color is not quite opaque. The wine has a purple rim.  The restrained fruit aromas are of black-plums. The palate is rich & very ripe with black plum & blackberry fruit. The wine is medium to full bodied with smooth graphite notes. The attractive oak comes with chocolatey notes & cinnamon spices. The finish has juicy blackcurrant fruit with a touch of cedary grip. The finish lasts quite well. 04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的紫红色，酒液不完全透明，酒液边缘呈紫色。酒中有着黑浆果的芬芳。口感丰富，黑浆果和黑莓果味浓郁。酒体中等到中高，具有光滑的石墨质感。酒中有着可爱的橡木味，带有巧克力和肉桂的香气。酒尾有着 juicy 的黑加仑果味，带有松木的紧绷感。酒尾持久。 评分：04/24 (ep) DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 占地2.7公顷、年产量仅5000到6000瓶的车库酒庄。平均树龄45年的葡萄树种植在砾石为主的土壤之上。不锈钢桶发酵；100%的新橡木桶。在11月与Guillaume Thienpont一起进行桶边试饮，Guillaume如今只参与Le Pin葡萄园的管理，而Le Pin的葡萄酒则是由Guillaume的叔叔Jacques Thienpont所酿。相比2015年份的副牌酒Trilogie更为紧闭，但要新鲜许多，富有大量黑色水果味和岩石般的矿物质；此酒的香气亦散发出少许花香以及深邃的清咖和香料味。这款风格颇为严肃的佳酿完美诠释了Thienpont家族的酿酒理念。口中高质量单宁所带来的圆润及丝滑真的非常宜人。
Chinese pairs.new:
这是一家产量极低的车库酒庄，占地2.7公顷，年产量仅5000到6000瓶。葡萄树平均年龄45年，种植在主要是砾石的土壤上。酒庄使用不锈钢桶发酵，并且100%的新橡木桶。 

在11月与Guillaume Thienpont一起进行了桶边试饮。相比2015年份的副牌酒Trilogie，这款酒更为紧闭，但更为新鲜。它富有大量黑色水果味和岩石般的矿物质。酒的香气散发出少许花香以及深邃的清咖和香料味。这款风格严肃的佳酿完美诠释了Thienpont家族的酿酒理念。酒口中高质量单宁所带来的圆润及丝滑非常宜人。

English pairs.original: A ‘vin de garage’ that possesses merely 2.7 hectares vineyards with a tiny production between 5000-6000 bottles a year. An average of 45 years old vines planted on gravel predominately soils. Fermented in stainless steel tanks; 100% new oaks. Barrel tasting in November with Guillaume Thienpont, Guillaume is now just involved in the management of Le Pin's vineyards, but the wines are made by Guillaume's uncle Jacques Thienpont. Tighter but much fresher than the 2015 Trilogie (second wine), which showed an abundance of black fruits and stone-like minerality; the scent also presented a tinge of flowers as well as the depths include black coffee and spices. It's a serious wine that perfectly reflected the winemaking philosophy of the Thienpont family. The roundness and silkiness of the quality tannins were particularly admirable in the mouth.
English pairs.new: 一款“酒窖酒”（vin de garage），拥有仅有2.7公顷的葡萄园，年产量仅在5000-6000瓶之间。平均年龄45年的葡萄栽培在主要是花岗岩土壤中。使用不锈钢储存罐进行发酵；100%新橡木桶。11月份与Guillaume Thienpont一起进行了酒桶品尝，Guillaume目前仅参与了Le Pin葡萄园的管理，但酒款由Guillaume的叔叔Jacques Thienpont制作。与2015年Trilogie（二级酒款）相比，这款酒更紧致但更清新，展现了丰富的黑果和石质矿物质，酒香中也带有花朵的香气，以及深度中的黑咖啡和香料。是一款严肃的酒款，完美地体现了Thienpont家族的酿酒哲学。酒中质感丰富的纤维特别值得赞赏。

Western reviews.review: Good things come to those that wait. Due to the higher than normal sugar levels in the wine, 2015 Le Pin was not able to be tasted during the premiers. This stunner was certainly worth waiting for. Deep ruby in color, with truffle, floral, black and blue fruit and a touch of kirsch in the nose, the wine shows a lush, silky, decadent, mouth feel. The opulent finish does not quit, as the spicy cherry griotte, kirsch, marzipan and clay tinged finish lasts close to 60 seconds! The wine reached 14.2% alcohol with a pH of 3.72, produced from 100% Merlot, the wine is aging in 100% new, French oak barrels. If you cannot afford a bottle, and not many people can, try and find a rich friend that is lucky enough to buy the wine. It is going to be hard to find as only 500 cases were made this year. 99 Points
Western reviews.translation: 等待就是为了拥有这样的美酒。由于本酒的糖含量较高，2015年莱平（Le Pin）在首次品酒会上无法进行品尝。等待的确是值得的。酒色深红，鼻子中充满了松露、花香、黑色和蓝色水果以及一丝柠檬酒香。酒口滑润、丰富、豪华，口感极其舒适。酒尾丰富多彩，持续近60秒，带有香料樱桃、柠檬酒、杏仁和泥土味。酒精含量14.2%，pH值为3.72，100%梅洛（Merlot）葡萄制成，全部陈酿于新法兰克（French）橡木桶中。如果你无法负担起一瓶，很少有人能买得起，试着找一个有钱的朋友，希望他们能买到这瓶酒。因为今年只生产了500箱，很难找到。评分99分。

Chinese pairs.original: Blason d’Issan 在2022年份依旧保持着鲜爽多汁的特点。从这些年期酒的表现来看，迪仙副牌的酒体变得越来越柔和，感觉在年轻时就可以无限畅饮。轻轻摇杯之后，山楂果和樱桃汁跃然而出，流淌过味蕾。尽管收尾时果香并不算复杂，但小巧玲珑的风格很招人喜欢。
Chinese pairs.new:
Blason d'Issan 在2022年份依旧保持着鲜爽多汁的特点。从这些年期酒的表现来看，迪仙副牌的酒体变得越来越柔和，感觉在年轻时就可以无限畅饮。轻轻摇杯之后，山楂果和樱桃汁跃然而出，流淌过味蕾。尽管收尾时果香并不算复杂，但小巧玲珑的风格很招人喜欢。

Translated Wine Review:

Blason d'Issan remains fresh and juicy in the 2022 vintage. From the performance of these aged wines, the Blason d'Issan has become increasingly smooth, feeling like it can be enjoyed endlessly when young. After gently swirling the glass, the flavors of blackberry and cherry juice burst forth, flowing across the palate. Although the finish is not particularly complex, the charming style is very appealing.

English pairs.original: Blason d’Issan continues to showcase its juicy and refreshing characteristics in the 2022 vintage. Judging from the performance of the past few vintages, the second label of Chateau d’Issan has become increasingly smooth and can be enjoyed to the fullest in its youth. With a gentle swirl of the glass, notes of hawthorn fruit and cherry juice leap out, cascading over the taste buds. Although the finish may not be complex in terms of fruit aromas, its delicate and charming style is still very appealing.
English pairs.new: 伊桑庄园的第二酒牌，伊桑庄园二酒牌，继续展现出2022年的果香和清新特征。根据过去几年的表现，伊桑庄园二酒牌越来越平滑，年轻时可以享受到最好的效果。轻轻摇晃玻璃杯， Hawthorn 果和樱桃汁的香气会跳跃出来，冲击味蕾。虽然尾部可能不复杂，但其细腻和迷人的风格仍然非常吸引人。

Western reviews.review: Roses and red fruits combine in the perfume, while soft, silky, red, and black, creamy fruits combine on the palate and in the elegant, sweet, cherry-packed finish. Give this a year to soften, and it will be perfect for near term drinking while waiting for the Grand Vin to develop. The wine blends 55% Merlot, 44% Cabernet Sauvignon and 1% Petit Verdot. Drink from 2025-2035. 89-91 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中，玫瑰和红果的香味相互融合，而口感则是柔软、滑顺的红黑色浓郁果味，完美的结尾带有甜美的樱桃味。建议将其放置一年，让它变得更加柔和，然后可以在等待Grand Vin成熟的过程中享用。该酒的混合比例为55%梅洛、44%卡波弗雷和1%佩蒂·韦尔多。建议在2025-2035年内饮用。评分：89-91分。

Western reviews.review: Wie sein grosser Bruder, mit etwas weniger Tiefgang aber nicht weniger Reiz. Feiner Gaumen, schlank und elegant, präzise Gerbstoffe, knackige Frucht, das hat Charme, eine sehr gute Länge und wird früh Spass machen. Ein Hit. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / Vintex / Château Ripeau) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒就像他的大哥一样，虽然没有那么深入，但同样有吸引力。口感细腻，瘦长而优雅，精确的橡木味，新鲜的果味，非常有魅力，酒龄长，很快就会让人感到愉快。是一款非常好的红酒。

Western reviews.review: Un joli nez intense, qui offre de la fraîcheur et de la puissance. Il exprime les notes de framboise fraîche, de petits fruits mûrs frais et plus légèrement – de violette, associées à des touches de mûre sauvage pulpeuse ainsi qu’à des pointes de fève tonka, de lys, d’épices, à une fine pointe variétale noble. La bouche est joliment fraiche, juteuse, joliment tendue et acidulée et offre de l’élégance, de la gourmandise, tout en équilibre. Elle exprime les notes de mûre pulpeuse/juteuse, de framboise fraiche/croquante et plus légèrement – de cassis éclatant/acidulé, associées à des touches de bleuet, de violette et de minéralité racée, ainsi qu’à des fines pointes d’épices, de bergamote/infusion et à une pointe de fève tonka. Une pointe saline en fin de bouche/persistance. Une jolie fraicheur, minéralité et du soyeux. Une belle persistance sapide.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶美丽的红酒，具有强烈的香气，带来清新和力量。它展现出新鲜莓果、成熟的小水果和轻微的紫罗兰花香，以及野生浆果和豆蔻的味道，伴随着一丝丝的高级香气。口感清新、丰富、细腻、酸甜，具有优雅和丰富的口感，展现出浆果的味道、新鲜莓果的味道和轻微的黑currant酸甜味，伴随着蓝莓、紫罗兰花香和矿物质的味道，以及细腻的香气和柚子茶的味道。口感结束时带有一丝盐味。整体口感清新、矿物质和细腻，具有持久的酸甜味。

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby garnet colour with opaque core and purple reflections, delicate brightening on the rim. Delicate floral nuances, a hint of purples, dark wild berries in the background, tobacco notes, inviting bouquet. Juicy, elegant, red fruit nuances, fine acidity, mineral and salty finish, a finesse food wine.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色调，透明中心，紫色反射，酒杯边缘有细微的光泽。花香细腻，带有紫色调，暗黑浓郁的黑莓在背景中，烟草味道，令人垂涎的香气。果香丰富，细腻，红果味，酸度细腻，矿物质和咸味的尾韵，细腻的食用葡萄酒。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark, not quite opaque purple-red color. The aromas have a lifted violet perfume overlaid by cedary oak. The palate has a nice balance between freshness & concentrated dark-fruit. The tannins aree fine & dusty - the alcohol seems balanced. The oak gives the wine good grip & some cedar notes, but they are well-integrated. The finish shows firm, juicy dark-plum & ripe red-cherry, the juicy, lifted fruit lasts well & ends fresh. 04/23 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的紫红色，接近透明。酒香中有轻盈的紫罗兰香水味，覆盖着松木的香气。口感平衡，新鲜的水果与浓郁的黑果相互平衡。酒中的纤维素细致，略带尘土味，酒精度量合适。松木味给酒带来了坚实的感觉和些许松木香气，但整体融合得很好。尾韵中有坚实的黑浆果和成熟的红樱桃，水果的鲜味持久，最后留下清新的感觉。评分：4.23（ep）DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 期酒时我就说过，相对于热年份，Chateau Carlmagnus 在温和年份的单宁似乎更加柔和，令石灰岩的风土特性更加突出。果香清澈灵动，酸度清爽怡人，酸甜可口的话梅和酸枣芳香萦绕酒杯，满满的都是自然之气。
Chinese pairs.new: Tasting this wine, I've said before that in cooler vintages, the tannins of Chateau Carlmagnus seem softer, allowing the limestone terroir to shine through. The fruit is bright and lively, with crisp acidity that's refreshing and delightful. Flavors of sweet plum and tangy apricot linger in the glass, full of natural charm.

English pairs.original: During the en primeur tasting, I mentioned how, Chateau Carlmagnus seems to have softer tannins in moderate vintages, making the limestone terroir characteristics more pronounced. The fruit aromas are clear and lively, with a refreshing and pleasant acidity. The delightful blend of sour plum and sour date aromas lingers around the glass, exuding a natural essence.
English pairs.new: 在品酒会上，我提到，查塔欧卡尔曼斯在中等年份的葡萄酒中，似乎具有较软的橡皮质，更加突出了石灰质土壤的特征。果香清晰生动，带有清新和愉悦的酸度。酸性葡萄和酸性枣子的香气组合令人愉悦，持续在玻璃中挥之不去，散发着天然的香气。

Western reviews.review: Genuine and spicy tones show notes of black plums, blackberries, myrtle and subtle mixed Indian spices. Medium body, soft tannins little bite and a balanced finish of good taste and classicism. A blend of 95% Merlot and 5% Cabernet Franc. Drink now.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的真性和辣味，展现出黑杏、黑莓、山茶花和微妙的印度混合香料的风味。中等体积，软的苦味，微微的咬感和平衡的口感，充满了典雅黑的风味。酒中含有95%的梅洛和5%的卡波弗朗克。建议立即饮用。

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Rubinrot. Die Nase ist etwas verhalten, dezent reduktiv, braucht etwas Zeit, zeigt dann Kirschen und Pflaumenaromen. Im Gaumen straff, merklich Tannin, dieses ist reif, feine Säure, im mittleren Gaumen mit einem kleinen Durchhänger und im Abgang rotfruchtig und eher kurz. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2022. Dourthe)
Western reviews.translation: 深红色。酒鼻有些谨慎，低调的酸度，需要时间才能展现出樱桃和石榴的香味。口感紧致，明显的橡皮味，酸度细腻，中口略有延续感，尾部果香浓郁，较短。 (2022年4月在Dourthe酒庄品尝的“En Primeur”版)

Chinese pairs.original: 在采收前，我参观了Chateau Haut-Brisson的葡萄田，当时很担心排水性较强的土壤无法帮助它度过干旱的2022年。品鉴期酒时，那股熟悉的舒畅感让我长舒了一口气。摇杯之后满是浓郁的黑色浆果芬芳。得益于低温浸渍和轻柔萃取，单宁的质感十分柔和，是一款非常适合早饮的浓郁型圣爱美隆。
Chinese pairs.new: Before harvest, I visited the vineyards of Chateau Haut-Brisson, worrying that the soil's high water permeability wouldn't help it survive the dry 2022 year. But when I tasted the wine, that familiar sense of comfort washed over me. After swirling, the glass was filled with the intense aroma of dark fruit. Thanks to cold soak and gentle extraction, the tannins feel incredibly smooth, making it a perfect choice for early drinking, a rich Saint-Émilion.

English pairs.original: Before the harvest, I visited the vineyards of Chateau Haut-Brisson and was worried that the well-draining soil would not help it survive the dry summer of 2022. However, when tasting the wine En Primeur, I was relieved when feeling the familiar sense of smoothness. A rich aroma of blackberries emerged after swirling the glass. Thanks to the low-temperature maceration and gentle extraction, the texture of the tannins was very soft, making it a rich Saint-Emilion wine that is perfect for early consumption.
English pairs.new: 我在收获前造访了Chateau Haut-Brisson的葡萄园，担心干燥的夏天会影响葡萄的成熟。但是在品尝En Primeur的葡萄酒时，我感到放心，因为它仍然保持着熟悉的光滑感。旋转玻璃杯后，黑莓的香气开始显现。低温浸泡和轻柔的提取使得橡胶的质地非常柔软，使得它成为一个适合早期消费的富有魅力的圣埃米利翁葡萄酒。

Western reviews.review: On the palate, the wine is medium-bodied, forward, soft and fruity, with a chalky nuance in the plummy finish. The wine blends 95% Merlot with 5% Cabernet Franc. Drink from 2025-2038. 91-93 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 口感上，这款红酒中等体积，前端果香浓郁，口感柔和，带有石灰质的矿物质味道，尾部有浓郁的黑杏味。该酒以95%的梅洛和5%的卡波弗朗克为主。建议2025-2038年饮用。评分：91-93分。

Western reviews.review: Shows a fantastic dynamic in the wine. Ample, airy, luminous. Moderate concentration and complexity, but full of details and definition on all fronts. They have added some plots from limestone soils 2021 that show its potential better in 2022.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒展现出极好的风格。酒体丰富、清爽、光亮。酒中有适中的浓度和复杂性，但在各个方面都有细节和定义。他们在2021年添加了来自石灰质土壤的新葡萄园，这使得2022年的酒表现更好。

Western reviews.review: Das faszinierende an diesem Wein sind die intensiven Veilchenaromen in der Nase, da wähnt man sich in einem delikaten Barolo, wären da nicht dunkelfruchtige Untertöne. Im Gaumen cremig, rund, sehr schöne Frucht, top feines, nicht überbordendes Tannin. Im Abgang lang, feinwürzig, rotfruchtig und frisch. Wunderbar und sicherlich schon früh mit Spass zu trinken. 2028-2050+ (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / Vintex / Château Ripeau) #primeurs22 #vignoblesk
Western reviews.translation: 这个红酒最吸引人的地方是鼻子里强烈的紫罗兰香气，仿佛置身于一杯精致的巴罗洛中，除非有深色的果味调和。口感丰富、圆润，非常美好的果味，非常细腻的、不显得过度的坚果味。尾部长长，细腻、红果味和清新。非常好喝，值得早早享受。预计可享受时间：2028-2050年。 (2023年4月在原酒庄品尝，Château Ripeau) #primeurs22 #vignoblesk

Western reviews.review: Nez racé, bien mené et offre une jolie fraicheur, un joli côté poivré ainsi que de la profondeur dans sa fraicheur. On y retrouve des notes de violette, de cassis et plus légèrement de petites baies fraiches associées à des touches de poivre ainsi qu’à des pointes de tabac blond frais ainsi qu’à une discrète pointe de bleuet. La bouche est joliment minérale, équilibrée et offre de la fraicheur, de la souplesse, du gras, de la gourmandise, une certaine petite onctuosité, de la justesse ainsi qu’une trame acidulée. En bouche ce vin exprime des notes de mûre pulpeuse/crémeuse, de cassis crémeux et plus légèrement de framboise écrasée associées à des touches de prune crémeuse, à des pointes de bleuet, de muscade ainsi qu’à de fines pointes de tabac blond sucré, de vanille et de graphite. Une subtile pointe saline sur la fin de bouche / persistance. Les tannins offrent un petit moelleux.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气清新、平衡，带有美妙的清爽感和一丝辛辣的味道，深度也很好。酒中有紫罗兰、黑currant和轻微的新鲜小果的香气，以及一丝胡椒和新鲜的白烟草的味道，以及一丝蓝莓的味道。口感清新、平衡，带有清爽感、柔软感、油腻感、丰富感和酸度。口中酒体表达出浓郁的黑berry、黑currant和轻微的破碎的草莓的味道，以及一丝浓郁的黑berry、蓝莓、丁香和白烟草的味道，以及一丝糖浆、香料和石墨的味道。酒尾有细微的咸味。酒中的纤维质带有轻微的油腻感。

Chinese pairs.original: 尽管Chateau La Clemence的葡萄生长在排水性较好的土壤上，但它还是表现出了流畅的酒体，并没有任何干涩感。香气温柔迷人，足够纯净，乌梅与甘草糖和谐共处，虽没有太多复杂度，但也精致优雅，非常适合在年轻时饮用。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau La Clemence的口感流畅细腻，没有干涩感。酒中有柔和迷人的香气，纯净的乌梅和甘草糖和谐相处，虽然没有太多复杂的层次，但仍然精致优雅。它非常适合年轻时饮用。

English pairs.original: Although the grapes of Chateau La Clemence grow in well-drained soil, it still exhibits a smooth texture without any astringency. The fragrance is gentle and charming, pure enough, with harmonious coexistence of black plum and licorice sugar. Though lacking in complexity, it exudes a refined elegance and is ideal for drinking when young.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒来自Chateau La Clemence，产于有良好排水的土壤中。尽管如此，它仍然展现出细腻的口感，没有任何苦涩感。酒香温和迷人，纯粹而且充满黑杏和糖浆 licorice 的和谐。虽然它缺乏复杂性，但它却展现出优雅的品质，适合年轻时饮用。

Western reviews.review: Black fruits, chocolate, coffee bean, licorice, and spice notes create the character here. The wine is creamy, the fruits are ripe, but, there is a strong, smoky, oaky edge to the fruit on the palate that needs time to integrate. Drink from 2025-2037. 89-91 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的特点是黑果、巧克力、咖啡豆、甘草和香料的复杂风味。酒体丰富、果实成熟，但在口感中，果实被强烈的烟熏、橡木味所覆盖，需要时间来融合。建议从2025年到2037年饮用。评分：89-91分。

Western reviews.review: Offen, dezent oxidativ, dunkelfruchtig und mit deutlichen Röstaromen. Im Gaumen weich, füllig, satte, reife Frucht, sehr feines Tannin, der Wein zeigt eine Opulenz und hat doch Eleganz, hallt lange nach, endet eine Spur hitzig. Ein sehr hochwertiger Wein, der reifen kann. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / Grand Cercle / Château la Dauphine) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

开阔、低调的氧化感，深色果味和明显的焦糖味。口感柔和、丰富、饱满、成熟的果味，非常细腻的苦味，酒呈现出豪华感和优雅感，余味悠长，尾部略带热烈。是一瓶非常高品质的酒，值得长期陈酿。 (评分时间：2023年4月 / 来源：Grand Cercle / Château la Dauphine)

Western reviews.review: Le nez est frais, fruité et offre une fine intensité. Il exprime les notes de mûre crémeuse, de framboise écrasée et plus légèrement de muscade, associées à des touches de lys, de chocolat ainsi qu’à une pointe de prune écrasée et d’épices douces. La bouche est fruitée et offre de la fraicheur, de la jutosité, de la suavité, une jolie fraicheur, du gras, un petit côté enveloppant, de l’ampleur, de l’énergie. Elle exprime les notes de mûre pulpeuse/juteuse, de prune violette pulpeuse/acidulée et plus légèrement – de framboise crémeuse, associées à des touches de toasté, de chocolat ainsi qu’à des pointes de badiane, de tabac blond frais et à une pointe d’infusion et de vanille. Les tannins sont souples et sapides. Bonne longueur et définition. De l’onctuosité en fin de bouche.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气清新、果香，具有细致的强度。它展现出浓郁的黑莓、挤压的草莓和轻微的肉豆蔻的香气，伴随着花朵、巧克力和挤压的李子以及甜香料的点缀。口感果香，带有清新、果味、柔滑、清新、丰富、能量。它展现出浓郁的黑莓果肉、紫李子果肉酸味和轻微的草莓奶油，伴随着烤味、巧克力以及点缀着丁香、淡黄烟草、茶叶和香草的香气。口感柔软、丰富。口感持久、清晰。口感丰富、滑顺。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby colour, deep purple reflections. Delicate wood spice, red cherries, fine herbal savouriness, tangerine zest, some plums. Juicy, complex, chocolatey texture, mineral and salty. Well lasting, some nougat in the finish, has good length.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色酒液，深紫色反射。有细微的木质香气，红樱桃、精致的草本风味、柑橘皮、少量的李子。口感丰富、复杂、巧克力味，矿物质和咸味。持久感强，尾部有些核桃味，酒尾长度良好。

Chinese pairs.original: 2018年份的香气非常开放，草莓果粒和大黄果酱的甜美气息在杏花膏和甘草糖的陪伴下格外诱人。虽然我认为2018年份的陈年潜力并不突出，但在当下，你可以尽情享受 这款酒带来的鲜美世界。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2018 vintage is incredibly approachable, with luscious aromas of strawberry jam and blackberry compote accompanied by the sweetness of apricot jam and licorice sugar. While I don't think the 2018 vintage has particularly impressive aging potential, it's perfect for enjoying now, offering a vibrant and fresh world of flavors.

English pairs.original: The 2018 vintage has a beautiful open aroma, with sweet notes of strawberry and rhubarb jam, accompanied by apricot paste and licorice candy, making it particularly enticing. While I don’t think the 2018 vintage has exceptional aging potential, it offers a fresh and delightful experience that you can fully enjoy right now.
English pairs.new: 2018年产的红酒具有美丽的开放香气，带有甜蜜的草莓和萝卜糖浆的香味，伴随着橄榄球果酱和甘草糖果的香味，使其尤其诱人。虽然我认为2018年产的红酒没有特别的陈化潜力，但它提供了一个新鲜而愉悦的体验，让你可以立即享受。

Western reviews.review: Saint Emilion is among the most productive of all Bordeaux appellations and a source of some outstanding wines in the 2018 vintage. Château La Tour-Figeac is one of sixty or so estates with the Grand Cru Classé designation. Located between Châteaux Cheval-Blanc and Figeac, La Tour Figeac comes from a very fine neighborhood indeed. Until 1879, in fact, the estate was part of Figeac. Their 2018 is one of the best renditions of the past few decades. It shows a classic Saint Emilion style with black cherry, blackberry and a touch of red cherry fruit aromas enhanced by elements of roasted coffee, cocoa, violets, herbs and toasty oak. A blend of 70% Merlot and 30% Cabernet Franc, it displays flavors that are round, elegant and supple, with layers of plush black and red fruits interwoven with the herb, vanilla, cocoa and spice tones. The wine exhibits a harmonious style even in its youth, and the 2018 Château La Tour-Figeac will provide delicious drinking for the next twenty years and beyond.---- Wayne Belding
Western reviews.translation: 圣埃米利翁是波尔多所有产区中产量最丰富的之一，2018年产出的佳酿中也有一些杰出作品。沙特奥拉图菲加是六十多个拥有格兰克鲁克莱斯（Grand Cru Classé）称号的庄园之一。沙特奥拉图菲加位于沙特奥谢瓦尔白酒和沙特奥菲加之间，确实是一个非常优良的邻里。直到1879年，沙特奥拉图菲加庄园实际上是沙特奥菲加的一部分。他们的2018年产酒是几十年来最好的版本之一。它展现了典型的圣埃米利翁风格，具有黑樱桃、黑莓和红樱桃果香，伴有烤咖啡、可可、紫罗兰、香草和-toast oak的元素。酒款中有70%梅洛和30%卡波弗朗克，展现出圆润、优雅和柔和的口感，黑色和红色果实的层次与香草、香料、可可和香料的调和相融。即使在年轻时，这款酒也展现出和谐的风格，沙特奥拉图菲加2018年的酒款将为接下来的二十年甚至更长时间提供美味的饮用体验。

Western reviews.review: Expressiv und feminin in der Nase, wunderbar floral, rotfruchtig, etwas Anis. Im Gaumen mit Struktur und Schwung, etwas burschikos vielleicht, mit dem einen oder anderen nicht ganz ausgereiften Tannin, aber sowas von charaktervoll. 2024-2038 (Verkostet am 21. Juni 2021 im Rahmen der UGCB Probe in Genf)
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气非常丰富，带有女性般的魅力，具有迷人的花香，果香和安息香的味道。口感中有结构和流畅感，可能带有一点儿野性的味道，伴有尚未完全成熟的橡木味，但整体上非常有个性。推荐饮用时间：2024-2038（评分时间：2021年6月21日，于瑞士日内瓦举行的UGCB品酒会）。

Western reviews.review: This vineyard operated on organic principles has produced a firm, solidly structured wine. It is dense, full of tannins as much as black-currant fruits. All the elements are just beginning to come together. Drink from 2026. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 这家采用有机耕种的葡萄园生产了一款坚实、结构紧密的红酒。酒中充满了坚果味和黑加仑果的风味，所有元素正在逐渐融合。建议2026年后饮用。 - 罗杰·沃斯

Western reviews.review: Silky, sexy, fresh and vibrant, with a great core of elegantly textured fruits. The wine is aromatic, refined and with a beautiful sense of purity, lengthy and character. This is showing much better in bottle than in barrel, which is always something you want to see.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感细腻、性感、新鲜、生动，具有优雅的果酱质感。酒香浓郁、精致、纯粹，长长的尾部充满个性。这瓶酒比在酒桶中的表现要好得多，这是每个酒迷都希望看到的。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby garnet, ochre reflections, broader lightening on the rim. Tobacco on the nose with fine noble wood, dark berry fruit, black cherry and notes of cedar. Medium body, hints of ripe plum, integrated tannins, mineral and fresh on the finish. Good ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色宝石色，橙色反射，酒杯边缘更广泛的光亮。鼻子里有烟草味，精致的高贵木头，黑莓果，黑杏和cedar的香气。中等体积，成熟的浆果味，融合的纽扣，矿物质和新鲜的口感。酒龄潜力良好。

Chinese pairs.original: 经历了冰雹、火灾、高温干旱的种种挑战，Chateau Meyney 依然顽强地展现着属于它的精彩。刚将鼻子靠近酒杯，便迎来紫罗兰的盛开，紧随其后的是汁水丰满的樱桃和酸果。和其他年份相比，2022年份的单宁明显太过强劲，若收尾时的口感能够柔和一些，势必会更加优秀。
Chinese pairs.new: Despite facing challenges such as hail, fires, high temperatures and drought, Chateau Meyney still shines with its unique charm. As soon as you bring your nose close to the glass, you're greeted by the blooming lavender, followed by the juicy sweetness of cherries and tart fruits. Compared to other vintages, the tannins in the 2022 vintage are overpoweringly strong, but if the finish could be smoother, it would be truly exceptional.

English pairs.original: Despite facing various challenges such as hail, fires, and high temperatures, Chateau Meyney still impresses with its resilience. As soon as I bring the glass to my nose, I am greeted with the fragrance of violets, followed by juicy cherries and tart berries. Compared to other vintages, the tannins in the 2022 vintage are noticeably strong, if the finish could be smoother, it would undoubtedly be even better.
English pairs.new: 尽管面临各种挑战，如冰雹、火灾和高温，尚贝尼酒庄仍然令人印象深刻。 一旦我将玻璃带到鼻子下，我就被紫罗兰的香气迎接，接着是鲜红的樱桃和酸甜的浆果。 与其他年份相比，2022年份的酒精含量显著强劲，如果尾部可以更加光滑，那么它一定会更加出色。

Western reviews.review: 93-95 Barrel sample. Dense blackberry fruits go along with the rich tannins. The spicy wood flavors are a layer under the fine fruits. It has a future of ripe tannins and black fruits.
Western reviews.translation: 酒评：93-95分。酒体浓密，黑莓果味浓郁，搭配丰富的橡木味。酒中有着一层复杂的香气，未来酒体将会展现出成熟的橡木味和黑莓果味。

Western reviews.review: Leafy herbs, tobacco, currants, spice, and spearmint notes show easily in the nose, and on the long, rich palate. The wine finishes with creamy-textured currants, cocoa, spearmint, and bitter chocolate on the end note. This should age quite nicely. Drink from 2026-2045. 92-94 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中，带有叶绿植物、烟草、葡萄干、香料和薄荷的味道。口感丰富，长长的尾部留下了奶油般的葡萄干、可可、薄荷和苦巧克力的味道。这瓶红酒应该会很好地陈化。建议在2026-2045年之间饮用。评分92-94分。

Western reviews.review: Eher verhalten ist diese Nase, man sucht, man findet, lehmige Mineralik, dunkle Frucht. Im Gaumen sensationell balanciert, dicht, kernig, mit messerscharfen Tanninen, einer knackigen Frucht und grosser Länge. Ein ausgezeichneter Meyney, der im Kontext seines Preises klar zu den MUST BUYs gehört. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / CVBG / Château Belgrave) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的鼻子很谨慎，需要仔细寻找，但最终发现了泥土矿物质和深色的果味。口感惊人地平衡，浓密，坚实，带有锋利的橡胶质感，果味清脆，长长的尾部。这个梅尼（Meyney）酒在价格上非常值得购买。 (评分时间：2023年4月/ CVBG / Château Belgrave)

Western reviews.review: Le nez est frais et offre de l’intensité, de la puissance ainsi qu’un joli côté étiré, précis, fin, tendu. On y retrouve des notes de graves sèches/salines, de poivre et plus légèrement de mûre associées à des touches de petites baies sauvages, à des pointes de fumée, de graphite, à de fines pointes d’épices ainsi qu’à une subtile pointe de clou de girofle et de camphre. La bouche est fruitée, équilibrée, élégante, riche, opulente (mais en équilibre) et offre de la fraîcheur, une belle définition, de la minéralité, une trame fraîche ainsi qu’un côté aérien et compact. Un joli gras gourmand et sapide. En bouche ce vin exprime des notes de mûre pulpeuse/juteuse, de violette et plus légèrement de petites baies noires éclatantes associées à des touches de prune noire pulpeuse, de cardamome, de camphre ainsi qu’à des pointes de toasté et à une fine pointe de torréfaction. Il y a une discrète pointe de sève sur la persistance. Bonne longueur. Les tannins sont crayeux et gourmands. Bon travail sur les amers.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气清新而强烈，具有美妙的延展性，精确、细致、紧张。它带有干燥、咸味的矿物质、胡椒和轻微的黑berry，伴随着一些小型野生果实、烟雾、石墨、细致的香料和微妙的丁香和樟脑。口感丰富、平衡、优雅、丰富、豪华（但平衡）并带有清新感、美妙的定义、矿物质感、清新感和紧凑感。它有一个美妙的丰富口感和口感。口感中，酒精表达了黑berry的浓郁和黏稠感、紫罗兰和轻微的黑berry爆炸，伴随着一些黑berry浓郁、杏仁、樟脑和轻微的烤焦和微妙的焦糖。酒精中有一个微妙的点滴感。酒精有很好的持久性。牙齿是白色的和丰富的。酒精处理了苦味。

Western reviews.review: Deep ruby, opaque core, purple reflections, brightening on the rim. Black forest berries, blackberries and liquorice, tobacco spice, some nougat. Full-bodied, round and complex, dark nougat, supporting tannins, good length, chocolatey mineral finish.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，透明核心，紫色反射，边缘加亮。黑森林莓、黑莓和士力架、烟草香料、些许果仁糖。口感丰富、圆润、复杂，果仁糖味浓郁，支撑性纤维，长尾，巧克力矿物质尾韵。

chateau smith haut lafitte le petit haut.name: chateau smith haut lafitte le petit haut lafitte 2018

Chinese pairs.original: 这款酒芒果干、菠萝干的氧化类水果香气更加突出。口中的矿物感和层次感融合的非常好，圆润细滑而又不失硬朗。收口时的白胡椒感最大程度地烘托出了这款酒的活力。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts prominent oxidative fruit aromas of dried mango and pineapple. The minerality and texture meld together beautifully, offering a smooth and rounded mouthfeel without sacrificing its crispness. The white pepper notes at the finish perfectly amplify the wine's liveliness.

English pairs.original: The nose features dried mango and pineapple. The mineral notes and multi-layered structure are well integrated, tender, smooth, but still very architectural. Some white pepper-like mouth feeling contributes lots of vigor at length. As a second wine, it is highly worth trying.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的鼻子中带有干燥的芒果和菠萝的香气。矿物质的味道和多层次的结构融合得很好，柔和、光滑，但仍然非常复杂。口感中有一些白胡椒的感觉，给人带来很强的活力。作为一瓶次酒，它值得一试。

Western reviews.review: Beautiful depth, density and complexity, and a lovely spice, along with softer touches of floral aromatics. Successfully holds juice and tension through the palate. A clear feeling of family relation to its bigger sibling, Smith Haut Lafitte. Drinking Window 2021 - 2034
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒具有美丽的深度、密度和复杂性，伴有温和的香料和花朵香气。口感中成功保留了果汁和张力。与其更大的兄弟酒Smith Haut Lafitte有着明显的亲缘关系。建议饮用时间：2021年至2034年。

Western reviews.review: One of two second white wines from this top estate, this has a ripe pineapple and apple character that is enhanced by wood aging. Rich and full in the mouth, it is spicy and likely to be Best after 2022.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶来自顶级庄园的两瓶白酒之一。酒中充满了成熟的菠萝和苹果的风味，木桶陈化使其更加丰富。口感丰富饱满，带有辛辣的味道，预计2022年后最佳品尝时机。

Western reviews.review:
Plump and juicy, delivering red currant and cherry preserve flavors lined with a taut licorice edge. There's a flash of tobacco on the finish.
Barrel Sample: 89-92
Western reviews.translation:
酒体丰富饱满，带有红葡萄柚和樱桃果酱的风味，伴有紧致的甘草边缘。酒尾有烟草的闪现。

酒样评分：89-92分。

Western reviews.review: Aromas of blackberries, blueberries and fresh herbs follow through to a full body with lots of ripe fruit and a long, flavorful finish. A little warm and slightly bitter at the end. But it shows structure and intensity. Mostly cabernet sauvignon. Try after 2024.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中充满了黑莓、蓝莓和新鲜香草的味道，口感丰富，果实成熟，长长的口感充满了风味。虽然最后有一点温和和苦涩，但它展现出结构和强度。主要是卡贝网索维涅。建议在2024年后品尝。

Western reviews.review: Composed of 60% Cabernet Sauvignon and 40% Merlot matured in 20% new barriques, the 2018 Le Petit Haut Lafitte has a medium to deep garnet-purple color and expressive notions of crushed black plums, fresh blackberries and mulberries with wafts of dark chocolate, cinnamon stick and unsmoked cigars, plus a waft of bouquet garni. The medium to full-bodied palate is chock-full of juicy black fruits, framed by fine-grained tannins and well-knit freshness, finishing with an herbal lift.
Western reviews.translation: 2018年莱皮特奥哈尔菲特（Le Petit Haut Lafitte）红酒，主要由60%卡波内尔（Cabernet Sauvignon）和40%梅洛（Merlot）组成，陈酿于20%新橡木桶中。其颜色为深红色，气味中有浓郁的黑浆果、黑莓和黑莓果味，伴有巧克力、肉桂和未点燃的雪茄烟味，最后还有花卉香气。口感丰富，黑果味浓郁，细致的纤维和清新气味相互融合，最后以清新的香气结束。

Chinese pairs.original: 这款酒体颜色很深的美酒展现出妩媚的薰衣草、成熟树莓、山楂和香料的香气及些许延续到口腔中的咸矿物味，口感集中、丝滑而且均衡，伴有粉末状的单宁、活泼的果味以及略显严肃的坚实回味。
Chinese pairs.new: This full-bodied wine showcases alluring scents of lavender, ripe strawberries, quince, and spices, with a hint of salty minerality that lingers on the palate. The texture is concentrated, silky, and well-balanced, with powdery tannins, lively fruit flavors, and a serious, lingering finish.

English pairs.original: This deeply colored wine presented an enchanting perfume that opened nicely in the glass with the sniffs of lavender, ripe raspberry, hawthorn, spices and a tinge of savoury-mineral continued onto the intense, silky and poised flavours that possessed powdery tannins, lively fruitiness as well as a slightly austere and firm finish.
English pairs.new: 这款深色的红酒在玻璃中展现出迷人的香气，闻起来有玫瑰花、熟透的莓果、山楂、香料和矿物质的味道。口感丰富、滑顺、平衡，具有粉末状的坚果感、活泼的果味以及略带严肃和坚实的尾韵。

Western reviews.review: Showing maturity in color, the tobacco, earth, truffle and plum aromatics are ready to shine. Medium bodied, silky, soft and mineral driven, this is just starting to drink in its sweet spot, where it should remain for years. 91 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒展现出成熟的颜色，烟草、土壤、松露和浆果的香气已经准备好呈现。中等体积，滑顺、柔软、矿物质驱动，这瓶酒刚刚开始进入最佳饮用期，未来几年应该会保持这一状态。评分：91分。

Western reviews.review: Although it begins with austerity, its acidity and tannins dominant, the palate opens beyond its youthfulness after a few moments. It becomes dark and powerful, certainly still dryly tannic, but the fruit is generous, and the final taste is of beautiful, ripe fruits.
Western reviews.translation: 尽管这款红酒开始时显得 austerity（简约），酸度和苦味（tanins）占据主导地位，但在几分钟后，口感会展开，超越了年轻的特点。它变得深沉而强大，虽然仍然带有干酪味，但果味丰富，最后的口感是美好的，成熟的水果。

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Rubingranat, violette Randaufhellung. In der Nase feiner Blütenhonig, saftige süße Frucht, zart nach Vanille, einladendes Bukett. Am Gaumen delikat und frisch, extraktsüße Textur, feste Tannine, etwas weitmaschig im hinteren Teil, leicht zitronig, mittlere Länge.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

深红色葡萄酒，紫红色的边缘。酒鼻中有细微的花蜜香气，浓郁的甜果味，微微的香料味，令人愉悦的香气。口感轻盈，新鲜，浓郁的甜度，坚实的苦味，后端略微松散，略带柠檬味，中等长度。

Western reviews.review: Very dark ruby-red color. Rich damson aromas are quite closed at present. On the palate the rich dark fruit is very ripe, rounded & supple. The rich fruit is supported by fine, clean, cedary oak. Alcohol is balanced & the acidity is high enough to enliven the ripe fru.it. The finish is ripe and juicy & lasts extremely well. 11/10 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红宝石色。酒中的浓郁的浆果香气虽然现在还不太明显，但很有潜力。口感上，浓郁的浆果非常成熟，圆润且柔滑。浓郁的浆果被细致的干净的松木味所支持。酒中的酒精度量很好，酸度也足够高，能够让成熟的浆果味更加鲜活。酒尾是成熟的浆果味，非常 juicy，持久极好。评分：11/10

Chinese pairs.original: 相比Chanfreau旗下的其他几款酒来说，Lestage对橡木桶味道的控制更加精准，在完美融入酒体的同时能够了无痕迹。虽然这款酒香气的强度不大，但复杂度一点儿不少。当柔软的酒体划过舌尖，当丝绒般的单宁抚摸味蕾的时候，当包裹着鲜花的草莓和红李子挽手亮相的那一刻，我就明白这款酒“成了”。
Chinese pairs.new: Compared to other wines under the Chanfreau label, Lestage has a more precise control over the oak flavor, seamlessly integrating it into the wine without any noticeable residue. Although the aroma of this wine is not particularly strong, its complexity is not lacking. As the soft wine glides across the palate, the silky tannins caress the senses, and when the strawberry and cherry, wrapped in floral notes, make their appearance, I know this wine has truly come together.

English pairs.original: Compared to Chanfreau’s other wines, the Lestage shows better control of the oaky aroma, which is perfectly integrated into the mouth. The lack of pronounced aromas is made up by its ideal complexity. The moment the liquid touches my tongue, presenting the tender texture, the velvety tannins, and also the combination of strawberry and red plum notes coated with flowers, I know this wine is a “well-done”.
English pairs.new: 相比于查弗罗（Chanfreau）的其他葡萄酒，莱斯塔（Lestage）表现出更好的橡木香控制，香气完美融入口感。虽然它的香气不够强烈，但它的理想复杂性弥补了这一点。液体一触及舌头，呈现出细腻的口感、绵软的苦味和红莓、红杏的花香混合，知道这款酒已经做到了“功夫圆满”。

Western reviews.review: This smoky wine comes from one of the estates of the Chanfreau family in Listrac. It is a full, obviously wood-aged wine with spice up front and layers of black fruits behind. Drink from 2027.
Western reviews.translation: 这款烟熏红酒来自于Chanfreau家族在Listrac的庄园。它是一款充满体积的木桶陈化红酒，前端有香料的味道，后面有黑色水果的层次。建议2027年后饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有黑醋栗，李子和黑莓的香气。酒体饱满，单宁耐嚼，余味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of black fig, plum, and blackberry. Full-bodied with chewy tannins and a long, lingering finish.

Western reviews.review: Tasted at Bordeaux Index's annual 10-Year On tasting in London and then at the château. The 2006 Château Batailley has much more fruit intensity on the nose compared to Lynch Moussas: vibrant blackberry, raspberry coulis and cedar scents all vying for attention, the oak neatly assimilated. The palate is medium-bodied with supple ripe red berry fruit, a gentle grip in the mouth and a pleasing, ferrous finish. Give this another 2-3 years in bottle and you will have yourself a very fine Batailley. Tasted April 2016.
Western reviews.translation: 在伦敦举办的Bordeaux Index年度10年后品酒会上品尝，并在酒庄品尝。 2006年夏布利酒庄的酒香比林奇穆萨酒庄的酒香要浓郁得多：黑莓、草莓酱和松木香味都争相吸引注意力，橡木味巧妙地融入其中。口感中等，果味丰富，口感柔软，口感中有细微的铁味。将酒放置2-3年后，你将拥有一个非常出色的夏布利酒庄。品尝时间：2016年4月。

Chinese pairs.original: 如果说Chateau Fleur La Mothe 和其他Medoc葡萄酒最大的不同是什么？绝对要数它对单宁的打磨。那种毛茸茸的质感能够在口中营造出醇厚的酒体和出众的回甘，即便果香并不是特别丰富，依然十分讨喜。建议适饮窗口：2023-2029年。
Chinese pairs.new: The biggest difference between Chateau Fleur La Mothe and other Medoc wines is undoubtedly its polished tannins. The velvety texture creates a rich, full-bodied mouthfeel and a delightful finish, even if the fruit aromas aren't particularly complex. Recommended drinking window: 2023-2029.

English pairs.original: The defining characteristic of Chateau Fleur La Mothe that sets it apart from other Medoc wines is its impeccable tannin refinement. The velvety texture brings a full-bodied richness to the palate and leaves a remarkable finish. Although the fruit may not be as abundant, the overall experience is truly satisfying. It is suggested to enjoy this wine between 2023 and 2029.
English pairs.new: 查泰aux 弗勒拉莫特（Chateau Fleur La Mothe）的独特之处在于其完美的纽维素（tanin）成熟度。其细腻的口感带来丰富的口感，并留下了令人印象深刻的尾韵。尽管果实可能不如其他梅多克葡萄酒丰富，但整体体验却是令人满意的。建议在2023年至2029年之间品尝此酒。

Western reviews.review: With a perfume marked by dried flowers, coffee beans, red currants, spice, and herbs, the wine is medium-bodied, fresh, and fruity, with a soft texture, and a vibrant, red plum finish topped with a hint of chocolate in the endnote. Drink from 2023-2036.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中带有干花、咖啡豆、红 gooseberry、香料和香草的味道。酒体中等，清新、果香，口感细腻，尾部有红桃子的鲜味，最后带有巧克力的余味。建议从2023年到2036年饮用。

M. Chapoutier Chateauneuf du pape La Ber.name: M. Chapoutier Chateauneuf du pape La Bernardine 2010

Chinese pairs.original: 酒体丰满，十分优雅，呈现出经典的黑樱桃、覆盆子、湿泥土、矮树丛、森林植被的味道。酸度有点高，清新怡人，显得很有深度。
Chinese pairs.new: Full-bodied and elegant, this wine presents classic flavors of black cherry, blackberry, damp earth, bramble, and forest floor. The acidity is slightly high, refreshing and complex.

Western reviews.review: Reiffruchtiges Bouquet, warm anmutend, Zimt, Leder, Pflaumenkompott. Im Gaumen üppig, rund, milde Säure, gut verpackte, fein verwobene Gerbstoffe, kein Ausbund an Finesse, jedoch mit appellationstypischer Aromatik und einer sehr guten Länge. Endet etwas hitzig. Trinken.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气是鲜果的，温暖而舒适，带有柑橘、皮革和浓缩的石榴味。口感丰富、圆润、轻微的酸度，具有很好的包装和细致的橡皮味，没有过多的精细度，但具有典型的产区香气和很好的持久度。口感稍微有些热烈。建议饮用。

Western reviews.review: The best La Bernardine I can recall, this is a wonderfully full-bodied yet elegant rendering of Châteauneuf-du-Pape. Garrigue and floral notes make a healthy impression on the nose, while the expansive herb and black cherry flavors linger on the silky finish. Drink now–2025.
Western reviews.translation: 我记得的最好的拉伯纳丁（La Bernardine），这是香槟杜巴（Châteauneuf-du-Pape）的完美体现。干酪和花香的气味让人印象深刻，而细滑的尾部则是丰富的香草和黑樱桃的味道。建议立即饮用至2025年。

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, breitere Randaufhellung. Intensive Nuancen von Trockenkräutern, floraler Touch, ein Hauch von Erdbeeren, etwas Rosmarin, ein Hauch Nougat und Teer. Gute Komplexität, rotbeerige Frucht, präsente Tannine unterlegt, wirkt noch etwas unterentwickelt. Rotes Waldbeerkonfit im Abgang, mineralischer Nachhall.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一份红酒评论，翻译成中文如下：

深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，酒液边缘有较宽的光环。酒中有强烈的干草味、花香味、一点点草莓味、一点点罗勒香、一点点牛奶糖味和烟草味。酒的复杂度较高，红酒果味浓郁，含有明显的橡皮味，感觉还不够成熟。酒尾有浓郁的红莓果酱味，矿物质余味。

Western reviews.review: La Bernadine is mostly grenache with small amounts of syrah and mourvèdre. In 2010 the red fruit character is much more prominent on the nose mixing pepper and raspberry pastille aromas with typical garrigue notes. The attack is round and generous, tannins already tracking toward supple. The palate is a mix of juicy raspberry/black plum fruit with flecks of orange, wet stone minerality, liquorice, more garrigue and coffee chocolate flavours. Love the balance and fruit intensity. Drink now or keep for five to ten years. The vinification is traditional at high temperature in concrete tanks and it is mature in concrete tanks from a year to fifteen months. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 拉伯纳丁（La Bernadine）主要是grenache，少量加入了syrah和mourvèdre。2010年的拉伯纳丁，红果香气非常浓郁，混合了胡椒和草莓糖果香气，以及典型的 Garrigue 香气。口感圆润丰富，纤维素已经趋于柔软。口感是浓郁的草莓/黑草莓果味，伴有橙子、湿石矿质感、 licorice、更多的 Garrigue 和咖啡巧克力风味。非常喜欢这种平衡和果味的强度。建议立即饮用或保存五到十年。该酒的酿造采用传统方法，在高温下在混凝土罐中进行酿造，成熟时间为一年至十五个月。

Chinese pairs.original: 2018年份的香气非常开放，未及摇杯便散发出杨梅汁和大黄果酱的甜美芬芳。这款酒展现了经典的成熟感和细腻的单宁粉末，既保持了优雅的外观，又体现了细密的结构感。经典的“金属质感”为这款本就甜美的酒提供了坚实的骨架。即便继续10年之久，仍将保持理想的年轻态。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2018 vintage is incredibly approachable, releasing a sweet and fruity aroma of guava juice and blackberry jam even before the bottle is shaken. This wine showcases classic maturity and refined tannins, maintaining an elegant appearance while revealing a dense structure. The classic "metallic feel" provides a solid backbone to this already sweet wine, ensuring it will remain youthful and ideal for another 10 years.

English pairs.original: The 2018 vintage boasts an incredibly open aroma, with sweet notes of bayberry juice and rhubarb jam wafting from the glass even before swirling. This wine showcases a classic ripeness and fine tannin powder, maintaining an elegant appearance while demonstrating intricate structure. The signature “metallic texture” provides a solid backbone to the inherent sweetness. Even with another 10 years of aging, it will retain its youthful vibrancy.
English pairs.new: 2018年产的这款红酒具有极其开放的香气，酒杯中弥漫着浓郁的樱桃和红莓酱香气，即使不摇晃，也能闻到。 这款酒展现出典型的成熟度和细腻的纤维，保持着优雅的外观，同时展现出复杂的结构。 该酒的独特“金属质感”为其固有的甜度提供了坚实的支撑。 即使经过另外10年的陈化，也会保留其青春的活力。

Western reviews.review: With a year in wood, this wine's generous fruits have just started to develop a fine, perfumed character. Tannins give a firm backbone to this solid wine that needs time. Drink from 2023. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒经过一年陈酿，果味丰富的酒味开始展现出优雅的香气。坚实的苦味物质为这瓶酒提供了坚实的支撑，需要时间来发酵。建议2023年后饮用。 - 罗杰·沃斯

Chinese pairs.original: 装瓶后Clos La Gaffeliere 2020更显通透，和期酒满是烤杏仁的味道截然不同，看来500升的大橡木桶陈酿发挥了显著的效果。口感依旧多汁鲜美，爽滑的酒液中藏着纤细的单宁线条，稍加陈年2-3年就可以达到最佳状态。
Chinese pairs.new: After bottling, the 2020 Clos La Gaffeliere has become even more transparent, with a completely different flavor profile from the barrel sample, which was dominated by notes of toasted almonds. The wine's juiciness and beauty are still intact, with fine, silky tannins and a smooth texture. It should reach its peak in 2-3 years.

English pairs.original: The bottled 2020 vintage of Clos La Gaffeliere is a remarkable departure from the En Primeur wine, revealing a newfound transparency and a bouquet of roasted almonds. This transformation can be attributed to the impeccable barrel aging in 500L oak barrels. Despite the fine tannins woven into the wine’s silky smoothness, the palate remains juicy and vibrant, promising to reach its peak after 2 to 3 years of bottle aging.
English pairs.new: 2020年Clos La Gaffeliere的瓶装版是一种令人惊叹的转变，与En Primeur酒相比，展现出一种崭新的透明度和烤杏仁的花香。这一转变可以归因于500L橡木桶的完美陈酿。尽管酒中纺织的细致纤维使其变得 silky smooth，但口感仍然是 juicy 和 vibrant，预示着在2到3年的瓶装陈酿后将达到巅峰。

Western reviews.review: Refined and terse showing a very elegant sensory profile of super-fine craftsmanship. Notes of cherries blend well with hints of gardenia, magnolia and hibiscus flowers. White pepper dominates the secondary scene. Medium to full bodied, fine grain tannins and a linear, tasty finish. Splendid now but better from 2026.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒展现出精致的风格和优雅的口感。它的香气中融合了樱桃、花园兰花、水仙花和荔荔花的芬芳。白胡椒的味道在次要层次占据主导地位。口感中等到丰富，纤维细腻，尾部线条流畅，味道丰富。现在品尝很好，但从2026年开始会更好。

Chinese pairs.original: 和品鉴期酒时的感觉类似，装瓶后的香气依然有些还原，等了一晚上才得见芳容。香气虽然并不复杂但集中度很不错，黑莓、桑果和桂皮丁香的芬芳坚挺而持久。鲜亮通透的入口很快就被丰富的单宁所掌控，如果在收尾时能够更加细腻将会增色不少。
Chinese pairs.new: The aroma is reminiscent of the tasting period, still somewhat reserved after bottling, but reveals its charm after a night. Although the aroma is not complex, its concentration is excellent, with persistent and lasting notes of blackberry, mulberry, and cinnamon. A bright and transparent entry is quickly taken over by rich tannins, and would benefit from a more refined finish.

English pairs.original: Like the En Primeur tasting, the nose is still slightly reductive after bottling, and it took a long time to be flourished. The aromas are not that complex but well concentrated, offering scents of long-lasting blackberry, mulberry, and the spiciness of cinnamon and clove. The brightly translucent entry of the palate is quickly controlled by rich tannins, this wine would be more interesting if it could be more delicate at the finish.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的香气虽然在瓶装后仍然有一点儿减少的味道，但经过一段时间的发酵后，才逐渐展现出复杂的香气。酒中有浓郁的黑莓、浆果和浓郁的黑莓味，伴随着一丝丝的肉桂和丁香味。酒口入口清晰透明，但很快被丰富的橡木味和坚果味所控制。酒尾略显厚重，如果能更轻盈一些，酒的魅力会更大。

Western reviews.review: Beautiful purity of fruit here with currant and berry aromas, as well as fresh roses and other flowers. Citrus peel as well. Full-bodied with creamy and lightly velvety tannins that are long and beautiful. Hints of citrus to the lovely fruit. Textured and polished. A blend of 54% cabernet sauvignon, 27% merlot, 13% cabernet franc and 6% petit verdot. Try after 2024.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的优点在于其清澈的果味，带有黑currant和浆果的香气，伴有新鲜的玫瑰和其他花朵的芬芳，柑橘皮的味道也很明显。酒体丰富，具有丰富的奶油质感和轻微的绵软口感，口感长且美丽。柑橘味的余韵伴随着美丽的果味。酒体细腻，光滑。酒款的组成比例为54%卡波内尔·索维涅，27%梅洛，13%卡波内尔·法兰克，6%小皮特·韦多。建议在2024年后品尝。

Western reviews.review: The Grand Vin 2019 Château Du Tertre checks in as 54% Cabernet Sauvignon, 27% Merlot, 13% Cabernet Franc, and the rest Petit Verdot. This beautiful Margaux offers awesome notes of black raspberries, crushed flowers, sandalwood, spice, and a touch of bouquet garni. With medium to full-bodied richness, polished tannins, and a great finish, it's certainly the finest wine I've tasted from this domaine. It's going to evolve nicely over the coming two decades. Barrel Sample: 92-94+
Western reviews.translation: 2019年杜特雷庄园（Château Du Tertre）的格兰维（Grand Vin）以54%卡波内尔·萨夫维诺（Cabernet Sauvignon）、27%梅洛（Merlot）、13%卡波内尔·法兰克（Cabernet Franc）和余下的佩蒂特·维多（Petit Verdot）组成。这个美丽的马格努（Margaux）酒庄展现出黑莓、踩碎的花朵、沉香、香料和一丝花卉香的独特风味。酒体丰富中等至中等以上，牙齿光滑，尾部长达两十年。酒庄的最佳作品。酒样评分：92-94+.

Western reviews.review: A beautifully elegant and expressive Margaux that has sappy fruit with clear salinity and minerality on the finish. Pretty serious in its structure but subtly so, it takes its time to unfurl and has an upward lift through the palate. Violet rim to the colour and the austerity speaks to energy that will help power it to long life. 6% Petit Verdot completes the blend. Drinking Window 2027 - 2042. Barrel Sample:92
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶优雅典雅的玛格朗（Margaux）红酒，具有浓郁的果味，清晰的盐度和矿物质味道。结构严谨但不显著，需要时间才能展现出全部风采，口感上升带来愉悦体验。酒色带有紫色边缘， austerity（严谨）体现出其持久的能量。 Petit Verdot（小黑葡萄）占6%，完美地融入了混合。推荐饮用时间：2027-2042年。酒评：92分。

Western reviews.review: Offers incense and black tea notes that give this aromatic intrigue, while roasted plum and cherry compote flavors provide the bulk of the experience. Delivers a swath of warm humus on the finish. Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot. Drink now.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒带有香烟和黑茶的香气，令人感到神秘而迷人。烤石榴和樱桃酱的味道占据了主导地位。口感结束时带有温暖的土壤味。酒中含有卡波雷尔·索维涅、梅洛、卡波雷尔·法兰克和佩蒂·韦多特。建议立即饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 醒酒需要3个小时，有奶质感的橡木香、烟丝、香料，黑色水果等，口感平衡，但单宁主导口腔，顺畅饱满，带香草风味，此款酒的试饮期还需要等2年。
Chinese pairs.new: "Aging time: 3 hours. Notes of creamy oak, tobacco, spices, and black fruits. Balanced taste, but tannins dominate the palate. Smooth and full-bodied with a hint of vanilla. Recommended to wait 2 more years for optimal drinking experience."

Western reviews.review: The iconic 2012 Pape Clement is a candidate for near-perfection as well as one of the wines of the vintage. From proprietor Bernard Magrez, this is a blend of 51% Cabernet Sauvignon, 46% Merlot, 2% Petit Verdot and 1% Cabernet Franc. This extraordinary vineyard (a few miles to the west of Haut Brion and La Mission Haut Brion) has hit all the highlights of this vintage. Interestingly, the quality of the Pomerols and Graves wines in 2012 is closer to what one would consider a great vintage than the general image of 2012. This is truly great wine and not far off their magnificent 2005 and 2010. Full-bodied, with rich cassis, subtle burning embers and spice followed by velvety, well-integrated tannins, the wine is lush, expansive, savory and profound. This is a remarkable wine that could be drunk at a reasonably young age, but should cellar brilliantly for a quarter-century.
Western reviews.translation: 2012年巴布莱蒙特（Pape Clement）是当之无愧的经典之作，也是当年最出色的葡萄酒之一。由伯纳德·马格雷斯（Bernard Magrez）掌门的这瓶酒，是由51%卡波弗莱（Cabernet Sauvignon）、46%梅洛（Merlot）、2%佩蒂·维多（Petit Verdot）和1%卡波弗莱（Cabernet Franc）组成的复合葡萄酒。这个出色的葡萄园（距离豪布里昂和拉米歇昂葡萄园不远）在这瓶酒中展现了当年葡萄酒的全部魅力。值得注意的是，2012年波美洛和格雷夫葡萄酒的质量更接近于人们认为的佳年份，而不是人们对2012年的普遍印象。这确实是一瓶出色的葡萄酒，仅次于他们的2005年和2010年葡萄酒。酒体丰富，带有浓郁的黑加仑（cassis）、微妙的燃烧余烟和香料，随后是柔软、融合的纤维素，酒口丰富、开阔、香气浓郁、深刻。这是一瓶令人惊叹的葡萄酒，可以在较年轻的年龄饮用，但也可以在25年后在酒窖中保存。

Western reviews.review: Densely packed, with lots of dark steeped currant, fig and blackberry fruit, slowly melding with muscular licorice snap, bramble, singed bay and ganache notes. The long, dark, ganache-coated finish isn't shy, but an enticing rusticity keeps this honest. A large-scaled wine that has really powered up since the barrel tasting. Best from 2018 through 2027.
Western reviews.translation: 浓密的口感，充满黑熟葡萄、浓郁的黑枣和黑莓果味，缓慢融合着强烈的甘草、荆棘、焦烧的迷迭香和巧克力酱的香气。长长的、巧克力酱覆盖的尾部并不谦逊，但诱人的原始性使其保持着真实性。这是一款大规模的葡萄酒，自酒桶品尝以来已经显著增强。建议从2018年到2027年享用。

Western reviews.review: Always one of the richest of the Pessac-Léognan reds, the 2012 Château Pape Clément offers a bounty of ripe fruit, sweet oak, and palate satisfaction. Drinks nicely now with a grilled Porterhouse steak. (Tasted: January 30, 2015, San Francisco, CA)
Western reviews.translation: 2012年沙莱昂-佩萨克红酒中的其中一款最为丰富的酒款，2012年沙莱昂-佩萨克的克莱门特庄园提供了成熟的果实、甜橡木和口感的满足感。现在可以与烤牛排一起品尝。

Western reviews.review: Offering perfumed notes of spice box, dried red and black currants, cigar wrapper, toasted bread and leather, the 2012 Pape Clement is medium to full-bodied, silky, elegant, and beautifully pure on the palate, with no hard edges, a seamless, voluptuous texture and a classy finish. It's already approachable, but it should evolve nicely on its overall balance.
Western reviews.translation: 2012年巴布莱蒙特（Pape Clement）红酒，带有香气的香料盒、干红黑葡萄、雪茄纸、烤面包和皮革的香味。口感中等到中高级，滑顺，优雅，纯粹，口感平滑，没有硬边，质感顺滑，完美的结尾。它已经很容易入口，但应该在整体平衡上有很好的发展。

Western reviews.review: Concentrated and rich, this has fine tannins that are integrated into the big plum fruits. It’s a black-fruited wine that has both the fruit and the structure to allow it to age well. Drink from 2020.
Western reviews.translation: 浓郁而丰富的口感，这款红酒拥有细致的橡木味，融入了丰富的浓郁黑果味。它是一款黑果红酒，既有足够的果味，也有足够的结构，使其能够在陈化过程中保持稳定。建议于2020年后饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 和Chateau Larose Trintaudon相比，Chateau Larose Perganson拥有更为丰满的酒体，以及更加扎实的结构。单宁的打磨无可挑剔，放在列级庄中都属于“优等生”。建议品鉴窗口：2023-2030
Chinese pairs.new: Compared to Chateau Larose Trintaudon, Chateau Larose Perganson boasts a fuller-bodied wine with a more solid structure. The tannins are impeccably polished, making it a standout among its peers. Recommended drinking window: 2023-2030.

English pairs.original: Chateau Larose Perganson has a chubbier body and a more compact structure than Chateau Larose Trintaudon. It’s well-polished flawless tannins are among those of the best Grand Cru. Suggested drinking window: 2023–2030
English pairs.new: 拉罗斯-佩尔加松庄园的体积较为丰满，结构紧凑。它的完美光滑的橡皮质是世界级葡萄酒中的一流。建议饮用时间：2023-2030年。

Western reviews.review: A finely balanced wine that is partly wood aged and partly matured in amphoras. The wine, full of tannins from Cabernet Sauvignon and spice, is rich, while not being too dense. Drink the wine from 2026.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的平衡度很好，部分在木桶中陈化，部分在陶罐中发酵。这种来自卡波雷尔·沙维尼翁的酒，富含坚果味和香料，口感丰富但不至于太浓稠。建议从2026年开始饮用。

Western reviews.review: Flowers, dried herbs and ripe, juicy currants form the core of this early-drinking, charmer. You can drink this on release or with just a year or two of aging. Drink from 2023-2034.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的主要特点是花香、干香草和成熟的葡萄果实。这种早期饮用红酒的魅力，可以立即饮用或在一到两年后饮用。建议饮用时间为2023-2034年。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby, purple reflections, deep core, faint ochre brightening on the rim. Inviting bouquet of blackberries, black cherries, fine spicy nuances and some elderberry fruit. Medium complexity, ripe cherries, integrated tannins, fresh structure, salty minerality, stimulating food wine, lingers, versatile.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，紫色反射，深色核心，杯口有淡黄色光泽。酒香诱人，黑莓、黑樱桃、细微的辣味和一些 elderberry 果味。中等复杂度，熟透的樱桃，融合的苦味，新鲜的结构，咸矿物质，刺激食物酒，余味持久，多样性。

Western reviews.review: A finely balanced wine that is partly wood aged and partly matured in amphoras. The wine, full of tannins from Cabernet Sauvignon and spice, is rich, while not being too dense. Drink the wine from 2026.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的平衡度很好，部分在木桶中陈化，部分在陶罐中发酵。这种来自卡波雷尔·沙维尼翁的酒，富含坚果味和香料，口感丰富但不至于太浓稠。建议从2026年开始饮用。

Western reviews.review: Flowers, dried herbs and ripe, juicy currants form the core of this early-drinking, charmer. You can drink this on release or with just a year or two of aging. Drink from 2023-2034.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的主要特点是花香、干香草和成熟的葡萄果实。这种早期饮用红酒，酒龄不长，适合于即刻饮用或储存一两年后再饮。建议饮用时间为2023年至2034年。

Chinese pairs.original: 2020年份的Les Cerisiers拥有出众的甜美感以及扎实的结构。香气表现力比较单一，主要展现出成熟的浆果和辛甜的桂皮。这款酒对风土的表达非常清晰，对单宁的打磨也十分精细。是一款口感平衡又能给人期待的Merlot混酿。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2020 Les Cerisiers boasts an exceptional sweetness and a solid structure. The aroma is relatively straightforward, showcasing mature plum and sweet cinnamon notes. This wine offers a clear expression of terroir and a refined tannin texture, making it a well-balanced Merlot blend that delivers.

English pairs.original: Les Cerisiers 2020 has an outstanding refreshing sweetness and a steady structure. Relatively simple, the fragrance is dominated by the aromas of mature berries and sweet cinnamon. This wine makes a clear expression of terroir with delicate tannins, which is an expecting Merlot blend with a great balanced palate.
English pairs.new:
《红酒评论》

"2020年《樱桃花》红酒具有出色的清新甜度和稳定的结构。虽然香气相对简单，但却被成熟的浆果和甜杏仁香气所主导。这款红酒清晰地展现了地理特征，具有细腻的苦味，正如我们对梅洛酒的期望那样，具有平衡的口感。"

Western reviews.review: Deep purple-black in color, the 2020 Les Cerisiers comes skipping out of the glass with cheery notes of kirsch, raspberry coulis and plum preserves and plush hints of cinnamon toast and mossy tree bark. The medium to full-bodied palate is laden with bright, crunchy red and black fruits, framed by ripe, rounded tannins and bold freshness, finishing perfumed. Barrel Sample : (89 - 91)+
Western reviews.translation: 2020年Les Cerisiers红酒呈现出深紫黑色的颜色，酒香中充满了开心的果香，如可乐果、草莓酱和浆果干果，伴随着软糖般的肉桂和树皮的香气。口感丰富中等到中高的口感，酒中充满了鲜活的红黑果味，搭配着成熟的圆润的橡皮质和强烈的新鲜感，完美的结尾。酒评人评分：89-91分。

Western reviews.review: Aromas of blackcurrants, chocolate nibs and sweet spices with an earthy character to it. Medium-bodied with firm, lightly dusty tannins and a juicy red and blue berry character. Refreshing and solid in the finish. Drink or hold.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中带有黑currant、巧克力碎片和甜香料的味道，伴有泥土的特征。口感中等，口感坚实，轻微的粉尘质感，带有鲜红和蓝莓的味道。口感清新，结尾坚实。适合立即饮用或储存。

2023 Chateau Leoville Poyferre Chateau M.name: 2023 Chateau Leoville Poyferre Chateau Moulin Riche

Chinese pairs.original: 当Chateau Moulin Riche 天生的强劲遇到2023年份的柔情，它决定剪掉胡须，打好领带，以一副谦谦君子的温柔形象示人。得益于其深沉的粉末状单宁，整个口感展现出理想的深度。绵密的质感包裹着味蕾，再经过可可、蓝莓干、咸话梅的巧妙雕琢，轻轻松松就营造出理想的成熟感和底色。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau Moulin Riche 的天生强劲在 2023 年的柔情中找到平衡，呈现出谦逊的温柔面貌。深沉的粉末状单宁赋予了酒体理想的深度。细致的质感包裹着味蕾，巧妙的巧克力、蓝莓干和咸话梅的风味营造出完美的成熟感和底色。

English pairs.original: When Chateau Moulin Riche’s innate strength meets the tenderness of the 2023 vintage, it decides to trim its beard, adjust its tie, and present itself as a gentle gentleman. Thanks to its profound powdery tannins, the entire palate reveals an ideal depth. The dense texture envelops the taste buds, and with subtle notes of cocoa, dried blueberries, and savory plum, it effortlessly creates an ideal sense of maturity and foundation.
English pairs.new: 当查托·穆林·里奇的内在力量遇到2023年的温柔之美时，它决定修剪胡子，调整领带，呈现出温和的绅士形象。 由于其深刻的粉末状鞣质，整个口感展现出理想的深度。 密集的质地包围着味蕾，伴随着巧克力、干蓝莓和浓郁的梅子等细微的香气，它轻松地创造出理想的成熟感和基础感。

Western reviews.review: This wine exhibits silky tannins that merge seamlessly with a juicy and gentle texture, concluding with a notable savouriness. It displays a subtle yet powerful presence, marked by a fairly long finish. The palate is graced with nuanced flavors and beautifully perfumed lingering aromatics.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒展现出细腻的橡皮质感，融合得非常自然，带有浓郁的果香和柔和的口感，结尾带有明显的干酪味。它展现出细腻而强烈的风格，尾部持久。口感丰富多彩，带有美妙的香气余韵。

Chinese pairs.original: 此酒在澄清与装瓶前，存放在桶内18个月。饱满的酒体尽显中度红宝石色泽，馥郁的黑醋栗、肉桂、丁香、咖啡及太妃糖香气，入口时充盈黑色水果气息，而后中段散发烘培香料的味道，随即过渡到花香四溢的余韵，并衬托出太妃糖和摩卡的味道，中度单宁，且带有中等余韵。这款酒很年轻，但酒体十分平衡，橡木味融合得恰到好处。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine was aged in oak barrels for 18 months before bottling. The full-bodied wine boasts a medium garnet color, with aromas of rich blackberry, cinnamon, nutmeg, coffee, and caramel. Upon entry, the wine is filled with dark fruit flavors, followed by a mid-palate of baked spices, transitioning to a floral finish with notes of caramel and mocha. The wine has a moderate level of tannins and a medium-length finish. Although young, the wine is well-balanced, with oak flavors integrated seamlessly.

English pairs.original: The wine has stayed in barrel for up to 18 months before fining and bottling. This full-bodied wine had medium ruby color, nose of black currant, cinnamon, clove, coffee and toffee, initial dark fruit in the mouthfeel, then added baking spices transitioning into a floral finish with underlining toffee and mocha, with medium tannin and a medium length. Still very youthful but also exceptionally balanced with great oak integration.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒在桶中陈化达18个月，之后进行精酿和装瓶。 这是一款体积丰富的红酒，颜色为深红宝石，酒香中有黑加仑、肉桂、丁香、咖啡和糖浆的味道。口感中初期有浓郁的果味，随后加入了烘培香料，逐渐转变为花朵般的尾韵，底层有糖浆和摩卡的味道。酒中有中等的苦味和中等的长度。尽管还很年轻，但这款红酒的平衡性非常出色，橡木成分的融合也非常出色。

Western reviews.review: I was surprised by how hard and firm this bottle showed. The wine is much better on the nose than the palate. Usually, the wine is round, voluptuous and fun, but not in this vintage. Did they miss the boat in 2000? Such is life...
Western reviews.translation: 我对这瓶酒的口感感到惊讶，它比我预期的要硬和坚实。酒的香气远远好于口感。通常，这种酒是圆润、丰满、有趣的，但这个年份却不是这样。他们在2000年错过了什么？生活就是这样。

Western reviews.review: The aromas are all dominated by new wood. But to taste, this super cru bourgeois is all about fruit. It is sweet, generous, not having typical Saint-Estèphe tannins, but showing more elegance. A great success.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气完全被新橡木的味道所主导。但是，口感上，这瓶超级级别的波尔多酒庄红酒却完全以果味为主。它是甜的，慷慨的，没有典型的圣埃斯泰夫（Saint-Estèphe）苦味，但展现出更高雅的风格。是一款杰出的成功作品。

Le Petit Mouton De Mouton Rothschild 201.name: Le Petit Mouton De Mouton Rothschild 2012

Chinese pairs.original: 葡萄柚、柠檬、酸橙，桃子和糯米的香气，酒体是新鲜活泼，单宁丰富，平衡良好的结构。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of grapefruit, lemon, orange, peach, and sweet rice. The wine has a fresh and lively body, rich tannins, and a well-balanced structure.

Western reviews.review: This wine is soft and fruity with ripe berry fruits and gentle tannins. For a major second wine, it's surprisingly easy and soft, developing fast with its berry fruits, chocolate and wood flavors at the end. Drink from 2017.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒口感柔和，果香浓郁，带有成熟的浆果风味和细微的苦味。作为一款次级红酒，它的口感意外地轻松和柔和，快速展现出浆果、巧克力和木质香味。建议从2017年开始饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 这款老年份酒依然使用过去的酒标并且使用全新的橡木桶，因此此酒的香气不意外十分华丽，透出香草、黑莓、西梅、黄桃和香料矿物味。曼妙的质地，回味展现的活泼果味要多于坚实单宁。
Chinese pairs.new: This aged wine still uses its vintage label and is aged in brand new oak barrels, so its aroma is not surprisingly very elegant, revealing notes of vanilla, blackberry, apricot, and mineral spices. The refined texture, with lively fruit flavors on the finish, outshines the solid tannins.

English pairs.original: This back vintage still on the old label and uses 100% new oak so that it's expectedly lush on the bouquet of vanilla, blackberry, prune, yellow peach and spicy-mineral. Beautifully textured, showing more vivid fruit than firm tannin toward the finish.
English pairs.new: 这瓶老酒的标签仍然保留着原来的设计，使用了100%新橡木桶，预计会带来浓郁的香气，包括香草、黑莓、浆果、黄桃和矿物质的香气。酒体细腻，口感丰富，酒尾呈现出鲜艳的果味，而不是坚实的苦味。

Western reviews.review: The spicy note adds complexity to the licorice, vanilla, wild cherry and smoke in the nose. The wine is silky, soft, polished sweet and uplifted, with loads of elegant, polished, sweet, perfectly ripe red pit fruits in the finish. 94 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中，辣味的添加使得 licorice、vanilla、野樱桃和烟味变得更加复杂。酒体细腻、柔和、光滑甜美，口感丰富，尾部充满优雅、光滑、甜美的成熟红果味。评分：94分。

Western reviews.review: Black fruit with nougat and roasted aromas, mineral note, pleasant herbal savouriness. Juicy, subtle fruit sweetness, chocolate note, fine tannins, elegant and balanced, red berry nuances, mineral freshness on the finish.
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的口感非常丰富：

*   有黑果、核桃糖和烤果的香气，矿物质的味道，带有清新的草药味。
*   酒体丰富，果味甜度适中，巧克力味道浓郁，纤维度细腻，平衡美观，红果的细微差别，矿物质的清新味道在口感中留下了深刻的印象。

Western reviews.review: (En Primeur) Anfangs verhaltene Nase, mit mehr Luft öffnet sich der Wein, reifes Cassis, Kirschen, Weihnachtsgewürze, Torf, sehr schöne Tiefe zeigend, komplex, verspielt, würzig. Gradliniger Auftakt, dann mit schönem Schmelz, dunkle und rote Früchte, Pflaumen, wieder würzige Noten, feine Tannine, saftige Säure, sehr gut strukturiert. Im Abgang von wunderbarer Länge und mit guter Eleganz, endet feinwürzig und sehr frisch. Ein hervorragend gelungener Saint-Emilion der sowohl in seiner Jugend als auch mit Reife gefallen dürfte. 2022-2036, 18.5 vvPunkte (92/100)
Western reviews.translation:
(En Primeur) 初期闻起来比较保留，随着空气的流通，酒味逐渐打开，展现出成熟的黑加斯派（Cassis）、樱桃、圣诞树香、泥炭，非常深邃，复杂，轻佻，具有香气。 

入口平稳，随后展现出美妙的融合，黑色和红色水果、浆果、再次出现香气的味道，细腻的橡皮质，清爽的酸度，非常完美的结构。 

尾部长达数秒，展现出优雅的风格，结尾清晰香气，非常清新。 

这是一个出色的圣埃米利翁葡萄酒，既在年轻时期，也在成熟时期都能获得好评。 

推荐饮用时间：2022-2036年。评分：18.5 vvPunkte（92/100）。

Western reviews.review: Youthful and elegant nose with ripe dark fruit like cassis, blackberry, plum with tobacco with fine floral and chalky notes, some herbal sage and mint aromas, a hint of oak but certainly more of a fruity expression. Very ample palate, finely tuned with fine grained tannins, polished and glossy texture with high ripeness, ripe dark berry flavours with dry spices, chocolate, opulent with a well-integrated fresh acidity, followed by a long, lingering finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气年轻而优雅，带有成熟的黑果味，如黑加仑、黑莓、黑枣，伴有烟草、花香和石灰味，另外还有些草药和薄荷的香气，微微带有橡木味，但更倾向于果香。口感丰富，细腻，纤维度细致，表面光滑，果肉成熟，带有干燥的香料、巧克力味，丰富而且有着很好的新鲜酸度，尾部长而持久。

Western reviews.review: (65% Merlot, 18% Cabernet Franc, 11% Cabernet Sauvignon, 4% Pressac, 2% Carménère): Offene Nase, zeigt viel dunkle Frucht, würzige Noten, auch florale Töne schwingen mit. Im Gaumen dicht, konzentriert, kräftiger Körper, leicht cremig in der Textur, der Wein zeigt Fülle, ist dabei jedoch sehr elegant. Endet auf eine reife, warme Frucht und eine fast schon spicy Würze, eher rotfruchtig im Retrofinale. 2023-2035+
Western reviews.translation:
酒款成分：65% 美丽托（Merlot）、18% 卡布塞尔法兰克（Cabernet Franc）、11% 卡布塞尔沙夫宁（Cabernet Sauvignon）、4% 普雷萨克（Pressac）、2% 卡门内尔（Carménère）

酒味：开阔的鼻子，展现出大量的深色果味，香料和花香的味道也随之出现。

口感：口感浓郁，集中，体积丰富，略带奶油感，酒体充满了丰富的果味，然而仍保持着优雅的风格。酒尾留下了成熟的果味和微微的辣味，回味中呈现出典型的红酒风格。

推荐饮用年份：2023-2035年。

Chinese pairs.original: 第一次在酒庄品鉴，橡木桶气息颇为显著，尚未完全融入香气家族。再次品鉴时花果香气明显芬芳了不少。作为Margaux产区最晚采收的酒庄之一，2022年份的Chateau Malescot Saint-Exupery具有超乎想象的集中度。幸运的是，这款酒用酸枣汁和樱桃汁的清透感来柔化酒体，从而呈现出相对平衡的口感。
Chinese pairs.new: 在第一次品鉴中，酒庄的橡木桶气息非常明显，尚未完全融入到酒中的香气家族。然而，在第二次品鉴时，花果香气变得更加芬芳。作为Margaux产区最晚采收的酒庄之一，2022年份的Chateau Malescot Saint-Exupery具有惊人的集中度。幸运的是，这款酒通过酸枣汁和樱桃汁的清透感来平衡酒体，从而呈现出相对平衡的口感。

English pairs.original: During my first tasting in Chateau, the scent of oak barrels was quite prominent and had not yet been fully integrated. Upon a subsequent tasting, the floral and fruity scents were much more pronounced. As one of the latest harvest wineries in the Margaux appellation, Chateau Malescot Saint-Exupery 2022 boasts a concentration beyond imagination. Fortunately, the wine is softened with the freshness of cranberry and cherry juice, thereby presenting a relatively balanced aftertaste.
English pairs.new: 在我第一次品尝时，酒庄的陈酿木桶味道非常浓郁，尚未完全融合。随后一次品尝时，花香和水果香味更加突出。作为马格努阿克(Margaux)产区中最新收获的酒庄之一，马莱斯科圣厄普里酒庄2022年酒款以其超乎想象的浓度而闻名。幸运的是，这款酒以cranberry和樱桃果汁的新鲜感进行调和，从而呈现出相对平衡的余味。

Western reviews.review: Black, blue and red fruits, tobacco leaf, flowers, and coffee bean, with a hint of cocoa create the nose. Lively red and black fruits, with hints of chocolate show in the round, full-bodied, deep wine. The lengthy finish is all about its layers of sweet, ripe, dark red berries, energy and chocolately, espresso in the mid-palate and end notes. The wine is a blend of 55% Cabernet Sauvignon, 40% Merlot, and 5% Petit Verdot. 14.5% ABV, 3.65. Harvesting took place September 19 - October 5. Yields were 30 hectoliters per hectare. Drink from 2027-2050. 93-95 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中包含黑、蓝和红色的水果、烟草叶、花朵和咖啡豆，伴有巧克力和可可的微妙气息。酒体圆润、丰富、深邃，展现出活泼的红和黑水果，带有巧克力和巧克力味。酒尾长而持久，展现出甜、成熟的黑红果实的多层次，充满能量和巧克力味，中间和尾部留下了浓缩的咖啡和巧克力味。酒的成分为55%卡波雷特·索维涅、40%梅洛和5%佩蒂·韦多。酒精度14.5%，酸度3.65。酒庄于9月19日至10月5日采收，产量为每公顷30公升。建议于2027-2050年饮用。评分93-95分。

Western reviews.review: Dieser Duft ist intensiv, mit Cassis, Holunder, Schwarzkirsche und floralen Tönen. Im Gaumen dicht, ein Mund voll Wein, viel Frucht, viel Gerbstoff, da ist ein ungemein kompakter Fruchtkern, umgarnt von einem massiven Tanninkorsett, doch die Proportionen stimmen, ebenso die aromatische Länge. Ein Monument. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / CVBG / Château Belgrave) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气非常浓郁，带有黑加仑、黑莓、黑浆果和花朵的香味。口感浓密，满口都是酒，酒中有很多果味和坚果味，酒中的果核非常紧密，包裹在坚果味的外壳中，酒的比例非常合适，酒的香味也非常持久。简直是一瓶杰作。 (评分时间：2023年4月，来自Château Belgrave的CVBG)

Western reviews.review: Little fruitiness in the aromas but highly expressive on the palate. Interesting texture, th e fruits and tannins are like ironed together, somehow flattened, but with a certain depth. Savoury finish, slightly jammy ending but pleasant, aided by its vibrant acidity. Long lasting.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中有很少的水果味，但在口感上却非常丰富。口感有趣，水果和苦味物质似乎被整理得很好，平坦但有深度。口感中带有咸味，最后略带果酱味，但总体来说是很愉悦的，受到其活泼的酸度的帮助。口感持久。

Western reviews.review: Le nez est frais et fleuri avec une certaine élégance racée dans la concentration. On a des notes de mûres de boysen fraîches, de bleuet et plus légèrement de lilas frais associés à des touches de petits fruits rouges sauvages frais ainsi qu’à des pointes de graphite, de fleurs de safran et de poivre gris frais. La bouche est joliment minérale avec de la fraîcheur et de la tension. Elle a de la justesse et une trame acidulée avec des notes de mûres juteuses et pulpeuses, de violettes et plus légèrement de cassis éclatants associés à une touche de petits fruits croquants ainsi qu’à des pointes de cerises fraîches croquantes et à de discrètes notes de graphite, de safran et d’épices douces. Il y a un bon travail sur les amers. Présence d’une pointe séveuse qui apporte de la fraîcheur.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气清新而花香，具有典雅的浓缩感。它带有新鲜的蓝莓、蓝花和轻微的鲜花香气，伴随着新鲜的野生红果和图形、鲜花香气和新鲜胡椒的点缀。口感清新矿物质，带有紧张感，具有准确的酸度和纤维结构。它带有新鲜的浆果和紫罗兰花香气，以及轻微的黑加仑和新鲜的草莓，伴随着新鲜的果实和轻微的图形、鲜花香气和温和的香料。酒中有很好的苦味处理，带有清新的苦味和新鲜的果实。

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby in colour with an opaque core, purple reflections, and subtle brightening on the rim. On the nose, fine nuances of crystallised violets, invitingly fruity with black cherry, hints of cassis and liquorice and hints of nougat. The palate is juicy and complex, with silky tannins, fresh acidity, mineral and persistent with refreshing berry fruit and a fine core sweetness. Harmonious and fine with an immensely attractive finish, the wine has great potential for ageing.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红宝石色，核心是透明的，边缘有浅紫色的反射。酒鼻子上，酒体散发着晶紫花的细微气息，带有黑樱桃的诱人果香，黑加斯和牛肉糖的微妙气息，和一丝丝的杏仁味。口感丰富复杂，滑顺的纤维，新鲜的酸度，矿物质和持久的，带有清新果香和细微的甜度。酒体和谐细致，酒尾极具吸引力，酒有很大的潜力来陈化。

Chinese pairs.original: Lafleur-Gazin 2021是一款柔软细腻而又充满花果芬芳的波美侯美酒，其砂土、砾石和黏土的土壤组合在2021年份营造出松脆柔软的酒体以及绵柔细密的口感。收尾时的一抹淡淡咸鲜质感更是巧妙地增加了回甘的层次和密度。必须为这款100%美乐竖起大拇指。
Chinese pairs.new: Lafleur-Gazin 2021是一款柔软细腻的波美侯美酒，充满花果芬芳。其砂土、砾石和黏土的土壤组合，营造出松脆柔软的酒体和绵柔细密的口感。酒尾的淡淡咸鲜质感增加了回甘的层次和密度。值得一提的是，这款100%美乐酒的品质非常出色。

English pairs.original: Lafleur-Gazin 2021 is a soft, delicate Pomerol filled with floral and fruity aromas. A combination of sand, gravel, and clay soil creates a crisp, soft body and fine-grained, mellow palate in 2021. A hint of saltiness at the end skillfully increases the layers and intensity of the aftertaste. Thumbs up for this 100% Merlot.
English pairs.new: 拉弗鲁-加辛 2021是一款柔和、细致的波美罗酒，充满了花香和水果香气。2021年的沙质、砾石和粘土混合土壤创造了一个清晰、柔和的身体和细致、温和的口感。酒尾的微妙的咸味巧妙地增加了层次和强度。对这款100%梅洛的赞赏。

Western reviews.review: Strong ruby core, purple reflections, broad bright rim. Delicate red berries, redcurrants and vibrant cherries with a hint of tangerine zest. Taut, juicy, fresh cherries on the palate with fine tannins, very animating acidity and a long mineral finish. Great with food.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色的，带有紫色的光泽，酒液的边缘清晰明亮。酒中的味道是轻盈的，带有红果、红葡萄和鲜红的樱桃的香气，伴有柑橘的微妙香气。口感上，酒中的樱桃味道清新果香，口感丰富，细腻的纤维，酸度清新，矿物质味道持久。这种红酒非常适合与食物搭配。

Western reviews.review: (100% Merlot). Mittleres Rubin. Frische Nase, würzig und steinig, der Duft erinnert an einen Beeren-Tarte, etwas Hefeteig schwingt mit, auch Haselnuss. Der Gaumen ist präzis, saftig und frisch, straffes Tannin umgarnt die Frucht, diese ist auf den Punkt gereift, hallt im Abgang sehr lange nach. Gefällt mir dieses Jahr noch fast einen Tick besser als 2020. Sehr gelungen. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2022. J.P. Moueix)
Western reviews.translation: (100% 梅洛葡萄酒) 深红色。酒香清新、浓郁、矿物质，闻起来像一块果酱蛋糕，伴有轻微的酵母味和杏仁味。口感精确、丰富、清新，紧致的果皮纤维包围着果味，果味成熟到最佳状态，余味持久。今年的品质比2020年好了一点。非常出色。 (评分于2022年4月，J.P. Moueix)

Western reviews.review: Medium ruby-red with purple hues at the rim. Chocolatey, ripe dark-fruit aromas are overlaid by notes of vanilla & cocoa-butter. The palate is medium-bodied with chocolatey black-cherry fruit & cedar notes. Acidity is fresh & the balanced alcohol adds a touch of warmth to the palate. The wine's fine, tannic structure takes over from the dark fruit on the finish, leaving it cedary & meaty with lingering cocoa notes & slightly bitter coffee grounds. 04/22 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色，边缘有紫色光泽。酒香中有巧克力和成熟黑果的味道，伴有香草和巧克力油的香气。口感中等，口味中有巧克力黑樱桃和松木的味道。酒精的酸度清新，酒的平衡使得口感温暖。酒的细致的、坚实的结构在尾部接管了黑果的味道，留下了松木和肉类的味道，伴有持续的巧克力味和微微苦的咖啡渣味。评分：04/22 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 这款酒的“自信从容”从我举杯的那一刻就开始弥漫。一款陈年39年的葡萄酒，虽然没了年轻时的娇嫩面容，但悠然自得的体态还是那么动人。淡淡的烟熏和松柏芬芳构建出深沉而又清新的复杂芬芳；伴随着成熟的单宁粉末在味蕾上按摩，品的人满心欢喜。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine exudes "confidence and composure" from the moment I raise my glass. A 39-year-old aged wine, though it may have lost its youthful delicacy, still possesses a captivating elegance. Delicate smokiness and pine aromas weave together to create a deep and refreshing complex bouquet; as the mature tannins caress the palate, the drinker's heart is filled with joy.

English pairs.original: The “confident ease” of this wine begins to spread the moment I lift my glass. A 39-year-old vintage may no longer have a young face, yet its composed and graceful posture remains captivating. The light smokiness and pine fragrance create a profound yet refreshing complexity; with mature tannin powder massaging the palate, it leaves my palate brimming with joy.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的“自信的轻松”一旦我举起酒杯，就开始弥漫开来。虽然这瓶39岁的老酒不再年轻，但它优雅的姿态仍然令人着迷。轻微的烟熏味和松柏香气融合在一起，产生了深刻而又清新复杂的味道；成熟的橡胶质感在口中轻轻地抚慰，留下了令人愉悦的口感。

Western reviews.review: 92-94 Looks like a 15, actually 45 years Bordeaux, cedar with some red fruits nose are really elegant and noble, your nose cannot stop but enjoy this quite unbelievable  complex sleep beauty. Still a bit grippy, it tasted like date and haw juice with short sweet finishing. January 27, 2020
Western reviews.translation: 92-94分，外观像15年，实际上是45年的波尔多红酒，檀木和一些红果味的香气非常优雅和高贵，闻起来无法停止享受这种令人难以置信的复杂睡美人。口感仍然略带坚韧，味道像甜瓜和枇杷汁，短暂的甜尾。2020年1月27日。

Chinese pairs.original: 晚采收和超级精细的筛选为 Chateau Lespault-Martillac 2021的成功创造了条件。在一个成熟度并不突出的年份里，Chateau Lespault-Martillac展现出了相当坚实的酒体和理想的单宁口感。尽管吸收了35% 的全新橡木桶，但这并没有压倒果香的表达。收尾时略显苦涩，但整体保持了理想的平衡，是Pessac-Leognan产区最具性价比酒庄之一。
Chinese pairs.new: A successful vintage for Chateau Lespault-Martillac 2021 was created by late harvesting and super fine selection. In a year where maturity was not particularly notable, Chateau Lespault-Martillac showed a remarkably solid body and ideal tannin texture. Despite absorbing 35% of new oak barrels, this did not overpower the expression of fruit. A slightly bitter finish, but overall, it maintains an ideal balance, making it one of the most value-for-money estates in the Pessac-Leognan region.

English pairs.original: Late harvesting and strict selection have created favorable conditions for the success of Chateau Lespault-Martillac in 2021. In a vintage where ripeness isn’t particularly pronounced, Chateau Lespault-Martillac showcases a quite robust body and an ideal tannins’ texture. Despite incorporating 35% new oak barrels, it doesn’t overwhelm the expression of the fruit aromas. The finish may have a slight bitterness at present, but overall, it maintains an ideal balance and stands as one of the most cost-effective wineries in the Pessac-Leognan.
English pairs.new: 2021年，庄园莱斯波尔特-马蒂拉克（Chateau Lespault-Martillac）凭借晚收割和严格的选择，取得了成功。在一个不太注重成熟度的产季中，莱斯波尔特-马蒂拉克庄园展现出强劲的体积和理想的纹理。尽管采用了35%的新橡木桶，但它并未压倒果香的表达。目前，尾部可能有一点苦味，但整体上保持着理想的平衡，成为佩萨克-莱奥纳根（Pessac-Leognan）地区最具成本效益的酒庄之一。

Western reviews.review: Run by the Bernard family of Domaine de Chevalier, this estate on the edge of Martillac has produced a wine that is dominated by juicy Merlot with a high 13% of Petit Verdot. The wine is rich, structured and likely to age well. Drink from 2027.
Western reviews.translation: 由Domaine de Chevalier的Bernard家族管理的位于马蒂拉克边缘的庄园，生产了一款以丰富的梅洛为主，含有13%的佩蒂·韦尔多的葡萄酒。该酒精质丰富、结构良好，预计会有很好的陈年潜力。建议2027年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: Run by the Bernard family of Domaine de Chevalier, this estate on the edge of Martillac has produced a wine that is dominated by juicy Merlot with a high 13% of Petit Verdot. The wine is rich, structured and likely to age well. Drink from 2027.
Western reviews.translation: 由Domaine de Chevalier的Bernard家族管理的位于马蒂拉克边缘的庄园，生产了一款以丰富的梅洛为主，含有13%的佩蒂·韦尔多的葡萄酒。该酒精质丰富、结构良好，预计会有很好的陈年潜力。建议2027年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: Flowers, espresso, cocoa, cherries and spearmint aromatics get the wine moving in the nose. The medium-bodied, fresh palate is even better with all of its soft, polished, sweet, red cherries, black plums, and vibrant black raspberries. This has really improved after its barrel aging. Drink from 2024-2035.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中包含了花朵、咖啡、巧克力、樱桃和薄荷的气味。口感中充满了新鲜的、柔软的、甜美的、红樱桃、黑杏和生动的黑莓的味道。这瓶酒经过木桶陈化后，品质有了显著的提高。建议从2024年到2035年饮用。

Western reviews.review: Flowers, espresso, cocoa, cherries and spearmint aromatics get the wine moving in the nose. The medium-bodied, fresh palate is even better with all of its soft, polished, sweet, red cherries, black plums, and vibrant black raspberries. This has really improved after its barrel aging. Drink from 2024-2035.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中包含了花朵、咖啡、巧克力、樱桃和薄荷的气味。口感中充满了新鲜的、柔软的、甜美的、红樱桃、黑杏和生动的黑莓的味道。这瓶酒经过木桶陈化后，品质有了显著的提高。建议从2024年到2035年饮用。

Western reviews.review: Important in sensory profile, it shows notes of plums, plums, sandalwood and hyacinth. Full-bodied, smooth in the sip, it closes harmoniously and balanced. Important presence on the palate. A blend of 50% Merlot, 45% Cabernet Sauvignon and 5% Petit Verdot. Best since 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感非常重要，展现出浓郁的浆果味（特别是李子味），还有檀木和百合花的香气。口感丰富，入口顺滑，余味和谐平衡。口感丰富，入口顺滑，余味和谐平衡。酒中含有50%梅洛、45%卡波弗雷希诺和5%佩蒂·维多特的混合。建议在2025年后品尝。
