Chinese pairs.original: 2022年的Chateau Clarke非常讨人喜欢，只有亲身品尝之后才能体会到它的美妙之处。作为一款左岸的高比例美乐混酿，它却呈现出清新透彻的口感，很有新意。酸度纯净而鲜亮，与2022年份干热的印象完全不同。这款酒延续了上几个年份爽滑多汁的风格特点，尤其适合年轻人与友人畅饮。毫无疑问，这是一款能够同时得到广大消费者和专业酒评人认可的美酒。
Chinese pairs.new: 2022年的Chateau Clarke非常令人愉悦，只有亲身品尝之后才能体会到它的美妙之处。作为一款左岸的高比例美乐混酿，它呈现出清新透彻的口感，很有新意。酸度纯净而鲜亮，与2022年份干热的印象完全不同。这款酒延续了上几个年份爽滑多汁的风格特点，尤其适合年轻人与友人畅饮。毫无疑问，这是一款能够同时得到广大消费者和专业酒评人认可的美酒。

English pairs.original: Chateau Clarke 2022 is utterly delightful, its enchanting qualities only fully appreciated upon personal tasting. As a left bank wine with a high proportion of Merlot, it presents a refreshing and unanticipated clarity on the palate. Its acidity is pristine and vibrant, a stark contrast to the dry vintage like 2022. This wine continues the juicy and smooth characters of its recent vintages, making it especially suitable for young wine lovers. Undoubtedly, it is a fine wine that can garner the approval of both general consumes and professional critics.
English pairs.new: 克莱克庄园2022年红酒绝对令人愉悦，仅通过亲自品尝才能充分体会到其迷人的品质。作为左岸葡萄酒，含有高比例的梅洛，呈现出清新而意外的口感。其酸度清晰而生动，鲜明地与干燥的2022年产季形成对比。这款酒继续了其近期年份的果香和滑顺口感，使其尤其适合年轻的葡萄酒爱好者。毫无疑问，这是一款精美的葡萄酒，能获得普通消费者和专业评审的认可。

Western reviews.review: 92-94 Barrel sample. This estate, one of the largest in Listrac, has produced a solid wine. Its tannins and black fruits will develop well together, along with some spice. Owned by the Rothschild family, the wine has a fine future.
Western reviews.translation: 92-94 分数。 该酒庄是Listrac地区最大的酒庄之一，生产出了一瓶坚实的红酒。其坚果味和黑色水果味将会在一起发展，并带来一些香料味。由罗得施尔家族所有的酒庄，酒品未来有着光明的前景。

Western reviews.review: Floral, fruity, and fresh, with blackberries, and chocolate-accented black currants and cherries, the wine is medium-bodied, creamy, and fruity from start to finish. Chateau Clarke is one of the very few wines in the Medoc that is planted to 100% Merlot. Drink from 2025-2038. 89-91 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有鲜花、水果和新鲜的气味，黑莓、巧克力浸润的黑加仑和樱桃的风味。酒体中等，乳白色，水果味从头到尾都非常浓郁。克莱克庄园是梅多克区中极少数100%梅洛特种植的葡萄酒之一。建议2025-2038年饮用。评分：89-91分。

Western reviews.review: Sehr reiffruchtig, dunkle Beeren dominieren, sehr schöne Frucht, gut dosiertes Holz. Im Gaumen straff, kernig, mit knackiger Frucht, markanten, jedoch reifen Tanninen und viel Druck, hallt angenehm lange nach. Das ist ein sehr gelungener Château Clarke mit guten Reserven. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / CVBG / Château Belgrave) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒非常成熟，深色浆果占主导地位，非常美味，木质味道很好地调节。口感紧致，果实坚实，具有清脆果味，明显的但成熟的苦味和强烈的压力，余味悠长。这个Château Clarke非常成功，储备充足。 (评分于2023年4月，CVBG/Château Belgrave)

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby, opaque core, purple reflections, subtle brightening on the rim. Ripe plums, blackberry confit, hints of nougat and tobacco and subtle herbal spice. Juicy, red berry nuances, fresh, medium complexity, dark cherries on the mineral finish.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，浓密的核心，紫色反射，酒杯边缘微微发亮。熟透的浆果，黑莓酱，核桃和烟草的微妙气息，微妙的草药香。果香浓郁，红果的细微变化，新鲜，中等复杂度，矿物质末端的黑樱桃。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark, but not opaque purple- red color. The restrained fruit aromas are of warm, ripe, dark-plum over chocolate & coffee hints. The palate starts with lovely fresh acidity & juicy, plumy red-fruit. The wine is of mid-weight with fine tannins. The balanced alcohol helps lift exotic, cedary spices from the oak. The finish is fine, firm & crunchy with juicy, lifted red-plum fruit - it lasts well. 04/23 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的紫红色。酒中有温暖的熟透的黑杏和巧克力、咖啡的气息。口感清新果香，酸度适中，果味丰富。酒体中等，纤维度细腻。酒中有适度的酒精，帮助提取橡木中的异国风味和松木香。酒尾坚实果香持久。

Chinese pairs.original: 橡木桶的松香和檀香比较明显，酒体松软而鲜美，点缀着矿物质咸感以及肉肉的单宁，很是讨喜，与期酒时单宁发干的情况简直是判若两人。摇杯之后散发出的黑樱桃和黑梅成熟而多汁，开瓶后无需醒酒就可以畅饮。
Chinese pairs.new: The oak barrel aging is evident with prominent notes of cedar and sandalwood. The wine has a silky texture and is bursting with fresh flavors, accented by a subtle minerality and velvety tannins. It's a delightful contrast to the wine's expected dry tannins. After swirling, the wine releases mature black cherry and black plum flavors, rich and full-bodied. Enjoy it immediately after opening, no decanting required.

English pairs.original: The scents of pines and sandalwoods are prominent in the smell. With a soft and juicy body and a hint of mineral saltiness and fleshy tannins, this wine is satisfying, absolutely different from the En Primeur wine, whose tannins are so dry. It exudes the ripe and juicy aromas of black cherries and blackberries following the glass swirl. It’s drinkable immediately without a carafe.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的气味中，松柏和沉香的香气非常突出。酒体软滑，口感丰富，带有矿物质的咸味和丰富的果肉质的苦味，非常令人满意。与En Primeur红酒相比，这款红酒的苦味更加柔和。酒中充满了成熟的黑樱桃和黑莓的浓郁果香，随着玻璃旋转，香气会更加浓郁。这种红酒可以直接饮用，不需要过滤器。

Western reviews.review: This is the finest vintage of Saintayme I have ever tasted. Medium-bodied, finesse styled, elegant, fresh and vibrant, produced from 100% Merlot, the wine is all about showing off its sweet, red, earthy pit fruits, flowers, smoke, truffle and plums in the nose, palate and elegant finish. Drink from 2023-2038.
Western reviews.translation: 这是我尝过的圣泰姆（Saintayme）最好的年份。体积中等，精致风格，优雅，新鲜和充满活力，100% 梅洛（Merlot）葡萄制成的酒，酒中展现出其甜美的红色果实，花朵，烟草，松露和浆果的芳香，口感和优雅的尾韵。建议从2023年到2038年饮用。

Western reviews.review: Very elegant with fine craftsmanship showing notes of black prunes, blackberries, sour cherries, camphor, sandalwood, crushed blueberries and plums. Full bodied, perfectly extracted tannins and a solid, very precise finish which shows elegance and modern vision. Better from 2026.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒非常优雅，工艺精良，展现出黑枣、黑莓、酸樱桃、樟脑、沉香、蓝莓和黑桃的复杂风味。酒体丰富，提取度完美，口感坚实，尾部精确，展现出优雅和现代风格。建议在2026年后品尝。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Laurence 2020 是一款异常清爽的白葡萄酒，拥有响亮的酸度和清脆的口感，完全看不出2020年份的干热痕迹。鲜脆的白桃、纯粹的青柚、再加上淡淡的还原气息 (打火石)，让整个味蕾营造出欢愉的氛围感。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau Laurence 2020 is a refreshingly crisp white wine, boasting a lively acidity and a clean finish, with no hint of the dry heat of the 2020 vintage. Fresh white peaches, pure green citrus, and a subtle hint of smokiness (gunpowder) come together to create a delightful sensory experience.

English pairs.original: Chateau Laurence 2020 is an extraordinarily fresh white wine with bright acidity and crisp texture, completely masking the dry heat traces of the 2020 vintage. . Combined with the light reductive hint (flint), crisp fragrance of white peach and pure flavour of green pomelo create a delightful atmosphere for the palate.
English pairs.new: 查泰奥·劳伦斯 2020是一款极具新鲜感的白酒，具有明亮的酸度和清脆的口感，完全掩盖了2020年产季的干热痕迹。  与轻微的还原性气味（火石）和白桃的清脆香气相结合，绿柚子的纯粹口感为味蕾带来愉悦的氛围。

Western reviews.review: Joli nez précis et qui offre de la puissance en maitrise, de la justesse, une certaine petite intensité ainsi que de la profondeur. On y retrouve des notes de mûre de Boysen, de fraise des bois assez mûre et plus légèrement de petits fruits presque rôtis associées à des touches de poivre de Timut, de lys ainsi qu’à de fines pointes presque zestes frais et à de subtiles pointes de gousse de vanille. La bouche est joliment minérale, équilibrée et offre de la jutosité, une trame acidulée, une bonne définition, une certaine tension, de la justesse ainsi que de la gourmandise. L’attaque est fraiche, gourmande et offre de l’ampleur ainsi que de la justesse. En bouche ce vin exprime des notes de mûre juteuse/pulpeuse, de framboise et plus légèrement de bleuet, de lys associées à des touches de groseilles écrasées, à une pointe de petits fruits rôtis, à des pointes de toasté, de chocolaté ainsi qu’à une subtile pointe de sauge, de violette et de vanille. Les tannins sont moelleux. Bonne longueur. Du moelleux en fin de bouche.
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的香气精致，具有强大的控制力，正直，轻微的强度以及深度。它带有 Boysen 桃子的熟透味，森林 strawberries 的熟透味以及轻微的几乎烤熟的小水果味，伴随着 Timut 胡椒的微妙味道，百合花味以及几乎新鲜的柑橘皮和细微的香料味道，包括轻微的香草味。

口感清晰，平衡，具有丰富的口感，酸度清晰，具有良好的定义，轻微的紧张感，正直以及丰富的口感。入口清新，丰富，具有广阔的空间以及正直。

在口中，这瓶红酒表现出浓郁的、汁液丰富的 Boysen 桃子味，黑莓味以及轻微的蓝莓味，百合花味伴随着压碎的草莓味，几乎烤熟的小水果味，烤焦味，巧克力味以及微妙的迷迭香味，紫罗兰味和香草味。纤维素柔软。口感持久。口感柔软。

Chinese pairs.original: 酒质富含果实味，集中醇厚，单宁圆润。赤霞珠葡萄为此酒带来了力道，单宁以及黑醋栗的风味，而美乐则赋予其深邃的酒色以及酒香，使酒体更加圆润优雅。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine is rich in fruit flavors, concentrated and full-bodied, with smooth tannins. The Cabernet Sauvignon grapes bring power, tannins, and blackberry flavors, while Merlot adds depth and complexity to the wine's color and aroma, making it smooth and elegant.

Western reviews.review: Medium-bodied, fresh, bright, developed, classic styled wine with cedar, tobacco and earthy notes on top of the red currants and red plums. The wine is correct, but not exciting. 88 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感中等，清新、明亮、成熟，典雅黑风格，带有红葡萄和红李子的香气，伴有松木、烟草和泥土的味道。虽然这款红酒做得很好，但并没有给人特别的惊喜。评分：88分。

Western reviews.review: Medium-bodied, fresh, bright, developed, classic styled wine with cedar, tobacco and earthy notes on top of the red currants and red plums. The wine is correct, but not exciting. 88 Points
Western reviews.translation: 中等体积的酒，新鲜、明亮、成熟，典型的风格，带有红葡萄和红李子的香气，伴有松木、烟草和泥土的味道。酒的品质良好，但不够引人入胜。评分88分。

Western reviews.review: 90-92 Barrel sample. Dry, tight tannins, the fruit a hint of berries over stalky blackcurrants. This is a dense wine, with black flavors, only a hint of a powerful future in store.
Western reviews.translation: 90-92 桶样品。干燥的紧密的橡皮质，果味带有浓郁的黑莓和干枯的黑currant。这种酒很浓厚，带有黑色风味，只有微弱的预示着强大的未来。

Western reviews.review: 90-92 Barrel sample. Dry, tight tannins, the fruit a hint of berries over stalky blackcurrants. This is a dense wine, with black flavors, only a hint of a powerful future in store.
Western reviews.translation: 90-92 桶样品。干燥的紧密的橡皮质，果味带有浓郁的黑莓和干枯的黑currant。这种酒很浓厚，带有黑色风味，只有微弱的预示着强大的未来。

Western reviews.review: Medium ruby-red with garnet hints at the rim. Dark & curiously well-developed fruit on the nose, including over-ripe volatile notes. High-ripeness dark-fruit on the palate is unusually mature  in character & is backed by cedar & mocha flavors from new oak. Within its context the wine is elegantlt structured & acidity & alcohol are in balance. High-toned perfumes show on the finish and the flavors last well. 11/12 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色，边缘有 garnet 色调。酒香中有成熟的果味，包括一些过熟的气味。口感上，酒体丰富，带有熟透的黑果味，伴有新橡木的香气，如 cedar 和 mocha。考虑到酒的性质，酒的结构优雅，酸度和酒精的平衡。酒尾有高调的香气，味道持久。评分：11/12

Chinese pairs.original: 如果你想感受紫罗兰的幽香，Chauvin 2019一定能够满足你的心愿。作为一款来自砂土黏土的美乐混酿，它始终保持着柔软芬芳的性格特点。单宁细滑，酒体平顺，是为柔和型葡萄酒爱好者准备的专属礼物。
Chinese pairs.new: If you're looking to experience the subtle charm of lavender, Chauvin 2019 is sure to satisfy your desires. As a blend from clay soils, it consistently retains its soft, fragrant character. With fine tannins and a smooth texture, it's a gift tailored specifically for fans of gentle wines.

English pairs.original: If you would like to feel the fragrance of violet, Chauvin 2019 will surely be able to satisfy your wishes. As a Merlot blend from sandy clay, it always maintains a soft and fragrant character. With smooth tannins and silky body, it is an exclusive gift for lovers of soft wines.
English pairs.new: 如果你想体验到紫罗兰的芬芳，那么2019年查维恩（Chauvin）红酒一定能满足你的愿望。作为一款来自沙质黏土的梅洛（Merlot）系列红酒，它始终保持着柔和的香气和风情。它的滑顺的苦味和细腻的口感，让它成为那些喜爱柔和红酒的人的珍贵礼物。

Western reviews.review: Extremely aromatic with chalk and dried flowers, as well as blackberries and blueberries. It’s medium-to full-bodied with a steady layer of medium, round and chewy tannins and a long, spicy finish of white pepper and dark fruit.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有极强的香气，带有石灰和干花的味道，伴随着黑莓和蓝莓的果香。口感中等到中厚，具有稳定的中等坚果和圆润的口感，尾部长且带有白胡椒和黑果的香气。

Western reviews.review: I continue to love the wines from this château. The 2019 Château Chauvin shows an impeccably balanced, elegant, yet still concentrated style that's well worth seeking out. Mostly Merlot (there's some Cabernet Franc as well as a tiny amount of Cabernet Sauvignon), its deep purple hue is followed by a clean, pure, medium to full-bodied wine offering classic ripe darker cherry and currant fruits as well as spicy oak, chalky minerality, and hints of tobacco. It's still closed and reserved today, yet the balance is spot on, it has beautifully ripe tannins, and a great mid-palate. It's going to benefit from 4-5 years of bottle age and have at least two decades of prime drinking. It's wonderful stuff. Rating: 94+
Western reviews.translation: 我继续喜欢这个酒庄的葡萄酒。2019年沙文酒庄的葡萄酒展现出完美平衡的、优雅的、但仍然浓郁的风格，值得去寻找。主要是梅洛（还有些卡波弗朗克和少量的卡波萨维尼昂），其深紫色外观后面是清澈、纯粹、中等到全身葡萄酒，提供经典的成熟黑樱桃和黑currant水果味道，以及香料橡木、石灰质矿物质和烟草的味道。它今天仍然闭塞和保守，但平衡得非常好，它有美丽成熟的鞣质，中口感很好。它将从4-5年的瓶子年龄中受益，并有至少两十年的最佳饮用时间。它的确是很棒的葡萄酒。评分：94+

Western reviews.review:
An impressive wine that feels very true to the estate, with plenty of St Emilion signature - plump rich fruits and grilled oak without being overblown. Elegant, restrained with well placed blackberry and cherry, this really unrolls in the glass and is extremely enjoyable. There is twice as much Cabernet Franc as usual in the blend of the first wine, and it shows in the tension and lift through the finish.
Barrel Sample: 93
Western reviews.translation:
这是一瓶令人印象深刻的红酒，非常符合庄园的风格，充满了圣埃米利昂的标志性风味——丰富的果实和焦糖橡木味，但没有过度。优雅、克制，黑莓和樱桃的味道非常合适，这瓶酒在玻璃中展现得非常出色，非常令人愉悦。第一瓶酒的混合比例中，法布尔（Cabernet Franc）比例比平常高出一倍，这在酒尾的紧张感和升华中体现得非常明显。

酒评：93分

Western reviews.review: A ripe, fruity and smoky wine, this is a solid example of this vintage. The black fruits are open and luscious, giving juicy berry flavors. The tannins lurk underneath where lies the power and aging potential. This Sylvie Cazes wine is all set for medium-term aging.Barrel Sample: 91-93
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒充满了成熟的果味和烟熏味，是这一年份的典型代表。黑色果味开朗丰富，带来浓郁的浆果风味。酒中的纤维素潜伏在底层，蕴含着强大的力量和长期储存潜力。这瓶由Sylvie Cazes制作的红酒适合中期储存。酒评：91-93分。

Western reviews.review: A success from proprietor Sylvie Cazes, the 2019 Chauvin delivers aromas of rich berries and plums mingled with hints of sweet spices and dark chocolate. Medium to full-bodied, lively and seamless, it's layered and nicely concentrated, with bright acids and powdery tannins. This will merit a bit of patience.  Rating: 91+
Western reviews.translation: 来自 Sylvie Cazes 主人的一款成功作品，2019 年的 Chauvin 酒庄带来丰富的浓郁黑berries 和浓郁的浆果味道，混合着甜蜜的香料和黑巧克力。中等到全身的体积，生动活泼，流畅的口感，层次丰富，浓缩度良好，带有明亮的酸度和粉末状的纤维。需要一些耐心。 评分： 91+.

Chinese pairs.original: Clos Dubreuil 2021细腻的香气与柔和的口感组成一副温婉的画面，清晰干净的果香令其从列级庄中脱颖而出。单宁的萃取非常到位，既磨圆了单宁的棱角，又展现了Saint-Christophe-des-Bardes 的风土特性。虽然是一款黏土石灰岩高地的葡萄酒，但我觉得现在就可以开瓶饮用，当然陈年8-12年会更加精彩。
Chinese pairs.new:
Clos Dubreuil 2021

A delicate aroma and smooth texture come together to create a charming scene, with crisp and clean fruit notes setting it apart from its peers. Tannins are expertly extracted, rounding out the tannins' edges while showcasing the terroir of Saint-Christophe-des-Bardes. Despite being a wine from the clay limestone highlands, I think it's ready to drink now, but aging for 8-12 years will bring even greater complexity.

English pairs.original: Clos Dubreuil 2021 presents a refined and delicate picture with its subtle aromas and a palate that exudes elegance. The purity and clarity of its fruit aromas set it apart from the family of Grands Crus Classes. The tannin extraction is skillfully handled, rounding off any harsh edges while highlighting the terroir of Saint-Christophe-des-Bardes. Despite hailing from clay-limestone highlands, I believe it’s ready for enjoyment today, though aging it for 8-12 years will undoubtedly enhance its exquisite qualities.
English pairs.new: 克洛斯·德布吕伊 2021呈现出一种优雅而细致的风格，其微妙的香气和优雅的口感让人印象深刻。其果香的纯粹和清晰使其与其他大酒庄相比脱颖而出。酒中提取的鞣质被精心处理，使其柔和的口感不再具有任何粗糙的边缘，而是突出了圣克里斯托夫德巴尔德地区的特质。尽管来自黏土和石灰岩高地，但我认为它已经准备好享用了，尽管将其储存8-12年会无疑增强其优雅的品质。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby garnet, opaque core, purple hue at the rim. Dark wild berry fruit and black cherries hover over a touch of nougat, and tobacco. Complex and textured, cherries underscored with a whisper of cloves, vivid tannins, mineral, discreet sweetness, lovely length; already open, certain ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色 garnet色，透明核心，紫色边缘。黑野果和黑草莓的浓郁果香在一丝 nougat 和烟草的背景下飘荡。复杂且纹理丰富，草莓的味道被一丝丁香的微妙味道所伴随，明显的矿物质味道，低调的甜度，美妙的长度；已经打开，具有明确的陈化潜力。

Western reviews.review: Leuchtendes Rubinrot. Verspielte, feinduftige Nase, Brombeermarmelade, Tee, florale Töne, dezente Röstnoten. Der Gaumen ist fruchtig, frisch, da ist Druck und Finesse, ungemein feine Gerbstoffe, saftige Säure, präzis, charmant und mit viel Energie. Sehr gelungen. 2025-2038 (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2022. Grand Cercle des Vins de Bordeaux)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

闪亮的红宝石色。玩味的、果香的鼻子，浆果果酱、茶叶、花朵的香气、轻微的烟熏味。口感果香、清新、有力，酒液中有压力和细腻感，极细致的橡木味、清爽的酸度、精确、迷人和充满能量。非常成功。推荐饮用年份：2025-2038（2022年4月在巴黎品酒会上评估，巴黎葡萄酒协会）。

Chinese pairs.original: 烤面包、香料和木材艳丽芳香，还有很好的黑莓，黑醋栗和无花果果香，并融合了烤面包和石墨的气息。单宁饱满，余味长。
Chinese pairs.new: Toasted bread, spices, and wood notes abound, complemented by excellent blackberry, black currant, and quince fruit flavors, which blend seamlessly with toasted bread and graphite undertones. Tannins are full-bodied, with a long finish.

Western reviews.review: Huge improvement here. This is full-bodied, with super polished tannins and light smoky, chocolaty and plum character. Long and polished. Very fine indeed. Drink after 2016.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒有了显著的改进。它具有丰富的口感，细腻的橡皮质感和轻微的烟熏、巧克力和浆果风味。口感长且细腻。非常出色。建议在2016年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: An amped-up style, with showy aromatics of toasty spice and wood, but there's good solid density to the blackberry, black currant and fig fruit, and the toast melds into a more honest graphite edge through the finish. A solid expression of the modern style. Best from 2013 through 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的风格比较豪放，具有浓郁的香气，带有烤香和木头的味道。但是，黑莓、黑加仑和枣子的果味仍然保持着良好的实质感，烤香味逐渐融入到更真实的石墨边缘中，完美的结束。 这是现代风格的良好体现。建议从2013年到2025年享用。

Western reviews.review: Packed with Cabernet blackcurrant flavors, very ripe and laden with blackcurrants. Great final freshness.Barrel Sample: 90-92 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒充满了卡贝网黑currant的风味，非常成熟且充满了黑currant的味道。口感非常清新。酒评：90-92分。

Chinese pairs.original: 浓烈的蓝莓和黑醋栗果味交织着花朵的芬芳。质地丰满、顺滑。果味非常充沛。这是一款厚实的、诱人的葡萄酒。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich blueberry and blackberry fruit flavors are intertwined with floral aromas. The texture is full-bodied and smooth. The fruit flavors are incredibly vibrant. This is a rich, alluring wine.

Chinese pairs.original: 打底的橡木桶味并不明显，更多的是深厚但清晰的花香、黑莓、番茄、咸香、香草布丁和香料的香味。尽管酸度不足以完全支撑其脊骨，但其实此酒口感真正厉害的地方在于那丝滑、干净的果味及平衡、悠长的余韵。
Chinese pairs.new: The oak undertones are subtle, with a rich yet clear bouquet of floral notes, blackberry, tomato, saltiness, crème brûlée, and spices. Although the acidity falls short of fully supporting its structure, the wine truly shines with its silky, clean fruit flavors and balanced, lingering finish.

English pairs.original: A background touch of wood was sufficiently subtle that it allowed the profound but well-delineated sniffs of flowers, blackberry, tomato, savoury, vanilla pudding and spices to shine. Although somewhat lacking the acid backbone, but the silky qualities in the clean fruit and the balanced, long length were what you really need to pay attention to.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的背景中有微微的木质味道，但并不突出，反而让花香、黑莓、西红柿、咸味、香草布丁和香料的香味更加深刻和清晰。虽然这瓶红酒缺乏酸度的支撑，但它的清澈果味和平衡的长尾是值得注意的。

Western reviews.review: With an hour of air, the medium bodied, plummy wine developed more softness to its textures, coupled with the addition of the mocha, licorice and black cherries in the perfume. Clearly, this is not meant to make old bones. But if you give it some air, it's quite nice for drinking over the next several years. 92 Points
Western reviews.translation: 一小时后，中度体积的酒体变得更加柔和，气味中加入了巧克力、甘草和黑樱桃的香气。显然，这不是为了长期储存的酒。然而，如果给它一些空气，它在接下来的几年内是很好的饮用选择。 评分：92分。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby, purple reflections, delicate bright rim. An attractive bouquet of fresh cherry, hints of dark berry, tobacco spice, an inviting nose. Juicy, elegant, subtle chocolate nuances, vivid tannins, very long, it has good certain ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，紫色反射，细致的亮边缘。新鲜樱桃的诱人香气，黑莓的微妙暗香，烟草的香气，令人垂涎的鼻子。口感丰富，优雅，微妙的巧克力细节，明亮的坚果，非常持久，具有很好的陈化潜力。

Western reviews.review: Fresh herbs, truffle, licorice, dark cherry and spice box aromas get the show started. The soft, polished, sensuous fruits are what you need to pay attention to. Already open, drink this young for the freshness and silky qualities in the sweet fruit or age it for more complexity. This is one of the stars of the vintage. 94 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中包含了新鲜香草、松露、甘草、黑樱桃和香料盒的味道。柔软、光滑的果味是值得注意的。酒已经打开，可以直接饮用，享受新鲜果味和滑顺口感；也可以放置一段时间，等待更复杂的口感。 这是当年的一颗明星红酒。评分：94分。

Western reviews.review: Deep dark, almost opaque purple red colour. The wine’s aromas are predominantly of red-fruits & coffee grounds with underlying meaty notes. The palate is quite drying with plentiful fine tannins. Good acidity lifts the red-fruit nicely so elegant redcurrant notes remain on the finish even after the drying tannins have subsided. The acidity is fresh & the alcohol is balanced, the finish is long and refined if a little drying. 4/12 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深暗的紫红色，几乎是透明的。酒中的香气主要是红果和咖啡渣的味道，底层有肉类的味道。口感干净，充满细致的坚果味。酒中的酸度很好，能够让红果的味道更加鲜美，甚至在干净的坚果味消退后，仍然能留下清新的红果味。酒中的酸度新鲜，酒精平衡，酒尾长且细腻，但有一点干净的味道。评分：4/12

Western reviews.review: "Fully developed Chateau Clinet 2011 Black cherry , blackberries , plum and stunning cigar humidor note Powerful and focused palate with lots of black fruit fully integrated oak and soft tannins long stunning finish and in my opinion there is no need to wait , start enjoy it from now 94/100"
Western reviews.translation: 2011年克莱内特庄园（Chateau Clinet）红酒已达到成熟。酒中充满了黑樱桃、黑莓、浆果和令人惊艳的烟斗室香气。酒口强劲而集中，黑果充分融合了橡木味和柔软的牙感。酒尾长而惊艳。根据我的意见，完全没有必要等待，直接从现在开始享用吧。评分：94/100。

Chinese pairs.original: 刚装瓶后有些轻微的还原，但摇杯之后便感受到玫瑰花茶、清脆李子，以及淡淡的甘草胡椒辛香。作为一款高比例赤霞珠混酿(61% Cabernet Sauvignon, 34% Merlot, 5% Petit Verdot)，我却感受到了Merlot般柔软醇厚的酒体，酿酒师对浸渍的力度处理十分精湛。建议适饮窗口2024-2030年。
Chinese pairs.new: After bottling, there's a hint of reduction, but after swirling, I'm greeted by rose tea, crisp plum, and a subtle hint of sweet pepper. As a high proportion of Cabernet Sauvignon blend (61% Cabernet Sauvignon, 34% Merlot, 5% Petit Verdot), I'm surprised by the plush, velvety texture reminiscent of Merlot. The winemaker's deft handling of extraction is impressive. Recommended drinking window: 2024-2030.

English pairs.original: After bottling, it is mildly reserved, but after swirling the glass, I detect rose tea, crisp plums, and a vague licorice and pepper spice flavor. With the high percentage of Cabernet Sauvignon in the blend (61% Cabernet Sauvignon, 34% Merlot, and 5% Petit Verdot), I was suprised and pleased with its gentle, mellow Merlot-like body and the winemaker’s expert control of maceration. Suggested drinking window: 2024-2030.
English pairs.new: 瓶装后，酒精度是比较保守的，但在旋转酒杯后，我发现了玫瑰茶、清脆的李子和淡淡的甘草和胡椒味。鉴于酒中Cabernet Sauvignon的比例较高（61% Cabernet Sauvignon、34% Merlot 和 5% Petit Verdot），我对其温和、柔和的Merlot风格感到惊讶和满意。酒庄的酿酒师对发酵的控制也非常出色。建议饮用时间：2024-2030年。

Western reviews.review: Dried herbs, tobacco leaf, cedar, and peppery currants are easy to spot in the perfume and on the palate. Medium-bodied, chewy and savory, the wine leaves you with in herb-infused, minty, red currant finish. Drink from 2024-2039.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中，干香草、烟草叶、红檜和辣椒般的黑currant味道非常明显。口感中等，口感丰富，带有干香草和薄荷的味道，余味是干香草和红currant。建议从2024年到2039年饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: Les Forts de Latour 2021的酸度明显更高，但得益于13%的酒精度和圆润的口感，整个味蕾保持了理想的平衡度。和正牌酒一样，这款酒的亮点在于对单宁的打磨，丝绒般的单宁抚摸味蕾，给我带来了柔顺而绵长的回甘。
Chinese pairs.new: The Les Forts de Latour 2021 has a noticeably higher acidity, but thanks to its 13% alcohol content and smooth texture, the entire palate remains perfectly balanced. Like the flagship wine, the standout feature of this wine is its polished tannins, with silky tannins caressing the palate, delivering a smooth and lingering finish.

English pairs.original: Les Forts de Latour 2021 has significantly higher acidity. But thanks to its 13% alcohol level and rounded mouthfeel, an ideal balance is maintained on the palate. As with its Grand Vin, the highlight of this wine is the polished tannins, when the velvety tannins caress the taste buds, it brings a mellow and lingering aftertaste.
English pairs.new: 莱塔鲁的强力版2021年红酒，酸度明显升高。但是，由于其13%的酒精含量和圆润的口感，口感上保持了理想的平衡。与其大酒庄一样，这款酒的亮点是光滑的橡皮质，细腻的橡皮质在舌头上轻抚，带来了一种柔和且持久的余味。

Western reviews.review: Vibrant, crisp, fresh black raspberries, red currants, pepper, flowers, and tobacco leaves form the core of the wine in the nose, and on the palate. Medium-bodied, with bright, red currants, and herbs, there is brightness and a blast of minty refreshing air to the fruits in the mid-palate, and in the finish. The wine blends 61% Cabernet Sauvignon, 32.6 Merlot, and 6.4% Petit Verdot. Drink from 2025-2045.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中充满了活力、清脆、新鲜的黑莓、红葡萄、胡椒、花朵和烟草叶的味道。口感中体积适中，红葡萄和香草味道清新明亮，中口和尾部都有清新的薄荷味。酒中混合了61%卡波雷尔葡萄酒、32.6%梅洛葡萄酒和6.4%小皮特葡萄酒。建议从2025年到2045年饮用。

Western reviews.review: Intense ruby core with purple hues on the rim. Shows notes of hibiscus, redcurrants, red cherries and herbal savouriness. Juicy, fresh, well-structured, red berry fruit, integrated tannins, mineral coolness, salty finish.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色酒液，边缘有紫色光泽。酒中展现出荼花、红樱桃、红樱果和草药香气。酒口滑顺，新鲜，结构良好，红果味浓郁，纤维化合物融合，矿物质清凉，咸味尾韵。

Western reviews.review: 70% Neuholz. Leuchtendes Rubinrot. In der Nase mit sehr feinem Duft, da sind getrocknete Rosen über einer reifen Cassisfrucht, dahinter dunkle Beeren, ein Hauch Tee. Im Gaumen straff, gradlinig, klar und rein, das hat Eleganz, die Struktur ist da, die Frucht ist saftig und frisch. Leichtfüssig und mit sehr guter Länge im Abgang. 2025-2037 (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2022. Château Latour)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论，翻译成中文如下：

70% 新木桶。闪亮的深红色。酒鼻中有非常细微的香气，干燥的玫瑰花和成熟的黑加思果，后面是黑莓的味道，带有茶叶的微妙。口感紧致，平衡，清晰，纯粹，具有典雅的风格，结构清晰，果味丰富，新鲜。口感轻盈，余味持久。推荐饮用时间：2025-2037（2022年4月在酒庄试喝，拉图尔酒庄）。

Chinese pairs.original: 装瓶之后的Chateau Dalem 2021比期酒时优秀很多。虽然该年份酒色比较淡雅，香气也不甚张扬，但却透着几分精巧与柔媚。细腻如粉的单宁恰到好处地铺在圆圆的酒体表面，巧妙地丰富了口感的层次。尾韵中的一抹咸意很好地表达了石灰岩土质的独特风韵，伴随着小红莓与酸樱桃的香气缓缓散去。看的出来，这款酒对葡萄的筛选非常严苛，是2021年份Fronsac产区值得推荐的作品。
Chinese pairs.new: The post-bottled Chateau Dalem 2021 far surpasses its predecessor. Although the color is relatively pale and the aroma is not particularly pronounced, it exudes a touch of finesse and subtlety. The fine-grained tannins are perfectly balanced on the smooth, rounded palate, skillfully adding depth to the flavor profile. A hint of saltiness in the finish beautifully captures the unique terroir of the limestone soil, as the subtle scents of wild strawberry and tart cherry slowly dissipate. It's clear that the winemakers were extremely selective in their grape choices, making this a standout recommendation for the 2021 Fronsac vintage.

English pairs.original: The bottled Chateau Dalem 2021 has improved significantly compared to its En Primeur tasting. Despite its lighter hue and somewhat understated aroma, it possesses a refined delicacy. The finely powdered tannins are perfectly laid over its round body, cleverly enriching the texture on the palate. The hint of saltiness in the finish beautifully conveys the limestone soil’s unique character, gradually fading with the scents of cranberries and sour cherries. It’s evident that this wine underwent stringent grape selection, making it a commendable Fronsac production for the 2021 vintage.”
English pairs.new: 2021年酒庄佳酿（Chateau Dalem）装瓶品质已经显著提高，远超初次品尝时的表现。尽管其颜色较浅，香气相对低调，但它仍然展现出优雅的细腻感。细致的粉末状纤维素完美地覆盖在其圆润的体积上，巧妙地增厚了口感。酒尾的微妙咸味美妙地展现了石灰质土壤独特的特征，随着枫糖和酸橙的气味逐渐消退。显然，这款酒经过了严格的葡萄选择，这使得2021年弗朗萨克（Fronsac）产区的佳酿酒庄佳酿成为一款值得称赞的佳酿。

Western reviews.review: The 2021 Dalem offers ample black fruit on the nose with hints of lavender and rose petals, showing a pastille-like purity that is quite seductive. The palate is medium-bodied with fine tannins, very silky in texture, revealing just a touch of bitterness on the finish that lends tension and energy. This is a fine Fronsac that will age well over the next 15 to 20 years. –Neal Martin
Western reviews.translation: 2021年达勒姆(Dalem)红酒的香气中充满了黑果的味道，伴有百合和玫瑰花的微妙气息，呈现出一种非常诱人的清澈纯粹感。口感中等，纤维细腻，表面光滑，尾部略带苦味，给人一种紧张和活力感。这种弗朗萨克(Fronsac)红酒品质不错，预计在未来15到20年内会有很好的陈化效果。 –Neal Martin

Western reviews.review: A fragrant, spicy red with olives, currants and iron on the nose, alongside cloves and violets. Medium-bodied, fine and elegant with sleek tannins. Juicy and precise. Merlot and cabernet franc.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有浓郁的香气，带有橄榄、葡萄干和铁矿的味道，鼻子中还可以闻到丁香和紫罗兰的香味。口感中等，细致优雅，纤维性质细腻。口感丰富，精确。酒中含有梅洛和卡波弗朗克两种葡萄品种。

Western reviews.review: The 2021 Dalem offers ample black fruit on the nose with hints of lavender and rose petals, showing a pastille-like purity that is quite seductive. The palate is medium-bodied with fine tannins, very silky in texture, revealing just a touch of bitterness on the finish that lends tension and energy. This is a fine Fronsac that will age well over the next 15 to 20 years. –Neal Martin
Western reviews.translation: 2021 年的达勒姆(Dalem)红酒带有丰富的黑果味，鼻子中还带有玫瑰花和月季花的香味，呈现出一种非常诱人的清澈纯粹感。口感中等，纤维细腻，表面细腻柔滑，尾部带有微微的苦味，给人一种紧张和活力感。这是一款精美的弗朗萨克(Fronsac)红酒，预计在未来15到20年内会有很好的陈化效果。 –Neal Martin

Western reviews.review: A fragrant, spicy red with olives, currants and iron on the nose, alongside cloves and violets. Medium-bodied, fine and elegant with sleek tannins. Juicy and precise. Merlot and cabernet franc.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有浓郁的香气，带有橄榄、葡萄干和铁矿的味道，鼻子中还可以闻到丁香和紫罗兰的香味。口感中等，细致优雅，纤维性质细腻。口感丰富，精确。酒中含有梅洛和卡波弗朗克两种葡萄品种。

2023 Le Clarence de Haut-Brion - Chateau.name: 2023 Le Clarence de Haut-Brion - Chateau Bahans Haut-Brion

Chinese pairs.original: Le Clarence de Haut-Brion 2023 是一款很有力量感的一级庄副牌，虽然赤霞珠的比例只有40.9%，但却带着罕见的结构和力量。石墨、铅笔芯、草果、桂皮的香气组合既有深度又活力满满，伴随着经典的甜美感，颇有几分正牌酒的影子。高酸所带来的清澈感令整个酒体更显轻盈，无论是陈年还是现在饮用都非常合适。
Chinese pairs.new: Le Clarence de Haut-Brion 2023是一款充满力量感的顶级葡萄酒，尽管赤霞珠仅占40.9%，但它却展现出罕见的结构和力量。酒中石墨、铅笔芯、草果和桂皮的复杂香气令人印象深刻，带有典雅黑的甜美感，令人想起了正牌酒的风范。高酸度赋予了酒体清澈和轻盈的感觉，无论是陈年还是现在饮用，都非常适合。

English pairs.original: Le Clarence de Haut-Brion 2023 is a powerful second label from a premier Grand Cru, boasting a rare structure and strength despite only having 40.9% Cabernet Sauvignon. The combination of graphite, pencil shavings, cubeb, and cinnamon offers both depth and vitality, accompanied by a classic sweetness. The high acidity brings a clarity that makes the wine appear lighter, making it suitable for drinking now or aging.
English pairs.new: 莱克莱恩德豪特布里昂 2023是一款来自顶级大酒庄的强劲第二品牌葡萄酒，具有罕见的结构和力量，尽管仅含有40.9%卡波内尔萨维诺。石墨、铅笔屑、卡布奇诺和肉桂的组合，提供了深度和活力，并伴有经典的甜度。高酸度带来清晰的效果，使得葡萄酒看起来更轻，适合立即饮用或陈化。

Western reviews.review: 94-96. Barrel Sample. Showing some of typical seriousness of Haut-Brion, the wine has structure and a firm layer of tannins. With its smoky aroma, it has spice and a core of dryness.
Western reviews.translation: 94-96分。酒桶样品。展现出一些典型的黑白布里昂严肃性，酒中结构坚实，坚韧的橡皮质。酒中有烟熏味，带有香料和干燥的核心。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark, virtually opaque purple-red in color with a purple rim. Juicy, ripe damson fruit aromas comprise the nose. The palate opens with fresh acidity showing off open, ripe black-plum fruit. The wine is medium-bodied with licorice fruit core & plentiful, fine tannins that add grip to the back palate. The finish is long & structured, but concludes with lively blackcurrant fruit. 04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深紫红色，几乎透明。酒鼻子上充满了熟透的浆果香气，特别是浆果的气味。口感上，酒体开启时带有清新的酸度，展现出开启的黑浆果的风味。酒体中等，口感中带有 licorice 的浆果核心和丰富的细致纤维，给后口带来紧实的感觉。酒尾长且结构紧凑，但结尾时带有活泼的黑葡萄风味。评分：4.24分（ep）DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 2023 年份的Chateau Laforge 在Merlot 的圆润感周围敷上了一层面膜，摘掉面膜的那一刻，我看到的是富有弹性的酒体和光滑的肌肤。2023年份的果香并不是特别复杂，但却带着温柔的气质，软糯的草莓伴随着几粒沾满奶油的蓝莓，给圆润的酒体增加了几分甜美。几乎不需要任何陈年就可以开瓶饮用。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2023 vintage of Chateau Laforge wraps a layer of silk around the plush Merlot texture, and when I peel it away, I see a wine with a supple body and smooth tannins. The 2023 vintage's fruit flavors aren't particularly complex, but they have a gentle charm, with soft strawberry notes accompanied by a few blueberries smothered in cream, adding a touch of sweetness to the plush texture. It's almost ready to drink straight away, with minimal need for aging.

English pairs.original: In the 2023 vintage, Chateau Laforge has applied a mask around the roundness of Merlot. Upon removing the mask, what I see is a resilient body and smooth skin. While the fruitiness of the 2023 vintage isn’t overly complex, it carries a gentle demeanor. Soft strawberries accompanied by a few blueberries coated in cream add a touch of “sucrosite” to the rounded body. It’s almost unnecessary to age; it can be enjoyed straight from the bottle.
English pairs.new: 2023年产的香格拉堡（Chateau Laforge）对梅洛（Merlot）的圆润性进行了掩饰。脱去掩饰后，我看到的是坚韧的体积和光滑的皮肤。虽然2023年产的果味并不是非常复杂，但它带有温和的气质。软红莓伴随着几颗蓝莓被奶油覆盖，给圆润的体积带来了“甜美”的感觉。几乎不需要陈化就可以直接享用。

Western reviews.review: 91-93. Barrel Sample. Structure and concentration on a wine that has rich tannins and aromatic Merlot blackberry fruits. It has density and juicy acidity that gives it a succulent character. The wine will age well over the medium term.
Western reviews.translation: 酒评：91-93分。酒体结构和浓度完美，富含的橡木味和黑莓果味。酒精度高，酸度清新，口感丰富。酒精度高，酸度清新，口感丰富。酒将在中期内逐渐成熟。

Western reviews.review: The wine exhibits a dark, gothic character with the inclusion of just 10% Cabernet Franc providing significant structural elements, the wine is lean and powerful. It is quite texturised overall, with impressive tannins that impart a powdery mouthfeel. Fairly long finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒展现出深沉的、哥特式风格，仅含有10%的卡波弗朗克，提供了显著的结构元素，使得这款红酒显得瘦长而强劲。整体来说，这款红酒具有丰富的口感，具有深刻的牙感，口感持久。

Western reviews.review: The wine has a deep, dark, virtually opaque black-red color with a purple rim. The high-toned, ripe, dark-cherry aromas have cedary hints. The palate displays rich, bursting, ripe black-plum & black-cherry fruit with powerful clean cedary oak, vanilla & exotic spices. Acidity is fresh & the wine is medium-bodied with a smooth structure of ripe tannins. The wine finishes with warming touches from the alcohol, richness & juicy black fruit. 04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒呈现出深暗的黑红色，几乎透明的紫色边缘。酒中高调的、成熟的黑樱桃香气伴有松木的味道。口感丰富，爆发式的成熟黑杏和黑樱桃果味，配以强烈清晰的松木、香草和异国风味。酒的酸度清新，酒体中等，结构平滑，成熟的鞣质柔和。酒尾留有温暖的酒精感、丰富感和浓郁的黑果味。评分：04/24 (ep) DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 焦糖，烟熏以及甜美黑色浆果香气，入口单宁结实厚重，酸度稍偏高，酒质表现好，需几年时间陈酿后风味更佳。
Chinese pairs.new: Caramel, smoky, and sweet black fruit aromas. Firm, full-bodied tannins on the palate, with a slightly elevated acidity. Shows good quality, and will improve with several years of aging.

Western reviews.review: Tiefdunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung. Einladende süße Kirschenfrucht, zart nach Kräutern, Velours, feines Brombeerkonfit, zarter Anklang von Lakritze. Frisch, mittlere Komplexität, rotbeerige Nuancen, präsentes, gut verflochtenes Tannin, salzige Nuancen, mineralischer Nachhall, ein vielseitiger Speisenbegleiter.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色调，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。诱人的甜柠檬味，微微带有草药和绒毛感，细致的黑莓果酱，轻微的 licorice 回味。新鲜，中等复杂度，红色调，现成，细致的橡木味，微微带有盐味，矿物质余味，适合多种菜肴的搭配。

Western reviews.review: This marks an impressive step forward for this wine that's so often been in the shadows of other wines in the Lafite-Rothschild stable. It's dense and structured as well as deliciously fruity. The wine is straight down the line, starting with perfumed acidity and finishing with blackberry fruit. Intense and tannic, it's likely to age. Drink from 2020.
Western reviews.translation: 这款酒在拉菲-罗思柴尔德系列中终于脱颖而出，展现出令人印象深刻的进步。酒体浓密、结构良好，果香丰富。酒的风格直率，开头是清新的酸度，结尾是黑莓的果味。酒质强烈、有嚼头，很可能会随着时间的推移而更好。建议2020年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: Darkly pigmented medium to deep ruby-red. Fruit aromas are restrained & cedary. Fruit character consists of delicate plum & bullace flavors. The palate has a very fine cedary structure. Very fine, elegant, chalky tannins & mouth-watering acidity give lovely length & excellent freshness. 11/16 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，中度至深度。酒中果香较为淡雅，带有松木香。口感中果味以细腻的浆果和牛桃味为主。口感结构细致松木味。细致的松木质感和口感清新酸度使得口感延长并保持新鲜。评分：11/16

Western reviews.review:
13% Oak is a bit prominent with cocoa and roasted coffee bean upon the fruit. A hint of vegetal note as it gets decanted. Mellow, silky and pleasurable but lacking real verve and depth of flavors and persistence. Long. (Zekun Shuai)
Rating: 89/100 or 16.5/20
2016-2027
05/2018, Beijing
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的口感比较平和，入口有轻微的木头味和巧克力和烤咖啡豆的味道。随着酒瓶被倒出，会有轻微的植物味。口感滑顺，令人愉悦，但缺乏真正的活力和深度的味道和持久性。酒尾长。 (Zekun Shuai)
评分：89/100 或 16.5/20
推荐饮用年份：2016-2027
品鉴时间：2018年5月，北京。

Chinese pairs.original: 丰郁、柔顺，而不失粘稠，伴着李子、黑醋栗、黑莓酱的浓郁香气。余味中闪烁着木炭、烟草和铁块的气息。
Chinese pairs.new: Lush and smooth, yet not cloying, with intense aromas of plum, black cherry, and blackberry jam. The finish is punctuated by hints of charcoal, tobacco, and iron.

Western reviews.review: You can think of this as a scaled-down version of the stunning 2009 Grand Vin. Les Pagodes 2009 is at full-maturity, with smoked blackberries, spice, thyme and wet earthy nuances on the nose. Medium-bodied, soft, polished and silky, with loads of sweet, ripe, red fruits and freshness that glides over your palate. This is fully ready to go. No decanting needed. Just pop, pour and enjoy over the next 2-5 years. 93 Points
Western reviews.translation: 你可以把这个红酒想象成2009年格兰德温的缩小版。2009年莱斯帕戈斯已经达到成熟期，酒鼻中有烟熏黑莓、香料、鼠尾草和湿土的细微差别。口感中等，软、光滑、细致，满满的甜、成熟的红果味和新鲜感，流畅地在口中滑过。这瓶酒已经完全成熟，完全准备好享用。无需脱瓶，只需轻轻打开瓶塞，倒入杯中，享用2-5年。评分93分。

Western reviews.review: Tiefdunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe. In der Nase frische Preiselbeeren, rote Waldbeeren, ein Hauch von Dörrzwetschgen, Orangenzesten klingen an. Stoffig, komplex und süß, mineralisch, präsente, gut eingebundene Tannine, bleibt sehr gut haften, profitiert enorm vom tollen Jahrgang, zeigt Länge, Reifepotenzial. Ein wahrlich überdurchschnittlicher Zweitwein.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光。酒香中有新鲜青berry、红色森林果实、干燥的黑浆果和橙子皮的味道。口感厚重复杂，甜度适中，矿物质味道浓郁，坚果味道清晰，口感持久，酒龄潜力巨大。这个葡萄酒的质量远超一般的第二瓶葡萄酒。

Chinese pairs.original: 用一个词来形容2022年份的Chateau Carlmagnus，那便是：清甜爽朗。鲜亮的酸度绝对是这款酒最大的亮点，犹如黑暗中一道闪耀的光芒，让酒体中的所有”元素“都情不自禁地涌向它的周围。当山楂、红枣和花椒的麻味逐渐消退，精心打磨过的单宁随即粉嫩登场。这便是Fronsac葡萄酒的教科书，谁喝谁知道。
Chinese pairs.new:
To describe the 2022 Chateau Carlmagnus in one word, it's: crisp.

Vibrant acidity is the standout feature of this wine, shining like a beacon in the darkness, drawing all the "elements" in the wine towards it. As the prune, cherry and peppery spice notes fade, the polished tannins emerge, tender and refined. This is the textbook definition of a Fronsac wine.

English pairs.original: Chateau Carlmagnus 2022 can be described in one word: refreshing. Its bright acidity is the wine’s crowning glory, serving as a beacon in the darkness that draws all the elements of the wine towards it. As the numbing flavors of hawthorn, red dates, and Sichuan pepper gradually fade away, delicately crafted tannins emerge with a soft pink hue. This is truly a textbook Fronsac wine that one simply must taste in order to appreciate fully.
English pairs.new: 查托卡尔曼斯 2022 可以用一个词来描述：清新。它的亮丽的酸度是这瓶酒的亮点，像一盏灯塔一样引导所有酒中的元素朝向它。 当荚蒾、红枣和四川胡椒的麻木味渐渐消失时，精心打造的柔软的橡胶味开始出现，呈现出柔和的粉红色。这确实是一瓶典型的弗朗萨克酒，值得品尝以充分欣赏。

Western reviews.review: Parfümierte Nase, sehr floral, Rosenblüten, rote und dunkle Frucht, ein Hauch Cola. Im Gaumen frisch, knackige Frucht, merklich Gerbstoff, dieser ist leicht trocknend, im Abgang von guter Länge und mit viel Würze. Dürfte früh Spass machen. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / CVBG / Château Belgrave) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation: 芳香浓郁，非常花朵式，带有玫瑰花香，红色和深色水果，微微带有可乐味。口感清新，果味脆爽，明显有橡木味，略带干涩，尾部长且有嚼劲。应该会在短期内给人带来愉悦。 (评分时间：2023年4月，来自Château Belgrave)

Western reviews.review: Le nez a une jolie fraîcheur avec de l’intensité et de la profondeur ainsi qu’un joli petit côté épicé. On a des notes de mûre de boysen, de cassis éclatant et plus légèrement de poivre frais associé à des touches de sens de la place ainsi qu’à des pointes de camphre, de graphite et de vanille. La bouche est joliment menée avec de la fraîcheur et de la tension. Il y a de la justesse avec une bonne définition et des notes de mûres pulpeuses et juteuses, de cassis crémeux et plus légèrement de framboises associées à des touches de petits fruits bleus assez mûrs, de poivre de cubèbe ainsi qu’à de fines pointes de chocolat et de toast. Les tannins sont souples, racés et élégants. Il y a une jolie mâche en fin de bouche.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气非常清新，具有强烈的气味和深度，伴有微妙的辣味。酒中有浓郁的黑berries、爆发性的黑currant和轻微的新鲜胡椒，伴有地方风味和点缀的樟脑、石墨和香料。口感清新、紧张，具有准确的定义和浓郁的黑berries和黑currant，伴有轻微的蓝berries、熟透的蓝berries、胡椒和细微的巧克力和烤面包。酒中的纤维柔软、优雅和典雅，口感结束时留下美好的余韵。

Chinese pairs.original: 第一次品尝有明显的橡木桶烘焙气息，但在酒庄品鉴时香气明显舒展了很多。透过浓郁醇厚的酒液，我能够感受到丰富的烤榛子、烤杏仁以及八角、桂皮的醇香；回味时还带着乌梅、桑果以及黑莓的味道。酒体结构非常扎实，但在多汁口感的滋养下并不沉闷。如果收尾时的单宁能够更加绵柔，定能提升一个品级。期待装瓶后的表现。
Chinese pairs.new:
The first sip reveals a prominent oak barrel toast aroma, but during the winery tasting, the aroma becomes much more refined. 

Through the rich, full-bodied liquid, I can sense the richness of roasted hazelnuts, toasted almonds, and the spices of cinnamon and cloves; the aftertaste also brings notes of blackberry, plum, and blackberry. 

The wine's structure is very solid, but it's not heavy due to the juicy texture. If the tannins at the end could be smoother, it would definitely elevate the wine to the next level. 

I'm looking forward to seeing its performance after bottling.

English pairs.original: Upon my first taste, the prominent notes of oak were evident, yet upon re-tasting the wine at the chateau, the aromas had distinctly unfolded. Rich and luscious on the palate, the wine exuded an abundance of toasty hazelnut and almond, infused with hints of star anise and cinnamon, and culminated with a lingering finish of dark plum, mulberry, and blackberry. The wine boasted a solid structure, while its succulent texture kept it from feeling heavy. Should the tannins on the finish become even more supple, this wine has the potential to be elevated to new heights. I eagerly anticipate its performance when bottled.
English pairs.new: 第一次品尝时，橡木的浓郁香气立即显现，但是在庄园重新品尝时，香气已经明显展开。口感丰富醇厚，酒中充满了 Toasty hazelnut 和 almond 的香气，伴有星安妮斯和肉桂的微妙气息，最后以黑浆果、紫葡萄和黑莓的持久尾韵结束。酒体结构坚实，细腻的口感使其避免了沉重的感觉。如果尾韵中的苦味变得更加柔和，这款酒有望达到新的高度。

Western reviews.review: Flowers, cherries, currants, cigar wrappers and a touch of spice create the nose. On the palate, the wine is medium-bodied, fresh, spicy, and savory, with a peppery edge to the chewy currants in the finish. Drink from 2026-2045. 90-92 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中包含着花朵、樱桃、黑加仑和烟草纸的味道，伴随着一丝辛香料的味道。口感中，酒体中等，新鲜、辛辣、咸淡，尾部有着一丝辣椒的味道伴随着黑加仑的味道。建议从2026年到2045年饮用。评分：90-92分。

Western reviews.review: Fruchtig und mit floralen Tönen ist dieses Bouquet nicht sonderlich komplex, jedoch charmant. Im Gaumen leichtfüssig, zeigt eine knackige Frucht, die Tannine sind gut dosiert, tragen den Wein zusammen mit einer feinen Säure in ein angenehm langes Finale mit wiederum floralen Rückaromen. Stimmig und vermutlich schon in seiner Jugend mit Spass zu trinken. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / UGCB / Château Lynch-Bages) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中有浓郁的果香和花香，虽然不复杂，但很有魅力。口感轻盈，果味清脆，苦味和酸度都很好地平衡，带来一个舒适的长尾，尾部还留有花香余味。这瓶红酒很有协调性，可能在年轻时就可以享受。

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby garnet, purple reflections, subtle rim brightening. Delicate nougat, black cherries, some plums, tobacco nuances. Medium complexity, chocolaty, ripe plums, discreet freshness, round and harmonious, offers uncomplicated drinking pleasure.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，紫色反射，微微的边缘光泽。细腻的杏仁味，黑杏，少量的李子，烟草的细微差别。中等复杂度，巧克力味，成熟的李子，隐约的新鲜感，圆润和谐，提供简单的饮用乐趣。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark, practically opaque black-purple color to a vivid purple rim. The fruit on the nose has a slightly meaty nature and there is plenty of graphite character. The palate has fresh acidity and a very fine structure. Juicy blackcurrant notes enliven the mid-palate. The long finish is structured and ends a little bitter, yet retains a fresh blackcurrant crunch. 04/23 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的黑紫色，几乎透明的紫色边缘。酒鼻中果味略带肉质质感，图形特征丰富。口感清新酸度，结构细致。中口黑currant果味清新活泼。长尾结构完美，略带苦味，但仍保留清新黑currant果味。评分：04/23 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 陈年13载，2008年份依旧散发着年轻的气息，果香清澈柔和，虽然强度并不突出，但蔓越莓、酸枣和山楂等酸红果的芳香很是讨喜。入口细嫩柔顺，酸度爽朗高挑，带着Brane-Cantenac永恒的丝滑单宁在味蕾上流淌。
Chinese pairs.new: Aged for 13 years, this 2008 vintage still exudes a youthful charm, with clear and delicate fruit aromas, although the intensity is not particularly striking. The scents of cranberries, persimmons, and quinces are particularly pleasing. The entry is fine and smooth, with a crisp and lively acidity, and a silky, eternal tannin from Brane-Cantenac that flows across the palate.

English pairs.original: After 13 years of aging, this wine is still very vigorous. The moderate nose is purely precise, offering cranberry, sour jujube, and Chinese hawthorn. The palate is soft and sleek, with bright acidity and Brane-Cantenac iconic silky tannins towards the finish.
English pairs.new: 经过13年的陈酿，这款红酒仍然非常有活力。酒鼻中清晰的味道，呈现出浓郁的草莓、酸甜的枸杞和中国山楂的风味。口感柔和细腻，带有明亮的酸度和布兰-卡滕纳克（Brane-Cantenac）标志性的细腻橡质，直到尾部。

Western reviews.review: Showing its age in the color, the developing nose offers wet earth, espresso and red fruits. The wine is medium bodied,, with barely a tannic edge remaining to the sweet cherries on the palate. Just a few more years will add even more softness and complexity to the wine. The wine was made from blending 70% Cabernet Sauvignon, 28% Merlot and 2% Cabernet Franc. 91 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色已经显现出它的年龄，酒鼻中有湿润的土壤、浓缩的咖啡和红果的气息。酒体中等，口感中有甜樱桃的味道，几乎没有苦味的余韵。再过几年，酒会变得更加柔和复杂。酒的组成是70%卡波雷尔（Cabernet Sauvignon）、28%梅洛（Merlot）和2%卡波雷尔法兰克（Cabernet Franc）。评分：91分。

Western reviews.review: Medium intensity of darkly pigmented ruby red color. The nose is very restrained. The palate combines clean toasty oak & delicate red fruit. The fruit is initially quite flat, violet perfume shows briefly, but fades. Acid & alcohol are in balance but the fruit is closed so the length is short & the finish flat at present. 11/12 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深红色，中度浓密度。

香气：闻起来很谨慎，很难察觉到。

口感：口感清新，带有干酪和细微的红果味。红果味在开始时很平淡，紫罗兰香味短暂出现，但很快消失。酸度和酒精处于平衡状态，但红果味很封闭，所以口感不长，尾韵也很平淡。

Chinese pairs.original: 香草、香料、樱桃核黑醋栗的香气，细致的单宁，中等酒体，口感圆润。
Chinese pairs.new: Vanilla, spice, and cherry pit black plum aromas, fine tannins, medium-bodied, smooth texture.

Western reviews.review: (2021) The 4th growth Beychevelle from 1985 has been one of my favourite ever wines for three decades now, a bottle from a case bought around 1989 having been drunk every few years. This the last of the dozen. Now the colour is still a lovely ruby, a hint of brick on the rim, though the nose and palate both show some age. There's a little autumn leaf, vegetal note that was not there on the previous bottle seven or eight years ago, but it does not detract: there is still so much to like. The palate still has that quite sumptuous, plummy fruit depth and swirling smokiness and hints of fudge and chocolate generosity, and the framework of tannins and now slightly more angular acidity give it tension and drive, making for a really enjoyable wine. Would I buy more of the 1985 at this stage? I'd say it is definitely just past its peak, but possibly would at the right price. Current price is shown below.
Western reviews.translation: 1985年贝什维尔（Beychevelle）第四级葡萄酒已经是我最喜欢的葡萄酒之一，三十年来一直如此。 我买了一箱，约在1989年左右购买的瓶子，每隔几年就会喝一瓶。 这是最后一瓶了。 该酒的颜色仍然是美丽的红色，边缘有砖红色的提示，虽然鼻子和口感都显示出了一些年头。 有一点秋叶、植物性质的味道，七八年前之前的瓶子上没有出现过，但这并没有减少：仍然有很多值得喜欢的地方。 口感仍然有丰富的、浓郁的果实深度和旋转的烟味和巧克力和巧克力般的慷慨，和现在略微更尖锐的酸度框架和坚韧的纽维，给了它张力和驱动力，使得它成为一个真正令人愉快的葡萄酒。 我是否会在这个阶段购买更多的1985年葡萄酒？ 我会说它已经超过了巅峰，但在合适的价格下可能会购买。 当前价格如下：

Chinese pairs.original: 矿物的香气，花香和黑莓的气息，中等良好的酒体，带有薄荷和黑莓果的味道，较长的回味.
Chinese pairs.new: Mineral aromas, floral notes and blackberry scents, medium to full-bodied wine with hints of mint and blackberry fruit, long finish.

Western reviews.review: One of the top wines from the Medoc , in this Right Bank vintage offers a lot of character and style. The wine is elegant, soft and shows a lot of polish to the sweet, cassis and plums, that are only made better by the notes of tobacco, cedar and wet earth. The wine was produced from a blend of 70% Cabernet Sauvignon and 30% Merlot. This is quite good now and should get even better with time.
Western reviews.translation: 来自梅多克地区的顶级红酒，在这一右岸葡萄酒产区的葡萄酒品质出众，展现出丰富的个性和风格。酒体优雅，柔和，表面光滑，展现出浓郁的黑加仑、浆果和浆果风味，烟草、红木和潮湿土壤的香气使其更加完美。该酒由70%卡波弗雷希和30%梅洛混合酿造。目前品质很好，随着时间的推移会变得更加出色。

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Rubingranat, tiefer Kern, zarte violette Reflexe, zarter Wasserrand. In der Nase feine animalische Nuancen, zart nach Quittengelee, ein Hauch von Hagebuttenkonfitüre, reifes, entwickeltes Bukett mit zarten ätherischen Nuancen, feiner Zedernholztouch. Am Gaumen stoffig-komplexe Textur, dunkle Beerenfrucht, feste, sehr gut integrierte Tannine, nach Lakritze, im Abgang wird die Holznote etwas strenger und fordernder, besitzt eine gute Länge, ein potenzieller Langstreckenläufer. Trinken/lagern +20
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

深红色葡萄酒，深色核心，微微的紫色反光，细微的边缘。酒香中有细微的动物性质感，轻微的李子果酱味道，少量的罐罐果酱味道，成熟的花朵香味，微微的松香味道。口感丰富复杂，黑色浆果味道，坚实的坚果味道，非常好地融合的坚果味道，口感中有少量的甘草味道，尾部有木头味道，变得更加坚硬和挑战性，酒体长长，具有很好的潜力成为长跑者。推荐饮用或储存20年以上。

Western reviews.review: Medium ruby-red color. Beautifully perfumed cassis aromas on the nose are supported by well-defined, new-oak. The palate is clean with lifted black-cherry fruit backed by good acidity. The wine is well structured without being huge, there is lovely well-balanced cedar at the finish. Alcohol is balanced & the open, ripe fruit lasts well. 11/02 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色。酒鼻子上有美丽的黑加仑香气，伴随着新橡木的清晰定义。口感清爽，黑樱桃果味清晰，酸度良好。酒精平衡，开阔的成熟果味持久。酒体结构良好，没有过于庞大的感觉，酒尾有美丽的平衡的松木味。评分：11/02 DCAMW。

Western reviews.review: Really lovely, 22 years young! Dark purple red. Sweet, leather, red fruit, cherries, cigar box, fresh oak. Lovely soft tannines, subtle and complex, more earthy than fruit. A grande dame ND
Western reviews.translation: 非常喜欢，22岁的美酒！深紫红色。甜美，皮革味，红果味，樱桃味，雪茄盒，新橡木味。柔软的苦味，细腻而复杂，更加土味而非果味。是一位高贵的美酒。

Chinese pairs.original: Laussac 2019最大的特色就是纯净优雅，40%的品丽珠是这款酒能够脱颖而出的关键所在。果香柔和细腻，散发着蓝莓和沙棘的特殊芳香。粉笔灰一般的单宁为酒体巧妙地增添了一抹层次，玲珑小巧，甚是可人。
Chinese pairs.new: The standout feature of Laussac 2019 is its purity and elegance, thanks to 40% of Pinot Noir. The fruit aromas are soft and refined, with notes of blueberry and blackberry. A subtle hint of graphite from the tannins adds depth and complexity to the wine, making it charming and delightful.

English pairs.original: The most prominent characteristic of Laussac 2019 is its graceful purity. The key to such an outstanding wine is 40% of Cabernet Franc. The soft and delicate fruity aroma sends out the scents of blueberries and buckthorn berries. Tannins taste like chalk powders, making the wine more multi-layered, peaceful, and adorable.
English pairs.new: 拉索2019最突出的特点是其优雅的纯粹性。这种出色的酒的关键在于40%的卡波弗朗克。柔和而细致的果香散发着蓝莓和荆棘果的香气。苦味像粉笔粉一样，赋予酒精更多的层次感、平和和可爱。

Western reviews.review: Aromas of stewed blackberries, tomato leaves, tobacco and bark. It’s medium-bodied with fine tannins. Savory, lightly dusty finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的气味中带有烤黑莓、番茄叶、烟草和树皮的香气。口感中等，纤维细腻。口感中带有咸味，略带尘土的尾韵。

Western reviews.review: Pretty mulled cherries, spicy wood, and hints of chocolate all emerge from the 2019 Château De Laussac, a medium-bodied, elegant, nicely balanced Castillon that can be drunk today or cellared for 7-8 years, if not longer.
Western reviews.translation: 2019 年的 Château De Laussac，呈现出漂亮的浓果香气，带有木质的辣味和巧克力的微妙气息。这种中等体积的精致优雅的卡斯蒂永葡萄酒，既可以立即享用，也可以储存 7-8 年甚至更长时间。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Canon Chaigneau 2020 的香气异常甜美，品尝时像吃了一颗爆浆的糯米滋，香甜软糯而又充满汁水。从浸渍和陈酿的角度来看，酿酒师审美很在线，这款酒的每一个细节都透着名庄风范。
Chinese pairs.new: The aroma of Chateau Canon Chaigneau 2020 is exceptionally sweet, with flavors that evoke a burst of creamy glutinous rice. The wine is sweet, soft and velvety, yet full of juice. From a perspective of aging and maturation, the winemaker's taste is spot on, with every detail of this wine exuding the elegance of a renowned chateau.

English pairs.original: Chateau Canon Chaigneau 2020 offers unique sweet aromas, tasting like a bursting glutinous rice cake with, soft and juicy texture. Viewed from extraction and ageing, this wine displays good aesthetics of winemakers with every detail demonstrating the dignity of Grand Cru.
English pairs.new: 佳士白 Canon Chaigneau 2020 具有独特的甜美香气，口感像刚出炉的糯米糕，软糯又富有水分。从提取和陈化的角度来看，这款酒展现出酒匠们的精湛技艺，每个细节都体现出大酒庄的尊严。

Western reviews.review: Black plums, cherries topped with chocolate, and licorice in the nose. You find more of that on the medium-bodied, round, fruit-packed, lush, fruity, chocolate, and espresso-filled palate with a cool note of spearmint that comes in at the end of the finish. Drink from 2024-2040.
Western reviews.translation: 酒 nose中有黑杏、草莓和巧克力味，配上 licorice。口感中也能感受到这些味道，酒体中充满了果味，巧克力和咖啡的味道非常浓郁，最后还有一丝清凉的薄荷味。酒的口感丰富，适合从2024年到2040年饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: Malescot Saint-Exupery 在2021年份继续保持鲜爽多汁的风格，入口清透柔顺，丝滑流畅。虽然香气的复杂度并不突出，但紫罗兰的花香很是讨巧。虽然味蕾上没有热年份的复杂度，但对于喜欢灵动型玛歌葡萄酒爱好者来说，Malescot Saint-Exupery 2021会是个不错的选择。
Chinese pairs.new: Malescot Saint-Exupery 继续保持2021年的风格，入口清透柔顺，口感丝滑流畅。虽然香气并不复杂，但有着优雅的紫罗兰花香。对于喜欢轻质玛歌葡萄酒的爱好者来说，Malescot Saint-Exupery 2021是一个不错的选择。

English pairs.original: Malescot Saint-Exupery maintains its fresh and juicy style in the vintage of 2021, with delicate, silky and smooth entry of the palate. Although the complexity of its aromas is not pronounced, its fragrance of violet is very adorable. Even though it does not have the complexity of hot vintages on the palate, for fans who are into lively Margaux wine, Malescot Saint-Exupery 2021 should be a good choice.
English pairs.new: 2021年马莱斯科圣埃克苏佩里（Malescot Saint-Exupery）红酒保持了其清新果香的风格，入口柔和细腻，口感平滑。虽然其香气的复杂度不够突出，但紫罗兰的香气非常可爱。虽然口感没有热年份那么复杂，但对于喜欢活泼马格朗红酒的爱好者来说，2021年马莱斯科圣埃克苏佩里红酒仍是一个不错的选择。

Western reviews.review: Precise and spicy reminiscences of raspberries, currants, coriander and juniper berries. Lots of dehydrated cherries and lemon peel describe the secondary scene. Medium-bodied, elegant and relaxed, it shows a solid fragrance. Best since 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的味道精确而有刺激的，回忆着红莓、黑加仑、香菜和山茱萸的味道。干燥的樱桃和柠檬皮构成了次要的场景。中等体积，优雅而放松，展现出坚实的香气。预计2025年后会更好。

Western reviews.review: Opaque ruby core, purple reflections, subtle brightening on the rim. Elegant aromas of blackberries with hints of black cherry, spice and tobacco nuances. Juicy, elegant, fine dark berry fruit, integrated tannins and minerality with a long length, great ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation:
酒液颜色：深红色，透明度高，酒液边缘有细微的光泽。

酒香：黑莓、黑杏、烟草等香气相互融合，具有典型的红酒风味。

口感：果香丰富，黑莓、黑杏等黑色水果味道浓郁，口感细腻，纤维度高，矿物质味道清晰，酒尾长长，具有很好的陈年潜力。

Western reviews.review: Initially you notice the brightness in the fruits before moving to the flowers, tobacco leaf, espresso, smoke and earthy nuances. The wine is focused on its vibrancy, freshness and fleshy style, managing to find the perfect balance between all three characteristics. The wine is a blend of 49% Cabernet Sauvignon, 38% Merlot, 8% Cabernet Franc and 5% Petit Verdot. Drink from 2027-2050. 92-94
Western reviews.translation: 初次品尝时，酒中果味的鲜明感会首先突出，然后逐渐转变为花香、烟草叶、咖啡、烟雾和泥土的复杂层次。酒体以其生动的活力、清新感和丰富的口感为特点，成功地在三个方面找到平衡。酒款的组成比例为49%卡波内托·萨万尼翁、38%梅洛、8%卡波内托·法兰克和5%佩蒂·韦多。建议在2027-2050年间饮用。评分：92-94分。

Western reviews.review: Leuchtendes Rubinrot. Die Nase ist etwas scheu, feiner Duft, mineralische Noten, Veilchen und rote Beeren, etwas Rauch. Im Gaumen straff und mit knackiger Frucht, die Tannine sind präsent, umgarnen die Frucht, der Wein hat Zug und Frische, ist lebendig und hallt lange nach. Elegant. 2026 bis 2045 (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2022. Dourthe)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一瓶美酒的评论。以下是翻译成中文：

闪亮的红宝石色。酒鼻有些谨慎，细微的香气，矿物质的味道，紫罗兰和红果，略带烟味。口感紧致，果味清脆，苦味物质明显，包围着果味，酒有张力和清新感，生动活泼，余味悠长。优雅。推荐饮用年份：2026-2045（2022年4月在Dourthe酒庄品尝“En Primeur”）。

Western reviews.review: Medium to deep purple-red color. The wine's aromas are of juicy dark-cherry & cream. The palate has jammy red-fruit & svaory notes with a graphite edge. The tannins are fine, providing a little bitter-licorice grip at the finish, without giving astringency. Alcohol is balanced & fresh acidity keeps the fruit on the finish juicy & blackcurranty. The finish lasts quiet well. 04/22 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的颜色是深紫红色。酒中的香气是浓郁的黑樱桃和奶油。口感上，酒中的红果味和浓郁的香气与 graphite 的边缘相结合。酒中的纤维素细腻，酒尾略带苦艾的味道，但不带干涩感。酒中的酒精度合适，清新酸度使酒尾的果味保持新鲜和黑currant味。酒尾持久。评分：04/22 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 对于一款走柔润风格的葡萄酒来说，很难在高单宁的2022年份保持这种特质。但是，Chateau Grand Corbin-Despagne 很好地做到了。沙土下的黏土层为葡萄提供了充足的水分，从单宁的结构就可以看出，葡萄果粒未受生长停滞的困扰。香气清新明朗，酸度流畅顺滑，尽管层次感不甚丰富，但却足够讨喜。是一款在年轻时即可畅饮的圣爱美隆列级庄。
Chinese pairs.new: For a wine that follows a soft and smooth style, it's challenging to maintain this characteristic in a high-tannin 2022 vintage. However, Chateau Grand Corbin-Despagne has done a great job. The clay layer beneath the gravel provides the grapes with ample moisture, evident from the tannin structure, which suggests that the grapes were not affected by growth stagnation. The aroma is fresh and clear, with a smooth acidity, although the complexity is not particularly rich, it's still quite enjoyable. This is a Saint-Émilion Grand Cru that can be enjoyed young.

English pairs.original: For a wine that emphasizes a smooth and silky style, it’s difficult to maintain these qualities in a high-tannin vintage such as 2022. However, Chateau Grand Corbin-Despagne has managed to do so brilliantly. The clay layer under the sandy soil provides ample water to the grapes, and the tannin structure indicates that the grapes have not been hindered by growth stagnation. The aroma is fresh and clear, and the acidity is smooth and flowing, although the complexity is not particularly rich, it is still quite pleasing. It is a Saint-Emilion Grand Cru Classe that can be enjoyed while still young.
English pairs.new: 在强调光滑细腻风格的红酒中，2022年这种高苦味的年份确实很难维持这些特质。但是，格兰德科宾-德斯帕涅酒庄却做到了出色。酒庄下方的粘土层为葡萄提供了充足的水分，苦味结构表明葡萄生长没有受到停滞的影响。酒香清新明亮，酸度光滑流畅，虽然复杂度不算丰富，但仍然很令人愉悦。这是一款可以在年轻时享用的圣埃米利翁大酒庄。

Western reviews.review: Wie oft besonders samtener, fruchtiger Wein, der jedoch auch grosse Frische und sogar Rasse besitzt, der Alkohol ist ideal abgestimmt und gut integriert, das Ganz stimmig und durch und durch erfreulich. Gehört zu den besten hier je verkosteten Weinen.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一个非常赞美的红酒评论。以下是翻译成中文：

特别是细腻、果香的酒，然而也具有强烈的新鲜感和品质感，酒精度合适，完美融合，整体非常令人愉快。是我们尝试过的最好的红酒之一。

Western reviews.review: Dark in color, the wine pops with chocolate, licorice, black cherries, plums and flowers in the nose. Medium-bodied, round, fresh and sweet, the dark red fruits with their lush textures, lift and sucrosity create a gorgeous mouth-feel on the mid-palate and in the finish. The wine is produced from blending 75% Merlot, 24% Cabernet Franc and 1% Cabernet Sauvignon. 14.5% ABV, 3.64 pH. Drink from 2025-2045. 94-95 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的颜色深黑，酒鼻中充满了巧克力、甘草、黑樱桃、浆果和花朵的香气。酒体中等，圆润，新鲜，甜美，黑色水果的丰富口感和甜度使得口感丰富，余味持久。该酒由75%梅洛、24%卡波弗朗克和1%卡波萨维宁等葡萄品种混合酿造。酒精度14.5%，pH值3.64。建议于2025-2045年饮用。评分94-95分。

Western reviews.review: Fruit forward, mainly dark berries and a bit of spice. Quite light in extraction, light body in the context of the region / vintage. Shortish finish. A good candidate for finger food pairing.
Western reviews.translation: 果味突出，主要是黑莓和一些香料。提取度较轻，体积较轻，考虑到产区和年份。口感较短。适合与小口味食物配对。

Western reviews.review: Das Bouquet dieses Weins zeigt einen Mix aus Veilchen, Kräutern, Himbeerfrucht und Brombeerbrause, faszinierend, klar, rein. Der Gaumen ist top strukturiert, üppig, jedoch ohne Fett, einfach nur frisch, präzis, mit sehr feinkörnigem Tannin, das sich erst ganz hinten im Gaumen bemerkbar macht, dazu kommt eine perfekt dosierte Säure und ein wunderbar langer, rotfruchtiger und feinwürziger Abgang. Einmal mehr ein Hit, Kraft und Eleganz vereint. Klarer Kauftipp! (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / Grand Cercle / Château la Dauphine) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation: 这个红酒的香气中混合着紫罗兰、草本植物、蓝莓果味和苔藓的气息，令人着迷，清晰，纯粹。口感结构完美，丰富却不油腻，仅仅是新鲜、精确，具有极细致的橡皮质感，仅在口底最深处才会感觉到，伴随着精确调节的酸度和一个美妙的长长尾部，带有红果和细微的香味。再一次，力量和优雅相结合。明显的购买推荐！ (在2023年4月的"En Primeur"中品尝 / Grand Cercle / Château la Dauphine) #primeurs22

Western reviews.review: Le nez est frais, élégant et offre de la puissance, de la profondeur, de la race, de la densité en élégance, de la complexité, de la pureté ainsi qu’un petit côté aérien dans sa puissance. On y retrouve des notes de cassis sauvage, de minéralité iodée / racée et plus légèrement de mûre pulpeuse associées à des touches de fraise, de violette, à des pointes de poivre, de fumée ainsi qu’à de fines pointes de sens de la place (biotop local), de badiane/graphite et à une discrète pointe d’amande toastée. La bouche est fruitée, équilibrée, joliment minérale et offre de la pureté, de l’éclat, de la jutosité, une jolie fraicheur, de la tension, de la rondeur, une trame acidulée, une certaine largeur, de l’éclat, de la justesse, une jolie sapidité ainsi que de la délicatesse dans sa puissance. En bouche ce vin exprime des notes de mûre juteuse/fraiche, de framboise croquante/acidulée et plus légèrement de petits fruits bleus pulpeux/juteux associées à des touches de fleurs, de prune bleue fraiche/croquante ainsi qu’à de fines pointes de fève tonka, de toasté et de salinité. Les tannins sont élégants, racés et sapides. Une très belle persistance.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

酒的香气清新、优雅，具有力量、深度、品质、密度、复杂性和纯粹性，伴有轻微的空气感。酒中有野樱桃、矿物质海盐和轻微的浆果气息，伴有草莓、紫罗兰、胡椒、烟草和细微的地域特征（生物地理学）、丁香/石墨和轻微的烤杏仁气息。口感果香、平衡、美丽的矿物质和纯粹性，具有光泽、圆润、清新、紧张、柔和、酸度、宽广、光泽、准确、美丽的口感和细微的力量。口感中有浆果气息、酸性蓝莓和轻微的蓝色浆果气息，伴有花香、青蓝浆果气息和细微的豆蔻、烤味和盐气。酒中的纤维素优雅、品质和美丽。酒的持久性非常好。

Chinese pairs.original: 很惊讶，2004年份的Domaine de Chevalier 在入口时居然拥有这么好的能量感，与看似平静的香气形成了鲜明的对比。回甘时所散发的松香、青墨以及铅笔芯气息营造出朦胧的诗意；细密的单宁又在收尾时构建出理想的酒体，盲品时完全想不到是缺乏成熟度的2004年，这让人不禁慨叹Domaine de Chevalier 的强大实力。
Chinese pairs.new: I'm astonished by the Domaine de Chevalier 2004, which boasts an incredible energy at the entrance, contrasting sharply with its seemingly calm aromas. The lingering notes of cedarwood, dark ink and pencil lead evoke a dreamy poetic quality; the fine tannins build a perfect body at the finish, making it impossible to guess that this is a 2004 lacking maturity. It's a testament to Domaine de Chevalier's incredible strength.

English pairs.original: I was really surprised by Domaine de Chevalier 2004. It is nicely energetic on the palate, which is really different from its calm nose. The aftertaste brings a dreamy feeling with scents of pine, green ink, and pencil lead. The wine’s tannins are refined, making the body ideal towards the end. When tasting it in blind, you wouldn’t guess it’s from the less mature year like 2004, which really shows the real capacity of Domaine de Chevalier.
English pairs.new: 我对2004年Domaine de Chevalier感到非常惊讶。它在口感上非常有活力，和它的平静的香气形成了鲜明的对比。余味带来了一种梦幻般的感觉，带有松柏、绿墨和铅笔笔芯的香气。酒中的纤维素非常细腻，使得酒体在最后变得完美。即使在无视酒标签的情况下品尝，也不会猜到它来自2004年这个相对较不成熟的年份，这真的是Domaine de Chevalier的真正实力。

Western reviews.review: The fineness of Chevalier's tannin is matched by the nobility of the fruit, a cabernet that rides high across the palate, then lasts as a deep chord of flavor. The integration of the tannin and firm, currantlike fruit creates the wine's beauty for now, compelling for its balance of freshness and concentration. Sleek and dry as the stones in which it grows, this has lasting fruit richness for a long life ahead.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的坚果味与丰富的果味相得益彰，Cabernet Sauvignon的风味在口中流动，留下深刻的味道。坚果味和浓郁的果味的完美融合，赋予了这款红酒现在的美丽，令人惊叹的是它的新鲜和浓缩的平衡。干净、干燥如岩石般的风味，让人预感这款红酒将拥有长久的果味丰富，未来将有长久的生命力。

Western reviews.review: This property, run so expertly by Olivier Bernard, is now making reds that almost equal its legendary whites. This 2004 is intensely solid, dominated by black berry fruits, by spice, some smokiness aromas. It is finely balanced, smooth, with wood and tannins well integrated.Editors' Choice
Western reviews.translation: 这家酒庄，由奥利维尔·贝尔南德（Olivier Bernard）精心管理，现已开始生产与其传奇白酒不相上下的大红酒。这个2004年的红酒非常浓郁，黑莓果味、香料、烟熏味的香气占据了主导地位。它的平衡性极好，口感细腻，木质和纤维素的融合得当。编辑推荐。

Western reviews.review: The colour remains deep from centre to the rim of the glass, we are in rich stately purple, touches of black chocolate on the attack, some lovely gathering together of the tannins over the palate, although they are hard-edged as many 2004s are, even at 14 years old. Certainly got lots of ageing ahead of it, and has a curl of cigar and slate through the palate, nice upwards motion to the acidity.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色从杯子中心到边缘都保持深色，呈现出富有尊严的紫色，攻击时有黑巧克力般的触感，口感上有美妙的纤维收敛，尽管纤维仍然很硬，像许多2004年的红酒一样，即使在14年后也如此。毫无疑问，它还有很多成熟的潜力，口感中有烟草和石板的余味，酸度上升的动作很好。

Western reviews.review: A round and silky red now with dark chocolate, stone and blackberry character. Full body, firm tannins and a juicy finish. Austere at the finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感圆润滑顺，带有深巧克力、石头和黑莓的特征。酒体丰富，口感坚实，余味果香。然而，酒尾略带干涩。

Western reviews.review: Thankfully, this estate appears to have scaled down their use of new oak as the wood component is much more subtle than in previous vintages. The classic southern Graves version of elegance, the 2004 Domaine de Chevalier exhibits aromas of lead pencil shavings, sweet cherry and strawberry fruit, cedar, spice, and subtle smoke. Medium-bodied with outstanding purity, richness, and texture, this soft, round beauty is ideal for drinking over the next 15+ years.
Western reviews.translation: 幸运的是，这个庄园在使用新橡木方面似乎已经有所收敛，木质成分比之前的几年更为微妙。2004年Domaine de Chevalier展现出典型的南部格拉夫斯风格的优雅，气味中有铅笔削片、甜樱桃和草莓果味、松木、香料和微妙的烟气。中等体积，品质优良、丰富、质地细腻，这个柔和圆润的美酒适合在未来15年内饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: Domaine Clarence Dillon旗下的三款白葡萄酒的酿造工艺大同小异：橡木桶发酵、酒渣上陈年、为了保留酸度而不进行乳酸发酵。通透的淡金色。此酒的香气相较一同品鉴的2011年份修道院红颜容白葡萄酒要更为含蓄。杯中散发出果干、坚果、木桶香料和咸矿物的香味。口中微微的浓郁感被那新鲜的酸度及严肃、干净的矿物质完美中和，矿物质一直延续到了其集中并且悠长的回味中。
Chinese pairs.new: Domaine Clarence Dillon的三款白葡萄酒的酿造工艺相似：橡木桶发酵、酒渣上陈年、不进行乳酸发酵以保留酸度。酒呈现透明的淡金色。酒的香气相对同期的修道院红颜容白葡萄酒更为低调。杯中散发出干果、坚果、木桶香料和矿物质的香味。口感微微浓郁，但被新鲜的酸度和干净的矿物质完美平衡，矿物质持续存在于其集中且悠长的回味中。

English pairs.original: All white wines made by Domaine Clarence Dillon (Le Clarte de Haut-Brion, La Mission Haut-Brion Blanc and Haut-Brion Blanc) follow the similar vinification: barrel fermented and aging on lees, no MLF since the company want to keep the acidity of their white wines. Brightly light gold. More reticent than the 2011 La Mission Haut-Brion Blanc (tasted together). It revealed the noses of dried fruits, nuts, oak spices and savoury-mineral. The subtle richness on the palate was beautifully balanced by the fresh acidity and austerely clean minerality that continued onto the focused and long finish.
English pairs.new:
克莱伦斯·迪龙（Clarence Dillon）家族的白酒（包括莱克拉尔特德奥特布里昂、拉米歇昂白酒和奥特布里昂白酒）都采用相同的酿造方法：在橡木桶中发酵和发酵后储存在酵母沉淀物上，不进行MLF（乳酸发酵）处理，以保留白酒的酸度。 

颜色：亮金色。 

与2011年拉米歇昂白酒相比，这款酒更为谨慎。酒鼻中展现了干果、坚果、橡木香料和矿物质的香气。酒口上的细腻感被新鲜的酸度和干净的矿物质感完美平衡，酒尾长而集中。

Western reviews.review: Mittleres Gelbgrün, Silberreflexe. Mit einem Hauch von Wiesenkräutern unterlegte einladende weiße Fruchtnuancen, Anklänge von reifen Stachelbeeren, etwas Litschi und Limette, aber auch etwas Ananas und Meersalz. Elegant, gute Komplexität, feine Fruchtsüße, zeigt sich nach zehn Jahren noch sehr jugendlich und frisch, ein Hauch von Limette im Abgang, mineralisch und gut anhaftend, sicheres weiteres Potenzial für einige Jahre.
Western reviews.translation:
这段红酒评论的中文翻译如下：

中等黄绿色，银色反光。带有微妙的草本香气的邀请性白色果香，成熟的刺梨、荔枝和柠檬的回忆，另外还有些香蕉和海盐的味道。优雅，复杂性良好，细腻的果糖，十年后仍然显得年轻和新鲜，一点柠檬味在尾部，矿物质和持久，确保了在几年后仍然有很好的发展潜力。

Western reviews.review: Der beste weisse Haut-Brion, den ich bisher verkostet habe, von komplexer Aromatik, dicht und mit Rasse, grosse aromatische Komplexität, gute aromatische Länge. Der mit Abstand beste trockene Weisse 2011 der Region.
Western reviews.translation: 我尝过的最好的白酒之一，是白布里昂。它具有复杂的香气，浓郁且有品质，具有丰富的香气层次，香气持久。它是2011年该地区最好的干白酒。

Chinese pairs.original: 清新雅致惹人欢喜的一款酒。花香特别突出，感觉像是在杯中打翻了一篮字玫瑰。单宁柔美细腻、收尾紧致内敛，对于喜欢自然纯净风的爱好者来说，这款酒值得尝试。
Chinese pairs.new: A refreshing and charming wine that's sure to delight. The floral notes are particularly prominent, evoking the sensation of a bouquet of roses spilled into the glass. The tannins are smooth and refined, with a crisp, compact finish that will appeal to those who appreciate a natural, unadulterated style.

English pairs.original: A fresh and elegant wine that delights people very well. The floral scent is particularly prominent, feeling like a basket of roses turned over in a cup. With its creamy, delicate tannins and compact finish, this wine is worth trying for lovers of the style of natural purity.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒新鲜而优雅，深受人们的喜爱。花香尤其突出，闻起来像一杯盛满了鲜花的玫瑰。它的奶油般细腻的苦味和紧致的尾部，让人感觉非常舒适。这款酒适合喜欢自然纯粹风格的酒爱好者。

Western reviews.review: Tiefdunkles Rubingranat, opaker Kern, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung. Zart kräuterwürzig unterlegter Dörrobsttouch, feine Feigenfrucht, etwas Zedernholz. Saftig, gute Komplexität, reife Kirschen, präsente Tannine, mineralischer Anklang, etwas Nougat im Nachhall, frisch strukturiert, salziger Abgang, gutes Reifepotenzial.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色调，透明的葡萄核，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。酒中有轻微的草药和橡果味，伴有细微的李子果味和一点点松木味。口感丰富，复杂性佳，成熟的樱桃味，明显的坚果味，矿物质的回味，尾部有一点点牛奶糖味，结构清晰，咸味的尾部，酒有很好的成熟潜力。

Chinese pairs.original: 葡萄干和黑莓的香味，中等浓郁的口感，单宁成熟、巧克力、浆果的回味。
Chinese pairs.new: Dried grape and blackberry aromas, medium-bodied texture, with mature tannins, chocolate, and fruity finish.

Western reviews.review: (2007) A nice perfume that is slightly gamy and animal, with a solid, vivid underpinning of black fruits. Ripe and rich, this has a sheen of quite vanillin oak and tannins showing through, but nicely composed fruit and a savoury dryness. Good quality, if a little less harmonious than some at this stage.
Western reviews.translation: 2007年：一款带有轻微动物气息和浓郁黑果味的香味红酒。酒体丰富饱满，表面有明显的香草木质和坚果味，口感干爽，果味丰富。酒质优良，但还需要一些时间来达到完美的和谐。

Western reviews.review: (2007) A nice perfume that is slightly gamy and animal, with a solid, vivid underpinning of black fruits. Ripe and rich, this has a sheen of quite vanillin oak and tannins showing through, but nicely composed fruit and a savoury dryness. Good quality, if a little less harmonious than some at this stage.
Western reviews.translation: 2007年：一款带有轻微动物气息和浓郁黑果味的香味红酒。酒体丰富饱满，表面有明显的香草木质和坚果味，口感干爽，果味丰富。酒质优良，但还需要一些时间来达到完美的和谐。

Western reviews.review: (2007) A nice perfume that is slightly gamy and animal, with a solid, vivid underpinning of black fruits. Ripe and rich, this has a sheen of quite vanillin oak and tannins showing through, but nicely composed fruit and a savoury dryness. Good quality, if a little less harmonious than some at this stage.
Western reviews.translation: 2007年：一款带有轻微动物气息和浓郁黑果味的香味红酒。酒体丰富饱满，表面有明显的香草木质味和坚实的果实味。酒中有适度的干性和坚果味，但整体风格优雅。酒质良好，但尚未达到完美的和谐。

Western reviews.review: Medium to deep, ruby-red is darkly pigmented. The dark fruit aromas are closed, with cedar & cocoa aromas dominating the nose. Concentrated, rich black fruits on the palate have passable freshness. The structure is supple, yet retains fair grip. Alcohol is balanced & length is fairly good. The wine is balanced & concentrated, but the fruit is a little flat at present. 11/10 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深度为中到深的红色，浓郁的颜色。

香气：黑酒果的香气闭合，松木和可可的香气占据了鼻子。 

口感：浓缩的黑酒果味，口感中有可接受的新鲜感。结构柔软，但仍然有较好的抓握力。酒精平衡，长度较好。酒精平衡，浓缩，但目前果味略平淡。 评分：11/10

Western reviews.review: Medium to deep, ruby-red is darkly pigmented. The dark fruit aromas are closed, with cedar & cocoa aromas dominating the nose. Concentrated, rich black fruits on the palate have passable freshness. The structure is supple, yet retains fair grip. Alcohol is balanced & length is fairly good. The wine is balanced & concentrated, but the fruit is a little flat at present. 11/10 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深度为中到深的红色，浓郁的颜色。

香气：黑酒果的香气闭合，松木和可可的香气占据了鼻子。 

口感：浓缩的黑酒果味，口感中有可接受的新鲜感。结构柔软，但仍然有较好的抓握力。酒精平衡，长度较好。酒精平衡，浓缩，但目前果味略平淡。 评分：11/10

Chinese pairs.original: 清晰的香气和柔美的结构展示了酿酒师团队纯熟的掌控力。丝滑的单宁中带着一些粉末状的质感，伴随着清甜圆润的口感在不断在口中萦绕，非常罕见的一款波尔多大区葡萄酒。
Chinese pairs.new: A clear and elegant aroma showcases the winemaking team's mastery. Smooth tannins with a powdery texture are accompanied by a sweet and rounded finish that lingers beautifully in the mouth, a rare find in a Bordeaux-style wine.

English pairs.original: The distinct aromas and graceful structure provide sophisticated control of the entire wine-making team. The silky tannins trace a layer of powdery texture, coupled with roundness and sweetness toward the lingering finish. A rare Bordeaux AOC in Entre-deux-Mers.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒具有独特的香气和优雅的结构，表明了整个酒庄团队的高端控制。细腻的橡胶质感在口感中留下了一层细致的粉末状质感，伴随着圆润和甜润的味道延续到尾部。它是一款罕见的波尔多AOC红酒，产自Entre-deux-Mers地区。

Western reviews.review:
A touch of reduction on the nose which clears as it relaxes in the glass. This is well put together, has definition and finesse, and is punching above its weight in the appellation. Ambitious, well managed tannins and juicy red fruits; 2% Malbec completes the plantings. I don't have the 2020 blend.

Barrel Sample
Western reviews.translation: 酒 nose 上有轻微的减少感，但随着酒在玻璃中放松，这种感觉会消失。这款酒的制作非常出色，具有清晰的定义和细致的风格，尤其是在产区的表现非常出色。酒中有雄心勃勃的、得体的橡皮质和鲜美的红果味，2%的马尔贝克葡萄完美地完成了种植。

Western reviews.review: This shows notes of ripe berries, vanilla, licorice, crushed walnut and cocoa. Medium-bodied with ripe, supple tannins and a creamy texture. Fruit-forward and flavorful.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒展现出浓郁的浆果风味，伴有香草、甘草、碎 walnut 和巧克力味。口感中等，具有柔软的果皮和丰富的口感。果味浓郁，口感丰富。

Chinese pairs.original: 丰富的黑色水果，橡木、烤面包等香气，酒体饱满平衡，单宁厚实且成熟，油质感果香充沛，余味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich black fruit flavors, aromas of oak and toasted bread, full-bodied and balanced texture, robust and mature tannins, velvety texture with a full and fruity finish, lingering aftertaste.

Western reviews.review: Solid wine. Bright blueberry and floral aromas follow through to a full body, with soft, velvety tannins and a long finish. Best since 1989. Try after 2017.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶很好的红酒。酒中有明亮的蓝莓和花朵香气，口感丰富，纤维软绵，尾部长而持久。自1989年以来，这瓶红酒的品质一直很稳定。建议在2017年后品尝。

Western reviews.review: This is fleshy and polished, with layers of crushed plum, fig sauce and blackberry paste that unfurl slowly, backed by maduro tobacco, charcoal and iron. There’s lots of minerality on the finish, but it’s nicely enveloped in the fruit. Best from 2013 through 2022.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒富有肉感和光滑度，展现出层次丰富的浓郁黑果、浓缩的浆果和黑莓酱，缓慢展开，伴有深度的烟草、焦炭和铁味。酒尾有丰富的矿物质，但被丰富的果味所包围。建议在2013年至2022年期间饮用。

Western reviews.review:
Caramel aromas, a wine that seems over-extracted, tough. The fruit has a juicy element, but misses out on elegance.

Barrel Sample:  89-91 Points
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的香气中有焦糖的味道，但整体感觉过度提取，口感坚硬。虽然果味中有水果的清新感，但却缺乏优雅感。

评分：89-91分（酒桶样品）

Western reviews.review: The best Phelan-Segur since the 1990, this is a rather dense, full-bodied, massive wine for a cru bourgeois. Sweet blackberry and black raspberry fruit intermixed with crushed rock and a hint of subtle oak jump from the glass of this full-bodied, intense, yet attractive and alluring wine. There is significant depth and substance to this Phelan-Segur, which is a sleeper of the vintage that should last up to 15 or more years.
Western reviews.translation: 这是自1990年以来最好的费兰-塞古尔（Phelan-Segur），这是一款厚实、浓郁、巨大的酒，适合于布ерж（cru bourgeois）级别。酒中充满了甜黑莓和黑莓果味，混合了碎石和微妙的橡木味，酒的厚实和强烈的魅力让人难以抵抗。费兰-塞古尔的深度和实质让人惊叹，这是一款睡眠中的巨星，应该能维持15年以上的时间。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau de Sales 2023 的酸枣和橙皮气息令其在一众沙土土壤的酒庄中脱颖而出。口感清澈舒爽，回味简单明了，相对高的酸度搭配上轻柔的酒体，品起来十分轻松舒畅。相比2022年份的强劲，我觉得2023年份的柔美更符合Chateau de Sales 的气质。装瓶1-2年后，就可以轻松饮用。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau de Sales 2023 的酸枣和橙皮气息使其在众多沙土土壤的酒庄中脱颖而出。口感清澈舒爽，回味简单明了，相对高的酸度与轻柔的酒体相得益彰，品起来十分轻松舒畅。相比2022年份的强劲，我觉得2023年份的柔美更符合Chateau de Sales 的气质。建议在瓶装1-2年后饮用。

English pairs.original: Chateau de Sales 2023 stands out among its sandy-soil vineyard peers with its distinctive aromas of sour cherry and orange peel. It offers a clear and refreshing palate, with a straightforward and easy-to-appreciate finish. The relatively high acidity is complemented by a soft body, making it a pleasantly light and enjoyable wine. In comparison to the robustness of the 2022 vintage, I find the softness of the 2023 vintage better aligns with the personality of Chateau de Sales. It can be enjoyed with ease after 1-2 years of bottle aging.
English pairs.new: 沙勒斯庄园2023年产酒以其独特的酸橙和橙皮香气脱颖而出。它提供了清晰和新鲜的口感，简单直接的口感使其易于欣赏。相比2022年产酒的强劲口感，2023年产酒的柔和口感更符合沙勒斯庄园的风格。酒体轻盈柔和，酸度较高，适合轻松享用。酒龄1-2年后即可享用。

Western reviews.review: Expressiv, viel Frucht, Himbeere, Brombeere, florale Noten, Zimtwürze; am Gaumen seidenweich, rund, füllig, dabei nicht schwerfällig, perfekt reife Frucht, samtige Tannine, schöner Spannungsbogen, Frucht und Struktur harmonieren; im Abgang von eindrücklicher Länge, endet rotfruchtig, hinterlässt ein salines Mundgefühl. Ein Hit. (En Primeur Tasting April 2024, 13.5 Alkohol)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论，翻译成中文如下：

表达丰富，果味丰富，含有浓郁的草莓和黑莓，花朵香气和姜味；口感细腻，圆润，丰富，但不腻口，完美成熟的果味，丝绸般的纹理，美妙的张力，果味和结构和谐一致；尾部长达令人印象深刻，结束时呈现红果味，留下了清新的口感。绝对是一款好酒。 (2024年4月初酒评，13.5%酒精度)

Western reviews.review: Expressiv, viel Frucht, Himbeere, Brombeere, florale Noten, Zi mtwürze; am Gaumen seidenweich, rund, füllig, dabei nicht schwerfällig, perfekt reife Frucht, samtige Tannine, schöner Spannungsbogen, Frucht und Struktur harmonieren; im Abgang von eindrücklicher Länge, endet rotfruchtig, hinterlässt ein salines Mundgefühl. Ein Hit.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

表达丰富，多种果味，草莓、黑莓、花香、浓郁的果味；口感滑顺，圆润，丰富，但不腻，完美成熟的果味，丝绸般的坚果感，美妙的张力，果味和结构完美和谐；尾部长达惊人的长度，结束于红果味，留下了一个清新的口感。真的是一款绝佳的红酒！

Western reviews.review: Medium to deep, dark ruby red in color. There is lovely juicy mulberry & dark plum fruit on the nose. The wine is smoothly structured with some grip, but with lovely freshness, chocolatey smoothness & juicy dark-plum fruit. The wine is of mid-weight with balanced alcohol. The tannins are fine & seamless on the back-palate. There is a lovely long, luscious, fresh-fruit finish, ending with juicy dark-fruit. 04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深度红酒色，介于深红到暗红之间。

香气：酒中有丰富的浓郁的黑杏和黑草莓果香。

口感：酒体平滑，结构紧凑，口感丰富，带有巧克力般的滑顺感和浓郁的黑草莓果香。酒体中等，酒精度衡平。

后味：酒尾长而丰富，带有浓郁的新鲜果香，结束于浓郁的黑果香。

评分：04/24 (ep) DCAMW

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Clarke 2020 在它擅长的柔美风格道路上越做越好。虽然果香没有2019年份那么鲜甜浓郁，但怡人的蓝莓和树莓依旧清晰可见。淡奶油般的口感很是柔和，即便豪饮也毫无厚重感。当然，如果收尾前能有更多的层次感，那绝对就是列级庄的水准。
Chinese pairs.new:
Chateau Clarke 2020 在它擅长的柔美风格道路上越做越好。虽然果香没有2019年份那么鲜甜浓郁，但怡人的蓝莓和树莓依旧清晰可见。淡奶油般的口感很是柔和，即便豪饮也毫无厚重感。当然，如果收尾前能有更多的层次感，那绝对就是列级庄的水准。

Translated Wine Review:

Chateau Clarke 2020 continues to excel in its refined style. While the fruit aromas may not be as rich and intense as the 2019 vintage, the pleasant blueberry and raspberry notes remain clear. The silky texture is very smooth, with no heaviness even when consumed in large quantities. If only it had a more complex finish, it would truly be a top-tier wine.

English pairs.original: On its way to achieving the delicate style for which it is known, Chateau Clarke 2020 is getting better and better. The nice blueberries and raspberries are still readily apparent, despite the fruit not being as crisp and sweet as in the 2019 vintage. Even with a large sip, there is no heaviness because to the delicate and milky palate. Of course, it would be of Grand Cru caliber if there were additional layers on the finish.
English pairs.new: 克莱尔庄园2020年红酒在追求其所知的精致风格的路上越来越好。虽然与2019年产量相比，蓝莓和草莓的味道不再那么清新和甜美，但仍然很明显。即使是大口喝下，也不会感到沉重，因为口感细腻和奶油般的。当然，如果有更多的层次在尾部的话，它就能达到格兰克鲁级别。

Western reviews.review: A grand vintage for this Edmond de Rothschild family-owned estate. The wine is rich, powerfully textured. It is solid with tannins that are considerable to balance the black fruits. This will age many years, drink from 2027.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶酒是埃德蒙德·德·罗得希尔德家族所有的庄园的精华之作。酒精浓度高，口感丰富，质地坚实。黑色果实的味道被坚实的橡木味道所平衡。酒的年龄层次很高，建议在2027年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: Essa propriedade em Listrac pert ence ao Barão Benjamin de Rothschild, seus vinhedos têm 70% de Merlot e 30% de Cabernet Sauvignon. Nariz muito floral, com framboesa e mirtilo. O paladar confirma esses predicados, com a típica assinatura de boca do Mouton. Taninos poderosos e em perfeita maturação. Merece ao menos 5 anos em adega para abrir.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒来自法国的Listrac产区，属于巴罗·罗特希尔德家族（Barão Benjamin de Rothschild）的葡萄园。该葡萄园的葡萄种植比例为70%梅洛（Merlot）和30%卡波弗雷（Cabernet Sauvignon）。酒香非常花香，带有浓郁的蓝莓和黑莓味。口感与香气相符，典型的莫顿（Mouton）口感，口感丰富，口感柔和。酒中的纤维非常强劲，已经达到完美的成熟度。建议将酒放置在酒窖中至少5年后再饮用。

Western reviews.review: Chewy, leafy, savory, earthy, chalky currants with leafy accents and a hint of spice is what you will find in the nose and on the medium-bodied, fresh, earthy, classic, slightly rustic palate. Drink from 2023-2038.
