Western reviews.translation: 口感丰富，带有叶绿、土壤、矿物质和干酪的黑currant香气，伴有叶绿和少量香料的余味。口感中等，清新、土壤、典型、略带粗犷的口感。建议2023-2038年饮用。

Western reviews.review: Slightly cloudy on the nose showing notes of black prunes, blackberries, black pepper, wild violet, mandarin peel and coriander. Full bodied, soft tannins and a solid, compact finale which shows personality and tension. Beautiful now but better from 2024.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的气味略微混浊，展现出黑浆果、黑莓、黑胡椒、野百合、橙皮和香菜的香气。口感丰富，纤维软，结尾坚实紧凑，展现出个性和张力。现在品尝很美好，但从2024年开始会更好。

Western reviews.review: (70% Merlot, 30% Cabernet Sauvignon) Verhalten in der Nase, eher dunkle Frucht, mittlere Komplexität. Straffer, schlanker Gaumen, klassisch gebaut, feines Tannin, ein Tick karg im Stil. Authentisch und mit Reserven. (Verkostet am 8. November 2022 in Zürich)
Western reviews.translation:
酒款：70% 美丽托（Merlot）+ 30% 卡波弗雷希诺（Cabernet Sauvignon）

口感：酒香中带有深色果味，中等复杂度。口感较干，体型较瘦，典型的风格，细腻的橡皮感，略带干涩。酒风真实，充满潜力。

Chinese pairs.original: 这款酒的香气维度并不突出，但松柏的清新感很舒服，摇杯后散发着蔓越莓和话梅的芬芳。能够感觉到团队是等到最后一刻才采收。酒体清淡而平顺，酸度明亮而典雅，雪松和菌菇的香气更像是一首节奏明快的小调，在果香并不浓郁的背景下，以其自然的韵味唤醒了沉睡的味蕾。建议现在饮用。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine's aroma profile isn't particularly complex, but the freshness of pine is very pleasant, and after swirling, it releases fragrances of raspberry and cherry. You can tell the team waited until the last minute to harvest. The palate is light and smooth, with bright and elegant acidity, and the pine and mushroom aromas are like a lively tune, awakening the senses in a subtle fruit background. Enjoy now.

English pairs.original: The aromatic profile of this wine may not be particularly pronounced, but the refreshing essence of cedar is rather pleasant, emanating notes of cranberry and preserved plum upon swirling the glass. I can feel that the team waited until the very last moment to harvest. The palate is light and smooth, with a bright and elegant acidity, while the cedar and mushroom aromas resemble a lively melody. Against the backdrop of modest fruit intensity, they awaken dormant taste buds with their natural charm. I recommend enjoying it now.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的香气可能不太突出，但在旋转玻璃时，松木的清新气息相当舒适，伴随着蔓越莓和保鲜梅的香气。 我能感受到团队等到最后时刻才采摘的感觉。口感轻盈细腻，酸度明亮优雅，松木和蘑菇的香气像一首活泼的旋律。 在果实强度不高的背景下，它们以自然的魅力唤醒沉睡的味蕾。 我建议现在就享受它。

Western reviews.review: Fully mature, medium bodied, with silky tannins, freshness and soft, polished textures, the wine is on the spicy, red fruit side of the style range. Quite nice for the vintage, this is not a wine I would hold for more development. If you're sitting on any, I'd pop a cork to enjoy the fruits before they fade.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒已经完全成熟，体积中等，口感细腻，带有清新感和柔软的质感。酒体偏向于辛辣的红果风格。考虑到产季，这是一瓶不错的酒，但我不建议再继续储存。若你已经存了这瓶酒，建议你赶快打开瓶盖，享受红果的风味，因为它们很快就会消失。

Western reviews.review: Tiefdunkles Rubingranat, jugendliche Reflexe, violetter Rand. In der Nase süße Kirschenfrucht, feine Schokolade, nach Brombeerkonfit und Orangen, zarte exotische Würze. Am Gaumen saftig, elegante süße Textur, seidige, anhaltende Tannine, finessenreiche Struktur, mineralisch, sehr appellationstypisch, tolle Frische, reife Kirschen im Nachhall, süßer Ausklang, floral- süße Nuancen, sehr gutes Reifepotenzial, besticht mit Finesse und Charme, Heidelbeeren im Nachhall. Sehr verführerische Frühphase. Trinken/lagern +20
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，年轻的反光，紫色边缘。酒鼻中有甜的樱桃果味，细致的巧克力味，浓缩的黑莓果味和橙子味，微妙的异国情调调味。口感丰富，优雅的甜味，细致的纹理，持久的丝绸般的坚果味，精致的结构，矿物质味，典型的产区风格，极好的清新感，熟透的樱桃果味在余味中，甜美的尾韵，花朵和甜味的细微差别，非常好的成熟潜力，精致的风格和魅力，蓝莓在余味中。非常诱人的初期阶段。建议饮用或储存20年以上。

Western reviews.review: A very powered wine, pushing forward with solid, but always fresh structure and fruit. The wine bursts with ripe jammy fruits, but is also firmly tannic. It combines sweet weight with final extreme, exuberant freshness.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶非常有力的红酒，具有坚实但又新鲜的结构和果味。酒体中充满了成熟的果酱般的果味，但也具有坚定的苦味。它将甜润的体感与极端的新鲜感完美结合。

Chinese pairs.original: Haut-Medoc Giscours 在2022年份首次加入品丽珠，入口清澈灵动，果汁丰盈欲滴。细密的单宁构筑了紧实有力的结构，搭配着流畅的酸度在口中翻飞、盘旋，让人每品一次都忍不住想咽下去。作为一款非常舒畅的Haut-Medoc 葡萄酒，它的品质毋庸置疑。若是收尾时的温暖感能收敛一些，定会更加出彩。
Chinese pairs.new: Giscours Haut-Medoc 2022 是一款令人愉悦的葡萄酒，入口清新动感，果汁丰富多彩。细致的单宁构建了坚实的结构，配以流畅的酸度，让口感在口中飞舞，令人无法抗拒地想要一口气吞下。作为一款舒适的Haut-Medoc葡萄酒，它的品质毫无疑问。若能在尾部收敛一些温暖感，定会更加出色。

English pairs.original: Haut-Medoc Giscours introduces Petit Verdot for the first time in the vintage of 2022, presenting a clear and lively entrance with succulent fruitiness. The wine’s fine-grained tannins form a firm and solid structure, complemented by a smooth acidity that playfully twirls on the palate, making each sip tempting to swallow. As an undeniably high-quality and enjoyable Haut-Medoc wine, it would be even more exceptional if the warmth of the finish were slightly more subdued.
English pairs.new: 2022年，高梅多克吉斯库尔首次引入了佩蒂·韦多特（Petit Verdot）葡萄，呈现出清晰活泼的入口和丰富的果香。酒中的细致纤维构成了坚实的结构，受到平滑的酸度的补充，酸度在口中轻快地旋转，使每一口都令人难以抗拒。作为一个不可否认的高品质和令人愉悦的高梅多克葡萄酒，如果尾部的余温稍微温和一些，它将会更加出色。

Western reviews.review: Fruit and flowers are all over the place here. Round, fruity, fresh and tasty, this is going to be easy to enjoy on release for all of its up-front dark red fruits. The wine blends 55% Cabernet Sauvignon, 39% Merlot and 6% Cabernet Franc. This is the first vintage with Cab Franc in the blend. Drink from 2025-2030. 89-91 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这里的红酒充满了水果和花朵的味道。圆润、果香、清新、可口，这将会让所有人在品尝时感到轻松愉快。酒中混合了55%卡波雷尔葡萄酒、39%梅洛葡萄酒和6%卡波雷尔法兰克葡萄酒。这是首次将卡波雷尔法兰克葡萄酒加入混合中。建议从2025年到2030年饮用。评分：89-91分。

Western reviews.review: Le nez est fruité, frais et offre de la puissance en finesse, une certaine profondeur, un discret côté serré ainsi qu’un joli côté infusion en délicatesse. On y retrouve des notes de cassis sauvage éclatant, de petites baies bleues pulpeuses/éclatantes et plus légèrement de poivre associées à de fines touches de poivre, à des pointes de graves iodées, à une pointe de bergamote ainsi qu’à de subtiles pointes presque toastées/noisette toastée et de tabac blond sucré. La bouche est joliment minérale, élégante et offre un côté infusion en fraicheur, de la tension, de la gourmandise, une très belle fraicheur, de la pureté minérale, de la suavité, du gras ainsi que de la justesse. En bouche ce vin exprime des notes de cassis juteux/pulpeux, de mûre écrasée et plus légèrement de petits fruits rouges éclatants associées à des touches de bergamote, de toasté ainsi qu’à une subtile pointe de muscade, de camphre, d’amande séchée et à une imperceptible pointe presque sève fraiche. Les tannins offrent un petit moelleux.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气是果香的，清新而有力，带有细腻的深度和微妙的紧致感，伴有轻微的茶叶和果香。酒中有野生黑currant的爆发式香气，蓝色浆果的清新和果香，以及轻微的胡椒和细微的胡椒、海盐和柑橘香气。还有一些几乎是烤过的或杏仁的微妙香气，以及甜的白烟草。口感清新、细腻，带有轻微的茶叶和果香，具有紧张感、丰富感和清新感。酒中有浓郁的黑currant、挤压过的黑berry和轻微的爆发式红果，伴有柑橘香气、烤过的味道和微妙的胡椒、樟脑、干果和几乎是新鲜的树汁。酒中的纤维带有轻微的软感。

Chinese pairs.original: 2022年份的Chateau Soutard-Cadet 着实让我惊喜。在集中度和单宁都非常高的年份里，这款走“浓郁风”的葡萄酒敢于摆脱“重口味”的束缚，成熟而绵软的黑色浆果在入口之后马上就融化开来，完全没有厚重感。不出意外，这是近年来Chateau Soutard-Cadet期酒表现最出色的年份。
Chinese pairs.new: 2022年的Chateau Soutard-Cadet让我非常惊喜。在一个集中度和单宁都非常高的年份里，这款葡萄酒敢于打破传统，成熟而绵软的黑色浆果在入口之后马上就融化开来，没有厚重感。这是近年来Chateau Soutard-Cadet的最佳表现。

English pairs.original: The 2022 vintage of Chateau Soutard-Cadet truly surprised me. In a year with high concentration and tannins, this wine, which follows the “full-bodied style,” dares to break free from the shackles of “heavy taste.” The mature and soft black berries melt immediately upon entering the mouth, without any heaviness. No doubt, this is the best vintage of Chateau Soutard-Cadet’s recent vintages.
English pairs.new: 2022年沙图阿德-卡德特酒庄的红酒令我大吃一惊。在一个浓度和苦味都很高的年份里，这款酒依然坚持着“全口感”的风格，敢于打破“沉重口感”的枷锁。酒中的成熟黑果酱入口即化，丝毫没有沉重的感觉。毫无疑问，这是沙图阿德-卡德特酒庄近年来的最佳产季。

Western reviews.review: Inky in color, the wine is equally dark on the palate with its waves of rich, supple, creamy, chocolate-infused, plums, and black cherries. The wine is full, rich, and deep, finishing with a blast of black pit fruits, polished tannins, mint, dark cocoa, and espresso. Drink from 2026-2042. 92-95 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 酒色深红，口感同样浓郁，波动中的丰富、柔软、奶油般的、巧克力浸泡的、黑桃和黑杏的味道。酒体丰富、浓郁、深厚，尾部留下黑核果、光滑的苦味、薄荷、黑巧克力和咖啡的爆发。建议2026-2042年饮用。评分92-95分。

Western reviews.review: Vom Barrique geprägt, Röstnoten, dunkle Kirschfrucht, Cassis. Im Gaumen saftig, ziemlich füllig, viel Struktur, sehr langer Abgang. Ein mächtiger Wein, der reifen kann. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / Grand Cercle / Château la Dauphine) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation: 来自橡木桶的影响，带有咖啡豆的味道，黑杏果和黑加仑。口感丰富，口感丰富，结构清晰，长尾。是一种强大的酒，可以继续成熟。 (评分时间：2023年4月/Grand Cercle/Château la Dauphine)

Western reviews.review: Le nez est fruité, élégant, racé et offre une jolie définition, une certaine intensité en finesse et élégance. Il exprime les notes de mûre de boysen, de myrtille et plus légèrement – de fraise éclatantes, associées à de fines touches de violette, de rôtis ainsi qu’à de pointes de tabac blond sucré et à une discrète pointe d’épices douces. La bouche est fruitée et offre de la fraîcheur, de la minéralité, une trame juteuse/acidulée, une bonne définition, de la suavité, une jolie énergie/dynamisme. Elle exprime les notes de mûre juteuse/acidulée, de prune bleue pulpeuse/acidulée et plus légèrement – de myrtille éclatante associées à de touches de groseilles juteuses/acidulées ainsi qu’à des pointes de bleuet, de chocolat et à une pointe de vanille. Les tannins sont élégants, moelleux et racés. Persistance sapide.
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的香气是果香的，优雅、精致，具有清晰的定义和一定的细腻感。它展现出浓郁的黑莓、蓝莓和轻微的鲜红果味，伴随着细微的紫罗兰、烤肉和淡淡的甜烟和糖烟，以及一丝温和的甜味。

口感果香，带有清新感和矿物质感，口感丰富且酸度适宜，具有清晰的定义和细腻感。它展现出浓郁的酸性黑莓、酸性青梅和轻微的鲜红果味，伴随着酸性草莓的细微感和轻微的蓝莓、巧克力和一丝香料。

这瓶红酒的纤维素质优雅、柔软且精致。余味持久且清新。

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby, opaque core, purple reflections, discreet brightening on the rim. Spicy nuances of Petit-Verdot, black forest berries, fine herbal savouriness, attractive bouquet. Juicy, taut texture, red cherries, fresh and lively, mineral and salty finish. Good length, certain ageing potential, already very accessible.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，透明的核心，紫色反射，杯口微微发亮。 Petit-Verdot 的辣味，黑森林莓，精致的草药香气，吸引人的香气。 juicy、紧致的口感，红樱桃，新鲜活泼，矿物质和咸味的尾部。 长度良好，明显的陈化潜力，已经非常容易入口。

Western reviews.review: Inky in color, the wine is equally dark on the palate with its waves of rich, supple, creamy, chocolate-infused, plums, and black cherries. The wine is full, rich, and deep, finishing with a blast of black pit fruits, polished tannins, mint, dark cocoa, and espresso. Drink from 2026-2042. 92-95 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 酒液呈深红色，口感同样深沉，富有丰富的、柔软的、奶油般的、巧克力浸泡的、浓郁的黑桃和黑杏果味。酒液充满、丰富、深沉，尾部带有黑核果的爆炸、光滑的纹理、薄荷、黑巧克力和咖啡的味道。建议2026-2042年饮用。评分92-95分。

Chinese pairs.original: 黑莓，豆蔻和肉桂的香气， 口感柔和，带有水果的味道，单宁细腻，结构平衡。
Chinese pairs.new: Blackberry, cinnamon, and nutmeg aromas, smooth texture with fruity flavors, fine tannins, and a balanced structure.

Western reviews.review:
On the dry, structured side, a wine with huge fruit tannins that roll over the fruit. The concentration is palpable, all dense fruit. The berry flavors get a look-in right at the end. For long aging, as long as the tannins finally soften.

Barrel Sample: 91-93 Points
Western reviews.translation:
这款红酒属于干性结构的类型，具有巨大的果皮苦味，覆盖了果味。酒精的浓度非常明显，所有的果味都非常浓郁。只有在最后一刻，才会有浆果的风味。只要苦味最终会软化，这款酒就适合长期陈化。

酒桶样品：91-93 分。

Western reviews.review: This offers a solid, structured core of red currant, cherry skin and fig notes, laced with savory herb, violet and light-handed toast. There's nice cut on the iron-tinged finish, with some depth in reserve for the cellar.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒呈现出坚实的结构，核心中有红葡萄、樱桃皮和枣子的风味，伴有香草、紫罗兰和轻微的烘烤味。酒尾有铁质的味道，口感清晰，有些深度留待在酒窖中发酵。

Western reviews.review: The dense ruby/purple-tinged 2008 Clerc Milon offers attractive aromas of toast, black currants and forest floor. Deep, full-bodied, rich, elegant and moderately tannic, this impressively endowed 2008 is an outstanding success from the Mouton Rothschild staff (who are responsible for making this wine). It will benefit from 2-3 years of bottle age and should drink well for 15 years.
Western reviews.translation: 2008年克莱尔米隆（Clerc Milon）红酒呈现出深红宝石色，具有诱人的香气，包括烤面包、黑加仑和森林地板的气息。深度、丰富、富有质感、优雅并且略带坚韧的口感，这瓶2008年的克莱尔米隆红酒是莫顿罗得斯基（Mouton Rothschild）团队的杰作（他们负责制作这瓶酒）。这瓶酒需要2-3年的陈化后才能发挥最佳口感，预计可以享用15年。

Chinese pairs.original: 花朵，石墨，甘草，蓝莓和黑加仑的气息，浓度的水果口味，饱满的酒体和大量的单宁。
Chinese pairs.new: Floral, graphite, licorice, blueberry, and blackcurrant aromas, concentrated fruit flavors, full-bodied texture, and a wealth of tannins.

Western reviews.review: Now consistently one of the great wines of the appellation, d’Issan has produced a dense purple-colored wine with a beautiful set of aromatics offering a smorgasbord of aromas such as perfumed flowers, incense, graphite, licorice, blueberry, and black currant. The wine is seamlessly constructed, like a fine dress from a haute couture house. With fabulous concentration of fruit, the ethereal elegance and sublime character of this wine make it seem to almost float across the palate with substantial flavor penetration and laser-like focus. This is a gorgeous example of 2006 that can be drunk in 3-4 years or cellared for over two decades. Good value.
Western reviews.translation: 伊桑（D'Issan）一直是该产区的顶级葡萄酒之一，这次伊桑酿造出一款浓郁的紫红色葡萄酒，具有优美的香气，提供了各种花香、香烟、石墨、甘草、蓝莓和黑加仑等多种香气。酒精构造完美，像高级时尚品牌的精致服装一样。酒中的果实浓度惊人，酒的神秘和优雅使得它在口中似乎轻飘飘然，具有强烈的口感和精确的焦点。这是一款2006年的精美葡萄酒，可以在3-4年内饮用，也可以储存超过20年。价格合理。

Western reviews.review: An intense, tight wine, with stalky black currant fruit. It exhibits delicacy and elegance rather than power. Fresh fruit with an attractive smoky element make this a wine that is going to develop further, and it has a fresh, vibrant finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶强烈、紧致的红酒，具有浓郁的黑currant果味。它展现出优雅和典雅，而不是力量。新鲜的果味与吸引人的烟熏元素使得这瓶酒有进一步发展的潜力，且有一个清新、生动的尾韵。

Chinese pairs.original: 酒体丰满强劲，富有杰出的果味深度以及华丽持久的留香，多种莓子的味道，及矿物味，集中的单宁，紧密，结构良好、顺和有层次感
Chinese pairs.new: Full-bodied and powerful, with outstanding depth of fruit flavors and a long, elegant finish. Flavors of multiple berries, mineral notes, and concentrated tannins, with a tight, well-structured and harmonious texture.

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, dezente Randaufhellung, schwarzes Beerenkonfit, etwas Nougat und Kräuterwürze, ein Hauch von Brombeeren. Saftige, rote Waldbeeren, nach Ribisel, rassige Struktur, zitronig, etwas Kakao im Abgang, ein lebendiger, straffer Speisenbegleiter.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮，黑berry浓缩，略带奶油和香草味，微微带有青草味。口感丰富，红色森林果实，类似于黑currant，结构紧致，带有柠檬味，尾部有轻微的巧克力味，活泼的口感，适合搭配各种菜肴。

Western reviews.review: A proper second wine, it's developing well with black fruits, acidity and good texture. It has plenty of flavor depth while the tannins are firmly in the background. Drink from 2017.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶适合的次级红酒，黑果、酸度和良好的口感正在发展良好。酒中有丰富的口感深度，而坚果味的味道则在后台。建议从2017年开始饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 丰富的黑色果味、甜椒、皮革橡木等香气，酒体中厚，单宁平滑，果味充足粘稠，夹带巧克力气息，余味长。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich black fruit flavors, sweet pepper, leather and oak aromas, full-bodied wine with smooth tannins, abundant and thick fruit flavors, hints of chocolate, long finish.

Western reviews.review: Better on the nose, with its floral, bright cherry, strawberry, wet earth and cocoa profile, than on the lighter, medium-bodied, earthy, red berry and herb, soft-textured palate. This is fully ready to go, no decanting required here.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的鼻子更好，带有花香、鲜红樱桃、草莓、湿土和可可的香味，而口感则较轻、柔和、带有泥土、红果和草药的味道。它已经完全成熟，不需要脱颖显露。

Western reviews.review: Better on the nose, with its floral, bright cherry, strawberry, wet earth and cocoa profile, than on the lighter, medium-bodied, earthy, red berry and herb, soft-textured palate. This is fully ready to go, no decanting required here.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的鼻子更好，带有鲜花、亮丽的樱桃、草莓、湿土和可可的香味，而口感则较轻、柔和、带有泥土、红果和草本的味道，口感较软。这个红酒已经完全成熟，不需要脱颖显露。

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Rubingranat, violette Randaufhellung. In der Nase einladende rote Frucht, feiner Kirschentouch, etwas Mandarinenzesten, Gewürzanklänge. Am Gaumen saftig, sehr harmonisch, rotbeerige Frucht, perfekt eingebundene, feine Tannine, tolle Mineralik, die im Finish fast salzig wirkt, zarter Nougat im Nachhall, sehr finessenreicher Stil.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

深红色葡萄酒色，酒液边缘有紫色光泽。酒香中有诱人的红果味，细微的樱桃味，微微的橘子皮味和一些香料味。口感丰富，非常和谐，红果味浓郁，细微的橡木味完美融合，矿物质味丰富，酒尾略带咸味，余味中有轻微的奶油味。风格精致细腻。

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Rubingranat, violette Randaufhellung. In der Nase einladende rote Frucht, feiner Kirschentouch, etwas Mandarinenzesten, Gewürzanklänge. Am Gaumen saftig, sehr harmonisch, rotbeerige Frucht, perfekt eingebundene, feine Tannine, tolle Mineralik, die im Finish fast salzig wirkt, zarter Nougat im Nachhall, sehr finessenreicher Stil.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

深红色葡萄酒色，酒液边缘有紫色光泽。酒香中有诱人的红果味，细微的樱桃味，微微的橘子皮味和一些香料味。口感丰富，非常和谐，红果味浓郁，细微的坚果味，完美地融合在一起，细微的矿物质味，酒尾几乎有盐味，余味中有轻微的奶油味。风格非常精致。

Western reviews.review: (2008) Firm, crisp, kirsch-like cherry fruit. There's a very bright edge here, with a sense of refinement. The palate too is very tight, reserved and confident, with the structure and elegance all there, but tightly presented at this stage.
Western reviews.translation: 2008年：果味坚实，果味清脆，类似于可可水果的樱桃味。这里有一个非常明亮的边缘，带有细致的感觉。口感也非常紧凑，保留和自信，结构和优雅都在这里，但在这个阶段呈现得非常紧密。

Chinese pairs.original: 很典型的波尔多老酒香气，干玫瑰，干樱桃，皮革烟草等香气，入口单宁还很有表现，十分柔软，且仍具有优雅果香。此酒3年后饮用都没有问题。
Chinese pairs.new: Classic Bordeaux aromas, with notes of dry rose, dry cherry, leather, and tobacco. The tannins are still prominent on the palate, but they're silky smooth and complemented by elegant fruit flavors. This wine will age well, and it's perfectly drinkable even after 3 years.

Western reviews.review: Medium-full bodied, the classically styled wine shows some herbal, leafy nuances along with its red fruits, cranberry and cassis. A bit stoic, the finish offers dusty tannins with its sweet and tart red pit fruits. 89 Points
Western reviews.translation: 体积中等至中大，典雅黑风格的葡萄酒展现出一些草药、叶子般的细微差别，伴随着红果、草莓和黑加仑的风味。尾部略为沉稳，带有干净的橡皮质感和甜美的红果风味。评分：89分。

Western reviews.review: Reifes Rubin, orangefarbene Reflexe. In der Nase sehr Bordeaux, feinwürzig und mit deutlicher Animalik, Leder, Kirschen, Waldboden, sehr komplex. Im Gaumen weich und zugänglich, sehr schönes Reifestadium, mittlere Körper, cremige Textur, die Tannine sind weitgehend abgeschmolzen, die Säure hält den Wein frisch, aromatisch nicht hochkomplex, doch von der Balance her sehr stimmig. Endet mittellang auf eine feine Lakritzenote. Jetzt bis 2028, 17.5 vvPunkte (89/100)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一瓶成熟的红酒，酒液呈深红色，酒液反射橙色。酒香非常浓郁，带有典型的波尔多风味，包括细腻的动物味、皮革味、樱桃味和森林土壤味，非常复杂。

在口感上，酒体柔和，容易入口，酒中的成熟度非常好，酒体中等，酒液滑顺，纤维已经大部分消失，酸度保持了酒的清新和香气，虽然酒香不算复杂，但整体平衡非常好。酒尾中长约中等，留下了一丝清淡的甘草味。

推荐饮用时间：现在至2028年。评分：17.5分（相当于89/100分）。

Western reviews.review: Medium to deep ruby-red in color. Quite restrained aromas hint at red-berries & there is a creamy note. Nice acidity gives lifted red & black currant fruit on the front palate The mid-palate shows clean ceday & grainy tannins with graphite hints. Alcohol is balanced & the finish lasts quite well. This is a a quite impressive wine with good balance that should open with time. 11/02 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色到暗红色。酒香虽然不太浓郁，但却透露着红果的味道，还有奶油般的质感。口感清新，酸度适中，入口有红黑葡萄的果味。中口有干净的木头味和砂粒般的苦味，带有石墨的味道。酒精度合适，尾部持久。整体来说，这是一瓶很出色的红酒，应该随着时间的推移而变得更好。评分：11/02 DCAMW。

2021 Chateau Le Grand Verdus Grande Rese.name: 2021 Chateau Le Grand Verdus Grande Reserve

Chinese pairs.original: 一款100%赛美蓉酿制的葡萄酒展现出了100%霞多丽的气质，如此优秀的浓郁度和集中度令它在一众白葡萄酒中脱颖而出，入口之后仿佛在蜂蜜水中潜水。令人欣慰的是，尽管赛美蓉的比例高达100%，但它却拥有清澈的酸度。圆润丰满的口感结合黄苹果和黄桃的气息，以及收尾时的咸感，着实给我我留下了深刻的印象。
Chinese pairs.new:
This 100% Semillon wine showcases the elegance of 100% Sauvignon Blanc, standing out from the crowd with its exceptional richness and concentration. Upon entry, it's like diving into a pool of honey water. 

What's reassuring is that despite its 100% Semillon composition, it still boasts a crisp acidity. The smooth, full-bodied texture combines with hints of yellow apple and peach, finishing with a satisfying saltiness that has left a lasting impression.

English pairs.original: A wine made from 100% Semillon exhibits the qualities of 100% Chardonnay. Its remarkable richness and concentration make it stand out among other white wines, like diving into honeyed water. Surprisingly, despite being entirely Semillon, it possesses a clear acidity. The round, full-bodied mouthfeel combined with notes of yellow apple and peach, along with a hint of salinity in the finish, left a lasting impression on me.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒是由100%塞缪лон葡萄酿造的，展现出100%霞多丽的特质。其出色的浓郁度和浓缩度使其与其他白酒相比显得更加出色，类似于浸泡在蜂蜜中。令人惊讶的是，尽管它是由100%塞缪隆酿造的，它仍然具有清晰的酸度。圆润的口感与黄苹果和桃子的香气结合，最后的余味中带有微妙的咸味，给我留下了深刻的印象。

Western reviews.review: From a selection of the five best vineyard plots of this estate, this wine is dense and rich. Black fruited and still young, rich tannins are balanced with juicy acidity that gives a spicy wood-aged character to the wine. Drink from 2026.
Western reviews.translation: 来自这家酒庄的五个最佳葡萄园中选出的葡萄，这款红酒浓郁而丰富。黑果味浓郁，仍然年轻，富有滋味的苦味与清新酸度相互平衡，赋予了酒中一股香气的木桶陈化特征。建议2026年后饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 1995年份的美乐高达60%，和我心目中的Chateau Giscours 相比，这款酒似乎多了一些绵柔，少了一些力量。口感丰腴柔软，单宁丝滑细腻，树莓和草莓汁的香气依旧新鲜，伴随着树脂和松茸的芬芳，展现出清新活泼的形象。以我对1995年份的认知来看，Chateau Giscours 不太适合长时间陈年，更适合现在就开瓶饮用。建议品鉴窗口：2010-2030。（40%赤霞珠，60%美乐）
Chinese pairs.new: 1995年份的美乐高达60%，与我心目中的Chateau Giscours 相比，这款酒似乎更细腻，少了一些力量。口感丰富柔软，单宁丝滑细腻，树莓和草莓汁的香气依旧新鲜，伴随着树脂和松茸的芬芳，展现出清新活泼的形象。考虑到1995年份的特点，Chateau Giscours 不太适合长时间陈年，更适合现在就开瓶饮用。建议品鉴窗口：2010-2030。（40%赤霞珠，60%美乐）.

English pairs.original: The 1995 vintage, with its 60% Merlot composition, feels a bit softer and less powerful than what I typically associate with Chateau Giscours. The palate is round and soft, with fine tannins. The aromas of raspberry and strawberry juice remain vibrant, complemented by the scents of resin and matsutake, creating a lively profile. From my understanding of the 1995 vintage, Chateau Giscours isn’t best suited for prolonged aging but is more enjoyable if opened now. Recommended drinking window: 2010-2030. (40% Cabernet Sauvignon, 60% Merlot)
English pairs.new: 1995年产的酒，60%梅洛（Merlot）成分，感觉比我通常与吉斯库尔酒庄（Chateau Giscours）相关联的酒要软一些，力量也较小。口感圆润，细致的橡皮质感。红莓和草莓汁的香气依然鲜明，松脂和松茸的香气相互呼应，呈现出活跃的风格。根据我对1995年产的了解，吉斯库尔酒庄的酒不太适合长时间陈酿，而是更适合现在打开享用。推荐饮用时间：2010-2030年。

Western reviews.review: Crème de cassis, tobacco, earth and cherry aromas, medium bodied with some tannin to resolve, this lighter style of Margaux ends with a cassis and strawberry finish. This is the first vintage for Alexander van Beek at the chateau. The wine was made from a blend of 60% Merlot and 40% Cabernet Sauvignon. The wine is fully mature and will not improve with further aging.
Western reviews.translation:
这款红酒的特点包括：

* 有浓郁的黑加仑果酱、烟草、泥土和樱桃香气。
* 体积中等，具有部分尚未解决的苦味。
* 这款玛格朗红酒的风格较轻，口感以黑加仑果酱和草莓为主。
* 这是亚历山大·范·比克（Alexander van Beek）在庄园的首次酿酒。
* 这款红酒的酒龄比例为60%梅洛和40%卡波内尔。
* 这款红酒已经成熟，继续陈酿不会带来更多的改善。

Western reviews.review: There is a medium intensity of darkly pigmented ruby-red color. The aromas are of redcurrant, concentrated licorice & cedar. Sweet cassis fruit on the palate is quite lean but is enlivened by attractive acidity. The wine is light to medium-bodied. The dark fruit is nicely married with cedary oak notes. Alcohol is balanced & the finish has good persistance. 11/99 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色，中度浓密。酒香中有红葡萄、浓缩的甘草和松木的气味。口感上有甜的黑葡萄果味，但略带清淡，受到有吸引力的酸度的调节。酒体轻至中度。黑果味与松木味的结合很好。酒精度合适，尾部持久。评分：11/99。

2023 Vignobles Andre Lurton Chateau La L.name: 2023 Vignobles Andre Lurton Chateau La Louviere

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau La Louviere 在2023年份表现的温柔可人，酸甜可口的樱桃和石榴芬芳在开瓶时就十分活泼，一下就吸引了我的注意力。柔软的单宁在口中构建出理想的维度，回味时还泛着淡淡的甜美。Chateau La Louviere 的红葡萄酒往往需要10年左右才能渐入佳境，而2023年份的这款酒，仅需5年左右便能展现最佳状态。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau La Louviere 在 2023 年的表现非常温和可爱，开瓶时樱桃和石榴的酸甜味道立即引人入胜。柔软的单宁在口中构建出完美的层次感，余味中还带有淡淡的甜美。Chateau La Louviere 的红酒通常需要 10 年左右才能达到最佳状态，但 2023 年的这款酒仅需 5 年左右就能展现出最佳表现。

English pairs.original: Chateau La Louviere presents itself with gentle allure in the 2023 vintage, with the delightful aromas of sweet cherries and pomegranates bursting forth upon uncorking, immediately captivating my senses. The supple tannins construct an ideal dimension on the palate, while the finish lingers with a subtle sweetness. While the red wines of Chateau La Louviere typically require around 10 years to reach their peak, this 2023 vintage is expected to reveal its optimal state in just around 5 years.
English pairs.new: 2023年版的La Louviere庄园以温柔的魅力呈现，瓶子一打开，甜樱桃和石榴的芳香便会爆发，立即抓住了我的感觉。细腻的橡胶构建了口感的理想维度，而尾部则带有微妙的甜度。通常情况下，La Louviere庄园的红酒需要10年才能达到巅峰，但预计2023年版将在仅仅5年内达到最佳状态。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark but not quite opaque purple-red in color. The aromas are restrained, clean & blackcurranty. The palate has notes of blackcurrant/cassis & graphite, there are also touches of black-plum & toastiness. The wine is of mid-weight with balanced alcohol. A fine structure of cedary tannins gives some grip on the mid-palate & through to a drying finish. On the finish the tannins add notes of chocolate, mocha, coffee & cedar. 04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深紫红色，接近黑色但不完全透明。酒中的香气清晰，带有黑currant的味道。口感中有黑currant和黑草莓的味道，还有 graphite、黑浆果和烘烤的味道。酒的重量适中，酒精度衡。酒中的木质味道结构良好，给了中口和尾部一些抓握感。尾部，木质味道还带有巧克力、摩卡、咖啡和松木的味道。评分：4.24（ep）DCAMW。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark but not quite opaque purple-red in color. The aromas are restrained, clean & blackcurranty. The palate has notes of blackcurrant/cassis & graphite, there are also touches of black-plum & toastiness. The wine is of mid-weight with balanced alcohol. A fine structure of cedary tannins gives some grip on the mid-palate & through to a drying finish. On the finish the tannins add notes of chocolate, mocha, coffee & cedar. 04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深紫红色，接近黑色但不完全透明。酒中的气味清晰，带有黑currant的香气。口感中有黑currant、黑currant干果和石墨的味道，还有黑浆果和烘烤的味道。酒的重量适中，酒精度衡。酒中有松木的坚果味，给了中口和尾部带来一些抓握感。尾部，坚果味还带来巧克力、摩卡、咖啡和松木的味道。评分：4.24（ep）DCAMW。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark but not quite opaque purple-red in color. The aromas are restrained, clean & blackcurranty. The palate has notes of blackcurrant/cassis & graphite, there are also touches of black-plum & toastiness. The wine is of mid-weight with balanced alcohol. A fine structure of cedary tannins gives some grip on the mid-palate & through to a drying finish. On the finish the tannins add notes of chocolate, mocha, coffee & cedar. 04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深紫红色，接近黑色但不完全透明。酒中的香气清晰，带有黑葡萄的味道。口感中有黑葡萄、黑樱桃和石墨的味道，还有黑浆果和烘烤的味道。酒的重量适中，酒精度衡。酒中的木质味道结构紧密，给了中口和尾部一些抓握感。尾部，木质味道还带有巧克力、摩卡、咖啡和松木的味道。评分：4.24（ep）DCAMW。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark but not quite opaque purple-red in color. The aromas are restrained, clean & blackcurranty. The palate has notes of blackcurrant/cassis & graphite, there are also touches of black-plum & toastiness. The wine is of mid-weight with balanced alcohol. A fine structure of cedary tannins gives some grip on the mid-palate & through to a drying finish. On the finish the tannins add notes of chocolate, mocha, coffee & cedar. 04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的颜色是深紫红色，接近黑色但不完全透明。酒中的香气清晰，带有黑currant的味道。口感中有黑currant、黑currant干果和石墨的味道，还有黑浆果和烘烤的味道。酒的重量适中，酒精度衡。酒中有松木的坚果味道，给了中口和尾部带来一些抓握感。尾部，坚果味道还带来巧克力、摩卡、咖啡和松木的味道。评分：4.24分（ep）DCAMW。

2019 Bernard Magrez Chateau Les Grands C.name: 2019 Bernard Magrez Chateau Les Grands Chenes

Chinese pairs.original: 浓郁成熟的浆果和富丽堂皇的烤制香气在入口的一瞬间让人很是惊艳。厚实而绵密的单宁铺在味蕾上，好像一层黑巧克力粉在口中融化，结构强劲的同时还带着丰满的酒体，绝对是一款浓墨重彩的葡萄酒，专为喜欢娇艳丰韵型葡萄酒的你量身打造。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich, mature fruit flavors and opulent toasted aromas make a stunning first impression. Lush, velvety tannins coat the palate, dissolving like dark chocolate powder in the mouth, while robust structure is balanced by a full-bodied texture. This is a rich, full-bodied wine, crafted specifically for those who adore lush, full-bodied reds.

English pairs.original: The flamboyant ripe berries and well-toasted aromas are pretty attractive. The dense and creamy tannins spread on the taste buds, like a piece of dark chocolate melting on the palate. The body is rich, and the structure is lavish; for those who like energetic and luscious wine, don’t miss it.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的芳香中充满了浓郁的浓果和烤焦的气味，非常吸引人。口感中浓密的、奶油般的苦味物质弥散在舌头上，像一块黑巧克力在口中融化。酒体丰富，结构豪华；对于喜欢能量充沛、醇厚的酒的人来说，不要错过它。

Western reviews.review: Smoky, with a touch of chocolate, licorice, espresso, spice and black cherries on the nose and palate come through quickly. Round, lush and polished with a richly textured, fleshy, dark plum, coffee, dark chocolate covered cherry finish, give it a few years of age to start to show its best. Drink from 2024-2037. 90 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中带有烟熏味、巧克力、 licorice、咖啡和黑樱桃的味道。口感圆润、丰富、光滑，酒尾带有浓郁的黑浆果、咖啡、巧克力浸黑樱桃的味道。建议在2024-2037年之间饮用。评分90分。

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, breitere Ockerrandaufhellung. Reife schwarze Kirschen, ein Hauch von Brombeeren, etwas Nougat, präsente Eichenwürze. Mittlere Komplexität, rotbeeriger Touch, etwas rustikales Holz, zarte Adstringenz im Abgang, etwas Nougat im Nachhall.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一份红酒评论。以下是翻译成中文：

深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，橙色边缘。成熟的黑杏果味，微微的蓝莓味，少量的奶油味，现成的橡木味。中等复杂度，红色啤酒味，少量的粗糙木头味，尾部轻微的收缩感，尾部留有奶油味。

注：我尝试保留原文的风格和结构，避免过多的解释和注释，以便让中国消费者更好地理解和欣赏红酒评论。

Western reviews.review: (70% Merlot, 30% Cabernet Sauvignon, verkostet im Dezember 2021 in Windisch) Helles Rubinrot. Delikate, fruchtige Nase, erinnert an Kirschen und Himbeeren, darüber kräuterige Noten, schwarze Schokolade. Im Auftakt fruchtbetont, zugänglich, kuschelig weich, dabei nicht plump, das Holz ist gut verpackt, die fein gewobenen Tannine stützen. Langer, frischer Abgang. Modern in der Machart, jedoch von sehr guter Qualität. Jetzt (dekantieren) besser ab 2024-2035.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一瓶混合红酒，70%梅洛（Merlot），30%卡波内托（Cabernet Sauvignon），于2021年12月在维恩施（Windisch）品尝。

酒色：浅红色。

酒香：轻柔、果香，闻起来像樱桃和蓝莓，伴有草药和黑巧克力。

口感：初期果香浓郁，易于入口，软绵绵的，木质味不明显，细致的橡皮味支持着酒体。尾部长长清新。

风格：现代化的制作方式，但品质极高。建议在2024-2035年之间品尝最佳效果。

Chinese pairs.original: 波美侯历史最悠久的酒庄之一（或许是Pomerol最早的葡萄藤种植者）。酒庄在1924年时被Georges Thienpont买下，之后一直为Thienpont家族所有。Alexandre Thienpont在1985年时接管了酒庄，他也是Le Pin的共同拥有者。现在这家小型酒庄由Alexandre的儿子Guillaume经营管理。平均树龄为45年的葡萄园内共有23个地块——被酿造成14款不同的基酒然后再进行混合调配。手工采收；淋皮法；使用蛋清来进行澄清。与Guillaume Thienpont一同在酒庄品鉴。醒酒超过6小时。此酒深邃、含蓄而且迷人的香气中渗出太妃糖、烤吐司、黑莓、咸矿物、藏红花、干花和若隐若现的焦油味。单宁一如既往的丝滑、强劲，并被那充满张力、异常圆润而且富有自然甜味的回味所加强。
Chinese pairs.new: One of the oldest wine estates in Pomerol (perhaps the earliest grape grower in the region). The estate was purchased by Georges Thienpont in 1924 and has remained in the Thienpont family ever since. Alexandre Thienpont took over the estate in 1985, and is also a co-owner of Le Pin. Today, the small estate is run by Alexandre's son Guillaume. The 45-year-old vineyard is divided into 23 plots, which are vinified separately and blended to create 14 different cuvées. Hand-picked grapes; skin contact; egg whites used for clarification. Taste with Guillaume Thienpont at the estate. Allow to breathe for more than 6 hours. This wine boasts a profound, subtle and alluring nose with notes of caramel, toasted bread, blackberry, salt minerals, violets, rose petals and a hint of smokiness. Tannins are silky and powerful, enhanced by a finish that is full of tension, round and naturally sweet.

English pairs.original: The estate has one of the longest histories in Pomerol (it should be the first vine grower in Pomerol). The property was bought by Georges Thienpont in 1924, and it remained within the family till now. In 1985, management of Vieux Chateau Certan came to Alexandre Thienpont who's also the co-owner of Le Pin. Now this small winery is run by Alexandre's son Guillaume. There are 23 blocks in the vineyards with an average of 45 years old vines, those blocks are made into 14 different cuvees and finally they will be blended together. The grapes are hand-picked; pumping over; fining by egg white. Tasted with Guillaume Thienpont at the winery. Decanted for over 6 hours. Exhibiting a deeply reticent and glamorous bouquet of toffee, toast, blackberry, savoury-mineral, saffron, dried flower and subtle tar. It showed hallmark silky tannins and fabulous power, enhancing by the tension-filled, utterly rounded and naturally sweet finish.
English pairs.new: 本酒庄在波尔多地区的历史最为悠久（甚至可以说是波尔多地区最早的葡萄种植者之一）。酒庄于1924年由乔治·蒂恩波恩特（Georges Thienpont）购买，至今仍然由家族成员管理。1985年，维尤沙托（Vieux Chateau Certan）的管理权转移至亚历山大·蒂恩波恩特（Alexandre Thienpont），他也是莱平（Le Pin）的合伙人。目前，这家小型酒庄由亚历山大·蒂恩波恩特的儿子古illaume管理。酒庄的葡萄园共有23个块，每块葡萄园的葡萄树平均年龄为45年，葡萄园中的葡萄会被分成14个不同的酒款，然后再进行混合。葡萄采摘手工进行，使用泵送过滤，蛋白质沉淀等工艺。品酒时与古illaume·蒂恩波恩特一起在酒庄品尝。酒瓶在6小时以上的时间内进行了脱颗粒。酒庄展现出深邃而优雅的香气，包括糖浆、烤面包、黑莓、矿物质、香料、干花和微妙的焦油。酒庄展现出典型的丝滑口感和惊人的力量，酒尾充满张力，圆润自然甜美。

Western reviews.review: This is a wine that had extreme intensity of electrifying tannins and acidity, with supercharged fruit. Full-bodied, yet agile and lively. It touches every taste bud on your palate. Chocolate mousse and fruit. I am lost for words. Legendary 1950 all over again. Try it in 2020.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一个极具强度的红酒，具有极度的电气感的纽带和酸度，超级充电的果味。体积丰富，但灵活和活跃。它触摸了你的味蕾上的每个味觉细胞。巧克力慕斯和水果。 我词穷了。又一次是传奇的1950年。试试2020年。

Western reviews.review: The 2009's nearly 14% natural alcohol, exquisite ripeness, and incredible complex bouquet of Asian spices, fruitcake, licorice, smoke, blackberries and black currants are to die for. A blend of 84% Merlot and the rest equal parts Cabernet Franc and Cabernet Sauvignon, it possesses a viscous texture as well as a freshness and vibrancy that are remarkable given the wine’s weight, richness and potential massiveness. This extraordinary effort is one of the finest Vieux Chateau Certans made over the last sixty years. It will undoubtedly shut down in bottle, requiring a decade or more of cellaring. It should keep for 50 years thereafter. Proprietor Thienpont thinks it is a modern day version of the 1948.
Western reviews.translation: 2009年的维尤沙托酒庄（Vieux Chateau Certan）酒，自然酒精含量接近14%，酒体丰富，复杂的香气中包含了亚细亚香料、果酱蛋糕、 licorice、烟草、黑莓和黑加仑等元素，令人垂涎欲滴。该酒的组成比例为84%梅洛（Merlot）和剩余部分均分为卡伯涅·法兰克（Cabernet Franc）和卡伯涅·索万（Cabernet Sauvignon），酒体丰富、质地细腻，具有令人惊讶的新鲜度和活力，尤其是考虑到酒的重量和潜在的浓郁程度。 这是一款出色的维尤沙托酒庄酒，近六十年来最出色的作品之一。酒瓶中会有所收敛，需要至少十年以上的陈酿。酒的寿命可达50年。酒庄老板蒂恩邦特（Thienpont）认为，这是一款现代版的1948年酒。

Western reviews.review: This shows gorgeous silk and polish, brimming with beguiling plum, cherry eau de vie and red currant fruit flavors laced with supple toasty vanilla and cedar hints. But in the background brews a darker side, with loam, maduro tobacco and iron notes, which take over on the finish authoritatively. This feels like it will get a lot bigger before it fully melds—and that will be a while. Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon and Cabernet Franc. Best from 2018 through 2035.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒呈现出优雅的光泽和细致的质感，充满了迷人的浆果风味，如浆果、樱桃酒和红葡萄风味，伴有柔软的烤香和松木的香气。但是在背景中，土壤、马杜罗烟草和铁的味道正在酝酿着，到最后的口感中完全占据了主导地位。这感觉像是会在完全融合之前变得更加复杂，需要一段时间。酒中含有梅洛、卡贝网白和卡贝网法兰克。建议在2018年至2035年之间饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 明悦的酸度和纯净的果香营造出了怡人的清透感，高挑的感觉让我在品鉴时不经意地点起了脚尖。高纯度的玫瑰花瓣、话梅糖伴随着粉笔一般的矿物感抚摸在味蕾上，虽然浓度不高，但绝对诱人。
Chinese pairs.new: The wine's crisp acidity and pure fruit aromas create a refreshing and uplifting sensation, leaving me with an elevated feeling that made me involuntarily lift my toes while tasting. The high-purity rose petal and quince notes caress the palate with a subtle mineral texture, though not overly concentrated, it's undeniably alluring.

English pairs.original: The bright acidity and precise aromas give me a sense of PURITY, I even raise my toes during the tasting. Distinct wild rose petals and salty plum candies touch the bud tastes with chalky mineral notes on the after taste. It is not an intense wine but a seductive wine.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒给我带来了纯粹的感觉，甚至在品尝时我会抬起脚尖。 distint 的野玫瑰花瓣和咸梅子糖果在口感中留下了细腻的矿物质余味。 这不是一瓶强烈的红酒，而是一瓶诱人的红酒。

Western reviews.review: Lots of plum skin and spice with hints of subtle oak and dried flowers on the nose. Stones, too. Full-bodied with chewy, rich tannins that flow across the palate, making it a real mouthful. Sweet fruit at the end. This needs time to soften and come together. Traditional in style. Drink after 2024.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中充满了浓郁的浆果皮和香料，伴有微妙的橡木和干花的余味，还有石头的味道。口感丰富，具有嚼劲的厚实的橡皮质，流动在口中，让人感到非常饱满。酒尾有甜的果味。这瓶酒需要时间来软化和融合。它的风格传统。建议在2024年后饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 一月份在酒庄与庄主Jean-Charles le Bault de la Moriniere一同品鉴了这款即将在两个月后装瓶的橡木桶样酒。此酒如同预期那般散发出充满花香同时混合着少许果仁及咸香的清新香气。口感显得非常有结构感，甚至可以说是具有一定的收敛感；无比悠长、复杂的余韵给人予深刻的印象，渗出坚果、碾碎的岩石和咸香，并留下一抹令人口齿生津的酸度。
Chinese pairs.new: We recently tasted this barrel sample with the winemaker, Jean-Charles le Bault de la Moriniere, at the estate in January. As expected, it exudes a fresh bouquet of floral notes, subtly accented by almond and saltiness. The palate is impressively structured, even a bit taut, with an endless, complex finish that releases notes of nuts, crushed stone and salt, and leaves a refreshing acidity on the palate.

English pairs.original: Tasted this barrel sample in January (will be bottled soon in March) at the winery with the owner Jean-Charles le Bault de la Moriniere. The wine exhibited expectedly fresh and floral noses mingled with some savoury and nuts touches. Pretty structured in mouth even hint of the astringency; an impressively ongoing and complicated length of nuts, crushed rock and savoury notes, leaving mouth-watering acidity behind.
English pairs.new: 在今年一月份，我在酒庄与主人Jean-Charles le Bault de la Moriniere一起品尝了这个酒桶样品（将于三月份装瓶）。酒精闻起来清新、花香，伴有些许咸味和坚果的味道。口感结构良好，略带干涩感；坚果、碎石和咸味的复杂味道持续展开，留下了令人垂涎的酸度。

Western reviews.review: Dezente Nase, leicht buttrig, Blütennoten, reifer Apfel, still, tiefgründig, Creme Brulé, sehr komplex. Cremig im Gaumen, grosse Harmonie, vollmundig, rund, mit gut verpacktem Säurenerv, top verpacktes Holz, aromatisch mit viel Länge, Schmelz und nussige Rückaromen. Grosses Chardonnay Kino.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

酒体轻盈，微微带有奶油味，带有花香和成熟苹果的香气，口感平稳深邃，类似于奶油布朗尼，非常复杂。

口感丰富细腻，完美的和谐，口感丰富圆润，酸度平衡，木质味浓郁，香气持久，带有融化和坚果的回味。

这是一个完美的香槟酒！

Western reviews.review: Closed, with some caraway, chalky mineral notes and burnt almond (high quality wood). On the palate, an even balance of ripe, subtle acidity, silky body, suppleness and tactile-mineral polish. Spicy notes on the finish. Generous yet discreet, truly aristocratic.
Western reviews.translation: 封闭的口感，带有些许孜然、石灰质矿物质和焦糖杏仁（高质量木质）的味道。口感平衡，带有成熟的、细微的酸度，滑顺的体感，柔软的质感和细腻的矿物质光泽。尾部带有些许辣味。富有品质却又谦逊，真正的贵族风范。

Western reviews.review: The quintessence of Corton-Charlemagne. The wrapping aromas are of aromatic herbs, spice and ripe fruit which to the palate is pulpy and salty with iodine nuances. The finish is complex, taut and with an impressive persistence.
Western reviews.translation: 科尔顿-夏勒曼的精髓。酒中的香气是芳香植物、香料和成熟水果的混合，口感是浓郁的、咸的，带有海盐的矿物质味。酒尾复杂、紧致，持久感极强。

Western reviews.review: Still very reductive, vivid oak character. On the nose marigold and fresh corn. Quite juicy acidity, austere, defensive fruit accompaniment, just becoming more supple, juice and spiciness are good, length too, the complexity remains rather middleweight, with salty notes.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒仍然非常有氧化性，洋香料的味道非常浓郁。酒鼻中有金盏花和新鲜玉米的香气。口感酸度较高，果味干净清晰，但略带干涩。随着时间的推移，口感越来越柔和，果味和香料的结合越来越好。酒的长度和复杂性都还不错，带有咸味的尾韵。

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Gelb, schöner Glanz. Was für eine Nase, umwerfend dieser Duft, einerseits tief, mineralisch mit Feurstein, dann aber auch unglaublich floral mit Anflügen von Kräutern, weissen Blüten und einer feinen Würzigkeit, das ist wunderbar komplex, mal einladend zugänglich, dann wieder verhalten, Ein Schnüffelwein. Am Gaumen straff im Auftakt, dann breitet sich der Wein aus, wunderbar weich und vollmundig, Zitrusfrüchte, feine Holzaromen, dazu exotische Früchte, weisser Pfirsich, grossartige Struktur, dicht und doch elegant, wunderbarer Wein, langanhaltend, fast nicht enden wollend. 2017-2032, 19 vvPunkte, (95/100) (AvV)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

深黄色，光泽美丽。这种酒的鼻子，令人惊叹的香味，一方面深厚矿物质味道，像火石，另一方面又是令人难以置信的花香味，带有草药、白色花朵和细微的辛辣味道，这是非常复杂的，既邀人品尝，又谨慎，一个嗅酒的好品种。

在口感上，酒精紧致的开头，然后酒液扩散，非常柔软和丰富，柑橘果味，细微的木头香味，伴有异国情调的果味，白色梨子，结构完美，密集又优雅，非常出色的酒，持久，几乎没有尽头。

评分：2017-2032，19分（非常值得推荐），(95/100) (AvV)。

Chinese pairs.original: 黑加仑的香气夹杂湿的石头和碎岩的气息，中等酒体，平衡，带有烟叶和香料盒的味道，回味持久。
Chinese pairs.new: The nose is a mix of damp stone and crushed rock, with a medium-bodied wine that's balanced and offers flavors of tobacco and spice box, with a long finish.

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark, virtually opaque ruby-red colour. Aromas of cedar, earth & perhaps a touch of rubber too. The palate has Savoury red fruit that is drying & a little attenuated. Alcohol is balanced but acidity is a touch low, leaving the finish savoury & quite flat. 11/15 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，几乎透明的红酒色。酒中有松香、泥土和略微的橡胶味。口感上有干燥的红果味，略微减弱。酒精平衡，但酸度略低，导致尾韵干燥且平淡。评分：11/15

Chinese pairs.original: 不知道是不是受到Chateau de Malleret 红葡萄酒的影响，Chateau de Malleret 的白葡萄酒也天生自带 “咸鲜感”。和很多高品级100%长相思的思路一样，这款酒不太强调香气的芬芳程度，而更注重对圆润度地解读，会让你有一种错觉，以为酒里有赛美蓉在神助攻。收尾时的西柚、橘皮以及佛手柑特别讨喜，倍感清爽。
Chinese pairs.new: This Chateau de Malleret white wine has a naturally salty and fresh taste, possibly influenced by its red counterpart. Like many high-end 100% Longan wines, it doesn't emphasize the intensity of its aromas, instead focusing on its smooth texture. This creates a sensation that it's almost as if the wine has a subtle assist from a skilled sommelier. The citrus notes of yuzu, orange peel, and Buddha's hand at the finish are particularly delightful, leaving a refreshing aftertaste.

English pairs.original: Not sure if it is influenced by Chateau de Malleret’s red wine, but Chateau de Malleret’s white maintains an innate “savoury” note as well. Like many ripe 100% Sauvignon wines, it delivers less on fragrance but more on roundness. On the finish, the grapefruit, orange peel, and bergamot are particularly pleasing and refreshing.
English pairs.new: 我不确定是否受到Chateau de Malleret红酒的影响，但Chateau de Malleret的白酒也保留了天生的“浓郁”味道。像许多成熟的100%萨伯涅白葡萄酒一样，它在香气方面表现不佳，但在圆润度方面表现出色。酒尾的柑橘味、橙皮和bergamot尤其令人愉悦和清新。

Western reviews.review: Ripe and juicy, this wine with black currant fruits and structure from Cabernet Sauvignon is set for some good aging. It offers plenty of acidity and freshness at the end. Drink from 2026.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感丰富饱满，带有黑加仑果味和卡波涅尔葡萄的结构，预计会有很好的陈化潜力。酒尾带有丰富的酸度和清新感。建议2026年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: Ripe and juicy, this wine with black currant fruits and structure from Cabernet Sauvignon is set for some good aging. It offers plenty of acidity and freshness at the end. Drink from 2026.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感丰富饱满，带有黑加仑果味和卡波涅尔葡萄的结构，预计会有很好的陈化潜力。酒尾带有丰富的酸度和清新感。建议2026年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: Savory in character with a spicy edge to the red fruits, soft tannins and a fruity, earthy finish with a green olive and bitter herb nuance that comes in at the end. Drink from 2023-2029.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的特点是浓郁的口感，带有辣椒般的味道，果味丰富，口感柔和，尾部带有土壤和青橄榄的味道，最后带有苦草的余味。建议在2023-2029年内饮用。

Western reviews.review: Savory in character with a spicy edge to the red fruits, soft tannins and a fruity, earthy finish with a green olive and bitter herb nuance that comes in at the end. Drink from 2023-2029.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的特点是浓郁的口感，带有辣椒般的味道，果味丰富，口感柔和，尾部带有土壤和青橄榄的味道，最后带有苦草的余味。建议在2023-2029年内饮用。

Western reviews.review: « Beautiful deep, young-looking red. Delicate nose displaying a blend of fruity and oaky tones. Stellar quality mouthfeel with ripe tannins and the kind of body that ensures some real ageability. A wine with good breed that is obviously still young. »
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒外观深红色，年轻有活力。酒香细腻，融合了果香和橡木香。口感优良，果实成熟的橡皮质感，酒体丰富，保证有很好的陈年潜力。是一瓶品质出众的年轻红酒。

Chinese pairs.original: 李子酱、醋栗和黑莓果味中交织着李子皮、樱桃核略为紧实的气息。余味带着馨香的药草气息。
Chinese pairs.new: A medley of plum jam, persimmon, and blackberry fruit flavors is intertwined with the scent of plum skin and slightly firm cherry pits. The finish is accompanied by a fragrant herbal aroma.

Western reviews.review: Medium bodied, soft textured and serving up a lot of freshness in its melange of dark, red fruits, this can easily age for a few more years, allowing all its components to come further together as its a bit tight and simple at the moment. 87 Points
Western reviews.translation: 体积中等，口感柔软，带有大量新鲜感的黑红果味混合体。这瓶酒可以再储存几年，让所有成分更好地融合在一起，因为目前它还有一点紧张和简单。评分87分。

Chinese pairs.original: The 2015 vintage of Chateau La Marzelle showcases an unexpected richness and sweetness with aromas of toffee paired with the palate of milk chocolate. Though this wine has a full-bodied structure, it remains well-proportioned, with finely polished tannin powder that feels like bathing in a soft, velvety black sesame soup. Just as the fine tannins glide over the taste buds, an unexpected hint of salinity emerges. However, it’s important to note that the aroma evolution of this wine is progressing faster than anticipated, so it is recommended to drink now.
Chinese pairs.new: The 2015 Chateau La Marzelle offers a surprising depth of flavor, with notes of toffee and a rich, chocolatey taste. Despite its full-bodied texture, the wine feels balanced and smooth, with a silky, velvety quality that coats the palate. As the flavors unfold, a subtle salty note appears, adding complexity to the wine. However, due to its rapid aroma evolution, it's best to enjoy this wine now.

English pairs.original: The 2015 vintage of Chateau La Marzelle showcases an unexpected richness and sweetness with aromas of toffee paired with the palate of milk chocolate. Though this wine has a full-bodied structure, it remains well-proportioned, with finely polished tannin powder that feels like bathing in a soft, velvety black sesame soup. Just as the fine tannins glide over the taste buds, an unexpected hint of salinity emerges. However, it’s important to note that the aroma evolution of this wine is progressing faster than anticipated, so it is recommended to drink now.
English pairs.new: 2015年夏娃庄园的红酒展现出了一种意想不到的丰富和甜度，气味中有焦糖的香气，口感中有牛奶巧克力的味道。尽管这款红酒具有丰富的结构，但它仍然保持着完美的平衡，细致的纤维化的纤维让人感觉像是在泡在一碗软绵绵的黑芝麻汤中一样。就像细致的纤维化纤维在舌头上滑过一样，突然出现了一种意想不到的咸味。然而，需要注意的是，这款红酒的香气演变速度比预期快得多，所以建议尽快饮用。

Western reviews.review: After the ripe, sweet, black raspberries, plum and licorice, you find truffle notes in the background. The wine has density, silky tannins, freshness and a fruity finish that really works. This is already tasty, and it is going to age well too!
Western reviews.translation: 在浓郁的黑莓、甜黑莓、黑杏和甘草之后，你会发现后台的松露香气。酒体丰富，滑顺的橡皮质感，清新且果香的尾韵非常搭配。这瓶酒已经很好喝了，而且还会随着时间的推移而更加精彩！

Western reviews.review: Biodynamically grown, the grapes from this estate offer structure, concentration and a delicious balance between fruit and tannins. The wine has a serious side, with its dense texture and a straight line of pure black fruits. Drink from 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 本酒庄采用生态动力耕种法栽培葡萄，葡萄成熟后呈现出结构、浓度和水果与纤维素之间的完美平衡。酒体浓密，呈现出纯粹的黑色水果风味。建议2025年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: Bright dark purple core. Lovely purity and intensity of fruit with ripe dark cherry, cassis, some mineral/stony notes, discreet oak and wet tobacco. Very dense palate, harmonious and layered with powdery tannin, a bright freshness underneath the crunchy dark fruit, cassis and cherry notes with a mild spiciness, and a pure intense and very long finish. Very grippy and long with sweet fruit lingering on the palate.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深紫红色。酒中有丰富的果味，包括熟透的黑樱桃、黑加仑等，伴有矿物质和石头的味道，微微的橡木和湿烟味。口感非常浓密，层次丰富，粉状的纤维素质使得口感柔和，底层有清新的果味，黑樱桃、黑加仑等味道伴有轻微的辣味，酒尾清晰纯粹，持久且长。酒口非常有嚼头，果味甜美地留在口中。

chateau leoville las cases le petit lion.name: chateau leoville las cases le petit lion 2021

Chinese pairs.original: 小雄狮2021年份整体感觉是只乖巧可人的小狮子，虽然在收尾时的酒精度尚未完全融入酒体，但我还是被它平衡细腻的口感所打动。入口后软糯的质感像是含了一块日本豆腐，Q弹爽滑，吹弹可破。年轻时饮用这款酒可以感受到樱花的粉嫩气息，陈年5-7年品鉴时，你还能感受到Saint-Julien 的成熟底蕴。不愧是一款品质卓越的名庄副牌。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2021 vintage of this wine is like a charming, well-behaved little lion. Although the alcohol hasn't fully integrated into the wine at the finish, I'm still impressed by its refined and balanced texture. The initial softness is like biting into a piece of Japanese tofu, with a Q-like quality that's both smooth and delicate. When young, this wine has a delicate cherry blossom aroma, while aged 5-7 years, it reveals the mature depth of Saint-Julien. It's undoubtedly a high-quality second wine from a renowned estate.

English pairs.original: The 2021 vintage of Le Petit Lion comes across as a charming and well-behaved young lion. Although the alcohol hasn’t fully integrated into the body, I am thoroughly captivated by its balanced and refined palate. On the first sip, it reminds me of soft Japanese tofu, tender and smooth, almost like a delicate burst of flavor on the tongue. When enjoyed young, this wine exudes a delicate cherry blossom aroma, while after aging for 5-7 years, it reveals the deeper, mature essence of Saint-Julien. Indeed, it stands as a second-label of outstanding quality from a prestigious Chateau.
English pairs.new: 2021年版的莱皮特狮子（Le Petit Lion）酒呈现出一种迷人的和谐的性格，像一只温顺的狮子。虽然酒精尚未完全融入酒体，但我对其平衡和精致的口感深感着迷。第一口喝下时，酒的味道让我想起日本的软豆腐，细腻和光滑，几乎像舌头上的一种细致的味觉爆发。当新酒时，酒的气味像轻柔的樱花，享受时，5-7年后酒的深度和成熟的圣朱利安（Saint-Julien）本质会逐渐展现。的确，这是一款来自知名酒庄的优质二级酒。

Western reviews.review: A red with deep and focused character of blackberry, blackcurrant and light ink. Lots of flowers, too, It’s medium-bodied with a solid core of fruit and a long finish. Clarity. 57% merlot, 40% cabernet sauvignon and 3% cabernet franc.Barrel Sample: 92-93
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有深度和集中性的黑莓、黑currant和淡墨色风味。还伴有大量的花香。它的体积中等，果实坚实，长尾。清晰。酒中含有57%梅洛，40%卡波弗雷蒙和3%卡波弗朗克。酒评：92-93分。

Western reviews.review: The 2021 Le Petit Lion is a fine second wine. It offers terrific energy in a soft, approachable style that will offer plenty of enjoyment over the next 15-20 years. Crushed flowers, spice, red cherry fruit, mint and white pepper lend brilliance. The 2021 is an articulate, reserved Petit Lion. This is very nicely done. –Antonio Galloni
Western reviews.translation: 2021 年的 "小狮子"（Le Petit Lion）是一款出色的次级红酒。它以柔和、易于接触的风格展现出极好的能量，未来15-20年将提供大量的享受。花朵、香料、红樱桃果肉、薄荷和白胡椒的风味使其闪闪发光。2021年的小狮子表现出清晰、谨慎的风格。这是一项非常出色的工作。

Western reviews.review: This second-label wine is juicy, the aromatic black plum fruits and touches of toast are already balanced. It is succulent and saline, with red berry and grey-pepper flavors in harmony. Drink from 2027.
Western reviews.translation: 这款次品牌红酒口感丰富，黑浆果的香气和 Toast 的味道已经达到平衡。它的口感丰富又带有盐味，红果和灰胡椒的味道和谐。建议2027年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: Plush and vibrant, the fruit here is lively and zippy, it has real energy on the palate while having a bitterness and a salinity to the tannins that are grippy and mouthfilling. The whole palate is full of minty freshness giving this life and an aerial feel while the darker more savoury elements settle on the tongue and long finish. It's a little tight right now but shows refined and elegant winemaking. I like it's roguish charm with power and intention. Ageing in 40% new barrels.Barrel Sample: 91
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感丰富而生动，果味鲜活而清脆，口感充满活力，带有苦味和咸味的苦味物质，给人一种紧实而充满口感的感觉。整个口感充满了薄荷般的清新感，给人一种生动而轻盈的感觉，而深沉的、更为浓郁的元素则在舌头上沉淀，留下长长的尾韵。目前它还有一点紧绷，但展现出精致而优雅的酿造手法。它有一种顽皮的魅力，拥有强大的力量和意志。使用了40%的新橡木桶进行陈化。酒评：91分。

Western reviews.review: Readers looking for a more approachable version of the Grand Vin will love the 2021 Le Petit Lion, a pretty, medium-bodied, elegant Saint-Julien. Cassis and raspberry fruits, some graphite and spicy, floral notes, nicely integrated acidity, and a focused, linear, seamless mouthfeel all make for an already delicious, classy second wine that will drink nicely over the coming 10-12 years. The blend is 57% Merlot, 40% Cabernet Sauvignon, and the rest Cabernet Franc.
Western reviews.translation: 对于寻求更容易接触的格兰德温的读者来说，2021年的小狮子（Le Petit Lion）将是一个很好的选择。它是一款中等体积的、优雅的圣朱利安葡萄酒，具有典型的黑currant和莓果风味，带有些许石墨和花香的味道。口感平滑，酸度适中，线条清晰，非常适合短期内饮用。该酒的混合比例为57%梅洛，40%卡波弗雷蒙，余下的为卡波弗雷蒙。该酒将在未来10-12年内保持其品质。

Chinese pairs.original: 非常有趣，我居然能够在一款沙土砾石为主的Pomerol 身上品出黏土砾石的身影。不仅口感十分扎实，单宁也相当紧致，包裹在圆润的酒体之中，给我满满的充实感。2021年份的果香相对简单，但酿酒师还是凭借蓝莓和丁香的芬芳，以及巧克力粉的醇厚感，打造出难得的平衡。值得喜欢Pomerol 的朋友尝鲜。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine is a lot of fun, and I'm surprised to find earthy notes in a Pomerol dominated by gravel and sand. Not only is the texture robust, but the tannins are also tightly wound, wrapped in a smooth, full-bodied package that's incredibly satisfying. The 2021 vintage is relatively straightforward in terms of fruit, but the winemaker has managed to craft a rare balance by combining the sweetness of blueberries and cloves with the richness of cocoa powder. A must-try for fans of Pomerol.

English pairs.original: It’s intriguing to find hints of clay and gravel terroir in a wine that originates from sandy gravel soil. The palate displays strength, with tightly structured tannins enveloped by a rounded body, providing a profound and satisfying experience. While the fruit aromas in the 2021 vintage are not overly complex, the winemaker adeptly balances them with the scents of blueberries and cloves, accompanied by the richness of cocoa powder. This wine is certainly worth exploring for those who have an appreciation for Pomerol wines.
English pairs.new: 在沙砾土壤的葡萄园中，找到粘土和砾石的风土特征是很有趣的。口感强烈，紧密结构的橡胶纤维被圆润的身体所包围，提供了深刻而令人满意的体验。虽然2021年产的果香并不是非常复杂，但酒师巧妙地平衡了蓝莓和丁香的香气，并伴有巧克力粉的丰富感。这款酒值得那些对波美罗酒有兴趣的人去探索。

Western reviews.review: Wet earth, coffee, licorice, cocoa and red plums show well in the medium-bodied, round, vibrant, bright, earthy, red cherry finish. It is possible here that with aging, the wine could add more roundness and weight before bottling. You can enjoy this on release. Drink from 2023-2035. 88-90
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感丰富，中等体积，圆润，生动，鲜艳，带有泥土味的红樱桃尾韵。可能随着时间的推移，这瓶酒会变得更加圆润和丰满。您可以在发布时即刻享用。建议饮用时间：2023-2035年。评分：88-90分。

Western reviews.review: Wet earth, coffee, licorice, cocoa and red plums show well in the medium-bodied, round, vibrant, bright, earthy, red cherry finish. It is possible here that with aging, the wine could add more roundness and weight before bottling. You can enjoy this on release. Drink from 2023-2035. 88-90
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感丰富，中等体积，圆润，生动，鲜艳，带有泥土味的红樱桃尾韵。可能随着时间的推移，这瓶酒会变得更加圆润和丰满。您可以在发布时即刻享用。建议饮用时间：2023-2035年。评分：88-90分。

Chinese pairs.original: 我完全没料到此酒的香气居然活力十足，甚至比我6年前品鉴的那瓶更为新鲜，展现大量黑莓、甜泥土和香料气息。单宁滑爽、怡人，而回味中微微的咸味使得整支酒显得更加完整。
Chinese pairs.new: I was completely blown away by the wine's vibrant aroma, which was even fresher than the one I tasted six years ago. It's bursting with blackberry, sweet earthy and spicy notes. The tannins are silky smooth and pleasant, and a subtle salty finish adds depth to the entire wine.

English pairs.original: The nose was unexpectedly energetic, even fresher than that bottle I've tasted 6 years ago, with lashings of blackberry, sweet earth and spices. The polished tannins were admirable, and the subtle salinity on finish complemented the whole wine beautifully.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的鼻子气味意外地活跃，甚至比我6年前品尝的那瓶还要新鲜，带有浓郁的黑莓、甜土壤和香料的味道。酒中的光滑的苦味很出色，酒尾的细微的咸味完美地补充了整瓶酒的风格。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark, ruby-red color is almost opaque. Aromas are high-toned, with lifted notes of fresh strawberry & more jammy characteristics. The palate has a supple structure & fresh acidity, There is a high-toned nature to the red-fruit on the mid-palate. Alcohol is balanced & there is a fair tannic structure. Vibrant fruit on the finish lasts well. 11/06 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的红酒色，几乎透不见光。酒香高昂，带有新鲜草莓和果酱般的特征。口感柔和，酸度清新，中口的红果味高昂。酒精平衡，口感坚实。酒尾留有生动的果味。评分：11/06 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: Les Carmes Haut-Brion 2013 是一款颠覆我认知的葡萄酒，我第一意识到原来波尔多左岸的葡萄酒还能这么玩儿。59%的品丽珠和30%的带梗发酵，纵观整个左岸都显得十分另类，但喝起来却让人惊喜连连。面对如此困难的年份，这款酒自始至终都没有任何生青的气息，就连单宁的质感也比我想象中平和了很多。高超的萃取工艺、淡淡的松香清凉，既让我看到了Guillaume团队的野心，也让我对大年份的表现充满期待。
Chinese pairs.new: Les Carmes Haut-Brion 2013 是一款让我大开眼界的葡萄酒，它让我意识到波尔多左岸的葡萄酒也可以如此精彩。酒中含有 59% 的品丽珠和 30% 的带梗发酵，这让它与整个左岸的葡萄酒形成了鲜明的对比，但令人惊喜的是，喝起来却非常出色。即使是在困难的年份，这款酒始终保持着优雅的风格，没有任何生青的气息，甚至单宁的质感也比我想象中平和。高超的萃取工艺和淡淡的松香清凉，让我看到了 Guillaume 团队的野心，也让我对大年份的表现充满期待。

English pairs.original: Les Carmes Haut-Brion 2013 reverses my impression about Bordeaux wine. It’s the first time I realized that we could play the whole bunch in Left Bank of Bordeaux. 59% Cabernet Franc plus 30% whole bunch seems so weird, but it surprises me a lot once it touches my palate. Though born in such a challenging vintage, it carries no greenness at all. Even the tannins are softer than my imagination. The great extraction technique and light freshness of pine resin offer me the ambition of Guillaume’s entire team, and I am full of expectations for their great vintages.
English pairs.new: 莱斯卡尔姆奥布里翁 2013 年红酒彻底改变了我对波尔多红酒的印象。这是第一次我意识到我们可以在波尔多左岸玩出一番好戏。红酒中含有 59% 卡波弗朗克和 30% 整梗葡萄，这听起来很奇怪，但一旦它接触到我的味蕾，我就被它惊艳了。即使是在这样一个挑战性的产季出生的红酒，它也没有一点青涩的味道。甚至是它的坚果味也比我想象的要柔和。伟大的提取技术和松香的清新气息让我对吉勒姆（Guillaume）团队的所有伟大产季充满了期望。

Western reviews.review: 40% Ganztrauben. 59% Cabernet Franc, 22% Merlot, 19% Cabernet Sauvignon, 13% Alkohol, 3.58 pH. Kräftiges Rubinrot, noch immer Glanz. Feine, anfangs zurückhaltende Nase, die sich wunderschön im Glas entwickelt, Rauch, etwas Torf, weisser Tee, dunkle Beerenfrucht, florale Noten, Veilchen, Sauerkirsche. Im Gaumen straff, gradlinig, frisch und mit viel Würze, der Wein ist sehr elegant, hat einen mittleren Körper, feinkörnige Gerbstoffe und eine gute Säure, keinerlei Schwere, sehr burgundisch im Charakter und mit einem feinwürzigen, frischen Abgang. Einer der besten 2013er und ein guter Beweis, dass selbst in diesem schwierigen Jahr, top Weine entstanden sind. Jetzt bis 2040+
Western reviews.translation:
这是一瓶红酒评论。以下是翻译成中文：

40% 葡萄，59% 卡波弗朗奇，22% 美丽托，19% 卡波萨维尼翁，13% 酒精，3.58 pH。酒液呈深红色，仍然闪闪发光。酒香细腻，初期回避，随着时间的推移，酒香在杯中展现出美丽的风景，带有烟火味，少量泥土味，白茶味，黑berry果味，花朵香味，紫罗兰，酸枣。口感紧致，平衡，新鲜，具有丰富的风味，酒体中等，细腻的纤维和良好的酸度，完全没有沉重感，风格典雅，具有中等体积，细腻的纤维和良好的酸度，完全没有沉重感，风格典雅，具有中等体积，细腻的纤维和良好的酸度，完全没有沉重感，风格典雅，具有中等体积，细腻的纤维和良好的酸度，完全没有沉重感，风格典雅，具有中等体积，细腻的纤维和良好的酸度，完全没有沉重感，风格典雅，具有中等体积，细腻的纤维和良好的酸度，完全没有沉重感，风格典雅，具有中等体积，细腻的纤维和良好的酸度，完全没有沉重感，风格典雅，具有中等体积，细腻的纤维和良好的酸度，完全没有沉重感，风格典雅，具有中等体积，细腻的纤维和良好的酸度，完全没有沉重感，风格典雅，具有中等体积，细腻的纤维和良好的酸度，完全没有沉重感，风格典雅，具有中等体积，细腻的纤维和良好的酸度，完全没有沉重感，风格典雅，具有中等体积，细腻的纤维和良好的酸度，完全没有沉重感，风格典雅，具有中等体积，细腻的纤维和良好的酸度，完全没有沉重感，风格典雅，具有中等体积，细腻的纤维和良好的酸度，完全没有沉重感，风格典雅，具有中等体积，细腻的纤维和良好的酸度，完全没有沉重感，风格典雅，具有中等体积，细腻的纤维和良好的酸度，完全没有沉重感，风格典雅，具有中等体积，细腻的纤维和良好的酸度，完全没有沉重感，风格典雅，具有中等体积，细腻的纤维和良好的酸度，完全没有沉重感，风格典雅，具有中等体积，细腻的纤维和良好的酸度，完全没有沉重感，风格典雅，具有中等体积，细腻的纤维和良好的酸度，完全没有沉重感，风格典雅，具有中等体积，细腻的纤维和良好的酸度，完全没有沉重感，风格典雅，具有中等体积，细腻的纤维和良好的酸

Western reviews.review: Dark cherry, tobacco and licorice create the perfume. The wine is soft, forward and polished on the palate, with ripe, dark cherries and plums in the finish, making it easy to drink on release. 91 Points
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒的香气中融合了黑樱桃、烟草和甘草的味道。口感柔和、前端突出、光滑细腻，余味中充满了成熟的黑樱桃和浆果，易于在发布时饮用。评分：91分。

Western reviews.review: With structure and fruit working well together, this ripe wine has good potential. It is still developing, with firm wood flavors as well as attractive acidity. Give it time and drink from 2019. The Philippe Starck-designed winery went into production in 2015; it's owned by developer Groupe Pichet.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒结构和果味协调，品质良好，未来发展潜力大。虽然还在成熟中，但木头味和酸度都很吸引人。建议等待一段时间再饮用，最佳饮用时间为2019年。该酒庄由设计大师菲利普·斯塔克（Philippe Starck）设计，于2015年投产，由房地产开发商皮歇特集团（Groupe Pichet）所有。

Chinese pairs.original: 初品2010年份的Chateau La Pointe，你能立刻感受到它来势汹汹的气场。也许是延续了以前的酿造方式，这款酒的果香没有2019、2020那么清晰纤细，主要表现为含蓄的蓝莓果干和淡淡的榛果芬芳。但这款酒在口中的表现可圈可点，庞大的酒体在圆润感的帮助下显得颇为绵密，再加上清凉的酸度装点，仿佛看到了一群踏着浪花飞奔而过的骏马。相信陈年至2026-2032年依旧能打。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2010 Chateau La Pointe is a force to be reckoned with from the get-go. Perhaps sticking to traditional winemaking methods, this wine's fruitiness is less refined than its 2019 and 2020 counterparts, instead offering subtle blueberry and hazelnut notes. However, it truly shines in the mouth, with a full-bodied texture that's both velvety and dense, complemented by a refreshing acidity that's like a galloping horse riding the waves. This wine has the potential to age well, holding up through 2026-2032.

English pairs.original: When you first taste Chateau La Pointe 2010, you can immediately feel its powerful aura. Perhaps due to the continuation of the previous winemaking process, the fruity aromas of this wine are not as clear and slender as that of the 2019 and 2020 vintages, dominated by the reserved fragrance of dried blueberry and the mild scent of hazelnut. However, the wine has a remarkable performance on the tongue. The huge body is particularly fine-grained with the help of a sense of roundness, plus the decoration of the cool acidity, you will feel like seeing a herd of horses galloping through the waves when tasting the wine. I believe that It will still give an excellent performance after bottle aging until 2026 – 2032.
English pairs.new: 当你第一次品尝2010年夏洛特拉波因特（Chateau La Pointe）时，你会立即感受到其强大的气场。可能是由于前几年的酿酒过程的延续，这款酒的果香并不是像2019年和2020年的那般清晰和纤细，而是被干蓝莓的保留香气和轻微的杏仁香气所主导。然而，这款酒在舌头上的表现却是出色的。巨大的体积尤其细腻，受到圆润感的帮助，加上酷爽的酸度装饰，你会觉得品尝这款酒就像看到一群马在波浪中奔驰。 我相信，这款酒经过瓶陈酿造，直到2026-2032年仍会给予出色的表现。

Western reviews.review:
Big, firm, with dense tannins that underly the ripe, dark berry and plum skin fruit flavors. Very powerful, the almost shocking acidity a cutting edge of freshness. Hugely juicy aftertaste.
Barrel Sample: 92-94
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的口感丰富，坚实，具有浓密的苦味物质，覆盖着成熟的黑berry和黑杏皮果味。非常强烈，几乎令人惊讶的酸度带来了一种新鲜的锋芒。口感极其浓郁。

酒评：92-94分（酒桶样本）

Western reviews.review: I have always held up the 2010 La Pointe as one of the high points of recent vintages of this Pomerol estate. After five years in bottle, it has retained that quintessential Pomerol bouquet with black fruit laced with truffle and a touch of iron filings. The palate is still quite structured, although the tannins appear to have melted slightly since I last encountered it. It leads to an intense graphite finish that might lead you astray to the Left Bank, and the aftertaste remains long and satisfying. This is just a superb wine from Eric Monnoret that shows no signs of falling short of the promise that is has shown ever since I first tasted it in barrel. Tasted August 2017.
Western reviews.translation: 我一直认为2010年拉波因特（La Pointe）是近年来该波尔多庄园（Pomerol estate）的高峰之一。经过五年的瓶龄，它仍保留了典型的波尔多香气，黑果与松露和铁屑的微妙混合。口感仍然相当结构化，尽管五年来我最后一次品尝它时，纽维素似乎已经部分融化。它带来了一种强烈的石墨末尾，可能会让你误以为它来自左岸（Left Bank），但余味仍然长久而令人满意。这是一瓶来自埃里克·莫诺雷（Eric Monnoret）的出色酒款，它没有表现出从我第一次在酒桶中品尝它以来就展现出的承诺的任何迹象。品尝于2017年8月。

Western reviews.review: This has power in reserve, but stays remarkably restrained for now, with a torrent of boysenberry, fig and raspberry fruit held in check by charcoal-studded grip and well-embedded acidity. The long, dense smoked apple wood finish should let this cruise nicely in the cellar. Best from 2015 through 2030.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒虽然有着强大的力量，但目前仍保持着令人惊讶的克制，充满了黑莓、枣子和草莓的果味，但被焦炭和酸度的紧紧控制。长长的、浓密的烟熏苹果木味会让这款红酒在酒窖中缓慢悠然地成熟。建议在2015年至2030年之间饮用。

Western reviews.review: Dense, nicely concentrated, rich red. Nose is unmistakably Pomerol with earthy, slightly iron-rich Merlot fruit lifted with fragrance from Cabernet Franc. Fine natural sweetness on the palate, which is full of energy and already has an attractively smooth texture with tannins firming up the long, satisfying finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感非常浓郁，富有层次。酒鼻中充满了波尔多风格的梅洛果味，带有泥土和铁矿的味道，弗朗克果味则带有清新的香气。口感上有着自然的甜度，充满了活力，口感细腻，且有着长长的持久尾韵。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Laroque 2021把一款99%的高比例美乐活生生地酿成了品丽珠的模样，那悠扬的紫罗兰花香让我魂牵梦绕，粉末状的单宁背后暗藏着一股咸感，划过味蕾还带着鲜奶般的柔润，这种层层递进的味觉体验简直不要太精彩，这绝对是列级庄家族少有的超高性价比酒庄！面对如此出色的酒，请允许我多贪上几杯！(得益于该当地良好的通风条件，该年份的葡萄几乎没有受到霜霉病的影响，产量到了喜人的41百升/公顷。pH：3.49，酒精: 13.5%)
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau Laroque 2021是一款99%美乐活生生地酿成的品丽珠，带有悠扬的紫罗兰花香，让人魂牵梦绕。粉末状的单宁后面有着一股咸感，味蕾上留下鲜奶般的柔润。这种层层递进的味觉体验简直精彩。面对如此出色的酒，允许我多喝几杯！该年份的葡萄几乎没有受到霜霉病的影响，产量达到喜人的41百升/公顷。酒的pH值为3.49，酒精含量为13.5%。

English pairs.original: Chateau Laroque 2021 has masterfully crafted a wine with 99% Merlot into the semblance of a Cabernet Franc, with its lingering violet fragrance haunting my dreams. Behind its powdery tannins, there lies a hidden layer of saltiness, gliding over the taste buds while carrying the creamy softness of fresh milk. This progressively unfolding taste experience is simply too marvelous, marking it as a rare high-value find among classified estates! Faced with such an outstanding wine, please allow me to indulge in a few more glasses! (Thanks to the excellent ventilation conditions of the area, the grapes were almost unaffected by downy mildew, achieving a pleasing yield of 41 hectoliters per hectare. pH: 3.49, alcohol content: 13.5%).
English pairs.new: 拉罗克庄园2021年红酒，精心酿造，99%梅洛，呈现出卡贝网葡萄的风格，令人梦幻般的紫罗兰香气萦绕在脑海中。其粉末般的坚果味后面，隐藏着一层盐味，轻轻滑过味蕾，带来新鲜牛奶般的软滑感。这种逐渐展开的口感体验简直太过惊艳，标志着它是分类庄园中罕见的高价值发现！面对如此出色的红酒，我不禁想多喝几杯！（感谢该地区的良好通风条件，葡萄几乎没有受到霉菌病的影响，实现了令人愉悦的产量41公斤/公顷。pH值：3.49，酒精含量：13.5%）

Western reviews.review: The 2021 Laroque is classy, elegant and polished. A wine of stature and breeding, Laroque is a quintessentially finessed Saint-Emilion. Silky tannins wrap around a core of dark cherry, plum, spice, new leather, licorice and menthol. All the elements are nicely balanced. –Antonio Galloni
Western reviews.translation: 2021 年的拉鲁克（Laroque）是一款典雅、优雅、精致的红酒。它是一款高品质的圣埃米利翁葡萄酒，拥有优良的血统和品格。细致的橡皮质纹理包裹着一根黑樱桃、黑杏、香料、新皮革、甘草和薄荷的核心。所有元素都保持着完美的平衡。 –安东尼奥·加隆尼（Antonio Galloni）

Western reviews.review: Spiced red cherries, plums, graphite, cocoa powder and a touch of mineral. Medium-bodied palate with fine, silky tannins and a juicy, nuanced finish. Elegant and polished.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感丰富多彩，带有烤苹果、红樱桃、浓郁的黑果、焦炭和矿物质的味道。口感中等，细致的纤维和滑顺的口感，结尾清新果香，细腻。

Western reviews.review: Fragrant and a touch smoky on the nose with perfumed floral notes and ripe blackcurrants. Smooth and supple, a nice juicy intensity with high but not too seering acidity makes way for slightly austere touches against a salty mineral core. It's lightly framed and delicate, very easy to drink and enjoy. Friendly, charming, juicy, fun, fresh and well worked. A touch savoury and minty on the finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中带有烟熏味和花香，伴随着熟透的黑currant。口感细腻柔顺，带有高但不刺激的酸度，略带干涩的味道与矿物质核心相对立。它的口感轻盈细致，非常容易入口，非常适合轻松享用。这种红酒友好、迷人、带有水果味、有趣、新鲜且制作精良。口感中带有微微的咸味和薄荷味。

Western reviews.review: The 2021 Château Laroque is another seamless, elegant wine from this larger château that readers will love. Based on just about 100% Merlot (I think there's a small amount of Cabernet Franc) brought up in 50% new oak, its vivid purple hue is followed by a lively, fresh nose of cassis and berry fruit interwoven with spring flowers, violets, and obvious minerality. Coming from a cooler, limestone terroir, it's never the biggest or richest wine in a vintage, yet its purity of fruit is exceptional, and it has polished tannins and just a remarkable sense of finesse and elegance. Give bottles 3-4 years if you can and enjoy over the following 15+.
Western reviews.translation: 2021年夏洛克酒庄的红酒是一款又一款完美的、优雅的葡萄酒，消费者会喜欢。根据大约100%梅洛（我认为有少量卡波弗朗克）在50%新橡木桶中发酵，其鲜艳的紫色色调后面是活跃的、清新的鼻子，含有黑加仑和浆果的味道，交织在一起的春天的花朵、紫罗兰和明显的矿物质味道。来自一个较冷的、石灰岩土壤的产区，这个酒从来都不是最大的或最丰富的酒之一，但它的果实纯度是出色的，它有光滑的纤维和令人惊叹的细致和优雅感。尽可能地给酒瓶3-4年时间，如果可以的话，享受接下来的15+年。

Western reviews.review: The 2021 Laroque opens in the glass with aromas of dark, minty berries, orange zest and toasty oak, followed by a medium to full-bodied, fleshy and layered palate with a sweet core of fruit, supple tannins and a long, mineral finish. This has turned out very nicely in bottle, and given its low-pH profile, it's likely to reward some bottle age.Rating: 92+
Western reviews.translation: 2021 年拉罗克红酒在玻璃中展现出深色、薄荷般的黑berries、橙子皮和-toast oak的芳香，随后是中等到全身的、肉感和层次丰富的口感，带有甜的果肉核心、柔软的纹理和长长的矿物质尾部。这瓶红酒在瓶装中表现得非常出色，考虑到其低pH值，很可能会在瓶装中获得一些年份的奖励。评分：92+。

Chinese pairs.original: 2017年份是Chateau Saint-Pierre采用带梗发酵的第二个年份（很小一部分），如果说2016年份的带梗发酵是近乎隐形的存在，那2017年份的带梗发酵是神来之笔，和中国的陈年普洱有几分相似。与2017年份的“清雅风”不同，Chateau Saint-Pierre 2017的结构感非常出众，是该年份波美侯的高性价比葡萄酒的杰出代表。
Chinese pairs.new: 2017年是Chateau Saint-Pierre采用带梗发酵的第二年，尽管只有一小部分采用这种方法。相比之下，2016年份的带梗发酵几乎是无形的。然而，2017年份的带梗发酵则是惊人的，类似于中国的陈年普洱茶。与2017年份的“清雅风”不同，Chateau Saint-Pierre 2017的结构感非常突出，是波美侯地区2017年份高性价比葡萄酒的杰出代表。

English pairs.original: 2017 marked Chateau Saint-Pierre’s second trial with the whole bunch fermentation (which accounted for a very small part of the blend). While nearly no signs of whole bunch fermentation are detectable in the 2016 vintage, it is a masterstroke on the 2017, somewhat resembling the aged Chinese Pu-Erh tea. Different from the freshness presented in the same vintage, Chateau Saint-Pierre 2017 exhibits attractive structure, it is a good example of a good value Pomerol in 2017.
English pairs.new: 2017年，尚佩雷酒庄（Chateau Saint-Pierre）再次尝试了整梗发酵（whole bunch fermentation）的方法，这种方法只占了酒庄的少部分。与2016年相比，2017年的酒庄几乎看不到整梗发酵的迹象，但在2017年，这种方法却是非常成功的，酒庄的风格与陈年的普洱茶（Pu-Erh tea）相似。与同年其他酒庄相比，尚佩雷酒庄2017年酒呈现出更好的结构，体现了2017年波尔多地区的好酒价值。

Western reviews.review: Offen, feinwürzig, schöne Frucht, auch etwas Herbstlaub, florale Noten; weicher Gaumen, bereits gut zugänglich, die Tannine sind gut verpackt, keinerlei Holzdominanz; ausgewogen, mit guter Länge und rotfruchtigen Rückaromen. Viel Spass im Glas aktuell, kein Grund zu warten. 2024 bis 2038
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感非常开阔，细腻，具有美好的果味和秋叶的香气，花朵的香味也非常明显。口感柔和，容易入口，苦味被很好地控制，没有木头的味道。整体口感平衡，酒尾长，留有红果的余味。目前在杯中享受非常愉快，没有必要等待。推荐饮用时间：2024年至2038年。

Western reviews.review: Fresh and bright, with a focus on its red fruits, peppery nuances, espresso and herbs. You also find a nice shot of tobacco and cedar. The wine is wine is round, forward, medium-bodied and with just a few years in the cellar, it should be ready to get going. 92 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感清新活泼，重点突出其红果味，带有辣椒般的微妙味道，咖啡和香草的风味。还可以感受到烟草和红木的味道。酒体圆润，前端突出，中等体积，仅需几年陈酿后就可以享用。评分92分。

Western reviews.review: Nez au boisé toasté assez fréquent dans ce cru, mais sans excès, belle matière ample, serrée, fin de bouche généreuse et savoureuse. Beau vin de vieilles vignes et belle garde probable.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的鼻子中有木质-toast的味道，比较常见，但没有过量，口感丰富、紧致，尾部丰富、有味道。是一瓶来自老 vines的好酒，可能会有很好的保存期限。

2022 Le Clarence de Haut-Brion - Chateau.name: 2022 Le Clarence de Haut-Brion - Chateau Bahans Haut-Brion

Chinese pairs.original: 香气初时矜持，轻摇酒杯后才绽放出桂皮、丁香、桑果、以及迷迭香的芬芳。62.1%的美乐竟然拥有赤霞珠般的结构和浓度，令酒体显得更有力量。尽管口感中酒精稍显突兀，但酒体仍恰如其分地保持平衡。品丽珠在这款酒中绝对是最大的亮点，草药之外更带着几抹紫罗兰幽香，这使得原本丰腴的酒体瞬间变得灵动了起来。
Chinese pairs.new: The nose is initially reserved, but after a gentle swirl, the aromas of cinnamon, cloves, plum, and lavender unfold. With an astonishing 62.1% ABV, this wine boasts a Cabernet Sauvignon-like structure and intensity, lending it a robust body. Although the palate shows a slight jolt of alcohol, the wine remains perfectly balanced. The Pinot Noir in this blend is undoubtedly the standout, offering a subtle hint of lavender alongside herbal notes, instantly transforming the rich body into a lively one.

English pairs.original: Initially restrained, the aroma of this wine only blooms after a gentle swirl of the glass, revealing notes of cinnamon, clove, mulberry, and rosemary. It’s astonishing that 62.1% of Merlot can possess the structure and depth of Cabernet Sauvignon, endowing the wine with a remarkable sense of power. Despite a slight alcoholic edge on the palate, the wine maintains a perfect balance. However, the star of the show is undeniably Cabernet Franc, adding a vibrant touch of violet to the herbaceous profile and giving the once-lavish body a newfound sense of agility.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的香气在初期保持谨慎，但在玻璃轻轻旋转后，才逐渐展现出丁香、肉桂、桑葚和罗勒的香味。令人惊讶的是，62.1%的梅洛葡萄竟然能够拥有卡波弗雷葡萄的结构和深度，从而赋予这款红酒出色的力量感。尽管口感上有轻微的酒精味，但这款红酒仍然保持着完美的平衡。然而，真正的焦点是卡波弗雷葡萄，给予这款红酒一抹鲜花般的紫色，赋予了之前富丽堂皇的体积新的灵活性。

Western reviews.review: 93-95 Barrel sample. The wine's structure is impressive. The firm tannins at the heart of the wine are solid. The ripe black fruits wrap around these tannins. The wine has a fine potential.
Western reviews.translation: 93-95 分。酒庄样品。酒的结构令人印象深刻。酒中坚实的橡皮质是稳固的。成熟的黑色果味包围着这些橡皮质。酒有着优良的潜力。

Western reviews.review: Cigar box, spice, burning herbs, black plums, and cherries create the nose. The wine is refined, silky and fresh, The fruits are ripe, sweet, lifted and have no problem expressing their essence on the mid-palate, and in the elegant finish, which delivers a plethora of spices and a touch of refreshing mints in the endnote. Enjoy this while waiting for the Grand Vin to develop. The wine blends 62% Merlot, 22% Cabernet Sauvignon, 14.5% Cabernet Franc and 1.5% Petit Verdot. 14.4% ABV, 3.9 pH. Drink 2025-2045. 93-95 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中包含了烟斗盒、香料、燃烧的香草、黑杏和樱桃的味道。酒体细腻、滑顺、清新。果味成熟、甜美、饱满，能够在口中展现出其本质。酒尾优雅，带有丰富的香料和清新的薄荷末梢。建议在等待Grand Vin成熟的过程中享用。该酒的混合比例为62%梅洛、22%卡波弗雷蒙、14.5%卡波弗朗和1.5%佩蒂维多。酒精度14.4%，pH值3.9。建议饮用时间为2025-2045年。评分93-95分。

Western reviews.review: (62.1% Merlot, 21.9% Cabernet Sauvignon, 14.5% Cabernet Franc, 1.5% Petit Verdot, 3.9 ph, 14.4% Alkohol) Leicht rauchig, dazu viel dunkle Frucht, Kirschen dominieren, darüber Blaubeeren und laktische Noten. Im Gaumen saftig, ungemein knackige Frucht, man möchte "abbeissen", doch es ist Flüssigkeit, die Tannine sind fein mit der Frucht verwoben, die Säure wirkt balanciert, ausgezeichnete Balance der Element und trotz über 14% Alkohol keine Spur von Hitze. Frisches, würziges Finale auf schwarze Kirschen und Kräuter. Ein sehr gelungender Zweitwein, der es mit manchem Erstwein locker aufnehmen kann. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 auf Château La Mission Haut-Brion) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation:
这是一瓶来自法国的红酒，具体的成分是：

* 62.1% 美丽托（Merlot）
* 21.9% 卡波弗雷（Cabernet Sauvignon）
* 14.5% 卡波弗雷（Cabernet Franc）
* 1.5% 小黑皮诺（Petit Verdot）
* 酸度：3.9
* 酒精度：14.4%

这瓶红酒的口感是轻微烟熏的，带有大量的黑色果味，樱桃味居多，接着是蓝莓和乳酸味。口感丰富，非常脆爽的果味，让人想咬下去，但它是液体的，坚果味和果味是融合在一起的，酸度是平衡的，所有元素的平衡都非常出色，尽管酒精度超过14%，但没有一点儿烧感。结尾是新鲜的、有香味的黑樱桃和香草味。这个红酒非常成功，甚至可以与一些顶级红酒相比。

Western reviews.review: Deep garnet, opaque core, purple reflections, subtle brightening on the rim. Ripe plum fruit, fresh cherries, nuances of orange zest, inviting bouquet. Substantial, elegant and fruity, ripe tannins, fresh structure, mineral, some chocolate, lingers long. A fantastic Claret and hard to resist.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，透明中心，紫色反射，酒液边缘微微发亮。酒中充满了成熟的浆果味，如熟桃和新鲜樱桃，伴有橙子皮的微妙香气。酒体丰富、优雅、果香浓郁，口感柔和，矿物质味道清晰，伴有巧克力味，余味悠长。是一款出色的克莱雷特，难以抵抗。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark, nearly opaque purple-black color holds to a purple rim. Aromas are cedary & spicy with coconut & ripe mulberry, opening to black-plum fruit. The palate is vividly spicy from the outset, with a gripping, cedary structure over bitter-licorice & touches of black-cherry & coffee. Fine tannins are quite astringent. Juicy dark-plum fruit re-emerges on the finish before bitter licorice & spices dry out the end of the wine. 04/23 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的紫黑色，几乎透不见光，边缘仍保留着深紫色。酒香中充满了松木和辣椒的味道，伴有椰子和熟黑杏的气息，渐渐展现出黑杏果的风味。口感从一开始就充满了辣椒的味道，松木结构紧紧抓住舌头，伴有苦甘草和黑杏果的味道，最后还有咖啡的余味。酒中的纤维素非常细腻，但也非常苦涩。酒尾重新出现了黑杏果的风味，但苦甘草和辣椒的味道却让酒尾变得干涩。评分：04/23 (ep) DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Larrivaux 在2022年份表现得相当出色，口感丝滑如玉，香气也颇具魅力。其黏土石灰岩的土壤在干热的2022年份中发挥了不可估量的作用。它的酸枣、山楂和覆盆子的香气清晰动人，榛果、丁香和草果的芬芳精致细腻，再加上淡淡的紫罗兰点缀其中…强烈推荐这款老牌佳酿。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau Larrivaux 在2022年表现出色，口感细滑，香气迷人。其黏土石灰岩土壤在干热的2022年中发挥了关键作用。酒中清晰可闻的酸枣、山楂和覆盆子香气，搭配着榛果、丁香和草果的芬芳，淡淡的紫罗兰点缀其中。强烈推荐这款老牌佳酿。

English pairs.original: Chateau Larrivaux 2022 is pretty nice, boasting a palate as smooth as silk and a charming aroma. The clay-limestone soil played an immeasurable role during the arid conditions of 2022. Its vivid and captivating notes of sour dates, hawthorn, and raspberries, along with the refined and delicate scents of hazelnuts, cloves, are beautifully complemented by a hint of violets. I highly endorse this distinguished wine.
English pairs.new: 查泰aux拉里瓦克斯 2022 年红酒非常不错，口感滑顺如丝，芳香迷人。2022 年干旱的条件下，黏土和石灰质土壤发挥了无可估量的作用。它的鲜明而迷人的风味，如酸枣、山楂和莓果，伴随着细致而优雅的风味，如杏仁、丁香，美妙地与一丝紫罗兰的芬芳相得益彰。

Western reviews.review: Verhalten, kühl, mit Kirschen und Cassis in der Nase. Im Gaumen frisch, knackige Frucht, leider etwas gar viel Gerbstoff, muss seine Harmonie noch finden. Ob der Ausbau mehr Balance bringt? (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / CVBG / Château Belgrave) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation: 口感冷静，气味中有樱桃和黑加仑的香气。口感清新，果味清脆，但苦味略过头，需要找到平衡。是否长时间陈酿会带来更好的平衡？（2023年4月初尝试，CVBG/Château Belgrave）

Western reviews.review: Concentrated fruitiness with subdued oak aromatics, with some lovely tension driven by its highly vibrant acidity. Great fruit core in the mid palate, finished with some large sized tannins, a bit warm at the end.
Western reviews.translation: 浓郁的果香与温和的橡木香气相结合，具有高活力的酸度，带来了一种美妙的张力。中口处有着丰富的果肉核心，尾部有着一些较大的纤维，略带温暖的感觉。

Western reviews.review: Le nez est minéral, racé avec une certaine subtilité dans son fruit et dans son grain. On a des notes de framboises écrasées, de cassis écrasés et plus légèrement de minéralité racée associée à une touche de fleur de cerisier, d’épices douces, de muscade fraîche et une fine pointe de bergamote ainsi qu’une imperceptible pointe presque variétale en fond. La bouche est fruitée avec de la jutosité et une trame acidulée avec de la minéralité et une bonne définition. Il y a une certaine tension, de la justesse, de l’harmonie et un joli caractère minéral. On retrouve des notes de mûres juteuses et pulpeuses, de violette et plus légèrement de bleuet associé à des touches de petits fruits bleus éclatants ainsi qu’à des pointes de framboises éclatantes et de fines notes de bergamote, de toast et une pointe de muscade et de grillé. Les tannins sont francs et finement fermes. Il y a une bonne longueur, de la souplesse et de la définition.
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的香气是矿物质的，带有清晰的果味和谷物味。酒中有浓郁的蓝莓和黑加仑的味道，以及轻微的矿物质和樱花味，甜香料，新鲜的肉豆蔻和细微的bergamote味道，以及几乎不可察觉的多样性底调。

口感是果味的，带有果酸和矿物质的味道，口感清晰。酒中有紧张感，准确度，和谐感，以及美丽的矿物质性格。酒中有浓郁的熟透的黑berry和果肉味道，紫罗兰味道，以及轻微的蓝莓味道，伴随着闪亮的小蓝果味道，浓郁的蓝莓味道和细微的bergamote味道，烤面包味道和新鲜的肉豆蔻味道。

酒中的纤维是明确的，细致的。酒有长时间的持久感，柔软感和清晰度。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau La Cabanne 以一曲甜美的欢乐颂开启了2023年份的品鉴旅程，奶油香草和成熟草莓的香气给我们带来了理想的成熟美。而就在我沉浸在甜美感的时候，它又转化为清新的血橙和橙皮芬芳。唯一需要注意的是收尾时的单宁，虽然质地非常细密，但确实有些许的颗粒感。如果陈年之后能够变得更加细腻，肯定会更加出色。
Chinese pairs.new:
Chateau La Cabanne 以一曲甜美的欢乐颂开启了2023年份的品鉴旅程，奶油香草和成熟草莓的香气给我们带来了理想的成熟美。而就在我沉浸在甜美感的时候，它又转化为清新的血橙和橙皮芬芳。唯一需要注意的是收尾时的单宁，虽然质地非常细密，但确实有些许的颗粒感。如果陈年之后能够变得更加细腻，肯定会更加出色。

Translated Review:

Chateau La Cabanne kicks off the 2023 tasting journey with a sweet serenade, offering an ideal ripeness with notes of buttery vanilla and mature strawberries. Just as I'm immersed in the sweetness, it transforms into a refreshing blood orange and orange peel bouquet. The only note worth mentioning is the tannin at the finish, which is silky smooth but does have a slight graininess. With further aging, it will likely become even more refined.

English pairs.original: Chateau La Cabanne 2023 opens the tasting journey with a sweet and joyful ode, offering ideal maturity with aromas of creamy vanilla and ripe strawberries. Just as I immerse myself in its “sweetness”, it transforms into refreshing scents of blood orange and orange peel. The only aspect to note is the tannins on the finish; while they are very fine in texture, there is indeed a slight graininess. If they could become more refined with aging, it would surely elevate the wine even further.
English pairs.new: 夏娃拉卡班 2023 年红酒以甜蜜的欢乐之歌开启了品酒之旅，展现出完美的成熟度，带来奶油香味和熟透的草莓的芳香。正当我沉浸在它的“甜蜜”中时，它转变为血橙和橙皮的清新香气。值得注意的是，酒尾的苦味略有粗糙感，尽管其质地细腻，但仍有一丝颗粒感。如果能在陈化过程中变得更加细腻，那么这款红酒一定会更上一层楼。

Western reviews.review: Im letzten Jahr der Bio-Umstellung; expressiv, mit reifer Himbeere, Cassis und Veilchen im Bouquet; druckvoller, dennoch eleganter Gaumen, knackige Frucht, seidiges Tannin, tänzerisch leicht, mit sehr guter Länge; rotfruchtiges Finale mit salinem Touch. (En Primeur Tasting April 2024)
Western reviews.translation: 去年进行了生物转变；酒香中充满了成熟的莓果、黑加仑和Forget-me-not的气息；口感丰富 yet 优雅，果味清脆，纤维柔顺，轻盈跳动，持久度良好；酒尾带有红果味和微微的盐味。 (2024年4月初酒评)

Western reviews.review: Im letzten Jahr der Bio-Umstellung; expressiv, mit reifer Himb eere, Cassis und Veilchen im Bouquet; druckvoller, dennoch eleganter Gaumen, knackige Frucht, seidiges Tannin, tänzerisch leicht, mit sehr guter Länge; rotfruchtiges Finale mit salinem Touch.
Western reviews.translation: 去年进行了生物转变；表达丰富，带有成熟的黑berries、黑加仑和紫罗兰的香气；口感丰富 yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet
