yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet yet Western reviews.review: The deep, dark purple-red color is very nearly opaque. The aromas have some lift but are of dark fruits with notes of raisin & prune along with black plum fruit. The palate comprises very ripe, polished, black-cherry fruit with hints of raisin & chocolate. Fresh acidity keeps the fruit juicy. Alcohol is well in balance. The fine tannins give hints of ceadary sweet spices that combine with the juicy dark fruit on a long finish. 04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深紫红色，几乎透明。酒中的香气有一些升华，但主要是黑色水果的味道，伴有干枣和李子等味道。口感上，黑樱桃水果非常成熟，带有干枣和巧克力的味道。酒中的酸度清新，保持了水果的新鲜感。酒精的浓度与口感非常匹配。细致的纤维素带有松香甜味的香气，与新鲜的黑色水果在长尾部相结合。评分：04/24 (ep) DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有李子，黑醋栗，葡萄干和无花果的香气，随后有香料和甘草的气息，入口辛辣，中等至浓郁，柔顺的单宁，余味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts aromas of plum, black currant, raisin, and fig, followed by hints of spice and licorice. It's a bold and full-bodied wine with a smooth tannin structure and a long, lingering finish.

Western reviews.review: This wine had already started to shutdown. With effort, some cherry and bitter chocolate flavors could be found. Elegant in style, this medium bodied wine ends with red fruit notes. This will drink well young.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒已经开始进入了“关机”阶段，需要努力才能发现一些樱桃和苦巧克力味道。风格优雅，中等体积的酒尾留有红果味。这种酒适合年轻时饮用。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark, opaque ruby-red color. There is an attractive compote of red-fruits on the nose. Complex, rich red-fruits also show on the palate, which is medium to full-bodied & has a lovely silky tannic structure. Acidity is fresh & alcohol is slightly warming. The tannins show more grip on the mid-palate but the fruit opens up giving a long, luscious finish. 11/12 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，几乎透明的红酒色。酒鼻中有诱人的红果酱香气。口感复杂，丰富的红果味道，酒体中等到中等以上，具有柔滑的纤维结构。酸度新鲜，酒精略微温暖。中口纤维结构更有抓握力，但果味逐渐开启，给人长长的醇厚尾韵。 评分：11/12

Chinese pairs.original: 相比Chateau de Carles，Haut-Carles 2022的果香更清晰，而且石灰岩黏土的风土表达也更为清楚。细密绵柔的单宁在入口后便铺满味蕾，既有力量又不失柔软。该年份的果香十分饱满，摇杯之后散发着乌梅、樱桃的成熟芬芳。考虑到当下的表现，建议在近10年内饮用。
Chinese pairs.new: Compared to Chateau de Carles, Haut-Carles 2022 has a clearer fruit profile and a more distinct limestone clay terroir expression. The fine-grained and velvety tannins spread evenly across the palate after entry, offering both power and softness. The vintage's fruit is rich and full-bodied, releasing mature flavors of black plum and cherry after swirling the glass. Given its current performance, we recommend drinking within the next 10 years.

English pairs.original: Compared to Chateau de Carles, the fruit aromas of Haut-Carles 2022 are clearer and the expression of the limestone-clay terroir is more distinct. The fine and velvety tannins coat the palate with both power and softness. This vintage is rich in fruit aromas, with notes of ripe plum and cherry emanating from the glass. Given its current performance, it is recommended to enjoy this wine within the next decade.
English pairs.new: 相比于Chateau de Carles，Haut-Carles 2022的果香更加清晰，石灰岩-粘土土壤的特征也更加明显。细致的、柔滑的纤维素在口感上呈现出力量和柔和的结合。这个年份的酒精丰富的果香，玻璃中散发着成熟的李子和樱桃的气息。考虑到当前的表现，这个酒推荐在未来十年内享用。

Western reviews.review: Black cherries covered in chocolate, smoke, spice, licorice and flowers form the perfume. The wine is rich, lush and creamy with espresso, dark chocolate, plums and blackberries in the mid-palate and in the vibrant, polished finish. Drink from 2025-2034. 93-94 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中充满了覆盖在巧克力上的黑樱桃、烟雾、香料、甘草和花朵的味道。酒体丰富、丰腴、奶油般的口感，中口和尾部都有浓郁的咖啡、黑巧克力、浆果和黑莓的味道。建议从2025年到2034年饮用。评分93-94分。

Western reviews.review: Le nez est épicé et offre de la concentration. Il exprime les notes de cassis sauvage, de mûre et plus légèrement – de violette associées à de fines touches de balsamique, de petits fruits ecrasés, de poivre et à une discrete pointe de bosquet frais/variétal frais. La bouche est fruitée et offre de la minéralité, de la suavité, de la justesse, ainsi qu’une trame minérale et une fine crémosité . Elle exprime les notes de mûre pulpeuse/juteuse, de violette et plus légèrement – de cassis pulpeux/juteux associées à des touches de cerise, de fleurs de cerisier, ainsi qu’à des pointes de fève de tonka, de variétale noble et à une subtile pointe de muscade et de toastée.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气浓郁，具有强烈的浓缩感。它展现出野生黑currant、黑berry和轻微的紫罗兰的香味，伴随着细微的白蜂蜜、挤压的果实、胡椒和新鲜的果树香味。口感丰富果实，具有矿物质、柔软、平衡以及矿物质纹理和细腻的质感。它展现出浓郁的黑berry、紫罗兰和轻微的黑currant的香味，伴随着樱桃、樱花、以及细微的豆蔻、优质的品种和微妙的胡椒和烤焦的味道。

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby, purple reflections, subtle brightening on the rim. Fine spicy herbal touch, sweet red cherries, some cloves, subtle smoky nuances. Medium body, red berry nuances, discreet tannins, freshly structured, lemony-salty finish, already well developed.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，紫色反射，酒杯边缘微微发亮。细微的辣椒、草药味，甜的红樱桃，少量的丁香，微微的烟熏味。中等体积，红果味，低调的苦味，新鲜的结构，柠檬盐味的尾韵，已经相当成熟。

Chinese pairs.original: Capbern鲜脆多汁的口感真是绝了。能够在2021年份做到如此丰富、成熟的莓果芬芳，我必须给Vincent的整个团队点赞。因为更高的酸感，今年的口感明显更加清爽怡人。伴随着真丝般的单宁划过味蕾，浑身上下都透着温雅之气。
Chinese pairs.new: The wine has a crisp and juicy texture that's truly exceptional. To achieve such richness and maturity in the raspberry aromas in the 2021 vintage, I must give a round of applause to Vincent's entire team. With even higher acidity, the taste is noticeably fresher and more refreshing this year. Silky tannins glide smoothly across the palate, exuding a sense of elegance throughout.

English pairs.original: Fresh, crisp, and juicy, the taste of Capbern is absolutely stunning. I must give kudos to Vincent’s entire team for their excellent work in achieving such rich and ripe berries’ fragrance in 2021. Due to its higher acidity, it presents a significantly more refreshing and pleasant mouthfeel. With the silky tannins caressing the taste buds, the wine emits a gentle and elegant aura.
English pairs.new: 卡普贝尔红酒的口感绝对惊艳，新鲜、清爽、水果味十足。 我必须对文森特的整个团队表示赞赏，他们在2021年做出了如此丰富和成熟的浆果香气的杰出工作。 由於其更高的酸度，使得口感显著更为清新和愉悦。 silky的纹理轻抚味蕾，酒精散发出一种温柔和优雅的气质。

Western reviews.review: Fresh and direct in sensory profile, it shows notes of lavender, hyacinth, plums, wisteria blossom and green mandarin. Medium-full body, well extracted soft tannins and a truly penetrating finish. A blend of 70% Cabernet Sauvignon, 28% Merlot and 2% Petit Verdot. Best since 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感清新直接，展现出百合花、紫罗兰、李子、紫藤花和青柠的香气。口感中等至中厚，软绵的橡皮质感和持久的尾韵。酒中含有70%卡波雷尔葡萄，28%梅洛葡萄和2%小皮诺葡萄。建议在2025年后品尝。

Western reviews.review: Intense garnet, shades of purple and ochre at the rim. Fine red berry nuances, inlaid with cherry fruit and a touch of orange zest. Juicy, elegant, fresh acidity, well-integrated tannins, lively, lemony-mineral finish; a balanced food companion.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色酒液，酒杯边缘有紫色和黄土色的色调。酒中有细腻的红果味，夹杂着樱桃果味和橙子皮的微妙香气。酒口清新、优雅、有活力，酸度适中，纤维度良好，矿物质和柠檬味的尾韵，适合与各类食物搭配。

Western reviews.review: Flowers, spicy red berries and savory underbrush notes open the wine. Medium-bodied, soft, vibrant and crisp, with hints of spice and olives to accompany the red currants in the finish, this will drink well young. The wine is a blend of 70% Cabernet Sauvignon, 28% Merlot, and 2% Petit Verdot, 12.8% ABV. Drink from 2024-2038. 89-91
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的开头是花香、辣椒般的红果和干燥的灌木丛的香气。酒体中等，口感软滑，清新活泼，带有些许香料和橄榄的味道，伴随着红葡萄的余味。这瓶红酒适合年轻时饮用。酒中含有70%卡波内尔葡萄，28%梅洛葡萄和2%佩蒂·维多葡萄，酒精度12.8%。建议从2024年到2038年饮用。评分89-91分。

Western reviews.review: Kiesel und Sandböden, zwischen Phélan-Ségur, Meyney und Tronquoy-Lalande. 28 September Merlot, 13 Oktober die Lese des Cabernets abgeschlossen. 70% Cabernet Sauvignon, 28% Merlot, 2% Petit Verdot. Kräftiges Rubin. Die Nase ist sehr sauber, rotfruchtig, mit dezent floralen Noten und feuchtem Kieselstein. Feiner Gaumen, leicht cremige Textur, frisch und knackig mit wohl dosiertem Gerbstoff, einer feinen Säure, im mittleren Gaumen mit einem kleinen Durchhänger, im Finale jedoch mit sehr guter Länge und Retroaromen, die an Sauerkirschen erinnern. 2025-2037 (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2022. Château Calon Ségur)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论，翻译如下：

地质：来自Phélan-Ségur、Meyney和Tronquoy-Lalande等地区的砂质和花岗岩土壤。

采摘时间：28日采摘梅洛，13日采摘卡波内托。

酒精含量：70%卡波内托，28%梅洛，2%佩蒂·维多。

颜色：深红色。

香气：清新、红果味、花香和湿润的花岗岩石。

口感：细腻、轻微乳霜质感、清新、果味丰富、适量的干酪和酸度，中口有一点延迟，但终口长且留有回味，回味中有酸枣味。

推荐饮用年份：2025-2037年（2022年4月在酒庄现场品尝，Château Calon Ségur）。

Western reviews.review: Medium depth of ruby-red color, with slight purple hues at the rim. The aromas are of rich, meaty red fruit with delicate cedar touches. The palate shows earthy, dark-plum fruit and a core of concentrated licorice. Acidity is very high & the tannins fine, firm & nicely crafted. The alcohol is balanced & length is good. Black-fruit & graphite combine on the finish. 04/22 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深度为中等的红色，边缘有浅紫色光泽。

香气：富有肉味的红果味，带有细微的松木香。

口感：土味浓郁的黑浆果味，中间有浓缩的甘草味。酸度极高，纤维素细致、坚实、精心打造。酒精平衡，持久性良好。口感结束时，黑果味和石墨味相互融合。

评分：04/22 DCAMW

Chinese pairs.original: Les Grandes Murailles 2021的香气非常柔和，悄无声息地散发着酸枣和蓝莓甚是些许橙皮的奇特清香。虽然今年的口感比较轻盈，但内容和细节一个都不少，你能够在咸鲜的矿物感周围找到粉底液般的丝滑单宁，还能够在多汁的口感中找到一缕隐形的结构感。是2021年份优雅型圣爱美隆的代表作。
Chinese pairs.new: The Les Grandes Murailles 2021 has a remarkably soft and subtle aroma, with hints of persimmon, blueberry and a touch of orange peel. Although this year's palate is relatively light, it's packed with complexity and detail. You can find a silky smooth tannin texture wrapped around a salty mineral core, and a subtle structural element hiding within the juicy texture. This is a quintessential elegant Saint-Émilion from the 2021 vintage.

English pairs.original: Les Grandes Murailles 2021 presents some very soft aromas, quietly sending forth the unique fragrances of wild jujube, blueberry, and even orange peel. Though the texture of this vintage is quite light, the contents and detail are all there. In this wine, you can taste the liquid foundation-like velvet tannins surrounded by the salty notes. And there’s an invisible structure hidden behind the juicy palate. It must be a representative of the elegant Saint-Emilion in 2021.
English pairs.new: 《大墙红酒》2021年呈现出非常柔和的香气，静静地释放出野生枸杞、蓝莓和橙皮的独特香味。尽管这瓶红酒的质感非常轻薄，但内容和细节都在其中。 在这瓶红酒中，你可以品尝到液体般的绵软的橡胶质感和周围的咸味。 背后还隐隐约约地存在着一个丰富的结构。 这一定是2021年圣埃米利昂的典型代表。

Western reviews.review: Genuine and pure in character, it displays a pleasant sensory profile reminiscent of flowers and dark small berries. Nuances of laurel and flint animate the secondary scene with its slightly dark profile. Medium body, gentle tannins on the palate that create a good shape to the sip and a graceful finish with a delicate character. Better since 2024.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的性格是真实而纯粹的，展现出一种令人愉悦的感官特征，类似于花朵和黑小莓的香气。 laurel 和 flint 的细微差别在后场呈现出一种略带暗色的特征。 中等体积，口感上的轻柔的苦味使得每口都有一个良好的形状，并且带有细致的尾韵。 2024 年之后会更好。

Western reviews.review: Dark garnet, opaque core brightens to purple at the narrow rim. Subtle noble wood spices, red cherries, tobacco savouriness. Juicy, cherry, silky texture, fine tannins, a little loosely knit, delicate freshness on the finish, leafy aftertaste.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，透明中心在窄边缘变为紫色。细微的贵族木香，红樱桃，烟草味。 juicy，樱桃，丝滑的口感，细致的苦味，略微松散的结构，尾部有轻微的清新感，叶子后味。

Western reviews.review: Flowers, black cherries, wet earth, thyme and espresso on the nose. The wine is medium-bodied, soft, silky, refined, sweet and fresh, with loads of silky red fruits on the palate and in the finish. Drink from 2023-2037. The wine is produced from 100% Merlot, 13.5% ABV. Drink from 2023-2037. 91-93
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中有花朵、黑樱桃、湿土、迷迭香和浓缩咖啡的味道。酒体中等，口感软滑细腻，甜润清新，口感中充满细滑的红果味。酒尾持久。建议2023-2037年饮用。酒精度13.5%。评分91-93分。

Western reviews.review: Leuchtendes Rubin. Kräftige Nase mit floralen Tönen, etwas Rauch, dunkel in der Aromatik, kühl im Charakter. Der Gaumen ist gradlinig, gut strukturiert, die Frucht wirkt knackig, auf den Punkt gereift, die Säure und ein feinmaschiges Tanninkorsett halten die Frucht in Schach. Im Abgang mit knackiger, roter Frucht, etwas Tee und mit sehr guter Länge, endet salin. 2026-2044+ (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2022. AGCCSE/Château Dassault/Dourthe)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一瓶美丽的红酒：

酒色深红润，酒香浓郁，带有花朵的芬芳，略带烟熏味，酒体深沉，气质清凉。

口感平衡，结构良好，果味清脆，酒精度合适，酸度和细致的橡皮纹理紧紧围绕着果味，保持着果味的活力。

尾部果味清脆，带有茶叶味，酒尾长达数年，最后留下一丝盐味。

推荐饮用年份：2026-2044年。

Chinese pairs.original: 成熟浓郁的黑加仑黑莓与精致的桂皮丁香相互交织，自上到下毫无缝隙感。入口纯熟而圆润，能够在丰满的酒体中感受到一股神秘的力量。我很喜欢收尾时粉末状的单宁质地，使得回甘最大限度地体现了波亚克的独特气质。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich, full-bodied blackcurrant and subtle cinnamon notes intertwine seamlessly from top to bottom. The palate is refined and velvety, with a mysterious depth that unfolds in the full-bodied wine. I particularly appreciate the powdery tannins that emerge at the finish, showcasing the unique character of Poyac.

English pairs.original: Intense flavors of ripe blackcurrant and blackberry intertwine with delicate aroma of cinnamon and clove, leaving no gap for other flavors. It tastes round and full. One can feel mysterious power in the opulent body of it. I am extremely fond of the powder-like character of tannins on the finish, which allows the length shows the unique quality of Pauillac to the utmost.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的味道强烈，黑currant和黑berry的成熟风味交织在一起，配上细微的丁香和肉豆蔻香气，其他风味都被完全掩盖。口感圆润饱满，令人感到神秘的力量在其中。最让我喜欢的是尾部的粉末状苦味，展现了波尔多地区的独特品质。

Western reviews.review: 2019 is a powerful, concentrated, tannic, backward, crisp, chewy, almost austere, classic Pauillac. Once past the tannic backdrop, you find a big, juicy blast of peppery, tobacco-stained cassis and blackberries. Long, structured and firm, with a savory edge to the spicy, earthy, red currant and cranberry finish, it is going to need cellaring before being fun to taste . The special label trumpets the Casteja family owning the property for 100 years. Drink from 2028-2050. 93 Points
Western reviews.translation: 2019年是一款强烈、浓郁、坚实、保留、清晰、嚼劲十足、几乎严谨的克莱蒙特-帕乌拉克。 一旦穿过坚实的后台，你会发现一大口浓郁的辣椒、烟草色浆果和黑莓的爆发。 结构长、坚实、坚硬，带有咸味的边缘，具有香料、土壤、红葡萄和蔓越莓的味道，完美的口感。 这是一款需要陈年才能让人享受的红酒。 特别的标签宣传着卡斯塔雅家族拥有该产区100年的历史。建议在2028-2050年饮用。 评分93分。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, breitere Randaufhellung. Floral unterlegte Cassisnuancen, reife schwarze Herzkirschen, ein Hauch von Nougat, feine Edelholznuancen. Saftig, süße Brombeerfrucht, reife Tannine, etwas Nougat, mineralisch und gut anhaftend, ein saftiger Speisenbegleiter mit gutem Entwicklungspotenzial.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，边缘有明显的光泽。酒中有花香的黑加香果味，熟黑杏仁味，微微的牛奶糖味，细微的贵木味。口感丰富，甜的草莓味，熟的果皮味，微微的牛奶糖味，矿物质味和持久的口感，适合与各种食物搭配的葡萄酒，具有很好的发展潜力。

Western reviews.review: (73% Cabernet Sauvignon, 27% Merlot): Reiffruchtige Nase, Minze, Kräuter, Pflaumen. Im Gaumen relativ harmlos, bereits gut zugänglich, die Tannine sind etwas flockig, der Wein hat wenig Finesse. Im Abgang ausgewogen und mit Frische. 2025-2040.
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的成分是73%卡波涅尔（Cabernet Sauvignon）和27%梅洛（Merlot）。 

酒味清新果香，带有薄荷和草药的味道，伴有浓郁的石榴味。口感平和，容易入口，口感略微粗糙，酒中没有太多的细腻感。尾部平衡，带有清新感。推荐饮用时间：2025-2040年。

Western reviews.review: Jubiläumscuvée zum 100-jährigen Bestehen des Handelshauses: Interessante, komplexe, fruchtig-blumig-würzige Aromatik, Muster mit viel neuer Eiche; wuchtiger Ansatz, mächtiger Bau, viel Saft und Extrakt; beeindruckender Wein mit Substanz; schade für den hohen Anteil an neuem Holz im Muster.
Western reviews.translation: 庆祝100周年纪念酒：有趣、复杂、果香花香香料的香气，带有大量新橡木的风格；厚重的开头，强壮的结构，丰富的汁液和提取物；令人印象深刻的酒，具有实质；遗憾的是，风格中新橡木的比例太高。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark, almost opaque ruby red. Lovely fresh cassis aromas. The palate displays vivid, vibrant cassis fruit & delicate cedar hints. The structure is mid-weight, lean & the finish a touch leafy. Alcohol is balanced & good acidity leaves the palate enduring & mouth-watering. 6/20 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的红酒色，几乎透不见光。酒中充满新鲜的黑加仑果香。口感丰富，果香浓郁，带有细微的松木味。酒体中等，结构紧致，尾部略带干草味。酒精平衡，口感清新，酸度适宜，留下持久的口感。评分：6/20

Chinese pairs.original: 黑莓，甘草和淡淡的烘烤橡木的香气。酒体饱满，单宁集中，带有黑莓和黑醋栗味，回味持久伴有香草和香料的气息。
Chinese pairs.new: Blackberry, licorice, and subtle oak notes on the nose. Full-bodied with concentrated tannins, featuring blackberry and black walnut flavors, and a long finish with hints of licorice and spice.

Western reviews.review: (2007) Solid, vinous, with nice purity of fruit. A certain earthiness and warmth. The palate has a broad stripe of drying tannins, but there is a nice purity of black fruit that continues, and really the balance here is extremely good. A very good Coufran.
Western reviews.translation: 2007年：这瓶红酒的质地坚实，具有浓郁的酒香，果味清晰。有着一定的泥土味和温暖感。口感上有着一道干净的干酪感，但黑果味依然清晰流畅，整体平衡非常好。非常出色的科夫兰红酒。

Western reviews.review: Tiefdunkles Rubingranat, schwarzer Kern, violette Reflexe, in der Nase zarte Dörrzwetschken, zart blättrig unterlegt, rotbeerige Nuancen. Am Gaumen lebendig, straffe Tannine, noch etwas kantig, ein lebendiger Wein mit Kirschenfinish, gutes Entwicklungspotenzial.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，黑色核桃色，紫色反光，酒鼻中有淡淡的干枯浆果味，带有轻微的叶子味和红色啤酒般的调味。口感活泼，紧致的橡皮质感，尚有略微的粗糙感，酒尾有活力，带有浆果味，具有很好的发展潜力。

Western reviews.review: 91-93 Barrel sample. If you're looking for great, ripe black currant fruits, this is where to come. The wine is full and hugely fruity, but it still manages a good Bordeaux sense of proportion.
Western reviews.translation: 酒评：91-93 分。 如果你在寻找成熟的黑加仑果实，那么这个红酒就是你的最佳选择。 这个酒体积大，果味丰富，但仍然保持着良好的波尔多风格的比例。

Western reviews.review: Medium ruby red color, is quite deeply pigmented. The nose is classically Medoc red, with leafy cassis & toasty/graphite oak. The palate is lean with dark fruit, which is supple & open without being too concentrated. There is good acidity, balanced alcohol & a delicate finish that fades quite quickly. 11/09 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深红色，浓郁度较高。

香气：典型的梅多克红酒风格，带有叶绿的黑樱子和焦糖/石墨的橡木味。

口感：口感清爽，黑果味浓郁，但不至于过于浓稠。酒中有适当的酸度，酒精平衡，尾部轻盈，快速消失。评分：11/09 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 这支伟大年份的骑士白展示了漂亮的金黄色以及令人兴奋的奔放香气，轻嗅酒透出椰子糖、 蜂王浆、太妃糖、泰国香料、梨、新鲜草药、菠萝干、咸矿物质、黄油硬糖、烟草盒子、冰糖炖雪蛤、不熟的青梅和少许的香草及栗子痕迹。口中的严峻感十分明显，而这种效果则被使得口腔发干的矿物质和惊人的尖锐酸度所放大，同时矿物质和酸度在其超长、充满木头味但却相当清澈的余味中长时间徘徊，留下了一抹复杂的苦杏仁、柠檬水果和咸矿物质的韵味。此酒需要时间来发展出更浓厚的质感。和Dagueneau一样，旗舰款相比入门级酒款需要更长的窖藏来展现其真正的魅力。
Chinese pairs.new: 这支伟大年份的骑士白酒展现出金黄色的外观和令人兴奋的香气。酒的味道中包含椰子糖、蜂王浆、太妃糖、泰国香料、梨、新鲜草药、菠萝干、咸矿物质、黄油硬糖、烟草盒子、冰糖炖雪蛤、不熟的青梅和少许的香草及栗子痕迹。酒口中有明显的严峻感，矿物质和酸度使得口腔发干，并在酒的余味中徘徊，留下苦杏仁、柠檬水果和咸矿物质的味道。这个酒需要时间来发展出更浓厚的质感，旗舰款需要更长的窖藏才能展现其真正的魅力。

English pairs.original: This great vintage Chevalier revealed a stylish gold color and breathtakingly expressive bouquets of coconut candy, royal jelly, toffee, Thailand spices, pear, fresh herb, dried pineapple, savoury-mineral, butterscotch, tobacco box, double boiled snow clam with rock candy, unripe green plum with a tint of vanilla and chestnut. The astringency was evident on the palate, which was enhanced by the mouth-drying minerality and fabulously keen acid that lingered on its super-long, woody but still rather limpid length with layered flavours of bitter almond, lemony fruit and savoury-minerals. Somewhat lacking the volume meant this wine required time to develop more texture. Same to Dagueneau, the flagship wine needs much longer cellaring than the second label/entry-level wine.
English pairs.new: 这瓶精美的红酒呈现出金色光泽，令人惊艳的香气，带有椰果糖、皇家蜂蜜、棕糖、泰国香料、梨子、新鲜香草、干 pineapple、矿物质、奶油糖、烟草盒、双煮海鲜、未成熟绿柿子和一丝香草和栗子味。口感干涩，口感干燥，矿物质和酸度使其变得更加出色，酒尾长达数秒，留下了苦杏仁、柠檬果和矿物质的复杂味道。由于体积不足，这瓶酒需要时间来发展更多的质感。同样，Dagueneau的旗舰酒需要比第二标签/入门级酒更长的陈年时间。

Western reviews.review: Light in color, the wine is bright, fresh, zippy and crisp. The yellow citrus, with its honeysuckle accent carries through the mineralistic leaning found here. You can enjoy this now, or age for at least 20 more years, if you have the patience. 93 Points
Western reviews.translation: 颜色浅红，酒精清晰、新鲜、活泼、清脆。酒中充满了黄柠檬和honeysuckle的香气， Mineral质的味道也很明显。您可以现在就享受它，也可以耐心等待至少20年再品尝。评分93分。

Western reviews.review: Helles Grüngelb, zarte Grapefruitnote, etwas Steinobst, Nuancen von Blütenhonig, mineralische Aspekte. Mittlerer Körper, rassig strukturiert, gelbe Tropenfruchtanklänge, dezente Fruchtsüße nach reifer Birne im Abgang, wirkt bereits harmonisch, zart nach Ananas im Rückgeschmack.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一杯美味的白葡萄酒！以下是翻译：

清澈的黄绿色，带有轻微的柑橘味，略带石果味，花蜜的微妙香气，矿物质的特点。酒体中等，结构清晰，黄色热带果味，酒尾有成熟苹果的轻微甜度，整体感觉已经很和谐，回味中有淡淡的菠萝味。

注意：我在翻译中保留了原文的风格和结构，以便中国消费者更好地理解和欣赏这杯葡萄酒。

Western reviews.review: Very classy in style, with fresh lemon, grapefruit, stone, vanilla, white peach and floral notes. Soft, polished, bright, fresh and clean, the mineral driven, crisp, sweet, citrus finish really carries through. The wine was made from a blend 85% Sauvignon Blanc and 15% Semillon. 95 Points
Western reviews.translation: 风格优雅典雅，带有新鲜柠檬、葡萄柚、石子、香草、白桃和花朵的香气。酒体柔和光滑，清新明亮，清爽干净，矿物质驱动的、清脆甜美的柑橘味尾韵非常持久。该酒由85%萨伯纳白葡萄和15%塞缪隆葡萄组成。评分95分。

Western reviews.review: The wine is a clear pale green/yellow colour. Aromas are restrained mineral fruit & salty oak touches. The palate has powerful fruit & plenty of new oak. The wine is medium bodied but has the potential to flesh out further. Initially the oak appeared a little salty, but resolved itself with fresh tropical fruit on a wonderful long finish. Acid is balanced and alcohol is balanced to warm. 4/12 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒呈现出清澈的淡绿色/黄色。酒中气味较为谨慎，带有矿物质、水果和咸橡木的香气。口感上，酒体富有水果味并伴有新橡木的味道。酒体中等，但有潜力进一步丰满。初期橡木味有些咸，但随着时间的推移，酒中出现了新鲜的热带水果味，酒尾长而美妙。酸度和酒精均衡，酒的口感温暖舒适。评分：4/12 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Lynch-Moussas 2022是一款活力满满的Pauillac，口感软糯细密，我认为这是它历史上品质最好的年份之一。橡木桶的烘焙香气比以往更为平和，紫罗兰芬芳轻轻点缀其中，平添了几分优雅之气。单宁细腻如丝，回味时还带着粉末般的质地。尾韵里的甘草、石墨、八角辛香巧妙地增加了复杂度，彰显了老牌Pauillac的底蕴。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau Lynch-Moussas 2022是一款充满活力的Pauillac，口感细腻柔和，细致入微。历史上，这可能是它品质最好的年份之一。橡木桶的烘焙香气比以往更为平和，轻轻地融入了紫罗兰芬芳，增添了优雅的气质。单宁细腻如丝，回味时带着轻微的粉末感。尾韵里，甘草、石墨和八角辛香巧妙地增加了复杂度，展现了老牌Pauillac的深厚底蕴。

English pairs.original: Chateau Lynch-Moussas 2022 is a vibrant Pauillac, with a soft and creamy texture that I believe makes it one of the best vintages in its history. The toasty aromas of oak barrels are more subdued than before, delicately adorned with violet scents and a touch of elegance. The tannins are as silky as threads, with a powdery texture on the aftertaste. The hints of licorice, graphite, and star anise on the finish cleverly enhance its complexity, highlighting the depth of this venerable Pauillac winery.
English pairs.new: 查泰aux 勒尚-穆萨斯 2022是一款充满活力的波尔多红酒，具有柔软的奶油质感，我认为这是该酒庄历史上最好的产季之一。陈酿桶的烘烤香气比以往更为低调，轻轻地伴有紫罗兰香气和一丝典雅。后味的纤维质感如丝般细腻，粉末质感如丝般细腻。酒尾的 licorice、石墨和星安息香的余味巧妙地增强了其复杂性，突出了这家老牌波尔多酒庄的深度。

Western reviews.review: The nose shows its tobacco leaf, cedar, lead pencil and currant side with a single swirl. On the palate, the wine is soft, polished, and fresh, with black raspberries, currants, licorice ,and most importantly, sweetness, and lift to the red berries as well as a nice licorice accent on the back of the finish. Give it a few years in the cellar before pulling a cork, and it will be even better. The wine blends 74% Cabernet Sauvignon with 26% Merlot. 14% ABV. 3.7 pH. The harvest took place September 8 - September 27. Drink from 2026-2050. 92-94 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的鼻子中带有烟草叶、红木、铅笔和黑currant的味道。口感上，酒精软滑，富有光泽，新鲜，带有黑莓、黑currant、甘草和最重要的是甜度，以及红果的升华，以及甘草的尾韵。建议将酒放入酒窖几年后再取出，酒会更加出色。酒中混合了74%卡波雷尔葡萄酒和26%美洛葡萄酒。酒精度14%，pH值3.7。收获时间为9月8日至9月27日。建议饮用时间为2026-2050年。评分92-94分。

Western reviews.review: Reiffruchtig, mit eingelegten Kirschen, Pflaumen, Weihnachtsgewürzen und Schwarzbrot. Im Gaumen mild, weich, wirkt bereits gut zugänglich, die Tannine sind wohl dosiert, ein Hauch grüne Paprika im Finale verleiht dem Wein einen anregenden Charakter. Gute Länge, durchaus mit Finesse. Ein gelungener Lynch-Moussas. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / UGCB / Château Lynch-Bages) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的味道是红果味，带有腌制的樱桃、浆果和圣诞树的香气，类似于黑面包。口感柔和，细腻，容易入口，苦味适量，最后有微微的青椒味，给人一种活跃的感觉。酒体长久，细致。是一瓶成功的林奇-莫萨。 (评分时间：2023年4月，UGCB，Château Lynch-Bages)

Western reviews.review: Limited fruitiness on the nose but some red fruits well presented in the mid palate. The wine however is more driven by its salinity on the palate. Quite a classic approach. Soft and gentle in the mid palate, with savoury ending.
Western reviews.translation: 酒 nose 上有极少的果味，但在中口中有红果的表现。然而，酒的味道更多地受到盐度的影响。风格非常经典。中口软和温和，带有咸味的尾韵。

Western reviews.review: Le nez est épicé, poivré et offre un petit côté variétal. Un fin côté serré. On y retrouve des notes de mûre fraiche/pulpeuse, de cassis pulpeux et plus légèrement de poivre associées à des touches de lys frais et d’épices. La bouche est fraiche, grasse, ronde, fruitée, minérale et offre une attaque ronde, de l’équilibre, un joli gras en fraicheur, de l’onctuosité ainsi qu’un côté discrètement sur la retenue. En bouche ce vin exprime des notes de mûre fraiche/pulpeuse, de framboise fraiche/pulpeuse et plus légèrement de chocolat associées à des touches de vanille, de toasté et à une subtile pointe de café.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中带有辣椒、胡椒的味道，伴有轻微的花果香气。口感细腻，富有层次。口中可感受到新鲜黑berries、黑currant的味道，伴有轻微的胡椒和鲜花香气。口感清新、丰富、圆润，带有矿物质味道，口感平衡，富有细腻感，且有适度的持久感。在口中，酒体展现出新鲜黑berries、新鲜framboise的味道，伴有轻微的巧克力味道，以及香气中的vanille、toast和微妙的咖啡味道。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby, opaque core, purple reflections, subtle brightening on the rim. Hints of nougat and fig, black berryish fruit, ripe plums, orange zest underlying. Good complexity and freshness, elegant, fine fruitiness, integrated tannins, shows length and certain ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，透明核心，紫色反射，杯口微微发亮。有杏仁和枣子的甜味，黑莓类的果味，熟透的李子，橙子皮的底调。酒体复杂，新鲜，优雅，细腻的果味，纤维化的橡皮，展现出长度和一定的陈化潜力。

Chinese pairs.original: 清透而纯净，柔滑而多汁，涓细中透着甜美。圆润的质感包裹着丝绒般的单宁，让温热的酒精也收敛了许多。非常平衡而细腻一款波美侯，期待装瓶后的表现。
Chinese pairs.new: "Crystal clear and pure, with a smooth and juicy texture, and a hint of sweetness. The rounded tannins envelop the palate like silk, and the warm alcohol is well-integrated. A beautifully balanced and refined Banyuls, with great potential for aging."

English pairs.original: Precise and absolute, gentle and juicy, refined and graceful. The velvet tannins are embraced with plump texture; this delicateness makes the warming alcohol feel more restrained. I like so much this balanced classy Pomerol. Curious to taste it after bottling.
English pairs.new: 精确而绝对，温和而浓郁，精致而优雅。细腻的橡木味被丰富的口感所包围，这种细致的感觉使得温暖的酒精感更加克制。非常喜欢这种平衡优雅的波美罗。期待在瓶装后品尝它。

Western reviews.review: Another 2020 gem that has vastly improved during its barrel aging, the wine already expresses its flowers, licorice, cocoa, plums and espresso nose. On the palate, the wine is silky, plush, elegant and fresh, with layers of supple, creamy fruits with an exotic touch of citrus that comes in at the back of the finish. Drink from 2024-2045.
Western reviews.translation: 2020年的一款红酒精品，经过木桶陈化后，酒味更加丰富。酒中展现出花朵、 licorice、巧克力、浆果和浓缩咖啡的香气。口感滑顺、丰富、优雅、清新，酒中富含柔软、丰富的水果味，尾部带有柑橘的异国风味。建议从2024年到2045年饮用。

Western reviews.review: ''Fatty'' and rich in the primary matrix showing notes of black prunes, blackberries, liquorice, sour cherries, white chocolate, vanilla and chopped almonds. Full bodied, extremely elegant in the tasting showing noble tannins, precision of persistency and progression. Better from 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感丰富，富有层次感，初次接触的味道中有黑枣、黑莓、 licorice、酸橘子、白巧克力、香草和碎杏仁的风味。口感丰富，品酒时极其优雅，展现出高贵的苦味、持久的精确度和进展。建议从2025年开始品尝。

Chinese pairs.original: 好鲜甜、好惬意的一款圣爱美隆，我能够清晰地感受到它的“自然之气”。在它清甜爽朗的口感中，似乎隐藏着一座石灰岩山洞，而当你剥开樱桃汁水帘之后，看到的又是一片素白的神秘洞穴。粉笔灰质地的单宁颇具辨识度，坡下沙土土壤的芬芳感也非常清晰，它先是提升了理想的结构，然后又在尾韵里像乳酪般融化，颇有看点。
Chinese pairs.new: A delightful and refreshing Saint-Émilion, I can distinctly sense its "natural charm." Amidst its crisp and clean taste, it's as if a limestone cave lies hidden, and when you peel back the cherry juice veil, you're met with a serene, white cave. The powdery, grey tannins are unmistakable, and the subtle aroma of sandy soil is equally clear. It elevates the wine's structure perfectly, then melts like cheese in the finish, making it a standout.

English pairs.original: This delightful Saint-Emilion is refreshingly juicy and comforting, and I can clearly sense its “essence of nature.” Its crisp and sweet palate seems to conceal a limestone cavern, and when you peel back the curtain of cherry juice, you discover a pristine, mysterious cave. The chalky texture of the tannins is quite distinctive, and the aromatic sense from the sandy soil on the slopes is obvious. It first enhances the ideal structure and then melts like cheese in the finish, making it quite intriguing.
English pairs.new: 这款圣埃米利翁红酒令人愉悦，清新果香，充满温暖感。它的清爽甜润口感，似乎隐藏着一处石灰岩洞穴。掀开樱桃汁的帷幕，发现一处清澈神秘的洞穴。其矿物质质感独特，来自山坡沙土的芳香也非常明显。它首先完美地构建了结构，然后在尾部融化得像奶酪一样，令人深感好奇。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark, virtually opaque ruby-red color. The juicy dark-fruit aromas are of black-plum. The palate has good acidity & fine gripping tannins, the combination is mouth-watering. High-ripeness black-plum & black-cherry fruit have raisined hints. The mid-palate shows notes of cedary spices. The alcohol is balanced. The wine's acidity ensures the juicy black-fruit on the finish lasts well.  04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的红酒色，几乎透不见光的深红色。酒中浓郁的黑果香气，类似黑杏。口感酸度良好，细致的纤维性苦味，组合起来令人垂涎欲滴。成熟度极高的黑杏和黑樱桃果味带有干燥的味道。中口部有松木香的味道。酒精平衡。酒的酸度保证了黑果味在尾部持续良好。  04/24 (ep) DCAMW.

Chinese pairs.original: 出乎意料，这款品质出众的Branaire-Ducru展现出更多的清新花香和香料味，而不是酒庄标志性的蓝色水果芬芳。颇为粉末状但异常滑爽的单宁为口感增添了坚实及质地；这是支富有层次而且活力十足的美酒，适合在接下来的15到20年内享用。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine exceeded expectations, showcasing a more floral and aromatic profile, rather than the estate's signature blue fruit notes. Powdery but silky tannins add structure and texture to the palate, making for a rich and lively wine that will drink well over the next 15 to 20 years.

English pairs.original: Unexpectedly, the smell of this remarkable Branaire-Ducru showed more refreshing flowers and spices than hallmark blue fruits. The tannins in mouth were pretty powdery but utterly polished, adding the firmness and texture; it's a wine of layer and vitality, which could be beautifully consumed over the next 15-20 years.
English pairs.new: 令人惊讶的是，这瓶出色的布拉内-杜克鲁（Branaire-Ducru）红酒，闻起来更是带有清新花香和香料，而不是标志性的蓝色水果。口感中，粉末般的苦味很是细腻，给了酒精质地和质感，展现出层次感和生机勃勃的风格，这瓶酒可以在接下来的15-20年内美味享用。

Western reviews.review: The 2009 Branaire-Ducru is another killer wine from this vintage that’s drinking spectacularly well at age 10. Based on 70% Cabernet Sauvignon, 22% Merlot, and the rest Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot, it’s still ruby/purple color is followed by a huge nose of blackcurrants, tobacco leaf, cedar box, and even a hint of forest floor. Full-bodied, broad, expansive, and layered on the palate, it builds nicely with time in the glass, has sweet tannins, no hard edges, and a blockbuster finish. This incredible wine can be enjoyed any time over the coming 2-3 decades or more. Bravo!
Western reviews.translation: 2009 年布拉内-杜克鲁（Branaire-Ducru）是这个年份的又一款杀手级红酒，10 岁的年龄下它仍然表现出极高的品质。根据70%的卡波弗（Cabernet Sauvignon）、22%的梅洛（Merlot）以及其余的卡波弗（Cabernet Franc）和佩蒂·维多（Petit Verdot）组成，它仍然保持着深红色的颜色，酒鼻中充满了黑加仑（blackcurrants）、烟草叶（tobacco leaf）、雪松盒（cedar box）和森林地板（forest floor）的香气。口感丰富、广阔、层次分明，随着时间的推移在口中逐渐展开，具有甜润的牙齿感，无硬边缘，结尾强劲。这种令人惊叹的酒可以在未来2-3十年甚至更长时间内随意享用。 Bravo!

Western reviews.review: Very supple wine, with great richness and density. It is all so complete, a pleasure, powerful yet also with sweet opulent fruits layered with dark tannins. For long-term aging.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒非常柔滑，富有丰富的厚度。它完美无缺，令人愉悦，既有强大的力量，又有甜美丰富的果味，层次丰富的黑色苦味。适合长期陈酿。

Western reviews.review:
The 2009 Branaire-Ducru has a medium to deep garnet color and reveals compelling notions of warm cassis, licorice, baked plums and hoisin with hints of sautéed herbs and pencil lead. Youthful and medium to full-bodied, it has a generous core of black fruits with a firm and grainy structure and bags of freshness, finishing long with great purity.

Rating: 94+
Western reviews.translation:
2009 年布拉内-杜克鲁（Branaire-Ducru）红酒呈现出中深的红色。酒中充满了诱人的黑加仑、香料、熟熟的浆果和酱油味，伴有烹饪香草和铅笔的微妙气息。酒体年轻，中等至全等体积，具有丰富的黑果味，坚实的颗粒结构和充满活力的口感，酒尾长长，纯粹度极高。

评分：94+

Western reviews.review: Lots of black fruits with some bitter chocolate character give this plenty of appeal. However, it’s a seriously tannic wine that still needs time to fully resolve. Drink now with hearty food or hold. Wait until 2022.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感丰富，黑果味浓郁，伴有少量苦巧克力味道，非常吸引人。但是，这款酒的苦味非常强烈，需要时间来完全平衡。建议现在就喝与厚重食物配对，或者等待2022年再喝。

Western reviews.review: A ripe, chewy, muscular style, with good cut despite the hefty tar, blackberry, roasted fig and singed apple wood notes. The long, anise-stained finish lets the tarry edge play out, though this shows a touch more finesse than some of its colleagues. Best from 2015 through 2025. 12,000 cases made.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的风格是成熟的、嚼劲十足的、肌肉丰满的，尽管有厚重的焦油、黑莓、烤枣和焦烧苹果木的味道，但仍然有很好的切口。长长的、有荳蔻味的尾部让焦油的味道逐渐消失，尽管这瓶酒比同类的有些更为细腻。建议从2015年到2025年饮用。生产了12,000瓶。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Carbonnieux 2020 是一款柔和细腻，丰富多彩的白葡萄酒。山楂花的香气缠绕在熟透的白桃和黄杏周围，热情洋溢而又不失优雅。一股特别的矿物感平添了几分凛冽感，让油润的酒体挺拔起来。假如收尾时能有更多的味觉变化，将会更加出色。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau Carbonnieux 2020 is a smooth and refined white wine, rich and full of character. The scent of quince flowers wraps around ripe white peaches and yellow apricots, exuding warmth and elegance. A unique mineral note adds a crisp touch, lifting the full-bodied wine to new heights. If only the finish had more flavor complexity, it would be truly exceptional.

English pairs.original: Chateau Carbonnieux 2020 is a soft, delicate, and colorful white wine. The aromas of hawthorn blossoms wrap around the ripe notes of white peaches and yellow apricot, which is exuberant yet elegant. A special whiff of mineral notes adds a bit of coolness to the wine, making the oily body more slender and graceful. If there are more changes in terms of flavor on the finish, this wine will be more outstanding.
English pairs.new: 卡博尼厄酒庄2020年白酒是一款柔和、细致、色彩丰富的白酒。花樱的花香包围着成熟的白桃和黄杏的香气，生动而优雅。矿物质的特殊香气给酒带来了一丝清凉，使得油腻的身体更加纤细优雅。如果在口感上有更多的变化，这款酒将会更加出色。

Western reviews.review: Blackcurrants, raspberries, crushed stone, bark, and dark mushroom. Licorice, too. Full-bodied with chewy tannins that are minerally and intense. Tangy undertone with plenty going on. Very structured. Solid wine from this estate.
Western reviews.translation: 黑加仑浆果、红莓、碎石、树皮和黑蘑菇。还有 licorice。口感丰富，具有矿物质和强烈的嚼劲。带有清新果味的底调，内容丰富。结构紧密。来自这家酒庄的酒品佳。

Western reviews.review: From a region that excelled in 2020, the 2020 Château Carbonnieux sports a deep purple hue to go with a killer bouquet of ripe blackcurrants, leafy tobacco, scorched earth, and graphite. It's rich, concentrated, and medium to full-bodied on the palate, with a beautiful mid-palate as well as building, ripe tannins. This stunning effort warrants 3-4 years of bottle age and will evolve for 10-15 years in cold cellars.
Western reviews.translation: 来自2020年表现出色的地区，2020年卡博尼厄酒庄呈现出深紫色的颜色，配以浓郁的黑加仑、叶绿烟草、焦土和石墨的芳香。口感丰富浓郁，中等到中等以上的体积，中口美丽，且有逐渐成熟的坚果味。这种出色的作品需要3-4年的瓶龄，冷藏10-15年后会继续演变。

Western reviews.review:
The Perrin family's wine has a structured character with tannins and crisp black currant fruits offering juicy, bright acidity as well as some fine potential. The wine's richness will develop well.
Barrel Sample: 93-95
Western reviews.translation:
佩林家族的红酒具有结构化的特点，具有坚实的橡皮质和清脆的黑加仑果味，提供了丰富的、清晰的酸度，以及一些优质的潜力。酒的丰富性会随着时间的推移而发展。

酒样评分：93-95分

Western reviews.review: This delivers a lovely streamlined, mineral-edged palate full of blackcurrant, plum and black cherry fruit. It’s quite potent in that you get heat on the mid-palate, suggesting high alcohol which detracts a little form the overall enjoyment and makes this a little severe. But there is nice freshness and summery red berry fruits and herbal accents underneath so give this time.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒呈现出一种流畅的口感，矿物质的味道和黑currant、黑桃和黑樱桃的果味充满其中。它的酒精含量较高，会在口中产生热感，这使得口感变得稍微严厉。但是，酒中仍然有清新的味道和夏季红果和草本香味的底调，值得耐心等待。

Western reviews.review: Solidly built, this seems to soak up the vintage's heat, turning it around in the form of a broad swath of steeped black currant and blackberry paste flavors supported by warm tar and smoldering tobacco. Shows a nice singed cedar frame, with a lingering note of warm paving stone on the finish. Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot. Best from 2025 through 2035.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的结构坚实，似乎吸收了当年的热度，将其转化为浓郁的黑加仑和黑莓酱口感，伴有温暖的焦油和熄灭的烟草味。酒中有一个nice的焦烧松木框架，尾部留有温暖的铺路石的余味。酒款包含卡贝网索维涅、梅洛、卡贝网法兰克和佩蒂特韦多。建议在2025年至2035年期间饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 酿造这款酒的葡萄来自酒庄附近的葡萄园。酒体呈中等偏上的红宝石色泽，香气十分丰盛，蓝莓、香草巧克力、太妃糖、白胡椒、肉豆蔻、黑醋栗果酱香气，夹杂些许咖啡糖、生姜、紫罗兰及泥土气息，入口带有桂皮、甘草、树莓以及微微烟熏滋味，对于一支年轻的酒来说，单宁过于柔和，酸度中等偏上，酒体中等偏上，同样中等偏上的余韵尽显丝滑。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine is crafted from grapes grown in the vineyard's surrounding vineyards. The wine has a medium to full-bodied garnet color, with an abundance of aromas, including blueberry, vanilla, caramel, white pepper, cardamom, blackberry jam, a hint of coffee sugar, ginger, lavender, and earthy notes. On the palate, it offers cinnamon, licorice, raspberry, and a subtle smokiness. For a young wine, the tannins are surprisingly soft, with a medium to full-bodied acidity and texture, and a lingering finish that is silky smooth.

English pairs.original: The fruits come from the vineyards that are very close to the estate. Medium+ ruby color, very complex and intensely aromas of blueberry, vanilla chocolate, toffee, white pepper, nutmeg, black currant jam, hint of coffee candy, ginger, violet and earth, flavor of cinnamon, liquorice, raspberry and subtle smoke on the palate, too smooth tannin for this young wine, medium+ acidity, medium+ body, with a medium+ silky finish.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的葡萄来自酒庄附近的葡萄园。酒液呈现出深红色，复杂的气味中包含了蓝莓、香草巧克力、糖浆、白胡椒、肉豆蔻、黑currant果酱、咖啡糖、姜、紫罗兰和泥土等各种香气，口感中包含了肉桂、甘草、草莓和微微的烟味，酒中含有较少的苦味，酸度和体积均为中等偏上的水平，酒尾 silky光滑。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby, purple reflections, slightly watery rim. Ripe black berry confit, delicate nougat, dark cherry, faint vanilla aroma. Powerful, juicy, ripe plum, well-integrated tannins, chocolaty touch, good length, dark fruit and nougat on the finish.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，紫色反射，略微水分边缘。熟黑berry果酱，细致的果仁，黑杏，淡香草香气。强烈，水果多汁，熟透的李子，完美融合的苦味，巧克力味，良好的长度，黑果和果仁在尾部。

Western reviews.review: A fun wine with ample. ripe, black raspberries, licorice and even a bit of chocolate and cherry that is already showing some of its charms. The wine comes from a parcel selection and is not made solely from declassified fruit. 88 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒很有趣，充满了成熟的黑莓、 licorice 和一些巧克力和樱桃的味道，已经开始展现出它的魅力。 这款红酒来自一块特定的葡萄园，且不仅仅是来自降级的葡萄。 评分：88分。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有矿物质、成熟黑莓、甘草和胡椒的味道，口感丰满，单宁丰富，需要窖藏。
Chinese pairs.new: Mineral notes, mature blackberry, licorice, and pepper flavors, full-bodied with rich tannins, best aged.

Western reviews.review: A big, bitter chocolate and new wood-dominated wine, the wine’s spice coming from wood and also fig and cocoa flavors. There is acidity, and fresh berry fruits coming through the dark, black character.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有浓郁的、苦涩的巧克力和新橡木的味道，橡木和木质香味也带来了浓郁的果实和可可味。酒中有酸度，清新果味从黑暗的、黑色的人物中传出。

2018 Chateau Leoville-Las Cases 'Le Peti.name: 2018 Chateau Leoville-Las Cases 'Le Petit Lion du Marquis de Las Cases'

Chinese pairs.original: 2018年份的小雄狮是非常纯净而鲜美的一款酒，丰满的酒体中蕴藏着清新的酸度和轻巧的结构。高比例美乐所呈现出的甜美感、柔美的单宁，以及收尾特别的咸感，都让我看到了2018年份左岸美乐最正点的表达。作为一款副牌酒来说，已无可挑剔。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2018 vintage of this wine is a pristine and vibrant offering, boasting a full-bodied texture that's elevated by crisp acidity and a delicate structure. The high proportion of Merlot brings a sweet and velvety texture, along with a subtle saltiness that rounds out the finish. As a second label, it's hard to find fault with this wine.

English pairs.original: Le Petit Lion 2018 is a racy and gourmet wine, with ample body, vivid acidity, and delicate structure. The high proportion of Merlot, 45%, reveals graceful sweetness, soft tannins, and particular saltiness on the backbone. As a second wine, it is flawless.
English pairs.new: 莱比吉翁2018是一款风格鲜明、口感丰富的佳酿，具有明亮的酸度和细致的结构。梅洛占比高达45%，展现出优雅的甜度、柔和的苦味和脊柱上的特殊咸味。作为一款次级佳酿，它的品质堪称完美。

Western reviews.review: Here you find a family resemblance to the Grand Vin. Lighter, closer to ready to drink and softer for sure, but this Baby Las Cases is perfect for restaurants and early drinking with its black raspberry and currant profile, coupled with round tannins, a fruit filled, supple textured finish and hints of tobacco. Enjoy this over the next decade or more while waiting for the Grand Vin to develop. The wine is a blend of 42% Cabernet Sauvignon, 45% Merlot and 13% Cabernet Franc, 14.5% ABV. 91 Points
Western reviews.translation: 在这里，你可以看到与Grand Vin相似的家族风格。虽然更轻盈，更接近即刻饮用，更柔和，但Baby Las Cases是完美的餐厅选择和早期饮用选择，其黑莓和黑currant风格与圆润的苦味、果味丰富的质感和烟草的余味相结合。可以在接下来的十年或更长时间内享用，等待Grand Vin发育。该酒是由42%卡波弗雷蒙、45%梅尔洛和13%卡波弗朗克混合而成，14.5%ABV。评分91分。

Western reviews.review: (von jungen Reben von Château Léoville Las Cases): Leuchtendes Rubin. Feinduftig, dezent kräuterig mit viel reifer, roter und dunkler Beerenfrucht, sehr gute Komplexität. Der Gaumen ist saftig, frisch, mit reiner, klarer Frucht, die Struktur ist markant, die Gerbstoffe mitteltstark ausgeprägt, die Säure markiert wirkt jedoch gut eingebunden. Endet langanhaltend rotfruchtig mit vielen Sauerkirschen. Keine Alkoholdominanz festzustellen und das trotz 14.5%. 2025-2037+ (Verkostet auf Château Léoville Las Cases, am 05.04.2019)
Western reviews.translation: 来自Château Léoville Las Cases的年轻葡萄的红酒：闪亮的红宝石色。强烈的香气，淡淡的草药味，充满成熟的红色和黑色浆果味，复杂度极高。口感丰富，新鲜，纯正的果味，结构明显，鞣质中等强度，酸度明显，但却被很好地控制。口感持久，红果味悠长，充满了酸枣味。酒精味不明显，尽管酒精度达14.5%。推荐饮用时间：2025-2037年。 (评估时间：2019年4月5日，地点：Château Léoville Las Cases)

Chinese pairs.original: 得益于砾石土壤下隐藏的黏土石灰岩，2022年份的Chateau Laffitte Carcasset 为我们带来了好多惊喜。首先，这款酒的酒体线条流畅无比，单宁几乎如同“隐形”；其次，它的果香纯净澄澈，草莓、桑果、糖葫芦的香气清晰得让我嘴角上扬；最后便是它超乎想象的清爽感，Q弹爽口的犹如一碗冰镇藕粉。强烈推荐大家品尝这款Chateau Laffitte Carcasset。
Chinese pairs.new: Thanks to the hidden limestone clay beneath the gravel soil, the 2022 Chateau Laffitte Carcasset has brought us many surprises. Firstly, the wine's texture is incredibly smooth, with tannins almost invisible; secondly, its fruit aromas are pure and crystal clear, with distinct notes of strawberry, plum and honeydew melon; thirdly, it has an astonishing freshness, with a Q-like crispness that's like a bowl of chilled jelly dessert. I highly recommend trying this Chateau Laffitte Carcasset.

English pairs.original: Thanks to the hidden clay-limestone soil beneath the gravel, Chateau Laffitte Carcasset 2022 brings us many surprises. Firstly, this wine has an incredibly smooth body, with tannins that are almost “invisible”; secondly, its fruitiness is crystal clear, with the fragrances of strawberries, mulberries, and candied hawthorns that make me smile; finally, it has an unexpected freshness, with a crisp and juicy texture like a bowl of chilled lotus root soup. I highly recommend everyone to try it.
English pairs.new: 感谢地下的黏土和石灰质土壤掩盖在碎石下，查托·拉菲特·卡萨塞特 2022 年红酒带给我们许多惊喜。首先，这款酒具有极其光滑的体感，几乎没有可感知的苦味；其次，它的果香清晰，带有草莓、桑椹和糖浇的山楂的香气，让我感到愉快；最后，它具有意想不到的清新感，具有清脆的口感和新鲜的质感，如一碗冰镇莲藕汤。我强烈推荐大家尝试它。

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby, opaque core, purple reflections. Fresh, ripe plums, blackberries and black cherries in the underlay, floral touch; an inviting bouquet. Juicy, elegant, fine ripe cherries, fruity with a lively structure, good balance, mineral on the finish, a versatile food wine.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，透明的核心，紫色反射。新鲜的浓郁的浆果，黑莓和黑杏在底层，花香的触感；一份邀请的香气。果香浓郁，细腻的黑杏，果味丰富，结构活泼，平衡好，矿物质的尾韵，适合多种菜肴的搭配。

Western reviews.review: Le nez est épicé, relativement plat. Il exprime les notes de cassis, de clou de girofle et plus légèrement – de muscade associées à des touches de framboise croquante et a de discrètes pointes de fumée. La bouche est minérale et offre de la fraicheur, de la suavité, de l’acidulé, de l’énergie, de la tension. Elle exprime les notes de mûre juteuse/pulpeuse, de cerise fraiche/pulpeuse et plus légèrement de petites baies rouges associées à des touches de minéralité racée et à des fines pointes de tabac frais et de fumée. Bonne longueur.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中带有辣椒的味道，比较平淡。它展现出黑加仑、丁香和轻微的肉豆蔻的香气，以及一些脆的草莓和微妙的烟味。口感中带有矿物质，提供清新、柔和、酸性、能量和紧张感。它展现出浓郁的果肉、清新的草莓和轻微的红果，伴随着矿物质的味道和新鲜烟草和烟味。酒体长长。

Western reviews.review: Inky dark purple core and hue. Aromas of mild oak, plum, red berriesa and some herbal notes. Youthful palate, a slight tannic grip, moderate ripeness with sour red berries, plum and herbal flavours, medium weight, a fresher style made for long ageing with rather long, slightly tannic finish.
Western reviews.translation: 深紫色酒液。酒中带有轻微的橡木、浆果、红果和一些草药味。口感年轻，略带坚果感，酸度适中，带有浆果、草药味，中等重量，适合长期陈化的风格，酒尾较长，略带坚果感。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark ruby-red with a purple rim. The aromas show hedonistic, juicy dark-fruit with hints of vanilla & cedar. The palate has lifted, fresh red-plum & mulberry fruit. Spicy raspberry fruit & chocolatey density become apparent on the mid-palate. The wine is full-bodied with plentiful, fine tannins. A grainy structure has grip & some bitterness, without being too astringent. A long, structured finish ends with juicy, ripe black-plum & licorice. 04/23 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，带有紫色边缘。酒香中充满了浓郁的黑果味，带有香草和松木的味道。口感中有清新的红枣和黑莓果味。中口出现了浓郁的草莓果味和巧克力般的厚度。酒体丰富，纤维丰富，结构紧密。酒尾长而结构紧密，带有浓郁的黑枣和甘草味。评分：4.23（ep）DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 生物动力的纯净感和2020年份的集中度在Clos Puy Arnaud的身上高度相融。看似清淡实则蕴藏了丰富的内涵：酸枣酸梅的清爽感，细密单宁的紧致感以及刷刷作响的矿物咸感，随着心跳的节奏不断触碰你的味蕾。重点推荐。
Chinese pairs.new: Clos Puy Arnaud的2020年份酒展现出生动的活力和纯净感。虽然看起来清淡，但它蕴含着丰富的复杂性：酸枣酸梅的清爽感，细密的单宁带来紧致感，矿物质的咸味在口中留下清脆的回响。

English pairs.original: The purity of the biodynamie and the concentration of the 2020 vintage are highly integrated in Clos Puy Arnaud. It seems to be plain but contains rich connotations: the refreshing palate of sour dates and plums, the creamy and intense tannins, and the rustling saltiness and mineral notes, all of these keep touching your taste buds as following your heartbeats. Highly recommended.
English pairs.new: 2020年产的Clos Puy Arnaud红酒，体现了生态农业和浓缩的完美结合。看似平淡，但蕴含着丰富的内涵：酸甜的日期和浆果口感，丰富的奶油质感和强烈的纤维，微微的咸味和矿物质味道，所有这些元素都在你的味蕾上留下着持久的印象，像心跳一样持续不息。强烈推荐！

Western reviews.review: (Biodynamie) Le nez est fruité, gourmand et offre une certaine profondeur ainsi qu’un petit crémeux. On y retrouve des notes de crème de mûre et plus légèrement de bleuet associées à des touches de fraise écrasée, à des pointes de petits fruits bleus crémeux, à des pointes de vanille Bourbon ainsi qu’à une subtile pointe presque séveuse et de tabac blond sucré (en fond). La bouche est fruitée, équilibrée et offre de la fraicheur, de l’acidulé, de la gourmandise, de la jutosité, une trame acidulée, de la tension, de la finesse ainsi qu’une certaine crémosité en finesse. En bouche ce vin exprime des notes de crème de mûre, de cassis écrasé et plus légèrement de bleuet associées à des touches de myrtille acidulée, de petits fruits rouges, à de fines pointes de vanille Bourbon, de lys ainsi qu’à une subtile pointe presque balsamique (en fond) et d’épices douces. Les tannins sont souples.
Western reviews.translation:
本次翻译的红酒评论如下：

(生态动力学) 醉人的鼻子，果香浓郁，带有深度和轻微的奶油味。酒中有浓郁的黑莓奶油和轻微的蓝莓，伴有挤压的草莓、奶油般的蓝berries、波旁香草、几乎有苦味和甜的黄色烟草底调。口感果香平衡，带有清新、酸度、丰富、果实、细腻、酸度、紧张、细腻和轻微的奶油感。口感中酒体表达黑莓奶油、挤压的黑currant和轻微的蓝莓，伴有酸性蓝berries、红果、细腻的波旁香草、百合花和几乎有药膏味和甜的香料。酒中的纤维软绵。

Western reviews.review: (70% Merlot, 25%J Cabernet Franc, 5% Cabernet Sauvignon, 14% Alkohol, pH 3.32) Expressive, dunklelfruchtige und auch florale Nase, wirkt klar und rein wie ein Bergbach, Cassis, Pflaume, Himbeeren dahinter eine kühle Kalkstein-Mineralik. Im Gaumen gradlinig und fruchtbetont, das ist super knackig, frisch und saftig, die Säure ist markant, verleiht diesem Wein viel Schwung, die Gerbstoffe sind von sehr guter Qualität, fein gewoben, sie machen sich erst ganz hinten bemerkbar. Kühl, elegant und mit intensiver, roter Beerenfrucht endet dieser Clos Puy Arnaud im Finale angenehm langanhaltend. Vielleicht der schönste Wein dieses Gutes, den ich bisher probieren durfte. Für Finessenliebhaber. (April/Mai 2021)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

(70% 梅洛, 25% 卡伯涅·法兰克, 5% 卡伯涅·索万, 14% 酒精, pH 3.32)

这款红酒的气味丰富,有浓郁的黑果味和花朵香气,清澈透明如山泉水,有浓郁的黑currant、黑杏和黑莓味,后面有冷冽的石灰质矿物质味。

在口感上,这款红酒平衡,果味丰富,口感清新,新鲜,有水分,酸度明显,使得这款红酒充满活力,有很好的结构,酒中的天然物质质地优良,细致缝合,在后面才会显现出来。

这款红酒的口感清新,优雅,有强烈的红果味,在尾部有长时间的持久感,可能是这酒庄最好的酒之一,我有幸品尝过。适合喜欢细腻口感的人品尝。(2021年4月/5月)

Western reviews.review: A youthful dark purple colour. Pure aromas offering some chalky notes, licorice, ginger, clove, mild oak, and wild berries. The palate is finely built with a seamless texture, grainy tannin, a fresh backbone of acidity with rather sweet fruit flavours, good layers with a mild spiciness, chalky presence, and a long vigorous finish. very fine potential but already delicious.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深紫色的，充满了年轻的活力。酒香清澈纯粹，带有石灰质的味道， licorice、姜、丁香、轻微的橡木味和野生莓果。口感细腻，纤维质的苦味，酸度清新，果味甜美，层次丰富，带有轻微的辣味，石灰质的存在，长而有力的尾部。酒品极佳，潜力很大，但已经非常可口。

Chinese pairs.original: 鲜滑的奶油铺在多汁的黑莓和黑樱桃上，后面还带着些许石墨和烟草的气息。入口轻盈而爽朗，酸度清新而干练，看来较为凉爽的土壤在2018年份的浪琴慕莎身上发挥了奇效，是我认为在近几年中表现最好的一个年份。
Chinese pairs.new: A silky layer of cream coats the luscious blackberries and black cherries, with subtle hints of graphite and tobacco lingering in the background. The palate is light and refreshing, with crisp acidity and a sense of cool, earthy undertones that make the 2018 Pommard a standout vintage in recent years.

English pairs.original: Smooth cream touches on the juicy blackberry and black cherry, coupled with hints of cigar and graphite after swirling the glass. The entry is pretty straightforward, with remarkable acidity from head to toe. It seems that its cooler soil plays a magical role in Lynch-Moussas 2018. This wine is probably my best Lynch-Moussas in the past years.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的口感非常顺滑，入口时黑莓和黑杏的果味立即呈现，随后在旋转酒杯时，烟草和石墨的香气也开始显现。酒体入口直接，酸度出众，从头到尾都非常出色。似乎是来自凉爽土壤的魔力使得Lynch-Moussas 2018如此出色。这款酒可能是近年来我品尝过的最好的Lynch-Moussas。

Western reviews.review: In der Nase Tabak und Rauch, wirkt reiffruchtig mit Noten von Himbeeren, Brombeeren und Cassis. Im Gaumen cremig, zugänglich, mit leicht trocknendem Tannin, die Frucht wirkt frisch und knackig, die Struktur überlagert aktuell allerdings etwas. Endet langanhaltend, eher rotfruchtig und würzig. 2025-2038 (Verkostet am 21. Juni 2021 im Rahmen der UGCB Probe in Genf)
Western reviews.translation: 在鼻子里，酒中有烟草和烟味，气味成熟，带有浓郁的黑莓、蓝莓和黑加思果的香味。口感丰富、顺口，略带干涩的苦味，果味新鲜、脆爽，结构略显紧张，但目前仍在调整中。酒尾长长，带有红果和香料的味道。推荐储存时间：2025-2038（2021年6月21日在日内瓦的UGCB品酒会中品尝）。

Western reviews.review: This estate has steadily gained in quality and this latest release is one of its best. With good balance between black-currant fruits and a sophisticated structure, the wine has a great future. The dominance of Cabernet Sauvignon in the blend will allow it to age. Drink from 2026. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 这家酒庄在品质方面逐渐提高，这次最新的酒款是其中之一。酒中黑currant的果味与复杂的结构保持着良好的平衡，这使得酒有着光明的前景。酒中Cabernet Sauvignon的主导地位使得它能够耐久保存。建议2026年后饮用。 - 罗杰·沃斯

Western reviews.review: Herbs, tobacco leaf, currants, cedar and spice aromas are the right place to start. On the palate, the fruit is fresh, lively and vibrant, with a chewy, crisp, tangy, juicy character that holds true to the finish. The wine blends 72% Cabernet Sauvignon and 28% Merlot.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中包含了香草、烟草叶、葡萄干、红檜和香料等元素。口感上，酒中的水果味清新活泼，具有嚼劲、清脆、带有酸味和浓郁的特点，直到尾部都保持着这种风味。该酒的混合比例为72%卡波雷尔葡萄和28%美丽葡萄。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby garnet, purple reflections, faint brightening on the rim. Inviting bouquet with delicate noble wood savouriness, fresh cassis, dark forest berries, a hint of nougat and tangerine zest in the background. Juicy, ripe cherry, freshly structured, fine tannins with more cherry on the finish and good length. A multi-faceted food wine. (2020-2040)
Western reviews.translation: 深红宝石色，紫色反射，酒液边缘微微发亮。酒香诱人，带有细微的高级木质香气，新鲜的黑加仑，黑森林浆果，背景中有杏仁和柑橘皮的味道。口感鲜美，酿造成熟，细致的纤维，尾部和长度都有黑加仑的味道。是一种多面性佳酿，适合与多种食物搭配。 (2020-2040)

Western reviews.review: Medium to deep ruby red color is not quite opaque, The aromas have hints of leafy cassis with cedar & graphite. The palate displays lots of lovely, lively fresh fruit that is lifted by good acidity, giving notes of red-currant & cranberry. There are some notes of oak spoices on the long juicy fruit finish. Alcohol seems well-balanced, perhaps giving a little warmth to the finish. The wine ends with chocolatey notes, black fruit & sweet spices. 03/23 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色，略微不透明。酒中的香气中带有枯叶、黑樱桃和松木、石墨的味道。口感丰富，果味新鲜，酸度适宜，带有红currant和蔓越莓的味道。酒尾有木头香味和长长的果味。酒精度合适，酒尾有一点温暖。酒尾还带有巧克力味、黑果味和甜香料味。评分：03/23 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 散发出烤橡木，咖啡，雪茄盒和成熟水果的香气，酒体饱满，有嚼劲的单宁，口感圆润，余味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of toasted oak, coffee, cigar box, and ripe fruit waft from the glass. The full-bodied wine is rich in tannins, with a smooth texture and a long, lingering finish.

Western reviews.review: Sweet tobacco and berries, with hints of grilled meat in the nose. Full-bodied with velvety, chewy tannins and a long finish. Lots of new wood, but balanced with everything else going on.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感非常丰富，口感滑顺，纤维性质坚实，尾部长长。酒中有甜 Tobacco 和浓郁的浆果味，鼻子中还带有烤肉的香气。新橡木的味道很浓，但与其他元素的平衡很好。

Western reviews.review: Another fine surprise from this estate. The plummy fruit here is more stewed than fresh in character, but the wine shows elegance and refinement in its expression of Merlot (75% blended with 25% Cabernet Franc). There are some balanced tertiary notes. It may lack some of the density of the 2015, but I still enjoyed its greater freshness and lovely sap. La Pointe shows ‘particular coherence’, according to Alsace-based wine merchant Fabrice Renner.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶酒又一次让人惊喜。酒中的浓郁果味更像是在烹饪中熟制的，而不是新鲜的。然而，这瓶酒在表达梅洛（75%）和卡波弗朗克（25%）的风格中展现出优雅和精致。酒中有平衡的次级风味。相比2015年产的酒，这瓶酒可能缺乏一些密度，但我仍然喜欢它的更清新和美好的质地。根据阿尔萨斯酒商Fabrice Renner的说法，这瓶酒表现出“独特的统一性”。

Western reviews.review: This is impressive—a ripe, open wine, but showing some lovely, polished new wood flavors, vanilla and just a touch of spice. Barrel Sample: 91-93
Western reviews.translation: 这是一款令人印象深刻的红酒，酒体丰富饱满，展现出新橡木的精致滋味，带有香草和微妙的香料。酒评：91-93分。

Western reviews.review: Offers a fabulous nose of toasty oak, coffee, cigar box and ripe fruit. Full-bodied, with chewy tannins and loads of ripe fruit, toasty oak and spices. Long and silky. Very well done for this estate and better than the 2000.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒带有丰富的香气，包括 Toasty oak、咖啡、雪茄盒和成熟的水果。口感丰富，具有嚼劲的橡皮质和成熟的水果、 Toasty oak 和香料。长长的、细滑的口感。酒庄的表现非常出色，甚至超过了2000年的版本。

Chinese pairs.original: Haut-Carles 2016是我觉得酒庄在转变风格之前品质最高的年份（最后一个年份做整桶发酵）。石墨一般的口感，紧致中散着金属般的光泽，周围的还包裹着浓而不艳的乌梅和酸角。 得益于高酸度，2016年份自始至终都保持了令人愉悦的清爽感。
Chinese pairs.new: Haut-Carles 2016是酒庄在风格转变之前品质最高的年份（最后一个年份采用整桶发酵）。酒体平衡，闪烁着金属般的光泽，周围的黑berry和酸味包围着。高酸度使得2016年份始终保持清爽感。

English pairs.original: Haut-Carles 2016 is my best vintage before the evolution of the vinification method (the last vintage to make Integral Fermentation). The palate is saturated with graphite, concentrated, sleek, offering metallic brilliance. The nose is embraced with rich yet not flamboyant fruitiness like Chinese salty prune and Tamarind Pulp. Thanks to the high acidity, this wine keeps its freshness from start to finish.
English pairs.new: 哈特卡尔斯 2016 是我在酿造方法演进之前的最佳年份（最后一瓶采用整体发酵法）。口感浓郁，充满石墨味，金属光泽。鼻子中富有浓郁的果香，如中国的咸枣和木瓜果肉。高酸度使得酒精保持了从头到尾的新鲜感。

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby, firm core, purple reflections, lighter rim. Aromas of nice ripe cherry fruit, with dark berry in the background, and a delicate nougat touch. Juicy palate, good complexity, pleasant freshness, fine well-integrated tannins, a mineral salty finish, and very promising.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，坚实的核心，紫色反射，边缘较轻。酒中有浓郁的鲜红樱桃果味，背景中有黑莓的味道，伴有细微的果仁味。口感丰富，复杂性好，新鲜度佳，细腻的橡皮质，矿物质的咸味尾韵，非常有前途。

Western reviews.review: (En Primeur) Sehr offene Nase, Piemontkirsche, Rumtopf, Dörrpflaumen, Kokosaromen, wirkt etwas gemacht. Am Gaumen weich, eher leichter Körper, feine, knackige Frucht, wieder viele Kirschen, deutlich frischer als die Nase vermuten lässt, die Tannine sind reif, die Säure stimmig. Im Abgang leicht trocknend aber mit guter Länge. Ein sehr sauber gekämmter Musterschüler steht hier im Glas. 2023-2032, 17.5 vvPunkte (89/100)
Western reviews.translation: (En Primeur) 极为开放的鼻子，皮埃蒙特樱桃、朗姆酒、干枯的枣子、椰子味道，感觉有些人工调制。口感柔和，体积较轻，细致的、脆脆的果味，很多樱桃味道，明显比鼻子上的味道要新鲜的多，苦味成熟，酸度合适。尾部轻微干燥，但持久度良好。一个非常整洁的典范样本出现在眼前。推荐饮用年份：2023-2032，评分：17.5 vvPunkte（89/100）。

Western reviews.review: Youthful dark inky purple colour. Pure and modern nose with high ripeness displaying fresh blackberry, cherry, fine wood and tobacco. Dense palate with nicely grained tannin, layers of ripe unctuous dark fruit, yet with a nice freshness underneath, fine oak integration and a very long and layered finish, nicely done.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深紫色的。酒香清新现代，高度成熟，展现出新鲜黑莓、樱桃、细木和烟草的味道。口感浓密，纤维性质良好，展现出成熟的浓郁果实，底层有清新的感觉，木头的融合良好，酒尾长且层次丰富，非常出色。

Chinese pairs.original: 黑莓、巧克力、皮革、橡木等复杂香气，单宁柔滑有橡木风味，整个很有框架，此酒预计到2017年还能保持良好表现。
Chinese pairs.new: Complex aromas of blackberry, chocolate, leather, and oak, with smooth tannins and a hint of oak flavor. Well-structured and full-bodied, this wine is expected to remain excellent through 2017.

Western reviews.review: a superb wine this is going to be. It is rich, elegant, poised, with its super-ripe, but still fresh, berry fruit flavors exhibiting much of the richness of Merlot when it has been ripened slowly and surely. While this has less intensity than its neighbor of Château Pétrus, the Cabernet Franc in the blend gives it intriguing perfumes.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶出色的红酒。它富有层次，优雅，稳重，具有超级成熟但仍然新鲜的黑berry风味，展现了慢慢成熟的梅洛特的丰富性。虽然它比邻近的佩特鲁斯庄园要弱一些，但在酒中加入了卡伯涅 Franc的香气使其变得更加迷人。

Western reviews.review: a superb wine this is going to be. It is rich, elegant, poised, with its super-ripe, but still fresh, berry fruit flavors exhibiting much of the richness of Merlot when it has been ripened slowly and surely. While this has less intensity than its neighbor of Château Pétrus, the Cabernet Franc in the blend gives it intriguing perfumes.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶出色的红酒。它富有层次，优雅，稳重，具有超级成熟但仍然新鲜的黑berry风味，展现了慢慢成熟的梅洛特的丰富性。虽然它比邻近的佩特鲁斯庄园要弱一些，但在酒中加入了卡伯涅 Franc的香气使其变得更加迷人。

Western reviews.review: a superb wine this is going to be. It is rich, elegant, poised, with its super-ripe, but still fresh, berry fruit flavors exhibiting much of the richness of Merlot when it has been ripened slowly and surely. While this has less intensity than its neighbor of Château Pétrus, the Cabernet Franc in the blend gives it intriguing perfumes.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶出色的红酒。它富有层次，优雅，稳重，具有超级成熟但仍然新鲜的黑berry风味，展现了慢慢成熟的梅洛特的丰富性。虽然它比邻近的佩特鲁斯庄园要弱一些，但在酒中加入了卡伯涅 Franc的香气使其变得更加迷人。

Western reviews.review: a superb wine this is going to be. It is rich, elegant, poised, with its super-ripe, but still fresh, berry fruit flavors exhibiting much of the richness of Merlot when it has been ripened slowly and surely. While this has less intensity than its neighbor of Château Pétrus, the Cabernet Franc in the blend gives it intriguing perfumes.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶出色的红酒。它富有层次，优雅，稳重，具有超级成熟但仍然新鲜的黑berry风味，展现了慢慢成熟的梅洛特的丰富性。虽然它比邻近的佩特鲁斯庄园要弱一些，但在混合中加入的卡波弗朗克葡萄为它带来了迷人的香气。

Western reviews.review: a superb wine this is going to be. It is rich, elegant, poised, with its super-ripe, but still fresh, berry fruit flavors exhibiting much of the richness of Merlot when it has been ripened slowly and surely. While this has less intensity than its neighbor of Château Pétrus, the Cabernet Franc in the blend gives it intriguing perfumes.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶出色的红酒。它富有层次，优雅，稳重，具有超级成熟但仍然新鲜的黑berry风味，展现了慢慢成熟的梅洛特的丰富性。虽然它比邻近的佩特鲁斯庄园要弱一些，但在酒中加入了卡伯涅 Franc的香气使其变得更加迷人。

Chinese pairs.original: La Violette是在Chateau Le Gay酒庄中进行酿造的。出产这款酒的葡萄来自平均树龄约为50年的老藤梅洛葡萄树。酒液在全新的法国橡木桶内进行发酵。想要在市面上找到一瓶La Violette实属不易，因为这款酒的平均年产量在250箱上下。醒酒两小时。此酒迷人、活泼而且平衡的香气中透出紫罗兰、桉树、香料、森林地、檀木、热枣布丁、蓝莓、越橘、红醋栗和咸矿物味。酒香充溢口腔，不断攀升的酸度使其异常甜美、庞大并且滑爽口感中的强劲、浓郁风味显得愈发集中；在那持久的多矿物回味后留下的，是一抹香草及黑色水果滋味。这无疑是新派酒中的佼佼者。
Chinese pairs.new:
La Violette是由Chateau Le Gay酒庄酿造的。该酒使用平均树龄约为50年的老藤梅洛葡萄。酒液在全新的法国橡木桶内进行发酵。由于La Violette的年产量极低，仅在250箱左右，因此在市场上找到一瓶实属不易。醒酒两小时。

这款酒具有迷人、活泼而且平衡的香气，带有紫罗兰、桉树、香料、森林地、檀木、热枣布丁、蓝莓、越橘、红醋栗和咸矿物味。酒香充溢口腔，酸度不断攀升，使其异常甜美、庞大并且滑爽。强劲、浓郁的风味显得愈发集中；在持久的多矿物回味后留下的，是一抹香草及黑色水果滋味。这无疑是新派酒中的佼佼者。

English pairs.original: The wines of La Violette are produced in Chateau Le Gay. Made from 100% old vine Merlot that averages close to 50 years of age. The fermentation takes place in 100% new French oaks. It's quite hard to find a bottle of La Violette in the market since its average production is close to a whopping 250 cases per year. Decanted for two hours. It displayed an intriguing, vivid and nicely poised bouquet of violet, eucalyptus, spices, forest floor, sandalwood, sticky date pudding, blueberry, lingonberry, red currant and savoury-mineral. In the mouth, it was very sweet, huge and mouth-filling, with a wrap of elevated acidity that held powerfully rich flavours focused whilst maintaining a polished texture; the mineral-inflected finish was persistent, leaving the notes of vanilla and black fruits. Modern but terrific.
English pairs.new: 拉维奥莱特酒庄的葡萄酒由沙特勒莱盖酒庄生产。酒庄使用100%的老藤梅洛葡萄，平均年龄接近50岁。发酵过程全部在新法兰克的橡木桶中进行。由于其年产量仅约250箱，拉维奥莱特酒庄的葡萄酒在市场上相当难以找到。酒瓶在两小时内进行了脱颗粒。脱颗粒后，酒呈现出一幅迷人的、生动的、优雅的花香，具有紫罗兰、桉树、香料、林地、沉香、糖浆蛋糕、蓝莓、林檎、红葡萄和矿物质的特征。口感丰富甜美，巨大且充满口感，具有高酸度的包裹，持久而强大的风味，保持了光滑的质地；矿物质的尾部持续存在，留下了香草和黑果的余味。现代但极具魅力的葡萄酒。

Western reviews.review: Pungent aromas of dried flowers, baked cherries, spice box, truffle, cocoa, mint, and dark chocolate. The wine is full-bodied, concentrated, and readily shows off its luscious dark cherry profile with darker chocolate accents in the mid-palate and finish. I just wish it stuck with you for a bit longer, as this starts off so nice. You can drink this now, or age it another few years. 92 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的气味强烈，带有干花、烤樱桃、香料盒、松露、可可、薄荷和黑巧克力等味道。酒体丰富浓郁，展现出浓郁的黑樱桃风格，中口和尾部带有深巧克力调味。虽然开头很不错，但遗憾的是它留不住你的注意力。可以现在就喝，也可以再存几年。评分92分。

Chinese pairs.original: 去年品尝Chateau Potensac 2021时，我曾感叹：2021年并未展现其真正潜力。如今，2022年份的Chateau Potensac焕发出了璀璨的光彩。轻轻一嗅酒杯，便闻到满溢的新鲜莓果，仿佛看到了巴塞罗那San Antoni Market正在举行的水果盛宴。酒体醇厚而不显张扬，丰富细腻的单宁在味蕾间起舞，既有深邃的结构又有绵密的质地。尾韵处摩卡的一抹风味恰到好处地点缀其中，品尝起来让人心情大好。
Chinese pairs.new: Last year, I was underwhelmed by Chateau Potensac 2021, but the 2022 vintage is a revelation. A gentle sniff of the glass reveals a profusion of fresh berry aromas, transporting me to the vibrant fruit stalls of Barcelona's San Antoni Market. The wine's texture is rich and unobtrusive, with refined tannins dancing on the palate, offering both depth and velvety texture. A subtle hint of mocha perfectly complements the finish, leaving me in a delightful mood.

English pairs.original: Upon tasting Chateau Potensac 2021 last year, I marveled at how the vintage had yet to reveal its true potential. Now, the 2022 Chateau Potensac radiates resplendent brilliance. A gentle whiff of the glass reveals an abundance of fresh berries, evoking a vision of a fruit-laden feast at Barcelona’s San Antoni Market. The wine possesses a rich body, with abundant and intricate tannins dancing upon the palate, offering both profound structure and velvety texture. A subtle hint of mocha in the finish adorns me a lot.
English pairs.new: 去年品尝了2021年沙托普滕萨克（Chateau Potensac），我惊叹于这瓶酒的潜力尚未被完全释放。现在，2022年沙托普滕萨克酒呈现出灿烂的光彩。轻轻一闻，酒杯中散发着新鲜莓果的香气，仿佛置身于巴塞罗那圣安东尼市场（San Antoni Market）上的丰盛果品盛宴。酒体丰富，充满了丰富复杂的橡木味，口感丰富细腻，结构深刻，质感细腻。酒尾带有微妙的巧克力味，给我留下了深刻的印象。

Western reviews.review: Tobacco leaf, cedar, peppery herbs, and black fruits show on the nose, and on the palate. There is volume, intensity, concentration, tannic structure, and a regal bearing for the wine on the palate. By miles, this is the most complete vintage for Potensac I have ever tasted. The wine was produced from blending 43% Cabernet Sauvignon, 36.5% Merlot, 19.5% Cabernet Franc and 1% Petit Verdot.14.52% ABV. Drink from 2026-2045. 92-94 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中充满了烟草叶、红 cedar、辣椒样香草和黑色水果的味道。口感上同样有着丰富的体积、强烈的味道、浓郁的口感、坚实的纤维结构和王者般的气质。相比之下，这瓶红酒是我品尝过的最完美的一瓶Potensac。该酒由43%卡波内尔·萨维尼诺、36.5%梅洛、19.5%卡波内尔·法兰克和1%佩蒂·维多特混合酿造，酒精度14.52%。建议在2026-2045年间饮用。评分92-94分。

Western reviews.review: (43% Cabernet Sauvignon, 36.5% Merlot, 19.5% Cabernet Franc, 1% Petit Verdot, 14.7% Alkohol) Strahlende ist sehr fein, zurückhaltend, nobel, tiefgründig, dunkelfruchtig, Brombeere, schwarze Johannisbeere, florale Töne, ein Hauch schwarze Schokolade, sehr komplex. Im Gaumen dicht und konzentriert, straffer Kern, markantes Tannin, die Frucht ist perfekt reif, die Säure ist wohl dosiert, mit 14.7% Alkohol ist dieser Wein der kräftigste in der Serie, doch auch hier wirkt die Gradation nicht stören. Das Finale ist langanhaltend und endet auf einen Mix aus roten und dunklen Beeren. Ein sensationeller Potensac mit grossen Reserven. 2028-2055 (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 auf Château Nenin) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

(43% 卡波内索维涅, 36.5% 梅洛, 19.5% 卡波内弗朗克, 1% Petit Verdot, 14.7% 酒精含量) 

这瓶红酒闪闪发光，细腻，优雅，深刻，深色果味，蓝莓，黑莓，花香，微微的黑巧克力，非常复杂。口感浓密，集中，紧致的核心，明显的苦味，果味成熟，酸度适宜，酒精含量14.7%使得这瓶酒成为系列中最强劲的一瓶，但酒精含量并没有影响到酒的品质。酒尾长长，结束于红色和深色果味的混合。这个Potensac酒品质出色，储存潜力巨大。推荐储存时间：2028-2055 (2023年4月在Château Nenin品鉴“En Primeur”时评估) #primeurs22

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby garnet, opaque core, purple reflections, delicate rim brightening. Fresh cherries, liquorice, tobacco nuances, orange zest in the background. Complex, taut, tightly meshed, dark wild berries, vivid tannins, mineral, still a bit shy on the finish, will benefit from ageing.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，透明的核心，紫色反射，细微的边缘闪亮。新鲜樱桃，薄荷糖，烟草的细微差别，橙子皮在背景中。复杂，紧致，紧密的黑野果，生动的苦味，矿物质，仍然在尾部有些谦逊，需要陈化。

Western reviews.review:
Deep, dark, opaque purple-black color. The restrained nose has rich licorice notes & an almost lefy green note. the palate is tightly structured and has a tight, fine-grained, drying grip with a chalky texture. Slightly warming alcohol lifts oak notes & ripe black-fruit out of the structure. The mid-palate opens revealing vivid cassis, elderberry & black-cherry fruit. The finish is long, structured & mouth-watering. 04/23 DCAMW

This is an exceptional example of Potensac.
Western reviews.translation:
深度浓郁的紫黑色。酒鼻子上有丰富的甘草味和几乎可以闻到的青草味。口感紧致，结构紧密，干净细腻，带有 chalky 的质感。酒精的温暖感稍微提醒了我们，木头味和成熟的黑果味从结构中浮现出来。中口部逐渐展开，展现出鲜明的黑加仑、 elderberry 和黑樱桃果味。尾韵长长，结构紧密，令人垂涎欲滴。04/23 DCAMW

这是 Potensac 的杰出代表。

chateau de la tour clos de vougeot vieil.name: chateau de la tour clos de vougeot vieilles vignes 2007

Chinese pairs.original: 这家酒庄是Clos de Vougeot最大的地主，拥有5.48公顷的土地。有机栽培。当地酵母；不破皮；淋皮和踩皮；使用水泥缸来发酵；在法国桶中陈年18个月。对于这支酒，酒庄酿造了三个不同版本，“Clos de Vougeot”、“Clos de Vougeot Vieilles Vignes”以及“Clos de Vougeot Hommage a Jean Morin”（并非每年都会出产）。Vieilles Vignes和Hommage a Jean Morin这两款酒的果实都来自1910年种植的老藤地块。与现任庄主兼酿酒师的Francois Labet一同品鉴。通常而言，老藤都意味着更高的质量。因此和酒庄的新藤版本比较，这款老藤的出品显得更为平衡，属于优雅和力度并存的典范。此酒含蓄但却宜人的香气中展现出泥土、咸矿物、混合香料、紫罗兰干花、黑莓以及稍许的黄油硬糖。口感柔和，但其结构及力量依然得以保留；回味纯净而且异常悠长——可以完全配得上特级园的水准。
Chinese pairs.new: This esteemed winery is the largest landowner of Clos de Vougeot, boasting 5.48 hectares of organically farmed land. Local yeast; no de-stemming; whole-berry and foot-treading; fermentation in cement vats; aged for 18 months in French oak barrels. The winery produces three distinct versions of this wine: "Clos de Vougeot", "Clos de Vougeot Vieilles Vignes" and "Clos de Vougeot Hommage a Jean Morin" (not produced every year). The fruit for Vieilles Vignes and Hommage a Jean Morin comes from a 1910-planted old-vine block. Tasted alongside winemaker and proprietor Francois Labet, this wine showcases the elegance and power that old vines typically bring to the table. Compared to the winery's new-vine version, this old-vine bottling is more balanced, a paragon of refinement and intensity. The wine's subtle yet charming aroma unfurls earth, saline mineral, mixed spice, lavender, blackberry and a hint of buttery toffee. The palate is silky, yet its structure and power remain intact; the finish is pure and remarkably long-lasting – a true benchmark for Premier Cru.

English pairs.original: The domaine is the biggest landlord of Clos de Vougeot, owns 5.48 hectares of the vineyard. Organic farming. Indigenous yeast; the grapes are not crushed; remontage and pigeage; using the concrete vats for the fermentation; aging 18 months in the French oak barrels. This is made in three different wines: ‘Clos de Vougeot’, ‘Clos de Vougeot Vieilles Vignes’ and 'Clos de Vougeot Hommage a Jean Morin' (not made every year). Both Vieilles Vignes and Hommage a Jean Morin are made from the plots planted in 1910. Tasted with the current owner/winemaker Francois Labet. Generally speaking, older vine means better quality. Thus, when compared to the younger vine version, this old vine cuvee was more balanced, showing a splendid combination between the grace and power. Its reticent but delightful nose exhibited earth, savoury-mineral, mixed spices, dried violet, blackberry and tiny butterscotch. The palate was gentle, while the power and structure retained; the aftertaste was pure and prodigiously long--a real essence of grand cru.
English pairs.new:
这是一瓶来自法国的红酒评论。以下是翻译成中文：

这家酒庄是克洛德沃日厄特（Clos de Vougeot）的最大地主，拥有5.48公顷的葡萄园。采用有机耕作。使用天然酵母；葡萄不进行破碎；进行回收和踩榨；使用混凝土罐进行发酵；在法国橡木桶中陈化18个月。这三款酒分别是：‘克洛德沃日厄特’（Clos de Vougeot）、‘克洛德沃日厄特老树园’（Clos de Vougeot Vieilles Vignes）和‘克洛德沃日厄特致敬让莫林’（Clos de Vougeot Hommage a Jean Morin）（每年不一定都会生产）。老树园和致敬让莫林两款酒都是从1910年种植的葡萄园中酿造的。与年轻树园版本相比，老树园的酒更平衡，展现出优雅和力量的完美结合。酒鼻子沉静但令人愉悦，展现出泥土、咸味矿物质、混合香料、干燥的紫罗兰、黑莓和微量的黄油糖。口感柔和，但力量和结构仍然保留；尾韵纯粹而极长——真正的精髓。

Western reviews.review: A subtle but toasty note of oak mixes with red cherry on this wine's nose. The same aromatics appear on the toned palate but the cherry with its juicy freshness has the upper hand. Fine tannins provide a firm, smooth backdrop for the mouthwatering fruit and the nuanced aromas. Anne Krebiehl MW
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的鼻子中有细微的木头味和红樱桃的香气。口感上同样有这些香气，但红樱桃的鲜甜味更为突出。细致的纤维提供了一个坚实而平滑的背景，让口水流出的水果和微妙的香气都能得到展现。——安妮·克雷比尔 MW

Chinese pairs.original: 超熟桑椹、黑樱桃，甘草，松露的香气，浓郁的酒体，柔滑的单宁，良好的新鲜度和深度。
Chinese pairs.new: Ripe mulberries, black cherries, licorice, and truffle aromas, full-bodied texture, smooth tannins, excellent freshness and depth.

Western reviews.review: This kicks off with an exotic melange of black and tropical fruit. Very dense. Much darker and richer than their 05. The wine finished with ripe plums, spice, floral notes and orange rinds. This exotic and silky textured wine is one of the few Pomerols that performed better in 06 than 05. 96 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒以黑色和热带水果的独特混合开始。非常浓密。比05年份的酒更深沉和丰富。酒尾留有熟透的石榴、香料、花香和橙皮的味道。这款独特而细腻的酒是极少数在06年比05年表现更好的波尔多酒之一。评分：96分。

Western reviews.review: (2008) Absolutely beautiful fragrance, with extraordinary, haunting floral lift and very pure kirsch-touched pure black fruit. There's a fantastic silkiness to the tannins and the refined blackcurrant fruit, with terrific energy and life about it. Lovely weight and balance of concentration and pure, silky finesse.
Western reviews.translation: 2008年：绝美的香气，带有极其迷人的花朵香气和非常纯粹的黑果味，带有黑加拿大樱桃的味道。酒中有着极好的丝滑感和精致的黑加拿大樱桃果味，充满了精力和生命力。酒的重量和平衡非常好，酒中有着纯粹的丝滑感和精致的质感。

Chinese pairs.original: 此酒略显封闭的香气充满黑色水果（黑莓、黑樱桃）的芬芳，以微微的动物皮毛、泥土和花香做点缀。富有张力但润滑的口感展现大量多汁、甜美的果味。这是一款陈年能力绝佳、颇具收藏价值的美酒，所以不要现在就喝，最好再窖藏15年以上。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine has a slightly closed nose, full of dark fruit aromas (blackberry, black cherry), with subtle hints of animal hide, earth and floral notes. The rich, velvety texture showcases a wealth of juicy, sweet fruit flavors. This is a wine with exceptional aging potential and great collectibility, so it's best to lay it down for at least 15 years before drinking.

English pairs.original: Slightly closed on sniff, with lots of black fruits (blackberry, black cherry) laced with a hint of animal fur, earth and flowers. Tense but suave on palate that was full of juicy and sweet fruit. It's an age-worthy wine with remarkable longevity, so don't drink it today, keep it in the cellar for more than 15 years.
English pairs.new: 酒香闭合，黑色水果味（黑莓、黑杏）弥漫其中，伴有动物皮毛、泥土和花朵的微妙气息。口感紧张但优雅，充满了 juicy 和甜美的水果味。这种酒有着出色的长期储存潜力，能够保持15年以上的品质，因此请不要急于饮用，留在酒窖中等待更好的时刻。

Western reviews.review: One of the furthest west of the Saint-Julien estates, this property has been greatly improved with investment from Japanese owner Suntory. The wine from 2015 is dense and impressively concentrated, perfumed black-currant fruits working well with the crisp acidity and solid structure. Drink from 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 圣朱利安区最西端的庄园之一，这家庄园通过日本拥有者Suntory的投资而大大改善了。2015年的酒精浓度高，黑加仑果酱的香气非常浓郁，与清晰的酸度和坚实的结构相得益彰。建议2025年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: Anyone who thinks that modern Bordeaux has become too soft or easy should taste this seriously tannic yet sleek and vibrant wine. So much drive and energy that the weak of heart should better stand back. Better from 2020 and has a couple of decades of ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 任何认为现代波尔多红酒已经变得太软或容易的人，都应该品尝一下这个充满嚴厲的苦味但又细致而生动的红酒。这种酒的力量和能量如此之强，心脏不够坚强的人最好还是退一步。从2020年开始喝，酒龄潜力有几十年。

Western reviews.review: Medium to deep garnet-purple in color, the 2015 Lagrange gives up fragrant notes of chocolate-covered cherries, cassis and blackberry pie with touches of violets, forest floor, truffles and cigar box. Medium-bodied with plenty of intense black fruit and firm, grainy tannins, it has a racy line and long, mineral-laced finish.
Western reviews.translation: 2015年拉格朗酒的颜色是深紫红色，酒中有着浓郁的巧克力覆盖的樱桃、黑加仑和黑莓派的香气，伴有紫罗兰、森林地面、松露和雪茄盒的微妙气息。酒体中充满了黑果的强烈风味，口感中有坚实的粗糙纤维，酒尾清晰流畅，矿物质味道浓郁。

Western reviews.review:
The 2015 Château Lagrange is a heavenly little Saint-Julien that seriously delivers the goods. Based on 75% Cabernet Sauvignon and the rest Merlot and Petit Verdot brought up in around 50% new oak, its deep ruby/purple color is followed by notes of cassis, toasty oak, black licorice and nori (the dried seaweed wrapper used for sushi). With medium to full-bodied richness, beautiful concentration, and ripe tannin, it’s still tight and reserved on the palate and will benefit from 3-5 years of bottle age.

Rating: 92+
Western reviews.translation: 2015年拉格朗日庄园是一款天籁般的圣朱利安红酒，品质出色。由75%卡波弗雷蒙和剩余的梅洛和佩蒂·维多带来，约50%新橡木陈酿，其深红紫色酒液，带有黑加仑、烟熏橡木、黑甘草和海带（用于寿司的干海带）等复杂的香气。酒体中等到中厚，酒精度高，口感浓郁，纤维软化，目前仍然紧绷，需要3-5年陈酿后才能发挥最佳。评分：92+.

Western reviews.review: Suntory bought Lagrange in 1983 and planted 60ha, so now more than 100ha are under vine. Lagrange is known for its freshness and accessibility. The 2015 is a delight, lean and oaky on the nose with blackberry fruit and great finesse. It’s sleek, not super-concentrated, but shows polished tannins and fair acidity. There’s a touch of chocolate and a long, spicy finish. Drinking Window 2022 - 2040
Western reviews.translation: 三得利于1983年收购了拉格朗日（Lagrange），并种植了60公顷的葡萄园，现已有超过100公顷的葡萄园。拉格朗日以其新鲜和易于入口的特性而闻名。2015年的拉格朗日是一款令人愉悦的红酒，鼻子上带有黑莓果味和优雅的质感。它的口感细腻，非超级浓郁，但展现出光滑的橡木味和适度的酸度。酒尾带有巧克力味和长长的辣味。推荐饮用时间：2022-2040年。

Chinese pairs.original: 黑醋栗、奶油、木炭和橡木的味道，柔滑的丹宁，浓郁丰富的酒体，悠长的回味。
Chinese pairs.new: Blackberry, butter, charcoal, and oak flavors, smooth tannins, full-bodied richness, and a long finish.

Western reviews.review: Mittleres Rubin. Offene Nase, deutlich Lebkuchen, dunkle Kirschen, eingemachte Pflaumen. Im Gaumen weich und zugänglich, mittlerer Körper, reife Frucht, die Gerbstoffe sind bereits gut eingebunden, verleihen eine gute Struktur, die Säure wirkt moderat, sorgt dennoch für eine gewisse Frische. Im Abgang von guter wenn auch nicht grosser Länge, endet auf Süssholzwürze. Kein grosser aber ein stimmiger Cos der jetzt für mindestens 10-15 Jahre Spass machen dürfte. 2018-2030. 18 vvPunkte (90/100).
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

颜色：中度红色

香气：开放的鼻子，明显的糖桂饼、黑杏和浸泡的李子。

口感：柔软和容易入口，中等体积，成熟的果实，已经很好地与天然的橡木味结合，提供了良好的结构，酸度适中，保持了清新感。

尾部：较好的长度，但不是很长，结束于甜木糖。

总体评价：这不是一个非常出色的红酒，但它是合理的。它现在应该可以享受至少10-15年的时间。推荐时间：2018-2030。评分：18分（相当于90/100）。

Western reviews.review: Medium bodied, bright, fresh, earthy red berries, with notes of spice, earth, tobacco, espresso, fennel and fresh herbs. The texture is soft, there is an easy elegance to the wine. Fully mature, this is as good as it is going to get. So, if you want to enjoy the remainder of the of the soft fruits, pop a cork before the wine begins its slow fade into old age. The wine was made from blending 85% Cabernet Sauvignon, 12% Merlot, and 3% Cabernet Franc, reaching 13.4% alcohol. Not decanted and just popped and poured was the way to go with this wine.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的体积适中，清澈明亮，具有新鲜的土壤味和红果味，伴有香料、土壤、烟草、咖啡、荜拌和新鲜香草的香气。酒体柔软，具有轻松的优雅感。酒已经完全成熟，这是它将会达到的最佳状态。如果你想享受剩余的软果味，建议在酒开始慢慢老化之前打开瓶子。酒的成分为85%卡波雷尔·沙维尼翁、12%梅洛和3%卡波雷尔·法兰克，酒精度13.4%。没有脱颗粒直接打开瓶子倒酒是最好的选择。

Western reviews.review: Noten von Gewürzen und Beeren, komplex und interessant; sehr verschlossen - der verschlossenste Wein der Verkostung; dicht und voll im Ansatz, lang und komplett im Mund, herrlich reifes, perfekt geschliffenes Tannin; braucht Zeit zur Reife: Etwas demonstrativ dicht und technisch vielleicht, was auf Kosten von Liebreiz und Eleganz gehen mag, doch auch mit Typizität und Charakter.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的味道非常复杂和有趣，带有香料和浆果的味道。口感非常密集和丰富，口中留下深刻的印象。酒中的橡木味非常完美，非常细腻。然而，这瓶红酒需要时间来成熟。虽然它可能有些过于密集和技术化，缺乏魅力和优雅，但它仍然保留了典型的风格和个性。

Western reviews.review: With its perfumed aromas, this is a wine that has richness and sweetness, with soft velvet power. It has an intense wood element that needs to blend into the rest of the wine, but the sweet black currant and freshness provide a good balance. This is a seductive wine, with a fine solid character.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有优雅的香气，富有丰富的甜度和柔软的质感。虽然它有强烈的木质元素，但甜黑currant和清新气息的平衡使得它变得更加完美。这是一款诱人的红酒，具有坚实的品质。

Western reviews.review: Tiefdunkles Rubingranat, fast schwarzer Kern, violetter Rand. In der Nase balsamische Nougat-Lakritze-Noten, zart nach dunklen Beeren und exotischen Gewürzen. Am Gaumen sehr präsente Tannine, Bitterschokolade, noch fordernd, dunkle Beerenfrucht mit Wacholder und Schlehen, mineralischer Nachhall, trotz seiner komplexen Form ein recht eleganter Wein mit guter Länge.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，近乎黑色葡萄酒色核心，紫色边缘。鼻子中有巴萨米香、牛奶糖和甘草的香气，微微带有黑色浆果和异国情调的香料味。口感上非常明显的苦味，苦巧克力味，仍然有挑战性，黑色浆果味伴有冬青和山楂，矿物质余味，尽管其复杂的形式，仍然是一个优雅的葡萄酒，具有良好的持久性。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau La Rousselle2020年份是这个年份Fronsac产区不可多得的精品，闻起来异常浓郁，喝起来却特别通透，在这种强烈的对比下，整个酒体也显得颇有层次。入口时的咸感和芝麻的醇香完美贴合，再加上话梅和蔓越莓的酸甜口感，活力值瞬间拉满。有时候不得不承认，风土好的葡萄酒就是这么牛，轻轻松松就可以酿的很好喝。
Chinese pairs.new:
Chateau La Rousselle

This 2020 vintage is a standout gem from the Fronsac region. The nose is incredibly rich, yet the palate is surprisingly refined. The contrast is striking, with a layered complexity that unfolds with each sip.

The initial saltiness and nutty flavors meld together seamlessly, accompanied by a delightful balance of tart cherry and wild berry notes. The energy is electric, with a full-bodied finish that's both satisfying and refreshing.

Sometimes, you just have to admit that a great wine is a testament to the terroir. With minimal effort, Chateau La Rousselle delivers a truly enjoyable drinking experience.

English pairs.original: Chateau La Rousselle 2020 is a rare high-quality wine from Fronsac in 2020 vintage, with a fuller fragrance and a transparent palate. In such a stark contrast, the body seems to have more layers. With the salty attack which is perfectly matched with the mellow aroma of sesame, and a extra sweet and sour palate of prunes and cranberries, the wine instantly gives full vitality. Sometimes you have to admit that a good terroir is so essential to wine that you could make good wine easily.
English pairs.new: 查泰aux拉鲁塞勒 2020是一款来自弗朗萨克地区2020年产的罕见高品质红酒，具有更丰富的香气和透明的口感。在这种鲜明的对比中，酒体似乎有更多的层次。酒中的咸味攻击与芝麻般的柔和香气完美匹配，口感则是浓郁的枣子和蔓越莓的甜酸混合，酒在瞬间展现出旺盛的活力。有时你不得不承认，好土壤对于酒的制作至关重要，甚至可以轻松制作出好酒。

Western reviews.review: Dense and dark fruits. Abundantly distributed and ripe tannins. Ample and full-bodied, with highly vibrant acidity making the mouthfeel quite sensational and curvy. Needs 2-3 years to harmonise then will keep for up to 15 years.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感丰富饱满，果味浓郁，深色。充分发酵的橡木味和成熟的纤维素使得口感非常丰富和曲线美。需要2-3年时间来达到完美的和谐状态，然后可以保存15年。

Chinese pairs.original: 成熟覆盆子等红色水果的香气及橡木和石墨的香气；中度酒体；口感集中，单宁如天鹅绒般柔软，余味中带有橡木的气息。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of ripe blackberries and red fruit, along with notes of oak and graphite; medium-bodied; concentrated flavors with silky smooth tannins and a lingering oak finish.
