Western reviews.review: Delicate and elegant wine, with smoky fruit, ripe but freshened with a tight layer of acidity. It has delicious black currant juice flavors, but the texture remains light and the tannins soft.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶优雅的红酒，具有烟熏的果味，口感丰富但又带有清新的酸度。它的黑currant果汁味道非常美味，但口感仍然轻盈，纤维软且不苦。

Western reviews.review: Tiefdunkles Rubingranat, jugendliche Reflexe, violetter Rand. In der Nase intensive Waldbeerenaromen, etwas Preiselbeeren, feine tabakige Nuancen, ein Hauch von Muskatnuss. Am Gaumen saftig und frisch, gute Komplexität, rotbeerige Frucht, präsente, gut integrierte Tannine, feine Extraktsüße im Nachhall, zitronig-kirschiger Nachhall, erstaunlicher Säurebogen, der gut eingebaut ist.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，年轻的反光，紫色边缘。酒鼻中浓郁的森林果实香气，带有蓝莓和烟草的细微差别，微微带有孜然香。口感丰富、清新，复杂性佳，红色果实香气浓郁，现成的、完美融合的坚果感，余味中有细微的甜度，余味中带有柑橘和樱桃的味道，令人惊讶的酸度曲线，完美地融合在一起。

Western reviews.review: (2007) Very composed, attractive berry fruit. A nice hint of Margaux perfume with some floral and earthy notes. Lovely delicate fruit on the palate, with a silky texture and very composed, rounded fruit. Tannins are rounded and fine, and there is a freshness about this.
Western reviews.translation: 2007年：非常成熟，具有吸引力的浆果风味。有着玛格朗（Margaux）香水的微妙气息，伴有花香和泥土的味道。口感上，细腻的果味非常美丽，具有细腻的质感和非常成熟的圆润果味。纤维素细腻，具有新鲜感。

Chinese pairs.original: 黑莓，黑醋栗和鲜花的气息。酒体丰满，单宁甜美，丰富结构，平衡，优雅。
Chinese pairs.new: Blackberry, black walnut, and floral notes. Full-bodied with sweet tannins, rich structure, balanced, and elegant.

Western reviews.review: Floral in nature, finesse in style, medium-bodied, fresh, soft, silky, and vibrant, the sweet red berries along with notes of earth and tobacco are starting to show quite well. The refined finish, with its touch of crushed rocks, red fruits, and forest leaf has only a bit of tannin to resolve. Drink from 2022-2040.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的特点是花香的气味，优雅的风格，中等体积，新鲜，柔和，细腻，充满活力。甜甜的红果味伴随着泥土和烟草的香气逐渐展现。精致的尾部，带有碎石、红果和森林叶的味道，只有少量的苦味需要消化。建议从2022年到2040年饮用。

Western reviews.review: Medium ruby-red color. The aromas are very attractive, consisting a delicate perfume. The palate is also delicate & perfumed, it is quite light-bodied with flavors of soft red-fruits. The fine tannins in the structure are currently chalky, fine & drying. Alcohol is balanced & the acidity gives good liveliness. The wine is not yet completely in harmony, but its lovely focused fruit suggest it will mature into a beautiful poised, elegant Margaux as d' Issan so often does. 11/09 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深红色，中度浓度。

香气：非常吸引人，带有轻柔的香味。

口感：轻盈，带有轻柔的香味，口感细腻。酒体轻盈，果味柔和。

结构中含有细腻的橡木味，目前呈现出粉笔样质地，细腻且干燥。酒精平衡，酸度给人感觉清新活泼。

虽然酒还没有完全达到和谐，但其美丽的果味预示着它将会成熟为典型的马格努（Margaux）风格的酒，典型的马格努风格的酒通常是优雅典雅的。

2021 Le Petit Mouton de Mouton Rothschil.name: 2021 Le Petit Mouton de Mouton Rothschild

Chinese pairs.original: 当层次丰富而又质感绵柔的单宁包裹味蕾时，我就知道这款酒成功了。虽然酒体并不浑厚，但胜在线条修长且玲珑有致，酸度那更是格外清爽。压榨酒的运用是这款酒的点睛之笔，在延长回甘的同时巧妙地提升了味觉的深度。这款酒向我们证明：无论年份好坏，Le Petit Mouton 永远不会背叛你的味蕾。
Chinese pairs.new: When rich, velvety tannins envelop the palate, I know this wine has succeeded. Although the body isn't full-bodied, it's a triumph of elegance and refinement, with a crisp acidity that's particularly refreshing. The use of press wine is the crowning touch, lengthening the finish while cleverly adding depth to the flavors. This wine proves that no matter the vintage, Le Petit Mouton will never betray your palate.

English pairs.original: When my palate is enveloped by the rich, yet tenderly soft tannins, I know it’s a success. Although the body is not particularly hefty, it excels with its slender, well-defined structure, and the acidity is quite refreshing. The press wine is the crowning touch here, cleverly deepening the flavor profile while lengthening the aftertaste. This wine proves that Le Petit Mouton will always be a faithful delight to your taste buds, irrespective of the vintage’s overall standing.
English pairs.new: 当我的味蕾被丰富而又细腻的苦味所包围时，我就知道它成功了。尽管酒体并不特别丰满，但它却以其纤细而又清晰的结构而脱颖而出，酸度也非常清新。酒庄的精选酒是这里的亮点，巧妙地丰富了口感并延长了余味。这瓶酒证明了勒皮特穆通酒庄的酒酒总是会让你的味蕾感到愉悦，无论是哪个年份的酒都一样。

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby with purple reflections on the pale watery rim. Delicate floral scent with hints of plums and black cherries, subtle savoury note. Medium body, elegant blackberry fruit is well integrated, balanced, savoury tannins. More marked by Cabernet than usual, mineral finish with a little nougat on the back palate.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，带有浅紫色光泽的边缘。酒中带有细微的花香，伴有浆果和黑樱桃的气息，略带干酪味。酒体中等，黑莓果味优雅，.savory的苦味成分平衡。酒中Cabernet的影响较为明显，矿物质的尾韵伴有后口的蜂蜜味。

Western reviews.review: Cigar box, tobacco leaf, smoke, cedar, wet earth and dark red fruits come through in the nose. On the palate, the wine offers supple, polished, fresh, sweet, dark red berries. The fruit in the end is equally vibrant and sweet. The wine blends 77% Cabernet Sauvignon, 19.5% Merlot, 3% Cabernet Franc and a dollop of Petit Verdot to spice things up. 13% ABV. Drink from 2024-2045. 92-94
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中，含有烟盒、烟草叶、烟雾、红檜木、潮湿的土壤和深红色的水果的味道。口感上，酒精呈现出柔软、光滑、新鲜、甜美的深红色浆果。酒尾同样充满活力和甜美。酒中混合了77%卡波雷尔·索维涅、19.5%梅洛、3%卡波雷尔·法兰克和少量佩蒂·维多的葡萄酒，后者为酒带来了辛辣的味道。酒精含量为13%。建议从2024年到2045年饮用。评分92-94分。

Western reviews.review: Intensives Rubinrot. Reine Nase, noch etwas vom Barrique geprägt, reife Kirschen, Johannisbeeren, Kräuter, dazu Brombeeren, sehr schöne Frucht. Im Gaumen mit ordentlich Kraft, die auf den Punkt gereifte Frucht, wird von feinkörnigen Gerbstoffen getragen, leicht cremige Textur, die Säure ist perfekt dosiert, das Holz im Gaumen kaum spürbar, der Wein hat eine sehr gute Balance und ein nicht zu unterschätzendes Lagerpotential. 2025-2040 (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2022. Château Mouton Rothschild)
Western reviews.translation: 极致的红酒。酒香清澈，带有微微的橡木味，熟透的樱桃、黑莓、草药和浆果味，尤其是浆果味非常丰富。口感强劲，熟透的果味被细致的鞣质所支撑，口感轻轻的乳白色，酸度完美调节，橡木味在口中几乎不可察觉，酒有很好的平衡性，并且有着不容小觑的储存潜力。推荐储存时间：2025-2040年（2022年4月在尚未成熟的状态下品尝，来自尚未成熟的尚孟罗思酒庄）。

Western reviews.review: A medium depth of ruby-red color with purple hues at the rim. The aromas express red soft-fruits overlaid by graphite & vanilla notes. The palate combines clean, red soft-fruit aromas with appealing vanilla & cedary new-oak notes. The mid-weight tannic structure has fair grip. Alcohol is balanced & clean red-fruit combines with attractive new, cedary oak on an enduring finish. 04/22 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色，边缘有紫色光泽。酒中的香气中有红色软果的味道，伴有石墨和香草的味道。口感清爽，红色软果的味道与新橡木的香气（有香烟味）相结合。酒的结构中有适度的坚果味，酒精平衡，酒尾持久，留下红色软果和新橡木的味道。评分：4.22分。

Chinese pairs.original: 和我印象中满是青绿感的2006年份不同， Cantenac Brown 2006的香气来的更加醇厚。成熟的黑加仑和红樱桃周围笼罩着一层雪松和树脂的芬芳，沉稳中透着清雅之气。酒庄在2006年份首次采用“分批采收”的方法（正牌酒大多来自高地葡萄园中间最成熟的葡萄果串）。虽然正牌酒只占总产量的30%，但品质方面绝对出类拔萃。流畅的口感、柔和的单宁在一抹石墨般的回甘中画上句号，现在饮用正值巅峰。
Chinese pairs.new: 与我之前的印象不同，Cantenac Brown 2006的香气更加丰富和醇厚。酒中充满成熟的黑加仑和红樱桃的芬芳，伴随着雪松和树脂的清雅气息。酒庄在2006年首次采用分批采收的方法，虽然只占总产量的30%，但品质却出众。酒口感流畅，单宁柔和，完美的回甘使其现在正值巅峰。

English pairs.original: Unlike the greenness about the vintage of 2006 in Bordeaux, Cantenac Brown 2006 expresses a pretty mellow nose. The ripe blackcurrants and red cherries are embraced by a layer of cedar and resin’s freshness, calm and elegant. It is the first vintage that they adopted “intra-parcel selection” during the harvest (they started from the outside of each parcel and finished the core at last). Although the Grand Vin only accounts for 30% of the total production, the quality is unquestionably impressive. The smooth taste and soft tannins end up with a touch of graphite-like texture. This wine is at its drinking peak.
English pairs.new: 与2006年波尔多的绿色风格不同，卡滕纳克布朗2006展现出了一种温和的鼻子。成熟的黑加仑和红樱桃被一层松木和树脂的新鲜感包围，平和而优雅。这是他们采用的“内部分区选择”（intra-parcel selection）第一次（他们从每个分区的外围开始，最后才到核心）。尽管大酒庄只占总产量的30%，质量却令人印象深刻。平滑的口感和柔软的纹理以图形似质的触感结束。这瓶酒已经达到最佳饮用状态。

Western reviews.review: Forest floor and tobacco coupled with blackberries are found in the nose. The wine is fresh, medium/full bodied and finishes with a crisp cassis note, coupled with an herbal streak. The wine was made from a blend of 75% Cabernet Sauvignon and 25% Merlot and was aged in 60% new, French oak barrels. Only 30% of the harvest was used in the Grand Vin. 90 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中融合了森林地面和烟草的味道，伴随着黑莓的气息。酒体清新，中等至中等以上的体积，酒尾带有清脆的黑加思果味，伴随着草药的余韵。这瓶红酒是由75%卡波雷尔·萨维尼翁和25%梅洛特混合酿造的，-aged在60%新法兰克的橡木桶中。仅有30%的收获用于制作Grand Vin。这瓶红酒获得了90分。

Western reviews.review: (2007) Lots of silky, ripe, forward and glossy fruit. Creamy and plush. The palate is very bright and vibrant, with lovely fruit and suede-like tannins. Long and pure, this is very good.
Western reviews.translation: 2007年：这款红酒充满了细滑、成熟、前置和光泽的果味，奶油般的质地，柔软舒适。口感非常清新活泼，果味丰富，纹理像丝绸般细腻。酒尾长长纯净，这是一款非常出色的红酒。

Chinese pairs.original: 香气突出，清新，带有紫罗兰，黑莓和香草的香气，酒体饱满，单宁细腻顺滑，余味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromatic, crisp, with notes of lavender, blackberry, and subtle hints of vanilla, full-bodied with refined tannins and a long, lingering finish.

Western reviews.review: Tobacco,, cigar box, cassis and tobacco notes create the nose. On the attack, the wine is equally young and strict, with a tannic personality. This requires real patience, so give it at least another decade in the cellar. 90 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中有烟草、雪茄盒、黑currant和烟草的味道。口感上，这瓶红酒同样年轻且严格，具有坚实的苦味。需要耐心等待，所以至少再等10年才能品尝到最佳口感。评分：90分。

Western reviews.review: Tobacco,, cigar box, cassis and tobacco notes create the nose. On the attack, the wine is equally young and strict, with a tannic personality. This requires real patience, so give it at least another decade in the cellar. 90 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中充满了烟草、雪茄盒、黑currant和烟草的味道。口感上，这瓶红酒同样年轻且严格，具有坚实的苦味。需要耐心等待，所以至少再等10年才能品尝到最佳口感。评分：90分。

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Rubingranat, zarter violetter Rand. In der Nase vielschichtige Gewürzanklänge, feine dunkle Beerenfrucht, nach Brombeeren und Cassis, sehr einladend. Am Gaumen stoffige Beerenfrucht, rotbeerige Nuancen, finessenreiche Struktur, mit 13 % Alkohol auch nicht zu mächtig, seidige Tannine, zarte Zitrusnote, die Rasse hinzufügt, ein ungemein delikater und eleganter Wein, dezente Lebkuchengewürze im Nachhall, ein Klassiker.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

深红色葡萄酒色，边缘有淡紫色。酒香丰富多层次，带有浓郁的香料味道，细腻的黑色浆果味，类似于黑莓和黑加仑，非常诱人。口感上，浓郁的浆果味，带有红色浆果的余味，结构精致细腻，13%的酒精度量并不强烈，滑顺的苦味，淡淡的柑橘味，增加了品质，非常细腻和优雅的酒，回味中有轻微的糖桂花味，一个经典的酒。

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Rubingranat, zarter violetter Rand. In der Nase vielschichtige Gewürzanklänge, feine dunkle Beerenfrucht, nach Brombeeren und Cassis, sehr einladend. Am Gaumen stoffige Beerenfrucht, rotbeerige Nuancen, finessenreiche Struktur, mit 13 % Alkohol auch nicht zu mächtig, seidige Tannine, zarte Zitrusnote, die Rasse hinzufügt, ein ungemein delikater und eleganter Wein, dezente Lebkuchengewürze im Nachhall, ein Klassiker.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

深红色葡萄酒色，边缘有淡紫色。酒香丰富多层次，带有浓郁的香料味道，细腻的黑色浆果味，类似于黑莓和黑加仑，非常诱人。口感上，浓郁的黑色浆果味，带有红色浆果的余味，结构精致细腻，13%的酒精度量并不强烈，滑顺的苦味，淡淡的柑橘味，增加了品质，非常细腻和优雅的酒，回味中有轻微的糖桂花味，一个经典的酒。

Western reviews.review: Medium to deep, ruby-red color. The wine has a lovely, classic open claret nose combining perfumed blackcurrant with toasty oak & graphite. Concentrated dark fruit on the palate is beautifully fresh, but rich enough to prevent the firm structure of fine-grained tannins being too astringent. Alcohol is balanced & mouth-watering cassis fruit combines with attractive cedary oak & leafy touches on the enduring finish. 11/10 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深度红色，中到深的ruby红色。

香气：典雅黑葡萄酒的开瓶气味，结合了浓郁的黑醋栗、 Toasty 橡木和石墨的香气。

口感：浓郁的黑果味，口感清新但富有层次，坚实的结构和细致的纤维不会太过苦涩。酒精平衡，口感清新且富有层次的黑醋栗果味与吸引人的橡木和叶子味道结合在一起，持久的尾韵。

评分：11/10，DCAMW

Chinese pairs.original: 2014年份的Chateau Haut-Bages Liberal有种莫名的亲和力，无论是柔和的香气，还是纯美的味道都很好地诠释了“小巧”二字的真谛。作为一个气温相对温和的年份，这款酒却自内而外地透着一股成熟感，海棠果、蔓越莓的莓果香气如一抹浅笑，盈盈浮现。在我看来，这款酒是整个2014年份波尔多最具性价比的名庄之一。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2014 Chateau Haut-Bages Liberal has an inexplicable charm, whether it's the soft aroma or the pure flavor, it perfectly embodies the essence of "delicacy". As a relatively mild vintage, this wine exudes maturity from the inside out, with cherry blossom and raspberry fruit aromas that float gently on the surface. In my opinion, this wine is one of the best value chateaux of the 2014 vintage in Bordeaux.

English pairs.original: Chateau Haut-Bages Liberal 2014 is inexplicably accessible. Both the gentle aromas or the pure flavors are excellent interpretation of the term ‘delicate’. For a vintage produced in relatively mild temperature, this wine shows a good level of ripeness from the inside out. The aromas of crab apple and cranberries are light, emerging like a gentle smile. In my opinion, this is one of the best value Bordeaux wines of the 2014 vintage.
English pairs.new: 夏图哈布日利伯塔尔2014年是难以置信的易于入口。无论是轻柔的香气还是纯粹的口感，都是对“轻盈”的完美诠释。由于产于相对温和的气候，这款酒展现出从内部到外部都充满成熟的气息。苹果和蔓越莓的香气轻柔，像一道温和的微笑。根据我的观察，这是2014年波尔多最值得推荐的酒之一。

Western reviews.review: Leuchtendes Rubin, violette Reflexe. Zurückhaltende Nase, das braucht Zeit, dunkle Kirschen, schwarze Johannisbeeren, Trüffel, Harz, Mokka und Rauch, sehr komplex und angenehm Tief. Der Gaumen beginnt weich, wird dann rasch straffer, die Frucht ist ein mix aus Himbeeren, Brombeeren und Sauerkirschen, markante Gerbstoffe, fein gewoben, die Säure stimmt, der Wein wirkt verspielt und zeigt Energie, die Eleganz ist bestechend, hier ist alles an seinem Platz, im Abgang wunderbar lang und harmonisch. Ein sehr präziser, hocheleganter Pauillac der gut reifen wird, stilistisch ein Hit. Jetzt bis 2038
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是亮丽的红宝石色，带有紫色的反光。酒鼻子虽然有些保留，但需要时间才能释放出全部的香气，包括黑杏子、黑莓、松露、树脂、摩卡和烟雾等，非常复杂且深刻。口感开始柔软，然后迅速变得更加紧致，果味是黑莓、牛尾果和酸枣的混合，具有明显的鞣质，细致地编织在一起，酸度恰到好处，酒味轻盈且充满活力，优雅的风格令人印象深刻，每个元素都处于最佳状态，尾部长达数分钟，和谐而美妙。这是一瓶非常精确、优雅的波尔多红酒，需要时间来成熟，风格上是一绝。建议在2038年之前享用。

Western reviews.review: The estate, under the direction of Claire Lurton, continues its slow regular progress. In this vintage, the emphasis is on the fruit, which is forward and full of black-currant flavors. There is a good medium-term potential to this ripely attractive wine. Drink starting from 2022.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒是克莱尔·卢顿（Claire Lurton）指导下的庄园出品。今年的产量以果味为主，果味丰富，带有黑加仑（黑currant）风味。酒体中长期潜力较好，推荐从2022年开始饮用。

Western reviews.review: Leuchtendes Rubin, violette Reflexe. Zurückhaltende Nase, das braucht Zeit, dunkle Kirschen, schwarze Johannisbeeren, Trüffel, Harz, Mokka und Rauch, sehr komplex und angenehm Tief. Der Gaumen beginnt weich, wird dann rasch straffer, die Frucht ist ein mix aus Himbeeren, Brombeeren und Sauerkirschen, markante Gerbstoffe, fein gewoben, die Säure stimmt, der Wein wirkt verspielt und zeigt Energie, die Eleganz ist bestechend, hier ist alles an seinem Platz, im Abgang wunderbar lang und harmonisch. Ein sehr präziser, hocheleganter Pauillac der gut reifen wird, stilistisch ein Hit. Jetzt bis 2038
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是亮丽的红宝石色，带有紫色的反光。酒鼻子虽然有些保留，但需要时间才能释放出全部的香气，包括黑杏子、黑莓、松露、树脂、摩卡和烟雾等，非常复杂且深邃。口感开始柔软，然后迅速变得更加紧致，果味是黑莓、牛尾果和酸枣的混合，具有明显的鞣质，细致地编织在一起，酸度恰到好处，酒味轻盈且充满活力，优雅的风格令人印象深刻，每个元素都处于最佳状态，尾部长达数分钟，非常和谐。这个非常精确、优雅的波尔尼克酒在成熟后会变得更加出色，风格上是一种成功的典范。建议在2038年之前享用。

Western reviews.review: The estate, under the direction of Claire Lurton, continues its slow regular progress. In this vintage, the emphasis is on the fruit, which is forward and full of black-currant flavors. There is a good medium-term potential to this ripely attractive wine. Drink starting from 2022.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒是克莱尔·卢顿（Claire Lurton）指导下的庄园出品。今年的产量以果味为主，果味丰富，带有黑加仑（黑currant）风味。酒体中长期潜力较好，推荐从2022年开始饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Langoa Barton 2023 继承了2022年份的清晰的果香和柔和的单宁。丰富的榛果和可可粉香气并没有掩盖果香，摇杯时，酸樱桃和蓝莓的芳香缓缓浮现，仿佛刚刚睁开的朦胧睡眼。新酒窖对单宁的精细打磨显而易见，其沉稳气质与收尾时经典的石墨芳香相呼应，完美展现了老牌波尔多的经典气质。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau Langoa Barton 2023 retains the 2022 vintage's crisp fruit aromas and soft tannins. Rich hazelnut and cocoa powder notes complement the fruit aromas without overpowering them. As the wine is swirled, subtle cherry and blueberry scents emerge, reminiscent of a gentle morning after a refreshing sleep. The new cellar's fine-tuned tannin work is evident, its elegant demeanor harmonizing with the classic graphite notes at the finish, perfectly showcasing the classic style of an old Bordeaux.

English pairs.original: Chateau Langoa Barton 2023 inherits the clear fruit aromas and soft tannins like the vintage of 2022. The rich scents of hazelnut and cocoa powder do not overshadow the fruitiness; when the glass is swirled, the aromas of tart cherries and blueberries gradually emerge, like eyes slowly opening from a misty sleep. The fine polishing of tannins by the new wine cellar is evident, harmonizing with the stable demeanor and the classic graphite note at length, perfectly showcasing the classic character of an established Bordeaux wine.
English pairs.new: 查塔欧朗加巴顿 2023 年红酒继承了 2022 年的清晰果香和柔和的橡木味。杏仁和可可粉的丰富香气并未遮盖果香，当酒杯被搅动时，渐渐出现的酸橙和蓝berries的香气，如同从迷雾中慢慢睁开的眼睛。新酒窖对橡木味的精细打磨显而易见，与稳定的性格和长时间的典型石墨笔记相和谐，完美展现了成熟的波尔多红酒的典型特征。

Western reviews.review: This wine is generous and elegant, with lovely tannins that harmonize fruitiness with minerality. It boasts a fullish mid-palate and solid structure. The finish is marked by scented flavors and a savory note, lingering fairly long on the palate.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒富有体贴和优雅，具有美妙的苦味和矿物质的和谐。它具有丰富的中口感和坚实的结构。尾部带有香气和咸味的味道，留在口中相对较长。

Western reviews.review: Dunkle Frucht, reif, ausladend, feinwürzig, klar und rein wie e in Bergbach; zeigt Fleisch am Knochen, eine saftige Frucht, feinkörniges Tannin; sehr langer, saliner Abgang, Harmonisch, wird früh Spass machen, kann reifen.
Western reviews.translation: 深色果味，成熟，开阔，细腻，清澈如山泉水；展现出肉质质感，丰富的果味，细致的苦味；长长的，清爽的尾韵，和谐，很快会让人感到愉悦，随着时间的推移会更加成熟。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark, but not quite opaque purple ruby in color. The aromas show cedary touches overlaying ripe damson & black-cherry fruit. The palate has a mouth-watering freshness. The tannins are fine & supple, but have a dusty grip. Fresh acidity gives a long finish layered with cedary spice, blackcurrant/cassis & black-cherry fruit which is smooth & elegant. 04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深紫红色，接近透明。酒中的香气中有松木的味道，覆盖着熟透的浆果和黑樱桃的味道。口感清新，口感丰富。酒中的纤维质细腻，但略带干燥感。酒中的酸度清新，酒尾长且丰富，带有松木香、黑葡萄和黑樱桃的味道，口感平滑优雅。评分：4.24分（ep）DCAMW。

2018 Chateau Smith Haut Lafitte 'Le Peti.name: 2018 Chateau Smith Haut Lafitte 'Le Petit Smith Haut Lafitte'

Chinese pairs.original: 轻巧而清晰的香料感迎面扑来，彷如走进了孟买的香料市场。入口的层次感十分突出，爆果一般的浆果芬芳背后是精致的烘焙坚果醇香。流畅而宜饮的同时不缺复杂度和结构感，抛光过的单宁让整个酒体变得顺滑。从任何角度来说，这都是一支可以媲美正牌酒的佳作。
Chinese pairs.new: A delicate and crisp spice sensation hits the senses, like stepping into a bustling spice market in Mumbai. The layered entry is striking, with a fruit bomb-like fruitiness giving way to refined, toasted nuttiness. Smooth and approachable, yet lacking in neither complexity nor structure, the polished tannins make the entire wine feel silky. From any angle, this is a worthy rival to a top-shelf wine.

English pairs.original: Refined and precise spices blow on my face, like walking into a spices market in Mumbai. The entry delivers with multi-layers; behind the delicate dried fruits, I can feel plenty of succulent wild berries. This wine is straightforward to drink, but it doesn’t lack any structure or complexity. Polished tannins provide a graceful line and a sense of flowing on the aftertaste. From any point of view, this is an excellent wine to compete with many first labels.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的香气精致细致，像走进孟买的香料市场一样，各种香料的味道在我的脸上扑面而来。入口层次丰富，细致的干果味下面还隐藏着丰富的野生浆果味。这款红酒喝起来很直接，但并不缺乏结构和复杂性。光滑的橡胶质感提供了优雅的线条和余味的流动感。从任何角度来看，这是一款与许多顶级红酒竞争的优秀红酒。

Western reviews.review: One of two second white wines from this top estate, this has a ripe pineapple and apple character that is enhanced by wood aging. Rich and full in the mouth, it is spicy and likely to be ready from 2022. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶来自顶级庄园的两瓶白酒之一。酒中充满了成熟的菠萝和苹果的风味，木桶陈化使其更加丰富。口感丰富饱满，带有辛辣的味道，预计2022年后即可享用。- 罗杰·沃斯

Western reviews.review: Cigar box, cedar, tobacco leaf, flowers, blackberry, currants, licorice, vanilla and dark cherry aromatics create the nose. On the palate, the wine is round,, soft, polished and fresh with good sweetness to the fruits, concentration and a finish loaded with cocoa, cherries, licorice, spice and espresso. This is a top vintage for Le Petit Haut Lafitte that will drink well for at least 12 years or more. The wine is made from a blend of 60% Cabernet Sauvignon and 40% Merlot.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中包含了烟盒、红木、烟叶、花朵、黑莓、黑加仑、甘草、香草和黑樱桃等复杂的香味。口感上，酒体圆润、柔软、光滑、清新，果味甜美，酒精浓度高，尾部留有巧克力、樱桃、甘草、香料和咖啡的余味。这是一款顶级的莱皮特奥拉菲特（Le Petit Haut Lafitte）红酒，至少可以饮用12年以上。酒款由60%卡波弗雷（Cabernet Sauvignon）和40%梅洛（Merlot）两种葡萄品种组成。

Western reviews.review: (60% Cabernet Sauvignon, 40% Merlot, junge Reben): Dunkles Rubin. Intensive Nase, sehr schönes Parfum, neben Kirschen auch Cassis und Brombeere, dazu florale Noten, etwas Kardamom, sehr schöne Komplexität. Der Gaumen beginnt weich, dann breitet der Wein sich aus, zeigt einen mittleren Körper, sehr feine Gerbstoffe, der Alkohol perfekt verpackt, die Säure belebt, hält die eindrückliche, reife Frucht frisch. Im Abgang mit einem Mix aus dunklen und roten Beeren sowie einer dezenten Sahnenote. Sehr ausgewogen, dürfte früh Spass machen, hat Reserven. 2023-2035 (Verkostet auf Château Smith Haut Lafitte, am 01.04.2019)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一瓶红酒评论，内容如下：

(60% Cabernet Sauvignon, 40% Merlot, junge Reben)

颜色：深红色

香气：浓郁的香气，带有鲜花、柿子、黑berries和一点点香料的味道。

口感：入口柔和，随后展现出中等体积的口感，细腻的橡木味，酒精完美地融入，酸度清新，保持着成熟的果味的新鲜感。

尾部：混合了黑berries和红berries的味道，以及一丝淡淡的奶油味。

总体评价：非常平衡，适合早期享用，具有储存潜力。

推荐饮用时间：2023-2035年

注：本评论于2019年4月1日在Château Smith Haut Lafitte进行了品尝。

Western reviews.review: One of two second white wines from this top estate, this has a ripe pineapple and apple character that is enhanced by wood aging. Rich and full in the mouth, it is spicy and likely to be ready from 2022. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶来自顶级庄园的两瓶白酒之一。酒中充满了成熟的菠萝和苹果的风味，木桶陈化使其更加丰富。口感丰富饱满，带有辛辣的味道，预计2022年后即可享用。- 罗杰·沃斯

Western reviews.review: Cigar box, cedar, tobacco leaf, flowers, blackberry, currants, licorice, vanilla and dark cherry aromatics create the nose. On the palate, the wine is round,, soft, polished and fresh with good sweetness to the fruits, concentration and a finish loaded with cocoa, cherries, licorice, spice and espresso. This is a top vintage for Le Petit Haut Lafitte that will drink well for at least 12 years or more. The wine is made from a blend of 60% Cabernet Sauvignon and 40% Merlot.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中包含了烟盒、红木、烟叶、花朵、黑莓、黑加仑、甘草、香草和黑樱桃等复杂的香味。口感上，酒体圆润、柔软、光滑、清新，果味甜美，酒精浓度高，尾部留有巧克力、樱桃、甘草、香料和咖啡的余味。这是一款顶级的莱皮特奥拉菲特（Le Petit Haut Lafitte）红酒，至少可以饮用12年以上。酒款由60%卡波弗雷（Cabernet Sauvignon）和40%梅洛（Merlot）两种葡萄品种混合而成。

Chinese pairs.original: 巨兽般的结构是力士金2018最大的特点，无论是香气还是口感都充满着力量。强劲的单宁并不会在年轻时那么讨喜，但耐心等待后会仍然会被浓郁的黑色浆果、丰富的甜香料，以及些许香草奶油咖啡的气息所吸引。
Chinese pairs.new: The defining characteristic of Lanson Gold Label 2018 is its massive structure, with both the aroma and taste bursting with power. The robust tannins may not be appealing at a young age, but with patience, they will be drawn to the rich black fruit, opulent sweet spices, and subtle hints of vanilla coffee.

English pairs.original: The mammoth-like structure is the most prominent appearance of Lascombes 2019; both the nose and the palate are brimming with strength. The powerful tannins are not very friendly at a young age, but you will be attracted by intense crushed berries, lavish spiciness, and scents of vanilla milk coffee if you are patient enough.
English pairs.new: 拉斯科姆斯2019的最显著特征是巨型般的结构；鼻子和口感都充满了力量。强大的苦味物质在年轻时并不友好，但如果你有耐心的话，你会被浓郁的浆果味、丰富的香料味和香草奶油咖啡的香气所吸引。

Western reviews.review: « Dark colour with red highlights that are still youthful. The nose is elegant with very endearing smoky and woodsy accents. The palate beguiles with its very fine mouthfeel and soft tannins. The wood is still very present but offers the promise of a composed future for this superlative wine. »
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色，带有年轻的红色光泽。酒香优雅，带有令人愉悦的烟熏和林木香味。口感细腻，苦味柔和。木质味仍然很明显，但这瓶酒的未来前景很有希望。

Western reviews.review: Diese Nase erinnert mich oft an einen Merlot aus dem Tessin, expressiv, verführerisch, Himbeeren, Waldbeeren, steinig und kühl, viel Komplexität ist in diesem Wein. Der Gaumen ist schon wunderbar zugänglich, von mittlerem Körper, mit einer auf den Punkt gereiften Frucht und einer top Struktur mit feinem Gerbstoff und knackiger Säure. Lang, würzig, floral im Rückaroma. Verführerisch und noch besser, als ich ihn En Primeur eingeschätzt habe. 2024-2042 (Verkostet am 21. Juni 2021 im Rahmen der UGCB Probe in Genf)
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的鼻子让我常常想起瑞士的梅洛葡萄酒，具有表达力、诱人、浓郁的黑莓、森林果实、岩石和清凉的特征，这瓶酒的复杂性令人惊叹。口感非常容易入口，中等体积，成熟的果实和完美的结构，细腻的鞣质和清脆的酸度。酒尾长长，芳香浓郁，花香味道。非常诱人，甚至比我在品酒会上品尝时的预期更好。推荐饮用时间：2024-2042（2021年6月21日在日内瓦的UGCB品酒会上品尝）。

Western reviews.review: This large estate to the north of Margaux village is performing well. There is still a tendency to overuse wood aging, but powerful black fruits will provide balance as the wine ages. With its structure and dark tannins, this wine has a long-term perspective. Drink from 2027. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 玛格诺（Margaux）村北部的这座大型庄园表现良好。虽然仍然倾向于过度使用木桶陈化，但随着酒的陈化，强大的黑色水果会提供平衡。酒的结构和深色鞣质使其具有长期前景。建议2027年后饮用。- 罗杰沃斯（Roger Voss）

Western reviews.review: With a smoke filled nose of plum, espresso, licorice, cigar box and roasted dark red fruits, the wine is round, lush and full-bodied with espresso and dark chocolate that rise along with all the ripe, dark red berries in the finish. It is going to take time for the oak to integrate, therefore, you will need to be either oak tolerant or very patient with this one. 92 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的气味中充满了烟雾、浓郁的浆果、浓缩的咖啡、甘草、雪茄盒和烤红果的味道。酒体圆润、丰富、浓郁，口感中咖啡和黑巧克力与成熟的红果一起呈现。由于橡木味需要时间来融合，所以你需要耐心等待，或者你需要对橡木味有耐受性。评分92分。

Western reviews.review: Very dark ruby, opaque core with purple reflections and a delicate brightening on the rim. Hints of roasted aromas and nougat caramel, black forest berry confit in the background along with subtle liquorice and candied orange zest. Complex, juicy, black cherries, ripe tannins with a chocolaty touch on the finish and underlying mineral notes; a powerful, tasty food wine which will be drinking perfectly 2025-2045..
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色，几乎透明的核心带有紫色反射，酒口边缘有细微的光泽。酒中有烤焦的香气和奶油糖浆，黑森林浓果酱的背景中伴有细微的甘草和糖橙皮的香气。酒口复杂，果实丰富，黑草莓味道浓郁，酒中有成熟的纤维和巧克力味道，底层有矿物质的味道；这是一瓶强劲的美味佳酿，适合与食物搭配，最佳饮用时间为2025-2045年。

Chinese pairs.original: 2022年份的Chateau Malescasse 有股奇特的咸鲜感，让我误以为在品鉴一款石灰岩土壤出产的葡萄酒。赤霞珠的香气纯正而醇厚，混合着甘草糖、黑胡椒及丁香的气息，使整款酒显得分外迷人。最让我喜欢的是它对单宁地打磨，总给人一股深沉低调的绵密感，高级感瞬间拉满。收尾时，一股淡淡的石墨气息尽显堪称一绝，恍若置身于幽静的深谷。
Chinese pairs.new: 2022年份的Chateau Malescasse 具有独特的咸鲜味，令人误以为它是来自石灰岩土壤的葡萄酒。赤霞珠的香气纯正而浓郁，融合了甘草糖、黑胡椒和丁香的气息，使整款酒显得异常迷人。最让我喜欢的是它对单宁的处理，总给人一种深沉低调的细腻感，高级感瞬间爆发。收尾时，一股淡淡的石墨气息完美呈现，仿佛置身于幽静的深谷。

English pairs.original: Chateau Malescasse 2022 possesses a unique salty freshness, misleading me into believing I was sampling a wine derived from limestone soils. The pure aroma of Cabernet Sauvignon, intermingled with nuances of licorice, black pepper, and clove, lends an extraordinary charm to the nose. What enamors me most is its meticulously refined tannins, which consistently impart a profound yet velvety sensation, immediately amplifying the wine’s sophistication. As the taste reaches its finale, a subtle hint of graphite makes its presence known, a touch so exquisite it’s like finding oneself in the serenity of a secluded valley.
English pairs.new: 查泰aux马莱斯卡斯 2022红酒具有独特的咸鲜味，让我误以为它来自石灰岩土壤的葡萄酒。卡布塞尔·索维涅的纯粹香气，混合了 licorice、黑胡椒和丁香的细微差别，使得鼻子闻起来异常迷人。最让我着迷的是它精心打造的纤维素，始终给人深刻而又细腻的感觉，立即增强了酒的高雅感。味道达到高潮时，微妙的石墨味开始显现，如此精致的感觉，就像置身于一个幽静的山谷中。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby, opaque core, purple reflections, broader brightening on the rim. Delicately floral, ripe plums, some blackberry fruit and tobacco. Juicy, elegant, good fruit expression, appealing freshness, balanced and lasting with a mineral and salty finish, good length, certain ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，透明核心，紫色反射，杯口更广泛的亮光。细腻的花香，成熟的李子，少量黑莓果和烟草。 juicy，优雅，良好的果实表达，吸引人的新鲜感，平衡和持久的矿物质和咸味的尾部，良好的长度，确保了成熟的潜力。

Western reviews.review: Black currants, licorice, tobacco leaf and spearmint shine in the nose with no effort. On the palate, the wine is medium-bodied, soft, polished and vibrant, with chewy currants in the round, savory-edged finish. Drink from 2026-2040. 90-92 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中，黑加仑果、甘草、烟草叶和薄荷叶的味道清晰可辨。口感中等体积，软滑、光滑、生动，口感丰富，尾部有坚果的味道。建议2026-2040年饮用。评分：90-92分。

Western reviews.review: Sehr expressiv, fast schon kitschig in der Frucht, nein, nicht negativ gemeint, eine strahlende Brombeerfrucht ist das. Im Auftakt rund, zugänglich, knackige Frucht, gut dosiertes Tannin, der Wein zeigt Ausgewogenheit und durchaus Eleganz, hallt im Abgang lange nach. Einmal mehr ein harmonisches Gesamtpaket. 2028-2048+ (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / Grand Cercle / Château la Dauphine) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation: 非常有表现力，几乎是 kitsch 的水果味道，但不是负面的意思，闪闪发光的莓果味道。起始时圆润，易于入口，清脆的水果味道，适量的苦味，酒呈现出平衡和优雅，余味悠长。一次又一次地呈现出和谐的整体效果。2028-2048+ (2023年4月在Grand Cercle / Château la Dauphine进行了"En Primeur"品鉴) #primeurs22

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby, opaque core, purple reflections, broader brightening on the rim. Delicately floral, ripe plums, some blackberry fruit and tobacco. Juicy, elegant, good fruit expression, appealing freshness, balanced and lasting with a mineral and salty finish, good length, certain ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，透明核心，紫色反射，杯口更广泛的亮光。细腻的花香，熟透的李子，少量黑莓果和烟草。口感 juicy，优雅，好果味表达，吸引人的新鲜感，平衡和持久，矿物质和咸味的尾韵，好长度，肯定有 ageing 潜力。

Western reviews.review: Black currants, licorice, tobacco leaf and spearmint shine in the nose with no effort. On the palate, the wine is medium-bodied, soft, polished and vibrant, with chewy currants in the round, savory-edged finish. Drink from 2026-2040. 90-92 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中，黑加仑果、甘草、烟草叶和薄荷叶的味道清晰可辨。口感中等体积，软滑、光滑、生动，口感丰富，尾部有坚果的味道。建议2026-2040年饮用。评分：90-92分。

Chinese pairs.original: 浓墨重彩而又甜美怡人的黑色水果香气不断地抚摸着我的鼻子，能够感受到丰富黑莓、桑葚和樱桃的果汁在杯中缭绕。和预想一样，入口的浓郁感爆棚，伴随着绵密厚实的单宁以及劲道十足的结构感。明亮的酸度在带来清新感的同时也点亮了酒体，让如此浓郁的酒变得清亮了起来，也让收尾处的温热酒精得以舒展。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich, vibrant, and sweet black fruit aromas caress my nose, evoking a sense of lush blackberry, elderberry, and cherry juice swirling in the glass. As expected, the palate is packed with intense flavor, accompanied by velvety tannins and a robust structure. Bright acidity brings a refreshing quality while also illuminating the wine, making this rich wine feel bright and lifted, allowing the warm, lingering alcohol to unfurl on the finish.

English pairs.original: The nose pampers me with an abundance of intense and enticing sweet dark berries, such as blackberry, bramble cherry, and wild blueberries. As expected, the entry is fully concentrated, paring with powdery tannins and a powerful structure. A bright acidity infuses the wine with remarkable freshness; it not only lightens up the entire body but cleverly moderates the warming alcohol at length.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的鼻子给了我丰富的浓郁甜黑果香气，如黑莓、荆棘樱桃和野蓝莓。正如预期的那样，入口是浓缩的，搭配细粉状的苦味和强有力的结构。明亮的酸度为酒精注入了令人惊叹的新鲜感，不仅使整个身体变得轻盈，而且巧妙地调节了酒精的温暖感。

Western reviews.review: Lots of mulled cherries, blueberries, iron, and bouquet garni emerge from the 2020 Château Faugeres, a rich, focused, yet fruit-loaded barrel sample that has a good sense of purity and elegance. I was able to taste two bottles, both showing medium to full-bodied richness, with one having slightly more precision. Both showed great mid-palates, and this is certainly a beautiful wine in the making. Two to four years should do it well and it’s going to have two decades of longevity.Barrel Sample: 93-95
Western reviews.translation: 2020年夏托法格雷斯（Château Faugeres）是一款精致的红酒，充满了浓郁的樱桃、蓝莓和铁矿味，配上花卉香气。这种酒的口感丰富，果味丰富，具有优雅的纯粹感。 我尝试了两瓶酒，两瓶都呈现出中等到中高的体积，口感丰富，精确度各有不同。两瓶酒都有出色的中口感，这确实是一款美丽的酒。两到四年后，这酒将会达到最佳状态，并且有望在二十年内保持其品质。酒评：93-95分。

Western reviews.review: Red berries, plums and flowers with hints of orange peel. Full-bodied with rich fruit, light jam, creamy tannins and brightness at the end. Lightly salty. Vivid. 70% merlot, 25% cabernet franc and 5% cabernet sauvignon.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感丰富，果味丰富，带有轻微的果酱和奶油般的苦味，最后有明亮的尾韵，略带鹽味。酒中有鲜红果实、李子和花朵的香气，伴有橙皮的微妙气息。酒中70%为梅洛，25%为卡波弗朗克，5%为卡波斯维涅。

Western reviews.review: Deep purple-black colored, the 2020 Faugères stampedes out of the glass with a herd of powerful black fruit notes: blackberry pie, baked black plums and ripe, juicy black cherries, plus hints of wild mushrooms, damp soil, tar and star anise with a waft of tobacco. The full-bodied palate is chock-full of black fruit preserves, framed by ripe, rounded tannins and oodles of freshness, finishing long and earthy. Barrel Sample: 91-93
Western reviews.translation: 2020年法格雷斯红酒呈现深紫黑色，酒香中充满了强烈的黑果味道：黑莓派、烤黑杏子和熟透的黑樱桃，伴有野菌、潮湿土壤、焦油和八角的气息，最后带有烟草的味道。酒口丰富饱满，黑果果酱味道浓郁，圆润的橡皮质和新鲜的味道相互融合，口感长长而泥土味道浓郁。酒评：91-93分。

Western reviews.review: Always a concentrated wine and with low 23hl/ha yields it is expectedly so. This translates as intense charred oak on the nose, but they have done a good job of balancing it with ripe berry fruit alongside liquorice and black chocolate. Sleek and confident with clear depth. Another wine that shows the success of Cabernet Sauvignon in the right places of St-Emilion.Barrel Sample: 91
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒总是非常浓郁，产量只有23hl/ha，自然而然地就如此。这种风格在鼻子里展现出强烈的焦木味，但酒庄做得很好，巧妙地平衡了成熟的浆果和黑巧克力，以及 licorice 的味道。酒体光滑自信，深度清晰。 Cabernet Sauvignon 在 Saint-Émilion 的适当位置又一次证明了自己的成功。酒样评分：91分。

Chinese pairs.original: Aiguilhe今年闻起来就像是高比例品丽珠，而且还是那种鲜美多汁、杯中飘香的品丽珠。我特别喜欢紫罗兰环绕酸枣汁的流畅口感，得益于更低的PH值，这款酒喝起来清澈流畅，干净利索。是非常值得推荐的高性价比美乐混酿。
Chinese pairs.new:
Aiguilhe今年闻起来就像是高比例品丽珠，而且还是那种鲜美多汁、杯中飘香的品丽珠。我特别喜欢紫罗兰环绕酸枣汁的流畅口感，得益于更低的PH值，这款酒喝起来清澈流畅，干净利索。是非常值得推荐的高性价比美乐混酿。

Translated to English:

This year's Aiguilhe smells like a high proportion of Merlot, and it's the kind of fresh, juicy, aromatic Merlot. I particularly enjoy the smooth texture of plum surrounding the cherry juice, thanks to its lower pH value, making the wine taste clear and smooth, clean and crisp. It's a highly recommended high-value Merlot blend.

English pairs.original: On the nose, Aiguilhe 2021 presents itself as a high percentage of Cabernet Franc blend, especially the kind that is fresh and juicy and leaves a lingering fragrance in my glass. I love its smooth palate with the scent of violet and delightful jujube juice. Thanks to a lower pH, this wine delivers a purely clean mouthfeel. It is a valuable Merlot blend that is worth recommending.
English pairs.new: 在鼻子里，Aiguilhe 2021展现出高比例的卡波弗朗克（Cabernet Franc）混合，尤其是那种新鲜、水果味道浓郁且留下持久香气的品种。 我喜欢它的平滑口感，带有紫罗兰和美味的枸杞汁的香气。 由于pH值较低，这款酒呈现出清澈的口感。 这是一款值得推荐的梅洛（Merlot）混合。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby core, purple reflections, broad bright rim. Dark berries, a touch of liquorice, hints of nougat, with blackberry confit. Juicy, red berry fruit on the palate, ripe tannins, freshly structured, lemon citrus, lively, salty finish, very versatile.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色核心，紫色反射，宽广明亮的边缘。黑berry、薄荷糖味道，黑berry confit的暗香。口感丰富，红果味浓郁，熟透的苦味，新鲜的结构，柠檬柑橘味，生动，咸淡的尾韵，非常灵活。

Western reviews.review: Black cherries, sea salt, flowers and herbs create the nose. On the palate, the wine is soft, fresh, polished and fruity, with silky tannins, chalk and freshness in the finish. The wine is made from 90% Merlot and 10% Cabernet Franc. 13.3% ABV. Drink from 2023-2036. 91-93
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中充满了黑樱桃、海盐、花朵和香草的味道。口感上，酒体柔和、清新、光滑、果香丰富，口感细腻，余味中带有石灰味和清新感。酒中90%是梅洛，10%是卡波弗朗克。酒精度13.3%。建议在2023-2036年间饮用。评分：91-93分。

Western reviews.review: Sehr kräftiges Rubin. Die Nase ist fruchtig, mit Noten von Brombeeren, Tabak und schwarzen Kirschen. Der Auftakt ist fleischig und rund, der Wein zeigt erstaunlich viel Körper und eine gute Struktur. Im Abgang endet der Wein auf einen Mix aus roten und dunklen Beeren. Sehr ausgewogen .2026-2040 (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2022. Daniel Vins)
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶非常强劲的红酒，酒色呈深红色。酒鼻中充满了浓郁的果香，带有浆果、烟草和黑樱桃的味道。酒口入口丰富饱满，酒体丰富，结构良好。酒尾留下了红果和黑果的余味，非常平衡。推荐饮用时间：2026-2040年。 (评分时间：2022年4月，评估师：Daniel Vins)

Chinese pairs.original: 洋溢着甜润的黑樱桃果香味，略带矿物味，充满尘土味的单宁含量很高，口感紧致，结构感强。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine is bursting with sweet, velvety black cherry flavors, accompanied by subtle mineral notes and a high level of dusty, tannic complexity. The palate is tight and structured.

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat. Frische rotbeerige Frucht, Kirschkonfit, zart rauchig, mineralischer Touch. Am Gaumen recht lebendiger Stil, wirkt eher mittelgewichtig, kirschiger Nachhall, gute Länge, wirkt etwas alkoholisch, Bitterschoko, etwas trockener Abgang. (Lagern/trinken +20)
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色。新鲜的红果味、樱桃酱、轻微的烟味、矿物质味。口感活泼，中等体积，樱桃味余韵，持久感，略带酒精味，苦巧克力味，干净的尾部。建议储存或饮用20年以上。

Western reviews.review: Violets, bitter chocolate, plums and black raspberry notes make up the perfume. This structured, sturdy style of Lafleur is austere and the tannins are not quite ripe. The plummy finish shows hints of green flavors. For the money this costs today, it's an easy pass.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中包含了紫罗兰、苦巧克力、浆果和黑莓的味道。拉弗勒的风格是结构化的、坚实的，但也有些严肃。这种风格的苦味和未完全成熟的苦味使得口感有些生涩。浆果的余味中带有青涩的味道。考虑到这瓶红酒的价格，个人认为不值得购买。

domaine armand rousseau pere et fils cha.name: domaine armand rousseau pere et fils charmes-chambertin 2012

Chinese pairs.original: 此酒紧闭、新鲜而且清晰的香气中透出红色水果（越橘、红醋栗、红布林）、咸香、岩石、灌木、黄色花朵和若隐若现的灌木味。易饮、特别圆润的口感被缎子似的成熟单宁所增强，但依然保留了Rousseau一贯的优雅和清新。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine has a tightly closed, fresh and clear aroma that reveals red fruits (crowberries, red cherries, red currants), saltiness, stone, underbrush, yellow flowers and a subtle hint of underbrush. Easy to drink, the particularly round texture is enhanced by silky mature tannins, yet still retains Rousseau's signature elegance and freshness.

English pairs.original: Tight, fresh and precise, sniffing of red fruits (lingonberry, red currant, red plum), savoury, stone, scrub, yellow flowers and subtle butterscotch. Approachable and particularly sleek on mouthfeel that was strengthened by the ripe, satiny tannins but still retaining the hallmark fineness and refreshment of Rousseau.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的口感紧致、清新、精确，闻起来有红果味（蓝莓、红currant、红桃子），还有些咸味、石头味、灌木味和黄花味，微微带有糖浆味。口感接近，特别是滑顺，受到成熟、光滑的橡胶质的加强，但仍保留了罗素的典型特点和清新感。

Western reviews.review: (Kurznotiz) Helles Rot. Die Nase eine kleine Droge, floral, Rosenblüten, rote Frucht, super verspielt, alle paar Minuten kommen neue Elemente dazu, hervorragend. Im Gaumen weich, rund, top Gerbstoff, feine Würze, ein Traumtänzer, hochelegant, langanhaltend, ausgewogen. Sensationell aktuell.
Western reviews.translation: 简评：浅红色。酒鼻子上有轻微的药香，花香，玫瑰花，红果，非常轻快，几分钟后会有新的元素出现，非常出色。口感柔和，圆润，顶级的橡木味，细腻的调味，一个梦幻般的舞者，高雅优雅，持久，平衡。目前非常出色。

Chinese pairs.original: 喝的是半支装。此酒的紧实香气在开始时显得颇为深邃，有许多皮革味，但随后慢慢地展现出新鲜感。中等酒体的口感精美、多矿物，带有生津的酸度及优雅的单宁包裹着其充满张力的悠长回味。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine is served in a half-bottle. The wine's taut aroma is initially quite deep, with many leathery notes, but gradually reveals a fresh quality. The medium-bodied palate is refined, with a high mineral content, a refreshing acidity and elegant tannins that wrap around its long, tense finish.

English pairs.original: Half bottle. Deeply leathery and tense on the entry of the bouquet, but the freshness slowly came latter. There was delicacy to the mineral-inflected, medium-bodied flavours that possessed mouth-watering acidity and refined tannins, all wrapped in a tension-filled and very long finish.
English pairs.new: 半瓶装。酒香入口时深度的皮革味和紧张感，但随后逐渐展现出清新感。酒体中矿物质的细腻风味，带有口感清新和细致的橡果感，所有这些都被紧张感充盈的长长尾部所包围。

Western reviews.review: Ruby in color, the wine offers truffle, cigar box and red fruits. This is all about the secondary nuances and the soft, silky, elegant textures. Medium bodied, but with charming, red fruit characteristics, this is at full maturity. This is not a Margaux to make old bones, but in a blind tasting, no one is going to think this is from 2007. It's surprisingly much better than anticipated. 93 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒呈现出深红色，酒中带有松露、雪茄盒和红果的香气。这是所有关于次级细微差别和柔软、丝滑、优雅的质感。酒体中等，但具有迷人的红果特征，这瓶酒已经达到成熟。这种玛格朗酒不适合长期储存，但在无视酒瓶标签的品酒中，人们不会认为这瓶酒是2007年的产物。令人惊讶的是，这瓶酒比预期要好得多。评分93分。

Western reviews.review: Schon der erste aromatische Eindruck haut einen buchstäblich aus den Socken, Die winken unglaublich delikae Noten von Flieder, Himbeere, Moschus, Sauerkirsche, man reibt sich die Nase und glaubt an ein Trugbild, da muss ein Clos du Tart oder so was Ähnliches im Glas sein - doch nein, es ist ein Margaux, versichert Paul Pontallier und ist selber erstaunt und hingerissen vom Charme seines Kindes, das auch im Mund ungemein delikat, elegant und feingliederig daher kommt, voller Liebreiz, dabei auch dicht und sehr lang und komplett; selten so ausgewogen in diesem Stadium und kann doch dauern. Entweder ganz jung geniessen (11/12) oder sechs Jahre reifen lassen. (16/20)
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的第一印象就像一记重击，令人惊艳不已。酒中的芳香令人难以置信地细腻，带有玫瑰花、蓝莓、麝香、山核桃等各种花果香气，闻起来像是在梦中一样美好。然而，这瓶酒并不是来自Clos du Tart这样的顶级葡萄园，而是来自玛格朗（Margaux）地区的葡萄酒。葡萄酒制作人保罗·庞塔利耶（Paul Pontallier）自己也被这瓶酒的魅力所惊艳。他说，这瓶酒在口感上非常细腻、优雅和精致，充满魅力，同时也非常浓郁和持久。这种平衡在这种年龄的葡萄酒中非常罕见。这种葡萄酒可以选择两种方式来享受：一是尽快品尝（11-12年），二是将其储存六年（16/20）。

Western reviews.review: Silky wine, fresh and light, balanced with high acidity cutting through black berry fruits. The structure has some substance, but this is a light, aromatic wine, developing fast, already delicious, and only for medium-term aging.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感细腻，新鲜清爽，酸度高，切割黑莓果味。酒体有一定厚度，但这是一款轻质、香气丰富的红酒，发展迅速，已经非常可口，适合中期陈酿。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, jugendliche Reflexe, violetter Rand. In der Nase zart nach Mandarinenzesten, Waldbeerkonfit, zarte Gewürzanklänge, Nuancen von Himbeeren, Kirschen, Nougat, Cassis. Am Gaumen mittelgewichtig, zartes rotes Beerenkonfit, angenehme Extraktsüße, rund, kaum merkliche Tannine, ein feiner, delikater Weinstil, bereits gut entwickelt und zugänglich, im Moment mit mittlerer Länge ausgestattet.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，年轻的光泽，紫色边缘。鼻子中有淡淡的杏仁味，森林浓缩的蓝莓，微妙的香料味道，浓缩的黑莓，草莓，牛奶糖，黑加仑。口感中等，微妙的红果浓缩，愉悦的浓缩甜度，圆润，几乎不可察觉的苦味，细致的葡萄酒风格，已经很好地成熟和易于接受，目前具有中等长度。

Western reviews.review: Intense colour. Deep, pure bouquet of blackcurrants, cherries some fine, slightly minty oak, all underpinned by lovely minerality. A touch tight in the mouth but fine with silky tannins, remarkable balance, lovely length. Delicious fruit purity.
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的颜色。黑currant、樱桃的清晰、纯粹的香气，伴有细微的薄荷味和精致的橡木味，所有的香气都被矿物质的美妙基调所支配。口感紧致，但细腻的纤维使其变得柔和，令人惊叹的平衡，美妙的持久感。果味纯粹、美味。

Chinese pairs.original: 黑莓，黑醋栗，春天的花，甘草和矿物的香气，丰富强劲的单宁，复杂醇厚的酒体，回味中蕴含甜美而强劲的单宁。
Chinese pairs.new: Blackberry, black walnut, spring flowers, licorice, and mineral aromas. Rich, intense tannins, full-bodied complexity, and a lingering finish with sweet and powerful tannins.

Western reviews.review: Attention grabbing aromatics of flowers, black and red plums, cassis, smoke and licorice. Still tannic, this concentrated, round Margaux wine needs at least another 5-7 more years before it begins to express its personality. 90 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有引人注目的花香、黑桃、红桃、黑加仑和烟草的气味。虽然它仍然具有坚实的口感，但这款浓缩的玛格纳克酒需要至少再过5-7年才能展现出其个性。评分：90分。

Western reviews.review: This seems to tread the line between power and great style with ease. While the fruit is concentrated, it is sweet and ripe, balanced with acidity. Very poised, layered with some good firm tannins and a solid core of dry fruits.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒似乎轻松地平衡了力量和优雅的风格。虽然果味浓郁，但甜度适中，酸度平衡。非常稳重，层次丰富，有些坚实的苦味和干果的坚实核心。

Western reviews.review: (2007) A very good Dauzac, with coffeeish, warming, toasty, plush sweet red berry fruit. Open and generous, there is plenty of sweet fruit here, with a touch of coffee to the tannins and a delicious acidity.
Western reviews.translation: 2007年达祖克(Dauzac)是一款非常出色的红酒，具有浓郁的咖啡味、温暖的、烘烤的、丰富的甜红果味。酒体开阔、慷慨，甜果味丰富，口感中带有咖啡的苦味和可口的酸度。

Chinese pairs.original: 好一个软糯柔润的Chateau Lagrange，其甜美丰润的口感颇为讨喜，隐约中甚至带着些许LFP的影子。2023年份的酒精度明显温和了许多，这令起温柔甜美的气质更为凸显。粉末状的单宁、丝滑的酒体、伴随着淡淡的柔润感，那感觉，就好似一位身材妖娆的女子给你抛了个媚眼。
Chinese pairs.new: A plush and velvety Chateau Lagrange, with a sweet and full-bodied texture that's quite charming, and even hints of LFP in the background. The 2023 vintage has a noticeably softer and more approachable tannin profile, which highlights the wine's gentle sweetness. The powdery tannins, silky texture, and subtle smoothness all come together to create a sensation that's like being flirted with by a sultry beauty.

English pairs.original: What a lusciously smooth and tender Chateau Lagrange, its delicious and rich palate is quite pleasing, hinting at traces of LFP. The alcohol content of the 2023 vintage is noticeably milder, which accentuates its sweet tenderness even more. The powdery tannins, and silky texture, accompanied by a subtle velvety sensation, evoke a feeling akin to a seductive glance from a gracefully charming woman.
English pairs.new: 这款Chateau Lagrange的口感非常滑顺柔滑，口感丰富而美味，带有轻微的LFP风味。2023年产的酒精含量明显较低，这使得酒的甜度和柔韧度更加突出。酒中的粉末状苦味和丝滑的口感，伴随着细微的绵软感，令人感到如同一位优雅迷人的女性的诱人眼神。

Western reviews.review: Displays notable oak influence in prominant cedar and spice notes. The fruit is beautifully extracted, with a lovely texture on the palate. Featuring a firm mid-palate that blends sweet sensations and refreshing acidity. Fairly long finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒展现出明显的橡木影响，带有强烈的松柏和香料的味道。酒中的水果味道被完美提取，口感细腻。中口坚实，融合了甜感和清新酸度。酒尾相对较长。

Western reviews.review: Medium to deep, dark ruby-red color. Rich, jammy dark-fruit aromas have hints of black-plum, but also an earthy aspect. The palate has a smooth, concentrated dark-red & black-cherry with glycerol-like smoothness & vivid juicy dark-fruit. The structure is very fine with chocolatey smoothness. The wine is medium-bodied. Alcohol is balanced & length is good. The wine finishes with juicy black-cherry & blackcurrant fruit. 04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深度红宝石色。

香气：浓郁的浓果香气，带有黑浆果和黑杏的味道，伴有泥土的味道。

口感：滑顺的浓果味道，带有黑樱桃和黑草莓的味道，口感丰富，滑顺如糖。酒体结构细致，带有巧克力般的滑顺感。酒体中等，酒精平衡，持久度良好。酒尾留有黑樱桃和黑黑葡萄的果味。评分：04/24 (ep) DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 身材高挑、面容姣好，举手投足间还散发着迷人的紫罗兰芬芳… 2023年份的Chateau Dalem 果香清脆爽朗，酸石榴和酸樱桃的酸甜气息令人口齿生津，浑身舒畅。这样的Fronsac值得每一位wine bar 的主理人重点关注， 它不仅完美地反映了风土特性，还充分展现了波尔多人精湛的酿酒工艺。无论是与朋友聚会还是独自享受，这么高的性价比哪里去找？
Chinese pairs.new: This 2023 Chateau Dalem exudes an alluring lavender charm, from its statuesque appearance to its elegant demeanor. The wine's crisp and refreshing fruitiness is a symphony of sweet and tangy notes, with hints of pomegranate and cherry that leave the palate refreshed and invigorated. This Fronsac is a standout that deserves the attention of every wine bar owner, perfectly capturing the region's terroir and showcasing the mastery of Bordeaux winemaking. Whether you're sharing it with friends or savoring it alone, its exceptional value is hard to beat.

English pairs.original: Tall and graceful, with a captivating allure reminiscent of enchanting violet fragrances… In the 2023 vintage, Chateau Dalem boasts a crisp and refreshing fruitiness, with the tangy sweetness of pomegranate and sour cherry tantalizing the taste buds, leaving a delightful sensation throughout the body. Such a Fronsac deserves the keen attention of every wine bar owner, as it not only impeccably reflects its terroir but also showcases the Bordeaux artisans’ mastery of winemaking. Whether enjoyed among friends or in solitary contemplation, where else can we find a wine with such exceptional value for money?
English pairs.new: 高挑而优雅，带有迷人的紫罗兰香气的诱惑……在2023年产季，沙勒姆庄园呈现出清新果香，风干的葡萄柚和酸橙味让味蕾感到愉悦，留下一种令人愉快的体验。这样的方卡酒值得每个酒吧老板的关注，因为它不仅完美地反映了其土壤特征，还展现了波尔多酒庄的酿酒师们的精湛技艺。无论是在与朋友共享还是在独自沉思时，哪里还能找到如此优质的价格比率的酒？

Western reviews.review: A great classic Bordeaux with its fantastic quality Cabernet Sauvignon. Great flesh with an excellent backbone, expressive, very tasty. Long lasting vibe. Sublime tannin profile, very well ripe, juicy and long lasting.
Western reviews.translation: 一款经典的波尔多红酒，采用优质的卡波涅（Cabernet Sauvignon）品种。酒体丰富，结构坚实，口感丰富，味道极佳。酒尾持久，余味悠长。酒中的天然纤维（tannin）质地优良，成熟度极佳，口感丰富，持久。

Western reviews.review: Umwerfend im Duft, viel Frucht, Himbeere, Brombeere, Tee, Ir is; schlanker Auftakt, baut aus, zeigt eine delikate Frucht, viel Gerbstoff, fein mit der Frucht verwoben, deutlich leichtfüssiger als auch schon, mit Finesse und sehr guter Länge. Ein sehr eleganter Dalem.
Western reviews.translation:
这段红酒评论的中文翻译是：

令人惊艳的香气，充满了果味，含有莓果、黑莓、茶叶和冰岛等香气；酒体轻盈，起始时清爽，逐渐展开，展现出细腻的果味和丰富的橡木味，果味和橡木味之间的融合非常完美，酒体轻盈，具有优雅的口感和良好的持久度。是一款非常优雅的达莱姆红酒。

Chinese pairs.original: Clos de L’Oratoire 2023年份的品丽珠增加到了25%，由此带来的紫藤花香给我留下了印象深刻。我非常喜欢它在口中的味觉变化，入口时彷如清澈的小溪，回味时却带着丰富的石灰岩粉末，从轻柔到紧致的过程，顺畅而自然，如同情人在耳边念着充满花果芬芳的抒情诗，满心舒爽。
Chinese pairs.new: The Clos de L'Oratoire 2023 vintage boasts a 25% increase in Pinot Noir, leaving a lasting impression with its fragrant wisteria notes. I'm thoroughly enamored with its flavor evolution on the palate, where the entry is as refreshing as a crystal-clear brook, only to reveal a rich limestone dustiness on the finish, unfolding from gentle to taut with effortless ease, like a lover whispering a sonnet of floral and fruity scents in your ear, leaving you feeling carefree.

English pairs.original: With the presence of 25% Merlot in the 2023 vintage, Clos de L’Oratoire leaves a lasting impression with its wisteria fragrance. I particularly adore its taste evolution on the palate, reminiscent of a clear stream upon entry and evolving into rich limestone powder upon finish. The transition from softness to firmness is seamless and natural, it feels like listening to a lover whispering lyrical poetry in an atmosphere filled with floral and fruity aromas, leaving a sense of delightful contentment.
English pairs.new: 2023年产的克洛德洛拉托里（Clos de L’Oratoire）红酒中，含有25%的梅洛（Merlot），这使得它留下了浓郁的紫藤花香气。特别是它的口感演变让我深深着迷，入口时清澈如流水，余韵中则是丰富的石灰质粉末。从柔软到坚实的过渡是如此自然和平滑，就像在充满花香和果香的氛围中倾听爱人轻声吟诵诗歌，留下了令人愉悦的满足感。

Western reviews.review: Flowers, black raspberries, incense, and licorice fill the nose. On the palate, the wine is supple, creamy, fresh, and vibrant. The fruits show the influence of the Cabernet Franc with their spice, and floral edge. There is lift to the sweet, ripe, round berries on the mid-palate, and in the finish. The wine blends 75% Merlot, with 25% Cabernet Franc. 13.5% ABV. Drink from 2027-2042. 93-95 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 酒香中充满了鲜花、黑莓、香烟和甘草的味道。口感丰富、滑顺、清新、生动。酒中的水果受到卡贝网（Cabernet Franc）影响，带有香料和花朵的味道。中口和尾部的甜、熟、圆润的黑莓味道有明显的提升。酒中含有75%梅洛（Merlot）和25%卡贝网（Cabernet Franc）。酒精含量13.5%。建议在2027-2042年内饮用。评分93-95分。

Chinese pairs.original: 和技术团队沟通之后得知，2019年份是Chateau Montlabert 全新酒窖投入使用的第一个年份，难怪我当年品鉴的时候发现它对细节的表达比以往更加精准。得益于更加柔和的单宁以及超越砂质黏土葡萄酒本身的集中度，品鉴这款酒时我感受到前所未有的坦然与自信。这款酒不仅拥有当地风土经典的柔和果香和甜美口感，收尾时居然还带有一丝不同寻常的石墨金属感。在我看来，2019年份注定是 Chateau Montlabert 的高光时刻，也是它迈向高级葡萄酒家庭的重要里程碑。
Chinese pairs.new: After communicating with the technical team, I learned that 2019 was the first year Chateau Montlabert's new cellar was in use, which explains why I found it to be even more precise in its expression of details during my tasting that year. Thanks to softer tannins and a concentration that surpasses the wine's own terroir, I felt an unprecedented sense of calm and confidence when tasting this wine. This wine not only boasts the local terroir's classic soft fruit aromas and sweet palate, but it also ends with an unusual graphite metal sensation. In my opinion, the 2019 vintage is destined to be Chateau Montlabert's crowning moment, and an important milestone on its journey to becoming a top-tier wine estate.

English pairs.original: After talking with the technical team, I found out that the 2019 is the first vintage made in Chateau Montlabert’s new cellar. This explains why I noticed much more precision in the details during my tasting. This wine features softer tannins and a concentration that exceeds expectations for wines from sandy clay soils, giving it an unprecedented sense of ease and confidence. It not only has the classic soft fruit aromas and sweetness, but it also finishes with an unusual graphite metallic note. In my opinion, the 2019 vintage is a standout moment for Chateau Montlabert and a significant milestone as it steps into the realm of fine wine family.
English pairs.new: 与技术团队交谈后，我发现2019年是查特奥蒙特拉伯特（Chateau Montlabert）新酒窖的第一批酒。这种情况解释了我在品尝过程中注意到细节更加精确的原因。这款酒具有柔和的苦味和超出沙质粘土土壤酒的预期的浓度，给人一种前所未有的轻松和自信。它不仅具有经典的软果香和甜度，还有一个不寻常的石墨金属味。根据我的观点，2019年是查特奥蒙特拉伯特的亮点，并且是它进入精酿酒家族的重要里程碑。

Western reviews.review: Flowers, cherries, plums and a touch of cocoa hit all the right notes in the nose. Medium-bodied, silky, fresh, vibrant and fruity, with a soft, polished texture to the finish. This should be enjoyable on release. The wine was made from blending 80% Merlot and 20% Cabernet Franc . Drink from 2022-2036.. 91 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中，含有花朵、樱桃、李子和巧克力味。口感中等，滑顺，新鲜，生动，果香丰富，尾部有软糯的光滑感。该酒应在发售时即可享用。该酒的酿造方法是将80%的梅洛和20%的卡波弗朗克混合。建议于2022-2036年内饮用。评分：91分。

Western reviews.review: Rather deep garnet colour. Pure nose offering some earthy notes, wild berries, cassis, mocha and mild oak. The palate shows good density and freshness with a youthful but ripe texture, grainy tannin, digest dark fruit flavours and a fine length.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色深红色。酒香纯粹，带有泥土味、野生莓果、黑加仑、摩卡和轻微的橡木味。口感丰富，新鲜，年轻但成熟的质地，粗糙的橡胶质感，黑色水果味和长长的尾部。

Western reviews.review: Flowers, cherries, plums and a touch of cocoa hit all the right notes in the nose. Medium-bodied, silky, fresh, vibrant and fruity, with a soft, polished texture to the finish. This should be enjoyable on release. The wine was made from blending 80% Merlot and 20% Cabernet Franc . Drink from 2022-2036.. 91 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中，含有鲜花、樱桃、李子和巧克力味。口感中等，滑顺，新鲜，生动，果香丰富，尾部有细腻的光滑感。该酒应在发售时即可享用。该酒的酿造方法是将80%的梅洛和20%的卡波弗朗克混合。建议在2022-2036年内饮用。评分：91分。

Western reviews.review: Rather deep garnet colour. Pure nose offering some earthy notes, wild berries, cassis, mocha and mild oak. The palate shows good density and freshness with a youthful but ripe texture, grainy tannin, digest dark fruit flavours and a fine length.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色深红色。酒香纯粹，带有泥土味、野生莓果、黑加仑、摩卡和轻微的橡木味。口感丰富，新鲜，年轻但成熟的质地，粗糙的橡胶质感，黑色水果味和长长的尾部。

Chinese pairs.original: 2009年份是酒庄采用“整桶发酵”的第一个年份，虽然香气有些还原，但依然无法掩盖这款酒的丰富的表达。鲜美的黑李子、多汁的桑葚与巧克力咖啡饼干完美相融，好像是一块铺满水果的“布朗尼蛋糕”在口中融化开来，甜美又不失力量感。
Chinese pairs.new: This 2009 vintage marks the winery's first year of using "whole barrel fermentation," and although the aromas are somewhat reduced, they can't hide the richness of this wine. Luscious black plums, juicy raspberries, and chocolate coffee cookies blend perfectly together, like a fruit-topped "brownie cake" melting in your mouth, sweet yet retaining its power.

English pairs.original: It’s the first vintage that Marquis de Terme uses “integral fermentation.” Even the nose opens up with hints of positive reduction; the entire aromatic family is still so expressive after swirling the glass. Delicious black plum, juicy brambleberry, and chocolate-coffee cookies are nicely integrated like a Browny cake topped up full of black fruits, which delivers a sense of structure and power in the round body.
English pairs.new: 这是马基斯德特尔姆（Marquis de Terme）首次采用“整体发酵”（integral fermentation）的葡萄酒。即使是闻酒时，也能感受到积极的减少（positive reduction）的气味；在旋转酒杯后，整个香气家族仍然非常生动。酒中有丰富的黑浆果、浓郁的黑莓和巧克力咖啡饼的香气，整体融合得非常完美，像一块浓郁的布朗尼蛋糕，满满的黑果味，给人一种结构和力量的感觉。

Western reviews.review: A bright, ripe style, with very fresh crushed plum, raspberry and blackberry fruit wrapped in silky tannins and laced with hints of anise and black tea. The rounded finish has modest grip for mid-term cellaring. Drink now through 2020.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒呈现出明亮、成熟的风格，具有新鲜的浆果风味，如浆果、草莓和黑莓，包裹在细滑的纤维素中，带有黑茶和丁香的微妙气味。圆润的尾部具有适度的抓握力，适合中期陈化。建议立即饮用至2020年。

Chinese pairs.original: Chapelle d’Ausone 2021的混酿比例太有趣了，75%的品丽珠+25%的赤霞珠，这应该是我人生中第一次品尝没有任何美乐的圣埃美隆副牌酒。香气清晰细腻，能够在阳光并不充足的2021年份依旧表现出傲人的成熟多酚，尤其是混合着蓝莓、黑加仑和紫罗兰的“蓝紫芳香”。也许有人觉得今年的“另类混酿”有些奇怪，但我倒是从“另类的Chapelle d’Ausone”身上看到了Pauline团队无所畏惧的精气神儿。
Chinese pairs.new: Chapelle d'Ausone 2021的混酿比例非常有趣，75%的品丽珠+25%的赤霞珠，这是我的人生中第一次品尝没有任何美乐的圣埃美隆副牌酒。酒香清晰细腻，能够在阳光并不充足的2021年份依旧表现出傲人的成熟多酚，尤其是混合着蓝莓、黑加仑和紫罗兰的“蓝紫芳香”。也许有人觉得今年的“另类混酿”有些奇怪，但我倒是从“另类的Chapelle d'Ausone”身上看到了Pauline团队无所畏惧的精气神儿。

English pairs.original: The 75% Cabernet Franc and 25% Cabernet Sauvignon blend of Chapelle d’ Ausone 2021 is very interesting. This must be the first time in my life to taste a Saint-Emilion second wine with no Merlot in it. With clear and delicate flavors, it presents the usual rich ripe polyphenol in the backdrop of sun-deprived vintage of 2021. The “blue and purple” fragrances presented by blueberry, black current, and violet are especially attractive. The “untraditional blending” may seem strange, but I appreciate the bravery and boldness of Pauline’s team in producing an “alternative” Chapelle d’ Ausone.
English pairs.new: 2021年 Chapelle d’ Ausone 的 75% 卡波弗朗奇和 25% 卡波网酒的混合物非常有趣。这可能是我的生活中第一次品尝没有梅洛的圣埃米利翁第二酒。它呈现出明亮和细致的风味，背景是2021年阳光不足的葡萄成熟度。蓝莓、黑加仑和紫罗兰的“蓝紫色”香气尤其吸引人。这种“非传统的混合”可能看起来奇怪，但我很欣赏保琳团队在生产“替代品” Chapelle d’ Ausone 时的勇气和果断。

Western reviews.review: Made from 100% of the two Cabernets, the wine is structured with ripe, smoky rich tannins and great blackberry flavors. This second-label wine is likely to age well. Drink from 2027.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒是由两种卡贝网葡萄（Cabernet）完全酿造而成，具有成熟、烟熏、丰富的苦味和浓郁的黑莓风味。这种二级标签的红酒有很好的储存潜力，建议在2027年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: Deep ruby core, purple reflections, subtle brightening on the rim. Delicate aromas of cranberries, tobacco, a touch of cassis and a smoky savouriness. Medium-bodied, red cherries on the palate, lean and fresh, well balanced with fine tannins and a long finish.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色核心，紫色反射，酒杯边缘微微发亮。酒中有细微的红枣、烟草、黑currant和烟熏味的气息。口感中等，口味中有红果味，清新、细腻，口感平衡，纤维度细腻，长长的尾部余味。

Western reviews.review: Ruby in color, you find an intriguing cedar, leafy herb, tobacco leaf, coffee bean, red plum and black raspberry nose with a touch of cinnamon in the background. On the palate, the wine is medium-bodied, lively, fresh and vibrant, with a crisp edge to the red fruits on the palate. The wine blends 75% Cabernet Franc with 25% Cabernet Sauvignon, 12.6% ABV. This is the first vintage of Chapelle d'Ausone without any Merlot in the blend. Drink from 2026-2037. 91-93
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的颜色是深红色，酒香中有诱人的红 cedar、叶子、草药、烟草叶、咖啡豆、红李子和黑莓味，背景中有微微的肉桂味。口感中，酒体中等，生动、清新、活跃，红果味清脆。酒中混合了75%卡波弗朗克和25%卡波萨维尼翁，酒精含量12.6%。这款酒是 Chapelle d'Ausone 的首款没有梅洛的葡萄酒。建议在2026-2037年饮用。评分：91-93分。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Purpur. Die Nase strahlt aus dem Glas, klar und rein wie ein Bergbach, viel dunkle Frucht, dezente Röstnoten vom Holz, ein Hauch Lakritze, florale Töne, faszinierend. Der Gaumen beginnt rund, leicht cremig, reife, satte Frucht, feinkörniges Tannin, das ist wunderschön balanciert, zeigt keine Schwere, einfach nur eine knackige Frucht, Finesse und im Abgang ein rotfruchtiges Rückaroma. Ausgezeichnet. Wüsste man nicht, dass man hier beim Zweitwein ist, ginge dieser Wein locker als Erstwein durch. Klasse. 2025-2040 (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2022. Château Ausone)
Western reviews.translation: 深紫色。酒液从玻璃杯中闪耀，清澈如山泉水，充满了深色的果实，微妙的木质烟熏味，薄荷糖的微妙气息，花朵的香气，令人着迷。口感圆润，轻微的奶油感，成熟的果实，细腻的坚果，完美的平衡，没有沉重感，只有清脆的果实，细腻和在尾部留下了一丝红果的回味。出色。如果不知道这是第二瓶酒，可能会认为这是第一瓶酒。2025-2040年（在2022年4月品尝“En Primeur”时，来自Château Ausone）。

Chinese pairs.original: 如果和2009年份相比，我反倒觉得2010年份的Jean Faure更加成熟、更加浓密、更加丰韵十足，特别是袅绕在酒杯中的黑色浆果芬芳，以及收尾时近似烟熏气息的焦油和石墨味道。55%的品丽珠所呈现出的清凉口感让我欣喜不已，整个味蕾都变得轻盈飘扬，感觉随时都可以腾空而起。
Chinese pairs.new: Compared to the 2009 vintage, I find the 2010 Jean Faure to be even more mature, rich and full-bodied, with a particularly seductive black fruit aroma that lingers in the glass, and a smoky, ashy finish. The 55% Grenache Blanc's crisp acidity is a joy, leaving the palate feeling light and airy, as if it might lift off at any moment.

English pairs.original: Compared to the 2009 vintage, I found Jean Faure 2010 riper, more intense, and has greater charm. It is especially beautiful with the black fruit aromas curling in the glass, the smoky tar notes and the graphite scents on the finish. The fresh and cool palate brought by the 55% Cabernet Franc is very pleasing. The whole palate hence becomes light and refreshing, giving you the illusion of flowing in the air.
English pairs.new: 相比2009年产的，2010年版的让法尔红酒更为成熟、更为浓郁，具有更大的魅力。尤其是在玻璃中，黑果香气的缠绕、烟熏焦炭的味道和图形的气息在尾部都非常美丽。55%的卡伯涅 Franc的新鲜和清凉的口感非常令人愉悦。整个口感因此变得轻盈和清爽，让人产生流动在空气中的错觉。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby, purple reflections, subtle bright rim. Discreet ripe cherry fruit, delicate savouriness, a hint of candied orange zest, some nougat. Juicy, shows good complexity, fine and very well integrated tannins, lively, ripe cherry, silky and subtle, fine chocolate note, persistent, faint minerality on the finish.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，紫色反射，微微亮的边缘。 低调的成熟樱桃果实，细致的咸味，橙子皮糖化的微妙提示，些许果仁。 醇口，展现出良好的复杂性，细致的，非常好地融合的纤维，生动，成熟的樱桃，细致的，微妙的，精致的巧克力味道，持久，尾部微微的矿物质感。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby, purple reflections, subtle bright rim. Discreet ripe cherry fruit, delicate savouriness, a hint of candied orange zest, some nougat. Juicy, shows good complexity, fine and very well integrated tannins, lively, ripe cherry, silky and subtle, fine chocolate note, persistent, faint minerality on the finish.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，紫色反射，细微的亮边缘。低调的成熟樱桃果实，细致的咸味，橙子糖霜的微妙气味，些许果冻。水果清新，展现出良好的复杂性，细致的口感，非常完美地融合的纤维，生动，成熟的樱桃，细致的巧克力味，持久，余味中略带矿物质的味道。

Chinese pairs.original: 一闻就发现，这酒“起范儿”了。2022年份的Chateau Jean Faux 将清爽巧妙地融入到樱桃、蓝莓、黑李子的馥郁芬芳之中。浓郁的口感中有丝丝甘美环绕，如同粉笔灰的单宁粉末在味蕾上摇曳，清爽的酸度更是令人叹为观止。谁说2022年份干热难耐？这款葡萄酒能够让你看到碧波荡漾的一汪湖水。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine is a showstopper from the moment you sniff it. The 2022 Chateau Jean Faux seamlessly blends the sweet aromas of cherry, blueberry, and blackberry. Rich flavors are wrapped in a subtle sweetness, like powdered tannins dancing on the palate, while the crisp acidity is simply breathtaking. Don't believe the hype about the 2022 vintage being too hot and dry - this wine transports you to a serene lake on a calm day.

English pairs.original: Upon first whiff, one can immediately sense that this wine is “in vogue.” Chateau Jean Faux 2022 expertly blends a refreshing note with the rich aromas of cherry, blueberry, and black currant. The full-bodied taste is tinged with a subtle sweetness, as if the chalky tannin powder is dancing on your taste buds, and the refreshing acidity is simply breathtaking. Who says the scorching heat of 2022 is unbearable? This wine will transport you to a shimmering lake.
English pairs.new: 初一闻，酒香便让人感受到这款酒的时尚感。 2022年夏日的佳酿，尚都酒庄的珍宝，完美地融合了清新和丰富的气味，带来浓郁的樱桃、蓝莓和黑加仑的香气。酒体丰富，带有微妙的甜度，仿佛矿物质的坚果粉在舌尖舞动，清新的酸度简直令人惊艳。谁说2022年的酷热难以承受？这款酒会带你来到一片闪闪发光的湖泊中。

Western reviews.review: Savory herbs, crushed stone, flowers and red fruits combine in this medium-bodied, fresh lively, vibrant wine. This is already easy to enjoy with its juicy fruits on the palate and in the finish. Drink from 2025-2032. 90-92 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这款中等体积的红酒，具有清新活泼的风格，融合了香草、碎石、花朵和红果的风味。口感丰富，果味浓郁，完美的口感和尾韵。建议在2025-2032年内饮用。评分：90-92分。

Western reviews.review: Le nez est fruité et offre de la richesse, de la gourmandise, un certain charnu. Il exprime les notes de cerise charnue/pulpeuse, de framboise écrasée et plus légèrement – de violette associées à des touches saline/sens de la place ainsi qu’à des pointes de petits fruits rôtis et à des discrètes pointes de muscade et d’épices douces. La bouche est joliment juteuse, fraiche, pulpeuse et offre de la gourmandise, de l’énergie, une trame acidulée, un côté aérien. Elle exprime les notes de cerise pulpeuse/juteuse, de framboise fraiche/éclatant et plus légèrement – de violette associées à des touches de prune pulpeuse/fraîche ainsi qu’à des pointes de framboise rôtie, d’amande fraiche et une subtile pointe séveuse. Les tannins sont souples, sapides, frais. Bonne longueur et définition, belle acidité.
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的香气丰富多彩，带有丰富的口感和诱人的香味。它展现出浓郁的鲜红樱桃、挤压的蓝莓和轻微的紫罗兰的香味，伴随着海盐和地理特征的微妙变化，以及烤熟的小果和温和的香料的微妙点缀。

口感丰富、清新、浓郁，带有丰富的口感和能量，酸度清晰，空气轻盈。它展现出鲜红樱桃、清新蓝莓和轻微的紫罗兰的香味，伴随着浓郁的鲜红樱桃、清新蓝莓和轻微的紫罗兰的香味，以及烤熟的蓝莓、清新杏仁和微妙的苦味的微妙点缀。

这瓶红酒的纤维柔软、丰富、清新。它具有良好的持久性和清晰度，酸度清晰。

Western reviews.review: Savory herbs, crushed stone, flowers and red fruits combine in this medium-bodied, fresh lively, vibrant wine. This is already easy to enjoy with its juicy fruits on the palate and in the finish. Drink from 2025-2032. 90-92 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这款中等体积的红酒，具有清新活泼的风格，融合了香草、碎石、花朵和红果的风味。口感丰富，果味浓郁，完美的口感和尾韵。建议在2025-2032年内饮用。评分：90-92分。

Western reviews.review: Le nez est fruité et offre de la richesse, de la gourmandise, un certain charnu. Il exprime les notes de cerise charnue/pulpeuse, de framboise écrasée et plus légèrement – de violette associées à des touches saline/sens de la place ainsi qu’à des pointes de petits fruits rôtis et à des discrètes pointes de muscade et d’épices douces. La bouche est joliment juteuse, fraiche, pulpeuse et offre de la gourmandise, de l’énergie, une trame acidulée, un côté aérien. Elle exprime les notes de cerise pulpeuse/juteuse, de framboise fraiche/éclatant et plus légèrement – de violette associées à des touches de prune pulpeuse/fraîche ainsi qu’à des pointes de framboise rôtie, d’amande fraiche et une subtile pointe séveuse. Les tannins sont souples, sapides, frais. Bonne longueur et définition, belle acidité.
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的香气丰富多彩，带有丰富的口感和诱人的香味。它展现出浓郁的鲜红樱桃、挤压的蓝莓和轻微的紫罗兰的香味，伴随着海盐和地理特征的微妙变化，以及烤熟的小果和温和的香料的微妙点缀。

口感丰富、清新、浓郁，带有丰富的口感和能量，酸度清晰，空气轻盈。它展现出鲜红樱桃、清新蓝莓和轻微的紫罗兰的香味，伴随着浓郁的鲜红樱桃、清新蓝莓和轻微的紫罗兰的香味，以及烤熟的蓝莓、清新杏仁和微妙的苦味的微妙点缀。

这瓶红酒的纤维柔软、丰富、清新。它具有良好的持久性和清晰度，酸度清晰。

Chinese pairs.original: 晚采收搭配上高比例全新橡木桶，让2021年份的Chateau Peby Faugeres 拥有了远超其他酒庄的浓郁度和集中度，在相对凉爽的年份依旧能大秀“肌肉感”。得益于大量烤制化的单宁，品尝这款酒感觉像是一块纯度90%的黑巧克力在口中融化，质感扎实不说，还颇有嚼劲，是一款需要时间打磨地陈年型葡萄酒。
Chinese pairs.new: This 2021 Chateau Peby Faugeres boasts an intense and concentrated profile, thanks to a high proportion of new oak barrels. Even in a relatively cool vintage, it still showcases its muscularity. The abundance of toasted tannins gives the wine a rich, velvety texture, reminiscent of 90% dark chocolate melting in the mouth. With a solid, chewy quality, this wine is best aged over time.

English pairs.original: The late harvest and extensive use of new oak barrels grant the 2021 Chateau Peby Faugeres a richness and concentration, showcasing a ‘muscular feel’ even in a relatively cool vintage. Thanks to its heavily toasted tannins, tasting this wine is like having a piece of 90% pure dark chocolate melt in your mouth – not only is the texture solid, but it also has a substantial chewiness. It is a wine that demands time and patience to fully mature.
English pairs.new: 2021年沙特奥佩比福日（Chateau Peby Faugeres）是一款丰富而浓郁的红酒，来自晚收成和大量使用新橡木桶的酿造。即使是在一个相对凉爽的年份中，这款酒也展现出强烈的肌肉感。由于其深度焦糖般的苦味，品尝这款酒就像在口中融化90%纯黑巧克力一样——不仅口感坚实，还有着丰富的嚼劲。它是一款需要时间和耐心才能完全成熟的酒。

Western reviews.review: Pure Merlot, this wine comes from a specific parcel of the Faugères estate. It is an opulent wine, proudly showing its origins from old vines. Dense black fruits and concentrated tannins are pierced with acidity and a smoky richness. Drink from 2027. Organic.
Western reviews.translation: 纯正的梅洛葡萄酒，这瓶酒来自法格雷斯庄园的特定地块。它是一瓶豪华的葡萄酒，自豪地展现出来自老葡萄的源头。浓郁的黑色水果和浓缩的苦味被酸度和烟熏的丰富感所穿透。建议于2027年饮用。有机葡萄酒。

Western reviews.review: Ripe and pleasant in its sweet profile reminiscent of strawberries, plums, hawthorn, magnolias, vanilla and hazelnut cream. Full body, soft tannins and a harmonious, balanced finish. 100% Merlot. Best since 2026.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感丰富，甜度适中，带有草莓、李子、山楂、Magnolia、香草和杏仁奶油的甜美风味。口感丰富，纤维软，尾部和谐平衡。100%梅洛。建议在2026年后品尝。

Western reviews.review: Intense garnet, opaque core, purple reflections, broader rim. Delicate leather and nougat, ripe blackberry fruit, hints of candied orange zest, tobacco nuances. Complex, fine blackberry nuances, some cassis, ripe tannins, chocolatey and textural; good ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，透明中心，紫色反光，宽边缘。细腻的皮革和果冻，成熟的黑莓果味，糖浆橙皮的微妙，烟草的细微差别。复杂的黑莓细微差别，些许黑加索，成熟的纽扣，巧克力味和纹理；有很好的陈年潜力。

Western reviews.review: Deeply colored, the wine is concentrated, long, deep, lush, opulent and rich. Yet, it is equally elegant, long and refined, with a sweetness and freshness to the fruits and soft, polish to the tannins in the ostentations finish. This is the first vintage produced in their new, show-piece cellars. The wine is produced from 100% old vine Merlot. 13.5% ABV. Drink from 2025-2045. 93-95
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色深邃，口感浓郁，长长的尾部，富有滋味，华丽而丰富。然而，它同样优雅，长长的尾部，果味甜美，新鲜，且有细腻的橡皮感。这种酒是他们新建的酒窖中首瓶产出的。酒用100%老藤梅洛葡萄酿造，酒精度13.5%。建议在2025-2045年间饮用。评分93-95分。

Western reviews.review: Kräftige Farbe, tiefe Nase, dunkle Beeren, Pflaumen, dezent Gewürze, Lakritze. Im Gaumen gradlinig, mit Druck, dabei kein Gramm Fett, sehr gute Struktur, merklich Gerbstoff, die Frucht hält dagegen. Im Abgang mit guter, aromatischer Persistenz und viel Frische. Ein recht kräftiger Wein im Kontext des Jahrgangs und gleichzeitig wundervoll schlank für einen Péby Faugeres. Kann reifen. 2026-2045+ (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2022. Vintex/Dourthe)
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶强劲的红酒，颜色深红，酒鼻深厚，带有浓郁的黑berry和黑葡萄风味，伴有淡淡的香料和 licorice。口感平衡，压力适中，没有一丝脂肪，结构非常好，显著的橡木味，果味持久。尾部有很好的持久性和清新感。考虑到产区和年份，这是一瓶相当强劲的红酒，同时又非常苗条。适合长期储存。推荐储存时间：2026-2045年。

Chinese pairs.original: 这支酒展现诸如红茶、红色甘草和些许仓库在内的三级香气。华丽的底色由雪松和雪茄盒组成。极具表现力的一款酒。张力十足且略带油脂感的口感相比香气更为新鲜。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine showcases a complex aroma profile featuring notes of red tea, red licorice, and a hint of oak. The rich, velvety texture is comprised of cedar and cigar box undertones. A highly expressive wine, its tannins are bold and slightly oily, offering a fresher taste than the aroma.

English pairs.original: Showing the tertiary aromas such as black tea, red liquorice and a tint of barnyard. Lush in the backdrop that was made up of cedar and cigar box. Expressive. Fresher on the slightly oily taste that was tension-filled.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒展现出复杂的香气，如黑茶、红甘草和田间的味道。背景中充满了松木和雪茄盒的芬芳。口感丰富。口感略带油腻，但又带有一丝紧张感。

Western reviews.review: Owned by the Cruse family, one of the dynasties of Bordeaux, this estate is performing well. This new release has powerful tannins and, equally importantly, great ripe black fruits. The wine has a good future, ready to drink from 2026.
Western reviews.translation: 由克鲁斯家族（Cruse家族）所有，这是一家著名的波尔多家族企业。该酒庄的新酒表现出色，具有强烈的苦味和成熟的黑色果味。酒的前景良好，建议2026年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: Juicy and vibrant on the nose showing notes of lavender, hibiscus, guaranà and hyacinth. There's more in the background with notes of wild violets and white chocolate. Medium bodied, slightly dry tannins and a finish of good workmanship if a little tense at the moment. Better from 2024.
Western reviews.translation: 酒香中充满了鲜花和果实的气息，带有紫罗兰、红花、可可豆和百合花的香味。背景中还隐约可闻到野百合和白巧克力的香味。口感中等，略带干涩的口感，尾部有良好的品质，但目前略带紧张。建议2024年后再次品尝。

Western reviews.review: Good purity with a hint of toast and mocha blending red and dark berries. Balanced medium bodied with dense young fruit, young texture but ripe tannin, generous fruit, fine oak treatment and a long fresh finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的品质非常纯正，带有 Toast 和咖啡的微妙风味，混合着红色和黑色浆果的味道。酒体平衡，中等体积，充满了浓密的新鲜果味，年轻的口感但成熟的苦味，丰富的果味，精致的橡木处理和长长的新鲜尾韵。

Western reviews.review: Owned by the Cruse family since the late 19th century, this property, with its grand chateau, is an important estate in the village of Le Taillan. This wine is packed with tannins as well as with dense black fruits and rich acidity. A wine with power it needs time to settle down. Drink from 2024. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒由克鲁斯家族自19世纪末就拥有，拥有壮观的庄园，这是莱泰延村的重要庄园。这瓶酒充满了坚果和浓密的黑色水果以及丰富的酸度。需要时间来平息的强劲酒。建议2024年后饮用。-罗杰沃斯。

Western reviews.review: A French historical monument, this chateau is owned by the Cruse family, one of the leading Bordeaux dynasties. This wine is richly textured with dense black fruits and considerable potential. Power and concentration will allow it to age well. Drink from 2026. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 一座法国历史名胜，这座酒庄由著名的波尔多家族Cruse家族所有。这款红酒富有质感，黑果浓郁，潜力巨大。酒中力量和浓度使其有很好的陈年潜力。建议2026年后饮用。 - 罗杰·沃斯

Chinese pairs.original: 2022年份是Chateau Langoa Barton 在新酒窖酿造的第一个年份。摇杯之际，咖啡与榛果的馥郁气息跃然而出，入口时则迎来了丰盈多汁的莓果芬芳。和很多期酒相比，Chateau Langoa Barton 毫无掩饰地展现了它的所有气质。酸度非常鲜亮，口感十分细腻，就连单宁也打磨地更加细腻了。最令人惊喜的是其匪夷所思的酸度，以及收尾时那股神秘的石墨气息，让我对瓶装后的表现充满无限期待。
Chinese pairs.new: 2022年是Chateau Langoa Barton在新酒窖酿造的第一个年份。摇杯时，咖啡和榛果的香气立即跃然眼前，入口时则迎来丰富多汁的莓果香味。与之前的酒相比，Chateau Langoa Barton毫无掩饰地展现了它的所有特质。酒的酸度非常鲜明，口感细腻，单宁也变得更加细腻。最令人惊喜的是其出乎意料的酸度，以及酒尾时那股神秘的石墨气息，让我对瓶装后的表现充满无限期待。

English pairs.original: The 2022 vintage marks the first vintage of Chateau Langoa Barton in its new wine cellar. Upon swirling, the luscious aroma of coffee and hazelnut captivates the senses, while the palate is welcomed by a juicy burst of berry fruitiness. In comparison to many other wines En Primeur, Chateau Langoa Barton unabashedly displays all its qualities. The acidity is bright and the texture is delicate, with even the tannins polished to a finer degree. What surprises me most is the astonishing acidity and the mysterious graphite note in the finish, which fills me with great anticipation for its expression when bottled.
English pairs.new: 2022年是查特奥朗加巴顿（Chateau Langoa Barton）新酒窖的第一年。酒瓶旋转时，浓郁的咖啡和杏仁香气会让人深深着迷，而口感则是由浓郁的浆果味道带来的。与其他En Primeur酒相比，查特奥朗加巴顿毫不隐瞒地展现出了它的优点。酒中的酸度清晰，口感细腻，甚至是它的苦味也变得更加细腻。令我惊讶的是，酒尾的酸度惊人而神秘的石墨笔记，让我对它在瓶装后的表现充满了期待。

Western reviews.review: Cassis, tobacco, flowers, blackberries, and red currants show easily on the nose, and palate. There is a wealth of fresh, dark red fruits, creamy tannins, and blackberries on the mid-palate, and in the finish. This clearly shows a new face for Langoa Barton with more fruit, and softer tannins, yet the wine holds on to its classic style as well. The wine blends 56.5% Cabernet Sauvignon, 41% Merlot and 2.5% Cabernet Franc. 14.2% ABV. Drink from 2027-2050. 93-95 Pts.
Western reviews.translation:
这款红酒的香气中，樱桃、烟草、花朵、黑莓和红currant的味道非常明显。口感上，新鲜的黑莓、黑currant和黑葡萄的味道非常丰富，口感中也能感受到黑莓和黑currant的味道。酒中还含有丰富的黑葡萄和黑currant的味道，口感中也能感受到黑葡萄和黑currant的味道。

这款红酒的口感中，黑葡萄和黑currant的味道非常丰富，口感中也能感受到黑葡萄和黑currant的味道。酒中还含有丰富的黑葡萄和黑currant的味道，口感中也能感受到黑葡萄和黑currant的味道。

这款红酒的风格与以往的Langoa Barton相比，更加果实丰富，口感更加柔和，但仍然保留了经典风格。酒中含有56.5%的卡波内尔·萨旺儒尼、41%的梅洛和2.5%的卡波内尔·法兰克。酒精度14.2%。建议在2027-2050年之间饮用。评分93-95分。

Western reviews.review: Intensive, reiffruchtige Nase, das riecht wie beim Brombeer-Marmelade-Kochen, dazu kommen subtile Röstnoten, Cassis sowie ein mineralischer Unterton. Der Gaumen ist gradlinig, frisch, knackige Frucht, top Tanninqualität, wie immer mit viel Charme und mit eindrücklicher Länge ist das ein ausgezeichneter Langoa, der das Warten auf seinen "grossen Bruder" deutlich angenehmer gestalten dürfte. 2028-2050 (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / CVBG / Château Belgrave) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation: 强烈的、复杂的果香，闻起来像是在烹饪莓果酱，伴有微妙的烤果味、黑加香和矿物质底调。口感平滑、清新、果香清脆，口感坚实，质地优良，充满魅力，酒尾长而持久。这是一款出色的朗格杜酒，足以让我们期待它的兄弟酒。推荐储存时间：2028-2050年。

Western reviews.review: Another highly enjoyable Saint Julien from this vintage. Smooth tannins, mouth waterin g acidity. Relaxed and approachable but still with great density of fruits. Ticked all the boxes for being an excellent wine. Sapid and savoury, simply delicious!
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶圣朱利安红酒非常令人愉悦。口感细腻，酸度清新。风格轻松舒适，但仍然具有丰富的果味。完全符合优质红酒的标准。口感清新鲜美，简直太好喝了！

Western reviews.review: Joli nez intense, précis et qui offre un côté infusion/macération ainsi que de la profondeur. On y retrouve des notes de mûre de Boysen pulpeuse/juteuse, de violette et plus légèrement de cerise Bigarreau éclatante associées à des touches de badiane, de camphre, de fraise des bois ainsi qu’à des pointes de bleuet, de muscade, de lys ainsi qu’à une très discrète pointe de toasté/amande toastée. La bouche est fraiche, minérale, fruitée, équilibrée et offre de la justesse, de la suavité, une trame acidulée/juteuse, du pulpeux, une jolie énergie, une matière onctueuse (très fine et aérienne) ainsi qu’une jolie souplesse et délicatesse. Quelle texture ! En bouche ce vin exprime des notes de cerise pulpeuse/juteuse, de prune violette éclatante et plus légèrement de petites baies rouges écrasées associées à des touches de badiane/réglisse ainsi qu’à des pointes de noisette toastée et de vanille. Un joli côté soyeux, floral et frais. Jolie mâche et sapidité.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

这款红酒有着强烈的芳香，精致而富有深度。它带有浓郁的黑berry、紫罗兰和轻微的樱桃风味，伴有丁香、樟脑、森林莓和轻微的蓝莓、肉桂、百合和微微的烤面包风味。

口感清新、矿物质、果香、平衡，具有准确的酸度、柔和的口感、细腻的纹理、浓郁的口感、美丽的能量、细腻的质地和美丽的柔韧性。

这款红酒的口感非常独特！在口中，它展现出浓郁的黑berry、紫罗兰樱桃和轻微的红果风味，伴有丁香/甘草风味和轻微的烤杏仁和香料风味。

这款红酒有着美丽的滑感、花香和清新感。口感柔和、美丽，具有美丽的嚼劲和口感。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby colour, purple reflections, subtle brightening on the rim. Fine blackberry fruit, some liquorice, ripe black cherries, inviting bouquet. Taut, energetic, ripe cherries, good freshness, herbal savouriness, salty, lemony touch on the finish, a lively food wine.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，紫色反射，酒杯边缘微微发亮。黑berry果味清晰，少量的 licorice，成熟的黑樱桃，令人垂涎的香气。紧致、充满活力、成熟的樱桃，好新鲜感，草本的咸味，柠檬味的余味，口感清新活泼，适合与食物搭配的佳酿。

Chinese pairs.original: 我从来没有品过这么水嫩的Chateau Grand-Puy Ducasse，它在2023年份的改变可谓是脱胎换骨。之前相对粗糙的单宁变得细密而粉嫩；相对慌张的香气表达开始变得平稳自信，香气和口感之间的过度也非常顺畅，在保持标志性的黑色水果同时还带着罕见的兰花芬芳。收尾时的石墨粉感觉十分显著，让Chateau Grand-Puy Ducasse 找到了久违的Pauillac 气质。
Chinese pairs.new: I've never tasted a wine as silky smooth as Chateau Grand-Puy Ducasse, and the 2023 vintage is a complete transformation. The previously rough tannins have become refined and delicate; the initially frantic aromas have settled into a confident and stable expression, with a seamless transition between aroma and palate. The signature black fruit is still present, but now accompanied by a rare floral nuance. The graphite finish is particularly striking, and Chateau Grand-Puy Ducasse has finally rediscovered its Pauillac character.

English pairs.original: I have never tasted such succulent Chateau Grand-Puy Ducasse, as the transformation in the 2023 vintage is truly remarkable. The previously coarse tannins have become fine and tender; the once erratic aroma expression now exudes a calm confidence, with a smooth transition between scent and flavor. While maintaining its signature dark fruit, this wine also carries the fragrance of orchids that I’ve never seen before. The finish is distinctly marked by graphite powder, which has reinstated the long-missed Pauillac character.
English pairs.new: 我从未品尝过如此醇厚的查塔格朗皮杜卡斯（Chateau Grand-Puy Ducasse），2023年产季的转变令人惊叹。之前粗糙的橡皮质现在变得细腻柔顺；曾经不稳定的香气表达现在展现出平和的自信，气味和味道之间的过渡变得更加顺滑。虽然保留了其标志性的黑果味道，这款酒也带有我之前从未见过的兰花香气。酒尾被明显的石墨粉覆盖，重新恢复了长久以来被遗忘的波亚克（Pauillac）风格。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark, not quite opaque purple-ruby color. The nose has open raspberry fruit with creamy notes & vanilla. The wine has excellent acidity. Tannins are fine & supple with lovely spices overlaying mulberry fruit. The wine is medium-bodied & the alcohol adds a touch of warmth & roundness to the back palate where it elevates cedary, exotic spice notes that overlay velvety textured cassis fruit. The finish is long & structured with juicy red-fruit. 04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的紫红色，接近透明。酒鼻中充满开阔的莓果香气，伴有奶油和香草的味道。酒精度非常高。纤维素细腻柔和，覆盖着覆盖着浆果的美味香料。酒体中等，酒精的加入使后舌感到温暖和圆润，提升了覆盖在浓郁浆果上的松木、异国风味的香料。酒尾长且结构紧凑，带有新鲜的红果味。评分：4.24（ep）DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 大橡木桶和陶罐陈酿充分地优化了Chateau Guadet 2020的香气表达：蓝莓、树莓粒粒饱满，入口的时候仿佛都能听到爆果的声音。石灰岩高地的粉笔灰质感在2020年份表达地特别清晰，笼罩在圆润的酒体表面，感觉展开了一张蕾丝花布，品的人满心欢喜。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau Guadet 2020的香气表达得淋漓尽致，来自大橡木桶和陶罐陈酿的完美结合：蓝莓和树莓的果实香气丰富饱满，入口时爆发出的果酱味道让人耳目一新。石灰岩高地的矿物质质感在2020年份的表达中尤其突出，覆盖在圆润的酒体表面，展现出细致的花边纹理，让品酒者感到极度愉悦。

English pairs.original: The big oak barrels and amphora aging fully optimize the aromatic expression of Chateau Guadet 2020: blueberries and raspberries are plump, and you can seem to hear the sound of the fruit bursting on the entry of the palate. The chalky texture of the limestone plateau is expressed particularly clearly, covering the surface of the round body, which feels like a lace cloth has been unfolded. It is a great pleasure to taste this wine.
English pairs.new: 2020年夏图德（Chateau Guadet）红酒的陈酿过程，采用了大橡木桶和陶罐的组合，充分发挥了酒的芳香特性。酒中充满了浓郁的蓝莓和草莓果香，入口时仿佛能听到果肉爆裂的声音。石灰质台地的矿物质质感尤其清晰地展现出来，覆盖在圆润的酒体上，感觉就像一层丝绸一样轻盈。品尝这款酒是一种极大的享受。
