Western reviews.review: The estate has evolved considerably, and this latest release continues the development with ripe black fruits and beautifully textured tannins. With its balance and structure, the wine will develop. Drink from 2027. Organic and biodynamic. Multiple U.S. importers.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的产地已经有了很大的变化，这次的新品继续了这一趋势，呈现出成熟的黑果和细腻的纹理。酒的平衡和结构使其有发展潜力。建议2027年后饮用。该酒采用有机和生物动力学生产方法。有多家美国进口商。

Western reviews.review: Ripe black plums and licorice define the wines nose. On the palate. you find a soft, ripe, silky, fresh, sweet layer of ripe cherries, coffee and kirsch with dusty tannins. 88-90
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中充满了成熟的黑杏和甘草的味道。口感上，你会发现一层软、成熟、滑顺、新鲜、甜的黑杏、咖啡和威士忌的味道，伴随着微微的干涩感。评分：88-90分。

Chinese pairs.original: 香气温和矜持，除了诱人的桑葚、黑莓之外还散发着铅笔芯和兰花的芬芳，能够感觉出来品丽珠的比例非常高。入口轻柔细腻，从中段开始缓缓伸开臂膀，即展现了2019年份的浓郁饱满又彰显了Lalande-de-Pomerol的风土多样性，是一款位于价值洼地的好酒。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas are subtle yet refined, with enticing notes of blackberry and raspberry, complemented by hints of pencil lead and lavender. The proportion of Petit Verdot is particularly noticeable. The palate is silky smooth, with a gentle entry that gradually unfolds, showcasing the rich, full-bodied style of the 2019 vintage and the terroir diversity of Lalande-de-Pomerol. A great wine from a value region.

English pairs.original: Being mild on the nose, it includes not only the aroma of inviting mulberries and blackberries but the scent of pencil leads and orchids. On the palate, I can feel the Cabernet Franc is high in the blend. In the opening of it, the wine is soft and fine. From the mid-palate, it demonstrates richness, roundness, and the expression of diversified terroir of Lalande-de-Pomerol. The wine is remarkable with high-cost performance.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的鼻子很轻柔，除了有诱人的黑莓和黑berries香味，还有铅笔和兰花的香味。口感上，我可以感受到卡贝网法兰克(Cabernet Franc)占有很大比例。酒精在入口时很软很细腻，从中口开始，酒精展现出丰富的口感、圆润的质地和拉兰德-波梅罗(Lalande-de-Pomerol)的多样化土壤特征。酒精的价格表现非常出色。

Western reviews.review: Black fruit, currants, undergrowth, leather and baking spices on the nose. Medium-to full-bodied with ripe tannins. Layered, fleshy palate. Flavorful chocolate and dark-fruit notes on the finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中有黑果、葡萄干、林地和烘烤香料的味道。口感丰富中等到中重度，口感丰富柔和。酒尾有丰富的巧克力和黑果味道。

Western reviews.review: Shows steeped black cherry and blackberry fruit that has a nice winey feel, with black tea, anise and singed vanilla notes ingrained nicely on the finish. Nicely done. Merlot and Cabernet Franc.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒展现出浓郁的黑樱桃和黑莓果味，具有典型的葡萄酒风味，口感中还可感受到黑茶、荳蔻和焦糖香气的余韵。整体表现不错。酒中含有梅洛和卡波弗朗克两种葡萄品种。

Western reviews.review: Checking in as 58% Merlot and 42% Cabernet Franc, the 2018 Château Tournefeuille has a juicy, fruit-forward bouquet of red plum and ripe black cherries as well as a touch of leafy tobacco and cedarwood. Nicely textured, medium to full-bodied, pure, and elegant on the palate, it has terrific tannins as well as outstanding length. This smoking good Lalande-de-Pomerol should keep for 8-10 years.
Western reviews.translation: 2018年夏托图尔内费尤尔（Château Tournefeuille）红酒，主要由梅洛（Merlot）58%和卡波弗朗（Cabernet Franc）42%组成。酒精度为14.5%。酒的香气中充满了红草莓和熟黑樱桃的果味，伴有少量的叶子烟和红木的味道。口感丰富细腻，中等到中等以上的体积，纯正优雅，口感持久，纤维度出色。该酒应该能维持8-10年。

Western reviews.review: This dark wine offers chocolate and black-plum flavors. The dense tannins and concentrated structure are impressive and promise further aging. A dry aftertaste at the end adds to the promise. Drink from 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这款深色的红酒带有巧克力和黑浆果的风味。酒中的浓密的苦味和紧密的结构令人印象深刻，预示着酒将在未来继续成熟。酒尾的干爽味道进一步增强了酒的前景。建议2025年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: The 2019 Tournefeuille exhibits a dense, complex bouquet with aromas of dark berries, cassis, blueberries, violet, iris and spring flowers. Beautifully balanced, on the palate, it is medium to full-bodied, concentrated and layered, with structuring tannins and a slight touch of green pepper in the finish. A bit oaky but without overdoing it.
Western reviews.translation: 2019 年的 Tournefeuille 酒展现出浓密复杂的香气，带有黑莓、黑加仑、蓝莓、紫罗兰、百合和春花的香味。口感平衡，酒体中等到中厚，浓缩且层次分明，具有结构性的橡皮质感和微微的青椒味。酒中有轻微的橡木味，但没有过度。

Chinese pairs.original: 2017年由于霜冻的缘故而损失了95%的产量，所以此年份酒庄只出产了3000瓶，并且是非常特别以品丽珠为主的混酿。此酒含蓄、清新的香气透出桑葚、香料矿物、生姜、黑巧克力和微微的干花香。这是一排酒中深邃气息最少且最新鲜的那一支；中段口感很飘逸，回味则富有庄严的单宁。
Chinese pairs.new: This 2017 vintage was severely impacted by frost, resulting in a mere 3000 bottles produced. This limited release is predominantly a blend of Pinot Noir. The wine exudes a subtle and crisp aroma, featuring notes of raspberry, spice, mineral, ginger, dark chocolate, and a hint of dried flowers. Among its peers, this wine stands out for its understated yet fresh bouquet. The mid-palate is silky smooth, while the finish is marked by a dignified tannin presence.

English pairs.original: Only made in 3000 bottles for the 2017 due to the frost (lost 95% of the crop), and in this vintage is distinctively Cabernet Franc predominantly. Restrained but refreshing aromas of mulberry, spicy-mineral, ginger and black chocolate, with a tint of dried flower. Showing the least depth and it's the freshest of the lineup; ethereally textured on the mid-palate while austerely tannic on the finish.
English pairs.new: 2017年产量仅3000瓶，受霜冻影响（丢失95%的收成），这瓶酒以Cabernet Franc为主。酒香清新持重，带有浓郁的黑莓、辣椒矿物质、姜和黑巧克力味道，伴有干花的余味。酒体最浅，最清新，中口纤细而空灵，尾部则坚实而有力。

Western reviews.review: There is a fine proportion of Cabernet Franc in this wine, giving structure to the dense black fruits. It is a ripe, fruity wine, its tannins well embedded in the fruit. The wine needs to age. Drink from 2027.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒中有适当的卡贝网法兰克（Cabernet Franc）比例，赋予了浓密的黑色果肉结构。酒体丰富果实，苦味（tanin）与果肉完美融合。酒需要陈化。建议2027年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: Flowers, licorice, and smoke with fresh red berries create the nose. On the palate, the wine is elegant, silky and fresh, as well as supple, long and packed with dark chocolate, black cherries, espresso and licorice, there is length and refinement here. Drink from 2023-2040.
Western reviews.translation: 花朵、 licorice 和烟雾与新鲜红莓融合在一起，构成了酒的鼻子。 在口感上，酒精优雅、滑顺、清新、柔软、长长的，充满了黑巧克力、黑樱桃、咖啡和 licorice，酒中有长度和细致的品质。建议从2023年到2040年饮用。

Western reviews.review: Solid and centred showing notably mature traces which reveal themselves with dried prunes, wild strawberries and cumin. Full bodied, well smoothed tannins and a finale with good energy. Better from 2024.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感坚实，中心偏重，展现出明显的成熟痕迹，包括干枯的李子、野 strawberries 和孜然的味道。口感丰富，苦味平滑，尾部有很好的能量。建议从2024年开始饮用。

Western reviews.review: (70% Merlot, 30% Cabernet Franc) Frische, fruchtige Nase, dazu kommt etwas Kräuterwürze, eher still. Auch im Gaumen eher zurückhaltend, still, jedoch ausgewogen, baut Druck auf ohne Fett zu wirken, reifes Tannin, gute Säure. Der Abgang ist würzig und frisch. Wird früh Spass machen. 2025-2040 (Verkostet am 8. November 2022 in Zürich)
Western reviews.translation:
(70% 美丽托, 30% 卡波弗兰克) 

酒精清新、果香浓郁，伴有少许香草味，口感平和。口感平和，果香和香草味相互平衡，酒精感不显著，口感柔和。酒尾清新，余味持久。酒精清新，适合早期享用。推荐饮用时间：2025-2040。

Western reviews.review: Deep ruby, opaque core, purple reflections, bright narrow rim. Somewhat restrained, a hint of cherries, ripe plums, a trace of orange zest, fine tobacco nuances. Juicy, elegant, pronounced fruit, lively structure, round, ripe tannins, a hint of nougat, balanced. Good ageing potential.߭.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，透明的核心，紫色反射，亮丽的窄边缘。有些克制，樱桃的味道，熟透的李子，橙子皮的微妙，细致的烟草味。 juicy，优雅，明显的水果味，活跃的结构，圆润的熟透的纽维，微妙的果仁味，平衡。有很好的陈年潜力。

Chinese pairs.original: 经典就是经典， Baron de Brane 2022的品质真的好过一些列级庄正牌。和许多凸显浓郁果浆的葡萄酒不同，这款酒一开始就展现出难以捉摸的松柏清凉。这款酒让我感受到了酿酒师对成熟度的把控、以及对浸渍的深刻认识。粉状单宁在酸枣、樱桃以及甘草的伴随下，缓缓涌向收尾，隐约中还透着几分咸感。这款酒能够让你领略2022年份不一样的韵味。
Chinese pairs.new: 这款 Baron de Brane 2022 酒的品质堪称经典。与许多浓郁果浆的葡萄酒不同，它展现出一种难以捉摸的松柏清凉。酒中的酿酒师对成熟度的把控和对浸渍的深刻理解令人印象深刻。酒中的粉状单宁在酸枣、樱桃和甘草的伴随下缓缓展现，带有微妙的咸感。这款酒让你体验到2022年份的独特风味。

English pairs.original: Classics truly stand the test of time, and indeed, the 2022 vintage of Baron de Brane outshines several recognized Cru Classe. Contrasting with many wines that flaunt a rich fruit profile, this wine immediately unveils a sense of pine-like freshness. It attests to the winemaker’s meticulous control of grapes’s maturation and precise maceration. The powdery tannins, escorted by notes of sour dates, cherries, and licorice, subtly ebb towards the finish, hinting at an undercurrent of salinity. This wine invites you to taste the distinct charisma of the vintage of 2022.
English pairs.new: 经典的红酒确实能经受时间的考验，2022年巴隆德布兰的产量不仅超过了众多认可的克鲁级别红酒。与许多展示丰富果味的红酒不同，这款红酒立即展现出松柏般的清新感，这是酒庄对葡萄成熟度的精心控制和精确发酵的结果。细致的粉末状苦味，伴随着酸枣、樱桃和甘草的味道，悄然地向尾部延伸，暗示着盐度的潜在存在。这款红酒邀请您品尝2022年产量独特的魅力。

Western reviews.review: Flowers, cherries, spice and licorice aromas are easy to find. On the palate, the wine is elegant fresh, soft, and supple, with a nice sweetness to the fruits and a refined texture in the finish. This baby Brane is perfect to enjoy on release while waiting for the Grand Vin to develop. The wine blends 65% Merlot, 30% Cabernet Sauvignon, 4% Cabernet Franc and 1% Petit Verdot, 13.5% ABV. Drink from 2025-2037. 91-93 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中，容易发现的花朵、樱桃、香料和甘草的味道。口感上，酒精优雅、清新、柔和、细腻，果味甜美，尾部有细腻的质感。这款小型布兰酒（Baby Brane）适合在发布时即刻享用，等待大型布兰酒（Grand Vin）成熟。酒中混合了65%梅洛、30%卡波弗雷蒙、4%卡波弗朗和1%佩蒂·韦多，13.5%的酒精含量。建议2025-2037年饮用。评分：91-93分。

Western reviews.review: Was für ein bezaubernder Himbeerduft, herrlich, expressiv. Im Gaumen präzis, knackige, rote Frucht, wohl dosierte Tannine, das hat Rasse und Frische, endet mit guter Länge und viel Finesse. Da muss sich mancher Erstwein warm anziehen. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / CVBG / Château Belgrave) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气是如此迷人，充满了浓郁的草莓味道，非常出色。口感清晰，果味鲜美，坚果味道适量，充满了活力和新鲜感，酒尾长而细腻。许多初次品尝红酒的人都将会对它产生深刻的印象。 (评分时间：2023年4月 / 来源：CVBG / Château Belgrave)

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby garnet colour with opaque core and purple reflections, broad and bright rim. Floral bouquet, fresh red heart cherries, delicate notes of currant, a hint of tangerine zest. Juicy, silky and elegant, fine fruit sweetness, creamy texture, velvety tannins, good freshness, mineral and citrusy on the finish, an elegant food wine.
Western reviews.translation: 深红宝石色，透明中心，紫色反射，宽广明亮的边缘。花香的香气，新鲜的红心樱桃，浓郁的黑加仑，柑橘的微妙香气。口感丰富，滑顺，优雅，细腻的果糖，奶油般的质地，细致的橡皮感，清新，矿物质和柑橘味的尾韵，优雅的食用酒。

Chinese pairs.original: 香气特别浓郁，看得出葡萄的成熟度非常棒。黑莓、李子和蓝莓果酱的芳香在甘草和桂皮的包裹下出落的格外甜美动人。丰满强劲的单宁带着可可粉般的绵密质感，在通透多汁的口感衬托下，整个酒体结构都十分平衡有致。
Chinese pairs.new: The aroma is particularly rich and intense, showcasing the excellent ripeness of the grapes. The scents of blackberry, plum, and blueberry jam unfold beautifully beneath a blanket of honey and cinnamon. The full-bodied tannins have a velvety texture reminiscent of cocoa powder, which complements the wine's transparent and juicy texture, resulting in a remarkably balanced and harmonious overall structure.

English pairs.original: The aromas are pretty intense, it can be seen that the maturity of their grapes is exceptional. The scents of blackberry, plum and blueberry jam become more enticing through the decoration of licorice and cinnamon. The powdery tannins are rich and robust, but thanks to the juicy and translucent mouth feeling, the entire body maintains balanced until the end.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的香气非常浓郁，表明其葡萄成熟度非常出色。黑莓、浆果和蓝莓果酱的香气通过 licorice 和 cinnamon 的装饰变得更加诱人。粉状的苦味物质丰富而强烈，但由于口感 juicy 和透明，整个口感保持平衡直到最后。

Western reviews.review: In the southern Haut-Médoc, this 133-acre estate devoted to horse riding has produced a rich wine that has both density and impressive black fruits. With concentration and a core of tannins, the wine has great potential. Drink from 2026. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 在法国南部的Haut-Médoc地区，这座拥有133英亩土地的庄园以马术为主，生产了一种丰富的红酒，具有厚实的口感和深黑色的果实。酒中充满了浓缩的味道和坚实的纤维，展现出巨大的潜力。建议2026年后饮用。 - 罗杰·沃斯

Western reviews.review: « Darkly coloured with young, vibrant red reflections. Intense nose with fruit tones underscored by elegant oakiness. The same noble structure and aromas flow through to the palate. A wine with good breed and undeniable potential. »
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色深红，带有年轻的活力红色反射。酒香浓郁，果香味道被优雅的橡木味道所衬托。同样的高贵结构和香气在口感中流动。是一瓶品质良好的红酒，充满了不可否认的潜力。

Western reviews.review: Medium-bodied, fresh, soft and juicy, with hints of earth and cocoa, round textures and a fruity, charming finish that will be delicious on release and over the next 10-12 or 15 years after that.
Western reviews.translation: 口感中等，新鲜、柔软、水果味浓郁，带有泥土和巧克力味，口感圆润，果香甜美的尾韵，酒体在初期饮用时就能体验到美味，未来10-12年或15年后也能持续享受。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有烧焦月桂叶和石楠木的香气，以及黑莓，黑樱桃，黑醋栗，烟草和橄榄的气息，酒体醇厚，酸度高，单宁饱满，余味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts aromas of charred rosemary and heather, along with blackberry, black cherry, black fig, tobacco, and olive notes. It has a rich, full-bodied texture, high acidity, and a satisfying tannin structure, with a long, lingering finish.

Western reviews.review: Deeply pigmented, dark ruby color. Slightly green stalky aromas marry with confected blackcurrant fruit. The palate has smooth tannins and fresh, lifting acidity. Green notes over the black fruit are a little sappy. A nice wine with a slightly angular mid-palate. The alcohol is in balance & the finish is of fair length, ending harmoniously. 11/13 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的红色，暗红色。酒中带有轻微的青草和干草气味，混合着人工黑currant果味。口感平滑，纤维度较低，酸度清新，带有轻微的苦味。青草味与黑果味的平衡有一点点的苦涩。酒中酒精度合适，尾部长度中等，结束和谐。评分：11/13

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau La Dominique 2021鲜奶冻（Panna Cotta）般的口感告诉我们，什么才是2021年份的正确打开方式。不需要过多的单宁、也不需要宏大的结构，仅凭着柔润感就可以轻松征服味蕾。装瓶后的花果芬芳被摩卡和奶咖所包裹，看似有些封闭，但以我对Chateau La Dominique的了解，用不了多久它就会伸开臂膀，成为那朵在味蕾上摇曳的“雪绒花”。
Chinese pairs.new:
Chateau La Dominique 2021

This wine's creamy texture tells us what's in store for 2021. No need for excessive tannins or grand structure, just a smooth, velvety feel to seduce the palate. The fruit and floral aromas in the bottle are wrapped in mocha and coffee notes, initially closed but will soon unfurl to become the delicate "snowflower" that dances on the palate.

English pairs.original: Chateau La Dominique 2021, with its Panna Cotta-like mouthfeel, demonstrates the perfect approach to this vintage. It conquers the palate with a mere whisper of softness, without the need for excessive tannins or an imposing structure. After bottling, its floral and fruity essences are gently wrapped in layers of mocha and milk coffee, appearing somewhat reserved at first glance. However, based on my previous experience with Chateau La Dominique, it won’t be long before it unfurls its arms, blossoming into a ‘Snowflake Flower’ that dances gracefully on the taste buds.
English pairs.new: 2021年夏娃庄园（Chateau La Dominique）红酒，拥有类似奶油布丁般的口感，完美地体现了这一年份的风格。它轻轻地占据了口腔，柔和的质感不需要过多的苦味或强烈的结构。瓶装后，花香和果香的精华被巧妙地包裹在巧克力和牛奶咖啡的层次中，初看起来有些保守。但是，基于我对夏娃庄园的前期经验，它很快就会展开它的花瓣，像雪花般优雅地舞动在味蕾上。

Western reviews.review: Dark plums, cherries, grilled citrus and a touch of dark earth decadence and mushrooms on the nose. Subtle dark spices, too. Medium to full body on the palate with dusty tannins and a lengthy, intricate finish. Refined and layered. Already complex.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中有浓郁的黑浆果、黑杏子、烤柑橘和一点点黑土的浓郁气息和蘑菇的味道。还有微妙的黑香料。口感中等到中厚，口感中有细沙般的苦味和长长的复杂尾韵。口感细致而层次分明。已经非常复杂了。

Western reviews.review: Ripe, fragrant nose, chocolate, cherries and roses. Enjoyably textured, this has energy and focus as well as fruit concentration. Touches of vanilla and cream come in to give smoothness, ending on a softly salty note with liquorice and dark cocoa powder. Juicy, fruity and enjoyable, still with licks of oak so will need time but has ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气丰富，带有熟透的水果、巧克力、樱桃和玫瑰花的味道。口感丰富，具有活力和焦点，同时也保留了果实的浓度。酒中带有香草和奶油的味道，给人以平滑的感觉，最后以轻微的咸味和 licorice 和黑巧克力粉末结束。口感 juicy、果香浓郁，享受良好，但仍然带有橡木味，需要时间来成熟，但有很好的陈化潜力。

Western reviews.review: There is a light touch to this wine, typical of 2021. From a 25-acre vineyard to the northwest of the Saint-Emilion core, it has ripe licorice and pepper aromas and jammy black-fruit flavors from the dominant Merlot. It is a fine wine, full of potential.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的风格轻盈典雅，典型的2021年风格。来自圣埃米利翁核心西北部的25英亩葡萄园，具有成熟的甘草和胡椒香气，以及来自主导梅洛的浓郁黑果风味。是一款精美的葡萄酒，充满潜力。

Western reviews.review: The 2021 La Dominique opens in the glass with notes of minty berries, plums and cherries, framed by a discreet touch of new oak. Medium to full-bodied, suave and polished, with an attractive core of cool, layered fruit, it's framed by powdery tannins that assert themselves on the gently structured finish. While it will show well out of the gates, this will also reward at least a modicum of bottle age.Rating: 92+
Western reviews.translation: 2021 年的拉多米尼克（La Dominique）在玻璃中展现出薄荷莓、浆果和樱桃的香气，伴随着新橡木的微妙余味。酒体中等到中等以上，细腻光滑，具有吸引人的冷却果肉核心，受到细致的粉末状纤维素包围，酒尾结构轻盈。虽然它会在短期内表现出色，但它也会在至少有一定的陈年期后给予回报。评分：92+

Western reviews.review: The 2021 Château La Dominique comes from 85% Merlot, 13% Cabernet Franc, and 2% Cabernet Sauvignon that spent 14 months in 50% new French oak. It has a deeper ruby hue as well as gorgeous aromatics of darker currants, truffly earth, ripe herbs, and flowers. More medium-bodied on the palate, it has a supple, layered mouthfeel, ripe, polished, and nicely integrated tannins, and flawless balance. This is a very complete, balanced, seamless, and incredibly complex 2021 that has the density and class to evolve and drink well for two decades.
Western reviews.translation: 2021年夏特劳多米尼克红酒，来自85%梅洛、13%卡波弗朗克和2%卡波萨维宁的葡萄，14个月在50%新法兰克橡木桶中发酵。它具有深红色的外观，具有更深的红色，具有迷人的香气，包括更深的黑currants、土壤、成熟的香草和花朵。口感中等，具有细腻的、层次丰富的口感，具有成熟、光滑、完美融合的纹理，具有完美的平衡。这是一款非常完美、平衡、无缝、极其复杂的2021年红酒，具有足够的密度和品质，可以在两十年内演变和品尝。

Chinese pairs.original: 在成熟度普遍偏高的2022年，拥有较高比例品丽珠(30%)和赤霞珠(10%)的Chateau Certan de May独树一帜，展现出了令人惊艳的风采。尽管该年份的花香并不突出，但莓果的香气却愈发醇厚。浓郁而柔顺的单宁为温热的酒体注入了立体的骨架和细腻的结构，既稳重有力，又不失柔情。
Chinese pairs.new: In a year where maturity was generally high, Chateau Certan de May stands out with its impressive charm, boasting a high proportion of Merlot (30%) and Cabernet Sauvignon (10%). While the floral notes of the vintage may not be particularly prominent, the fruit aromas have become even more rich and velvety. The dense yet smooth tannins add a three-dimensional framework and refined structure to the warm-bodied wine, conveying both power and elegance.

English pairs.original: In the high-ripeness vintage of 2022, Chateau Certan de May, with its higher proportion of Merlot (30%) and Cabernet Franc (10%), stands out and exhibits stunning grace. While floral notes may not be the most prominent in this vintage, the berry aromas are more rich and luscious. The dense yet supple tannins provide a three-dimensional backbone and a delicate structure to the warm-bodied wine, which is both commanding and gentle.
English pairs.new: 2022年丰收的佳酿，尚塔乌塞尔坦德梅（Chateau Certan de May）以其较高的梅洛（Merlot）比例（30%）和卡波弗朗（Cabernet Franc）比例（10%）独树一帜，展现出优雅的风范。虽然这瓶酒的花香并不是最突出的，但果香更加丰富和醇厚。酒中的坚实但柔韧的纤维提供了一个立体的骨架和温和的结构，使得这瓶酒既有权威感又有温柔感。

Western reviews.review: 93-95 Barrel sample. This wine comes from a small 13-acre vineyard. It is a structured blend that has a fine percentage of Cabernet Franc. With its ripe, rounded character, the wine should develop well.
Western reviews.translation:
评分：93-95分。 

这款红酒来自一块面积仅13英亩的葡萄园。它是一种结构良好的混合葡萄酒，含有优质的卡波弗朗克葡萄。酒体丰富圆润，酒味成熟，酒质稳定，预计酒会有很好的发展前景。

Western reviews.review: Roses, chocolate-covered plums, smoke, licorice, and scorched earth form the perfume. On the palate, the wine is long, rich, silky, fresh, and loaded with layers of dark cocoa-covered plums, licorice and black cherries, There is more richness than you normally find here, along with silky-tannins, lift, and opulence in the finish. A bit more Cabernet in the blend really made a difference this year. The wine blends 60% Merlot, 30% Cabernet Franc, and 10% Cabernet Sauvignon. Drink from 2026-2042. 93-95 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中包含着玫瑰、巧克力浸果、烟雾、甘草和焦土的味道。口感上，酒精丰富、滑顺、清新、富有层次的黑巧克力浸果、甘草和黑樱桃味道。酒尾中有丰富的口感、滑顺的纹理、提升和奢华感。今年的酒中，更多的卡波内尔（Cabernet）成分使得酒的风格有了明显的变化。酒中含有60%梅洛（Merlot）、30%卡波内尔法兰克（Cabernet Franc）和10%卡波内尔苏维翁（Cabernet Sauvignon）。建议在2026-2042年之间饮用。评分93-95分。

Western reviews.review: Das Bouquet dieses Weins ist insofern faszinierend, als dass es eine fast schon Toskanische Aromatik ausstrahlt, die Veilchenblüten, Früchtetee, dunkle und rote Beerenfrucht, Brombeeren und Kirschen dominieren. Im Gaumen straff, dicht und doch hochelegant, der Wein zeigt viel Struktur, hat Rasse und Frische, die Gerbstoffe sind markant, die Säure wirkt stimmig, im Abgang rotfruhtig geprägt und mit würzigem Finish. Vorzügliche Qualität, kerniger Charakter. 2032 bis 2058 (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 in den Büros von J.P. Moueix in Libourne) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation: 这个红酒的香气非常迷人，带有托斯卡纳风味的花朵香气，包括紫罗兰花、果茶、黑色和红色浆果、黑莓和樱桃。口感紧致、浓郁、优雅，酒中结构清晰，具有典型的品质和新鲜感，柚皮味道明显，酸度合适，尾部带有浓郁的红果味和香料味。品质出色，具有坚实的个性。推荐储存时间：2032-2058年（2023年4月在J.P. Moueix公司办公室品尝的“En Primeur”红酒）。

Western reviews.review: Le nez est joli, floral et épicé avec de la puissance. On découvre des notes de mûre de boysen, de violette et de lys associé à des touches de petites baies noires sauvages, de petits fruits bleus pulpeux ainsi qu’à des pointes de fraises écrasées et une touche d’herbe aromatique. La bouche est fruitée avec de la fraîcheur et une petite onctuosité. Elle présente de la tension, de la rondeur, de la suavité et une certaine justesse. On a des notes de mûres éclatantes, de petites baies rouges sauvages assez mûres et plus légèrement de framboises rôties associées à des touches d’épices, de poivre et à une subtile pointe de badiane. Ce vin a une bonne longueur et une jolie définition, de la précision, de la souplesse et de l’harmonie. Un fin côté infusion est en fond et le côté floral rajoute de la fraîcheur. C’est un vin avec une certaine ampleur.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气很美丽，带有花香和辛香料的力量。我们可以闻到黑莓、紫罗兰和百合花的香味，伴随着一些黑野莓、蓝色浆果和挤压过的草莓的味道，以及一些碎碎的草药味。口感果香清新，略带油腻。口感中有张力、圆润、柔和和准确的感觉。我们可以闻到爆发性的黑莓、熟透的野生红莓和略微烤过的蓝莓的味道，伴随着一些香料、胡椒和细微的丁香的味道。这个酒有很好的持久度和美丽的定义，准确、灵活和和谐。酒尾有一种细微的浸泡感，花香味道增加了清新感。这是一瓶有着一定规模的酒。

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby garnet colour with opaque core and purple reflections, subtle brightening on the rim. Ripe black cherries, inviting blackberry confit, candied orange zest, developed bouquet. Complex, juicy, dark fruit, fresh and lively on the palate, salty and lemony finish, a multi-faceted, early accessible food wine.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，色泽浓郁，透明中心，紫色反射，酒杯边缘微微发亮。酒中充满了成熟的黑杏子和黑莓酱的香气，糖化橙皮的香气，复杂的花香。口感丰富多彩，黑色水果的味道浓郁，新鲜活泼，口感清爽，尾部有盐和柠檬的味道，适合早期食用，多面性佳，适合搭配各种菜肴。

Chinese pairs.original: 酒庄出产两款副牌酒：Les Hauts de Smith和Le Petit Haut Lafitte。此酒充满糖渍和生姜味的香气带有微微的花香。富有高酸度的顺滑口感同样展现花香。
Chinese pairs.new: The winery produces two second labels: Les Hauts de Smith and Le Petit Haut Lafitte. This wine is full of sweet, spicy aromas with a hint of floral notes. The rich, smooth texture also showcases floral notes, with high acidity.

English pairs.original: The estate produces two second wines: Les Hauts de Smith and Le Petit Haut Lafitte. Candied and gingery aromas with slightly floral perfumes. Floral as well on the smooth and acidic palate.
English pairs.new: 这家酒庄生产了两款次级酒：Les Hauts de Smith 和 Le Petit Haut Lafitte。酒中带有糖果和姜的香气，伴有轻微的花朵香气。口感平滑，酸度适中，花朵香气也在口感中体现。

Western reviews.review: Dark fruit, coffee bean, soft, polished textures and a dark, sweet, open, medium bodied, dark cherry finish that feels great, and should be easy to drink. The wine was made from a blend of 60% Cabernet Sauvignon and 40% Merlot.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感丰富，带有黑果和咖啡豆的味道，口感柔软细腻。酒尾深沉甜润，黑樱桃的味道清晰可辨，体积中等，非常舒适。该酒由60%卡波雷尔葡萄和40%美洛葡萄混合酿造。

Western reviews.review: 92–94. Barrel Sample. The second wine produced by the estate , 60% Merlot and 40% Cabernet Sauvignon, this offering is lightly spicy with juicy red berry fruits. The wine is full of acidity with a crisp aftertaste. It will develop relatively quickly; drink after 2023.
Western reviews.translation: 92-94分。酒庄的第二款酒，60%梅洛，40%卡波内托，酒体轻微带有辣味，果味丰富，红果味浓郁。酒中酸度充足，余味清脆。酒体会较快成熟，建议2023年后饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 刚装瓶后香气有些内敛，需要更多的耐心来走近它的内心世界。奶油般的口感是Anthonic 2019最引人瞩目的地方，把所有热年份的元素以平衡而柔软的形式演绎出来。单宁绵密而细滑，厚厚地铺在味蕾上很有安全感。
Chinese pairs.new: After bottling, the aroma is somewhat reserved and requires more patience to fully appreciate its complexity. The creamy texture is the standout feature of Anthonic 2019, presenting all the elements of a hot vintage in a balanced and soft manner. The tannins are dense and velvety, providing a sense of security with their rich, layered feel on the palate.

English pairs.original: The aromas are not fully flourished yet after bottling; you need to take more patience to enter its inner world. The cream-like taste is the most astonishing character of Anthonic 2019, which interprets all of the elements of a hot vintage in a gentle manner. The velvet tannins spread on the palate like a woolen carpet, giving me a sense of security and warmness on the finish.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的香气还没有完全展现出来，需要更多的耐心才能进入它的内在世界。 2019年的安东尼克（Anthonic）最令人惊讶的特点是它的奶油般的口感，温和地解读了炎热年份的所有元素。 绵软的橡胶纤维在口中铺展开来，如同一件温暖的羊毛地毯，给我留下了安全感和温暖的余韵。

Western reviews.review: With black-currant fruits and spicy acidity, this is developing well into a rich, structured wine for aging. Tannins form the backdrop for an open texture that comes from partial aging in amphorae, a revolutionary concept in the Médoc. Drink from 2025. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的风味特点是黑加仑果和辛辣的酸度，正在逐渐成熟为一款适合长期陈年的结构丰富的红酒。部分在陶罐中陈化的方法为这款红酒带来了开阔的口感。建议从2025年开始饮用。 - 罗杰·沃斯

Chinese pairs.original: 这支酒予人回味无穷之感，酒体呈深红色泽，奔放的黑加仑、烟熏、肉桂、辣椒、青椒、木炭及黑巧克力的香气，入口带有湿泥土、矿物及香草的滋味，单宁扎实，中等余韵伴随着辣椒，木香和泥土香气，极佳的丝滑口感萦绕味蕾，很适合目前饮用。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine leaves a lasting impression, with a deep red hue and aromas of blackberry, smokiness, cinnamon, pepper, green pepper, charcoal, and dark chocolate. The palate offers earthy, mineral, and herbal notes, with firm tannins and a medium finish featuring pepper, wood, and earthy undertones. The silky texture lingers on the palate, making it perfect for drinking now.

English pairs.original: This memorable wine expressed a dark ruby color and expressive noses of black currant, smoke, cinnamon, capsicum, green pepper, charcoal and black chocolate, flavour of moist earth, mineral and vanilla on the palate, well-integrated tannins with a medium finish of capsicum, wood and earth notes, great smooth mouthfeel and drinking very well now.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒留下了深刻的印象，呈现出深红宝石色的外观，酒香浓郁，带有黑加仑、烟火、肉桂、辣椒、青椒、焦炭和黑巧克力等特征。口感中带有潮湿土壤、矿物质和香草的味道，口感平滑，口感中有中等长度的尾韵，带有辣椒、木头和土壤的余味。

Western reviews.review: You can think of this as a scaled-down version of the stunning 2009 Grand Vin. Les Pagodes 2009 is at full-maturity, with smoked blackberries, spice, thyme and wet earthy nuances on the nose. Medium-bodied, soft, polished and silky, with loads of sweet, ripe, red fruits and freshness that glides over your palate. This is fully ready to go. No decanting needed. Just pop, pour and enjoy over the next 2-5 years. 93 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒可以想象成2009年格兰德温的缩小版。2009年莱斯帕戈斯已经达到成熟期，酒鼻中充满了烟熏黑莓、香料、迷迭香和湿润土壤的香气。口感中等，软滑，细腻，充满了甜美的熟透的红果和清新感，流畅地在口中滑过。这款红酒已经完全成熟，完全准备好享用。无需脱颗粒，只需轻轻打开，倒入杯中，享用2-5年。评分93分。

Western reviews.review: Tiefdunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe. In der Nase frische Preiselbeeren, rote Waldbeeren, ein Hauch von Dörrzwetschgen, Orangenzesten klingen an. Stoffig, komplex und süß, mineralisch, präsente, gut eingebundene Tannine, bleibt sehr gut haften, profitiert enorm vom tollen Jahrgang, zeigt Länge, Reifepotenzial. Ein wahrlich überdurchschnittlicher Zweitwein.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光。酒鼻中有新鲜的蓝莓、红莓、干枯的黑杏和橙子皮的香气。口感厚重复杂，甜度适中，矿物质味道浓郁，坚果味道清晰，口感持久，非常适合品尝。这个葡萄酒的品质非常出色，值得品尝。

Chinese pairs.original: 酸枣酸梅的芬芳与爽朗的酸度无缝链接，每一个细节都打磨地非常细腻。口感多汁鲜爽，伴随着绸缎般的单宁和通透的酒体。从中段开始涌现出的矿物感很有力道，能够在柔美的酒体中看到一具钢铁之躯。
Chinese pairs.new: The tart cherry and plum aromas seamlessly integrate with the crisp acidity, every detail polished to perfection. The palate is juicy and refreshing, accompanied by silky tannins and a transparent texture. From the mid-palate, a powerful mineral presence emerges, revealing a robust iron core within the wine's elegant body.

English pairs.original: The fragrance of jujube, sour plum, and the lively acidity are seamlessly integrated, every detail is polished impeccably. The succulent taste radiates silky tannins and a crystalline body. And the minerality from the mid-palate grabs my entire taste buds, allowing me to see the iron structure inside the tender body.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的香气中融合了枸杞、酸梅的味道，活泼的酸度与之完美融合，每个细节都经过精心打磨。酒体丰富而细腻，晶莹透明的质感让人难以抵挡。酒中矿物质的味道从中口开始展现，充满活力地激活了我的味蕾，让我能够感受到坚实的铁质结构与柔软的酒体之间的完美平衡。

Western reviews.review: Flowers, chocolate, cinnamon spice, truffle and red pit fruits are found in the complex aromatic profile. On the palate the wine is all about the dark chocolate coated plums with just a hint of espresso on the palate and in the supple textured finish. This is already so good and it is going to get even better with just a few years of age. Drink from 2022-2034. 93 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的芳香复杂，包含了花朵、巧克力、肉桂、松露和红果的香气。口感上，酒体以巧克力浸泡的浆果为主，仅有微微的咖啡味。酒尾细腻，充满了深度。虽然已经非常出色，但随着时间的推移，酒体还会变得更加出色。建议在2022-2034年之间饮用。评分93分。

Chinese pairs.original: 品尝2021年份的Chateau Meyney是一种享受，对于一次性大量品鉴2021年份的我来说简直就是“久旱逢甘霖”。该年份的果香颇为秀气，在现阶段主要以酸枣、树莓以及话梅为主导，熟悉的奶油蓝莓以及紫罗兰芬芳则相对收敛。让我欣喜的是，这款酒能够展现出细密的单宁以及石墨粉般的回甘，即便在凉年份也带着十足的自信和底气。
Chinese pairs.new: Tasting the 2021 Chateau Meyney is a delight, and for a one-off tasting of the 2021 vintage, it's like "a refreshing rain after a long drought". The fruit aromas are quite elegant, currently dominated by notes of apricot, raspberry and cherry, with the familiar creamy blueberry and lavender scents more subdued. What pleases me is that this wine shows fine-grained tannins and a graphite-like finish, even in a cool vintage, with plenty of confidence and backbone.

English pairs.original: Tasting Chateau Meyney 2021 is truly delightful, like a welcome shower of rain after a prolonged dry spell. The fruit aromas in this vintage are elegantly composed, featuring prominent notes of sour dates, raspberries, and preserved plums, while the familiar creamy blueberries and violet fragrances take a more subtle role. What particularly intrigues me are the fine tannins and a lingering graphite-like aftertaste, which exude a sense of confidence and strength even in a cooler vintage.
English pairs.new: 品尝2021年夏多尼梅尼酒是一种真正令人愉悦的体验，像一场久违的春雨。这个葡萄酒的果香优雅地组合，展现了明显的酸枣、草莓和蜜枣的风味，而熟悉的蓝莓和紫罗兰香味则在背景中回荡。让我特别着迷的是细致的橡皮质和持久的石墨味，展现出即使是在冷淡的葡萄成熟季节，也具有自信和力量的气质。

Western reviews.review: This wine has density and some firm tannins. A spectacular vineyard that faces the Gironde estuary, this estate gives a rich wine that needs some serious aging.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有厚实的口感和一些坚实的苦味。面临吉伦特河口的壮观葡萄园，这家庄园生产出需要经过严格陈年的丰富口感的红酒。

Western reviews.review: The 2021 Meyney has a lovely bouquet with floral-tinged red berry fruit, opening nicely with aeration. The palate is medium-bodied with fresh red berry fruit laced with oyster shell and spice. Fine build towards a menthol-tinged finish, winemaker Anne La Nour has conjured a very commendable Saint-Estèphe from a tricky growing season. If release prices match your wallet, I'd stick a case (or two) in the cellar. –Neal MartinBarrel Sample: 91-93
Western reviews.translation:
2021年梅尼（Meyney）红酒具有迷人的香气，带有花香的红果味，随着氧化而开启。口感中等，带有新鲜红果味，伴有蚌壳和香料的味道。酒尾带有薄荷味，酒庄的制作人安妮·拉诺尔（Anne La Nour）在一个挑战性的生长季节中创造了一个非常值得称赞的圣埃斯泰夫（Saint-Estèphe）。如果价格与您的预算相符，我建议您将一箱（或两箱）存入酒窖。 –Neal Martin

酒评分：91-93分（酒桶样品）

Western reviews.review: A refined and complex expression for the vintage with sweet red chili pepper, cassis, red plums, pencil shavings and a cedary edge. Medium to full body with silky, fine tannins and a lengthy, polished finish. An overachiever here that shows finesse and sophistication. Already a joy to drink now, but should age nicely in the next decade.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的风格优雅复杂，带有甜辣椒、黑加仑、红桃和木屑的味道，伴有松木的香气。口感中等到中厚，纤维细腻，尾部长而光滑。这个酒品表现出优雅和高雅的风格，既可以现在享用，也可以在未来十年中储存。

Western reviews.review: Gorgeous floral aromatics, this is crisp with the most delicious blackcurrant and black cherry and strawberry fruit flavour - really so well executed. Lively and bright, clean and clear. Succulent and juicy, lovely frame and texture overall. A wonderful easy to drink wine, with elegance refinement but still that concentration that drives the flavours from start to finish. A top buy for classic clart, refreshing, minty, deep, layered and so charming.Barrel Sample: 92
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的芳香极其美丽，具有清新的口感，黑currant、黑樱桃和草莓的果味非常丰富，非常出色。酒体轻盈活泼，清澈明亮，口感丰富多样，整体框架和质感都非常出色。这是一款非常容易入口的红酒，具有典雅的风格和细致的品质，但仍然保持着强烈的味道，从头到尾都非常出色。是一款经典的清爽红酒，具有清新、薄荷、深度、层次感和迷人的魅力。酒评：92分。

Chinese pairs.original: 当多酚完全成熟且酒精度并不高时，Chateau Bourgneuf 鲜甜温润的气质更加突显了。刚一入口，奶油蓝莓挞般的香气便绽放开来，它不仅强调了甜美，同时还带有桂皮粉、肉豆蔻及甘草片的辛香。在它丝滑的酒液中，藏着一朵含苞待放的紫色牡丹花，既展现了Merlot的温柔性格，也精准地传递了Pomerol 娇艳迷人的经典气质。
Chinese pairs.new: At its peak of maturity with moderate alcohol levels, Chateau Bourgneuf showcases its luscious and velvety texture. Upon entry, a rich, creamy blueberry tart aroma unfurls, emphasizing sweetness while also carrying subtle notes of cinnamon, nutmeg, and licorice. Within its smooth, silky liquid, a delicate, unopened purple peony flower is hidden, revealing the gentle nature of Merlot while accurately conveying the alluring, classic charm of Pomerol.

English pairs.original: When polyphenols are fully ripe and alcohol content is not too high, the fresh and sweet temperament of Chateau Bourgneuf is even more prominent. Upon first sip, the fragrance of creamy blueberry tart unfolds, emphasizing not only “sweetness” but also the spicy notes of cinnamon powder, nutmeg, and licorice. Within its silky texture lies a budding purple peony, showcasing both the gentle character of Merlot and precisely conveying the alluring classic qualities of Pomerol.
English pairs.new: 当多酚类化合物成熟且酒精含量不高时，尚堡新堡的新鲜甜美性格更加突出。初尝时，蓝莓酥的奶油香味展开，强调不仅是“甜度”，而且是肉桂粉、肉豆蔻和甘草的辣味。其滑腻的口感中隐含着紫罗兰的开花，展现出梅洛的温和性格，并准确传达了波美罗的诱人经典品质。

Western reviews.review: This wine is well structured, featuring firm tannins and a great depth and breadth. It showcases a refreshing and brilliant fruit profile, demonstrating density without any heaviness. The tannins are small and refined, and notably flavorful on the finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒结构合理，具有坚实的橡皮质和深度广阔的口感。它展现出清新活泼的果味特征，展现了厚实的质地却不带重感。橡皮质细腻，口感丰富，尾部留有持久的果味余韵。

Western reviews.review: The wine is a deep, dark not quite opaque black-ruby color. Lovely vibrant dark-cherry aromas are ripe & high-toned. Attractive red-cherry & fine vanilla oak combine on the mid-palate. Tannins are silky-smooth & the wine is medium to medium full bodied. Alcohol adds richness & roundness to the back palate. Acidity is pretty good & the long finish shows juicy blackcurrant fruit. 04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒呈现出深暗的黑宝石色，几乎透明。酒中充满了鲜活的黑樱桃香气，气味浓郁且高调。中口部的红樱桃和细致的香橡木味相互融合。酒中的纤维素细腻柔顺，酒体中等到中等以上。酒中的酒精使得后口部更加丰富圆润。酸度较好，酒尾长且充满了黑加仑果的鲜味。评分：4.24（ep）DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 这款酒富有泥土气息的严肃香气中带有含蓄的烟熏味和微微的紫罗兰花香。圆润的单宁和极好的酸度增强了口中的丝滑、平衡和新鲜；扎实的收尾充满多汁的果味。这支佳酿还需要再放许多年。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts a serious, earthy aroma with subtle smokiness and a hint of lavender. Smooth, rounded tannins and excellent acidity create a silky, balanced, and fresh mouthfeel, while a full-bodied finish is packed with juicy fruit flavors. This wine still has many years to go.

English pairs.original: Reticently smoky and subtly floral (violet) for the earthy and serious bouquet. It had a delightful palate of silkiness, balance and freshness, enhancing by suave tannin and stunning acid; juicy fruit suffused the well-knit finale. This beauty still required many years' cellaring to show its best.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的香气中有谨慎的烟熏味和微妙的花香（紫罗兰），呈现出土壤味和严肃的气质。口感丰富细腻，平衡和新鲜，受到细腻的橡胶质和惊人的酸度的增强；果味丰富充盈了结实的尾部。这款美酒仍需要多年陈酿才能展现出最佳风采。

Western reviews.review: The years of additional age have really added a lot to this wine. Now, you find a medium-bodied, elegant, refined expression of tobacco, flowers, red currants, plum, and a hint of spice on the nose, and on the vibrant, expressive palate. Drink from 2023-2040.
Western reviews.translation: 岁月的沉淀使得这瓶红酒变得更加丰富。现在，你会发现这瓶酒具有典雅的中等体积，带有烟草、花朵、红葡萄、梅子和一丝辛香料的气味，口感也同样生动和富有表现力。建议从2023年到2040年饮用。

Western reviews.review: After a low period, Siran has come back in 2010 with this solid, tannic, firm and serious wine. There is plenty of blackberry flavor to flesh out the structure, resulting in a wine for medium-term aging.
Western reviews.translation: 2010年，Siran再次回归，带来了一款坚实、苦涩、刚强和严肃的红酒。酒中充满了黑莓的风味，完善了结构，使得这款红酒适合中期陈酿。

Western reviews.review: Dense, bright hue. Medium intense focused fruity nose. The palate displays pleasurable harmony yet is still reticent. A Margaux built to last that seems to have closed up after bottling. Still a reliable choice nonetheless.
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的红色。中度浓烈的果香味道。口感平衡舒适，但仍然有些保留。玛格朗（Margaux）型的红酒，适合长期储存，瓶装后似乎已经封闭了。尽管如此，它仍然是可靠的选择。

Western reviews.review: Very dark and clear colour; the nose is displaying dark berries, blackcurrant, fine oak and mineral; the palate is pure and fresh with vibrant dark fruit, excellent freshness, tannin, length and balance - slightly young, but highly potent.
Western reviews.translation: 酒色深红透明；鼻子中充满了黑莓、黑currant、细微的橡木和矿物质的气息；口感清新纯粹，充满活力且丰富的黑果味，口感清新，纤维度佳，持久度好，平衡度高——略带年轻的气息，但极具潜力。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Clinet 2017的香气并不盲目追求热烈奔放，而是以精细的线条细致刻画。特别是樱桃干、黑茶以及迷迭香的气息，感觉每一个香气线条背后都蕴藏着未知的故事线索。这款酒的结构非常扎实，但品鉴时并没有任何厚重感，给人一种井井有条、秩序井然的印象。经过时间的沉淀，我相信它会展现出别样的精彩。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau Clinet 2017的香气并不追求过度的热烈和奔放，而是以细致的线条来刻画。樱桃干、黑茶和迷迭香的气息让人感觉每一道香气线条都有着深藏不露的故事。这个酒的结构非常坚实，但在品尝时却没有任何沉重感，给人一种井然有序的感觉。经过时间的沉淀，我相信它会展现出独特的魅力。

English pairs.original: Chateau Clinet 2017’s aroma does not blindly pursue exuberance and flamboyance; instead, it delicately depicts its intricate nuances with refined strokes. In particular, the scents of dried cherry, black tea, and rosemary carry a sense of mystery, as if each aroma thread conceals an untold story. The structure of this wine is remarkably solid, yet during the tasting, it carries no sense of heaviness, leaving a well-organized and orderly impression. With the passage of time, I believe it will unveil a unique brilliance.
English pairs.new: 克莱内庄园2017年的香气并不追求夸张和华丽，而是用细致的笔触精心刻画其复杂的细节。尤其是干樱桃、黑茶和罗勒的香气带有神秘感，仿佛每一根香气线都隐藏着一个未被讲述的故事。这个酒的结构非常坚实，但在品尝过程中，它并没有带来沉重的感觉，留下了井井有条的印象。随着时间的流逝，我相信它会展现出独特的光彩。

Western reviews.review: This is brimming with raspberry and boysenberry compote flavors, while mouthwatering anise and pain d’épices notes fill in the background. Reveals a flash of ganache, a streak of tar and an echo of bramble through the finish, adding range while the gorgeous fruit holds center stage. Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon. Best from 2022 through 2038.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒充满了莓果和黑莓酱的风味，口感中有着令人垂涎的 licorice 和 pain d’épices 的味道。完美的果味在口感中占据主导地位，尾部还带有巧克力 ganache、焦油和荆棘的余味。酒中含有梅洛和卡贝网白葡萄酒。建议在2022年至2038年内饮用。

Western reviews.review: This wine is stacked with tannins and concentrated fruits, with a dense texture. The wine’s future is assured and long term. Drink from 2024.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒充满了坚果味和浓郁的果味，口感丰富厚实。酒的未来前景广阔，长期投资值得。建议2024年后饮用。

Western reviews.review:
Deep garnet-purple colored, the 2017 Clinet opens slowly to reveal vibrant red and black fruits: red currants, black cherries, plums and cassis with touches of roses, yeast extract, wood smoke and crushed rocks. Medium-bodied with firm, grainy tannins and a taut, muscular palate of tightly wound fruits and compelling mineral accents, it finishes long with wonderful purity and fragrant earth accents.

Barrel Sample: 92-94
Western reviews.translation:
2017年克林特红酒呈现深红紫色。酒体中充满了鲜活的红黑果味，如红樱桃、黑樱桃、浆果和黑加思，伴有玫瑰花、酵母、木烟和碎石的香气。酒体中有中等体积，坚实的砂粒质感，紧绷的肌肉感，紧密包裹的果味和令人着迷的矿物质香气。酒尾长长，纯粹而芳香的土壤香气。

酒评：92-94分（酒桶样本）

Western reviews.review: A fresh and fruity Clinet with tangy acidity highlighting the plum and cherry character. Reserved style. Medium body, creamy tannins and a delicious finish. Linear and focused in general. Needs a year or two to calm down. Better after 2022.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的风格是新鲜果香的，带有柠檬酸的味道，突出了浆果和樱桃的特点。风格保守。中等体积，奶油般的纹理和美味的尾部。整体线性和集中。需要一年左右的时间来平息。2022年后更好。

Western reviews.review: The 2017 Chateau Clinet checks in behind the 2015 and 2016 (and I suspect the 2018), yet it does well in the vintage. Based on 92% Merlot and 8% Cabernet Sauvignon brought up in 72% new barrels (the estate has moved to using more 500-liter barrels), representing 80% of the production, its deep purple hue is followed by classic Clinet dark, chocolatey fruit and tobacco notes. This gives way to a medium to full-bodied Pomerol that has firm tannins, solid mid-palate density, and outstanding length. The tannins here will need 4-5 years of bottle age, and I’d lean toward drinking bottles over the following decade.
Western reviews.translation: 2017年克莱内酒庄的红酒表现不及2015年和2016年，但在2017年这个年份中仍然表现良好。根据92%的梅洛和8%的卡波内索（Cabernet Sauvignon）组成，使用72%的新桶（酒庄开始使用更多的500升桶）陈化，代表了酒庄的80%产量，深紫色的颜色，紧接着是典型的克莱内酒庄的黑色巧克力和烟草的果香。这种风格的波尔多酒庄表现出中等到中等以上的体积，具有坚实的牙齿，坚实的中口和出色的长尾。这种酒庄的牙齿需要4-5年的瓶龄，个人建议在接下来的十年内饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 散发着浓郁的醋栗和黑莓的香气，口感细腻柔和，酒体丰满，单宁丝滑柔顺，余味中带有矿物质、薄荷和浆果的味道。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts rich aromas of persimmon and blackberry, with a silky smooth texture and a full-bodied mouthfeel. The tannins are velvety and refined, leaving a lingering finish with notes of mineral, mint, and fruit.

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby garnet, purple reflections, subtle edge brightening. Delicate touch of fig, some cardamom, dark berry fruit, candied orange zest, a hint of nougat. Juicy, firm texture, fine extract sweetness, ripe tannins, good freshness, mineral touch on the finish, good further development certain ageing potential. Already gluggable, but better to wait.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色调，紫色反射，微微的边缘亮度。 fig的细微触感，些许卡达木，黑莓果味，糖化橙皮， nougat的微妙呼吸。 醇厚的口感，细致的提取甜度，成熟的苦味，新鲜的口感，矿物质的余味，酒龄潜力良好。 可以立即饮用，但建议稍等一段时间。

Western reviews.review: Deep red, garnet and crimson. A blend of red fruit and toasted notes on the nose. Warm entry submerging a refined texture. Power, fullness and suppleness with a fine-grained texture. Firmer finish. A successful wine.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色， garnet 和 蔷薇色。酒鼻子上有红果和烤香的混合。入口温暖，浸润细致的质地。酒中有力量、丰富和柔韧感，质地细腻。尾部坚实。是一款成功的红酒。

Chinese pairs.original: 2023年份的Blason de l’Evangile 相当纯美，当酒精更低的时候，即便酒庄大幅提升了Merlot 的比例（95%），也不会有任何厚重感。石墨粉和乌梅干的香气在丝滑的皮肤表面相互缠绕，沉稳大气。醇厚绵密的单宁为这款酒带来了丰富的质地，即便是年轻的时候品鉴也让人甚是欢喜。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2023 vintage of Blason de l'Evangile is remarkably elegant, and even with a significant increase in Merlot proportion (95%), it remains light-bodied. The graphite and prune aromas entwine on the smooth skin, exuding a sense of stability and grandeur. The rich, velvety tannins bring a luxurious texture to this wine, making it a joy to drink even at a young age.

English pairs.original: The 2023 vintage of Blason de l’Evangile is remarkably pure. With lower alcohol, despite a significant increase in the proportion of Merlot (95%), there is no sense of heaviness. Aromas of graphite powder and dried prunes intertwine gracefully on the silky surface, exuding a sense of calm and grandeur. The rich and velvety tannins contribute to the wine’s luxurious texture, making it a delightful wine to enjoy even in its youth.
English pairs.new: 2023年埃旺吉尔（Evangile）的布拉松（Blason）品酒体验非常纯粹。尽管梅洛（Merlot）比例大幅增加（达95%），酒精含量降低，没有感到沉重的感觉。酒中充满了硫磺灰和干枯的李子香气，优雅地融合在细滑的表面，散发着宁静和壮丽的气质。丰富的柔软的橡胶质感使得酒的质感更加奢华，令酒在年轻时也能带来愉悦的品酒体验。

Western reviews.review: This wine is highly aromatic, offering floral and fruity notes. The tannins are notably beautiful. Firm-mid palate, juicy finish. Moderate length. Pleasant and joyful. Comprising 95% Merlot and 5% Cabernet Franc, with 15% aged in new oak barrels, 20% in concrete vats, and the remainder in one-year-old barrels.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有强烈的香气，带有花香和水果的味道。它的坚果味和果味非常完美。口感坚实中等，余味丰富。持久度适中。整体感觉舒适愉悦。酒中含有95%的梅洛和5%的卡波弗朗克，15%在新橡木桶中陈化，20%在混凝土罐中陈化，余下的在一岁的橡木桶中陈化。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark, virtually opaque purple-black color. Aromas are of rich, ripe black-cherries & black-doris plums. The palate is lovely & open with smooth, velvety-textured black-plum fruit. Smooth tannins add a chocolatey smoothness to the texture. The medium-bodied wine has balanced alcohol & lively acidity. The warm, ripe finish displays fresh, juicy black-plum fruit. 04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的紫黑色。酒中富有黑樱桃和黑杏果香。口感开阔舒适，黑杏果味丰富细腻。细腻的橡皮质感赋予了酒体柔滑的巧克力般的质感。酒体中等，酒精度衡，酸度活泼。酒尾温暖浓郁，展现出新鲜的黑杏果味。 评分：4.24 分（ep） DCAMW

Chinese pairs.original: 2023年份的Chateau La Garde 继续延续了2021年份的优秀表现，高酸冰爽透亮，质感Q弹。橘子粉、柠檬挞、鼠尾草、黄李子的香气清澈而干净，照射在透明的酒液上，折射出波光粼粼的奇特感受。而就当我准备放下酒杯时，它又用一缕经典的咸感把我拉了回来，让我有点“欲罢不能”。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2023 vintage of Chateau La Garde continues to impress, with high acidity and a crisp, transparent texture that's both refreshing and Q-like in quality. The citrusy aroma of orange blossom, lemon meringue, and chamomile, along with notes of apricot, shines brightly on the glass, casting a mesmerizing glow on the transparent liquid. Just as I was about to put down the glass, a subtle hint of classic saltiness pulled me back in, leaving me with a lingering "can't-put-it-down" sensation.

English pairs.original: The 2023 Chateau La Garde is a beautiful vintage, much like the 2021, with a high acidity level, crystal clear appearance, and a pleasantly bouncy texture. The aromas of orange zest, lemon tart, sage, and yellow plum are fresh and crisp, and they reflect beautifully on the transparent liquid, creating a shimmering effect. As I was about to put down the glass, a classic hint of salinity drew me back in, making it nearly impossible for me to stop tasting.
English pairs.new: 2023 年的夏多布莱格酒庄（Chateau La Garde）是一款美丽的佳酿，类似于2021年，具有高酸度、晶莹透明的外观和愉悦的跳动感。酒中的柑橘皮香、柠檬酥香、香蒜香和黄桃香气清新、清脆，反映在透明的液体中，产生了闪烁的效果。正当我准备放下酒杯时，一种典型的咸味突然吸引了我，使我几乎无法停止品尝。

Western reviews.review: With Axel Marchal’s involvement , there have been changes to the winemaking process, with more emphasis on earlier blending. Additionally, there’s now the inclusion of 4% press wine in the blend. A total of 35% went to Grand Vin, down from the previous 50%. The resulting wine showcases a great salinity, with a few layers of extra depth. It’s a relaxed, poised wine filled with finesse and intricate details, offering a restrained profile.
Western reviews.translation: 阿克塞尔·马尔夏尔（Axel Marchal）参与后，葡萄酒酿造过程发生了变化，更加注重早期混合。同时，现已加入4%的压榨酒。总共35%用于Grand Vin，低于之前的50%。这瓶酒展现出出色的咸味，具有几层额外的深度。它是一瓶放松、稳健的酒，充满细节和优雅，呈现出一种克制的风格。

Western reviews.review: With Axel Marchal’s involvement , there have been changes to the winemaking process, with more emphasis on earlier blending. Additionally, there’s now the inclusion of 4% press wine in the blend. A total of 35% went to Grand Vin, down from the previous 50%. The resulting wine showcases a great salinity, with a few layers of extra depth. It’s a relaxed, poised wine filled with finesse and intricate details, offering a restrained profile.
Western reviews.translation: 阿克塞尔·马尔夏尔（Axel Marchal）参与后，葡萄酒酿造过程发生了变化，更加注重早期混合。同时，现已加入4%的压榨酒。总共35%用于Grand Vin，低于之前的50%。这瓶酒展现出出色的咸味，具有几层额外的深度。它是一瓶放松、稳健的酒，充满细节和优雅，呈现出一种克制的风格。

Western reviews.review: With Axel Marchal’s involvement , there have been changes to the winemaking process, with more emphasis on earlier blending. Additionally, there’s now the inclusion of 4% press wine in the blend. A total of 35% went to Grand Vin, down from the previous 50%. The resulting wine showcases a great salinity, with a few layers of extra depth. It’s a relaxed, poised wine filled with finesse and intricate details, offering a restrained profile.
Western reviews.translation: 阿克塞尔·马尔夏尔（Axel Marchal）参与后，葡萄酒酿造过程发生了变化，更加注重早期混合。同时，现已加入4%的压榨酒。总共35%的酒液用于Grand Vin，低于之前的50%。这瓶酒展现出出色的咸味，具有几层额外的深度。它是一瓶放松、稳重的酒，充满细致的细节，呈现出一种克制的风格。

Western reviews.review: With Axel Marchal’s involvement , there have been changes to the winemaking process, with more emphasis on earlier blending. Additionally, there’s now the inclusion of 4% press wine in the blend. A total of 35% went to Grand Vin, down from the previous 50%. The resulting wine showcases a great salinity, with a few layers of extra depth. It’s a relaxed, poised wine filled with finesse and intricate details, offering a restrained profile.
Western reviews.translation: 阿克塞尔·马尔夏尔（Axel Marchal）参与后，葡萄酒酿造过程发生了变化，更加注重早期混合。同时，现已加入4%的压榨酒。总共35%的酒液用于Grand Vin，低于之前的50%。这款酒展现出出色的咸味，具有几层次的深度。它是一款放松、沉着的酒，充满细致的细节，呈现出一种克制的风格。

Chinese pairs.original: 圆润的酒体与孜然、胡椒搭配的非常巧妙，即保持了柔润度，又增添了微微的辛辣感，层次感跃然纸上。单宁的萃取非常到位，绵柔细密，毫无厚重感。果实的成熟度也控制地相当到位，连续品了4次，始终鲜爽嫩滑，值得推荐。
Chinese pairs.new: The wine's texture is perfectly balanced with a subtle blend of cumin and pepper, maintaining its smoothness while adding a hint of spiciness. The layers of flavor leap off the page. The tannins are expertly extracted, silky and refined, with no heaviness. The fruit's ripeness is also expertly controlled, remaining fresh, crisp, and smooth even after four consecutive tastings. Highly recommended.

English pairs.original: Cumin and pepper complement its round body very well, it maintains smoothness and offers delicate spiciness. The tannins’ extraction is very well, delicate, and mellow, without any heaviness. The fruit’s ripeness is also carefully managed; after four tastings in a row, it remains crisp and soft. Well recommended.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的口感圆润，配上孜然和胡椒的味道非常搭配，保持了细腻的口感，带有轻微的辣味。酒中的苦味提取得非常好，细腻柔和，没有任何沉重感。酒中的水果成熟度也被精心管理，连续四次品尝后仍保持清新和柔软。非常推荐。

Western reviews.review: A rich slick stripe of damson and smoked oak, but things close down pretty quickly on the palate. There are fine but tight tannins here, with a sweep of acidity traveling fast and swift through the palate, until the whole thing expands and softens after a minute in the glass. Great delicacy, power and depth, you would almost think there is Cabernet Franc in here because of its verticality, and beautifully rough slate texture on the finish. I love it. A yield of 33hl/ha. Barrel Sample: 94
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感非常丰富，带有浓郁的浆果和烟熏橡木的味道，但在口中快速收敛。口感中有细致但紧密的橡皮质感，酸度快速流动，直到在杯子里停留一分钟后，口感变得更加丰富和柔和。这种红酒的细腻、力量和深度令人惊叹，几乎可以想象其中有卡贝网红葡萄的存在，因为它的垂直性非常出色，口感结尾的粗糙石板纹理非常美丽。产量为每公顷 33 公升。酒评：94分。

Western reviews.review:
I loved the 2020 Château Bellevue, and this might be the finest vintage I’ve tasted from this address. Lots of cassis and blue fruits as well as toasted spice, chocolate, and chalky minerality emerge from the glass, and it’s medium to full-bodied, with a great texture, ripe tannins, and a nice mix of freshness and richness.
Barrel Sample: (92-94)+
Western reviews.translation:
我非常喜欢2020年夏特奥贝维尤（Château Bellevue）的红酒，这可能是我品尝过的最好的产季之一。从玻璃中释放出大量的黑加仑（cassis）和蓝色水果味道，以及烤香料、巧克力和石灰质矿物质的味道。酒体中等到中等以上，口感丰富，纤维柔顺，口感丰富，新鲜和丰富的味道相互融合。

酒评：92-94分（酒桶样品）

Western reviews.review: A full-bodied, firm and intense red with blackcurrants, toasted walnuts, violets, smoked paprika and dried herbs on the nose. Sturdy frame from firm yet polished tannins. Powerful and wonderfully integrated.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶充满体积、坚实而强烈的红酒，口感中有黑currant、烤杏仁、紫罗兰、烟熏辣椒和干香草的味道。酒体由坚实而又光滑的橡胶质构成，具有强大的力量和完美的融合。

Western reviews.review: A rich slick stripe of damson and smoked oak, but things close down pretty quickly on the palate. There are fine but tight tannins here, with a sweep of acidity traveling fast and swift through the palate, until the whole thing expands and softens after a minute in the glass. Great delicacy, power and depth, you would almost think there is Cabernet Franc in here because of its verticality, and beautifully rough slate texture on the finish. I love it. A yield of 33hl/ha. Barrel Sample: 94
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感非常丰富，带有浓郁的浆果和烟熏橡木的味道，但在口中快速收敛。口感中有细致但紧密的橡皮质感，酸度快速流动，直到在杯子里停留一分钟后整个口感变得丰富和柔和。口感细腻，强劲，深度惊人，几乎可以想象其中有卡贝网法兰克的存在，因为它的垂直性和美丽的粗糙花岗岩质感。非常喜欢！产量为33hl/ha。酒评：94分。

Western reviews.review:
I loved the 2020 Château Bellevue, and this might be the finest vintage I’ve tasted from this address. Lots of cassis and blue fruits as well as toasted spice, chocolate, and chalky minerality emerge from the glass, and it’s medium to full-bodied, with a great texture, ripe tannins, and a nice mix of freshness and richness.
Barrel Sample: (92-94)+
Western reviews.translation:
我非常喜欢2020年夏特奥贝维尤（Château Bellevue）的红酒，这可能是我品尝过的最好的产季之一。从玻璃中释放出大量的黑加仑（cassis）和蓝色水果味道，以及烤香料、巧克力和矿物质的味道。酒体中等到中等以上，口感丰富，纤维柔顺，酸度和丰富感相互平衡。 

酒样评分：92-94分。

Chinese pairs.original: 仅从成熟的果香就能看出，2016年份的 Chateau Montlabert 是被“阳光亲吻过的孩子”。虽然这一年份依然有10桶酒采用“整桶发酵”技术，但得益于健康的葡萄和出色的酸度，我丝毫没有感受到“重桶”的痕迹。酒窖主管告诉我，他在酿造这一年份时完全是在享受，这一点我毫不怀疑。柔和而丝滑的单宁如同纱网般附着在味蕾上，不需要太多的深度便能打动我们的味蕾。收尾时的咸感让人惊喜连连，轻而易举地展现了许多沙土黏土（主要是沙土，地下是黏土）所不具备的层次感。
Chinese pairs.new: 2016年份的 Chateau Montlabert 是一款被“阳光亲吻过的孩子”。尽管采用了“整桶发酵”技术，但健康的葡萄和出色的酸度使得酒的重感消失。酒窖主管表示，他在酿造这一年份时非常享受，这一点我完全相信。柔和的单宁在味蕾上留下了细致的印记，不需要太深的体验就能感受到。酒尾的咸感令人惊喜，展现了沙土和黏土的独特层次感。

English pairs.original: The ripe fruit aromas of the 2016 Chateau Montlabert reveal it as a “child kissed by the sun.” Although ten barrels used “Fermentation Integrale,” the healthy grapes and nice acidity ensure there’s no heavy oakness. The cellar master told me he enjoyed a lot making this vintage, and I do believe it. The soft, silky tannins wrap around the palate like a delicate web, charming us without needing intense depth. The finish surprises with a touch of salinity, adding a complexity that sandy clay soils typically don’t offer.
English pairs.new: 2016年夏特罗蒙特拉伯特的成熟果香，展现出它像“阳光亲吻的孩子”。尽管使用了十桶“整体发酵”（Fermentation Integrale），但健康的葡萄和nice的酸度确保没有沉重的橡木味。酒窖师傅告诉我，他非常享受制作这个年份的过程，我也深信不疑。柔软的丝滑的纹理包裹在口腔中像一张细致的网，迷人而不需要强烈的深度。尾部惊喜地带来了一点盐味，添加了沙质黏土土壤通常不具备的复杂性。

Western reviews.review: Medium bodied, elegant, round and forward, there is some oak that needs to integrate before the ripe plums cherries and licorice in this soft textured fruity wine is at its best. 90 Points
Western reviews.translation: 体积中等，优雅，圆润，前端突出，酒中有些木头味需要融合，才能让熟透的李子、樱桃和甘草的甜味在这款软质的果酒中展现得淋漓尽致。评分：90分。

Western reviews.review: (En Primeur) Sehr duftige Nase, floral, feinwürzig, dunkelfruchtig, rauchig, spannend, das Holz präsent aber nicht überbordend, sehr schöne Komplexität. Straffer Auftakt, deutlich Gerbstoff, einiges an Struktur und viel Frische durch die saftige Säure, dunkle und rote Beeren geben sich die Hand, viel Würze auch hier am Gaumen. Im Abgang von sehr guter Länge, endet auf Sauerkrischen. Ein knackiger Saint-Emilion mit viel Frische, dürfte sehr schön reifen. Verlangt aber was zu Essen. 2024-2038, 18 vvPunkte (91/100)
Western reviews.translation:
(En Primeur) 极具芳香的鼻子，花朵般的气味，细微的烟熏味，深色果实的味道，令人期待，木头的味道清晰但不突出，非常复杂。

入口强烈，明显的橡木味，结构清晰，酸度清新，深色和红色浆果相互融合，口感丰富。口感长达很久，结束于酸性果酱的味道。

这是一个非常有活力的圣埃米利翁葡萄酒，具有很好的清新感，应该会在未来很好地成熟。然而，它需要与适当的食物配对。预计成熟期为2024-2038年，评分18/20（91/100）。

Western reviews.review: 93–95. Barrel Sample. Ripe and juicy, this is a delicious wine. With its bold black fruits and balanced structure, it has all the makings of a ripe and generous yet crisp wine. There is a strong black-currant element here, while the wine finishes with a great lift of juicy acidity.
Western reviews.translation:
评分：93-95

酒样：成熟、丰富的口感，非常美味。酒中黑色果实丰富，结构平衡，具有成熟、丰富、清爽的特点。酒中有浓郁的黑加仑果实元素，酒尾带有清新、果香的酸度。

2022 Chateau Pichon Longueville Comtesse.name: 2022 Chateau Pichon Longueville Comtesse de Lalande 'Pichon Comtesse Reserve'

Chinese pairs.original: 与多年来的清雅风格略有不同，Pichon Comtesse Reserve 在2022年份注入了更多的活力、结构和深度。紫藤和鸢尾花香还没落下，一股甘草糖和话梅糖的香气便涌上心头。沉稳的单宁结构很有记忆点，或许多花些时间醒酒，才能唤醒它内在优雅。
Chinese pairs.new: The Pichon Comtesse Reserve deviates slightly from its traditional elegance, injecting more vitality, structure, and depth in the 2022 vintage. The scent of wisteria and irises still lingers, but is soon replaced by notes of honey and cherry liqueur. A solid tannin structure provides a sense of depth, which unfolds over time, revealing its inherent elegance.

English pairs.original: Pichon Comtesse Reserve infused more vigor, structure, and depth into the vintage of 2022, which differs slightly from its previous style. As the scent of wisteria and iris dissipates, the aroma of licorice and sour plum candy rushes to the nose. Its poised tannin structure is quite memorable, perhaps requiring more time to breathe to reveal its inherent elegance.
English pairs.new: 皮尚康特斯储备2022年款，注入了更多的活力、结构和深度，略有不同于之前的风格。随着紫藤和百合花的香气消散， licorice 和酸枣糖的香气涌现。其优雅的鞣质结构令人难忘，可能需要更多时间让它呼吸，才能展现出其内在的优雅。

Western reviews.review: Truffle, tobacco leaves, black currants, cedar, and hints of peppery spice show in the perfume. On the palate, the wine is clearly a baby Pichon. It is medium-bodied, elegant, soft, silky and lifted, with layers of finesse-oriented dark, red pit fruits that make you want to go back for another sip. This is just as good most vintages of the Grand Vin from the 80s and 90s. The wine blends 54% Cabernet Sauvignon, 34% Merlot, 10% Petit Verdot and 2% Cabernet Franc. Drink from 2025-2040. 92-94 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中，包含了松露、烟草叶、黑加仑、红檜和胡椒的味道。口感上，这瓶红酒显然是Pichon家族中的一员，体积中等，优雅、柔和、滑顺，层次丰富，黑红果味丰富，令人忍不住想再次品尝。与80年代和90年代的Grand Vin相比，这瓶红酒的品质不相上下。该酒的混合比例为54%卡波弗雷蒙、34%梅洛、10%佩蒂弗罗和2%卡波弗朗。建议2025-2040年饮用。评分92-94分。

Western reviews.review: Deep garnet, opaque core, purple reflections, subtle brightening on the rim. Black cherries, blackberries, some cassis and fine oak. Good complexity, dark wild berryish fruit, taut tannins that are perfectly integrated. Persistent, delicate nougat on the finish, toasty aromas in the aftertaste, certain ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，透明中心，紫色反射，酒液边缘微微发亮。黑杏、黑莓、些许黑加思和精致的橡木味。酒中有很好的复杂性，黑莓类的果味浓郁，紧致的纤维素质完美融合。酒尾持久，细腻的果仁味，口感中有烤焦的香气，酒有明显的陈化潜力。

Chinese pairs.original: 熟悉小拉菲的朋友或许会觉得2021年份比较清淡，但结合该年份的气候特点，能够有如此尚佳的表现实属可贵。香气清澈流畅，淡淡的檀香芬芳笼罩在奶油话梅、蓝莓果粒的周围，营造出清澈宁静的嗅觉画面。得益于来自拉菲正牌的一部分Merlot，这款酒获得了超出2021年份平均水准的集中度，不需要特别陈年，现在享用也很合适。
Chinese pairs.new: Friends familiar with Lafite may find the 2021 vintage a bit lighter, but given the climate conditions of that year, its excellent performance is truly commendable. The aroma is clear and smooth, with a subtle sandalwood fragrance enveloping the creamy cherry and blueberry fruit, creating a serene and clear olfactory landscape. Thanks to the part of the Merlot from Lafite's official vineyard, this wine has achieved a concentration beyond the average of the 2021 vintage, making it suitable for drinking now without the need for special aging.

English pairs.original: For those familiar Carruades de Lafite, the 2021 vintage might seem comparatively lighter, yet its performance is pretty attractive. The aroma is clear and seamless, with subtle sandalwood fragrances harmoniously mingling with creamy plum and blueberry, creating a tranquil tasting experience. Thanks to a portion of Merlot sourced from the Grand Vin de Lafite, this wine achieves a concentration that surpasses the character of 2021. It doesn’t need extended aging and is quite suitable for immediate enjoyment.
English pairs.new: 对于熟悉卡鲁瓦德·拉菲的人来说，2021年的品酒可能会觉得相对轻薄，但其表现却相当吸引人。酒香清晰流畅，细微的檀木香与浓郁的浆果和蓝莓巧妙融合，创造出一种宁静的品酒体验。由于部分梅洛来自拉菲大酒庄，这款酒取得了比2021年更高的浓度。它不需要长时间陈酿，非常适合立即享用。

Western reviews.review: Cherries and ripe black-currants give this second-label wine a generous, open character. It is succulent with rich tannins and pure black-currant acidity. This is sure to age well. Drink from 2028.
Western reviews.translation: 这款二级红酒的风味丰富开朗，带有浓郁的黑加仑和黑樱桃的味道。酒体丰富，口感丰富，带有黑樱桃的酸度。该酒有很好的储存潜力，建议2028年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: Vivid dark ruby, purple overtones on the narrow rim. Ripe dark cherries, a touch of blackberries, floral, candied orange zest, with a touch of fig in the background. Juicy, elegant, fresh, well structured, fine tannins and bright acidity; a harmonious, lively food companion with a salty red berry finish. Has a lovely future and ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红宝石色，带有紫色光泽。酒中的味道是熟透的黑杏子和黑莓，伴有花香和糖浆橙皮的香气，背景中还有一丝熟透的枣子味。口感是 juicy（水果味浓郁）、elegant（优雅）、fresh（新鲜）、well structured（结构合理）、fine tannins（细腻的苦味）和 bright acidity（清晰的酸度）。这瓶红酒是非常和谐的，适合与各种食物搭配，口感是鲜红的黑莓味。酒的未来前景很好， ageing potential（陈年潜力）也很高。

Western reviews.review: Tobacco leaf, wet forest floor, leafy herbs, cedar and red currants create the perfume. On the palate, the wine exudes freshness, elegance, crisp, bright, sweet, energetic fruits and a finish with a touch of spice in the zesty endnote. This wine was made from a blend of 55% Cabernet Sauvignon, 36% Merlot , 5% Cabernet Franc and 4% Petit Verdot. Drink from 2025-2042. 91-93
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中融合了烟草叶、湿润的森林地面、叶绿植物、红松和红currants的气息。口感上，酒体呈现出清新、优雅、清脆、明亮、甜美和充满活力的果味，以及带有点辛辣的尾韵。该酒由55%卡波内尔·沙夫宁（Cabernet Sauvignon）、36%梅洛（Merlot）、5%卡波内尔·法兰克（Cabernet Franc）和4%佩蒂·维多（Petit Verdot）组成。建议在2025-2042年内饮用。评分：91-93分。

Western reviews.review: Rubinrot und mit feinduftiger, floraler Nase, Veilchen über schwarzer Kirsche, Johannisbeeren, steinige Noten, zeigt eine sehr gute Komplexität. Im Gaumen frisch und relativ schlank, die rote Frucht wird von einer soliden Tanninstruktur gestützt, die Gerbstoffe sind nicht dominant, harmonieren mit der delikaten Frucht. Im Abgang lang mit Rückaromen, die an Blutorangen erinnern. Für die mittlere Reife gebaut. 2027-2040 (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2022. Château Lafite Rothschild)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

酒液呈深红色，酒香芳香，花朵味道浓郁，紫罗兰和黑浆果、黑莓、石果味道融合在一起，展现出极高的复杂性。口感清新，相对细长，红果味道由坚实的橡木结构支撑，柚皮味道不突出，和细腻的果味相和谐。尾部长长，余味回荡，似橙子味道。适合中期陈化，推荐陈化期为2027-2040年。

Western reviews.review: The deep, dark, ruby-red color is almost opaque & it holds well to the rim. Aromas of cassis & plum have a lovely minty freshness that is tamed by graphite overtones. The acidity is fresh & the tannins are firm, fine & gripping, without being astringent. Juicy, lively red-fruit dominates the mid-palate & a seam of graphite runs through it. Alcohol is balanced & the finish is quite long. 04/22 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色深暗红色，几乎是透明的，酒液在杯口保持稳定。酒中有浓郁的黑加仑和浆果香气，带有清新的薄荷味，图形的味道稍微平衡了这种清新感。酒的酸度清新，纤维素坚实细腻，抓住味蕾，但不苦涩。酒中充满了鲜活的红果味，中口的味道丰富，酒中有图形的味道贯穿其中。酒精平衡，酒尾长而持久。评分：04/22 DCAMW。

domaine armand rousseau pere et fils cha.name: domaine armand rousseau pere et fils charmes-chambertin 2014

Chinese pairs.original: Mazoyeres-Chambertin和Charmes-Chambertin的比例在这款酒中各占2/3和1/3。桶边试饮。此酒讨喜的香气中渗出杏、黑布林果肉、黑莓、薄荷、干花、岩石和香料。口感展现了极好的平衡感及女性化的优雅；充满矿物质的回味富有大量的干净果味，很好地中和了收尾处的严肃感。
Chinese pairs.new: 这款酒的配方是Mazoyeres-Chambertin和Charmes-Chambertin的混合，比例为2/3和1/3。酒桶边的品尝体验非常愉悦。酒中的香气中有杏、黑布林果肉、黑莓、薄荷、干花、岩石和香料的味道。口感平衡优雅，女性化的风格非常出色。酒尾留下了矿物质的回味，充满干净果味，很好地平衡了严肃的尾部感受。

English pairs.original: Composed of 2/3 Mazoyeres-Chambertin and 1/3 Charmes-Chambertin. Barrel tasting. Delightful on sniff, it opened up with the aromatics of apricot, black plum flesh, blackberry, mint, dried flower, rock and spices. Offering glorious balance and feminine elegance; the mineral-filled length possessed profusely clean fruit to absorb the austerity.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的组成是2/3的马佐雷斯-尚贝尔坦和1/3的尚梅-尚贝尔坦。酒庄进行了木桶品尝。酒香迷人，闻起来有杏子、黑杏、黑莓、薄荷、干花、岩石和香料的气息。酒体平衡优雅，矿物质充足的长度带有清新的果味，能够抵消酒中的严谨感。

Western reviews.review: (Kurznotiz) Helles Rot. Die Nase eine kleine Droge, floral, Rosenblüten, rote Frucht, super verspielt, alle paar Minuten kommen neue Elemente dazu, hervorragend. Im Gaumen weich, rund, top Gerbstoff, feine Würze, ein Traumtänzer, hochelegant, langanhaltend, ausgewogen. Sensationell aktuell.
Western reviews.translation: 简评：浅红色。酒鼻子上有轻微的药香，花香，玫瑰花，红果，非常轻快，几分钟后会有新的元素出现，非常出色。口感柔和，圆润，顶级的橡木味，细腻的盐味，一种梦幻般的舞者，高雅优雅，持久，平衡。目前非常出色。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Dassault 这两年进步显著。既然在高温的2022年份，它能成功将“温柔”融入酒中，那么在更加温和的2023年份，它变得愈发温柔动情。这款酒以一缕淡淡的甜美滋润了我的舌尖，然后又用看不见的单宁抚摸着我的味蕾，再加上鲜甜多汁的覆盆子和草莓。得了，我在这一刻，不想有其他任何要求，也不想较真它的风土（沙地黏土），只想静静地感受它给我带来的这份似水柔情。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau Dassault has made significant progress over the past two years. If it could successfully infuse "gentleness" into the wine in the hot 2022 vintage, then in the even more temperate 2023 vintage, it has become even more tender and emotive. This wine gently caressed my tongue with a hint of subtle sweetness, then gently stroked my palate with an invisible tannin, accompanied by the luscious flavors of fresh raspberries and strawberries. In this moment, I don't want to ask for anything else, nor do I want to nitpick its terroir (sandy clay soil), I just want to quietly appreciate the gentle charm it brings me.

English pairs.original: Chateau Dassault has shown remarkable improvement over the past two years. After successfully incorporating “gentleness” in the hot vintage of 2022, it has become even more tender and moving in 2023. This wine moistens my palate with a hint of sweetness, then caresses my taste buds with invisible tannins, complemented by raspberries and strawberries’ fresh, juicy flavors. At this moment, I have no other demands, nor do I wish to scrutinize its terroir (sandy clay); I simply want to quietly enjoy the gentle affection it offers.
English pairs.new: 夏娃酒庄在过去两年里表现出显著的进步。成功地在2022年的炎热年份中融入了“温柔”，并在2023年变得更加温柔和动情。这款酒以甜蜜的味道湿润我的口腔，然后用无形的苦味物质轻抚我的味蕾，伴随着新鲜 juicy 的草莓和草莓的风味。在这个时刻，我没有其他要求，也不想去细究它的土壤（沙质粘土）；我只想静静地享受它所提供的温柔的爱意。

Western reviews.review: Expressive and intense, this wine captivates with chewy yet delicious tannins and a delightful fruitiness. It maintains a firm and refreshing character, delivering a quite intense experience that lingers long on the palate.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒表现出强烈的个性，具有嚼劲而又美味的苦味和可爱的果味。它保持着坚实而清新的人设，带来了一种强烈的体验，留在口中久久不散。

Western reviews.review: Zeigt mehr Tiefgang als auch schon, schwarze Kirsche, dunkl e Beeren, Süssholz, florale Töne; kompakt am Gaumen, nicht überladen, frischer, saftiger und vor allem auch eleganter als in anderen Jahren; hat an Präzision gewonnen.
Western reviews.translation:
这段红酒评论翻译成中文如下：

展现出更深入的层次，黑色浆果，深色浆果，甜木香，花香味道；口感紧致，非过载，新鲜，水润，尤其是比往年更优雅；精确度也有所提高。

Western reviews.review: The deep, dark ruby-red color is not quite opaque. The aromas are a concentrated, ripe juicy red-fruit jam, like a compote of strawberries & juicy red-cherries. The palate displays rich, smooth strawberry & raspberry fruit with hints of spice. Fresh acidity lifts the fruit & the fine ripe, concentrated tannins gives some chewy grip. The wine is of mid-weight with balanced alcohol. A juicy, clean, fresh red-fruit finish lasts well. 04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色，略微透明。酒中的香气是浓郁的、成熟的、浓稠的红果酱，类似于草莓和鲜红樱桃的酱汁。口感上呈现出丰富、滑顺的草莓和莓果风味，伴有轻微的香料味。酒中的新鲜酸度使果味更加鲜明，而细致的成熟、浓缩的橡果纤维则给出了些许嚼劲。酒的重量适中，酒精度衡平。酒尾清新、干净、果香持久。评分：04/24 (ep) DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 对于生物动力酒庄来说，2018年份充满了压力，从装瓶后的表现来看，纯净却成了这款酒的主旋律，可见Haut-Bages对葡萄筛选是何等精细。清透而鲜爽的小红果中透着活泼的酸度，后面还跟着一丝淡淡的普洱茶清香。标志性的柔顺酒体和细腻的单宁都让这款酒成为2018年份波亚克产区为数不多的婉约派葡萄酒。
Chinese pairs.new: For Château Haut-Bages, 2018 was a high-pressure vintage, but the wine's purity shines through, a testament to the estate's meticulous grape selection. The bright, crisp red fruit is infused with lively acidity and a subtle hint of Pu-erh tea. The wine's signature smooth texture and refined tannins make it one of the few elegant wines from the 2018 Pauillac vintage.

English pairs.original: For all of the Biodynamic wineries, 2018 is not a easy vintage at all, but the clearance of Haut-Bages Liberal surprises me a lot; I think they made a perfect selection during the harvest. The vibrant acidity emerges from the juicy red berries, framed with a trace of attractive Puer tea-like fragrance. The palate ends up with lacy tannins and a soft body. It is absolutely one of the few graceful wines of Pauillac in 2018.
English pairs.new: 2018年对于所有生物动力葡萄园来说并不是一个容易的年份，但哈图-巴日利伯塔尔（Haut-Bages Liberal）的成果让我感到惊讶；我认为他们在收获季节做出了完美的选择。鲜红的浆果带来了活跃的酸度，伴随着一种吸引人的普洱茶香。口感以纤维质的坚果和柔和的体积结束。它绝对是2018年巴约克（Pauillac）的少数几款优雅的葡萄酒之一。

Western reviews.review: Noch sehr ausbaugeprägte, interessante Aromatik; von besonders saftiger, knackiger Art, Tannin mit besonderer Frische und Mineralität, langer, fruchtiger, wuchtiger und doch nicht brennender Ausklang; wirkt etwas verschlossener als en Primeur, doch hat unverkennbare Klasse.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的气味非常丰富，具有特别的水果和坚果香味，口感非常柔软，且有明显的矿物质和果味，尾部长而持久，非常有层次感。虽然这瓶红酒在初次品尝时可能会显得有些闭塞，但它的品质却是无可否认的。

Western reviews.review: Medium/full-bodied, bright, lifted layers of sweet, juicy red currants pop up on the nose along with tobacco, cedar, cigar box and a light hint of oak. There is a brightness to the fruit in the mouth, chewy tannins and a crispness to the red berries that carries through from start to finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感是中等到中重的，气味中有鲜甜的红 gooseberry、烟草、松木、雪茄盒和轻微的橡木味。口感中有明亮的果味，口感丰富的纤维和清脆的红果味，从开头到结尾都保持着。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, gute Tiefe, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung. Mit feiner Edelholzwürze unterlegte Nuancen von Lakritze, Cassis und Brombeerkonfit, ein Hauch von Limette, mineralischer, zart tabakiger Touch. Komplex, stoffig, straffe Textur, dunkle Kirschen, gut eingebettete, tragende Tannine, dunkelwürzig, stilistisch bereits in Richtung St.-Estèphe verweisend, zeigt gut Länge, ein robuster, facettenreicher Speisenbegleiter, hat noch einiges vor sich. (2021–2045)
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，深度良好，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。酒中有细微的高档木质香味，伴有薄荷糖、黑加仑和浓缩莓果的复杂香味，微微带有柠檬味，矿物质和轻微的烟草味。酒体复杂，厚实，紧致，黑葡萄味浓郁，坚实的橡木味充满，酒中有深度和长度，酒体丰富多面，适合与坚实的菜肴配对，酒体仍有很大的发展空间。 (2021-2045)

Western reviews.review: Tiefdunkel. Intensiver, tiefer Duft, zeigt neben viel dunkler Beerenfrucht auch Anflüge von Trüffel und dunklem Tabak. Der Gaumen ist weich, fast mollig, feinte Textur, das Tannin von sehr guter Qualität, zeigt Druck, eine schöne Balance und viel Länge, endet ungemein würzig auf rote und dunkle Beeren. Ein gelungener Haut-Bages Libéral! 2027-2044 (Verkostet auf Château Batailley (UGCB), am 01.04.2019)
Western reviews.translation: 深色红酒。强烈、深邃的香气，除了黑色浆果外，还有松露和黑烟的味道。口感柔软，几乎是软绵的，细腻的口感，高质量的苦味，具有压力，平衡美妙，长时间持久，结束于红色和黑色浆果的强烈香气。一个成功的Château Bages Libéral！推荐饮用时间：2027-2044（评分于Château Batailley（UGCB），2019年4月1日）。

Western reviews.review: Un fier et délicieux représentant de l’appellation Pauillac. Le village de Pauillac, situé entre Saint-Estephe et Saint-Julien, a sa propre appellation spécifiquement pour les vins rouges. C’est là que ce superbe vignoble, riche d’une longue histoire, élabore cette cuvée racée et typique de l’appellation. Depuis 1983, Claire Villars Lurton est propriétaire du domaine et lui redonne tout son lustre en produisant des vins impeccables, dont cette cuvée 2018. Nez distingué s’ouvrant sur des parfums d’une belle pureté évoquant les cerises, le cassis et les groseilles, rehaussés de notes poivrées, boisées et vanillées du plus bel effet. L’aération valide son élégance en ajoutant une dimension empyreumatique. En bouche, l’attaque est veloutée, restituant fidèlement les parfums reconnus au nez. Bonne amplitude, superbe équilibre et grande persistance. Oxygéner en carafe une heure et servir à 17 °C. Exquis avec le carré d’agneau grillé, la bavette de boeuf, les côtes de veau aux champignons, l’entrecôte de boeuf sauce au poivre, ou le gigot d’agneau.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一个来自巴吕阿克（Pauillac）的精致红酒。巴吕阿克位于圣埃斯泰夫和圣朱利安之间，拥有自己的红酒产区。这个历史悠久的葡萄园在这里生产了典型的巴吕阿克红酒。自1983年以来，克莱尔·维拉尔·卢尔顿（Claire Villars Lurton）是这个葡萄园的主人，她通过生产出无可挑剔的红酒，重新焕发了葡萄园的光彩，包括2018年的这款红酒。

这款红酒的香气独特，开启了清新的风景，带来浓郁的樱桃、黑加仑和草莓的味道，伴随着优雅的胡椒、木质和香料的味道。经过氧化后，红酒的优雅性被加强，带来了一种烟熏的味道。口感丰富，味道清晰，忠实地复现了鼻子中识别出的味道。红酒的幅度良好，平衡出色，持久性强。建议在一小时后在17°C的温度下在杯子中氧化后饮用。与烤羊排、牛肉扁片、蘑菇的牛排、胡椒牛排或烤羊腿等食物相配。

Chinese pairs.original: 若在盲品时品尝到2022年份的Chateau Lascombes，我肯定不敢猜是它家。常见的摩卡、榛果以及诸多烘烤香气被轻盈的樱桃果汁和草莓软糖所取代。单宁结构依旧稳固、浓郁，但酒体却愈发柔和圆润。这款酒令我对Chateau Lascombes的未来充满期待，期盼转型之后的它能震撼人们的味蕾，焕发全新的活力。
Chinese pairs.new: Tasting the 2022 Chateau Lascombes blind, I wouldn't have guessed it was from this estate. The usual mocha, hazelnut and toasted aromas are replaced by a light cherry juice and strawberry syrup. The tannin structure remains solid and rich, but the texture has become even softer and rounder. This wine has me excited for the future of Chateau Lascombes, hoping that after its transformation, it will shock our palates and radiate new vitality.

English pairs.original: If I were to blind-taste the 2022 vintage of Chateau Lascombes, I would never have guessed its origin. The familiar aromas of mocha, hazelnut, and other baked goods have given way to the light and refreshing essence of cherry juice and strawberry candy. The tannin structure remains solid and full-bodied, yet the wine’s texture is increasingly supple and smooth. This exquisite wine fills me with great anticipation for the future of Chateau Lascombes, with hopes that its transformation will please more people and radiate new vitality.
English pairs.new: 如果我没有看到标签，喝2022年的拉斯科姆酒庄（Chateau Lascombes），我绝不会猜到它的产地。熟悉的咖啡、杏仁和烘焙食品的香气已经让位给了清新果香的樱桃汁和草莓糖果。坚实的坚果结构仍然保持着充满体积的质地，但酒的质感变得更加柔软和光滑。这瓶精美的酒让我对拉斯科姆酒庄的未来充满了期待，希望它的变化会让更多的人喜欢，并带来新的活力。

Western reviews.review: Deep in color, the wine is lush, concentrated, polished, full-bodied, and packed with toasty oak, black currants, blackberries, black cherries, espresso and cocoa. This is incredibly creamy, but it is also quite oaky, so it is not for the oak averse. If you let it age it a bit, the oak could become better integrated into the wine. Drink from 2027-2050. 92-94 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 颜色深邃，酒体丰富浓郁，口感细腻光滑，充满了-toast的橡木味、黑加仑、黑莓、黑樱桃、咖啡和巧克力。酒精度非常高，但也有一定的橡木味，如果你愿意让它陈年一段时间，橡木味可能会更好地融入酒中。建议在2027-2050年饮用。评分92-94分。

Western reviews.review: Insgesamt 3x probiert und jedes Mal mit einer zweifelhaften Nase, sehr reif, leicht oxidiert. Im Gaumen cremig, reiffruchtig, kompottig, feines Tannin, in sich gute Balance. Ich habe meine Fragezeichen bei diesem Wein… (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / CVBG / Château Belgrave) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation: 总体来说，我尝试了三次，每次都有疑虑的鼻子，酒味非常成熟，略微氧化。口感丰富，成熟果味，果酱般的口感，细腻的苦味，整体平衡很好。我对这个酒有很多疑问…… (2023年4月尝试了 "En Primeur" / CVBG / Château Belgrave)

Western reviews.review: Le nez est fruité, aromatique avec un joli petit côté rôti et de la fraîcheur grâce à un fin côté mentholé. On a des notes de cerises rôties, de mûres écrasées et plus légèrement de petits fruits noirs assez mûrs associés à des touches de violette et de badiane. Il y a une pointe séveuse et on perçoit une subtile pointe de lys ainsi qu’une discrète note d’infusion presque ceylan et de chocolat. La bouche est fruitée, fraîche, minérale, élégante, gourmande avec de la crèmosité dans la fraîcheur. Il y a un joli toucher du grain velouté. On a des notes de cerises rôties, de cassis crémeux et plus légèrement de mûres écrasés associées à des touches de violette, de badiane voire de sève ainsi qu’à des pointes de minéralité racée presque saline voir iodée ainsi qu’à une pointe de petits fruits rouges mûrs et frais ainsi qu’à des notes chocolatées et toastées. Les tannins sont élégants, racés, francs et précis. Il y a une jolie persistance aromatique, une bonne définition, de la droiture et une jolie fraîcheur. C’est un vin étiré, sapide presque mentholé en fond.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

酒香果香、芳香，带有轻微的烤味和清新感，来自细微的薄荷味。有烤樱桃、挤压过的黑莓和略微成熟的黑果的味道，以及紫罗兰和丁香的点缀。酒中有一点苦涩的味道，且有细微的百合味和几乎是斯里兰卡茶的味道，以及巧克力的味道。口感果香、清新、矿物质、优雅、丰富，有轻微的乳脂感。酒中有细微的纤维感。有烤樱桃、奶油浓缩黑currant和略微挤压过的黑莓的味道，以及紫罗兰、丁香、树汁和矿物质的点缀，以及成熟的红果和清新的味道，以及巧克力和烤面包的味道。酒中的纤维质优雅、精致、直接和准确。酒中有优雅的持久香气、良好的定义、直率和清新感。酒体延展、丰富、几乎有薄荷味的底部。

Western reviews.review: Deep ruby, purple reflections. Delicate old wood spice, ripe cherries, some cassis, subtle nougat, fine herbal note in the underlay. Complex, taut and deep, very good freshness at the core, chocolatey, ripe plums. Lingers long and shows good spice on the finish. Certain ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，紫色反射。细腻的老木香，成熟的樱桃，些许黑加仑，微妙的果仁，细微的草药味在底层。复杂，紧致，深邃，核心处有很好的新鲜感，巧克力味，成熟的李子。余味持久，尾部有很好的香料味。有明显的陈化潜力。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark black-purple color holds well to a vivid purple rim. Lifted, leafy cassis perfume with well-integrated cedary notes. The palate is fresh with juicy black-cherry notes which close up to a bitter licorice & graphite core of concentrated, tary fruit. The wine has lovely freshness & the alcohol seems balanced. Oak gives a toasty/graphite notes to the mid-palate. The finish combines tight graphite with juicy black-fruit to ensure good length. 04/23 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的黑紫色，带有鲜明的紫色边缘。酒香中有浓郁的浆果味和干草味，中和的松木味。口感清新，带有浓郁的黑樱桃味，渐渐转变为苦杏仁和石墨的核心，富有集中和浓郁的果实味。酒有很好的清新感，酒精度量合适。橡木味在中口中带来 Toasty/石墨的味道。尾部结合紧密的石墨和浓郁的黑果，确保了酒的持久度。 评分：04/23 DCAMW

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Sociando-Mallet酒庄和Chateau Gloria酒庄一样，没有参与任何酒庄评级制度，但其生产的葡萄酒的平均质量却超过了一些4级酒庄。葡萄园的葡萄藤的平均树龄大约为30年。美妙深邃的香气充盈嗅觉，此酒散发出伴有叶子气息的黑醋栗水果味道，与此同时伴随着薄荷、湿泥土以及烟草滋味，入口后厚重的酒体伴随良好的质地。香气始终有封闭之感，需要时间陈年，来展示其潜力，这支酒极为出色！
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau Sociando-Mallet的葡萄酒与Chateau Gloria一样，没有参与任何酒庄评级制度，但其平均质量却超过了一些4级酒庄。葡萄园的葡萄藤平均树龄约为30年。酒中充满深邃的香气，带有黑醋栗水果味和叶子气息，伴随薄荷、湿泥土和烟草的味道。入口后，酒体厚重，质地良好。酒香封闭，需要时间陈年才能展现其潜力。这是一瓶极为出色的酒！

English pairs.original: Without any classification as Chateau Gloria, but this wine's quality is even better than some 4th growth. The average age of vines in vineyards are about 30 years old. Full of lovely depth on nose of leafy cassis fruit, with a fresh and rather surprising seam of mint, damp earth and tobacco, a nice weight followed by very good substance here. The nose was a little bit tight when drinking now, but overall it has much potential for the future, and it's very good indeed.
English pairs.new: 没有被分类为格拉迪亚庄园（Chateau Gloria），但这个酒的质量甚至超过了一些4级葡萄酒。葡萄园中葡萄的平均年龄约为30年。酒鼻子上充满了美丽的深度，带有叶绿的黑加斯（cassis）果味，伴有新鲜的薄荷，潮湿的土壤和烟草味，酒体很有重量，口感丰富。虽然现在喝起来酒鼻子有点紧，但整体来说它有很大的发展潜力，品质非常好。

Western reviews.review: This is a beautiful wine and certainly one of the great sleepers of the vintage. I originally predicted that this wine would be at full maturity between 2007 and 2028, but I would push that back by a good 4-5 years. Still inky/purple, with notes of acacia flowers intermixed with wet rocks, black currants, and blueberries, the wine is full-bodied, displays no real evidence of any oak, and offers up terrific concentration, texture, and length. For those who bought this beauty at $30-35 when it was available, this was a terrific buy, and it should continue to evolve for 20+ years.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶美丽的红酒，毫无疑问是当年的一大黑马。  我最初预测这瓶酒在2007年至2028年之间会达到成熟，但我会推迟这一时间约4-5年。 仍然是深紫色的，混合了紫罗兰花、湿石头、黑加仑和蓝berries的香气，这瓶酒充满体积，完全没有木头的迹象，展现出出色的浓度、质地和长度。对于那些在当时以30-35美元购买了这瓶美酒的人来说，这是一个了不起的买卖，它应该在20多年后继续进化。

Western reviews.review: Very smoky, with charcoal, almost lamblike aromas. Full-bodied, chewy and very rich, with a thick and velvety finish. Stylish and decadent young wine.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有非常浓郁的烟熏味，类似于焦炭或羊肉的香气。口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富、厚重、富有层次，口感丰富

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark, opaque, ruby/purple. Aromas are predominantly savoury with meaty marmite notes overlying brooding dark-fruits. The palate starts with fresh acidity & delicious lifted red fruits, supported by plentiful, fine, velvet-textured tannins. There are distinct meaty aromas & clean, cedar notes overlying the fruit. Alcohol is balanced & the fruit maintains a lovely vitality to the end of the long finsh. 4/12 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的红酒，呈现出深红紫色的色调。酒中浓郁的香气，带有肉类的咸味和酱油般的味道，掩盖着浓郁的黑果味。口感上，酒体呈现出清新果酸和丰富的红果味，受到细致的、柔软的纤维质的支持。酒中还有明显的肉类香气和干净的松木味，掩盖着果味。酒精平衡，果味保持到酒尾的活力。酒评：4/12 DCAMW。

Western reviews.review: Cassis und Leder, weißer Pfeffer. Sehr ­weicher Auftakt, unmittelbar präsente Extraktspannung, nervig und mineralisch begleitet, ein kleiner Alkoholüberhang im Vergleich zu Frucht und Struktur, aber inhaltsreich, mit intensiver Abgangsaromatik, sehr gutes Potenzial.
Western reviews.translation: 黑樱桃和皮革的味道，白胡椒的味道。非常柔和的开头，紧接着是浓郁的果实和矿物质的感觉，略带酒精的余味，但整体来说是丰富的，尾部有强烈的香气，非常有潜力。

Chinese pairs.original: 蜂蜜，西番莲，芒果和蜜饯柠檬皮的香气，酒体饱满，平衡和精致的，回味持续几分钟。
Chinese pairs.new: Honey, rambutan, mango, and candied lemon peel aromas. Full-bodied, balanced, and refined texture with a lingering finish lasting several minutes.
