Western reviews.review: (2001) Fine quality of apricot fruit with modest botrytis, but notes of honey and butterscotch. Rich palate, with a fine, thick, syrupy sweetness. Quite straightforward, but cool and long with good acidity.
Western reviews.translation: 2001年：这款红酒的口感丰富，带有杏桃果的味道，伴有轻微的霉菌感，但也带有蜂蜜和糖浆糖的香气。口感丰富，甜度高，口感细腻，浓郁。口感清爽，持久，酸度适宜。

Chinese pairs.original: 2020年份的Chateau Potensac 超级通透，和过往年份相比，装瓶后的它拥有更多的铅笔芯和檀香气息。口感酸爽多汁，蔓越莓、红李子、酸杨梅的味道能够铺满整个味蕾。这款看似轻巧的葡萄酒其实分为 “三重奏”，从开始的清脆、到中段的金属质感，再到收尾时的咸感，每个阶段都有不一样的精彩。
Chinese pairs.new: 2020年份的Chateau Potensac 极其透明，相比之前年份的版本，它在瓶装后拥有更强烈的铅笔芯和檀香气息。口感酸爽多汁，蔓越莓、红李子和酸杨梅的味道充满整个口腔。这款看似轻巧的葡萄酒实际上是一种复杂的“三重奏”，从清脆的开头，到金属质感的中段，再到咸感的结尾，每个阶段都有独特的魅力。

English pairs.original: The 2020 vintage of Chateau Potensac is a true masterpiece, with a translucent radiance that outshines all previous vintages. The bouquet is rich with the alluring scents of sandalwood and pencil shavings, drawing you in for a sip. The taste is a symphony of sourness, juiciness, and freshness, with notes of cranberry, red plum, and waxberry dancing across your taste buds. This delicate wine is actually a “trio”, with each stage of the palate delivering a unique and unforgettable experience. The crisp entry gives way to a metallic mid-palate, before concluding with a touch of saltiness that leaves you thirsting for more.
English pairs.new: 2020年沙托波滕萨克（Chateau Potensac）的葡萄酒是一部真正的杰作，透明的光泽远远超过了之前的所有年份。酒香丰富，带有令人着迷的檀木和铅笔屑的香气，邀请你品尝。口感是酸、汁液和新鲜的和谐，柿子梅、红李子和蜂蜜柿子的味道在你的味蕾上跳跃。这种细致的葡萄酒实际上是一部“三部曲”，每个阶段的口感都带来独特而难忘的体验。清脆的入口逐渐转变为金属般的中口，最后以一丝咸味结束，让你渴望更多。

Western reviews.review: Plenty of currants and flowers with crushed stone. Slate and iron, too. Lead pencil. Medium-bodied with racy and polished tannins that show intensity and length. Linear and focused. 44% merlot, 33% cabernet sauvignon, 22% cabernet franc and 1% petit verdot. Drink after 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感丰富，带有浓郁的黑currant和花朵香味，伴有石头和铁的矿物质味道，还有铅笔的清晰感。口感中等，具有清晰的果酸和细致的纤维，展现出强烈的深度和持久的尾韵。酒中含有44%梅洛，33%卡波弗雷蒙，22%卡波弗朗克和1%佩蒂·维多。建议在2025年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: The 2020 Potensac is a jewel of a wine. Bright acids give the 2020 notable energy that is immediately apparent. Crushed red berry fruit, blood orange, mint, rose petal, star anise and crushed rocks are all beautifully laced together. This finely cut, chiseled Médoc is a winner. I imagine it will age gracefully for a number of years to come. - Antonio Galloni
Western reviews.translation: 2020年波特纳克（Potensac）是一瓶珍贵的红酒。2020年的酒精度明显，带有明亮的酸度。酒中充满了新鲜的红果味、血橙、薄荷、玫瑰花、星安赛和碎石的味道，所有这些元素都被精心编织在一起。这瓶精致的梅多克红酒（Médoc）是一瓶赢家。我想它会在未来几年中逐渐成熟。 - 安东尼奥·加隆尼（Antonio Galloni）

Western reviews.review: A year-in, year-out winner, the 2020 Château Potensac is another beauty that has the vintage's fresh, focused style as well as classic red and black currant/cherry fruits, some damp earth and underbrush nuances, medium body, nicely integrated acidity and oak, and outstanding length. Rating: 92+
Western reviews.translation: 2020年夏托波滕萨克（Château Potensac）红酒再次证明了它的优质，拥有新鲜、集中且典型的黑红葡萄风味，带有典型的黑樱桃、黑currant和黑樱桃风味，伴有泥土和灌木丛的细微差别，中等体积，酸度和橡木味道融合得很好，口感持久。评分：92+.

Western reviews.review: Quite herbal on the nose, a medicinal touch, aniseed and bramble fruits. Smooth and satisfying, this has a nice clarity to the fruit, clean and clear, generous with lots of energy and Medoc characters. Easy drinking with a cool, classic touch - some bright red and blue fruits and a slightly chalky salinity. Very appealing and great to drink now with a juicy mid palate. Drink now if you want but it will age too. A fine example that has a real kick to it on the fresh finish. 1% Petit Verdot completes the blend. Ageing 20% new oak. 3.63pH.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中有很多草药味，带有一点药物味，带有 licorice 和黑莓果味。口感平滑舒适，果味清晰明亮，干净清澈，充满能量和 Medoc 风格。口感轻松，带有一点冷清的经典风格，带有亮丽的红色和蓝色果味和微微的盐味。非常吸引人，非常适合现在饮用，口感丰富中等。想要饮用现在的可以，但也可以放置储存。口感清新，带有一点新鲜的味道。配方中有 1% Petit Verdot。使用了 20% 新橡木桶进行陈化。pH 值为 3.63。

Western reviews.review: The 2020 Potensac is composed of 44% Merlot, 33% Cabernet A powerful, rather rich vintage for this estate, the 2020 Potensac offers up aromas of cassis, vine smoke and cigar wrapper, followed by a medium to full-bodied, fleshy and vibrant palate. Framed by powdery tannins and lively acids, it's built to age with grace.Rating: 90+
Western reviews.translation: 2020年波特纳克（Potensac）红酒的组成比例为44%梅洛（Merlot）和33%卡布ernet（Cabernet）。波特纳克2020年是一款强劲而富有魅力的红酒，酒体丰富，口感中等到中等以上，带有黑加仑（cassis）、烟草味和雪茄味。酒体丰富而又充满活力，粉末状的纹理和清晰的酸度使其具有很好的储存潜力。评分：90+。

Chinese pairs.original: 酒体呈中等红宝石色泽，黑巧克力、泥土、桑莓、黑橄榄的香气浓郁丰盈，并带有些微肉豆蔻以及薄荷气息，入口后带有香草、烟草和肉桂滋味，口感丝滑，接近于“天鹅绒般的丝滑”质感，单宁柔顺，回味悠长，是一支很棒的葡萄酒！
Chinese pairs.new: The wine has a medium garnet color, with intense and full-bodied aromas of dark chocolate, earth, blackberry, and black olive. There are subtle hints of nutmeg and mint, followed by flavors of vanilla, tobacco, and cinnamon on the palate. The texture is silky smooth, akin to "velvety" softness, with gentle tannins and a long, lingering finish. This is an excellent wine!

English pairs.original: Medium ruby color, the wine expressed a complex and intense bouquet of dark chocolate, earth, mulberry, black olive, hint of nutmeg and mint, flavour of vanilla, tobacco and cinnamon on the palate, very silky even close to ‘velvet’ texture, with well-integrated tannins and a long finish. So great!
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色，酒体呈现出复杂而浓郁的香气，包括黑巧克力、土壤、黑莓、黑橄榄、丁香和薄荷的味道，口感中有香草、烟草和肉桂的味道，口感非常滑顺，接近丝绸般的质感，口感中有很好的整合度，且有长长的尾韵。非常棒！

Western reviews.review: Slightly past fully mature, this requires drinking. The fruit has started to fade. There is much more earth and tobacco going on here. The small amount of bright, red fruits in this medium bodied wine that are barely poking through are not enough to keep you interested. 87 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这个红酒已经接近成熟，需要尽快饮用。果味已经开始减退，地质和烟草的味道变得更加突出。虽然这个中等体积的红酒中仍有少量的鲜红果味，但它们很难让人感兴趣。评分87分。

Western reviews.review: (2003) A dense sweet fruitness dominates the nose, and another powerful, brooding style of wine. Lacks a little fruit on the palate compared to the Lafon-Rochet, but bold, plummy and spicy. Very good.
Western reviews.translation: 2003年：酒精的鼻子中充满了浓郁的甜水果味，另一个强大的、沉思的葡萄酒风格。口感上与拉丰-罗歇相比略少水果，但果味浓郁、果实丰富、有着浓郁的果酱味和辣味。非常好。

Chinese pairs.original: 水果，蘑菇与黑莓，蓝莓的香气。醇厚的酒体，平衡的结构，以及柔滑的单宁。
Chinese pairs.new: Fruity, earthy, and blackberry-blueberry aromas. A rich, full-bodied wine with a balanced structure and smooth tannins.

Western reviews.review: Sehr schöner Pétrus, weil er Substanz und schon spürbare Fruchtgkeit besitzt und daher sowohl jung getrunken werden kann (2011 bis 2013) als auch mit der Reife (2016 bis 2020). Voller Rasse, Feuer, Würze, Sinnlichkeit.
Western reviews.translation: 非常美好的佩特鲁斯（Pétrus），因为它具有丰富的质地和明显的果味，既可以在年轻时饮用（2011-2013年）又可以在成熟后饮用（2016-2020年）。充满野性、火焰、香料和诱人的魅力。

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Rubingranat, violette Randaufhellung. In der Nase saftige, dunkle Beerenfrucht mit einem zarten Hauch Hagebuttenjam, Schlehenbeeren, gewürzige Nuancen, Edelholzanklang. Am Gaumen feines Kirschenkonfit, zart nach Orangen, feiner Tanninteppich, der den Mund gut auskleidet, extraktsüße Frucht im Nachhall, mineralischer Nachhall, zeigt sein edles Geblüt.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

深红色葡萄酒，紫色边缘。酒香中有浓郁的浓果味，带有轻微的罐头果酱味，黑浆果味，香料味，高档木头味。口感中有细腻的樱桃果酱味，带有轻微的橙子味，细腻的果皮味，酒精味在口中流淌，余味中有浓郁的果味，矿物质味，展现出高档的品质。

Western reviews.review: (2008) Pétrus adds a fascinating gravel and very gently meaty edge to powerful black fruit. There is terrific concentration and intensity here. On the palate this has a very composed, harmonious but grippy character, with extremely taut tannins and acidity, and the fruit tightly-packed and layered. Not so giving as the Trotanoy, but has obvious gravitas.
Western reviews.translation: 2008 年的佩特鲁斯（Pétrus）在强烈的黑果中加入了迷人的碎石和极轻的肉味。这里有极好的浓度和强度。口感上，这个酒有非常和谐、平衡但又有抓人的特点，非常紧绷的橡木和酸度，果味紧密、层次分明。与托罗诺伊（Trotanoy）相比，这个酒不太给予，但显然具有很强的权威感。

Bouchard Pere & Fils Greves Vigne de l'E.name: Bouchard Pere & Fils Greves Vigne de l'Enfant Jesus 2009

Chinese pairs.original: 馥郁的芬芳，其中充满了浓郁的果味和辛辣味、橡木味，口感浓郁、稠密而柔和。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich aromas of intense fruit and spice, with hints of oak, followed by a full-bodied, dense, and smooth texture.

Western reviews.review: Medium dark ruby red; the fruit is slightly darker, blackcurrant, herbs and cherry, some vanilla and gentle oak; the palate is rounded with sweet fruit, a hint of confiture jam, blackcurrant and cherry, darker fruit character; it has a bright freshness and sweet spiciness, it shows plenty of structure from fine tannins and the aftertaste is really long - it needs time to reveal its full potential, but should have a very long life ahead of it - great stuff
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深红色，略微偏黑。

香气：黑currant、草本植物、樱桃、香草和轻微的橡木味。

口感：圆润，甜度高，果味浓郁，黑currant和樱桃味浓郁，深度果味。口感清新，甜度适中，带有轻微的香料味。口感结构良好，细腻的橡皮味，余味持久。需要时间来展现其全部潜力，但预计寿命长达数十年。

Chinese pairs.original: En Primeurs 状态的Chateau Alcee 就已经这么好喝了，装瓶后还得了啊！酸枣、血橙与大红袍的茶香清晰可见，其酸甜清爽的香气即便隔着半米远都令人神清气爽。细粉状的单宁与多汁的口感搭配得恰如其分，细粉状的单宁与多汁的口感搭配地天衣无缝，再加上石灰岩黏土天生的pH加持，品的我那叫一个爽。这么好的高性价比酒，做Wine Bar的朋友们可以入手啊！
Chinese pairs.new: The Chateau Alcee En Primeurs is already drinking incredibly well, and it's even better after bottling. The clear and distinct aromas of persimmon, blood orange, and tea from the Cabernet Sauvignon are refreshing and invigorating, even from a distance. The fine-grained tannins and juicy texture are perfectly balanced, with the fine-grained tannins and juicy texture blending seamlessly together. The natural pH from the limestone clay soils adds to the refreshing quality of the wine. This excellent value wine is a must-have for wine bars.

English pairs.original: Chateau Alcee 2022 (En Primeurs) is already so delicious, just imagine how amazing it will taste once bottled! The fragrances of sour cherry, blood orange, and Da Hong Pao tea are distinct and refreshing, with a delightful acidity that lingers in the air. The finely powdered tannins complement the juicy texture perfectly, while the pH level enhanced by the natural clay-limestone soil adds an extra level of freshness. It’s an absolute pleasure to indulge in this high-value wine, making it a great addition to any wine bar collection!
English pairs.new: 夏都艾利 2022（预售）已经如此美味，想象一下当它被装瓶后会有多么惊人！这款红酒的酸橙、血橙和大红袍茶的香气清新独特，带有令人愉悦的酸度，留在空气中久久不散。细致的粉末状纤维素与果肉般的口感完美匹配，而天然黏土石灰质土壤增强的pH值，给了这款红酒额外的清新感。品尝这款高价值的红酒，是一种绝对的享受，值得成为任何酒吧收藏的精选品！

Western reviews.review: Flowers, powdered-chocolate, black plums, cherries and a hint of spearmint open the perfume. The wine is rich, lush, full and polished on the palate, with layers of sweet, ripe, juicy plums and dark chocolate with intensity and freshness to the fruits on the mid-palate and in the finish. The wine was produced from 100% Merlot. Drink from 2025-2037. 82-94 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中包含着花朵、巧克力粉末、黑杏、樱桃和薄荷的味道。口感丰富、浓郁、饱满且光滑，口感中有层次的甜、熟、 juicy 的杏子和黑巧克力的味道，中口和尾部都有果味的强度和新鲜感。该酒是由100%梅洛特葡萄生产的。建议在2025-2037年内饮用。评分82-94分。

Western reviews.review: Le nez est joli en élégance avec une certaine puissance racée, de la précision et une petite droiture. On a des notes de mûres écrasées, de petits fruits noirs écrasés et plus légèrement de fraises assez mûres associées à des touches de petits fruits rouges rôtis ainsi qu’à des pointes de prunes bleues écrasées ainsi que de fines notes d’amandes toastées, de clous de girofle et de chocolat. La bouche est fruitée, minérale avec de la tension et de la justesse. Il y a une jolie énergie racée avec une trame acidulée. On a des notes de mûres pulpeuses et juteuses, de cassis éclatant acidulé et plus légèrement de petits fruits rouges acidulés croquants associés à une touche de bleuet, d’amande toastée et de muscade. Il y a une subtile pointe presque iodée en fond. On perçoit même une imperceptible note séveuse en fond de dégustation accompagnant une belle fraîcheur et des tanins racés et francs dans la minéralité.
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的香气优雅而强烈，具有精确和干净的特点。酒中有浓郁的黑berry、黑果和略带熟度的草莓的气息，伴有烤红果和蓝berry的味道，以及轻微的杏仁、丁香和巧克力的香气。

口感果香、矿物质，具有张力和准确性。酒中有优雅的能量和酸度的线索。有浓郁的黑berry和果肉的气息，酸性爆发的黑currant和略带酸度的红果的味道，伴有轻微的蓝berry、杏仁和肉桂的香气。酒底有微妙的海盐味和几乎不可察觉的苦味，伴有清新的气息和强烈的矿物质和果皮的味道。

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby garnet, opaque core, purple reflections, delicate rim brightening. Black notes of blackberries and liquorice, subtle touch of noble wood, tobacco nuances. Complex, substantial, fine black cherries, integrated, ripe tannins, shows good length, nougat in the finish, has maturity and certain ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，浓郁的紫红色核心，紫色反射，细微的边缘闪亮。黑色黑莓和 licorice 的黑色笔记，高贵的木质的微妙触感，烟草的细微差别。复杂，丰富，细致的黑黑杏仁，融合，成熟的鞣质，展现出良好的长度， nougat 在尾部，具有成熟和某种成熟潜力。

Chinese pairs.original: 真的是太神奇了，Chateau Les Cruzelles 不但能够在凉爽的2021年份保持成熟感，还能在干热的2022年份大秀清雅。这已经不是风土好这么简单了，而是酿酒师对葡萄成熟度精准把握的真实体现。酒体浓郁圆润，包裹着咸奶油的蓝莓和桑果在摇杯的瞬间就倾泻而出；回甘时的甘草糖、茶梗和黑橄榄为酒增添了傲人的深度，是一款品质极佳的Lalande-de-Pomerol。
Chinese pairs.new:
It's truly magical, Chateau Les Cruzelles not only retains its maturity in the cool 2021 vintage, but also showcases its elegance in the dry 2022 vintage. This is no longer just a matter of terroir, but a genuine reflection of the winemaker's precise grasp of grape ripeness.

The full-bodied wine is rich and velvety, wrapped in salty cream and blueberry and plum notes that burst forth in the glass; the lingering finish adds a regal depth with hints of licorice, tea leaves, and black olive, making it a truly exceptional Lalande-de-Pomerol.

English pairs.original: It is truly miraculous that Chateau Les Cruzelles not only maintains its maturity in the cooler vintage of 2021 but also showcases its elegance in the dry and hot 2022 vintage. This is not only due to the excellent terroir, but also a true reflection of the winemaker’s precise control of grape ripeness. The rich and round body of the wine is enveloped in the flavors of salty buttercream, blueberries, and blackcurrants, which pour out instantly upon swirling the glass. The sweet licorice, tea stems, and black olives in the aftertaste add an impressive depth to the wine, making it an excellent quality Lalande-de-Pomerol.
English pairs.new: 令人惊讶的是，2021年酿造的克鲁塞尔酒庄（Chateau Les Cruzelles）不仅在酷热的2021年酿造中保持了成熟的风格，还在干燥炎热的2022年酿造中展现出优雅的风格。这不仅是因为优质的土壤条件，也是酿酒师精确控制葡萄成熟度的结果。酒中的丰富圆润体感被盐味奶油、蓝莓和黑加仑的风味所包围，旋转酒杯时这些风味会立即释放出来。酒尾的甜薄荷、茶叶和黑橄榄风味为酒品增添了深度，使其成为一款优质的拉兰德-波梅罗酒（Lalande-de-Pomerol）。

Western reviews.review: Lush, soft, and creamy, the wine shows its layers of chocolately plums, black cherries, smoke, espresso, and licorice with ease. Fresh and silky are the words of the day here for what you enjoy on the medium-bodied, supple-textured palate, and in the finish. You can enjoy this Pomerol look-alike on release if you prefer its creamy, youthful fruits, or age it for its secondary characteristics. Drink from 2025-2040. 92-94 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感丰富细腻，展现出浓郁的巧克力浆果、黑樱桃、烟熏、咖啡和甘草等复杂的层次。新鲜和细腻是这款酒的特点，适合中等体积的口感和柔软的口感。您可以在发布时享受这款类似波美罗的酒的鲜嫩果味，或者将其储存以享受其次级特征。建议在2025-2040年内饮用。评分92-94分。

Western reviews.review: (80% Merlot, 20% Cabernet Franc, von lehmigen Kiesböden, 50% Neuholz, 14.6% Alkohol). Was für eine Nase, tiefgründig und kühl, viel dunkle Frucht, dazu ein Hauch Minze. Der Gaumen ist zupackend, strukturiert, merklich Tannin umgarnt die knackige Frucht, der Wein hat Druck und Präszision, wirkt lebhaft, jugendlich wild und doch bei sich. Sehr schöne Länge, rotfruchtiges Finale. Das hat Frische, Klasse und Rasse, dürfte sehr gut reifen. 2028-2055 (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 auf Château L'Église Clinet) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation:
这是一瓶红酒评论，内容如下：

80% 梅洛，20% 卡波弗兰克，来自石灰质土壤的葡萄园，50% 新生树，14.6% 酒精含量。

这瓶红酒的鼻子非常深邃和清凉，充满了黑色果味，伴随着一丝薄荷的味道。

口感强烈，结构良好，坚果味和果味相互融合，酒精含量高，酒体丰富，酒味清晰，充满活力，年轻而野性，但又有着稳定的基调。

酒尾长达数秒，留下了深红色的果味，酒体清新，品质优良，酒味纯正，应该会在2028-2055年间达到最佳状态。

注：这瓶红酒是在2023年4月在Château L'Église Clinet品尝的，属于2022年产的“En Primeur”系列。

Chinese pairs.original: 2005年份Latour-Martillac的铅笔芯味道很抢镜，把左岸赤霞珠陈年后的经典形象地呈现了出来。 这款酒的酸度比我印象中的2005年份要高挑很多，单宁的质感也更为柔化。收尾中还带着Latour-Martillac标志性的咸鲜回甘，以及雅痞男指尖温暖的烟草味道。很有型男范儿的一款左岸混酿。
Chinese pairs.new: 2005年份Latour-Martillac的口感非常出色，展现了典型的左岸赤霞珠风格。酒中的酸度比我预期的要高，单宁质感也更加柔和。酒尾带有Latour-Martillac的典型咸鲜回甘和烟草味道，非常有型男风格。

English pairs.original: The taste of the pencil shave of Latour-Martillac 2005 is very impressive, presenting the classic image of the Left Bank Cabernet Sauvignon shown after the bottle aging. The acidity of this wine is higher than my memory of 2005 in Bordeaux, and the texture of tannins is softer and gentler. It brings me an aftertaste of the signature saltiness of Latour-Martillac and the warm note of tobacco that lingers on a yuppie man’s fingertips. This is a very masculine left bank blend.
English pairs.new: 拉图尔-马蒂亚克 2005 的口感非常出色，展现了瓶陈的左岸卡波弗雷（Cabernet Sauvignon）典型风格。这个酒的酸度高于我对 2005 年波尔多的记忆，纤维的质地更加柔软。它带给我拉图尔-马蒂亚克的标志性咸味和一丝烟草的暖意，留在年轻成功男性的指尖。这个酒是一款非常典型的左岸混合酒。

Western reviews.review: Tiefdunkles Rubingranat, fast schwarzer Kern, violette Reflexe, in der Nase reifes süßes Beerenkonfit, etwas Dörrobst, zarte Orangenschalen. Am Gaumen saftig, frisch und elegant, lebendig strukturiert, harmonische Textur, sehr gute Entwicklungschancen. Ein großer Wurf.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，近乎黑色葡萄酒色核心，紫色反光，酒鼻中充满成熟的甜果酱香气，略带干酪和轻微的橙色皮肤。口感丰富、清新、优雅，结构活跃，纤维柔顺，发展前景良好。是一款出色的葡萄酒。

Western reviews.review: 91-93 Barrel sample. With its dryness, this seems at first to be all tannin. There is, though, a black currant fruit flavor that shows through after the wine has been in the mouth for a while, and the aftertaste has fine acidity. This should develop well.
Western reviews.translation:
评分：91-93 分。 

初次尝试时，这款红酒似乎非常干净，几乎完全是苦味。但是，经过一段时间的咀嚼后，黑currant的果味会逐渐显现，口感中还有一丝细腻的酸度。这种酒应该会在未来发展得更好。

Western reviews.review: Deep, ruby-red, verging on the opaque. The dark fruit oin the nose is quite restrained and cedary oak aromas dominate. Brooding black fruits on the palate are dominated by cedar flavors. The palate is well-structured & the style is quite old-fashioned & astringent. Acidity & alcohol are balanced but the long finish is quite hollow. 11/09 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深度的红色，接近透明。酒鼻中黑果的气味相对保守，松木香气占据主导地位。口感中浓郁的黑果被松木味道所淹没。口感结构良好，但风格老派，略带苦涩。酸度和酒精平衡，但长尾部略显空虚。评分：11/09 DCAMW。

Western reviews.review:
Ici un pessac  sensationnel 
Au nez un ensemble aérien de minéral et graphite, léger boisé et fruit noir , mûre, très frai 
En bouche belle caresse et persistance, belle longueur entièrement sur le fruit
Western reviews.translation:
这里是一个令人惊艳的佩萨克酒庄红酒

在鼻子里，酒体呈现出轻盈的矿物质和石墨气息，轻微的木质和黑色果实，浓郁的黑莓，非常新鲜

在口中，酒体呈现出柔和的触感和持久感，酒尾长而圆润，完全依靠黑色果实的风味。

Chinese pairs.original: 好一款甜美四溢的葡萄酒，既展现了2015年份的成熟气质，又表现出了 Chateau La Tour Figeac 的丰满质感。品尝这款酒时，仿佛被阳光所拥抱，沐浴在它的身下，整个人都会被能量和热情所感染。奶粉般的单宁和丝滑的酒体相得益彰，再加上经典的咸感，简直不要太好喝。
Chinese pairs.new: A luscious and full-bodied wine that showcases both the maturity of the 2015 vintage and the opulence of Chateau La Tour Figeac. As you sip this wine, you're enveloped in warmth and energy, feeling invigorated by its passion. The creamy tannins and silky texture complement each other perfectly, paired with a classic saltiness that makes it utterly irresistible.

English pairs.original: What a delightfully sweet and exuberant wine! It perfectly showcases the mature character of the 2015 vintage while also highlighting Chateau La Tour Figeac’s rich texture. Tasting this wine feels like being embraced by sunshine, with its warmth and energy washing over you. The powdery tannins and silky body complement each other beautifully, and the classic hint of salinity makes it simply irresistible.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的甜度和活力令人愉悦！它完美地展现了2015年产季成熟的特质，同时也突出了酒庄Chateau La Tour Figeac的丰富口感。品尝这款酒就像被阳光温暖地拥抱，温暖和能量会在你身上流动。粉状的苦味和细滑的口感相互完美融合，经典的咸味使得它简直无法抗拒。

Western reviews.review: This estate, run on biodynamic principles, has made a rich wine with density and intense, pure black-currant fruits. It has a firm backbone of tannins along with perfumed minerality from the Cabernet Franc in the blend. Drink this wine from 2024. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 这家葡萄酒庄园采用生物动力学原则进行管理，生产出一款丰富的葡萄酒，具有厚实的体积和浓郁的黑加仑果实。酒中有坚实的坚果味和来自卡贝网法兰克的香气矿物质。建议从2024年开始饮用。- 罗杰沃斯

Western reviews.review: Here's a wine that keeps getting better and better as it ages in bottle. The truffle and floral notes get you going. But perhaps it's the silky, fresh, ripe, sweet, plums and cherries that is the best part. Elegant and classy, this is quite the charmer.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一个越来越好越来越美味的红酒。瓶中陈酿的过程中，酒中的松露和花香会让你兴奋。但也许最好的部分是它的滑顺、新鲜、成熟、甜美的浆果和樱桃。优雅、典雅，这是一款非常迷人的红酒。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung, reife Zwetschgen, dunkle Beerenfrucht, angenehme Kräuterwürze, kandierte Orangenzesten unterlegt. Saftig, süße Frucht, samtige Textur, feine Tannine, elegant und anhaltend, wirkt bereits sehr zugänglich, schokoladiger Nachhall, sicheres Potenzial.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，微微的边缘光泽，成熟的浆果，黑色浆果果肉，舒适的香草味，糖化的橙子皮底调，酒体丰富，甜美的果肉，丝绒般的质地，细腻的苦味，优雅而持久，已经相当容易入口，巧克力般的余味，充满潜力。

2021 Vignobles Andre Lurton Chateau La L.name: 2021 Vignobles Andre Lurton Chateau La Louviere

Chinese pairs.original: 相当经典的Pessac-Leognan白葡萄酒，清甜的口感、舒畅的酸度、流畅的线条，再加上香瓜和冰糖雪梨的成熟气息，宛然一副俏佳人的美好形象。我非常喜欢这款酒贯穿始终的矿物感，这种咸鲜的矿物感能够在酒体中撑起一道薄如蝉翼却又牢不可破的结构感，把收尾拉得无比修长且让整个口感显得特别挺拔。刚品完我就开始期待装瓶后的表现了。
Chinese pairs.new: A quintessential Pessac-Leognan white wine, with a sweet and silky texture, a refreshing acidity, and a smooth, flowing profile, complemented by the mature scents of honeydew melon and Asian pear. It's a stunning beauty, with a minerality that I adore, a salty, fresh minerality that provides a delicate yet unshakeable structure, extending the finish to a remarkable length and making the entire palate feel lifted and refined. I'm already looking forward to seeing how it develops in bottle.

English pairs.original: A pretty classic Pessac-Leognan white wine that can be summarized with a neat and sweet mouthfeel, soothing acidity, smooth silhouette, and notes of ripe melon and pear sorbet. All contribute to an attractive image of a fair lady. I especially enjoy the minerality that runs through this wine, a savory sensory that holds up the thin but unbreakable structure, lengthening the finish and making the whole palate seem particularly upright. I already look forward to its performance after bottling the moment I tried its Primeur sample.
English pairs.new: 这是一瓶典型的佩萨克-莱奥甘白酒，口感清新甜美，酸度适中，体型平滑，带有成熟的瓜果和梨冰淇淋的香气。所有这些元素都让这瓶酒呈现出一种优雅的女性形象。特别值得一提的是，这瓶酒的矿物质味道非常出色，给人一种丰富的感觉，酒体结构紧致坚实，延长了尾部，让整个口感变得更加立体。从我尝试的原酒样本开始，我就已经期待着它的表现了。

Western reviews.review: Mittleres Rubinrot. Zurückhaltend in der Nase, etwas Tabak, Kräuter, verhaltene Kirschfrucht. Im Gaumen ziemlich straff, markante, leicht trocknende Tannine, leichter Körper und relativ kurzes Finish. 2025-2033 (Verkostet im November 2023 in Zürich bei UGCB)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论，翻译如下：

颜色：中度红色

香气：回味中，带有烟草、草本植物和控制的樱桃果味。

口感：口感紧致，具有明显的果皮味，略带干涩，体积较轻，尾部相对较短。

推荐饮用年份：2025-2033（2023年11月在瑞士Zürich的UGCB品尝）。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby with purple hues on the rim. Delicate vanilla and lime notes along with dark wild berries, nougat and a touch of noble wood. Medium-bodied, dark cherry fruit, integrated tannins, lightly savoury, open and fresh; a versatile food companion.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色酒液，边缘有紫色光泽。酒中带有细微的香草和柠檬味，混合着黑莓、果仁糖和一丝高贵的木头味。酒体中等，黑樱桃果味浓郁，纤维素柔和，略带咸味，开朗新鲜，适合多种菜肴搭配。

Western reviews.review: Floral in nature with accents of tobacco leaf, spice, dark currants and smoke. The wine is round, polished, soft, and sweet, with plenty of ripe, dark red berries and polished tannins in the medium-bodied finish. Drink from 2024-2039. 90-92
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有花香的特征，伴有烟草叶、香料、黑葡萄和烟雾的味道。酒体圆润、光滑、甜润，口感丰富，中等体积，尾部有成熟的黑红果味和光滑的苦味。建议2024-2039年饮用。评分：90-92分。

Western reviews.review: Medium to deep ruby red in color with a touch of purple at the rim. The aromas are of restrained dark-plum fruit. On the palate the fruit has a clean & straightforward red-plum nature. Fine tannins are slightly astringent. Fresh acidity lifts the fruit well, but the structure is quite light. Alcohol is balanced and the finish has reasonable length. 04/22 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深红色，边缘带有紫色光泽。

香气：酒中有着抑制的黑浆果香气。

口感：酒中浆果味清新直接，呈现红浆果风味。酒中有细致的纤维，略带干涩。酒中有清新的酸度，能够很好地提升酒的风味，但酒的结构较轻。酒中的酒精平衡，酒尾有合理的持久度。评分：04/22 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 2004年份的果香并不芬芳，但它的质感绝对是上乘之作。和2004年份很多青绿寡淡的葡萄酒不同，Clos Fourtet 如同一位智者，懂得如何扬长避短。它不去过分追求果香的堆砌，而是借助时间的力量慢慢打磨出一种特有的柔美感，通体散发着淡淡的松柏清凉。于是乎，我们品到的是一款酒体出色又不缺层次感的圣爱美隆佳作。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2004 vintage lacks aromatic intensity, but its texture is truly exceptional. Unlike many 2004 Bordeaux wines that are pale and austere, Clos Fourtet is a sage that knows how to play to its strengths and downplay its weaknesses. It doesn't overemphasize fruitiness, instead relying on time to slowly hone a unique, velvety texture that exudes a subtle, cedar-like freshness. The result is a wine that is both outstanding in body and layered in complexity.

English pairs.original: The fruitiness of the 2004 vintage may not be excellent, but its texture is truly good. Unlike many pale and unimpressive wines in 2004, Clos Fourtet, like a wise sage, knows how to accentuate its strengths and mitigate its shortage. It doesn’t excessively pursue the abundance of fruitiness, but instead gradually crafts a unique sense of delicacy through the time, and exuding a subtle freshness like pine and cypress.
English pairs.new: 2004年产的红酒虽然果味不算突出，但其口感却非常出色。与2004年许多淡薄无力的红酒不同，克洛斯·福尔泰（Clos Fourtet）像一位智慧的哲人一样，知道如何突出其优势并弥补其不足。它不至于过度追求果味的丰富，而是通过时间的流逝逐渐打造出独特的细腻感，并散发着松柏和柏树的微妙清新感。

Western reviews.review: This estate seems to be going places, making in 2004 an impressively balanced wine that seems to walk a fine line just the right side of superripeness with consummate ease.  It is elegant, yet powerful, dominated by a seamless combination of blackberry jelly fruits and dark smoky tannins.
Western reviews.translation: 这家酒庄似乎正在快速发展，2004年产的红酒令人印象深刻，完美地平衡在超熟的边缘。它优雅而强大，黑莓果酱和暗烟熏味的坚果味道融合得天衣无缝。

Western reviews.review: Subtle aromas of forest fruit, meat and flowers follow through to a full-bodied palate, with silky tannins and a delicate berry, chocolate and earth aftertaste. Well done for the vintage. Best after 2009.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的气味非常细腻，带有森林果实、肉类和花朵的香气，口感丰富，纤维度细腻，余味中带有细腻的浆果、巧克力和泥土的味道。这个产季的酒做得非常出色。建议在2009年后再饮用。

Western reviews.review: A soft, fleshy cassis note intermixed with plum, fig, and truffle characteristics are present in this round, easy-going, medium-bodied St.-Emilion. While it does not possess the power, richness, or remarkable concentration of its siblings, the 2003 and 2005, it is a noteworthy success for this vintage. Consume it now and over the next 10-12 years.
Western reviews.translation: 这款圣埃米利翁葡萄酒具有圆润、轻松的口感，体积中等。它的风味中包含了软而富有肉感的黑加仑、浓郁的浆果、干果和松露的特征。虽然它没有其兄弟葡萄酒2003和2005年的力量、丰富感和令人惊叹的浓度，但它仍然是这一年份的值得注意的成功作品。建议尽快享用，并在未来10-12年内继续享用。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Cote de Baleau 真是让人惊喜不断，虽然有30%的沙土地，但每一次品鉴都能够感受到石灰岩高地特有的粉笔灰质感。En Primeurs时的香气稍显内敛，但透过半掩的门缝，就能够嗅到成熟樱桃、鸢尾花、甘草片以及小红枣的精致香气，让人流连忘返。期待装瓶后它更精彩的表现。
Chinese pairs.new:
Chateau Cote de Baleau is a constant surprise, despite its 30% sandy soil, every tasting reveals the unique chalky texture of the limestone highlands. 

During En Primeurs, the aroma was slightly reserved, but through the half-open door, one can catch the refined scents of ripe cherries, irises, licorice, and small red plums, leaving one in a state of enchantment. 

Looking forward to its even more impressive performance after bottling.

English pairs.original: Chateau Cote de Baleau consistently impresses me. Despite having 30% sandy soil, every tasting reveals the unique chalky texture of the limestone plateau. While the aroma during En Primeurs may seem somewhat reserved, a whiff of mature cherries, iris flowers, licorice, and small red dates can be discerned through the half-opened door, leaving a lasting impression. I can hardly wait to see how it will perform after bottling.
English pairs.new: 巴莱乌山庄（Chateau Cote de Baleau）始终令我印象深刻。尽管土壤中有30%的沙质成分，但每次品尝都能体现出石灰岩高原独特的 chalky（石灰质）口感。虽然在 En Primeurs（葡萄酒品鉴会）时，酒香可能会有些保留，但通过半开的门，仍能嗅到成熟的樱桃、百合花、甘草和小红枣的气息，留下深刻的印象。等待着它在瓶装后表现的时刻。

Western reviews.review: Flowers, black raspberries, licorice, espresso, and black cherries form the core of this wine. Medium-bodied, soft, elegant, forward, and already delicious to enjoy due to all of its supple, sweet, polished, ripe, fresh fruits, this is going to be a pleasure to enjoy on release. The wine blends 90% Merlot with 10% Cabernet Franc. Drink from 2025-2036. 91-93 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的主要风味包括玫瑰花、黑莓、甘草、咖啡和黑樱桃。酒体中等，口感软滑，优雅，前端果味丰富，现已成熟可享。酒中90%为梅洛，10%为卡波弗朗克。建议2025-2036年饮用。评分：91-93分。

Western reviews.review: (90% Merlot, 10% Cabernet Franc, 14.5% Alkohol, pH 3.61) Expressiv, noch vom Ausbau geprägt, jedoch mit Tiefgang und Frische, roter Frucht und floralen Noten. Im Gaumen charmant, weich und rund, man möchte gleich schlucken, so harmonisch ist dieser Wein bereits jetzt, die Tannin sind von sehr guter Qualität, die Säure passt. Im Abgang mit grosser Länge und viel Würze. Wenn das nicht grossartig wird... Top Value. 2030 bis 2055+ (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 auf Clos Fourtet) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的成分是：90%梅洛（Merlot），10%卡波弗朗奇（Cabernet Franc），酒精含量14.5%，pH值为3.61。

这瓶红酒的口感是：表达丰富，酒庄的风格不明显，但具有深度和新鲜感，具有红果和花朵的香气。口感柔和、圆润，非常舒适，令人想马上喝下，这瓶酒的和谐程度已经非常高，酒中的纤维素质非常好，酸度也非常适合。酒尾长且有深度，具有丰富的味道。

这瓶红酒的价格非常合理，值得购买。预计这瓶红酒的最佳饮用年份是2030年至2055年。

Western reviews.review: Joli nez aromatique, aérien et offre une puissance aérienne. On y retrouve des notes de violette, de mûre de Boysen et plus légèrement de prune violette associées à des touches de badiane, presque séveuse ainsi qu’à de discrètes pointes de thé Ceylan et d’épices douces. La bouche est joliment menée, équilibrée et offre de la fraicheur, une trame acidulée/fraiche, une jolie énergie, de la sapidité, de l’acidulé, un petit côté chatoyant, de l’harmonie, une jolie définition ainsi que de la plénitude. En bouche ce vin exprime des notes de cassis éclatant, de petits fruits bleus éclatants et plus légèrement de fraise associées à des touches de petits fruits frais / rôtis ainsi qu’à des pointes de bleuet/lys, une subtile pointe de sève/badiane, à de fines pointes de fève tonka et d’épices douces. Les tannins sont subtilement moelleux. Un joli et discret travail sur les bons amers.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一杯美丽的红酒，具有清新的气味和空气感。酒中有紫罗兰、 Boysen 梅子和轻微的紫色李子味道，伴随着一丝丁香和几乎干酪的味道，以及轻微的茶叶和甜味。口感平衡，清新，带有酸味和果味，具有活力和丰富的口感。酒中有爆炸性的黑berry、闪亮的蓝berry和轻微的草莓味道，伴随着新鲜和烤过的果味，以及轻微的蓝莓和百合花味道，以及细微的豆蔻和甜味。酒中的纤维质细腻，苦味处理得很好。

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby garnet colour with opaque core and purple reflections, delicate brightening on the rim. Seductive cherry fruit, ripe plums, delicate noble oak nuances, a hint of nougat and herbs in the background. Textured, complex, pleasant fruitiness, ripe tannins, great freshness in the aftertaste, chocolatey and mineral echo, very good ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色宝石色葡萄酒，透明中心，紫色反射，酒杯边缘有细微的光泽。诱人的樱桃果味，成熟的李子，细微的高级橡木香气，背景中有杏仁和香草的味道。口感丰富复杂，果味甜美，熟透的苦味，余味清新，巧克力和矿物质回味，酒龄很好。

Chinese pairs.original: 和期酒时的“重烘焙”风格完全不同，装瓶后的2022年份一上来就给我展现出了不错的香气层次。除了黑李子、黑樱桃和黑莓的香气之外，还涂抹着香醇的香草巧克力，和淡淡的甘草辛香。虽然这款酒依旧“花枝招展”，但比期酒时已然多了几分雅致感，希望在未来的年份中看到更加柔和的画风。
Chinese pairs.new: This vintage is a far cry from the "over-roasted" style of the previous release, and the 2022 bottling immediately presents a more refined aromatic profile. In addition to the blackberry, black cherry, and blackberry notes, it's also infused with rich, chocolatey vanilla and subtle anise undertones. While this wine still has a lively, showy quality, it's gained a more sophisticated air compared to the previous release, and I'm hopeful that future vintages will continue to dial back the bombast.

English pairs.original: In contrast to the heavily toasted style displayed during the En Primeur, the bottled 2022 vintage immediately unveils a pleasing array of aromatic layers. Alongside the scents of black plum, black cherry, and blackberry, there is a delicious coating of vanilla chocolate and a subtle hint of sweet licorice. While this wine still maintains its captivating allure, it has gained an added touch of refinement compared to the En Primeur sample, leaving me hopeful for more graceful expressions in future vintages.
English pairs.new: 与En Primeur时的浓烈烤调风格形成鲜明对比，瓶装2022年红酒立即展现出一系列令人愉悦的香气层次。黑浆果、黑樱桃和黑莓的香气与巧妙的香草巧克力和甜薄荷的微妙提示并存。虽然这款酒仍然保持着迷人的魅力，但它相比En Primeur样本获得了更高的成熟度，令我对未来年份更优雅的表达充满希望。

Western reviews.review: From vines surrounding one of Saint-Emilion's most beautiful château, this wine is massively rich with dense tannins, dark chocolate and rich berry flavors. Obviously, it has a fine future, ripe with powerful fruits and structure.Barrel Sample: 93-95
Western reviews.translation: 来自圣埃米利昂最美丽的城堡周围的葡萄园，这款红酒极其丰富，具有浓密的苦味、黑巧克力和丰富的浓果味。显然，它有着光明的未来，充满了强大的果味和结构。酒桶样品：93-95分。

Western reviews.review: Very linear and tight with a firmness and brightness. Blackcurrant, earth, and lemon rind character throughout. Fresh and racy. Needs time to open. Drink after 2026.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感线条紧致，带有坚实的质感和明亮的光泽。口感中有黑currant、土壤和柑橘皮的特征。新鲜且清脆。需要时间来打开。建议在2026年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: Cassis, black raspberries, graphite, spicy oak, and floral notes all emerge from the 2020 Chateau Fombrauge, a wonderfully textured, medium to full-bodied, concentrated, yet elegant Saint-Emilion. A wine that builds beautifully with time in the glass, it complex, has ripe, silky tannins, and a great finish. Tasted on more than one occasion, it never failed to impress. Drink this richly textured, sexy, beautiful 2020 over the coming 15+ years.
Western reviews.translation: 2020年沙特奥堡庄园的红酒，展现出黑樱子、黑莓、石墨、辣橡木和花香等复杂的风味。它是一款具有中等到中高度体积、浓缩但又优雅的圣埃米利翁红酒，口感丰富细腻，过时间在杯子里会变得更加完美，具有柔软的口感和长长的尾部。经过多次品尝，这款红酒始终令人印象深刻。建议在15年以上的时间内品尝这款富有魅力的、丰富的2020年沙特奥堡庄园红酒。

Western reviews.review: The 2020 Fombrauge is enticing right out of the gate. Cherries in liqueur, spice, rose petal, menthol, licorice and chocolate make a strong first impression. Racy and deep, with notable textural resonance, Fombrauge is terrific in 2020. There's plenty of opulence and yet the 2020 is nicely balanced. -Antonio Galloni
Western reviews.translation: 2020年福布拉日（Fombrauge）红酒一推出就让人着迷。酒中充满了浓郁的浓果味，浓缩的果酱味，香料，玫瑰花香，薄荷，甘草和巧克力，给人强烈的第一印象。福布拉日红酒风格狂野而深邃，具有明显的质感，2020年是非常出色的年份。酒中充满了奢华感，但2020年版的酒却是非常平衡的。

Western reviews.review: Frankly ripe and forward, with a broad swath of dark plum, blackberry and boysenberry compote flavors that course through, supported by light licorice root and alder threads. Reveals a warm earth note that drapes over the finish. Merlot and Cabernet Franc. Best from 2025 through 2035.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感非常饱满和前置，展现出浓郁的黑浆果、黑莓和牛油果酱风味，伴随着轻微的甘草和桧木的香气。酒尾带有温暖的土壤味。酒中含有梅洛和卡贝网红葡萄。建议在2025年至2035年之间饮用。

2018 Bernard Magrez Chateau La Tour Carn.name: 2018 Bernard Magrez Chateau La Tour Carnet

Chinese pairs.original: 拉图嘉利2018的肌肉感爆棚。庞大的骨架，成熟的单宁以及扎实的酒体在入口的一瞬间就全部迸发出来。巧克力鲜奶蛋糕的口感上还装点着一层层桑葚果酱，如此浓郁的质感即便在年轻时也十分宜饮。
Chinese pairs.new: The Latour 2018 is a powerhouse of tannins. A massive structure, mature tannins, and a solid texture all burst forth at the moment of entry. Chocolate mousse with a layer of raspberry jam adds to the palate, making this rich texture even more drinkable, even in its youth.

English pairs.original: La Tour Carnet 2018 is a super muscle man. Its compelling structure, ripe tannins, and convincing body rush into my palate like a surge of black forest cake’s tsunami. Even though at a young age, it is still delightful.
English pairs.new: 拉图尔卡内特2018是一款超级肌肉型红酒。它的引人入胜的结构、成熟的橡胶质和令人信服的体积，像黑森林蛋糕的海啸一样冲击我的味蕾。即使年轻，也仍然令人愉悦。

Western reviews.review: Ausladende Nase, viele Kräuter, dunkle Beerenfrucht, Leder und Tee, darüber florale Noten. Im Gaumen gradlinig und gut strukturiert, keine Schwere, feine Gerbstoffe, rotfruchtige Aromatik. Endet mit guter Länge und viel Charakter und Frische. Sehr gelungen. 2025-2036 (Verkostet am 21. Juni 2021 im Rahmen der UGCB Probe in Genf)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

优雅的鼻子，多种香草味道，黑色浓郁的果实味道，皮革和茶叶味道，伴有花朵的香气。口感平衡，结构良好，没有沉重感，细致的橡木味道，红酒的香气。结尾是长而有特色的，充满新鲜感。非常成功。推荐饮用时间：2025-2036（2021年6月21日在日内瓦的UGCB品酒会中品尝）。

Western reviews.review: The vineyards surrounding the 12th-century castle have produced this rich and densely structured wine. Powerful tannins give a smoky character to the ripe, black-plum fruits. It definitely needs aging, so drink from 2026. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒来自12世纪的古堡周围的葡萄园，产出了这瓶丰富且结构紧密的酒。强烈的苦味物质赋予了成熟的黑浆果烟熏的特征。一定需要陈酿，所以建议从2026年开始饮用。- 罗杰·沃斯

Western reviews.review: Licorice, espresso, chocolate, plums, black cherry and jam pop up with little effort. The wine is full-bodied, rich and fleshy with length and loads of ripe, dark red fruits in the lush finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感丰富、富有肉感，具有持久的尾韵，满满的成熟黑红果味。口感中可发现 licorice、咖啡、巧克力、浆果、黑樱桃和果酱等味道。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby garnet, purple reflections, faint brightening on the rim. Dark berry conserve on the nose with delicate nougat and tobacco and hints of cedar and liquorice. Juicy, ripe plum and black cherry, well-integrated tannins, fine extract sweetness, long with some chocolate on the finish. Good ageing potential. (2020-2040)
Western reviews.translation: 深红宝石色，紫色反射，酒液边缘微微发亮。酒香中有浓郁的黑berry果酱、细腻的果仁和烟草味，伴有些许松木和甘草的味道。口感丰富的浓郁黑桃和黑杏，纤维素柔和，精致的提取甜度，长长的尾韵中带有巧克力味。酒龄潜力良好，推荐储存时间：2020-2040年。

Chinese pairs.original: 此酒年轻、清新的香气充满柠檬蜜饯和岩石味，引领其生津、扎实的口感以及上等的酸度和具体中等偏上酒体的多矿物回味。这是一排酒中酸度最高的那一支。
Chinese pairs.new: This young and crisp wine boasts a citrusy and honeyed aroma, redolent with lemon marmalade and stony notes, leading to its refreshing, full-bodied palate and excellent acidity, along with a minerally finish that's specifically medium-plus in weight. It's the most acidic of the bunch.

English pairs.original: Preserved lemon and rock saturated the youthfully refreshing perfume that led to the salivary and well-knit flavours that was full of classy acid that sustained the mineral-suffused aftertaste that exhibited medium plus body. The one had the highest acid of the lineup.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的香气中充满了新鲜的柑橘味和岩石般的矿物质味道，带来了一种清新且充满活力的口感。口感丰富，酸度高， Mineral味道浓郁，余味持久，体积中等偏大。这瓶红酒的酸度最高。

Western reviews.review: Fresh, bright, sweet and lush, with a nose of vanilla custard, honey drenched pineapple, apricot, nuts and nectarines with hints of over ripe citrus, this classy wine leaves a long, sweet, tropical impression on the palate. 93 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感是新鲜、明亮、甜美和丰富的，酒香中带有香草蛋糕、蜂蜜浸泡的菠萝、杏子、坚果和nectarine的味道，伴有过熟的柑橘味。这种高级红酒在口中留下了长久的甜美、热带风味。评分93分。

Western reviews.review: With loads of candied citrus, pineapple, mango, apricot and orange rind, there is a the perfect amount of honey dripping all over everything, paired with freshness and acidity so that the wine retains it freshness. 91 - 93 Pts
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒充满了糖浆柑橘、菠萝、芒果、杏子和橙皮的香气，伴随着蜂蜜般的甜味，完美地与清新和酸度相结合，保持了酒的新鲜感。评分：91-93分。

Western reviews.review: 92–94. Barrel Sample. This is a rich wine that has a generous full-bodied character. At the same time, the acidity is there, offering some beautiful spice and ginger. This is going to develop so well.
Western reviews.translation:
评分：92-94

酒样：充满体积的酒，富有丰富的口感。同时，酒中也带有清晰的酸度，展现出美丽的香料和姜味。酒将会在未来发展得非常出色。

Chinese pairs.original: 香气纯净而清晰，散发着清亮的樱桃蓝莓和香料芬芳。入口流畅而轻松，弥漫着甜美的黑果丰富的烘焙味道。酒精度处理地非常平衡，没有一丝厚重感。如果在收尾前增加更丰富的味觉层次将会更加出色。
Chinese pairs.new: The aroma is pure and crisp, releasing bright cherry and blueberry notes with subtle spice undertones. The palate glides smoothly and effortlessly, unfolding rich, sweet black fruit and baking spice flavors. The alcohol is expertly balanced, with no hint of heaviness. Adding more depth to the finish would elevate it to perfection.

English pairs.original: The nose is clear and racy, delivering bright cherry, blueberry, and plentiful spicy notes. The entry is smooth and straightforward, brimming with sweet dark fruits and plenty of toasty notes. The alcohol is well maintained, without any heaviness. If had more nuances of complexity in the finish, it would be much more prominent.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的香气清晰、果香，带有明亮的樱桃、蓝莓和丰富的辣味。入口顺滑，直接，充满甜黑果和大量的烤香味。酒精保持平衡，没有任何沉重感。如果尾部有更多的复杂性和细微差别，它就更出色了。

Western reviews.review: Dark chocolate, licorice, smoke, truffle, espresso and red with black pit fruits come alive on the nose and on the sweet, fresh, lusciously textured palate. The wine ends with a cocoa and plum filled, dusty finish. Produced from 100% Merlot , drink from 2023-2034. 93 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中，巧克力、黑糖、烟草、松露、浓缩咖啡和红黑色的浆果融合在一起。口感甜润，新鲜，丰富。酒尾留有巧克力和浆果的味道，伴有沙沙的感觉。该酒由100%梅洛葡萄生产，建议饮用时间为2023-2034年。评分93分。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, fester Kern, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung. Schwarze Beerenfrucht, etwas Cassis, feine Kräuterwürze, etwas Zedernholz, kandierte Orangenschalen. Saftig, rotbeerige Nuancen, mineralisch, integrierte Tannine, gute Frische, mittlere Komplexität, zart kalkiger Nachhall, lebendiger Speisenbegleiter.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，浓密的葡萄核，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。黑色浆果风味，带有些黑加思（Cassis）和细微的香草和松木香味，伴有糖浆橙子皮的甜味。口感丰富，带有红色浆果的余味，矿物质味道，柔和的苦味，清新，中等复杂度，微微带有石灰味的余味，适合与食物搭配的活力。

Western reviews.review: (100% Merlot, 14.5% Alkohol, verkostet im Dezember 2021 in Windisch). Offene, sehr feinduftige Nase, fruchtige Komponenten duellieren sich mit Krätuern und einer stenig-kühlen Terroirnote, mit mehr Luft zeigt sich zudem ein Aroma, das mich an frisch geraspeltes Süssholz erinnert, sehr komplex. Im Gaumen gradlinig und dicht, konzentriert in der Frucht, jedoch mit top Balance und ohne jegliche Schwerfälligkeit, die Frucht ist knackig, die Gerbstoffe markieren, sind präzis und reif, die Säure wirkt stimmig. Man möchte meinen, dass Merlot-betonte Weine in diesem Warmen Jahr zu üppig werden könnten, doch dieser Wein ist die Antithese dazu. Frisch, lebendig und langanhalten, top gelungen. 2023-2035
Western reviews.translation:
这是一瓶100%梅洛特红酒，酒精度14.5%，于2021年12月在Windisch进行评估。酒的香气开放、非常强烈，果香和草药味在斗争中，伴有冷冽的土壤味道，随着空气的流通，酒还会释放出新切的甜橙木的香气，非常复杂。

在口感上，酒的味道平衡，果香浓郁，但没有任何沉重感，酒的酸度和干酪味都非常协调，果香清脆，干酪味精确且成熟，酸度也非常合适。有人可能会认为在炎热的年份，梅洛特酒会变得过于丰富，但这瓶酒却是例外。酒的口感新鲜、活泼、持久，非常成功。推荐饮用时间：2023-2035年。

Western reviews.review: Good purity and ripeness with kirsch, black cherry and cassis notes blended with some chalk and earth. Digest and supple palate with powdery tannin, a fine dose of freshness, unctuous fruit with a sweet spiciness and a long velvety finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感非常纯粹和成熟，带有果酱、黑樱桃和黑加仑的香气，混合了石灰和泥土的味道。口感柔和细腻，粉末状的苦味，带有清新的味道，丰富的果味，带有甜甜的香料味，长长的绵软的尾韵。

Chinese pairs.original: 我在2011年份感受到了酷似热年份的能量感… 它的香气变化相当丰富，从甘草跳到肉汁，再从烟草回到焦糖，成熟中带着清新，沉稳中透着活泼。扎实的单宁包裹在橡皮泥般的酒体中，即便不摇动酒杯，也能透着强大的能量感。2011年份的Chateau Godard Bellevue是值得葡萄酒达人追寻的年份，仅从当天的品鉴来看，这款酒甚至比著名的2010和2009更加讨喜。
Chinese pairs.new: I felt an energy reminiscent of a hot vintage in the 2011, with a rich aroma that shifted from molasses to meat broth, then from tobacco back to caramel, with a sense of freshness and vitality amidst maturity. The robust tannins are wrapped in a velvety texture, exuding a powerful energy even when the glass is still. The 2011 Chateau Godard Bellevue is a vintage worth seeking out for wine connoisseurs, and based on this tasting alone, it may even surpass the more famous 2010 and 2009 vintages.

English pairs.original: In the 2011 vintage, I sensed an energy reminiscent of a hot year. Its aromas are quite complex, shifting from licorice to meat broth, then from tobacco to caramel. There’s a balance of ripeness and freshness, stability and liveliness. The solid tannins, wrapped in a clay-like body, exude a powerful energy even without swirling the glass. The 2011 Chateau Godard Bellevue is a vintage worth seeking out for wine enthusiasts. From today’s tasting, this wine is even more delightful than the renowned 2010 and 2009 vintages.
English pairs.new: 2011年产的这瓶红酒给我留下了极大的冲击感，仿佛是炎热的一年。酒中的香气复杂多变，从 licorice 到肉汤味，再从烟草到焦糖味。酒中有着完美的成熟度和新鲜度的平衡，稳定性和活力也得到了很好的体现。坚实的苦味成分，包裹在泥土般的身体中，酒中充满了强烈的能量，即使不摇晃玻璃也能感受到。2011年产的Chateau Godard Bellevue红酒是酒界的追求者们值得去寻找的。从今天的品尝中来看，这瓶酒比闻名的2010年和2009年产的更为令人愉悦。

Western reviews.review: This is a full and ripe wine showing fine concentration, rich and jammy fruits, and some firmer, well-integrated tannins. There is a hint of juiciness as well, leading to a wine that is generous and with some good aging. Drink from 2015.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一个充满和成熟的红酒，展现出精致的浓度、丰富的果酱风味和一些更坚实、完美融合的苦味。还有一丝果汁的味道，使得这款酒具有慷慨和一些良好的陈化潜力。建议于2015年开始饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 面对缺少阳光的2013年份，这款酒依然能够保持成熟丰润的果香，想必酿酒师做了相当严苛地筛选。酸甜可口的杨梅和蔓越莓伴随着丝滑细腻的口感，虽然收尾时的单宁略微突出但始终保持了平衡感。
Chinese pairs.new: Despite the lack of sunlight in the 2013 vintage, this wine still retains its mature and rich fruit flavors, likely due to the winemaker's rigorous selection process. The sweet and tangy flavors of mulberries and raspberries are accompanied by a smooth and velvety texture, although the tannins are slightly prominent at the finish, they remain well-balanced.

English pairs.original: Facing a difficult vintage, Le Dome 2013 still maintains a pleasant maturity and easygoing fruitiness. The winemaker must have made a rigorous selection. Sweet and sour waxberry and cranberry are welcomed by a silky and delicate mouth feeling. Although the tannins are slightly noticeable on the finish, the whole palate always maintains an ideal balance.
English pairs.new: 面对挑战性的产季，勒多姆2013仍然保持着舒适的成熟度和轻松的果味。酒庄的酒师一定是经过严格的筛选。甜而酸的红果和蓝莓在滑顺的口感中受到欢迎。尽管尾部有轻微的苦味，但整个口感始终保持着理想的平衡。

Western reviews.review: Initially closed, this wine just hints at its richness and perfumed character. As it opens it shows still-young tannins and intense black plums and blueberries that will develop as the wine ages. It is likely to mature well over the medium to long term, and will not be ready to drink before 2022.
Western reviews.translation: 初期关闭，这款红酒仅仅透露了其丰富的特质和芳香的性格。随着时间的推移，它展现出仍然年轻的苦味和浓郁的黑浆果和蓝berries，随着时间的推移会逐渐成熟。它很可能会在中长期内保持稳定，并且不会在2022年之前成熟。

Western reviews.review: With licorice, chocolate, plum and floral notes on the nose, the wine is fresh, spicy, medium bodied and plush with a soft chocolate, red plum and stone-driven finish. From 80% Cabernet Franc and 20% Merlot, the wine reached 12.9% alcohol with a pH of 3.65. The yields were 26 hectoliters per hectare. 90-92 Pts
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中有 licorice、巧克力、浆果和花朵的味道。口感新鲜、有辣味、体积中等、富有质感，尾部有软巧克力、红浆果和石果味。酒精含量为12.9%，pH值为3.65，产量为每公顷26公升。评分：90-92分。

Western reviews.review: Mittleres Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, breitere Randaufhellung. Zart floral unterlegte frische Kirschennote, ein Hauch von Pflaumen, rotbeeriger Touch. Feine Extraktsüße, fast burgundisch in der Textur, zart nach Honig, feine Tannine, bleibt gut haften, zeigt eine sehr gute Länge, trinkanimierend und anhaltend.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，紫色反光，边缘有细微的光泽。酒中带有轻微的花香，清新果香，特别是樱桃味，伴有浓郁的浆果味和微微的啤酒味。酒体细腻，口感丰富，类似于红葡萄酒，带有轻微的蜂蜜味，细腻的果皮感，口感持久，余味悠长，适合慢慢品尝。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Feytit-Clinet 2022 真是个美人胚子！她粉嫩娇艳的皮肤和恬静甜美的微笑，让我心花怒放！虽然En Primeurs阶段还有很多焙烤的味道，但迎面走来的黑桑葚、黑李子和黑加仑的浓郁香气以及牡丹花的芳香还是让我狠狠的满足了一把。软糯Q弹的酒液中里藏着细腻的单宁，它就像是拥抱你的一双臂膀，宽大而又温暖… 如果能在陈酿后更有层次感，想必会更加让人神往！
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau Feytit-Clinet 2022 - A true beauty! Her delicate, rosy skin and serene, sweet smile have left me breathless. Although it still has some toasted notes from the En Primeurs stage, the rich aromas of black currant, black plum, and blackberry, along with the subtle scent of rose, have left me thoroughly satisfied. The soft, velvety texture of the wine is like being wrapped in a warm, comforting hug - it's broad and soothing. With a bit more complexity after aging, I have no doubt it will be utterly captivating.

English pairs.original: Chateau Feytit-Clinet 2022 is a real beauty in the making! Her pink and delicate skin and sweet and serene smile make my heart sing! Although there are still many toasty flavors during the En Primeurs phase, the rich aromas of black mulberry, black plum, blackcurrant, and peony are still satisfying. The soft and chewy wine hides delicate tannins, which are like arms that embrace you, spacious and warm… If it gains more complexity after aging, it will surely become even more desirable!
English pairs.new: 费伊蒂-克林特庄园2022年红酒是一瓶即将成熟的美酒！它的粉红色和细腻的外表，甜蜜的笑容让我心情愉悦！尽管在En Primeurs阶段仍有许多烟熏味，但黑莓、黑杏、黑醋栗和牡丹的丰富香气仍然令人满意。柔软的口感和细腻的口感隐藏着细微的苦味，像温暖的拥抱一样宽敞和温暖……如果经过陈化后变得更加复杂，它一定会变得更加令人垂涎！

Western reviews.review: Deep, rich, purple in hue, the wine is packed with black plums, flowers, cloves, cinnamon, cherries, apple blossoms, smoke, and licorice in the aromatic profile. On the palate, the wine shows off its sensuous, silky wealth of plums, cherries, and chocolate form the initial sip. Concentrated, rich, and creamy, with vibrancy, length and suppleness, this is a gorgeous expression of Feytit-Clinet. The wine blends 90% Merlot with 10% Cabernet Franc. 14.9% ABV, 3.75 pH. The harvest took place September 5 - September 27. The yields were 33 hectoliters per hectare. This is the finest vintage of Feytit Clinet produced yet. Drink from 2026-2050. 96-98 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的颜色深紫红，酒中充满了黑杏、花朵、丁香、肉桂、樱桃、苹果花、烟雾和 licorice 的芳香。口感上，酒展现出其丰富的黑杏、樱桃和巧克力味道，初尝时感受到的都是柔滑的口感。酒的浓度高，富有层次，具有活力和持久感，这是 Feytit-Clinet 最美好的表达。酒中含有 90% 的梅洛和 10% 的卡波弗朗克。酒精含量为 14.9%，pH 值为 3.75。收获时间为 9 月 5 日至 9 月 27 日，产量为每公顷 33 公升。这是 Feytit Clinet 生产的最好的年份。建议在 2026-2050 年间饮用。评分 96-98 分。

Western reviews.review: Dicht in der Farbe, intensiv im Duft, sehr dunklelfruchtig geprägt, rauchige Noten, Tee. Der Gaumen ist ungemein weich und charmant, was für eine Gerbstoffqualität, was für eine Fülle, man könnte den Wein schon jetzt trinken, so fein ist alles verwoben. Ungemein fruchtig und mit sehr guter Länge, einer feinen Würze und floralen Rückaromen ist das ein Wein, mit Klasse und Potential. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / Grand Cercle / Château la Dauphine) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色深浓，气味浓郁，具有深度的果味，带有烟熏味和茶香。口感极其柔滑，充满魅力，酒中的橡木味和丰富的口感令人惊叹。酒中的各种元素都非常完美地融合在一起，令人惊叹。酒的果味极其丰富，口感持久，带有细腻的辛辣味和花香余味。这是一瓶具有高品质和巨大潜力的红酒。

Western reviews.review: Le nez est frais et offre une certaine profondeur ainsi qu’un petit côté fumé. On y retrouve des notes de mûre, de violette et plus légèrement de cassis, d’encens associées à des touches de petites baies rouges fraiches, de lilas, de fumé ainsi qu’à une discrète pointe vanillée. La bouche est fruitée et offre de la minéralité, de la fraicheur, une fine tension, une certaine sapidité, un joli côté cachemire, un côté aérien, une petite droiture, une fine concentration ainsi que du soyeux. En bouche ce vin exprime des notes de cassis écrasé, de mûre de Boysen écrasée et plus légèrement de groseilles écrasées associées à des touche de bleuet, de prune bleue, de fumée et à une subtile pointe de fève tonka. Bonne longueur.
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的香气清新，带有一定的深度和轻微的烟熏味。酒中有浓郁的黑莓、紫罗兰和轻微的黑currant、香柏树脂和少量新鲜红果、百日红、烟熏味以及微妙的香草味。

口感果香，带有矿物质、清新、细腻的紧张感、一定的口感、丝绸般的质感、空气感、细腻的质感以及细腻的质感。口感中有浓郁的黑currant、黑莓和轻微的青草、烟熏味以及微妙的豆蔻味。酒有很好的持久度。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby garnet colour with opaque core and subtle reflections, delicate brightening on the rim. Tobacco, some leather, plums with a nutty note in the background, a hint of dried fruit. Juicy, opulent and sweet, somewhat fluid texture, mineral, a touch of nougat and wood savouriness on the finish, mellow tannins in the aftertaste.
Western reviews.translation: 深红宝石色，透明中心，微微的反光，酒杯边缘有细微的光泽。酒中有烟草、皮革、浆果和干果的味道，背景中有坚果的味道。酒口滑顺，口感丰富甜美，矿物质味道，尾部有杏仁和木头的香气，余味中有柔和的苦味。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Bonalgue 2022用香浓纯净的果香让我对Pomerol西边的风土有了新的看法。面对2022年份极为干热的情况，Chateau Bonalgue 精细的田间管理发挥了重要作用。技术总监Mathieu透露，他们在前一年采收后种植了苜蓿和燕麦，这为来年的葡萄树提供了丰富的营养，因此他们的葡萄在2022年份保持了相当理想的活力。是一款非常值得关注的Pomerol佳酿。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau Bonalgue 2022的香气让我对Pomerol地区的风土有了新的看法。面对2022年份极为干热的情况，Chateau Bonalgue 精细的田间管理发挥了重要作用。技术总监Mathieu透露，他们在前一年采收后种植了苜蓿和燕麦，这为来年的葡萄树提供了丰富的营养，因此他们的葡萄在2022年份保持了相当理想的活力。这是一款非常值得关注的Pomerol佳酿。

English pairs.original: Chateau Bonalgue 2022, with its rich and pure fruitiness, has reshaped my perception of the terroir in the western part of Pomerol. Amidst the extreme heat of 2022, Chateau Bonalgue’s meticulous vineyard management played an important role. The technical director, Mathieu, revealed that they had sowed Trefle (Clover) and Avoine (Oats) after the previous year’s harvest, replenishing the grapevines with an abundance of nutrients, thereby retaining a considerable vitality for the vintage of 2022. This is indeed a Pomerol creation that demands attention.
English pairs.new: 2022年夏日炎炎的天气下，尚图波纳尔古庄园（Chateau Bonalgue）以其丰富纯正的果味重新定义了波莫罗（Pomerol）西部的土壤特征。庄园的精心管理在极端炎热的2022年中发挥了重要作用。技术总监马修（Mathieu）透露，他们在去年收获后在葡萄园种下了苜蓿（Trefle）和燕麦（Avoine），为葡萄藤补充了丰富的营养物质，从而为2022年的葡萄收获保留了相当的活力。这确实是一款值得关注的波莫罗葡萄酒。

Western reviews.review: The fruits are ripe, lifted, sweet, spicy, and earthy. The mid-palate, and finish is all about its chocolate-coated plums, black cherries, and espresso. Fresh and vibrant, soft and polished, the fruits are lush, long and creamy. The end note delivers touches of salty-chocolate on the backend. The wine is made from blending 92% Merlot with 8% Cabernet Franc. Drink from 2025-2042. 91-93 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感丰富多样，果味成熟，带有甜、辣、泥土的味道。中口和尾部的口感主要是巧克力浸泡的石榴、黑樱桃和咖啡的味道。新鲜、活泼、柔软、光滑的果味丰富、长长的、奶油般的。尾部留下了鹽巧克力的余味。这瓶红酒是由92%梅洛和8%卡波弗朗克混合酿造的。建议2025-2042年饮用。评分：91-93分。

Western reviews.review: Le nez est fruité, élégant et offre du pulpeux, de la densité, une certaine richesse et une bonne définition. Il exprime les notes de mûre de boysen, de fraise pulpeuse/éclatante et plus légèrement – de petits fruits éclatants, associées à des touches de badiane/sève ainsi qu’à de fines pointes de lys, de poivre et de clou de girofle. La bouche est fruitée et offre de la minéralité, de la jutosité, de la suavité et une trame minérale, une bonne définition, une certaine tension, de la justesse. Elle exprime les notes de mûre pulpeuse/juteuse, de violette et plus légèrement de prune violette pulpeuse/juteuse, associées à des touches de petites baies rouges éclatantes ainsi qu’à des pointes de lys, de fève tonka et à des fines pointes de cardamone et de bergamote. De la gourmandise et de la tension.
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的香气是果香的，优雅而富有质感，具有丰富的体积和清晰的定义。它展现出浆果的风味，如 Boysenberry、鲜果和一些轻微的爆发性小果，伴随着一些丁香和树胶的味道，以及细微的百合、胡椒和丁香的味道。

口感是果香的，具有矿物质、柔软、细腻和矿物质纹理，清晰的定义和适当的紧张感。它展现出浆果的风味，如浆果和紫罗兰，伴随着一些轻微的紫罗兰浆果风味，伴随着一些爆发性的红果，百合、豆蔻和细微的柚子风味。有饱腹感和紧张感。

Western reviews.review: The fruits are ripe, lifted, sweet, spicy, and earthy. The mid-palate, and finish is all about its chocolate-coated plums, black cherries, and espresso. Fresh and vibrant, soft and polished, the fruits are lush, long and creamy. The end note delivers touches of salty-chocolate on the backend. The wine is made from blending 92% Merlot with 8% Cabernet Franc. Drink from 2025-2042. 91-93 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感丰富多样，果味成熟，带有甜、辣、泥土的味道。中口和尾部的口感主要是巧克力浸泡的石榴、黑樱桃和咖啡的味道。新鲜、活泼、柔软、光滑的果味丰富、长长的、奶油般的。尾部留下了鹽巧克力的余味。这瓶红酒是由92%梅洛和8%卡波弗朗克混合酿造的。建议2025-2042年饮用。评分：91-93分。

Western reviews.review: Le nez est fruité, élégant et offre du pulpeux, de la densité, une certaine richesse et une bonne définition. Il exprime les notes de mûre de boysen, de fraise pulpeuse/éclatante et plus légèrement – de petits fruits éclatants, associées à des touches de badiane/sève ainsi qu’à de fines pointes de lys, de poivre et de clou de girofle. La bouche est fruitée et offre de la minéralité, de la jutosité, de la suavité et une trame minérale, une bonne définition, une certaine tension, de la justesse. Elle exprime les notes de mûre pulpeuse/juteuse, de violette et plus légèrement de prune violette pulpeuse/juteuse, associées à des touches de petites baies rouges éclatantes ainsi qu’à des pointes de lys, de fève tonka et à des fines pointes de cardamone et de bergamote. De la gourmandise et de la tension.
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的香气是果香的，优雅而富有质感，具有丰富的体积和清晰的定义。它展现出浆果的风味，如 Boysenberry、鲜果和一些轻微的爆发性小果，伴随着一些丁香和树胶的味道，以及细微的百合、胡椒和丁香的味道。

口感是果香的，具有矿物质、柔软、细腻和矿物质纹理，清晰的定义和适当的紧张感。它展现出浆果的风味，如浆果和紫罗兰，伴随着一些轻微的紫罗兰浆果风味，伴随着一些爆发性的红果，百合、豆蔻和细微的柚子风味。有饱腹感和紧张感。

Chinese pairs.original: 泥土的气息混合成熟浆果，黑醋栗，甘草和皮革的香气，人口辛辣，酒体饱满，丰富的单宁，回味中巧克力的味道明显，回味持久。
Chinese pairs.new: Earthy aromas blend with mature plum, black truffle, honey and leather notes, sharp acidity, full-bodied texture, rich tannins, and a lingering chocolate finish.

Western reviews.review: Medium bodied, fresh, earthy, floral wine, with a steak of herbs, and leafy notes. There is softness to the tannins, but there is a leafy, green, discernable note in the otherwise, red plum finish. There is no reason for further aging here. 91 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的体积适中，清新自然，带有泥土和花香的味道，伴有草药和叶子般的气息。酒中的纤维软绵，但在红葡萄的余味中，仍然有明显的草叶和青绿的味道。无需再次陈化。评分：91分。

Western reviews.review: Mittleres Rubin, aufgehellter Rand. Anfangs etwas staubig anmutende Nase, das braucht viel Luft, dann Rauch, Tee, Tabak, Torf, auch ein Anflug von Bouillon, dazwischen dunkle Kirschen, würzige Noten, sehr gute Komplexität. Am Gaumen mittelkräftiger Auftakt, rotfruchtige Aromen, strukturiert, mit etwas austrocknenden Gerbstoffen, die Säure ist saftig, verleiht dem Wein Frische, das ganze Paket wirkt aber noch etwas ungestüm, sollte unbedingt noch reifen, endet mittellang auf rote Kirschen und eine feine Würze. Ein nicht ganz einfacher Zeitpunkt, doch die Frucht scheint solide genug, so dass der Wein in meinen Augen durchaus eine gute Zukunft hat. Könnte in 5-10 Jahren durchaus für eine Überraschung gut sein. 2020-2030+, 18+ vvPunkte, (91+/100)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

颜色：中度红色，边缘较浅。

香气：初期略带干燥的气息，但经过充分呼吸后，出现烟草、茶、烟草、泥炭、肉汤等气息，中间有黑樱桃和浓郁的香气。

口感：口感中等强度，初期有红果味，结构紧密，有些干涸的味道，酸度清新，给人以清新感。整体感觉尚未成熟，需要再陈化。口感中长，结束于黑樱桃和细微的香气。

评论：这是一个复杂的红酒，需要时间来成熟。虽然当前还不成熟，但果味坚实，未来有很好的前景。五到十年后，可能会成为一个惊喜。推荐年龄：2020-2030年，适合成年人饮用，评分：91+/100。

Western reviews.review: (2000) Moderately dense ruby lightening at rim but not browning. Gloriously sweet nose with masses of cedary wood and pencil-shavings. The fruit is extremely rich on the nose with little violet scents and red berries. Lovely ripeness. The palate is quite rich and spicy, but the fruit is very sweet, even a touch jammy. There's a mass of leafy tobacco flavour that shows towards the finish and some lean, sinewy tannins take hold. Good concentration and a lovely though not profound wine.
Western reviews.translation: 2000年：酒液呈深红色，边缘微微发亮但未出现褐色。酒香甜美，充满了松木和铅笔削的气味。酒香中果味丰富，带有轻微的紫色花香和红果味。酒呈现出美好的成熟度。口感丰富、辛辣，但果味甜美，甚至带有少许果酱味。酒尾有大量的叶子烟味，最后一些紧致的纤维性橡胶味开始显现。酒的浓度不错，口感舒适但不深刻。

Chinese pairs.original: 2021年份的Chateau Pape Clement显然没有达到其应有的高度。果香的表达比较简单，话梅糖、酸石榴的周围点缀着些许草果和丁香的辛香。不过，单宁的萃取还是非常老道的，在多酚并不成熟的年份，它始终保持了相对细密的质感。基于该年份的表现来看，我建议在陈年10年后再开瓶。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2021 Chateau Pape Clement clearly didn't live up to its potential. The fruit expression is relatively straightforward, with notes of quince and pomegranate surrounded by subtle hints of herbaceousness and spice. However, the tannins remain classic, maintaining a refined texture even in an unripe year. Based on this vintage's performance, I recommend cellaring for 10 years before opening.

English pairs.original: Chateau Pape Clement 2021, unfortunately, did not reach the heights it typically aspires to. The expression of fruit aromas is not complex, with plum candy and sour pomegranate accented by slight notes of Cardamon and clove. However, the extraction of tannins is skillfully made, maintaining a relatively fine texture in a year when polyphenols were less mature. Based on this vintage’s performance, I suggest cellaring for 10 years before enjoying it.
English pairs.new: 查泰aux 帕佩克莱门特 2021 年，遗憾的是，它并没有达到通常的高度。果香的表达并不复杂，主要是浆果糖和酸性枣子的味道，伴有轻微的卡达木和丁香的香气。然而，提取的鞣质却是精心制作的，保持了在当年鞣质成熟度较低的情况下相对细致的口感。基于这一年份的表现，我建议将其贮存10年后再享用。

Western reviews.review: This rich wine from a legendary Bordeaux estate is full of spice and toast, with a backing of ripe white-fruit acidity. It has depth and concentration, a full-bodied wine that will age well. Drink from 2026.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶来自名符其实的波尔多庄园的红酒，充满了香料和烤面包的味道，伴随着成熟的白果酸。它有着深度和浓度，是一瓶体积丰富的红酒，能够耐久保存。建议2026年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: This rich wine from a legendary Bordeaux estate is full of spice and toast, with a backing of ripe white-fruit acidity. It has depth and concentration, a full-bodied wine that will age well. Drink from 2026.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶来自名符其实的波尔多庄园的红酒，充满了香料和烤面包的味道，伴随着成熟的白果酸。它有着深度和浓度，是一瓶体积丰富的红酒，能够长时间保存。建议2026年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: Composed and well-integrated in the fruit, it recalls plums, strawberries, blueberries, grape must, black cherries and white chocolate. Full-bodied, relaxed and persuasive in the sip, it closes harmonious and truly precise. Beautiful. A blend of 60% Merlot and 40% Cabernet Sauvignon. Best since 2026.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感丰富、舒适，入口感染人，余味和谐、精准。它的风味复杂，包括了浆果、草莓、蓝莓、葡萄浆、黑杏和白巧克力等。酒中60%是梅洛，40%是卡波弗雷希。值得期待，推荐在2026年后品尝。

Western reviews.review: Composed and well-integrated in the fruit, it recalls plums, strawberries, blueberries, grape must, black cherries and white chocolate. Full-bodied, relaxed and persuasive in the sip, it closes harmonious and truly precise. Beautiful. A blend of 60% Merlot and 40% Cabernet Sauvignon. Best since 2026.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感丰富、舒适，入口感染人，余味和谐、精准。口感中可感受到浓郁的水果味，如浆果、草莓、蓝莓、葡萄浆、黑杏和白巧克力。酒中60%为梅洛，40%为卡波内尔。值得期待，最佳品质将出现在2026年之后。

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Rubinrot. Die Nase zeigt krautige und dunkelfruchtige Aromen, ein Touch Holz, auch Haselnuss. Im Gaumen straff, mittelkräftiger Körper, markante Struktur, das Tannin ist markant, von sehr guter Qualität, der Wein baut Druck auf, bleibt dabei elegant und hallt im Abgang rotfruchtig nach, hinterlässt Himbeeren und einen Hauch von Blutorangen. Gute Anlagen. 2027-2044 (Verkostet im November 2023 in Zürich bei UGCB)
Western reviews.translation: 深红色。酒鼻中有草本和深色果实的香气，带有木头和杏仁的味道。口感紧致，中等体积，结构明显，苦味强烈但品质良好，酒精感强烈但优雅，余味中有红果和浓郁的黑莓和橙子味。品质良好。推荐饮用时间：2027-2044（2023年11月在瑞士Zürich的UGCB品尝）。

Chinese pairs.original: 此酒的香气富有可爱、新鲜的黄色水果芬芳以及岩石、牛轧糖和花香。非常坚实的多岩石口感展现这片葡萄园典型的油脂感；集中的回味透出大量栗子和柑橘滋味。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts a charming, fresh aroma of yellow fruits, accompanied by notes of stone, caramel, and floral hints. A robust, rocky texture showcases the vineyard's signature richness, with a concentrated finish that reveals a wealth of hazelnut and citrus flavors.

English pairs.original: Displaying lovely and fresh fruits (mostly yellow fruits) on nose lined with stone, nougat and flowers. Very firm and stony on the palate that had typical oiliness of this vineyard; intense on the finish with lots of chestnut and citrus notes.
English pairs.new: 酒香上充满了新鲜的水果味（主要是黄色的水果），伴有石子、果仁和花朵的气息。口感坚实，石质感，典型的油腻感。尾部强烈，带有大量的栗子和柑橘味。

Western reviews.review: Whispers of caramel and char lend smoky accents to white pear and lemon flavors in this rich yet complex, stately wine. Ripe and powerful in demeanor yet streaked with chalk, salt and steel, it's hedonistic yet pure in fruit and minerality. A stunner in youth, the wine is likely to improve over the next two decades. Anna Lee C. Iijima
Western reviews.translation: 这款酒的风味中，焦糖和焦炭的微妙呼声为白梨和柠檬的风味增添了烟熏的味道。这瓶酒虽然富有层次感却又稳重，酒中成熟的果味和矿物质味道纯粹而又享受。酒在年轻时就已经非常出色，预计在接下来的二十年中会不断改善。——安娜·李·伊吉马。

Chinese pairs.original: 甜蜜丰富的香气，特别突出的紫罗兰、雪松和黑醋栗的味道，天鹅绒般的单宁和复杂的口感美妙的平衡，回味充满果香。
Chinese pairs.new: Luscious and rich aromas, particularly prominent notes of lavender, pine, and blackberry, silky tannins and a complex, beautifully balanced palate, with a lingering finish of fruit.

Western reviews.review: As the 1983 surprised many people for its success compared to 1982, so too is the 2001 Palmer, outgunning the 2000 on many of my recent tastings. I would not bet on it lasting as long as the 2000, but this is still young right now, with firm, still-muscular tannins and deep cassis fruits. An enjoyably balanced and subtle wine filled with charcoal and woodsmoke. Drinking Window 2020 - 2040
Western reviews.translation: 2001年帕尔默酒的成功，远远超过了2000年。与1983年相比，1982年也一样令人惊讶。虽然我不认为2001年会超过2000年的寿命，但它仍然很年轻，具有坚实的、仍然肌肉般的坚果味和深厚的黑加仑果味。这种酒的平衡和微妙，充满了焦炭和烟雾味。建议饮用时间：2020年至2040年。

Western reviews.review: Fairly deep color. Another lovely, elegant Palmer nose. It offers richness, but stays pure and delicate. (There’s almost as much Merlot (44%) in the blend as Cabernet Sauvignon (51%), one reason it’s less powerful than other vintages.) The 2001 offers scents of red fruit, blackberry, sandalwood, spice, and mocha. Follows through in a similar fashion on the palate; same delicacy and precision. It’s subtle yet graceful, nicely balanced, still needing a few more years to reach peak, although it's most of the way there. Overall, a very strong showing.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色深度不错。 Palmer 的鼻子又是那么优雅迷人，富有丰富的味道，但仍保持纯净和细致。 (这瓶红酒的混合比例中，梅洛（44%）和卡波雷尔（51%）几乎相等，这也使得这瓶红酒比其他年份的红酒要弱一些。) 2001 年的红酒有红果、黑莓、檀木、香料和巧克力等香味。口感上同样如此，细致和精确。它的味道很微妙，但又很优雅，平衡很好，虽然还需要再过几年才能达到巅峰，但已经接近了。总体来说，这瓶红酒表现非常出色。

Chinese pairs.original: 期酒。此酒略显严肃但非常优雅、新鲜而且清晰的香气透出泥土、药材、黑色甘草、岩石、黑樱桃、枇杷和花蜜味。口感充满滑爽、细腻的单宁以及微微的花香还有干净、多酸的果味。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine has a slightly serious tone but exudes a very elegant, fresh, and clear aroma of earth, herbs, black licorice, rocks, black cherries, lychee, and honey notes. The palate is full of smooth, velvety tannins, subtle floral hints, and crisp, high-acid fruit flavors.

English pairs.original: En primeur. Surprisingly refined, faintly serious and freshly precise aromas of earth, medicine, black liquorice, stone, black cherry, loquat and nectar. Polished and detailed tannins filled the palate that had a hint of florality lined with clean and acidic fruit.
English pairs.new: 预购品。令人惊讶的精致，微微严肃和新鲜精确的土壤、药品、黑糖、石头、黑樱桃、荔枝和花蜜的香气。口感上有光滑细致的纤维，带有清新和酸性的果味。

Western reviews.review: Fresh, sweet, silky, and filled with elegant, sweet plum and cherry filled charm, the wine is medium bodied, forward, refined and perfect for near term drinking, while waiting for the Grand Vin to develop. 90 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒新鲜、甜美、滑顺，充满优雅的甜美黑桃和樱桃的魅力，酒体中等，前端突出，精致，适合近期饮用，等待Grand Vin成熟。评分：90分。

Western reviews.review:
Outstanding for me. Beautiful ruby color. Complexity on the nose all long the time of tasting: smoky notes, followed by ripe red fruits notes, floral notes and then milky chocolate notes. Palate round and quite smooth. Long finish with a fruity sweetness.
Highly recommended.
Western reviews.translation:
非常出色。酒色深红美丽。酒香复杂，整个品尝过程中都有烟熏味、成熟红果味、花香味和奶油巧克力味。口感圆润，非常滑顺。尾韵长，带有果香甜味。

强烈推荐。

Western reviews.review: This second wine of the Haut-Brion's newly acquired Château Quintus is rich, with layers of black plums and dense juicy tannins. A dark Merlot-dominated wine, it's smooth and likely to be ready soon. Drink from 2017.
Western reviews.translation: 昂布里昂新收购的尚特奥昂特斯（Château Quintus）的第二款酒，富有层次的黑浆果味道和浓密的果酱般的坚果感。是一款黑色梅洛主导的酒，口感平滑，预计在2017年左右就能饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 香味复杂多样，林茨塔蛋糕、黑莓、李子酱和大茴香的香味交织在一起，还带有焦油和石墨的味道，余味悠长且紧实。
Chinese pairs.new: Complex aromas of Linzer tart, blackberry, plum jam, and allspice intertwine, with notes of char and graphite, lingering with a firm finish.

Western reviews.review: A sensational effort and one of the stars of the vintage, Smith-Haut-Lafitte's 2004 possesses an inky/blue/purple-tinged color as well as a sumptuous nose of lead pencil shavings, spring flowers, blueberries, and blackberries. Surprisingly full-bodied for the vintage with stunning concentration, purity, and overall harmony, this is another brilliant wine from the proprietors, the Cathiards, who have done such a spectacular job at this estate since the early 1990s. Anticipated maturity: 2009-2022.
Western reviews.translation: 2004年史密斯-豪特-拉斐特（Smith-Haut-Lafitte）是一款出色的红酒，且是当年最出色的之一。它呈现出深紫色，酒香浓郁，带有铅笔削痕、春花、蓝莓和黑莓的芬芳。考虑到当年的产量，这款酒的体积和浓度令人惊讶，酒中充满纯粹和和谐感。史密斯-豪特-拉斐特的所有者，卡蒂亚德家族（Cathiards），自1990年代初以来一直在这家酒庄取得了辉煌的成就。预计成熟期：2009-2022年。

Western reviews.review: The Cathiards have scored with their 2004. It is rich and dense, but keeps a fine sense of structure. While the tannins are dusty, almost sweet, they keep good balance with the elegant fruit and the enticing acidity.
Western reviews.translation: 卡蒂亚酒庄的2004年红酒表现出色。它富有厚度和浓郁，但仍保持着精致的结构。虽然它的苦味（tanins）略带干燥，近乎甜美，但它与优雅的果味和诱人的酸度保持着完美的平衡。

Western reviews.review: Oak dominates the wine for now, with luscious red- and black-currant fruit a whisper underneath. The juiciness of that fruit grows rounder and more substantial with air as the wine evolves toward elegance. Modern and supple, this should be at its best six to eight years from the vintage.
Western reviews.translation: 酒中橡木味道占据主导地位，红黑葡萄的果味在下层悄然存在。随着酒的变化，果味的汁液性质变得更加圆润和丰富。现代且柔和的口感，这款酒在六到八年后应该达到最佳状态。

Western reviews.review: Lots of blackberry, spice and tobacco on the nose, with hints of cigar box. Full-bodied, with soft, round tannins and a dark chocolate and fruit aftertaste. Balanced and caressing. Best after 2009.
Western reviews.translation: 酒香中充满了黑莓、香料和烟草的味道，伴有雪茄盒的微妙气息。口感丰富，细腻的橡胶纤维和黑巧克力和水果的余味。平衡和柔和。建议在2009年后享用。

Chinese pairs.original: 2004年份的摩卡和松露气息非常突出，摇杯之后涌现出成熟的乌梅和红李子以及淡淡的松柏清凉。盲品的时候，我感觉它更像是表现不俗的2008年份，而不是相对单一的2004年份。在我看来，Ducru-Beaucaillou 对单宁的打磨以及对咸感的表达，使其在较困难的2004年份取得成功，而这也是另其超越众多2004年份葡萄酒的秘诀。
Chinese pairs.new: 2004年的Ducru-Beaucaillou展现出浓郁的摩卡和松露气息，摇杯后释放出成熟的乌梅和红李子的风味，以及淡淡的松柏清凉感。虽然我在盲品中认为它更像是一款出色的2008年份，但Ducru-Beaucaillou的成功在于对单宁的精细打磨和对咸感的完美表达，这使得它在困难的2004年份中脱颖而出，成为众多2004年份葡萄酒中的佼佼者。

English pairs.original: The pronounced aromas of mocha and truffle dominate the 2004 vintage, while the glass reveals ripe plums, red cherries, and a subtle touch of refreshing pine after swirling. During a blind tasting, I found it to resemble a commendable 2008 vintage rather than the relatively straightforward nature of 2004. In my opinion, Ducru-Beaucaillou’s meticulous craftsmanship in taming the tannins and expressing a delicate hint of salinity contributed to its success in the challenging 2004 vintage, setting it apart from numerous wines of the same year.
English pairs.new: 2004年的杜克鲁-博凯奥（Ducru-Beaucaillou）红酒，浓郁的咖啡和松露香气占据了主导地位，而在杯中，熟透的石榴、红樱桃和一丝清新的松柏香气随着摇晃而出现。在无视酒瓶标签的品酒中，我发现它与2008年的品酒相似，而不是2004年的直接性。根据我的观察，杜克鲁-博凯奥精心的工艺使其能够控制苦味并表达出细微的咸味，从而在挑战性的2004年中取得成功，令其与同年其他许多酒相比脱颖而出。

Western reviews.review: Ready to drink, stylish, soft, sweet and inviting, the wine is equally attractive in its earthy, berry and tobacco scented nose as it is in the fresh, spicy, fruit filled finish.
Western reviews.translation: 准备好饮用，时尚，柔和，甜美，邀人品尝，酒精气味中带有泥土、浆果和烟草的香气，与果实丰富、带有新鲜、辣味的尾韵一样吸引人。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, kräftiger Kern, violette Reflexe. In der Nase verhalten, Nuancen von dunkler Schokolade, Röstaromen klingen an. Am Gaumen dominieren straffe Tannine das Geschehen, Nuancen von Bitterschokolade, wirkt im Moment noch nicht ganz balanciert, unter dem festen Tanninkern liegt jedoch eine saftige Frucht, die eine finessenreiche Säurestruktur und damit einige Finesse verschüttet, kann sich zu einem Klassiker entwickeln, ein Kauftipp für intelligente Weinfreunde mit Geduld. Lagern +20
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，浓密的核心，紫色反光。酒鼻中有着谨慎的气息，深巧克力和焦糖的细微差别。口感中，紧绷的苦味物质占据主导地位，苦巧克力和苦味物质的细微差别。目前还没有完全平衡，但在坚实的苦味物质下面，有着丰富的果味，具有细致的酸度结构和一些细微差别。有潜力成为经典，适合有耐心的酒友购买。建议储存20年以上。

Western reviews.review: Impressively dense, dark flavored wine, very rich and quite extracted. But it still keeps the elegance and some of the freshness of 2004, and there is plenty of blackberry flavor to push the wine along. Heavier than many 2004s, it still shows that great acidity.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的密度和颜色令人印象深刻，口感丰富，果味浓郁。虽然如此，但它仍然保留了2004年的优雅和新鲜感，黑莓味道也非常丰富，推动了酒的前进。相比于许多2004年的酒，它的口感更浓郁，但仍然表现出出色的酸度。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Labegorce 2020 纯净的香气和清澈的酒体真的太迷人了，是2020年份我在Margaux产区品过的最通透的葡萄酒之一。摇杯之后层层叠叠的玫瑰花瓣从头顶撩过，又从脚趾飘走，十分空灵飘逸。清脆多汁的小红果和精致的香料气息深得我心，它们手拉手、肩并肩在味蕾上玩耍，品的我甚是欢喜。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau Labegorce 2020 - This wine is absolutely captivating with its pure aromas and crystal-clear texture, one of the most transparent wines I've tasted from the Margaux region in 2020. After swirling, delicate rose petal layers dance above my head, only to waft away from my toes, leaving a sense of ethereal lightness. Crisp and juicy cherry notes and refined spice nuances have won me over, playing together in perfect harmony on my palate, leaving me thoroughly delighted.

English pairs.original: The Chateau Labegorce 2020 boasts a pristine aroma and a crystal clear wine body that is truly captivating. It is one of the most transparent wines I have tasted in the Margaux region in 2020. Swirling the glass releases layers of rose petals that dance from the top of my head to the tips of my toes, ethereal and graceful. The crisp, juicy notes of small red fruits and delicate spices have captured my heart, as they play hand in hand on my taste buds, filling me with delight.
English pairs.new: 拉贝戈斯庄园2020年红酒，拥有清澈的香气和晶莹透亮的酒体，极具吸引力。它是2020年马尔加什地区我品尝过的最透明的红酒之一。将酒杯旋转，释放出从头顶到脚趾的玫瑰花瓣般的层次，优雅而神秘。清脆的、水果味和细腻的香料的混合，深深地吸引了我，随着它们在舌尖上演奏，我感到无比愉悦。

Western reviews.review: A tight, compact Labégorce with blackcurrant, walnut and some graphite. It’s medium-to full-bodied with a solid core of tannins and fruit. Some lead pencil. Very structured for this estate. Barrel Sample: 92-93
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒紧致、结实，带有黑currant、杏仁和一些石墨的味道。口感中等到中等以上，坚实的果实和坚实的纽扣。有些铅笔味。非常结构化的风格，适合此庄园。酒评：92-93分。

Western reviews.review: Smoked cedar oak on the nose, a welcome touch in a vintage where tannins have frequently been turned up to 11. Grilled almonds; really a campfire edge. I like this, works well with the vintage. The fruit softens through the mid palate but the team has done a great job of finding extra layers flavor and complexity. Good stuff. 40% new oak. 2% Petit Verdot completes the blend. Yields around 32hl/ha. Just 20mm of rain in August here, which meant veraison was more difficult. Tasted this also at the estate, and both times I was impressed. Less opulent than 2019, more classic and serious but this is great.Barrel Sample: 93
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的鼻子中有烟熏的红松木和橡木的味道，这在一个经常把苦味调到极致的年份中是很受欢迎的。烤杏仁的味道非常强烈，几乎像是在野外的篝火旁边。这种味道我很喜欢，非常适合这个年份。酒中的水果味在中口中逐渐软化，但团队做得很好，找到了额外的层次和复杂性。很棒的酒。酒中有40%的新橡木，2%的佩蒂·维多（Petit Verdot）完成了酒的混合。产量约为32公斤/公顷。8月这里只有20毫米的雨量，这意味着成熟期更为困难。酒的味道在庄园中尝过，也在酒庄中尝过，两次尝都很满意。相比2019年，这瓶酒更为典雅和严肃，但这瓶酒非常棒。酒评：93分。

Western reviews.review: A forward, textured, already delicious wine, the 2020 Chateau Labegorce offers lots of red and black fruit as well as notes of cedar, smoke tobacco, and chocolate. Based on 50% Cabernet Sauvignon, 45% Merlot, and the rest Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot, aged in 40% new barrels, it has perfectly integrated oak, ripe, fine-grained tannins, and outstanding overall balance. Give bottles just a year or three and enjoy over the following 10-15 years or more. Best After 2023.
Western reviews.translation: 2020年夏洛特拉贝戈斯是一款前卫、质感丰富的佳酿，酒中充满了红色和黑色水果的风味，以及柯达、烟草、烟草和巧克力的香气。根据50%卡波内尔·萨夫维诺、45%梅洛和其他卡波内尔·法兰克和佩蒂特·维多的比例，40%新桶陈酿，酒中完美地融合了橡木味，成熟的细致纤维和出色的整体平衡。将酒瓶放置一年或三年后，享受接下来的10-15年或更长时间。最佳享用时间：2023年之后。

Western reviews.review: The 2020 Labégorce is a dark, sumptuous beauty. 2020 has softened a bit with élevage, but it remains a distinctly potent, brooding Margaux. Best After 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 2020 年的Labégorce是一款深色、奢华的美酒。经过陈酿后，2020 年的Labégorce变得更加柔和，但仍然是一款具有强烈魅力、深沉的马格努酒庄。建议在2025年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: The 2020 Labégorce has turned out nicely, bursting with aromas of cherries, berries and licorice, followed by a medium to full-bodied, rich and ample palate. Fleshy and layered, this contemporary-styled Margaux will drink well young. Best after 2023.
Western reviews.translation: 2020 年的Labégorce红酒表现不错，气味中充满了樱桃、浆果和甘草的香气，口感丰富、充满体积，富有层次。这种现代风格的马格努红酒在年轻时期就能享用。建议在2023年后再次品尝。

Chinese pairs.original: 快来看看人家Chateau Laroque 是如何在“烈火中孕育优雅”的。能够在热年份把超高比例的Merlot 混酿 (99% Merlot, 1% Cabernet Franc) 做得如此通透，同时还能把pH值控制在恐怖的3.44，若不是酿酒师和风土实现了天人合一，绝对达不到这种水准。入口之后全是酸枣和山楂的酸爽感，绵密的矿物质感能从舌尖蔓延到头顶。作为酒评人，够把如此高水准又价格合适的葡萄酒推荐给消费者，我发自内心地感到幸福。
Chinese pairs.new: 来看看Chateau Laroque是如何在烈火中孕育出优雅的葡萄酒。他们能够在热年份中以99%的Merlot和1%的Cabernet Franc的比例混酿，控制pH值在3.44，达到了惊人的水准。入口之后是酸枣和山楂的酸爽感，细致的矿物质味道从舌尖蔓延到头顶。作为酒评人，我感到幸福，因为我能够推荐这样高水准又价格合适的葡萄酒给消费者。

English pairs.original: Here you will see how Chateau Laroque “creates elegance in the midst of raging flames”. In a vintage marked by higher temperatures, it’s remarkable that the blend with such a high percentage of Merlot (99% Merlot, 1% Cabernet Franc) has maintained its transparency and the pH incredibly low pH at 3.44. Such a blend is nearly impossible unless the winemaker has a superb understanding of the terroir. Upon tasting, the palate is full of freshness reminiscent of sour dates and hawthorn berries, followed by a rolling wave of minerality. As a wine critic, I feel truly fortunate to recommend a wine of such high quality and reasonable price to consumers.
English pairs.new: 在烈焰中，尚都拉罗克酒庄却以优雅的姿态呈现。即使是在高温的葡萄成熟季节，酒庄仍能将梅洛葡萄（占99%）与卡伯涅·法兰克葡萄（占1%）巧妙地融合在一起，保持了清澈的口感和极低的pH值（仅3.44）。这需要酒庄拥有对土壤的深刻理解。品尝时，口感清新，带有酸枣和山楂果的味道，随后是矿物质的波动。作为一名酒评人，我感到幸运能够推荐这样高质量的酒款，同时价格也很合理。

Western reviews.review: From an estate that has been on an incredible run of late, largely due to the talents of director David Suire, the 2020 Chateau Laroque shows the cooler, limestone-driven style of the terroir beautifully and has a clean, focused style in its darker (almost blue) berry fruits as well as chalky minerality, violets, spice, and floral nuances. Medium-bodied on the palate, this focused, straight, remarkably pure Saint-Emilion has terrific mid-palate depth and a great finish. It needs to be hidden in the cellar for a solid 4-5 years if possible and is going to have 30 years of longevity. If drinking any time soon, give it an hour in a decanter. Best After 2027. Rating: 95+
Western reviews.translation: 来自近期表现出色的一家酒庄，主要是由于总监David Suire的才华，2020年Chateau Laroque展现了该地区的风格，展示了石灰岩驱动的风格，清晰、集中地展现了深色（几乎是蓝色的）浆果的风味，以及 chalky矿物质、紫罗兰、香料和花朵的细微差别。口感中等，口感集中、直接、异常纯粹的圣埃米利翁，具有出色的中口深度和出色的尾部。它需要在酒窖里存放至少4-5年，如果可能的话。它将有30年的长寿。如果马上饮用，请将其放入装饰瓶中，至少1小时。最佳饮用时间：2027年后。评分：95+。

Western reviews.review: Aromas of sweet berries with herbs, wet earth and moss undertones as well as fresh mushrooms. Medium- to full-bodied with ultra-fine and creamy tannins and a lovely finish. It’s polished and refined. Drink after 2025, but already very pretty.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中充满了甜甜的浆果、香草、潮湿的土壤和苔藓的底调，以及新鲜的蘑菇。口感中等到中等以上，具有极细致和丰富的橡皮质感，口感悠长。整体上非常光滑和精致。建议在2025年后饮用，但即使现在也已经非常美味。

Western reviews.review: The 2020 Laroque has turned out nicely, bursting with aromas of cherries, minty blackberries, licorice and bay leaf. Medium to full-bodied, velvety and layered, with good depth at the core, chalky but refined tannins and a saline finish, it's another strong performance for this rising star of Saint-Émilion. Best after 2023.
Western reviews.translation: 2020 年的拉鲁克红酒表现不错，酒中充满了樱桃、薄荷黑莓、甘草和山羊膻的芳香。酒体中等到中等以上，滑顺且层次分明，酒中核心部分有着良好的深度，粉笔状但细致的橡皮质感和咸味的尾韵，拉鲁克红酒再次展现出圣埃米利翁地区的新星。建议在2023年后品尝。

Western reviews.review: Plenty of sappy, well defined juice running underneath the moody tannic frame, but you need to look away right now because this is closed and subdued. Blueberry purée and a limestone scrape helps build momentum through the mid-palate - give this time. David Suire manages the winemaking.Barrel Sample: 92
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒充满了浓郁的果汁，清晰的口感，但现在它正在闭塞，低调。蓝莓果酱和石灰味在中口感中帮助推动动力——给它时间吧。戴维·苏伊尔(David Suire)负责酒庄的酿造。酒庄样本：92分。

Chinese pairs.original: 在我心目中，Chateau Prieure-Lichine 是一块质地柔滑的嫩豆腐，在干热的2022年份，它更像一块有嚼劲的豆腐干。该年份的浆果气息比较突出，摇杯之后散发出酸枣干和蓝莓果粒的浓香、以及些许橙皮的清爽。得益于轻柔的萃取（比以往减少了一半）以及相对低温的发酵，这款酒在入口之际便展现出可可粉的质感，即便单宁的数量颇丰也并不觉得厚重。当然，如果香气更富有表现力，一定会更加出色。期待装瓶后的表现。
Chinese pairs.new: 在我心目中，Chateau Prieure-Lichine 是一款质地柔滑的酒，2022年份更是有嚼劲。该年份的浆果气息比较突出，摇杯后散发出酸枣干、蓝莓果粒和橙皮的清爽香气。酒的入口质感像可可粉，尽管单宁丰富，但并不觉得厚重。轻柔的萃取和低温发酵是关键。酒的表现如果能更富有表现力，肯定会更出色。

English pairs.original: In my mind, Chateau Prieure-Lichine is like a silky block of tofu, but in the hot and dry vintage of 2022, it resembles a more chewy and textured dried tofu. The berry aromas are particularly pronounced in this vintage, with the fragrance of dried red dates and blueberry pulp emanating from the glass, as well as a hint of refreshing orange peel. Thanks to a gentle extraction, which was reduced by half compared to previous vintages, and a cooler fermentation, this wine reveals a velvety texture reminiscent of cocoa powder upon entry, despite the abundance of tannins that do not weigh it down. Of course, if the aroma were more expressive, it would be even more exceptional. I look forward to seeing how it performs after bottling.
