English pairs.new: 在我的脑海中，沙特奥普里埃-利希内的味道像是一块滑滑的豆腐，但是在2022年的炎热干燥年份中，它更像是一块咬起来有嚼头的干豆腐。这个年份的浆果香气尤其浓郁，酒中弥漫着干红枣和蓝莓果肉的香气，还有微微的柑橘皮的清新感。由于采取了更加轻柔的提取方法（与之前的年份相比减少了50%），以及较低的发酵温度，这款酒入口时呈现出像巧克力粉一样细腻的质感，尽管它富含的纤维素并没有使其沉重。当然，如果酒中的香气更为丰富，它就更为出色了。

Western reviews.review: Flowers, blackberries, currants, espresso, and plums with a touch of cocoa form the nose. On the palate, the wine is loaded with lusciously-textured, ripe, polished fruits. There is a solid depth of flavor, good energy, and layers of black and red fruits on the mid-palate and in the creamy, fruit-packed finish. Drink from 2027-2055. 94-96 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中包含着鲜花、黑莓、黑加仑、浓缩咖啡和浆果的味道，伴随着巧克力的微妙气息。口感上，酒体丰富、饱满、光滑，充满了成熟的果实味道。酒中有着深度的味道、充足的能量和黑色和红色果实的层次感，酒尾丰富、果实丰富。建议在2027-2055年之间饮用。评分：94-96分。

Western reviews.review: Reife Frucht, Kirschen, Zwetschgen, Cassis und frisch geschnittene Kräuter. Im Auftakt harmlos, dann packt der Gerbstoff zu, die Frucht ist hier leider etwas im Hintergrund, der Wein endet trocknend und rotfruchtig. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / CVBG / Château Belgrave) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感丰富，带有浓郁的果香，包括草莓、浆果和黑berries，伴随着新鲜的香草味。起初口感平和，但随后干酪味逐渐显现，果香味则相对较淡。最后，口感干净，留下深红色的果味。 (评分时间：2023年4月 / 来源：Château Belgrave)

Western reviews.review: Good level of extraction and structure, in good harmony. Intense black cherries, attrac tive floral note, on the nose and palate. Firm mid palate, crunchy with moderate finish, quite spicy. The shape of tannins feels flattened out and sticking on the palate until the finish. Some tea leaves flavour.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的提取度和结构都很好，和谐度高。酒鼻中有浓郁的黑樱桃和吸引人的花香。口感中有坚实的中口feel，口感清脆，尾部温和，略带辣味。橡皮质感平滑，留在口中直到尾部。还有一些茶叶的味道。

Western reviews.review: Le nez est minéral avec une certaine puissance maîtrisée. Il est franc avec des notes de mûres sauvages fraîches pulpeuses, de petits fruits rouges frais et plus légèrement de violette associée à une touche de fraise écrasée ainsi qu’une pointe de bergamote. La bouche est minérale, fraîche avec un fin côté infusion. Elle a de la tension, de la droiture, de la justesse et des notes de mûres fraîches pulpeuses et de cassis pulpeux frais et plus légèrement de violettes associées à des touches de bergamote, de minéralité saline et à une discrète pointe d’épices ainsi qu à une note de toast.
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的香气是矿物质的，具有控制的力量。它清晰明了，带有新鲜的野生浆果、红色新鲜水果和轻微的紫罗兰花香，以及压榨的草莓和 bergamote 的点缀。

口感矿物质，新鲜，细腻。它有张力、直率、准确性和新鲜的浆果和浆果的味道，以及轻微的紫罗兰花香和 bergamote 的点缀，以及轻微的盐味和隐约的香料，以及烤面包的味道。

Western reviews.review: Deep ruby, opaque core, purple reflections, brightening on the rim. Fruity bouquet, ripe wild berries and cherries, fine spicy nuances, candied orange zest. Complex palate, juicy and fresh, a touch of chocolate, mineral and lasting, good length, certain ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，透明核心，紫色反射，边缘明亮。果香 bouquet，成熟的野生浆果和樱桃，精致的辣味细节，糖化橙皮。复杂的口感， juicy 和新鲜，少量巧克力，矿物质和持久，良好的长度，确定的成熟潜力。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Le Crock 2020的果香非常诱人，给人一种晶莹剔透的纯净感。摇杯之后能够看到一朵鸢尾花在杯中绽放，华贵的本色尽显无余。多汁而轻盈的入口非常活泼，期酒品鉴时的灼热感更是烟消云散。和我印象中走浓郁风的Chateau Le Crock颇为不同，2020年份好像开启了 “瘦身计划”，是我印象中表现最好的年份之一。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau Le Crock 2020的果香非常诱人，给人一种晶莹剔透的纯净感。摇杯之后能够看到一朵鸢尾花在杯中绽放，华贵的本色尽显无余。多汁而轻盈的入口非常活泼，期酒品鉴时的灼热感更是烟消云散。与我过去对Chateau Le Crock的印象相比，这款酒似乎有了明显的变化，2020年份的版本更为轻盈，可能是因为它开始了“瘦身计划”，这是我印象中表现最好的年份之一。

English pairs.original: The fruity aromas of Chateau Le Crock 2020 are very seductive, showing a crystal and clean sense of purity. After swirling the glass, you can see an iris blooming in the glass, revealing its magnificent and dazzling nature. The juicy entry is very lively, and the burning sensation in En Primeurs tasting disappears. Different from the full-bodied Chateau Le Crock in my impression, the 2020 vintage seems to have started a “fitness program” and is one of the best vintages in my memory.
English pairs.new: 2020年夏特勒克洛克的果香非常诱人，展现出清澈纯粹的晶莹感。旋转玻璃杯后，你可以在杯中看到一朵iris花开放，展现出其辉煌夺目的性格。入口充满活力，En Primeurs品酒时的烧感消失。与我之前对夏特勒克洛克的印象相反，2020年产季似乎开始了“健身计划”，并且是我的记忆中最好的产季之一。

Western reviews.review: Viel versprechende, komplexe Aromatik, erstklassige Eiche, aber auch Beeren und Gewürze; kompakter Auftakt, saftige Entwicklung über erstklassigem, besonders feinkörnigem Tannin, Mineralität und grosse Länge; hervorragender Wein, ein Hit in diesem Jahr.
Western reviews.translation:
这个红酒评论翻译成中文如下：

非常有希望的、复杂的香气，顶级橡木味，但也带有浓郁的果实和香料；紧凑的开头，经过顶级、细腻的橡木纤维、矿物质和长长的尾部；出色的葡萄酒，今年的最佳选择。

Western reviews.review: This big, smoky wine is well crafted and concentrated, with rich tannins and a dense structure. The black fruits and juicy character are sustained by the intensity of the tannins. Drink this wine from 2027.
Western reviews.translation: 这款酒的风格浓郁，烟熏味浓郁，口感丰富，结构紧密。黑色果味和果肉感受受到坚实的苦味的支撑。建议2027年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: Medium-bodied, soft, creamy and fresh, with layers of ripe, polished red currants, blackberries, spice, chocolate and a sprig of fresh mint at every turn, this is going to be delicious on release and it also offer additional levels of complexity with a few years of age. Drink from 2023-2038.
Western reviews.translation: 口感中等，软滑，新鲜，层次丰富的熟透的红葡萄，黑莓，香料，巧克力和一缕新鲜薄荷在每个转折处都能感受到。这种酒在发布时将非常美味，并且在几年后也会带来更多的复杂性。建议在2023-2038年内饮用。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby, purple reflections, deep core, faint ochre brightening on the rim. Delicate nougat, black cherries, some cassis and liquorice, fine herbal spice on the nose, tobacco nuances, fresh orange zest underneath. Medium-bodied, red berry nuances, fresh acidity, salty-lemon hint and a currant touch on the finish.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，紫色反射，深色核心，酒杯边缘有淡淡的黄土色光泽。鼻子上有细腻的果仁味，黑杏子，些许黑加仑和甘草，精致的草药香味，烟草的细微变化，橙子皮的新鲜味在下面。中等体积，红果味的细微变化，新鲜的酸度，柠檬味的咸味和黑葡萄的触感在尾部。

Chinese pairs.original: 玛歌的温柔，是深入骨髓的。2021年份的红亭带着这抹温柔底色，让困难的凉年份也变得温情脉脉。它的香气轻巧怡人，酸度清晰流畅，单宁细密柔软，含在口中彷如浸泡在温泉中。酸枣和山楂的香气非常流畅，隐约中还泛着牛肝菌的醇香气息。收尾时的月桂叶气息又平添了一抹草本芬芳，令整个口感纤细修长。在我看来，玛歌红亭是2021年份所有一级庄里品质最出色的副牌酒。
Chinese pairs.new: 玛歌的温柔，是深入骨髓的。2021年份的红亭带着这抹温柔底色，让困难的凉年份也变得温情脉脉。它的香气轻巧怡人，酸度清晰流畅，单宁细密柔软，含在口中彷如浸泡在温泉中。酸枣和山楂的香气非常流畅，隐约中还泛着牛肝菌的醇香气息。收尾时的月桂叶气息又平添了一抹草本芬芳，令整个口感纤细修长。在我看来，玛歌红亭是2021年份所有一级庄里品质最出色的副牌酒。

English pairs.original: Pavillon Rouge 2021 is beautifully embodies Margaux’s inherent elegance, even in a challenging cool vintage like 2021. This vintage carries a warmth and gentleness, making the cool vintage feel surprisingly tender and emotive. The aroma is inviting and delicate, with a crisp, flowing acidity and tannins that are as fine and soft as a relaxing soak in a warm spring. The smooth interplay of sour date and hawthorn, enriched by a subtle undertone of porcini mushrooms. The finish, with a hint of laurel, adds an herbal freshness that further refines and elongates the palate. In my view, the Pavillon Rouge distinguishes itself as the most outstanding second-label wine among the first growths in 2021.
English pairs.new: 帕维永罗日2021年红酒以其典雅的风格，完美地体现了马格努的本质。即使是在2021年这个挑战性的冷年，帕维永罗日也展现出温暖和温柔的气质，让冷年的感觉变得意外地温柔和感性。酒香诱人而细腻，带有清晰流畅的酸度和细腻柔软的纹理，如同在温暖的春天泡在温泉中。酸枣和山楂的和谐交融，伴有细微的松露菌香气。酒尾带有 laurel 的微妙香气，进一步完善和延长了口感。在我看来，帕维永罗日是2021年第一梯队中最出色的二级红酒。

Western reviews.review: Quite floral in nature, the nose exudes white and purple flowers, black cherries, spice, and just a hint of espresso. The palate is medium-bodied, vibrant, crisp, and chalky, with a sweetness to the lifted, chewy red fruits with a touch of citrus in the finish. The wine blends 73% Cabernet Sauvignon, 18% Merlot, 5% Petit Verdot, and 4% Cabernet Franc, 13.1% ABV, 13.5 pH. Drink from 2025-2037.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气非常花朵式，带有白色和紫色花朵、黑樱桃、香料和一丝咖啡的味道。口感中等，生动、清脆、有矿物质感，带有甜度的果实味道，尾部带有柑橘味。酒中混合了73%卡波内尔·萨夫维尼翁、18%梅洛、5%小皮诺和4%卡波内尔·法兰克，13.1%酒精度，13.5pH。建议2025-2037年饮用。

Western reviews.review: The aromas of rich black-currant fruits dominate this second-label wine. With its blackberry fruits and rich, supple tannins, this shows strongly in its structure, complex black fruits and acidity. Drink from 2027.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的气味中，浓郁的黑加仑果香占据了主导地位。这款次品牌酒的黑莓果香和丰富的柔韧性tanins，使其结构更加复杂，黑果和酸度也更加完美。建议2027年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby, opaque core, purple hues. Attractive savoury notes, a hint of cloves, red cherries, a touch of orange zest; an inviting bouquet. Juicy and complex, finessed, well-structured, ripe tannins, dark cherries, mineral, lovely length; already very seductive.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，透明的核心，紫色调。有吸引人的香气，带有香料味道，红樱桃味，橙子皮的微妙味道；一份诱人的香气。口感丰富，复杂，细腻，结构良好，成熟的橡皮感，黑樱桃味，矿物质味，长长的尾部；已经非常诱人了。

Western reviews.review: Leuchtendes Rubin. Die Nase ist frisch, herrliche Frucht, Cassis und etwas Brombeere, darüber eine feine Floralität. Im Gaumen frisch und fruchtbetont, ungemein knackig, wie ein Biss in einen Korb von Beeren, die Tannine sind fein, stützen die Frucht, sind nie vordergründig, halten sich dezent zurück. Der Wein wirkt bereits jetzt schon zugänglich, ein Charmeur von A-Z. Angenehm lang, balanciert und frisch, rotfruchtiges Rückaroma. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2022. Château Margaux)
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是亮丽的红宝石色。酒鼻子清新，充满了美妙的果香，黑加仑和一些蓝莓，伴随着细微的花香。口感清新，果味浓郁，非常脆爽，像是在品尝一篮子的鲜果，苦味细腻，支持果味，永远不会突出，谦逊地保持沉默。酒已经相当容易入口，完美的魅力从头到尾。酒尾长，平衡，清新，留下了红果的回味。

Western reviews.review: Medium to deep purple-red color with a deep core. Red fruits on the nose have a meaty/vegemite aroma & minty touches. On the palate vibrant, fresh red-fruit has a smooth structure. There are plenty of very fine, slightly chalky-textured tannins that are not astringent. The wine is of mid-weight. Cedary structure on the finish supports elegant, soft red-fruit with stalky & toasty notes behind it. Acidity is fresh, alcohol is balanced & the finish is long. 04/22 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深紫红色，中间有深色的核心。酒鼻子上有红果的味道，带有肉类/维生素B1的气味和薄荷的味道。口感上，酒体鲜活，果味丰富，结构光滑。酒中有很多细致的、略带 chalky 的纤维质，口感不苦。酒体中等。酒尾有松木结构，衬托着优雅的、柔软的红果味，后面有干草和烤焦的味道。酒酸度清新，酒精平衡，酒尾长。评分：04/22 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 充分成熟的多酚、超强的集中度、14度的酒精、丰润的蓝莓和蓝莓芬芳，一切的一切都超出了我对2021年份的固有认知。作为一款黏土比例颇高的Castillon 葡萄酒，能够在凉爽的年份有如此尚佳的表现，简直太不可思议了。在这款酒中，我感受到的是“天赋+努力”碰撞出的花火，是顶级酒农挥洒的激情。以我对Chateau Montlandrie 的了解，陈年5年左右它就会演化出松露和牛肝菌的独特味道。热爱波尔多的朋友注意了，这支潜力股可一定不要错过。
Chinese pairs.new: 这款葡萄酒拥有充分成熟的多酚、强烈的焦点和14度的酒精，配以丰润的蓝莓和蓝莓芬芳。它超出了我对2021年份的预期，表现出令人惊讶的品质。作为一款黏土比例高的Castillon葡萄酒，它在凉爽的年份表现出如此出色的成绩，简直不可思议。这个葡萄酒让我感受到天赋和努力的完美结合，是顶级酒农挥洒的激情。陈年5年左右，它将演化出独特的松露和牛肝菌味道。热爱波尔多的朋友们注意了，这款葡萄酒的潜力不可或缺，千万不要错过。

English pairs.original: The fully matured polyphenols, intense concentration, 14% alcohol, and the lush blueberry aromas of Chateau Montlandrie have all exceeded what I typically expect from the vintage of 2021. For a Castillon wine with a high clay content, its excellent performance in a cool vintage is astonishing. In this wine, I sense a fusion of innate talent and dedicated effort, and a testament to the passion of top winemaker. Based on my understanding of Chateau Montlandrie, it should develop unique truffle and porcini mushroom after about five years of aging. Bordeaux enthusiasts, take note – this promising wine is not to be missed.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的成熟度极高，浓度十足，14%的酒精含量，蓝莓的香气丰富，远远超过了2021年的典型表现。考虑到这瓶酒来自含有高粘土含量的卡斯蒂永地区，其在寒冷年份中的表现令人惊讶。 在这瓶酒中，我感受到天赋和努力的完美融合，以及顶级酒庄的热情。根据我对查特奥蒙兰德里酒庄的了解，这瓶酒在五年左右的陈化过程中会展现出独特的松露和黑松露香气。 BORDEAUX爱好者们注意到，这瓶酒的前景非常有希望，不容错过。

Western reviews.review: It is serious and decidedly structured, showing notes of black plums, blackberries, black tea leaves, sandalwood, incense and juniper berries. Medium body, soft tannins little extracted and a composed finish that lacks some brightness and healthy exuberance. A blend of 75% Merlot, 20% Cabernet Franc and 5% Malbec. Drink now.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒严肃而结构明确，展现出黑杏、黑莓、黑茶叶、沉香、香烛和山茱萄果的风味。口感中等，口感柔和，苦味较轻微，尾部结尾平稳但略欠光彩和生机。酒中含有75%梅洛、20%卡波弗朗和5%马尔贝克的混合。建议立即饮用。

Western reviews.review: Crushed rocks, flowers, cocoa and ripe, dark plums create the perfume. On the palate, the wine is fresh, soft, bright and crisp, with a juiciness to the fruits on the mid-palate and in the medium-bodied finish, with its touch of salty tannins on the backend. The wine blends 75% Merlot, 20% Cabernet Franc and 5% Cabernet Sauvignon, 14% ABV. The harvest took place October 4 - October 7. Drink from 2023-2035. 90-92
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中融合了碎石、花朵、巧克力和成熟的黑杏的味道。口感上，酒精清新、柔和、明亮、清脆，中口和尾部都有果实的新鲜感，尾部带有轻微的咸味苦味。酒中混合了75%梅洛、20%卡波弗朗克和5%卡波萨维尼格，14%的酒精含量。采摘时间为10月4日至10月7日。建议饮用时间为2023-2035年。评分：90-92分。

Western reviews.review: It is serious and decidedly structured, showing notes of black plums, blackberries, black tea leaves, sandalwood, incense and juniper berries. Medium body, soft tannins little extracted and a composed finish that lacks some brightness and healthy exuberance. A blend of 75% Merlot, 20% Cabernet Franc and 5% Malbec. Drink now.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒严肃而结构明确，展现出黑杏、黑莓、黑茶叶、沉香、香烛和山茱萄果的风味。口感中等，苦味柔和，未被充分提取，尾部平衡但略欠光彩和生机。酒款为75%梅洛、20%卡波弗朗克和5%马尔贝克的混合。建议立即饮用。

Western reviews.review: Crushed rocks, flowers, cocoa and ripe, dark plums create the perfume. On the palate, the wine is fresh, soft, bright and crisp, with a juiciness to the fruits on the mid-palate and in the medium-bodied finish, with its touch of salty tannins on the backend. The wine blends 75% Merlot, 20% Cabernet Franc and 5% Cabernet Sauvignon, 14% ABV. The harvest took place October 4 - October 7. Drink from 2023-2035. 90-92
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中融合了碎石、花朵、巧克力和成熟的黑杏的味道。口感上，酒精清新、柔和、明亮、清脆，中口和尾部都有果实的滋味，尾部带有轻微的咸味和坚果味。酒中含有75%梅洛、20%卡波弗朗克和5%卡波萨维尼格，14%的酒精含量。酒庄于10月4日至10月7日采收。建议于2023年至2035年饮用。评分：90-92分。

Chinese pairs.original: 品尝Chateau Duhart-Milon 2021的时候像是吃着一慕斯蛋糕，温润丝滑的口感给我留下了深刻地印象。软糯的莓果芬芳周围缠绕着一圈儿精致的丁香、甘草和八角的辛香，收尾时还泛着淡淡的草药清香以及标志性的石墨和檀香气息，无论从哪个角度衡量，都毫无破绽，妥妥的“弱年不弱”。
Chinese pairs.new: Tasting Chateau Duhart-Milon 2021 is like savoring a rich mousse cake, with a smooth and velvety texture that left a lasting impression. Soft and luscious berry aromas are wrapped in a delicate tapestry of cinnamon, licorice, and star anise, finishing with a subtle herbal nuance and the signature graphite and sandalwood notes. From every angle, it's a seamless and unbroken thread, a true "weak vintage that's not weak".

English pairs.original: Tasting Chateau Duhart-Milon 2021 is akin to savoring a mousse cake, leaving a deep impression with its creamy and silky texture. Soft, glutinous fruitiness is wrapped in a delicate embrace of clove, licorice, and star anise. The finish reveals a hint of herbal scent, along with the signature graphite and sandalwood notes. From any perspective, this wine is impeccably crafted, truly a ‘strong performer in a moderate vintage.’
English pairs.new: 品尝2021年杜哈尔米隆庄园的红酒，就像品尝一块软绵的奶油蛋糕，留下深刻的印象。它的奶油般的质地和丝滑的口感，让人难以忘怀。软绵的水果味道被丁香、甘草和八角的细微味道包围。尾部则带来一丝草药的香气，伴随着典型的石墨和沉香的味道。无论从哪个角度看，这款酒都是精心打造的，真正的“强队出色表现”之一。

Western reviews.review: Rich and slender in sensory profile, it shows notes of black plums, blackberries, dark chocolate, sweet caramel and sage. Full-bodied, soft tannins and a finish with excellent taste persistence. A blend of 81% Cabernet Sauvignon and 19% Merlot. Best from 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感丰富细长，具有黑浆果、黑莓、黑巧克力、甜焦糖和山药的香气。口感丰富，纤维软，余味持久。酒中含有81%卡波雷尔葡萄和19%美洛葡萄。建议2025年后品尝。

Western reviews.review: Deep ruby core with narrow purple rim. Delicate black cherry, hints of precious wood and nougat, nuances of cloves. Medium-bodied, ripe plum fruit, round, integrated, elegant tannins, good structure, cocoa on the finish; offers uncomplicated drinking pleasure.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色核心，细窄的紫色边缘。细致的黑杏果味，贵木和果仁的微妙气息，丁香的微妙味道。中等体积，成熟的浆果味，圆润，融合，优雅的纤维，良好的结构，巧克力味在尾部；提供简单的饮用乐趣。

Western reviews.review: Flowers, black cherries, earth and a hint of coffee bean for the nose. On the medium-bodied palate, the wine is soft, fresh, gentle and elegant, with a focus on the purity in the fruit, and the refinement in the tannins in the mid-palate and in the finish. The wine is a blend of 81% Cabernet Sauvignon and 19% Merlot. This is the second vintage produced in the new cellars which helped a lot this year, due to the ability to vinify on a parcel by parcel basis. Drink from 2024-2042. 91-93
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中包含着花朵、黑樱桃、泥土和一丝咖啡豆的味道。口感中等，酒体柔和、清新、细腻、优雅，重点在于果实的纯粹和中口和尾部的纤维的精致。酒精含量为81%的卡波网索维涅和19%的美洛托。 这是新酒窖中生产的第二瓶，今年的酒窖能够根据每个葡萄园单独进行发酵，这对酒的质量有了很大的帮助。建议在2024-2042年之间饮用。评分：91-93分。

Western reviews.review: Florale Nase, hellfruchtig, auch schwarze Johannisbeeren sehr feminin, die Röstnoten dezent im Hintergrund, ein schönes Parfüm. Im Auftakt straff, gradlinig und mit guter Struktur ausgestattet, lebendig, zeigt Finesse, Balance und Trinkfluss, die Tannine machen sich erst ganz hinten bemerkbar, im Abgang mit sehr guter Länge und wiederum floralen Rückaromen. Faszinierend und herrlich frisch. 2027-2045 (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2022. UGCB/Château Lafite Rothschild)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论，翻译如下：

花香的鼻子，烈酒的果味，黑莓的味道也很明显，非常女性化，背景中有轻微的烤味，像一款美丽的香水。酒的开头是紧致的，线条清晰，结构良好，生动活泼，展现出细腻、平衡和流畅的口感，后期的苦味才开始显现，尾部长且有花香的余味。非常迷人和新鲜。推荐储存时间：2027-2045（2022年4月在UGCB/Château Lafite Rothschild品鉴）。

Western reviews.review: Darkly pigmented medium ruby-red in color with purple hues at the rim. Aromas are of clean cassis with underlying graphite & cedar notes. The palate shows lovely bursting cassis fruit & toasty notes. The wine's acidity is fresh & there is a rich core of licorice ripeness. The wine is of mid-weight & the tannins are gripping but not astringent. Alcohol is balanced & the finish is long with mouth-watering blackcurrant fruit. 04/22 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色，带有紫色光泽。酒香中有清新的黑加斯（一种黑色浆果）味道，底层有石墨和红木的味道。口感上，黑加斯的果味丰富，带有烤味。酒的酸度清新，中间有丰富的黑Licorice味道。酒的重量适中，纤维素紧紧抓住口腔，但不苦涩。酒精度合适，尾部长且带有口水的黑加斯果味。评分：04/22 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 血橙和血柚的味道在带梗发酵工艺的加持下活力满格，2020年份的Chateau Saint-Pierre 拥有砾石黏土天生的 “紧绷感”，以及在Pomerol 产区少见的中草药香气，是整个Pomerol 清流一般的存在。在Merlot相对早熟的年份，这款Pomerol 能够始终保持清爽的口感和适中的酒精度(14度)，收尾时莫名的甜感在一定程度上增加了圆润感，酿的非常讨巧。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine is bursting with the vibrant flavors of blood orange and blood tangerine, thanks to the innovative piquet fermentation method. The 2020 Chateau Saint-Pierre boasts a natural "tension" from its gravel and clay soils, along with a rare herbal note often found in Pomerol. This Pomerol is a refreshing gem, with a crisp texture and moderate alcohol level (14%) that stays youthful even in Merlot's relatively early-ripening years. The finish is surprisingly sweet, adding a touch of roundness to the wine's overall charm.

English pairs.original: The flavors of blood orange and blood tangerine come to life with the whole bunch fermentation. Chateau Saint-Pierre 2020 boasts a naturally tense from clay soil and a rare herbal aroma that is unusual in the entire Pomerol. Despite being an early-ripening year for Merlot, this Pomerol wine maintains a crisp palate and an ideal alcohol level (14°) while ending with a subtle sweetness that adds a touch of roundness. Truly a clever artwork.
English pairs.new: 2020年圣皮埃尔庄园的红酒，采用整捆发酵的方法，展现出血橙和血橙的独特风味。来自黏土土壤的天然紧张感和罕见的草药香气，使得这款波尔多酒独树一帜。即使是在早熟的葡萄成熟年份中，这款波尔多酒仍然保持清新的口感和理想的酒精含量（14°），并以细微的甜度结束，给人以圆润的感觉。

Western reviews.review: Flowers, chocolate covered plums, espresso and licorice create the catchy nose. Darkly colored, lush, medium-bodied, polished and with a blast of chocolate-covered supple, dark red fruits, licorice and smoke in the finish. I am really liking this wine. This is the best vintage of Saint Pierre Pomerol yet. 90-92
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中充满了鲜花、巧克力浸果、浓缩咖啡和 licorice 的味道。酒体深色、丰富、中等度、光滑，口感中有浓郁的巧克力浸果、黑红色水果、 licorice 和烟熏味。 我非常喜欢这款酒，这是圣皮埃尔波尔多至今最好的产季。评分：90-92。

Western reviews.review: Pure nose, offering red plum, herbal notes, red berries, with some wood notes and some truffle notes. Rather tannic profile with a youthful texture, good volume and attractive fruit with fine persistency. Made for long ageing.
Western reviews.translation: 纯净的鼻子，带有红枣、草药、红果、木质和松露的香气。口感较坚实，年轻的质地，充满体积，具有吸引人的果味和持久的尾韵。适合长期陈化。

Chinese pairs.original: Marquis d’Alesme 2018的香气中有种十分特别的芝麻油芳香， 以及我经常在托斯卡纳的波尔多混酿中找到的成熟气息。清脆多汁的入口十分讨喜，流畅的酸度和柔顺的单宁加分不少。收尾时有一丝黑巧克力的甘苦，在丰富的层次感上增加了更多变化。
Chinese pairs.new: Marquis d'Alesme 2018的香气中有种十分特别的芝麻油芳香， 以及我经常在托斯卡纳的波尔多混酿中找到的成熟气息。清脆多汁的入口十分讨喜，流畅的酸度和柔顺的单宁加分不少。收尾时有一丝黑巧克力的甘苦，在丰富的层次感上增加了更多变化。

English pairs.original: Marquis d’Alesme 2018 offers a unique fragrance of sesame oil and the typical ripeness that I often find in Super Toscana’s Bordeaux blend. The juicy entry is pretty enticing, followed by the streamlined acidity and the smooth tannins. A touch of black chocolate on the backbone provides both complexity and variation.
English pairs.new: 马里斯·德阿尔斯梅 2018 年红酒带来了一种独特的芝麻油香气和我常常在超级托斯卡纳的波尔多混合中发现的典型成熟度。入口丰富醇厚，之后是流畅的酸度和细腻的橡木味。酒中有一丝黑巧克力味，给酒带来复杂性和变化。

Western reviews.review: Erfreulich kühl im Ausdruck, mit Kieselsteinen und Sommerregen im Duft, dazu Tabak, dunkle Frucht; dichter Gaumen, markante Tanninstruktur, zeigt Leben und Rasse, das warme Jahr sehr gut interpretiert. Jetzt bis 2045
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感是非常舒适的，气味中有石子和夏季雨水的味道，伴随着烟草和黑色水果的香气。口感丰富，具有明显的坚果结构，展现出生动的生命力和品质，很好地体现了温暖的年份。该酒的品质将持续到2045年。

Western reviews.review: Voluptuous, silky, fresh, concentrated, full-bodied, rich and packed with layers of perfectly ripe, sweet, silky textured, red and black fruits. The weight, depth of flavor, complexity, length and opulent finish is just great. This has a long future with at least 2-3 decades of positive evolution ahead. The wine blends 55% Cabernet Sauvignon, 35% Merlot, 5% Petit Verdot and 5% Cabernet Franc.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感丰富、滑顺、清新、浓郁、富有层次的果味，呈现出完美成熟的甜美果实。酒体丰厚，味道深邃，复杂性十足，余味悠长。这种酒有着长期的前景，至少有2-3个十年的积累期。酒中混合了55%卡波内尔·沙夫诺、35%梅洛、5%佩蒂·维多和5%卡波内尔·法兰克。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby, purple reflections, faint brightening on the rim. Delicate noble wood savouriness, dark berries, a hint of liquorice, mineral touch and floral aromas in the background. Juicy palate with good complexity, freshly structured, red cherry fruit, well-integrated tannins with good length and discreet fruit sweetness on the finish. Certain ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，紫色反射，酒杯边缘微微发亮。细腻的贵族木香，黑莓，薄荷糖味，矿物质触感和花香在背景中。口感丰富，结构良好，新鲜的红樱桃果味，好地整合的苦味，长而不显眼的果味甜度。有明显的陈化潜力。

Chinese pairs.original: 1989年份的成熟度让人颇有好感，相信每个遇见它的朋友，都能够感受到它迷人的微笑以及富有安全感的肩膀。烤核桃、烤榛子的烘焙芬芳相对浓郁，但并不会掩盖樱桃、杨梅以及血橙的果香表达。牛肉干的醇熟感以及草果的辛香气息在收尾处螺旋上升，层次丰富而又细节满满，让我在一款陈年35载的葡萄酒身上看到了阳光大男孩的形象。如果你想在80年代感受到Chateau Giscours 最为热情的一面，毫无疑问，就是1989年份。
Chinese pairs.new: 1989年份的葡萄酒令人印象深刻，带给每个品尝者温暖的微笑和安全感。烤核桃和烤榛子的香气浓郁，但樱桃、杨梅和血橙的果香依然清晰可辨。牛肉干的醇熟感和草果的辛香气息在尾部呈现出复杂的层次，细节丰富。品尝这瓶35岁的葡萄酒，令人想起阳光大男孩的形象。如果你想体验80年代Chateau Giscours最为热情的一面，那么1989年份的葡萄酒绝对是最佳选择。

English pairs.original: The 1989 vintage’s maturity is genuinely appealing. I believe that anyone who encounters this wine will instantly feel its charming smile and a reassuring strength. The rich, roasted aromas of walnuts and hazelnuts don’t dominated the vibrant fruity notes of cherry, bayberry, and blood orange. The mature, savory character of beef jerky and the spicy notes of Sichuan pepper climb in a spiral towards the finish, adding layers of richness and intricate details. I can see the image of a sunny boy in this 35 years old wine, if you’re looking to experience the warmest embrace of Chateau Giscours from the 1980s, the 1989 vintage is, unquestionably, the best choice.
English pairs.new: 1989年的酒龄已经达到成熟，令人深感满意。每个人一旦品尝到这瓶酒，就会立即感受到它的亲切笑容和令人放心的力量。杏仁和花生酱的浓郁、烤味气息并未压倒鲜果的活力，如樱桃、海棠和血橙。牛肉干的成熟、咸味和四川椒的辣味在酒尾呈螺旋状上升，增加了酒的丰富和复杂性。通过品尝这瓶35岁的酒，我能清晰地看到一个阳光灿烂的男孩的形象。如果你想体验到1980年代的Chateau Giscours的温暖拥抱，那么1989年的酒龄无疑是最佳选择。

Western reviews.review: Light crimson and tea in color, the wine offers earth, tobacco, cassis, barnyard and cherry flavors. With a short, red fruit finish, this is beginning to dry out. Consumers should drink this sooner than later.
Western reviews.translation: 酒色为浅红色，类似茶色。酒中带有泥土、烟草、黑加仑、马厩和樱桃的味道。酒尾短暂，带有红果味，酒正在逐渐干燥。建议尽早饮用。

Western reviews.review: The color is a deep, dark, ruby-red. The nose is an intense combination of red-plum & raisin fruit. Initially the palate shows notes of tobacco-leaf & raisins overlaying delicate red-fruits. acidity is good & fresh. The structure has a medium weight with a pleasant depth of fruit. Alcohol is balanced & the finish lasts reasonably well. 11/93 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色的，类似于红宝石。酒香中充满了红枣和葡萄干的果香。口感上，初期有烟草叶和葡萄干的味道，覆盖着细腻的红果味。酸度清新，结构中等，果味丰富。酒精平衡，尾部持久。评分：11/93。

Chinese pairs.original: 香气强烈而集中，带有饼干风味，酵母风味，花香，鲜明的辛香风味，果酱型香气，麝香与面包屑气味。口感浑厚强劲，值得回味。
Chinese pairs.new: Intense and concentrated aromas with notes of biscuit, yeast, floral hints, bright spice, jammy fruit, and subtle musk and brioche undertones. Full-bodied and rich, with a lingering finish.

Western reviews.review: Rich rather than sweet, this is stuffed full of botrytis. The wine is powered through with this dusty texture, rolling richly but catching the dried fruit character
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感丰富而非甜腻，充满了霉菌感。酒体中充满了细微的粉尘感，滚动流畅但又带有干果的特征。

Western reviews.review: Tasted single blind against its peers. The Chateau Rieussec 2008 should become an excellent Sauternes for the vintage. It has a floral bouquet with peach, tinned apricot and a touch of marmalade, all with fine delineation, and touches of lemon curd developing with aeration. The palate is mellifluous on the entry, with great depth and a luscious, vanillary note with hints of orange peel, marmalade and quince towards the long finish. Excellent. Tasted January 2012.
Western reviews.translation: 在与同类酒进行单盲品尝后，2008年沙托酒莊的里厄塞克酒应该成为该年产的优秀沙托酒。酒中有花香的气味，带有桃子、罐装杏仁和一丝橙子酱的味道，所有这些都有细致的分辨率，并在通风后发展出柠檬酱的味道。酒口入口丰富，具有深度和浓郁的香气，带有橙子皮、橙子酱和枇杷的味道，长尾结束。非常出色。品尝时间：2012年1月。

Western reviews.review: This cuts a broad swath, with dense fig, piecrust, green almond and golden raisin notes held together by ginger cream and tarte Tatin notes. The long, creamy finish lets a coconut milk hint check in. One for the cellar. Best from 2014 through 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的风格广泛，具有浓郁的枣子、饼皮、绿杏仁和金枣的味道，均由姜奶油和塔丁蛋糕的味道所连接。长而丰富的尾部让椰奶的味道悄然出现。建议将其存放于酒窖中。最佳饮用时间为2014年至2025年。

Chinese pairs.original: 2017年份的咖啡和黑巧克力香气特别突出，而相比之下果香的强度则显得比较平和。入口的酸度非常高，带着粉末状的单宁在口中延展。酒庄在2017年受到了一部分霜冻的影响，但从最后的结果来看，我认为酿酒师Axelle处理的十分得当。
Chinese pairs.new: 2017年的这款红酒特别突出了咖啡和黑巧克力风味，而与此相比，果香的强度则相对平和。入口时酸度非常高，口感中带有粉末状的单宁。尽管2017年酒庄受到部分霜冻的影响，但酿酒师Axelle的处理却让这款红酒呈现出出色的口感。

English pairs.original: Croix de Labrie 2017 mainly features coffee and black chocolate aromas, with hints of familiar ripe berries. The acidity is pretty high on the entry of the palate, with powder tannins from head to toes. Even if this winery suffered spring frost in this vintage, the winemaker Axelle still handled the character of this wine very well.
English pairs.new: 克罗伊德拉布里 2017主要表现出咖啡和黑巧克力香气，伴有熟透的浆果的熟悉气息。口感入口时酸度较高，口感上全身都有粉末状的橡果感。尽管这家酒庄在这个产季遭遇了春季霜冻，但酒师阿塞尔仍然很好地处理了这瓶酒的性格。

Western reviews.review: Youthful as you would expect, the wine is on the fresh, bright, red fruit side with soft, polished tannins and a nice sweetness to the fruits. The oak is close to fully integrated, allowing you to savor all the sweet, ripe, red pit fruits and berries. Still, this is quite primary, so give it at least 5 years of cellaring before popping a bottle.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的风格年轻活泼，果味清新鲜艳，口感柔软细腻，果实甜美。橡木味已经融入其中，能够让您品尝到丰富的甜美红果和浓郁的浆果。虽然这款红酒还比较初级，但仍需要至少5年陈酿后才能打开瓶子。

Western reviews.review: Tiefdunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung, feine schwarze Beerenfrucht, zart nach Lakritze, frische Pflaumen und Orangenzesten. Saftig, elegant, feine Säurestruktur, reife Herzkirschen, integrierte, reife Tannine, mineralischer Nachhall, ausgewogen, extraktsüß im Finale, gute Länge.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，微微的边缘光泽，细微的黑色浆果味，淡淡的薄荷糖味，新鲜的石榴和橙子皮。口感丰富，优雅，细微的酸度结构，成熟的樱桃味，完美融合的成熟的坚果味，矿物质余味，平衡，果汁甜的尾部，长长的尾部。

Western reviews.review: (Bordeaux Blend): Dichtes Rubin, Violettreflexe. Sehr offene Nase, wunderbare Brombeerfrucht, tief, rauchig, viele florale Noten, sehr komplex. Im Auftakt seidenweich, sehr vollmundig mit kräftigem, fein gewobenen Tannin, sehr gute Qualität, rote und dunkle Beeren geben sich die Hand, die Säure ist perfekt eingebunden, im Abgang von sehr guter Länge, endet dezent auf Lakritze. Kraftvoll mit Druck und viel Finesse. 2022-2035, 18.5 vvPunkte (93/100)
Western reviews.translation: 波尔多混合葡萄酒：深红色，紫色反光。非常开放的鼻子，奇妙的蓝莓果味，深沉，烟熏味，多种花香，非常复杂。起始时细腻，非常丰富，具有强劲的、细致的橡皮味，非常高品质，红色和黑色浆果相互融合，酸度完美结合，尾部非常持久，淡淡的 licorice味。强劲而有力，具有细腻的质感。2022-2035，18.5分（93/100）。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有黑樱桃，黑醋栗，异国风情的亚洲香料味。酒体丰满，单宁丰沛，具有明显酸度，余韵悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts flavors of black cherry, black prune, and exotic Asian spices. It has a full-bodied texture, robust tannins, and a noticeable acidity, with a long-lasting finish.

Western reviews.review: Mushroom, truffle, cedar wood, forest floor and spicy cassis are found in the nose. Full bodied, fresh, crisp and tannic, with a stern, masculine edge to its character, the wine demands at least another decade before it is fun to drink. The wine was produced from a blend of 43% Merlot, 43% Cabernet Sauvignon, 12% Cabernet Franc and 2% Petit Verdot. 91 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中包含了蘑菇、松露、松木、森林地面和辣柠檬的味道。酒体丰富、清新、清脆、有嚼头，具有坚硬、男性化的性格，需要至少再过十年才能真正享受。该酒由43%梅洛、43%卡波弗雷蒙、12%卡波弗朗和2%佩蒂弗多特的混合酿造而成。评分：91分。

Western reviews.review: Tiefdunkles Rubingranat, violette Ränder, in der Nase angenehme Gewürzanklänge, Nougat, florale Nuancen. Am Gaumen stoffig und komplex, elegante, seidige Tannine, lebendige, frisch strukturierte Säure, bleibt lange haften. Finessenreich und bereits gut antrinkbar. - BEST BUY
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，边缘有紫色光泽。酒鼻中有舒适的香料味道，杏仁味和花朵的细微差别。口感丰富复杂，细腻的橡皮味，生动的清新酸度，持久的余味。精致细腻，已经可以享用。 - 强烈推荐。

Western reviews.review: Deep, ruby-red color is very nearly opaque. Dark fruit on the nose is overlaid with earthy aromas. Earthy notes again compliment intense black-cherry fruit on the palate, The fruit is supple & juicy with nice acidity & a dusty tannic structure. The plentiful tannins dry out the mid-palate. Alcohol is balance & the firm, fine tannins last well. This is a high-quality, classically-styled wine as is typical of wines from this property. 11/09 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深红色的酒液几乎透明。酒鼻中有浓郁的黑果味，伴有泥土的气息。口感中，泥土的味道再次与黑樱桃的果味相互呼应。酒液丰富、果香浓郁，酸度适宜，口感干净。酒中的丰富的纤维使中口干涩。酒精平衡，坚实的细致纤维持久。这种酒的品质高，风格典雅，符合该产区的典范。评分：11/09 DCAMW。

Western reviews.review: What a great wine! Raw elegance, superbly balanced, chocolate, brambles, cherry, it’s that I know this is 50/50 Cabsav/Merlot and it shows, so complex and suave. Endless finesse and gorgeousness! Superb
Western reviews.translation: 这个红酒太棒了！简洁优雅，完美平衡，巧克力、荆棘、樱桃，知道这是50/50的卡波萨维尼/梅洛，表现得非常出色，复杂而优雅。无穷尽的细腻和美感！非常出色。

Chinese pairs.original: 2014年份的Clerc Milon是“经典波尔多“的教科书，值得波尔多爱好者重点关注。它不仅果香轻快灵动、在复杂度方面也与“大年份”奇虎相当。除了松柏精油的清凉感之外，收尾时还泛着一股酷似Saint-Emilion的“咸感”（部分葡萄田地下有石灰岩），这在Clerc Milon的品鉴历史中实属罕见。此外，这股“咸感”还能和丝滑的单宁彼此交融，营造出更为细密的层次感，这是Clerc Milion能够在2014年份脱颖而出的关键所在。
Chinese pairs.new: 2014年的Clerc Milon是波尔多的经典范本，值得波尔多爱好者关注。它不仅有着轻快灵动的果香，在复杂度方面也与大年份奇虎相当。除了松柏精油的清凉感外，收尾时还带有酷似圣埃米利昂的咸感，这在Clerc Milon的品鉴历史中是罕见的。此外，这股咸感还能和丝滑的单宁融合，营造出更为细密的层次感，这是Clerc Milon能够在2014年脱颖而出的关键所在。

English pairs.original: The 2014 vintage of Clerc Milon exemplified the “Classic Bordeaux”, which deserves the most attention from Bordeaux lovers. Its fruitiness is so vivid yet has a similar complexity as the other Big Vintages. In addition to the freshness of essential pine oil, it finishes with a “saltiness” like that of Saint-Emilion (limestone can be found in some parcels), which is rare in my tasting experience of Clerc Milon. Besides, this “saltiness” is also subtly intertwined with the silky tannins, creating a sense of fine layer, which is what makes Clerc Milion stand out in the 2014 vintage.
English pairs.new: 2014年克莱尔米隆（Clerc Milon）红酒典型代表了“经典波尔多”（Classic Bordeaux），值得所有波尔多爱好者关注。其果香丰富而又复杂，类似于其他大年份的波尔多红酒。除了有新鲜的松油香气外，酒尾还带有圣埃米利昂（Saint-Emilion）般的“咸味”（saltiness），这是我品尝克莱尔米隆的经历中极为罕见的。这种“咸味”与细滑的纤维素（tannins）巧妙地融合在一起，形成了细致的层次感，这正是克莱尔米隆在2014年份中脱颖而出的原因。

Western reviews.review: This property continues its upward trend. It is a solid wine, packed with great ripe fruit. Old vines give extra concentration and depth of flavor. The wine has great potential, with both its tannins and rich fruit playing strongly. Drink from 2023.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的品质继续上升。它是一款充满成熟果实的坚实红酒，老藤的存在使得酒液更加浓郁，口感更加深厚。酒中既有强烈的苦味，也有丰富的果实味道，展现出极大的潜力。建议从2023年开始饮用。

Western reviews.review: Extremely floral and fresh with currants, light chocolate and orange peel. Red clay, too. Full-bodied, firm, silky and long with a flavorful finish. Salty undertone. Stones. Really serious. Better in 2021.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感极其鲜花般的花香，带有黑葡萄、轻微的巧克力和橙皮的味道。还有一种红土的味道。口感丰富、坚实、滑顺，长长的尾韵，带有咸味的底调。还有石头的味道。非常严肃。建议在2021年后再喝。

Western reviews.review: The 2014 Cantenac Brown has a backward nose at first, a mixture of red and black fruit, cedar and tobacco, an attractive pastille-like scent emerging with time. The palate is medium-bodied with a little more extraction than its peers. It feels fleshy and pure, notes of raspberry coulis, confit fruit, orange rind and tobacco towards the well-structured, delicately spiced finish. It makes you want to come back for another sip—always a good sign! A bottle tasted six months later in February 2017 demonstrated a little more cohesion and finesse, suggesting that this Margaux will meliorate with bottle age. One to watch out for.
Western reviews.translation: 2014 年的卡腾纳布朗（Cantenac Brown）在初期闻起来有些保留，混合着红色和黑色水果、雪松和烟草的香味，随着时间的推移，会出现一种吸引人的糖果味（pastille-like scent）。口感中等，略微比同辈更有提取力。它感觉丰富纯粹，口味中有红莓酱、果酱、橙皮和烟草的味道，口感结构良好，细腻的调味。它让你想要再次品尝——这是一个很好的迹象！在2017年2月进行的六个月后再次品尝的瓶子表明，这个马尔格勒（Margaux）会随着瓶装年龄的增长而变得更加和谐和精致。值得关注！

Western reviews.review: This is defined by a large, rounded core of enticing cassis, cherry preserves and plum compote, while light anise and briar notes hang in the background. Offers an ample spine for balance, but this feels like it may be approachable sooner because of that ball of fruit. Best from 2018 through 2028.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的特点是由一大块诱人的黑加仑、樱桃果酱和浓稠的浆果酱组成，背景中轻微的 licorice 和荆棘香气。它提供了足够的支撑来保持平衡，但由于果肉的丰富性，这可能会更早地变得可及。建议在2018年至2028年期间饮用。

Western reviews.review: For decades, Château Clerc Milon has been one of my favorite Pauillacs. I have enjoyed its balance between the Old and New Worlds—never over-the-top in being too international and always showing its Pauillac roots. This vintage shows bright red and black fruit, a touch of sweet oak, and a little bit of dust. (Tasted: January 27, 2017, San Francisco, CA)
Western reviews.translation: 几十年来，克莱尔米隆酒庄一直是我的最爱之一。它完美地平衡了古典和现代风格，从不过于国际化，始终展现出其巴约讷特有的风格。这瓶酒呈现出明亮的红黑色果味，带有甜橡木的味道和微微的尘土味。

MAISON LOUIS JADOT Clos Vougeot Grand Cr.name: MAISON LOUIS JADOT Clos Vougeot Grand Cru 2004

Chinese pairs.original: 果香浓郁，带有新橡木桶，香料的气息，天鹅绒般的单宁，酒体中等，余味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich fruit aromas, with notes of new oak barrels and spices, silky tannins, medium-bodied with a long finish.

Western reviews.review: A real blockbuster, with dark tannins and a firm, tough structure. Only right at the end does tasty, ripe fruit show up, but even this is heavy and brooding. If you want power in a Pinot, look no further.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶真正的重磅级红酒，具有深色的苦味和坚硬的结构。只有在最后一刻，才会出现一些甜美的成熟果味，但即使如此，这也还是很沉重和阴郁。如果你想要在品诺（Pinot）中体验到力量，那么就别再等了。

2023 Chateau Les Carmes Haut-Brion 'Le C.name: 2023 Chateau Les Carmes Haut-Brion 'Le C des Carmes'

Chinese pairs.original: 我认为没有几款酒能够像Le C des Carmes Haut-Brion 这样，能够把三倍浓缩的浆果用鲜果汁般的方式表达了出来，品的人大呼过瘾。清甜的入口在口中转了个圈儿，而后化作奇特的咸感。和之前的年份相比，2023年份的口感更加完整，也更加地道，在保持能量感和鲜甜感的同时，更具传统波尔多气度。之前天马行空的大男孩开始逐渐成熟了…
Chinese pairs.new: I think there are few wines that can express concentrated fruit in a juice-like way like Le C des Carmes Haut-Brion, leaving the drinker utterly satisfied. The crisp entry circles the mouth before transforming into a unique saltiness. Compared to previous vintages, the 2023 vintage has a more complete and authentic taste, maintaining energy and freshness while exuding traditional Bordeaux elegance. The previously wild and carefree young man is slowly maturing...

English pairs.original: There are few wines that capture the taste of triple-concentrated berries in a fresh juice-like manner as Le C des Carmes Haut-Brion does. Every sip is an exhilarating experience, with a sweet entry that transforms into a distinctive saltiness. The 2023 edition is even better than previous vintages, with a more complete and authentic palate that embodies traditional Bordeaux character while maintaining a sense of energy and freshness. The previously whimsical young wine is gradually maturing…
English pairs.new: 这款红酒以其浓郁的浆果味道和清新的口感，堪称佳品。每口都是一种令人振奋的体验，入口甜润，随即转变为独特的咸味。2023年版的口感更加完美，更加真实地体现了传统波尔多风格，同时保持着活力和新鲜感。之前的年份版本虽然年轻轻松，但逐渐成熟的味道更加深刻。

Western reviews.review: Klar und rein wie ein Bergbach, Cassis- und Kirschfrucht, stei nige Kräuter, Tee; seidenweicher Gaumen, mittlerer Körper, der Wein hat mehr Tannin als 2022, doch die Gerbstoffe sind reif, fein mit der Frucht verwoben, die Säure verleiht viel Frische, knackig, mit Dynamik, Energie, Frische und salinem Abgang.
Western reviews.translation:
这段红酒评论的中文翻译如下：

清澈透明如山泉水，带有黑currant和黑berry的果香，伴有少量草药和茶叶的味道，口感细腻，体积中等，酒中含有较多的苦味物质，但这些苦味物质已经成熟，融合在果香中，酸度给酒带来了清新、生动、有活力和咸淡的尾韵。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有摩卡咖啡和烤烟草香气，随之而来的是黑莓，李子和黑醋栗的气味，有天鹅绒般的单宁，带有木材，烟熏回味。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts aromas of mocha coffee and smoky tobacco, followed by notes of blackberry, plum, and black currant. It has a silky texture with velvety tannins, featuring hints of wood and a smoky finish.

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark, virtually opaque ruby-red color. The nos consists of vivid cassis aromas. On the palate the fresh blackcurrant flavours are pure, but quite one-dimensional. The mid-weight structure has some grip & adds a little bitterness to the finish has good length. 11/14 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，几乎透明的红酒颜色。酒香中充满了浓郁的黑加仑果香。口感上，新鲜的黑加仑果味清澈，但略显单调。中等重量的结构带有些许抓握感，并在尾部添加了一点苦味，口感持久。评分：11/14

Chinese pairs.original: 黑莓，矿物和烤橡木的香气，酒体饱满，非常甜美，单宁紧致细腻，结构平衡，回味较长。
Chinese pairs.new: Blackberry, mineral, and toasted oak aromas, full-bodied with a rich sweetness, tight and smooth tannins, balanced structure, and a long finish.

Western reviews.review: Blackberry, mineral and lightly toasted oak. Subtle and complex. Full-bodied, with wonderfully sweet fruit character and ultrarefined tannins. Goes on and on. Gorgeous and seductive. Best after 2009. 5,055 cases made.
Western reviews.translation: 黑莓、矿物质和轻微的-toast橡木。细腻而复杂。体积丰富，具有美妙的甜果实特征和极细致的纤维。持续不断。美丽而诱人。建议在2009年后饮用。生产了5055瓶。

Western reviews.review: There have been more complete Cheval Blancs than this, but this 2003 does have power. Huge fruit, huge solid tannins, concentration - maybe some charm would create a better wine. 92-94
Western reviews.translation: 这个2003年的Cheval Blanc虽然没有完全达到完美，但它确实有着强大的力量。丰富的果味和坚实的苦味，浓缩的口感——如果有更多的魅力，可能会创造出更好的酒。评分：92-94。

Chinese pairs.original: 虽然2022年份的天气超级热，但Chateau Latour-Martillac 2022的酸度依然很在线。果香并不算特别复杂，和该年份很多主打成熟核果的白葡萄酒相比，这款酒明显更为清秀: 青柚、梨花、盐花和番石榴的芬芳宛如一曲典雅的交响乐。即便赛美蓉的比例高达48%，也始终保持清爽感，是2022年份罕见的高品质白葡萄酒。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2022 vintage was scorching hot, but Chateau Latour-Martillac 2022 still packs a punch with its crisp acidity. The fruit aromas are not overly complex, but in a year where many top wines are showcasing mature stone fruits, this wine stands out for its elegance: notes of grapefruit, pear blossom, salt flower and passionfruit blend together in a refined symphony. Even with a high 48% Sauvignon Blanc proportion, it remains refreshing, a rare high-quality white wine in the 2022 vintage.

English pairs.original: Despite the scorching hot weather of the 2022 vintage, Chateau Latour-Martillac 2022 maintains its acidity impeccably. While the fruit aroma may not be overly complex, it exudes an understated elegance: the fragrance of green grapefruit, pear blossom, sea salt, and pomegranate blend seamlessly, creating a refined symphony that distinguishes it from many of its counterparts heavily featuring mature stone fruit. With a high percentage of Semillon (48%), the wine remains refreshingly light, making it a rare and exceptional white wine of the 2022 vintage.
English pairs.new: 尽管2022年产季的酷热天气，拉图尔-马蒂亚克庄园2022年红酒仍然保持了出色的酸度。虽然果香可能不够复杂，但它却展现出一种低调的优雅：青柠黄柑的香气、梨花的芬芳、海盐和石榴的混合，完美地融合在一起，形成了一种优雅的交响乐，远远超过了那些以成熟的石榴石果为特征的许多同类酒。由于白葡萄酒中高达48%的塞缪兰的比例，这款酒保持了清新轻盈的口感，使其成为2022年产季罕见而出色的白葡萄酒。

Western reviews.review: 93-95 Barrel sample. The wine is ripe, a product of the hot, dry year. But it still manages to retain a fresh, spicy character that will develop as the wood aging moves forward.
Western reviews.translation: 酒评：93-95分。酒精度高，产自炎热干燥的一年。但是，酒仍然保留了清新、有辣味的特性，这将随着木桶陈化的进展而发展。

Western reviews.review: 93-95 Barrel sample. The wine is ripe, a product of the hot, dry year. But it still manages to retain a fresh, spicy character that will develop as the wood aging moves forward.
Western reviews.translation: 酒评：93-95分。酒精度高，产自炎热干燥的一年。但是，酒仍然保留了清新、辣味的特性，这将随着木桶陈化的进展而发展。

Western reviews.review: Deeply colored, initially you notice, dried roses, blackberries, black cherries, cocoa, pepper, and 5 spice on the nose. On the palate, the medium-bodied wine is packed with layers of creamy, elegant, ripe, dark, red fruits with hints of pepper and even some cocoa that comes in at the end of the long, plummy finish. This should age quite nice well, yet be approachable young. The wine blends 50% Cabernet Sauvignon, 42% Merlot and 8% Petit Verdot. 14.5% ABV, pH 3.73. Harvesting took place September 6 - September 28. Drink from 2026-2042. 93-95 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色深红，初次闻到时，会有干玫瑰、黑莓、黑草莓、可可、胡椒和五香的气味。口感中，这瓶中等体积的红酒充满了丰富的、优雅的、成熟的、深红色的水果味道，伴有胡椒和可可的余味，长而浓郁的口感。这种红酒应该会在时间的推移中变得更加完美，但同时也可以在年轻时就享用。这种红酒的混合比例为50%卡波雷尔葡萄酒、42%梅洛葡萄酒和8%佩蒂·维多葡萄酒。酒精含量为14.5%，pH值为3.73。采摘时间为9月6日至9月28日。建议在2026年至2042年之间饮用。评分93-95分。

Western reviews.review: Deeply colored, initially you notice, dried roses, blackberries, black cherries, cocoa, pepper, and 5 spice on the nose. On the palate, the medium-bodied wine is packed with layers of creamy, elegant, ripe, dark, red fruits with hints of pepper and even some cocoa that comes in at the end of the long, plummy finish. This should age quite nice well, yet be approachable young. The wine blends 50% Cabernet Sauvignon, 42% Merlot and 8% Petit Verdot. 14.5% ABV, pH 3.73. Harvesting took place September 6 - September 28. Drink from 2026-2042. 93-95 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 深色红酒，初次闻到，带有干玫瑰、黑莓、黑草莓、可可、胡椒和五香的气味。口感中等，酒体丰富，层次分明，带有奶油般的、优雅的、成熟的、黑色的红果味，伴有胡椒和可可的余味，长而浓郁的口感。酒龄较长，初期也容易入口。酒中混合了50%卡波雷尔葡萄酒、42%梅洛葡萄酒和8%小皮诺葡萄酒。酒精含量14.5%，pH值3.73。采摘时间为9月6日至9月28日。建议饮用时间为2026-2042年。评分93-95分。

Western reviews.review: Kräuter, Tabak, Tee und Rauch, dahinter eine dunkle Frucht, Süssholzwürze. Im Gaumen schlank im Auftakt, breitet sich dann aus, die Frucht ist knackig, die Tannien sind hochwertig, ungemein harmonisch und mit viel Finesse hallt der Wein im Abgang lange nach. Sehr elegant! 2030-2055 (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / Syndicat Viticole de Pessac-Léognan / Château La Garde ) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation: 香草、烟草、茶和烟雾的味道，后面是深色的果味和甜木糖。口感在入口时细长，然后扩散，果味清脆，苦味高品质，非常和谐，酒尾留有细腻的余味。非常优雅！推荐储存时间：2030-2055 (2023年4月在Pessac-Léognan的Château La Garde进行了初次品尝 / Pessac-Léognan酒庄协会 )

Chinese pairs.original: 高贵的束的黑醋栗，雪松，香料盒，甘草和一点松露的香气。酒体适中，香甜的水果味和丰富的单宁，长长的回味。
Chinese pairs.new: Elegant notes of blackberry, cedar, spice box, licorice, and a hint of truffle. Medium-bodied with sweet fruit flavors and rich tannins, leading to a long finish.

Western reviews.review: Medium-bodied, elegant, soft, round and polished, you find espresso, vanilla, smoke, licorice and ripe, sweet cherries on the nose and palate. The finish leaves with you ripe, fresh, lush red fruits wrapped in coffee beans. Drink it now, or age it a few more years, either way, it is quite nice.
Western reviews.translation: 口感中等，优雅，柔和，圆润，光滑。鼻子和口腔中你可以发现浓缩咖啡、香草、烟雾、甘草和成熟甜樱桃的味道。余味中你会留下成熟新鲜丰富的红果，裹在咖啡豆中。无论是现在品尝还是再过几年储存，都会非常美味。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark, opaque ruby-red. Aromas are initially quite leafy with vibrant cassis fruit behind. The palate has a lovely freshness which lifts clean, sharp blackcurrant fruit. A fine tannic structure is quite drying & this dominates the mid-palate. Alcohol is balanced & length is good. Quite classically-styled for Cos yet retaining the estate's usual richness & polish. 11/05 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的红色葡萄酒，几乎透不见光。初次闻香时，带有浓郁的叶子味和鲜艳的黑加仑果香。口感清新活泼，清晰的黑加仑果味让人印象深刻。酒中有着细致的纤维结构，干爽的味道占据了中口。酒精平衡，持久性良好。这种风格的葡萄酒典型地代表了科斯庄园的风格，但仍保留了庄园的典雅和光泽。评分：11/05 DCAMW。

Western reviews.review:
Cherry purple red, looks like a 10 year old wine whilst its 20 years! Burgundy, pinot nose, complex, greenish, cherries, strawberries.
Sublimely charming, really pleasing, only really great wines can have this subtlety, liquid velvet.
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的颜色是樱桃紫红色，外观像20岁的酒一样，但实际上只有10岁。它的香气像勃艮第地区的品种，复杂，带有青草和樱桃、草莓的味道。

这瓶红酒非常迷人，非常令人愉快，只有真正出色的酒才能拥有这种细微的味道，液体软绵绵的。

Chinese pairs.original: 酸樱桃，黑醋栗，甘草，烟雾和矿物质的香气，酒体适中，平衡新鲜的口感，单宁紧致柔滑，悠长的回味。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of tart cherry, black fig, licorice, smoke, and minerals. Medium-bodied, with a balanced fresh taste, firm yet smooth tannins, and a long finish.

Western reviews.review: Medium to deep ruby-red, but not quite opaque. Aromas are of rich, over-mature, dried-fruits with figs & sultana notes. The palate is beautifully together. Initially there is good grip, then it becomes smooth. Good acidity lifts clean fruit from among smooth cocoa-butter notes to give a fresh finish. There is plentiful oak & the lovely fine tannic structure lasts well. 11/05 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深红色，透明度适中。

香气：浓郁的干果味，带有干枣、浆果和葡萄干的气息。

口感：口感完美融合。初期有较好的抓握感，随后变得平滑。清新的酸度使得果味和巧克力般的奶油感相互融合，给人以清新果香的尾韵。酒中有丰富的橡木味，细致的纤维结构持久耐久。评分：11/05 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 这支酒多少有些奢华、深厚的香气透出春花、黑色水果、香草、香料、糖渍姜和黑巧克力味。张力十足的新鲜、干净而且细腻中段口感富有生姜酸度和非常顺滑的单宁。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine has a luxurious, full-bodied aroma that reveals notes of spring flowers, black fruits, herbs, spices, candied ginger, and dark chocolate. The palate is bursting with fresh, clean, and refined texture, boasting a lively ginger acidity and very smooth tannins.

English pairs.original: Somewhat lush and profound on the nose of spring flowers, black fruits, vanilla, spices, candied ginger and black chocolate. Fresh, clean and delicate on the tense mid-palate with mouth-watering acid and very smooth tannins.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的香气中带有春花的芬芳、黑果、香草、香料、糖浇的姜和黑巧克力等元素。口感清新、干净、细腻，中口紧张，带有令人垂涎的酸度和非常光滑的纹理。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby garnet, purple reflections, delicate rim brightening. Delicate toffee, roasted aromas, some caramel and liquorice, ripe plums in the background, attractive bouquet. Juicy, ripe cherries, fresh acidity, silky tannins, sweet finish, red berry touch on the finish, delicate wood savouriness on the finish, still needs some time, has charm and length. (2025-2050).
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红宝石色，带有紫色光泽，酒液边缘微微发亮。酒香中有轻微的糖浆味、烤糖味、焦糖味和 licorice味，背景中有熟透的石榴味。酒的香气很吸引人。口感丰富，果味浓郁，酸度清新，纤维素滑顺，余味甜美，余味中有红果味和木头的香气，酒仍需要一些时间来成熟，但它有很好的品质和长度。推荐储存时间：2025-2050年。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, dezente Randaufhellung feine Röstaromen, ein Hauch von Zedernholz, mineralischer Touch, feine Kirschenfrucht, sehr attraktives Bukett, feines Karamell im Hintergrund. Saftige, feine Kirschenfrucht, gut integrierte Tannine, finessenreicher Säurebogen, mineralisch und anhaltend, seidiger, typischer Stil, gutes Entwicklungspotenzial.
Western reviews.translation:
深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。酒中有细微的红色木果味，微微的松木味，矿物质味，细微的樱桃味。酒香非常吸引人，后面有细微的糖浆味。

口感丰富，细微的樱桃味，很好的天然苦味，细微的酸度，矿物质味和持久感，细微的滑感，典型的风格，发展潜力很好。

Western reviews.review: Medium to deep, ruby-red color. Lovely, lifted, perfumed aromas are augmented by toasty-oak high-notes. The palate has very fresh, vivid blackcurrant fruit that is lifted by lovely acidity. There are toasty oak flavors. Alcohol is quite restrained, ensuring the wine is nicely balanced and the finish lasts very well. The wine combines concentration with freshness and balance, it is a very smart wine! 11/14 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色，酒香清新、芬芳，带有 Toasty-oak 的高调香气。口感清新、果香浓郁，黑currant 的果味清新活泼，酸度适宜。酒中有 Toasty-oak 的风味。酒精含量适中，酒的平衡性很好，酒尾持久。整体来说，这瓶红酒结合了浓郁和清新，平衡性非常好，是一瓶非常聪明的红酒！评分：11/14

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark ruby with an opaque core, brightening at the rim. Closed dark berries, a little tarry, and blackberry. There's a fleshy density on the palate, and tannins with good-natured, stemmy undertones. It is restrained in acidity yet has enough juiciness behind the striking structure. A ripe, full Boyd with hefty alcohol, that is rich in ageing potential, and, this year, more on the side of density and power than elegance.
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的红酒色，暗红色，中间有透明的核心，边缘略微明亮。口感中有闭合的黑berry和黑莓味，略带焦糖味。口感丰富厚实，纤维含量高，带有天然的干酪味。酸度相对较低，但仍有足够的水果味。酒精含量高，酒龄潜力大，今年的风格更倾向于厚实和强劲，而不是优雅。

Western reviews.review: (En Primeur) Neuholzbetonte Nase, dahinter Kräuter, Himbeerconfitüre, getrocknete Blumen, Stroh, sehr gute Komplexität. Sehr straffer Gaumen, ein Konzentrat an Frucht, massiv Gerbstoff, markante Säure, dicht, männlich, strukturiert, spannungsvoll, zeigt viel Würze, ist noch ungestüm, jugendlich, ja fast wild, im Abgang charaktervoll und von ausgezeichneter Länge. Keine einfacher Zeitpunkt aber ein sehr gelungener Boyd Cantenac. 2025-2045+. 18.5 vvPunkte (93/100)
Western reviews.translation: (En Primeur) 新木质味的鼻子，后面是香草、草莓果酱、干花、干草，非常复杂。口感非常紧致，果味浓缩，含有大量的鞣质，明显的酸度，密度高，男性化，结构良好，紧张感强，展现出丰富的香味，仍然充满激情，年轻，几乎是野性的，尾部典雅，持久度极佳。不是一个简单的时刻，但是一款非常成功的波德-卡南（Boyd Cantenac）。推荐储存时间：2025-2045年。评分：18.5分（93/100）。

Chinese pairs.original: 仅从2021年份的芬芳程度来衡量，Chateau Pedesclaux 绝对算得上是Pauillac 产区的翘楚。轻摇酒杯，鸢尾花、玫瑰的芬芳随之绽放，隐约中闪烁着“花房姑娘”的身影。口感清澈如湖水、单宁细腻如胭脂。淡淡的草果和丁香点缀在味蕾上，不但巧妙地增添了回甘的长度，还增加了律动感。这款酒是我心目中2021年份最具灵动感的赤霞珠混酿。
Chinese pairs.new: From the aromatic perspective alone, Chateau Pedesclaux is undoubtedly the crown jewel of Pauillac. A gentle swirl of the glass releases a bouquet of irises and roses, with a subtle hint of "la petite fleur". The palate is crystal clear, with refined tannins that caress the senses. Delicate notes of grass and pepper add a subtle rhythm to the finish, extending the sweetness and adding a sense of movement. This wine is my top pick for the most dynamic Cabernet Sauvignon blend of 2021.

English pairs.original: Judging solely by the fragrance of the 2021 vintage, Chateau Pedesclaux certainly stands out as a leader in the Pauillac. A gentle swirl of the glass releases enchanting aromas of iris and rose, displaying the beautiful silhouette of the ‘Flower Girl’. The palate is as clear as lake water, and the tannins are as fine as powder. Subtle notes of Tsaoko and clove elegantly adorn the taste buds, not only extending the aftertaste but also adding a sense of rhythm. In my eyes, this wine represents the most spirited Cabernet Sauvignon blend in 2021.
English pairs.new: 2021年产的佩德斯克劳酒庄（Chateau Pedesclaux）仅凭借香气就显得与其他波尔多酒庄（Pauillac）相比格外出众。轻轻摇晃酒杯，释放出迷人的花香，展现出“花女孩”的美丽身姿。酒口清澈如湖水，纽维细如粉末。酒中隐约可闻的茶果香和丁香味，优雅地在舌尖上留下余韵，增添了节奏感。在我看来，这酒是2021年最具活力的一款卡波涅（Cabernet Sauvignon）混合酒。

Western reviews.review: Dark cherries, black currants, white pepper and graphite with a touch of dark chocolate and cigar box. I love the suppleness and the mid-palate fruit that give excellent width and flesh to this rather lean vintage. Medium to full body with more flesh than bones. The tannins are fine and sleek, and the finish, creamy and extensive. A commendable effort from this vintage. Shows lots of early appeal but will hold very well in the next five to seven years.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感非常丰富，带有黑樱桃、黑加拿大蓝berries、白胡椒和石墨的味道，伴随着一丝巧克力和雪茄盒的香气。这种酒的柔软度和中口的果味使得它具有极好的宽度和丰富感，尽管它是比较瘦削的年份。酒体中等到中等以上，肌肉比骨头要多。酒中的纤维非常细致，尾部是丰富的和持久的。这种酒的品质值得称赞，展现出很多早期的吸引力，但在未来五到七年内会保持很好的品质。

Western reviews.review: Gorgeous dark pinky purple rim to the glass. Beautifully expressive aromas, red and pink flowers - peonies, rose and violets and intense, chocolatey cola blackcurrant, just the best combination. Concentration and lift on the palate, this is darker and more seductive than the second wine, the perfume and the richness of the fruits with the dark liquorice tones draws you in and plays alongside the bright, light acidity. So you have focus and intensity as well as freshness and approachability. The two are not totally combined yet but such lovely elements going on and such precision on show. This has tension and a balance between refinement and power really led by the Cabernet Sauvignon. The bright cherry hit on the finish lingers too. A lovely set of wines this year - worth seeking out! 3% Petit Verdot completes the blend. 3.71pH. Ageing 60% new oak. 58% grand vin. A yield of 29hL/ha. In official organic conversion since 2019. Barrel Sample: 92
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深紫红色，酒杯边缘有深粉红色光环。酒香非常丰富，带有红色和粉色花朵的气息，如牡丹、玫瑰和百合，混合着浓郁的可可黑currant味道，绝对是完美的组合。口感浓郁又轻盈，这瓶酒比第二瓶更深沉、更诱人，花香和果实的丰富感与黑胡椒的深度味道相互呼应，搭配着清新的酸度。因此，这瓶酒既有焦点和强度，又有新鲜感和亲和力。虽然这两方面还没有完全融合，但酒中有很多美妙的元素和精确的表现。这瓶酒有张力和平衡，既有精致的品质，又有强大的力量，主要是由卡波涅尔·萨旺吉翁带领的。酒尾的亮红果味持续存在。今年的酒品非常出色，值得去寻找！这瓶酒的配方中有3%的佩蒂·维多，pH值为3.71，使用了60%的新橡木桶，58%的酒是精选酒。产量为29hL/ha。自2019年起开始了官方有机转型。酒样评分：92

Western reviews.review: The 2021 Pedésclaux is a strong effort that's turned out well in bottle, offering up aromas of cassis, dark berries, violets and pencil shavings, followed by a medium to full-bodied, fleshy palate with powdery tannins, lively acids and a vibrant core of fruit.
Western reviews.translation: 2021年佩德斯克劳斯（Pedésclaux）是一款出色的红酒，瓶装后表现出色，展现出黑加仑、黑莓、紫罗兰和铅笔削的芳香，口感中等到中厚，肌肉丰满，粉末状的橡皮质，生动的酸度和充满活力的果肉核心。

Western reviews.review: The 2021 Château Pédesclaux is solid, even outstanding, with classic Pauillac notes of graphite and lead pencil supported by beautiful cassis-driven fruit. Medium-bodied, elegant, and balanced, it has fine tannins, reasonable mid-palate depth, and a good finish. Based on 64% Cabernet Sauvignon, 27% Merlot, and the rest Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot, it's well-made, has terrific purity of fruit, and I love its overall balance. It's going to benefit from just a few years of bottle age and should drink nicely for 10-15 years if well stored.
Western reviews.translation: 2021年佩德斯克劳酒庄的红酒非常出色，甚至可以说是杰出的。它带有典型的波尔多风格的矿物质和铅笔味，伴随着优美的黑currant风味。中等体积，优雅，平衡，具有细致的纤维，中口部的深度尚可，尾部也很好。根据64%的卡波涅尔·萨万，27%的梅洛，其他是卡波涅尔·法兰克和佩蒂特·维多，酒庄的制作非常出色，果味纯正，整体平衡也非常好。酒庄建议在瓶子里放置几年后再饮用，若储存得当，酒可以持续10-15年。

Chinese pairs.original: 不知道是由于50%的全新桶，还是因为田里的燧石，Chateau Les Cruzelles 2020 在摇杯时总弥漫着一股烟熏的气息。相比2019年份怒放的紫罗兰，2020年份的花香比较内敛，樱桃桑果、以及丁香桂皮的辛香芬芳更为突出。单宁依旧紧致有力，营造出深邃的结构感，收尾时还带着咸鲜四溢的回甘。从各个角度来衡量都达到了Pomerol 名庄的水准。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau Les Cruzelles 2020 在摇杯时散发着一股烟熏的气息，可能是由于50%的全新桶，或者是来自田地的燧石。相比2019年份的怒放紫罗兰，2020年份的花香更加内敛，樱桃、桑果和丁香桂皮的辛香芬芳更加突出。酒中的单宁依旧紧致有力，营造出深邃的结构感，并带着咸鲜的回甘。从各个角度来看，Chateau Les Cruzelles 2020 都达到了Pomerol 名庄的水准。

English pairs.original: Whether due to the 50% new oak or the flint in the field, Chateau Les Cruzelles 2020 always contains a smoky aroma when swirling the glass. Compared to the vivid violets in 2019, the floral scent in 2020 is more reserved, with more prominent cherry, mulberry and clove flavors. The tannins are still tight and powerful, creating a deep sense of structure, and the finish is still bursting with salty sweetness. In all aspects, it meets the standards of a famous Pomerol estate.
English pairs.new: 2020年夏托莱斯库泽尔的红酒，可能是因为50%的新橡木 barrels 或田间的石英矿物质，总是带有烟熏的香气。与2019年鲜花般的紫罗兰相比，2020年的花香更加低调，更多的樱桃、黑浆果和丁香味。口感仍然紧绷有力，结构深厚，尾部仍然充满了咸甜的味道。从各个方面来看，夏托莱斯库泽尔的品质符合名副其实的波美罗酒庄的标准。

Western reviews.review: Flowers, chocolate, smoke, licorice and plummy nuances are all over the place here. On the palate, the wine is vibrant, silky, fresh, and most importantly, there is a beautiful sense of purity to the red pit fruits in the elegant, supple, chocolately finish. Drink from 2024-2040.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的味道丰富多样，包含了花朵、巧克力、烟熏、 licorice 和浓郁的黑果味。口感上，酒精清新、滑顺、清爽，尤其是黑果的纯粹感在优雅、柔软的巧克力味中体现得淋漓尽致。建议从2024年到2040年饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 与Anne Gros及她的女儿Julia Tollot一起进行桶边试饮。此酒略显含蓄的香气展现微微的花香（花蜜、紫罗兰）以及黑色&红色水果芬芳和香料矿物味。结实的单宁相当丝滑；干净、通透而且富有果味的回味十分优雅。
Chinese pairs.new: Tasting alongside Anne Gros and her daughter Julia Tollot at the barrel. This wine offers subtle aromas of floral notes (honey, lavender) and black and red fruit fragrances, along with mineral spice. The tannins are robust yet silky; the finish is clean, transparent and full of fruit, with great elegance.

English pairs.original: Barrel tasting with Anne Gros and her daughter Julia Tollot. Slightly restrained on nose that showed a tinge of flowers (nectar, violet) lined with black&red fruits and spicy-mineral. Quite silky for the tannin that was somewhat firm; clean, bright and fruited for the end that was refined as well.
English pairs.new: 与安妮·格罗斯（Anne Gros）和她的女儿朱莉娅·托洛特（Julia Tollot）一起品尝了酒桶中的红酒。酒鼻子上略微抑制，展现出花朵的微妙气息（蜜糖、紫罗兰），伴有黑色和红色水果和矿物质的香气。口感非常滑顺，纤维略有坚韧；清晰、明亮、果香的尾部也非常精致。

Western reviews.review: Grossartige Nase, tief, ungemein duftig, komplex und sehr floral, ein Schnüffelwein, man möchte eintauchen. Am Gaumen zugänglich und weich, wie ist das möglich? Eine so präzise, schöne und saftige Frucht, viele knackige Himbeeren, dazu rote Johannisbeeren, gestützt durch perfekt reife Gerbstoffe, seidenweich und fein gewoben, im Abgang von fast nicht enden wollender Länge, endet auf Sauerkirschen und Bergamotte, wow! 19.5 vvPunkte (97/100)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论，翻译成中文如下：

极好的鼻子，深度，异常芬芳，复杂且非常花香，像是在嗅觉中沉浸。口感通畅柔软，令人惊讶。这种如此精确美丽且滋润的果味，多种干酪莓，红莓，完美成熟的鞣酸，丝绸般柔软且精致的缝合，尾部几乎无止境，结束于酸橘和柠檬，wow! 19.5 分（97/100）。

Chinese pairs.original: 醒酒1小时。这款颜色深邃的酒显得异常奢华、滑爽，并且充满了新鲜、甜美的果味。此酒诱人的香气中透出香草、檀木、雪茄盒、咸香、皮革、泥土、新鲜草药、香料、黑樱桃、浓缩咖啡、栀子花和少许的铅笔芯。生机勃勃的口感中富有令人感到兴奋的酸度和无与伦比的平衡感，伴有包裹着颗粒状单宁的美妙树莓风味及一抹“画龙点睛”的草本滋味。
Chinese pairs.new:
Tasting Notes:

* Aged for 1 hour.
* This full-bodied wine exudes opulence, smoothness, and an abundance of fresh, sweet fruit flavors.
* The alluring aroma reveals notes of lavender, sandalwood, cigar box, saltiness, leather, earth, fresh herbs, spices, black cherries, espresso, jasmine, and a hint of pencil lead.
* The lively palate is characterized by invigorating acidity and unparalleled balance, accompanied by a beautiful raspberry flavor wrapped in granular tannins and a subtle herbal nuance.

English pairs.original: Decanted for one hour. This deeply colored wine was opulent and polished, with freshness and sweetness in the fruit. It offered up an inviting bouquet of vanilla, sandalwood, cigar, savoury, leather, earth, fresh herb, spices, black cherry, espresso, gardenia and subtle pencil lead. Animate on palate that revealed thrilling acid and supreme balance, with a veil of grainy tannins around the pretty raspberry flavors and a touch of herb to enliven the finish.
English pairs.new: 酒瓶倒置一小时。 这款深色的红酒富有豪华感，光滑细腻，果味中带有新鲜和甜。 它带来了一种诱人的香气，包括香草、檀木、雪茄、咸味、皮革、泥土、新鲜香草、香料、黑樱桃、咖啡、花园花和微妙的铅笔。 口感活跃，展现出令人惊叹的酸度和完美的平衡，果味中带有细粒的橡胶质感，口感中带有香草味，完美的结尾。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby garnet, purple reflections, delicate rim brightening. Delicate toffee, roasted aromas, some caramel and liquorice, ripe plums in the background, attractive bouquet. Juicy, ripe cherries, fresh acidity, silky tannins, sweet finish, red berry touch on the finish, delicate wood savouriness on the finish, still needs some time, has charm and length. (2025-2050).
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红宝石色，带有紫色反射，酒液边缘微微发亮。酒香中有轻微的糖浆味、烤糖味、焦糖味和 licorice味，背景中有熟透的石榴味。酒的香气很吸引人。口感丰富，果味浓郁，酸度清新，纤维素滑顺，余味甜美，余味中有红果味和木头的香气，酒还需要一些时间来成熟，但它有很好的品质和长度。推荐储存时间：2025-2050年。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, dezente Randaufhellung feine Röstaromen, ein Hauch von Zedernholz, mineralischer Touch, feine Kirschenfrucht, sehr attraktives Bukett, feines Karamell im Hintergrund. Saftige, feine Kirschenfrucht, gut integrierte Tannine, finessenreicher Säurebogen, mineralisch und anhaltend, seidiger, typischer Stil, gutes Entwicklungspotenzial.
Western reviews.translation:
深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。酒中有细微的红色木果味，微微的松木味，矿物质味，细微的樱桃味。酒香非常吸引人，后面有细微的糖浆味。

口感丰富，细微的樱桃味，很好的天然苦味，细微的酸度，矿物质味，持久。酒的质地细腻，典型的风格，发展潜力很好。

Western reviews.review: Medium to deep, ruby-red color. Lovely, lifted, perfumed aromas are augmented by toasty-oak high-notes. The palate has very fresh, vivid blackcurrant fruit that is lifted by lovely acidity. There are toasty oak flavors. Alcohol is quite restrained, ensuring the wine is nicely balanced and the finish lasts very well. The wine combines concentration with freshness and balance, it is a very smart wine! 11/14 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色，酒香清新、芬芳，带有 Toasty-oak 的高调香气。口感清新、果香浓郁，黑currant 的果味清新活泼，酸度适宜。酒中有 Toasty-oak 的风味。酒精含量适中，酒的平衡性很好，酒尾持久。整体来说，这瓶红酒结合了浓郁和清新，平衡性很好，是一瓶非常出色的红酒！评分：11/14

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark ruby with an opaque core, brightening at the rim. Closed dark berries, a little tarry, and blackberry. There's a fleshy density on the palate, and tannins with good-natured, stemmy undertones. It is restrained in acidity yet has enough juiciness behind the striking structure. A ripe, full Boyd with hefty alcohol, that is rich in ageing potential, and, this year, more on the side of density and power than elegance.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，颜色深暗，中间有一个不透明的核心，边缘略微发亮。酒中有闭合的黑berry和黑berry味道，略带焦糖味。口感丰富，口感丰富，苦味有着友好的，带有干草味的底调。酒中酸度较低，但结构强劲，带有足够的果汁感。酒体丰富，酒精含量高，酒龄潜力大，今年的酒体更侧重于厚实和力量，而不是优雅。

Western reviews.review: (En Primeur) Neuholzbetonte Nase, dahinter Kräuter, Himbeerconfitüre, getrocknete Blumen, Stroh, sehr gute Komplexität. Sehr straffer Gaumen, ein Konzentrat an Frucht, massiv Gerbstoff, markante Säure, dicht, männlich, strukturiert, spannungsvoll, zeigt viel Würze, ist noch ungestüm, jugendlich, ja fast wild, im Abgang charaktervoll und von ausgezeichneter Länge. Keine einfacher Zeitpunkt aber ein sehr gelungener Boyd Cantenac. 2025-2045+. 18.5 vvPunkte (93/100)
Western reviews.translation: (En Primeur) 新木质味的鼻子，后面是香草、草莓果酱、干花、干草，非常复杂。口感非常紧致，果味浓缩，含有大量的鞣质，明显的酸度，密度高，男性化，结构良好，紧张感强，展现出丰富的香味，仍然充满激情，年轻，几乎是野性的，尾部典雅，持久度极佳。不是一个简单的时刻，但是一款非常成功的波德-卡南（Boyd Cantenac）。推荐储存时间：2025-2045年。评分：18.5分（93/100）。

Chinese pairs.original: 雪松、李子和黑莓的香气，良好平衡的酒体，精致的单宁，回味带有水果香的味道。
Chinese pairs.new: Notes of pine, plum, and blackberry, a well-balanced body, refined tannins, and a finish with fruity flavors.

Western reviews.review: There's a real purity of fruit here with currant and blueberry aromas coming out in the glass. Full body, with fine tannins and a fresh and clean acidity. Very polished tannins. It's all about balance and drinkability here. Try in 2018.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的果味非常纯粹，酒中有浓郁的黑currant和蓝莓香气。酒体丰富，口感细腻，酸度清新。酒中的纤维素非常细致。整体来说，这瓶红酒注重平衡和口感舒适。建议在2018年左右品尝。

Western reviews.review:
This wine shows black currant fruit, with just the
right balancing acidity. Talbot is progressing well in its
quest to bring out its fine terroir.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒展现出黑加仑果味，酸度刚刚好。塔尔博特酒庄在努力展现其独特土壤特征方面取得了进展。

Western reviews.review: Deep garnet in color, the 2010 Talbot opens with maturing scents of fruitcake, Chinese five spice and cigar box plus hints of dried mint, pencil lead and chargrill. Medium to full-bodied, the palate is pleasantly spicy, with a light grip of chewy tannins and just enough freshness, finishing savory.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，2010年塔尔博特红酒呈现出成熟的果酱、五香粉、雪茄盒和干枯的薄荷、铅笔和烧焦味的香气。口感中等到中厚，口感温和有趣，带有轻微的嚼劲和足够的新鲜感，结尾略带咸味。

Western reviews.review: This features a fairly plump core of crushed plum, blackberry and mulled boysenberry notes, coated with tar and driven by a strong graphite accent. An echo of pastis lingers on the finish, displaying good latent grip. Best from 2015 through 2027.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感丰富，主要特点是浓郁的黑浆果、黑莓和浓缩的蓝莓味道，外层覆盖着焦油味，强烈的石墨味道使其显得更加深沉。酒尾留有过去酒的余味，展现出良好的持久感。建议在2015年至2027年之间饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 高温干热的2019年份很好地彰显出了Grand-Puy Ducasse的风土特性。赤霞珠的辛香气息环绕在铅笔芯的周围，营造出独特的韵律感。美乐的圆润与丝绒般的单宁充分融合，在层层递进的过程中还带着一层鲜奶油般的绵柔口感，是近些年来我最喜欢的Grand-Puy Ducasse。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2019 vintage of Grand-Puy Ducasse shines brightly with its terroir characteristics. The Cabernet Sauvignon's spicy aromas swirl around the pencil lead core, creating a unique rhythm. The Merlot's roundness and silky tannins blend perfectly, with a layer of creamy texture that unfolds in a layered progression, making it my favorite Grand-Puy Ducasse in recent years.

English pairs.original: The scorching and dry vintage of 2019 perfectly shows the terroir of Grand-Puy Ducasse. The spicy scent of Cabernet Sauvignon surrounds the pencil shave, creating a unique sense of rhythm. Rounded Merlot fully blends with velvety tannins, edging with a layer of a creamy, soft, and fine-grained palate in its progression, this is my favorite Grand-Puy Ducasse in recent years.
English pairs.new: 2019年的格兰德-皮-杜卡斯（Grand-Puy Ducasse）红酒，干燥而酷热的风格完美展现了这片土地的特质。卡贝网-萨文儒尼（Cabernet Sauvignon）的辣椒香气环绕着木屑的味道，创造出独特的节奏感。圆润的梅洛（Merlot）与细腻的纤维完美融合，带来一层丰富的、细腻的口感，这是近年来我最喜欢的格兰德-皮-杜卡斯。

Western reviews.review: Flowers, red currants and cedar create the nose, while layers of soft, fresh, ripe, dusty red and black currants with touches of olives and savory herbs hit your palate. The tannins are ripe. There is good freshness, weight and the fruits express purity. The wine ends with a refined, polished, mildly dusty finish. Drink from 2025-2040. 94 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中充满了鲜花、红葡萄和松柏的味道。口感上则是软、新鲜、成熟、略带尘土的红葡萄和黑葡萄的复合层次，伴有橄榄和香草的微妙味道。酒中的纤维素成熟，酒体中有着良好的新鲜感和重量，果味清澈纯正。酒尾则是细致、光滑、略带尘土的完美结尾。建议从2025年到2040年饮用。评分94分。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung. Nougat und dunkle Waldbeeren, zart nach Vanille, reife Herzkirschen, zarte Edelholzanklänge. Kraftvoll, sehr straffe, etwas zu stark extrahierte Tannine, die spröde wirken, adstringierend und grün im Abgang, bitterer Nachhall.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。口感丰富，带有牛奶糖和黑森林莓的香味，微微带有香草味，熟透的樱桃和细微的贵木香味。酒精强劲，非常紧致，过度提取的苦味物质使其显得干涩，干涩且带有青草味的尾部，苦涩的余味。

Western reviews.review: (Verkostet im November 2021 in Zürich) Krautig-würzige Nase, steinige Noten, Kirsche, Cassis. Im Gaumen erst mild, dann straffer werdend, viel Gerbstoff, diese wirken etwas flockig, sind aber von guter Qualität, der Wein hat Charakter, muss reifen. Ob sich die grosse Harmonie einstellen wird, ist fraglich.
Western reviews.translation:
翻译成中文：

2021年11月在苏黎世品尝。酒香中有浓郁的蔬菜和果酱味道，石子般的质感，樱桃和黑加思。口感最初是温和的，然后变得更加紧致，含有大量的橡木味道，这些味道有些粗糙，但质量很好。酒有独特的个性，需要时间来成熟。是否能达到完美的和谐，尚有疑问。

Chinese pairs.original: 刚一亮相就展现出了成熟的“老炮儿”风范。黑墨和莓果的芬芳相互缠绕，丝丝缕缕地渗入到橡木桶的醇香之中。热年份的成熟感充斥酒杯，但却有着近似2016年份的酸度，着实让人眼前一亮。口中的浑圆感以及醇厚的单宁营造出了动静结合的和谐感，再加上丰富的香料气息，整个酒的层次感立刻跃然杯中。非常成功的一款Le Pape。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine exudes a mature, sophisticated charm from the start. Blackberry and dark fruit aromas intertwine, subtly infusing the rich oak notes. The full-bodied, ripe flavors of the vintage are balanced by a crisp acidity reminiscent of 2016, making for a truly impressive wine. The smooth, rounded texture and velvety tannins create a harmonious balance, while the complex spice notes add depth and dimension. A truly successful Le Pape.

English pairs.original: Purely classical Bordeaux style. The black ink and wild berries embrace together and gently infuse into the oaky bouquet. The ripeness of the hot vintage is pretty expressive in the glass, but with prominent acidity, pretty like 2016 rather than 2018. The roundness and elaborated tannins contribute to a harmonious mouth-feeling. And an abundance of spiciness stands out perfectly the complexity and layers on the aftertaste. A very successful Le Pape.
English pairs.new: 这是一瓶典型的波尔多风格红酒。黑色墨汁和野莓的香气融合在一起，轻轻地渗入到橡木的香气中。炎热的产季的成熟度在玻璃中表现得相当明显，但由于显著的酸度，酒的风格更接近2016年，而不是2018年。圆润的口感和发达的纤维素使得口感和谐。酒尾的复杂性和层次被丰富的香料完美地突出了。是一瓶非常成功的莱帕（Le Pape）。

Western reviews.review: Medium-bodied, with a core of fresh, ripe, elegant red fruits, the wine is soft, sweet, refined and energetic. Forward in style, the finish shows off its savory ripe, red berries, dark chocolate, spice, herbs and tobacco leaf with ease. The wine blends 80% Merlot with 20% Cabernet Sauvignon. 92 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的体积适中，果味新鲜、成熟、优雅，口感软、甜、细腻、有活力。风格前卫，尾部展现出成熟的红果、黑巧克力、香料、香草和烟草叶的风味。该酒以80%梅洛和20%卡波弗雷希诺为混合。评分92分。

Western reviews.review: (80% Merlot, 20% Cabernet Sauvignon): Leuchtendes Rubin. Feinduftige Nase, rote und dunkle Beeren, welke Rosen, frisch geschnittene Kräuter, auch ein paar Heidelbeeren. Im Auftakt weich, schon gut zugänglich, schlanker bis mittlerer Körper, die Frucht ist saftig, knackig, auf der rotbeerigen Seite, die Gerbstoffe von mittlerer Dichte, reif und fein gewoben, dazu kommt eine sehr schöne Säure und eine beeindruckende Länge. Finessenreich und elegant, ohne jegliche Schwere. 2022-2034+ (Verkostet auf Château Haut-Bailly, am 01.04.2019)
Western reviews.translation: (80% Merlot, 20% Cabernet Sauvignon): 闪亮的红色。芳香浓郁，红色和黑色浆果，玫瑰花香，新鲜切的香草，也有少量的蓝莓。入口柔和，易于入口，身体瘦长至中等，果味 juicy，脆爽，主要是红色浆果，中度的天然纤维，成熟和精致地编织在一起，伴有很好的酸度和令人印象深刻的长度。细腻和优雅，没有任何重量感。2022-2034+ (在 Château Haut-Bailly 品尝于 2019 年 4 月 1 日)

Chinese pairs.original: 又是一个能够彰显Pibran优质风土的好年份…香气丰韵十足，光彩照人，摇杯后折射出高纯度的辛香料和烤制化醇香。入口后通透的果汁感瞬间点亮整个味蕾，让浓密的酒体显得富有弹性、活泼可人。丝绒般的单宁细腻且富有光泽，大口畅饮也毫无压力。
Chinese pairs.new: Another year that showcases Pibran's exceptional terroir... The aroma is rich and full-bodied, shining brightly, and after swirling, it reflects high-purity spices and toasted oak notes. Upon entry, the transparent juice sensation instantly illuminates the palate, making the dense body feel lively and approachable. The silky tannins are smooth and lustrous, and drinking it by the glass is effortless.

English pairs.original: The flavor of it is charming and glamourous. Swirling the glass, high-purity spice and toasted aroma emerge. Once entering your mouth, it refreshes all the palate immediately with its translucent juicy texture, which makes this full-bodied wine flexible and fresh. The velvety tannins, delicate and shiny, create no burden for drinking to your heart’s content.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的口感迷人华丽。将酒杯旋转，高纯度的香料和烤酵的香气浮现出来。一旦入口，酒液立即清新了整个口腔，透明的果肉质感使得这款充满体积的酒变得灵活和新鲜。细腻的橡胶质感，轻盈且光亮，令你可以尽情品尝。

Western reviews.review: Lots of cassis, graphite, chalky minerality, and sappy herb notes emerge from the 2019 Château Pibran, a rich, medium to full-bodied, beautifully concentrated Pauillac. I love its purity of fruit, the balance is spot on, and the tannins, while present, are perfectly ripe and polished. It's not a blockbuster and shows the more elegant style of the vintage, but it's a gorgeous, classy Pauillac that will benefit from 4-6 years of bottle age and have 25+ of prime drinking. Best After 2026
Western reviews.translation: 2019年夏托皮布兰（Château Pibran）是一款精美的波尔多红酒。它的风味中充满了黑currant、石墨、矿物质和青草的气息。这种中等至全口感的波尔多红酒富有质感，果味纯正，平衡完美，纤维软滑。虽然它不是一款极具爆发力的波尔多，但它展现了当年波尔多的典雅风格。这种波尔多红酒需要4-6年的陈化期，才能达到最佳状态，预计有25年以上的最佳饮用期。建议在2026年后饮用。

Western reviews.review:
This small estate, with the same winemaking team as Pichon Baron, reveals a gentler view of Cabernet Sauvignon. The blend with Merlot gives plenty of ripe fruit with smooth tannins and an attractive medium-term potential.
 Barrel Sample: 90-92
Western reviews.translation:
这个小型葡萄酒庄园，同样拥有与巴隆皮尚（Pichon Baron）相同的酿酒团队，展现出卡波内尔·索维涅（Cabernet Sauvignon）的温和面貌。与梅洛（Merlot）混合后，呈现出丰富的成熟果实和细腻的纤维，具有中期的吸引力。

酒评样本：90-92分

Western reviews.review: Aromas of black cherries, blackberries, cloves, black tea, wet earth and graphite. Medium-to full-bodied with firm, smooth tannins. Nicely balanced, with a compact core of dark fruit.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中包含黑樱桃、黑莓、丁香、黑茶、湿土和石墨的味道。口感中等到中等以上，具有坚实而光滑的橡皮质。整体平衡，黑色水果的核心紧凑。

Western reviews.review: Juicy and ripe, with plum, blackberry and black currant paste flavors that have good energy as they move along, picking up singed alder, cast iron and tobacco accents along the way. Approachable but will develop a bit more, too. Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon. Drink now.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感丰富饱满，带有浓郁的浆果味，如黑桃、黑莓和黑加仑果酱，口感流畅，随着时间推移，会带来焦木、铁锅和烟草的复杂香气。口感平易近人，但也会随着时间的推移而变得更加丰富。酒中含有梅洛和卡波弗雷斯基葡萄。建议立即享用。

Western reviews.review: The 2019 Pibran offers up aromas of plums, sweet berries, loamy soil and licorice. Medium to full-bodied, ample and velvety, with polished tannins and a succulent core of fruit, it's a charming, giving wine from a cooler site than Pichon Baron, with limestone soils and a higher proportion of Merlot in the blend. Best After 2021
Western reviews.translation: 2019 年皮布兰红酒呈现出浓郁的浆果、甜果实、土壤和甘草香气。口感中等到中厚，富有余裕且细滑，具有光滑的纤维和丰富的果实核心，是来自比皮尚男爵更冷的产区，土壤中含有石灰岩，酒中梅洛葡萄比例较高。建议在2021年后饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 2016年份的Beauregard很是诱人，强劲中透着曼妙的身姿，高亢中藏着清亮的音色。丰富的香气中包裹着能量感，酸枣、砖茶、红桑葚的芬芳随着罗勒叶和松脂的清香在杯中飘扬。就现阶段的品鉴来看，这款酒还完全没有展露它的锋芒，耐心等待15-25年后，应该会有更为出彩的表现。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2016 Beauregard is incredibly alluring, with a robust yet elegant presence, and a high-pitched voice that shines with clarity. Rich aromas are packed with energy, as flavors of apricot, brick tea, and red currant mingle with the freshness of rosemary and pine sap in the glass. At this stage, this wine has yet to reveal its full potential, and patience will be rewarded with a truly exceptional performance in 15-25 years.

English pairs.original: Beauregard 2016 is pretty enticing, I can feel a bright tone and a graceful body shape emerge from the robust structure. The nose is brimming with sour jujube, Chinese black tea, red brambleberry, and hints of pine-like freshness. From my perspective, this wine hasn’t delivered all of its potentials, giving 15-25 of bottle aging; it will be even more colorful.
English pairs.new: 贝奥格拉德 2016 年红酒很有诱惑力，我感觉到它的亮丽色调和优雅的体型从强烈的结构中脱颖而出。酒鼻中充满了酸枣、中国红茶、红莓和松柏般的清新气息。从我的角度来看，这款红酒尚未发挥出全部潜力，建议在 15-25 个月的瓶龄中储存，待其更好地展现颜色。

Western reviews.review: Beautiful aromas of plums, flowers, truffles, earth, and hot stones. Full-bodied, yet the very fine and polished tannins have fabulous poise and elegance. Plush. Love the finish. One of the best ever from here. Drink from 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒具有优美的香气，带有浓郁的浆果、花朵、松露、泥土和热石的味道。酒体丰富，但细致的橡皮质非常光滑，具有优雅的风格。口感丰富柔和，完美的尾韵。值得一试，推荐2025年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: This has more concentration than the 2015, less immediately seductive but the layers are evident, and it's hard to fault the construction. Plush and sexy and full of Pomerol pleasure, but also real depth, power and spice. Lovely wine, with the juicy saline kick on the finish that you want in Beauregard. Love this, but needs time - those tannins are chewy right now.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒比2015年更浓郁，虽然不像2015年那样立即诱人，但其层次结构却非常明显，结构也非常完美。它充满了波尔多风味的魅力，丰富而性感，但也具有真正的深度、力量和香料。这个酒非常美味，尾部有令人愉悦的海盐味，这是贝奥雷加德的典型风格。虽然我非常喜欢这个酒，但它需要时间来成熟，因为现在的纽维非常坚韧。

Western reviews.review: Deep garnet-purple in color, the 2016 Beauregard is a little closed on the nose, opening to warm black plums, blackberries and mulberries with touches of chocolate box and dried herbs plus violets hints. The palate is medium to full-bodied, firm, grainy and packed with muscular fruit, finishing long and earthy.
Western reviews.translation: 2016 年贝奥格拉德红酒的颜色是深红紫色，酒 noseClosed，打开后释放出熟黑杏、黑莓、黑莓和巧克力盒的香气，伴有干草和花朵的味道。口感中等到中厚，坚实，粗糙，充满肌肉的果味，长长的土味。

Western reviews.review: I loved the 2016 Château Beauregard, which was firing on all cylinders during my visit. Medium to full-bodied, beautifully pure, with good acidity and a meaty nose of black fruits, truffle, bouquet garni, and earth, it’s beautifully balanced and about as classic Pomerol as it gets. Give bottles another handful of years and it will deliver the goods over the following 10-15.
Western reviews.translation: 我非常喜欢2016年夏布勒加德庄园的红酒，酒庄在我访问时表现出色。酒体中等到中等以上，清澈纯正，酸度良好，黑果、松露、香草和泥土的香气浓郁，酒的平衡非常好，几乎是典型的波美罗酒。给酒瓶再过几年，酒会在接下来的10-15年内呈现出最佳口感。

Western reviews.review: Structured from the start, with a light charcoal edge and a strong graphite spine supporting the core of dark plum, blueberry and açaí berry flavors. Tobacco and alder details are etched on the finish, with the fruit driving through. Slightly taciturn in style, but cellaring should lighten the mood.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒从一开始就有结构，带有轻微的焦炭边缘和强有力的石墨脊柱支撑着黑浆果、蓝莓和阿卡西莓的核心风味。烟草和白桦的细节在尾部被刻画出来，果味仍然在推进。风格上略显沉默，但储存应该会让它变得更轻松。

Chinese pairs.original: 此酒之前的酒标为“Reserve de la Comtesse”。期酒。此酒充满庄严岩石味的香气带有些许草本和香料气息。中段口感非常绵密，伴有巧克力般的回味。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine previously bore the label "Reserve de la Comtesse". The current vintage. The wine is full-bodied with a majestic stone-like aroma, accompanied by subtle herbal and spicy notes. The mid-palate is incredibly smooth, with a lingering chocolatey finish.

English pairs.original: Previously labelled as 'Reserve de la Comtesse'. En primeur. Faintly herbal and spicy on the evidently stony aroma that was rather solemn. Very dense on the mid-palate, with a chocolaty finish.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒曾经被标记为“Comtesse的储备”。新酒。酒香中带有淡淡的草药和辣味，显然是石质的气味有些严肃。口感非常浓密，中口部分的味道非常丰富，口感结束时带有巧克力味。

Western reviews.review: Ripe black fruits and rich tannins are piled high in this wine. It shows finesse in the tannins and in the blackberry flavors. This second wine is likely to age well. Drink from 2026
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的黑果味道成熟，富有深度的苦味。它在苦味和黑莓味道方面展现出优雅的风格。这款次酒有很好的储存潜力，建议2026年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: The attention seeking bouquet pops with its notes of flowers, tobacco leaf, spearmint, cocoa and sweet, ripe, red fruits. The wine is elegant, refined, soft and complex, with a finish that is long, refined, complex and gentle. This is a fabulous example of a baby Pichon Lalande that will drink beautifully on release, while offering pleasure for up to two decades. As the quality here continues jumping in class every year, this is becoming a true Pauillac brand, instead of a second wine. Drink from 2023-2040.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气引人注目，带有花朵、烟草叶、薄荷、可可和甜熟的红果的味道。酒体优雅、精致、柔和、复杂，口感长、精致、复杂、温和。 这是一款出色的“婴儿”皮尚拉朗德（Pichon Lalande），酒在释放时会美味无比，享受时长达两十年。随着品质每年都在不断提高，这款酒逐渐成为真正的波尔多（Pauillac）品牌，而不是次级酒。建议从2023年到2040年饮用。

Western reviews.review: Wow! Deep and intense playing with a really exciting mixed sensory profile which tells of notes of plums, pressed blueberries, magnolias, gardenias, hawthorn, white almonds and chopped lime. Full bodied, light tannins present in the matrix and a solid, enveloping finale. Splendid right away but better from 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 哇！深度和强烈的口感，充满了令人兴奋的多种感官特征，带有浓郁的浆果、压榨的蓝莓、夜shade花、花卉、山楂、白杏仁和切碎的柠檬的味道。酒体丰富，轻微的苦味在酒中弥散，结尾坚实，包围感强。非常出色，立即可享用，但从2025年开始会更好。

Western reviews.review: Intense ruby, purple reflections, discreet brightening on the rim. Subtle blackberry confit, ripe cherries, tobacco nuances, inviting notes of wood. Medium-bodied, subtle cherries, spicy tannins, a fresh structure, with a subtle sweetness, leafy nuances on the finish, good ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，紫色反射，酒杯边缘微微发亮。细微的黑莓酱果味，熟透的樱桃，烟草的细微变化，木头的诱人气味。中等体积，细微的樱桃味，辣的纤维，新鲜的结构，微妙的甜度，叶子的细微变化在尾部，良好的陈化潜力。

Western reviews.review: Very precise fruit selection and a relatively complex aromatics. Beautiful delicate green pepper (ripe!) note of Cabernet Sauvignon, broad yet solid structure, filled with intense fruit concenration on the mid-palate, with a fairly long finish. Serious but accessible. Tasted 3 times in 2021 and the latest was Nov. 2021.
Western reviews.translation: 精确的果实选择和相对复杂的香气。美丽的细致的青椒（成熟！）的Cabernet Sauvignon香气，宽广而坚实的结构，中口充满浓郁的果实浓度，尾部较长。严肃但易于接触。2021年尝过三次，最新一次是2021年11月。

Chinese pairs.original: 两小时的醒酒帮助这支酒移除了浓厚感及浑浊感。此酒的香气具有极好的优雅感和出色的清晰感，同时还保有宜人的深度，展现出由花香、红醋栗、树丛、咸矿物和泥土所组成的迷人香气，打底的则是烤吐司和香料的桶味。这是款高度融合并且异常圆滑的美酒，标志性的干净甜味在其结实的收尾中达到了顶点。
Chinese pairs.new: Two hours of decanting helped to soften and clarify this wine, removing its initial heaviness and murkiness. The aroma of this wine is characterized by an excellent elegance and clarity, while still retaining a pleasant depth, showcasing a captivating bouquet of floral notes, red currant, forest floor, salty minerals, and earth, underpinned by toasted brioche and spice oak. This is a highly integrated and exceptionally smooth wine, with its signature clean sweetness reaching its peak in its solid finish.

English pairs.original: The thickness and muddiness were removed after the two hours' decantage. The sniff possessed stunning elegance, excellent precision while it still retained lovely depth, with alluring aromatics consist of flowers, red currant, underbush, savoury-mineral and earth with a background touch of oaks (toast, spices). It's exceedingly suave and well-integrated, with the signature of clean sweetness that culminated in a structured finale.
English pairs.new: 两小时的脱色后，红酒的浑浊感消失了。酒香优雅典雅，精确度高，仍然保留了深度，具有诱人的花香、红葡萄、灌木丛、矿物质和土壤香气，背景中有橡木的烤香和香料。它极其优雅，融合得非常好，具有清新的甜度，结尾结构完美。

Western reviews.review: Tasted blind at the 2007 Bordeaux horizontal in Southwold.
