Jean-Pascale Vazart is overseeing some wonderful wines from this Pomerol stalwart and even off-vintages such as 2007 are no exception. It has fine delineation on the nose with macerated dark cherries, creme de cassis, blueberry compote and a touch of crushed stone. Fine delineation. The palate has a rounded, sensual entry, slightly lower acidity than others, caressing sumptuous dark cherry and cassis fruit towards the finish that lingers long in the mouth. Irresistible.
Western reviews.translation: 在2007年波尔多巡回品酒会上， blind品尝了这瓶酒。  Jean-Pascale Vazart正在监督着这家波尔多名庄园的精彩酒款，甚至是2007年这种不佳的产季也不例外。  酒鼻中有细致的分辨度，带有浓郁的黑樱桃、黑加仑、蓝莓酱和一丝碎石的气味。  酒口入口圆润，富有感官体验，酸度稍低于其他酒款，口感丰富的黑樱桃和黑加仑果味在口中停留很久。  无法抗拒。

Western reviews.review: Fresh tobacco and blackberry aromas follow through to a medium- to full-bodied palate, with polished tannins and a pretty finish. Caressing and attractive, with a lot of new wood. Best after 2012.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中有新鲜的烟草和黑莓的味道，口感中等到中等以上，口感中有光滑的橡皮质感，尾部清晰。这种红酒的风格温柔而吸引人，新橡木的味道很浓郁。建议在2012年后喝。

Western reviews.review: Fully developed, the wine is medium-bodied, bright, fresh, crisp and offers red plums, truffle, mint, forest leaf, tobacco, cocoa, and herbs on the nose and palate. No decanting is needed, just pop and pour. 90 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒已完全成熟，口感中等，清澈、新鲜、清脆，酒中有红杏、松露、薄荷、森林叶、烟草、可可和香草的香气和口感。无需脱颗，直接打开即可享用。评分：90分。

Western reviews.review: Deep ruby-red color, is darkly pigmented, but not opaque. The restrained dark-fruit aromas on the nose are overlaid by notes of chocolate, vanilla & cedary oak. The palate combines rich chocolatey notes with over-mature black-fruit & excellent acidity. The tannins are fine & the texture is velvety with a dusting of cocoa powder. The acidity is good, but not high. Alcohol is slightly warming & vanilla & cocoa butter flavors linger well on the long finish. An impressive wine. 11/03 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，颜色深但不透明。酒鼻中有着抑制的黑果香味，伴有巧克力、香草和松木的气息。口感丰富，巧克力味与成熟的黑果味相结合，酸度出色。酒中的纤维细腻，口感滑顺，末端有着一层可可粉的余味。酸度适中，但不高。酒精略微温暖，香草和可可脂的余味在长长的尾部持续着。酒评人认为这是一个令人印象深刻的葡萄酒。 评分：11/03 DCAMW

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Clos de Sarpe 2022 的清新爽朗让人不可思议，犹如一杯酸甜爽口的酸梅汤在舌尖划过。要知道，这可是号称干旱酷热的2022年啊，你好歹也给人家一点儿面子吧？果香轻盈而富有弹性，酸枣、李子、桑果的味道在口中激荡，仿佛是一场盛大的水果Party。En Primeurs的收尾稍显热烈，但我相信装瓶之后的表现会更加平衡。我现在已经等不及品尝装瓶后的Chateau Clos de Sarpe 2022。
Chinese pairs.new: The Chateau Clos de Sarpe 2022 is a refreshing and lively wine that's simply astonishing, like a tangy and sweet sour plum soup gliding across the palate. And this is no ordinary year - 2022 was known for its drought and scorching heat, so it's impressive that this wine still manages to impress. The fruit aromas are light and springy, with notes of persimmon, plum and mulberry that dance on the palate, like a grand fruit party. The finish is slightly hot, but I'm confident that the bottled version will be more balanced. I'm already counting down the days to taste the final product.

English pairs.original: Chateau Laroze 2022 – nicely delicious! It was already so fresh and tasty during En Primeurs, so imagine how heavenly it will be after bottling? While many believe that soils with sand and clay are unable to withstand the droughts of 2022, this wine shows us what it means to reach the “realm of fresh fruit brewed in a hot vintage”. As the wine dances in the glass, the fresh aroma of orchids lingers with the sweet and sour of berries, and every sip leaves you feeling in high spirits. Without a doubt, 2022 is the most unforgettable year of Chateau Laroze that I have tasted in many years.
English pairs.new: 拉罗兹庄园2022年 - 美味极了！在En Primeurs时，它就已经如此新鲜可口，想象一下瓶装后会有多美妙！许多人认为，2022年干旱的土壤，含有沙和粘土，无法承受干旱，但这个酒却告诉我们，如何在干旱年份中，酿造出新鲜水果的香味。酒在玻璃中跳跃，洋兰的新鲜香味与浓郁的果实香味相融合，每一口都让人感到高兴。毫无疑问，2022年是拉罗兹庄园我多年来品尝过的最难忘的一年。

Western reviews.review: Deeply colored, the wine is perfumed with flowers, crushed stones, peppery spices, black plums, black cherries and espresso. The wine is concentrated, powerful, and packed with dark red and black pit fruits, chocolate, and salty, crushed stone characteristics. Give it time to come together. It is worth the wait. Drink from 2027-2055. 94-96 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色深沉，酒香中充满了花朵、碎石、辣椒、黑杏、黑樱桃和浓缩咖啡的味道。酒精浓度高，酒体丰富，带有黑色和红色浆果、巧克力和咸味的碎石特征。值得等待，时间会让它变得更加完美。建议在2027-2055年之间饮用。评分：94-96分。

Western reviews.review: (85% Merlot, 15% Cabernet Franc, 15% Alkohol) Reiffruchtig, mit Brombeeren, Heidelbeeren, einer dezent krautigen Note, Eukalyptus und schwarzer Schokolade in der Nase. Der Gaumen ist dicht, zeigt eine knackige Frucht, reifes, markantes Tannin, gute Säure, wird im mittleren Gaumen immer straffer, zieht messerscharf durch und hallt rotfruchtig nach. Eine faszinierende Symbiose aus Kraft und Eleganz. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / AGCCSE / Château Dassault) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation:
这是一瓶红酒评论。以下是翻译成中文：

85% 梅洛，15% 卡波弗兰克，15% 酒精含量。 

酒香浓郁，带有浆果味，蓝莓、黑莓、淡淡的草本味、桉树和黑巧克力。口感浓密，果味清脆，酒体成熟，明显的坚果味，酸度适宜，中口逐渐紧绷，锋利的口感，余味浓郁的红果味。是一种充满魅力和优雅的酒。 

(评分时间：2023年4月 / AGCCSE / Château Dassault) #primeurs22

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby garnet, opaque core, purple reflections, delicate rim brightening. Seductive bouquet of liquorice and purples, black fruit, fine noble wood nuances. Juicy, blackberries, elegant, very fresh and finesse, shows enormous energy, red berry finish, great length, certain ageing potential for many years to come.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色宝石色，透明核心，紫色反射，细微的边缘闪亮。诱人的香气，含有 licorice 和紫色，黑色水果，精致的高贵木质细微差别。口感丰富，黑莓，优雅，非常新鲜和细致，展现出巨大的能量，红果尾韵，长长的尾韵，未来多年有很好的陈化潜力。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Lilian Ladouys 2020年份没有让我失望。虽然香气不像2019年那么的热情洋溢，但口感依旧惊艳不已。入口的瞬间就像是掉进了冰冻鲜奶，爽滑细嫩，还带着丝丝凉意。单宁精致细密，酸度流畅轻盈，喝起来通透高挑又不失润度，现在开瓶就能马上饮用。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau Lilian Ladouys 2020 did not disappoint me. Although the aroma is not as vibrant as the 2019, the taste is still stunning. The moment it enters your mouth is like diving into a frozen milk, smooth and delicate, with a hint of coolness. The tannins are refined and subtle, the acidity is smooth and light, making it refreshing and refined. It's crystal clear and elegant, yet still retains its texture, and can be enjoyed immediately after opening.

English pairs.original: Chateau Lilian Ladouys 2020 does not disappoint me. Although the fragrance of this wine is not as exuberant as that of the 2019 vintage, its palate is still arresting. Once the wine touched my tongue, I felt like falling into a sea of icy fresh milk, smooth and delicate, with a hint of freshness. The tannins are intricate and tightly knit, and the acidity is smooth and bright, which makes the wine translucent without losing its moisture. You can drink it immediately after opening the bottle.
English pairs.new: 2020年夏都利安拉杜伊酒庄的红酒令我没有失望。虽然这瓶酒的香气不如2019年的那瓶那么浓郁，但它的口感仍然令人惊艳。一旦酒液触及我的舌头，我就像掉进了一杯冰凉的新鲜牛奶中一样，感觉非常顺滑和细腻，带有清新的味道。酒中的纤维素结构复杂且紧密缠绕，酸度也非常光滑和明亮，这使得酒液看起来清澈而不失水分。可以直接在开瓶后就饮用。

Western reviews.review: The combination of powerful tannins and equally generous black fruits is a fine harbinger for this wine's development. Big, bold and juicy with a dense structure, the wine is for longterm aging. Barrel Sample: 93-95
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的强劲的苦味和同样丰富的黑色果味，是这瓶酒未来发展的良好预兆。酒体大、浓郁、果香浓郁，结构紧密，适合长期陈酿。酒评：93-95分。

Western reviews.review: Juicy, well balanced, plenty of personality, with enough juice through the mid palate to balance out the big tannins that are pretty inescapable in any wines of ambition in 2020. The finish closes in sharply, but this is an enjoyable wine from the Lorenzetti-owned Lilian Ladouys (and for me one of the clear leaders of the new Cru Bourgeois Exceptionnel category). Barrel Sample: 93
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒口感丰富、平衡充足，具有足够的果味在中口中平衡了酒中强烈的苦味。虽然苦味很难避免，但这瓶酒仍然很可爱。它由Lorenzetti家族拥有的小酒庄Lilian Ladouys生产，且是新推出的Cru Bourgeois Exceptionnel类别中的佼佼者。酒评：93分。

Western reviews.review: This is a young 2020 that is back ended with a serious finish of solid and polished tannins and plenty of juicy fruit. Medium body. Racy structured. Excellent length at the end. Try after 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这是2020年的年轻红酒，后端有坚实而光滑的橡木味和丰富的果肉口感。中等体积，结构紧凑，尾部长而持久。建议在2025年后品尝。

Western reviews.review: Seemingly always terrific, the 2020 Chateau Lilian Ladouys shows the class of the vintage and has a medium to full-bodied, concentrated, yet silky, perfectly balanced style with tons to love. Darker fruits, damp earth, truffle, and beautiful spice-driven aromatics define this beauty, and while it's already accessible, I'm sure will evolve gracefully for 10-15 years. Best After 2023.
Western reviews.translation: 2020年夏都利安拉杜伊酒庄的酒品似乎总是出色，展现了当年的品质。酒体中等到中厚，浓郁但又细腻，完美平衡，令人喜爱。酒中深色果味、潮湿土壤、松露和美丽的香料驱动的香气定义了这美酒的风格。虽然它已经可以享用，但我相信它会在10-15年内逐渐成熟。建议在2023年后享用。

Western reviews.review: The 2020 Lilian Ladouys offers up aromas of cassis, licorice and a deft touch of creamy new oak, followed by a medium to full-bodied, rather rich and broad palate framed by powdery tannins that assert themselves on the finish. It's a touch more structured than the demonstrative 2019 and will require a little patience. Best after  2027. Rating: 91+
Western reviews.translation: 2020年利莉安拉杜伊（Lilian Ladouys）红酒展现出黑加仑（cassis）、甘草和新橡木的奶油质感的芳香，口感丰富、富有层次，口感中有细致的粉末状纤维，纤维在尾部发挥作用。相比于2019年更具结构，需要一些耐心。建议在2027年后享用。评分：91+。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有东方香料、烤橡木、药草、成熟水果怡人的香气；香气丰富，层次复杂，发展较好。口感风味丰富，早熟，风味持久，十分迷人。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of exotic spices, toasted oak, herbs, and ripe fruit delight the senses; rich and complex, with good development. Flavors are rich, early-ripening, and lingering, utterly captivating.

Western reviews.review: The customary glamour of Mouton is on display here, with softened but welcoming blackberry, bilberry and raspberry fruits, still offering texture and juice through the palate. This is matched by clove, cinnamon, caramel and smoke. Another era at Mouton, making this even more delightful to drink - Baron Philippe was still heading up the estate as he had since 1922, and would continue to until his death in 1988, making this his 63rd vintage, and the legendary Raoul Blondin was cellarmaster (he oversaw 60 vintages before his eventual retirement in 1989). 3% Petit Verdot completes the blend. Paul Delvaux label. Harvest September 26 to October 11. (Re-tasted Jan 2021)
Western reviews.translation: 莫顿酒庄的典雅黑葡萄酒魅力在这里展现，黑莓、蓝莓和草莓的果味柔和但仍然欢迎，通过口感仍然提供了质感和汁液。这与丁香、肉桂、焦糖和烟气的风味相匹配。莫顿酒庄的另一个时代使得这瓶酒更加令人愉悦。巴隆菲利普在1922年开始领导酒庄，直到1988年去世，共推出了63瓶酒。传奇的拉乌尔布朗丁担任酒庄的酒窖师（他在1989年退休前推出了60瓶酒）。3%的佩蒂维多完成了酒庄的混合。保罗德尔瓦克斯标签。收获时间为9月26日至10月11日。 (2021年1月重评)

Western reviews.review: The rich, complex, well-developed bouquet of oriental spices, toasty oak, herbs, and ripe fruit is wonderful. On the palate, the wine is also rich, forward, long, and sexy.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气丰富复杂，具有东方香料、-toast橡木、香草和成熟水果的特征，非常出色。口感上，酒精也非常丰富、前端、持久、性感。

Chinese pairs.original: 当苹果酸乳酸发酵不在橡木桶中进行后，Chateau La Confession 的果香愈发清晰纯净，酒体线条也变得更加柔美流畅。鸢尾花、牡丹花的芬芳娇媚动人，草莓和杨梅的香气甜美诱人，再加上黏土石灰岩的一抹咸感加成，将酒庄对风土的理解呈现得淋漓尽致。在我眼中，2022年份是Chateau La Confession 全新的转折点，让我看到了“倔强老者拥抱新时代后露出的自信微笑”。
Chinese pairs.new: The fruit aromas of Chateau La Confession become even clearer and more refined after the malolactic fermentation is not carried out in oak barrels, with the wine's texture also becoming smoother and more elegant. The fragrance of irises and peonies is charming and captivating, while the sweetness of strawberries and lychees is irresistible, complemented by a hint of saltiness from the limestone soil. In my opinion, the 2022 vintage marks a new turning point for Chateau La Confession, revealing a confident smile after the stubborn old man has embraced the new era.

English pairs.original: When the malolactic fermentation undergoes outside of oak barrels, Chateau La Confession’s fruitiness has become increasingly clear and pure, with a more graceful and smooth body. The fragrance of iris and peony is charming and captivating, while the sweet and tempting aromas of strawberry and waxberry are further enhanced by a touch of salinity from the clay-limestone soil. This exemplifies the winery’s thorough understanding of its terroir. To me, the 2022 vintage marks a new turning point for Chateau La Confession, as I see “a headstrong elder embrace the new era with a confident smile”.
English pairs.new: 在没有橡木桶的乳酸发酵过程中，沙特奥拉忏悔庄园的果味变得更加清晰和纯粹，身体更加优雅和光滑。iris和牡丹的香气迷人而诱人，而草莓和红果的甜美诱人香气进一步增强了来自黏土和石灰岩土壤的轻微咸味。这体现了酒庄对其土壤的深刻理解。对我来说，2022年产季标志着沙特奥拉忏悔庄园的新起点，因为我看到“一位果断的长者以自信的笑容迎接新时代”。

Western reviews.review: Flowers, tobacco leaf, mint, licorice, and red berries open the nose. On the palate, the wine is silky, polished, fresh, and energetic. The fruits are clean, pure, and lively, with sweetness, lift, and delicacy, as well as purity in the finish. The wine blends 70% Merlot, 27% Cabernet Franc and 3% Malbec. 14.5% ABV, 3.63 pH. Drink from 2025-2045. 93-95 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中包含了花朵、烟草叶、薄荷、 licorice 和红莓的味道。口感上，酒精 silky、光滑、清新、充满活力。果味清新、纯粹、生动，带有甜度、升华和细致的味道，且在尾部保持纯粹。酒中混合了70%梅洛、27%卡波弗朗克和3%马尔贝克。酒精度14.5%，pH值3.63。建议从2025年至2045年饮用。评分93-95分。

Western reviews.review: Krautige Nase, Kirschen, blonder Tabak, Brombeerkompott, florale Noten, sehr komplex. Im Gaumen druckvoll, üppig, viel Gerbstoff, top knackige Frucht, der Wein zeigt trotz der Opulenz viel Frische, das Holz ist perfekt verpackt. Langanhaltend, dunkelfruchtig und mit einem Hauch von Blutorangenzesten im Rückaroma. Kann reifen. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / AGCCSE / Château Dassault) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation:
这是一瓶复杂的红酒，口感丰富。酒的香气中有浓郁的草莓味、淡淡的烟草味、浓郁的黑莓果酱味、花朵的香气，非常复杂。

在口中，酒的味道丰富，充满了果实和坚果的味道，酒的味道非常鲜美，木质的味道完美地融入其中。酒的口感丰富，长时间持久，酒的余味中有浓郁的黑果味和淡淡的橙子味。

这瓶酒有很好的潜力，可以继续陈化。

Western reviews.review: Deep ruby colour, opaque core, purple reflections, brightening on the rim. Delicately floral, red wild berries, subtle hints of liquorice, tangerine zest, inviting fresh bouquet. Taut, red berryish, lively acidity, red cherries, mineral, fine integrated tannins, a fine spicy food companion.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，透明中心，紫色反射，酒液边缘明亮。花香轻微，红野果，薄荷糖味，柑橘皮香，令人愉悦的花香。紧致的红果味，生动的酸度，红樱桃，矿物质，细致的整合性纤维，适合与辣味食物搭配的佳酿。

Western reviews.review: Flowers, tobacco leaf, mint, licorice, and red berries open the nose. On the palate, the wine is silky, polished, fresh, and energetic. The fruits are clean, pure, and lively, with sweetness, lift, and delicacy, as well as purity in the finish. The wine blends 70% Merlot, 27% Cabernet Franc and 3% Malbec. 14.5% ABV, 3.63 pH. Drink from 2025-2045. 93-95 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中包含了鲜花、烟草叶、薄荷、甘草和红莓的味道。口感上，酒精度滑顺，光滑，新鲜和充满活力。酒中的水果清澈纯粹，生动活泼，带有甜度，升华感和细腻感，且在尾部保持纯粹。酒中混合了70%梅洛，27%卡波弗朗克和3%马尔贝克。酒精度14.5%，pH值3.63。建议从2025年到2045年饮用。评分93-95分。

Western reviews.review: Krautige Nase, Kirschen, blonder Tabak, Brombeerkompott, florale Noten, sehr komplex. Im Gaumen druckvoll, üppig, viel Gerbstoff, top knackige Frucht, der Wein zeigt trotz der Opulenz viel Frische, das Holz ist perfekt verpackt. Langanhaltend, dunkelfruchtig und mit einem Hauch von Blutorangenzesten im Rückaroma. Kann reifen. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / AGCCSE / Château Dassault) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation:
这是一瓶复杂的红酒，口感丰富。酒的香气中有浓郁的草莓味、淡淡的烟草味、浓郁的黑莓果酱味、花朵的香气，非常复杂。

在口中，酒的味道丰富，充满了果实和坚果的味道，酒的味道非常鲜美，木质的味道完美地融入其中。酒的口感丰富，长时间持久，酒的余味中有浓郁的黑果味和淡淡的橙子味。

这瓶酒有很好的潜力，可以继续陈化。

Chinese pairs.original: 在酒庄与Alain Moueix进行了一场垂直品鉴（Alain同时准备了Chateau Fonroque和Chateau Mazeyres的垂直品鉴）。半支装。此酒的香气优雅、含蓄。更为芬芳的口感富有复杂的树莓、红花、桂皮和碎岩石滋味。不似2015年份那般深邃，但却更有女性气质。回味非常结实。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine has an elegant and subtle aroma. The palate is more fragrant with complex flavors of raspberry, red flowers, cinnamon and stony notes. Not as deep as the 2015 vintage, but with a more feminine character. The finish is very solid.

English pairs.original: A vertical tasting with Alain Moueix at the winery (Alain prepared the vertical tasting for both Chateau Fonroque and Chateau Mazeyres). Half bottle. Elegantly reticent on the aroma. More perfumed on the palate that was full of complex flavours of raspberry, red flowers, cinnamon and crushed stone. Less dark while more feminine than the 2015. Very firm on the finish.
English pairs.new: 与Alain Moueix在酒庄进行的垂直品鉴会（Alain为Chateau Fonroque和Chateau Mazeyres准备了垂直品鉴会）。半瓶。酒香优雅而谨慎。口感上更香艳，满满的复杂果味，包括草莓、红花、丁香和碎石。比2015年更轻、更女性化。口感坚实。

Western reviews.review: The 2016 Fonroque has a medium to deep garnet-purple color and opens with black cherries, kirsch, warm blueberries and spice box scents plus hints of tobacco and pencil lead. Medium-bodied, it has a chewy line and plenty of earth-inspired flavors, finishing just a tad grippy.
Western reviews.translation: 2016年福诺克红酒（Fonroque）呈现出深红色，酒体中充满了黑樱桃、可可、熟蓝berries和香料的香气，伴有烟草和铅笔的微妙味道。酒体中充满了泥土的风味，口感丰富，余味略带坚果感。

Western reviews.review: This has a slightly exotic edge, with warmed fig, crushed plum and steeped raspberry notes, laden with anise, black tea and singed apple wood accents. Though the fruit gushes, this shows focused energy through the finish, with a latent graphite hint. Drink now through 2035.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒带有略带异域风情的味道，具有烤枣、压碎的李子和浸泡的草莓的香气，伴有 licorice、黑茶和焦炭苹果木的味道。虽然果味丰富，但这款红酒在尾部展现出聚焦的能量，带有潜在的石墨味。建议立即饮用至2035年。

Western reviews.review: This was the last vintage with Alain Moueix as the owner - in 2017 he sold the estate to a French insurance company, although he is likely to continue as consultant for the foreseeable future. This has an impressive texture right from the start, with silky black and red fruit that's well knitted together, along with coffee and chocolate. It has clear potential but needs time. 30% new oak. 50hl/ha yield.
Western reviews.translation: 这是阿兰·穆埃克斯（Alain Moueix）最后一年的产酒 - 2017年，他将庄园卖给了一家法国保险公司，尽管他很可能会继续作为顾问。这个酒从一开始就有着出色的口感，黑红果酱的滑顺感与巧妙地编织在一起，伴有咖啡和巧克力。它有着明显的潜力，但需要时间来发酵。酒中有30%的新橡木桶，产量为每公顷50公斤。

Western reviews.review: This wine is superripe and generous in fruit. The contrast is with the dry core of tannins. Juicy blackberry fruits are rich and opulent, cut by acidity and supported by the tannins. Barrel Sample: 90-92.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的果味非常成熟丰富，充满了黑莓的风味。然而，干燥的橡皮质和坚果味却给人一种干净的感觉。果味丰富的黑莓风味被酸度和橡皮质所平衡。酒评：90-92分。

Western reviews.review: A blend of 90% Merlot and 10% Cabernet Sauvignon, the 2016 Château Fonroque is a pretty, classy wine that has plenty of tobacco and earthy notes, plenty of darker fruits, medium body, and a supple, lightly textured, balanced style on the palate. It doesn't match the 2015 yet is a beautiful, elegant, nuanced wine to drink over the coming 10-15 years.
Western reviews.translation: 2016年尚多克酒庄（Château Fonroque）的葡萄酒，90%为梅洛（Merlot），10%为卡波内（Cabernet Sauvignon），是一款优雅的葡萄酒，具有浓郁的烟草和泥土味道，丰富的黑色果味，中等体积，口感细腻，平衡。虽然它还没有达到2015年的水准，但仍是一款美丽的、优雅的、细腻的葡萄酒，适合在未来10-15年内饮用。

2020 Chateau Pichon Longueville Comtesse.name: 2020 Chateau Pichon Longueville Comtesse de Lalande 'Pichon Comtesse Reserve'

Chinese pairs.original: 品期酒的时候我就发现Pichon Comtesse Reserve 2020 拥有超出许多副牌酒的芬芳香气。新鲜爽滑的果汁，粒粒清晰的香料，含在口中能够嗅到层层的桂皮、丁香和孜然的辛香。一缕轻盈的紫罗兰锦上添花，细细地撒在糯米圆子般的酒体表面，品的我喜笑颜开。
Chinese pairs.new: When I first sipped the Pichon Comtesse Reserve 2020, I was struck by its exceptional bouquet that surpasses many of its peers. Fresh and silky fruit flavors, with distinct spices that unfold on the palate, revealing layers of cinnamon, nutmeg, and a hint of warmth. A delicate lavender note adds a touch of elegance, sprinkled subtly across the plush, round body of the wine.

English pairs.original: When tasting En Primeur, I found that Pichon Comtesse Reserve 2020 vintage boasts more fragrant flavours than many other second labels. Its juicy fruitiness is so fresh and precise. Kept in the mouth, it sends forth layers of cinnamon, cloves and cumin. Delicate fragrance of violet interspersed on the Sweet-dumplings-like body, making it even more delightful.
English pairs.new: 品尝2020年品种的皮尚公爵夫人储备时，我发现它比许多其他二级标签更具香气。它的果酱般的果味非常新鲜和精确。口感中，层次丰富的肉桂、丁香和肉豆蔻味道层层展开。紫罗兰的轻微香气在甜馅饼般的身体中交织，更加令人愉悦。

Western reviews.review: Ripe black fruits and rich tannins are piled high in this wine. It shows finesse in the tannins and in the blackberry flavors. This second wine is likely to age well. Drink from 2026
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的黑果味道成熟，富有深度的苦味。它在苦味和黑莓味道方面展现出优雅的风格。这是次酒，可能会在时间的推移中变得更加出色。建议2026年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: The attention seeking bouquet pops with its notes of flowers, tobacco leaf, spearmint, cocoa and sweet, ripe, red fruits. The wine is elegant, refined, soft and complex, with a finish that is long, refined, complex and gentle. This is a fabulous example of a baby Pichon Lalande that will drink beautifully on release, while offering pleasure for up to two decades. As the quality here continues jumping in class every year, this is becoming a true Pauillac brand, instead of a second wine. Drink from 2023-2040.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气引人注目，带有花朵、烟草叶、薄荷、可可和甜熟的红果的味道。酒体优雅、精致、柔和、复杂，口感长、精致、复杂、温和。 这是一款出色的“婴儿”皮尚拉朗德（Pichon Lalande），酒在释放时会美味无比，享受时长达两十年。随着品质每年都在不断提高，这款酒逐渐成为真正的波尔多（Pauillac）品牌，而不是次级酒。建议从2023年到2040年饮用。

Western reviews.review: Wow! Deep and intense playing with a really exciting mixed sensory profile which tells of notes of plums, pressed blueberries, magnolias, gardenias, hawthorn, white almonds and chopped lime. Full bodied, light tannins present in the matrix and a solid, enveloping finale. Splendid right away but better from 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 哇！深度和强烈的口感，充满了令人兴奋的多种感官特征，带有浓郁的浆果、压榨的蓝莓、夜shade花、花卉、山楂、白杏仁和切碎的柠檬的味道。酒体丰富，轻微的苦味在酒中弥散，结尾坚实，包围感强。非常出色，立即可享用，但从2025年开始会更好。

Western reviews.review: Intense ruby, purple reflections, discreet brightening on the rim. Subtle blackberry confit, ripe cherries, tobacco nuances, inviting notes of wood. Medium-bodied, subtle cherries, spicy tannins, a fresh structure, with a subtle sweetness, leafy nuances on the finish, good ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，紫色反射，酒杯边缘微微发亮。细微的黑莓酱果味，熟透的樱桃，烟草的细微变化，木头的诱人气味。中等体积，细微的樱桃味，辣的纤维，新鲜的结构，微微的甜度，叶子的细微变化在尾部，良好的陈化潜力。

Western reviews.review: Very precise fruit selection and a relatively complex aromatics. Beautiful delicate green pepper (ripe!) note of Cabernet Sauvignon, broad yet solid structure, filled with intense fruit concenration on the mid-palate, with a fairly long finish. Serious but accessible. Tasted 3 times in 2021 and the latest was Nov. 2021.
Western reviews.translation: 精确的果实选择和相对复杂的香气。美丽的细致的青椒（成熟！）的Cabernet Sauvignon香气，宽广而坚实的结构，中口充满浓郁的果实浓度，尾部较长。严肃但易于接触。2021年尝过三次，最新一次是2021年11月。

Chinese pairs.original: 这才是我想看到的Chateau Saint-Pierre嘛，陈年之后应该会比2019年份更加出色。和期酒时颇为浓郁的黑色浆果截然不同，装瓶后的Chateau Saint-Pierre 2020 真的不要太纯净！过往年份的封闭感也随之烟消云散，随着摇杯的节奏散发出层层甘草、八角、缕缕多汁的桑果、以及令人神驰的月季芬芳。收尾时的丰富单宁比期酒时柔和了不少，陈年5-10年之后相信会更加精彩。
Chinese pairs.new: This is the Chateau Saint-Pierre I've been waiting for, and I believe it will surpass the 2019 vintage after aging. Unlike the dense black fruit flavors of the barrel sample, the bottled 2020 Chateau Saint-Pierre is incredibly pure. The previous vintages' sense of closure has dissipated, and as the wine unfurls in the glass, it reveals layers of honey, cinnamon, luscious plum, and intoxicating jasmine. The finish is rich in tannins, but softer than the barrel sample, and I have no doubt it will be even more captivating after 5-10 years of aging.

English pairs.original: This is exactly the Chateau Saint-Pierre I have expected. it should be even better than the 2019 vintage after aging. Extremely different from the En Primeur wine with rich aromas of black berries, Chateau Saint-Pierre 2020 is incredibly pure after bottling. The closeness of previous vintages vanishes without trace. With each swirl of the glass, flavours of liquorice, anise and juicy mulberry and the enchanting fragrance of Chinese rose come forth layer by layer. The rich tannins on the finish are smoother than En Primeur. I believe it will be even more impressive after aging for 5-10 years.
English pairs.new: 这是我期待的圣皮埃尔庄园酒。经过陈化后，2020年份的酒应该会比2019年份更出色。与En Primeur酒相比，2020年圣皮埃尔庄园酒的气味更加丰富，黑莓的香气更加浓郁。酒瓶陈化后，酒的纯度更加惊人。之前的几年份的酒的特点已经消失不见。每次摇晃玻璃杯，酒中的香气层层展现： licorice、anise、浓郁的黑莓和中国玫瑰的香气。酒尾的丰富的纹理比En Primeur酒更加光滑。经过5-10年的陈化后，我相信酒会更加出色。

Western reviews.review: Eine Nase zum Eintauchen, ungemein parfümiert, mineralisch unterlegt, Cassis, viel Floralität; dicht gebaut am Gaumen, ungemein saftig und mit der obligaten Eleganz und viel Spannung, ausgezeichnete Tanninqualität, stimmiger Säurenerv; lang, ausgewogen; ein Klasse Saint-Pierre. 2028-2050
Western reviews.translation: 一瓶适合品鉴的红酒，闻起来极其香艳，矿物质味道浓郁，带有黑加斯派斯和大量花香味。口感丰富厚实，极其滋润，带有典型的优雅和张力，质地坚实，酸度完美。口感持久平衡，品质出色，圣皮埃尔级别的佳酿。推荐储存时间：2028-2050年。

Western reviews.review: The nose, with its notes of espresso, smoke, tobacco, incense, spice and red currants creates the perfume. On the palate, the wine is soft, seductive, and long, with a focus on its core of ripe, polished, earthy, black currants, chocolate and coffee beans. The finish is soft, polished, and fresh. Drink from 2024-2050.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中，含有浓缩的咖啡、烟雾、烟草、香烛、香料和红葡萄的味道，构成了其独特的香味。口感上，这瓶红酒柔和诱人，持久，重点在其成熟的、光滑的、泥土的黑葡萄、巧克力和咖啡豆上。尾韵柔和光滑，新鲜。建议从2024年到2050年饮用。

Western reviews.review: Very elegant and well lengthened in the sensory profile showing notes of lavender, hibiscus, red prunes, cut cedar, lemon, lime and vetiver. Medium bodied, good quality biting tannins and a tense finale which needs some time to distend. Better from 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感优雅，持久感强，展现出紫罗兰、红花、红李子、切割的红木、柠檬、酸橙和茵陈蒿等花果香气。口感中等，质地良好，具有强烈的咖啡因和紧张的尾部，需要时间来展开。建议在2025年后品尝。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby garnet, purple reflections, opaque core, delicate rim brightening. Subtle hints of liquorice and tangerine zest, fine tobacco nuances, black cherries in the background, inviting bouquet. Medium-bodied, fresh and elegant, red cherries, fine, supporting tannins, mineral and long lasting, certain ageing potential, a touch of nougat on the finish. (2025-2055).
Western reviews.translation: 深红宝石色，紫色反射，透明核心，细微的边缘闪亮。酒中有着浓郁的甘草和柑橘皮的香气，细微的烟草味，黑杏在背景中呼之欲出，令人垂涎的香气。中等体积，新鲜而优雅，红杏的味道，细微的支撑性苦味，矿物质和持久，确保了长期储存的潜力，酒尾有着一丝核桃味。 (2025-2055)

Chinese pairs.original: 如果用两个字来总结2023年份的Chateau Larrivet Haut-Brion，就是“舒坦”，如果一定要我多写几个字的话，那就是“特别舒坦”。沙土砾石的风土特性赋予了它舒畅的花果芬芳，红枣、桂圆、玫瑰花酱散发着迷人的香甜气息，蕾丝般的单宁轻轻掠过舌面…考虑到Pessac-Leognan 酒农在2023 年份遇到的众多挑战，Chateau Larrivet Haut-Brion 凭借不懈的努力让我们看到了“雨过天晴”后的美好。
Chinese pairs.new: If I had to sum up the 2023 Chateau Larrivet Haut-Brion in two words, it would be "comforting". If I had to write a few more words, it would be "exceptionally comforting". The gravelly soil of the terroir imparts a smooth, fruity aroma, with notes of dates, lychee and rose jam, releasing an alluring sweetness. Delicate tannins caress the palate like silk... Considering the numerous challenges faced by Pessac-Leognan winegrowers in 2023, Chateau Larrivet Haut-Brion has shown us the beauty of "after the rain" thanks to their unwavering efforts.

English pairs.original: Summing up Chateau Larrivet Haut-Brion’s 2023 vintage in two words: “comfortably satisfying.” If I were to expand, I’d say “exceptionally comfortable.” Its terroir, composed of sandy gravel, bestows upon it a delightful bouquet of flowers and fruits. Notes of red dates, longans, and rose jam exude a charmingly sweet aroma, while lace-like tannins gently glide over the palate… Considering the numerous challenges faced by Pessac-Leognan winemakers in the 2023 vintage, Chateau Larrivet Haut-Brion’s relentless efforts reveal the beauty that emerges after the storm.
English pairs.new: 总结2023年拉里维特豪布里昂庄园的葡萄酒风格：舒适满意。如果我要进一步描述，我会说：异常舒适。庄园的土壤，主要是沙砾质地，赋予了它一份令人愉悦的花果香气。红枣、龙眼和玫瑰果酱的香气散发着迷人的甜美气息，而细致的纱线状纤维素轻柔地滑过口腔……考虑到2023年佩萨克-莱奥纳克地区葡萄酒制造商所面临的众多挑战，拉里维特豪布里昂庄园的不懈努力揭示了风暴过后美丽的景象。

Western reviews.review: This wine initially shows reduction on the nose. On the palate though, it offers a refreshing, bright and lively sensation, with a firm mid-palate. The finish is characterized by great energy and fantastic, juicy tannins, with a supple texture and lingering acidity. Truly a gorgeous wine!
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒最初的气味有些浓缩。然而，在口感上，它却带来了一种清新、生动和活泼的感觉，口感中间部分坚实。酒尾充满了精力和极好的、水果般的苦味，口感细腻，酸度持久。简直是一瓶美酒！

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark but not quite opaque ruby-red color with purple hints at the rim. Tight, toasty oak aromas overlay restrained cassis on the nose. Intense cassis & blackcurrant on the palate is lifted by fresh acidity. The wine is of mid-weight with balanced alcohol & fine ripe-fruit tannin that give good grip. Fresh acidity gives a long, crunchy Cabernet finish that displays lovely vivid cassis. 04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，边缘有紫色光泽。酒鼻中有紧致的-toast气味和控制好的黑加香气。口感中有强烈的黑加和黑葡萄风味，新鲜的酸度使其更加鲜明。酒体中有平衡的酒精和成熟的果实纤维，给人一种良好的抓握感。新鲜的酸度使其具有长长的、脆脆的卡贝网酒尾，展现出美丽的鲜红色黑加风味。 评分：4.24 分（ep） DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 相比期酒时的表现，装瓶之后的Chateau Moulin Saint-Georges 2020 年份的细节更加清晰可见。纯熟而甜美，流畅而通透。清新脆爽的果香在鸢尾花装点下更具线条感。丝滑的单宁、温和的香料气息，再加上收口时的一缕独特的矿物质感，无不彰显着Vauthier家族对“精准”二字的理解与诠释。
Chinese pairs.new: Compared to its performance at the primeur tasting, the bottled Chateau Moulin Saint-Georges 2020 shows even more clarity and definition. Elegant and sweet, smooth and transparent. The crisp and refreshing fruit aromas are even more defined with the iris label. Silky tannins, gentle spice notes, and a hint of mineral complexity at the finish all demonstrate the Vauthier family's understanding and interpretation of the term "precision".

English pairs.original: Unlike the En Primeur wine, Chateau Moulin Saint-Georges 2020 after bottling displays more distinct details. Mellow and juicy, smooth and translucent. The crisp and fresh fruitiness is more linear under the decoration of the iris. The silky tannins, gentle fragrance, and a hint of unique minerality on the finish are standing for the Vauthier’s understanding and performance of “precision”.
English pairs.new: 与En Primeur酒相比，2020年Chateau Moulin Saint-Georges在瓶装后展现出更明显的细节。酒体柔和、果香浓郁，滑顺透明。清新果香线条清晰，像iris一样精致。酒尾 silky纤维般的苦味、轻柔的香气和独特的矿物质味道，体现了Vauthier对“精确”的理解和表现。

Western reviews.review: Cherries, flowers, espresso, forest leaf and plums create the perfume. Medium-bodied, soft, lifted, fresh and silky, there is a nice touch of salinity, chocolate and mint in the finish that accompanies all the elegant, bright, red fruits. Drink from 2025-2045.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中融合了樱桃、花朵、咖啡、森林叶和石榴的芬芳。口感中等，柔软，轻盈，新鲜，滑顺。酒尾带有盐味、巧克力和薄荷的余韵，完美地伴随着优雅、明亮的红果味。建议从2025年到2045年饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 2010年份的 Chateau La Tour Figeac 同时拥有热年份的浓郁和热烈，以及凉年份的冷峻和清新。在甜美的树莓、樱桃酱和鲜李子的香气中，蕴藏着一股镇定自若的单宁骨架，和道骨清风般的气质。甜美中透着咸鲜；力道中泛着柔光，和太极拳中崇尚“刚柔并济”理念不谋而合。这是 Chateau La Tour Figeac 近50年来的最佳年份之一，而且拥有不可限量的陈年潜力，谁喝谁知道。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2010 Chateau La Tour Figeac masterfully balances the opulence of a hot vintage with the elegance of a cool one. Amidst luscious aromas of sweet raspberries, cherry jam, and fresh plums, lies a refined tannic structure and an ethereal quality reminiscent of a gentle breeze. Sweetness is tempered by a hint of saltiness; power is tempered by a soft glow, embodying the harmony of yin and yang. This is one of the best vintages of Chateau La Tour Figeac in nearly 50 years, with boundless aging potential - only time will tell.

English pairs.original: The 2010 vintage of Chateau La Tour Figeac masterfully combines the richness and warmth of a hot year with the crispness and freshness of a cool year. It boasts sweet aromas of raspberry, cherry jam, and fresh plum, all supported by a calm and composed tannic structure and a breezy elegance. There’s a lovely balance of sweet and saltiness, with strength softened by a gentle touch, much like the Tai Chi concept. This is best vintage of Chateau La Tour Figeac in the past 50 years, offering tremendous aging potential that will impress anyone who tries it.
English pairs.new: 2010年夏特劳费雅克（Chateau La Tour Figeac）红酒，完美地结合了炎热年份的丰富和温暖，以及凉爽年份的清新和新鲜。它带有甜美的红莓、草莓酱和新鲜石榴的香气，所有这些都由平和和沉着的纤维结构和轻盈的典雅风格所支持。有一个美好的平衡，甜美和咸味的平衡，强度被柔和的触摸所软化，就像太极概念一样。这是夏特劳费雅克50年来最好的年份，提供了极大的陈化潜力，会让尝试它的人都感到惊叹。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby, purple reflections, subtle bright rim. Ripe plum, a touch of liquorice, floral nuances, fine nougat notes. Full-bodied, dark berry fruit, fine vivid tannins, mineral touch, black berry and some nougat in the finish, good length, delicate spicy nuances in the aftertaste.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，紫色反射，微微亮的边缘。成熟的李子，少量的甘草，花朵细微的变化，精致的果仁味。体积丰富，黑berry的果实，细致的明亮的纽扣，矿物质的触感，黑berry和一些果仁在尾部，良好的长度，细致的辣味的余味。

Western reviews.review: 2010 La Tour Figeac is made by Christine Derenoncourt, the wife of Stephane Derenoncourt. In 2010, the apple does not fall far from the tree with this wine 75% Merlot and 25% Cabernet Franc blend. Licorice, spice, jammy black cherry aromas open to a suave, lush, fennel, spice and ripe dark berry finish. 91-93
Western reviews.translation: 2010 年拉图尔菲加克（La Tour Figeac）是由克里斯汀德罗农库尔（Christine Derenoncourt）制作的，她是斯蒂芬德罗农库尔（Stephane Derenoncourt）的妻子。在2010年，这个由75%梅洛（Merlot）和25%卡波弗朗克（Cabernet Franc）组成的葡萄酒证明了“苹果不会掉在树外”，具有浓郁的黑樱桃、香料和浓郁的黑醋栗香气。酒尾富有层次，具有清晰的薄荷、香料和成熟的黑果味。评分：91-93分。

Western reviews.review: (2011) Cedary, raspberry-like lift to this, a certain impression of elegance. There's a raciness to the palate, the fruit bright and focused on crisp, bittersweet liquorice and red fruits, with a biting freshness to the finish. Lovely style this, managing the tannins and retaining lots of savoury bite.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有典型的红木香气和浓郁的莓果味，给人一种优雅的感觉。口感上充满活力，果味清新明亮，焦糖和红果的苦甜味道浓郁，尾部带有清新的口感。这种风格很美丽，巧妙地处理了橡皮质的坚韧感，保留了大量的咸味。

Western reviews.review: Deep purple colour is virtually opaque and is held right to the rim. The vivid attractive, open red-berry aromas are typical of Tour Figeac. The palate has an appealing, smooth, opulent structure. The fruit profile mirrors that found on the nose. The flavour profile is typical of Merlot, being juicy with a clean capsicum note. The silky tannins take on some bite at the finish. Alcohol is balanced to warm while fresh acidity enhances the juicy nature of the fruit and gives reasonable length to the finish. 3/11 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的颜色是深紫色的，几乎完全不透明，颜色一直延伸到杯口。酒中的香气是典型的Tour Figeac风格，鲜艳、吸引人，开阔的红果香气。口感丰富、滑顺，结构优雅。口味与鼻子上的香气相符，典型的梅洛特风格，果味 juicy，带有清新的辣椒味。酒中的纤维素 silky，口感中有微微的咬感。酒中的酒精度合适，温暖而不刺激。酒中的酸度清新，增强了果味的 juicy 性质，酒尾有合理的长度。评分：3/11

Chinese pairs.original: 2000年份的Domaine de Chevalier的强劲感给我留下了不错的印象，即便经过23年的磨砺，依然无法洗去它的一身傲骨。我在品尝时惊奇地发现，该年份的成熟与力量中暗藏着某种异样的清凉，我似乎在它满面荣光的身后嗅到了淡淡的忧伤。因此，从纯粹的热年份来看，我认为2000年份的Domaine de Chevalier 并不算太典型，但这“阳刚背后的温柔” 却恰好击中了我的心房。
Chinese pairs.new: 2000年份的Domaine de Chevalier给我留下了深刻的印象，即使经过23年的时间，它仍然保持着傲人的气质。在品尝时，我惊讶地发现，这年份的成熟和力量中隐藏着一种奇特的清凉感，似乎在它光彩夺目的外表背后，有一丝淡淡的忧伤。因此，从纯粹的热年份来看，我认为2000年份的Domaine de Chevalier并不典型，但它的“阳刚背后的温柔”恰好击中了我的心弦。

English pairs.original: The strength of the 2000 vintage of Domaine de Chevalier made a good impression on me. Even after 23 years, it still has a proud character that can’t be worn down. I am happy to find ta kind of freshness hidden inside its strength and maturity, like there’s a bit of sadness behind its impressive look. So, compared to the typical hot vintages, I don’t think the 2000 Domaine de Chevalier is very typical. But this ‘gentleness behind the strength’ really struck a chord with me.
English pairs.new: 2000年Domaine de Chevalier的风格给我留下了深刻的印象，即使经过23年的时间，它仍然保持着骄傲的性格，无法被磨灭。 我很高兴发现，这种强大的酒中仍然隐藏着一种新鲜感和成熟感，就像它的强大外表背后有一丝忧伤。 与典型的炎热年份相比，我认为2000年Domaine de Chevalier并不是典型的风格。但是，这种“强大背后的温柔”确实让我深感触动。

Western reviews.review: Medium to deepish ruby-red. Powerful aromas of plummy red fruit are well-married with oak notes. Ripe, plummy fruit on the palate is medium to full bodied with attractive cedar notes. Acidity is balanced to good & alcohol is in check. Tannins are fine & supple, giving grip on the finish, which lasts well. A well balanced wine with the concentration to age well. 11/04 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色。酒中的气味非常强烈，带有浓郁的浆果和橡木味。口感丰富，浆果味浓郁，酒体中等到中等以上，带有优雅的松木味。酸度和酒精都很好地平衡，口感柔顺。酒尾有细致的纤维，持久。整体来说，这是一瓶平衡的红酒，酒中浓度足够让它在时间长河中成熟。评分：11/04 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 半支装。这支酒严肃、优雅的香气透出紫罗兰、岩石、香料、黑莓和枇杷味。绵密的口感富有坚实的单宁；回味充满蓝色水果滋味和多汁的酸度。
Chinese pairs.new:
Bottle size: half.

This wine exudes a serious and elegant aroma of lavender, stone, spice, blackberry, and loquat. The rich texture is full of robust tannins; the finish is filled with blue fruit flavors and juicy acidity.

English pairs.original: Half bottle. Seriously refined aromas of violet, stone, spices, blackberry and loquat. Dense on the palate with lots of firm tannins; the finish was full of blue fruits and juicy acidity.
English pairs.new: 半瓶。酒香非常精致，带有紫罗兰、石头、香料、黑莓和荔枝的气息。口感浓郁，具有坚实的橡皮质感，尾部充满了蓝莓和清脆的酸度。

Chinese pairs.original: 焦糖、咖啡、黑樱桃和黑醋栗的香气，丰满圆润的酒体，柔和丝质的单宁，结构复杂，香气多变，回味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Caramel, coffee, black cherry, and black walnut aromas, full-bodied and smooth texture, soft and silky tannins, complex structure, changing aromas, and a long finish.

Western reviews.review: Exotically textured, with a melange of red fruits, licorice, flowers and citrus, the wine has body, length, purity of fruit and complexity. But it is the lush texture that steals the show! This beauty will age for at least 2 decades. 97 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有异国情调的质感，融合了红果、 licorice、花朵和柑橘的多种风味，酒体丰富，口感持久，果实纯正，复杂性十足。然而，最令人惊艳的还是它的丰富质感！这瓶美酒至少可以存放20年。评分97分。

Chinese pairs.original: 半支装。瓶醒一小时。此酒优雅、甜美的香气充满了金银花和草本以及微微的黑醋栗、生姜、薄荷糖和咸矿物味；一点泥土和皮革气息增添了一抹严肃和深邃。口感圆润、绵密而且新鲜，同时富有大量甜美的红醋栗滋味，伴有延续到那滑爽回味中的出色酸度。
Chinese pairs.new: Bottled in a half-bottle. Decant for one hour. This wine is filled with elegant and sweet aromas of honeysuckle, herbs, and subtle black walnut, ginger, peppermint, and mineral notes. A hint of earth and leather adds a touch of seriousness and depth. The palate is smooth, velvety, and fresh, with a rich abundance of sweet red plum flavors, accompanied by excellent acidity that lingers through the silky finish.

English pairs.original: Half bottle. Aeration in bottle for one hour. The elegantly sweet sniff was dominated by honeysuckle and herb mingled with cassis, ginger, mint candy and savoury-mineral; a touch of earth and leather gave the nose a more serious deeper edge. Sleek, dense and fresh, the palate offered sweet red currant fruit in abundance, as well as stunning acid that concluded in a polished aftertaste.
English pairs.new: 半瓶。瓶内氧化一小时。优雅甜美的香气中，honeysuckle和香草与黑currant、姜、薄荷糖和矿物质调和，带有泥土和皮革的味道，给鼻子带来了更深沉的严肃感。口感细腻、密集、清新，口中充满了甜美的红currant果味，伴有惊人的酸度，结尾是光滑的余味。

Western reviews.review: A spectacular effort from this estate rivaling their 2005, but more flashy/flamboyant, this dark ruby/purple wine has a strikingly intense nose of licorice, flowers, plums and dark berries. Medium to full-bodied, very approachable and silky, this suave, very sexy wine can be drunk early on as well as aged for 20+ years.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶酒的表现出色，堪比2005年产量，但更为耀眼夺目。这瓶深红紫色的酒，具有强烈的鼻香，带有 licorice、花朵、浆果和黑莓的味道。酒体中等到中等以上，口感细腻，非常容易入口，酒质优雅，性感。酒可以立即享用，也可以储存20年以上。

Western reviews.review: Warm and rounded, this spicy wine has wood flavors just showing through the ripe fruit. It is already delicious, with rich blackberry flavors right up front, although its aging potential is evident with the concentrated, deep structure.Cellar Selection
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感温暖圆润，带有木质味道的香气，掩盖在成熟的果味下。它已经非常美味，果香丰富，黑莓味道浓郁，但其成熟潜力也很明显，结构深厚集中。适合陈年储存。

Western reviews.review: Ripe and fleshy, with an enticing mix of Linzer torte, currant confiture and crushed plum fruit offset by hints of briar and bay leaf. The long finish lets roasted apple wood, singed iron and tobacco leaf notes fill in, while staying plush in feel. Combines the ripeness of the vintage with a nice old-school feel. Best from 2013 through 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感丰富饱满，具有诱人的林格饼干、黑枣果酱和压碎的浆果风味，伴有荆棘和樟叶的微妙气息。长长的尾部让烤苹果木、焦铁和烟草叶的味道充盈其中，而保持着丰富的感觉。它结合了这瓶酒的成熟和古典风格。建议从2013年到2025年享用。

Western reviews.review: Plenty of fresh plum fruit alongside the bitter chocolate in the nose, but on the palate this retains the Margaux lightness and elegant dryness, the finish just slightly warm. Drink or hold.
Western reviews.translation: 酒 nose中充满了新鲜的浆果和苦巧克力味道，但在口感上，这款酒保留了马格努（Margaux）地区典型的轻盈和干爽的风格，尾部略带温暖。适合立即饮用或储存。

Western reviews.review: Already incredible to drink, the wine is concentrated, rich, sensuous, and packed with layers of fruit that does not quit. Even though it is early days, it is difficult not to be seduced by the complex aromatics and if that does not grab you, the velvet-textured opulence in the finish will. If you prefer exuberant, youthful fruits, with decadent textures, and a finish packed with fruit and glycerin, try a bottle now, If you desire more secondary notes, wait a few more years. Either way, this is a superb wine and a clear candidate for the best vintage of Brane Cantenac ever produced! Drink from 2024-2055.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒已经可以品尝，酒精浓度高，富有感官体验，果味丰富，层次感强。即使是初期阶段，也很难抵抗其复杂的香气。如果你不喜欢这种香气，那么酒尾的细腻、丰富的口感也会让你着迷。如果你喜欢果味丰富、年轻、豪放的红酒，带有丰富的口感和果味，建议现在就喝。如果你更喜欢酒中的次级香气，建议再等几年。无论如何，这是一瓶出色的红酒，是布兰·卡南（Brane Cantenac）历史上最好的产季之一！建议在2024-2055年之间饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 一款能够带你通往纯美之境的风土之酒，只有理解低调内涵的人，才能真正感受它的美。瞧瞧看啊，它柔嫩细化的单宁、它冰爽丝滑的肌肤、它香甜软糯的回甘，都在2023年份“老好人”（温和的酒精、成熟的多酚）的氛围下显得更加精致。还没完，收尾时的紫罗兰花香才是这款酒的经典瞬间，往日封闭的香气终于开始展开怀抱，就像冷美人露出的久违的微笑。
Chinese pairs.new: A wine that takes you to a realm of pure elegance, only those who appreciate subtlety can truly appreciate its beauty. Look at it, its refined tannins, its silky smooth texture, its sweet and velvety finish, all come together in the 2023 vintage "old good fellow" (mellow alcohol, mature polyphenols) to create a refined and sophisticated whole. And it's not over yet, the lavender floral notes at the finish are the classic moment of this wine, the previously closed aromas finally unfold, like a cold beauty revealing a long-awaited smile.

English pairs.original: A terroir wine that leads you to a realm of pure beauty, can only be fully appreciated by those who understand its understated essence. The 2023 vintage is a perfect example with its tender, refined tannins, cool, silky texture, and sweet, soft finish. Its “good-natured” atmosphere (gentle alcohol and mature polyphenols) enhances its exquisite qualities. The finale of violet aromas is the wine’s defining moment, as previously restrained scents finally unfold, like a cool beauty offering a long-awaited smile.
English pairs.new: 一瓶来自特定土壤的红酒，带领你进入纯粹的美丽世界，只有那些理解其低调本质的人才能真正领略其美。2023年产季的这瓶红酒，展现出细腻的、精致的橡胶感、凉爽的、丝滑的口感和甜蜜的、柔和的尾韵。其“善良”的气质（低酒精和成熟的多酚）增强了其优雅的品质。紫罗兰香气的终曲是这瓶红酒的定义时刻，因为之前被抑制的香气终于展开，如一位冷艳美人带来了一种久违的微笑。

Western reviews.review: This wine offers a delightful blend of both horizontal and vertical extension, showcasing lovely elasticity. Consistently impressive from start to finish, it features a firm and vibrant mid-palate, complemented by refreshing acidity. The wine culminates in a fantastic sweet sensation, accompanied by hints of salinity, powdery tannins, and a beautiful finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒呈现出完美的平衡，既有水平的延展，又有垂直的深度，展现出柔韧的口感。从开头到结尾，酒精的表现始终令人印象深刻，中口坚实而生动，清新果酸的加入使得口感更加鲜活。酒尾呈现出美妙的甜感，伴随着微微的咸味、细致的粉末状纤维和优雅的余韵。

Western reviews.review: Reiffruchtig mit Sahnehäubchen, Cassis und Brombeerlikör; satt am Gaumen, ein Mund voll Wein; mächtig, rund, mit hochwertigen, seidigen Tanninen und einer eindrücklichen Länge. Im Kontext des Jahrgangs mit viel Opulenz, dennoch frisch.
Western reviews.translation:
这段红酒评论翻译成中文如下：

果香丰富，带有奶油般的口感，黑加仑和浓郁的黑莓酒香；口感丰富，满口都是酒的味道；强烈、圆润、具有高质量的细腻的橡果感和深远的长度。在这一年份的背景下，酒的富丽堂皇，但仍然保持着新鲜的味道。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark black-ruby color is not quite opaque. Aromas are of concentrated raspberry & mulberry fruit with touches of vanilla - there is nicely-handled, cedary-oak. The palate is juicy & fresh, displaying raspberry & mulberry fruit overlaid by vanilla & cedary spices. Tannins are fine & the wine is medium-bodied. Alcohol is balanced. Vivid notes of raspberry & vanilla-cream on the mid-palate. Ripe, pure red-fruit on the finish last well. 04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的黑紫色，略微透明。酒香中浓郁的莓果和黑浆果味，伴有轻微的香草和松木味。口感清新果甜，莓果和黑浆果味浓郁，覆盖着香草和松木的香气。酒中纤维细腻，酒体中等。酒精平衡。中口有浓郁的莓果和香草奶油味。酒尾留有成熟纯正的红果味。评分：04/24 (ep) DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 若让我在Chateau Fonplegade 诸多年份中挑选最心仪的一个，我会毫不犹豫地选择2022年份。香气或许并不如该年份其他酒款那么活泼跳跃，然而一旦入口，味蕾上犹如鲜花盛开，美不胜收。酒液轻舐舌间，淡淡的甜意令整个酒体变得璀璨动人。再加上黏土石灰岩所赋予的粉笔灰单宁，以及酸梅、山楂、橘子的芳香弥漫，优雅之感顿时油然而生，如思如梦，令人陶醉。
Chinese pairs.new: If I had to choose a standout vintage from Chateau Fonplegade, I would unhesitatingly select the 2022. While the aromas may not be as lively and expressive as some of the other vintages, once in the mouth, the flavors burst forth like a bouquet of flowers, breathtakingly beautiful. The wine glides effortlessly across the palate, leaving a subtle sweetness that elevates the entire wine to a dazzling level. The addition of powdery tannins from the limestone soils, along with the aromas of sour cherry, quince, and orange, creates an air of elegance that is both dreamy and intoxicating.

English pairs.original: If I had to pick a favorite vintage from the numerous years of Chateau Fonplegade, I wouldn’t hesitate to choose 2022. Although its aroma may not be as lively as other wines from the same year, once it touches the palate, it blossoms like a beautiful bouquet of flowers. The wine delicately caresses the tongue, imparting a subtle sweetness that lingers throughout the body. Together with the chalky tannins from the clay-limestone soil and the fragrance of sour plums, hawthorn, and citrus, it exudes an effortless air of elegance.
English pairs.new: 如果我必须从多年的香格拉德酒庄中挑选一个最喜欢的年份，我毫不犹豫地选择2022年。虽然它的香气可能不如同年其他酒的活跃，但一旦它接触到舌头，它就像一朵美丽的花朵般盛开。酒精轻轻地抚摸舌头，带来一种细微的甜味，持续贯穿整个身体。与来自粘土岩土壤的 chalky tannins 和酸枣、山楂和柑橘的香气一起，它散发着一种优雅的轻松气质。

Western reviews.review: 93-95 Barrel sample. The estate is American owned by the Adams family. The wine has concentration that will bring out dark fruits and structure, but it also has great freshness among all the richness.
Western reviews.translation: 评分：93-95分。酒庄由美国阿德姆斯家族所有。酒精浓度高，会展现出黑色水果的深度和结构，但同时也带有丰富的清新感。

Western reviews.review: Initially you notice flowers, and crushed rocks before moving on to all the black raspberries, licorice, cherries, and background note of orange blossoms in the perfume. On the medium-bodied palate, the wine is soft, pure, and fresh, with a sweetness to the fruits, silkiness to the tannins and a touch of chocolate-mint, sea salt and espresso in the endnote. Made from a blend of 85% Merlot, and 15% Cabernet Franc, 15% ABV, pH 3.7. The harvest took place September 12 - September 26. Yields were 35 hectoliters per hectare. Drink from 2026-2047. 94-96 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 初步闻酒时，会闻到花朵、碎石和黑莓的香气，随后会闻到 licorice、樱桃和橙花的香气。口感中等，酒体软、纯、清新，果实甜美，纤维滑顺，尾部带有巧克力薄荷、海盐和咖啡的味道。酒精含量15%，pH值3.7，来自85%梅洛和15%卡波弗朗克的混合葡萄，采摘时间为9月12日至9月26日，产量为35公顷每公顷。建议饮用时间为2026-2047年。评分94-96分。

Western reviews.review: (85% Merlot, 15% Cabernet Franc, Ausbau in zu 50% Neuholz, 30% gebrauchten Barriques sowie je 10% in Beton-Eiern und Amphoren) Ein zarter Duft nach Himbeeren und Kräutertee, dazu kommen viele Veilchen, das Holz hält sich dezent im Hintergrund. Im Auftakt fruchtig, fast harmlos, viel süsse Frucht, top verpackter Gerbstoff, hier ist alles an seinem Platz, die Säure stützt, der Alkohol überbordet nicht, wunderbare Länge und ein rotfruchtig-würziges Finale. Sehr lang und vermutlich der beste, je verkostete Fonplegade. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / AGCCSE / Château Dassault) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation:
这是一瓶红酒评论。翻译成中文如下：

85% 梅洛，15% 卡波弗朗克，使用50% 新橡木桶，30% 二手巴里克桶，以及各10% 的混凝土蛋和陶瓷坛子。 

这瓶红酒有着轻柔的红莓和香草茶香味，伴随着大量的Forget-me-not花香，木头味很轻微。口感果香，几乎无害，充满甜美的果味，精致的鞣质，所有元素都处于最佳状态，酸度支持，酒精不突出，酒体长长，结尾是红果和浓郁的味道。非常长，可能是Fonplegade历史上最好的酒。 (评分于2023年4月/AGCCSE/ Château Dassault) #primeurs22

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby colour, opaque core, purple reflections. Red wild berries, fresh cherries, floral nuances, subtle vanilla, inviting bouquet. On the palate juicy, elegant, ripe wild berryish fruit, good fruit, discreet acidity, mineral aftertaste and a salty finish. Good ageing potential, a silky food wine.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，浓密的核心，紫色反射。酒中充满了红野果、鲜红樱桃、花朵细微香气、微妙的香草，令人垂涎的香气。口感丰富、优雅、成熟的野果风味，果味丰富、适度的酸度、矿物质余味和咸味的尾韵。酒有很好的陈化潜力，是一款细腻的食用葡萄酒。

Western reviews.review: Subtle and nuanced nose, mixing fresh dark cherries and some salty plum aromatics. Floral, great dynamics carried on from the nose to the palate. Clarity, luminosity, finishing with supple and fresh tannins. Long lasting.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气非常细致，混合着新鲜的黑樱桃和一些咸梅的香气。口感花香，鼻子和口感的动态非常好。清澈透明，口感柔软新鲜，尾部带有细腻的橡皮感。持久感非常强烈。

Chinese pairs.original: 直到乳酸发酵结束都不使用硫；在水泥缸中进行酒精发酵和乳酸发酵；淋皮；在轻度烘烤、30%新的法国桶内陈年12个月。此酒深邃但清澈、优雅的香气富有黑巧克力、黑色香料、黑莓、干花、岩石和香草味。多矿物的口感充满张力。
Chinese pairs.new:
This wine is aged without the use of sulfur until the malolactic fermentation is complete; fermented and aged in concrete tanks; skin-contact; aged for 12 months in 30% new French oak with light toast. 

The wine boasts a profound yet crystal-clear and elegant aroma, rich in black chocolate, black spice, blackberry, dried flowers, stone and herbal notes. The palate is full of minerality and tension.

English pairs.original: The sulphur is not used till the end of MLF; alcoholic fermentation and MLF in concrete vats; pumping over; aging 12 months in 30% new French oak barrels with light toast. Limpid on the deep yet elegant sniff of black chocolate, black spices, blackberry, dried flower, stone and vanilla. Freshly mineral-inflected on the very tense taste.
English pairs.new:
这瓶红酒的评论翻译如下：

酒中没有使用硫磺，直到完成MLF（乳酸发酵）；酒精发酵和MLF均在混凝土罐中进行；使用泵送法；在30%新法兰克尔橡木桶中陈化12个月，轻度烤香。

酒液清澈，深色中带有优雅的黑巧克力、黑香料、黑莓、干花、石头和香草的气息。口感清新，矿物质味道浓郁，非常紧张。

Western reviews.review: Medium-bodied, elegant, floral, spicy and fresh, with a vibrant core of currants, cedar, forest leaf and creamy cherries. There is lift, supple-textures and ample, sweet, red fruits that linger starting in the mid-palate and continuing all the way to the finish. Drink from 2024-2040.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感中等，优雅，花香，带有辣味和新鲜感，内心充满了浓郁的黑currant、松木、森林叶和奶油般的樱桃味。酒中有明显的升华感，质地细腻，果味丰富，甜美持久，从中口开始一直延续到尾部。建议从2024年到2040年饮用。

Western reviews.review: This is a wine that brings out all the bright fruit of the vintage. It has classic black-currant flavors and crisp acidity. The tannins are a firm supporting act to this wine that will develop well over the medium term.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一个展现出当年佳酿的鲜活果味的红酒。它具有典型的黑加仑风味和清脆的酸度。酒中的纤维素质坚实有力，会在中期内逐渐发酵。

Western reviews.review: Quite darkly colored, medium ruby-red. The red-plum fruit aromas have a medium intensity & are overlaid by coffee notes - there are lifted violet aromas. The mid-weight palate is open, perfumed & fresh with redcurrant & cassis fruit. The tannins are fine & a little drying, closing up the mid-palate a little. Good fresh acidity lifts the fruit on the finish. Alcohol is balanced & the wine finishes with fresh red-fruit & violet perfume. 05/22 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的颜色深红色，中度浓郁。酒中的红浆果香气中等强度，覆盖着咖啡的香气，伴有轻微的紫罗兰香气。口感中等，开阔、芬芳、清新，带有红葡萄和黑加仑果香。酒中的纤维素细致，略微干燥，稍微封闭了中口。酒中的新鲜酸度使得果香在尾部升华。酒中的酒精平衡，酒尾带有清新的红果和紫罗兰香气。评分：05/22 DCAMW。

Western reviews.review: Medium to deep ruby-red. The nose comprises leafy cassis & tobacco-leaf aromas. The palate displays fresh acidity & the blackcurrant fruit is at best mid-weight. The tannins are supple while still providing a reasonable structure. Alcohol is in balance & the finish lasts well. 11/06 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深红色至深红色。

香气：带有叶子味的黑加西（一种黑色水果）和烟草叶的气味。

口感：酸度清新，黑加西果味中等，口感平滑。酒精与果味平衡，尾部持久。

Chinese pairs.original: 2016年份对于Chateau La Pointe来说具有里程碑般的意义，是酒庄进军高品级Pomerol的新纪元。这款酒把 “通透敞亮” 一词诠释地淋漓精致，口感如溪流般清澈，鲜嫩的红黑莓果在触碰味蕾地瞬间就炸裂出清甜的果汁，回味时还透着松柏的清凉。得益于紧致的单宁结构，这款酒展现出修长的轮廓，用舌尖触碰时似乎还能感受到它紧实的肌肉纹理。陈年12-18年易如反掌，建议喜欢Pomerol的朋友重点关注。
Chinese pairs.new: 2016年是Chateau La Pointe的里程碑年份，标志着酒庄进入高品质Pomerol的新时代。这款酒以透明清晰著称，口感清澈细腻，红黑莓果的鲜嫩味道在入口即刻爆发，留下清甜果汁的回味，伴随着松柏的清凉感。酒中紧致的单宁结构赋予了它修长的轮廓，舌尖触碰时仍能感受到其紧实的肌肉纹理。建议陈年12-18年，特别是喜欢Pomerol风格的朋友们关注此款酒。

English pairs.original: The 2016 vintage is a milestone for Chateau La Pointe, a new era for the winery’s entry into high-class Pomerol. This wine perfectly interprets the words “transparent and bright”: the palate is as clear as a stream, the fresh red and black berries burst with sweet juice the moment they touch the palate, and the aftertaste is refreshing with the scent of cypress. Thanks to the intense tannic structure, the wine has a slender body, and you can feel its firm texture when the liquid touch your tongue. It is easy to age for 12-18 years and fans who love Pomerol should pay close attention to this wine.
English pairs.new: 2016年是沙特劳波因特（Chateau La Pointe）的里程碑，标志着这家酒庄进入高端波美罗（Pomerol）的新时代。这款酒精完美地诠释了“透明和明亮”的概念：口感清澈如流水，新鲜的红黑果酱在舌头上爆发，释放出甜美的汁液，余味清新，带有松柏的香气。酒精的强烈的鞣质结构使得酒精具有纤细的体型，当液体接触舌头时，你可以感受到它坚实的质地。酒精可以储存12-18年，热爱波美罗的酒迷们应该关注这款酒精。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby garnet, purple reflections, faint brightening on the rim. Inviting bouquet with a floral touch, delicate hibiscus, ripe Amarena cherry and touch of tangerine zest. Juicy palate with sweet, but tightly meshed texture, ripe tannins, fine nougat and a very long finish. Certain ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色宝石色，紫色反射，酒杯边缘微微发亮。酒香诱人，带有花朵的味道，细致的荔枝花，成熟的阿马雷纳樱桃和柑橘皮的微妙味道。口感丰富，甜但紧密的质地，成熟的苦味，细致的果仁和非常长的尾部。酒有明显的陈化潜力。

Chinese pairs.original: 香蕉梨、硬糖果伴随着柚子皮和柠檬草的芬芳一股脑的涌入鼻子，让人真真切切地感受到了何为“青春洋溢”。100%橡木桶发酵和陈酿完全没有掩盖这款酒的精气神儿，通透清瘦的口感中暗藏着一股咸咸的矿物感，在热年份依旧能如此的清爽，地下的石灰岩绝对功不可没。
Chinese pairs.new:
A burst of citrus and lemon verbena aromas, accompanied by notes of green apple and hard candy, floods the senses, evoking the essence of "youthful vitality." 

Despite being aged in 100% oak barrels, the wine's spirit remains unbridled. A crisp, lean palate conceals a subtle mineral undertone, which remains refreshing even in warmer vintages. The limestone subsoil undoubtedly plays a crucial role in this wine's refreshing character.

English pairs.original: William pear and English candy poured into the nose with the fragrance of grapefruit peel and lemongrass, making me feel the “The song of youth”. 100% oak barrel fermentation and aging do not cover up the essence of this wine. There is a touch of salty mineral notes hidden in the translucent taste. Its limestone soil plays a vital role in keeping freshness in the hot vintage.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的香气中融合了红梨和英式糖果的味道，伴随着柑橘皮和柠檬草的香气，让我感受到“青春的旋律”。 100% 的橡木桶发酵和陈酿并未掩盖这款酒的本质。透明的口感中隐含着微妙的咸矿物质味道。其石灰质土壤在炎热的产季中起到了保持新鲜度的关键作用。

Western reviews.review: Black fruit, dried sage, charred bark, lavender, graphite and oyster shell on the nose. It’s full-bodied with firm, tightly wound tannins. Focused. Excellent tannin framing. Best yet. 65% cabernet sauvignon, 25% merlot, 5% cabernet franc and 5% petit verdot.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中有黑果、干燥的sage、焦炭的树皮、紫罗兰、石墨和贝壳的味道。口感丰富，具有坚实的、紧绷的橡胶质。聚焦。橡胶质的框架出色。至今最佳。酒中含有65%卡波雷尔葡萄，25%梅洛葡萄，5%卡波雷尔法兰克葡萄和5%小佩蒂特葡萄。

Western reviews.review: The 2019 Château Carbonnieux sports a deep purple/ruby hue to go with a brilliant nose of red and black currants, spring flowers, spicy oak, and hints of tobacco. It's beautiful on the palate as well and is medium to full-bodied, has a seamless, elegant texture, ripe tannins, and a great finish. It's the finest wine I've tasted from this estate. The blend is 60% Cabernet Sauvignon, 30% Merlot, and the balance Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot, all brought up in 40% new barrels. It’s well worth tracking down some bottles and will keep for two decades.
Western reviews.translation: 2019年夏特奥卡邦尼厄斯（Château Carbonnieux）呈现出深紫红色，酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓郁，口感丰富。酒精含量高，酒精味道浓

Western reviews.review: Dominated by structured Cabernet Sauvignon, this wine is powerful, with layers of woodaging flavors to go with the strong tannins. Developing slowly.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒以结构严谨的卡波涅尔（Cabernet Sauvignon）为主，具有强大的力量，木质陈化的味道层次丰富，搭配坚实的苦味。

Western reviews.review: Strong black pepper, cloves, saffron and smoked cedar notes, adding up to spicy fruit and oak influence. A little overpowering on the attack but it settles down and this has excellent personality and hold. Good stuff. 5% Cabernet Franc completes the blend.Barrel Sample: 92
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感非常丰富，带有强烈的黑胡椒、丁香、土豆花和烟熏红木的香气，混合了辣椒和橡木的味道。虽然初期可能会有些过于强烈，但随着时间的推移，它会变得更加平衡，展现出出色的个性和持久性。完成了的酒中，卡贝网法（Cabernet Franc）占了5%。酒评人认为，这瓶酒非常出色，评分92分。

Western reviews.review: Exhibiting aromas of earthy black fruits, bay leaf, burning embers and forest floor, the 2019 Carbonnieux is medium to full-bodied, rich and enveloping, with a broad attack that segues into a fleshy core of fruit framed by ripe acids and fine, powdery tannins that assert themselves gently on the finish.
Western reviews.translation: 2019年卡尔邦尼厄红酒展现出泥土黑果、迷迭香、燃烧的炭和森林地面的香气。它是中等到全身的体积，丰富而包围性的口感，开口宽广，逐渐转变为果肉的柔软核心，受益于成熟的酸度和细致的粉末状纤维素，纤维素在尾部温和地表达。

Chinese pairs.original: 2016年份的Jean Faure充满了石墨和铅笔芯的气息，闻起来就像一副素描铅笔画。虽然现阶段的果香还比较收敛，但你依旧可以感受到它强大的内核与身后隐藏的光芒。口感集中有力，细密的单宁周围还装点着丝丝焦油的味道。仅现在的表现来看，我认为Jean Faure 2016还尚未展现它真正的实力，陈年5-10年后，它会把好年份+带梗发酵+品丽珠的精髓展现地淋漓尽致。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2016 Jean Faure is filled with graphite and pencil lead aromas, reminiscent of a pencil sketch. Although the fruit aromas are currently restrained, you can still sense its powerful core and the hidden radiance behind it. The palate is concentrated and forceful, with fine-grained tannins accompanied by a subtle smokiness. Based on its current performance, I believe the 2016 Jean Faure has yet to reveal its true potential. After 5-10 years of aging, it will showcase the essence of its good vintage, barrel fermentation, and Pinot Noir characteristics in all its glory.

English pairs.original: Jean Faure 2016 displays some evident notes of graphite and pencil lead, giving you the illusion of being presented with a pencil sketch drawing. Although the fruity aromas are relatively reserved at this stage, its dynamic inner power hidden behind it is still noticeable. The palate is concentrated and intense, with a hint of tar flavors surrounding the fine tannins. Judging from its current performance, I do not think Jean Faure 2016 has shown its true potential yet. With 5-10 years’ bottle-aging, it will perfectly bring out the essence of the Cabernet Franc in good vintage and made with whole bunch fermentation.
English pairs.new: 让·法尔 2016 年的红酒展现出明显的石墨和铅笔笔迹的气味，让人觉得像是在欣赏一幅铅笔素描画。虽然在当前阶段，果香相对保守，但其内在的动力仍然可感。口感浓郁且强烈，带有焦油味的细致纤维。根据当前表现，我认为让·法尔 2016 年的红酒尚未展现出其真正的潜力。经过 5-10 年的陈酿，它将完美地展现出卡波弗朗克的本质，尤其是在好年份和使用整束发酵的葡萄酒中。

Western reviews.review: Etwas zurückhaltender als der 2018er, tiefgründig, rauchig, darüber Veilchenblüten. Im Gaumen bereits wunderbar zugänglich im Auftrakt, dann packt der Wein zu, zeigt viel Gerbstoff, eine rassige Säurestruktur, die Frucht ist auf den Punkt gereift, der Alkohol nicht überbordend. Langer, dunkelfruchtiger und würziger Abgang. Viel Wein fürs Geld. Bis 2036
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的风格比2018年版更为谨慎，深度丰富，带有烟熏味和紫罗兰花香。口感上非常容易入口，随后酒体变得更加丰富，展现出丰富的橡木味和清晰的酸度，果味已经成熟，酒精度合适。酒尾长长，带有深色果味和香料味。价格合理，推荐储存至2036年。

Western reviews.review: Another Saint Emilion that is better in bottle than it was in barrel, the wine now offers deep, juicy plums, espresso, licorice, truffle flowers. Silky, elegant, fresh and lively, with a lifted, dried red pit fruit and floral finish, give this a few years before popping a cork, and it will show even better.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶圣埃米利翁红酒在瓶装时比在酒桶时更出色。酒中充满了深浓的浆果味，咖啡、甘草和松露花香。酒体细腻、优雅、清新、活泼，带有轻盈的干燥红果和花香尾韵。建议在几年后才打开瓶盖，酒会呈现出更好的风貌。

Western reviews.review: Etwas zurückhaltender als der 2018er, tiefgründig, rauchig, darüber Veilchenblüten. Im Gaumen bereits wunderbar zugänglich im Auftrakt, dann packt der Wein zu, zeigt viel Gerbstoff, eine rassige Säurestruktur, die Frucht ist auf den Punkt gereift, der Alkohol nicht überbordend. Langer, dunkelfruchtiger und würziger Abgang. Viel Wein fürs Geld. Bis 2036
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的风格比2018年版更为谨慎，深度丰富，带有烟熏味和紫罗兰花香。口感上非常容易入口，随后酒体变得更加丰富，展现出丰富的橡木味和清晰的酸度，果味已经成熟，酒精度合适。酒尾长长，带有深色果味和香料味。价格合理，值得推荐。可储存至2036年。

Western reviews.review: Another Saint Emilion that is better in bottle than it was in barrel, the wine now offers deep, juicy plums, espresso, licorice, truffle flowers. Silky, elegant, fresh and lively, with a lifted, dried red pit fruit and floral finish, give this a few years before popping a cork, and it will show even better.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶圣埃米利翁红酒在瓶装时比在酒桶时更出色。酒中充满了深浓的浆果味，咖啡、甘草和松露花香。酒体细腻、优雅、清新、活泼，带有轻盈的干燥红果和花香尾韵。建议在几年后才打开瓶盖，酒会呈现出更好的风貌。

Chinese pairs.original: Moulin Saint-Georges 2019把黏土石灰岩含蓄克制的性格特点完美地融入了热年份的美乐之中。纯净清晰的香气散发着淡淡的紫罗兰芳香，虽然表现欲并不强，但却十分典雅。单宁数量着实不少，而质感却细密绵柔，满是平衡和优雅。
Chinese pairs.new:
Moulin Saint-Georges 2019

This wine masterfully blends the restrained, limestone-clay character of the terroir with the opulence of a warm vintage. The bouquet is pure and elegant, with subtle hints of lavender, though it's not overly showy. The tannins are abundant, yet silky and refined, with a beautiful balance and poise.

English pairs.original: The most prominent character of Moulin Saint-Georges 2019 is to integrate the conservative of clay and limestone soil into a hot vintage’s Merlot. The purely clear nose releases a gentle scent of violet with a reserved yet classical personality. Despite a large number of tannins, its texture is still refined and creamy, and the body is still filled with balance and elegance.
English pairs.new: 穆兰圣乔治2019最突出的特点是将保守的黏土和石灰质土壤与热度的梅洛葡萄相结合。清澈的鼻子释放出一种温和的紫罗兰香气，具有保守而典雅的个性。尽管有大量的鞣质，但其质地仍然细腻而丰富，身体仍然充满着平衡和典雅的气质。

Western reviews.review: This small vineyard of old vines is dominated by Merlot. Its ripe black fruits and dark texture comes from concentration and the wood aging. The wine has a fine juicy character to balance the structure. Drink from 2026 Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 这家小型葡萄园以老 vines 葡萄为主，主要种植梅洛葡萄。酒中的成熟黑果和深色质感来自于浓缩和木桶陈化。酒中有细腻的果肉质感来平衡结构。建议2026年后饮用。 - 罗杰沃斯

Chinese pairs.original: 很有能量感的一款酒，仅从颜色就能感受到它丰满的质感。成熟的果实和浓郁的酒体中蕴藏着一抹清凉感，仿佛一块薄荷黑巧克力在口中融化，绵柔清凉的同时还伴随着丰富的单宁。随着时间的打磨，这款酒会变得更加成熟稳重、层次分明。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine exudes energy, with its rich texture evident from the first glance. Ripe fruit and a full-bodied palate are balanced by a hint of refreshing coolness, reminiscent of melting dark chocolate infused with mint. Silky smooth and refreshing, it's also packed with rich tannins. As it ages, this wine will only become more refined, balanced, and complex.

English pairs.original: This wine enjoys plenty of energy, you can sense its richness from the intense color, and its freshness from the rich fruitiness, as if a piece of minty dark chocolate melting on the palate delivering soft freshness and abundance of tannins. With time going by, this wine will embrace greater maturity and complexity.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒充满了活力，通过其浓郁的颜色和丰富的果香，你可以感受到它的丰富和新鲜。酒口中像融化的薄荷巧克力般柔和的清新和丰富的苦味。随着时间的流逝，这款红酒会逐渐成熟并变得更加复杂。

Western reviews.review: The wine has power and density. Packed with generous, firm tannins and dense fruits, the wine is a balanced blend of Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot. Produced from a specific parcel, the wine will age well. Drink from 2026. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒具有强大的力量和密度。充满了丰富的、坚实的橡皮质和浓郁的果味，酒精的平衡比例是卡波内尔·萨维尼翁和梅洛的混合。来自特定的葡萄园，酒精会在时间的推移中变得更加完美。建议2026年后饮用。 - 罗杰·沃斯

Western reviews.review: Polished, fresh, elegant and loaded with currants, cherries, tobacco, smoke, licorice, espresso and leafy herbs, the wine is medium-bodied, forward, juicy and vibrant with lift, energy and refinement on the palate and in the fruit-filled, soft-textured finish. Drink from 2023-2036.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感非常光滑，新鲜，优雅，充满了黑杏、樱桃、烟草、烟雾、甘草、咖啡和叶绿植物的香气。酒体中等，前端突出，口感丰富，生动，带有上升感和精致感。酒尾果香丰富，口感柔软。建议从2023年到2036年饮用。

Western reviews.review: Viel versprechende, blumig-fruchtige Aromatik von Flieder und roten Beeren, abgerundet durch dezente Eichenwürze; voller Ansatz, fleischige Entwicklung, superbes, dichtes, raffiniert-frisches Tannin, grosse Rasse und saftige Länge; vereint Rasse mit Fülle und Raffinesse.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有很大的潜力，具有鲜花和红果的芳香，伴有细微的橡木香味。口感丰富，肉感丰富，具有极好的、密集的、精致的果酸和坚果味，酒体充满活力，口感丰富，酒尾长而圆润。整体上，酒体充满活力，丰富而精致。

Chateau Certan De May de Certan 2000.name: Chateau Certan De May de Certan 2000

Chinese pairs.original: 浓郁的巧克力，草莓和鲜花的气息，口感浓郁，天鹅绒般的单宁，悠长的回味，酒体强劲。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich chocolate, strawberry, and floral aromas, full-bodied texture, silky tannins, long finish, robust body.

Western reviews.review: Showing not quite as well as it did the last time I tasted it, the light fruit is starting to fade. Drink this crisp, bright red berry centered wine sooner than later. 87 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的表现不如上次品尝时那么出色，轻微的果味已经开始消退。尽快品尝这瓶清爽、明亮的红果味中心的红酒。评分87分。

champagne gosset cuvee celebris extra br.name: champagne gosset cuvee celebris extra brut millesime 2002

Chinese pairs.original: 这款高质量的年份香槟展现了甜美宜人的香气，杏、果仁（榛子、松仁）、中药、酵母、油酥糕点、稻草和香料矿物质。口中极好的清澈感及杰出的酸度均让人感到十分愉悦，并在其集中、悠长且富有成熟果味的回味中达到了顶点。
Chinese pairs.new: This high-quality vintage champagne showcases a sweet and alluring aroma, featuring notes of almond, hazelnut, and pistachio, along with herbal and yeasty undertones, brioche, hay, and mineral notes of spice. The palate is characterized by a refreshing clarity and exceptional acidity, culminating in a concentrated, lingering, and maturely fruity finish.

English pairs.original: A high quality vintage Champagne with a sweet but delightful aromatic of apricot, nuts (hazelnut, pine nut), medicine, yeast, pastry, straw and spicy-mineral. The terrific clarity and exceptional acid were admirable, terminating in an intense and enduring finish that showed reams of ripe fruit.
English pairs.new: 一瓶高品质的陈年香槟，具有甜蜜但令人愉悦的杏子、坚果（杏仁、松子仁）、药膏、酵母、糕点、稻草和矿物质的香气。其出色的透明度和极佳的酸度令人印象深刻，终结于一场强烈而持久的尾韵，展现了成熟的果实。

Western reviews.review: Aged for 10 years before disgorging and a further time before release, this is Gosset's top wine from a great vintage year. Extra Brut means it is dry, although the age of this wine has softened the intense acidity and turned it into an elegant, mature wine of great complexity as well as immediate attraction. It will age further at least until 2022, although it is totally drinkable now.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒经过10年的陈酿后 disgorging，之后再次陈酿一段时间，才正式上市。这是高斯塞特(Gosset)从一场伟大的葡萄酒年份中推出的顶级酒款。Extra Brut意味着酒精度很高，尽管这瓶酒经过了10年的陈酿，强烈的酸度已经被软化，变得更加优雅、成熟，并且具有极高的复杂性和立即吸引力。酒精可以继续陈酿至少到2022年，但现在已经可以直接饮用。

Western reviews.review: (2014) Célébris is sourced from top Grand Cru villages, a blend of slightly more Chardonnay than Pinot Noir (52% as opposed to 48%). It is Extra Brut with only 5g/l dosage and once again, malolactic fermentation was blocked. From one of Champagne's greatest vintages, this has a bold golden colour and is immediately tight and fantastically mineral on the nose. There are hints of toffee and a lovely lime and pear-skin richness giving this a powerful aromatic character. It is massively concentrated and indeed powerful on the palate. It's a young wine with huge intensity, tight and appley fruit. but shimmering length and such cool precision. It is steely, almost like a Grand Cru Chablis, with such beautiful length and balance that it can be admired now, but will undoubtedly improve with cellaring.
Western reviews.translation: 2014年，Célébris来自顶级格兰克鲁村的葡萄，酒中白葡萄酒和红葡萄酒的比例为52%和48%。酒精含量仅为5克/升，完全没有二次发酵。来自香槟地区最好的产季之一，这款酒呈现出金色，酒香紧致，矿物质味道浓郁。酒中有糖浆和柠檬皮的味道，酒的香气非常强烈。酒口浓郁，果味紧致，酒的长度非常长，酒的平衡非常好。酒的味道像格兰克鲁霞多丽一样坚实，酒的长度和平衡非常好，可以现在就品尝，但也可以放置一段时间让酒的味道更好。

Western reviews.review: Light golden colour with fine lively bubbles. Mature nose of ripe fruit, red berries, plum, pear and crushed notes, intense palate rich and ample with a creamy mousse, layers of fruit, rather pinot like with raspberry and fine spices, fresh and very long finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是浅金黄色，气泡细致活跃。酒香成熟，带有成熟水果、红莓、李子、梨子和压碎的香气，强烈的口感丰富充满，奶油般的泡沫，水果层次丰富，类似于品诺特的风格，带有红莓和细微的香料，口感新鲜，非常持久。

Chinese pairs.original: 2022年份的Les Forts de Latour 拥有让人费解的清新感和清晰度。酸梅、山楂以及酸枣的香气酸甜宜人，毫无高温年份的痕迹。口感则如山涧清泉般流畅，透过酒液能够看见丁香、草果与玫瑰花瓣的婀娜身姿。让我见识到了顶级波尔多人对酿酒艺术的深刻领悟，能在炽热之火中幻化出春雨的温润，试问，谁能不服？
Chinese pairs.new: The 2022 Les Forts de Latour boasts a perplexing freshness and clarity. The nose is a delightful mix of tart cherry, prune and quince, with no hint of the heat that's typical of the vintage. The palate flows like a mountain stream, with the subtle nuances of cinnamon, green fruit and rose petal unfolding through the wine. It's a masterclass in winemaking from the top Bordeaux estates, conjuring a spring rain from the fiery flames. Who wouldn't be impressed?

English pairs.original: Les Forts de Latour 2022 possesses a perplexing freshness and clarity. The fragrances of sour plum, hawthorn, and jujube are tangy and pleasant, without a trace of the heat in this vintage. The mouthfeel is smooth like a mountain stream, revealing the graceful figures of cloves, allspice, and rose petals throughout the palate. It shows the profound understanding of the art of winemaking by top-level producer, who can transform the scorching heat into spring rain. Who can deny such masterful craftsmanship?
English pairs.new: 拉图尔的强力红酒2022年具有迷人的清新和明澈。酒中有酸梅、山楂和枸杞的香气，带有清新的味道，没有一点烈酒的味道。口感如山泉般流畅，展现了丁香、肉豆蔻和玫瑰花的优雅形象。它展现了顶级酒庄对酿酒艺术的深刻理解，能够将烈日转化为春雨。谁能否认这样的精湛技艺？

Western reviews.review: 94-96 Barrel sample. This is a beautifully structured wine, with great black fruits and solid tannins. At the same time, the wine has a soft edge around the firm core. The wine is ripe and firm at the same time.
Western reviews.translation: 94-96 桶样品。这是一款结构优美的红酒，具有丰富的黑色果味和坚实的橡木味。同时，酒中有一个柔和的边缘环绕着坚实的核心。酒体丰富而坚实。

Western reviews.review: Tobacco leaf, peppery herbs, creme de cassis, forest floor, cedar, and white pepper notes open the aromatic profile. On the palate, the wine is sweet, rich, ripe, fresh and clean, with layers of blackberries, and black currants. There is a softness to the tannins, as well as structure to the creamy-textured wine, and freshness in the finish that you can feel as it lingers. The wine was produced from blending 58.7% Cabernet Sauvignon, 37.9% Merlot, and 3.4% Petit Verdot. 14.47% ABV, 3.7 pH. The wine represents 41% of the harvest. Drink from 2028-2045. 94-96 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中包含了烟草叶、辣香草、黑加仑、森林地面、红木和白胡椒的复杂风味。口感上，酒体甜润、丰富、成熟、清新、干净，黑莓和黑葡萄的层次感非常丰富。酒中的天然果酸和酚类物质使得口感柔和，同时也保留了结构和丰富的口感。酒尾留有清新的感觉，持续时间较长。酒的成分中，卡波网葡萄酒占58.7%，梅洛葡萄酒占37.9%，佩蒂·维多葡萄酒占3.4%。酒精度14.47%，酸度3.7。酒的产量占收获量的41%。建议在2028-2045年间饮用。评分94-96分。

Western reviews.review: Subtile, tiefgründige Nase, rote Waldbeeren, Cassis, Lavendelblüten. Im Gaumen mit Rasse und Schliff, kein Gramm Fett, viel Druck, die Tannine sind hochwertig, die Säure stimmt, das hat Zug und Frische, hallt lange nach, wird hervorragend reifen und doch früh Spass machen, denn diese bezaubernde Frucht ist schlicht, ein Spektakel. Ein grosser Forts de Latour. 2030-2055+ (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 auf Château Latour) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论，翻译如下：

细腻、深刻的鼻子，带有红色森林果实、黑加香和兰花香味。口感中充满了品质和锋利感，没有一克脂肪，压力很大，高质量的苦味，酸度恰到好处，具有张力和新鲜感，口感持久，会在未来很好地成熟，但同时也会在短期内给人带来乐趣，因为这美丽的果实简直是太棒了。这个拉托尔堡的葡萄酒是非常出色的，预计会在2030-2055年左右达到最佳状态。

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby, opaque core, purple reflections, brightening on the rim. Orange zest, dark cherries, a hint of cassis, a touch of fine oak, multi-faceted bouquet. Complex, deep with black berries, tight-knit, very good freshness, mineral and long lasting with a salty finish. Certain ageing potential, perhaps for decades.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，浓密的核心，紫色反射，酒液边缘略微发亮。 橙子皮、黑樱桃、黑加仑、细微的橡木味，复杂的香气。 黑莓复杂深厚，紧密结合，非常新鲜，矿物质，持久，咸味的尾韵。 有一定的陈化潜力，可能会持续数十年。

Chinese pairs.original: 这款扎实的佳酿展现出优雅、微妙的香气，红色花朵、糖渍樱桃、香料矿物质、薄荷脑、咸香和芝麻。口感如同Chambolle般轻盈、细腻，同时还富有通透、坚实的绝妙酸度——支撑着其强劲但纹理细致并且宛如缎子似的回味。
Chinese pairs.new: This well-crafted wine showcases elegant and subtle aromas, featuring red floral notes, candied cherries, mineral spices, minty freshness, saltiness, and sesame. The palate is as light and refined as Chambolle, with a perfect balance of transparency and firm acidity – supporting its robust yet textured and silky finish.

English pairs.original: This solid effort showed a gracefully delicate aromatic of red flowers, candied cherry, spicy-mineral, menthol, savoury and sesame. Ethereal and fine, almost Chambolle-like, and it possessed brightly zesty yet very firm acidity that supported its forceful but fine-grained and satiny finish.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒表现出优雅的花朵香气，糖果般的樱桃味，矿物质和辣椒的味道，薄荷和芝麻的味道。酒体轻盈细致，几乎像香波尔一样优雅，具有明亮的柠檬味和非常坚实的酸度，支持其强劲但细腻的口感。

Western reviews.review: Very attractive nose, smoky with red and dark berries, earth and fine spices. The palate is rich and structured, rather modern with some new oak, attractive wild berries, fine spices, rounded tannin and a long complex finish. Very tempting and promising.
Western reviews.translation: 非常吸引人的鼻子，带有红色和黑色浆果、土壤和精致的香料。口感丰富且结构良好，现代风格，带有新橡木味，吸引人的野生浆果、精致的香料、圆润的纤维和长复杂的尾部。非常诱人和有希望。

Chinese pairs.original: 2010年份的Clos Saint-Martin 有一些轻微的氧化，焦糖和太妃糖的香气非常突出。该年份的酸度非常漂亮，能够在口中划出一道流畅的彩虹，把2010年份的浓缩+高挑表达地清清楚楚。清甜的入口与咸咸的收尾形成了完美地呼应，伴随着麻麻的香料气息在口中延展。仅我所品尝的酒款来看，2010年份已经达到了巅峰状态，建议陈年时间不要超过5年。
Chinese pairs.new: 2010年份的Clos Saint-Martin 有轻微的氧化，焦糖和太妃糖的香气非常强烈。该年份的酸度非常出色，能够在口中留下一道流畅的余味，清晰地展现了2010年份的浓缩和高挑。清甜的入口与咸咸的收尾形成了完美的对比，伴随着麻麻的香料气息在口中延展。基于我所品尝的酒款，2010年份已经达到巅峰状态，建议陈年时间不要超过5年。

English pairs.original: Clos Saint-Martin 2010 displays a subtle touch of oxidation, with pronounced notes of caramel and toffee. This vintage’s acidity is exceptionally elegant, drawing a smooth rainbow-like arc in the mouth, eloquently conveying the concentration and sophistication of the 2010 vintage. The initial “sweetness” harmoniously complements the saline finish, extending across the palate with a tingling sensation of spices. From the wines I’ve tasted, it appears that the 2010 vintage has already reached its pinnacle, and I would recommend not exceeding a further 5 years of bottle aging.
English pairs.new: 克洛圣马丁2010年款红酒展现出微妙的氧化感，带有明显的焦糖和糖浆糖味。 这个年份的酸度异常优雅，口感平滑如绘，生动地展现了2010年款的浓郁和高雅。初期的“甜度”和盐味完美和谐，延展在口中，带有刺激性的香料感觉。从我尝过的酒中看来，2010年款已经达到巅峰，建议不要再继续陈化超过5年。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby, purple reflections, discreet bright rim. Very attractive bouquet, floral underlay, dark berry fruit, a touch of cherry, delicate candied orange zest, fine nougat. Juicy, elegant, great fruit, finely integrated tannins, fresh acidity, very harmonious and appetizing, long lasting, mineral on the finish, also a cherry aftertaste, it has sure further ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，紫色反射，光亮的边缘。非常吸引人的香气，花朵底调，黑berry果味，樱桃味，糖浆橙皮，细致的果仁。口感鲜美，优雅，果味丰富，细致的纤维，新鲜的酸度，非常和谐，令人垂涎，持久，矿物质尾韵，也有樱桃余味，确实有进一步的陈化潜力。

Western reviews.review: 2010 Clos St. Martin, the smallest classified wine in the Bordeaux appellation comes from a 1.33-hectare vineyard. Planted to 7,000 vines/ha, with an average age of 31 years. The terroir is planted on clay and limestone soils over the limestone plateau. Smoke, mineral, licorice, oak, and jammy berry scents open to a supple, ripe, silky textured concentrated wine ends with a long fresh, black cherry, spice and licorice finish. 94-95
Western reviews.translation: 2010年克洛斯圣马丁（Clos St. Martin）是波尔多产区中面积最小的分类红酒，来自1.33公顷的葡萄园。每公顷种植了7000株葡萄，平均年龄31岁。该葡萄园的土壤是由石灰岩高原上的粘土和石灰岩组成。酒中有烟熏、矿物质、甘草、橡木和浓郁果酱般的黑berry香气，口感丰富、柔滑、浓郁，酒尾长长，带有新鲜黑樱桃、香料和甘草的余味。评分94-95分。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby, purple reflections, discreet bright rim. Very attractive bouquet, floral underlay, dark berry fruit, a touch of cherry, delicate candied orange zest, fine nougat. Juicy, elegant, great fruit, finely integrated tannins, fresh acidity, very harmonious and appetizing, long lasting, mineral on the finish, also a cherry aftertaste, it has sure further ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，紫色反射，光亮的边缘。非常吸引人的香气，花朵底调，黑berry果味，樱桃味，糖浆橙皮，精致的果仁。口感鲜美，优雅，果味丰富，细腻的纤维，新鲜的酸度，非常和谐，令人垂涎，持久，矿物质尾韵，也有樱桃余味，确实有进一步的陈化潜力。

Western reviews.review: 2010 Clos St. Martin, the smallest classified wine in the Bordeaux appellation comes from a 1.33-hectare vineyard. Planted to 7,000 vines/ha, with an average age of 31 years. The terroir is planted on clay and limestone soils over the limestone plateau. Smoke, mineral, licorice, oak, and jammy berry scents open to a supple, ripe, silky textured concentrated wine ends with a long fresh, black cherry, spice and licorice finish. 94-95
Western reviews.translation: 2010年克洛斯圣马丁（Clos St. Martin）是波尔多产区中面积最小的分类红酒，来自1.33公顷的葡萄园。每公顷种植了7000株葡萄，平均年龄31岁。该葡萄园的土壤是由石灰岩高原上的粘土和石灰岩组成。酒中有烟熏、矿物质、甘草、橡木和浓郁果酱般的黑berry香气，口感丰富、柔滑、浓郁，酒尾长长，带有新鲜黑樱桃、香料和甘草的余味。评分94-95分。

Chinese pairs.original: 这便是“玛歌白亭”的独特魅力，总能够凭借咸咸的矿物质感展现卓越级别的清新风采。在2022这个酸度并不突出的年份，它依然能轻而易举地打动你的味蕾。品尝这款酒就像品味一碗带着清爽感的燕窝炖银耳，香甜而略带胶质的酒体中充满了清透之感。人们常说热年份的干白缺乏平衡，然而2022年份的“玛歌白庭”无疑是对这一说法最有力的反驳。
Chinese pairs.new: This is the unique charm of "Mango Bai Ting", which always showcases its exceptional freshness with a salty mineral taste. Even in the 2022 vintage, which is not particularly acidic, it can easily move your taste buds. Tasting this wine is like savoring a bowl of silky bird's nest soup with silver ear mushrooms, where the sweet and slightly gelatinous texture is filled with a sense of clarity. People often say that dry whites from hot vintages lack balance, but the 2022 vintage of "Mango Bai Ting" is undoubtedly a strong rebuttal to this statement.

English pairs.original: The unique charm of Pavillon Blanc consistently exhibits a remarkable freshness through its salinity and mineral character. In 2022, a year not known for pronounced acidity, it still manages to effortlessly enchant your taste buds. Tasting this wine is akin to enjoying a bowl of Tremella Soup; its lightly jelly body radiates a sense of purity. Although it is commonly said that white wines from warm vintages lack balance, Pavillon Blanc 2022 undoubtedly provides a compelling rebuttal to this notion.
English pairs.new: 帕维永白酒（Pavillon Blanc）独特的魅力始终展现出令人惊叹的新鲜感，通过其矿物质特性和盐度。2022年，尽管这不是一个以明显酸度而闻名的年份，但帕维永白酒仍然轻松地迷住了你的味蕾。品尝这款酒，就像享受一碗 Tremella 汤（ Tremella 是一种中国名为银耳的菌类，常用于中医食疗）；其轻盈的体积散发着纯粹的感觉。尽管人们常说温和年份的白酒缺乏平衡，但帕维永白酒2022年版无疑提供了对这一观点的有力反驳。

Western reviews.review: Lemon chiffon, lawn grass, pears, vanilla, white peach, and tangerine skin nuances form the core of this wine. The wine is forward, sweet, creamy, and pure, with a buttery accent on the long, fruit-packed, fresh, vibrant backend. The wine will be a pleasure to enjoy on release and over the following decade or longer. The wine is produced from 100% Sauvignon Blanc.13.4% ABV. 3.18 pH. Yields were only 14 hectoliters per hectare, so not much of this wine was made. If you are a fan, act quickly. This is the white wine of the vintage! Drink from 2024-2037. 97-97 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这款白酒的主要特点是柠檬、草地、梨子、香草、白桃和橙皮的风味。酒精前端甜、奶油、纯粹，后端果味丰富、清新、生动，带有奶油的味道。酒精含量13.4%，pH值为3.18，产量仅为每公顷14公升，因此这款酒的产量很少。如果你喜欢这款酒，赶快行动吧！这是当年最好的白酒之一。建议在2024-2037年内饮用。评分97-97分。

Western reviews.review: (Die weissen Trauben wurden am 18. August gelesen, 100% Sauvignon Blanc, pH 3.18, 13.4% Alkohol. Rund 50% der Ernte gingen in den Pavillon Blanc, es wird mit den restlichen Trauben neu einen Zweitwein werden - Name und Label noch nicht bekannt) Grandiose Nase, sehr expressiv, viel exotische Frucht, Salzzitrone, weisser Pfirsisch, nussige Noten und deutliche Mineralik. Im Gaumen rund und füllig im Auftakt, dann packt der Wein zu, wird straffer, schlanker, sehr knackige Frucht, ausgezeichnete Säurestruktur, der Wein zeigt Rasse, Präzision und Balance, hallt im Abgang sehr lange nach und endet salzig und mit zitrischen Rückaraomen. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 auf Château Margaux) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation:
这是一瓶白葡萄酒的评论。以下是翻译成中文：

白葡萄酒于8月18日采摘，100%萨伯涅特白葡萄，pH 3.18，13.4%酒精。约50%的产量用于白葡萄酒系列，剩余的葡萄将用于制作另一种葡萄酒，名称和标签尚未确定。

这瓶葡萄酒的香气极其丰富，非常独特，具有大量的异国情调的果味，柠檬味，白梨味，坚果味和明显的矿物质味。

口感圆润丰富，初期充满果味，随后葡萄酒变得更加紧致，更加细长，具有非常脆的果味，出色的酸度结构，葡萄酒表现出品质，精确性和平衡，口感非常持久，结束时带有盐味和柠檬味回味。

(评分于2023年4月在Château Margaux进行的“En Primeur”评估中完成) #primeurs22
