Western reviews.review: Delicate aromatics, with a subdued herbal note. Medium built body, plentiful freshness , with creamy finish coming from ageing on the lees. Not massive structure but full of details. Savoury, nuanced, lingering finish.
Western reviews.translation: 细微的香气，带有柔和的草药味。中等体积的酒体，充满清新感，来自于在酵母上的陈化。结构并不强大，但细节丰富。口感丰富，带有复杂的余味。

Western reviews.review: Jolie fraîcheur et élégance dans l’aromatique qui appelle à la gourmandise. Le nez a une jolie petite concentration, de la richesse en fraîcheur ainsi que de la maîtrise. On a des notes de pêche de vigne éclatante fraîche, de brugnon pulpeux frais et plus légèrement d’agrumes frais (comme le citron et le pamplemousse mûr) ainsi que des pointes de quenette, de graves fraîches salines et une imperceptible pointe de sens de la place. La bouche est fraîche, minérale, élégante, racée et offre une jolie définition, de la précision, de la tension, une jolie guideline, un côté étiré ainsi qu’une belle gourmandise. Il y a un côté aérien dans son gras. En bouche ce vin exprime des notes de pêches blanches pulpeuses, de petits fruits blancs éclatants et plus légèrement de fleurs de sureau associées à des touches de quenette ainsi que des pointes d’agrumes frais et une subtile note presque noisette toastée beurrée. On perçoit aussi un joli gras issu du bâtonnage tout en finesse qui apporte une jolie texture en délicatesse. Cela confère de la complexité aromatique ainsi qu’une certaine richesse en justesse. Un joli vin gastronomique, frais, élégant, aérien et puissant. Il y a un joli travail sur les bons amers et sur la sapidité avec une discrète pointe zestée frais en fond sur la persistance.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

这款红酒具有清新而优雅的香气，令人垂涎欲滴。酒鼻中有着清晰的浓度，富有新鲜感和控制感。酒中有着明亮的葡萄果香，新鲜的葡萄果肉香，轻微的柑橘果香（如熟柠檬和橙子），以及一些新鲜的鳟鱼、海盐和几乎不可察觉的风味。口感清新、矿物质、优雅、精致，具有清晰的定义、精确的味道、紧张感、优雅的线条、拉长的侧面和美味的口感。酒中有着空气感的油感。在口中，这款酒表达了白葡萄果肉香、闪亮的小白果香和轻微的紫罗兰花香，伴随着鳟鱼、柑橘果香和几乎不可察觉的烤杏仁味。我们还可以感受到细致的木桶酿造感，带来细腻的口感，增加了香气的复杂性和正义感。这是一款美味的餐酒，清新、优雅、空气感和强劲。酒中有着美妙的苦味和咸味处理，伴随着清新的柑橘果香味道在后续中持续存在。

Western reviews.review: Light yellow green, silver reflections. A hint of lime, white apple, flowers, a touch of peach, a hint of passion fruit. Juicy, elegant, lemony touch, fine acidity, delicate and fresh, seems light on its feet, salty finish.
Western reviews.translation:
酒色：浅黄绿色，银光闪烁。

香气：有柠檬、白梨、花朵、桃子和百日红果的味道。

口感：果香浓郁，清新雅致，带有柠檬味，酸度细腻，新鲜清爽，感觉轻盈，尾部略带盐味。

Chinese pairs.original: 2020年份的柔润感让我开始重新审视Chateau Lafon-Rochet的传统形象。黏土土壤天生的强劲单宁在今天变得细密而柔软，无论是温和的口感还是流畅的酒体，都彰显着了酿酒师对萃取工艺的深厚理解。成熟的黑李子和黑加仑背后藏着淡淡的榛果和炒瓜子的香气，虽谈不上复杂多变，但却激发了我对陈年后的想象。强烈建议大家从现在开始重点关注Chateau Lafon-Rochet，随着干热天气出现的越发频繁，其黏土的风土特性可能会给我们带来意想不到的惊喜。
Chinese pairs.new: 2020年的柔润感让我重新评估了Chateau Lafon-Rochet的传统形象。黏土土壤天生的强劲单宁现在变得细密而柔软，无论是温和的口感还是流畅的酒体，都表明了酿酒师对萃取工艺的深刻理解。成熟的黑李子和黑加仑后面有淡淡的榛果和炒瓜子的香气，虽然不复杂，但却激发了我对陈年后的想象。强烈建议大家从现在开始重点关注Chateau Lafon-Rochet，随着干热天气出现的越发频繁，其黏土的风土特性可能会给我们带来意想不到的惊喜。

English pairs.original: The softness of the 2020 vintage made me start to re-examine the traditional image of Chateau Lafon-Rochet. The powerful tannins nurtured by clay soil naturally become tightly knit and soft, and both the gentle palate and the smooth body show the winemaker’s profound understanding of the extraction process. Behind the notes of ripe black plum and blackcurrant hides a mild scent of hazelnut and fried melon seeds, and although the fragrance of this wine is not complex, it inspires my imagination of its performance after bottle aging. It is highly recommended to focus on Chateau Lafon-Rochet from now on because as the dry and hot weather appears more and more frequently, the terroir features of its clay may bring us unexpected surprises.
English pairs.new: 2020年产的拉丰-罗歇酒庄让我开始重新审视传统的拉丰-罗歇形象。由粘土土壤培养的强劲的苦味成分自然紧密结合，柔和的口感和光滑的体积展现出制酒师对提取过程的深刻理解。黑浆果和黑加仑的成熟气息背后隐含着一种温和的杏仁和炸瓜子仁的香气，尽管这款酒的香气并不复杂，但它却让我对瓶陈的表现充满了想象力。建议大家从现在开始重点关注拉丰-罗歇酒庄，因为干燥和炎热的天气越来越常见，粘土土壤的特点可能会带来意想不到的惊喜。

Western reviews.review: Flowers, cigar wrapper, wet earth, smoke, chocolate, blackberries and red pit fruits open the nose. But, it is on the palate, where the wine really shines with all of its layers of full-bodied, concentrated, long, dark, round, energetic, creamy, plush, ripe, fruits. The finish is long, clean and vibrant with a creamy textured endnote that will be even better once the minor amount of oak remaining has fully integrated. This is the final vintage from the Tesseron family who brought in the harvest and vinified the wine. The new owner, Jacky Lorenzetti, along with Emmanuel Cruse finished the wine. Starting with the 2021 vintage, the new owners were fully in charge. Drink from 2024-2045.
Western reviews.translation: 花朵、雪茄纸、湿润的土壤、烟雾、巧克力、黑莓和红果的香气在鼻子中展现。然而，在口中，酒精真正闪耀出它的所有层次，包括丰富、浓缩、长、黑、圆、有活力、奶油、丰富、成熟的果味。酒尾长、干净、生动，奶油质感的尾音会随着少量剩余的橡木完全融合而变得更好。这是特塞隆家族的最后一瓶酒，他们收获并酿造了这瓶酒。新主人雅克·洛伦齐（Jacky Lorenzetti）和埃马纽埃尔·克鲁斯（Emmanuel Cruse）完成了这瓶酒。从2021年起，新主人完全掌控了酒精的制作。建议从2024年到2045年饮用。

Western reviews.review: Decisive in the floral sensory profile alternating notes of lavender, hibiscus, guaranà, cherry, lemon juice and linden. Medium bodied, light tannins and a spicy finish which is slightly rigid at the moment. Better from 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的花香特征非常明显，交替出现了紫罗兰、红花、花胶、樱桃、柠檬汁和白蜡树的香气。口感中等，苦味轻微，尾部有着微微的辣味，目前略有刚性。建议从2025年开始品尝。

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby, purple reflections, opaque core, soft brightening on the rim. Floral notes with violets and rose petals, ripe plums, some nougat and orange peel. Juicy blackberries, a fine acidity, integrated tannins, a touch of fine chocolate on the finish, mineral and salty, long lasting, good ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，紫色反射，透明核心，酒液边缘微微发亮。花香味道，含有紫罗兰和玫瑰花瓣，熟透的李子，少量的果仁和橙子皮。浓郁的黑莓，细腻的酸度，融合的橡皮感，酒尾微微带有精致的巧克力味，矿物质和咸味，持久，酒龄潜力较高。

Western reviews.review: (61% Cabernet Sauvignon, 33% Merlot, 3% Cabernet Franc, 3% Petit Verdot, 13.5% Alkohol) Dunkle Frucht, tiefgründig, mineralisch, kühl darüber Blüten, Minze. Im Gaumen ein Fruchtkonzentrat ohne Schwerfälligkeit, ausgezeichnete Gerbstoffqualität, viel Frische, das Holz ist perfekt integriert, alle Elemente sind in grosser Harmonie. Würziges, frisches Finale. Ein ausgezeichneter Lafon-Roche, Kauftipp. 2028-2048 (Verkostet am 8. November 2022 in Zürich)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一瓶红酒评论。翻译成中文如下：

(61% 卡波内尔·萨旺儒尼, 33% 美乐托, 3% 卡波内尔·法兰克, 3% Petit Verdot, 13.5% 酒精度) 深色果味, 深度复杂, 矿物质, 冷却的花香, 冷却的薄荷. 在口感中, 果味浓缩, 无重度, 果皮质地优良, 多汁, 木头完美融合, 各元素和谐. 辣味, 新鲜的尾部. 这是一瓶优质的拉丰-罗什红酒, 买家推荐. 评分: 2028-2048 (在2022年11月8日在苏黎世品尝)

Western reviews.review: A very classic St-Estephe style of wine. Deep, dark, almost opaque purple/ black color. Aromas are earthy with leafy cassis. The palate shows leafy red-fruit & cassis notes. Alcohol & acidity are well in balance & the finish is quite long. 05/21 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶典型的圣埃斯泰夫（St-Estephe）风格的红酒。酒液呈深紫黑色，几乎透明。酒香浓郁，带有泥土和浆果的叶绿气息。口感上，酒体呈现出浆果和浆果果实的叶绿风味。酒精和酸度之间的平衡很好，酒尾长而持久。评分：05/21 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 微弱的奶油，黑色水果的香气，浓郁丰富的酒体，结构感好，但缺乏中期口感的复杂性，回味中等。
Chinese pairs.new: Delicate creaminess, black fruit aromas, rich and full-bodied texture, good structure, but lacks mid-palate complexity, moderate finish.

Western reviews.review: On the nose the oak is still noticeable, from there you move on to the truffle, smoke, black cherry and dark chocolate notes. Full bodied, concentrated, the tannins are soft, the texture is round, the fruits are sweet, but there is some oak remaining in the finish that needs to further integrate. The wine was made from blending 60% Cabernet Sauvignon, 32% Merlot, 7% Cabernet Franc and 1% Petit Verdot. The wine reached 13.5% alcohol.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中，仍然可以闻到橡木的味道，接着是松露、烟熏、黑樱桃和黑巧克力的香气。口感丰富浓郁，酒中的纤维软化，口感圆润，果味甜美，但在尾部仍然可以感觉到一些橡木的余味，需要进一步融合。该酒是由60%卡波内尔·萨维尼诺、32%梅洛、7%卡波内尔·法兰克和1%佩蒂·维多特混合酿造的。酒精度为13.5%。

Western reviews.review: Warm but closed nose of dense and complex red and black fruits, some smoky wood. Palate is firm but there’s plenty of body just quite tightly wrapped. Dense and chewy with red and black fruits, smoky oak. 5/11
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的鼻子是温暖但封闭的，含有浓密复杂的红黑果味，带有些烟熏木味。口感坚实但有体积，虽然有些紧绷。口感浓密且嚼劲十足，带有红黑果味和烟熏橡木味。评分：5/11

Chinese pairs.original: 带有醋栗和黑巧克力的香气，夹杂一丝烟草，雪松与香料盒的气息，酒体饱满，单宁柔顺。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich aromas of persimmon and dark chocolate, with a hint of tobacco, pine and spice box notes. Full-bodied with smooth tannins.

Western reviews.review: As so often, Leoville-Barton stands out for its style and elegance.  With fresh fruit and acidity allied to generous tannins, it sums up the character of the 2004 vintage.  Very classic in Bordeaux terms: not hugely powerful, but delicious.
Western reviews.translation: 勒维尔巴顿（Leoville-Barton）如常显现出其独特的风格和优雅。  这瓶酒以新鲜的水果和酸度以及丰富的苦味，完美地体现了2004年的葡萄酒特征。  在波尔多的传统中，非常典型：不太强大，但非常美味。

Western reviews.review: This is an impressively endowed vin de garde that should age effortlessly for 20-30 years. How Anthony Barton continues to fashion uncompromisingly primordial Bordeaux that are always among the biggest and densest of all the St.-Juliens is beyond me, but he does it year in and year out. Moreover, when it's time to set the price, he appears to have the consumer foremost in his mind. The 2004 is a classic Leoville-Barton meant for long aging. Concentrated, with loads of smoke, creme de cassis, forest floor, and earthy notes emerge from this impressive, but oh, so backward wine. Anticipated maturity: 2015-2030+.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶令人印象深刻的储存红酒，应该能轻松地在20-30年内成熟。安东尼·巴顿（Anthony Barton）如何继续打造出始终是圣朱利安（St.-Juliens）中最大的和最浓郁的原始波尔多酒（Bordeaux），而且每年都能做到这一点，真的是令人难以理解。但是，他每年都能做到这一点。另外，当它是时候定价时，他似乎总是将消费者放在心上。2004年是莱维尔-巴顿（Leoville-Barton）的经典之作，适合长期储存。浓缩的酒液中充满了烟草、黑加仑浆果、森林地板和泥土的气息。这是一瓶令人印象深刻的，但非常保守的酒。预计成熟年份：2015-2030年。

Western reviews.review: Currant and dark chocolate, with hints of mineral. Full-bodied, with silky tannins and a long, caressing finish. Balanced. A more delicate and refined style.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感是黑醋栗和黑巧克力，带有矿物质的微妙气息。酒体丰富，具有细滑的纤维和长长的温柔尾韵。酒的平衡度很好，风格更加轻盈和精致。

Western reviews.review: Powerful minerality runs through this wine, wrapping the primary flavors of blueberries into blackness. There's also an herbal edge, the scent of rosemary cutting through the fruit. More extracted and showing more oak than Bartons of times past, this is structured to age two decades from the vintage.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有强烈的矿物质味道，包围着蓝莓的初级风味，呈现出黑色调。还有一种草药味，罗勒的香气穿过了果味。与以往相比，这款酒更浓缩， oak味更明显。它的结构设计来让酒龄至少20年。

Chinese pairs.original: 石灰岩粉末般的单宁在味蕾间游走，绵柔的桑果和树莓在舌尖上漫舞，Chateau Grand Mayne 在2022年份实现了属于它的巅峰时刻。作为一款清雅感十足的葡萄酒，我从不担忧它缺乏酸度；相反，我更加关心它是否能够保持足够的集中度。在浓郁度颇高的2022年份，它纤细的酒体被注入了能量，从一只金丝雀蜕变成在高空翱翔的雄鹰，绝对是一款兼具力量和诗意的圣爱美隆佳作，也是我最喜欢的年份。
Chinese pairs.new: The tannins dance across the palate like limestone powder, with velvety mulberries and raspberries performing a delicate ballet on the tip of the tongue. Chateau Grand Mayne has reached its peak in the 2022 vintage, a wine that exudes elegance without ever worrying about lacking acidity. Instead, I'm concerned about whether it can maintain sufficient concentration. In the rich 2022 vintage, its slender body is infused with energy, transforming from a humble sparrow into a soaring eagle. This is a Saint-Émilion of both power and poetry, and my favorite vintage to date.

English pairs.original: The powdery tannins from limestone dance on the palate, while the silky notes of mulberry and raspberry twirl on the tongue. Chateau Grand Mayne has truly reached its pinnacle in the 2022 vintage. As an elegant wine, I never worry about its acidity. Instead, I am more concerned about its ability to maintain sufficient concentration. In the intensely rich 2022 vintage, its delicate body has been infused with vigor, transforming from a canary to an eagle soaring high in the sky. It is an absolute masterpiece that combines power and poetry, it is my favorite vintage of Franc Mayne.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的粉末状苦味来自石灰岩在口中跳跃舞蹈，而浓郁的黑杏和草莓味道在舌头上旋转跳跃。 2022年产出的香格玛尼酒庄已经达到巅峰。 作为一款优雅的酒，我从来不担心它的酸度。 相反，我更关心的是它是否能保持足够的浓度。在2022年产出的丰富而浓郁的酒中，它的细腻的身体被充满了活力，从一只小鸟变成一只高飞的老鹰。 这是一款绝对的杰作，它结合了力量和诗意，是我对香格玛尼酒庄最喜欢的产年。

Western reviews.review: Recht ausbaugeprägt, mit Noten von Karamel und Gebäck; interessante Ansätze (Fruchtigkeit, Tanninqualität) die in diesem Muster nicht recht zur Geltung kommen wollen, das herb, sogar etwas trocken endet. Die Note unter Vorbehalt positiver Entwicklung.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感比较干燥，带有焦糖和饼干的味道。虽然它有着一些有趣的特点，如果味和坚果味，但它们并没有完全发挥出来。整体来说，这瓶红酒的味道比较干燥，甚至有些苦涩。虽然它有潜力，但还需要进一步的发展。

Western reviews.review: Elegant, floral, fresh, and loaded with sweet, ripe, plums, cherries, licorice, and cocoa, the wine is medium-boded, refined, vibrant and silky and while it can be enjoyed in its youth, it is only going to get better with age. Drink from 2025-2045. 93-95 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒优雅、花香、清新，充满了甜美的浆果、樱桃、甘草和可可的味道。酒体中等，细腻、活跃、滑顺。虽然可以在年轻时享用，但随着时间的推移，它将会变得更加出色。建议在2025-2045年之间饮用。评分93-95分。

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby garnet, opaque core, purple reflections, delicate rim brightening. Fine cherries, ripe plums, delicate orange zest. Juicy, elegant, fine fruit sweetness, some nougat, discreet acidity, long lasting, a substantial food wine with certain ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，浓郁的紫红色核心，透明的边缘，细微的亮光。细腻的樱桃，成熟的李子，细微的橙子皮。果味丰富，优雅，细腻的甜度，少量的奶油糖，低调的酸度，持久的口感，适合与食物搭配的葡萄酒，有一定的陈化潜力。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark, almost opaque red-purple. Aromas are warm, ripe, perhaps slightly raisined black fruit. The palate has fresh acidity & rich black-cherry, black-plum to prune fruit, leading to a core of concentrated. sweet black licorice. The wine is medium to full bodied, with alcohol adding warmth & roundness to the finish. The finish combines hedonistic dark-fruit with exoitic, cedary oak-derived spices. A superb effort from Grand Mayne. 04/23 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红紫色，几乎是透明的。酒中的气味是温暖的、成熟的、略带干酪的黑色水果。口感是新鲜的酸度和丰富的黑樱桃、黑杏到干枣的水果，最后是浓缩的甜黑甘草。酒体是中等到满足的，酒精添加了温暖和圆润的结束。酒尾结合了享受的黑色水果和异国的、来自橡木的香料。Grand Mayne的这瓶酒是一项杰出的努力。评分：4.23（ep）DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 清雅秀丽是2007年份高柏丽的主旋律。虽然该年份的天气状况不如人意，但高柏丽依然展现了和谐柔美的一面。香气很温柔，不似热年份的热情甜美，更多的是70%赤霞珠所主导的石墨和铅笔芯气息。入口纯净而清透，清凉薄荷糖的质感伴随着薄如蝉翼的精致单宁贯穿始终。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2007 Haut-Brion is the main theme of elegance and refinement. Despite the less-than-ideal weather conditions that year, Haut-Brion still showcases its harmonious and delicate side. The aroma is soft and subtle, unlike the passionate sweetness of hot vintages, with a dominant graphite and pencil lead character from the 70% Cabernet Sauvignon. The entry is pure and crystal clear, with a refreshing minty sweetness accompanied by a delicate, almost ethereal tannin that persists throughout.

English pairs.original: Elegance and freshness are the main topics of Haut-Bailly 2007. Although the weather condition was not ideal this year, HB tried its best to demonstrate harmonious beauty. The nose is very supple; it features more graphite and pencil shave character thanks to 70% of Cabernet Sauvignon. The entry of the palate is purely straightforward, coupled with minty freshness and ultra-slim tannins from head to toe.
English pairs.new: 2007年哈特贝利(Haut-Bailly)的主要特点是优雅和新鲜。尽管今年的天气条件并不理想，但哈特贝利仍然表现出和谐的美丽。酒鼻子非常柔和，70%的卡波内尔·萨旺(Cabernet Sauvignon)赋予了它更多的石墨和铅笔剃须的特征。口感入口直接，伴随着薄荷的新鲜感和从头到尾的超细致的纹理。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby, purple reflections, subtle ochre brightening on the rim. On the nose, subtle animalistic notes, a touch of dark berries, hints of tar and background notes of ripe cherries. Juicy and fresh on the palate, subtle fruit expression, red currant, salty-lemon hints, a savoury note and a lasting finish. A lively, well matured yet uncomplicated food companion. (Drink, store +15)..
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，紫色反射，酒杯边缘有微妙的黄土色光泽。鼻子里有微妙的动物性质的气味，带有暗红色的浆果味，焦油味和成熟的樱桃的背景味。口感鲜美清新，微妙的果味表达，红葡萄柚子味，盐酸味，咸味和持久的尾韵。是一款生动活泼，成熟但不复杂的食物伴侣。 (饮用时间：+15年)...

Western reviews.review: Fully mature, lighter styled wine, as you would expect, given the vintage. Still, the wine offered pleasure and character with its dark cherry fruit, herbs and tobacco. Softly textured, and quite easy to drink, enjoy this for its charm now, while waiting for the three subsequent vintages, 2008, 2009 and 2010 to develop.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒已经完全成熟，风格轻盈，正如你所期望的，考虑到产年。尽管如此，这瓶酒仍然带来了愉悦和个性，带有黑樱桃果味、香草和烟草。口感细腻，非常容易饮用，享受它的魅力吧，同时等待接下来的三个产年，2008、2009和2010的成熟。

Western reviews.review: Die Tannine sind kompromisslos fest und kompromisslos frisch und gut, das Ganze wirkt perfekt ausgewogen, aber mit der Textur eines Weines, der reifen muss. Für ihn spricht zusätzlich das leckere Brombeerfinale. Ein Klassiker.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的苦味（tanine）非常坚固和新鲜，整体感觉非常平衡，但酒体感觉需要更长时间的陈化。另外，酒尾的浓郁莓果风味也非常诱人。这是一瓶经典的红酒。

Western reviews.review: A dense wine, very much in the line of powerful wines from Haut-Bailly. Flavors of bitter chocolate, sweet berry fruits and richness are dominant, the acidity a fine balancing act to give a burst of freshness.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒浓郁，风格与豪特贝利（Haut-Bailly）强劲的红酒相似。苦巧克力、甜浆果和丰富的风味占据主导地位，酸度则在其中起到平衡作用，给人以清新感。

Western reviews.review: (2008) Lovely meaty fruit, with very nice bramble and black berry fruit. There's an earthiness and richness here, with the mid palate maintaining that rich fruit quality. There's real backbone here, but supple, with spice and grip, and some length.
Western reviews.translation: 2008年：这款红酒具有丰富的肉感果味，带有浓郁的荆棘和黑莓果味。酒中有泥土的味道和丰富的口感，中口保持着丰富的果味质。酒有坚实的骨架，但柔软，带有香料和抓握感，且有较长的尾部。

Chinese pairs.original: Potensac 2018是一款芬芳多汁而又楚楚可人的酒，能够从香气中感受到曼妙的酒体和甜甜的微笑。鲜果一般的口感伴随着丝滑般的单宁，抚摸着味蕾，让人好生欢喜。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2018 Potensac is a fragrant, luscious wine with a charming personality. It exudes a silky texture and a sweet smile through its aroma. The palate is typically fruity, accompanied by smooth tannins that caress the senses, leaving a delightful impression.

English pairs.original: Potensac 2018 is a fragrant, juicy, and adorable wine; I can even feel its graceful line and sweet smile in my glass. The palate is embraced with the succulent texture and silky tannins, which offer great pleasure to each bud taste.
English pairs.new: 波特纳克 2018是一款芳香诱人的、水果丰富的、可爱的红酒；我甚至可以在杯子里感受到它优雅的线条和甜美的笑容。口感丰富细腻，丝滑的苦味物质让每一口都带来极大的愉悦。

Western reviews.review: Fruity nose of blackcurrant and blueberry with sage and vanilla. It’s full-bodied with firm tannins. Savory and juicy with pleasant acidity. Compact and long. Racy. 45% merlot, 36% cabernet sauvignon,18% cabernet franc and 1% petit verdot. Try after 2023.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中充满了黑currant和蓝berry的果香，伴随着sage和vanilla的味道。口感丰富，具有坚实的纽扣感。口感丰富，具有坚实的纽扣感，带有浓郁的口感和舒适的酸度。整体口感紧凑，持久。风格鲜明。酒中含有45%梅洛，36%卡波弗雷蒙，18%卡波弗朗克和1%小皮诺。建议在2023年后品尝。

Western reviews.review: The Grand Vin 2018 Château Potensac (45% Merlot, 36% Cabernet Sauvignon, 18% Cabernet Franc, and the balance Petit Verdot) sports a deeper purple, almost opaque hue to go with lots of ripe black cherry and currant-like fruits intermixed with notes of toasty oak, tobacco, graphite, and earth. Richer and more concentrated than the Chapelle de Potensac release, with full-bodied richness and building tannin's, it's going to benefit from a solid 5-7 years of bottle age and keep for 15+.
Western reviews.translation: 2018年尚皮亚克葡萄酒（45%梅洛，36%卡波弗雷蒙，18%卡波弗雷蒙，余下的为小黑皮诺）呈现出更深的紫色，几乎透明的色泽，充满了成熟的黑樱桃和黑currant类的果味，混合了烟熏橡木、烟草、石墨和泥土的香气。比尚皮亚克教堂的葡萄酒更丰富和浓缩，具有全身的厚度和不断积累的纽扣，它将从5-7年的瓶子年龄中受益，并将持续15+年。

Western reviews.review: The dark cherry and plum fruit is fresh and direct, with light tobacco and toast accents hanging on the finish. Barrel Sample: 89-92
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感是鲜艳的樱桃和浆果味，直接且清新，余味中带有轻微的烟草和烘烤香气。酒评：89-92分。

Western reviews.review: Plush plum in colour, with a depth to the body that starts from the first sip. A clear step up from the second wine, as I have found in many Médocs in the vintage. Raspberry and blueberry fruits which then deepen out to the classic black fruit notes of Potensac. Bottled in mid-April, ageing in barrel was kept to 14 months to avoid any over-extraction, because alcohol levels are pretty high. 1% Petit Verdot completes the blend. Drinking Window 2024 - 2025
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的颜色是深紫红色，口感丰富，第一口就能感受到。与第二瓶相比，这款酒有明显的提升，尤其是在本年产的梅多克地区的红酒中。酒中有浓郁的莓果和蓝莓味道，随后发展成传统的黑果味道，如波特纳克（Potensac）。酒瓶于四月中旬装瓶，为了避免过度提取，酒龄仅为14个月。酒中含有1%的佩蒂·维多（Petit Verdot）。推荐饮用时间：2024-2025年。

Western reviews.review: The 2018 Potensac is composed of 45% Merlot, 36% Cabernet Sauvignon, 18% Cabernet Franc and 1% Petit Verdot. The wine has 14.42% alcohol and was aged in 35% new barriques. Medium to deep garnet-purple colored, it rolls out of the glass with open-knit scents of ripe, juicy black plums, boysenberries, redcurrant jelly and cassis, plus hints of dried Provence herbs, cinnamon stick and dusty soil. Medium to full-bodied, the palate is chock-full of lively black and red berry layers, supported by soft tannins and a racy line, finishing with a lively skip in its step.
Western reviews.translation: 2018年波特纳克（Potensac）红酒的组成比例为45%梅洛（Merlot）、36%卡波弗雷蒙（Cabernet Sauvignon）、18%卡波弗雷蒙（Cabernet Franc）和1%佩蒂·韦多（Petit Verdot）。酒精含量为14.42%，并在35%新橡木桶中陈化。酒色为深红色至紫红色，酒香中充满了成熟黑浆果、黑莓、红果酱和黑加思（Cassis）的香气，伴有干燥普罗旺斯香草、肉桂棒和土壤的微妙气息。口感中等至丰富，酒中充满了活跃的黑色和红色浆果层次，软绵的牙齿和快速的线条支撑着酒的口感，酒尾带有轻快的跳跃感。

Chinese pairs.original: 每逢品尝Clos Manou的佳酿，我总是心生欢喜。以我对他们家“流线型的酒体线条”理解，自然不会担忧干热的2022年份带来困扰。当深紫色的酒液从密林深处涌向味蕾之时，我沐浴在纯粹、清雅与畅快淋漓的花果世界…紫罗兰的花香、多汁的樱桃、轻挑的藤椒贯穿全身；绢丝般的酒体抚慰着味蕾，每一滴酒液皆是那么楚楚可人，让人忍不住又贪杯了。
Chinese pairs.new: Every time I taste Clos Manou's exceptional wine, I'm filled with joy. With their "streamlined wine body" in mind, I wouldn't worry about the dry heat of the 2022 vintage causing any issues. As the deep purple liquid flows from the depths of the forest to my taste buds, I'm immersed in a pure, elegant, and carefree world of flowers and fruits... the scent of lavender, juicy cherries, and delicate pepper weave through my senses; the silky wine body soothes my taste buds, and every drop is so charming that I just can't help but want another sip.

English pairs.original: Whenever I taste Clos Manou, I feel great joy. With my understanding of their “streamlined body lines,” I am not worried about the impact of the dryness in 2022 at all. As the deep purple drops flow from the depths of the forest to my taste buds, I am bathed in a pure, elegant, and exhilarating world of flowers and fruits… The violets, the juicy cherries, and a delicate touch of peppercorns run through my entire body; and the silky texture caresses my taste buds. Just a sip of it is enough to make you happy, sorry, I cannot resist pouring another glass.
English pairs.new: 每次品尝Clos Manou，我都会感到极大的喜悦。了解了他们的“流线型身材”，我完全不担心2022年的干性会带来什么影响。深紫色的液体从森林的深处流入我的味蕾，我被一片纯净、优雅、令人振奋的花朵和水果的世界所包围……紫罗兰、鲜红的樱桃和细微的胡椒味在我的整个身体中流动；而丝滑的质感抚慰着我的味蕾。仅仅一口就足以让你感到快乐，抱歉，我无法抵抗再倒一杯……

Western reviews.review: Blackberries, licorice, espresso, vanilla, currants and cedar work together to form the perfume. Complete from start to finish, the fresh, soft, firm, medium-bodied finish is packed with more of those, sweet, dark, fresh fruits. While this is easy to enjoy in its youth, with age, this is going to be even better. Drink from 2025-2038. 91-93 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中融合了黑莓、甘草、咖啡、香草、黑加仑和红檜的元素。从开始到结束，新鲜、柔软、坚实的口感中充满了更多的甜美、黑暗、新鲜的水果。虽然在年轻时容易享受，但随着时间的推移，这款红酒会变得更加出色。建议在2025-2038年饮用。评分：91-93分。

Chinese pairs.original: 与庄主Bernard Audoy在酒庄一同垂直品鉴。期酒。此酒的香气富有庄严的花香和岩石以及甜香料味。口感滑爽、干净，伴有漂亮的酸度和美妙的绵密感。
Chinese pairs.new: Tasted alongside winemaker Bernard Audoy at the estate, this wine boasts a regal floral and stony aroma, with sweet spice notes. Smooth and clean on the palate, it's beautifully balanced by crisp acidity and a lovely texture.

English pairs.original: A vertical tasting with the owner Bernard Audoy at the winery. En primeur. Austerely floral, stony and sweetly spicy on the nose. Polished on the taste with classy acid and excellent cleanness as well lovely density.
English pairs.new: 与葡萄酒厂主 Bernard Audoy 一起进行垂直品鉴。预售。酒鼻中充满了干净的花香、石头味和甜甜的辣味。口感光滑，酸度优雅，清晰度出色，体积饱满。

Western reviews.review: Tiefe, reiffruchtige Nase, Leder, Teer, dunkle Frucht, viel Würze, getrocknete Kräuter. Im Gaumen fleischig, füllig, sehr gut strukturiert, zeigt Volumen und Kraft, bleibt dabei ausgewogen und offenbart im Abgang eine wunderbare Frische. Rassig und mit guten Reserven. 2026-2042 (Verkostet am 21. Juni 2021 im Rahmen der UGCB Probe in Genf)
Western reviews.translation: 深度、成熟的果香，皮革、焦糖、黑色果实、丰富的香料、干燥的香草。口感丰富、饱满、结构完美、展现出体积和力量，但仍保持平衡，尾部展现出令人惊艳的清新。品质优良，储存潜力大。推荐储存期：2026-2042（2021年6月21日在日内瓦的UGCB品酒会中品尝）。

Western reviews.review: The Audoy family has produced a structured wine, dense with tannins and backed by dark plum and berry fruits. It is rich, with a good future ahead of it, textured with richness as well as initial dryness. Drink the wine from 2026. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 奥杜伊家族出品的这款红酒具有结构紧密的特点，充满了坚果味和黑浆果的风味。酒体丰富，未来前景广阔，口感丰富且初期干爽。建议2026年后饮用。- 罗杰·沃斯

Western reviews.review: Medium bodied, fresh, bright, lifted red fruits, spice and earth pop up in the nose easily. The wine has energy, elegance and loads of red currants, red plums and herbs on the palate. The finish delivers more of those gorgeous red, sweet, chewy fruits. This is a big step up from previous vintages. I am liking it a lot!
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的体积适中，清新、明亮、果香丰富，带有香料和泥土的气息。口感充满活力，优雅，满满的红葡萄、红李子和香草味。尾部带有更多的那些美味的红果，甜美、口感丰富。这瓶红酒比之前的几年更出色，我非常喜欢！

Western reviews.review: Deep ruby, purple glints, faintly lighter at the rim. A bouquet of ripe cherries underlaid with fine savoury woody notes, followed by gentle hints of liquorice and candied violets, as well as a dash of orange zest. Juicy, elegant, fresh red fruit, integrated, supportive tannins, mineral, pithy style. Will benefit from bottle ageing. (2022-2040)߭.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，紫色光泽，边缘略微浅色。酒中充满了成熟的樱桃的香气，伴有细微的咖啡和木质香气，接着是轻微的甘草和糖化紫罗兰的味道，以及橙子皮的味道。酒口丰富，优雅，新鲜的红果味，整合的、支持性的纤维，矿物质、坚果样风格。酒会从瓶中陈化中受益。 (2022-2040)

Western reviews.review: Helles Rubin, leicht wässeriger Rand, kühle, intensive Nase, rotfruchtig, rauch, getrocknete Kräuter, schönes Aromenspiel, komplex ohne zu überfordern, am Gaumen straff, gradlinig, wieder rote beeren, dazu auch Brombeeren und einiges an würzigen Noten, die Gerbstoffe sind markant, die säure lebhaft, das ist trinkanimierend, im Abgang von schöner Länge, endet auf Gewürznelken, ein sehr guter Wein, braucht essen und kann reifen, 2018-2034
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

酒色：深红色，略带水分的边缘。

香气：冷却后，酒香强烈，带有红果味、烟熏味、干燥的香草味，酒香丰富多样，没有过于复杂的感觉。

口感：口感紧致，平衡，入口有红果味和浆果味，中期有浓郁的果味和一些香料味，酒中的鞣质和酸度都很明显，非常适合饮用，酒尾长达几秒钟，最后留下了温和的香料味。

总体评价：这是一个非常好的红酒，需要与食物配对，酒龄可以达到15年左右，推荐饮用时间：2018-2034年。

Chinese pairs.original: 酿造正牌酒的葡萄园种植于坡地之上，葡萄藤的平均树龄为35年。木桶发酵；酒精发酵结束时浸渍10天；淋皮和踩皮；在全新的法国橡木桶内进行乳酸发酵；在70%新的法国桶内陈年18个月；每隔两个月取一次清汁；不做过滤，蛋白澄清。从此年份开始，混酿中加入了一点点的佳美娜（1%），但实际上，Henri Lurton早在10年前就已决定要在园内种植佳美娜来应对全球变暖。我一闻这支酒时，我就意识到这属于我非常喜欢的类型：清新、干净，大量的花香和微微深邃的气息（泥土、岩石、香料）完美结合。口感圆润，但不饱满；令人兴奋的酸度为那多矿物的咸香收尾提供了坚实，留下满满的新鲜果味。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine is crafted from grapes grown on sloping vineyards, with an average vine age of 35 years. Fermented in oak barrels, the wine undergoes a 10-day maceration after fermentation is complete. The wine is then racked and pressed, followed by malolactic fermentation in new French oak barrels. It is aged for 18 months in 70% new French barrels, with bâtonnage every two months. Unfiltered and fined with egg whites, this wine marks the first vintage to include a small amount of Carmenère (1%). However, the decision to plant Carmenère was made 10 years ago by Henri Lurton in anticipation of global warming. Upon first sniff, I knew this was a style I adore: fresh, clean, with an abundance of floral notes and subtle depth (dirt, stone, spice) in perfect harmony. The palate is round but not full-bodied, with invigorating acidity providing a solid foundation for the minerally, salty finish, leaving a full load of fresh fruit flavors.

English pairs.original: The vineyards of grand vin are grown on slopes, where the vines are 35 years old on average. Fermenting in wooden vats; maceration for 10 days when the alcoholic fermentation is finished; pumping over and pigeage; MLF in 100% new French oak barrels; aging 18 months in 70% new French oak barrels; racking every two months; without filtration, and fining by egg white. A little bit (1%) Carmenere is included in the blend since this vintage despite Henri Lurton has decided to plant Carmenere in his vineyards 10 years ago so as to adapt the global warming. When I put it into the nose, I knew it's that kind of wine I liked very much: refreshing and precise, with loads of floral aromas combined with an undertone of depths such as earth, stone and spices. The texture was rounded, but it wasn't full-bodied; the exciting acid provided the firmness to the mineral-inflected and saline finish that was full of fresh fruit.
English pairs.new:
这是一瓶来自法国的红酒评论。翻译成中文如下：

这瓶大酒庄的葡萄园位于山坡上，平均年龄35岁。酒庄采用木桶发酵，发酵后10天进行浸泡，进行过滤和踩果，100%新法兰克尔橡木桶进行MLF发酵，18个月在70%新法兰克尔橡木桶中陈化，每两个月进行一次转运，未进行过滤，使用鸡蛋白进行精细化。尽管亨利·卢尔顿10年前决定在葡萄园种植卡门埃雷，但这瓶酒中仍然包含了1%的卡门埃雷。酒庄希望通过种植卡门埃雷来适应全球变暖。

当我将酒放入鼻子中时，我就知道这是一瓶我非常喜欢的酒：清新、精确，具有大量的花朵香气，伴有泥土、石头和香料的底调。酒的质感圆润，但不是浓郁的；酒中的酸度提供了矿物质和盐味的坚实感，酒尾充满了新鲜的果味。

Western reviews.review: Already incredible to drink, the wine is concentrated, rich, sensuous, and packed with layers of fruit that does not quit. Even though it is early days, it is difficult not to be seduced by the complex aromatics and if that does not grab you, the velvet-textured opulence in the finish will. If you prefer exuberant, youthful fruits, with decadent textures, and a finish packed with fruit and glycerin, try a bottle now, If you desire more secondary notes, wait a few more years. Either way, this is a superb wine and a clear candidate for the best vintage of Brane Cantenac ever produced! Drink from 2024-2055.
Western reviews.translation: 这个红酒已经非常值得品尝，酒精浓度高，富有感官体验，果味丰富，层次感强。即使是初期品尝，也很难抵抗其复杂的香气。如果你不喜欢这种香气，那么酒尾的细腻、丰富的口感也会让你着迷。如果你喜欢果味丰富、年轻、豪放的红酒，带有丰富的口感和果味，建议现在就喝。如果你更喜欢成熟的红酒，带有更多的次级香气，建议再等几年。无论如何，这是一款出色的红酒，是布兰·坎坦纳克（Brane Cantenac）历史上最好的产季之一！建议在2024-2055年之间饮用。

Western reviews.review: Garantiert der grösste Brane, der je auf die Flasche gekommen ist, enorme aromatische Komplexität, mit einer nie gesehenen Balance von Reife und Frische, Blumigkeit und Fruchtigkeit, perfekt reifes Tannin absoluter Klasse, unaufdringliche Dichte und Tiefe, nicht enden wollende Länge: das absolute Must in diesem Jahr.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒保证了最大的酒庄生产的酒量，带来极大的香气复杂性，具有从未见过的成熟和新鲜的平衡，花香和果香的完美结合，品质极高的成熟的橡木味，优雅的厚度和深度，永不结束的长尾：今年的绝对必买。

Western reviews.review: Rich, fruity and with great potential, this ripe wine is also dense with firm tannins. Its juicy fruits are a part of a package with the concentrated tannins and smoky wood flavors that allow for long aging. This is an impressive wine from one of the Margaux properties owned by the Lurton family. Drink from 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒富有深度，果香浓郁，具有巨大的潜力。酒体丰富，坚实的橡木味和浓郁的果味相得益彰。酒中浓郁的橡木味和坚实的果味使其具有长期陈化的潜力。这是一款出自卢尔顿家族（Lurton family）所有的马格努（Margaux）产区的出色红酒。建议2025年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: Medium bodied, quite soft and silky, with almost, but not quite high pitched fruits. The freshness works here, with all the gentle tannins, strong floral, earthy, tobacco notes and sweet, red cherry and red plum in the finish. This is probably at peak, where it will remain for at least another 10-15 more years, if well stored. The wine was made from a blend of 48% Cabernet Sauvignon, 40% Merlot and 12% Cabernet Franc. 91 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的体积适中，口感柔软细腻，果味接近高调但不够。酒中的新鲜感很好，柔和的苦味，强烈的花香，土壤味，烟草味，以及甜的红樱桃和红杏味在后续留下深刻印象。这瓶红酒可能已经达到顶峰，若储存良好，至少还能维持10-15年。该酒由48%卡波内尔·萨维尼诺、40%梅洛和12%卡波内尔·法兰克混合酿造。评分：91分。

Western reviews.review: Medium ruby-red in color. The nose is open & ripe with red fruit & violet perfume. The palate has a reasonable weight of cassis & redcurrant fruit that is leant complexity by new oak notes. Good acidity adds freshness & lifts the fruit. The tannic structure is uncharacteristically big, without being particularly  astringent. Alcohol is well in balance & the finish is long with a cedary in character. 11/99 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深红色。

香气：开阔、成熟，带有红果和紫罗兰香味。

口感：口感丰富，带有黑加仑和红果味，新橡木味增添了复杂性。酸度适中，增加了果味的新鲜感，提升了口感。口感结构中，坚果味突出，但不太苦。酒精与口感平衡，尾部长且带有松木味。评分：11/99。

Chinese pairs.original: 香气非常成熟，甚至有些过熟的感觉，丰富的浆果气息中包裹着大量烤面包、吐司以及烟熏等烤制化香气。入口丰满而深邃伴随着粉末状的成熟单宁，整体表现力十分强劲，给人一种钢铁战车的形象。
Chinese pairs.new:
The aroma is extremely mature, bordering on overripe, with a rich fruitiness wrapped in a plethora of toasted bread, toast, and smoky, baked spices. 

The palate is full-bodied and profound, accompanied by powdery, mature tannins, with a robust overall presence that evokes the image of a steel tank.

English pairs.original: The nose is fully ripe, even a tiny of over-ripe fruitiness. It exhibits flamboyant crushed berries and plenty of toasty, smoky notes. The entry of the palate is ample and profound, with powdery tannins and impressive structure, like a Tank Destroyer.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的香气非常成熟，甚至有一点过熟的果酱味。它展现出华丽的浆果味和大量的烤焦、烟熏的香气。口感入口丰富深邃，粉末状的橡皮质感和出色的结构，让人感觉像是一辆坦克摧毁者。

Western reviews.review: Flowers, espresso, smoke, tobacco leaf, barbecue and black cherries create the aromatic qualities. The wine is rich, round, supple and fruity, with hints of vanilla overtones that ride along perfectly with all the ripe, red berries. This is the best vintage of Haut Marbuzet I have tasted in years.
Western reviews.translation: 花朵、咖啡、烟雾、烟草叶、烧烤和黑樱桃共同构成了这瓶红酒的芳香特征。酒体丰富、圆润、柔滑，果香浓郁，带有轻微的香草味，完美地与成熟的红果相融合。这是我近年来品尝过的最好的哈特马布泽特（Haut Marbuzet）年份。

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby, violet tints, delicate bright rim. Fresh dark berry fruit, vivid oak savouriness, tobacco, ripe cherries in the background. Tight, closely meshed, clearly marked by the wood texture, some nougat, seems a little bit over-extracted, dark chocolate on the finish.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，紫色调，边缘清晰。新鲜的黑berry果味，清晰的橡木风味，烟草味，背景中的熟樱桃味。紧密的口感，木质纹理清晰可见，伴有些许果仁味，似乎略微过度提取，口感中有深巧克力味。

Western reviews.review: 92–94. Barrel Sample. Ripe, spicy and with a firm structure to sustain it, this wine is packed with acidity and bright black currant flavor. This well-made wine will certainly age well. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 92-94分。酒桶样品。酒精成熟，带有辣味，具有坚实的结构来支撑它，这款酒充满了酸度和亮丽的黑加仑风味。这款酒精成熟的酒会非常耐久。- 罗杰·沃斯

Chinese pairs.original: 如此纯美的葡萄酒既是顶级风土的呈现，也是对酿酒人辛苦劳作的礼赞。作为一款来自Pavie石灰岩高地的葡萄酒，它将力量与结构用最优美地方式向我们展现出来。虽然香气开始时有些拘谨，但摇杯之后散发出的蓝莓和桑果能够很快敲开心门。Chateau Saint Georges (Cote Pavie) 2020 是一款能够诠释当地风土的佳酿，值得进口商重点关注。
Chinese pairs.new: This sublime wine is both a showcase for the region's top terroir and a tribute to the winemaker's hard work. As a wine from the Pavie limestone plateau, it presents power and structure in the most beautiful way. Although the aroma is initially a bit restrained, the blueberry and blackberry notes that emerge after swirling the glass quickly win you over. Chateau Saint Georges (Cote Pavie) 2020 is a wine that perfectly captures the essence of the local terroir, making it a must-watch for importers.

English pairs.original: Chateau Saint Georges 2020 is not only a testament to the top-quality terroir, but also a tribute to the hard work of the winemakers. Made on the Pavie limestone plateau, this elegant wine showcases its power and structure. At first, the bouquet may seem shy, but a gentle swirl reveals the rich scents of blueberries and mulberries that are sure to win your heart. As a true expression of the local terroir, Chateau Saint Georges 2020 (Cote Pavie) is a magnificent product that should not be overlooked by wine importers.
English pairs.new: 沙特奥圣乔治庄园2020年红酒，不仅是对优质土壤的见证，也是对酒庄工匠们辛勤劳动的致敬。产于帕维石灰岩高原的这款优雅的红酒，展现出其强大的力量和结构。初次闻香， bouquet可能会显得有些谦逊，但轻轻摇晃后，会揭开蓝莓和黑莓的丰富香气，深深吸引人。作为当地土壤的真实体现，沙特奥圣乔治庄园2020年（帕维地区）是一款不容忽视的杰作，应是酒商们的首选。

Western reviews.review: Deep in color, this full-bodied, rich, opulent, velvety-textured wine hits all the right notes. There is length, supple, sensuous tannins and layers of perfectly ripe, mineral-driven dark red fruits and spice. This is a huge step here from this estate. 92-94
Western reviews.translation: 酒色深红，口感丰富、富有层次、细腻的口感，完美地满足了我们的需求。酒中有着长长的尾部，柔软的、细腻的苦味以及完美成熟的、矿物质驱动的黑红果味和香料。这个酒庄的品质有了巨大的进步。评分：92-94分。

Chinese pairs.original: 当紫罗兰的花香迎风飘起，当奶粉般的单宁按摩味蕾时，我就知道2023年份的Chateau Meyney 成功了。经过一年的调整，它再次展现出了其风土的强大实力。蓝莓、桑果、覆盆子的香甜气息与甘草、桂皮、花椒的辛香气息相互交织，编织出一副幽紫色的山水画卷。砾石蓝黏土的风土为这款酒带来了神秘的深邃感，但它品尝起来确是那么柔软，真正诠释了什么是“刚柔并济”。
Chinese pairs.new: When the lavender fragrance wafts in the wind and the creamy tannins caress the palate, I know that the 2023 Chateau Meyney has succeeded. After a year of adjustment, it once again showcases its terroir's powerful strength. The sweet aroma of blueberries, blackberries, and raspberries intertwines with the spicy scent of licorice, cinnamon, and pepper, weaving a tapestry of a mysterious, deep purple landscape. The stony blue clay terroir imbues this wine with an air of mystery, but it tastes so soft, truly embodying the concept of "soft and strong."

English pairs.original: When the scent of violets wafts through the air, and the powder-milk-like tannins massage the taste buds, I know the 2023 Chateau Meyney has succeeded. After a year of adjustment, it once again showcases the formidable strength of its terroir. The sweet aromas of blueberries, mulberries, and raspberries intertwine with the spicy notes of licorice, cinnamon, and Sichuan pepper, weaving together a purple tapestry of a landscape. The gravelly blue clay imparts a mysterious depth to the wine, yet it tastes so soft, truly embodying the harmony of strength and gentleness.
English pairs.new: 当紫罗兰的香气飘散在空气中，粉末般的乳白色苦味在舌尖上轻柔地抚摸时，我知道2023年梅尼酒庄的红酒已经成功了。经过一年调整，它再次展现了其土壤的强大力量。蓝莓、莓果和草莓的甜香气与 licorice、丁香和四川椒的辣味交织在一起，织成了一幅紫色的风景画。蓝色粘土的砂砾赋予了酒精神秘的深度，但它的味道却如此柔和，真正体现了力量与温柔的和谐。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark purple-ruby color is not quite opaque. The wine has a purple rim.  The restrained fruit aromas are of black-plums. The palate is rich & very ripe with black plum & blackberry fruit. The wine is medium to full bodied with smooth graphite notes. The attractive oak comes with chocolatey notes & cinnamon spices. The finish has juicy blackcurrant fruit With a touch of cedary grip. The finish lasts quite well. 04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的紫红色，酒液不完全透明，酒液边缘呈紫色。酒中有着黑浆果的芬芳。口感丰富，黑浆果和黑莓果味浓郁。酒体中等到中厚，带有细致的石墨味。酒中有着可爱的橡木味，带有巧克力和肉桂的香气。酒尾有着 juicy 的黑葡萄果味，带有松木的紧绷感。酒尾持久。评分：04/24 (ep) DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 隶属杜夫集团旗下的这间酒庄拥有单一地块的54公顷葡萄园，树龄25年的葡萄藤种植于坡地之上——这在左岸属于不多见的。在不锈钢桶内发酵；淋皮和压帽；酒液在约33%新（之前的新桶比例为50%）的法国小桶内陈年近14个月。此酒含蓄、庄严而且经典的优雅香气透出碎岩石、红花、甜香料和黑莓味。滑爽的单宁增强了顺滑的质地，回味则富有甜美的果味。
Chinese pairs.new: This vineyard, part of the Duval-Leroy group, boasts 54 hectares of single-block vineyards, with 25-year-old vines planted on slopes - a rare sight on the Left Bank. Fermented in stainless steel tanks, the wine undergoes a light skin contact and is bottled under a cork. Aged for nearly 14 months in 33% new (previously 50% new) French oak barrels, this wine exudes a restrained, elegant and classic bouquet of crushed stone, red flowers, sweet spices and blackberry. Smooth tannins enhance the silky texture, while the finish is rich in sweet fruit flavors.

English pairs.original: The estate owned by Dourthe group has 54 hectares vineyards in only one block, with 25 years old vines grown on the slopes--quite unusual in left bank. Fermenting in stainless steel tanks; pumping over and punching down; aging nearly 14 months in about 33% (has been reduced from 50%) new French barriques. Restrained on the austere and classical yet refined aroma of crushed stone, red flowers, sweet spices and blackberry. Polished tannins enhanced the smooth texture, and it ended with sweet fruitiness.
English pairs.new: 杜尔特集团旗下庄园拥有54公顷的葡萄园，全部位于一个单一的区域内，种植着25岁的葡萄，生长在斜坡上——左岸地区并不常见。发酵在不锈钢储槽中，进行过翻转和踩压，储存近14个月，约33%（减少了50%）的新法式白桉木桶。酒香典雅、古典、克制，带有石灰味、红花香、甜香料和黑莓味。光滑的口感由细腻的纤维增强，酒尾留有甜果味。

Western reviews.review: What a great nose this has! The integration of black fruit and oak is spot on. Powerful, but with classical elegance, thanks to the polished tannins and the cool, mineral freshness that extends right through the long, refined finish. The best vintage ever from this chateau. Drink or hold.
Western reviews.translation: 这个红酒的鼻子非常棒！黑果和橡木的融合非常完美。它强大，但又带有典型的优雅感，感谢光滑的纽维素和延伸到长而精致的尾部的清凉矿物质的新鲜感。这是这个庄园历史上最好的产季。可以 immediate喝也可以放置。

Western reviews.review: Velvety tannins give this wine its open charm and fine texture. Structured yet crisp in acidity, hold this wine until 2027.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的质感细腻柔滑，具有开放的魅力和精致的口感。酸度结构良好，清脆有力。建议保存至2027年。

Western reviews.review: Slick, focussed and full of tannins and plush fruit, this has got to be one of the best wines produced from this estate, along with the 2015. It's worth bearing in mind that you'll want to wait another few years before opening it, as it remains pretty strict in its structure. Contemporary in style.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒非常光滑、集中且富有坚果味和丰富的果味，毫无疑问，这是该庄园生产的最好的酒之一，仅次于2015年产的。值得注意的是，你可能需要再等几年才能打开它，因为它的结构仍然比较严格。风格现代化。

Western reviews.review: Solid, with a fleshy feel to the dark plum and cassis fruit flavors that are inlaid liberally with warm tar, plum skin and roasted cedar notes. A touch muscular in feel but has enough acidity for balance in the end. Best from 2021 through 2029.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感坚实，黑浆果和黑加思（一种黑色水果）味道丰富，融入了温暖的焦油、浆果皮和烤松木的香气。口感略为肌肉感，但最后仍然保持了足够的酸度来平衡。建议从2021年到2029年饮用。

Western reviews.review: The 2016 La Garde, blend of 50% Cabernet Sauvignon, 47% Merlot and 3% Petit Verdot, offers dark berry fruit on the nose, hints of cedar and sandalwood, nicely poised and gaining intensity in the glass. The palate is medium-bodied with fine tannin, rounded in the mouth with black tea-tinged dark berry fruit and a composed, harmonious and almost easygoing finish. This is a step up from the 2015. Rating: 88-90
Western reviews.translation: 2016 年的拉加德（La Garde）红酒，混合了50%卡波内尔·萨维诺（Cabernet Sauvignon）、47%梅洛（Merlot）和3%佩蒂·维多（Petit Verdot），在鼻子里展现出浓郁的黑berry果味，带有些许的红檜木和檀木香气，酒体在玻璃中逐渐增强。口感中等，纤维质细腻，口感圆润，带有黑茶味的黑berry果味，结尾和谐、平衡，几乎是轻松的。这一款红酒比2015年版有所提升。评分：88-90分。

Chinese pairs.original: Malescot典型的甜花香中和了此酒香气的绵密和深邃。香气和口感都有微微的矿物质感。同样绵密的清晰、多汁口感更为新鲜，伴有圆润的单宁和表现力十足的果味。
Chinese pairs.new: Malescot's typical sweet floral notes balance out the wine's rich and deep aromas. Both the aroma and palate have a subtle minerality. The equally rich and clear, juicy palate is fresh, accompanied by smooth tannins and expressive fruit flavors.

English pairs.original: The aroma showed lovely density and depth graced by the typicallly sweet florality of Malescot. There was a hint of minerality on both nose and palate. Also dense but fresher on the precisely juicy palate that had rounded tannins and expressive fruitiness.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的香气非常浓郁和深厚，带有典型的甜花香气。口感中有矿物质的味道，口感浓郁但又清新，具有圆润的牙感和丰富的果香。

Western reviews.review: Still deeply colored, the wine instantly pops with smoke, blackberry, boysenberry, espresso bean, licorice and black cherry notes. Dense, full and plush, the mid-palate and finish is packed with the layers of dense, opulently textured, juicy, black fruits and cherry liqueur. The wine was made from a blend of 55% Cabernet Sauvignon and 37% Merlot, 6% Cabernet Franc and 2% Petit Verdot.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的颜色依然深厚，酒体中立即爆发出烟火、黑莓、牛油果、咖啡豆、甘草和黑樱桃的香气。酒体丰富饱满，口感丰富细腻，中口和尾部充满了浓郁的黑果和樱桃酒的层次。该酒由55%卡波内尔萨维诺、37%梅洛、6%卡波内尔法兰克和2%佩蒂·维多特混合酿造。

Western reviews.review: Zurückhaltend Aromatik; wir mögen ganz besonders die samtig- seidig Margaux- Art, die Klasse der Tannine, die Fülle und sogar das Feuer; wollüstig und vollbusig, mit besonderem Charakter: genau dafür mögen wir ihn.
Western reviews.translation:
这段红酒评论的中文翻译是：

谨慎的香气；我们特别喜欢这种细腻光滑的马格努（Margaux）风格，坚实的橡木味道，丰富的口感，甚至是火辣的味道；诱人且丰满，具有独特的个性：正是这种风格我们喜欢它。

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby, opaque core, subtle brightening at the rim, ripe sweet cherry and plum, fine nuances of oak, candied orange; multi-faceted bouquet. Juicy, ripe cherry, very elegant and full of finesse, perfectly integrated tannins, subtle nougat, persistent, beautiful appellation characteristics.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，浓郁的核心，酒杯边缘微微发亮，浓郁的甜樱桃和浓郁的浆果，细微的橡木味，糖化橙子；多面体的香气。 juicy、浓郁的樱桃，非常优雅，充满细致的味道，完美融合的纤维素，微妙的果仁，持久，美丽的产区特征。

Western reviews.review: 92–94. Barrel Sample. This estate is really improving. The wine in this vintage is full of fragrant fruit, with the tannins making a fine backdrop to the juiciness. It's going to be a fine medium-term wine.
Western reviews.translation: 92-94分。酒桶样品。这家酒庄的质量正在不断提高。今年的酒款充满了芳香的果味，苦味质作为背景使酒款更加鲜美。它将成为中期品酒的佳酿。

Western reviews.review: Pure nose offering mild oak with butterscotch, red plum, cassis and tobacco notes. Full bodied with a well-preserved freshness, ripe but youthful tannin with good lift and elegant red fruit flavours and a long silky finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气清晰，带有轻微的橡木、糖浆、红樱桃、黑加仑和烟草的味道。口感丰富，保留了新鲜的味道，果味成熟但仍然年轻，口感平滑，尾部长而丝滑。

Chinese pairs.original: 细腻、清雅是Cos 1985最显著的特色，虽然果实的浓郁度并不突出，但成熟度绝对在线。陈年之后的泥土气息缭绕在高级皮革和烟草周围，宛如一曲琴声悠扬的大提琴协奏曲，纯朴中透着温暖。最让我印象深刻是该年份贯穿始终的清新感，这是对波尔多式优雅最好的诠释。
Chinese pairs.new: Refined and elegant, the 1985 Cos is characterized by its exceptional maturity, even if the fruit intensity is not particularly prominent. After aging, the earthy notes envelop the high-end leather and tobacco, reminiscent of a soaring cello concerto, with a warm, rustic charm. What impresses me most is the persistent freshness that runs throughout, a perfect interpretation of the elegance of a classic Bordeaux.

English pairs.original: The most prominent character of Cos 1985 is the finesse and freshness. Although this wine is not highly intense, the grapes’ ripeness is just perfect. Scents of the forest floor are lingering around the classy leather and tobacco, like a warm melody of Cello around my body. What impresses me the most is the unforgettable freshness from the inside out, which is an excellent expression of Bordeaux’s elegance.
English pairs.new: 科斯1985最突出的特点是细致和新鲜。尽管这瓶酒不是非常浓烈，但葡萄的成熟度却恰到好处。森林地板的香气围绕着优雅的皮革和烟草，像一首温暖的大提琴曲在我身边旋转。让我印象最深的是从内到外都充满了不可忘怀的新鲜感，这是波尔多风格的典型表现。

Western reviews.review: Fully developed, the nose, with its spice box, tobacco leaf, forest floor, and cigar wrapper calls your name. Medium-bodied, fresh, vibrant, round, and packed with dark currants and red plums, this is ready to go. If you have a bottle, there is no reason to hold this any longer. It will not improve.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒已经完全成熟了，酒香中带有香料盒、烟草叶、森林地面和雪茄纸的味道，非常诱人。口感中等，新鲜、活泼、圆润，充满了黑葡萄和红杏的味道。这瓶红酒已经准备好享用了。如果你已经有瓶子了，那就没有理由再等待了。它不会变得更好。

Western reviews.review: Mittleres Rubin, Reifentöne. In der Nase offen und wunderbar duftig mit Zedernholz, Tabak, Gewürzen, Kräutern. Im Gaumen weich und zugänglich, mittlerer Körper, sehr feines, abgeschmolzenes Tannin, die Frucht wirkt warm und reif, im Abgang mit viel Würze. Ein reifer Cos, der aktuell viel Trinkspass bietet und sein Plateau noch einige Jahre halten dürfte. Bis 2026 geniessen. 18.5 vvPunkte (92/100)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论。翻译如下：

颜色：中度红色，酒色有层次。

香气：酒香浓郁，闻起来像松木、烟草、香料、香草。

口感：口感柔和，易于入口，酒体中等，细腻的橡木味消失在口中，果味温暖且成熟，尾部有丰富的香气。

总体评价：这是一瓶成熟的红酒，目前非常适合饮用，酒体还会保持稳定状态几年。建议在2026年前享用。评分：18.5分（相当于92/100分）。

Western reviews.review: Mittleres Karmingranat, breiter Ockerrand. In der Nase zarte Waldbeerfrucht, ein Hauch von Dörrzwetschken, etwas Orangenzesten, eher verhaltenes Bukett, mit Luft zart malzig-laktische Noten. Am Gaumen saftig, kraftvoll, wieder etwas Zwetschkenröster, straffe Tannine, die dem Wein Körper verleihen, Herzkirschen im Abgang, frischer, ausgewogener Gesamtausdruck. Trinken/lagern +10
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，宽广的橙色边缘。鼻子中有淡淡的森林浆果味，干燥的浆果味，橙子皮味，气味相对较轻，随着空气的变化，会有轻微的奶油和乳脂味。口感丰富，强烈，浆果味再次出现，紧致的橡皮味，赋予酒体质感，黑樱桃在尾部留下印象，整体风格清新平衡。推荐饮用/储存时间 +10年。

Chinese pairs.original: 2005年份的 Chateau La Tour Figeac 拥有强劲的结构和紧实的肌肉，高温干旱的天气不仅没有摧毁它的意志，反而练就了它坚强的体魄。焦糖、话梅和西梅干的香气清晰扑鼻，摇杯之后还散发出甘草、桂皮和丁香的复杂辛香。这款酒带有一种神奇的咸感，在它的衬托下，美乐的甜美莫名其妙地倍显突出，颇有几分法餐里的“Sucre & Sale”的概念。
Chinese pairs.new: 2005年份的Chateau La Tour Figeac拥有强劲的结构和紧实的肌肉，高温干旱的天气不仅没有摧毁它的意志，反而练就了它坚强的体魄。焦糖、梅子和西梅干的香气清晰扑鼻，摇杯之后还散发出甘草、桂皮和丁香的复杂辛香。这款酒带有一种神奇的咸感，在它的衬托下，美乐的甜美莫名其妙地倍显突出，颇有几分法餐里的“甜与咸”的概念。

English pairs.original: The 2005 vintage of Chateau La Tour Figeac boasts a strong structure and firm muscle. The hot, dry weather didn’t weaken it; instead, it forged a robust physique. Clear aromas of caramel, preserved plums, and dried prunes greet the nose, and swirling the glass reveals complex spicy notes of licorice, cinnamon, and clove. This wine has a magical hint of salinity that unexpectedly highlights the sweetness of the Merlot, reminiscent of the “Sucre & Sale” concept in French cuisine.
English pairs.new: 2005年夏特劳费加（Chateau La Tour Figeac）的红酒具有强烈的结构和坚实的肌肉。炎热干燥的天气并没有削弱它的力量，反而赋予了它强健的体型。鼻子里清晰的焦糖、保留的李子和干燥的李子香气迎接了我们，旋转玻璃时，复杂的香料味道如 licorice、丁香和肉桂被揭示出来。这瓶酒具有神奇的咸味，意外地突出了梅洛的甜味，令人想起法国烹饪中的“糖与盐”概念。

Western reviews.review: The entry is plush, rich and soft. Aromatics were enough to keep me interested, but, I'd like to see this wine in another 5 years to learn how well the oak bonded with the wine.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒入口丰富、富有质感，气味也很吸引人。但是，我更想在五年后再次品尝这瓶酒，了解橡木桶与酒的结合情况。

Western reviews.review: Very straight, firm, a wine that seems to be developing slowly. The blackberry fruits are impressive, rich and pure, and the tannins form a dense core of darkness. The wood is currently showing too strongly, but the fruit will certainly open out in a year or so. An impressive wine, but it needs time.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒非常直率、坚实，似乎正在缓慢成熟。黑莓果味非常出色，丰富纯粹，且坚果味形成了浓密的黑色核心。目前木头味太强烈，但果味一定会在一年左右逐渐展现。这个红酒很出色，但需要时间来发挥。

Western reviews.review: (2007) Quite subdued aromatically, but with a fine, dense, tight fruitiness. The palate is muscular and dense, with a chunky black fruit quality that is chewy, with a certain plummy breadth and mouth-filling ripeness. Again, no shortage of structure in a wine that is perhaps less fine that the best.
Western reviews.translation: 2007年：酒香相当低调，但具有细致密集的果香。口感强健密集，具有厚实的黑果质，口感坚韧，有一定的浓郁果实感和充满口感的成熟度。同样，这款酒没有结构不足的问题，可能不如最佳品质那么精致。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark, opaque ruby-red color. The nose has deep, juicy black-cherry aromas with delicate cedar notes. The palate's red & black cherry fruit is rich with soft tannins. Fine, ripe tannins on the mid-palate give good grip. The alcohol is a touch warm but fresh acidity helps to keep the fruit lively & supple. The finish lasts well. This is an open, clean & opulent modern wine - a nice example of La Tour Figeac. 11/09 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，几乎透明的红酒色。酒鼻中充满了浓郁的黑樱桃香气，带有细微的松木香。口感丰富的红黑樱桃果味，软滑的苦味。中口处的精致、成熟的苦味给了酒带有很好的抓握感。酒精略微温暖，但清新酸度帮助保持了果味的活泼和柔韧。酒尾持久。这是一款开放、清澈、奢华的现代红酒，体现了拉图尔菲雅克（La Tour Figeac）的典范。 评分：11/09 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 葡萄园面积4.58公顷的小型酒庄。花堡的核心理念是对于品丽珠克隆的选择。园内种植了花草来控制当下最为严重的葡萄扇叶病毒。一军酒通常要比二军酒更早采收，在1987和1991两个年份未被酿制。和中国一些葡萄园类似，冬季实行“半埋藤”；平均藤龄接近40年，但一些为非常古老的葡萄藤。在不锈钢桶和水泥缸中发酵，随后一般在约半新的法国桶内陈年15个月；乳酸发酵的方式取决于年份。平均年产量1000箱左右。在酒庄与酿酒师Omri Ram一同品鉴。半支装。此酒华丽的香气充满香料和雪松味，打底的是蓝莓、紫罗兰和岩石的香味。魁梧但细腻的单宁使其结构感十足的干净回味显得愈发滑爽。
Chinese pairs.new:
Here's the translation of the wine review:

A small winery covering 4.58 hectares of land, Flower Castle's core concept revolves around the selection of Pinot Noir clones. The vineyard is planted with flowers to control the most severe grape fanleaf virus. First-growth wines are usually harvested earlier than second-growth wines, and in 1987 and 1991, they were not produced. Like some Chinese vineyards, winter sees a "half-buried trellis" system; the average vine age is around 40 years, with some extremely old vines. Fermentation takes place in stainless steel tanks and concrete vats, followed by aging in approximately half-new French oak barrels for 15 months; the type of malolactic fermentation depends on the vintage. Average annual production is around 1,000 cases. Tasted with winemaker Omri Ram, this wine is available in half-bottles. The wine's elegant aroma is filled with spices and pine, underpinned by blueberry, lavender, and rocky notes. The robust yet refined tannins make the clean finish feel increasingly smooth.

English pairs.original: A small estate with 4.58 hectares vineyards. The core philosophy of Lafleur is the selection of clone (particularly Cabernet Franc) has a great impact on wine's quality. The fan leaf virus is currently the most serious disease in Lafleur's vineyards, so flowers and herbs are planted so as to control the virus. The grand vin is usually harvested earlier than the second wine, and only two vintages grand vin is not made: 1987 and 1991. A bit similar to those vineyards of China, the vines are semi-buried in winter; the average age of the vines is nearly 40 years of age, but the winery also possesses much older vines as well. The wines are fermented in stainless steel tanks and concrete vats, then generally aged in an average of 50% new French oak barrels for about 15 months; the place of MLF is decided by vintage (in tanks or in barrels). The average production is around 1000 cases per year. Tasted with the cellar master Omri Ram at the winery. Half bottle. Lush on the nose with lots of spices and cedar, plus underlying notes of blueberry, violet and stone. Massive but delicate tannins made the clean finish polished and structured.
English pairs.new: 拉弗鲁（Lafleur）是一家面积约为4.58公顷的葡萄酒庄园。拉弗鲁的核心理念是选择克隆（尤其是卡波弗兰克）对葡萄酒质量有着重大影响。目前，拉弗鲁葡萄园中最严重的疾病是扁桃叶病毒，因此在葡萄园中种植了花卉和香草以控制病毒。拉弗鲁的首酒通常比第二酒早收获，仅有两次没有酿造首酒：1987年和1991年。与中国的葡萄园类似，葡萄园在冬季会将葡萄架半埋入土中。葡萄园的平均年龄约为40岁，但葡萄园中也有一些更老的葡萄。葡萄酒在不锈钢罐和混凝土罐中发酵，然后通常在新法兰克的橡木桶中-aged约15个月，平均50%的新橡木桶。葡萄酒的MLF（葡萄酒发酵）位置由年份决定（罐子或桶子）。葡萄酒的平均产量约为每年1000箱。与酒庄的 cellar master Omri Ram一起品尝了葡萄酒。半瓶。酒鼻子丰富，满满的香料和松木味，蓝莓、紫罗兰和石头的底层。柔和但坚实的巨大但细致的纹理使得清晰的结尾变得光滑和结构化。

Western reviews.review: This is a crazy nose of tangerines and blueberries, with raspberries and mushroom and berries. Full-bodied, with ultra fine tannins. This wine is all about texture, with phenomenal tannins and subtle fruits that just make you think. Evocative. It is layered, yet changes all the time. I can't believe it really. Speechless. Amazes me. Try in 2020.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气简直疯狂，带有柑橘和蓝莓的味道，伴有草莓和蘑菇和浆果。口感丰富，纤维度极细。这个酒的所有重点都在于口感，具有极好的纤维度和微妙的果味，让人深思。它的味道丰富多层次，变化无穷。真的是让我无法相信。无言以对。令人惊叹。建议在2020年品尝。

Western reviews.review: An absolutely prodigious blend of 55% Cabernet Franc and 45% Merlot, the 2009 Lafleur displays the tell-tale characteristics of this great estate. Kirsch liqueur, licorice and floral notes are intermixed with raspberry in a very full-bodied, super-intense, opulent and multi-dimensional style. Extraordinarily dense and pure, but not heavy by any means, the intensity, texture, and richness of the 2009 Lafleur are reminiscent of the perfect 1982. Anticipated maturity: 2018-2040.
Western reviews.translation: 2009 年拉弗鲁（Lafleur）是一款绝对惊人的混合酒，含有 55% 卡波弗朗克（Cabernet Franc）和 45% 梅洛（Merlot）。这款酒展现了拉弗鲁酒庄的典型特征。酒中融合了可可糖、黑Licorice 和花朵香气，伴随着浓郁的草莓味。酒体丰富、强烈、奢华且多维度，酒质极其浓密而纯粹，但并不沉重。2009 年拉弗鲁的酒质、口感和丰富感令人回忆起完美的 1982 年拉弗鲁。预计成熟年份：2018-2040。

Western reviews.review: This gushes with mouthwatering blueberry, boysenberry and blackberry fruit, leading to a long black tea- and incense-filled finish. Darkens up considerably as it airs, with layers of extra flesh, Kenya AA coffee and charcoal notes striding through the finish. Shows an exotic side, and gorgeous mouthfeel. Best from 2015 through 2030.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒充满了令人垂涎的蓝莓、牛油果和黑莓果味，带来一长长的茶叶和香烟味的尾韵。随着时间的推移，酒色会变得更加深沉，层次更加丰富，肯尼亚AA咖啡和焦炭味会在尾韵中展现。它展现出异国情调的风格，口感也非常美妙。建议在2015年至2030年之间品尝。

Western reviews.review: Every bottle ages on a different curve. This example was more closed, tannic and less expressive than other bottles recently tasted. The potentail was there, but time and air were needed to allow more of the plum, chocolate and earthy character to emerge.
Western reviews.translation: 每瓶酒的成熟过程都不同。这个例子相比最近品尝的其他瓶子更闭塞、更苦、表达性较低。潜力确实存在，但需要时间和空气来让更多的浓郁的黑果、巧克力和泥土特征显现出来。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat. Zunächst etwas verhalten. Stoffig, feine Nuancen von Bitterschoko, saftige Beerenfrucht, sehr einladend, auch am Gaumen fruchtbetont, frische Struktur, reife Tannine, herrliche Länge, Orangenzesten, bereits sehr gut in Form, süßer Nachhall, gutes Reifepotenzial. (Lagern/trinken +20)
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色。起初有些谨慎。厚重的口感，细微的苦巧克力味道，浓郁的浆果味道，非常诱人，口感上也浓郁果香，结构清新，熟透的果皮，美妙的持久感，橙子皮味道，已经非常成熟，甜余味，很好的成熟潜力。 (建议储存/饮用20年以上)

Chinese pairs.original: 与Chateau Peyrabon风格颇为相似，Chateau La Fleur Peyrabon在入口处便展现出绵柔的质感，含在口中还带着毛茸茸的单宁质地。这款酒的集中度很好，单宁醇厚扎实，收尾时能感受到石墨和铅笔芯的风味，还泛着神秘的咸感。每个细节都打磨地无可挑剔，堪称是一款与Pauillac列级庄媲美的佳作。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine shares a similar style to Chateau Peyrabon, with a silky texture that unfolds from the start, accompanied by a velvety tannin texture that lingers on the palate. The concentration is excellent, with rich, full-bodied tannins that evoke graphite and pencil lead notes, finishing with a subtle, mysterious saltiness. Every detail is meticulously crafted, making this wine a worthy rival to Pauillac's top-tier estates.

English pairs.original: Chateau La Fleur Peyrabon exhibits a similar style to Chateau Peyrabon, with a soft and velvety texture that is apparent from the first sip, and a fuzzy tannic quality that lingers on the palate. Its concentration is superb, with a rich and solid tannin structure. The finish reveals the flavors of graphite and pencil lead, accompanied by a mysterious saline sensation. Every detail is nicely crafted, making it a counterpart that rivals Pauillac classified growths.
English pairs.new: 查泰aux拉弗勒佩拉邦展现出与查泰aux佩拉邦相似的风格，口感柔软细腻，第一口就能感受到。酒中有着轻微的苦味质感，留在口中久久不散。酒的浓度非常出色，坚实的苦味结构让人印象深刻。酒尾展现出石墨和铅笔味道，伴随着神秘的咸味。每个细节都经过精心打造，让它成为与巴约克级别相媲美的对手。

Western reviews.review: Forward, soft, chewy, peppery red berries with freshness, spice, cedar and leafy herbs on the nose and palate. The wine is medium-bodied, forward, and fruity. This is one of the remaining values in Pauillac. The wine is a blend of 57% Cabernet Sauvignon, 30% Merlot, and 13% Petit Verdot. Drink from 2025-2042. 89-91 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感柔和，入口果香丰富，带有新鲜的香气、香料、松木和叶绿植物的味道。酒体中等，果香浓郁。这是巴约克地区（Pauillac）中剩余的价值之一。酒款由57%卡波内尔葡萄（Cabernet Sauvignon）、30%梅洛葡萄（Merlot）和13%佩蒂·维多葡萄（Petit Verdot）组成。建议在2025-2042年内饮用。评分：89-91分。

Western reviews.review: Le nez est élégant, frais, aérien et offre une jolie richesse en « légèreté » ainsi qu’un fin côté torréfié/cacao. On y retrouve des notes de mûre éclatante, de violette, de bleuet et plus légèrement de cerise fraiche/pulpeuse associées à des touches de petits fruits rouges presque rôtis ainsi qu’à de fines pointes de poivre de Cubebe et à une fine pointe presque variétale en fond. La bouche est fraiche, élégante, minérale, délicate, soyeuse, texturée et offre une jolie définition. En bouche ce vin exprime des notes de mûre pulpeuse/juteuse, de petits fruits bleus écrasés et plus légèrement de framboise éclatante associées à des touches de cerise rôtie, de minéralité racée, de badiane, à une subtile pointe de toasté ainsi qu’à une fine pointe de torréfaction fraiche et d’amande toastée. Bonne longueur. Une très belle fraicheur, puissance, harmonie générale, une grande structure et de la gourmandise ! Félicitations !
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气优雅、清新、空气感十足，带有轻盈的质感和微微的烤焦味。酒中有爆发性的黑莓、紫罗兰、蓝莓和轻微的鲜红樱桃的香气，伴随着几乎烤熟的红果和细微的古巴胡椒和几乎多变的底部。口感清新、优雅、矿物质、细致、柔软、纹理丰富，具有美丽的定义。口中这瓶酒表现出黑莓的果肉和纹理、压碎的蓝果和轻微的爆发性草莓，伴随着烤红樱桃、矿物质、丁香、微微的烤味、新的烤味和烤杏仁。酒有很好的持久性。酒有很好的清新感、力量、整体和谐、结构和口感！祝贺！

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark, purple-red color, stains the glass when swirled. Aromas are restrained dark, black-cherry fruit. The structure has a graphite note & a very fine, smooth structure. Acidity is fresh & alcohol is balanced. Fresh black-cherry and fine tannins combine on a persistent finish. 04/23 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的紫红色，酒液在旋转时会染色。酒香中有黑樱桃的果香，非常深沉。酒体中有 graphite 的矿物质味道，结构细腻光滑。酸度清新，酒精平衡。酒尾持久，黑樱桃和细腻的苦味结合。评分：4.23（ep）DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 当Chateau Saint-Pierre的精巧灵动遇上火热的2018年份，我仿佛看到了纵身飞跃火圈的猛虎，和“心有猛虎、细嗅蔷薇”的表达颇有几分相似之处。这款酒闻起来是满满的成熟莓果，但喝起来却轻巧空灵。多汁的黑色果肉周围笼罩着一层干墨，醇厚紧致又韵味十足，是波美侯产区黏土砾石土壤的经典代表。
Chinese pairs.new: When the refined elegance of Chateau Saint-Pierre meets the fiery 2018 vintage, I'm reminded of a tiger leaping through flames, evoking the phrase "heart full of tigers, sniffing roses." This wine is full of mature berry aromas, but its taste is light and ethereal. Plump black fruit is wrapped in a layer of dry ink, rich and taut with a wealth of flavor, a classic representation of the clay and gravel soils of the Pomerol region.

English pairs.original: What will it be like when the exquisite and fairy Chateau Saint-Pierre meets the hot 2018 vintage? I would say it’s like a tiger jumping through the fire hoop, a sensation quite similar to the expression “in me a tiger sniffs the rose”. The wine smells of ripe berries, but tastes light and airy. The juicy black fruit aromas are surrounded with a layer of dried ink, mellow, compact, charming length. It is a classic representation of the clay gravel soil of Pomerol.
English pairs.new: 当精致的、神秘的圣皮埃尔庄园与热情的2018年葡萄酒相遇时，会是什么样的呢？我会说，这就像一头老虎跳过火圈一样，感觉与“在我心中，一只老虎嗅到玫瑰”的表达非常相似。酒精的气味像熟透的浆果，但口感轻盈、空灵。浓郁的黑果香气被干燥的墨色所包围，柔和、紧致、迷人。它是波尔多地区的典型代表，来自黏土和碎石的土壤。

Western reviews.review: Ausdrucksstark, dunkelfruchtig, das warme Jahr zeigt sich, jedoch mit einer ungemein feinduftigen, floralen Note; kräftiger, runder Gaumen, zeigt Opulenz und baut Druck auf, bleibt dabei sehr elegant, reife Gerbstoffe, milde Säure, langanhaltend, dunkelfruchtig; Kraft und Finesse vereint. 2026-2048
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

强烈的表达，深色果味，温暖的年份显现，但伴有极其强烈的花香味道；口感丰富，圆润，展现出豪华和压力，但保持着极其优雅的风格，成熟的橡木味，柔和的酸度，持久的深色果味；力量和细腻结合。推荐储存时间：2026-2048。

Western reviews.review: Ausdrucksstark, dunkelfruchtig, das warme Jahr zeigt sich, jedoch mit einer ungemein feinduftigen, floralen Note; kräftiger, runder Gaumen, zeigt Opulenz und baut Druck auf, bleibt dabei sehr elegant, reife Gerbstoffe, milde Säure, langanhaltend, dunkelfruchtig; Kraft und Finesse vereint. 2026-2048
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

强烈的表达，深色果味，温暖的年份显现，但伴有极其强烈的花香味道；口感丰富，圆润，展现丰富的风味和压力，保持着优雅的风格，成熟的橡木味，柔和的酸度，持久的深色果味；力量和细腻结合。推荐储存时间：2026-2048。

Western reviews.review: This firm wine shows layers of tannins as well as the warm, rich black fruits typical of the vintage. Black-currant flavors along with the tannins give a dense wine with aging potential. Drink from 2026. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒呈现出厚实的口感和典型的黑色果味。黑currant的风味与坚实的口感使得这款酒具有很好的陈化潜力。建议2026年后饮用。 - 罗杰·沃斯

Western reviews.review: This firm wine shows layers of tannins as well as the warm, rich black fruits typical of the vintage. Black-currant flavors along with the tannins give a dense wine with aging potential. Drink from 2026. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒呈现出厚实的口感和典型的黑色果味。黑currant的风味与坚果味的结合，展现出厚实的口感和长期储存的潜力。建议2026年后饮用。 - 罗杰·沃斯

Western reviews.review: Deep in color, the wine kicks off with flowers, smoky currants, spice, espresso and cigar box notes. From there, the richly textured dark red fruits provides layers of lusciously textured, fresh berries and toasty oak. Balanced, elegant and fresh, give this some time to fully come together and allow the oak to fully integrate. The wine was produced from 77% Cabernet Sauvignon, 21% Merlot and 6% Cabernet Franc.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的颜色深邃，开头的香气中带有花朵、烟熏黑currant、香料、咖啡和雪茄盒的味道。随后，丰富的黑色红果提供了丰富的、鲜嫩的黑berries和 Toasty oak的层次。平衡、优雅、清新，给这款酒一些时间，让木头的味道完全融合。该酒由77%卡波内尔·萨维尼诺、21%梅洛和6%卡波内尔·法兰克制成。

Chinese pairs.original: 蓝莓、李子、黑莓浓郁的气味。口感浓郁，如奶油般细腻，余味悠长，并带有甘草和烤面包的味道。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich blueberry, plum, and blackberry aromas. Full-bodied and creamy, with a long finish, featuring hints of honey and toasted bread.

Western reviews.review: A good value among over-achieving St.-Emilion estates is La Fleur Cardinale’s 2009. Composed of 70% Merlot, 20% Cabernet Franc and 10% Cabernet Sauvignon, some of the abrasive tannins noticeable early on in this big wine (14.5% alcohol) are now sweeter and better integrated. Made from tiny yields of 30 hectoliters per hectare, this is a concentrated, rich effort revealing lots of black cherry and black currant fruit as well as a fragrant, firm, full-bodied personality. It should be at its best between 2016 and 2030.
Western reviews.translation: 圣埃米利昂地区的超越表现中，拉弗勒卡迪南（La Fleur Cardinale）的2009年红酒是其中一项值得推荐的选择。该酒以70%梅洛、20%卡波弗朗和10%卡波萨维尼格为主要组成部分。虽然这款酒的酒精含量高达14.5%，但早期的粗糙纤维现在已经变得更加甜润并且更好地融合在一起。由30公顷/公顷的极低产量酿造而成，这是一款浓缩、丰富的酒，展现出大量黑樱桃和黑加仑的果味，以及一股清新的、坚实的、充满体积的个性。该酒预计在2016年至2030年之间达到最佳状态。

Western reviews.review: This delivers the textbook panoply of blueberry, plum and blackberry fruit of the appellation, with a lush, creamy mouthfeel and a long licorice- and sweet toast-filled finish. Along with the suave fruit, there's latent grip that should mellow nicely with midterm cellaring. Best from 2013 through 2023.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒呈现出典型的蓝莓、李子和黑莓果味，口感丰富、滑顺，尾部长长的 licorice 和甜toast味。除了优雅的果味外，还有潜在的嚼感，中期陈酿后会逐渐平衡。建议在2013年至2023年期间饮用。

Western reviews.review: Wow. Blueberry, minerals, oyster shell and black chocolate aromas. Full body, with velvety tannins and juicy finish. Delicious and succulent. Better in 2018.
Western reviews.translation: 哇！这款红酒的气味中有蓝莓、矿物质、牡蛎壳和黑巧克力。口感丰富，纤维柔软，余味浓郁。非常美味，口感丰富。建议在2018年喝。

Chinese pairs.original: 铅笔屑，黑加仑，雪松和香料盒的香气，香气相对封闭，酒体适中，很经典，甜美的单宁，口感圆润多汁，回味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Earthy notes of pencil shavings, black pepper, pine, and a hint of spice box, aromas are relatively closed, medium-bodied, very classic, sweet tannins, smooth and juicy texture, long finish.

Western reviews.review: Young, tight and tannic, this requires another 5-10 years before it add more complexity to its tobacco, earth, spice, cassis, floral, stone and fresh cut herb filled nose. Masculine in style, the wine ends with a blast of fresh, berries, cassis and cranberry. This wine is more about potential than pleasure today. Give it time. 92 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒年轻、紧致、有嚼头，需要再过5-10年才能让其复杂的烟草、泥土、香料、黑加仑、花香、石头和新鲜切割草本植物的香气更加丰富。风格上比较男性化，酒尾以新鲜的黑berries、黑加仑和蔓越莓的味道结束。这瓶酒更注重潜力而非当前的享受，给它时间吧。评分：92分。

Western reviews.review: At first taste, this wine seems more new world than Bordeaux. But then the subtle, perfumed aromas and structured fruit show through, along with the clean acidity and black tannic fruits. Give this wine at least 12 years before opening.
Western reviews.translation: 初尝时，这款红酒似乎更像新世界风格的葡萄酒。但是随后，细微的香气和结构化的果味开始显现，伴随着清晰的酸度和黑色坚果的果味。建议在开瓶前至少放置12年。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark ruby-red, not quite opaque. Aromas are predominantly cedary oak over ripe red-cherry fruit. Ripe red fruits combine with chocolatey notes on the palate. The wine is mid-weight with plenty of fine gripping tannins. Alcohol is balanced & despite the fact that the acid is a touch soft the ceadry finish lasts well. 11/04 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，几乎透明。酒香以松木桶味为主，伴有成熟的红樱桃果味。口感上，成熟的红果与巧克力味相结合。酒体中等，具有细致的抓握性纤维。酒精平衡，尽管酸度略软，但松木味的尾韵持久。评分：11/04 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 黑加仑，甘草、矿物质和黑莓的香气，柔滑细腻的口感，浓郁成熟的单宁，回味较长。
Chinese pairs.new: Dark plum, licorice, mineral, and blackberry aromas, smooth and velvety texture, rich and mature tannins, long finish.

Western reviews.review: The nose offers tobacco, blackberry, cassis, wet earth, cedar chest and cassis. On the palate, the wine is firm, fresh and traditional. This is well made and developing nicely, but there is a lack of excitement in the wine that would make me want to open another bottle. Tasters that prefer less ripe, lean, traditional or classic Bordeaux wine, will like this a lot more than I did. 90 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的鼻子中带有烟草、黑莓、黑加仑、潮湿的土壤、松木箱和黑加仑的气息。口感上，这瓶酒是坚实的、清新且传统的。这瓶酒做得很好，正在逐渐成熟，但我却没有足够的激情去打开另一瓶。那些喜欢较不成熟、瘦削、传统或经典波尔多红酒的品酒者，会比我更喜欢这瓶酒。评分：90分。

Western reviews.review: Mittleres Rubingranat, zarter Ockerrand. Anklänge von Nougat und Karamell, reife süße Frucht, feines Zwetschkenkonfit. Stoffig, recht süß und kraftvoll, wirkt aromatisch, fast wie ein kleiner Vintage Port, sehr zugänglich, zarte Bitterschokonote, gutes weiteres Entwicklungspotenzial.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，微微的橙色边缘。酒中有杏仁和糖浆的气息，成熟的甜水果和熟制的浆果味。口感厚重，甜度适中，酒力强劲，气味浓郁，类似于小型葡萄牙葡萄酒，非常容易入口，带有轻微的苦巧克力味，酒有很好的发展潜力。

Western reviews.review: (2007) A wine I've tasted several times i the past (and bought en primeur) showing a much more firm. lean, edgy liquorice and black plum fruit on the nose, with cherry and mineral edges adding a lot more nervosity than in previous tastings. Less opulent for sure on the palate, but there are reserves here, with that espresso-supported black fruit all constrained by grippy tannins and a liquorice and damson-skin severity. Over the course of an hour this starts to fill out, with the mid-palate developing a much more lush, blackcurranty fruit and hints of chocolaty richness. This is in a slightly awkward stage, but I am very happy to have some tucked away.
Western reviews.translation: 2007年我尝试过多次的这款红酒（并且在原酒庄购买了），这次的酒香更加坚实、干净、有边缘的 licorice 和黑浆果，鼻子上还带有樱桃和矿物质的边缘，增加了比之前尝试时更多的紧张感。口感上显得不那么奢华，但这里有储备，黑果由浓缩的咖啡支持，受到紧紧的橡胶质感的制约， licorice 和 damson-skin 的严厉程度。经过一小时，这开始填充起来，中口部发展出更加丰富的黑curranty 果味和巧克力般的丰富感。这是在一个稍微尴尬的阶段，但我非常高兴有这款酒藏起来。

Western reviews.review: If any wine could be described as beautiful, then Beychevelle is beautiful. Its flavors of liquorice and blackcurrant are smooth and opulent, well proportioned. The texture is rich, ripe and generous.
Western reviews.translation: 如果说有哪种红酒可以被描述为美丽，那么贝什维尔（Beychevelle）就是美丽的。它的 licorice 和黑currant 的风味是细腻而丰富的，比例合适。酒体丰富、成熟、慷慨。

Western reviews.review: Medium ruby-red with fairly deep pigmentation. Aromas are of leafy cassis with plenty of cedar notes. On the palate blackcurrant fruit has a liquorice-like concentration & plentiful cedary oak. Medium to full-bodied with plentiful fine tannins. Alcohol & acidity are balanced & the freshness lifts the cassis fruit on the finish well, giving good length. 11/04 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深红色，中度浓郁。

香气：带有叶子味的黑加斯（一种黑色水果）和大量的松木香气。

口感：黑加斯果实浓郁，类似于 licorice（甘草），松木香气也很浓郁。口感中等到中等以上，纤维质丰富。酒精和酸度平衡，果实香气在尾部留下了良好的长度。

Chinese pairs.original: 来看看Chateau de Pressac 是如何解读2021年份的：如此优秀的成熟度，打着灯笼都难找！淡淡的摩卡气息如鸭绒一般包裹在红李子和红樱桃身上，让一款凉年份的葡萄酒也披上了几分暖意；用舌面抚摸上颚，整个味蕾都被粉笔灰单宁所笼罩，不经意间就把石灰岩土壤的风土特性表达的清晰明了。收尾平顺而沉稳，高酸度中透着一股能量感。毫无疑问，这将是一款能够和大年份媲美的优秀作品。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau de Pressac 的 2021 年份葡萄酒表现出极高的成熟度。酒中淡淡的摩卡气息包裹着红李子和红樱桃的风味，给这款凉年份的葡萄酒带来了一丝温暖。舌头触摸上颚时，粉笔灰单宁的味道覆盖了整个味蕾，清晰地展现了石灰岩土壤的风土特性。酒尾平稳而沉稳，高酸度中透露着一股能量感。这是一款出色的葡萄酒，堪与大年份相媲美。

English pairs.original: Chateau de Pressac’s interpretation of the 2021 vintage stands out with its exceptional level of maturity, a true gem in this vintage. The subtle aroma of mocha delicately envelops the red plums and cherries like feathers, adding a touch of warmth to a wine from a cooler vintage. As it glides across the palate, it is embraced by the chalky tannins, unconsciously expressing the distinctive terroir of the limestone soil. The finish is smooth and composed, with a burst of vibrant energy from the high acidity. Undoubtedly, this wine is a remarkable creation, capable of competing with ‘Big Vintages’.
English pairs.new: 普雷萨克庄园2021年产的葡萄酒表现出其出色的成熟度，真的是这一年产的珍品。轻柔的摩卡香味轻轻地包裹着红杏和樱桃，给了这瓶来自冷季的葡萄酒带来温暖的感觉。酒液在口中流动时，被细致的石灰质苦味包围，自然地展现了来自石灰质土壤的独特风味。酒尾平稳而有序，高酸度带来了生动的能量。毫无疑问，这瓶酒是杰出的作品，能够与“大年份”相媲美。

Western reviews.review: Espresso, spice, and savory red berries fill the nose. The wine is medium-bodied, soft, polished, silky and fresh, with sweetness to the creamy, red fruits on the palate and in the finish. Drink from 2024-2036.
Western reviews.translation: 酒香中充满了浓缩的咖啡、香料和浓郁的红果味。酒体中等，口感柔和、光滑、细腻、清新，带有甜度的红果味。酒尾持久。建议2024-2036年饮用。

Western reviews.review: Dark garnet, narrow purple rim. Delicate nougat, dark berry fruit, a hint of plums and blackberries, hints of liquorice and tangerine zest. Medium-bodied, elegant, red cherries, ripe, fine tannins, pleasant minerality, balance and length; certainly has ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，细窄的紫色边缘。细腻的果仁味，黑berry果味，黑杏和黑莓的暗香，薄荷糖和橙子皮的微妙气息。中等体积，优雅，红果味，成熟，细致的纤维，愉悦的矿物质味，平衡和长度；绝对有陈化潜力。

Western reviews.review: Vom Barrique geprägte Nase, öffnet sich mit Luft, tiefgründig, kalkig, reiffruchtig und doch kühl anmutend, florale Töne und Tee, faszinierend. Im Gaumen schlank im Auftakt, baut Druck auf, zeigt Struktur und Frische, Tannine, Säure, Frucht, sind gut balanciert, angenehm lang und würzig im Abgang. Ausgezeichnete Qualität im Kontext des Jahrgangs. 2027-2040 (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2022. Grand Cercle des Vins de Bordeaux)
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的鼻子是由橡木桶的气味所影响的，随着空气的流通，变得更加深刻、有矿物质味道、成熟的果味和清爽的感觉，伴有花香和茶味，非常迷人。

在口中，初期是细长的，随后逐渐增强，展现出结构和清新感，苦味、酸味、果味都非常平衡，口感舒适，尾部长且有泥土味。

考虑到产区和年份，这瓶红酒的质量非常出色。推荐储存时间：2027-2040年。 (评分时间：2022年4月，来自Grand Cercle des Vins de Bordeaux)

Western reviews.review: Inky dark purple core and hue. Floral and fragrant with violet, crushed blackberry, cassis, truffle, and finely toasted oak with some coffee bean hints. Dense and voluminous with ripe tannin, sweet fruit flavours with a fine level of acidity, digest fruit, warming and fleshy with a really long finish, remarkably well done for the vintage.
Western reviews.translation: 深紫色酒液，气味芳香，带有紫罗兰、黑莓、黑加仑、松露和微微焦糖的木头味，伴有咖啡豆的微妙气息。酒体丰富饱满，口感丰富果实，酸度适中，余味持久，口感温暖丰富，酒龄长达。

Chinese pairs.original: 2022年份的干热天气在Clos de L’Oratoire 身上展现得较为明显。高成熟度所带来的甜美感在一开始便撩拨着我的嗅觉，黏土石灰岩的土壤特性为这款酒赋予了浓郁而流畅的果香：黑莓、樱桃以及高度成熟的杨梅甚是讨喜。收尾时的茶梗香气如同诗歌的押韵，让整款酒充满着和谐之美。
Chinese pairs.new: The effects of the dry and hot weather in 2022 are particularly evident at Clos de L'Oratoire. The high level of ripeness immediately tickles my senses with its sweetness, and the soil's limestone-clay characteristics imbue the wine with a rich and smooth fruitiness: blackberry, cherry, and delightfully ripe guava. The tea-leaf notes at the finish are like the perfect rhyme in a poem, filling the entire wine with a sense of harmony.

English pairs.original: The dry and hot weather of 2022 has left its mark on Clos de L’Oratoire. The high level of ripeness imparts a succulent sweetness that immediately tantalized my senses. The clay-limestone soil characteristic has endowed this wine with a rich fruitiness, exuding delightful notes of blackberry, cherry, and highly ripened blackcurrant. The finish, with its scents of tea leaves, is reminiscent of the rhythm of poetry, infusing the entire wine with a harmonious beauty.
English pairs.new: 2022年的干燥炎热天气留下了Clos de L’Oratoire的印记。高度成熟的葡萄带来了令人愉悦的甜度，立即激发了我的感官。黏土和石灰质的土壤特征赋予了这款酒丰富的果香，释放出黑莓、樱桃和高度成熟的黑currant的迷人香气。酒尾的茶叶香气，让人回忆起诗歌的节奏，赋予了整瓶酒和谐的美感。

Western reviews.review: Licorice, violets, black plums, incense, black raspberries, smoke, and leafy herbs open the nose. On the palate, the wine is creamy, fresh, rich, and loaded with black fruits, crushed stone, and spice. The oak is already close to fully integrated. The wine blends 80% Merlot, with 20% Cabernet Franc. Drink from 2026-2045. 93-95 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中包含了 licorice、紫罗兰、黑浆果、香烟、黑莓和叶绿植物等元素。口感上，酒体丰富、清新、富有黑浆果、碎石和香料的味道。橡木味已经与酒体融合得很好。酒中含有80%的梅洛和20%的卡波弗朗克。建议在2026-2045年间饮用。评分93-95分。

Western reviews.review: (80% Merlot, 20% Cabernet Franc, 14.5% Alkohol) Sehr expressive Nase nach Veilchen, würzige Noten, dunkle Beeren, Rauch. Im Auftakt weich, fast harmlmos, packt dann zu, die Frucht ist knackig, die Tannine sehr hochwertig, wie ein Seidentuch hüllen sie sich um die Frucht und tragen den Wein in einen langen Abgang. Herrlich, knackig, mineralisch im Finish. Sehr gut gelungen und mit grossen Reserven. 2030-2060 (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 auf Château Canon la Gaffelière) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation:
这是一瓶来自法国的红酒，具体信息如下：

* 成分：80% 美丽（Merlot）、20% 卡波弗朗奇（Cabernet Franc）
* 酒精度：14.5%
* 味道：有着浓郁的紫罗兰花香，带有香料和黑色浆果的味道，伴有轻微的烟熏味。
* 口感：初期柔和，接近于柔和的口感，但随后变得丰富，果味清脆，坚果味非常出色，像丝绸一样包裹着果味，带来长长的尾部。
* 结尾：清脆，矿物质味道，非常出色。
* 总体评价：非常成功，具有巨大的潜力，推荐储存时间为2030-2060年。

注：这瓶红酒是在2023年4月在Château Canon la Gaffelière进行的“En Primeur”品鉴。

Western reviews.review: Deep ruby colour, purple reflections, subtle brightening on the rim. Red cherries, fresh wild berries, a touch of orange zest, delicate tobacco spice in the background. Complex, juicy, dark berries on the palate, juicy tannins, mineral and lasting. Good length and certain ageing potential, a very gastronomic style.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，紫色反射，酒杯边缘微微发亮。红樱桃、鲜野果、橙子皮的微妙香气，背景中有细微的烟草香。口感复杂，果实丰富，黑果味浓郁，矿物质和持久。酒体长，具有明显的陈化潜力，风格极具美食性。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Sigalas Rabaud 2022 是所有贵腐酒中香料气息最突出的一款。它在高糖分和高浓度的衬托下，让我感受到了全方位的丰满。菠萝蜜、芒果和橘子酱的香气清晰明朗，搭配上圆润而不肥厚的酒体，十分馥郁诱人。这款酒就像是从槐花树梢轻轻垂下的花蜜，吸引了一群蜜蜂共享甘美。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau Sigalas Rabaud 2022 是所有贵腐酒中最具香气的一款。它在高糖分和高浓度的衬托下，让我感受到了一种全方位的丰满感。菠萝蜜、芒果和橘子酱的香气清晰明朗，搭配上圆润而不肥厚的酒体，十分馥郁诱人。这款酒就像是从槐花树梢轻轻垂下的花蜜，吸引了一群蜜蜂共享甘美的滋味。

English pairs.original: The Chateau Sigalas Rabaud 2022 stands out among noble rot wines with its distinctive spice aromas. Its fullness is felt in every aspect, thanks to its high sugar content and great concentration. The aromas of pineapple, mango, and orange marmalade are crisp and clear, paired with a rounded but not heavy body, making it extremely aromatic and tempting. This wine is like nectar dripping lightly from the acacia tree, attracting a swarm of bees to share its sweet and delicious essence.
English pairs.new: 沙加拉斯拉博 2022 年的独特香气让它脱颖而出，成为典型的霉菌感染红酒。其丰富的口感在每个方面都能感受到，得益于其高糖含量和高浓度。菠萝、芒果和橙子酱的香气清晰明了，配以圆润但不沉重的体积，使其极具芳香和诱人。这个酒就像轻轻滴落的阿卡西树的甘露，吸引一群蜜蜂来分享其甜美和美味的精华。

Western reviews.review: Candied white peach, pineapple, apricot, vanilla, and honey show up instantly on the nose and palate. The wine finishes with sweetness, and ample lift to the honeyed apricots along with a nice touch of vanilla as well on the creamy, sweet, fresh palate. You can enjoy this early as well as age it. Drink from 2025-2045 91-93 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感非常甜美，入口即感受到白桃、菠萝、杏子、香草和蜂蜜的味道。酒尾留有甜味，蜂蜜般的杏子的味道和香草的味道在口感丰富、甜美的口感中留下了深刻的印象。酒可以早喝，也可以放置储存。建议在2025-2045年之间饮用。评分：91-93分。

Western reviews.review: Feinwürzig, frisch, Datteln, Rosienen und Dörraprikosen. Im Gaumen mit viel Süsse, einer guten Säurestrutur, lebendig und mit viel Frische. Gelungen. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / CVBG / Château Belgrave) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感非常细腻，新鲜，带有DATES、葡萄干和干燥的柿子的味道。口感上充满甜味，酸度适宜，生动且充满新鲜感。整体效果很好。 (评分时间：2023年4月，来自Château Belgrave)

Western reviews.review: Light golden yellow, silver reflections. Ripe stone fruit, a touch of white pear, some mango and honey blossom, candied tangerine zest in the background. Full-bodied, elegant, vivid sweetness, fine acidity, shows power and minerality, salty finish, good development and certain ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation:
酒色：浅金黄色，银光闪烁。

酒香：成熟的石果，白梨的微妙气息，芒果和蜂蜜花的香气，背景中有糖化的柑橘皮。

口感：体积丰富，优雅，明亮的甜度，细致的酸度，展现出力量和矿物质感，咸味的尾韵，酒体良好，具有明显的陈化潜力。

Western reviews.review: Medium golden-yellow in color. The aromas are, lifted & high-toned with honey, fresh citrus & candied peel notes. The palate is very sweet with juicy, fresh apricot fruit, candied peel & honey with a marzipan-like concentration. The wine is quite full bodied with its alcohol adding warmth & roundness to the mid-palate. The finish has good length & the wine ends sweet. 04/23 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：金黄色。

香气：蜂蜜、柑橘果味、糖浆橙皮等高调香气。

口感：非常甜，果味丰富，口感滑顺，蜂蜜、糖浆橙皮、杏仁味等。

酒体：酒体丰富，酒精使得口感圆润。

尾部：尾部长且甜。

champagne salon cuvee s le mesnil brut b.name: champagne salon cuvee s le mesnil brut blanc de blancs millesime 1999

Chinese pairs.original: 沙龙香槟的核心酿酒哲学在于3个单一：单一葡萄品种，单一年份以及来自单一特级村的最好的葡萄。干净明亮的金色，杯子显现出持续得夸张的徐徐上升的气泡。太年轻了以至于香气有点紧，但却是那么的新鲜动人，散发出香料矿物、蛋白、杏仁牛轧糖、酵母、沙琪玛和杏。干净同时富有滋味的口感比起香气来说要更令人感到振奋：集中的焦糖化的风味、极为细致的气泡和庄严的矿物质之间存在着一种难以言喻的美妙平衡；非同凡响的葡萄质量赐予了此酒略带白中白香槟中通常都会有的青苹果般的突出酸度及若隐若现的怡人奶油质同时具有严峻的岩石感且难以置信的复杂而且超长的余韵。尽管我承认我还是比较喜欢更饱满、更有质感的香槟比如说库克，但我还是非常清楚地知道为什么说这支酒是世界上最牛逼的白中白香槟的理由。
Chinese pairs.new:
沙龙香槟的核心酿酒哲学在于3个单一：单一葡萄品种，单一年份以及来自单一特级村的最好的葡萄。干净明亮的金色，杯子显现出持续得夸张的徐徐上升的气泡。太年轻了以至于香气有点紧，但却是那么的新鲜动人，散发出香料矿物、蛋白、杏仁牛轧糖、酵母、沙琪玛和杏。

口感干净同时富有滋味，比起香气来说要更令人感到振奋：集中的焦糖化的风味、极为细致的气泡和庄严的矿物质之间存在着一种难以言喻的美妙平衡；非同凡响的葡萄质量赐予了此酒略带白中白香槟中通常都会有的青苹果般的突出酸度及若隐若现的怡人奶油质同时具有严峻的岩石感且难以置信的复杂而且超长的余韵。

尽管我承认我还是比较喜欢更饱满、更有质感的香槟，但我还是非常清楚地知道为什么说这支酒是世界上最牛逼的白中白香槟的理由。

English pairs.original: The core philosophy of Salon is the three ‘single’ : single grape variety (Chardonnay), single vintage and yet single grand cru village with best fruits. Neatly bright gold color revealed formidably enduring and constantly lifted bubbles.
