Too young so that it was tautly fresh on the beautiful nose characterized with spicy-mineral, egg white, almond nougat, yeast, caramel treats and apricot. The cleanly flavoursome palate was much more breathtaking than it aroma: there was a harmonious combination of intensely caramelized flavours, very detailed bubbles and solemn minerals; the extraordinary grape quality endows the wine a rather rocky, astringent, incredibly complex and super-long length which displayed green apple like pointed acidity for a stylized Blanc de Blancs and tinges of delightful creaminess. Although I still prefer richer and more textured Champagne such as Krug, while I understand this is one of the best Blanc de Blancs Champagne.
English pairs.new: 萨隆（Salon）红酒的核心理念是“三单”：单一葡萄品种（Chardonnay）、单一年份和单一一级葡萄酒庄园，使用最佳的果实。清澈的金色液体中，持续不断的气泡令人印象深刻。酒香清新，带有香料矿物质、蛋清、杏仁糖、酵母、焦糖糖果和杏子的气味。口感清晰，味道丰富，远远超过了酒香：酒中有着和谐的焦糖化味道、细致的气泡和庄严的矿物质；这瓶酒的葡萄质量极高，使得酒呈现出岩石般的、苦涩的、极其复杂的和超长的长度，酒中带有绿苹果般的尖锐酸度，呈现出典型的白白葡萄酒风格，并带有可爱的奶油感。虽然我仍然更喜欢像克鲁（Krug）那样更丰富和更有质感的香槟，但我理解这是一瓶最好的白白葡萄酒香槟。

Western reviews.review: Feine, komplexe Nase nach reifem Apfel, Kümmel, dezent Brioche, dazu Kräuter, Guave, herrlich verspielt, wird mit etwas Wärme immer intensiver. Im Gaumen cremig, feine Textur, sehr druckvoll, vollmundig aber gleichzeitig hochelegant, feinste Perlage und top eingebundene Säure. Im Abgang von sehr guter Länge, zeigt eine beeindruckende Harmonie. Jetzt bis 2030+, 19.5 vvPunkte (96/100)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论。翻译成中文后如下：

细腻、复杂的鼻子，带有成熟苹果、孜然、轻微的布里奥奇、香草、菠萝、迷人、随着温暖而变得更加浓郁。

口感丰富、细腻、非常有力、丰满但同时又高雅、细腻的泡沫和完美地融合的酸度。

尾部非常持久，展现出令人印象深刻的和谐。

推荐储存时间：现在至2030年，评分19.5/20（96/100）。

Western reviews.review: (2014) I tasted this wine shortly before Christmas and thought it was superb (scoring 96), so it was a welcome chance to taste it again in different surroundings. The 37th ever bottling of Salon is a different animal in many ways, with more roundness and depth of fruit, presumably through both vintage conditions and the extra three years of age. It came from a warm year that was one of the highest yielding ever in Champagne. It has a slightly deeper colour and is a little more open and nutty though still with a pristine fruit character that is elegant and pure. Joyous stuff for drinking already, there are hints of ginger, pear and spices, a real feeling of warmth, but then the tension builds through the core of refined acid. Delicious, though arguably without the aesthetic beauty and infinite precision of the 2002.
Western reviews.translation: 2014年圣诞节前，我品尝了这瓶酒，觉得非常出色（评分96分），所以再次品尝它在不同的环境中是一种欢迎的机会。萨隆（Salon）系列的第37瓶是一种不同的酒，具有更多的圆润和丰富的果味，可能是由于当年的气候条件和酒龄加长（三年）所致。它来自一个温暖的年份，是香槟产量最高的一年。酒色略深，口感更开阔，略带坚果味，但仍保留着优雅纯粹的果味。适合即刻饮用，酒中有姜、梨和香料的味道，带有温暖的感觉，但随后酸度的紧张感在酒的核心中逐渐增强。非常美味，但可能不如2002年版那样具有审美价值和无限精确度。

Western reviews.review: Helles Grüngelb, feines Mousseux. Feine Blütenaromen, zarte gelbe Apfelfrucht, ein Hauch von Honigmelone, Nuancen von Vanille. Saftig, elegant, feine weiße Birnenfrucht, finessenreiche Säurestruktur, mineralisch-salzig, ein Hauch von Zitronen im Abgang, besitzt eine sehr gute Länge, feine Apfelfrucht im Nachhall, ein rares Champagner-Juwel.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

深浅金黄色，细致的泡沫。细腻的花香，轻柔的黄苹果果味，蜂蜜瓜果的微妙香气， Vanilla 的微妙调和。口感丰富，优雅，细腻的白梨果味，精致的酸度结构，矿物质和盐味，尾部有柠檬的微妙余韵，具有很好的持久度，尾部留有细腻的苹果果味，非常罕见的香槟酒珍品。

注：由于原文是描述白酒（Champagner），我在翻译中保留了“香槟酒”一词，以便中国消费者能够理解。

Western reviews.review:
Magnum 1999, 2 Stunden karaffiert, aus Riedel Burgunder Sommelier getrunken, war dies ein ein subtiler, mit feinsten Bubbles verwobener Spitzen-Champagner. Eigentlich sollte man diesen Weltwein "ausriechen"!!! 
Dazu wurde selbstgebackenes Marillen-Brot gereicht.
Amazing!!!!
Western reviews.translation:
1999年红酒，2小时后从Riedel Burgunder Sommelier的葡萄酒杯中饮用，体验到了一个细腻、充满细微泡沫的顶级香槟。这个世界级的红酒应该慢慢品尝！ 
伴随着自制的梅子面包的享受，绝对惊艳！

Western reviews.review: 20240608 opened 3.5hrs before served. clear, bright, yellow gold. nutty, floral, honey, almond on the nose.  mid-high acidity, creamy, toasted, citrus, honey, minerals on the palate.  long finish with citrus, honey. smooth, elegant, mature, beautiful.  best champagne tasted sofar.
Western reviews.translation:
2024年7月26日

酒评：2024年6月8日开瓶，3.5小时后饮用。

颜色：清澈，亮丽的金黄色。

香气：有坚果、花朵、蜂蜜、杏仁的气味。

口感：酸度中高，奶油般的质地，烤焦的味道，柑橘味，蜂蜜，矿物质。

尾韵：长长的尾韵，留下柑橘和蜂蜜的味道。

口感：滑顺，优雅，成熟，美丽。

评语：至今为止品尝过的最好的香槟。

2021 Chateau Les Carmes Haut-Brion 'Le C.name: 2021 Chateau Les Carmes Haut-Brion 'Le C des Carmes'

Chinese pairs.original: 能够在2021年份有如此尚佳的表现，我必须给Le C des Carmes Haut-Brion竖两个大拇指。和热年份相比，这款酒的复杂度毫不逊色，20%带梗发酵以及成熟度很高的葡萄（13.5%度酒精）共同营造出大红枣、甘草片、酸角糕以及乌龙茶的独特芬芳。这款酒的收尾依旧有些仓促，但你无法不被它溪流般通畅的口感以及丝线般的单宁所感染。以我来看，这款酒真实地还原了2021年份所遇到的所有难题，而它却凭借自然素朴的表达方式再现了属于Le C des Carmes Haut-Brion 的独家记忆。
Chinese pairs.new: 我必须给Le C des Carmes Haut-Brion竖两个大拇指，因为它在2021年份表现出色。与热年份相比，这款酒的复杂度丝毫不逊色，20%带梗发酵和成熟度很高的葡萄（13.5%度酒精）共同营造出大红枣、甘草片、酸角糕和乌龙茶的独特芬芳。这款酒的收尾有些仓促，但它的溪流般通畅的口感和丝线般的单宁却让我深深感染。从我看来，这款酒真实地还原了2021年份所遇到的所有难题，而它却凭借自然素朴的表达方式再现了属于Le C des Carmes Haut-Brion的独家记忆。

English pairs.original: Le C des Carmes Haut-Brion in the 2021 vintage earns it unequivocal acclaim, meriting two thumbs up. Despite the cool vintage, the complexity loses nothing in comparison to warmer vintages. The combination of 20% whole bunch fermentation and mature grapes (13.5% alcohol) creates a distinctive bouquet of red dates, licorice, tamarind cake, and oolong tea. Although the finish might seem a bit hurried, it’s hard not to be captivated by the wine’s stream-like smoothness and silk like tannins. To me, this wine genuinely reflects all the challenges faced in 2021, yet it triumphs with a natural and straightforward expression that uniquely belongs to Le C des Carmes Haut-Brion.
English pairs.new: 2021年产的Le C des Carmes Haut-Brion红酒获得了无可争议的赞誉，值得两根手指竖起。即使是在冷淡的产季，酒中的复杂性也丝毫不输于暖和的产季。20%的整粒发酵和成熟的葡萄（13.5%的酒精）组合，创造了红枣、甘草、酸枣糕和乌龙茶的独特香气。尽管尾部可能略显匆忙，但难以抵抗这款酒的流畅如水和丝绸般的纹理。对我来说，这款酒真实地反映了2021年的挑战，但它却以自然和直接的表达方式独特地属于Le C des Carmes Haut-Brion。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby, purple hues on the narrow rim. Delicate smokiness, subtle herbal savouriness, then hints of blackberries and cassis, candied orange zest. Juicy, dark berry fruit, vivid tannins, salty and persistent with a savoury edge, fine sweetness on the finish; a multi-faceted food companion.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，紫色光泽的酒液，酒杯边缘狭窄。酒中带有细微的烟熏味和清晰的草药味，接着是黑莓和黑加仑的气味，糖浆橙皮的香气。酒液中充满了浓郁的黑莓果味，清晰的坚果味，咸味和持久的口感，酒尾带有微妙的甜度；这是一款多面性佳酿，适合与多种菜肴搭配。

Western reviews.review: Bright red fruits, spearmint, leafy tobacco and spice create the nose. Medium-bodied, fresh, crisp, energetic and vibrant, the bright red fruits in the finish are accented with a touch of salt in the endnote. Using 20% whole bunches in the vinification, the wine blends 62% Cabernet Sauvignon, 36% Merlot and 2% Petit Verdot, 13.5% ABV. The wine is aged in 20% new, French oak barrels. Drink from 2023-2033. 90-92
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中融合了鲜红的水果、薄荷、叶子烟草和香料的味道。口感中等，清新、清脆、充满活力和生动，酒尾的鲜红水果味道被盐的微妙味道所衬托。酒的酿造过程中使用了20%的整梗葡萄，酒的比例为62%卡波雷特·索维涅、36%梅洛和2%佩蒂·维多，酒精度13.5%。酒陈化于20%的新法兰克尔橡木桶中。建议2023-2033年饮用。评分90-92分。

Western reviews.review: (20jährige Reben) Herrliche Nase, dunkle fruchte, Cassis und Brombeeren, ein Hauch Lakritze. Im Gaumen weich und mit süsser Frucht im Auftakt, das ist knackig und frisch, sehr vertikal, straff im Tannin, diese jedoch reif, die Säure in perfekter Balance mit Frucht und Struktur. Das ist frisch, würzig und sehr balanciert. Ausgezeichnete Qualität. Bestimmt schon jung ein Gedicht, kann aber auch einige Jahre reifen. 2025-2038 (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2022. Château Les Carmes Haut-Brion)
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶20岁的红酒，酒瓶上的气味非常美好，带有浓郁的果香，黑berry和黑莓，微微带有 licorice 的味道。口感柔和，初期有甜果香，之后变得清脆和新鲜，非常垂直，紧致的 tannin 却已经成熟，酸度与果香和结构保持完美的平衡。这瓶酒非常新鲜，具有香料味道，非常平衡。品质出色。虽然它可能已经成熟，但也可以在几年后再次品尝。推荐储存时间：2025-2038年。

Chinese pairs.original: 香气十分活泼，绵柔的黑莓和蓝莓芬芳中还透着一缕淡淡的烟草气息，散发着与年龄不符的成熟气质。让人好奇的是，在如此甜美的口感中居然带着咸咸的话梅糖芬芳，有点儿像法餐中“甜咸口味经典搭”。单宁粉嫩而紧致，让收尾显得平和绵长而又细腻有加。
Chinese pairs.new: The aroma is lively and soft, with blackberry and blueberry notes that are subtly infused with a hint of smoky undertones, giving off a mature quality that belies its age. What's intriguing is that amidst the sweetness, there's a salty hint of quince sugar, reminiscent of the classic sweet-savory flavor combination found in fine French cuisine. The tannins are delicate and firm, contributing to a smooth and refined finish.

English pairs.original: Well sophisticated wine, rich dark fruits, sweet spices align with intense okay notes. Concentrated and well structured but showed by refined and soft texture, especially expected juicy and fresh mouth-filling. Tannins are improving in persistence, but by velvet and polished texture.
English pairs.new: 这是一瓶非常复杂的红酒，富有深色水果的味道，伴随着甜香料和浓郁的烟熏味。酒体结构紧密，层次分明，但又表现出细腻柔和的口感，尤其是入口时的果酱般的滋味和清新感。酒中的纤维逐渐变得持久，但仍然呈现出细腻光滑的口感。

Western reviews.review: Vibrant nose of wild raspberries, bramble berries, lemon zest, thyme and sandalwood. It’s medium-to full-bodied with firm, tight-grained tannins and bright acidity. Vibrant and fragrant. Firm yet elegant finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气非常鲜艳，带有野莓、荆棘莓、柠檬皮、迷迭香和沉香的味道。口感中等到中厚，具有坚实的、紧密的纤维和清晰的酸度。酒体充满活力和芳香。酒尾坚实而优雅。

Western reviews.review: The deep purple-black colored 2019 La Vieille Cure comes prancing out of the glass with regal scents of boysenberries, warm black plums, black cherry preserves and kirsch plus nuances of violets, espresso and camphor with a waft of black olives. Medium to full-bodied, the palate is laden with bright, pure black fruit layers, framed by wonderfully ripe, finely grained tannins and bold freshness, finishing long and fragrant. Stunning!Barrel Sample:(91-93)+
Western reviews.translation: 2019 年的 "La Vieille Cure" 红酒呈现出深紫黑色的颜色，酒香中充满了浓郁的黑莓、熟黑杏子、黑樱桃果酱和威士忌香气，伴有紫罗兰、咖啡和樟脑的微妙气息，最后是黑橄榄的余味。口感中等到中厚，酒液中充满了清新明亮的黑果层次，受到完美成熟的细致纤维和强烈的新鲜感的支撑，酒尾长长且芳香。简直是惊人的！酒桶样品：(91-93)+

Western reviews.review: A year-in, year-out best value, the 2019 Château La Vieille Cure is another winner from this château that does everything right. Revealing a deep ruby/purple hue as well as great aromatics of black cherries, tobacco leaf, spicy oak, and loamy earth, it's medium to full-bodied, perfectly balanced, has silky tannins, and a great finish. It's just an impeccably made, satisfying, classic Right Bank beauty to drink over the coming 10-12 years.
Western reviews.translation: 2019 年的 Château La Vieille Cure 是一瓶年复一年都值得推荐的红酒。它展现出深红紫色的颜色和黑樱桃、烟草叶、香橙木和泥土的芳香。口感中等到中厚，平衡完美，纤维细腻，尾部长而持久。它是一瓶制作精良的典型右岸葡萄酒，适合在未来 10-12 年内享用。

Western reviews.review: Stylish, with crushed plum and lightly warmed cassis flavors infused gently with dark earth and tobacco accents, followed in the end by a hint of cast iron. Merlot, Cabernet Franc and Cabernet Sauvignon.
Western reviews.translation: 风格优雅，口感丰富，带有压榨的浓郁黑桃和轻微加热的黑加仑风味，伴有暗土和烟草的细微调味，最后以一丝铁锅味结束。酒中含有梅洛、卡伯涅 Franc 和卡伯涅 Sauvignon。

Chinese pairs.original: 2022年份的Chapelle d’Ausone 与普通年份的正牌旗鼓相当。它将品丽珠的优雅气质以更加甜美的方式呈现，无论是香气还是口感，都荡漾着软糯多汁的莓果芬芳，以及类似水果软糖的香甜气息。贯穿始终的紫罗兰之韵正是这款酒的灵魂所在，让万物皆为之倾倒。这是2022年份右岸品质最好的副牌酒。
Chinese pairs.new: 2022年份的Chapelle d'Ausone与普通年份的正牌旗鼓相当。它以更加甜美的方式呈现品丽珠的优雅气质，无论是香气还是口感，都充满了软糯多汁的莓果芬芳和类似水果软糖的香甜气息。贯穿始终的紫罗兰之韵是这款酒的灵魂，让所有人都为之倾倒。这是2022年份右岸品质最好的副牌酒。

English pairs.original: Chapelle d’Ausone 2022 is on par with its flagship counterpart of regular vintage. It presents the elegant character of Cabernet Franc in a more luscious and succulent manner, imbuing both aroma and flavor with the juicy and delicious fragrance of berries, as well as a candy-like sweetness. The soul of this wine lies in the continuous perfume of violet, which infuses all aspects of the experience, captivating all those who encounter it. This is unequivocally the finest second-label of the right bank in 2022.
English pairs.new: 查佩尔·奥索内 2022 年红酒与其标志性同系列的常规年份相媲美。它呈现出卡伯内特·弗朗克的优雅风格，但以更加丰富和醇厚的方式呈现，赋予了气味和口感浓郁的浓果香和甜美的糖果味。酒中的灵魂在于持续的紫罗兰香气，它渗透到整个体验中，深深吸引着所有遇见它的人。这无疑是 2022 年右岸最好的二级标签红酒。

Western reviews.review: Verführerische Aromatik; auch hier ist es gelungen, Frische, Extrakt, den Ausdruck von Frucht und Mineralität unter einen Hut zu bringen. Tannin mit Klasse und Tiefe, grosse Spannkraft trotz der Alkoholwerte, und Länge.
Western reviews.translation: 迷人的香气; 这次又成功地将新鲜、浓缩、果味和矿物质的特征融合在一起。具有品质和深度的苦味，酒精含量高但仍具有强大的张力和持久性。

Western reviews.review: Deeply colored, the nose shows off its wild flowers, black raspberries, incense, and licorice nuanced perfume without asking. Medium-bodied, creamy, lush, fresh, and with a strong sense of minerality, the wine fills your palate with chocolate, mint, spice, licorice, and black cherries before you find all the salty, crushed rocks, and stones on the back end. Once again, it is difficult to believe this is a second wine. The wine blends 60% Cabernet Franc, 35% Merlot and 5% Cabernet Sauvignon, 15% ABV, 3.52 pH. Drink from 2027-2048. 93-95 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 深色浓郁的酒液，鼻子中充满了野花、黑莓、香烟、薄荷和甘草的芬芳。酒体中等，丰富、滑顺、清新，矿物质感强烈，口感中充满了巧克力、薄荷、香料、甘草和黑樱桃的味道。酒尾中有盐味、碎石和石头的感觉。令人惊讶的是，这是一款次酒。酒中混合了60%卡波弗朗克、35%梅洛和5%卡波弗雷蒙，15%的酒精含量，3.52的pH值。建议2027-2048年饮用。评分93-95分。

Western reviews.review: Great energy , well transmitted by its crunchy and refreshing red and black fruits. Juicy and vibrant. Some interesting laurel aromatics, along with subtle oak spiciness of cedar. Salinity at the end, long finish. Elegant and vivacious.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒充满活力，通过其清脆的黑红果味传递出生动的感觉。口感丰富，充满活力。酒中有着一些独特的罗勒香气，以及细微的松木香味。酒尾带有盐味，持久的尾韵。整体上，酒呈现出优雅和活泼的风格。

Western reviews.review: (60% Cabernet Franc, 35% Merlot, 5% Cabernet Sauvignon, 15% Alkohol) Kräuterig und würzig zeigt diese Nase, dass der Cabernet Franc hier die Hauptrolle spielt, Süssholz und eine dezente Teenote schwingen mit, dahinter Kirsche und Brombeeren. Im Gaumen elegant, sehr feines Tannin, saftige Säure, die Frucht ist ungemein knackig, harmoniert mit der Struktur, keinerlei Hitzigkeit, nur Frische und Eleganz. Langer, rotfruchtiger, Abgang. Ein wunderbarer Chapelle d'Ausone, der schon früh Spass bereiten wird, dessen Lagerpotential jedoch nicht zu unterschätzen ist. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 auf Château Ausone) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的成分是：60% 卡波弗朗克，35% 梅洛，5% 卡波萨维尼翁，酒精含量为 15%。

这瓶红酒的香气中，卡波弗朗克占主导地位，带有草药和香料的味道，伴有甜木和淡淡的烟草味。后来还可以闻到樱桃和黑莓的味道。

在口感上，这瓶红酒非常优雅，细腻的橡木味和清脆的酸度使得果味变得非常鲜活和清脆。口感非常平衡，没有任何的刺激感，只有清新的味道和优雅的质感。

这瓶红酒的尾部非常长，带有典型的红果味。总体来说，这是一瓶非常出色的 Ausone 红酒，很快就会让人享受它的美味，但也要注意它的储存潜力。

Western reviews.review: (60% Cabernet Franc, 35% Merlot, 5% Cabernet Sauvignon) Joli nez riche, équilibré, élégant et offre une certaine petite puissance, de la profondeur ainsi qu’une petite fraicheur variétale. On y retrouve des notes de petits fruits noirs charnus/denses, de fraise écrasée et plus légèrement de petits fruits bleus écrasés associées à de fines touches de cacao frais, de prune bleue écrasée ainsi qu’à une discrète pointe vanillée. La bouche est joliment fraiche, minérale, élégante et offre une certaine richesse/maturité du fruit (en fraicheur), une discrète pointe rôti (en fond) ainsi qu’une jolie ampleur et harmonie en fraicheur. En bouche ce vin exprime des notes de mûre pulpeuse, de framboise écrasée et plus légèrement de prune bleue fraiche/éclatante associées à des touches de muscade, de toasté, de badiane et de vanille. De la sapidité et un fin côté iodé en fond. Joli petit moelleux des tannins. Une belle fraicheur qui porte.
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的成分是：60% 卡波弗朗（Cabernet Franc）、35% 梅洛（Merlot）、5% 卡波萨维（Cabernet Sauvignon）。

这瓶红酒的香气丰富、平衡、优雅，具有小巧的力量，深度和轻微的果香。它带有黑色浓实的果实、挤压的草莓和轻微的挤压的蓝色果实，伴有新鲜巧克力、挤压的蓝色葡萄和微妙的香草味。

口感清新、矿物质、优雅，具有果实的丰富和成熟感，微妙的烤味和清新果香。口感中表现出浓实的黑berry、挤压的草莓和新鲜的蓝色葡萄，伴有丁香、烤面包、肉桂和香草味。口感中有清新果香和细微的海盐味。酒中的纤维轻柔，清新果香持久。

这瓶红酒的口感清新、优雅，具有丰富的果实和成熟感。

Chinese pairs.original: 初闻酒杯就进入了奶油蓝莓的甜美世界，咸咸甜甜的话梅周围还飘散着香叶和月桂叶的草本芬芳。入口时的石墨质感十分明显，伴随着绵柔的单宁质感在味蕾上奔跑。口感强劲集中但始终保持了平衡与优雅，作为一个世纪大年，如果收尾时能展现出更多的风味物质将会更加出众。
Chinese pairs.new: Upon first sip, the wine transports you to a world of creamy blueberry sweetness, with salty-sweet plum notes lingering in the background, accompanied by the herbal aromas of bay leaves and rosemary. The graphite texture is immediately apparent on the palate, accompanied by a silky smooth tannin sensation that dances across the taste buds. The flavor is powerful and concentrated, yet remains balanced and elegant throughout. As a century-old wine, it would be even more exceptional if it could showcase more complexity and depth in its finish.

English pairs.original: Just a sniff is good enough to fall you into a sweet world of cream blueberry. Around the flavor of salty dried plum, there is the fragrance of bay leaves and delicate herbal notes. The entry of it, the character of graphite is prominent, with dense tannins running on the palate. The palate of it is intense but well-balanced and elegant. As a wine born in a good year of a century, it will be even better if showing more Phenolic on the finish.
English pairs.new: 一口气就能感受到这款红酒的甜美世界，蓝莓和奶油的香味弥漫开来。周围的盐干梅的风味中，带有樟叶和细微的草药香气。入口时，图形的特征突出，口感中充满了密集的苦味。口感强烈但平衡，优雅。作为一款出生于世纪佳年红酒，若能在尾部展现更多的苯酮味道，会更加出色。

Western reviews.review: Ab 28 September gelesen. 50% neues Holz, 50% einmal gebrauchtes Barrique, 50% Merlot, 40% Cabernet Franc, 10% Cabernet Sauvignon, 14.5% Alkohol, 3.7 pH, 4.5g Tannin. Mittlers Rubinrot, Reifetöne. Die Nase ist komplex, leicht rauchig, zeigt Tabak, Schwarztee, eine dunkle Kirschfrucht sowie Pflaumen, mit mehr Luft auch Lakritze und etwas Tomatenstile. Im Gaumen anfangs weich, dann rasch straffer werdend, merklich Tannine, gute Säure, der Wein ist kräftig, jedoch nicht hitzig, im Abgang leicht trocknend, hallt lange nach und endet auf einen Mix aus roten und dunklen Früchten. Ein klassischer, etwas rustikaler Pessac der bereits gut zu trinken ist und dennoch reifen kann. Jetzt bis 2038
Western reviews.translation: 本酒已于2022年9月28日阅读。酒中50%新橡木桶，50%曾经使用过的橡木桶，酒中50%梅洛，40%卡波弗朗克，10%卡波萨维尼翁，酒精含量14.5%，pH值3.7，苦味物质4.5g。酒呈中度红色，酒色深红。酒香复杂，带有轻微烟味，带有烟草、黑茶、黑果、浓郁的黑果味，带有浆果和浆果味，空气中还带有 licorice 和一点点番茄味。口感最初柔和，然后迅速变得更紧张，明显带有苦味物质，酒酸好，酒味浓郁，但不辣，酒尾略微干燥，酒香持续很久，最后以红果和黑果的混合味结束。酒呈现出典型的，略带粗犷的佩萨克风格，酒已经可以饮用，但仍有潜力继续成熟。建议在2022年至2038年之间饮用。

Western reviews.review: Produced from a blend of 55% Merlot, 35% Cabernet Franc and 10% Cabernet Sauvignon. Chocolate mint accompanied by fennel, black cherry and thyme in the nose. On the palate, the wine is smooth, light on its feet and serves up a fresh blackberry and cocoa sensation with little effort. 91 Points
Western reviews.translation: 本酒由55%梅洛、35%卡波弗兰克和10%卡波萨维宁三种葡萄品种混合酿造。酒鼻中充满了巧克力薄荷、荜拌、黑樱桃和迷迭香的香气。口感细腻，轻盈，酒中黑莓和可可的风味清新自然，毫不费力。评分：91分。

Western reviews.review: Sehr dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe; reife Frucht, Dörrzwetschgen klingen an, feine balsamische Noten, etwas Nougat; saftige, süße Beerenfrucht, reife, kraftvolle Tannine, die sehr gut integriert sind, bleibt gut haften, schokoladiger Nachhall, großes Zukunftspotenzial.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光；成熟的果实，干枯的浆果味道，细微的乳香味，略带奶油味；浓郁的甜果实，成熟的坚果味，强劲的纤维，非常好地融合在一起，留下了深度的巧克力余味，未来发展巨大。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有烤浓咖啡、黑醋栗甜酒、烟熏、皮革、石墨和甘草的香气，酒体丰满，单宁收敛，口感紧致。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich aromas of roasted espresso, black fig jam, smoky notes, leather, graphite, and licorice. Full-bodied with firm tannins and a crisp finish.

Western reviews.review: Composed of 86% Cabernet Sauvignon, 12% Merlot and 2% Cabernet Franc, the 1998 Mouton Rothschild is deep garnet-brick in color with lovely crème de cassis, dried roses, hoisin and baking spice notes with underlying notions of dried cherries and mulberries plus touches of wood smoke, incense and forest floor. Medium to full-bodied and packed with rich fruit framed by firm, chewy tannins, it is stacked with complex, evolving flavors and finishes with incredibly long-lasting perfumed notes. According to winemaker Philippe Dhalluin, this needs about three hours of decanting at this stage. I simply love the place this wine is in right now, possessing plenty of mature, tertiary characters yet still sporting bags of fruit. It won’t be fading anytime soon either and should cellar nicely for 20-25+ more years.
Western reviews.translation: 1998年毛顿罗得施（Mouton Rothschild）红酒，主要由86%卡伯涅松（Cabernet Sauvignon）、12%梅洛（Merlot）和2%卡伯涅法兰（Cabernet Franc）组成。酒色深红砖色，具有美丽的黑加拿大浆果、干玫瑰、酱油和烘烤香料的香气，底层有干樱桃和黑浆果的味道，以及木烟、香烛和森林地板的微妙感觉。酒体中等到中厚，富有丰富的果味，框架由坚韧的嚼头纤维构成，酒中充满了复杂的、不断演变的味道，酒尾留有长久的、芬芳的味道。根据酒庄的酒师菲利普·德哈吕（Philippe Dhalluin）表示，这种酒需要在当前阶段进行约三小时的脱颖。 我非常喜欢这种酒目前的状态，具有成熟的次级特征，同时仍然具有大量的果味。这种酒不会很快消失，而且应该在20-25+年后继续陈化。

Western reviews.review: A blend of 86% Cabernet Sauvignon, 12% Merlot, and 2% Cabernet Franc, the 1998 Château Mouton Rothschild comes from a vintage that saw beautiful early season weather but rain in September and October that made the vintage more complicated for the Médoc and Graves region. A more medium to full-bodied effort, it has terrific complexity in its red and black currant fruits as well as smoked tobacco, loamy earth, spice box, and chocolate. Balanced, elegant, and silky on the palate, its oak is perfectly integrated, it has fine tannins, and it’s smack in the middle of its prime drinking window.
Western reviews.translation:
1998年夏布勒伊-莫顿-罗得施利德（Château Mouton Rothschild）是一款由86%卡布ernet·索维涅（Cabernet Sauvignon）、12%梅尔洛（Merlot）和2%卡布ernet·法兰克（Cabernet Franc）组成的红酒。该酒来自一场风调雨顺的早季，但9月和10月的雨水使得梅多克（Médoc）和格雷夫（Graves）地区的酒庄面临更大的挑战。

这款酒的口感中等到中等以上，具有丰富的复杂性，展现出红黑葡萄的果香，以及烟熏烟草、土壤、香料盒和巧克力等复杂的香气。口感平衡、优雅、滑顺，木头味完美融合，具有细腻的纤维，正处于最佳饮用期。

Western reviews.review: In his Wine Buyer’s Guide to France, Robert Parker felt this was the finest Mouton since 1986. At Vivat Bacchus, this was the most variable wine of the tasting, with one bottled corked, two distinctly edgy and a little green. The best bottle (described here) was much better. Deep and intensely purple in colour, there is still plenty of concentration and potential for this Mouton to blossom further. Ripe red/black cherry aromas combined with warm, spicy oak. The issues at harvest time are most evident on the palate with slightly hard, furry tannins. Harvested 28 September to 6 October. 86% Cabernet Sauvignon, 12% Merlot, 2% Cabernet Franc. 57% of production used for the Grand Vin.
Western reviews.translation: 罗伯特·帕克在他的《法国葡萄酒购买指南》中认为，这是自1986年以来最好的穆通葡萄酒。 在维瓦特·巴克斯（Vivat Bacchus）中，这是品酒会中最不稳定的葡萄酒，一个瓶子塞塞了，两个瓶子味道很刺激，略带青涩。 但是最好的瓶子（在这里描述）要好得多。 深度浓郁的紫色，仍然有很多浓缩和潜力让穆通葡萄酒进一步成熟。 甜熟的红/黑樱桃香气与温暖的、带有香料的橡木混合。 产季中的问题在口感中最明显，略带硬、毛糙的橡皮味。 采摘时间为9月28日至10月6日。 产酒比例为86%卡波弗雷蒙（Cabernet Sauvignon）、12%梅洛（Merlot）和2%卡波弗雷蒙（Cabernet Franc）。 产酒总量中57%用于Grand Vin。

Western reviews.review: Blackberry and violets on the nose, with hints of roses. Sweet tobacco too. Full-bodied, with a solid core of fruit and round tannins. A little tight and reserved now. Give it time.
Western reviews.translation: 酒香中有浓郁的黑莓和紫罗兰花香，伴有玫瑰花的微妙气息，还有甜的烟草味。酒体丰富，果实丰富，纤维柔顺。现在酒气略紧绷，保留一些。需要时间来发酵。

Western reviews.review: This is spicy and peppery with dried fruits and currants. It's full and velvety on the palate, showing pretty berries and toasted coffee beans. Long, long finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有辣椒和胡椒的味道，伴有干果和葡萄干的风味。口感丰富、滑顺，展现出鲜艳的浆果和烤咖啡豆的风味。口感持久，非常长。

Chinese pairs.original: 唇齿间的花香比期酒的时候少了许多，装瓶后主要表现为多汁的黑桑葚以及丁香八角的辛香。空灵的入口和丝滑的口感十分出众。绸缎般的单宁和鲜滑软嫩的口感让整个味蕾都充满了温柔的气息。
Chinese pairs.new: The floral notes that linger between the palate and lips are less pronounced than in the barrel-aged version, with a focus on juicy blackberry and warm, spicy cinnamon. The ethereal entry and silky texture are truly exceptional. The smooth, velvety tannins and tender, luscious mouthfeel fill the palate with a gentle, soothing quality.

English pairs.original: Comparing with Malescot Saint-Exupery en Primeur, the floral notes are less prominent yet more focusing on juicy blackberry, mulberry, and the spiciness of star anise and clove. Then airy entry and smooth palate are beautifully outstanding, adorned with silky tannins and tendre mouth feeling like a mellow personality.
English pairs.new: 与Malescot Saint-Exupery en Primeur相比，这款红酒的花香味道较为淡雅，但更注重黑莓、浆果和星安息香、丁香的浓郁果香。入口轻盈，口感平滑，具有细腻的纤维和柔和的口感，像是一位温和的性格。

Western reviews.review: This is a fruity and structured wine. With its dusty tannins and promising firm core, it has the texture for aging. Fruitiness gives it the potential to mature into a poised and sophisticated wine. Drink from 2026. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 这是一个富有果味和结构的红酒。它的干净的橡木味和坚实的核心使其具有长期储存的潜力。果味使其有可能成熟为一种优雅和复杂的红酒。建议2026年后饮用。 - 罗杰·沃斯

Western reviews.review: Almost opaque in color, this full-bodied, lusciously textured, round, rich gem provides layers of ripe, sweet, dark red fruits, licorice, espresso, plums and cherries . The combination of velvety tannins, intensity and a plush finish hits the spot. If you can keep your hands off it for a decade or so, this is going to be an outstanding wine to enjoy for the following 2 decades after that. 95 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的颜色接近透明，具有丰富的口感、圆润的质地和丰富的口味。它提供了成熟的、甜美的、黑红色的水果、 licorice、咖啡、浆果和樱桃等多层次的口感。它的细腻的纤维、强烈的口感和丰富的尾部让人难以抗拒。如果你能忍住不喝它，等待10年左右，这款红酒将会在接下来的20年内成为一瓶难得的佳酿。评分：95分。

Western reviews.review: Deep ruby-garnet, purple glints, faintly lighter at the rim. Dark berry fruit, black cherries, spices underpin noble wood nuances, fine tobacco note. Juicy, elegant texture, fresh sweetheart cherries, delicate nougat, ripeness, supportive tannins, expressive finish, persistent, followed by a savoury aftertaste. Still needs time. (2025-2045)
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，紫色闪光，边缘略微浅色。黑berry果味，黑杏子，香料和高贵的木质nuances，细微的烟草味。口感丰富，优雅，新鲜的甜心杏子，细致的果仁，成熟，支持性的纤维，表达性的尾部，持久，随后是咸味的余味。仍需要时间来成熟。 (2025-2045)

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Rubin. Tiefe Nase, rauchig, dunkelfruchtig, zeigt auch Süssholz, darüber Veilchen. Im Gaumen straff, gradlinig, kraftvoll, sehr strukturbetont mit satter Frucht, die Säure ist stimmig, der Alkohol perfekt verpackt, das hat Druck und eine sehr gute Länge. Eher maskulin jedoch mit guten Anlagen für eine lange Reife. 2028-2042+ (Verkostet auf Château Dauzac (UGCB), am 01.04.2019)
Western reviews.translation: 深红色。酒香浓郁，烟熏味、黑果味浓郁，伴有甜木香和紫罗兰花香。口感紧致、平衡、强劲，结构完善，果味丰富，酸度适宜，酒精完美融合，酒体有力，口感持久。酒风较为男性化，但有很好的储存潜力。建议储存至2028-2042年。 (评估时间：2019年4月1日，评估地点：Château Dauzac)

Western reviews.review: This is a fruity and structured wine. With its dusty tannins and promising firm core, it has the texture for aging. Fruitiness gives it the potential to mature into a poised and sophisticated wine. Drink from 2026. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 这是一个富有果味和结构的红酒。它的干净的橡木味和坚实的核心使其具有长期储存的潜力。果味使其有可能成熟为一种优雅和复杂的红酒。建议2026年后饮用。 - 罗杰·沃斯

Chinese pairs.original: Les Carmes Haut-Brion 2014鲜美温润的香气给我留下了很好的印象。多汁的樱桃、纯熟的蓝莓以及带梗发酵(Whole bunch)的茶梗清凉，在紫罗兰的装点下显得无比清雅。纯净的口感彷如吃了一颗Q弹的草莓果冻，伴随着绵柔细密的单宁以及流畅的酒体线条在口中融化。
Chinese pairs.new: The Les Carmes Haut-Brion 2014 has a stunningly elegant aroma, with luscious cherry notes, ripe blueberries, and a refreshing tea leaf hint from whole-bunch fermentation, all set against a delicate lavender backdrop. The palate is as pure as a strawberry sorbet, with a silky smooth texture and refined tannins that melt effortlessly on the palate.

English pairs.original: Les Carmes Haut-Brion 2014 impresses me with its fresh and smooth personality, embellished by the fragrance of violet, the flavor of juicy cherry, ripe blueberry, and the freshness of black tea seems to be extremely fresh and elegant. The pure palate creates the illusion of savoring a springy strawberry jelly, with soft and dense tannins and graceful structure melting on the palate.
English pairs.new: 莱斯卡尔姆豪布里昂 2014 年红酒给我留下了深刻的印象，它的新鲜和平滑的性格让人印象深刻，带有紫罗兰的香味，鲜红樱桃的味道，成熟的蓝莓的味道，和黑茶的清新感，让人觉得非常新鲜和优雅。纯粹的口感让人觉得在品尝一份春天的草莓果冻，软绵的和密集的纤维和优雅的结构在口中融化。

Western reviews.review: 50% Ganztrauben, ein ganz kleiner Teil der Vinifikation wurde hier bereits mit der "Infusions-Technik" gemacht. 54% Cabernet Franc, 32% Merlot, 14% Cabernet Sauvignon, 13.5% Alkohol, 3.6 pH. Dichtes Rubinrot. Die Nase ist tiefgründig und komplex, eine wunderschöne Aromenpalette steigt einem hier entgegen, würzige Noten, Anis, Kümmel, Schwarztee, Iris, Veilchen, mit mehr Luft auch ein Hauch Lakritze. Der Gaumen ist gut strukturiert und im Vergleich zu 2011 bis 2013 eher kräftig, die satte Frucht wird von feinen Tanninen und einer frischen Säure gestützt, die 14% Alkohol sind gut verpackt. Das Finish ist hier langanhaltend und dunkelfruchtig. Man kann diesen Wein natürlich schon antrinken (Dekantieren empfohlen), idealerweise ab 2025 bis 2040+
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的成分是：

* 50% 葡萄全部使用
* 部分采用浸泡技术进行酿造
* 成分：54% 卡波弗朗克、32% 梅洛、14% 卡波萨维尼翁
* 酒精度：13.5%
* pH值：3.6
* 颜色：深红色

酒香深邃复杂，具有丰富的香气，包括：

* 热带风味
* 杏仁
* 肉桂
* 黑茶
* 鲜花香
* 蓼花香
* 空气中有薄荷糖的味道

口感结构良好，相比2011-2013年更为强劲，丰富的果味由细致的橡木味和清新的酸度支撑，14%的酒精度被很好地包装起来。酒尾长达数分钟，深红色果味。

可以立即饮用（建议脱颖而出），但最佳饮用时间是2025-2040年。

Western reviews.review: Much better from bottle than barrel, this continues developing nicely. Perfumed, silky, elegant and refined, the smoky, dark, ripe, sweet, fresh, red fruits, spice, earth and tobacco linger and build. 95 Points
Western reviews.translation: 瓶装比酒桶好，酒精继续发展得很好。酒精中带有香味，滑顺，优雅，精致，烟熏的黑色成熟甜美的红果，香料，土壤和烟草味道在口中停留并逐渐增强。评分：95分。

Western reviews.review: 92–94. Barrel Sample. Dusty tannins float in this impressive wine. It has dark layers of black fruits and acidity that cushion the dry, tannic character, with great freshness at the end.
Western reviews.translation: 92-94分。酒桶样品。酒中充满了细微的橡木味，黑色果实和酸度层次丰富，干燥的橡木味被酸度和新鲜味道所平衡。

Chinese pairs.original: 不知道是不是因为蓝黏土的魔力，Meyney 2019能够在收敛紧致的香气中绽放出独特的花果气息，尤其是那一缕悠然的紫罗兰花香，让钢筋铁骨般的结构也变得充满了柔情。入口超级浓郁但毫无厚重感，伴随着咸咸的话梅味道和淡淡的中草药气息在味蕾上久久不散。以我对Meyney的了解来看，陈年6-8年会好喝到不行。
Chinese pairs.new:
The Meyney 2019 seems to be infused with the magic of blue clay, as it bursts with unique floral and fruity aromas amidst a compact and taut bouquet, particularly a subtle lavender note that adds a touch of elegance to its robust structure. 

The palate is incredibly rich yet surprisingly light, with a salty blackberry flavor and a hint of herbal notes that linger on the finish. Based on my experience with Meyney, I believe it will reach its peak in 6-8 years.

English pairs.original: I don’t know whether it’s because of the magical blue clay, Meyney 2019 opens up with plenty of floral notes, especially those elegant violet petals. This fragrance is graceful enough to soften the steel-like structure. The palate is super dense but without heaviness, accompanied by salty plum and hints of Chinese herbs lingering on the palate. From my experiences with Meyney, it will be even more gorgeous after 6-8 years of bottle aging.
English pairs.new: 我不确定是因为神奇的蓝色泥土，还是其他原因，梅尼 2019 年的红酒打开后，充满了花香，尤其是优雅的紫罗兰花瓣。 这种香气足以软化钢铁般的结构。 口感非常浓密，但没有沉重感，伴随着咸梅和中国药材的余味在口中挥之不去。 根据我对梅尼的了解，这瓶红酒经过 6-8 年的陈酿后，会更加美丽。

Western reviews.review: From a reliable estate, this wine is firm in feel. It also has open black fruits that pair alongside the generous tannins. It is good long-term aging.Barrel Sample: 93-95
Western reviews.translation:
来自可靠的庄园，这款红酒具有坚实的口感。它还具有开放的黑色果味，与丰富的橡胶质相得益彰。它适合长期储存。

酒评样本：93-95分

Western reviews.review: The 2019 Meyney has a divine bouquet, so pure and winsome with floral red berry scents, beautifully integrated new oak and superb precision. The palate is medium-bodied with supple tannins, fleshy to the point where you can almost overlook the backbone of this Saint-Estephe. It could have been blowsy, yet it retains superb balance and feels luxuriant and long on the finish. This is a stellar showing easily eclipsing its performances either in barrel or just after bottling.
Western reviews.translation: 2019年梅尼（Meyney）红酒具有神圣的香气，纯粹而迷人，带有鲜花和红果的香味，新橡木的味道融合得非常完美，精确度也非常出色。口感中等体积，纤维柔软，几乎可以忽略这瓶圣埃斯泰普（Saint-Estephe）的骨架。它可能会变得过于丰富，但它仍然保持着出色的平衡感，感觉奢华且长长的尾部。这个表现非常出色，远远超过了它在酒桶或刚刚装瓶后的表现。

Western reviews.review: One of the wines I use as a marker of how good the vintage is in St Estèphe, because it isn't classified but is in a brilliant location right next door to Montrose. And this is good, extremely concentrated, pure cassis and bilberry flavours, tons of tannins, clear austerity and fairly high acidity as I am getting in a lot of these 2019s. Not the same luscious character as 2018, but in many ways that makes it more typical of the appellation, and the alcohol seems less over the top than in 2018. Lots to enjoy here, not quite up to 2016 standard but not far. Tasted two weeks apart, and if anything its expression had deepened second time around. Barrel Sample: 93
Western reviews.translation: 我用这个红酒来衡量圣埃斯泰夫 (St Estèphe) 的产季质量，因为它虽然没有被分类，但位于蒙罗斯 (Montrose) 邻近的优质地块。这个红酒非常出色，浓郁的黑加仑和蓝莓风味，充满了坚果的苦味和高酸度。与2018年相比，这个红酒没有那么浓郁，但在很多方面它更符合该产区的风格，酒精含量也没有2018年那么高。这个红酒有很多可爱的地方，虽然不如2016年，但也没有太远。两周后再次品尝，红酒的表现更加深入。酒评：93分。

Western reviews.review: A solid, slightly burly version, featuring streaks of tar and bay leaf mixed with dark plum and black currant preserve flavors. The finish is underscored by a warm paving stone note, which adds cut, drive and a hint of old school. Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot and Petit Verdot. Best from 2024.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的风格坚实，略带浓郁，体现出焦油和迷迭香的条纹，混合着黑浆果和黑加仑果酱的风味。尾部由一块温暖的铺路石的味道所主导，这增加了剪裁、驾驭力和老派风格的点缀。酒中含有卡波雷尔·沙维尼翁、梅洛和佩蒂·韦多特。建议2024年后再饮。

Western reviews.review: Aromas of ripe berries, licorice and chocolate with a touch of mushroom and some dustiness. Silky, polished texture with medium body and firm tannins. Holds long and even, with a lingering sensation of crushed stones. Hold for a couple of years. Second wine of Meyney.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的气味中带有成熟的浆果、 licorice 和巧克力，伴有蘑菇和微微的尘土味。口感滑顺，体积中等，口感坚实，且有坚实的苦味。酒尾持久平稳，留下石头碎片的余味。建议在几年后再次品尝。Meyney的第二酒。

Chinese pairs.original: 这款酒能够在高酸年份巧妙地借助咸鲜矿物感来柔化酒体，那种口感就好像是柠檬+咸盐+龙舌兰的奇特感受。茴香、香芹籽、小雏菊的香气相当精致，让整个味蕾充满了活力和清雅。我特别欣赏这款酒暗藏在柑橘皮之中的深邃矿物感，直接把我拽入到另一个神秘空间。重点推介！
Chinese pairs.new: This wine skillfully uses its high acidity to soften the palate with a salty, mineral taste, reminiscent of a unique blend of lemon, salt, and agave. The subtle aromas of caraway, dill seeds, and chamomile add a lively and elegant touch to the senses. I'm particularly impressed by the wine's deep, mineral undertones hidden beneath the citrus peel, which transport me to a mysterious realm. Highly recommended!

English pairs.original: This wine artfully softens its body through the salty mineral notes in a vintage with high-acidity, a magical experience similar to taming a tequila shot with lemon and salt. Delicate flavors of fennel, parsley seed, and daisy fill my palates with vigor and fresh elegance. Profound mineral notes hidden among that of orange peels really catch me, leading me into a mistrial world. Strongly recommended!
English pairs.new: 这款红酒巧妙地通过矿物质的海盐味来软化其身体，体现出高酸度的典范。这种体验就像在酒精中加入柠檬和盐一样，具有魔力。薄荷、芹菜籽和百合花的细微味道充满了我的口感，带来新鲜的典雅感。橙皮的味道中隐藏着深刻的矿物质味道，引领我进入一个迷人的世界。强烈推荐！

Western reviews.review: This estate, on the edge of the village of Martillac, has produced a fine, structured wine. The wood aging has lent its polish, giving the wine richness alongside the acidity as well as good potential. Drink from 2027.
Western reviews.translation: 这家庄园位于马蒂亚克村的边缘，生产了一款结构良好的美酒。木桶陈化赋予了酒精光泽，酒精与酸度并存，展现出良好的潜力。建议2027年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: This estate, on the edge of the village of Martillac, has produced a fine, structured wine. The wood aging has lent its polish, giving the wine richness alongside the acidity as well as good potential. Drink from 2027.
Western reviews.translation: 这家庄园位于马蒂亚克村的边缘，生产了一款结构良好的美酒。木桶陈化赋予了酒精光泽，酒精与酸度并存，展现出良好的潜力。建议2027年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: Rich and well-pronounced sensory profile shows notes of black plums, blackberries, plums, dark chocolate, incense and peppermint. Medium body, soft tannins and a smooth finish. A blend of 60% Cabernet Sauvignon, 30% Merlot and 10% Petit Verdot. Drink now.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒具有丰富的口感和明显的香气，展现出黑杏、黑莓、黑桃、暗巧克力、香烟和薄荷的特征。口感中等，苦味柔和，尾部光滑。酒中含有60%卡波雷尔葡萄酒、30%梅洛葡萄酒和10%佩蒂·韦尔多葡萄酒的混合。建议立即饮用。

Western reviews.review: Rich and well-pronounced sensory profile shows notes of black plums, blackberries, plums, dark chocolate, incense and peppermint. Medium body, soft tannins and a smooth finish. A blend of 60% Cabernet Sauvignon, 30% Merlot and 10% Petit Verdot. Drink now.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒具有丰富的口感和明显的香气，展现出黑杏、黑莓、黑桃、巧克力、香烟和薄荷的特征。口感中等，苦味柔和，尾部光滑。酒中含有60%卡波雷尔葡萄酒、30%梅洛葡萄酒和10%佩蒂·韦多葡萄酒。建议立即饮用。

Western reviews.review: Mittelkräftiges Rubin. Feiner Duft, Tabak und Röstnoten, dahinter ein Mix aus dunklen und roten Beeren. Im Auftakt straff, schlank und frisch, keinerlei Überextraktion, sehr feines Tannin, die Säure wirkt markant, verleiht Zug, delikates, rotfruchtiges Finale. Burgundisch. Dürfte früh Spass machen. 2025-2038 (Verkostet im November 2023 in Zürich bei UGCB)
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒。酒香芬芳，带有烟草和烤果味，后面是黑色和红色浆果的混合。酒口入口紧致，清爽，口感细腻，没有过度提取，具有细致的橡皮感，酸度明显，给人一种紧绷感，酒尾轻盈，带有红果味。风格典型的勃艮第风格。酒应该在2025-2038年之间达到最佳状态。 (2023年11月在瑞士Zürich的UGCB进行评分)

Chinese pairs.original: 12.7%的压榨酒 + R’pulse浸渍 + 超高的Saignee（酿酒师Christophe跟我说，他们今年从100多个压榨酒样品中选择了品质最好的12.7%加入到正牌酒中），2021年份的Chateau Brane-Cantenac向我们展现了意料之外的集中度和醇厚感，含在口中，仿佛有只羊绒球在来回翻滚。无论年份好坏，Chateau Brane-Cantenac 始终保持着玛歌的尊荣，无论是对高级草本的诠释、对单宁的打磨、还是对层次的诠释，都值得我为之脱帽致敬。
Chinese pairs.new:
12.7%的压榨酒 + R'pulse浸渍 + 超高的Saignee（酿酒师Christophe跟我说，他们今年从100多个压榨酒样品中选择了品质最好的12.7%加入到正牌酒中），2021年份的Chateau Brane-Cantenac向我们展现了意料之外的集中度和醇厚感，含在口中，仿佛有只羊绒球在来回翻滚。无论年份好坏，Chateau Brane-Cantenac 始终保持着玛歌的尊荣，无论是对高级草本的诠释、对单宁的打磨、还是对层次的诠释，都值得我为之脱帽致敬。

Translated Review:

A 12.7% press wine + R'pulse infusion + an exceptionally high Saignee (winemaker Christophe told me they selected the best 12.7% from over 100 press wine samples to add to the main wine this year), the 2021 Chateau Brane-Cantenac presents an unexpected concentration and richness, with a texture that feels like a plush ball rolling around in the mouth. Regardless of the vintage, Chateau Brane-Cantenac consistently upholds its noble reputation, deserving of my utmost respect for its interpretation of high-end herbs, its refinement of tannins, and its layering.

English pairs.original: Chateau Brane-Cantenac 2021, with its 12.7% of finest press wine, R’pulse maceration, and an exceptionally high level of Saignee, as winemaker Christophe revealed, demonstrates a surprising concentration and richness. Tasting it feels like a cashmere ball rolling around in my mouth, with a mellow mouth feeling. Vintage after vintage, good or not, Chateau Brane-Cantenac always maintains its noble dignity in Margaux. Whether it’s unique interpretation of noble herbal notes, meticulous refinement of tannins, or the multi-layered complexity, it’s a performance that commands my utmost respect.
English pairs.new: 布兰-坎坦纳酒庄2021年产酒，拥有12.7%的精选葡萄酒，采用R’pulse浸泡法，异常高的采摘酒量，酒庄的制酒师克里斯托夫透露，这瓶酒展现出令人惊讶的浓郁和丰富。品尝它的感觉就像一颗绵绵的羊毛球在口中滚动，口感柔和。无论是好年份还是差年份，布兰-坎坦纳酒庄都始终保持着马尔格斯区的高贵尊严。它独特的解读高贵的香草味，精心调节的纤维，多层次的复杂性，让人深深敬佩。

Western reviews.review: It shines with character and energy in notes of black cherries, plums, wild violets, rosemary and marjoram. Medium-full body, soft tannins and a highly stylistic finish that combines freshness and juiciness with a great desire to return to the glass. A blend of 74% Cabernet Sauvignon, 22% Merlot, 2% Cabernet Franc, 1% Petit Verdot and 1% Carmènere. Drink now or age.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒闪闪发光，展现出黑樱桃、浆果、野百合、罗勒和马吉罗的独特风格和活力。口感中等至中等以上，口感柔和，后味风格独特，结合了新鲜和水果的味道，令人渴望再次品尝。酒款以74%卡波内托葡萄，22%梅洛葡萄，2%卡波弗朗葡萄，1%佩蒂·韦尔多葡萄和1%卡门雷葡萄为主。可立即饮用或陈化。

Western reviews.review: Komplexe Nase, noch dezent vom Holz geprägt, tiefgründig und rein, sehr feiner Cassisduft, Kirschen, Gräser, florale Noten, ein Hit. Im Gaumen elegant, anfangs leicht cremig, wird dann immer straffer, messerscharf, elegant, mit feinkörnigem Tannin, einer ungemein knackigen Frucht und sehr schöner aromatischer Länge. Das ist ein tänzerischer Brane, der früh Spass machen kann, jedoch nicht zu unterschätzen ist in Sachen Potential. 2027-2048+ (Verkostet im November 2023 in Zürich bei UGCB)
Western reviews.translation: 复杂的鼻子，木质味道仍然很淡，但深入且纯粹，非常细腻的黑加斯杜夫，草莓，草本植物，花朵的香气，绝对的好酒。口感优雅，初期略微奶油，随后变得越来越紧绷，锋利，优雅，具有细腻的坚果，非常脆的果味和非常美丽的香气持久度。这是一瓶舞蹈般的布兰，能够早早让人享受，但不能低估其潜力。评分：2027-2048+ (2023年11月在苏黎世的UGCB品尝)

Western reviews.review: Vivid ruby, opaque core, purple and ochre tinges at the rim. Elegantly savoury with black berry fruit, a touch of noble wood and hints of liquorice. Complex, taut, cool style, fine tannins, fresh, lively, very precise and persistent on the finish; a very successful wine reminiscent of the great classics of the Médoc of an early era.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色的，透明度很高，边缘有紫色和黄褐色的色调。口感优雅，带有黑莓果味，微微带有高档木头和 licorice 的味道。风格复杂，紧致，冷静，口感细腻，新鲜，活泼，非常精确和持久的尾韵；这瓶酒非常成功，令人回忆起早期梅多克地区的经典佳酿。

Western reviews.review: Tobacco, roses, currants and bouquet garni kick off the perfume. The wine is soft, fresh, medium-bodied, and quite charming, as well as vibrant, finishing with a touch of spice on top of all the sweet red fruits you find on the backend. You will be able to enjoy this on release. The wine blends 74% Cabernet Sauvignon, 22% Merlot, 2% Cabernet Franc, 1% Petit Verdot and 1% Carmenere 12.7% ABV. The harvest took place September 23-October 7. Drink from 2023-2050 93-95
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中，烟草、玫瑰、黑currant和香草开花的香味相互融合。酒体柔和、清新、中等体积，非常迷人，充满活力，最后以一丝辛辣的味道结束，伴随着后端的甜红果味。酒的口感非常舒适，值得在发布时享用。酒的组成比例为：74%卡波网索维诺、22%梅洛、2%卡波网法兰克、1%佩蒂·维多、1%卡门埃雷。酒精度12.7%。酒庄采摘时间为9月23日至10月7日。建议饮用时间为2023-2050年，评分93-95分。

Chinese pairs.original: 层层叠叠的粉质单宁铺满整个味蕾，美得让人应接不暇，这就是我在2021年份苦苦寻找的浓郁度。品尝这款酒，彷如一块牛轧糖在口中融化，丰润的奶质感伴随着粒粒榛果在口中延展，把整个味蕾装点的无比醇厚丰满。收尾时的那一抹紫罗兰芬芳堪称经典，它就像高定套装里藏着那一抹紫色的丝线，无需过多的装饰就能散发出极致的魅惑。
Chinese pairs.new: A blanket of powdery tannins envelops the palate, so beautiful it's almost overwhelming, this is the rich depth I've been searching for since 2021. Sipping this wine is like a block of caramel melting in the mouth, with a rich, creamy texture accompanied by plump, juicy berries that stretch across the palate, adorning it with unparalleled opulence. The final flourish of lavender fragrance is nothing short of classic, like a subtle purple thread woven into a bespoke suit, exuding an irresistible allure without needing any embellishment.

English pairs.original: Layer upon layer of powdery tannins envelop the entire palate, providing the richness that I’ve eagerly looked for in the 2021 vintage. Savoring this wine is akin to enjoying a piece of nougat that gently dissolves on the palate, with its creamy texture and generous hazelnuts. The subtle hint of violet in the finish adds a classic touch, like a hidden thread of purple silk in an elegant ensemble, exuding timeless charm without the need for excessive embellishments.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的口感丰富厚实，层次丰富的粉末状苦味覆盖整个口感，满足了我对2021年产季的期望。品尝这款酒，犹如享受一块柔软的 nougat，轻轻融化在口中，带有丰富的奶油质感和丰富的杏仁味。酒尾的轻微紫罗兰味道，像一根细致的紫色丝线，穿在优雅的服装中，散发着永恒的魅力，没有必要添加过多的装饰。

Western reviews.review: Os registros de produção de vinho na propriedade datam de 1595 e foi uma das primeiras propriedades a adotar o termo Château. Os solos de argila com gravas baseiam os 11,27 hectares de vinhedos com 88% de Merlot e 12% de Cabernet Sauvignon. Nariz elegante com frutas azuis e chocolate da madeira. A boca é profunda confirmando o mirtilo com framboesa. Taninos potentes para muitos anos em belo equilíbrio.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的生产记录可以追溯到1595年，这是当时使用"Château"一词的其中一家早期葡萄酒庄园。该庄园的11.27公顷葡萄园以含有碎石的黏土土壤为特点，种植了88%的梅洛葡萄和12%的卡波弗雷什葡萄。酒的香气优雅，带有蓝berries和木头巧克力的味道。口感深厚，体现了浆果和莓果的风味。酒中的纤维素强大，能够维持多年良好的平衡。

Western reviews.review: Wild violets, green tea leaves, eucalyptus, rosemary and basil describe the main matrix of this young Pomerol. Medium-full-bodied, harmonious and balanced in the sip, it shows depth, creaminess and pleasant distension. A blend of 75% Merlot and 25% Cabernet Sauvignon. Best since 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这款年轻的波美罗酒（Pomerol）以野生紫罗兰、绿茶叶、桉树、罗勒和百里香为主。口感中等至中等以上，和谐平衡，展现深度、奶油感和舒适的延展感。酒中含有75%梅洛（Merlot）和25%卡波弗（Cabernet Sauvignon）。建议在2025年后品尝。

Western reviews.review: Sehr dichte Farbe. Betörende Nase, tiefgründig, noch leicht vom Fass geprägt, dahinter eine wunderbar dunkle, reine Frucht, florale Töne, Cassis, ein Gedicht. Im Gaumen kräftig, zeigt Druck, Konzentration, die Tannine sind von höchster Güte, ausgezeichnet die Balance, hier treffen Kraft und Eleganz aufeinander. Vielleicht der schönste Clinet, der mich vor allem mit seinem frischen Stil überzeugt. 2026-2045+ (Verkostet im November 2023 in Zürich bei UGCB)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论，翻译成中文如下：

颜色非常浓密。酒香迷人，深度很高，仍然有木桶的痕迹，后面是一种美丽的、纯粹的黑果味，花香味，黑加西斯，简直是诗一般。口感强烈，表现出压力和集中度，橡皮素质极高，平衡极好，力量和优雅相互融合。也许这是我见过的最好的克林特酒，尤其是它的新鲜风格让我深受感动。推荐储存时间：2026-2045年（2023年11月在苏黎世的UGCB品尝）。

Western reviews.review: Vivid dark ruby with a purple tinge to the narrow rim. Fine wood savouriness, cloves and vanilla, dark cherries, a touch of plums, candied orange zest. Medium-bodied, plum fruit to the fore, integrated tannins, a touch of nougat and a mineral, dry finish; a somewhat static style.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红宝石色，带有紫色光泽。酒香中有木头的香气、丁香、香草、黑樱桃、浆果和糖浆橙皮。口感中等，浆果味道突出，纤维素柔和，带有核桃糖和矿物质的干爽口感，风格有些稳定。

Western reviews.review: Deeply colored, on the nose you initially find chocolate, flowers, mint, black plums, licorice, espresso, black raspberries, nutmeg and black cherries. Medium-bodied, soft, polished, fresh and silky, with a vibrancy to the ripe, deep, dark red fruits on the mid-palate. There is ample ripe, plums, blueberries and cherries in the refined, chalky finish along with length and vibrancy. The wine is a blend of 75% Merlot and 25% Cabernet Sauvignon, 13% AVB. The harvest took place September 27 - October 12. Drink from 2025-2044. 93-95
Western reviews.translation: 深色红酒，鼻子里闻到巧克力、花朵、薄荷、黑杏、甘草、咖啡、黑莓、肉豆蔻和黑樱桃的味道。口感中等，软滑，光滑，新鲜，丝滑，带有成熟深红果味的活力。口感中有丰富的成熟杏子、蓝莓和樱桃味道，尾部有细致的粉质感，长度和活力。酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，酒精含量13%，

Chinese pairs.original: 薄荷，药材，香水和黑樱桃汁的香气，还有淡淡的橡木桶味道，酒体强大，但有点封闭，回味带有香草的味道。
Chinese pairs.new: The aroma is a blend of mint, herbal notes, perfume, and black cherry juice, with a subtle oakiness. The full-bodied wine is somewhat closed, but finishes with a hint of herbal notes.

Western reviews.review: Youthful, firm, full-bodied, structured vintage here. There is a wealth of sweet, ripe fruit. But much of those berries lay hidden behind a wall of tannin that lets you know, air and time are needed here before this is fun to taste, as it is still in its austere stage. Drink from 2026-2050.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒年份的风格是年轻、坚实、充满体积、结构良好的。酒中有丰富的甜美、成熟的果味。但是许多浆果的味道被一道坚实的苦味的屏障所遮盖，告诉你，需要空气和时间来让这瓶酒变得更好喝，因为它还处于严谨的阶段。建议在2026-2050年之间饮用。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, jugendliche Reflexe, violetter Rand, zarter Wasserrand. In der Nase feinwürzige Nuancen, einladende dunkle Beerenfrucht, Brombeeren. Am Gaumen saftig, wirkt fast leichtfüßig, das Holz ist perfekt integriert, fast unmerkbar, ein sehr eleganter und runder Wein, frisch strukturiert, wird eine sehr gute Lagerfähigkeit entwickeln, fällt aber auch jetzt schon sehr trinkanimierend und zugänglich aus, schokoladiger Abgang, feine Karamellnuancen. Trinken/lagern +20
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，年轻的光泽，紫色边缘，细微的水边缘。鼻子里有细微的果香，邀请性的黑色浆果，黑莓。口感丰富，几乎轻盈，木头完美融合，几乎不可察觉，非常优雅和圆润的葡萄酒，新鲜的结构，会发展出很好的储存能力，但现在也非常容易喝，口感丰富，巧克力味，细微的糖浆味。推荐饮用/储存 +20。

Western reviews.review: This is that rare Bordeaux Cabernet that comes close in style to a Napa Cabernet. The character comes from the mint aromas and medicinal edge, formed from new wood aging. At this stage in its development, the wine is powerful, but closed and tight. However, it is possible to taste the ripe perfumes and the black cherry juice flavors that come through the vanilla.
Western reviews.translation: 这是那一罐与纳帕红酒风格相似的波尔多红酒。酒中的特点来自于薄荷香气和新橡木陈化的药物味。目前这个阶段的酒非常强烈，但封闭和紧绷。然而，酒中仍然可以品尝到成熟的香气和黑樱桃果汁的风味，透过香草味传递而来。

Western reviews.review: 4 stars but barely. Cedar, violets and cassis on the nose. Follows through with black fruits on the palate but very dry tannins. Needs more fruits to balance the tannin. Enjoyable. Drink up whilst it still has fruit
Western reviews.translation: 4星半分。酒香中有松柏、紫罗兰和黑加仑果。口感上有黑色水果，但干的橡胶味道非常强烈。需要更多的水果来平衡橡胶味。还算可口。建议尽快饮用，趁酒还有一些水果味。

Western reviews.review:
violet, plum, apricot,blackberry, cream de cassis, coffee beans, nutmeg, mint, cream.. the nose was really elegant and calm.
the bottle has been 13years so it was really good to drink immediately(actually it already opened before 2~3hours). the balance between acidity and tannins also superb.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

这瓶红酒的气味非常优雅和平和，闻起来有紫罗兰、浆果、杏子、黑莓、黑加拿大蓝莓酒、咖啡豆、肉豆蔻、薄荷和奶油等味道。

瓶子已经13年了，所以喝起来非常好（实际上，瓶子已经打开了2~3小时）。酸度和苦味之间的平衡也非常出色。

Chinese pairs.original: Olivier Bernard有机耕种的葡萄园被森林所环绕（靠近森林的地块实行生物动力法），园内高密度种植、平均树龄约为30年的葡萄藤种植于砂石和多岩石的土壤之上。作为波尔多最好的白葡萄酒生产商，骑士庄园的白葡萄酒酿制于40%新的法国橡木桶内。这是一瓶发展迅速的半支装，展现成熟的柑橘果酱、太妃糖、拔丝苹果、梨和咸矿物的香气。中等酒体的多岩石口感拥有美妙的集中度和锐利、清晰的酸度——使其回味显得愈发悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Olivier Bernard的有机葡萄园被森林环绕，靠近森林的部分采用生物动力法。葡萄藤高密度种植，平均树龄约30年，种植在砂石和多岩石的土壤上。作为波尔多最好的白葡萄酒生产商，骑士庄园的白葡萄酒酿制于40%新的法国橡木桶内。这是一瓶快速发展的半支装，展现成熟的柑橘果酱、太妃糖、拔丝苹果、梨和咸矿物的香气。中等酒体的多岩石口感拥有美妙的集中度和锐利、清晰的酸度——使其回味显得愈发悠长。

English pairs.original: Olivier Bernard's organically farmed vineyards are surrounded by forest (the plots near the forest are farmed bio-dynamically), where the close-planted vines grown on sandy and rocky soils are about 30 years old on average. As the best white wine producer in Bordeaux, the vinification of Domaine de Chevalier's white grand vin takes place in 40% new French oak barrels. It developed fast as a half bottle, showing well-evolved bouquets of marmalade, toffee, caramelized apple, pear and savoury-mineral. There's lovely intensity to the medium-bodied and stony palate that had keen and precise acid that carried the finish on and on.
English pairs.new: 奥利维尔·贝尔纳德的有机葡萄园环绕着森林（靠近森林的葡萄园采用生物动力耕作），在沙质和岩石土壤中种植的密集葡萄园平均年龄约30年。作为波尔多地区最好的白酒生产商，Domaine de Chevalier的白葡萄酒大酒庄的酿造过程发生在40%的新法兰克尔橡木桶中。半瓶快速发酵，展现出非常成熟的果酱、糖浆、焦糖苹果、梨和矿物质的香气。中等体积的口感非常强烈，具有石质的口感，酸度清晰、精确，延续了长长的尾部。

Western reviews.review: Light in color, the wine is bright, fresh, zippy and crisp. The yellow citrus, with its honeysuckle accent carries through the mineralistic leaning found here. You can enjoy this now, or age for at least 20 more years, if you have the patience. 93 Points
Western reviews.translation: 酒色清亮，酒体明亮、新鲜、清脆。酒中充满了黄柠檬和honeysuckle的香气，矿物质的味道也很明显。您可以现在就享用，也可以将其储存至少20年，如果您有耐心的话。评分93分。

Western reviews.review: Helles Grüngelb, zarte Grapefruitnote, etwas Steinobst, Nuancen von Blütenhonig, mineralische Aspekte. Mittlerer Körper, rassig strukturiert, gelbe Tropenfruchtanklänge, dezente Fruchtsüße nach reifer Birne im Abgang, wirkt bereits harmonisch, zart nach Ananas im Rückgeschmack.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一杯美味的白葡萄酒！以下是翻译：

清澈的黄绿色，带有轻微的柑橘味，略带石果味，花蜜的微妙香气，矿物质的特征。酒体中等，结构紧致，黄色热带水果的余味，成熟的苹果的轻微甜度在尾部，整体感觉已经很和谐，回味中带有淡淡的菠萝味。

注意：我在翻译中做了些调整，以使其更适合中国消费者理解。例如，将"Grüngelb"翻译为"清澈的黄绿色"，以便更好地描述酒的颜色。

Western reviews.review: Very classy in style, with fresh lemon, grapefruit, stone, vanilla, white peach and floral notes. Soft, polished, bright, fresh and clean, the mineral driven, crisp, sweet, citrus finish really carries through. The wine was made from a blend 85% Sauvignon Blanc and 15% Semillon. 95 Points
Western reviews.translation: 风格优雅典雅，带有新鲜柠檬、葡萄柚、石头、香草、白桃和花朵的香气。酒体柔和光滑，清新明亮，清爽干净，矿物质驱动的、清脆甜美的柑橘味尾韵非常持久。该酒由85%萨伯纳白葡萄和15%塞缪隆葡萄组成。评分95分。

Western reviews.review: The wine is a clear pale green/yellow colour. Aromas are restrained mineral fruit & salty oak touches. The palate has powerful fruit & plenty of new oak. The wine is medium bodied but has the potential to flesh out further. Initially the oak appeared a little salty, but resolved itself with fresh tropical fruit on a wonderful long finish. Acid is balanced and alcohol is balanced to warm. 4/12 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒呈现出清澈的淡绿色/黄色。酒中气味较为谨慎，带有矿物质、水果和盐味的橡木香气。口感上充满了强烈的水果味和新橡木的味道。酒体中等，但有潜力进一步丰满。最初，橡木味似乎带有盐味，但随着时间的推移，酒中出现了新鲜的热带水果味，留下了长长的尾韵。酸度和酒精均衡，酒的温度适中。评分：4/12 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 赤霞珠在此年份的混酿中占87%，剩余的则是梅洛。此酒庄严、含蓄的优雅香气透出干花、岩石、泥土、灌木、香料和黑莓味。细腻、干净的口感充满带来些许张力的强劲单宁。希望能够再品鉴一次。
Chinese pairs.new: This Cabernet Sauvignon (87%) blend with Merlot (13%) presents a refined and understated elegance in its bouquet, featuring notes of dried flowers, stone, earth, brambles, spices and blackberry. The palate is smooth and clean, with a robust tannin structure that adds a sense of tension.

English pairs.original: 87% Cabernet Sauvignon and the rest is Merlot. Very austere on the restrained and elegant nose of dried flower, stone, earth, scrub, spices and blackberry. Delicate and clean on the palate that was full of forceful tannins that led to subtle tension. Hope to taste it again.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的成分是87%卡波内尔和13%梅洛。酒香干净俐落，带有干花、石头、泥土、灌木、香料和黑莓的味道。口感清爽细腻，但有强烈的橡皮质感，带有微妙的紧张感。希望能再次品尝。

Western reviews.review: The bouquet enchants by its expression of pure, crunchy fruit and florality without a trace of oakiness despite barrel-aging with 80% new wood. Some touches of graphite and subtle spices come into the aromatic mix. On a par with the great 2016, this stunning wine has a palate that combines fleshy, velvety texture and linearity as well as remarkable length, and provides convincing testimony of the progress achieved by the estate’s technical team.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气令人着迷，展现出清新的水果和花香，没有一点橡木味，尽管80%的酒桶是新木制的。一些 graphite 和微妙的香料加入到香气中。与2016年同样出色的，这瓶酒的口感结合了丰富的、柔软的质地和线性，以及出色的长度，证明了estate的技术团队取得的进步。

Western reviews.review: As always, it is the Cabernet Sauvignon that sings. It brings an impressive structure to the wine, rich tannins and powerful black fruits. The wine is set for aging. It shows all the power and the open quality of the vintage.  Drink from 2027.
Western reviews.translation: 如常，卡贝网酒（Cabernet Sauvignon）是这瓶酒的主角。它带来了令人印象深刻的结构，丰富的苦味和强烈的黑色果味。酒精成熟度适宜，适合长期陈酿。酒中的力量和品质都展现了当年的特点。建议2027年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: COMMENTARY: The 2019 Chateau Pichon-Longueville Baron is the most incredible wine I tasted in 2022. TASTING NOTES: This extraordinary wine shows power with restraints as it corrals aromas and flavors of bold black fruits, multi-faceted berries, and toasted oak. Give this one time in the cellar before opening, if you can. (Tasted: June 29, 2022, San Francisco, CA)
Western reviews.translation:
评论：2019年夏普龙-隆维尔男爵酒庄的红酒是2022年我品尝过的最出色的酒。

品评：这个出色的酒展现了强大的力量，同时又保持着克制，收集了黑果的芳香和风味，以及多面性的黑莓和烤橡木的味道。 如果有机会，建议将其放入酒窖中储存一段时间再打开。 (品尝日期：2022年6月29日，美国加州旧金山)

Western reviews.review: Blackberries and blueberries with stone and graphite. Flint and black licorice, too. So perfumed. Full-bodied, very long and linear with incredible length. The new 1990, but better crafted. Chewy, yet so tailored and wonderfully proportioned. Freshness and elegance. Wonderful depth. 87% cabernet sauvignon rest merlot. The highest ever proportion of cabernet.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感非常丰富，长而线性的口感，令人印象深刻。它的新品质，甚至超过了1990年的版本。口感坚实，但又非常精致和完美比例。它带有新鲜和优雅的感觉，深度也非常惊人。酒中主要是87%的卡波涅（Cabernet Sauvignon）和剩余的梅洛（Merlot）。这是卡波涅的最高比例。

Western reviews.review: Based on 87% Cabernet Sauvignon and 13% Merlot raised in 80% new French oak, the 2019 Château Pichon-Longueville Baron is pure class and just a beautiful, seamless Pauillac that does everything right. Revealing a deep purple hue as well textbook notes of blackcurrants, smoked tobacco, freshly sharpened pencils, and liquid violets, it shows the more medium to full-bodied, elegant style of the vintage yet is brilliantly concentrated, has a supple, layered mouthfeel, ripe yet building tannins, and a great, great finish. It's more open and expressive than Mouton and shares plenty of similarities with Comtesse with its layered, supple, just perfectly balanced and classy style. It unquestionably already offers pleasure today (and it's a good time to try a bottle, as I wouldn't be surprised to see it close down), but it will need a decade to hit maturity and it will be a 50-year wine. Rating : 98+ Best After 2032
Western reviews.translation: 2019年夏普龙-隆维尔男爵（Château Pichon-Longueville Baron）以87%卡布ernet·萨维诺（Cabernet Sauvignon）和13%梅洛（Merlot）为主，80%使用新法兰克式橡木 barrel aging。这种酒是典型的巴约克（Pauillac）风格，完美无缺，细腻流畅。酒液呈深紫色，具有典型的黑加仑（blackcurrants）、烟草味、新笔尖味和液体紫罗兰花味。这种酒体积中等到中大，优雅典雅，酒精度高，口感丰富，纤维柔软，口感层次丰富，味道持久。这种酒与莫顿（Mouton）相比更开放，更具表达力，与孔特斯（Comtesse）相比更相似，风格优雅，细腻，完美平衡，典雅。这种酒已经可以享受（现在是尝试一瓶的好时机，因为我不惊讶于它会关闭），但需要十年才能达到成熟，酒龄50年。评分：98+ 最佳饮用时间：2032年之后。

Chinese pairs.original: 如果让我在Pauillac产区选择一款最鲜美、最水灵、可以在年轻时饮用，同时还充满花香和鲜果的葡萄酒，Chateau Pedesclaux绝对是我的首选。2023年份依旧是花前月下般美好，娇嫩的牡丹、深情的玫瑰、清新的槐花，仿佛置身于一个由鲜花构成的童话世界中。与过往年份的空灵感相比，2023年份的Chateau Pedesclaux拥有更多的醇厚感，它就像一块浓缩的奶油冰淇淋在口中融化，香甜丝滑，不带任何杂质。
Chinese pairs.new: If I had to choose a wine from the Pauillac region that is the most vibrant, refreshing, and drinkable in its youth, while still bursting with floral and fruity aromas, Chateau Pedesclaux would be my top pick. The 2023 vintage is just as lovely as a moonlit garden, with delicate peonies, passionate roses, and fresh acacia flowers, transporting me to a whimsical world of flowers. Compared to previous vintages, the 2023 Chateau Pedesclaux has a richer texture, like a concentrated ice cream melting in the mouth, sweet and silky with no imperfections.

English pairs.original: If asked to pick the most vibrant wine from Pauillac brimming with floral and fruit aromas, Chateau Pedesclaux would definitely be my first choice. The 2023 vintage continues to be delightfully enchanting, with its tender peonies, passionate roses, and fresh acacia flowers, making it feel like stepping into a fairy-tale world made of blooms. Compared to the more ethereal past vintages, Chateau Pedesclaux 2023 has a richer mouth feeling, like concentrated cream ice cream melting on the palate.
English pairs.new: 如果要从巴约克选出最具活力、充满花香和水果香气的红酒，那么佩德斯克劳红酒一定是我的首选。2023年产酒依然令人愉悦，带有柔嫩的牡丹、激情的玫瑰和新鲜的白杨花香，让人感觉像走进了由花朵构成的童话世界。与更为飘渺的前几年产酒相比，佩德斯克劳红酒2023年产酒口感更丰富，如同融化在口中的浓缩冰淇淋。

Western reviews.review: There is a really pretty, powdery-tannin texture to this, with dark-berry and currant character. Some orange peel, too. It’s full and layered with a sense of precision and focus. Framed and open-grained in the texture. Velvety. Real Pauillac personality here. 70% cabernet sauvignon, 20% merlot and 10% cabernet franc. May be better than 2022.Barrel Sample: 95-96
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有非常漂亮的粉末质感，带有深色浆果和黑加仑的特征。还有一些橙皮的味道。它的口感丰富、层次分明，具有精确和集中感。质地细腻，像丝绸一样。它展现出典型的波亚克风格。酒中含有70%卡波弗雷蒙，20%梅洛和10%卡波弗朗克。可能比2022年更好。酒桶样品：95-96分。

Western reviews.review: The 2023 Pedesclaux is one of the best wines I have tasted here in some time, maybe ever. It offers a striking mix of ripe dark fruit and bright acids. My impression is that the extractions are less pushed, which really seems to emphasize vibrancy in the fruit. The 10% Cabernet Franc really lifts the aromatics, but it’s the wine's balance and energy that I admire most. Terrific.  –Antonio GalloniBarrel Sample: 92-94
Western reviews.translation:
2023年佩德斯克劳斯（Pedesclaux）是近期我品尝过的最出色的红酒之一，也许是有史以来最出色的。它提供了浓郁的黑果和清晰的酸度的独特混合。我的印象是，提取度较低，这使得果味更加生动。10%的卡伯涅·法兰克（Cabernet Franc）果香得到提升，但我最欣赏的是这瓶酒的平衡和能量。非常出色。 –安东尼奥·加隆尼（Antonio Galloni）

酒桶样品：92-94分

Western reviews.review: Mint and dark chocolate on the nose with bramble fruit. Structured and almost chewy, this has texture and body, more of a serious step up, certainly less lively and fruit forward than second wine Fleur, this is more serious with well-defined tannins, gorgeous minty, blackcurrant Cabernet markers and in-balance acidity. Cool definitely but no hint of greenness - full of ripe fruit. Lots of Pauillac signature but without any harshness or too much tension. There’s a gentle softness that the Merlot gives which calms the expression. Lovely tannins give a powdery, chalky fleshiness around the cheeks and long lifted, minty finish. Feels elegant, precise and focussed. Still tense and a little strict but this is complete and has charm. Longest harvest ever, 17 days instead of 11. 14.5% press. 3.76pH. Ageing 65% new oak.Barrel Sample: 94
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的鼻子中带有薄荷和黑巧克力，伴有荆棘果的味道。结构紧密，几乎有嚼劲，具有丰富的体积和质感，这比第二瓶酒Fleur更严肃，果味不那么鲜明和活泼。这瓶酒更严肃，具有明确的纹理，具有迷人的薄荷味和黑currant味的卡贝网特征，以及平衡的酸度。酷但没有青涩的味道，充满成熟的果味。大量的巴利克特征，但没有过度的粗糙或紧张感。梅洛特的柔和性使得表达更加平和。美丽的纹理使得脸颊周围有粉末状的， chalky 的质感，长长的，薄荷味的尾部。感觉优雅，精确，集中。仍然紧张，略微严格，但这瓶酒完整，具有魅力。收获时间最长，17天而不是11天。14.5%的压榨。3.76pH。陈酿65%新橡木。酒评：94分。

Western reviews.review: The 2023 Pedésclaux is the estate's second organic-certified vintage. A blend of 70% Cabernet Sauvignon, 20% Merlot and 10% Cabernet Franc, it offers up attractive aromas of cassis and dark berries mingled with notions of mint and licorice, followed by a medium to full-bodied, fleshy and layered palate with sweet tannins, succulent acids and a rather rich, giving profile.Barrel Sample: 90-93
Western reviews.translation: 2023年佩德斯克劳斯（Pedésclaux）是该庄园第二个获得有机认证的葡萄酒。该酒的组成比例为70%卡波弗列（Cabernet Sauvignon）、20%梅洛（Merlot）和10%卡波弗列（Cabernet Franc）。它展现出诱人的香气，包括黑加仑和黑莓的混合，以及薄荷和甘草的印象。口感丰富，中等到中等以上的体积，肌肉丰满，层次丰富，甜度适中，酸度鲜美，口感丰富，富有层次。酒桶样品评分：90-93分。

Chinese pairs.original: 闻完酒杯我就不淡定了，那股玫瑰精油般的花香太撩人了，让人喝完一口想两口。入口清澈细腻而富有弹性，带着纯粹的黑莓、桑葚和牛奶般柔顺的口感。单宁数量颇丰但质感却如绒毛般绵密，划过味蕾的时候仿佛能听到唰唰的响声。如此细腻高雅的酒是酿酒师对圣埃美隆风土的礼赞。
Chinese pairs.new: I lost my composure as soon as I took a sip, the rose petal-like floral aroma was so alluring that I wanted to take another sip after finishing one. The entry is crystal clear, silky smooth and full of elasticity, with pure blackberry, raspberry and creamy textures. The tannins are abundant but the texture is as soft as velvet, leaving a satisfying whooshing sensation on the palate. This refined wine is a tribute to the terroir of Saint-Émilion by the winemaker.

English pairs.original: Just a sniff is good enough to blow my mind. The scent of rose essence is so enticing, leaving people hanging on every sip. The entry of the palate is precise, delicate and bouncy, with a pure blackberry, mulberry and milk-like creamy taste. The tannins are abundant, but its texture is as velvet as cashmere; when it flows on the taste buds, it seems that you could hear the sound of rattling. Such a luscious and elegant wine is a salute to the terroir of Saint-Emilion.
English pairs.new: 一口气就能让人惊艳。酒中的玫瑰精油香气迷人，令人每次品尝都欲罢不能。口感入口精准、细腻、跳跃，纯正的黑莓、白葡萄和奶油般的奶油味。酒中的天然纤维丰富，但质地如丝绸般柔软；酒液流过味蕾时，仿佛能听到细微的颤动。如此丰富而优雅的酒是对圣埃米利翁地理特征的致敬。

Western reviews.review: Much better in the bottle than it was from the barrel, the wine pops with nuances of flowers, licorice, espresso bean, black cherry and black plum. Rich, round, soft, and polished, the finish is loaded with silky textured fruits with a nice touch of salty-minerality on the finish. Drink from 2023-2034. 91 Points
Western reviews.translation: 酒瓶中的口感远远好于酒桶中的口感，这款红酒在瓶中展现出花朵、 licorice、咖啡豆、黑樱桃和黑杏的复杂气味。酒的口感丰富、圆润、柔和、光滑，尾部充满细腻的果味，尾部还带有矿物质的咸味。建议从2023年到2034年饮用。评分：91分。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, zarte Ockerrandaufhellung. Dunkles Nougat und etwas Lakritze, Blaubeerkonfit ist unterlegt, ein Hauch von Backpflaumen. Komplex, saftig, angenehme Fruchtsüße, tragende Tannine, mineralisch-straff im Abgang, schokoladiger Rückgeschmack, zeigt Länge und Entwicklungspotenzial.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，微微的橙色边缘。酒体深棕色，带有巧克力和少量 licorice 的香气，蓝莓果酱的底调，伴有烤石榴的味道。酒体复杂，丰富，具有愉悦的果糖味，坚实的苦味，矿物质和紧致的尾部，巧克力味的回味，展现出长期和发展潜力。

Western reviews.review: (80% Merlot, 20% Cabernet Franc, 14.5%. Verkostet im Dezember 2021 in Windisch). Kühles und leicht rauchiges Bouquet, rote Beeren, Mandelgebäck, Gewürze. Der Auftakt ist gradlinig, der Wein zeigt Schwung und Rasse, merklich Tannin, knackige Frucht, bereits wunderbar zugänglich und mit einer guten Länge und viel Würze im Abgang. Bereits Jung ein Spass und durchaus mit Finesse ausgestattet. 2022-2035
Western reviews.translation:
这是一份红酒评论。翻译成中文后如下：

80% 美丽托，20% 卡波弗兰克，14.5% 酒精度。2021年12月在温迪施品鉴。

冷静、轻微烟熏的香气，红色浆果，杏仁饼干，香料。开头平稳，酒体充满活力和品质，明显的坚果味，新鲜果味，已经非常容易入口，口感长且有余味。酒精度高但不突出，口感丰富。2022-2035年最佳品尝时期。

Western reviews.review: Floral and perfumed with chalky notes, darker fruit, violet tobacco leaf and fine oak. Good density and harmony with a fresh backbone, an abundance of really grainy tannin, layers of ripe dark fruit and a long vigorous finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒具有花香和矿物质的气味，带有暗果、紫罗兰、烟草叶和细木桶的味道。酒体丰富，结构和谐，带有清新的骨架，充满细粒的橡胶质感，层次丰富的熟黑果味和长而有力的尾部。

Chinese pairs.original: 在2022年份，Chateau Leoville Poyferre凭借柔和的浸渍过程仍然保持了口感的平衡。对于这种走浓郁风格的酒庄而言，让强烈的结构变得流畅是一项艰巨的任务，而它做到了。自2019年以来，我就发现Chateau Leoville Poyferre即便在年轻时就能露出“微笑”，这一点在2022年份也表现的十分突出。在我来看，该年份更像是一款100%黑巧克力慕斯蛋糕，并且带着酒渍樱桃夹心。如果收尾时的果香能够更显鲜亮，并且单宁能够更加柔和，定会更加出色。
Chinese pairs.new: In the 2022 vintage, Chateau Leoville Poyferre maintained a balanced palate through a gentle extraction process. For a winery that tends towards a rich style, making a strong structure feel smooth is a daunting task, and they succeeded. Since 2019, I've noticed that Chateau Leoville Poyferre can already show a "smile" even in its youth, and this was particularly evident in the 2022 vintage. To me, this vintage is like a 100% dark chocolate mousse cake with a wine-soaked cherry filling. If the finish were even brighter with fruit and the tannins were even softer, it would be even more impressive.

English pairs.original: In the 2022 vintage, Chateau Leoville Poyferre masterfully achieved a harmonious palate, owing to its delicate maceration process. For a winery renowned for its opulent style, it is an impressive feat to create a fluid and potent structure, and they made it. Since 2019, I have noticed that Chateau Leoville Poyferre possesses the ability to unveil its “smile” even in its youth, a characteristic that is remarkably evident in the 2022 vintage. In my estimation, this particular year is akin to a sumptuous 100% dark chocolate mousse cake with a wine-infused cherry core. If only the finish could present a more vivacious fruitiness, and the tannins were further refined, it would be truly outstanding.
English pairs.new: 2022年产的沙吕莱沃勒波伊费尔酒庄（Chateau Leoville Poyferre）以其精心的浸泡过程，创造出一个和谐的口感。虽然这家酒庄以其奢华的风格而闻名，但他们仍然能够在酿酒中表现出流畅和强大的结构。这是他们的又一项成就。自2019年以来，我注意到沙吕莱沃勒波伊费尔酒庄在年轻时就能展现出其“微笑”的特质，这一点在2022年的产量中尤为明显。在我看来，这个年份的酒类似于一块用100%黑巧克力做的奶油蛋糕，中间有酒类浸泡过的樱桃。虽然这酒的尾部有更丰富的果味和更细腻的纽耐（tannins）会使其更加出色。

Western reviews.review: Deeply colored, the floral display in the nose gets even better as you encounter black cherries, currants, licorice, tobacco leaf, cassis, and an array of spices. The palate provides layers of silky, fresh, pure, deep red berries. The wine is dense, concentrated, sweet, ripe, fresh, and polished. There is a wonderful sense of purity in the fruit. Effortless to taste, and even even easier to drink, the wine exudes sensuality, and complexity from start to finish. The wine blends 58% Cabernet Sauvignon, 34% Merlot, 4% Cabernet Franc, and 4% Petit Verdot. 14.4% ABV, 3.87 pH. The harvest took place September 8 - September 28. Yields were 33 hectoliters per hectare. 75% of the harvest went into the Grand Vin. Drink from 2026-2055. 97-99 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色深邃，鼻子中花香的展示越来越丰富，伴随着黑樱桃、黑加仑、甘草、烟草叶、黑加仑和各种香料的出现。口感中，细滑的、新鲜的、纯粹的、深红色的浆果层次丰富。酒精浓度高，甜度高，成熟度高，新鲜度高，表面光滑。酒中的水果呈现出纯粹的感觉。品尝起来轻松自如，甚至更容易喝下，酒从头到尾都散发着诱人的魅力和复杂性。酒中混合了58%卡波内尔·萨维尼诺、34%梅洛、4%卡波内尔·法兰克和4%佩蒂·维多。酒精度14.4%，pH3.87。收获于9月8日至9月28日。产量为每公顷33公升。75%的收获用于Grand Vin。建议2026-2055年饮用。评分97-99分。

Western reviews.review: Sehr kräftige Farbe, intensive Nase, mit Röstnoten, Mokka, dunkler Frucht und floralen Aromen, darunter steinig kühl, sehr nobel. Im Gaumen dicht, ein Mund voll Wein, markante Tanninstruktur, sehr fein mit der Frucht verwoben, der Wein zeigt Fülle, Frische und viel Präzision, der Abgang ist eindrücklich lang. Ausgezeichnete Qualität, wie so oft. Grosse Reserven. 2030-2060 (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / UGCB / Château Beychevelle) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶非常强烈的红酒，酒色深红，酒香浓郁，带有焦糖、咖啡、黑果和花朵的香气，冷静而高贵。口感浓密，满口都是酒，口感坚实，果味与坚果味完美融合，酒体丰富、清新、精确，尾部长达数分钟。酒质出色，品质稳定，储存潜力巨大。推荐储存时间：2030-2060年。

Western reviews.review: Le nez est élégant et offre de l’intensité en finesse, de puissance en finesse, une très jolie finesse du grain ainsi qu’un petit côté épicé et un côté mélodieux. On y retrouve des notes de mûre de Boysen pulpeuse, de cerise bigarreau et plus légèrement de prune bleue pulpeuse associées à des touches de poivre gris, de clou de girofle ainsi qu’à une subtile pointe d’iris/lilas, de graves chaudes et à une pointe presque bergamote. La bouche est fruitée, élégante, équilibrée, racée et offre de la minéralité, de la justesse, une trame minérale, une bonne définition, de la crémosité, de l’ampleur, un petit côté dense/concentré (mais en finesse), un discret côté serré du grain ainsi que de la droiture. Jolie fraicheur. En bouche ce vin exprime des notes de mûre pulpeuse/juteuse, de framboise fraiche et plus légèrement de petits fruits rouges onctueux associées à une touche de prune violette, à des pointes de lys, de chocolaté/cardamone ainsi qu’à une subtile pointe d’iode/minéralité, à une discrète pointe de clou de girofle frais et à une imperceptible pointe presque variétal en fond. Les tannins sont souples et élégants. Sapidité et mâche sur la fin de bouche. Jolie persistance.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

酒的香气优雅，具有细腻的强度和力量，酒体细腻，带有微微的辛辣和旋律感。酒中有浓郁的 Boysen 梅子果肉、浓郁的杏仁和淡淡的蓝色浆果，伴有灰色胡椒、丁香和微微的紫罗兰、热烈的低音和几乎是bergamote的点缀。酒口果香、优雅、平衡、精致、矿物质、准确、矿物质纹理、清晰定义、丰富、浓密（但细腻）、密集的颗粒感和直线感。酒中有新鲜的气息。口感中酒体表达了浓郁的梅子果肉、鲜红的草莓和淡淡的红果，伴有紫色浆果、白色花朵、巧克力和卡达木的点缀，以及微微的海盐、丁香的新鲜点和几乎是品种的底层。酒中的纤维细腻优雅。酒尾有清新感。酒体表达了浓郁的梅子果肉、鲜红的草莓和淡淡的红果，伴有紫色浆果、白色花朵、巧克力和卡达木的点缀，以及微微的海盐、丁香的新鲜点和几乎是品种的底层。酒中的纤维细腻优雅。酒尾有清新感。酒体有持久感。

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby garnet colour with opaque core and purple reflections, delicate brightening on the rim. Attractive nuances of dark wild berries, blackberries, cassis, noble wood and tobacco, inviting bouquet. Powerful, complex, dark fruits, firm, supporting tannins, chocolatey on the finish, mineral and very persistent, great ageing potential, very balanced.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红宝石色，透明度高，边缘有细微的光泽。酒香中有浓郁的黑野莓、黑莓、黑加仑、贵族木和烟草的气息，非常诱人。口感强烈复杂，黑果味浓郁，坚实的纤维，口感中有巧克力味，矿物质味和持久感，酒龄潜力极大，口感平衡。

Western reviews.review: A more concentrated style of Saint Julien. Red fruit focused, less layers compared to t hose best of the vintage. Bigger sized tannins showing some austerity compared to majority of Saint Julien in 2022. Thus less accessible young but expect a brilliant wine once all is well integrated and smoothed up.
Western reviews.translation: 圣朱利安的更浓郁风格。红果味居多，较少层次，低于当年最佳的酒款。较大的苦味物质展现出一些严谨性，与2022年大部分圣朱利安相比。因此，年轻时较难入口，但期待在所有元素都融合平衡后，会成为一瓶精彩的酒。

2021 Chateau Pavie Les Aromes de Pavie.name: 2021 Chateau Pavie Les Aromes de Pavie

Chinese pairs.original: 无论从哪个角度讲，2021年份的Aromes de Pavie都是一款顶级名庄的水准，不出意外，这应该是该年份品质最高的名庄副牌酒。圆润的酒体、紧致的单宁、强劲的结构、舒畅的口感。没有突出的烘焙味道，有的是更加顺畅自如的表达，以及更加芬芳典雅的花香。我在这款酒中找到了太多的美好，也是我目前为止品鉴过的品质最好的Aromes de Pavie，没有之一。
Chinese pairs.new:
无论从哪个角度讲，2021年份的Aromes de Pavie都是一款顶级名庄的水准，不出意外，这应该是该年份品质最高的名庄副牌酒。圆润的酒体、紧致的单宁、强劲的结构、舒畅的口感。没有突出的烘焙味道，有的是更加顺畅自如的表达，以及更加芬芳典雅的花香。我在这款酒中找到了太多的美好，也是我目前为止品鉴过的品质最好的Aromes de Pavie，没有之一。

Translated Review:

From every angle, the 2021 Aromes de Pavie is a top-tier wine of exceptional quality, and it's no surprise that it's the best second wine of the vintage. The wine has a smooth texture, tight tannins, a robust structure, and a silky mouthfeel. There's no overpowering toastiness, but rather a refined and elegant expression, with a bouquet that's both fragrant and refined. I've found so much to love in this wine, and it's the best Aromes de Pavie I've tasted to date, hands down.

English pairs.original: From every perspective, the 2021 Aromes de Pavie reaches the heights of an excellent Grand Cru Classe on the right bank of Bordeaux, unsurprisingly marking it as the finest second-label wine of the vintage. It boasts a rounded body, tight tannins, a robust structure, and a smooth palate. Notably absent are oaky notes, replaced by a more seamless expression and an even more fragrant and refined bouquet of florals. Following the vintage of 2020, Aromes de Pavie once again captivates with a high proportion of 50% Cabernet Franc, making it the best Aromes de Pavie I have tasted to date.
English pairs.new: 从每个角度来看，2021年Aromes de Pavie是波尔多右岸的优秀格兰克鲁级葡萄酒的巅峰，毫不意外地将其定位为当年最好的二级标签酒。它具有圆润的体积、紧密的纽扣、强壮的结构和平滑的口感。值得注意的是，木质香味消失了，取而代之的是更平滑的表达和更香艳、更精致的花朵香味。随着2020年葡萄酒的成功，Aromes de Pavie再次以50%的高比例的卡波弗朗克（Cabernet Franc）而引人入胜，成为我迄今为止品尝过的最好的Aromes de Pavie。

Western reviews.review: Dark garnet, deep core with purple hues at the narrow rim. Juicy red cherries, sweet plums, a touch of nougat, backed with candied orange zest. Medium complexity, fine fruit sweetness, fresh, lovely structure, discreet tannins, mineral, lemony touch on the finish, cranberries on the back palate.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，中间深色，边缘紫色。 juicy 的红樱桃，甜的石榴， nougat 的微妙，伴有糖浆橙皮。 中等复杂度，细腻的水果甜度，新鲜，美丽的结构，隐蔽的纤维素，矿物质，柠檬味的尾部，蔓越莓在后口。

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Rubinrot. Expressive Nase, dunkle Frucht, merklich Holz, süsse Gewürze. Im Gaumen weich und cremig im Auftakt, knackige Frucht, feine Säure, die Tannine sind gut dosiert, da ist genügend Fruchtdruck mit im Spiel, um die Struktur zu kontern. Angenehm lang und mit einem Mix aus dunklen und roten Beeren im Rückaroma. Hohe Qualität. 2026-2040 (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2022. Dourthe)
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒。酒香浓郁，黑果味浓郁，木质味明显，甜香料味浓郁。口感柔和、奶油般滑顺，初期果味清脆，酸度细腻，天然的苦味适量，果味压力足够，结构紧凑。口感持久，尾部留有黑色和红色浆果的复杂香气。品质高。推荐储存时间：2026-2040年。 (2022年4月在Dourthe酒庄品尝的“En Primeur”版)

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark, ruby-red in color is not quite opaque. The palate is chocolatey with red & black plum fruit. On the palate the ripe plumy fruit is given a juicy edge by lively acidity. The fruit is overlaid by touches of tobacco-leaf, & earthy & meaty notes. Taninns are fine & smooth. Alcohol adds a little warmth & roundness to the palate. The flavors last quite well on the finish, but end with slightly bitter coffee notes. 04/22 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色，接近透明。口感上充满了巧克力和红黑浆果的味道。口感上，成熟的浆果味道被活泼的酸度赋予了清新果香。浆果味道被烟草叶、泥土和肉类的味道所覆盖。纤维素细腻柔顺。酒精带来了一丝温暖和圆润的口感。口感持久，但最后留下了一丝苦咖啡的味道。评分：04/22 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 在深紫色的酒液中，仿佛有无数小紫花在怒放，凑近一闻，又绽放出一轮又一轮的杨梅香气。面对2022年份的高温与干旱，Chateau Kirwan凭借地下的黏土给我们提交了一份令人满意的答卷。它以清爽的口感、柔滑的酒体、绵柔的单宁，以及不可思议的pH值3.55展现出无所畏惧的气势，完全就是一副“铿锵玫瑰”的姿态。2022是Chateau Kirwan 历史上采收最早的年份(9月5日-9月22日)，而这一大胆的决定成就了属于Chateau Kirwan 的精彩。
Chinese pairs.new: In the deep purple liquid, it's as if countless small purple flowers are in full bloom. As you bring your nose closer, another wave of lychee aromas unfolds. Despite the scorching heat and drought of 2022, Chateau Kirwan has delivered a satisfying performance thanks to the underground clay soil. It boasts a refreshing texture, a silky body, velvety tannins, and an astonishing pH value of 3.55, exuding an unyielding spirit that's reminiscent of a "crisp rose." 2022 was the earliest harvest in Chateau Kirwan's history (September 5th-September 22nd), and this bold decision has resulted in a masterpiece that belongs to Chateau Kirwan.

English pairs.original: Within the deep purple wine, it appears as though innumerable tiny violet flowers are passionately blossoming, while closer examination unveils continuous waves of enticing bayberry aromas. Despite the challenging heat and drought of the 2022 vintage, Chateau Kirwan, supported by its underlying clay, delivers a gratifying and triumphant performance. Showcasing a revitalizing palate, silky texture, supple tannins, and an extraordinary pH of 3.55, the wine exudes an unyielding spirit, evocative of a “steely rose.” The 2022 vintage marks the earliest harvest in Chateau Kirwan’s illustrious history (September 5th-22nd), with this daring decision ultimately cultivating a distinctive brilliance characteristic of Chateau Kirwan.
English pairs.new: 在深紫色的酒中，仿佛无数小紫花激情地绽放，而更近一步的观察则揭示出连续的诱人山楂香气。尽管2022年产季面临挑战性的高温和干旱，克劳恩酒庄（Chateau Kirwan）凭借其坚实的黏土底蕴，展现出令人满意和胜利的表现。酒中呈现出振奋的口感、滑腻的质地、柔韧的橡皮质和极为罕见的pH值3.55，酒液洋溢着顽强的精神，仿佛一朵“铁红玫瑰”。2022年产季标志着克劳恩酒庄历史上最早的收获季节（9月5日-22日），这一胆大敢为的决定最终培养出了克劳恩酒庄独特的光彩。

Western reviews.review: Flowers, currants, spice, and espresso form the core of this medium-bodied, fresh, currant-filled fine. The touch of spice at the end adds a nice fresh note in the finish. Drink from 2026-2045. 90-92 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这款中等体积的红酒，具有清新果香，主要特点是花朵、黑加仑、香料和浓缩咖啡。酒尾的香料味道让人感到清新。建议在2026-2045年饮用。评分：90-92分。

Western reviews.review: Würzig und mit dezenter Röstnote, roter und dunkler Frucht, etwas Pflaume in der Nase. Im Gaumen mit reifer Frucht, ausgewogen, ohne Überextraktion, sehr knackig und mit wunderbarere Länge ist das einer der besseren Kirwan, die ich bisher probieren durfte. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / CVBG / Château Belgrave) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的味道很独特，带有轻微的焦糖味，红色和深色水果的味道，鼻子里还有一点杏仁味。口感丰富，平衡，口感很好，没有过度浓缩，非常清脆，且有很长的尾部，这是目前我尝试过的最好的克莱朗酒之一。 (评分时间：2023年4月，来自CVBG/ Château Belgrave)

Western reviews.review: Firm mid-palate, refreshing cherry flavours, finishing with attractive savoury ending. El egant, ample, airy, layers of nuances without heaviness. Like a gentle kiss, or delicate like a dragonfly sipping on the water surface.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感坚实中等，带有清新果香，尤其是樱桃的风味，最后以一种吸引人的咸味结束。酒体优雅丰富，空气轻盈，层次丰富细致，没有沉重感。就像轻轻的吻，或者像一只轻盈的蜻蜓在水面上轻啜。

Western reviews.review: Deep ruby, purple reflections, subtle brightening on the rim. Fresh plums, some liquorice, a touch of fig, candied orange zest, inviting bouquet. Juicy, elegant, red cherry, freshly structured, mineral, salty, a delicious Margaux with good length. Accessible and endowed with certain ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，紫色反射，酒液边缘有微妙的光泽。新鲜的李子、少量的甘草、一点点的枣子、糖浆橙皮，令人愉悦的香气。 juicy、优雅、红樱桃、刚刚结构化、矿物质、咸味，一瓶美妙的马格努（Margaux）酒，酒尾长而持久。易于入口，具有某种程度的陈化潜力。

Western reviews.review: Very deep, dark, opaque black-purple color that holds well to a vivid, dark-purple rim. The aromas have sweet new oak spices over dark fruit. On the palate vanilla overlays opulent, juicy black-cherry fruit. There is an attractive interplay between the fine structure & the plentiful, lively fruit. Alcohol sees balanced. Fine, supple tannins lift the powerful, ripe juicy fruit. The mouth-watering nature of the open, lively, fresh black-fruit gives good length to the finish. 04/23 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色深度极佳，呈现出浓郁的黑紫色，边缘有明亮的紫色光泽。酒中的香气中有新橡木的甜甜的香味和黑色水果的香味。口感上，香味中有香草的味道覆盖着丰富的黑樱桃水果。酒中结构细致，水果丰富多彩，酒精平衡。酒中的纤维细腻，能够提升酒中的强烈、成熟、水果味。酒口水甜，开口活泼，新鲜的黑色水果味道让酒尾延长。评分：04/23 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 面对香气普遍内敛的2020年份，Chateau Pedesclaux依旧给我展现出花田月下的美好景象。纯净的花果芬芳能够轻而易举地撩开你的心房，技艺精湛的单宁萃取将最精华的部分呈现于味蕾。收尾时淡淡的还原气息点缀地好生巧妙，伴随着阵阵兰花芬芳，留给你无限的想象：我仿佛看到半夏之夜的萤火虫，整个夜空在看到它的时候都会忍不住地眨眼睛。建议适饮窗口：2025-2040。
Chinese pairs.new: In the face of the 2020 vintage's generally restrained aromas, Chateau Pedesclaux still presents a lovely scene under the moonlight. The pure floral and fruity scents can easily sweep you off your feet, while the masterful tannin extraction presents the essence to your palate. The subtle aftertaste is skillfully woven in, accompanied by the fragrance of orchids, leaving you with endless imagination: I'm reminded of fireflies on a summer night, with the entire sky blinking in delight. Recommended drinking window: 2025-2040.

English pairs.original: In the 2020 vintage with restrained aromas generally, Chateau Pedesclaux presents to me a brilliant scene as a flower yard under the moon with aromas. The pure fragrances of flowers and fruits can easily touch your heart and the tannins with skilled extraction will bestow the essence on your palate. On the finish, a light reductive hint artfully elicits layers of the fragrance of orchid and intrigues boundless imagination for you. Tasting it, I feel like watching fireflies twinkling with stars in the midsummer night sky. Suggested drinking window: 2025-2040.
English pairs.new: 2020年产的佩德斯克劳酒庄呈现出一种典雅的风格，花园般的清香在月光下绽放。花朵和水果的纯粹芬芳轻易地触动了你的心弦，而经过精心提取的坚果味道则将精髓呈现在你的味蕾上。酒尾处，轻微的还原性味道巧妙地展现了兰花的香气，引发了无尽的想象力。品尝它，仿佛是在夏夜的天空中看到萤火虫闪烁的光芒。建议饮用时间：2025-2040年。
