Western reviews.review: A crunchy and fresh 2020 with sliced oranges and redcurrants as well as cedar and nutmeg. Full-bodied with very firm and tight tannins. Bright finish. Crushed stone at the end as well. Needs three to five years to soften. 56% cabernet sauvignon, 34% merlot, 5% cabernet franc and 5% petit verdot.
Western reviews.translation: 2020年的这款红酒具有清新果香，带有橙子和红莓的风味，以及松木和肉豆蔻的香气。酒体丰富，具有非常坚实和紧密的橡皮质。酒尾清亮。酒尾还带有碎石子的味道。需要三到五年时间才能软化。酒中含有56%卡波雷尔·索维涅，34%梅洛，5%卡波雷尔·法兰克和5%佩蒂特·韦尔多。

Western reviews.review: The 2020 Château Pédesclaux reminds me of the 2016 with its concentrated, pure, classic Pauillac style. A blend of 56% Cabernet Sauvignon, 34% Merlot, and the balance Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot, it has a great nose of pure blue fruits (currants, cassis) as well as ample lead pencil, chalky minerality, and violet aromas and flavors. Medium to full-bodied, beautifully balanced, and elegant on the palate, it has the purity and polish to shine even today, yet my money is on it benefiting from 4-6 years of bottle age, and it should evolve gradually over the following 15+ years.
Western reviews.translation: 2020年佩德斯克劳酒庄的红酒让我想起了2016年的风格，具有浓缩、纯粹、典型的波尔多风格。酒庄的混合比例为56%卡波弗雷蒙，34%梅洛，余下的为卡波弗朗和佩蒂·维多。酒庄的鼻子里充满了纯净的蓝色水果（黑currants、黑berry）以及充足的铅笔、石灰质矿物质和紫罗兰香气和味道。口感中等到中等以上，口感平衡美观，具有纯净和光滑的质地，尽管它今天就已经闪闪发光，但我认为它将在4-6年内受益于瓶龄，随后15年以上的时间里会逐渐演变。

Western reviews.review: Tense and coiled, lovely styling here with bright and vibrant black fruits, a soft hit of creaminess alongside liquorice-laced tannins. Power and brawn, clearly structured and intense, this will age very well just a bit shy and tight right now. Dark chocolate, menthol freshness, plum and rosemary. Excellent tannic grip and I love the sweetness on the palate as well as overall freshness. Something very captivating about this and upscored from a tasting in September.
Western reviews.translation: 紧绷而有力，精美的风格，黑果酒充满生机，软绵的奶油感伴随着有姜味的苦味。强大而有力，结构清晰，强烈的酒香，今后会非常耐久，只是现在略为紧张和闭塞。巧克力味，薄荷的清新感，浓郁的黑果和迷迭香。酒体的苦味控制得非常好，我也喜欢口感的甜度和整体的清新感。这瓶酒非常吸引人，我在9月份的品酒会上曾经给它打了低分，但现在我认为它值得升级。

Chinese pairs.original: 葡萄藤的平均树龄约为35年。每个地块独立采收；淋皮；在不锈钢桶内进行发酵；60%到70%的新桶。赤霞珠从2000年份开始占据混酿中的主导地位，而在这之前的年份主角是梅洛。在酒庄与酿酒师兼总经理Jean-Luc Zell进行了一场连续21个年份的垂直品鉴。此酒的香气充满芬芳的甜花香，打底的是红色水果、桂皮和咸矿物味。口感的基石是锐利的酸度，而回味的主旋律则是矿物质。
Chinese pairs.new: The average age of the vineyard is approximately 35 years. Each plot is harvested separately; skin contact; fermentation in stainless steel tanks; 60-70% new oak. Cabernet Sauvignon has dominated the blend since the 2000 vintage, with Merlot taking center stage before that. The winery and winemaker/director Jean-Luc Zell conducted a vertical tasting of 21 consecutive vintages. This wine is filled with fragrant floral aromas, underpinned by red fruit, cinnamon and salty mineral notes. The palate is built on crisp acidity, while the finish is dominated by minerality.

English pairs.original: The vines are nearly 35 years old on average. Each plot is harvested separately; pumping over; fermenting in the stainless steel tanks; 60% to 70% new oak. Being Cabernet Sauvignon predominantly from 2000 (Merlot played the leading role before the 2000). A consistent 21 vintages' vertical tasting with the winemaker/general manager Jean-Luc Zell at the winery. Sweetly floral on the fragrant aroma where the backdrop was made up of red fruits, cinnamon and savoury-mineral. Sharp acid was the keystone of the mouthfeel while the predominant element of the finish was the defined minerality.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的葡萄平均年龄接近35年，每个葡萄园的葡萄单独收获；使用泵送法；在不锈钢储存罐中发酵；使用60%到70%的新橡木桶。主要是2000年产的卡波涅尔（Cabernet Sauvignon），之前的葡萄园中梅洛（Merlot）占主导地位。与葡萄酒制作人/总经理让-路易斯·泽尔（Jean-Luc Zell）在酒庄进行了21个连续的葡萄酒年份垂直品鉴。酒香甜蜜的花朵，背景是红色水果、肉桂和矿物质的风味。口感中酸度清晰是关键，而酒尾的主要元素是明确的矿物质风味。

Western reviews.review: Smoke and espresso greet your nose before the red pit fruits jump in. The wine is full-bodied, the tannins are round and the finish offers ample, sweet, red, fresh fruits to make this fun to drink. 91 Points
Western reviews.translation: 酒香中有烟和咖啡的味道，接着是红色水果的芳香。酒体丰富，苦味圆润，余味中有丰富的甜美红色新鲜水果，让人感到愉快。评分：91分。

Western reviews.review: From an estate dominated by its moated castle, this wine is firm, structured and ripe with blackberry fruits. Its richness is balanced with fresh acidity and ripe tannins. Drink this wine, full of aging potential, from 2023. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 来自一座被环绕着水池的古堡主导的庄园，这款红酒坚实、结构良好，黑莓果味成熟。其丰富的口感被新鲜的酸度和成熟的橡胶质平衡。建议从2023年开始饮用，这款酒有着很好的陈化潜力。- 罗杰·沃斯

Western reviews.review: (En Primeur) Herrliches Bouquet, Schwarze Johannisbeeren, Kirschen, rauchige Noten, der Wein zeigt noch nicht alles, was in ihm steckt, gute bis sehr gute Komplexität. Straffer Auftakt, knackige Frucht, viele schwarze Johannisbeeren, dazu Brombeeren, Anflüge von Tee, seidenweiche Tannine, gut integrierte Säure, knackig, frisch und gut strukturiert. Zieht sich im Abgang sehr lang hin, endet stimmig wie er begonnen hat. Sehr gelungen, ausgewogen, kraftvoll und doch elegant. 2022-2034, 18 vvPunkte, (91/100)
Western reviews.translation: (En Primeur) 美妙的香气，黑莓、草莓、烟熏味，酒还没有展现出全部的潜力，复杂性很好。入口清脆，果味清新，黑莓、蓝莓、茶叶味，细腻的橡皮感，酸度很好，结构紧凑，新鲜和有层次。尾部很长，结束与开始一样完美。非常成功，平衡，强大而又优雅。推荐饮用时间：2022-2034，18分（91/100）。

Chinese pairs.original: 成熟甜美的香气瞬间就锁定我的注意力，无数的鲜果随风起舞，好生快活。紧致的结构和绵密的单宁能够在口中将我的味蕾紧紧拥抱，伴随着黑巧克力的丝滑质感以及紫罗兰的幽香不断萦绕，这哪儿是Lalande-de-Pomerol？分明就是Pomerol砾石黏土的名庄形象。
Chinese pairs.new: The nose is immediately captivated by the mature and sweet aroma, with a lively dance of fresh fruits. The taut structure and velvety tannins tightly wrap my palate, accompanied by the smooth texture of dark chocolate and the subtle, floral hint of lavender. This is unmistakably a Pomerol estate, with the gravelly clay soils of Lalande-de-Pomerol shining through.

English pairs.original: Ripeness and sweetness on the nose catch my attention instantly. It feels like countless fruits dancing on my nose. Its compact structure and dense tannins embrace my palate tightly, haunting me around with the velvety texture of dark chocolates and a fragrance of violet. How can it be described as Lalande-de-Pomerol? It is exactly a Pomerol from a renowned Chateau with gravels and clay soils.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的鼻子里充满了成熟的果香和甜味，仿佛无数的水果在我的鼻子上跳跃。它的紧致结构和浓密的苦味在我的口中紧紧地包围着我，带给我黑巧克力的细腻触感和紫罗兰的芳香。它怎么能被描述为拉兰德-德-波梅罗尔呢？它正是来自一座著名庄园的波梅罗尔，土壤是 грав利土和粘土。

Western reviews.review: This wine was made during the last year of winemaker and Chateau-owner Denis Durantou’s life. He is famous for the excellent wine he produced at Clos L’Eglise in Pomerol, but he also bought lesser known vineyards and upgraded the farming and winemaking to produce some world-class value in Lalande-de-Pomerol, here at Les Cruzelles as well as at Le Chanade. I understand that his daughters have taken over daily operations and winemaking duties. This is a blend of mostly Merlot with 20% Cabernet Franc which was aged in about 1/3 new oak. Intense black raspberry aromas subsume the oak at this point in time. I have had younger bottles closer to release where the plush fruit intensity might lull one into thinking that this was a plump, early drinking example showcasing the generosity of the 2019 vintage. With another year of bottle age this is more overt with its inherent structure. Its combination of dark, plush fruit and superb structure declare this an excellently balanced wine which is both accessible now and which should age well for decades.---- Andrew Holod
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒是在葡萄酒制作人和酒庄老板Denis Durantou去世前一年生产的。他以在波美罗尔(Clos L'Eglise)生产出优质葡萄酒而闻名，但他也购买了较少人知的葡萄园，并通过改善种植和酿造手段，生产出世界级的价值葡萄酒，包括在拉兰德-波美罗尔(Lalande-de-Pomerol)的Les Cruzelles和Le Chanade。他的女儿们已经接管了日常运营和酿造工作。这是一款以梅洛(Merlot)为主的葡萄酒，含有20%卡波弗朗克(Cabernet Franc)，在1/3的新橡木桶中陈酿。酒中充满了浓郁的黑莓果香，盖过了橡木的味道。在刚刚发布的年份中，我喝过更年轻的瓶子，果味的丰富程度可能会让人误以为这是一款丰富的早期饮用葡萄酒，展现了2019年份的慷慨性。经过一年陈酿，这酒变得更加明显，展现出其固有的结构。它的黑色丰富果味和出色的结构使得这款葡萄酒成为一个完美的平衡，既可以现在饮用，也可以在几十年后继续陈酿。

Western reviews.review: Flowers, licorice, cocoa and earthy notes, along with black raspberries, plums and black cherries come through easily on the nose. The medium-bodied palate is soft, silky, refined and fresh, with loads of layered sweet fruit on the backend. Drink from 2023-2037.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中，含有花朵、 licorice、巧克力和泥土的味道，伴随着黑莓、浆果和黑樱桃的气息。口感中等，柔软、滑顺、细腻和新鲜，后端有丰富的甜果味。建议从2023年到2037年饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 从头到尾都是石墨的气息，浑身上下都是紫罗兰的清香，Chateau Meyney 2020所展现出的集中度令人拍案叫绝，蓝黏土在干热年份的魅力在这款酒身上完美呈现。和很多走”集中度”路线的葡萄酒不同，它的香气在年轻时就十分开放，蓝莓、奶油、榛子、豆蔻的香气奏响了青春的赞歌，伴随着磁铁般的单宁紧紧贴在酒体表面。这款酒的陈年潜力可以轻易超过20年，5-6年之后还会出现丰富的松露气息。相信我，Chateau Meyney 永远不会让耐心的朋友失望。
Chinese pairs.new: From start to finish, it's a graphite nose, with lavender notes throughout, and Chateau Meyney 2020 presents an astonishing concentration. The charm of blue clay in a dry year is perfectly showcased in this wine. Unlike many wines that follow the "concentration" route, its aromas are already very open at a young age, with blueberry, cream, hazelnut, and cinnamon notes singing a hymn to youth, accompanied by iron-like tannins tightly wrapped around the wine's body. This wine's aging potential can easily exceed 20 years, and after 5-6 years, rich truffle aromas will emerge. Trust me, Chateau Meyney will never disappoint patient friends.

English pairs.original: Penetrated by the note of graphite from entry to finish, and covered by the fresh aromas of violet from head to toe, Chateau Meyney 2020 shows remarkable concentration, and the charm of Argile Bleu in a dry and hot vintage is perfectly demonstrated in this wine. Unlike many wines that focus on “concentrations“, its fragrance is very open at a young age. The aromas of blueberry, cream, hazelnuts, and cardamom play the hymn to youth, while the magnet-like tannins cling tightly to the surface of the body. The bottle aging potential of this wine easily exceeds 20 years, and it will present a rich note of truffle after 5 – 6 years. Trust me, Chateau Meyney will never disappoint its patient fans.
English pairs.new: 2020年梅尼酒庄的红酒，入口到尾部都被图形笔的香气所包围，身上覆盖着鲜花般的紫罗兰香气。这种酒庄在干燥炎热的年份中，展现出出色的浓度和阿吉尔布鲁的魅力。与许多注重“浓度”的酒不同，这种酒的香气在年轻时非常开阔。蓝莓、奶油、杏仁和卡达木的香气在年轻的酒中演奏着青春的赞歌，而磁铁般的纤维素紧紧地附着在酒体表面。这种酒的瓶装储存潜力超过20年，它在5-6年后会呈现出浓郁的松露香气。相信我，梅尼酒庄的粉丝们不会失望的。

Western reviews.review: The 2020 Chateau Meyney is a solid step up, with more elegance and finesse, as well as structure. Giving up medium-bodied aromas and flavors of darker currants, black cherries, classy oak, tobacco leaf, and damp earth, it has terrific overall balance, building, fine-grained tannins, and a great finish. It has some accessibility today yet will benefit from 3-5 years of bottle age and keep for two decades.
Western reviews.translation: 2020年夏多尼梅尼（Chateau Meyney）是一款优质的红酒，具有更高的优雅和细腻感，以及更好的结构。它展现出中等体积的黑currant、黑樱桃、优雅的橡木、烟草叶和潮湿土壤的气味和口感，整体平衡出色，细腻的纤维和长长的尾部。虽然它在当前已经有一定的可及性，但仍将受益于3-5年的瓶龄，并能维持20年。

Western reviews.review:
This estate has produced a densely textured wine, rich in tannins and packed with dark, concentrated black fruits. There is a muscular character, structured and with fine promise for longterm aging. 
Barrel Sample: 92-94
Western reviews.translation:
这家酒庄生产了一种浓密的红酒，富含天然的苦味物质和浓郁的黑色果实。酒中肌肉感强，结构紧密，具有长期陈化的潜力。

酒庄样品评分：92-94分

Western reviews.review: Attractive aromas of ripe dark berries with dark spices, walnut, chocolate nibs and bark. Medium- to full-bodied with a dense, velvety texture and plush, fine-grained tannins. Very textural and creamy with a deep core of ripe dark fruit and a succulent finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有诱人的气味，带有成熟的黑berries、黑胡椒、核桃、巧克力碎片和树皮的香气。口感中等到丰富，有着浓密的、细腻的质地和细致的、柔软的苦味。非常具有质感和奶油感，带有成熟黑果的深层核心和丰富的口感。

Western reviews.review: Lovely aromatic expression, floral and richly scented with ripe black cherry and salty blueberry. Cool and charming, this makes an impact straight away with a push of ripe, gently chewy tannins which expand and coat the mouth. More expansive and less narrow than some from this appellation at this point. Feels a bit more approachable but still with structure and push. Lots of freshness, wide, minty and salty. Nuanced, savoury and satisfying.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的芳香非常迷人，带有鲜花和浓郁的黑樱桃和蓝莓的气味。酿造得非常精致，入口即感受到丰富的果味和细腻的口感。口感丰富，果味丰富，口感丰富，带有清新和咸味的感觉。口感丰富，果味丰富，口感丰富，带有清新和咸味的感觉。口感丰富，果味丰富，口感丰富，带有清新和咸味的感觉。

Western reviews.review: A strong performance for this improving estate, the 2020 Meyney unwinds in the glass with aromas of dark berries, plums, violets, cigar box and loamy soil. Medium to full-bodied, with a pure and fleshy core of fruit framed by sweet, powdery tannins and lively acids, it has retained energy and balance in this warm vintage.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的表现非常出色，这个不断进步的庄园的2020年梅尼（Meyney）在杯子里释放出黑莓、浆果、紫罗兰、雪茄盒和土壤的香气。口感中等到中等以上，果肉丰富纯正，搭配着甜蜜的粉末状纤维和活跃的酸度，保持了这一暖季的能量和平衡。

Chinese pairs.original: 大宝2018的香气十分强劲，是该年份整个Saint-Julien最强劲的一款酒之一。烟熏和辛香料的气息非常丰富，但目前还尚未完全展示它的实力。入口爽滑而讨喜，看得出酒庄对浸渍的处理非常温柔。结构和力量是在收尾时瞬间炸裂，和刚开始的柔和感形成了鲜明的对比。假以时日，这款酒会散发出更多的光彩。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2018 Château Grand Puy-Lacoste is one of the most powerful wines of the vintage in Saint-Julien. The nose is rich and full of smoky and spicy aromas, but it's still holding back. The palate is silky and charming, with a gentle approach that suggests a delicate touch in the winemaking. The structure and power explode on the finish, creating a striking contrast to the wine's initial softness. With time, this wine will reveal even more brilliance.

English pairs.original: The nose of Talbot 2018 is highly intensive; it is one of the most concentrated wines in Saint-Julien. Smoky notes and pungent species are pretty glowing, with full of aromatic potentials. What I like the most is the sleek entry, and I believe the wine-making team extracted nicely during maceration. The strength and structure stand out on the finish, which vastly contrasts to the gentleness at the beginning. Given enough patience, this wine will send off more glories.
English pairs.new: 塔尔博特2018的鼻子非常浓郁，是圣朱利安区中最浓郁的葡萄酒之一。酒中充满了烟熏味和强烈的香气，具有极大的芳香潜力。最让我喜欢的是酒体的滑顺入口，相信酒厂的团队在发酵过程中提取得非常好。酒的力量和结构在尾部表现突出，与初期的温和形成了鲜明的对比。只要耐心等待，这款酒将会带来更多的荣耀。

Western reviews.review: Rich aromas of blackcurrant, blackberry, chocolate, tobacco and licorice. Oyster shell, too. It’s full-bodied with firm, well integrated tannins. Polished, silky layers with a long finish. Gorgeous ripe and bright fruit in the center palate. Best in a long time. Try from 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有浓郁的黑currant、黑berry、巧克力、烟草和甘草香气，还有海贝壳的味道。酒体丰富，具有坚实的、完美融合的纤维。酒液光滑细致，长长的尾部。酒中充满了丰富的、鲜美的果味，尤其是在口感的中心。非常出色，值得一试。建议从2025年开始品尝。

Western reviews.review: This is densely packed with ripe macerated fig, blackberry and plum fruit flavors supported by tar and bramble notes that meld steadily through the finish. Notes of applewood and anise flash throughout. For the cellar. Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot and Petit Verdot. Best from 2023 through 2036.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒浓郁丰富，展现出成熟的浆果风味，如浆果、黑莓和浆果，伴随着焦炭和荆棘的香气，持续到尾部。苹果木和丁香的香气在整个过程中闪烁。适合长期陈化。搭配卡波网白葡萄酒、梅洛和佩蒂·韦多。最佳饮用时间为2023年至2036年。

Western reviews.review: The special bottle celebrates 100 years of ownership by the Cordier family, one of the top Bordeaux wine families.This wine shows concentration and intense black fruits. Rich dark chocolate and a luscious texture are allied to the firm base of tannins. The wine is set for aging. Drink from 2027.
Western reviews.translation: 特别瓶装纪念科迪埃尔家族100年家族所有权，这是波尔多地区顶级葡萄酒家族之一。这款红酒展现出浓郁的黑果味，富有深度的巧克力味和丰富的口感，坚实的天然纤维素基底。该酒适合长期陈酿，建议2027年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: Clear depth right off the first nose is evident, with swirling black cherry and blackberry fruits and grilled cedar. Caramel creaminess here also, with black chocolate edging. This is excellent-quality, with bristling tannins that are just at the beginning of their life. 60% new oak. Drinking Window 2026 - 2040
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的鼻子清晰深邃，第一印象就能感受到黑樱桃和黑莓的果香，伴随着烤柯的香气和焦糖般的奶油感，黑巧克力也在其中。酒质优良，口感中有刚刚开始发挥作用的坚果味，60%的新橡木 barrel 贡献了这款酒的特质。建议饮用时间：2026-2040年。

Western reviews.review: Deep garnet-purple in color, the 2018 Talbot is just a little reduced to begin, opening out to reveal notions of warm red and black currants, baked plums and mulberries with touches of sautéed herbs, tilled soil, fallen leaves and unsmoked cigars. Medium to full-bodied, it has commendably ripe, fine-grained tannins and restrained, earthy layers on offer in the mouth with an herbal lift on the finish. Barrel Sample: 91-93
Western reviews.translation: 2018年塔尔博特红酒的颜色是深红紫色，初期略微有减少的味道，逐渐展现出熟红和黑葡萄、烤石榴和黑莓的香气，伴有烤香的草药、翻耕土壤、落叶和未点燃的雪茄的味道。口感中等到中厚，具有可喜的成熟、细致的纤维和谦逊的土壤层次，口感中有草药的余韵。酒桶样品：91-93分。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Rauzan-Segla 在2023年份遭受了比较严重的霜霉病侵袭，但它还是凭借坚韧不拔的精神，给我们呈现出了优良的品质。该年份的果香相对收敛，标志性的紫罗兰花香和香甜软糯的莓果芬芳并不是特别突出。此外，它的单宁表现欲有些强，往日含蓄的性格变得有些急躁，因此也就少了几分我所期待的温柔气息。尽管面临种种挑战，这款酒在口感上依然保持了理想的平衡。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau Rauzan-Segla 在2023年份遭受了严重的霜霉病侵袭，但它仍然表现出坚韧不拔的精神，呈现出优良的品质。该年份的果香相对收敛，紫罗兰花香和莓果芬芳并不是特别突出。此外，单宁表现欲有些强，往日含蓄的性格变得有些急躁，因此也就少了几分温柔气息。尽管面临种种挑战，这款酒在口感上仍然保持了理想的平衡。

English pairs.original: Despite a severe attack of downy mildew in 2023, Chateau Rauzan-Segla has persevered with a resilient spirit to deliver commendable quality. The fruit aromas of this vintage are somewhat restrained, with its signature violet fragrance and the sweet, soft berry notes not as prominent. Moreover, its tannins are assertive, and the wine’s typically reserved character has become somewhat impatient, lacking some of the gentleness I had anticipated. Despite these challenges, the wine still maintains an ideal balance on the palate.
English pairs.new: 尽管2023年遭遇严重的白粉病袭击，拉赞-塞格拉庄园仍然表现出顽强的精神，坚持为消费者提供可圈可点的品质。 这个葡萄酒的果香相对保守，具有标志性的紫罗兰香味和甜软的浆果香味不如往常那么突出。 此外，其鞭炮味道也比较强势，葡萄酒的典型保守性格变得有些急躁，缺乏我预期的温柔。 尽管面临这些挑战，葡萄酒仍然在口感上保持着理想的平衡。

Western reviews.review: 85% Cabernet Sauvignon, der höchste Anteil seit je auch im Grand Vin; tief, floral, Rosenblüten, Kirschen, Cassis; am Gaumen dicht gebaut, vertikal, frisch, viel Druck und Spannung, knackig, saftig, Massen an Tanninen umgarnen die Frucht, salines Finale auf rote Beeren und Blutorangen. Einmal mehr ausgezeichnet, pure Eleganz!
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的成分是：85% 卡波雷尔·沙夫诺（Cabernet Sauvignon），这是自从该酒庄的格兰德维恩（Grand Vin）成立以来，卡波雷尔·沙夫诺的比例最高。酒的颜色深红，气味花香，带有玫瑰花和樱桃的芬芳，黑加仑（Cassis）味道浓郁。口感紧实，垂直，新鲜，充满压力和张力，口感清脆，水汁丰富，成千上万的苦味物质包围着果味，酒尾带有红果和橙子的海盐味。一次又一次地，酒庄的出品令人惊叹，纯粹的典雅！

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark & virtually opaque purple-black in color The aromas are rich, ripe & heady with notes of black-cherry, sweet licorice & raisins. On the palate concentrated, bursting, black-cherry fruit is overlaid with notes of chocolate & coffee. There are plentiful concentrated ripe fruit tannins with a plush, silky texture. Alcohol is balanced & the ripe fruit gains savory touches on the finish. The wine's freshness gives a long, bright fruit finish. 04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的颜色是深暗的紫黑色，几乎透不见光。酒中的香气丰富、浓郁，带有黑樱桃、甜甘草和葡萄干的味道。口感浓郁，黑樱桃的果味爆发，伴有巧克力和咖啡的味道。酒中的果皮苦味丰富，口感滑顺。酒精平衡，果味在尾部带有咸味。酒的清新感使得果味在口中留下长久的清新感。评分：04/24 (ep) DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 怡人的樱桃和黑莓浆的气味，并带有少许烤甘草味，质地极为柔软，结构极为紧实。
Chinese pairs.new: Delicate aromas of cherry and blackberry jam, with a hint of toasted licorice, extremely soft texture, and extremely tight structure.

Western reviews.review: Tasted at BI Wine & Spirits' 10-Years-On tasting, the 2007 Lafite-Rothschild has an elegant cigar box bouquet, with dusky black fruit and a touch of antique bureau—just classic Lafite. The palate is medium-bodied with fine tannin, cedar and tobacco infusing the black fruit, classic in style with a conservative yet focused finish that lingers in the mouth. This is certainly the most subtle First Growth, but one of the most refined too—a sophisticated but understated Lafite-Rothschild that will age with discrete style. Tasted February 2017.
Western reviews.translation: 2007年拉菲罗什柴尔德在BI Wine & Spirits的10年后品酒会上展现出典雅黑酒的典范风格。酒香中带有优雅的雪茄盒、黑色果实和古董橡木柜的味道，典型的拉菲风格。口感中等体积，细致的橡木纹理，雪茄和烟草味道浸润黑色果实，风格典雅，保守但聚焦的尾韵在口中停留。拉菲罗什柴尔德的这瓶酒是最低调的第一生长，但也最细致的品种之一，风格优雅但不张扬，会以低调的风格随着时间的推移而成熟。

Western reviews.review: This is a wine for aging. The tannins are dense, very dry with a feel of extraction. It takes a while for the black currant fruit to show through, with acidity and freshness dominant. The wine is still settling, and time will bring the fruit into line with the tannins.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶适合陈年的红酒。酒中的苦味物质（tanins）非常浓郁，干爽，感觉像被提取出来一样。黑currant的果味需要一段时间才能显现出来，酸度和清新感占据了主导地位。酒还在调整中，时间会让果味与苦味物质达到平衡。

Western reviews.review: A big, juicy wine for the vintage, with spice, sweet tobacco and plum aromas and flavors. Full, long and rich, with a soft texture. A little tight, but should develop nicely in the bottle. Best after 2014.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒是当年产量中的一大亮点，具有浓郁的香气，带有香料、甜烟草和浓郁的浆果味道。口感丰富、长久、富有层次，质地细腻。虽然现在还略有紧绷，但应该在瓶内发酵后会逐渐成熟。建议在2014年后品尝。

Chinese pairs.original: Lafaurie-Peyraguey的浓度好的令人惊喜，不但糖分特别多，就连酸度也高的惊人。层层环绕的桂皮、茴香、金桔、菠萝蜜周围还带着一层层麻麻的藤椒和姜片辛辣。入口饱满甜蜜，立体动感，油润的口感中带着丝丝清甜味道，是2021年份少见的高级别苏玳，贵腐爱好者绝对不容错过。
Chinese pairs.new: Lafaurie-Peyraguey的酒精度令人惊喜，不仅糖分丰富，酸度也异常高。酒中桂皮、茴香、金桔和菠萝蜜的香气层层展开，伴随着麻麻的藤椒和姜片的辛辣味道。入口丰富甜美，口感丰富多层次，油润的口感中带着清新的甜味。2021年份的Lafaurie-Peyraguey是少见的高级别苏玳酒，贵腐爱好者绝对不能错过。

English pairs.original: Lafaurie-Peyraguey boasts a surprisingly great concentration, with particularly high sugar and acidity. The flavors of cinnamon, fennel, kumquat, and jackfruit twine around the body, coated by layers of pungent spiciness from Sichuan pepper and ginger. It is plumpy and sweet on the mid-palate, vigorous and all-round, carrying breaths of fresh sweetness with its oily texture. It is a rare high-standard Sauternes in 2021. A not-to-be-missed to Botrytis fans.
English pairs.new: 拉法里-佩拉盖 (Lafaurie-Peyraguey) 的口感非常浓郁，糖度和酸度都非常高。酒中融合了肉桂、荜拌、柚子和菠萝的风味，外加来自四川椒和姜的辣味。口感丰富甜美，中口略带油腻，带有新鲜甜味。2021年的一款高品质的沙托恩酒，值得一试。对于喜欢霉菌感的酒迷来说，这是一款不可错过的佳品。

Western reviews.review: Esse Premier Grand Cru Classé da classificação de 1855 está localizado num terraço 70 metros acima do nível do mar com marcantes depósitos de calcário. São 18 hectares com vinhedos divididos em 93% de Sémillon, 6% Sauvignon Blanc e 1% de Muscadelle. A tipicidade de Sauternes esculpida pela botryts. Tem muito dulçor equilibrado pela espetacular acidez, que origina um vinho suculento e esbelto, com laranja madura e assinatura cítrica que equilibra o paladar entre o açafrão e ervas.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶来自1855年评级的第一级葡萄酒，产自70米高的台地上，地质条件为典型的白垩岩。葡萄园总面积18公顷，分为93%的塞米隆、6%的索维涅白和1%的穆斯卡德。塞米隆葡萄的特点是由Botrytis（一种葡萄酒酵母）形成的，赋予了这瓶酒甜度与酸度的完美平衡，呈现出丰富的口感，带有成熟橙子和柑橘的香气，余味中有黄油和草药的味道。

Western reviews.review: Light greenish yellow, silver reflections. An inviting bouquet of fine blossom honey, delicate wood nuances, vanilla and yellow tropical fruit. Juicy, complex, ripe yellow peach, some pineapple with hints of honey. Shows great length and balance with an elegant mineral finish.
Western reviews.translation:
酒色：浅绿色黄色，银色反光。

酒香：细腻的花蜜香，轻微的木质味，香草和黄色热带水果。

口感： juicy，复杂，成熟的黄桃，少量的菠萝，带有花蜜的味道。酒展现出出色的长度和平衡，优雅的矿物质尾韵。

Western reviews.review: Yellow tropical fruits dipped in honey, with flowers, oranges, lemon curd, vanilla, mango and roasted nuts. Fresh, sweet, racy and energetic, with touches of roasted white peach, overripe apricots and tropical fruits slathered in honey shine brightly in the mid-palate and in the finish. This is a sublime, sweet treat. Though it is going to be difficult to find as only 500 cases were produced! Drink from 2023-2050. 94-96
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感像黄色的热带水果浸在蜂蜜中，伴有花朵、橙子、柠檬酱、香草、芒果和烤坚果的味道。酒体清新、甜美、果香、充满活力，中口和尾部都有烤白桃、成熟的杏子和浸在蜂蜜中的热带水果的余味。这种红酒是极品甜品。虽然只有500箱生产，但你一定要尝试一下！建议饮用时间：2023-2050。评分：94-96。

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Goldgelb. Florale Nase, sehr feinduftig, weisse Blüten, reife Quitte, Datteln, Aprikosen. Im Gaumen rund und cremig, opulent, mit guter Säure, baut Druck auf, zeigt Eleganz. Im Abgang von ausgezeichneter Länge, hallt minutenlang nach. Top gelungen und mit viel Potential. 2025-2060 (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2022. Dourthe)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

深金黄色。花朵般的香气，非常浓郁，白色花朵，成熟的橘子，dates，杏子。口感圆润，奶油般的质地，丰富，酸度适宜，压力感强，展现出优雅的风格。尾部长达数分钟，余味悠长。非常成功，具有很大的潜力。推荐储存时间：2025-2060（2022年4月在Dourthe酒庄品尝）。

Western reviews.review: Deep lemon-yellow to pale-gold in color. Aromas are slightly lifted lemon & pineapple fruit. The palate is sweet & fresh with a little bitter structure. The mid-palate comprises marzipan flavors overlaying lifted, rip peachy fruit. The wine is of mid-weight with slightly warming alcohol. Good, fresh acidity ensures th finish lasts well, it ends with a hint of sweetness. 04/22 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的颜色是深橙黄色到浅金色。酒中的气味是轻微的柠檬和菠萝果味。口感是甜蜜的和新鲜的，略带苦味。中口部是杏仁味和轻微的成熟桃子果味。酒的重量是中等的，酒精略带温暖。酒中的酸度是新鲜的，保证了酒尾的持久，酒尾带有轻微的甜味。评分：04/22 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 温和的香气中弥漫着多汁而又含蓄的成熟果香，悠然的蓝莓芬芳、甜美的奶油樱桃，在紧致的矿物感帮助下显得特别立体。口中温润的感觉彷如鲜奶流过味蕾，与内秀的香气构成了温文尔雅、落落大方的性格特点，自内而外散发着“自然之气”。
Chinese pairs.new: A delicate aroma wafts with luscious and restrained mature fruit notes, a serene blueberry fragrance, and sweet cherry blossom, all set against a backdrop of tight minerality. The palate is coated with a silky smoothness, like fresh cream flowing over the senses, and the subtle aromas combine to create a refined, elegant character that exudes a sense of effortless natural charm.

English pairs.original: The genial aroma is filled with succulent ripe fruit aromas, while the melodious blueberry fragrance and sweet cream cherry are particularly solid with the help of a compact mineral notes. The softness on the palate is like fresh milk flowing through the taste buds, showing me a pleasant and elegant personality characteristic, exuding “sense of natural” from the inside out.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的芳香温馨，充满了成熟的水果香气，尤其是蓝莓的香味和甜奶油的樱桃味，均由矿物质的清晰味道所支持。口感柔和，如新鲜牛奶在味蕾间流动，展现出一种舒适和优雅的个性特征，透露着一种“自然”的气质。

Western reviews.review: Expressiv, floral, würzig, komplex, rote Beeren, geröstete Haselnuss, Kräuter; am Gaumen mit delikater Frucht und ungemein viel Würze, sehr lebendig, seidiges Tannin, stimmige Säure, langes, rotfruchtiges Finale. Ein Wein mit Finesse und Präzision. Ab sofort ein Hit, jedoch mit guten Reserven; 2024 bis 2040.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一杯表达丰富的、花香的、有泥土味道的、复杂的红酒，口感中有红果和烤杏仁的味道，伴有各种草药的香气。口感上有细腻的果味和丰富的香料，非常活跃，具有细腻的纤维和和谐的酸度，长长的果味尾韵。是一杯精致和精确的红酒。从现在开始，它将成为一款热门红酒，但需要储存；建议储存时间为2024年至2040年。

Western reviews.review: Showing much better in the bottle than it did from the barrel, the nose, with its display flowers, mint, espresso, coco and red fruits gets you ready for all the silky-textured, sweet, soft, polished, refined fruits with a touch of chocolate on the palate and in the finish. You can enjoy this on release or age it a few years before opening a bottle. de Ferrand has been kicking up the quality here over the past few years, which is nice to see. Drink from 2022-2035. 91 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒在瓶子里表现得比在酒桶里好得多。酒口上的花香、薄荷、咖啡、可可和红果让你期待着口感上的丝滑、甜、软、光滑、精致的果味，以及口感和尾部的巧克力味。您可以在发布时享用它，也可以将其储存几年后再打开一瓶。德费兰德在过去几年里一直在提高质量，这很令人高兴。建议饮用时间为2022-2035年。评分：91分。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung. Feines Nougat, etwas Velours, schwarze Beerenfrucht, reife Pflaumen, ein Hauch von Dörrobst, zarter Eukalyptuston, facettenreiches Bukett. Komplex, saftig, feine Fruchtsüße, reife, tragende Tannine, mineralisch, schokoladige Note, bleibt gut haften, salziger Nachhall, bereits zugänglich, gutes Reifepotenzial.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。酒香中有细腻的奶油糖果味，微微的丝绒感，黑色浆果味，成熟的石榴味，略带干果味，微微的薄荷味，复杂的酒香。口感丰富，果汁丰富，细腻的果糖味，成熟的坚果味，矿物质味，巧克力味，酒尾持久，余味微微带盐味，已经可以饮用，酒龄潜力很大。

Western reviews.review: Inky dark purple core. Pure intense and glossy nose showing fine oak, toast, roasted coffee, cassis and crushed dark berries. The palate combines a dense fruitiness and concentration with a fresh backbone, layers of finely grained tannins, stylish and pure with a chalky freshness and a long vigorous finish. Still youthful but finely assembled and harmonious.
Western reviews.translation: 深紫色酒液。酒香浓郁、纯粹、光亮，展现出精致的橡木、烘烤咖啡、黑加思和压碎的黑莓果味。口感丰富果实和浓缩的味道与清新底蕴相结合，细致的纤维质感，风格优雅纯粹，带有石膏般的清新和长而有力的尾韵。酒仍然年轻，但结构精致和谐。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark ruby-red in color, the wine holds its color well to the rim. Aromas are deep & ripe with dark-plum fruit. The palate displays rich, dark prune & plum fruit, The wine is medium-bodied with an excellent structure of fine chalky tannins & a little graininess. The finish is smooth & chocolatey with a touch of warmth from the alcohol. There is balanced acidity & the finish lasts well. 04/24 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色深暗的红宝石色，颜色持久到酒杯边缘。酒中的气味深厚浓郁，带有熟透的黑杏果香。口感丰富，黑杏和黑枣的果味浓郁。酒体中等，结构坚实，细致的石灰质苦味和微微的粗糙感。酒尾光滑，巧克力味浓郁，酒精的余温带来舒适感。酸度平衡，酒尾持久。评分：04/24 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 甘草，黑松露，黑莓、碎玫瑰和紫罗兰的香气，丰满浓郁的酒体，醇厚柔滑的单宁，持久的回味。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich aromas of licorice, black truffle, blackberry, rose petal, and lavender. Full-bodied texture, velvety smooth tannins, and a long-lasting finish.

Western reviews.review: Medium to deep, dark ruby red. On the nose red fruits show a violet scented perfume that is lifted by toasty oak. On the palate crunchy redcurrant ands cassis fruit is juicy & very well integrated with cedary new oak, there are also leafy touches. Lovely acidity gives plenty of freshness & the alcohol is balanced. There is fair grip & fine tannins which are supple on the long finish. 11/14 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深度的暗红色。

香气：酒中红果的香气带有紫罗兰的花香，受到 Toasty oak 的提振。

口感：口感中有新鲜的红果和黑加仑的味道，和新橡木的味道融合得很好，还有叶子的味道。酒中有很好的酸度，给人清新感，酒精度合适。酒中有适度的抓握感，纤维很细腻，长尾部很舒服。评分：11/14

Chinese pairs.original: 2023年份是Chateau Cantenac Brown 在焕然一新的酒窖里酿造的第一个年份，成功的延续了其清新爽朗的风格。该年份有一个特点值得画个大大的重点：我觉得2023年份的口感更加深邃，以往罕见的石墨粉气息变得极为清晰，我居然在这款酒身上找到了从未见过的梅多克气质。樱桃和黑李子芬芳纯粹而多汁；兰花和百合的芳香精致而优雅；松柏和树脂的清香清新而舒畅，当他们汇聚在高酸度的周围时，奏响的是一曲青春的赞歌，此时此刻，我已然听到了它们的高声吟唱。
Chinese pairs.new: 2023年是Chateau Cantenac Brown在新酒窖中酿造的第一个年份，成功地延续了其清新爽朗的风格。值得注意的是，这年份的口感更加深邃，之前罕见的石墨粉气息变得清晰，我在这款酒中发现了从未见过的梅多克气质。樱桃和黑李子芬芳纯粹而多汁；兰花和百合的芳香精致而优雅；松柏和树脂的清香清新而舒畅，当他们汇聚在高酸度的周围时，奏响的是一曲青春的赞歌，此时此刻，我已然听到了它们的高声吟唱。

English pairs.original: The 2023 vintage marks the first vintage that Chateau Cantenac Brown made in the renovated cellar, successfully continuing its fresh and vibrant style. A notable feature of this vintage deserves particular emphasis: I find the palate of the 2023 is deeper and richer than before, with an unusually clear presence of graphite powder that I’ve never encountered in Chateau Cantenac Brown. The fragrances of cherries and black plums are pure and juicy; orchids and lilies offer delicate and elegant aromas; the fresh scents of pine and resin are invigorating and soothing. As they come around the high acidity, they orchestrate a song of youth, and I can already hear their resounding chant now.
English pairs.new: 2023年是尚昂加布朗酒庄（Chateau Cantenac Brown）在新改造的酒窖中酿造的第一批酒。它成功地延续了酒庄的新鲜和活力风格。值得特别提及的是，这个年份的口感比之前更深更丰富，尤其是有一个清晰的石墨粉味道，这在尚昂加布朗酒庄的历史中是第一次。樱桃和黑杏的香气清新果甜；兰花和百合的香气细致优雅；松柏和树脂的香气清新舒缓。酒中的高酸度使得酒庄的年轻风格更加鲜明，我已经能听到他们的悠扬歌声了。

Western reviews.review: Dominant black fruits define this wine, making it both fruity and expressive. The vibrant mid-palate is both firm and dense, leading into a savoury and delectable finish. Notably, the wine boasts freshness and verticality, highlighting its dynamic and lively character.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒以浓郁的黑果味为主，既有浓郁的果味，又有丰富的表达。酒体中部的味道鲜活、坚实、密集，带来了一种风味丰富的尾韵。值得注意的是，这款酒具有清新和立体感，突出了其活泼、生动的性格。

Western reviews.review: Zurückhaltend, sehr nobel, tiefgründig, dunkelfruchtig, versp ielt; knackig, wie ein Biss in einen Korb frischer Beeren, massig Tannin, seidig verwoben, baut Druck auf, bleibt hochelegant; hat dank neuen Kellereinrichtungen an Präzision dazugewonnen.
Western reviews.translation:
这段红酒评论翻译成中文如下：

谨慎，极具高贵感，深度丰富，深色果味，细腻; 爆发力强，如品尝新鲜水果的口感，充满果皮的味道，细腻的纹理，高雅的风格; 由于新型酒窖设备的升级，酒的精确度有所提高。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark purple-black color with a purple rim, the wine is virtually opaque. Cassis aromas on the nose are restrained. On the palate concentrated black-plum to licorice fruit has touches of mouthwatering tannin & a little drying grip. The fine tannins have toasty touches but are not really astringent. Alcohol is balanced & the wine is medium to full bodied. Good acidity lifts blackcurrant fruit on a long structured finish. 04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的紫黑色，酒液几乎透明。酒鼻中有着抑制的黑加斯果香。口感上，浓郁的黑浆果到甘草味道，带有让人垂涎的苦味和微微干涩的感觉。细致的苦味带有烘烤的味道，但并不真正干涩。酒精平衡，酒体中等到中等以上。好酸度使黑加斯果味道在长而结构化的尾部持续存在。 评分：04/24 (ep) DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 圆润且芬芳的红茶、醋栗及碎无花果的味道，伴有微妙的烟熏、熏香及焦油。单宁较高，整体平衡完美
Chinese pairs.new: Smooth and fragrant with notes of plum, cherry, and crushed apricot, accompanied by subtle hints of smoke, incense, and tar. High tannins, perfectly balanced overall.

Western reviews.review: One of the fabulous surprises, although I had suggested last year that it could jump in quality, of my tastings, the 2006 Lafite Rothschild is a great, great wine made from a blend of 82% Cabernet Sauvignon, 16% Merlot, and 2% Petit Verdot. When I tasted it from barrel, it reminded me of their successful 1988, but it is dramatically superior to that vintage. Frankly, it may turn out to be as good as the 2005, which in all of Bordeaux is a far greater vintage than 2006. Lafite’s severe selection process (42% made it into the grand vin) resulted in a full-bodied wine boasting an extraordinary perfume of charcoal, truffles, lead pencil shavings, and sensationally sweet, ripe black currant and cedar notes. A wine of extraordinary intensity, texture, and depth with silky tannins as well as awesome concentration, this has turned out to be a remarkable Lafite Rothschild that should be drinkable much earlier than the 2005, but age for three decades. Anticipated maturity: 2014-2035+.
Western reviews.translation: 我在品尝中的一大惊喜，尽管去年我曾预测它可能会有质的提升，但2006年拉菲罗什柴尔德（Lafite Rothschild）仍然是一个出色的佳酿。它的酒精含量为82%卡波弗列（Cabernet Sauvignon）、16%梅洛（Merlot）和2%佩蒂·维多（Petit Verdot）。当我从酒桶中品尝它时，它让我想起了他们成功的1988年款，但它远远优于那一年的佳酿。诚然，它可能会成为2005年款的对手，而2005年款在波尔多地区是远远优于2006年款的。拉菲罗什柴尔德严格的选择过程（仅有42%的酒精被选入大酒）使得它成为一个充满体力的佳酿，具有极其独特的香气，包括焦炭、松露、铅笔削片和极其甜美的黑加仑和红木香气。酒精浓度高，质地细腻，深度惊人，具有丝滑的纹理和令人惊叹的浓度，这使得它成为一个令人惊叹的拉菲罗什柴尔德佳酿，应该比2005年款更早可饮用，但仍然需要三十年的时间来成熟。预计成熟年份：2014-2035年。

Western reviews.review: As so often with Lafite, it is power that marks this wine. That, and density of texture. The additional element in this vintage, and at this stage of the wine’s development, is a dominant wood element. The vanilla and tannins from the wood match well with the concentrated tannins of the fruit, which is dark, dense and tight. This is a wine for long-term aging: in 15 years this will have superb richness.
Western reviews.translation: 这款拉菲酒的特点是强劲的力量和丰富的口感。与往常一样，拉菲酒的力量让人印象深刻。另外，这款酒的木质元素也非常突出，木质的香气和坚果味与酒中的浓郁的果实和坚果味相得益彰。这种木质元素在酒的发展过程中非常重要，特别是在酒的成熟期。这种酒适合长期陈酿，15年后它将拥有极高的丰富度和复杂度。

Western reviews.review: Plum, sweet tobacco and blackberry aromas follow through to a full body, offering a tight, chewy palate, yet with polished, refined tannins. Very long and caressing. This turns to a muscular and toned young wine. Gets better and better with age. Best after 2014.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中包含了浆果、甜烟草和黑莓的味道。口感丰富，紧致有嚼劲，但口感细腻光滑。酒尾长长且柔和。随着时间的推移，这款酒会变得更加强壮和有肌肉。随着年龄的增长，这款酒会越来越好。建议在2014年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: The aromas of blue fruit, iodine, sweet tobacco and lavender follow through nicely to the palate that’s medium-bodied with fine, firm tannins and a long, cool finish. Still a little tight, but show great finesse and pedigree. Just starting to open now.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中包含了蓝色水果、碘、甜烟草和百里香的味道，口感中体积中等，具有细致的、坚实的橡皮质和长而清爽的尾部。虽然还有一点紧绷，但展现出优雅的风格和高品质。刚刚开始打开...

Western reviews.review: In tasting this wine over the course of several days, it transforms from the overt richness of puppy fat and new oak to a more supple enigma. The pure, clean fruit flavors of blueberry jam turn earthier, while the oak becomes more of a veil. This Lafite will require 20 years or more to begin to show its character, and it should reward those with the patience to wait.
Western reviews.translation: 在多天的品酒过程中，这款红酒从最初的浓郁和新橡木味逐渐转变为更加细腻的谜团。蓝莓果酱般的清新果味变得更加土质，而橡木味则变得更加模糊。这款拉菲特需要20年或以上的时间才能展现出其独特的风格，耐心等待的人将会获得丰厚的回报。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有黑醋栗，覆盆子，香草，烟草的香气，酒体浓郁饱满，单宁丰富柔顺，成熟黑色浆果水果的回味。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich and full-bodied, with aromas of black prune, blackberry, herbs, and tobacco. The palate is dense and velvety, with a smooth tannin structure and a lingering finish of mature black fruit.

Western reviews.review: One of the most powerful, massive wines of the vintage is the 1982 Gruaud Larose, a full-bodied, broad and concentrated effort redolent of ripe black fruits, loamy soil, smoked meats, leather, espresso roast and hints of cigar wrapper. Rich, layered and expansive, its deep core of ripe, fleshy fruit is framed by sweet, powdery tannins. As ever with the wines of the Cordier era, the fly in the ointment is that the wine's wild, somewhat animal profile is strongly marked by the presence of Brettanomyces, yet the 1982's intensely characterful, singular style means that I am personally able to overlook that defect.
Western reviews.translation: 1982年格鲁阿德拉罗斯（Gruaud Larose）是当年最强大的红酒之一，具有浓郁的口感，广阔的口感和浓缩的味道，带有成熟的黑果、土壤、熏肉、皮革、浓缩咖啡和雪茄纸的味道。富有层次和广阔的口感，其深厚的核心是由甜、粉末般的坚果味道包围的成熟、肉感的果肉。与科迪埃（Cordier）时期的葡萄酒一样，酒中的野性、有些动物的味道，由于布雷特诺米斯（Brettanomyces）的存在而变得更加明显，但1982年的强烈个性、独特的风格使得我个人能够忽略这一缺陷。

Chinese pairs.original: 香料和新鲜黑莓的气息，令人印象深刻的酒体，干燥的丹宁，回味持续了几分钟。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromatic notes of spice and fresh blackberry, impressive full-bodied wine, dry tannins, lingering finish that lasts for minutes.

Western reviews.review: A pure, lovely beam of cassis and steeped plum notes is now in perfect harmony with the fine-grained, lightly cedary and sandalwood-tinged structure. This has grace yet stays persistent, with the cassis accent echoing through the lengthy finish. An understated style, but all breed.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒呈现出纯粹、美丽的黑加仑和浸泡的浆果香气，完美和谐地融入细致的、轻微的松木和沉香味的结构。这款酒既有优雅的风格，又能持久，黑加仑的味道在长长的尾部持续回响。这是一款低调的风格，但却充满了品质。

Western reviews.review: The 2001 Chateau Margaux continues to evolve in impressive fashion. The nose feels sensual, veering towards red rather than black fruit, with disarming purity and perhaps showing more floral/violet character than the 1999. Both display tremendous precision and delineation. The palate is medium-bodied, edgy and tensile with crisp acidity, so fresh and vital in the mouth. Tasted next to the 1996 Château Margaux, it is clear to see that the 2001 is several steps behind, yet the way it fans out with such confidence and brio on the finish assures that this has a prosperous future. Tasted May 2016.
Western reviews.translation: 2001年夏多尼酒庄的红酒继续在令人印象深刻的方式中演进。酒鼻感官上呈现出诱人的性感，向红色果味倾斜，而不是黑色果味，具有令人惊叹的纯粹性，可能展现出比1999年更丰富的花朵/紫罗兰特征。两者都展现出惊人的精确性和分辨率。口感中等体积，锋利且紧张，具有清晰的酸度，口感新鲜和充满活力。与1996年夏多尼酒庄的红酒一起品尝，很明显2001年是几步之遥，但它在尾部展现出如此自信和活力，确保它有着光明的未来。品尝于2016年5月。

Western reviews.review: COMMENTARY: The 2001 Château Margaux is ready for the big show. TASTING NOTES: This wine has come to play. Enjoy its mature aroma and flavors of evolved fruit, dried herbs, and earth with a roast of leg of lamb accented with garlic and rosemary. (Tasted: October 25, 2019, San Francisco, CA)
Western reviews.translation:
评论：2001年夏朗格堡红酒已经准备好登场了。

品评：这瓶酒已经准备好享受了。品尝其成熟的香气和进化的果味、干燥的香草和泥土味，伴有烤羊腿的味道，带有蒜和罗勒的香气。 (品尝日期：2019年10月25日，美国加州旧金山)

Chinese pairs.original: 果汁一般的口感和强劲的酒体形成了鲜明的反差，而让这两股力量无缝连接的是细腻的单宁。那种粉底液般的绵密质感把酒体上的每一个毛孔都涂抹地光洁无瑕。虽然橡木桶的味道在现阶段还比较明显，但相信随着时间的推移，这款酒会变得更加丰富平衡。
Chinese pairs.new: The wine's juicy texture and robust tannins create a striking contrast, but it's the wine's silky smoothness that seamlessly bridges the two. The rich, velvety texture coats every pore on the palate, leaving it smooth and unblemished. While the oak flavors are still prominent at this stage, I'm confident that with time, this wine will mature into a more complex and balanced drink.

English pairs.original: The juicy taste and the powerful body are seamlessly connected under the embrace of well-defined tannins. The liquid foundation-like texture makes the body flawlessly polished. Although the oaky flavors are still noticeable after bottling, this wine will be much richer and more balanced in several years.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的滋味丰富，强劲的口感与清晰的苦味（tanins）完美融合。液体般的质感使得口感光滑细致。虽然瓶装后仍可察觉到橡木味，但经过几年陈酿，这款红酒将更加丰富、平衡。

Western reviews.review: Plenty of blackberry, currant and floral aromas. Some mint as well, following through to a full-bodied palate with layers of ultra-fine tannins and wonderful length. This is sophisticated and beautifully crafted with style and personality, displaying its terroir. Extremely well done.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中充满了黑莓、黑加仑和花朵的芬芳，伴有少量薄荷的味道。口感丰富，具有极细致的橡皮质感和长长的尾部。这瓶红酒的风格优雅，具有独特的个性，展现出其土壤特征。制作极为出色。

Western reviews.review: From one of the Barton family's estates, this wine is solid in black fruits flavors and spice from wood aging. It has a fine, perfumed character, rich in fruit but also lifted by lively acidity. The wine's ripeness will sustain it well as it ages.Barrel Sample: 94-96
Western reviews.translation: 来自巴顿家族的庄园，这款红酒以黑果味和木桶陈化的香气为主。它具有细腻、幽香的特质，果味丰富，但也被活泼的酸度所提升。随着时间的推移，这款红酒的成熟度将使其在陈化过程中保持稳定。酒桶样品：94-96分。

Western reviews.review: Silky blackberry and bilberry fruits, this is a brilliant Langoa, with concentration and lift that pull you both forwards and upwards through the palate. For me this is more successful than the 2018 because it delivers an absolute punch of fruits but gently so, with elegance and control that is very St Julien. Grilled cedar finish, great stuff.Barrel Sample: 94
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感细腻，黑莓和蓝莓果味浓郁，展现出出色的朗戈（Langoa）风格，口感丰富且清晰，带领你在口中前进和上升。相比2018年款，这款红酒更成功，因为它带来了果味的强烈冲击，但又不失优雅和控制，这正是圣朱利安（St Julien）风格的典范。酒尾有烤松木的味道，非常出色。酒评：94分。

Western reviews.review: A soft, seamless, beautifully textured Saint-Julien, especially in the vintage, the 2019 Château Langoa Barton gives up lots of red and black currant fruits as well as textbook damp earth, leafy herbs, chocolate, and spring flowers. It's complex, medium to full-bodied, has beautiful tannins, and no hard edges. Drink this beauty any time over the coming 20-25 years. The blend is 67% Cabernet Sauvignon, 26% Merlot, and the rest Cabernet Franc. Best after 2022.
Western reviews.translation: 2019年沙特奥巴顿（Château Langoa Barton）是一款柔和、无缝、美丽的圣朱利安红酒，尤其是在当年的产量中。它提供了大量的红黑葡萄果实，典型的潮湿土壤、叶绿植物、巧克力和春花的香气。它复杂、体积中等到中等以上、有美丽的纤维、无硬边。可以在未来20-25年内随意品尝这美酒。酒款的比例为67%卡波弗雷蒙（Cabernet Sauvignon）、26%梅洛（Merlot）和其他卡波弗雷蒙（Cabernet Franc）。建议在2022年后品尝。

Western reviews.review: A timely classic for patient readers with cold cellars, the 2019 Langoa Barton is performing beautifully in bottle, unwinding in the glass with a rich bouquet of cassis, plums, cigar wrapper, pencil shavings and loamy soil. Medium to full-bodied, deep and elegantly muscular, its concentrated core of fruit is framed by lively acids and ripe, powdery tannins that assert themselves on the youthfully firm finish. Forget it for a decade and reap the rewards for the following four. Best After 2029 Rating : 94+
Western reviews.translation: 2019 年的兰戈巴顿（Langoa Barton）红酒，在瓶中表现出色，瓶内的味道在玻璃中逐渐展开，展现出浓郁的黑加仑、浓郁的浆果、雪茄纸、铅笔屑和土壤的香气。中等到中等以上的体积，深度优雅的肌肉，浓缩的果肉核心被活泼的酸性和成熟的粉末状橡胶质纤维所包围，年轻的坚实的尾部表现出强烈的橡胶质纤维。忘记它十年，之后四年可以享受丰厚的回报。建议在 2029 年后饮用。评分：94+

Chinese pairs.original: 高柏丽2012是少见的没有品丽珠的年份，在这款酒中我能感受到两股相互对立的能量，一边是该年份标志性的烤青椒和芦笋清凉，而另一边是极为浓缩扎实的雄壮酒体。得益于高柏丽经典的绵密口感，两股看似针锋相对的势力，在入口的一瞬间不可思议地融为一体，营造出一种毫无违和感的平衡态势，令人印象深刻。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2012 Haut-Brion is a rare vintage without the typical charm, but in this wine, I sense two opposing forces at play. On one hand, the vintage's signature grilled bell pepper and asparagus freshness, while on the other, an incredibly concentrated and robust tannic structure. Thanks to Haut-Brion's classic velvety texture, these two seemingly opposing forces miraculously merge in an instant, creating a seamless balance that leaves a lasting impression.

English pairs.original: Haut-Bailly 2012 is a rare vintage without Cabernet France. In this wine, I can feel two completely contrasting energies; one side is the typical herbal notes of this vintage, like grilled green pepper and asparagus; the other side is intensely concentrated structure. Thanks to Haut-Bailly’s classic creamy texture, these two irreconcilable power unbelievably integrate on the palate, creating a unique harmony towards the finish. So impressive.
English pairs.new: 2012年哈特-贝利（Haut-Bailly）是一款罕见的没有卡波弗朗（Cabernet Franc）成分的红酒。在这款酒中，我感受到两种截然相反的能量；一方面是典型的草药味道，如烤青椒和芦笋；另一方面是强烈浓缩的结构。正是由于哈特-贝利的经典奶油质感，这两种相互矛盾的力量在口感上令人难以置信地融合在一起，创造了独特的和谐感，直到尾部。太令人印象深刻了。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby, purple reflections, subtle watery edge. On the nose, sweet tobacco, black fruits of the forest, a touch of orange zest and background savoury herbal notes. Medium complexity, notes of cassis, subtle fruit expression, good freshness and a mineral edge on the finish. Somewhat light-bodied, but offers an uncomplicated drinking pleasure today. (Drink +10)..
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，紫色反射，微微的水分边缘。鼻子里有甜的烟草，森林黑果，橙子皮的微妙味道和背景的咸味草本味道。中等复杂度，黑加仑，微妙的果味表达，好新鲜感和矿物边缘的完成。有些轻薄，但今天提供了一个不复杂的饮用乐趣。 (Drink +10)

Western reviews.review: Mittelkräftiges Rubin, jugendlicher Glanz, die Nase tief, nobel und feinwürzig, Brombeeren, Kaffee, auch ein Hauch Schokolade, florale Aromen, sehr gute Komplexität, am Gaumen straff beginnend, das ist einmal mehr Präzision pur, zu den dunklen Früchten gesellen sich rote Beeren und ein Hauch Schokolade, mittlerer Körper, feinste Gerbstoffe, genau richtig dosierte säure, das ist frisch und hochelegant, ist antrinkbar, gewinnt mit reife, jetzt bis 2035
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

深度的红色，年轻的光泽，酒鼻深邃，高贵且细腻，浆果味，咖啡味，甚至有一点巧克力味，花朵香气，非常复杂，口感紧致开始，精确无误，加入深色浆果和巧克力味，中等体积，细微的橡木味，酸度恰到好处，新鲜且高雅，适合饮用，随着成熟，直到2035年。

Western reviews.review: Just a super wine, 3 hours of air brought out all its plushly textured plums and blackberries. The smoky essence, with its earthy accents only added to the fun. Full bodied, with round, soft tannins, this is probably the best value for Haut Bailly in the marketplace today. Tasted twice over a 2 week period, once at the estate, and then again ordered off a restaurant menu, this blend of 60% Cabernet Sauvignon and 40% Merlot tasted and felt great!
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶超级好喝的红酒，放置3小时后，所有的浓郁的黑桃和黑莓的味道都被释放出来。烟熏的香气和泥土的味道让人感到愉快。酒体丰富，口感圆润，纤维软，这可能是目前市场上最好的巴伊利酒的价值。经过两周的品尝，第一次是在酒庄品尝，第二次是在餐厅点单，这瓶60%卡波弗雷希和40%梅洛的混合酒，品尝和感受都非常棒！

Western reviews.review: Very firm and closed up, this wine is a tough proposition at the moment. It has the weight to develop well along with richness. Acidity, sweet fruits and concentrated tannins will all come through strongly as the wine matures. Drink from 2020.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒目前非常紧实和封闭，需要耐心等待。它有足够的重量和丰富的口感，随着时间的推移，酸度、甜果味和浓缩的橡木味都将逐渐显现。建议从2020年开始饮用。

Western reviews.review: Was heraussticht, ist die besondere Qualität der Tannine, von ungemeiner Finesse und grosser Rasse, herausragende Flasche : die Klasse eines Lafitte, die Finesse eines Margaux: die Art von Wein, die man umarmen möchte.
Western reviews.translation: 最值得注意的是，这瓶红酒的特殊之处在于其天然的橡皮质感，细腻而优雅，品质出众：这瓶酒的品质堪比拉菲特(Lafitte)，细腻程度堪比马戛尼(Margaux)：是一种令人深深喜爱的酒。

Chinese pairs.original: 刚开始的时候有些还原。此酒开瓶时的表现颇为深邃，黑色水果、黑色香料、咸矿物和春花香，但25分钟后变得更为新鲜，展现许多寿司姜和干花香。口感顺滑、圆润，伴有锐利、干净的酸度和巧克力般的回味。
Chinese pairs.new: At first, it's somewhat reductive. The wine shows great depth when opened, with black fruit, black spices, salty minerals and floral notes, but after 25 minutes, it becomes fresher, revealing many notes of sushi ginger and dried floral hints. The texture is smooth and rounded, with a sharp, clean acidity and a chocolatey finish.

English pairs.original: Slightly reductive at the beginning. It began with dark sniffs of black fruits, black spices, savoury-mineral and spring flowers while the sniff became fresher after 25 minutes, with the notes of sushi ginger and dried flower. Smooth and rounded, with sharp and clean acid that concluded in a chocolaty finish.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒初期略带减少性。初步闻到黑色水果、黑色香料、咸矿物质和春季花朵的气息，25分钟后闻起来更加清新，带有生姜和干花的香气。口感平滑圆润，酸度清晰利落，结尾带有巧克力味。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby garnet, purple reflections, delicate rim brightening. Delicate toffee, roasted aromas, some caramel and liquorice, ripe plums in the background, attractive bouquet. Juicy, ripe cherries, fresh acidity, silky tannins, sweet finish, red berry touch on the finish, delicate wood savouriness on the finish, still needs some time, has charm and length. (2025-2050).
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红宝石色，带有紫色光泽，酒液边缘微微发亮。酒香中有轻微的糖浆味、烤糖味、焦糖味和 licorice味，背景中有熟透的石榴味。酒的香气很吸引人。口感丰富，果味浓郁，酸度清新，纤维素滑顺，余味甜美，余味中有红果味和木头的香气，酒仍需要一些时间来成熟，但它有很好的品质和长度。推荐储存时间：2025-2050年。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, dezente Randaufhellung feine Röstaromen, ein Hauch von Zedernholz, mineralischer Touch, feine Kirschenfrucht, sehr attraktives Bukett, feines Karamell im Hintergrund. Saftige, feine Kirschenfrucht, gut integrierte Tannine, finessenreicher Säurebogen, mineralisch und anhaltend, seidiger, typischer Stil, gutes Entwicklungspotenzial.
Western reviews.translation:
深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。酒中有细微的红色木果味，微微的松木味，矿物质味，细微的樱桃味。酒香非常吸引人，后面有细微的糖浆味。

口感丰富，细微的樱桃味，很好的天然苦味，细微的酸度，矿物质味和持久感，细微的滑感，典型的风格，发展潜力很好。

Western reviews.review: Medium to deep, ruby-red color. Lovely, lifted, perfumed aromas are augmented by toasty-oak high-notes. The palate has very fresh, vivid blackcurrant fruit that is lifted by lovely acidity. There are toasty oak flavors. Alcohol is quite restrained, ensuring the wine is nicely balanced and the finish lasts very well. The wine combines concentration with freshness and balance, it is a very smart wine! 11/14 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色，酒香清新、芬芳，带有 Toasty-oak 的高调香气。口感清新、果香浓郁，黑currant 的果味清新活泼，酸度适宜。酒中有 Toasty oak 的味道。酒精含量适中，酒的平衡很好，酒尾持久。酒的浓度与清新、平衡相结合，非常出色！评分：11/14

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark ruby with an opaque core, brightening at the rim. Closed dark berries, a little tarry, and blackberry. There's a fleshy density on the palate, and tannins with good-natured, stemmy undertones. It is restrained in acidity yet has enough juiciness behind the striking structure. A ripe, full Boyd with hefty alcohol, that is rich in ageing potential, and, this year, more on the side of density and power than elegance.
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的红酒色，深红色，几乎透明的核心，边缘略微明亮。口感中有闭合的黑berry和少量的焦糖味。口感丰富，带有肉感的厚度，且有适度的坚果味。酸度适中，口感中有足够的水果味。酒精含量高，酒龄潜力大，今年的品质更侧重于厚度和力量而非优雅。

Western reviews.review: (En Primeur) Neuholzbetonte Nase, dahinter Kräuter, Himbeerconfitüre, getrocknete Blumen, Stroh, sehr gute Komplexität. Sehr straffer Gaumen, ein Konzentrat an Frucht, massiv Gerbstoff, markante Säure, dicht, männlich, strukturiert, spannungsvoll, zeigt viel Würze, ist noch ungestüm, jugendlich, ja fast wild, im Abgang charaktervoll und von ausgezeichneter Länge. Keine einfacher Zeitpunkt aber ein sehr gelungener Boyd Cantenac. 2025-2045+. 18.5 vvPunkte (93/100)
Western reviews.translation: (En Primeur) 新木质味的鼻子，后面是香草、草莓果酱、干花、干草，非常复杂。口感非常紧致，果味浓缩，含有大量的鞣质，明显的酸度，密度高，男性化，结构良好，紧张感强，展现出丰富的香味，仍然充满激情，年轻，几乎是野性的，尾部典雅，持久度出色。不是一个简单的时刻，但是一款非常成功的波德-卡南（Boyd Cantenac）。推荐储存时间：2025-2045年。评分：18.5分（93/100）。

Chinese pairs.original: 醒酒半小时。由于是半瓶装，整瓶酒已经发展得很出色，丰腴的香气中透出海水、柑橘果酱、烤坚果（栗子、榛子）、焦糖、黄油蛋糕、罐头水果、蜂胶、水果甜芝士、太妃糖、花香、油画、淡柑橘和菠萝蜜气息。入口彰显极为通透的矿物质和干净的口感，同时酒体非常轻盈，但中段口感却很有厚度，酸度极高，伴随悠长且极其清澈的余韵，略带矿物质。不得不膜拜啊！
Chinese pairs.new:
Aroma: 30 minutes of breathing time. This half-bottle has developed beautifully, with a rich aroma that reveals notes of sea salt, citrus marmalade, toasted nuts (hazelnut and chestnut), caramel, butter cake, canned fruit, honey, fruit cheesecake, caramel, floral notes, oil painting, and subtle citrus and pineapple hints.

Palate: Upon entry, the wine showcases extremely transparent minerality and a clean texture, with a very light-bodied texture, but a full-bodied mid-palate. The acidity is extremely high, accompanied by a long and crystal-clear finish with subtle minerality. Absolutely breathtaking!

English pairs.original: Decanted for half an hour. Well-developed due to this is half bottle, very complex noses of sea water, marmalade, roasted nuts (chestnut, hazelnut), caramel, butter cake, canned fruits, propolis, sweet fruit cheese, toffee, flowers, paint, light citrus and jackfruit. Prodigiously penetrating minerality coated its clean palate with a very light body whereas still possessing weight on the mid-palate, very high acidity, finishing with long and lucid minerality. Adorable!
English pairs.new: 酒瓶倒置半小时。由于是半瓶酒，酒味非常成熟，复杂的鼻子气味有海水、橘子酱、烤坚果（栗子、花生）、焦糖、奶油蛋糕、罐头水果、蜂蜡、甜水果干、糖浆、花朵、油漆、轻微的柑橘和菠萝。酒体非常清晰，轻盈的体积，但仍然具有中口的重量，非常高的酸度，长长的清晰矿物质尾韵。非常可爱！

Western reviews.review: Dezente Nase, leicht buttrig, Blütennoten, reifer Apfel, still, tiefgründig, Creme Brulé, sehr komplex. Cremig im Gaumen, grosse Harmonie, vollmundig, rund, mit gut verpacktem Säurenerv, top verpacktes Holz, aromatisch mit viel Länge, Schmelz und nussige Rückaromen. Grosses Chardonnay Kino.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

酒体轻盈，略带奶油感，带有花香和成熟苹果的香味，口感平稳深邃，类似于奶油布朗尼，非常复杂。

口感丰富细腻，结构和谐，口感丰富圆润，酸度平衡，木质味浓郁，香气持久，带有融化感和坚果味的尾韵。是一款出色的佳酿。

Western reviews.review: Closed, with some caraway, chalky mineral notes and burnt almond (high quality wood). On the palate, an even balance of ripe, subtle acidity, silky body, suppleness and tactile-mineral polish. Spicy notes on the finish. Generous yet discreet, truly aristocratic.
Western reviews.translation: 封闭的口感，带有些许孜然、石灰质矿物质和焦糖杏仁（高质量木质）的味道。口感平衡，带有成熟的、细微的酸度，滑顺的体感，柔软的质感和细腻的矿物质光泽。尾部带有些许辣味。富有品质却又谦逊，真正的贵族风范。

Western reviews.review: The quintessence of Corton-Charlemagne. The wrapping aromas are of aromatic herbs, spice and ripe fruit which to the palate is pulpy and salty with iodine nuances. The finish is complex, taut and with an impressive persistence.
Western reviews.translation: 科尔顿-夏勒曼的精髓。酒中的香气是芳香植物、香料和成熟水果的混合，口感是浓郁的、咸的，带有海盐般的矿物质味。酒尾复杂、紧致，持久感极强。

Western reviews.review: Still very reductive, vivid oak character. On the nose marigold and fresh corn. Quite juicy acidity, austere, defensive fruit accompaniment, just becoming more supple, juice and spiciness are good, length too, the complexity remains rather middleweight, with salty notes.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒仍然非常有氧化性，洋香料的味道非常浓郁。酒鼻中有金盏花和新鲜玉米的香气。口感酸度较高，果味干净清晰，但略带干涩。随着时间的推移，口感变得更加柔和，果味和香料的结合更加和谐。酒尾长度较长，复杂度中等偏轻，带有咸味的尾韵。

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Gelb, schöner Glanz. Was für eine Nase, umwerfend dieser Duft, einerseits tief, mineralisch mit Feurstein, dann aber auch unglaublich floral mit Anflügen von Kräutern, weissen Blüten und einer feinen Würzigkeit, das ist wunderbar komplex, mal einladend zugänglich, dann wieder verhalten, Ein Schnüffelwein. Am Gaumen straff im Auftakt, dann breitet sich der Wein aus, wunderbar weich und vollmundig, Zitrusfrüchte, feine Holzaromen, dazu exotische Früchte, weisser Pfirsich, grossartige Struktur, dicht und doch elegant, wunderbarer Wein, langanhaltend, fast nicht enden wollend. 2017-2032, 19 vvPunkte, (95/100) (AvV)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

深黄色，光泽美丽。闻起来真的是惊人，既深沉又矿物质，带有火石味，接着又是花香，带有草香、白花香和细微的辛香料味，非常复杂，有时入口宽松，有时又很谨慎，是一个让人迷醉的酒。口感紧绷的开始，接着酒液扩散，非常柔软和丰富，带有柑橘味、细微的木头味和异国情调的果味，白梨味，结构完美，密集又优雅，非常出色的酒，持久耐久，几乎没有尽头。推荐饮用时间：2017-2032，19分（95/100）(AvV)

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Montrose的葡萄园由于地理位置靠近河边，因而不受霜冻的困扰，现在葡萄园逐渐开始实行有机种植；拥有气象站的整个葡萄园仅一块地，葡萄藤平均树龄38年。葡萄全部为人工采收；淋皮；在一些年份会使用压榨机；在60%新的法国桶内陈年18个月。紫红色。此酒的香气怡人、甜美，透出香草、薄荷糖、红醋栗、咸矿物和干花的芬芳。口感优雅，富有矿物质并一直延续到其通透、新鲜而且悠长的收尾中。
Chinese pairs.new:
Chateau Montrose的葡萄园因其靠近河边的位置，避免了霜冻的影响，目前正在逐步转向有机种植。葡萄园拥有一个气象站，仅有一块地，葡萄藤平均年龄38年。所有葡萄都是手工采收，淋皮，部分年份使用压榨机，陈年18个月在60%新的法国桶中。酒色为深红色。

酒香怡人，甜美，带有香草、薄荷糖、红醋栗、咸矿物和干花的芬芳。口感优雅，富有矿物质，持续到其清晰、新鲜和悠长的尾部。

English pairs.original: The frost-free vineyard of Chateau Montrose is located near the river, now is moving towards organic farming; there is a weather station in the vineyard that is made up of only one block, where the vines are 38 years old on average. All grapes are hand-picked; fermenting in temperature-controlled stainless steel tanks; pumping over; in some vintages, the pressing machines are used (for grand vin); aging 18 months in 60% new French oak barrels. Purple-red color. Lovely and sweet on nose that showed a poised mixture of vanilla, mint candy, red currant, savoury-mineral and dried flower. Elegantly textured, with loads of minerality that continued onto a bright, fresh and lingering finale.
English pairs.new: 蒙罗斯庄园（Chateau Montrose）的无霜葡萄园位于河边，目前正朝着有机农业发展；葡萄园内设有一个单独的天气站，平均年龄为38年的葡萄藤；所有葡萄均手工采摘；发酵在温度控制的不锈钢罐中；使用推送法；在某些年份中，使用压榨机（用于大酒款）；陈酿18个月在60%的新法兰克尔橡木桶中。紫红色。鼻子上有一个甜美的、平衡的混合，包括香草、薄荷糖、红葡萄、咸矿物质和干花。质地优雅，矿物质丰富，持续到一个亮丽、清新、持久的结尾。

Western reviews.review: Another contender for wine of the vintage. Here things get a little deep and fleshy, with crushed damson fruit that holds its integrity. Tannins are big and bold, oak influence clear but not offputting, just giving boots to slip your feet into. Your mouth responds to these tannins, reminds you that wine tasting us a physical activity. Great quality, what a brilliant wine.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒堪称当年最佳。酒体变得更加丰富和浓郁，果香中有压碎的浆果味，保持着其完整性。酒中的纤维素质大而强烈，橡木味清晰但不令人反感，反而让人感到舒适。口感丰富，酒中的纤维素质让人意识到品酒是一种身体活动。品质出色，这是一款出色的红酒。

Western reviews.review: This is a very fine wine showing a new level of quality at Montrose. With its almost velvet tannins inside the intense black fruits, the wine is rich, smooth and generous. Blackberry and black-plum fruits are to the fore along with the fine acidity and great structure. A wine to age for decades, it will be ready to drink from 2027. Cellar Selection
Western reviews.translation: 这是一款非常出色的红酒，展现了蒙特罗斯（Montrose）新的一面。酒中几乎是绵软的橡皮质，融入了浓郁的黑色果实，呈现出丰富、光滑和慷慨的口感。黑莓和黑杏果实占据了主导地位，伴随着精细的酸度和出色的结构。这种酒适合长期陈酿，预计2027年将达到最佳饮用状态。 cellar Selection。

Western reviews.review: Incredible aromas of currants, blackberries, slate and flowers. Full-bodied yet so tight and beautiful with superb polish and brightness. The length is fantastic. Truly superb. Drink in 2021.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气令人惊叹，带有黑葡萄、黑莓、花岗岩和花朵的味道。酒体丰富却又紧致美丽，表面光滑细致，闪闪发亮。酒尾长长的，非常出色。建议2021年饮用。

Western reviews.review: Tasted at the château, the 2014 Montrose builds on the promise it showed in barrel with gorgeous blackberry, raspberry, cedar and orange sorbet scents that are extremely pure and refined. The palate is medium-bodied with supple tannin, very precise acidity and layers of crisp black fruit laced with vanilla from the new oak at the moment. That will be subsumed in time. What you have here is a very precise, multi-layered, almost sensual Montrose that is going to delight many for years to come. This is highly recommended—one of the finest Left Bank wines this vintage. Tasted September 2016.
Western reviews.translation: 在酒庄品尝，2014年蒙特罗斯（Montrose）酒的品质已经在酒桶中展现出来，具有极其纯粹和精致的黑莓、草莓、松木和橙子冰淇淋的香气。酒体中有柔软的纹理，酸度非常精确，黑果的层次丰富，新橡木的香气在此时显现，但随着时间的推移会被掩盖。这里呈现的是一个非常精确、层次丰富、几乎是感官的蒙特罗斯酒，会让很多人在多年后都感到愉悦。这是一款极度推荐的左岸酒之一，2014年产量中的一精品。品尝时间：2016年9月。

Western reviews.review: This is seriously built, with an admirable core of red and black currant paste and bitter plum fruit inlaid with notes of tobacco, bay and smoldering charcoal. The finish is ramrod straight thanks to an iron girder supporting everything with ease. A tremendous effort for the vintage. Best from 2020 through 2035.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一款非常扎实的红酒，具有可爱的红黑葡萄酱和苦李子果实的核心，配有烟草、樟树和熄灭的木炭的香气。酒尾笔直坚实，钢筋支撑着所有的元素，轻松自如。该酒款的品质非常出色，适合2020年至2035年饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 一闻就知道这是坐拥顶级风土的Pomerol佳酿，砾石黏土的气质气质果然不凡。口感沉稳紧致、雄浑有力；香气成熟悠长、如诗如画。紫罗兰、黑樱桃、丁香和草果的复杂香气随着摇杯的节奏层层涌现。干酪融化般的单宁在舌尖萦绕，让一款拥有金属质感的Pomerol化作绵柔的膏脂。只要陈年之后不过早氧化，定会是Pomerol 的一股新锐力量。
Chinese pairs.new: This Pomerol is unmistakably a wine from the top terroir, with a gravelly clay character that's truly exceptional. The palate is rich and taut, with a powerful, full-bodied texture; the aromas are mature and long, like a poem. Complex scents of lavender, black cherry, cinnamon, and green fruit unfold in harmony with the rhythm of the glass. Velvety tannins melt like cheese on the palate, transforming a Pomerol with a metallic edge into a soft, creamy balm. With proper aging and minimal oxidation, this will be a new force in Pomerol.

English pairs.original: Upon the first whiff, one knows this is a Pomerol masterpiece, blessed with exceptional terroir, and the character of gravelly clay soil truly stands out. The palate is robust and powerful, while the aroma is lingering, as poetic as it is picturesque. The complex bouquet of violet, black cherry, clove, and Tsaoko emerge in layers with each swirl of the glass. The cheese-melting tannins dance around the tongue, transforming the metallic Pomerol into a velvety cream. If aged properly without premature oxidation, this wine is sure to become a cutting-edge force in Pomerol.
English pairs.new: 一口气进去，立刻就能感受到这是一瓶波尔多的杰作，拥有极好的土壤特性，石灰质土壤的特点尤其突出。口感强烈而有力，香气悠长，诗意而绘声绘影。酒中的紫罗兰、黑杏、丁香和茶果柑香层层展开，随着酒杯的旋转，各种香气不断变化。酒中的纤维柔软如乳酪般，给人带来极大的享受。如果正确储存，避免过早氧化，这瓶酒一定会成为波尔多地区的新典范。

Western reviews.review: The wine opens with chocolate, black raspberries, licorice, flowers, espresso, and a touch of smoke on the nose. On the palate, the wine is silky, opulent, and fresh. There is lift to the layers of sweet, ripe, deep red fruits, dark chocolate, and a lingering spicy note on the backend of the silky finish. The wine is a blend of 95% and 5% Cabernet Franc. 14.5% ABV, 3.52 pH. Yields were 38 hectoliters per hectare. Drink from 2026-2047. 96-98 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的开头气味中带有巧克力、黑莓、甘草、花朵、咖啡和一丝烟的味道。口感上，酒体滑顺、丰富、清新。酒中有层次感，甜美的熟透的红果、黑巧克力和后端的持久的辣味。酒是由95%和5%的卡波弗朗克混合而成。酒精度14.5%，pH值3.52。产量为每公顷38公升。建议2026-2047年饮用。评分96-98分。

Western reviews.review: Tiefgründige und dunkelfruchtige Nase, mineralisch geprägt, viel Kirsche, Pflaume, Gräser. Im Gaumen mit kalkigem Gerbstoff, straff, gradlinig, ungemein druckvoll und dabei hochelegant. Sehr langes, aromatisch komplexes Finale. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 auf Château Bellefont-Belcier) #primeurs22 #vignoblesk
Western reviews.translation: 深度丰富的酒香，带有深色果实的矿物质味道，充满了浓郁的樱桃和黑杏味，草本味也很明显。口感上带有石灰质的苦味，紧致、平衡、压倒性强大，极其优雅。酒尾长达极限，复杂的香气持续存在。

Chinese pairs.original: 新鲜的红浆果，甘草，黑莓，新皮革的气息，强烈而浓郁，有大量的单宁，强大的结构，丰富的酒体，陈年能力在30年以上。
Chinese pairs.new: Fresh red berry, honey, blackberry, and new leather aromas, intense and concentrated, with a massive amount of tannins, a powerful structure, a rich full-bodied texture, and aging potential of over 30 years.

Western reviews.review: Rich and concentrated, touched easily by toasty wood. The tannins are so sweet, blending easily into the powerful texture of black berry fruits with, hints of licorice. This is a ripe wine, its acidity always present.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒浓郁而丰富，轻易地受到橡木的烘托。其苦味（tanins）甜美，融入黑莓果的强烈质感中，伴有 licorice 的微妙气息。这是一款成熟的红酒，其酸度始终存在。

Western reviews.review: A stunning success for the vintage, and possibly the Margaux of the year, this wine, which achieved 13.5% natural alcohol, is a blend of 51% Merlot, 41% Cabernet Sauvignon and 8% Petit Verdot. Loads of barbecue smoke, licorice, incense, blackberry, new saddle leather and forest floor notes jump from the glass of this dense, purple-colored wine. Extraordinarily intense and full-bodied, with plenty of tannin, but not the formidable structure of the 2010, this is going to be one of the longest-lived wines of 2008. It is full, rich, layered, and should be reasonably approachable with 3-4 years of bottle age, and will also keep for 30+ years.
Western reviews.translation: 2008年马尔加斯（Margaux）的一款惊人的佳酿，可能是这一年最好的马尔加斯酒。酒精含量为13.5%，酒款以51%梅洛（Merlot）、41%卡波弗雷（Cabernet Sauvignon）和8%佩蒂·韦尔多（Petit Verdot）为主。酒中充满了烧烤烟、 licorice、香烟、黑莓、新马鞍皮革和森林地板的香气。酒体浓密，紫色，极度浓郁，口感丰富，含有大量的纤维，但结构不如2010年那么强大。这一款酒将是2008年最持久的酒之一。酒体丰富，层次分明，3-4年陈酿后应该会比较容易入口，酒龄30年以上。

Western reviews.review: Palmer knows what to do. Plenty of blackberry and licorice aromas and flavors follow through to full body, with chewy tannins and a vanilla, cedar and chocolate aftertaste. Needs time to mellow. Layered and beautiful. Best after 2012.
Western reviews.translation: 帕尔默酒庄知道怎么做。酒中充满了黑莓和甘草的香气和口感，延续到酒体丰富，口感坚实，带有坚果和巧克力的后味。需要时间来让酒变得更加平衡。酒的层次丰富，美丽。建议在2012年后喝。

Western reviews.review: Offers dark plum, mulled currant and blackberry notes, with flashes of roasted apple wood and maduro tobacco, plus cocoa and espresso. There's nicely rounded flesh and a long, integrated finish that has some extra grip. Clearly apart from the Margaux pack in 2008.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒呈现出深紫色浓郁的果香，包括熟透的黑杏、浓郁的黑莓和浓缩的黑currant，伴随着烤苹果木和马杜罗烟草的香气，以及巧克力和浓缩咖啡的味道。酒体丰富圆润，口感长而平滑，尾部有着些许的坚韧感。与2008年马格努斯（Margaux）系列相比，这瓶红酒有着明显的不同。

Chinese pairs.original: 精致的酸枣糕芳香、清新的柠檬草气息、淡淡的香料辛香让本就柔和的葡萄酒变得更加讨巧。入口柔美而细腻，带着一股绵柔的质感和爽朗的酸度。收尾时紧致的单宁很有力道，没想到看似小家碧玉的葡萄酒居然能够散发出这么大的能量。
Chinese pairs.new: Delicate apricot cake aromas, fresh lemon verbena scents, and subtle spice nuances elevate this already soft wine to a charming level. The entry is silky and refined, with a smooth texture and a crisp acidity. The finish is tight and powerful, with a surprising amount of energy from this unassuming wine.

English pairs.original: The aromas of delicate jujube candy, pure lemongrass, and the distinct spicy notes make this comforting wine more adorable. The opening is elegant and soft, with a fine-grained texture and fresh acidity. The tense tannins are quite powerful on the finish, and I didn’t expect this seemingly elegant and delicate wine to be able to burst out so much energy.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的香气中充满了细腻的枣糖味、纯净的柠檬草香和明显的辣味，使得这款温暖的红酒更加可爱。酒体的开口优雅而柔和，具有细致的质感和新鲜的酸度。酒尾的紧张性质的苦味非常强烈，令我感到惊讶的是，这款看似优雅而细腻的红酒竟然能够爆发出如此强大的能量。

Western reviews.review: Medium-bodied, soft, supple and polished, the wine opens with a mix of ripe, red fruits, flowers, espresso, licorice and a hint of cocoa. Round, ripe, polished and fresh, the finish loads you up with its layers of sweet, fresh, polished, lively, elegant, sensuously-textured fruits. This will age quite nicely. Drink from 2027-2050. 94 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感中等，柔和、细腻、光滑。酒体中充满了成熟的红果、花朵、咖啡、甘草和巧克力微妙的香气。酒尾圆润、成熟、光滑、清新，层次丰富的甜、清新、光滑、活泼、优雅、细腻的果味让人沉醉。酒品有很好的储存潜力。建议在2027-2050年间品尝。评分94分。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, opaker Kern, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung. Noten von Lakritze und Cassis, zart nach Zimt und Vanille, facettenreiches Bukett, angenehmer Edelholztouch. Kraftvoll, dunkle Beeren, etwas Nougat, integrierte Tannine, schokoladig auch im Abgang, reife Pflaumen, mineralisch, komplex im Abgang, wirkt noch etwas unterentwickelt und wird von weiterer Flaschenreife profitieren.
Western reviews.translation:
深红色葡萄酒色，透明的中心，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。

酒香中有Licorice和黑加仑的味道，微微带有丁香和香草的味道，酒香丰富多彩，带有高档木头的味道。

酒口强劲，黑色浆果味道浓郁，有些奶油味道，整体的苦味度很好，口感中也有一些巧克力味道，酒尾有熟透的石榴味道，矿物质味道，酒尾复杂，感觉还有一些未发育的部分，需要进一步的陈化来发挥最佳效果。

Western reviews.review: (62% Cabernet Sauvignon, 35% Merlot, 3% Petit Verdot): Feinduftige Nase, floral, würzig, mit dunklen und roten Beeren. Im Gaumen anfangs weich, packt dann zu, zeigt feinkörniges Tannin und wirkt tänzerisch leicht. Sehr balanciert und mit guter Länge. 2026-2040.
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的成分是：62% 卡波雷尔酒（Cabernet Sauvignon），35% 美乐酒（Merlot），3% 小皮诺酒（Petit Verdot）。

酒香浓郁，花香、香料味，带有黑色和红色浆果的味道。

口感最初柔和，但随后变得强烈，具有细腻的橡皮质感，感觉轻盈灵活。整体上非常平衡，酒尾长且圆润。推荐饮用时间：2026-2040年。

Western reviews.review: Wir haben klares Faible für Margaux, die auch in diesem Jahr der stürmischen Fülle mit Liebreiz aufwarten. Prieuré gehört dazu: superber Fruchtgehalt, Tannin von exquisitem, seidigem Schliff, Frische, Eleganz und ideale Länge, superb.
Western reviews.translation: 我们对马格努（Margaux）有着深深的偏爱，今年它也表现出惊人的魅力。普里厄（Prieuré）是其中之一：超级丰富的果味，精致的坚果味，细腻的口感，新鲜的味道，优雅的风格和完美的长度，简直是超级。

Western reviews.review: Pure and floral with stony notes, violet, inky dark fruit, cassis and fine tobacco. The palate´s got a dense structure, with fine polish and grain, cassis and black cherry notes, mild oak finely integrated, balanced, elegant and very good length.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感纯粹、花香，带有石质的味道，紫罗兰、墨黑的果味、黑加仑和细致的烟草。口感丰富，结构紧密，细腻光滑，带有黑加仑和黑杏子的味道，轻微的橡木味道融合得很好，平衡、优雅，口感持久。

Chinese pairs.original: 波美侯最大的酒厂。葡萄藤的平均树龄35年。酒液在水泥缸中发酵；在新桶比例少于20%的小号法国桶内陈年12个月。橡木桶样酒。此酒充满甜花和细腻岩石味的香气引领其富有高酸度的滑爽、精美口感，伴有清晰的果味、出色的活力、优雅的矿物质和微微的圆润感。
Chinese pairs.new: The flagship winery of Pomerol. The average age of the vines is 35 years. Fermentation takes place in concrete tanks, followed by aging in small, new oak barrels (less than 20% of which are French) for 12 months. This wine is led by a bouquet of sweet floral and fine stony notes, which precedes a rich, high-acid, silky texture, accompanied by clear fruit flavors, excellent vitality, elegant minerality, and a hint of roundness.

English pairs.original: The largest winery in Pomerol. 35 years old vines on average. Fermenting in the concrete vats; aging 12 months in less than 20% new French barriques. Barrel sample. Sweetly floral and delicately stony aromas introduced the polished, exquisite and acidic flavours that had precise fruit and outstanding vitality as well as fine minerality and subtle roundness.
English pairs.new: 波尔多地区最大的酒庄。平均35年的葡萄园。使用混凝土罐进行发酵，12个月在少于20%的新法式白桉木桶中陈化。酒桶样品。甜蜜的花香和细致的石质气味引入了精致、优雅和酸性的口感，具有精确的果味、出色的活力、细致的矿物质和微妙的圆润感。

Western reviews.review: (73% Merlot, 15% Cabernet Sauvignon, 12% Cabernet Franc) Kräftiges Rubinrot. Die Nase direkt nach dem Öffnen ein Hit, wunderbar duftig, mit Pflaumen, schwarzen Kirschen, dem obligaten Hauch Sahne, dazu eingemachte Erdbeeren und etwas Pfeffer, sehr komplex. Genauso schön geht’s am Gaumen weiter, bereits gut zugänglich, weich im Auftakt, mit feinkörnigen Tanninen ausgestattet, welche die reife Frucht stützen und dem Wein zusammen mit einer milden, gut integrierten Säure die nötige Struktur verleihen, baut am mittleren Gaumen Druck auf und hallt im Abgang lange nach, hinterlässt im Finale viel Frische und einen Mix aus roten und dunklen Beeren. Dieser Pomerol, aus einem wohlbemerkt warmen Jahr, ist einmal mehr ein guter Beweis für zwei Dinge: A, dass der Jahrgang 2018 viele frische Weine hervorgebracht hat und B, dass es Pomerol-Weine gibt, die nicht die Welt kosten. In diesem Fall CHF 32.30 inkl. MwSt. Jetzt bis 2035+. 92 vvPunkte.
Western reviews.translation:
(73% Merlot, 15% Cabernet Sauvignon, 12% Cabernet Franc)

深红色。酒瓶打开后，酒香立即爆发，非常香甜，带有浓郁的果香，包括浆果、黑杏、奶油、浓缩的草莓和少量胡椒，非常复杂。

口感同样出色，入口即感受到的柔软，细腻的纤维支持成熟的果肉，酒液与轻微的酸度相结合，提供了必要的结构，中口处有压力，余味持久，留下了大量的新鲜感和红、黑浆果的混合。这个来自一个温暖年份的波美罗酒，再次证明了两个事实：A，2018年产出的酒液中有很多新鲜的酒；B，波美罗酒并不需要花费天价。这个酒的价格为CHF 32.30（含税），值得购买，推荐储存至2035年。评分92分。

chateau de beaucastel blanc roussanne vi.name: chateau de beaucastel blanc roussanne vieilles vignes 2018

Chinese pairs.original: 这款百分百瑚珊酿自种植于1909年的百年老藤葡萄树（种植时间与Hommage a Jacques Perrin相同）。30%的酒液为木桶发酵（剩余酒液则在不锈钢桶内完成发酵）。此酒异常通透、干净的香气带有些许华丽的木桶香料、甜玉米和烟熏矿物味。香气和口感中的奶油质感都恰到好处。绵密但清新的咸香回味基本感觉不到苦味。
Chinese pairs.new: This 100% Grenache is crafted from century-old vines planted in 1909 (same planting date as Hommage a Jacques Perrin). 30% of the wine undergoes oak fermentation, while the rest ferments in stainless steel tanks. The wine boasts an exceptionally transparent and clean nose with subtle oak notes, sweet corn and smoky mineral flavors. The creamy texture in both the nose and palate is perfectly balanced. The dense yet refreshing saltiness lingers with little bitterness.

English pairs.original: It's made from 100% Roussanne planted in 1909 (almost at the same time as planting the plot of Hommage a Jacques Perrin). 30% of the wine is barrel fermented (the rest is fermented in the stainless steel tanks). Exceedingly bright and clean on the nose though it revealed a tint of lush sense such as oak spices, sweet maize and smoky-mineral. The creaminess was decent on both sniff and palate. Dense yet refreshing on the saline finish that hardly had bitterness.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒是由100%罗桑葡萄种植于1909年（几乎与种植的Homage a Jacques Perrin葡萄园同时期）。酒中30%采用桶发酵（其余部分在不锈钢罐中发酵）。酒的鼻子清澈明亮，虽然也展现出一些丰富的气息，如橡木香料、甜玉米和烟熏矿物质。酒的奶油感在嗅和口感上都很不错。酒的盐度很高，口感清新，几乎没有苦味。

Western reviews.review: White peach, honeysuckle, pear, spice and crushed stones. The wine is full-bodied, lush, sweet and fresh with a parade of white fruits and peach in the finish. The wine is always made from a 3 hectare of 100% old vine Roussanne planted in 1909.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感丰富、浓郁、甜美且新鲜，酒尾充满白果和桃子的味道。酒用来自1909年种植的100%老藤罗塞纳(Roussanne)葡萄，总面积仅3公顷。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Clos de Sarpe 2021装瓶之后的表现继续惊艳着我的味蕾，它的“玲珑美”和“纯净感”让我想起了“射雕英雄传”里的机灵鬼黄蓉。果香实在太诱人，草莓、枣糕以及话梅糖的酸爽气息响彻了整个酒杯，紫色的花瓣敲击着剔透的清泉。能够在困难的年份有如此尚佳的表现，我必须对其脱帽致敬。崇尚“纯净自然风”的葡萄酒爱好者一定不要错过这个”稀罕物“。
Chinese pairs.new:
Chateau Clos de Sarpe 2021

This wine continues to impress me with its elegance and purity, reminiscent of the cunning and agile heroine, Huang Rong, from the classic novel "The Legend of the Condor Hero". The fruit aromas are incredibly alluring, with notes of strawberry, date cake, and tart plum sweetness that fill the entire glass. The delicate purple flowers dance on the crystal-clear palate.

In a challenging vintage, this wine's outstanding performance is truly deserving of praise. Fans of wines that embody the "natural and pure" philosophy should not miss this rare gem.

English pairs.original: After bottling, Chateau Clos de Sarpe 2021 continues to astound my palate. Its exquisite beauty and “sense of purity” remind me of the clever and vivacious Huang Rong from “The Legend of the Condor Heroes”. The fruit aromas are simply irresistible, filling the glass with notes of strawberries, date cake, and sour plum candy. Every sip is like a burst of purple petals knocking crystal-clear spring water. I tip my hat to this wine for its exceptional showing in a difficult vintage. Wine enthusiasts who cherish a “pure and natural style” should not miss out on this rare gem.
English pairs.new: 在瓶装之后，2021年沙普庄园红酒仍然让我惊叹不已。它的精致美丽和“纯粹感”让我想起了《神雕侠侣》中的聪明美丽的黄蓉。酒中的水果香气简直无法抗拒，满满的红色葡萄酒中充满了草莓、蛋糕和酸梅糖的味道。每一口酒都像是一束紫色花瓣在清澈的泉水中跳跃。面对困难的产季，我对这瓶酒的表现表示敬佩。热爱“纯粹自然风格”的葡萄酒爱好者绝不能错过这罕见的珍品。

Western reviews.review: Deep garnet, purple rim. Plum fruit, dark cherries, a touch of nougat and figs, candied orange zest. Juicy, elegant, fine acidity, red cherries, silky tannins, well-structured, good length; elegant food companion.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，紫色边缘。浓郁的浆果味，黑杏子， nougat 和干枣的微妙风味，糖浆橙皮。 juicy、优雅、细致的酸度，红杏子，细滑的纤维，结构良好，长而持久；优雅的食物伴侣。

Western reviews.review: Flowers, dark cherries, black plums, espresso, chocolate and flowers come through with a strong touch of minerality in the nose and on the salty, rock and stone infused, fresh, bright, juicy, crisp palate. The cut stone elements here make this one of the more individualistic wines of the vintage. The harvest took place October 7 - October 17. Drink from 2026-2050. 92-94
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中充满了鲜花、黑樱桃、黑杏、咖啡、巧克力和花朵的味道，伴随着矿物质的强烈触感。口感清新、生动、果甜、脆口，带有岩石和石头的咸味。这种独特的风格使得这瓶酒成为当年产区中较为个性的品种之一。酒庄采摘时间为10月7日至10月17日。建议在2026年至2050年间饮用。评分：92-94分。

Western reviews.review: Dichtes Rubinrot. Intensive Nase, reife Brombeeren, dezent Zartbitterschokolade, auch geräucherten Tee. Die Frucht am Gaumen ist dunkel in der Aromatik, die Tannine sind reif, eine markante Säure verleiht Zug, etwas straff im Charakter aber nicht ohne Charme. Gute Länge, rotfruchtige Rückaromen. 2026-2036 (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2022. AGCCSE/Château Dassault)
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒。强烈的鼻子，成熟的黑莓，微妙的白巧克力，烟熏茶的味道。口感中的果味深沉，芳香浓郁，苦味成熟，酸度明显，给人一种紧绷的感觉，但不失魅力。口感持久，回味中有浓郁的红果味。推荐储存时间：2026-2036年（2022年4月在原酒庄品尝）。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Valandraud 2022凭借其宏大的结构、丰富的单宁、以及多维度的辛香料让年份的因素在其身上“失效”。面对高浓度的2022年份，我以为Chateau Valandraud 会用“热烈”迎接我；然而，它却在入口之后展现出意想不到的酸感。酒体紧实而绵柔，宛如一块黑色的Mozzarella在口中融化。当然，如果陈年之后能展现出更多莓果的芬芳，将会更上一层楼。
Chinese pairs.new:
Chateau Valandraud 2022

This wine's grand structure, rich tannins, and multi-dimensional spice profile render the vintage factor "ineffective". I expected a bold welcome from the high-concentration 2022 vintage, but instead, it surprises with a refreshing acidity after the entry. The wine's texture is firm yet velvety, melting like a black Mozzarella in the mouth. With more fruit aromas emerging after aging, it could reach new heights.

English pairs.original: Chateau Valandraud 2022, with its grand structure, rich tannins, and multidimensional spiciness, defies the typical characteristics of the vintage. Given the high concentration of the 2022 vintage, I anticipated a “passionate” reception from Chateau Valandraud, yet it surprised me with an unexpected acidity upon entry. The wine’s body is firm yet soft, like a black Mozzarella melting in the mouth. However, if it could reveal more of its berry fruit aroma after aging, it would certainly ascend to a higher level.
English pairs.new: 瓦兰杜酒庄2022年红酒，具有宏伟的结构、丰富的苦味和多维度的香料味，违反了典型的产区特征。考虑到2022年产区的高浓度，我预计瓦兰杜酒庄会表现出“激情”的接触方式，但它却让我惊讶了，酒庄在入口时展现出意想不到的酸度。酒庄的体积坚实而柔软，像黑色莫扎雷拉在口中融化一样。但如果它能在陈化后更多地展现出其浆果香气，它一定会达到更高的水平。

Western reviews.review: Inky dark in color, the wine explodes from the glass with its bouquet of wild flowers, violets, camphor, cinnamon, saffron, licorice and plum liqueur. The nose rocks, but the palate takes it to a new level. Opulent fruits drenched in velvet with intensity, purity, and electric vibrancy. The fruit caresses, and coats your palate with almost surreal levels of fruit, that magically remain light on its feet. The seamless finish lingers, builds, and expands for almost 60 seconds. It was 9am when I tasted this, and after making sure nobody was looking, I drained my glass with pleasure. This is a new level of quality for Valandraud, and that is saying something. Blending 88% Merlot, 6% Cabernet Franc and 6% Cabernet Sauvignon, 15.5% ABV, 3.55 pH. Harvesting took place September 15 - October 5. Drink from 2027-2055. 97-99 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色深如墨汁，酒精从玻璃杯中爆发出来，带来一阵野花、紫罗兰、樟脑、肉桂、硫黄、甘草和浆果酒的芳香。虽然鼻子很强烈，但口感却更为出色。酒中的丰富果味像披着丝绒一样，带有强烈的纯粹感和电力般的活力。果味轻轻地抚摸着你的口腔，几乎是超现实的程度，仍然保持着轻盈的感觉。酒尾的完美流动，逐渐积累并扩展了近60秒。酒评人在9点钟尝完这瓶酒后，确认没有人在看，才满意地喝完了酒。这瓶酒是瓦兰德（Valandraud）品质的新高度，值得一提的是，这瓶酒的成分是88%梅洛（Merlot）、6%卡波弗朗（Cabernet Franc）和6%卡波弗朗（Cabernet Sauvignon），酒精度15.5%、pH3.55。酒庄在9月15日至10月5日采摘。建议在2027-2055年间饮用。评分97-99分。

Western reviews.review: Sehr intensiver Duft, super nobel, tiefgründig mit Kirschen, Blaubeeren und etwas blondem Tabak. Im Gaumen seidenweich, rund und fruchtbetont, sehr feines Tannin, top Frucht, der Wein zeigt Fülle und gleichzeitig Eleganz, die Balance der Elemente ist hervorragend. Ausgezeichnete Länge und mit grossen Reserven. 2030-2060 (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / UGCB / Château Valandraud) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

非常浓郁的香气，极其高贵，深度丰富，带有浓郁的樱桃和蓝莓味，略带淡黄烟草味。口感细腻柔滑，圆润充实，果味浓郁，非常细腻的橡果感，品质极佳，酒中展现出丰富的味道和优雅的风格，各元素的平衡极好。酒尾长达数秒，酒中蕴含着巨大的潜力。预计酒龄：2030-2060（2023年4月在UGCB/Château Valandraud品鉴“En Primeur”）#primeurs22

Western reviews.review: Fruit was picked at optimum time, judging from its crunchy and highly refreshing fruit p rofile. Very expressive, firm and full mid palate, with great structure. Long finish with mouthwatering salinity. At the moment the new oak spiciness is present, with a touch of vanila and the evident cedary and spicy side of oak aromas. A marvelous wine!
Western reviews.translation: 酒庄采摘的时机非常恰当，酒的果味清新、果实脆嫩，非常令人愉悦。酒的中口结构坚实，口感丰富，非常有层次感。酒尾长长的，带有令人垂涎的咸味。目前新橡木的辣味和香味已经显现，带有轻微的香草味和橡木的典型香气。酒的味道非常出色！

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby in colour with an opaque core, purple reflections, and subtle brightening on the rim. On the nose, an inviting bouquet of nuanced fine oak, dark wild berries, fresh cherry, hints of nougat and orange zest. The juicy palate is elegant, finely structured, silky, and balanced, with delicate fine cherry and plum fruit, showing both great length and delicacy. Very compelling with certain ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红宝石色，透明的核心，紫色反射，酒杯边缘有细微的光亮。酒鼻子上有一个诱人的花香，细腻的精致橡木，黑野莓，新鲜樱桃， nougat 和橙子皮的微妙暗示。酒口上，酒味丰富，细致结构，滑顺，平衡，细致的黑樱桃和黑杏果，展现出长长的细致和优雅。酒有很强的陈化潜力。

Western reviews.review: Vibrant, deep, dark purple-black color, holds to a vivid purple rim. The aromas are opulent with powerful, open, ripe, high-toned black-cherry fruit overlaid by vivid vanilla & cedary oak. The rich, ripe palate is hedonistic. The structure is very smooth, with vanilla & exotic spices which are emphasized by warming alcohol. Wonderfully fine tannins combine with concentrated, ripe black-cherry fruit & sweet spices on a long, mouth-watering finish. 04/232 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的颜色是深紫黑色，边缘仍然保持着鲜亮的紫色。酒中的香气丰富，具有强烈的黑樱桃果味，伴有明显的香草和松木香气。口感丰富，极具享受感。酒的结构非常光滑，酒中有香草和异国风味，酒精的暖意使这些味道更加明显。酒中的纤维非常细腻，结合了浓郁的黑樱桃果味和甜香料，酒尾长长，令人垂涎欲滴。评分：04/232 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 很有张力的一款葡萄酒，和期酒品鉴时被橡木桶香气笼罩的情况不同，装瓶后的Lascombes 2019完全呈现在一片欢腾的花果世界。成熟的杨梅、娇艳的牡丹伴随着草果和八角的辛香，让人难以拒绝。刚入口时饱满多汁，收尾时又特别沉稳有力。当丰富的烤制化香气随着陈年逐渐柔化时，这款酒将会更加光彩照人。
