Chinese pairs.new: A wine of great tension, unlike the oak barrel aromas that dominated the barrel tasting, the bottled Lascombes 2019 presents itself as a vibrant fruit world. Ripe lychee and delicate peony are accompanied by herbaceous notes and a hint of cardamom, making it impossible to resist. Full-bodied and juicy at the start, it finishes with a particularly stable and powerful structure. As the rich toasted spices mellow with age, this wine will shine even brighter.

English pairs.original: A wine with a lot of tension, unlike En Primeur where it is shrouded by oaky notes, Lascombes 2019 is nothing short of a jubilant world of flowers and fruits after bottling. Ripe waxberries and delicate peonies are accompanied by amomum and anise, making it hard to resist. It is round and juicy on the opening of the palate, and it is particularly durable and robust on the finish. This wine will be even more luminous as the rich roasted aromas soften with age.
English pairs.new: 一瓶充满张力的红酒，与En Primeur相比，瓶装后的Lascombes 2019更像是一片充满鲜花和水果的欢乐世界。酒中充满了成熟的红莓和细致的牡丹花香，伴随着安息香和八角茴香，令人难以抵抗。口感圆润、水嫩，入口时尤其如此，尾部则坚韧且强劲。这瓶酒随着时间的推移，会变得越来越光彩夺目，酒中的丰富烤香味会逐渐柔和。

Western reviews.review: Dark in color, the wine is equally dark on the palate with its layers of black cherry, plum, licorice and chocolate. With a nose that starts off with oak, smoke, black fruit, herbs and coffee bean, the next step is the wine hitting your palate. Avoirdupois in nature, round, lush, opulent, chocolate-covered fruits, licorice and smoky oak in the finish stay with you. The oak seems to be dialed back and now you find more freshness and cleaner fruits, which I like a lot. Drink from 2024-2045. 93 Points
Western reviews.translation: 颜色深红，口感同样深沉，黑杏、黑草莓、黑草莓、 licorice 和巧克力层层展开。酒鼻开始时带有橡木、烟草、黑果、香草和咖啡豆的味道，接下来是酒液触碰你的味蕾。酒的性格丰富，圆润，丰富，巧克力覆盖的水果， licorice 和烟熏橡木在尾部留下深刻的印象。橡木的味道似乎被调节回去了，现在你会发现更多的新鲜感和干净的水果，这我非常喜欢。建议从2024年到2045年饮用。评分93分。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, opaker Kern, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung. Attraktive Nase nach Edelholz, feine Kirschfrucht, unterlegt mit Kirschen und Lakritze, Mandarinenzesten im Hintergrund. Saftig, komplex, elegante Textur, reife, tragende Tannine, etwas Nougat im Abgang, verfügt über Länge, sicheres Entwicklungspotenzial, ein Vin de Garde, schon jetzt antrinkbar.
Western reviews.translation:
深红色葡萄酒色，透明的核心，紫红色的反光，边缘微微发亮。

酒香优雅，带有高档木头的气息，细腻的樱桃果味，伴有樱桃和薄荷的味道，背景中有柑橘的味道。

口感丰富，复杂，优雅的质地，成熟的坚果味，口感持久，有些奶油味，具有长度，具有发展潜力，适合长期储存，现阶段已经可以饮用。

Western reviews.review: Verführerische Aromatik von Blumen und Kräutern und edle Eichenwürze; voller Ansatz, spürbarer, aber gemeisterter Extrakt, erstklassiges, feinkörniges Tannin mit Frische, endet herb-fruchtig; einmal mehr hervorragend gemacht, mit der Typizität der Marke und des Jahrgangs.
Western reviews.translation: 迷人的花香和草香，结合优质的橡木香气；酒口丰富，浓郁但控制的果香，细腻的橡木纤维带有清新感，结尾是清新果香的余韵；再一次表现出品牌和年份的典型风格。

Western reviews.review: A polished and modern expression with fine oak/butterscotch underling layers of dark, ample fruit - cassis and black cherry notes with finely sprinkled spices. Dense warm and concentrated palate with layers of black fruit with a long and muscular finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶精致而现代的红酒，具有细致的橡木/黄油般的底调，暗色丰富的果味层次，包括黑加仑和黑杏的香气，以及细致的香料。口感浓郁温暖，黑果味层次丰富，长长的肌肉感的尾韵。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark, virtually opaque ruby-red in color with purple hints at the rim. Cassis aromas are overlaid with meaty and milky touches. Meaty notes, possibly from the Petit Verdot dominate the mid-palate. The tannins are firm, a little drying & astringent. The wine is of mid weight with balanced to warming alcohol. Fresh acidity & ripe curranty fruit compliment drying cedar notes on the finish. 10/23 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色，几乎透明，边缘有紫色光泽。酒中有浓郁的黑currant香气，伴有肉类和奶油的味道。中口的味道是由Petit Verdot提供的肉类味道主导。酒中的纤维素是坚实的，略带干燥和苦涩。酒的重量是中等的，酒精度是平衡的到温暖的。酒中的酸度是新鲜的，熟透的黑currant果味与干燥的松木味道相互呼应，酒尾留下深刻的印象。评分：10/23 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 成熟的李子、黑莓、雪松和橡木的香气，丰富的单宁，平衡的结构，回味充满红色水果的味道，很强的陈年能力。
Chinese pairs.new: Aroma of mature plums, blackberries, pine, and oak, rich tannins, balanced structure, lingering finish of red fruit flavors, and excellent aging potential.

Western reviews.review: Ripe wine, with soft tannins allied to great density. Weight and lovely, juicy, final fruit flavors meld together easily. This is solid, dense, impressive and for long-term aging.
Western reviews.translation: 成熟的红酒，具有柔软的苦味和极高的密度。重量和美丽的果酱口感融合得非常好。这是一种坚实、密度高、令人印象深刻的红酒，适合长期陈化。

Western reviews.review: Lovely ripe cassis character, fullish body and elegant tannins make this an easy 2009 to enjoy in spite of the wine's ample structure.
Western reviews.translation: 这款2009年红酒具有美好的黑currant风味，体积丰满，纤维柔顺，使得这款酒在结构丰富的情况下仍然容易享受。

Western reviews.review: This has a solid core of juicy plum, red currant and blackberry fruit that sits in reserve, while mouthwatering briar and toasty spice notes move along the edges. Grippy and focused through the finish, with well-embedded acidity. Best from 2013 through 2024.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有坚实的核心，富有水果味的浆果、红葡萄和黑莓，静待发挥。口感清新，带有荆条和烤香料的香气。口感坚实，酸度清晰。建议在2013年至2024年期间饮用。

Western reviews.review: Saturated with the warm ripeness of the 2009 vintage, this is well upholstered rather than hyperripe. Its plump blueberry and currant flavors feel concentrated, completely integrating the oak so that the tannins are cushioned rather than extracted. Its vintage character shows in caramelized notes at the end of the wine, in spice that builds out of the warmth. Enjoyable now with roast duck, this will gain complexity as it ages.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶2009年产的红酒充满了温暖的成熟感，虽然不至于过于成熟，但仍然非常舒适。它的浓郁的蓝莓和黑加仑风味非常浓缩，完全融入了橡木味，使得它的坚果味变得柔和而不突出。酒尾的焦糖和香料味道是这瓶酒的典型风格，非常令人愉悦。现在可以与烤鸭一起享用，这瓶酒随着时间的推移会变得更加复杂。

Western reviews.review: Tightly knit, oaky and rich, with formidable concentration, but broodingly backward and not showing the charm and concentration of the top wines of St.-Julien, this 2009 from Lagrange is still an outstanding effort that has length, richness and character. It should be cellared for a good 5-6 years and then consumed over the following 25 years.Rating: 90+
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶2009年拉格朗日(Lagrange)红酒紧密结实，具有浓郁的橡木味和丰富的口感，但它的风格有些沉闷，未能展现出圣朱利安(Saint-Julien)顶级葡萄酒的魅力和集中度。尽管如此，这瓶红酒仍然是一款出色的作品，具有长长的尾部、丰富的口感和独特的风格。建议将其贮存5-6年后再饮用，之后可以持续25年。评分：90+

Chinese pairs.original: 这支酒含蓄的香气充满甜泥土和香料味以及微微的花香。香气和口感都颇为清澈。回味富有树莓为主的红果味。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine has a subtle aroma filled with sweet earthy and spicy notes along with a hint of floral. The aroma and palate are both crisp and clean. The finish is rich with a dominant red fruit flavor, particularly raspberry.

English pairs.original: Sweetly earthy and spicy on the reticent sniff with a tint of florality. Lucid on both nose and palate. Exciting acid filled the finish that showed loads of raspberry-like red fruits.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的气味中带有甜甜的泥土和辣椒的味道，伴有花朵的微妙香气。口感清澈，气味和口感都很清晰。酒尾带有刺激的酸度，展现出大量的红莓类红果味。

Western reviews.review:
A warm wine rich in tannins and with succulent berry fruits, this is both powerful and elegant. Its density doesn’t detract from the fruitiness that shines out of the wine and balances with the structured aging potential. Drink the wine from 2025.
Editors' Choice
Western reviews.translation:
这款红酒富有深度的苦味和浓郁的浆果风味，既强大又优雅。酒的密度并没有减少其果香的表现，而是与其结构良好的成熟潜力相平衡。建议从2025年开始饮用。

编辑推荐。

Western reviews.review: This is really decadent and rich with great aromas of earth, spice, frost flowers and fresh mushrooms that follow through to a full body, firm and chewy tannins and a flavorful finish. Very, very serious from here. A blend of 70 per cent merlot and 30 per cent cabernet franc. Try after 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一款极其奢华和丰富的红酒，具有强烈的泥土、香料、霜花和新鲜蘑菇的香气，口感丰富、坚实且有嚼头，尾部风味丰富。非常严肃的口感，从现在开始。酒款为70%梅洛和30%卡波弗朗克的混合。建议在2025年后品尝。

Western reviews.review: This was delicious En Primeur and is even better now with three years under its belt. It's had time to bed down and is fully set for the long term. Wonderfully rich, intense dark fruits are joined by grip and supple tannins through the palate. It has hints of dark chocolate, and a floral edge from the Cabernet Franc. Be in no rush to open this, because it's clearly going to deliver over the next few decades. As of this vintage, we are seeing the blend that the estate hopes to maintain (60% Merlot, 40% Cabernet Franc). Drinking Window 2025 - 2044
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒在 En Primeur 时就已经很好喝，现在经过三年后更加出色。它已经有足够的时间来成熟，长期来看也非常有前途。口感丰富，浓郁的黑果味伴随着紧实的果皮和柔软的纹理。还有一些巧克力味和来自 Cabernet Franc 的花香。不要急着打开瓶子，因为它将在接下来的几十年里不断发挥作用。根据今年的产量，我们可以看到庄园希望维持的配方（60% 梅洛，40% 卡波弗朗奇）。饮用时间：2025-2044。

Western reviews.review:
Medium to deep garnet-purple in color, the 2016 La Gaffeliere opens with compelling wild blueberries, freshly crushed plums and kirsch scents plus hints of garrigue, underbrush, rose hip tea and pencil lead. Medium to full-bodied, the palate is wonderfully elegant with a soft, velvety texture and seamless freshness carrying the multilayered fruit to a long finish.

Rating: 95+
Western reviews.translation:
2016 年拉加费里耶（La Gaffeliere）红酒呈现出深紫红色。酒香中充满了野蓝莓、新鲜的黑杏和可可水果的香气，伴随着干草、灌木丛、玫瑰茶和铅笔的微妙气息。口感丰富中等到中高，酒体细腻柔滑，清新果香在舌头上留下长长的尾韵。

评分：95+

Western reviews.review: This has a suave, cashmere feel, with waves of blackberry and plum reduction rolling through, infused liberally with dark tobacco and black licorice notes. A black tea accent smolders on the finish, complemented by a faint floral echo. This should age into a charmer. Best from 2022 through 2037.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有优雅的质感，类似于羊绒衫，黑berry和黑杏酱的波浪状味道在其中流动，充满了深色的烟草和黑甘草的香气。红茶的味道在尾部持续着，伴随着淡淡的花香回响。这款红酒应该会在2022年到2037年之间成熟并成为一款迷人的红酒。

Chinese pairs.original: 喜欢橘子糖的朋友一定会喜欢2023年份的Chateau Coutet。当酸度更高、贵腐菌更加理想的的时候，无论糖分有多高，Chateau Coutet 都能保持绝佳的平衡感。2023年份刚入口时的油润感，简直和花蜜有一拼，但很快就在舌面融化，很好地诠释了Barsac 轻柔的风土个性。杏脯、黄李子酱、白松露、桂皮粉的香气缓缓汇入橘子蜂蜜水的世界，然后在一抹清甜中缓缓落下。
Chinese pairs.new: Friends who love orange blossom water will adore the 2023 Chateau Coutet. When acidity is higher and the botrytis is more ideal, Chateau Coutet maintains perfect balance regardless of the sugar level. The 2023 entry is silky smooth, almost honey-like, but quickly dissolves on the palate, beautifully interpreting the Barsac's light and delicate terroir. The aromas of apricot, quince paste, white truffle, and cinnamon powder slowly blend into the orange blossom water world, then gently fade into a hint of sweetness.

English pairs.original: Orange candy lovers will be absolutely delighted by the 2023 Chateau Coutet. With heightened acidity and ideally formed noble rot, it maintains an exquisite balance, regardless of its high sugar content. When tasted, an initial oily sensation akin to nectar is experienced, but it quickly dissolves on the tongue, embodying the delicate terroir of Barsac. The flavors of dried apricots, yellow plum jam, white truffles, and cinnamon slowly merge into a world of orange honey water, culminating in a gentle sweetness on the aftertaste.
English pairs.new: 橙味糖果爱好者将会对2023年沙托库特（Chateau Coutet）绝对着迷。由高度酸度和理想的霜霉感组成，高糖含量也丝毫不影响其精致的平衡。品尝时，初期的油腻感似蜜水，但迅速在舌头上溶解，体现出巴萨克（Barsac）的细致风味。干枯的杏干、黄桃果酱、白松露和肉桂的味道逐渐融合成橙色蜂蜜水的世界，最后在余味中呈现出温和的甜度。

Western reviews.review: Clean and open, with a sweet taste. A lot of dried apricot fruit flavours. Great complexity and structure. Firm, highly refreshing, and vibrant. Brilliant. Silky, delicate tannins, rather than rich or oily.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒清澈明亮，口感甜美。有大量干枣的果味。结构复杂，层次丰富。口感坚实，清新Refreshing，充满活力。非常出色。口感滑顺，细腻的苦味，非油腻或浓郁。

Western reviews.review: Color is a medium to deep straw-yellow. Aromas are concentrated , honeyed & there are lifted aromas of mandarin orange & concentrated, dried apricots. The wine is very sweet with a pure perfumed sweetness. There are lots of botrytis notes & touches of honey. The mid-palate is rich-textured with notes of marzipan & honey& the acidity is quite good. The alcohol helps to bring cedary vanilla notes out of the fruit. The wine finishes sweet & with good length. 04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 颜色是浅到深的金黄色。酒香浓郁，蜂蜜般甜美，带有橙子和干枳实的气息。酒体非常甜，具有纯粹的花香甜味。酒中有大量的霉菌感染的气息和蜂蜜的味道。中口富有质感，带有杏仁和蜂蜜的味道，酸度较好。酒中的酒精使得果味中出现了松木和香草的味道。酒尾甜美，持久。评分：04/24 (ep) DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 当清澈的酒液触摸舌尖的瞬间，我整个人都愣住了！难以置信，这家年轻的生物动力酒庄居然能够在多舛的2021年份表现地这么稳定且出色。摇杯之后的酸梅、红枣、玫瑰以及红樱桃芬芳如发丝般清晰，伴随着清甜的口感，营造出娇艳欲滴的唯美感受，闭上眼睛，我仿佛感受到了春雨在抚摸我的面颊。收尾时还有淡淡的甜润感，明明有95%的全新橡木桶，但就是找不到一丝烘焙的气息，绝绝子…
Chinese pairs.new: The moment the crystal-clear wine touches my tongue, I'm left speechless! It's unbelievable that this young biodynamic winery has managed to deliver such stability and excellence in the tumultuous 2021 vintage. After swirling, the tart cherry, plum, rose, and cranberry aromas unfold with silky clarity, accompanied by a sweet and luscious texture that evokes a delicate, ethereal beauty. Closing my eyes, I'm transported to a spring shower caressing my cheek. The finish is subtle and smooth, with a hint of sweetness, despite 95% new oak barrels – and not a whiff of toastiness to be found. Absolutely stunning.

English pairs.original: As the crystal-clear wine touches my tongue, I am momentarily stunned. Incredibly, this biodynamic winery manages to deliver such a stable and exceptional performance in the challenging vintage of 2021. After swirling the glass, this wine reveals distinct aromas of sour plum, red dates, roses, and red cherries, as clear as strands of beauty’s hair. The palate is accompanied by a gentle roundness, crafting an exquisitely beautiful mouth feeling. Closing my eyes, it feels as if I am being caressed by a gentle spring rain. The finish carried a subtle sweetness, and despite being aged in 95% new oak barrels, there isn’t a hint of toastiness. Truly remarkable…
English pairs.new: 当晶莹透明的红酒触及我的舌头，我一下子就被震惊了。令人难以置信的是，这家生物动力葡萄酒厂在挑战性的2021年产季中仍然能够表现出如此稳定和出色的表现。搅拌玻璃后，这款酒展现出明显的酸枣、红枣、玫瑰和红樱桃的香气，清晰如美丽的头发。口感圆润柔和，营造出极美的口感。闭上眼睛，感觉就像被温柔的春雨抚慰。尾韵带有细微的甜度，尽管在95%新橡木桶中陈酿，但没有一点点的烤味。真的是令人惊叹……

Western reviews.review: Purpurrot und tiefgründig, was für ein delikater Duft, die Cassisfrucht ist subtil mit feinen Röstnoten verbunden, eine schöne Mineralik schwingt mit. Im Gaumen straff, kräftig, gut strukturiert, die Tannine sind hochwertig, umhüllen die Frucht wie ein Seidentuch. Langer, feinwürziger Abgang, sehr, sehr frisch. Gelungen und mit Potential. 2028-2050 (Verkostet im November 2023 in Zürich bei UGCB)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论，翻译成中文如下：

酒色深红，深度丰富，酒香细腻，黑currant果味微妙，伴有轻微的烤果味，酒中矿物质味道清晰。

口感紧致，强劲，结构良好，酒中的苦味物质高品质，包围着果味如丝绸般柔软。

尾部长长，细腻，复杂，酒味清新，非常出色，具有发展潜力。

推荐储存时间：2028-2050年（2023年11月在瑞士Zürich的UGCB评估）。

Western reviews.review: Dark in color, the wine kicks off with tobacco leaf, underbrush, herbs, olives, flowers and currants. On the palate the wine is soft, forward, fresh and fruity, with polished tannins, elegant textures and a round, sweet, red currant and black cherry finish. There is a nice spicy, fresh kick in the endnote of the classically-styled, bright, understated wine. Give it a few years to compose itself and it will show quite nicely. The wine blends 84% Cabernet Sauvignon, 12% Merlot, and 4% Cabernet Franc, 12.5% ABV. The harvest took place September 23-October 7. The yields were low at 29 hectoliters per hectare. Drink from 2025-2055. 92-94
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的颜色深暗，口感中有烟草叶、灌木丛、香草、橄榄、花朵和黑currant的味道。口感软滑、果香浓郁、有光滑的橡皮质感和圆润的口感，最后留下一丝甜美的黑currant和黑樱桃的余味。酒尾有一个清新的辣味，适合品尝。这种典型的风格，明亮、低调的酒，需要几年时间才能完全成熟。酒中含有84%卡波雷尔葡萄、12%梅洛葡萄和4%法兰克葡萄，酒精度12.5%。酒庄于9月23日至10月7日采摘，产量较低，仅29公斤/公顷。建议于2025-2055年饮用。评分92-94分。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby, opaque core, fading to purple at the narrow rim. Fine herbal savouriness, notes of blackberries and cassis, fresh orange zest, tobacco nuances. Taut, fresh cherries, lively structure, integrated tannins, mineral, with redcurrants on the finish. A light-footed, uncomplicated food companion with a touch of fruit sweetness on the finish. Will be very approachable early.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，透明核心，渐渐变成紫色边缘。有细微的草药香气，黑莓和黑加仑的味道，新鲜的橙子皮，烟草的细微差别。紧致的新鲜樱桃，活跃的结构，融合的苦味，矿物质，红果在尾部。轻盈的，简单的食物伴侣，尾部有果汁的甜味。很快就会变得非常容易接近。

Western reviews.review: Medium depth of darkly pigmented ruby-red with slight purple hints the rim. The fruit aromas are restrained & meaty hints give way to plumy red-fruit. The palate shows clean damson, cassis & black-cherry fruit & the tannins are finely structured, elegant & harmonious. The wine is of mid-weight & is velvety-textured. Nicely handled cedar notes sit behind the fruit, giving a little grip & elegance. Alcohol is balanced & good acidity gives a long finish. 04/22 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色，带有微微的紫色光泽。酒中的果香味道比较淡，带有肉类的香气，主要是浓郁的黑果味。口感清晰，带有黑樱桃、黑加拿大樱桃和黑杏的果味，口感细腻，结构紧致，味道和谐。酒的重量适中，口感丰富。酒中有轻微的松木香气，给人一种细致的感觉。酒中的酒精度合适，酸度适中，酒尾长而持久。评分：04/22 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 刚一举杯就闻到了阵阵花果茶的芬芳，稍作等待还泛着砚台的古朴清香，那种感觉就好像一位文人墨客在竹林见品茶作诗，怎一个悠然自得。和过往年份相比，2023年份的单宁质地来得稍显硬朗，含在口中仿佛有一枚黑墨在缓缓溶解，带着几分严肃。虽然赤霞珠比例高达92%，品尝起来却带着成筐的莓果芬芳，其甜美的尾韵很好地柔化了单宁的力量，很妙。
Chinese pairs.new:
The moment the glass is raised, a wave of floral fruit tea aromas fills the senses, with a subtle hint of ancient inkstone fragrance lingering in the background. It's as if a poet is sipping tea in a bamboo forest, feeling carefree and at ease.

Compared to previous vintages, the 2023 tannins are slightly more robust, coating the palate like a slowly dissolving black ink, with a hint of seriousness. Despite the high 92% Cabernet Sauvignon content, the wine is surprisingly filled with the sweet fragrance of a basket of raspberries. The wine's sweet finish beautifully softens the tannins, creating a delightful harmony.

English pairs.original: Upon lifting the glass, one is immediately greeted by the fragrance of floral fruit tea, which, upon a moment’s patience, gives way to the ancient, clean scent of an inkstone, evoking the image of a scholar sipping tea and composing poetry in a bamboo grove—utterly content. Compared to previous years, the tannins of the 2023 vintage are notably firmer, feeling in the mouth as if a piece of black ink is slowly dissolving, carrying a bit of severity. Although the Cabernet Sauvignon composition is as high as 92%, it is laden with baskets of berry notes, and its sweet finish beautifully softens the strength of the tannins, quite interesting.
English pairs.new:
将红酒评论翻译成中文：

一抬起玻璃，立刻被花果茶的芳香所迎接，稍等片刻，古老的墨石清香便浮现，仿佛在竹林中，学者在品茶作诗，心境惬意。与往年相比，2023年产的红酒的苦味更为坚实，入口时感觉像一滴墨水在慢慢溶解，带有一丝严厉。尽管卡布塞尔·索维涅（Cabernet Sauvignon）占比高达92%，但它却充满了浓郁的浆果香气，其甜润的尾韵美妙地缓和了苦味的强度，非常有趣。

Western reviews.review: 95-97. Barrel Sample. Ripe tannins contrast with the intense acidity and succulence of this wine. It is a firm wine, solid and concentrated. The potential, with the structure and acidity, is considerable. Organic and biodynamic.
Western reviews.translation: 95-97分。酒桶样品。酒中的成熟橡皮质与强烈的酸度和浓郁的口感形成对比。这是一种坚实的酒，浓缩且坚实。酒的潜力，结构和酸度都很出色。有机和生物动力学。

Western reviews.review: Signature silky texture, seen in recent vintages. Dense, expressive and briliiant. Perfect ripeness, like black cherries picked at perfect maturity, with a bite that just explodes. Smooth tannins. This vintage consists of 30% amphorae and 70% new oak.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有典型的细腻口感，类似于近年来的风格。酒体丰富、饱满、闪亮。酒中的成熟度完美，类似于成熟的黑杏，入口即爆发。酒中的纤维柔顺。该款酒的组成比例为30%陶器和70%新橡木桶。

Western reviews.review: Ein Duft zum Eintauchen, zum Träumen, ich will die Zeit für ei nen Moment vergessen; dunkle Frucht, pfeffrige Würze, klare Cassisfrucht, Kirsche, florale Noten; am Gaumen ein Fruchtbündel sondergleichen, kompakt, mächtig, dabei federleicht, viel Energie, Dynamik, wild und dennoch ruhig, die Tannine wie aus dem Stein gemeisselt, grosse Harmonie, sehr langer Abgang. Ausgezeichnet.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶让人沉醉的红酒，令人沉浸在美好的梦境中，想要忘记时间的存在；酒中的香气是浓郁的果实，带有辣椒般的味道，清晰的黑currant，樱桃，花朵的香气；在口中是一种独特的果实组合，紧密、强烈，但又轻盈，充满能量和动力，野性但又平和，橡皮素的味道像从岩石中挖掘出来的，酒中有着大和谐，酒尾长长。非常出色。

Chinese pairs.original: 龙阁2018的魅力绝对不在香气，而在于其沉稳而内敛的味觉体验。口中的层次和厚度相当突出，甚至有些波亚克产区的身影。紧致厚实的单宁赋予了这款酒大气庞涓的结构和角斗士一般的力量感，与彬彬有礼的香气形象大相径庭。龙阁酒庄每年正牌酒的比例都低得吓人，严格的筛选下，葡萄品质是何等出色。如果香气的复杂度再进阶的话，将会更加诱人。
Chinese pairs.new: The allure of Longkai 2018 lies not in its aroma, but in its refined and understated taste experience. The layers and depth in the mouth are particularly striking, even evoking a hint of the style found in the Po Valley region. The dense and taut tannins give this wine a majestic structure and a robust, athletic feel, which is at odds with its elegant aroma. Longkai winery's annual production of flagship wines is notoriously low, and the rigorous selection process ensures that only the finest grapes make the cut. If the complexity of the aroma were to be taken to the next level, it would be even more alluring.

English pairs.original: The charisma of Lagrange 2018 is not on its aromas but on its noble and profound mouth feeling. I am astonished by its compact structure, like a bit of Pauillac’s character. The majestic and polished tannins manifest warrior-like power, which tremendously contrasts with its polite and gentle image on the nose. As we know, the proportion of the 1st wine is scarily low, which explains why Lagrange’s grapes are such noticeable. Given more aromatic complexities, this wine will be even more charming.
English pairs.new: 拉格朗日2018的魅力不在于其香气，而在于其高贵而深刻的口感。它的紧致结构让我惊叹，像是一点点的波尔尼克风格。雄伟而光滑的橡木味呈现出强大的力量，与鼻子的温和和谦逊形成强烈对比。我们知道，第一酒的比例非常低，这解释了为什么拉格朗日的葡萄品质如此突出。给予更多的香气复杂性，这款酒将更加迷人。

Western reviews.review: The flagship 2018 Château Lagrange is a more dense, backward, serious wine, offering an unevolved yet incredibly promising bouquet of cassis, blackcurrants, scorched earth, graphite, and violets. A big, rich, full-bodied Saint-Julien, it delivers thrilling purity of fruit, plenty of background oak, ripe, silky tannins, and a great mid-palate. This is serious stuff, but it's going to require patience. Hide bottles for 7-8 years, count yourself lucky, and enjoy over the following two decades.
Western reviews.translation: 2018年夏朗格庄园的旗舰酒是一款更加浓密、保守、严肃的红酒，展现出未开启的但极具前景的黑currant、黑berry、焦土、石墨和紫罗兰的芳香。是一款大气、丰富、全口感的圣朱利安酒，提供了令人惊叹的果实纯度、丰富的背景橡木、成熟的细腻纤维和出色的中口感。这是一款严肃的酒，但它需要耐心。将酒瓶藏起来7-8年，自认为幸运，享受接下来的两十年。

Western reviews.review: Medium to deep garnet-purple colored, the 2018 Lagrange explodes from the glass with bombastic notes of crème de cassis, chocolate-covered cherries and baked red and black plums with suggestions of rose oil, cedar chest, pencil lead and hoisin. Medium to full-bodied, the palate has fantastic vibrancy for the ripeness, packed with juicy black fruits and compelling tension with a finely grained texture to support, finishing on a lingering mineral note. Nicely done!
Western reviews.translation: 2018年拉格朗日红酒呈现出深紫红色，酒香爆发，带有浓郁的黑加仑、巧克力浸柿子和烤红黑杏子的香气，伴有玫瑰油、松木箱、铅笔和糖醋味。口感中等到中厚，酒体充满活力，黑果味浓郁，紧张感强烈，纤维细腻，尾部留有矿物质的余韵。

Western reviews.review: This smoky wine still shows some wood aging flavors. Structure comes from this wood aging as well as the rich blackberry-fruit tannins and concentration. The succulent Cabernet Sauvignon is ripe and full. It needs time, so drink from 2026.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒仍然保留着烟熏味和木桶陈化的风味。这种木桶陈化的结构以及丰富的黑莓果味和浓郁的苦味都为这款红酒增添了力量。成熟的卡伯涅特葡萄酒丰富多味，需要时间来发酵。建议从2026年开始饮用。

Western reviews.review: Beautiful reflections through the body of this wine, with fresh acidity, and an attractive sense of uplift through the palate, although the actual fruit is a little subdued right now, which as it opens shows damson and bilberry. There is real tannic frame, and build-up on the finish as you see just how concentrated these dark fruits are. Drinking Window 2026 - 2044
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的体现出优雅的光泽，带有清新酸度，口感上有明显的升华感，尽管当前的果实味道略为低调，但随着酒精的开启，会展现出浆果和蓝莓的风味。酒中有着坚实的苦味结构和持久的尾韵，展现出浓郁的黑果风味。建议在2026年至2044年之间饮用。

Western reviews.review:
This has a notable tobacco and bay leaf profile out front, followed by bramble-textured, gently mulled plum and black cherry fruit.
 Barrel Sample: 90-93
Western reviews.translation:
这款红酒具有显著的烟草和迷迭香风味，接着是覆盖着荆棘的、温和烤过的梅子和黑樱桃果味。

酒桶样品：90-93分。

Chinese pairs.original: 此酒多少有些含蓄的优雅香气由甜泥土、红色水果（树莓、蔓越莓）、黄桃、灌木、甜香料（桂皮、红色甘草）、寿司姜、白巧克力和岩石味组成。非常细腻的中段口感富有中和收尾圆润感的惊人酸度。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine has a subtle, elegant aroma with hints of sweet earth, red fruit (raspberry, blackberry), apricot, bush, sweet spices (cinnamon, red licorice), ginger, white chocolate, and a rocky note. The mid-palate is incredibly smooth, with a stunning acidity that provides a balanced and rounded finish.

English pairs.original: Somewhat restrained on the elegant nose that was made up of sweet earth, red fruits (raspberry, cranberry), yellow peach, scrub, sweet spices (cinnamon, red liquorice), sushi ginger, white chocolate and stone. Very delicate on the mid-palate with exciting acid to offset the roundness on finish.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的香气优雅而持重，主要包括甜土壤、红果（草莓、蔓越莓）、黄桃、灌木丛、甜香料（肉桂、红糖浆）、 sushi姜、白巧克力和石头的风味。口感细腻，酸度清新，完美平衡了酒尾的圆润感。

Western reviews.review: (80% Merlot, 20% Cabernet Franc, die Reben stehen in der Nähe von Valandrau und werden seit dem Jahrgang 2020 wieder von der Besitzer-Familie von Ch. Gaffelière vinifiziert. 36 Tsd. Flaschen produziert, 14% Alkohol) Feinduftige Nase, kühl und kalkig anmutend, viel dunkle Frucht. Im Gaumen straff, präzis, sehr feines Tannin, knackigej Frucht, der Wein zeigt bereits eine gute Zugänglichkeit, hat Charme und im Abgang eine sehr gute Länge. Ab sofort bis 2035 geniessen.
Western reviews.translation:
这款红酒的成分是80%梅洛（Merlot）和20%卡波弗朗（Cabernet Franc），葡萄种植在Valandrau附近，自2020年起由Ch. Gaffelière的拥有者家族再次进行酿造。产量为36万瓶，酒精度为14%。

酒鼻清晰，冷冽且带有石灰味，充满了深色的果味。

口感紧致，精确，非常细腻的橡皮质，果味清脆，酒已经表现出很好的入口感，具有魅力，尾部非常持久。建议尽快享用，直到2035年。

Western reviews.review: This is the first vintage since the vineyard returned to the Malet Roquefort family after 60 years. It is full of black fruits and ripe juicy tannins, with a freshness allied to the wine's natural structure. It is a wine to age. Drink from 2027.
Western reviews.translation: 这是自葡萄园归还马莱特·罗克福特家族（Malet Roquefort家族）手中后，60年来首次推出的新酒。酒中充满黑色水果和成熟的果酿质感，具有自然结构的清新感。这种酒适合长期陈酿，建议2027年后饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Larcis Ducasse是一座钢铁城堡，即便面对凉爽的2021年份，也丝毫不会动摇。它极具压迫感的石膏单宁将整个酒体团团包裹，把凉爽年份的传统印象彻底踩在脚下。在我看来，Chateau Larcis Ducasse 的卓越之处不仅仅在于其坚实的酒体结构，更在于它对坚实结构的精雕细琢。就拿2021年份来说，在多酚物质并未完全成熟的情况下，它依旧能够凭借圆润细密的口感来充实酒体。直到收尾时，它还不忘撇下一抹精致的咸感。这种独特的品质，让Chateau Larcis Ducasse 在整个圣爱美隆显得独树一帜，无可撼动。
Chinese pairs.new:
Chateau Larcis Ducasse是一座钢铁城堡，即便面对凉爽的2021年份，也丝毫不会动摇。它极具压迫感的石膏单宁将整个酒体团团包裹，把凉爽年份的传统印象彻底踩在脚下。在我看来，Chateau Larcis Ducasse 的卓越之处不仅仅在于其坚实的酒体结构，更在于它对坚实结构的精雕细琢。就拿2021年份来说，在多酚物质并未完全成熟的情况下，它依旧能够凭借圆润细密的口感来充实酒体。直到收尾时，它还不忘撇下一抹精致的咸感。这种独特的品质，让Chateau Larcis Ducasse 在整个圣爱美隆显得独树一帜，无可撼动。

Translated Wine Review:

Chateau Larcis Ducasse is a steel fortress that remains unshakeable even in the cool 2021 vintage. Its imposing tannins envelop the entire wine, crushing the traditional impression of a cool vintage. In my opinion, Chateau Larcis Ducasse's excellence lies not only in its robust wine structure, but also in its meticulous refinement of that structure. Even in the 2021 vintage, where polyphenol compounds have not yet fully matured, it still manages to enrich the wine with its smooth and refined texture. Until the finish, it leaves a delicate hint of saltiness. This unique quality makes Chateau Larcis Ducasse stand out in the Saint-Émilion region, unshakeable.

English pairs.original: Chateau Larcis Ducasse stands as an iron fortress, unwavering even in the face of the challenge 2021 vintage. Its imposing gypsum tannins enshroud the entire wine, completely shattering the traditional perception of a cool vintage. In my view, the excellence of Chateau Larcis Ducasse lies not only in its robust structural framework but also in the meticulous craftsmanship applied to that structure. Take the 2021 vintage as an example; despite the polyphenols not fully maturing, it still manages to enrich the wine with a refined texture. Even up to the end, it still leaves behind a subtle touch of saltiness. This unique quality sets Chateau Larcis Ducasse apart in the entirety of Saint-Emilion, making it truly invincible.
English pairs.new: 拉尔西德库萨斯庄园（Chateau Larcis Ducasse）像一座坚不可摧的铁堡，面对2021年的挑战依然坚定不移。其雄伟的石灰质苦味（gypsum tannins）笼罩着整个酒，彻底打破了人们对冷年（cool vintage）的传统印象。在我看来，拉尔西德库萨斯庄园的卓越之处不仅在于其坚固的结构框架，还在于对该结构的细致工艺。以2021年的产酒为例，尽管多酚（polyphenols）没有完全成熟，但它仍然能够为酒精增添细腻的质感。即使到最后，酒也留下了一丝微妙的咸味。这独特的品质使拉尔西德库萨斯庄园在整个圣埃米利昂（Saint-Emilion）地区独树一帜，真正地不可战胜。

Western reviews.review: Very complex and subtle with cedar, dried herb, green tobacco, berry and lavender aromas that follow through to a medium body, with ultra-fine tannins that give a sophistication and beauty to the wine, especially from this vintage. 86% merlot and 14% cabernet franc. Drink after 2027.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒非常复杂且细致，具有松柏、干燥香草、绿色烟草、浆果和紫罗兰的香气，这些香气在口感中持续存在，体现出中等的体积，具有极细的橡皮质，赋予了这瓶酒优雅和美丽，尤其是来自这一年的产量。酒中含有86%的梅洛和14%的卡波弗朗克。建议在2027年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: The 2021 Larcis Ducasse has turned out better than I expected. It is a shy, introverted Larcis built along super-classic lines—the sort of Saint-Émilion that will emerge only with a number of years in bottle. Spice, tobacco, cedar, menthol, licorice and dried herbs all build effortlessly in the glass. This is such a classy, elegant wine. Tasted three times. –Antonio Galloni
Western reviews.translation: 2021 年的拉西德卡塞（Larcis Ducasse）比我预期的要出色。它是一种谦逊的、内敛的拉西德卡塞，按照超级经典的风格打造的——那种只有经过多年陈酿后才会显现的圣埃米利昂葡萄酒。酒中充满了香料、烟草、红木、薄荷、甘草和干燥的香草味。这种葡萄酒非常优雅、典雅。 –安东尼奥·加隆尼（Antonio Galloni）

Western reviews.review: Rose petals, pink flowers, raspberries and a touch of cardamom and cinnamon to the red berry fruit. Grippy and textured, quite a lean expression, direct and focussed, with bite to the tannins and a touch of dry salty, flinty minerality that coats the cheeks. It's well worked but hasn't quite settled yet and doesn't quite have the fruit density to carry more of the motion and energy. Sleek though and definitely confident. Will be lovely once it calms.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感是由玫瑰花、粉红花、草莓和一丝卡达米和肉桂调味的红果味构成的。口感坚实、纹理丰富，表达清晰直接，具有嚼劲的味道，且带有干净的盐味和花岗岩矿物质的味道。虽然这款红酒经过精心制作，但还没有完全成熟，果味还不够丰富，无法承载更多的动能和能量。然而，这款红酒仍然很光滑，充满自信。等到它平息下来时，它一定会很美好。

Western reviews.review: This has tobacco and black-pepper aromas, and solid tannins. Power and dense blackberry flavors are impressive.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有烟草和黑胡椒的香气，坚实的苦味。强烈的黑莓风味令人印象深刻。

Western reviews.review: Up with top wines of the vintage, the 2021 Château Larcis Ducasse is a beautiful Saint-Emilion based on 86% Merlot and 14% Cabernet Franc, with the Merlot harvested between September 29 and October 9, and the Cabernet from October 9 to October 11. From yields of 34 hectoliters per hectare and aged in 50% new barrels, its solid ruby/plum hue is followed by a beautiful nose of ripe red and black fruits, iron, dried tobacco, leather, and truffly earth. Medium to full-bodied (closer to medium-bodied), it has terrific mid-palate depth, ripe, polished tannins, and a balanced, layered, elegant mouthfeel. As with most 2021s, it only needs a few years of bottle age and will have two decades of overall longevity.
Western reviews.translation: 2021年夏朗德地区拉西德卡斯酒庄的佳酿，来自86%梅洛和14%卡波弗朗克的葡萄，梅洛于9月29日至10月9日采摘，卡波弗朗克于10月9日至10月11日采摘。产量为每公顷34公升，陈酿50%新橡木桶，呈现出坚实的红紫色，酒香美丽，带有成熟的红黑果实、铁、干烟草、皮革和土壤的香气。口感中等到中等以上（更接近中等），酒体丰富，口感深厚，牙齿光滑，口感平衡，层次丰富，典雅。与大多数2021年的酒一样，这款酒只需要几年的陈酿年龄，预计有两十年的总寿命。

Chinese pairs.original: 与Bernard de Laage de Meux（主席）及Benoit Prevot（酿酒师/总经理）在酒庄垂直品鉴了连续的21个年份。2018年份的橡木桶样酒包含了比以往多5%的品丽珠（占混酿比例的25%），因此这款酒略显严肃但芬芳、绵密的香气带有微微的新鲜草本气息，以及大量糖渍姜、岩石、碾碎的树莓、黑樱桃、杏和红花香，打底的则是更为深邃的香料（肉豆蔻、白胡椒）、烤吐司和黑巧克力味。细腻但强劲的单宁赋予口感健壮的结构，而多汁、生津酸度则中和了口感的干涩；滑爽、清晰而且活泼的收尾透出轮廓分明的矿物质感。
Chinese pairs.new:
在酒庄的垂直品鉴中，Bernard de Laage de Meux（主席）及Benoit Prevot（酿酒师/总经理）品尝了连续的21个年份的葡萄酒。2018年份的橡木桶样酒比以往多了5%的品丽珠，占混酿比例的25%。这款酒的香气略显严肃，但芬芳、绵密，带有微微的新鲜草本气息，以及大量糖渍姜、岩石、碾碎的树莓、黑樱桃、杏和红花香。底部的香气则是更为深邃的香料（肉豆蔻、白胡椒）、烤吐司和黑巧克力味。

口感健壮的结构由细腻但强劲的单宁赋予，多汁、生津酸度则中和了口感的干涩。滑爽、清晰而且活泼的收尾透出轮廓分明的矿物质感。

English pairs.original: A consistent 21 vintages' vertical tasting with Bernard de Laage de Meux (president) and Benoit Prevot (winemaker/general manager) at the winery. The barrel sample of the 2018 contains 25% Cabernet Franc (5% more than usual), so that it had a tint of fresh herb on the faintly austere but perfumed and dense aroma that also revealed lots of candied ginger, stone, crushed raspberry, black cherry, apricot and red flowers, with deeper underlying notes of spices (nutmeg, white pepper), toast and black chocolate. Delicate but powerful tannins gave the sturdy structure to the mouthfeel that possessed succulently salivary acid to offset mouth-drying sense; polished, precise and vivid on the finale that exuded defined minerality.
English pairs.new: 在酒庄举行了一场持续21年的垂直品鉴会，参加者包括酒庄总裁Bernard de Laage de Meux和酒庄总经理兼酒师Benoit Prevot。2018年的酒桶样品中，含有25%的卡波弗朗克（比平时多了5%），这使得酒的香气带有淡淡的新鲜香草味，虽然略带严肃，但仍然具有清新的气息和浓郁的香味，另外还可以闻到大量的糖化姜、石头、压碎的莓果、黑樱桃、杏子和红色花朵的香味，深层次的香味包括了香料（肉豆蔻、白胡椒）、烤面包和黑巧克力的香味。酒中的细致但强大的纤维结构使得口感坚实，具有足够的酸度来抵消口干的感觉；酒尾清晰、精确、生动，具有明确的矿物质特征。

Western reviews.review: With a nice overlay of flowers, smoke, licorice and dark cocoa, the sweet, ripe plums with black cherries, silky, soft tannins and hint of brightness in the finish is front and center here. Lay this down for 5 years and it will be quite charming to drink. 93 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中有花朵、烟草、 licorice 和黑巧克力等复杂的层次。酒体中充满了甜熟的浆果和黑樱桃的味道，口感细腻柔滑，后味有微微的清新感。建议将其储存5年后再饮用，会更加令人愉悦。评分93分。

Western reviews.review: From an estate managed by Dany Rolland, this wine is ripe, dense and layered with black fruits. It is rich in feel from firm tannins, which will lend to its longevity. Drink from 2024. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 来自丹尼·罗兰（Dany Rolland）管理的庄园，这款红酒成熟、浓密、层次丰富，黑果味浓郁。酒感丰富，坚实的橡木味会让它长久保存。建议2024年后饮用。- 罗杰·沃斯（Roger Voss）

Western reviews.review: Nobles Parfum, tiefgründig, sehr komplex, rote und dunkle Beeren, viele Kräuter, Gräser, Laub und Süssholz. Der Gaumen ist gradlinig, klar und rein, druckvoll aber elegant, saftige Frucht, herrliche Säure, markantes, leider im Abgang ganz leicht trocknendes Tannin, dafür mit sehr guter, aromatischer Länge. Gefällt mir sehr gut. Hat Reserven. 2022-2035+ (92/100).
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论。翻译成中文如下：

芳香悠长，深度丰富，极其复杂，红色和黑色浆果，多种草本植物，草本植物，落叶和甜木香。口感平滑，清晰，纯粹，充满活力但又优雅，果实丰富，酸度出众，具有特征性的味道，但遗憾的是在尾部略微干燥的苦味，然而这也带来了非常好的香气持久度。非常喜欢。有储存价值。推荐期：2022-2035+ (92/100)

Western reviews.review: Tiefdunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung, floral unterlegte Nuancen von schwarzen Waldbeeren, ein Hauch von Edelholz, zart nach Schokolade. Komplex, stoffig, feine Brombeernoten, präsente Tannine, nussiger Touch, etwas Nougat im Finale.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，微微的边缘光泽，带有黑莓花香的花朵，黑莓的微妙风味，微微的贵木香，微微的巧克力味。复杂，厚重，细致的黑莓风味，明显的坚果味，坚果味，最后有微微的牛奶糖味。

Western reviews.review: Intense bright inky purple colour. Modern nose with fine oak, roasted coffee, cassis and dark berries. Dense and mouth filling with high extract, yet finely grainy tannins, a fresh backbone with floral dark berry flavours and a long dense finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深紫红色。酒香现代化，带有细微的橡木、烤咖啡、黑加仑和黑莓的味道。口感浓密，口感丰富，细腻的纤维，带有鲜花和黑莓的味道，长长的浓郁的尾部。

Chinese pairs.original: 2016年份起初有些轻微的还原，但只要充分摇杯，你就会立刻被酸梅、蔓越莓、红李子以及红桑果所营造出的酸甜世界所拥抱，随后，百里香和普罗旺斯草的地中海草本清凉开始触摸你的神经。这款酒的口感非常紧，感觉蕴藏着巨大的能量感，周身散发着幽紫色的光芒，神秘而引人入胜。（81%赤霞珠，19%美乐）
Chinese pairs.new: 这款酒的口感非常紧凑，充满了能量感。初尝时，会有一点轻微的还原感，但摇杯后，酸梅、蔓越莓、红李子和红桑果的酸甜味道会立即呈现。随后，百里香和普罗旺斯草的海滨草本清凉味道会开始流露。酒体散发着幽紫色的光芒，神秘而引人入胜。酒中含有81%的赤霞珠和19%的美乐葡萄。

English pairs.original: The vintage of 2016 initially presents a slight reduction, but just give it a good swirl, and you’ll be immediately embraced by a tangy and sweet world of sour plums, cranberries, red plums, and mulberries. Then, the refreshing Mediterranean herbal freshness of thyme and herbes de Provence starts to tantalize your palate. The palate is remarkably tight, teeming with intense vitality, and it emits a captivating, enigmatic purple glow that mesmerizes and fascinates. (81% Cabernet Sauvignon, 19% Merlot)
English pairs.new: 2016年的这款红酒最初给人的感觉是略微有减少的气味，但只要轻轻摇晃一下，立刻就能被一股酸甜的浆果风味所包围：酸梅、红梅、樱桃和桑椹。随后，地中海风味的迷人香气开始在口中挥之不去：迷迭香和普罗旺斯香草。口感紧致，充满着强烈的活力，酒液呈现出迷人的紫色光泽，令人着迷和着迷。 (81%卡波涅尔·索维尼诺，19%梅洛)

Western reviews.review: This has attractive, glossy, ripe red-plum and licorice aromas with cedar, flowers and red berries, as well as a stony edge. A very fragrant, cabernet-driven nose. The palate has elegance and grace with sleek and charming, balanced style and a discreet tannin structure that holds the finish long and fresh. A blend of 81 per cent cabernet sauvignon and 19 per cent merlot. Try from 2023.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有吸引人的、光泽的、成熟的红杏和甘草香气，伴有松木、花朵和红果的气息，以及石头般的边缘。酒鼻子非常芳香，Cabernet Sauvignon驱动。口感优雅，典雅，流畅的风格，平衡的口感结构，隐约的坚果结构，持久的清新味道。酒款为81%的卡波网葡萄和19%的墨尔本。建议2023年后饮用。

Western reviews.review:
This nearly 200-acre estate lies in the south of the Margaux appellation. The wine is another great success in a series of superb years. It is rich but the structure and finely textured fruit give it style and longevity. Drink the wine from 2026.
Cellar Selection
Western reviews.translation:
这座面积近200英亩的庄园位于马格努阿克（Margaux）产区的南部。这瓶酒是系列中又一项杰出的成果，尽管它富有滋味，但结构和细腻的果味使其具有风格和持久性。建议2026年后饮用。

推荐入窖。

Western reviews.review: Concentrated autumnal fruit offers a hawthorny bramble of blackberry and bilberry. Big-framed, muscular tannins are joined by plenty of acidity - it's very clearly built to last and confident in its ability to reward those with patience. Matured in 50% new oak. Axel Marchal and Valerie Lavigne consult.
Western reviews.translation: 浓郁的秋季果实呈现出黑莓和蓝莓的荆棘丛。强壮的肌肉般的苦味和充足的酸度相结合，表明这款酒是为了长久储存而设计的，相信那些有耐心的酒友会得到回报。酒龄50%在新橡木桶中陈化。阿塞尔·马尔沙尔和瓦莱丽·拉维涅参与了酒的制作。

Western reviews.review: COMMENTARY: For decades, I have found Château Giscours to be a good but not top-notch Margaux. The 2016 vintage has changed my mind, and I now put this wine up with the best wines this appellation has to offer. TASTING NOTES: This wine shows classic Margaux character. Its aromas and flavors of black fruit, dust, and mineral should plate it well with a well-marbled grilled ribeye. (Tasted: January 25, 2019, San Francisco, CA)
Western reviews.translation:
评论：几十年来，我一直认为香格拉酒庄的酒品是好酒，但不是顶级的马格朗酒。然而，2016年的酒品却让我改变了看法，现在我认为这酒品是马格朗酒庄中最好的之一。

品评：这酒品展现出典型的马格朗风格，黑果、尘土和矿物质的香气和口感，让它与一块精致的烤牛排相得益彰。

Western reviews.review: Deep garnet-purple colored, the 2016 Giscours gives up aromas of cassis, chocolate, earth, tar, pepper and hoisin with touches of flowers and a meaty nuance. The palate is medium to full-bodied, firm and grainy with a great core and a long finish.
Western reviews.translation: 2016年吉斯库尔（Giscours）红酒呈现深红紫色。酒中带有黑加仑、巧克力、泥土、焦炭、胡椒和酱油的香气，伴有花朵和肉类的细微味道。口感中等到中厚，坚实且细粒，酒中有着强烈的核心和长长的尾部。

Chinese pairs.original: 与Jean-Francois Quenin在酒庄垂直品鉴。此酒略显含蓄的香气清晰、优雅，透出大量碎岩石、香料、黑樱桃、桑葚和干花的芬芳，以及微微的黑巧克力和牛轧糖味。口感的主旋律是细腻和丝滑；通透、锐利的酸度增强了口感的滑爽同时使风味显得愈发悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine is elegantly understated, with a clear and refined aroma that showcases a wealth of crushed stone, spice, black cherry, blackberry, and dried flower notes, along with subtle hints of dark chocolate and caramel. The palate's main theme is silky smoothness, with a bright, piercing acidity that enhances the wine's velvety texture and makes its flavors feel even more lingering.

English pairs.original: A vertical tasting with Jean-Francois Quenin at the winery. Faintly restrained on the aroma that was precisely elegant, with lots of crushed stone, spices, black cherry, mulberry and dried flower perfumes, plus a hint of black chocolate and nougat. The delicateness and silkiness were the themes of the palate; brightly keen acid enhanced the polished sense and extended the length of flavour.
English pairs.new: 在酒庄与Jean-Francois Quenin一起进行的垂直品鉴。酒香轻柔优雅，带有大量的碎石、香料、黑樱桃、黑莓和干花香味，伴有黑巧克力和果冻的微妙味道。口感细腻光滑，酸度清晰明亮，增强了酒的光泽感并延长了口感。

Western reviews.review: The spicy note adds complexity to the licorice, vanilla, wild cherry and smoke in the nose. The wine is silky, soft, polished sweet and uplifted, with loads of elegant, polished, sweet, perfectly ripe red pit fruits in the finish. 94 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中，辣味的加入使得 licorice、vanilla、野樱桃和烟味变得更加复杂。酒体细腻、柔和、光滑甜美，口感丰富，尾部充满优雅、光滑、甜美的成熟红果味。评分：94分。

Western reviews.review: Black fruit with nougat and roasted aromas, mineral note, pleasant herbal savouriness. Juicy, subtle fruit sweetness, chocolate note, fine tannins, elegant and balanced, red berry nuances, mineral freshness on the finish.
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的口感非常丰富：

*   有黑果、核桃糖和烤果的香气，矿物质的味道，带有清新的草药味。
*   酒体丰富，果味甜度适中，带有巧克力味，细腻的苦味，优雅平衡，红果的细微变化，矿物质的清新味道在口感中留下了深刻的印象。

Western reviews.review: (En Primeur) Anfangs verhaltene Nase, mit mehr Luft öffnet sich der Wein, reifes Cassis, Kirschen, Weihnachtsgewürze, Torf, sehr schöne Tiefe zeigend, komplex, verspielt, würzig. Gradliniger Auftakt, dann mit schönem Schmelz, dunkle und rote Früchte, Pflaumen, wieder würzige Noten, feine Tannine, saftige Säure, sehr gut strukturiert. Im Abgang von wunderbarer Länge und mit guter Eleganz, endet feinwürzig und sehr frisch. Ein hervorragend gelungener Saint-Emilion der sowohl in seiner Jugend als auch mit Reife gefallen dürfte. 2022-2036, 18.5 vvPunkte (92/100)
Western reviews.translation:
(En Primeur) 初期闻起来比较保留，随着空气的流通，酒味逐渐打开，展现出成熟的黑加斯派（Cassis）、樱桃、圣诞树香、泥炭，非常深邃，复杂，轻佻，具有香味。

入口平稳，随后展现出美妙的融合，黑色和红色水果、浆果、再次出现香味，细腻的橡皮质，清爽的酸度，非常完美的结构。

尾部长达数秒，展现出优雅的风格，结尾清晰香味，非常清新。这个圣埃米利翁酒既在年轻时期，也在成熟时期都能获得极高的评价。推荐饮用时间：2022-2036年。评分：18.5 vvPunkte（92/100）。

Western reviews.review: Youthful and elegant nose with ripe dark fruit like cassis, blackberry, plum with tobacco with fine floral and chalky notes, some herbal sage and mint aromas, a hint of oak but certainly more of a fruity expression. Very ample palate, finely tuned with fine grained tannins, polished and glossy texture with high ripeness, ripe dark berry flavours with dry spices, chocolate, opulent with a well-integrated fresh acidity, followed by a long, lingering finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气年轻而优雅，带有成熟的黑果味，如黑加仑、黑莓、黑枣，伴有烟草、花香和石灰味，另外还有些草药和薄荷的香气，微微带有橡木味，但更倾向于果香的表达。口感丰富，细腻，纤维度细致，表面光滑，高度成熟，带有成熟黑果味，干香料，巧克力，丰富而且有着完美融合的新鲜酸度，尾部长长持久。

Western reviews.review: (65% Merlot, 18% Cabernet Franc, 11% Cabernet Sauvignon, 4% Pressac, 2% Carménère): Offene Nase, zeigt viel dunkle Frucht, würzige Noten, auch florale Töne schwingen mit. Im Gaumen dicht, konzentriert, kräftiger Körper, leicht cremig in der Textur, der Wein zeigt Fülle, ist dabei jedoch sehr elegant. Endet auf eine reife, warme Frucht und eine fast schon spicy Würze, eher rotfruchtig im Retrofinale. 2023-2035+
Western reviews.translation:
酒款成分：65% 美丽托（Merlot）、18% 卡布塞尔法兰克（Cabernet Franc）、11% 卡布塞尔沙夫宁（Cabernet Sauvignon）、4% 普雷萨克（Pressac）、2% 卡门内尔（Carménère）

酒味：开阔的鼻子，展现出大量的深色果味，香料和花香的味道也随之出现。

口感：口感浓郁，集中，体积丰富，略带奶油感，酒体充满了丰富的果味，然而仍保持着优雅的风格。酒尾留下了成熟的果味和微微的辣味，回味中呈现出典型的红酒风格。

推荐饮用年份：2023-2035年。

Chinese pairs.original: 散发着黑醋栗，黑莓和香草的气味。酒体浓郁，具有天鹅绒般的单宁，风味是浓郁的巧克力口味。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts aromas of black fig, blackberry, and subtle hints of lavender. The full-bodied texture is velvety smooth, with a rich, intense chocolate flavor profile.

Western reviews.review: Bordeaux's wet, cool 2004 vintage got lost between the exceptional 2003 and 2005, but Jean-Hubert Delon's St.-Julien estate consistently delivers excellent wines in both great and difficult years. Half of the Chateau's 250 acres are planted in the famous Clos Léoville Las Cases, a gravelly vineyard that gently slopes down to the Gironde river. The wine was fermented in a mix of stainless-steel tanks, oak vats and cement tanks, then aged for about 18 months in oak barriques.
Western reviews.translation: 波尔多地区的2004年红酒产量较低，受到潮湿、凉爽的天气影响，夹在2003年和2005年的极品年份之间。但是，让-雨果·德隆（Jean-Hubert Delon）的圣朱利安庄园（St.-Julien）始终能够在好年和坏年都生产出优质的葡萄酒。庄园的250英亩土地中有半数种植在著名的克洛斯·勒维尔·拉斯·卡斯（Clos Léoville Las Cases）葡萄园，这片葡萄园的土地是由碎石组成的，缓缓地倾斜到吉伦特河（Gironde river）边。葡萄酒在钢质储存罐、橡木桶和水泥储存罐中进行发酵，然后在橡木桶中陈化约18个月。

Western reviews.review: This "super second" lives up to its billing. It is rich and concentrated with dark tannins that lie over the ripe, jammy fruit and black, rich chocolate flavors. Acidity and wood are there, but only just hints after the richness of the fruit. A real, magnificent aging wine.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶“超级次级”红酒完全符合预期。它富有深度，浓郁，带有黑色坚果的深度苦味覆盖着成熟的果酱和黑巧克力风味。酸度和木头味在那里，但只有微弱的提示，远远低于果酱的丰富。是一瓶真正的，令人惊叹的陈年红酒。

Western reviews.review: This is so beautiful now with ceps, mushrooms, bark and blackberries, as well as some flowers and black olives. It’s full-bodied, round and soft. Lovely now. Drink and enjoy now, or hold.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒现在非常美丽，带有菌菇、蘑菇、树皮和黑莓的风味，还有花朵和黑橄榄的香气。它的口感丰富、圆润、柔和。现在就可以品尝了，或者稍微等待一下。

Western reviews.review: Performing better from bottle than it did from cask, this blend of 76% Cabernet Sauvignon, 13% Merlot, and 11% Cabernet Franc has put on weight over the last year. It exhibits the classic style of both Las Cases and St.-Julien in its deep black currant notes interwoven with sweet cherries, wet stones, and toasty vanillin. Made in a structured, medium to full-bodied style with superb concentration, beautiful purity, and admirable symmetry, this beauty is one of the strongest efforts of the vintage. Anticipated maturity: 2012-2028.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的表现从酒桶中更好过从酒桶中，混合了76%卡波内托葡萄酒，13%梅洛葡萄酒和11%卡波内托法兰克葡萄酒，过去一年里它的体积增加了。它展现了拉斯凯斯和圣朱利安的经典风格，深黑葡萄干果味和甜樱桃味，湿石和烤香味。以结构化的中等到全身重的风格制作，具有出色的浓度，美丽的纯度和可敬的对称性，这款美酒是当年最强劲的作品之一。预计成熟年份：2012-2028。

Western reviews.review: COMMENTARY: Château Léoville Las Cases often shows more like a Pauillac than a Saint-Julien in its personality. The 2004 vintage is nicely-built and demonstrative. TASTING NOTES: This wine focuses on black fruit and oak in its aromas and flavors. Enjoy it with a grilled ribeye. (Tasted: July 22, 2019, San Francisco, CA)
Western reviews.translation:
评论：沙特奥莱维尔拉斯凯斯（Château Léoville Las Cases）通常表现出更像巴约（Pauillac）而不是圣朱利安（Saint-Julien）的个性。2004年产量的酒精度较高，表现出明显的特点。

品评：本酒以黑果和橡木的气味和口感为主。建议与烤牛排（grilled ribeye）一起享用。 (品尝日期：2019年7月22日，美国加州旧金山)

Chinese pairs.original: 在2023年份口感普遍比较轻柔的情况下，Clos du Marquis 却倔强地一往直前。在它露出的臂膀之上，可以看到突出的肌肉线条，那是多少酒庄都梦想拥有的底蕴和气场。鼠尾草、普罗旺斯草伴随着酸角和桂皮在高声吟唱，石墨粉的单宁又在收尾时发出低沉的嘶吼，无不彰显着王者的气场。
Chinese pairs.new: In a year where the overall texture is generally light and approachable, Clos du Marquis stands out with its unwavering intensity. Beneath its robust shoulders, one can see the unmistakable lines of a wine with depth and presence. Lavender, Provençal herbs and a hint of acidity and pepper sing in perfect harmony, while the graphite-like tannins unleash a low, rumbling growl on the finish, exuding an unmistakable air of regality.

English pairs.original: In a vintage known for its softer profiles, Clos du Marquis stands out with its pronounced muscular contours, depth, and presence. A harmony of sage, Provencal herbs, tamarind, and cinnamon create a loud chant on the palate, while the graphite powder tannins deliver a deep roar at the finish. All of this underscores the aura of a sovereign.
English pairs.new: 在一代酒款以柔和风格为主的葡萄酒中，克洛德马里西斯（Clos du Marquis）却以其强健的肌肉、深度和存在感独领风骚。口感上，山楂、普罗旺斯香草、柑橘和肉桂的和谐呼声震耳欲聋，而图形粉末般的苦味成分在尾部则发出低沉的轰鸣。所有这一切都凸显了这酒款的权威气质。

Western reviews.review: This offers beautiful blackcurrants and blackberries with hints of chocolate and walnuts. Medium- to full-bodied with vivid acidity that adds tension and freshness to the mid-palate. It’s full of life and vibrancy, very fine and polished, and with nicely integrated tannins. Long finish. 56% cabernet sauvignon, 35% merlot and 9% cabernet franc. What will be better between 2022 and 2023?Barrel Sample: 95-96
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒呈现出优美的黑currant和黑berry风味，伴有巧克力和坚果的微妙气息。口感中等到中重，酸度清晰明亮，给予中口层次紧张感和新鲜感。酒体充满生机和活力，细腻光滑，纤维柔和地融合在一起。尾韵长长。酒中含有56%卡波雷尔葡萄，35%梅洛葡萄和9%法兰克葡萄。2022年和2023年哪一年更好？酒桶样品：95-96分。

Western reviews.review: The 2023 Clos du Marquis might very well be the best Clos du Marquis I have ever tasted. A wine of freshness and verve, the 2023 is all nuance. Sweet red plum, blood orange, spice, flowers, mint and white pepper are all finely cut. The 2023 shows more vibrancy, less oak extraction and more refined tannins than in the past. It’s a glorious wine in every way. This early tasting is hugely promising. Clos du Marquis could turn out to be one of the real surprises of 2023. –Antonio GalloniBarrel Sample: 93-95
Western reviews.translation:
2023年克洛德马里斯（Clos du Marquis）可能是我尝过的最好的克洛德马里斯。这个酒的新鲜感和活力让人印象深刻，2023年的克洛德马里斯充满细微差别。酒中有甜红杏、血橙、香料、花朵、薄荷和白胡椒的味道，所有这些元素都被精心切割。与以往相比，2023年的克洛德马里斯更有活力， oak提取度更低，纤维素更细腻。它在各个方面都是一个辉煌的酒。这个早期品尝的结果非常有希望。克洛德马里斯可能会成为2023年的真正惊喜之一。 –安东尼奥·加隆尼（Antonio Galloni）

酒桶样品：93-95分

Western reviews.review: A beautiful Saint-Julien from the team of Léoville Las Cases, the 2023 Clos Du Marquis offers a deep purple hue as well as terrific aromatics of red and black fruits, saddle leather, graphite, and dried flowers. I love its complexity, and it's medium to full-bodied on the palate, with a concentrated, layered style. It brings plenty of density and mid-palate depth, has ripe tannins, and outstanding length.Barrel Sample: 92-94
Western reviews.translation: 来自勒维尔拉斯凯斯团队的美丽圣朱利安，2023年克洛德马克西斯提供了深紫色的外观以及红黑果实、马鞍皮革、石墨和干花的迷人香气。 我喜欢它的复杂性，它在口感上是中等到全身的，口感浓郁，层次丰富。它带来了丰富的密度和中口深度，具有成熟的纽扣和出色的长度。 桶样品：92-94分。

Western reviews.review: Great aromatics, fresh and lively but deep and opulent too - ripe blackcurrant and plum with some cool blueberries. Smooth and sumptuous, classy and finessed. A complete wine - this has structure and a certain level of power but with such fine tannins, almost creamy. Layered and complex but effortless in its construction. Really beautifully delivered. Crunchy, but chalky, some minerality and mouthwatering acidity. Brilliant harmony and balance and sense of weight in terms of texture. Barrel Sample: 94
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的芳香丰富，新鲜活泼又深沉豪华，带有熟黑加仑和浓郁的黑桃味，伴有清凉的蓝莓味。口感细腻丰富，优雅典雅，完美无缺。酒中结构坚实，具有一定的力量，但由于细腻的橡皮质，几乎是奶油般的。酒中层次丰富复杂，但结构却轻松自然。酒呈现出清脆的口感，带有 chalky 的矿物质和令人垂涎的酸度。酒的和谐与平衡令人惊叹，酒的重量感也非常自然。酒样评分：94分。

Western reviews.review: The 2023 Clos du Marquis is a rather serious, structured wine, evocative of cherries, dark berries and kirsch, framed by a touch of creamy new oak. Medium to full-bodied and fleshy but structured, it's a taut, concentrated wine that will reward some patience.Barrel Sample: 91-93
Western reviews.translation: 2023年克洛德马基斯红酒是一种相当严肃、结构化的葡萄酒，具有浓郁的樱桃、黑莓和基尔什风味，伴有轻微的新橡木奶油感。中等到中等以上的体积，丰富但结构化，紧致浓郁的葡萄酒，需要耐心才能体现出其价值。酒桶样品：91-93分。

Chinese pairs.original: 2019简直就是为生物动力酒庄量身订制的好年份，炎热干燥的天气大大缓解了霜霉病的风险，也终于让Ferriere迎来了比较理想的产量。 Ferriere标志性的紧致结构依然强劲，但很快就被柔软的口感所包裹。香气纯净芬芳，散发着雅致的莓果芬芳和淡淡的茶梗清凉，是一款身形匀称、毫无媚俗之气的温婉型玛歌佳酿。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2019 vintage was tailor-made for the biodynamic estate, as the hot and dry weather greatly reduced the risk of frost and finally brought a more ideal yield to Ferriere. Ferriere's signature taut structure remains robust, but is soon enveloped by a soft texture. The nose is pure and fragrant, releasing elegant raspberry aromas and a hint of tea leaf freshness, making this a well-proportioned, unpretentious and charming wine.

English pairs.original: 2019 is the perfect vintage for biodynamic Wines. The scorching dry weather greatly alleviates the risk of mildew and finally allows Ferriere to have a more ideal production. Ferriere’s signature solid structure remains strong, but it is soon embraced by a smooth texture on the mid-palate. With a pure, chic aroma of berries and a hint of lively tea stalks, it becomes a decent, refined, gentle, and perfectly proportional Margaux wine.
English pairs.new: 2019年是生态葡萄酒的理想产季。酷热干燥的天气大大降低了霉菌的风险，终于使费里埃尔(Ferriere)能够实现理想的生产。费里埃尔的标志性坚实结构仍然坚固，但很快被中口的细腻质感所包围。带有纯净、时尚的浆果香气和活泼的茶叶茎香味的费里埃尔，是一款细致、优雅、温和且比例完美的马格努(Margaux)葡萄酒。

Western reviews.review:
The rich Cabernet Sauvignon of this wine is beautifully in evidence. With its dense tannins as a foil to the fruit, the wine has both power and finesse. Biodynamic farming has added to the purity of the fruit. It is a fine wine, rich in texture and shows potential future aging.
Barrel Sample: 94-96
Western reviews.translation:
这款红酒的卡贝网酒（Cabernet Sauvignon）风味非常丰富，优雅地展现出来。酒中浓郁的苦味（tannins）与果味形成对比，使得酒具有强大的力量和细致的技巧。通过生物动力农业（Biodynamic farming）使得果味更加纯粹。酒的质感丰富，展现出明显的成熟潜力，是一款精美的佳酿，具有未来可期的陈年潜力。

酒评：94-96分（酒桶样品）

Western reviews.review: Blackberries, blackcurrants, violets, bitter chocolate, clay and gravel on the nose. It’s medium-bodied with firm, very fine and integrated tannins. Beautiful texture. Structured, yet with a soft, supple feel. Subtle. 20% in concrete eggs. 70% cabernet sauvignon, 25% merlot and 5% petit verdot. From biodynamically grown grapes with Demeter certification.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中包含了黑莓、黑加仑、紫罗兰、苦巧克力、黏土和碎石的味道。酒体中有中等的体积，具有坚实的、细致的、融合的橡果。酒感细腻，结构良好，柔软舒适。酒中含有20%的混酿酒，70%的卡波雷尔葡萄，25%的梅洛葡萄和5%的佩蒂·维多葡萄。酒用来自有机生长的葡萄，获得德米特尔认证。

Western reviews.review:
There feels to be a real step change in Ferrière this year, with a greater density of fruit and a richer seam of freshness. They have made a few changes in the vineyard, most notably pulling up Merlot that they felt wasn't working and leaving only the oldest Merlots that date back to the 1950s. We may also be feeling the impact of the clay in the gravel soils that helped hold freshness in this hot summer, as well as a reductive style of working in the cellar, bringing SO2 additions down low. Whatever it is, there is violet edging to the colour, a deliciously sappy, energetic quality to the wine, with bright berry fruits, chocolate shavings and a gentle gunsmoke edge that brings interest and grace. 40% new oak, 20% amphoras and cement eggs, and the rest in one year barrels. 3% Petit Verdot completes the blend.
Barrel Sample: 94
Western reviews.translation:
今年的费里埃酒庄有了明显的进步，酒中的果实更加浓郁，新鲜度更加丰富。酒庄在葡萄园中进行了一些调整，主要是砍掉了不太适合的梅洛葡萄，只留下最古老的梅洛葡萄（ dating back to the 1950s）。夏季炎热的天气中，葡萄园中的粘土可能也起到了作用，帮助保持了酒中的新鲜度。此外，酒庄在酿酒过程中采用了更为保守的方法，减少了硫化物的添加。无论如何，这款酒的颜色带有紫色调，酒中有着令人愉悦的果实感，充满活力，具有明亮的浆果风味，巧克力片和轻微的烟火味。酒中使用了40%新橡木桶，20%陶罐和水泥蛋，剩余部分使用了一年陈化的橡木桶。酒中还包含了3%的佩蒂·维多葡萄。 

酒样评分：94分。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有芳香的李子、黑莓和黑醋栗香气。入口能感受到强烈的黑樱桃、意式咖啡和旖旎的黑浆果味道。酒体丰盈，单宁细滑，余韵悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of fragrant plum, blackberry, and black truffle. Flavors of intense black cherry, Italian espresso, and alluring black fruit on the palate. Full-bodied with smooth tannins and a long, lingering finish.

Western reviews.review: Aromas of blackberries and meat with hints of spices. Full body, with round and juicy tannins. Lots of wood right now but loads of focused fruit too. This is structured and powerful. Needs at least five to six years to come around. Best Monbousquet ever?
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的气味是黑莓和肉类的混合，带有些许的香料味。酒体丰富，口感圆润，纤维柔滑。目前酒中木头味很浓，但也能感受到丰富的果味。这瓶酒结构严谨，力量十足。需要至少五到六年才能达到最佳状态。目前看来，这是蒙布索克（Monbousquet）历史上最好的酒。

Western reviews.review: This very structured, but polished, style shows a solid coat of coffee for the large core of crushed fig, plum sauce and steeped black currant fruit. Stays dense, but has a strong graphite and iron edge buried deeply on the finish, which should let this assimilate in the cellar. Lovely mineral, sanguine edge. Beautifully built. Best from 2014 through 2030. 7,500 cases made.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的风格非常结构化，但又非常光滑。它展现出一层厚厚的咖啡色外壳，覆盖着一大块的干酪葡萄、浓缩的浆果和浸泡黑加拿大果实。它保持着厚实的质地，但在尾部却有着强烈的石墨和铁的边缘，这应该让它在酒窖中逐渐融合。它具有美丽的矿物质和血红色边缘。它的构建非常完美。建议从2014年到2030年饮用。生产了7500瓶。

Western reviews.review: This exuberant, flamboyant, modern-styled St.-Emilion from Gerard and Chantal Perse is plump, succulent and irresistible in 2009. Yields were a low 28 hectoliters per hectare, and the blend was a classic combination of 70% Merlot and the rest primarily Cabernet Franc and a tiny dollop of Cabernet Sauvignon. The alcohol of 14.2% is typical for a Monbousquet. Copious notes of toasty oak, vanillin, jammy black and red fruits intermixed with notions of wood fire barbecue, roasted espresso and chocolate jump from the glass of this fleshy, exotic, impressively endowed, full-bodied, silky smooth, opulent 2009. It should drink well for 15+ years.
Western reviews.translation: 蒙布索克特（Monbousquet）2009年红酒，由杰拉德和尚塔尔·佩尔塞（Gerard and Chantal Perse）打造。这个充满活力的圣埃米利翁（St.-Emilion）红酒在2009年呈现出丰富的口感，口感丰富，令人难以抗拒。产量仅为28公斤/公顷，酒款中70%为梅洛（Merlot），其余主要为卡波弗朗（Cabernet Franc）和少量卡波萨维（Cabernet Sauvignon）。酒精含量为14.2%，这是蒙布索克特的典型特征。酒中充满了烤箱香气、焦糖黑红果味、木火烤肉、烤咖啡和巧克力等复杂的香气。这个富有魅力的红酒具有丰富的口感，滑顺，充满活力，应能在15年以上的时间内保持最佳口感。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau d’Issan 2022 的香气宛若云丝般柔美，每一缕香气都薄如蝉翼，藏在紫色的酒液中又是那么清晰可见。奶油草莓、风信子、甘草糖、烤血橙、可可粉的香气翻腾跳跃，尽显变幻；含在口中，仿佛能够看到它们随风舞动的曼妙身姿。收尾时一抹单宁很有讲究，让本就软糯的酒体显得更加层次分明，也让我们在干热年份感受了到了“迪仙最温柔的馈赠”。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau d'Issan 2022 的香气如同轻柔的云丝，每一缕香气都细如蝉翼，清晰地浮现在紫色的酒液中。奶油草莓、风信子、甘草糖、烤血橙和可可粉的香气交织在一起，呈现出多变的风景。口感柔和，仿佛能看到这些香气随风舞动的美丽姿态。酒尾处有一丝单宁，突出了酒体的层次感，使得这款酒在干热年份显得更加温柔和细致。

English pairs.original: The aroma of Chateau d’Issan 2022 is as soft as a wisp of cloud, each scent is crystal clear as a gossamer. On the palate, you can see the fragrance of creamy strawberries, hyacinths, licorice candy, roasted blood orange, and cocoa powder dancing in the wind. The subtle touch of tannins on the finish is exquisitely crafted, giving the already smooth texture an even more distinct layering, and it allows us to experience the Issan’s “gentle gift” in the hot and dry vintage.
English pairs.new: 伊桑庄园2022年红酒的香气如同轻纱般柔和，每一道香气都清晰细致。口感上，鲜 strawberries、百合花、 licorice糖、烤血橙和巧克力粉在口中跳跃舞动。尾部的轻微苦味完美地打造，给原本细腻的口感又增添了一层细致的层次，让我们在干热的年份中体验到伊桑庄园的“温柔礼物”。

Western reviews.review: Zurückhaltend, aber besonders komplex und von absoluter Klasse; dichter, fleischiger Auftakt, entwickelt Wucht und Tiefe, klingt lang aus, temperamentvoll, sogar recht feurig und doch nicht schwerfällig; ein Urwein, für die Ewigkeit gebaut.
Western reviews.translation:
这段红酒评论的中文翻译是：

谨慎但极具复杂性和绝对品质；浓密的、肉感的开头，发展出强劲的力量和深度，音量长久，激情四溢，甚至有些烈焰，但并非沉重；这是一个原始的葡萄酒，造就了永恒。

Western reviews.review: Violets, black cherries, blueberries, blackberries, cocoa, cedar, and cigar box fill the aromatics. On the palate, the wine is lively, creamy, deep, long, and most importantly pure. The tannins are silky, and even with all this ripeness, and concentration, the wine remains fresh, vibrant, long and sensuous. This is undoubtedly the finest vintage of d'Issan ever produced! The wine is made from a blend of 65% Cabernet Sauvignon, 30% Merlot, 2% Cabernet Franc, 2% Malbec and 1% Petit Verdot. 14.64% ABV, 3.67 pH. This is the only the third vintage to include 5 Bordeaux varietals in the blend. Picking took place September 15 - September 28. Yields were 30 hectoliters per hectare. Drink from 2027-2055. 95-97 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中充满了紫罗兰、黑樱桃、蓝莓、黑莓、可可、松木和雪茄盒的味道。口感上，酒精丰富、奶油般滑顺、深度极佳、持久且纯粹。酒中的纤维素细滑，尽管酒精丰富且浓缩，但酒仍保持新鲜、活泼、持久和诱人。毫无疑问，这是迄今为止最好的d'Issan年份。酒精由65%卡波弗雷蒙、30%梅洛、2%卡波弗兰克、2%马尔贝克和1%佩蒂维多特的混合而成。14.64% ABV，3.67 pH。这是仅有的第三个包括5种波尔多品种的混合。采摘于9月15日至9月28日。产量为每公顷30公升。建议于2027-2055年饮用。评分95-97分。

Western reviews.review: Noble Nase, sehr tiefgründig, komplex, fruchtige und florale Töne, viel dunkle Frucht, verspielt. Der Gaumen ist seidenweich, top Gerbstoffqualität, feine Säure, die Frucht ist knackig, die Harmonie stimmt. Langer Abgang. Ein grossartiger Issan! (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / Vintex / Château Ripeau) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论，翻译如下：

诺布纳斯（Noble Nase），非常深入，复杂，果香和花香味道，很多黑色果味，轻佻。口感细腻，顶级的橡木味，细微的酸度，果味清脆，和谐的味道。尾部长长。是一瓶极好的伊萨克（Issan）！(评分于2023年4月，Vintex/ Château Ripeau)

Western reviews.review: Le nez est fruité, frais, pulpeux et offre une certaine concentration, une fine droiture, un petit côté macération. Il exprime les notes de prune violette pulpeuse/juteuse, de framboise charnue et plus légèrement – de petits fruits rouges écrasées, associées à de fines touches de fruits rôtis ainsi qu’à des pointes de badiane, de grave fraiches/iodées, des pointes de tabac blond sucré et a une très discrète pointe de sève chaude en fond. La bouche est fruitée et offre de la fraicheur, de la minéralité, de la souplesse et de la subtilité dans sa droiture. Elle exprime les notes de cerise pulpeuse/juteuse, de framboise pulpeuse/charnue et plus légèrement – de petits fruits éclatants/frais associés à des touches de myrtille, de prune pulpeuse/juteuse, ainsi qu’à des pointes de bleuet, de cardamone, de réglisse, de chocolat, de vanillé, de salinité/iode. De l’harmonie, du soyeux, de la puissance dans sa fraicheur et une certaine droiture /classe. Main de fer dans un gant de velours. Les tannins sont veloutés, élégants, racés. De la gourmandise.
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的香气是果香的，新鲜的，富有果肉的感觉，具有某种程度的浓缩度，细致的直线性，略带有浸泡的味道。它表达了紫色浆果的浆果味道，浆果味道，略带有轻微的果肉味道，结合了轻微的烤果味道和丁香的味道，以及冷冻的海盐味道，轻微的烟草味道和温暖的汁液味道。

口感是果香的，具有新鲜感，矿物质感，柔软感和细致感。它表达了浆果的浆果味道，浆果味道，略带有轻微的果肉味道，结合了轻微的蓝莓味道，浆果味道，浆果味道，以及轻微的黑莓味道，卡达米诺味道，糖浆味道，香草味道，盐味道和海盐味道。

这瓶红酒具有和谐感，细致感，力量感和新鲜感，具有某种程度的直线性和品质感。它像是一只手套一样温柔，但又像是一只铁拳一样强大。它的纤维是柔软的，优雅的，精致的。它具有丰富的口感。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark ruby, opaque core, purple reflections, subtly brighter at the rim. Hints of fresh fig and orange zest, ripe plum and sweet cherry and in the background, a touch of noble wood. Juicy, fine fruit, fine acid structure, ripe cherry and integrated tannins. Despite its content, surprising freshness and elegance, with very good length and definite ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，几乎透明的核心，紫色反射，边缘略微更亮。酒中带有新鲜的枣和橙子皮的香气，成熟的李子和甜的樱桃，背景中有一点高贵的木头味。酒口入口清新，果味丰富，酸度结构细致，成熟的樱桃和融合的苦味。酒中有令人惊讶的清新和优雅，酒尾长且有明显的陈化潜力。

Chinese pairs.original: 属于木桐菲利普罗斯柴尔德男爵集团所有。酒液在25%新的法国桶内陈年12个月。垂直品鉴中的2005年份和2016年份都让我感到惊叹——两者的品质可轻松媲美波尔多列级酒庄。相比传统、古典的2005年份，2016年份在风格上要新派很多。此酒的香气充满甜花、白胡椒香料和黑色水果芬芳。质地顺滑，伴有相当多汁的果味。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine is owned by the Château Philippe Rosset Rothschild estate. The liquid aged for 12 months in 25% new French oak barrels. Both the 2005 and 2016 vintages in vertical tastings left me impressed - their quality easily rivals that of top-tier Bordeaux châteaux. Compared to the traditional, classic 2005, the 2016 is much more modern in style. The wine's aroma is full of sweet flowers, white pepper spices and black fruit fragrances. The texture is smooth, with a rich, juicy fruit flavor.

English pairs.original: Belongs to Baron Philippe de Rothschild (Mouton). Aging 12 months in 25% new French oak barrels. I was so much surprised by the 2005 and the 2016 in the vertical tasting--both of them could easily rival the Bordeaux GCC. When compared the old-fashioned and classical 2005, the 2016 was much more modern in style. Sweet flowers, white pepper-like spices and black fruits suffused the aroma. Smoothly textured, with fairly juicy fruitiness.
English pairs.new: 属于巴隆菲利普·德·罗得施德（Mouton）家族。陈酿12个月，使用25%新法兰克的橡木桶。通过垂直品鉴，我对2005年和2016年的惊喜--两者都可以与波尔多GCC相媲美。当与古典的2005年相比，2016年的风格更加现代化。花香、白胡椒类香料和黑色水果充满了芳香。质地细腻，果味丰富。

Western reviews.review: Balsamische Obertöne, Blaubeerkompott, Zimt, Tapenade, noble Hölzer, viel Geschmeidigkeit, sandiges Tannin, hohe Verdichtung, aber dabei nicht massiv oder alkoholisch, schokoladig in den Gaumenaromen, weit gefasst, dennoch bei allem Extrakt auch elegant, kalkmineralsich grundiert. Ulrich Sautter
Western reviews.translation:
这段红酒评论翻译成中文如下：

浓郁的香气，蓝莓酱味，肉桂味，橄榄酱味，高档木头味，滑顺的口感，沙沙的苦味，高密度，但不重口，不酒精味，口感中有巧克力味，味道广泛，但在所有的浓郁中仍然优雅，矿物质味道基础。 - Ulrich Sautter

Western reviews.review: Bright dark purple colour. Pure and layered nose with ripe dark fruit like cassis, plum, tobacco, fine spices and leather with modest oak. The palate is structured and concentrated, still youthful but fine-tuned with ripe tannin, good oak integration, layers of crème de cassis, plum, aromatic herbs and tobacco with a finely preserved freshness and a long dense finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深紫红色。酒香清晰丰富，层次感强，展现出成熟的黑果如黑加仑、黑桃、烟草、精致的香料和皮革的味道，轻微的橡木味。口感结构紧致，浓郁，仍然年轻但细腻，具有成熟的橡皮质，良好的橡木融合，层次感丰富的黑加仑、黑桃、芳香植物和烟草味道，保留了细致的新鲜感和长长的浓密尾韵。

Chinese pairs.original: 仅是闻香就能感受到Chateau Sociando-Mallet 2020 傲人的浓郁度。包裹着甘草和大料辛香的各种黑色水果让整个酒杯充满光芒。这款酒的丰韵感让人应接不暇：一缕缕的奶油蓝莓、一层层的细密单宁、一朵朵盛开的牡丹，随着”回鼻香”的节奏不断延展，品完5分钟后依然口齿留香。作为酒评人，如果不把这样出色的葡萄酒推荐给你，那就是我的失职了。
Chinese pairs.new: This Chateau Sociando-Mallet 2020 is a powerhouse of a wine, with an intoxicating aroma that fills the glass. Rich black fruits, wrapped in licorice and spice, shine brightly. The wine's opulent texture is a joy to behold: velvety blueberries, fine-grained tannins, and a bouquet of peonies that unfold in perfect harmony. As the nose returns to the glass, the flavors linger, leaving a lasting impression even five minutes later. As a wine critic, it would be a dereliction of duty not to recommend this exceptional wine to you.

English pairs.original: Chateau Sociando-Mallet 2020’s powerful intensity is evident only from the nose. The diverse dark fruits coated in licorice and spices give the glass a luminous appearance. This wine’s richness overpowers you with layers of delicate tannins, flowering peonies, and wisps of creamy blueberries. These flavors extend with the rhythm of retro-olfaction, and it lingers on the palate for more than five minutes after tasting. I would be negligent if I did not commend this exceptional wine to you as a wine critic.
English pairs.new: 沙利多-马莱特庄园2020年的强烈风味仅从鼻子中体现出来。各种黑色水果被覆盖在 licorice 和香料中，给玻璃带来光彩夺目。这个酒的丰富感会让你感到震撼，层次丰富的细腻橡胶、盛开的牡丹和奶油蓝莓的味道让人难以抗拒。这些味道在口中延续着节奏，甚至在品尝后五分钟以上仍然萦绕在口中。作为一名酒评人，我不能不高度推荐这个出色的酒。

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Rubinrot und mit einem Bilderbucht Cabernet-Duft; Cassis, Brombeere, Graphit, subtile Röstnoten, Lakritze. Am Gaumen jugendlich, jedoch erstaunlich gut zugänglich, ungemein knackig, dicht gebaut, dabei sehr elegant, die Tannine markieren, verleihen Struktur und eine anregende Herbe. Langer, dunkelfruchtiger Abgang. 2023-2050
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

深红色，带有浓郁的卡贝网气味，带有黑加仑、黑莓、石墨、微妙的烤果和 licorice 的香气。口感年轻，但非常容易入口，非常清脆，结构紧密，非常优雅，苦味物质清晰，给出了结构和刺激的味道。长长的，深色果味尾部。推荐饮用时间：2023-2050。

Western reviews.review: Precise and juicy on the nose showing notes of fruits of the forest such as raspberries and currants blended with hints hot citron and grapefruit. Medium bodied, light tannins and a finale with good distension. Drink now.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气精确而浓郁，展现出森林果树的风味，如草莓和黑加仑，混合着柑橘和葡萄柚的微妙香气。口感中等，轻微的苦味，尾部有很好的延展。建议立即饮用。

Western reviews.review: Aromas of blueberry and wild cherry with floral tones. Firmly built, fine-grained tannins, fresh and taut, richly structured fruit, without green tones, well-integrated acidity, profound mineral aspect, moderate finish. Polished and compact, classic Sociando.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的气味中带有蓝莓和野樱桃的香气，伴有花朵的香气。酒体坚实，纤维细腻，新鲜紧致，丰富的果味，没有青涩的味道，酸度与酒体完美融合，矿物质的深度，尾部平衡。整体上，酒体光滑紧致，典型的 Sociando风格。

Western reviews.review: Deeply colored, with a nose offering flowers, touches of chocolate, wet earth, herbs and dark red spicy fruits. The wine is full-bodied, with a generous splash of black fruits, savory herbs and cocoa. Long and full in the mouth, this will age and develop for at least 3 decades with little effort. 92-94
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的颜色，酒香中带有花朵、巧克力、湿土、香草和黑红色浓郁果实的味道。酒体丰富，口感丰富，带有黑色浓郁果实、香草和可可的味道。酒口长长的，口感丰富，酒龄至少30年，几乎不需要任何努力。评分：92-94分。

Western reviews.review: Wow, quel beau vin! Comme toujours la qualité est au rendez-vous de ce noble cru bourgeois qui est reconnu comme un modèle du Haut-Médoc, par sa typicité et sa puissance. C'est le genre de vin qui, bien que viril dans sa jeunesse, dévoilera à maturité toute l'étendue de sa richesse. Une robe d'un rubis intense nous incite à humer ce nez complexe qui dégage des parfums irrésistibles de cassis, de fleurs, de fruits rouges, de nuances épicées, accompagnés de notes de torréfaction et de moka très séduisantes. En bouche, il démontre une matière impressionnante, une concentration fabuleuse. C'est un vin tout en finesse sur de beaux tannins tendres et enrobés. Une très bonne persistance sur le fruit et un ensemble équilibré possédant juste assez d’extraits et beaucoup de saveur. Un grand vin! Servir à 18 °C Accompagnera une côtelette d'agneau au vin rouge, un filet de boeuf sauce au cabernet sauvignon ou un steak de thon poivré.
Western reviews.translation: 这个红酒简直太棒了！就像往常一样，这个高档的红酒品质再次出色，证明了它的高品质和典型风格。它被认为是上美多克地区的典范。虽然年轻时它可能显得有些强烈，但随着时间的推移，它会展现出其丰富的风味。它的深红色酒液让人忍不住想闻它的香气，这种香气复杂而迷人，带有黑currant、花朵、红果、辛辣的味道，以及烤焦和咖啡的诱人香气。口感丰富，浓缩度极高。它是一种细腻的红酒，具有柔软的橡皮质和丰富的口感。酒尾持久，果味丰富，风味平衡，具有适量的复杂性和丰富的口感。一个真正的好酒！建议在18°C的温度下饮用。可以与红酒烤羊排、牛排Cabernet Sauvignon酱汁或辣椒的黄鳝 steak一起食用。

Chinese pairs.original: 2020年份的Chateau Malescot Saint-Exupery 继续优雅着 。山楂果酸爽清甜、玫瑰花雅香四溢，闻香时能让人忘记了干热年份的存在。口感纯净飘逸，回甘清澈明亮，那通透的酒体仿如一枚晶莹剔透的水晶，所有内容在它的身体里都能折射出七彩的光线。喜欢纯净风格葡萄酒的朋友一定不要错过这种飞一般的体验。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2020 Chateau Malescot Saint-Exupery remains elegant. The tart cherry fruit is crisp and sweet, with a profusion of rose petal nuances that transport you away from the dry, hot vintage. The palate is pure and ethereal, with a bright, crystal-clear finish that shines like a flawless crystal, refracting every color of the rainbow. Fans of pure, unadulterated wines will not want to miss this sublime experience.

English pairs.original: Chateau Malescot Saint-Exupery 2020 continues to be elegant. The hawthorn is sour, fresh, and sweet while the delicate aromas of roses are everywhere, making you forget the existence of the dry and hot vintage when you start to smell. The palate is pure and ethereal, the length is clean and bright, and the transparent body is like a flawless crystal, in which all contents can radiate brilliant and colorful light. If you are into pure-style wines, please do not miss this wine, for it will show you the meaning of magnificence.
English pairs.new: 查泰aux马莱斯科圣-埃克塞普里 2020红酒依旧优雅。 Hawthorn的酸甜味道清新而甜美，玫瑰花的细腻香气弥漫其中，让人忘却干燥炎热的当年季节一旦闻到香气。口感纯粹而神秘，长度清晰而明亮，透明的体现如同无瑕的水晶，所有内容都可以辉映出灿烂的色彩。若您喜爱纯粹风格的红酒，请不要错过这款红酒，它将为您呈现出“壮丽”的含义。

Western reviews.review: (49% Merlot, 44% Cabernet Sauvignon, 4% Cabernet Franc, 3% Petit Verdot, 13.5%) Reduktive Nase, braucht Zeit, eher dunkelfruchtig, rauchige Noten. Der Gaumen ist dicht, top strukturiert, ein kompakter Fruchtkern, viel Gerbstoff. Der Abgang ist lang, würzig und reiffruchtig. Muss etwas reifen. 2028-2045 (Verkostet am 8. November 2022 in Zürich)
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的成分是：49% 美丽托（Merlot）、44% 卡波弗雷（Cabernet Sauvignon）、4% 卡波弗朗（Cabernet Franc）、3% Petit Verdot，酒精度为 13.5%。

酒的香气是减少式的，需要时间来释放，主要是深色果味和烟熏味。

口感丰富，结构完美，果肉紧实，含有大量的鞣质。酒尾长长，味道浓郁，带有成熟的果味。

这瓶红酒需要时间来成熟，推荐储存时间为2028-2045年。

Western reviews.review: Ripe red cherries, nuances of rose hips and sea buckthorn, delicate nougat, candied orange zest. Juicy, elegant, ripe cherry fruit, lovely fruit expression, ripe, integrated tannins, fresh, well-structured, very well-balanced. One for the cellar.
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的口感非常丰富：

红果味浓郁，带有玫瑰果和海棠果的微妙香气，细腻的果仁糖和橙子皮糖浆味。口感丰富，果味清新，果香浓郁，坚果味柔和，结构紧致，平衡完美。值得放入酒窖中储存。

Western reviews.review: Incredibly dark in color, the nose jumps with smoked currants, burning embers, singed cherries, spice and flowers. The wine is plush, dense, full-bodied and rich, with layers of polished, velvety dark red fruits that coat and soothe your palate, finishing with dark chocolate, sweet plums, licorice and espresso. Give this at least 8 or more years in the cellar and the wine is going to really start to show. 95-97 Pts
Western reviews.translation: 颜色深如墨，酒香中弥漫着焦炭浆果、燃烧的炭火、焦黑的樱桃、香料和花朵的味道。酒体丰富、浓郁、富有层次，口感滑顺，黑红果酱的味道覆盖着你的口腔，最后留下了巧克力、甜石榴、甘草和浓缩咖啡的味道。将酒放入酒窖至少8年以上，酒的品质将会更加出色。评分：95-97分。

Western reviews.review: Medium to deep ruby-red, not quite opaque. There are juicy red-berry aromas on the nose. Fruit on the palate is of jammy red-berry/red-cherry, thereis also cedary vanilla oak. there is a fair structure comprising slightly drying tannins. There is a touch of alcohol warmth, but fresh acidity gives the fruit good length. 05/21 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深红色，透明度不完全。

香气：果香浓郁，红果味浓郁。

口感：果味浓郁，类似于果酱般的红果和红樱桃味，伴有松木和香草的味道。口感结构良好，略带干涩的苦味。酒中有微微的酒精感，但清新酸度使果味延长。评分：05/21 DCAMW。

Western reviews.review: (49% Merlot, 44% Cabernet Sauvignon, 4% Cabernet Franc, 3% Petit Verdot, 13.5%) Reduktive Nase, braucht Zeit, eher dunkelfruchtig, rauchige Noten. Der Gaumen ist dicht, top strukturiert, ein kompakter Fruchtkern, viel Gerbstoff. Der Abgang ist lang, würzig und reiffruchtig. Muss etwas reifen. 2028-2045 (Verkostet am 8. November 2022 in Zürich)
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的成分是：49% 美丽托（Merlot）、44% 卡波弗雷（Cabernet Sauvignon）、4% 卡波弗朗（Cabernet Franc）、3% Petit Verdot，酒精度为 13.5%。

酒的香气是减少式的，需要时间来释放，主要是深色果味和烟熏味。

口感丰富，结构完美，果肉紧实，含有大量的鞣质。酒尾长长，味道浓郁，带有成熟的果味。

这瓶红酒需要时间来成熟，推荐储存时间为2028-2045年。

Chinese pairs.original: 三得利集团（龙阁酒庄的所有者）拥有龙船酒庄一半的所有权和管理权（另一半属于卡思黛乐酒业）。有机耕作。酒庄在酿造方面采用了大量高科技设备：混合了3种方式的浸渍管理（淋皮、压帽和返罐），但全部是由机器来完成的；温控发酵；乳酸发酵始于不锈钢罐，结束于橡木桶；在50%新的法国桶内醇化18个月；不过滤。在10月份品尝的橡木桶样酒。此酒极富表现力的香气充满了春花香，以无花果、树莓、红樱桃和香料矿物味做点缀。圆润的口感展现大量丝滑的单宁，但由于清新的酸度及轮廓清晰的矿物质的存在，整体依然非常平衡、优雅。
Chinese pairs.new:
三得利集团拥有龙阁酒庄一半的所有权和管理权。酒庄采用有机耕作，并使用高科技设备进行酿造，包括混合浸渍管理、温控发酵、乳酸发酵和无过滤。 

酒的香气极富表现力，充满春花香，伴有无花果、树莓、红樱桃和香料矿物味。口感圆润，单宁丰富，但清新的酸度和清晰的矿物质使得酒的平衡和优雅。

English pairs.original: Suntory (the proprietor of Chateau Lagrange) possesses the half of the ownership and management of Beychevelle (another half belongs to Castel). Organic farming. The estate applies lots of high-tech facilities for the vinification: mixed the three methods (pumping over, punching down and rack&return) of maceration management, but all done by machines; fermentation is temperature-controlled; MLF starts in stainless steel tanks and finishes in oak barrels; maturing 18 months in oak, of which only 50% is new each year; racking every 9 months; the wine is unfiltered. Barrel sample tasted in October. The expressive sniff was full of spring flowers laced with fig, raspberry, red cherry and spicy-mineral. The palate showed loads of silky tannins that provided the rounded sense but overall it's still nicely balanced and beautifully refined due to the refreshing acid and defined minerality.
English pairs.new:
圣路易酒厂（Chateau Lagrange的拥有者）持有贝希维尔酒庄（Beychevelle）的半数所有权和管理权，另一半属于卡斯特酒庄（Castel）。该酒庄采用有机农业。酒庄采用高科技设施进行酿造：混合了三种浸泡管理方法（抽取、压榨和转移）并全部由机器完成；发酵温度控制；MLF（乳酸发酵）在不锈钢罐中开始并在橡木桶中完成；橡木桶陈化18个月，每年只有50%新桶；每9个月进行一次转移；酒未过滤。 

酒庄在10月份提供的酒桶样品，酒的气味丰富，带有春花、浆果、红樱桃和矿物质的香气。酒的口感丰富，滑顺的纤维素提供了圆润的感觉，但整体仍然保持着平衡和精致的口感，酒的酸度清新，矿物质性定义明确。

Western reviews.review: I was able to taste the 2016 Château Beychevelle on two occasions, and it showed beautifully both times. This is also the first vintage made in the new cellar. Medium to full-bodied, incredibly seamless and elegant on the palate, yet beautifully concentrated, it offers a heavenly perfume of spring flowers, violets, saddle leather, and blueberry and cassis fruit. A blend of 47% Cabernet Sauvignon, 47% Merlot, 5% Petit Verdot and the rest Cabernet Franc, brought up in 50% new oak, it’s still tight, taunt, and reserved on the palate, yet has the hallmark purity of fruit and balance of the vintage front and center. Hide bottles for 4-6 years, and it will keep for 25+ years or more.
Western reviews.translation: 我有幸两次品尝了2016年夏布勒维尔庄园的红酒，两次都表现出色。这也是该庄园新酒窖的第一批酒。口感中等到中等以上，口感细腻优雅，然而又非常浓郁。它带有春天花朵、紫罗兰、马鞍革和蓝莓和黑加仑果的香气。酒中含有47%卡波弗雷蒙、47%梅洛、5%小皮诺和其他卡波弗雷蒙，50%新橡木桶发酵。酒口紧绷、保留，然而果味纯正，酒龄平衡。建议将酒存放4-6年，酒龄可达25年以上。

Western reviews.review:
The 2016 Beychevelle is comprised of 47% Cabernet Sauvignon, 47% Merlot, 5% Petit Verdot and 1% Cabernet Franc. It spent 18 months aging in 50% new and 50% second-use barrels. Medium to deep garnet-purple colored, it is a little broody to begin, opening slowly to reveal subtle savory notes of dried herbs, charcuterie and black olives before breaking through to a profound core of warm cassis, baked black plums, red currant jelly and candied violets. The palate is medium-bodied and delicately played with a quiet intensity of tightly wound nuances and fantastic freshness, finishing with a lingering savory lift. This latent beauty will require a bit more time than most 2016s, but promises to over-deliver to those prepared to wait. Around 19,000 cases were made.

Rating: 95+
Western reviews.translation:
2016 年贝什维尔（Beychevelle）红酒的组成比例为47%卡波涅（Cabernet Sauvignon）、47%梅洛（Merlot）、5%小栎（Petit Verdot）和1%卡波弗朗（Cabernet Franc）。该酒在50%新桶和50%二手桶中陈酿18个月。其颜色为深红色至紫红色，初期有些闷闷的，慢慢打开后，释放出干燥的香草、火腿和黑橄榄的香气，之后才展现出黑樱桃、烤黑杏子、红果酱和糖化紫罗兰的深度核心。口感中等体积，细致入微，静谧的强度和紧绷的细节，口感清新，尾部带有持久的干燥味。这种潜在的美丽需要比大多数2016年的酒要多一些时间，但对那些愿意等待的人，保证会超出预期。生产了约19,000箱。

评分：95+

Western reviews.review: Stacks of cassis, graphite and smoke on the nose of this rather full-bodied St.-Julien with a ton of velvety tannins that drive the long finish that’s simultaneously sweet, fresh and powdery. Try in 2022.
Western reviews.translation: 这款来自圣朱利安的红酒具有丰富的口感，鼻子上充满了黑currant、石墨和烟雾的味道。它的厚重口感由大量细腻的橡木味道支撑，长长的尾部同时带有甜、清新和粉末状的感觉。建议在2022年品尝。

Western reviews.review: Now with a brand-new, see-through glass winery, this estate is showing its true elegance. The wine does not have great power but it offers a ripe, smooth, sophisticated texture and black fruits. It already shows delicious flavors that will improve. Drink from 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这家酒庄刚刚完工了一座透明玻璃的酿酒厂，展现出其优雅的风格。虽然这款红酒没有极强的力量，但它却呈现出成熟、细腻、复杂的口感和黑色果味。酒中的味道已经很好，随着时间的推移会变得更加出色。建议从2025年开始饮用。

Western reviews.review: This has a slightly beefy edge, with warmed plum and blackberry paste flavors pumping through. Shows a touch of heft on the back end, with dark tobacco and earth notes leaving a subtly chewy feel, though there's ample fruit to soak that up. Best from 2024 through 2038.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒带有略微的牛肉味，口感丰富，含有熟透的浆果和黑莓果酱的风味。尾部略微有重量感，带有深色烟草和泥土的味道，留下细微的嚼劲感，但果味仍然充足。建议2024年至2038年最佳饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 纯粹的樱桃、芬芳的梅花以及淡淡的薄荷清香在闻杯的瞬间就一股脑地溜进鼻子，彷如一位抱着鲜花向你跑来的少女。口中淡淡的矿物感和奶油般的单宁相互贴合，在增加层次感的同时也弱化了酒精的温热，是非常精致小巧的列级名庄。
Chinese pairs.new:
A burst of pure cherry, fragrant plum blossoms, and subtle mint freshness floods the senses upon lifting the glass, reminiscent of a carefree girl running towards you with a bouquet of flowers.

A delicate mineral texture and velvety tannins caress the palate, adding depth while tempering the warmth of the alcohol, resulting in a refined and elegant wine.

English pairs.original: Pure cherries, fragrant plum blossoms and a scent of mint slip eagerly into your nose the moment you smell, like a fairy running towards you with bouquet in her arms. The light mineral notes and creamy tannins on the palate complete each other, which strengthens the layering and weakens the warmth of alcohol. It is a very luscious and compact Grand Cru Classe.
English pairs.new: 一口气中，清新的樱桃、芬芳的梅花和薄荷的香气立即冲入你的鼻子，像一位小精灵手持花束向你跑来。口感中轻盈的矿物质和丰富的橡皮质完美地结合，增强了层次感，减弱了酒精的热度。这是一款非常丰富且紧致的格兰克鲁级红酒。

Western reviews.review: The nose comes through with its leafy floral, spicy nuances that mesh perfectly with all of its ripe, dark red fruits and hints of cocoa on the nose and on the medium-bodied palate. Fresh, vibrant, elegant and refined, the wine finishes with elegance, energy and lift. Drink from 2023-2034. 91 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中充满了青葱的花香、辛辣的味道，完美地融合了成熟的黑红果实和巧克力味。口感中鲜活、生动、优雅、精致，酒尾以优雅、精力充沛和轻盈的感觉结束。建议从2023年到2034年饮用。评分：91分。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, dezente Ockerrandaufhellung. Schwarze Beerenfrucht, Nuancen von Trüffeln und grüne Oliven, etwas Nougat, Kräuter, individuelles Bukett. Saftig, elegant, feine Fruchtsüße, tragende, reife Tannine, mineralischer Stil, gutes Reifepotenzial, frischer Stil, braucht noch Zeit.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，微微的橙色边缘。黑色浆果风味，松露和绿色橄榄的细微差别，些许奶油糖，香草，独特的香味。口感丰富，优雅，细腻的果糖，承托的成熟的坚果，矿物质风格，良好的成熟潜力，新鲜的风格，需要时间来成熟。

Western reviews.review: (86% Merlot, 14% Cabernet Franc. 14.5%. Verkostet im Dezember 2021 in Windisch). Achtung, bei diesem Wein bin ich vorbelastet, denn ich liebe ihn... Kräftiges Rubin. Die Nase ist expressiv, fruchtbetont, zeigt Brombeeren und schwarze Johannisbeeren, auch Holunder, blumige Noten die mich an Rosen und Lilien erinnern übernehmen, ein herrlicher Duft, ein Schnüffelwein. Der Gaumen ist weich und rund im Auftakt, die Frucht ist knackig, die Tannin- und Säurestruktur harmoniert, kein Element überlagert das andere, alles ist gut proportioniert und in sich ruhend. Die Gerbstoffe sind von ausgezeichneter Qualität, stützen das Fruchtbündel bis in den langen, feinwürzigen Abgang. Ich kann nicht anders, aber was Alain Moueix und sein Team hier Jahr für Jahr leisten ist einfach grandios. Klarer Kauftipp! 2024-2045
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论，翻译如下：

86% 梅洛，14% 卡波弗雷斯科。14.5% ABV。2021 年 12 月在温迪施进行品尝。

注意：我对这个酒有偏见，因为我非常喜欢它...

酒色深红。

酒香浓郁，果香浓郁，带有浆果和黑莓的味道，还有杏仁和花朵的香气，令人想起玫瑰和百合花的香气，一个美妙的香气，一个嗅觉上的享受。

口感柔软和圆润，果味清脆，坚果和酸度结构和谐，所有元素都很好地平衡，没有一个元素超过另一个，所有元素都很好地平衡和沉着。酒中的颜料质地优良，支持果味团体直到长长的、细微的尾部。 我无法不说，阿兰·穆埃克斯和他的团队每年都做得非常出色。毫无疑问，这是一个值得购买的酒！推荐饮用时间：2024-2045。
