Chinese pairs.original: 装瓶之后的Chateau Cantenac Brown 2020 依旧是个机灵鬼，它灵动的口感营造出沁人心脾的通透感，完全看不出半点热年份的痕迹。熟悉的玫瑰花香是那么可人，多汁的小红果是那么娇俏，清澈的酒液是那么光滑细嫩。就在我沉浸于它的清雅世界时，无数的单宁线条开始在味蕾上汇聚，它们织成了一张巨网，把 “轻盈” 和 “柔韧” 表达地淋漓尽致。
Chinese pairs.new: The post-bottled Chateau Cantenac Brown 2020 remains a charming wine, its lively texture creating a refreshing sense of transparency, with no hint of heat from the vintage. The familiar rose petal aroma is endearing, the juicy red fruit is playful, and the clear wine is silky and refined. As I immerse myself in its elegant world, numerous tannin threads begin to converge on my palate, weaving a vast net that perfectly conveys "lightness" and "flexibility".

English pairs.original: After bottling, Chateau Cantenac Brown 2020 is still vibrant and ingenious, creating an appealing sense of transparency with its lively palate, which shows no signs that this wine was born in a hot vintage. The familiar rose fragrance is so lovely, the juicy red berries are so delicate, and the pure wine is so smooth and refined. Just as I was immersed in its elegancy, countless tannic lines began to converge on the taste buds, weaving a giant web that expresses “lightness” and “suppleness” in the best possible way.
English pairs.new: 陈特纳克布朗庄园2020年红酒在瓶装后依然充满生机，展现出活泼的口感，让人感受到透明度的魅力，完全没有让人觉得这是产自炎热年份的酒。熟悉的玫瑰香气非常迷人，鲜红的浆果非常细腻，纯正的酒体非常光滑细致。正当我沉浸在它的优雅中时，成千上万的苦味线条开始在味蕾上汇聚，织成了一张巨大的网，完美地体现了“轻盈”和“柔韧”的特质。

Western reviews.review: The 2020 Cantenac Brown is a knock-out. A Margaux of towering intensity, the 2020 is dense and vertical at the same time. It’s a combination that works so well. Dark cherry, plum, chocolate, new leather, licorice and cloves all saturate the palate. There's real depth and concentration here from the summer heat and small size of the berries, but at the same time the 2020 has more freshness and energy than some recent years. There have been quite a few changes here in recent years, starting with a new parcel on the Margaux plateau that entered the blend in 2019 and move towards lower toast levels in the barrels. Cantenac Brown remains a potent, opulent Margaux, but 2020 has a measure of classicism as well. Superb. –Antonio Galloni
Western reviews.translation: 2020年卡滕纳克布朗（Cantenac Brown）是一款绝佳的红酒。它是一款强烈的马格朗（Margaux）红酒，既浓密又垂直。这种组合效果极好。红樱桃、浆果、巧克力、新皮革、甘草和丁香等成分充满了口感。夏季炎热和小果实使得口感更深入和集中，但2020年卡滕纳克布朗也比近年来更有新鲜感和能量。近年来，卡滕纳克布朗发生了许多变化，包括2019年加入马格朗高原的新地块，以及减少木桶的烤度。卡滕纳克布朗仍然是一款强烈的、奢华的马格朗红酒，但2020年也有一定的经典风格。 –安东尼奥·加隆尼（Antonio Galloni）

Western reviews.review: This grand estate that recently changed hands has produced a seriously promising wine. Bold black fruits and dark tannins are just beginning a fine interplay, reinforced by the wine's acidity. Expect a good future for the wine. Barrel Sample: 95-97
Western reviews.translation: 这家刚刚更换所有者的庄园产出了一个非常有前途的红酒。深黑色的果实和浓郁的苦味正在开始展现出美好的协调，酒中的酸度也在加强。酒的未来前景很好。酒桶样品：95-97分。

Western reviews.review: The 2020 Château Cantenac Brown showed beautifully and is a serious, concentrated, powerful Margaux that's going to need bottle age. Ripe blackcurrants, toasty oak, ripe tobacco, and dried flower notes all define the aromatics, and it hits the palate with medium to full-bodied richness, a layered, balanced mouthfeel, beautiful tannins, and a great finish. It shows the more focused, slightly understated style of the vintage, yet everything is in the right place, it has terrific purity, and it’s just a brilliant Margaux. I followed this bottle for multiple days, and it never put a foot wrong. It will hit its prime drinking window in 7-8 years and evolve for two decades.
Western reviews.translation: 2020年尚塔克·坎塔内克·布朗（Château Cantenac Brown）展现出极佳的状态，是一款严肃、浓郁、强大的马格朗（Margaux）红酒，需要瓶龄发酵。黑currant、-toast oak、ripe tobacco和干花香都出现在鼻子里，口感丰富、层次分明、平衡、美妙的口感、完美的牙感和长长的尾部。它展现了该年份的更为聚焦、略为低调的风格，但所有元素都在合适的位置，品质纯粹，简直是马格朗的杰作。我跟踪了这个瓶子多天，它从未犯过错误。它将在7-8年内达到最佳饮用状态，并在20年内演变。

Western reviews.review: Plenty of blackberry, spice, iron and crushed lead pencil aromas follow through to a full body with chewy, velvety tannins and a rather cool side to it. Crushed stone and slate undertones.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中充满了黑莓、香料、铁和碎铅笔的味道，口感丰富、厚实，具有嚼劲的纤维和细腻的口感，带有清凉的味道，底部有碎石和花岗岩的味道。

Western reviews.review: A fine follow-up to the excellent 2019, the 2020 Cantenac Brown incorporates newly acquired holdings of Cabernet Sauvignon from the plateau of Margaux. Unwinding in the glass with aromas of cherries, cassis, burning embers and pencil shavings, it's medium to full-bodied, layered and concentrated, with good depth at the core, supple tannins and terrific purity of fruit. Concluding with a long, penetrating finish, it underlines the fact that this is the appellation's fastest-improving estate. Rating: 94+
Western reviews.translation: 2020年卡南布朗（Cantenac Brown）红酒是2019年杰作的续作，通过收购马格努（Margaux）高原的卡贝网（Cabernet Sauvignon）产区，进一步提升了品质。酒精在玻璃中缓慢释放，释放出樱桃、黑加仑、燃烧的炭和铅笔削的芳香，口感中等到中厚，层次丰富，浓缩，核心深度良好，纤维柔软，果实纯正。酒尾长达数秒，清晰透亮，证明了卡南布朗是马格努产区最快速发展的庄园。评分：94+.

Chinese pairs.original: 芳香四溢，散发着异域菠萝、芒果、百香果的美妙气味，酒体丰满，纯净无比，如水晶般，余味持久，
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas abound, releasing exotic pineapple, mango, and passionfruit notes, a beautiful bouquet. The full-bodied wine is crystal clear, with a long-lasting finish.

Western reviews.review: Botrytis bomb. Gold color. Loads of spicy, almondand toffee character with pineapple fruit. Full-bodied, very sweet and very, very ripe. Blistering long finish. A bit rustic, but amazing. Can age as long as you like.--1990 Bordeaux retrospective. Drink now. 6,250 cases
Western reviews.translation:
这是一瓶Botrytis红酒的评论。翻译如下：

Botrytis爆炸。金色。满满的辣椒、杏仁和糖浆味，伴有菠萝果味。口感丰富，极甜，极度成熟。长长的尾部。有一点粗糙，但令人惊叹。可以像喜欢一样长时间陈化。--1990年波尔多红酒回顾。立即享用。6,250箱。

Chinese pairs.original: 仅限于闻香我就肯定，Brane-Cantenac 2018绝对是一支高水准的玛歌精品。香气虽然不是特别强劲，但复杂程度可一点儿都不少。软糯的桑葚、成熟的黑李子，淡淡的兰花芬芳，营造出甜美可人的形象；摇杯后还带着一丝中国砖茶特有的清香。清透的口感与流畅的线条共同构建了修长的结构，粉末状的单宁带来了宝贵的沉稳感，给人一种气定神闲的印象。
Chinese pairs.new: This 2018 Brane-Cantenac is undoubtedly a high-end Margaux. The aroma is subtle yet complex, with notes of soft, jammy blackberries, ripe black plums, and a hint of delicate floral sweetness. A whiff of Chinese green tea lingers in the background. The palate is crystal clear, with smooth, elegant lines that build a refined structure. The powdery tannins add a precious sense of stability, evoking a sense of calm serenity.

English pairs.original: Only the nose is good enough to express Brane-Cantenac 2018’s superior quality. The aromas are not very intense, but the details are pretty inspirational, giving me a presence of mind in the glass. Soft mulberry, ripe black plum, elegant violet create a lovely personality; after swirling the glass, it even features a hint of lively Chinese brick tea’s freshness. Precise palate and graceful lines contribute to a sleek structure; and layers of powdery tannins provide creamy texture toward the finish.
English pairs.new: 只有鼻子才能体现出布兰-卡滕纳克2018的优质品质。虽然香气不算强烈，但细节却很有创意，让我在杯子里感受到存在感。软红果、成熟黑杏、优雅的紫罗兰共同构成了迷人的个性；在杯子里搅动后，甚至还带有活跃的中国砖茶的新鲜感。精确的口感和优雅的线条贡献了光滑的结构；而层层的粉末状纤维素提供了奶油般的质感，延续到尾部。

Western reviews.review: Wie schon en Primeur von besonderer aromatischer Komplexität, mit dezenten Akzenten von schwarzer Olive und roten Beeren; die Tannin sind von besonderer Klasse und das Finale klingt buchstäblich endlos lang nach; superb, ohne den Jahrgang zu verleugnen.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感与初次品尝时一样，具有特殊的芳香复杂度，带有黑橄榄和红果的细微调味；其坚果味的质地出众，尾部的持久感令人难以置信，简直是无限延续的完美结尾，品质出众，毫不掩饰其年份的特点。

Western reviews.review: Faszinierende Nase, sehr Margaux, super floral, tiefgründig, steinig, kühl und doch mit reifer Kirschfrucht, Heidelbeeren. Im Auftakt sehr schlank, was für eine Eleganz, straff und saftig, frisch und mit knackiger, roter Beerenfrucht, der Wein zeigt Struktur, Frische, Saftigkeit und trotz ordentlich Druck viel Finesse, die Gerbstoffe sind von ausgezeichneter Qualität, im Abgang langanhaltend, dunkelfruchtig und erhaben. Konnte noch zulegen! 2026-2045+ (Verkostet am 21. Juni 2021 im Rahmen der UGCB Probe in Genf)
Western reviews.translation:
迷人的鼻子，非常马格努（Margaux风格），超级花香，深度丰富，石质，冷却， yet 仍然带有成熟的樱桃果肉和蓝莓。 

在开端非常苗条，什么样的典雅，紧致和有水分，新鲜和带有坚果的红果肉，酒呈现出结构，新鲜度，水分和尽管有相当的压力仍然具有细致的味道，酒中的鞣质质地优良，在尾部持久，深色果肉和高贵。 

酒还可以继续完善！ 2026-2045+ (在2021年6月21日在日内瓦的UGCB品酒会上品尝)

Western reviews.review: This is now performing as one of the top Margaux estates. Their latest release shows structure, elegant black fruits and rich tannins. Densely textured and vibrantly fruity, the wine has a fine future. Drink from 2027. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 这家马格努（Margaux）庄园已经成为顶级庄园之一。最新的酒款展现出结构紧密、优雅黑果和丰富的橡木味。酒体丰富细腻，果香鲜活，酒有着光明的前途。建议2027年后饮用。 - 罗杰沃斯（Roger Voss）

Western reviews.review: Elegant, fresh and refined, the wine offers layers of sweet, ripe, fresh, red berries, smoke, flowers, wet earth, herbs, spice box and tobacco leaf in the perfume. On the palate, the wine is silky, lifted, long and pure, displaying a beautiful depth of flavor in the finish. The wine blends 74% Cabernet Sauvignon, 21% Merlot, 4% Cabernet Franc and 1% Petit Verdot.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒优雅、清新、精致，酒香中充满了甜美的、成熟的、新鲜的红果味、烟草味、花朵味、湿土味、香草味和烟草叶味。口感细腻、轻盈、长长的，酒尾展现出丰富的味道。酒中混合了74%卡波内尔·萨夫维诺、21%梅洛、4%卡波内尔·法兰克和1%佩蒂·维多。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby, purple reflections, DELICATE rim brightening. Delicately savoury UNDERLAY/BACKGROUND of fresh heart cherries, candied orange zest, some nougat, mineral touch. Juicy, red wild berryish fruit, fresh acidity, fine, integrated tannins, a lively companion at the table, already accessible and well developed. (2020-2040)߭.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，紫色反射，酒液边缘微微发亮。酒中有细腻的浓郁口感，底层是新鲜樱桃和糖化橙皮的香气，伴有些许果仁和矿物质的味道。酒体丰富，果香浓郁，酸度清新，纤维细腻，整体平衡，适合餐桌上的搭配，酒龄已有相当的成熟度，推荐饮用时间：2020-2040年。

Chinese pairs.original: 装瓶之后的Chateau La Violette 2021有些害羞，和热年份的妩媚形象有很大的不同。桑果、山楂、鲜花饼的芬芳伴随着淡淡的普洱茶香，在杯中呈现出一副行云流水的樱花江景画面。摇杯之后，紫罗兰花香逐渐绽放，它们躲在香甜软糯的酒体背后，不断地向你抛媚眼。我在期酒品鉴时就说：半成品都这么好喝，装瓶陈年之后得好喝成什么样？装瓶品鉴后，我必须再补充一句，它确实是该年份的顶级作品，是来自2021年份的仙女之吻。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2021 Chateau La Violette is a bit shy after bottling, a far cry from its sultry image in hot vintages. The aroma of mulberries, quinces, and flower cakes is accompanied by a subtle Pu-erh tea scent, presenting a beautiful cherry blossom landscape in the glass. After swirling, the lavender fragrance gradually unfolds, hiding behind the sweet, soft, and velvety body of the wine, constantly flirting with you. I said during the pre-release tasting: even the half-finished product is so delicious, how much better will it be after bottling and aging? After the bottling tasting, I must add that it is indeed the top work of the year, a kiss from a fairy from the 2021 vintage.

English pairs.original: After bottling, Chateau La Violette 2021 appears somewhat shy, a stark contrast to the coquettish charm in hot vintages. The fragrance of mulberries, hawthorns, and flower cakes, combined with a faint Pu-erh tea aroma, paints a scene of serene cherry blossom river in my glass. Upon swirling, the scent of violets gradually unfolds, coyly hiding behind the sweet and soft body, continually casting flirtatious glances. I said during the En Primeur tasting that such a delightful aging wine could only become more exquisite after bottling. And now, I have to add one more sentence, it indeed is a premium wine, a fairy’s kiss bestowed upon 2021.
English pairs.new: 2021年夏娃庄园的红酒在瓶装后似乎有些害羞，和那些炎热年份的魅力相比，显得格外谦逊。酒中的樱桃、山楂和花饼香气，伴随着淡淡的普洱茶香，描绘出一幅宁静的樱花河景。酒瓶旋转时，紫罗兰的香气逐渐展现， coyly 隐身在甜美柔和的身体后面，持续地投射出诱人的眼神。我在 En Primeur 品酒会上曾说过，这种令人愉悦的陈年红酒在瓶装后一定会变得更加精致。现在，我必须再加一句，它确实是一款高端的红酒，一种仙女的亲吻赠予了2021年。

Western reviews.review: Open and with a distinctly Mediterranean profile, it is reminiscent of black plums, blackberries, dark chocolate, incense, herbs and lots of rosemary. Medium body, medium smooth structure and a composed, juicy finish. 100% Merlot. Best since 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感开阔，具有典型的地中海风格，回忆起黑杏、黑莓、黑巧克力、香烟、香草和大量罗勒的味道。中等体积，中等光滑的结构和一个谐调的、水果味的尾部。100% 梅洛。2025年后最佳。

Western reviews.review: Espresso beans, roasted plums, incense, spice, black cherries, flowers and wet earth fill the nose. On the palate, the wine is plush and polished, soft, silky and fresh with concentrated layers of espresso tinted, spicy cherries, plums, cocoa and blackberries as well as a touch of chalk in the endnote. 13.4% ABV, the harvest took place September 29-October 4. The yields were low at 20 hectoliters hectare, about half of the normal production, so this is going to be very hard, if not impossible to find after release. Drink from 2025-2045. 93-95
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中充满了浓郁的咖啡豆、烤石榴、香烟、香料、黑樱桃、花朵和潮湿的泥土的味道。口感丰富细腻，软滑且新鲜，具有浓缩的咖啡色浓郁樱桃、石榴、可可和黑莓的层次，以及末尾的轻微石灰味。酒精度13.4%，收获于9月29日至10月4日。产量极低，仅20公顷/公顷，约为正常产量的一半，因此这款酒将在发布后极难找到。建议于2025-2045年饮用。评分93-95分。

Le Vieux Donjon Chateauneuf du Pape 2005.name: Le Vieux Donjon Chateauneuf du Pape 2005

Chinese pairs.original: 黑莓、香料、红茶、无花果、樱桃、香草熏肉、苔藓的气味，酒体深沉浓郁，余味悠长，陈年潜力强。
Chinese pairs.new:
Blackberry, spice, red tea, pomegranate, cherry, smoked vanilla, moss aromas. 

Full-bodied and rich texture, long-lasting finish, strong aging potential.

Western reviews.review: Powerful, fresh, long, ripe, structured and tannic, this is now out of its shell and displays its wealth of ripe red fruit, black pepper, herbs and spice. Good now, this could even be better with more age. 93 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒强劲、清新、持久、成熟、结构良好和有嚼头。它已经脱胎换骨，展现出成熟红果、黑胡椒、香草和香料的丰富风味。现在品尝良好，随着更多的陈年可能会更好。 93 分。

Chinese pairs.original: 成熟的黑莓，紫罗兰，香料，甘草，糖和石墨的香气，丰富的酒体，柔软的单宁，回味悠长，非常好的陈年潜力。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of ripe blackberry, lavender, spice, licorice, sugar, and graphite. Full-bodied with soft tannins, long finish, and excellent aging potential.

Western reviews.review: A candidate for one of the finest Angelus produced to date (and there have been many, including 1989, 1990, 2000 and 2005), this blend of 60% Merlot and 40% Cabernet Franc was fashioned from tiny yields of 20 hectoliters per hectare. It boasts a black/purple color along with a gorgeous perfume of blueberry liqueur, spring flowers and graphite. In the mouth, notes of incense and cassis also emerge from this velvety-textured, full-bodied, intensely concentrated 2009. With silky tannins, low acidity and spectacular purity, texture and depth, it is already approachable (although I’m sure proprietor Hubert de Bouard would think drinking it now is akin to infanticide), but should keep for 20-30+ years.
Western reviews.translation: 这款2009年安吉卢斯（Angelus）红酒堪称目前为止最出色的作品之一（尽管历史上有过1989年、1990年、2000年和2005年的佳作）。该酒的组成比例为60%梅洛（Merlot）和40%卡波弗朗（Cabernet Franc），以每公顷20公升的极低产量酿造而成。它呈现出深紫色，具有蓝莓酒精香气、春花和石墨的迷人香味。在口感上，香烟和黑加仑（Cassis）等味道也从这款细腻、充满体积、浓缩度极高的2009年安吉卢斯中脱颖而出。酒中有细滑的纤维、低酸度和出色的纯度、质地和深度。尽管我相信拥有者休伯特·德·布瓦尔（Hubert de Bouard）会认为现在饮用它是对酒的虐待，但它已经相当容易入口（尽管我相信拥有者休伯特·德·布瓦尔会认为现在饮用它是对酒的虐待），但它应该能维持20-30年以上的时间。

Western reviews.review: Rich and rather stolid now, this features a wall of roasted apple wood and charcoal flavors in front of the dense core of black Mission fig, steeped black currant fruit and espresso notes. Extremely dense on the finish, but the inlaid spice and tobacco hints are there just beneath the surface, needing only extended cellaring to emerge fully. One of the larger-scaled efforts of the vintage. Best from 2018 through 2035.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒现在呈现出浓郁的口感，入口处有烤苹果木和焦炭的味道，之后是黑Mission葡萄的浓郁果肉和浓缩的黑加拿大蓝莓和咖啡豆的味道。口感极其浓密，但在表面下方隐约可感的有细微的香料和烟草味，需要长时间陈酿才能完全展现。该酒是当年产量中较大的品种。建议在2018年至2035年期间饮用。

Western reviews.review: If you've ever eaten really good British Christmas cake then you know what this lavish 2009 St.-Emilion smells and tastes like. Every bit as rich as it is polished with a long moderately dry finish packed with powdery tannins. Drink or hold.
Western reviews.translation: 如果你曾经品尝过真正好的英国圣诞蛋糕，那么你一定知道这个奢华的2009年圣埃米利昂红酒的香气和口感。它的口感丰富，光滑，带有长而中等干的尾部，充满了细粉状的苦味。适合饮用或储存。

Western reviews.review:
Closed at this stage, this promises a huge, ripe
future. Toast and spice notes are balanced around
a black plum flavor. The dense, dark tannins create a
brooding character, which is balanced by freshness on
the finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒目前已经封闭，未来有着巨大的成熟潜力。酒中有 Toast 和香料的味道，围绕着黑浆果的味道。酒中的浓密黑色苦味让酒呈现出沉思的性格，但酒尾的清新感却能平衡这一点。

Chinese pairs.original: 李子、黑莓、矿物质雪松和橡木的香气，丰富柔滑的单宁，酒体丰满浓郁，回味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Notes of plum, blackberry, mineral fir, and oak, rich and smooth tannins, full-bodied and intense, with a long finish.

Western reviews.review: Fabulous aromas of crushed raspberries, plums and blackberries. Mind-blowing nose. Full-bodied, with soft and silky tannins and a long caressing finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有迷人的气味，带有浓郁的红莓、浆果和黑莓的香气。令人惊艳的鼻香。口感丰富，具有柔软的和细腻的橡皮质感，长长的醇厚而温柔的尾韵。

Western reviews.review: From my cellar, the 1996 Latour is still a very youthful, tightly wound wine, unfurling in the glass with notions of blackcurrants, loamy soil, cigar wrapper and English walnuts. Medium to full-bodied, deep and concentrated, it's built around by ripe, increasingly melting tannins and a bright spine of acidity, concluding with a long, penetrating finish. Given this Latour's ruby-black hue and impeccable structure, it still has a long future ahead of it. Today, it really begins to expatiate after four hours in a decanter. Rating: 95+
Western reviews.translation: 从我的酒窖中，1996年拉图尔（Latour）仍然是一瓶非常年轻、紧绷的红酒，酒液中展现出黑currant、土壤、雪茄纸和英式核桃的气味。酒体中等到中等以上，深度和浓度均较高，酒中充满了成熟的、逐渐融化的橡木味和清晰的酸度，酒尾长达数秒。考虑到拉图尔的深红色和完美的结构，酒仍然有很长的未来。今天，经过四小时的脱颖，酒开始展现出更好的风味。评分：95+。

Chinese pairs.original: 你很难想象，一款闻起来如此内秀的小精灵，居然在口中迸发出这么大的能量感。它明亮的酸度能够将所触碰到的一切化作山间的云雾、变成清澈的冰泉；它迷人的橙花芬芳能够让所有水果插上翅膀、踮起脚尖；2016年份是Miguel 掌管酒庄的第一个年份。它觉得该年份需要一些时间的陈年才能变得更加完整。而在我看来，这种尊重自然的呈现方式恰好符合2016年份想要表达的主题：深藏不露、充满希望…
Chinese pairs.new: You'd be hard-pressed to imagine that this delicate, introverted wine would unleash such explosive energy on the palate. Its bright acidity transforms everything it touches into a misty mountain cloud, a crystal-clear ice spring; its alluring orange blossom fragrance gives all the fruits wings, lifting them up on tiptoes. The 2016 vintage was Miguel's first year at the helm, and it feels like it needs some time to age to reach its full potential. But in its restraint, it perfectly captures the essence of the 2016 theme: subtlety, promise, and a deep-seated sense of hope.

English pairs.original: It’s hard to imagine, an elf so unassuming in nose could unleash such a tremendous energy in the mouth. Its bright acidity has the power to transform everything it touches into cloud, into spring; its enchanting orange blossom gives all fruits wings. The 2016 vintage marks Miguel’s first year in charge of the vineyard of Chateau La Tour Blanche. He believes this vintage needs some time to age to become more complete. In my view, this natural presentation aligns perfectly with what the 2016 vintage aims to express: low-key, yet full of hope…
English pairs.new: 难以想象，如此不起眼的鼻子，却能在口中释放出如此巨大的能量。它的清晰的酸度有能力将所有它触碰的东西转化为云，成为春天；它的迷人的橙花香让所有的水果都有了翅膀。2016年是米格尔（Miguel）在查托拉图布兰（Chateau La Tour Blanche）葡萄园的第一年，他认为这个年份需要一些时间来成熟，才能变得更加完美。在我看来，这个自然的呈现与2016年份的目标完全吻合：低调，但充满希望。

Western reviews.review: Preciso e succoso nelle note principali mostra note di arance sanguinelle, fiori di mandarino, camomille e ginestre in fiore. Corpo medio, struttura morbida ed un finale piacevole leggermente sottotono nella progressione al palato. Bevi ora.
Western reviews.translation:
这段红酒评论的中文翻译是：

精确而充满果味的主要调子中表现出血橙、柑橘花、蒲公英和开花的荚蒾的风味。中等体积，柔软的结构和口感舒适的轻微低调的尾部。现在就喝吧。

Western reviews.review: Deep yellow colour. A fine botrytis touch with honey and yellow tropical fruit aromas, and candied orange zest. On the palate juicy, ripe yellow peach, some pineapple and honey, opulent but still harmonious. A versatile wine.
Western reviews.translation: 深黄色的酒液。酒中带有霉菌感染的味道，伴有蜂蜜和黄色热带水果的香气，橙子皮的糖化味道。口感丰富，黄桃熟透，带有些金针菇和蜂蜜的味道，富有豪华感但仍保持着和谐。是一种多样化的佳酿。

Western reviews.review: 94–96. Barrel Sample. Structured and concentrated, this is a rich wine that is also fruity and packed with botrytis and acidity. Its texture and tangy edge are impressive and will certainly allow it to age.
Western reviews.translation: 94-96分。酒桶样品。结构紧凑，浓郁的酒体，果香浓郁，带有霉菌和酸度。酒体的质感和带有刺激性的边缘令人印象深刻，确保它能耐受时间的考验。

Western reviews.review: Preciso e succoso nelle note principali mostra note di arance sanguinelle, fiori di mandarino, camomille e ginestre in fiore. Corpo medio, struttura morbida ed un finale piacevole leggermente sottotono nella progressione al palato. Bevi ora.
Western reviews.translation:
这段红酒评论的中文翻译是：

精确而浓郁的主要调子中表现出血橙、柑橘花、蒲公英和开花的荚蒾的风味。中等体积，柔软的结构和口感舒适的轻微低调的尾部。现在就来品尝吧！

Western reviews.review: Deep yellow colour. A fine botrytis touch with honey and yellow tropical fruit aromas, and candied orange zest. On the palate juicy, ripe yellow peach, some pineapple and honey, opulent but still harmonious. A versatile wine.
Western reviews.translation: 深黄色的酒液。酒中带有霉菌感染的味道，伴有蜂蜜和黄色热带水果的香气，橙子皮的糖化味道。口感丰富，黄桃熟透，带有些金针菇和蜂蜜的味道，富有豪华感但仍保持着和谐。是一款多样化的佳酿。

Chinese pairs.original: 烟熏，木炭，黑醋栗，石墨，和橡木的香气，酒体浓郁，丰富密集的单宁，无限悠长的回味，复杂结构和香气，陈年能力非常强、
Chinese pairs.new: Smoky, charcoal, black walnut, graphite, and oak aromas. Full-bodied, richly concentrated tannins, with an endless, lingering finish, complex structure and aromas, and exceptional aging potential.

Western reviews.review: Powerful, concentrated and seriously young tannins are closed tight around the pure, intense, dark, sweet fruits, followed by a deep undertow of liquorice, cloves and graphite. Extraordinary balance, polish and control. Textbook Pauillac.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的味道非常强烈，浓郁的口感和年轻的坚果味紧紧包围着清澈的、浓郁的、黑色的甜果味，之后是深沉的 licorice、丁香和石墨的味道。这种平衡、光滑和控制的味道是典型的巴约讷风格。

Western reviews.review: Latour has always had the reputation of producing great wines in the less great vintages. The 2006 is a case in point. It brings structure and ripeness into a form that is almost ethereal. That elegance doesn’t take away from the powerful fruit. The fruit in fact melds into the structure with ease. And, as a reminder this is a 2006, the density gives way to freshness on the finish.
Western reviews.translation: 拉图尔（Latour）一直以在不太好的年份中生产出优质葡萄酒而闻名。2006年的拉图尔就是一个典型的例子。它将结构和成熟度融合在一起，呈现出几乎是神秘的形式。这种优雅的风格并没有减少强烈的果味。事实上，果味与结构融合得非常自然。值得注意的是，这是2006年的葡萄酒，酒体的厚度在尾部会给出清新的感觉。

Western reviews.review: As to the Grand Vin, the 2006 Latour showed beautifully. A blend of 86% Cabernet Sauvignon and the balance mostly Merlot, with a splash of Cabernet Franc, it offers a deep ruby/purple color to go with straight up classic Latour graphite, lead pencil and minerality all balanced by terrific cassis and blackcurrant fruit. With medium to full-bodied richness, present, yet silky tannin, impeccable balance and a great finish, it’s terrific today and I suspect on the early edge of a long drinking plateau.
Western reviews.translation: 关于格兰德维恩，2006年拉图尔表现出色。该酒的组成比例为86%卡波弗雷蒙和余下的主要为梅洛，少量卡波弗朗克，呈现出深红紫色，配以典型的拉图尔风格的石墨、铅笔和矿物质味道，均衡在黑加仑和黑currant的果味中。酒体中等到中高，纤维柔滑，平衡完美，酒尾长长。目前酒品出色，且我认为它正处于一个长期饮用高峰期的前沿。

Western reviews.review: In describing the feel of this wine, Lacey Burke of Gotham Bar & Grill said it was "like a cat wrapping around your ankles." Such a sensation clearly separates the '06 Latour from the '05, which is anything but cuddly. This does have the gravity of classic wines from the deep pile of river stones that counts for soil in this vineyard-its harmonious intensity a direct result of the superior drainage of those stones (and the rigorous farming and selection of the fruit). The tannins hold their share of mystery, both luscious and muscular at once, the source of the wine's minerality and strength. The fruit is black and compact, completely filling those tannins, with a hint of earthy root vegetable flavor that gives the sweeter aspects a savory cut.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的感觉，Gotham Bar & Grill的Lacey Burke描述道：“就像一只猫围绕着你的脚踝。”这种感觉明显地将‘06年拉图尔（Latour）与‘05年拉图尔区分开来，后者一点也不温柔。这款红酒拥有典型的重量感，来自于这片葡萄园的河石堆积土壤——那些石头的优良排水（和严格的农艺和果实选择）直接导致了这种和谐的强度。这种红酒的坚果味和肌肉感都充满了神秘感，既丰富又强壮，这些都是红酒矿物质和力量的来源。这种红酒的果实是黑色的，紧密的，完全填满了坚果味，带有一点泥土味的根蔬菜风味，这使得甜味更有咸味。

Western reviews.review: Offers a pure nose of currant and blackberry, with crushed fruit. Full-bodied, with a solid core of fruit and very polished, refined tannins. Long and classy. Best after 2016.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒带有浓郁的黑葡萄和黑莓香气，伴有果酱般的味道。口感丰富，果实丰富，纤维细腻，口感长而优雅。建议在2016年后品尝。

Chinese pairs.original: 对于喜欢丰韵型的葡萄酒爱好者来说，2020年份的Chateau Valandraud 绝对能让你心满意足。拿起酒杯感觉翻开了一盒深浅不一的巧克力礼盒，有丝滑的牛奶巧克力，有包浆的焦糖巧克力，有质地浓密的黑巧克力、还有撒着可可粉的松露巧克力，这是什么样的醇厚感？可想而知。好在这款酒对酸度的表达、对通畅感的控制都做得不错，即使口感这么浓郁但始终不觉得厚重。
Chinese pairs.new: 对于喜欢丰富口感的葡萄酒爱好者来说，2020年份的Chateau Valandraud绝对能满足你的需求。拿起酒杯感觉就像打开了一盒深浅不一的巧克力礼盒，有滑溜的牛奶巧克力，有浓郁的焦糖巧克力，有质地浓密的黑巧克力，还有撒着可可粉的松露巧克力，这样的醇厚感令人难以抗拒。好在这款酒对酸度的表达和通畅感的控制都做得非常好，即使口感这么浓郁，但始终不觉得厚重。

English pairs.original: If you’re a fan of full-bodied wines, the 2020 vintage of Chateau Valandraud is sure to impress you. Just take a sip and you’ll feel as though you’ve opened a box of assorted chocolates, filled with silky milk chocolate, rich caramel liqueur chocolate, dense dark chocolate, and truffle chocolate sprinkled with cocoa powder. The mellowness on the palate is truly remarkable and unexpected. Despite the wine’s strong and dense quality, it never feels heavy thanks to its well-balanced acidity and fluidity.
English pairs.new: 如果你喜欢浓郁的红酒，那么2020年产的香格拉德酒庄（Chateau Valandraud）一定会让你印象深刻。只需一口饮下，你就会觉得自己打开了一盒各种口味的巧克力，里面有滑顺的牛奶巧克力、浓郁的焦糖巧克力、浓密的黑巧克力和抹茶味的巧克力，均以可可粉装饰。口感的平和度令人惊讶且难以置信。尽管这款酒的质地强烈且浓密，但它从不感到沉重，因为它的酸度和流动性都非常平衡。

Western reviews.review: Very opulent and expressive aromas of black fruit and pine needles. So floral. Full-bodied with plush, velvety tannins and lots of fruit and texture. It goes on for minutes. Rich at the finish, but remains fresh and vivid. Superb. One of the great Valandrauds.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气非常丰富和生动，带有黑果和松针的味道，非常花香。口感丰富，纤维柔软，果味丰富，口感丰富。酒尾丰富，但仍保持清新和生动。非常出色。这是一瓶出色的瓦兰杜酒。

Western reviews.review: One of the wines of the vintage is Jean-Luc Thunevin's 2020 Château Valandraud, which comes from the cooler, eastern side of Saint-Emilion. Exhibiting a dense purple hue as well as an incredible perfume of crème de cassis, ripe black cherries, violets, new leather, and an almost Hermitage-like burning embers character, it hits the palate with full-bodied richness, ripe, seamless tannins, remarkable purity of fruit, and a finish that won't quit. A blend of 85% Merlot and the rest Cabernet Franc and Cabernet Sauvignon, it's clearly in the same league as the 2019, if not slightly more concentrated.
Western reviews.translation: 2020年圣埃米利翁的杰出酒款之一是让-路易斯·图内文（Jean-Luc Thunevin）的酒庄瓦兰杜（Château Valandraud）。这款酒来自圣埃米利翁东部较冷的地区，展现出浓密的紫红色以及令人惊艳的黑加拿大酱油、熟黑樱桃、紫罗兰、新皮革和几乎像赫尔米特酒庄（Hermitage）一样的燃烧着的炭火气味。酒庄在口感上展现出丰富的体积、成熟的、平滑的纹理、果实的纯粹性以及不会结束的长尾。酒庄的组成比例为85%梅洛（Merlot）和剩余部分为卡伯涅·法兰克（Cabernet Franc）和卡伯涅·索万（Cabernet Sauvignon），显然它与2019年酒庄同属于同一阵营，如果不是略微更浓郁。

Western reviews.review: Opaque purple-black colored, the 2020 Valandraud bursts with scents of crushed black plums, boysenberries and blackberry preserves, followed by hints of dusty soil, garrigue and clove oil. The medium to full-bodied palate delivers a lot of energetic, crunchy black fruits with a lively backbone and beautifully ripe, rounded tannins, finishing long and fragrant. Barrel Sample: 95-97
Western reviews.translation: 2020年瓦兰杜（Valandraud）红酒呈现深紫黑色，酒香中充满了黑浆果、黑莓和黑berry果酱的气味，伴有土壤、灌木丛和丁香油的微妙气息。酒口中黑果的能量十足，口感丰富，坚实的果肉和细腻的橡木味，尾部长长持久，气味芬芳。酒评：95-97分。

Western reviews.review: This 17-acre vineyard gives a wine with an explosion of black fruits. It offers sweetness balanced by acidity and impressive tannins. The wood aging gives a polished texture with richness and style in balance.
Western reviews.translation: 这座17英亩的葡萄园生产出一种爆炸性的黑果酒。酒中有甜度与酸度的平衡，以及令人印象深刻的苦味。木桶陈化赋予酒体光滑的质感，富有层次和风格的平衡。

Western reviews.review: This is excellent, broad-shouldered with ample depth to the brambled fruits, liquorice, cigar box spice, with a gorgeously saline finish. Chalky, grippy tannins keep tugging you back into the body of the wine. The tannic grip is helped by a linen rather than silk texture that stops things being overly smooth and instead adds depth and interest to the powerfully knitted body, as do white flowers on the aromatics as it opens. Good stuff. 100% new oak for 24 months. A yield of 49hl/ha. Thunevin has sold a 50% stake in Valandraud to the Lefevre family at Sansonnet (also the new owners of Villemaurine, so a busy year for them)
Western reviews.translation: 这是一款出色的红酒，具有宽广的肩膀和丰富的深度，展现出浓郁的果实、酒精、雪茄盒香和盐味。干酪质的坚果味和抓握感的纽扣味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果味让人回味不已。酒体中的纽扣味和坚果

Chinese pairs.original: 当举起酒杯的那一刻，我的葡萄酒激情被彻底点燃了… 它的香气宛如万花筒，每一次摇杯都能折射出不同的色彩。娇艳的牡丹、鲜爽的大枣、温和的榛子、调皮的花椒… 我情不自禁地舞动着酒杯，生怕错过每一个美妙的瞬间… 它的口感清润如露、它的回味绵柔如绢，初入口的甜美悄然转化为上等的咸感，而后又在舌根掀起了层层的石灰岩粉末。品鉴 Clos Saint Martin 2023 本身就是一种享受，它是每一个热爱圣爱美隆、热爱石灰岩高地的朋友们，所共同拥有的独家记忆。
Chinese pairs.new: The moment I raised the glass, my passion for wine was ignited... Its aroma was like a kaleidoscope, with every swirl revealing a different hue. Delicate peonies, fresh apricots, gentle hazelnuts, and mischievous peppercorns... I found myself dancing with the glass, afraid to miss a single moment of beauty... Its texture was silky smooth, its finish was soft and velvety, with an initial sweetness that subtly gave way to a refined saltiness, and finally, a layering of powdery limestone dust on the palate. Savoring Clos Saint Martin 2023 is an experience in itself, a shared memory among those who adore Saint-Émilion and the limestone plateau.

English pairs.original: The moment I raise the glass, my passion for wine is fully ignited… Its aroma is like a kaleidoscope, each swirl reflecting a different hue. Delicate peonies, refreshing dates, gentle hazelnuts, mischievous Sichuan pepper… I find myself dancing with the glass, fearful of missing any exquisite moment… Its taste is as clear as dew, its finish as soft as silk. The initial sweetness subtly transforms into a refined saltiness, which then lifts layers of limestone dust on my tongue. Tasting Clos Saint Martin 2023 is in itself a delight, a unique memory shared among all who cherish Saint-Emilion and its limestone highlands.
English pairs.new: 当我举起酒杯时，我的对酒的热情就完全被点燃了……酒的香气像一面彩色玻璃镜，旋转时每一圈都展现出不同的色彩。细腻的牡丹花，清新的小西柚，温柔的花生，调皮的四川胡椒……我发现自己在与酒杯跳舞，害怕错过任何精致的时刻……酒的味道清澈如露水，余味柔软如丝绸。初期的甜味逐渐转变为细腻的咸味，然后在舌头上留下一层石灰尘的层次。品尝Clos Saint Martin 2023本身就是一种享受，一种与所有珍爱圣埃米利翁和其石灰高原的人分享的独特记忆。

Western reviews.review: The wine showcases a firm and linear structure, complemented by supple fruits that are both fresh and ripe, contributing to a pleasant energy flow on the palate. While the tannins are noticeable, with a touch of austerity, they add a noble expression to the overall character of the wine. It offers a moderate finish and complexity, suggesting it’s worth ageing to allow the oak and fruit components to integrate further.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒展现出坚实而线性的结构，搭配新鲜而成熟的果味，给口感带来愉悦的能量流动。虽然有明显的苦味，但带有一丝严谨的味道，它们为整体风格增添了贵族的气质。它提供了一种中等的尾韵和复杂性，表明它值得陈放以让橡木和果味成分进一步融合。

Western reviews.review: Noblesse schon im Duft, dunkelfruchtig, floral, kühl, steinig; dicht gebaut, üppige, jedoch knackige Frucht, druckvoll, mit ausgezeichneter Struktur, grosser Spannungsbogen, kalkig geprägtes, salines Finish. Ein kleines Weinmonument, das hervorragend reifen dürfte.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的芳香就已经表现出其高贵的品质，带有深色果实、花朵、冷却、石头的味道。酒体厚实，丰富的果实味道却又有着清脆的感觉，酒液充满活力，结构优良，张力大，酒尾带有矿物质和盐的味道。这种酒应该会在陈化过程中表现出更高的品质。

Western reviews.review: The vivid black-purple color is virtually opaque. The aromas are of ripe dark-fruit & perhaps a touch of earthiness. The luscious dark fruit palate has a lovely smoothness & harmony – there is a chewy texture & a touch of dusty grip. The alcohol is balanced & spicy oak notes are very well integrated. On the mid palate juicy black-cherry & hints of sweet licorice come to be balanced on the finish by freshness & fine tannins. 04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的颜色是深紫红色，几乎是透明的。酒中的香气是熟透的黑果和泥土味。口感丰富，黑果味浓郁，滑顺，和谐，口感有嚼劲，略带干涩感。酒中的酒精度合适，橡木味很好地融合在一起。中口黑樱桃味和甜甘草味相互平衡，最后口感清新，细腻的苦味结束。评分：4.24分（ep）DCAMW。

Western reviews.review: The wine showcases a firm and linear structure, complemented by supple fruits that are both fresh and ripe, contributing to a pleasant energy flow on the palate. While the tannins are noticeable, with a touch of austerity, they add a noble expression to the overall character of the wine. It offers a moderate finish and complexity, suggesting it’s worth ageing to allow the oak and fruit components to integrate further.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒展现出坚实而线性的结构，搭配新鲜又成熟的果味，给口感带来愉悦的能量流动。虽然有明显的苦味，但带有一丝严谨的味道，它们为整体风格增添了高贵的表达。它提供了一种中等的尾韵和复杂性，表明它值得陈年以让橡木和果味成分进一步融合。

Western reviews.review: Noblesse schon im Duft, dunkelfruchtig, floral, kühl, steinig; dicht gebaut, üppige, jedoch knackige Frucht, druckvoll, mit ausgezeichneter Struktur, grosser Spannungsbogen, kalkig geprägtes, salines Finish. Ein kleines Weinmonument, das hervorragend reifen dürfte.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的芳香就已经表现出其高贵的品质，带有深色果实、花朵、冷却、石头的味道。酒体厚实，丰富的果实味道却又有着清脆的感觉，酒液充满了活力，结构优良，张力大，酒尾带有矿物质和盐的味道。这种酒应该会在陈化过程中表现出更高的品质。

Chinese pairs.original: “如牛奶般丝滑”，这便是我在品尝Chateau l’Evangile时的第一感受。虽然来自早熟的地块，Chateau l’Evangile 不再像其他炎热年份那样过分热情，而是以内敛的姿态传递它的好客。桑果、杨梅、奶油蓝莓的成熟芬芳；橙皮、甘草杏和迷迭香的草本清新，在同一杯酒中无缝衔接，营造出一种难以言喻的和谐美感。
Chinese pairs.new: "Smooth as milk," is the first impression I had when tasting Chateau l'Evangile. Although from an early-maturing vineyard, Chateau l'Evangile no longer overflows with the exuberance of other hot vintages, but instead conveys its hospitality with restraint. Ripe flavors of blackberry, mulberry, and creamy blueberry; the herbal freshness of orange peel, licorice almond, and thyme seamlessly blend together in one glass, creating an unspoken harmony of beauty.

English pairs.original: “Smooth as milk,” is my immediate impression as I taste Chateau l’Evangile. Despite coming from an early-ripening terroir, Chateau l’Evangile is not burdened by the exuberance often found in warm vintages. Rather, it exudes a refined, welcoming quality that is both subtle and compelling. The mature fragrances of mulberries, bayberries, and creamed blueberries; the herbal freshness of orange peel, licorice, and rosemary seamlessly combine each other, creating an indescribable harmony of beauty.
English pairs.new: 我一口喝下香榭路易埃万杰尔，第一感觉就是非常顺滑，像牛奶一样。尽管它来自早熟的土壤，但香榭路易埃万杰尔并没有受到温暖年份的繁荣影响。相反，它散发着一种优雅、温馨的质感，既细腻又引人入胜。成熟的浆果香气，如桑椹、海棠和蓝莓酱；柑橘皮、甘草和罗勒的清新香气完美融合，创造出难以言表的美丽和谐。

Western reviews.review: Deep in color, the wine pops with its nose of violets, black cherry, spice, cinnamon, and chocolate. On the palate, the wine quickly focuses you on its core of black cherries, black plums, spices, cocoa, espresso, and savory herbs. Elegantly textured, with softness, refinement, length and freshness, the finish has length, purity, and freshness on the back end that stands out. The is a complete change in direction from the recent vintages that were focused more on density. With the 2022, the wine is about its elegant nature. The wine blends 82% Merlot, 17.5% Cabernet Franc and .05% Cabernet Sauvignon. 14.5% ABV, 3.8 pH. Yields were 30 hectoliters per hectare. The harvest took place August 29 - September 14. The wine is aging in a combination of 50% new, French oak, 15% amphora and 10% foudres. Drink from 2027-2055. 95-97 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色深邃，酒鼻中弥漫着紫罗兰、黑樱桃、香料、丁香和巧克力等芬芳。口感上，酒精迅速聚焦在黑樱桃、黑杏、香料、可可、咖啡和干香草的核心上。酒精质地优雅细腻，软度、精致、长度和新鲜感让人印象深刻。尾部的长度、纯度和新鲜感令人印象深刻。与前几年相比，这瓶酒的风格发生了明显的转变，更加注重优雅的性格。酒精的成分为82%梅洛、17.5%卡波弗朗奇和0.05%卡波弗朗奇。酒精含量14.5%，pH值3.8。产量为每公顷30公斤。采摘时间为8月29日至9月14日。酒精在50%新法兰克的法国橡木桶、15%陶罐和10%大桶中陈化。建议饮用时间为2027-2055年。评分95-97分。

Western reviews.review: Almost opaque, deep, dark black-purple color holds well to a purple rim. Aromas are of juicy, fresh black-cherry. The palate opens slowly, revealing concentrated, hedonistic black-fruit. The fresh, juicy fruit has a jammy, dark-plum nature. The structure is initially fine, silky & supple. Warming alcohol lifts delicate sweet spices & some tannic bite out of the finish. The structure opens on the finish where graphite notes are enveloped by mouthwatering, juicy, black fruit. 04/23 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色几乎是完全透明的，深黑紫色，边缘有深紫色光环。酒中的气味是浓郁的黑樱桃，非常新鲜。口感在入口时缓慢展开，展现出浓缩的黑果味，非常享受。新鲜的黑果味带有浓郁的黑浆果味。结构在入口时细腻，滑顺。酒中的酒精逐渐升温，带出细微的甜香料和一些苦味。酒尾结构逐渐展开，黑果味变得更加浓郁，口感更加水嫩。04/23 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 这款正牌酒的大部分葡萄都来源于酒庄边上的中心葡萄园，仅有一小部分来自那位于圣埃斯泰夫的4公顷葡萄园。平均树龄41年；种植密度为每公顷8000株葡萄藤。酒庄遵循十分传统的酿造方式：使用全部三种发酵罐来进行发酵（水泥缸、不锈钢桶及木桶）；只使用淋皮法；每隔3个月取一次清汁；用蛋白来进行澄清。拉菲的所有橡木桶都是自己制作的，并且由于相同橡木桶的缘故，混酿通常在装瓶前14个月就已经完成了。混酿比例为84%赤霞珠、15%梅洛和1%小维多。二次醒酒4小时。此酒略显含蓄、新鲜、年轻并且无比迷人的香气在开始时充满了草药、泥土和香料味，随即便迅速演变出烟草叶、咸矿物、浓缩咖啡、干花和黑醋栗的香味——为香气增添了层次及深度。细滑、多矿物的口感确实是十分宜人，我同样对那深邃、清甜的超长回味感到惊讶。这支典型、高雅的拉菲在接下来20多年应该都会有出色的表现。
Chinese pairs.new: This flagship wine is primarily sourced from the estate's central vineyard, with a small portion coming from the 4-hectare vineyard in Saint-Estèphe. The average vine age is 41 years, with a planting density of 8,000 vines per hectare. The estate adheres to a traditional winemaking approach: using all three types of fermentation tanks (concrete, stainless steel, and oak); only using the "délestage" method; taking the press wine every three months; and clarifying with egg whites. All of Rauzan-Ségla's oak barrels are made in-house, and due to the use of the same oak barrels, the blend is typically complete 14 months before bottling. The blend is 84% Cabernet Sauvignon, 15% Merlot, and 1% Petit Verdot. The wine underwent a 4-hour second racking. This wine has a subtle, fresh, and youthful aroma that is both captivating and alluring at the start, with notes of herbs, earth, and spices, which quickly evolve into tobacco leaf, salty minerals, concentrated coffee, dried flowers, and black truffle - adding depth and complexity to the aroma. The smooth, mineral-driven palate is indeed pleasant, and I'm equally impressed by the profound, sweet finish. This classic, elegant Rauzan-Ségla should perform outstandingly over the next 20+ years.

English pairs.original: Most fruits of this first wine originate from the large, central vineyard near the chateau, with only a small proportion of the grapes come from the 4 hectares vineyard in Saint-Estephe. 41 years old vines on average; a plant density of 8000 vines per hectare. Conventional in the vinification: using all three types of fermenter (concrete vat, stainless steel tank and wooden vat); pumping over only; racking every three months; fining by egg white. Lafite makes all the oak barrels by itself, and normally the blending is done 14 months before the bottling since all the barrels are nearly the same. The blend is 84% Cabernet Sauvignon, 15% Merlot and 1% Petit Verdot. Double decanted for 4 hours. The faintly restrained, freshly young and utterly fascinating scent was packed with herb, earth and spices at the very beginning, then it rapidly emerged tobacco leaf, savoury-mineral, espresso, dried flower and cassis notes that added the layer and depth. The delicately satiny, mineral-driven palate was appealing and enjoyable indeed, I was also amazed by the deep, prodigiously long and lucidly sweet finish. This typically refined Lafite should drink well for 20+ years.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的主要成分来自于酒庄附近的大型葡萄园，仅有少量葡萄来自于圣埃斯泰夫的4公顷葡萄园。平均年龄为41岁的葡萄，密度为每公顷8000株。酒庄采用传统的酿造方法，使用混酿法（混酿法是指将不同葡萄品种的葡萄混合酿造的方法），使用混酿桶（混酿桶是指一种特殊的桶，用于混合不同葡萄品种的葡萄酿造的方法），每3个月进行一次转运，使用鸡蛋白进行澄清。酒庄自行制作橡木桶，通常在酒瓶装好之前14个月进行混合。酒的比例为84%卡波弗列（Cabernet Sauvignon）、15%梅洛（Merlot）和1%佩蒂·维多（Petit Verdot）。酒瓶在装好后进行4小时的双重脱颈。酒的香气初期清晰、年轻、迷人，带有草药、土壤和香料的味道，随后迅速出现了烟草叶、咖啡、干花和黑加仑的味道，增加了层次和深度。酒的口感细腻、矿物质驱动，令人愉悦。酒的尾部深长、清晰、甜美。这种典型的精致的拉菲酒应该可以在20多年后继续享用。

Western reviews.review: Tasted at BI Wine & Spirits' 10-Years-On tasting, the 2007 Lafite-Rothschild has an elegant cigar box bouquet, with dusky black fruit and a touch of antique bureau—just classic Lafite. The palate is medium-bodied with fine tannin, cedar and tobacco infusing the black fruit, classic in style with a conservative yet focused finish that lingers in the mouth. This is certainly the most subtle First Growth, but one of the most refined too—a sophisticated but understated Lafite-Rothschild that will age with discrete style. Tasted February 2017.
Western reviews.translation: 2007年拉菲罗什柴尔德在BI Wine & Spirits的10年后品酒会上展现出典雅黑酒的典范风格。酒香中带有优雅的雪茄盒、黑色果实和古董橡木柜的味道，典型的拉菲风格。口感中等体积，细致的橡木纹理，雪茄和烟草味道浸润黑色果实，风格典雅，保守但聚焦的尾韵在口中停留。拉菲罗什柴尔德的这款酒是最低调的第一级葡萄酒，但也是一款最为精致的葡萄酒，风格优雅但不张扬，会以低调的方式随着时间的推移而成熟。

Western reviews.review: This is a wine for aging. The tannins are dense, very dry with a feel of extraction. It takes a while for the black currant fruit to show through, with acidity and freshness dominant. The wine is still settling, and time will bring the fruit into line with the tannins.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶适合陈年的红酒。酒中的苦味物质（tanins）非常浓郁，干爽，带有提取感。黑currant的果味需要一段时间才能显现出来，酸度和清新感占据主导地位。酒还在调整中，随着时间的推移，果味会逐渐与苦味物质达到平衡。

Western reviews.review: A big, juicy wine for the vintage, with spice, sweet tobacco and plum aromas and flavors. Full, long and rich, with a soft texture. A little tight, but should develop nicely in the bottle. Best after 2014.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒是当年产量中的一大亮点，具有浓郁的香气和口感，包括香料、甜烟草和浆果的味道。酒体丰富、长久、富有层次，口感柔软。虽然现在还略有紧绷，但应该在瓶内发酵后会逐渐成熟。建议在2014年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: If you prefer your elegance and refined character-filled wines on the young, buy reaching adolescent side, where the fruit, with its trail of tobacco leaf, cedar, cigar box, lead pencil, and salty rocks is just starting to fold into the secondary stage, you came to the right place. While another 5-10 years will really bring this to center stage, due to its forward style, this is starting to work in your glass.
Western reviews.translation: 如果你喜欢年轻、优雅且富有特色的红酒，那么这个时候正是购买的好时机。酒中的果味正开始融入次级阶段，带有烟草叶、红木、雪茄盒、铅笔和岩石的味道正开始显现。虽然在未来5-10年里，这个酒会达到巅峰，但由于其前卫的风格，这个酒已经开始在杯子里展现出它的魅力。

Western reviews.review: Tiefdunkles Rubingranat, opaker Farbkern, violette Reflexe. In der Nase intensive Anklänge an Waldbeeren und Orangen, dazu etwas Nougat und Marzipan, attraktive jugendliche Gewürznote. Am Gaumen stoffig und frisch strukturiert, zeigt präsente, feste Tannine, dennoch bereits harmonisch, angenehme Zwetschkenfrucht, Brombeergelee im Nachhall, ein Wein mit einer guten Textur, hat sicheres Reifepotenzial. ! Lagern +30 Jahre
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，微暗的橙色核心，紫色反光。鼻子中有强烈的森林浆果和橙子香味，伴有些许奶油糖和杏仁糖，具有吸引人的年轻香料味。口感厚实，新鲜的结构，现成的坚实的橡皮质，尽管已经和谐，但仍然有着愉悦的浆果味和莓果果酱的余味，这是一瓶具有良好质地的葡萄酒，具有明确的成熟潜力。建议储存30年以上。

Chinese pairs.original: 鲜甜多汁、筋骨健硕，很难想象这两个看似矛盾的元素能够在一款酒中充分展现，着实让我开心。面对成熟年份的Domaine de Chevalier，我们可以尽情地发挥想象空间。来看看它在1998年给我们带来的惊喜吧：它英俊潇洒、谦逊有礼、身着铠甲骑着高头大马。你说，这不就是理想中的“骑士”形象嘛，简直了！拥有该年份的朋友可以放心陈年15年以上。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich and juicy, with robust tannins, it's hard to imagine how these two seemingly opposing elements can coexist in one wine, but it's truly delightful. When faced with a mature Domaine de Chevalier, the possibilities are endless. Let's take a look at what it brought us in 1998: it's dashing, modest, and refined, clad in armor riding a majestic steed. Who wouldn't want the ideal "knight" image? Friends who own this vintage can rest assured that it will age for 15 years or more.

English pairs.original: It’s really cool how this wine manages to be both juicy and sweet, and also strong and muscular at the same time – it’s like combining two opposites in one drink, which makes me so excited. With the mature vintages of Domaine de Chevalier, you can really use your imagination. Take the 1998 vintage, for example: it’s like a charming, polite knight in shining armor, and riding a tall horse. It’s like the ideal image of a “Chevalier” – just perfect! If you have this vintage in cellar, you can keep it for more than 15 years without any worry.
English pairs.new: 这个红酒的魅力在于，它既有浓郁的果味，又有甜美的口感，还有强烈的肌肉感，这两种截然相反的特质在同一杯酒中完美融合，让我非常激动。Domaine de Chevalier的成熟年份红酒，让你可以自由发挥想象力。例如，1998年的年份，就像一个英俊的骑士，骑着高大的马，穿着闪亮的铠甲，充满着优雅和风度。这正是“Chevalier”的理想形象，完美无缺。如果你有这个年份的红酒存放在酒窖里，可以放心地保留超过15年。

Western reviews.review: Strong ruby colour, broad brightening on the rim. Blackberryish fruit, subtle undergrowth note, fine oak nuances, some liquorice underneath. Full-bodied, blackberries, dark cherries, a hint of ripeness, elegant, fine tannins, mineral, salty touch in the finish, still very youthful, lemony aftertaste, a pleasant food wine, has really matured over time. (Drink/+10).
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，酒杯边缘有明亮的光泽。黑莓果味，微妙的林地香气，细致的橡木味，底部有 licorice 的味道。口感丰富，黑莓、黑草莓、成熟的味道，优雅，细致的纤维，矿物质，咸味的尾韵，仍然非常年轻，柠檬味的余韵，适合搭配食物的葡萄酒，经过时间的成熟，味道更加丰富。 (建议饮用时间：+10年)

Western reviews.review: Fully mature, the wine is medium bodied, elegant, soft, fresh and charming. The tobacco, smoke, cherry, earth and cigar box aromatics are right where it needs to be. Feminine, with more on the nose than on the discreet palate, this is ready for consumption. 90 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒已经完全成熟，口感中等，优雅，柔和，新鲜，迷人。酒中有烟草、烟雾、樱桃、泥土和雪茄盒的香气，位置正確。女性化，鼻子上的气味比口感上的要多，这瓶酒已经准备好享用。评分：90分。

Western reviews.review: Medium to deep, ruby-red in color. Medium to full intensity of leafy cassis & cedary oak aromas have a slightly agricultural character. Cassis & redcurrant fruit on the palate is supported by lively acidity. There is a lovely medium to full bodied structure that combines suppleness & grip. Alcohol is balanced & the acidity lifts clean red-fruit, giving a long finish. 11/02 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深红色至深红色。

香气：中等至强烈的浓郁黑currant、叶绿和松木香气，带有轻微的田园风味。

口感：口感丰富，黑currant和红currant果味清晰，酸度活泼。

体积：中等至强烈的体积结构，结合了柔软和紧实的感觉。

酒精与酸度平衡，清晰的红果味，留下长长的尾部。 评分：11/02 DCAMW。

Western reviews.review:
Cherry red with white rim. Timid nose, green fruit, cherry, oak, 60min later, the wine is opening up. Suave and sweet, red fruit, cabernets are ruling the taste, cherries, blueberries. Needs time in the glass (best decanted).
Very good but not great.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色，带有白色的边缘。酒鼻子很害羞，闻起来有青柠的味道，樱桃和橡木的味道。60分钟后，酒开始打开，变得更加丰富。酒的口感很细腻，甜度适中，红果味浓郁，卡贝网葡萄的味道占据了主导地位，樱桃和蓝莓的味道也很明显。需要在玻璃中放置一段时间（最好是倒酒）才能让酒的味道更好地展现。酒的质量很好，但不是非常出色。

Western reviews.review: Medium to deep, ruby-red in color. Medium to full intensity of leafy cassis & cedary oak aromas have a slightly agricultural character. Cassis & redcurrant fruit on the palate is supported by lively acidity. There is a lovely medium to full bodied structure that combines suppleness & grip. Alcohol is balanced & the acidity lifts clean red-fruit, giving a long finish. 11/02 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深红色至深红色。

香气：中等至强烈的浓郁黑currant、叶绿和松木香气，带有轻微的田园风味。

口感：口感丰富，带有浓郁的黑currant和红currant果味，酸度清新。酒体中等至丰富，结构完美，既有柔软的质感，又有紧实的感觉。酒精平衡，酸度清新，延长了果味的持久感。

Chinese pairs.original: 时隔四年之后再次品鉴Chateau Ducru-Beaucaillou 2017，我更加笃定，2017年份的梅多克左岸被严重低估了。以果香的丰富度来看，2017年份展现了出色的成熟度和温润感，除了软糯的桑果和杨梅之外，还带着纯正的摩卡，清新的草果、以及淡淡的松香芬芳。相较于那些果香热烈的年份，2017年份的Chateau Ducru-Beaucaillou 显然多了几分波尔多的传统韵味。收尾时的那一抹“甜感”点缀地非常巧妙，让人深切感受到这款酒含情脉脉的温暖问候。
Chinese pairs.new: 四年后再次品尝Chateau Ducru-Beaucaillou 2017，我更加确信，2017年梅多克左岸的葡萄酒被严重低估了。从果香的丰富度来看，2017年份展现了出色的成熟度和温润感，除了软糯的桑果和杨梅之外，还带着纯正的摩卡，清新的草果和淡淡的松香芬芳。相较于那些果香热烈的年份，2017年份的Chateau Ducru-Beaucaillou显然多了几分波尔多的传统韵味。收尾时的那一抹“甜感”点缀地非常巧妙，让人深切感受到这款酒含情脉脉的温暖问候。

English pairs.original: As I tasted Chateau Ducru-Beaucaillou 2017 after a four-year time, my conviction grew stronger—the Medoc’s Left Bank of the 2017 vintage has been gravely underestimated. In terms of the opulence of its fruit aromas, the 2017 vintage displays remarkable maturity and a soothing allure. Beyond the luscious notes of ripe mulberries and blackberries, there exists an authentic infusion of mocha, fresh green peppercorns, and a delicate hint of pine. Compared to those vintages characterized by exuberant fruit fragrances, Chateau Ducru-Beaucaillou 2017 embodies a discernible essence of traditional Bordeaux charm. The discreet touch of “sweetness” that adorns the finish is artfully woven, leaving a lasting impression of the wine’s tender and affectionate salutation.
English pairs.new: 我在品尝杜克鲁-博卡利奥 2017 年红酒四年后，我的信心更加坚定——2017 年的梅多克左岸被严重低估。在果香的奢华程度方面，2017 年的杜克鲁-博卡利奥展现出令人惊叹的成熟度和令人放松的魅力。除了浓郁的熟透的黑berries和黑berries外，还存在一股真正的摩卡、新鲜的绿胡椒和细微的松香的真实滋味。与那些以果香爆发著称的年份相比，杜克鲁-博卡利奥 2017 年体现出明显的传统波尔多风格。酒尾的“甜度”细微的触感是精心编织的，留下了酒的温柔和亲切的问候。

Western reviews.review: While the dense and dark tannins are prominent, they can't mask the exuberant fruit that wants to burst out. Blackberry flavors are impressively ripe and rich, shot through with acidity that gives the wine salinity as well as freshness. At the back, those tannins will allow the wine to age over many years. Don't drink before 2024. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的厚重而浓郁的苦味虽然显著，但却无法掩盖其欲爆发的丰富果味。黑莓的风味令人印象深刻，丰富而饱满，酸度的冲击使得酒精带有咸味和新鲜感。酒尾处的苦味会让酒精在多年后仍然保持其风味。建议不要在2024年之前饮用。 - 罗杰·沃斯

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby, purple reflections, delicate brightening on the rim. Intense dark berry fruit on the nose with hints of cassis and blackberry, fresh orange zest and a mineral touch. Taut palate, ripe cherry fruit, vivid, still demanding tannins and a long finish with more black cherry and red berries. A savoury food wine showing some development, but with definite ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，紫色反射，酒杯边缘有细微的光泽。酒鼻中有浓郁的黑berry果味，带有黑加仑和黑莓的暗香，新鲜的橙子皮和矿物质的味道。口感紧致，熟透的樱桃果味，生动的，仍然要求的坚果味和长长的尾部，更多的黑樱桃和红果味。是一款适合配餐的葡萄酒，展现出了一定的成熟度，但仍有明显的陈化潜力。

Western reviews.review: Freshness and accessibility are the hallmarks of this wine. The customary level of density is improved with added grace, elegance, pliability and an upbeat, spicy core of attention seeking fruits. This is not to say that the wine is light. It is to explain that power has been refined with approachability, brighter fruits and exceedingly silky tannins. The wine was made from a blend of 90% Cabernet Sauvignon and 10% Merlot and is aging in 100% new, French oak barrels. The wine reached 13.51% alcohol with a pH of 3.79. The harvest took place from September 18 to September 30.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的特点是新鲜和易于入口。它的典型密度被优雅、典雅、柔韧和富有活力的、带有辣味的果香所提升。这种说法并不是说这款红酒很轻。它是指力量被细化了，变得更加易于入口，果香更加鲜明，纤维素变得极其细腻。该酒是由90%卡波雷尔·萨维尼翁和10%梅洛混合酿造的，陈酿于100%新法兰克的橡木桶中。酒精含量为13.51%，pH值为3.79。收获时间为9月18日至9月30日。

Western reviews.review: La texture a gagné en plénitude après élevage. Grande robe, beau nez classique de cèdre et de violette, délicat, long, subtil. Il ne lui manque qu’un peu de vinosité pour être grand.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒经过陈酿后，口感更加丰富。酒色深红，酒香典雅典雅，带有松柏和紫罗兰的气息，细腻、持久、微妙。唯一的不足之处是缺乏一些酒中特有的风味。

Western reviews.review: "Great producer from an rather difficult vintage lovely nose packed with red and black fruit but also cedaroak , smoek and graphite well balanced , tannins are soft and fully integrated good to drink now 93/100"
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶来自一个相对困难的产季的出色的红酒，酒香丰富，带有红黑果味、松木、烟草和石墨的味道，口感平衡，纤维软且完全融合，适合现在饮用，评分93/100。

Chinese pairs.original: 拥有有机认证的酒庄（部分葡萄园采用生物动力法耕种）。葡萄藤的平均树龄为32年。所有地块都是单独酿制的；水泥缸内发酵；淋皮和压帽；篮式压榨；混酿在陈酿前就已经完成了；酒液在轻度烘培、25%新的法国桶内陈年14个月。2018年份的混酿比例为82%梅洛和18%品丽珠。今年2月我和庄主Alain Moueix（他还拥有位于波美侯的Chateau Mazeyres）在酒庄进行垂直品鉴时喝的那瓶，非常遗憾地受到了挥发性酸的影响。年底我在上海又重新品鉴了这款酒，幸运的是，当天的表现非常出色。奢华的桶味（香草、香料、黑巧克力）在历经2小时的醒酒后完全融入到底色中，与此同时，此酒庄严、古典的香气被绝妙、迷人的花香（紫罗兰干花、花蜜）所占据，其中亦夹杂灌木、岩石、黑莓、枇杷、人参果和些许甜泥土芬芳。以细腻、滑爽质地为基石的口感同样严肃；成线性的通透酸度以及粉末状的结实单宁赋予那多矿物的深邃、集中同时活泼、清晰回味紧实和张力。这支美酒需要再放8到10年，并且可以陈年至少30年。
Chinese pairs.new:
这是一瓶来自拥有有机认证的酒庄的红酒，部分葡萄园采用生物动力法耕种。酒庄的葡萄藤平均树龄为32年。每个地块都单独酿制，使用水泥缸发酵，淋皮和压帽，篮式压榨，混酿在陈酿前就已经完成。酒液在轻度烘培后陈年14个月，使用25%新的法国桶。2018年份的混酿比例为82%梅洛和18%品丽珠。

我曾经尝过这瓶酒，但当时受到了挥发性酸的影响。后来在上海重新品鉴时，酒的表现非常出色。醒酒后，奢华的桶味（香草、香料、黑巧克力）融入到了底色中。酒庄的严、古典的香气被绝妙、迷人的花香（紫罗兰干花、花蜜）所占据，夹杂着灌木、岩石、黑莓、枇杷、人参果和甜泥土芬芳。

酒的口感细腻、滑爽，严肃而成线性的。通透酸度和粉末状的结实单宁赋予了酒的深邃、集中同时活泼、清晰的回味紧实和张力。这支美酒需要再放8到10年，并且可以陈年至少30年。

English pairs.original: A certified organic producer (partial vineyards are farmed bio-dynamically). 32 years old vines on average. Each plot is vinified independently; fermenting in the concrete vats; pumping over and punching down; basket press; the blend is finished before the maturation; aging 14 months in 25% new French oak barrels that are lightly toasted. The 2018 contains 82% Merlot and 18% Cabernet Franc. That bottle I've tasted this February in the vertical tasting with the proprietor Alain Moueix (who also manages Chateau Mazeyres in Pomerol) at the winery was sadly impacted by the volatile acid. It was re-tasted at the end of the year in Shanghai, and luckily the wine was showing very well indeed. The opulently woody notes (vanilla, spices, black chocolate) were transferred into the backdrop after two hours' decantage when the attractively wonderful florality (dried violet, nectar) occupied the austerely classical perfume that was surrounded by scrub, stone, blackberry, loquat, ginseng fruit and a spark of sweet earth. Beautifully solemn on the palate too, where the keystone was the delicately polished texture; brightly linear acid and solidly powdery tannin gave the compactness and tension to the mineral-infused finish that was intensely deep yet vibrantly defined. The effort needed 8-10 years of bottle age, and should last at least 30 years.
English pairs.new:
本酒由认证有机生产商（部分葡萄园采用生物动力耕作）生产。平均年龄32年的葡萄。每个葡萄园独立酿造；在混凝土罐中发酵；搅拌和踩压；篮子压榨；酒精成分在成熟前完成；在25%新法国橡木桶中陈化14个月，轻度烤制。2018年酒中含82%梅洛和18%卡波弗朗克。 

我在2月份与产酒人Alain Moueix（同时管理波尔多的Chateau Mazeyres）在酒庄进行的垂直品鉴会中品尝了这瓶酒，但遗憾的是它被挥发性酸影响了。年底在上海重品尝时，幸运的是酒精表现得非常好。酒精中充满了丰富的木质香气（香草、香料、黑巧克力），在两小时后脱颖而出时，美丽的花香（干紫罗兰、花蜜）占据了古典的香气的背景，周围是杂草、石头、黑莓、柚子、人参果和甜土壤的微光。口感也非常庄严，酒精的关键在于细致的光滑表面；明亮的线性酸和坚实的粉末状鞣质给了矿物质中和的结尾，结尾深而清晰。酒精需要8-10年的陈化期，应该至少能存活30年。

Western reviews.review: Checking in as a blend of 82% Merlot and 18% Cabernet Franc, the 2018 Château Fonroque offers a rich, powerful nose of ripe black fruits and cassis as well as vanilla bean, spice box, and chocolate. Rich, medium to full-bodied, and concentrated, it has plenty of background oak, a great mid-palate, and one heck of a terrific finish. This is the real deal and certainly the finest wine I've tasted from the estate. Give bottles 2-3 years and enjoy over the following decade. It should be a stunning value.
Western reviews.translation: 2018年尚都福酒庄（Château Fonroque）的评分为82%梅洛（Merlot）和18%卡布塞尔法兰克（Cabernet Franc）的混合。酒庄的2018年产物呈现出浓郁的黑果和黑加仑（cassis）香气，伴有香草豆、香料盒和巧克力。酒体丰富，中等至全口感，浓缩度高，背景中有明显的橡木味，口感平衡，尾部长而持久。这是酒庄的真正产品，肯定是酒庄历史上品质最高的产物。建议将酒瓶放置2-3年后，享用10年左右。酒庄的品质将会给消费者带来惊喜。

Western reviews.review: Dark plum and blackberry compote notes form the core, while hints of licorice snap and fruitcake form the backdrop. Nice grippy, tarry streak on the finish adds length and drive. Should cellar well. Merlot and Cabernet Franc. Best from 2022 through 2034.
Western reviews.translation: 深紫色浓郁的果酱味道（如黑浆果和黑莓）构成了酒的核心，而 licorice 和果酱蛋糕的味道则形成了背景。酒尾的坚实、焦炭味道使得酒的长度和驱动力增强。酒应该会在 cellar 中保存良好。酒中含有梅洛和卡波弗朗克。建议从2022年到2034年最佳饮用。

Western reviews.review: Stewed berries, currants, cloves, sweet tobacco and some orange zest on the nose. It’s full-bodied with firm, tightly knit tannins, framing a core of ripe dark fruit. Spiced and zesty finish. Fills your mouth. Try from 2024.
Western reviews.translation: 酒香中有浓郁的浓果、黑加仑、香料、甜烟和橙子皮的味道。酒体丰富，口感坚实，紧密的纤维结构包裹着成熟的黑果。酒尾有香料和柠檬味。酒口感丰富，建议2024年后品尝。

Western reviews.review: There is an enjoyable hawthorn and bramble edge, quite different in feel from the others. More freshly cut herbs, with rosemary and sage notes. A little high in acidity on a finish that brings things to an end slightly abruptly. 30% new oak. Biodynamic and organic. Drinking Window 2024 - 2040
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒带有可爱的 Hawthorn 和 Bramble 边缘，感觉与其他不同。有更多的新鲜切割的香草味道，带有 Rosemary 和 Sage 的笔记。完美的口感略微被高酸度的尾部打断。30% 新橡木。生态和生物动力。饮用窗口：2024-2040。

Western reviews.review: A blend of 82% Merlot and 18% Cabernet Franc, the 2018 Fonroque has a deep garnet-purple color and rambunctious scents of baked black plums, boysenberry preserves and fruitcake with hints of Indian spices, potpourri, cedar and sandalwood. The medium to full-bodied palate has soft, well-managed tannins and plenty of freshness to support the black fruit preserves and spicy flavors, finishing earthy.
Western reviews.translation: 2018年福诺克（Fonroque）红酒是一款由82%梅洛（Merlot）和18%卡波弗朗克（Cabernet Franc）组成的混合酒。它呈现出深红紫色的颜色，气味强烈，带有烤黑杏子、黑莓果酱和果酱的香气，伴有印度香料、花卉香、松木和沉香的微妙气息。口感中等到中厚，纤维软顺，黑果酱和香料味道丰富，带有泥土味的尾韵。

Chinese pairs.original: 酒味新鲜，带有橘子味和柠檬味，入口第一感觉强烈，酒体均衡，余韵回味悠长回味。
Chinese pairs.new: Fresh and citrusy, with notes of orange and lemon, this wine explodes on the palate with a bold first impression, offering a balanced texture and a lingering finish that's full of character.

Western reviews.review: Wonderful, evocative orange marmalade and ginger flavors play around this rich wine. Its botrytis dryness doesn’t detract from the intense sweetness, ripe apricots, spice and deliciously refreshing acidity. The richness is in the texture, but the ripeness is in the open, generous fruit.
Western reviews.translation: 这个红酒非常出色，带有橙子马拉糕和姜的香味。酒中的白色念珠菌干酪感并没有减少酒的甜度，反而使酒中的成熟的杏子、香料和清新爽口的酸度更加突出。酒的丰富感来自于酒的质感，而酒的成熟感则来自于开放、慷慨的果味。

Western reviews.review: An intense nose, with vanilla, lemon cream, apple tart and honey. Full-bodied, very sweet and powerful, with a fabulous finish. So generous, with layers of delicious, sweet fruit. Best after 2014. 7,665 cases made.
Western reviews.translation: 强烈的鼻子，带有香草、柠檬奶油、苹果塔和蜂蜜的味道。口感丰富，非常甜美和强劲，完美的尾韵。非常慷慨，层次丰富的甜美水果。建议在2014年后饮用。生产了7665瓶。

Chinese pairs.original: 在En Primeurs时品尝Clos Saint Martin，你可能会感觉它的烘焙味过重，但别着急，不用等到装瓶，只需要轻轻晃动酒杯，让酒香慢慢散发，你就会发现一副长达八米的高山流水画卷在你的眼前缓缓铺陈开来。清澈通透的酸度宛如倾泻而下的瀑布水花；粉笔灰般的单宁结构则犹如高耸入云的山峦。颗颗饱满的酸枣、山楂，以及含苞待放的紫罗兰花香为这幅画卷增添了勃勃生机，让整个画面细节满满。在我看来，Clos Saint Martin 就像波尔多的Lieu-dit，而且是品质始终如一的Grand Cru。2022年份更是每位热爱圣爱美隆朋友必须膜拜的顶级佳作。
Chinese pairs.new: When tasting Clos Saint Martin at En Primeurs, you might initially think it's too oaky, but don't worry, you don't have to wait until it's bottled - just gently swirl the glass and let the aromas unfold. You'll be treated to a breathtaking eight-meter-long watercolor painting, with crystal-clear acidity cascading down like a waterfall and a powdery, graphite-like tannin structure rising up like towering mountains. Plump, juicy pomegranate and quince flavors, along with the subtle hint of a blooming lavender, add a burst of vitality to this masterpiece, bringing every detail to life. In my opinion, Clos Saint Martin is like a Lieu-dit from Pauillac, but with the added distinction of being a consistently high-quality Grand Cru. The 2022 vintage is a must-see for any Saint-Émilion enthusiast, a true masterpiece that deserves to be revered.

English pairs.original: When tasting Clos Saint Martin during En Primeurs, you may initially feel that its baked flavors are a bit overpowering. But don’t worry, there’s no need to wait until bottling. Simply give your glass a gentle swirl to let the wine’s aroma gradually unfold, and you’ll soon find yourself gazing upon an eight-meter-long mountain stream painting. The crystal-clear acidity cascades down like a waterfall, while the chalky tannin structure rises up like towering peaks. Each plump sour cherry, hawthorn, and budding violet aroma adds a lively touch to the painting, filling it with intricate details. In my opinion, Clos Saint Martin is like a Lieu-dit of Bordeaux, and a Grand Cru of consistent quality. The 2022 vintage is a must-try for any Saint-Emilion lover, and a top masterpiece to be worshipped.
English pairs.new: 在品尝圣马丁酒庄（Clos Saint Martin）时，可能会觉得酒中的烘烤味道有些过于强烈。但是，别担心，等待瓶装的必要性不存在。只需轻轻地摇晃玻璃杯，让酒的香气逐渐展开，你很快就会发现自己面前是一幅八米长的山水画。清澈的酸度像瀑布一样流淌，白 chalky 的纹理结构像高耸的山峰一样升起。每一颗浓实的酸橙、山楂和初开的紫罗兰香气都给画面增添了生动的色彩，使其充满细节。根据我的观察，圣马丁酒庄就像波尔多地区的特产（Lieu-dit），是一瓶质量一贯的格兰库鲁（Grand Cru）。2022年产季是圣埃米利昂爱好者的必尝之酒，也是一幅顶级的艺术杰作。

Western reviews.review: Flowers, black cherries, licorice, smoke, spice, espresso, cinnamon, and plums open the attention seeking perfume. On the palate, the wine is sensuous, silky, long and polished. The array of perfectly ripe, black, red, and blue fruits, with their chocolate edge lingers as the berries caresses your palate from start to finish. Drink from 2025-2042. 97-95 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中包含了鲜花、黑樱桃、甘草、烟雾、香料、咖啡、丁香和浆果等复杂的元素。口感上，酒精丰富、滑顺、长长的尾部，完美成熟的黑、红、蓝果类与巧克力味道相融合，持续在口中留下美妙的印象。建议从2025年到2042年饮用。评分97-95分。

Western reviews.review: (80% Merlot, 15% Cabernet Franc, 5% Cabernet Sauvignon) Das erste Muster, das deutlich vom Barrique geprägt ist, dunkelfruchtig, kalkig, komplex, noch verschlossen, jedoch mit grossem Tiefgang. Im Gaumen mit süssem Fruchtauftakt, sehr saftig, deutlich weniger holzbetont als die Nase vermuten lässt, denn die knackige Frucht mag dieses schlucken, die markante Tanninstruktur, der kalkige Charakter, die perfekt dosierte Säure, lassen den Wein ungemein frisch erscheinen. Langanhaltend und rotfruchtig im Rückaroma. Da schlummert was ziemlich grosses im Fass. 2032-2060+ (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 in den Büros von J.P. Moueix in Libourne) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation: (80% Merlot, 15% Cabernet Franc, 5% Cabernet Sauvignon) 这瓶红酒的第一款样品，深受橡木桶的影响，深红色，带有石灰味，复杂，尚未完全展现，但深度很大。口感上甜果味的开头，非常 juicy，木头味不如鼻子想象的那么强烈，因为果味的清脆使得它容易消化，果味的清脆，石灰味的特征，完美的酸度，使得酒精显得非常清新。长时间持久，回味中有深红色果味。酒中似乎有很大的潜力。推荐储存时间：2032-2060年。

Western reviews.review: Le nez est frais et offre une certaine puissance, un fin côté épicé ainsi qu’un fin côté séveux. On y retrouve des notes de cerise noire, de violette et plus légèrement de sève fraiche associées à de petites touches d’épices, de petits fruits denses ainsi qu’à une fine pointe de poivre, à de discrètes pointes de muscade, de petits fruits rouges sauvages et à une pointe minérale. La bouche est fruitée, équilibrée et offre de la suavité, de l’acidulé, de la jutosité, de la fraicheur, une trame acidulée, de la minéralité ainsi que de la tension. En bouche ce vin exprime des notes de framboise juteuse/acidulée, de cerise et plus légèrement de mûre acidulée/pulpeuse associées à des pointes de bleuet, de mûre écrasée ainsi qu’à de fines pointes de fève tonka et de tabac blond sucré. Les tannins offrent de la souplesse. Bonne longueur. Un fin moelleux et de la sapidité en fin de bouche/persistance.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气清新而有力，带有微妙的辣味和甜味。酒中有黑杏、紫罗兰和轻微的新鲜树汁的香气，伴随着少量的香料、浓实的果实和细微的胡椒、肉豆蔻、野生红果和矿物质的味道。口感果香、平衡，带有柔软、酸性、果实、清新、酸性基调、矿物质和紧张感。口中酒体表达出浓郁酸性和果实的黑莓、黑杏和轻微酸性和浓实的黑berries的味道，伴随着少量的蓝莓、挤压的黑berries和细微的豆蔻和甜的金黄烟草的味道。酒中的纤维提供了柔软。酒体长而持久，酒尾有细腻的口感和丰富的味道。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby colour, inky, opaque core, purple reflections, brightening on the rim. A hint of liqourice, a touch of fine oak, candied violets, blackberry nuances; a seductive bouquet. Juicy, elegant, ripe plums, nougat, fine acidity, mineral and long lasting. Good ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，浓稠的颜色，紫色反光，边缘略微发亮。酒中带有 licorice 的味道，微微的橡木味，糖化的紫罗兰，黑莓的细微变化；诱人的香气。口感丰富，优雅，熟透的浆果，果冻，细微的酸度，矿物质和持久的口感。酒龄潜力较好。

Chinese pairs.original: Valandraud是极少数生产三军酒的右岸酒庄。混合了85%梅洛、10%品丽珠和5%赤霞珠。此酒略显含蓄但诱人、高贵的香气使我联想到白花、桑葚和蔓越莓，下层的香味包含了若隐若现的岩石、桂皮、卡布奇诺和烟草，增添了深邃和层次。卓越、丝滑的单宁让口感显得愈发细腻、滑爽而且富有质地，所谓“心跳加速”的感觉莫过于此；我同样为那充满干净酸度的活泼口感着迷——赋予其持续近一分钟之久、带有矿物棱角和漂亮结构的回味美妙的清晰感。这款窖藏潜力不俗的美酒可以陈放至少30年。我已将这支酒加入到我的“不容错过”2015波尔多葡萄酒清单中。
Chinese pairs.new: Valandraud是极少数生产三军酒的右岸酒庄。混合了85%梅洛、10%品丽珠和5%赤霞珠。这款酒的香气略显含蓄但诱人、高贵，带有白花、桑葚和蔓越莓的味道，底层的香味包含了岩石、桂皮、卡布奇诺和烟草，增添了深邃和层次。酒中的单宁卓越、丝滑，让口感变得细腻、滑爽而且富有质地，令人心跳加速；酒中的酸度干净、活泼，带有矿物棱角和漂亮结构的回味美妙的清晰感。这款窖藏潜力不俗的美酒可以陈放至少30年。

English pairs.original: Valandraud is one of the very few right bank producers that makes the third label. A blending of 85% Merlot, 10% Cabernet Franc and 5% Cabernet Sauvignon. The faintly restrained but invitingly graceful perfume was redolent of white flowers, mulberry and cranberry, along with underlying hints of stone, cinnamon, cappuccino and tobacco to give it depth and layer. A textured, delicate and polished sensation was amplified by the illustrious tannin that was silk-like, causing my heart rate to jump; I was also fascinated by the lively flavours that had plenty of clean acidity that provided crackajack precision to the mineral-edged and beautifully constructed finish that went on for nearly a minute. This offered excellent cellar potential and should live for at least three decades. I've added it to my list of 'do not miss' 2015 Bordeaux wines.
English pairs.new: 瓦兰杜（Valandraud）是右岸（Right Bank）中极少数生产第三标签的酒庄之一。该酒的混合比例为85%梅洛（Merlot）、10%卡波弗朗（Cabernet Franc）和5%卡波弗朗（Cabernet Sauvignon）。酒中的微妙的抑制感却让人难以抗拒，芬芳的白花、白葡萄和红葡萄的香气让人心动不已，伴随着石头、肉桂、咖啡和烟草的暗示，让酒的深度和层次感更加丰富。酒的质感细腻、轻盈、光滑，丝绸般的纹理让人心跳加速，我也被酒中活跃的味道所吸引，清晰的酸度让酒的矿物质和完美的构造让人印象深刻，酒尾延续了近一分钟。酒的储存潜力极高，至少可以存放三十年。因此，我将其列入2015年波尔多酒的“不可错过”名单。

Western reviews.review: Tiefdunkles Rubingranat, opaker Kern, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung. Zart floral unterlegtes dunkles Waldbeerkonfit, ein Hauch von Lakritze, Veilchen, feines Edelholz, facettenreiches Bukett. Kraftvoll, schwarze Beeren, angenehme Fruchtsüße, präsentes Tannin, schokoladiger Touch, mineralisch und anhaltend, sicheres Reifepotenzial.
Western reviews.translation:
深红色葡萄酒色，微暗的橙色核，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。

酒香中有淡淡的花朵和浓郁的黑莓果酱，带有少量的甘草、百合花和细致的高档木头香气，复杂的香气。

口感强烈，黑莓果酱味浓郁，甜度适中，坚果味清晰，巧克力味浓郁，矿物质味和持久感强烈，酒龄潜力大。

Western reviews.review: Produced from an assemblage of 85% Merlot and 15% Cabernet Franc, the wine will be aged in 100% new oak and reached 14.5% alcohol. From yields that average of 32.5 hectoliters per hectare, the wine is deep in color with licorice, black cherry, smoke and oak scents that open to a finesse style of Valandraud. Lush in texture, the wine ends with an opulent, sweet, ripe black cherry finish. 92-94
Western reviews.translation: 本酒由85%梅洛和15%卡波弗朗克组成，酒龄在100%新橡木桶中，酒精含量14.5%。产量平均每公顷32.5公升，酒呈深色，气味中有 licorice、黑樱桃、烟和橡木的香气，展现出Valandraud典雅的风格。酒体丰富，酒尾以丰富、甜、成熟的黑樱桃味结束。评分：92-94。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark and almost inky in color, the wine is equally deep on your palate. Thick, rich, lush, and opulent, the black plums, boysenberry chocolate and licorice stand out here due to the velvet textures and fresh attitude. The wine is lively, and incredibly rich, a difficult act to achieve. The finish leaves you with layers of black cherry liqueur, dark chocolate, licorice and truffle. This is one of the best vintages of Valandraud ever produced, and that says something, with so many great vintages made at the estate over the years.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的颜色深暗如墨，口感同样深厚。酒中黑浆果、男孩森莓巧克力和甘草的味道十分突出，富有细腻的质感和新鲜的气息。酒的口感丰富而又生动，难得一见。酒尾留下一层黑樱桃酒、黑巧克力、甘草和松露的味道。这种酒是Valandraud历史上最好的产量之一，这也足以说明了这一点，尤其是考虑到该庄园多年来生产了许多出色的酒。

Western reviews.review: Since the first vintage in 1991, this wine and its vineyard have travelled far. Now close to the top of the classification tree in Saint-Émilion, this vintage shows the impressive nature of this powerful wine. With a good balance between acidity and black fruits backed up by tannins, the wine is powerful and stylish. Drink from 2027.
Western reviews.translation: 自1991年首次釀造以来，这款红酒和葡萄园已经走了很长的路。如今，位于圣埃米利翁的分类树上，近乎顶端的这款酒展现了这款强劲红酒的出色。酒中酸度和黑果的平衡，搭配坚果的苦味，呈现出强劲又时尚的风格。建议2027年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: Tiefdunkles Rubingranat, opaker Kern, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung, mit feiner Edelholzwürze unterlegtes schwarzes Waldbeerkonfit, feiner Nougat, ein Hauch von Orangenzesten. Saftig, süße Kirschenfrucht, seidige Tannine, finessenreich strukturiert, salzige Mineralität, bleibt gut haften, sicheres Reifepotenzial, feiner rotbeeriger Nachhall.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色酒液，微暗的橙色中间，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮，黑色浆果酱的黑色木香味，细微的白色坚果味，橘子皮的微妙香气。口感丰富，甜美的樱桃果味，细滑的苦味，精致的结构，微微的矿物质味道，留在口中的时间较长，成熟潜力较高，细微的红色余味。

Chinese pairs.original: 2020年份的Domaine de Chevalier 依然展现出了很高的水准，但和2019年份相比，少了些许我所期待的层次感。香气依旧含蓄，口感依旧精致，温文尔雅的气质依旧楚楚可人。这款酒对单宁和酒体地打磨令人着迷，像是在本就光滑的皮肤表面擦上了一层薄薄的脂粉，不但毫无瑕疵还充满质感。面对这么谦逊低调的葡萄酒，我们需要更多的耐心才能打开它的芳心。陈年15-20年之后，你会找到最经典的冷壁炉和铅笔芯气息。
Chinese pairs.new: 2020年份的Domaine de Chevalier仍然表现出高水准，但与2019年份相比，缺乏了一些我期待的层次感。酒香依旧含蓄，口感依旧精致，温文尔雅的气质依旧令人喜爱。这款酒对单宁和酒体的打磨令人着迷，像是在光滑的皮肤表面擦上了一层薄薄的脂粉，不但毫无瑕疵还充满质感。面对这么谦逊低调的葡萄酒，我们需要更多的耐心才能打开它的芳心。陈年15-20年之后，你会发现最经典的冷壁炉和铅笔芯气息。

English pairs.original: Domaine de Chevalier 2020 still shows a high level of quality, but with less layers that I was expecting from the 2019 vintage. The aromas are still subtle, the palate is still refined, and the elegance of the wine is still very appealing. The tannins and body are fascinatingly polished, like a layer of powder on the already smooth surface of the skin, which is not only flawless but also full of texture. It takes more patience to open the heart of such a modest and understated wine. After 15-20 years of ageing, you will find the most classic notes of cold fireplace and pencil core.
English pairs.new: Domaine de Chevalier 2020仍然展现出高品质，但比我预期的2019年份要少了一些层次。酒中的香气依然微妙，口感依然细腻，酒的优雅感依然非常吸引人。酒中的纤维和体积令人着迷，像一层粉末覆盖在已经光滑的皮肤上，既没有瑕疵又富有质感。要打开这样一个谦逊而低调的酒，需要更长的耐心。经过15-20年的陈化，你会发现最典型的冷火炉和铅笔芯的味道。

Western reviews.review: The purity of fruit is really something here, with blackcurrants and blackberries, together with orange, stone and granite character. Mind-boggling in many ways. Full-bodied with very fine tannins that are polished and pure. Such a fine texture. Lots of primary fruit. Like picking wonderfully ripe grapes. Great length. One for the cellar.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的果味纯粹到了极致，黑currant和黑berry的味道与橙子、石头和花岗岩的特征融合在一起，令人惊叹。它的口感丰富，纤维细腻，光滑纯粹。这种细腻的口感令人难以置信。大量的初级果味，像采摘完美成熟的葡萄一样。酒尾长长，令人满意。值得放入酒窖中。

Western reviews.review: From an estate that’s been on fire over the past decade, the 2020 Domaine De Chevalier is another brilliant wine in the making and checks in as 65% Cabernet Sauvignon, 27% Merlot, 5% Petit Verdot, and 3% Cabernet Franc. Offering impressive cassis and darker berry fruits, it has complex notes of crushed flowers, violets, and damp earth-like nuances. Medium to full-bodied on the palate, with ultra-fine tannins and a silky, layered, seamless texture, it shines for both its richness and its balance. It also shuts down quite quickly, so if you’re going to drink bottles, try one in its youth. Otherwise, be sure to give bottles 7-8 years in a cold cellar. It should have 30-40 years of overall longevity.Barrel Sample: 95-97+
Western reviews.translation:
来自过去十年里频繁引起关注的庄园，2020年Domaine De Chevalier又是一款出色的红酒，酒中含有65%卡波弗雷蒙，27%梅洛，5%小黑皮革，3%卡波弗雷蒙。酒中展现出深紫色的黑加西和浓郁的黑果味，复杂的花香、紫罗兰和潮湿土壤的细微差别。口感丰富中等到中等以上，纤维细腻，滑顺的质地，酒中展现出丰富的质地和完美的平衡。酒也会在短时间内迅速封闭，如果你打算喝酒，建议在年轻时喝。否则，请将酒瓶放置在冷藏室中，至少7-8年。酒的总寿命应该有30-40年。

酒桶样品：95-97+

Western reviews.review: This impressively rich wine is centered on great swathes of black fruits. The tannins, with their stylish swagger, are a fine complement to the fruit, giving the wine structure and the potential for elegant aging.Barrel Sample: 95-97
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒令人印象深刻，富有层次的黑色果味是其核心。坚果的风格优雅，完美地与果味相配，赋予了酒精结构和优雅陈化的潜力。酒桶样品：95-97分。

Western reviews.review: The 2020 Domaine de Chevalier is a touch more tightly wound than the brilliant 2019 out of the gates, but it seems likely to equal that vintage with a bit of time. Unwinding in the glass with aromas of minty blackberries and cassis mingled with notions of burning embers, spices, rose petals and orange rind, it's medium to full-bodied, fleshy and concentrated, with a deep core of fruit, powdery structuring tannins and a long, saline finish. As I wrote last year, this estate in recent vintages has arrived at a sort of stylistic contemporary classicism that evokes the great wines of yesteryear from this address, and the 2020 continues that trend. Best After 2028Rating : 95+
Western reviews.translation: 2020年Domaine de Chevalier的口感紧绷一些，初期与2019年的口感相比略有不同，但经过一段时间后，它很可能会达到同等的高度。酒精在玻璃中释放出薄荷黑莓和黑加仑的香气，伴随着燃烧的炭火、香料、玫瑰花和橙皮的气息。酒体中等到中厚，富有肌肉和浓缩，果实深入，粉末状的纹理和长长的盐味。如我上一年所写，这个庄园在近年来的几瓶酒中，已经达到了一个风格的当代经典主义，回忆起了这个地址的伟大酒的往日风采，2020年继续了这一趋势。建议在2028年后饮用。评分：95+

Western reviews.review: Concentrated ruby red colour, a little subdued on the nose, built with structure and power, concentrated and should age well. Classical, powerful, not exuberant, an impressive Chevalier that has tannins and fruit and freshness, nothing shouting too loud. As it opens, you see a peony floral edge that is very attractive. Easily among the best in Pessac.Barrel Sample: 95
Western reviews.translation: 濃郁的红酒色彩，鼻子上略带低调，结构坚实，充满力量，浓郁且有潜力长期陈化。典型的、强劲的，不过度张扬，令人印象深刻的Chevalier，具有坚实的纽扣、丰富的果味和清新感，什么也没有过于张扬。随着酒精的开启，你会看到非常吸引人的牡丹花香。轻松成为佩萨克地区最好的之一。酒桶样品：95分

Chinese pairs.original: 混合了85%赤霞珠和15%梅洛。这无疑与2010年份一样精美、古典而且颇具收藏价值。生青味于一小时后消失，呈现高雅、清新的樱花、寿司姜、牛轧糖、铁矿石、草药、黑樱桃、黑布林果皮、树莓、杏、肉豆蔻及一丁点的灌木味。这款美酒集通透、多汁和女性气质于一身，同时还拥有引人入胜的漂亮轮廓和持久；富有高酸度的飘逸中段口感亦充满岩石滋味；相当健壮但异常顺滑的单宁包裹着那滑爽、均衡的回味，展现令人满意的集中度、难忘的活力和新鲜以及纤细和张力。这支复杂的佳酿适合在接下来的40年内享用。我唯一感到遗憾的是，过早地与此款伟大的葡萄酒相遇，因此，我希望以后还会有机会再次品鉴到此酒。
Chinese pairs.new: 这款葡萄酒是由85%赤霞珠和15%梅洛组成的精美佳酿。它的风格与2010年份的葡萄酒非常相似，具有典型的古典风格和收藏价值。初期有生青味，但一小时后就消失了。它展现出高雅、清新的风格，带有樱花、寿司姜、牛轧糖、铁矿石、草药、黑樱桃、黑布林果皮、树莓、杏和肉豆蔻的味道。这种葡萄酒拥有典型的女性气质，具有通透、多汁和引人入胜的风格。它的持久度非常好，富有高酸度的中段口感充满岩石味道。单宁包裹着滑爽、均衡的回味，展现出令人满意的集中度、难忘的活力和新鲜感。这种复杂的佳酿适合在接下来的40年内享用。

English pairs.original: The assemblage is 85% Cabernet Sauvignon and 15% Merlot. This was undoubtedly as exquisite, classical and age-worthy as the 2010. The greenness totally dissipated after an hour, displaying refined and refreshing perfumes of sakura, sushi ginger, nougat, ironstone, herb, black cherry, black plum peel, raspberry, apricot, nutmeg and a dab of undergrowth. A beauty of brightness, succulence and femininity, also drawing you in with its wonderful delineation and persistency; ethereal and acidic on the mid-palate that was packed with stoniness; there was satisfying focus here, as well as impressive vitality and freshness allied with genuine finesse and tension towards the polished and proportional aftertaste that was swathed in quite sturdy but exceedingly smooth tannins. A sophisticated effort that should age well over the next 40 years. It's really a pity for me to encounter this great wine in such youthful stage, so hopefully I will have a chance to taste it again after a couple of years' cellaring.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的组合是85%卡波内尔（Cabernet Sauvignon）和15%梅洛（Merlot）。这瓶红酒无疑是精致、典雅且耐久的，和2010年份一样出色。经过一小时后，绿色气味完全消失，展现出精致、清新、樱花、寿司姜、核桃糖、铁石、香草、黑樱桃、黑杏皮、草莓、杏子、肉豆蔻和微量的林地气味。它的亮丽、滋润、女性化的特质让人深深着迷，令人惊叹的清晰度和持久性，让人难以抗拒。中口部的清澈和酸度让人感到神奇，石头味道浓郁；满满的焦点和令人印象深刻的活力和新鲜感与真正的细腻和紧张感相结合，形成了一个光滑、比例完美的余味，余味中充满了坚实但极其光滑的橡皮质。是一瓶高雅的作品，应该在接下来的40年里保持其品质。遗憾的是，我在品尝这瓶伟大的红酒时，它还处于年轻的阶段，所以希望我有机会在几年后再次品尝它。

Western reviews.review: Reminding me of the 2010 with its incredible stature and class (as opposed to the more opulently styled 2009), the 2016 Château Ducru-Beaucaillou is a legendary wine from the genius of Bruno Borie, who has managed this estate brilliantly since he arrived in 2003. A blend of 85% Cabernet Sauvignon and 15% Merlot brought up all in new oak, the 2016 has a mammoth bouquet of crème de cassis, espresso, camphor, crushed violets, toasty oak, and graphite. Full-bodied, concentrated, and backward on the palate, it nevertheless has perfectly integrated acidity and building tannins, a concentrated, layered texture, off-the-charts purity of fruit, and a finish that won't quit. Give this powerful, concentrated wine a solid 7-8 years of bottle age and enjoy it over the following 50 years or more.
Western reviews.translation: 2016年杜克鲁-博卡略（Château Ducru-Beaucaillou）是一瓶来自布鲁诺·博里（Bruno Borie）大师之手的传奇红酒。自2003年以来，博里先生精心管理着这片土地，带领杜克鲁-博卡略实现了辉煌的成就。该酒的组成比例为85%卡波弗雷（Cabernet Sauvignon）和15%梅洛（Merlot），全部在新橡木桶中发酵。2016年杜克鲁-博卡略的酒香令人惊叹，带有浓郁的黑加仑（crème de cassis）、浓缩的咖啡、樟脑、碎兰花、烤橡木和石墨的气息。口感丰富、浓郁、回味悠长，尽管它在口中显得有些沉重，但酸度和纤维却完美地融合在一起。酒体丰富、层次分明，果实的纯度极高，尾部长达数十年。建议将这瓶强劲的红酒放置7-8年后再享用，之后可以持续50年或更长时间。

Western reviews.review: Super perfumed, attractive violets with a thread of fresh blueberries, cassis, blackberries and dark plums, delivering a very enticing impression. Beautiful ripeness here. The tannins are perfectly ripe and layers meld into each other, carrying deep, graceful and plush, velvety dark fruit long into the vibrant and seductive, chocolate-laced finish. Great potential. Try from 2024.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气非常浓郁，带有吸引人的紫罗兰和新鲜蓝berries、黑berries和黑浆果的味道，给人留下极大的印象。酒中的成熟度非常完美。酒中的纤维素也非常成熟，层次融合得非常好，带有深度、优雅和丰富的黑果味道，持续到酒尾的浓郁、诱人的巧克力味道。酒品有很大的潜力。建议2024年后尝试。

Western reviews.review:
Very deep purple-black in color, the 2016 Ducru-Beaucaillou delivers a pronounced, enticing nose of baked plums, blueberry preserves, fruitcake and boysenberry with suggestions of lilacs, mocha, hoisin and exotic spices plus a waft of cedar chest. Full-bodied, rich and opulent in the mouth, the palate has layer upon layer of black fruit preserves and spicy nuances, matched by a very firm, grainy frame, finishing with epic length and depth.

Rating: 98+
Western reviews.translation:
2016年杜克鲁-博卡略（Ducru-Beaucaillou）红酒呈现出深紫黑色。酒香浓郁诱人，带有烤石榴、蓝莓果酱、水果蛋糕和黑莓的味道，伴有紫罗兰、摩卡、红豆酱和异国香料的余味，最后还有松木箱的气息。口感丰富、富有层次，口中充满黑果酱和香料的味道，酒体坚实、纤维粗糙，长长的尾部带有深度和厚度。

评分：98+

Western reviews.review:
This wine conveys density but its richness is sublimated by the complex structure and beautiful ripe fruit. Its power comes from the structure as much as the fruit, promising a wine with an immensely long life ahead of it. Drink from 2025. 
Cellar Selection
Western reviews.translation:
这款红酒展现出厚实的质感，但其丰富的味道被复杂的结构和美好的成熟果味所平衡。它的力量来自结构和果味的结合，预示着这款酒将拥有极长的寿命。建议2025年后饮用。
推荐入窖。

Western reviews.review: Offers exotic, cashmere-textured, mocha-infused blackberry, cassis and plum puree flavors, with smoldering incense and warm fruitcake notes and a swath of plush yet serious grip too boot, showing ample depth and breath. As distinctive a Bordeaux as there is these days. Best from 2025 through 2040.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒呈现出丰富的黑莓、黑加仑和浆果风味，带有咖啡和丝绒般的质感。酒中还带有熏香和烤糕的复杂味道，口感丰富而细腻。这种波尔多红酒独特而深刻，值得推荐。建议在2025年至2040年之间品尝。

Chinese pairs.original: 芬芳优雅的美妙香气，带着玫瑰、皮革和香料的气息，柔丝般的质地，单宁柔滑如丝般。
Chinese pairs.new: Delicate and elegant aromas, with hints of rose, leather, and spices, silky texture, smooth tannins.

Western reviews.review: Mittleres Karmingranat, violetter Kern, rubinrote Reflexe, breiter Ockerrand. In der Nase zunächst zart karamellige Noten, süßes Waldbeerkonfit, ein Hauch von Orangenzesten, etwas Lakritze, mit zartem Trüffelhauch unterlegt. Am Gaumen süß, weiche, seidige Textur, rotbeerige Frucht, zart nach Veilchen. Dann eine Überraschung: leicht trocken wirkende, etwas blättrige Tannine, darüber allerdings eine süße Nougatfrucht, ätherische Minzeanklänge und eine feine Mineralik, langes Süßefinish. Wie stark die vegetale Note im Rückgrat des Weines in Zukunft prägend sein kann, wage ich nicht zu bewerten, auf die Lagerfähigkeit wird sie sich wohl kaum negativ auswirken.
Western reviews.translation:
这段红酒评论的中文翻译如下：

中度红色色调，紫色核心，琥珀色反光，宽广的橙色边缘。鼻子里最初是轻微的糖浆味，甜的山核桃果酱，橙子皮的微妙香气，少量的薄荷糖，轻微的松露味。口感甜，柔软，丝滑的质地，红色果酱味，微妙的百合花味。然后是一种惊喜：轻微干的，略微苦的苦味，然而却有甜的奶油果酱味，清新的薄荷香气和细微的矿物质味，长时间的甜味尾韵。如何强烈的植物味道将在未来的红酒中起作用，我不敢预测，但它很可能不会对储存能力产生负面影响。

Western reviews.review: Made to last, this DRC is still holding back. Right now, it's the biggest but not the best of the 2000s, showing dark earth and rich black cherries, along with notes of each, kirsch and a hint of alcoholic warmth. Turns increasingly floral and rose-like with air.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶DRC红酒是为了长久保存而制作的，目前它仍在保留着力量。它是2000年系列中最强大的，但不是最好的。它展现出深色的土壤和丰富的黑樱桃，伴随着黑樱桃、基尔希和酒精的微妙余温的气息。随着时间的推移，它会变得越来越花香和玫瑰香。

Chinese pairs.original: Duhart-Milon 2019给我展示出了钢铁直男最温柔的一面。尽管香气矜持含蓄，但浓密的黑墨与花椒八角所构成的辛香气息还是造出了一副墨色晕染的诗意形象。单宁数量颇丰但口感柔顺，奶油般的质感铺在整个味蕾，温柔而又沉稳。后置嗅觉中飘散出的缕缕紫罗兰幽香令人神往，雅致脱俗而又余韵悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: The Duhart-Milon 2019 has shown the softer side of a steel-hearted man. Although the aroma is restrained and subtle, the dense blackberry and pepper notes still create a poetic image of a dark, smoky haze. The tannins are plentiful but the texture is smooth, with a creamy quality that coats the palate, gentle yet stable. A subtle hint of lavender wafts in the background, evoking a sense of refinement and subtlety, with a lingering finish.

English pairs.original: Duhart-Milon 2019 shows me the most gentle side of a “tough guy”. Although the aromas are reserved, the spicy notes of star anise, peppercorns and hints of graphite create a poetic image blending with inky tints. The tannins are dense but silky on the palate, and the creamy texture spreads throughout the taste buds, leaving a sense of calmness and strength.
