A whiff of violet that wafts out of the aftertaste is tantalizing, elegant, and long-lasting.
English pairs.new: 杜哈尔米隆 2019展现了一个“硬汉”的温柔面。虽然香气保留，但星安息香、胡椒和石墨的辣味混合在黑色色调中，构成了一幅诗意的画面。口感中的坚实但细腻的纤维，和丰富的奶油质感在味蕾间扩散，留下一种宁静和强大的感觉。余味中飘出的紫罗兰香气诱人、优雅且持久。

Western reviews.review: Flowers, cigar box, and cedar with red and black currants are what you initially notice. Medium-bodied, but with a bit more weight than in many previous vintages, the wine is fresh, elegant, soft, and vibrant, with a savory accent in the refined finish. The wine blends 72% Cabernet Sauvignon with 28% Merlot. Drink from 2026-2041. 94 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感非常丰富，初次品尝时你会感受到花朵、雪茄盒和红 cedar的香气，伴随着黑和红葡萄的果香。酒体中等，但比之前的几年更有重量，酒精清新、优雅、柔和、生动，尾部带有咸淡的味道。酒中含有 72% 的卡波雷尔葡萄和 28% 的美乐葡萄。建议在 2026-2041 年间饮用。评分 94 分。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, breitere Randaufhellung. Reife schwarze Waldbeerfrucht, ein Hauch von Zwetschken und Feigen, Nuancen von Nougat, kandierte Orangenzesten. Stoffig, komplex, süße Frucht, kraftvolle, reife Tannine, elegant und gut anhaftend, mineralisch im Abgang, etwas Schokolade im Nachhall, bereits gut entwickelt, ein facettenreicher Speisenwein mit gutem Reifepotenzial.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，边缘有明显的光泽。成熟的黑莓果味，略带浆果和葡萄味，伴有杏仁和糖浆橙子片的香气。厚重复杂的口感，甜的果味，强劲的成熟的橡皮味，优雅的口感，矿物质的尾部，余味中有巧克力，已经成熟，具有多面性，适合各种菜肴配对，酒龄潜力良好。

Western reviews.review: Dense inky and fresh, classic Pauillac style with pure dark fruit, cassis, and tobacco notes. Good volume with grainy tannin and long fresh finish. An estate that has certainly developed in terms of depth and complexity.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的风格典型的波尔多风格，深度浓郁，果香丰富，带有黑果、黑加仑和烟草的味道。口感丰富，纤维性坚果味，长长的清新尾部。该酒庄在深度和复杂性方面有了显著的进步。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark, opaque ruby-red colour.  Meaty, ripe-fruit dominates the nose. The palate layers ripe mulberry fruit with leafy cassis & meaty notes. The wine combines Duhart-Milion's classic foursquare style with a good concentration of lifted fresh fruit, fine cedar, warming alcohol & lively acidity. The powerful flavours endure well. 6/20 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的红色葡萄酒，几乎透不见光。酒鼻中充满了浓郁的果实和肉类香气。口感上，酒中融合了熟透的黑berries、叶绿的黑currant和肉类香气。酒体中结合了杜哈尔米隆(Duhart-Milion)的经典风格和浓郁的新鲜果实、细致的松木、温暖的酒精和活跃的酸度。酒中的强烈风味持久耐久。评分：6/20

Chinese pairs.original: 浆果，甘草，黑醋栗，紫罗兰和烤橡木的香气，酒体饱满，单宁如天鹅绒般柔顺，回味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Fruity, sweet licorice, black walnut, lavender, and toasted oak aromas. Full-bodied with silky smooth tannins and a long, lingering finish.

Western reviews.review: Incredible nose of crushed berry, licorice, violets and lightly toasted oak. Pure crème de cassis. Full-bodied, with big, velvety tannins and a long, long finish. Solid. Best after 2011.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气非常出色，带有浓郁的浆果、甘草、紫罗兰和轻微的烤橡木味。酒体丰富，具有大而柔软的纹理，口感长长持续。整体品质稳固。建议在2011年后再次品尝。

Western reviews.review: This is more exotic and monstrous than the 2000. It is like a muscle builder, with lots of round and rich tannins and a core of dark fruits like black cherries and blueberries. Still very young, but structured and in need of five more years. Don’t touch this until 2015.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒比2000年更为独特和强烈。它像肌肉男一样，具有丰富的圆润口感和黑果味，如黑樱桃和蓝莓。虽然还很年轻，但结构良好，需要再等五年。不要轻易打开，直到2015年。

Western reviews.review: An incredibly fresh, lively 2003 (the pH is only 3.6 and the alcohol is 13.1%), this wine offers a dense ruby/purple color along with full body and a remarkable nose of black currants, kirsch, lead pencil shavings and vanilla. Opulent, full-bodied and close to full maturity, it is a seamless classic that will age for 15-20 more years. Kudos to the Delon family for such a brilliant achievement in a tricky vintage.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶2003年的红酒非常新鲜、活泼，酒精含量仅13.1%，pH值仅3.6，呈现出浓郁的红宝石色，酒体丰富，酒香浓郁，带有黑加仑、可可、铅笔削片和香草的味道。酒体丰富，接近成熟，酒香浓郁，酒体平滑，酒龄15-20年。对德隆家族来说，这是一次在挑战性年份中取得的辉煌成就。

Western reviews.review: This is massive, hugely concentrated, topped with wood and intense tannins. Flavors of bitter chocolate are dominant, heavy fruits, blackberries and texture that fills the mouth with dark, dense flavors. Big in all senses.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一个巨大的红酒，浓度极高，木头味和强烈的苦味橡胶味。苦巧克力味道占主导地位，重口感的水果，黑莓和充满黑暗、浓密味道的口感。无论是体积还是口感都非常大。

Chinese pairs.original: 2023年份的 Le Dome 再一次露出了标志性的“品丽珠微笑”。它柔软的酒体和奶油泡芙般的口感令我忍不住想要投入它温暖的怀抱。太妃糖、干玫瑰花和蓝莓果酱的香气相互交织，汇聚成一杯加了双倍鲜奶的玫瑰红茶。在2023年份，酒庄将石灰岩高地的 Les Asteries 酒款全部加入到了Le Dome，这不仅给Le Dome 带来了更深的层次感，还在其一贯的甜美中增加了一抹罕见的咸感。期待未来年份更多精彩的作品。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2023 vintage of Le Dome once again unveiled its signature "Pompadour smile". Its soft texture and creamy mouthfeel left me wanting to be enveloped in its warm embrace. Notes of caramel, dried rose petals and blueberry jam intertwined, blending into a rose tea with double the cream. In the 2023 vintage, the winery has incorporated the entire Les Asteries range from the limestone plateau into Le Dome, not only adding depth but also a rare touch of saltiness to its signature sweetness. I look forward to more exciting releases in the future.

English pairs.original: The 2023 Le Dome once more showcases its characteristic “Cabernet Franc smile.” Its supple body and cream puff-like texture make it irresistibly inviting, as if drawing one into a warm embrace. Flavors of toffee, dried roses, and blueberry jam weave together, creating a mouth feeling akin to a double cream-enhanced rose tea. This year, the limestone vineyard of Les Asteries is integrated into Le Dome, enriching its complexity and adding a rare hint of saltiness to the wine’s inherent sweetness. I look forward to the future vintages, which promise to be even more spectacular.
English pairs.new: 2023 年的勒多姆（Le Dome）再次展现出其独特的“卡波弗朗克微笑”（Cabernet Franc smile）。其柔软的体积和奶油般的质地使其不可抗拒，仿佛在温暖的怀抱中吸引着你。口感中融合了糖浆、干玫瑰和蓝莓酱的味道，酿造出一种类似于加了双重奶油的玫瑰茶的口感。这年，勒多姆首次将莱斯特里（Les Asteries）的石灰质葡萄园整合进来，使其复杂度增强，并在其天然的甜度中添加了一丝罕见的咸味。

Western reviews.review: 96-98. Barrel Sample. This is a massive, structured wine with dense tannins, black fruits and perfumed acidity. Dominated by 80% Cabernet Franc, rare for Saint-Emilion, the wine is seriously rich with density and acidity along with new oak flavors that will integrate. It is a powerful wine that is ageworthy.
Western reviews.translation:
评分：96-98

酒样：浓郁的酒体，具有坚实的结构，黑色果味和清新的酸度。以80%卡波弗朗克为主，罕见于圣埃米利翁，酒体丰富，密度高，酸度适宜，新橡木味道也很好，会逐渐融合。是一款强劲的酒，具有很好的储存价值。

Western reviews.review: This wine exhibits a lot of airiness, with the abundant Cabernet Franc contributing to its highly expressive verticality. It is lean yet persistent, radiating great energy throughout. Some floral notes, especially violet, which enhance its charm. Notable long finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒展现出丰富的空气感，来自丰富的卡波弗朗克的贡献使其具有高度的垂直性。它虽然瘦削，但持久，散发着巨大的能量。一些花香的笔记，尤其是紫罗兰，增强了其魅力。值得注意的是其长长的尾部。

Western reviews.review: Completely opaque black-ruby color. Rich, opulent black-fruit perfumes open slowly revealing black-plum notes overlaid by notes of cedar, chocolate & vanilla. On the palate rich. Smooth, chocolatey dark-plum & black-cherry fruit overlays a firm structure with notes of cocao powder & graphite, The wine is medium to full bodied, the alcohol is balanced & fresh acidity helps the fruit last on the long finish. 04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是完全透明的深红宝石色。酒中的香气丰富豪华，黑果的香味慢慢打开，黑杏的香味在cedar、巧克力和香草的覆盖下展现。口感丰富，滑顺，巧克力味的黑杏和黑樱桃果味覆盖着坚实的结构，含有可可粉和石墨的香味。酒体中等到满足，酒精平衡，新鲜的酸度帮助果味在长长的尾部持续。评分：04/24 (ep) DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有明显的花香，淡淡的红莓，香草，肉桂和甘草味道，清新而淡雅。这款酒平衡感较好，口感浓郁，单宁柔和，结构完美。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts prominent floral notes, subtle hints of raspberry, grass, cinnamon, and honey, with a crisp and refined character. It has a well-balanced taste, with a rich texture, soft tannins, and a perfect structure.

Western reviews.review: This sensational, opaque blue/purple-colored wine from Smith Haut Lafitte has a gorgeous floral nose with notes of graphite, blueberries, blackberries, and cassis that jump from the glass of this inky, very dense, yet strikingly pure wine. Light on its feet despite its stunning concentration and multi-layered mouthfeel, this wine has fabulous intensity, richness and length. Quite impressive, and still incredibly youthful, this is a superstar of the vintage, and capable of lasting another 25-30 years.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶来自史密斯豪拉菲特(Smith Haut Lafitte)的深蓝紫色葡萄酒，具有迷人的花香鼻子，带有石墨、蓝莓、黑莓和黑加西的香气，令人惊叹。尽管其浓度惊人，口感丰富复杂，但这瓶酒却轻盈自如。酒中有着惊人的强度、丰富感和持久感。令人印象深刻，仍然充满青春活力，这是当年最出色的葡萄酒之一，能够持续25-30年。

Western reviews.review: The 2005s from Bordeaux continue to show youthfully, yet spectacularly well! The 2005 Smith-Haut-Lafitte is a prime example of the vintage and offers a huge, rich, concentrated style as well as classic dark fruits, tobacco, scorched earth and graphite aromas and flavors. While this is a tannic vintage, the tannins here are sweet and polished and covered by fruit. With stunning purity of fruit, notable freshness, and a great, great finish, drink this beauty anytime over the coming two decades.
Western reviews.translation: 2005年波尔多的红酒继续展现出年轻而又极具魅力的风格。史密斯-豪特-拉菲特（Smith-Haut-Lafitte）2005年是这一年份的典型代表，呈现出浓郁的风格，具有典型的黑果、烟草、焦土和石墨气味和口感。虽然这一年份的波尔多红酒具有坚实的口感，但史密斯-豪特-拉菲特的口感则是柔和的，果味覆盖了坚实的口感。酒中果味纯粹，新鲜度突出，口感持久，值得在未来二十年内随意品尝。

Western reviews.review: An impressive nose of spices, dark fruits, and fresh forest flowers. Full-bodied, this has a solid core of fruit and super polished tannins. A fabulous wine, showing great structure and harmony, and a long, long finish. Beautiful stuff.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气非常出色，带有香料、黑色水果和新鲜森林花的味道。口感丰富，果味坚实，纤维非常光滑。整体结构和和谐度都非常出色，酒尾长达很久。简直是美酒中的美酒。

Western reviews.review: The Cathiards have invested heavily in this property since they purchased it in the early 1990s. It is one of the great terroirs of the Graves, a raised plateau of gravel where the vines produce a rich and powerful wine. That power is amplified in a vintage like 2005 into a huge, cassis-driven red with the velvet feel of a favorite childhood pillow. The Cathiards do not spare the new oak, a character that dominates this young wine, while the fruit underneath feels healthy and clean, vibrating with tension, set for a long life ahead.
Western reviews.translation: 卡塔尔家族自1990年代初期购买此地以来，已经大力投资于此地。它是格雷夫地区的其中一处伟大的土壤，一个由碎石组成的高台地，葡萄藤生长出一瓶丰富而强大的红酒。这种力量在2005年的产季中被放大，成为一瓶由黑加香料驱动的巨大红酒，软绵绵的感觉如同童年时的柔软枕头。卡塔尔家族在新橡木方面毫不吝啬，这种特征在这瓶年轻的红酒中占据了主导地位，而在下面的果味中感觉健康而干净，充满紧张感，预示着长期的生命力。

Western reviews.review: Very grapey, with black licorice and mineral character. Full-bodied, with hints of new wood and spices. Big and velvety. This is balanced and very silky, with harmonious yet chewy tannins. This is a different style from the 2003, but it's equally impressive. A wonderful young wine. Best after 2013. 8,000 cases made.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感非常浓郁，带有黑甘草和矿物质的特征。酒体丰富，带有新橡木和香料的余味。酒感丰富而滑顺，口感平衡，纤维性质柔和。与2003年产的相比，这瓶酒的风格不同，但同样令人印象深刻。这是一瓶年轻的美酒，建议在2013年后品尝。产量8,000瓶。

Chinese pairs.original: 樱桃，石榴，黑莓和烟草的香气，口感丰富密集，单宁丰富，回味复杂持久。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of cherry, pomegranate, blackberry, and tobacco. Rich, full-bodied flavors with a wealth of tannins, leading to a complex and lingering finish.

Western reviews.review: Mittleres Rubin. Offene, expressive Nase, viel Tee, auch Traubentrester, florale Töne, feminin, baut aus, entwickelt viel Komplexität. Im Gaumen weich wie ein Seidentuch, fast harmlos, jedoch mit guter Struktur, burgundisch anmutend, feingliedrig, keine Ecken und Kanten, zeigt Schmelz und eine gewisse Cremigkeit, die Gerbstoffe sind von sehr guter Qualität, die Säure belebt, das hat Rasse und Klasse, endet langanhaltend. Harmonie, Finesse, Noblesse. Jetzt bis 2038+. 94/100 vvPunkte.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色。开放、表达性的鼻子，充满茶叶和葡萄渣的味道，花朵的香气，女性化，逐渐展开，展现出丰富的复杂性。口感细腻如丝绸，几乎无害，但结构良好，具有布尔冈的风格，细致入微，没有硬边和棱角，展现出融化和轻微的奶油感，天然的颜料质地，酸度活跃，具有品质和品位，持久。和谐、细致、贵族。现在到2038年。94/100分。

Western reviews.review: Mittleres Rubin. Offene, expressive Nase, viel Tee, auch Traubentrester, florale Töne, feminin, baut aus, entwickelt viel Komplexität. Im Gaumen weich wie ein Seidentuch, fast harmlos, jedoch mit guter Struktur, burgundisch anmutend, feingliedrig, keine Ecken und Kanten, zeigt Schmelz und eine gewisse Cremigkeit, die Gerbstoffe sind von sehr guter Qualität, die Säure belebt, das hat Rasse und Klasse, endet langanhaltend. Harmonie, Finesse, Noblesse. Jetzt bis 2038+. 94/100 vvPunkte.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色。开放、表达性的鼻子，充满茶叶和葡萄渣的味道，花朵的香气，女性化，逐渐展开，展现出丰富的复杂性。口感细腻如丝绸，几乎无害，但结构良好，具有布尔冈的风格，细致入微，没有硬边和棱角，展现出融化和轻微的奶油感，天然的颜料质地，酸度活跃，具有品质和品位，持久。和谐、细致、贵族。现在到2038年。94/100分。

Western reviews.review: Powerful, youthful, tannic, fresh and even a but crisp, the wine is full bodied, offering tobacco, cigar wrapper, tobacco and dark. deep, red fruits. There is a firm, almost strict nature to the tannins. There is the structure to age, which is a good thing, as this wine is going to need time before it all comes together. The wine is a blend of 51% Cabernet Sauvignon, 43% Merlot and 6% Cabernet Franc.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有强烈的风格，年轻而有活力，具有坚实的苦味，新鲜而且略带清脆。酒体丰富，展现出烟草、雪茄纸、深红色浓郁的果味。苦味坚实，几乎严格。酒中有足够的结构来耐久保存，这是件好事，因为这款酒需要时间来达到完美。酒的组成比例为：51% 卡波雷尔·沙维尼翁、43% 美乐托、6% 卡波雷尔·法兰克。

Western reviews.review: Powerful, youthful, tannic, fresh and even a but crisp, the wine is full bodied, offering tobacco, cigar wrapper, tobacco and dark. deep, red fruits. There is a firm, almost strict nature to the tannins. There is the structure to age, which is a good thing, as this wine is going to need time before it all comes together. The wine is a blend of 51% Cabernet Sauvignon, 43% Merlot and 6% Cabernet Franc.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有强烈的风格，年轻而有活力，具有坚实的苦味，新鲜而且略带清脆。酒体丰富，展现出烟草、雪茄纸、深红色浓郁的果味。苦味坚实，几乎严格。酒中有足够的结构来耐久保存，这是件好事，因为这款酒需要时间来达到完美。酒的组成比例为：51% 卡波雷尔·沙维尼翁、43% 美乐托、6% 卡波雷尔·法兰克。

Western reviews.review: 95-97 Barrel sample. A muscular wine, with well-defined tannins. The acidity is high, hiding the power and richness of the fruit behind. Then dark tannins come through, with other ripe fruits, finishing with a mineral character.
Western reviews.translation: 95-97 桶样品。 这是一种肌肉发达的酒，具有明确的橡皮质。 酸度高，掩盖了果实的力量和丰富性。 然后，深色的橡皮质出现，伴随着其他成熟的水果，最后以矿物质特征结束。

Chinese pairs.original: 2015年份的Latour-Martillac有着肉眼可见的天赋。那种浑然天成的单宁结构、那种纯正老练的檀木芳香、还有那种无以言表的深邃气质，都让我看到了一个品质绝佳的Latour-Martillac，毫无悬念地荣登我最喜欢的Latour-Martillac年份。相比其他热年份来说，2015年份能够把醇厚圆润的口感，以及黏土砾石与生俱来的集中度巧妙地融为一体，在我的味蕾上呈现出浓艳但不媚俗的美好画面。
Chinese pairs.new: 2015年份的Latour-Martillac展现出天赋卓越。其完美的单宁结构、典雅的檀木香气以及深邃的气质，让我深信这是一个品质出色的Latour-Martillac年份。相比其他热门年份，2015年份成功融合了醇厚圆润的口感和黏土砾石的集中度，呈现出浓艳但不俗丽的美好风景。

English pairs.original: The 2015 Latour-Martillac has a visible talent. The natural structure of tannins, the pure and mature aromas of sandalwood, and its indescribable aura of mystery show me a Latour-Martillac of excellent quality, making it my favorite vintage of Latour-Martillac without question. Compared with other hot vintages, the 2015 vintage is able to amalgamate the rich and rounded palate with the innate concentration of the clay and gravel soils, leaving an intense and beautiful performance on my taste buds without being cheesy.
English pairs.new: 2015年拉图尔-马蒂拉克（Latour-Martillac）展现出明显的天赋。天然的纤维结构、纯粹的成熟香气（如檀木香）以及其无法言说的神秘气质，让我对拉图尔-马蒂拉克的品质产生了极大的信心，认为这是拉图尔-马蒂拉克的最佳年份。与其他炎热年份相比，2015年拉图尔-马蒂拉克能够将丰富的口感与天然的浓缩度（来自黏土和碎石土壤）完美融合，呈现出强烈而美丽的口感，没有任何过时的感觉。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, dezente Randaufhellung, reife Pflaumen, dunkles Waldbeerkonfit, zart tabakige Würze, kandierte Orangenzesten unterlegt. Mittlerer Körper, Herzkirschen, rotbeeriger Touch, frischer Säurebogen, rotbeeriger Touch im Abgang, salzig-mineralischer Nachhall, zitroniger Rückgeschmack. Peter Moser
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫红色反光，边缘微微发亮，成熟的浆果味，黑莓酱，轻微的烟熏味，糖浆橙子味。中等体积，樱桃味，红啤酒味，清新的酸度，红啤酒味尾部，矿物质和盐味余韵，柠檬味回味。- Peter Moser

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, dezente Randaufhellung, reife Pflaumen, dunkles Waldbeerkonfit, zart tabakige Würze, kandierte Orangenzesten unterlegt. Mittlerer Körper, Herzkirschen, rotbeeriger Touch, frischer Säurebogen, rotbeeriger Touch im Abgang, salzig-mineralischer Nachhall, zitroniger Rückgeschmack. Peter Moser
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮，成熟的浆果味，黑莓酱，轻微的烟熏味，糖浆橙子味。中等体积，樱桃味，红啤酒味，新鲜的酸度，红啤酒味尾部，咸矿物质余味，柠檬味回味。- Peter Moser

Western reviews.review: Solid tannins mark this still very young wine. At the same time, the fruit is rich and well proportioned. Black currants dominate the fruity spectrum, giving the wine richness as well as great potential. Drink from 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的坚实的苦味仍然非常年轻。同时，酒中的果味丰富而均衡。黑莓是酒中的主要果味成分，赋予了酒体丰富的口感以及巨大的潜力。建议2025年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: Solid tannins mark this still very young wine. At the same time, the fruit is rich and well proportioned. Black currants dominate the fruity spectrum, giving the wine richness as well as great potential. Drink from 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的坚实的苦味仍然非常年轻。同时，酒中的水果味道丰富且比例合适。黑莓是水果味道的主导者，赋予了酒体丰富的口感以及巨大的潜力。建议2025年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, dezente Randaufhellung, reife Pflaumen, dunkles Waldbeerkonfit, zart tabakige Würze, kandierte Orangenzesten unterlegt. Mittlerer Körper, Herzkirschen, rotbeeriger Touch, frischer Säurebogen, rotbeeriger Touch im Abgang, salzig-mineralischer Nachhall, zitroniger Rückgeschmack. Peter Moser
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫红色反光，边缘微微发亮，成熟的石榴味，黑莓果酱味，轻微的烟熏味，糖浆橙子味。中等体积，樱桃味，红啤酒味，清新的酸度，红啤酒味尾部，咸矿物质余味，柠檬味回味。- Peter Moser

Chinese pairs.original: 2022年份的Chateau La Mission Haut-Brion 呈现出异乎寻常的平衡之美，一种在成熟、油润、且较低酸度的基础上构建出的奇特平衡感。为何Chateau La Mission Haut-Brion 能成就这番境界，而其他白葡萄酒却难以企及？因为它比其他人更懂赛美蓉啊。这款佳酿巧妙地用矿物质作支撑，将圆润的酒体撑得高挑笔直，然后再用咸咸的矿物质感拉长尾韵，整个过程都在清甜宜人的口感中流转，恍若无间。品味这款酒犹如在赛美蓉的引领下，与长相思共游塞纳河，船桨划过之处满是白梨、佛手柑、清茶、苦橘以及鲜杏仁的波光。(72%赛美蓉，28%长相思)
Chinese pairs.new: The 2022 Chateau La Mission Haut-Brion presents an extraordinary balance of beauty, built on a foundation of maturity, richness, and relatively low acidity. What sets Chateau La Mission Haut-Brion apart from other white wines is its deep understanding of Sémillon. This exceptional wine skillfully uses mineral elements to support its rounded body, elevating it to a statuesque height, before extending the finish with a salty mineral sensation. The entire experience unfolds smoothly, with a sweet and pleasant taste. Sipping this wine is like sailing the Seine with Sémillon as your guide, where the oars slice through the water, leaving behind a trail of white pear, Buddha's hand, green tea, bitter orange, and fresh almond blossoms. (72% Sémillon, 28% Sauvignon Blanc)

English pairs.original: Chateau La Mission Haut-Brion 2022 unveils an extraordinary harmony, a unique equilibrium founded upon a mature, opulent, and relatively low-acidity profile. What allows Chateau La Mission Haut-Brion to achieve such heights, when other white wines struggle to compare? It’s their unparalleled mastery of Semillon. This exceptional wine skillfully employs minerality as a support structure, elevating the rounded body with a graceful, poised stance, and then drawing out the finish with a savory mineral touch. The entire experience unfolds within an irresistibly delightful mouthfeel, feeling seamless. Tasting this wine is like being led by Semillon on a voyage with Sauvignon Blanc along the Seine River, where each stroke of the paddle unveils glistening ripples of white pear, bergamot, green tea, bitter orange, and fresh almond. (72% Semillon, 28% Sauvignon Blanc)
English pairs.new: 夏娃宫哈布里昂庄园2022年红酒展现出非凡的和谐，依靠成熟、丰富、酸度相对较低的特性。夏娃宫哈布里昂庄园如何能够达到如此高度，而其他白酒难以相比？这主要是因为他们对塞缪兰的无与伦比的掌控。这个出色的酒精巧妙地运用矿物质作为支撑结构，提升圆润的身体，展现出优雅、稳健的姿态，然后用矿物质的咸味结束。整个体验都在不可抗拒的愉悦的口感中展开，感觉无缝。品尝这个酒精就像被塞缪兰带领着，沿着塞纳河与沙白葡萄酒一起旅行，随着划桨的每个动作，展现出闪闪发光的白梨、bergamot、绿茶、苦橙和新鲜杏仁的波浪。 (塞缪兰占72%，沙白葡萄酒占28%)

Western reviews.review: 95-97 Barrel sample. The wine is so balanced with acidity and ripe spice. It has a generous character, offering softness within firm tannins plus beautiful blackberry fruits and balanced acidity. The wine is set for the long-term.
Western reviews.translation: 95-97 桶样品。酒精度非常平衡，酸度和成熟的香料相互呼应。酒精度富有慷慨的性格，具有柔软的质地和坚实的橡胶质感，伴有黑莓果味和平衡的酸度。酒精度适合长期储存。

Western reviews.review: 95-97 Barrel sample. The wine is so balanced with acidity and ripe spice. It has a generous character, offering softness within firm tannins plus beautiful blackberry fruits and balanced acidity. The wine is set for the long-term.
Western reviews.translation: 95-97 桶样品。酒精度非常平衡，酸度和成熟的香料相互呼应。酒精度富有慷慨的性格，具有柔软的质地和坚实的橡胶质感，伴有黑莓果味和平衡的酸度。酒精度适合长期储存。

Western reviews.review: Deep purple in color, and the fruits are equally deep. You find blackberries, black currants, and black cherries before its nuances of smoke, cigar box, barbecue, smoked meat and roses. On the palate, there is intensity, depth of flavor, concentration, and layers of fruit. But the wine is also lifted, fresh and energetic. It is easy to taste. The finish is rich, long, vivacious, and palate-filling. The wine blends 51.7% Cabernet Sauvignon, 43.2% Merlot, and 5.1% Cabernet Franc, 14.15% ABV, 3.95 pH. Harvesting took place, August 29 - September 19. Yields were 28 hectoliters per hectare, making this the lowest yields since 1991 with 50% of the harvest going into the grand Vin. Drink from 2027-2055. 96-98 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深紫色的，果味也同样深沉。酒中你可以品尝到黑莓、黑樱子和黑樱桃的味道，之后是烟雾、雪茄盒、烧烤、熏肉和玫瑰花的复杂气味。口感上，酒精的强度、深度、浓度和果味层次感非常突出。但是，这瓶酒也非常清新、活力十足，容易入口。酒尾丰富、持久、生动、充满口感。酒的比例为51.7%卡波涅尔·沙夫诺、43.2%梅洛、5.1%卡波涅尔·法兰克，14.15%酒精度，3.95pH。采摘时间为8月29日至9月19日，产量为28公顷/公顷，低于1991年以来的最低产量，50%的收获用于制作大酒。建议2027-2055年饮用。评分96-98分。

Western reviews.review: Deep purple in color, and the fruits are equally deep. You find blackberries, black currants, and black cherries before its nuances of smoke, cigar box, barbecue, smoked meat and roses. On the palate, there is intensity, depth of flavor, concentration, and layers of fruit. But the wine is also lifted, fresh and energetic. It is easy to taste. The finish is rich, long, vivacious, and palate-filling. The wine blends 51.7% Cabernet Sauvignon, 43.2% Merlot, and 5.1% Cabernet Franc, 14.15% ABV, 3.95 pH. Harvesting took place, August 29 - September 19. Yields were 28 hectoliters per hectare, making this the lowest yields since 1991 with 50% of the harvest going into the grand Vin. Drink from 2027-2055. 96-98 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的颜色是深紫色的，果味也同样深沉。酒中有黑莓、黑樱子和黑樱桃的味道，之后是烟火、雪茄盒、烧烤、熏肉和玫瑰的复杂气味。口感上，酒有强烈的味道、深度的口感、浓缩的味道和丰富的果味。但酒也很清新、活泼和充满能量。酒很容易入口。酒尾是丰富、长长的、生动的和充满口感的。酒的比例是51.7%卡波涅尔·沙夫诺、43.2%梅洛和5.1%卡波涅尔·法兰克，14.15%的酒精度，3.95的pH。采摘时间是8月29日至9月19日。产量是28公顷/公顷，低于1991年以来的最低产量，50%的收获用于制作大酒。建议2027-2055年饮用。评分96-98分。

Western reviews.review: (51.7% Cabernet Sauvignon, 43.2% Merlot, 5.1% Cabernet Franc, 3.9 pH, 14.15% Alkohol). Dunkelfruchtig und mit einer bezaubernden Floralität, viel Tiefgang in diesem Bouquet, getrocknete Kräuter, Rosen, Veilchen, Kirschen, feine Würze, ein Gedicht. Im Gaumen straff, präzis, klar und rein wie ein Bergbach, sensationeller Mix aus Dichte und Frische, hochpräzis, mit reifer Fruch und viel Eleganz. Grandiose Länge, rotfruchtiges Finish und "spicy" Rückaromen. Das ist grandios, umwerfend, schlicht eine Sensation. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 auf Château La Mission Haut-Brion) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation:
这是一瓶来自法国的红酒，具体的成分是：

* 51.7% 卡波涅尔·沙夫诺（Cabernet Sauvignon）
* 43.2% 美洛（Merlot）
* 5.1% 卡波涅尔·法兰克（Cabernet Franc）

酒精度为 14.15%，酸度为 3.9。

这瓶红酒的香气非常深邃，带有迷人的花香，酒中有丰富的深度，带有干燥的香草味，玫瑰花、Forget-me-not、樱桃等果香，以及细微的调味料。整个香气就像一首诗一样美妙。

在口感上，这瓶红酒非常紧致，精确，清澈，纯粹如同一条清澈的山泉水，酒中有惊人的密度和新鲜感，口感高精确，带有成熟的果实和优雅的风格。酒尾长达极限，带有红果味的余韵和“辣味”的回味。简直是绝世佳品，令人惊叹，简直是一种奇迹。这瓶红酒是在 2023 年 4 月在 Château La Mission Haut-Brion 品尝的。

Chinese pairs.original: 意大利浓咖啡烤，黑醋栗，松露和石墨。浓郁的单宁，强大的口感，酒体浓郁，回味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new:
Italian espresso roast, black truffle, mushroom, and graphite. 

Rich tannins, powerful texture, full-bodied wine, long finish.

Western reviews.review: This takes a heartbeat to kick in, and then the weight and impact of this wine slowly kicks in. Those Cabernets have lift and punch, and although it's not ethereal like the Ausone or even the Lafite, it has power, structure, impact and kick, and you know it's going the distance. It has really lovely menthol notes which play around on the finish, preceded by layers of cassis and liquorice. It's more accessible than many Latours at 10 years old - just give it another couple of years to fully get into its stride.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒需要一段时间才能发挥出它的全部魅力。随着时间的推移，这款红酒的重量和影响力会逐渐显现。这种卡贝网葡萄酒有着强劲的气势和结构，尽管它不像奥苏诺或拉菲特那样轻盈，但它有着强大的力量和持久性。它的薄荷香气非常迷人，伴随着黑加仑和浓郁的香料味。与许多10年老的拉图尔相比，这款红酒更容易入口，只要再等一两年，它就会完全展现出它的风采。

Western reviews.review: Expressive fruit aromas and wood perfumes announce this wine. With 94% Cabernet Sauvignon, this is a complex wine marked by purity of black fruits, berries, toast and tannins. It has power, richness and a lovely edge of spice to go with the acidity. The wine is firmly structured, while bursting with fruit and freshness. Cellar Selection.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有浓郁的果香和木质香气。以94%卡波内托萨维诺为主的这款红酒，展现出黑果、浆果、-toast和坚果的复杂性。它拥有强大的力量、丰富的口感和一丝丝的香料味，完美地与酸度相结合。酒精结构坚实，果味丰富，新鲜感十足。 cellar Selection..

Western reviews.review: The brilliant 2008 Château Latour has the classic stature and regal style of the estate front and center. A blend of 94% Cabernet Sauvignon, 5% Merlot, and 1% Cabernet Franc, it’s still purple-colored and brilliantly concentrated, offering medium to full-bodied aromas and flavors of blackcurrants, tobacco, lead pencil, and graphite. Dense, perfectly balanced, with ripe tannins, it’s a few years away from prime time (although it certainly offers pleasure) but will drink well for another 2-3 decades.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶2008年夏多尔酒庄的红酒（Château Latour）展现出典型的尊贵风格和庄园的典范。 它的酒液是由94%卡波弗列（Cabernet Sauvignon）、5%梅洛（Merlot）和1%卡波弗列（Cabernet Franc）组成的。 它依然呈现出深紫色的颜色，浓郁的酒液，中等到中高的酒体，酒香和口感中有黑加仑（blackcurrants）、烟草、铅笔和石墨的味道。 酒液浓密，平衡完美，酒质成熟，虽然它还需要几年时间才能达到最佳状态（尽管它已经可以享受），但它将在接下来的2-3个十年内保持品质。

Western reviews.review: Composed of 94% Cabernet Sauvignon, 5% Merlot, 0.75% Cabernet Franc and 0.25% Petit Verdot, the 2008 Latour gives a medium to deep garnet color and slips sensuously out of the glass with Chinese five spice, unsmoked cigars, sandalwood and dried roses scents over a core of warm cassis, Black Forest cake, chocolate mint and smoked meats plus a waft of black olives and garrigue. Medium to full-bodied, the palate is well-sustained in the middle with generous black fruits and lovely red fruit sparks, layered with savory nuances and a firm, grainy backbone, finishing with bags of perfume and freshness.
Western reviews.translation:
2008年拉图尔红酒的组成比例为94%卡波涅尔·沙维尼翁、5%梅洛、0.75%卡波涅尔·法兰克和0.25%佩蒂·维多。该酒呈现出深红色，酒香中融合了五香、未点燃的雪茄、沉香木和干燥玫瑰花的香气，伴随着暖暖的黑加西斯、黑森林蛋糕、巧克力薄荷和熏肉的味道，最后还有黑橄榄和 Garrigue 的微妙气息。

口感中等到中厚，酒体在中部保持稳定，黑果味丰富，红果味闪烁，酒中有丰富的香气和新鲜感。

Western reviews.review: Gorgeous aromas. Sandalwood and flowers, so perfumed and beautiful. Spices and currants with cassis too. Amazing nose. Such beauty and density with an iron and pure fruit character. Solid and racy. Best after 2015.
Western reviews.translation: 迷人的香气。有檀木和花朵的香味，非常芬芳美丽。还有香料和黑加仑莓的味道。酒鼻子非常惊人。酒的美丽和密度非常出色，铁和纯果实的特征非常纯粹。酒质坚实，口感清脆。建议在2015年后喝。

Chinese pairs.original:
这么轻巧灵动的葡萄酒，哪儿像是热年份的葡萄酒？
这几年我发现一个有趣的现象，一旦遇到干热年份，Chateau Kirwan 总能上演一出大戏。2020年份绝对是Chateau Kirwan的顶尖之作，从任何细节来讲都达到了历史新高度。绵柔的酒体、铁粉般的单宁，统统在酸奶般的口感中化作一缕温柔，口中犹如含着一枚洁白无瑕的明珠。能把Margaux的优雅用如此“软糯”的方式呈现出来，在梅多克，只有2020年份的Chateau Kirwan能够做到。
Chinese pairs.new:
这款葡萄酒如此轻盈灵动，难以想象它来自热年份。

最近几年，我发现一个有趣的现象：Chateau Kirwan总能在干热年份中表现出惊人的能力。2020年份的Chateau Kirwan绝对是其历史上最出色的作品，从细节到口感都达到了新高度。酒体柔和，单宁像铁粉一样细致，所有这些在酸奶般的口感中融合成温柔的感觉，口中感觉像含着一颗洁白无瑕的珍珠。Margaux的优雅以如此“软糯”的方式呈现出来，这在梅多克地区，只有2020年份的Chateau Kirwan才能做到。

English pairs.original: So delicate and lively, this masterpiece is nothing like a hot vintage wine. I have noticed an interesting phenomenon over the past few years, that is, when it comes to dry and hot vintages, Chateau Kirwan always gives an amazing performance. The 2020 vintage is the pinnacle of Caiarossa, reaching new heights in terms of details. The soft body and iron-powder-like tannins all turn into a whiff of tenderness on the yogurt-like palate, making you feel like holding a white and flawless pearl on your tongue. In Medoc, only Chateau Kirwan 2020 vintage can present the elegance of Margaux in such a “soft and mushy” way.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒细腻活泼，绝非烈酒的风格。近年来，我注意到一个有趣的现象：干热年份，佳年庄园（Chateau Kirwan）总能表现出惊人的水平。2020年产季是卡亚罗萨（Caiarossa）的巅峰之作，细节方面达到了新的高度。柔和的体积和铁粉样苦味都转化为舌尖上的柔软感，像是在舌头上感受到一颗白皙无瑕的珍珠。只有佳年庄园2020年产季才能在美度地区呈现出马格朗（Margaux）的典雅风范，呈现出一种“软糯”的风格。

Western reviews.review: Attractive nose of hazelnuts, chocolate, blueberries, blackcurrants, peach pits and sandalwood. Hints of olives and mushrooms, too. Complex, layered and integrated, with a medium to full body and powdery tannins. Long and savory at the end. Drink from 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气非常诱人，带有杏仁、巧克力、蓝berries、黑currants、桃核和沉香的味道。还有一点橄榄和蘑菇的味道。口感复杂、层次分明，口感中等到丰富，粉末状的苦味物质。最后口感长长的，带有咸味。建议从2025年开始饮用。

Western reviews.review: Lots of smoky oak, ripe blackcurrants, blueberries, tobacco, and chocolaty notes emerge from the 2020 Château Kirwan, a richly textured, medium to full-bodied Margaux. A wine that blossoms with time in the glass, it's a plush, sexy, yet brilliantly balanced 2020 offering velvety tannins and a great finish, and while the oak is preset right on opening, it integrated beautifully with air.
Western reviews.translation: 2020年夏图瓦尔酒庄的红酒展现出浓郁的烟熏橡木、成熟的黑currant、蓝莓、烟草和巧克力味道。 这是一款富有质感的中等至全等体积的马格朗酒庄红酒。随着时间的推移，酒精会在玻璃中开花，呈现出丰富的、性感的、却又完美平衡的风格，具有细腻的纹理和出色的尾部。虽然酒庄的橡木味在打开时略显突出，但随着空气的流通，它会融入到酒中，展现出完美的平衡。

Western reviews.review: Classic and powerful with plenty of architectural features giving angles and walls as the wine stretches out. This has confidence and juice, but lacks exuberance. The tannins are pretty high, there is some chewiness, a little austere, it will benefit from softening over ageing. 7% Petit Verdot completes the blend.Barrel Sample: 92
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒典雅而强烈，具有丰富的建筑特征，呈现出多个角度和墙壁。它充满自信和果实，但缺乏激情。该酒的苦味较高，有些嚼劲，略带严肃，随着年龄的增长会变得更加柔和。 Petit Verdot 7% 完成了酒的混合。酒桶样品：92分。

Western reviews.review: Exhibiting aromas of sweet black fruits and licorice mingled with hints of creamy new oak, the 2020 Kirwan is medium to full-bodied, deep and fleshy, with polished tannins, notably tangy acids for the vintage, and a suave, seamless profile despite its creditable concentration. In terms of aromatic purity and managed extraction, this is the finest Kirwan for some time. BBest after 2025. Rating: 92+
Western reviews.translation: 2020年基伦红酒展现出甜黑果和Licorice的香气，混合了新橡木的奶油味。基伦红酒的口感丰富，深度和丰富，具有光滑的纤维，特别是酸度清新，且口感顺滑。尽管其浓度值得称赞，但口感仍然非常顺滑。从香气纯度和提取管理方面来说，这是近期最好的基伦红酒。建议在2025年后享用。评分：92+

Western reviews.review: A velvety, seductive style, with warmed plum and black currant confiture laced with worn cedar, smoldering black tea and violet. Shows a subtle sanguine twinge at the very end that adds lift. Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot. Best from 2026 through 2036.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有细腻、诱人的风格，带有烤熟的浆果和黑加拿大蓝莓果酱的味道，伴有老化的红檜木、冒烟的黑茶和紫罗兰的香气。酒尾带有微妙的血红色味道，增加了酒的升力。酒中含有卡波雷尔·沙维尼翁、梅洛、卡波雷尔·法兰克和佩蒂特·韦多特等葡萄品种。建议在2026年至2036年之间饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有丰富的黑醋栗果香，并伴有些许干药草/咖啡香料的气味，入口后果味怡人，结构紧实且优雅，品质一流。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich blackberry fruit aromas accompanied by subtle herbal and coffee notes, leading to a smooth and refined palate with a tight, elegant structure and exceptional quality.

Western reviews.review: This wine continues the upward progression of Clerc-Milon. It has weight and density while also showing sweetness and delicious acidity. A very complete wine.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒继续了克莱尔米隆的上升趋势。它具有重量和密度，同时展现出甜度和可口的酸度。是一款非常完美的红酒。

Western reviews.review: This is very classic for the appellation with as much smoky and earthy character as ripe cassis. Good concentration and a stunning balance of ripe fruit, fine tannins and a long elegant finish. Drink or hold.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒典型代表了产区的风格，具有浓郁的烟熏和泥土味，搭配成熟的黑加思果。酒中有很好的浓度和完美的平衡，包括成熟的果实、细致的纤维和长而优雅的尾部。适合立即饮用或储存。

Western reviews.review: I'm cheating a little by saying this is ready to go, but it's the beginning of the true upward swing for Clerc Milon, and should be celebrated. The richness of the vintage comes through, gorgeous color, young, opulent, silky, wonderful texture. Here new oak crept up to 33% and this is just perfect, with a vibrant freshness. Young but not too oppressively so.
Western reviews.translation: 我稍微有点作弊，认为这瓶酒已经准备好喝了，但这标志着克莱尔米隆（Clerc Milon）真正的上升阶段，值得庆祝。  这瓶酒展现了丰富的葡萄酒风格，色泽美丽，年轻，奢华，滑顺，质感极佳。  新橡木的比例达到了33%，这正是完美的比例，带来了生动的新鲜感。  年轻但不至于太过沉重。

Western reviews.review: The 2009 Clerc Milon has great purity on the nose, almost Burgundy-like, with black cherries, cedar, fresh mint and pine cone aromas that gently unfold in the glass. The palate is extremely well balanced, with fine tannin—still a little tight and linear (unlike many 2009s)— but with a very persistent finish. Alongside the 2010, this is an extremely pleasurable, almost lascivious Clerc Milon that is one of the most sensual releases under winemaker Philippe Dhalluin. Tasted April 2017.
Western reviews.translation: 2009年克莱尔米隆（Clerc Milon）红酒具有极高的纯净度，几乎像勃艮第红酒一样，带有黑樱桃、松木、新鲜薄荷和松果的香气，随着时间的推移在玻璃中缓慢展开。口感极其平衡，细致的纤维（tanin）仍然略微紧绷和线性（与许多2009年的不同），但持久的尾部是极其持久的。与2010年一起，这是克莱尔米隆中极其愉悦的，几乎是放纵的品种，是葡萄酒制作人菲利普·德哈吕（Philippe Dhalluin）下最为诱人的发布之一。评分时间：2017年4月。

Western reviews.review: Juicy and nicely framed with a singed bay leaf note, which allows the medium-weight core of crushed plum and mulled fig to glide along nicely through the velvety finish. This fleshes out considerably as it sits in the glass, showing more layers of dark fruit and lingering minerality. This has some power in reserve, but lovely balance as well.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感丰富，带有焦香的樱草叶味道，中等重量的果肉和浓郁的黑果味道在细腻的尾部流动。随着时间的推移，这款红酒会展现出更多的层次和黑果味道，以及持久的矿物质味道。虽然它有着潜在的力量，但它的平衡也非常出色。

Chinese pairs.original: 2019年份的金玫瑰有着与众不同的控制力，和中国古人所讲的“克己复礼”有几分神似。无论是香气还是口感，这款酒都非常内敛，但仔细品味你就能够感受到它蕴藏其中的强大气场。入口时奶油般的丝滑口感以及收尾时流畅优美的线条让我印象很深刻，由始至终都体现了“极致的平衡” 。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2019 Gold Rose has a unique sense of restraint, reminiscent of the ancient Chinese phrase "克己复礼". Whether it's the aroma or the taste, this wine is incredibly understated, but upon closer inspection, you can feel its powerful presence. The silky, creamy texture at the beginning and the elegant, smooth finish left a lasting impression on me, showcasing "extreme balance" from start to finish.

English pairs.original: Gruaud-Larose 2019 enjoys a sense of controlled power, bearing a remarkable resemblance to the ancient Chinese philosophy “restrain yourself and return the rites”. Both the nose and palate demonstrate an extreme reservation, yet filled full of deep force on the mid-palate. The creamy texture and graceful figure impress me a lot on the finish, offering an “ultimate balance” from start to finish.
English pairs.new: 格劳德-拉罗斯 2019 年红酒拥有控制力十足的力量，展现出一种古老的中国哲学“约束自己，恢复礼仪”的气质。酒鼻和口感都表现出极度的谨慎，但在中口却充满了深厚的力量。奶油般的质感和优雅的风格在尾部给我留下了深刻的印象，始终保持着“完美平衡”的状态，从头到尾都令人惊叹。

Western reviews.review: Attractive aromas of ripe dark and blue fruit, vanilla, dark chocolate, hazelnuts and wet soil. Dense and compact with layers of polished tannins that hold long and even on the palate. Firm finish with notes of chocolate and crushed stones. Pretty finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒具有诱人的香气，带有成熟的黑色和蓝色水果、香草、黑巧克力、杏仁和潮湿的土壤的味道。酒体浓密紧致，具有多层次的光滑橡胶质感，持久均衡在口中。酒尾坚实，带有巧克力和碎石子的味道。酒尾美丽。

Western reviews.review: I wasn't able to taste the 2019 Château Gruaud Larose from barrel, but it's certainly an impressive Saint-Julien in bottle. Deep purple, with beautiful cassis and darker raspberry fruits as well as spice, dried flowers, and cedary incense notes, it hits the palate with medium to full-bodied richness carrying plenty of sweet tannins, a deep, concentrated mid-palate, and beautiful length. It's not the dense blockbuster style of the 2018 and is much more elegant and pretty, with plenty of up-front charm. It's beautifully done. It's going to benefit from just short-term bottle age and have 25+ years of prime drinking. Best after 2024.
Western reviews.translation: 我没有尝试过2019年格鲁阿德拉罗塞（Château Gruaud Larose）的酒桶样本，但在瓶装中，它确实是一个非常出色的圣朱利安（Saint-Julien）。深紫色，具有美丽的黑加仑和更深的莓果风味，伴有香料、干花和松香香烟的香气，它在口中呈现出中等到中等以上的体积，带有大量的甜橼酸，深厚的浓缩中部和美丽的长度。它不是像2018年那样密集的爆炸式风格，而是更加优雅和美丽，具有大量的前台魅力。它做得非常好。它将在短期内的瓶装年龄中受益，并将有25+年的最佳饮用时间。建议在2024年后饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Ducru-Beaucaillou对2003年份的诠释，充分展现了顶级酒庄在面对挑战时的从容。面对不期而至的酷暑，这款酒展现出了不可思议的清新感。薄荷黑巧和蓝莓果粒的香气十分坚挺，搭配上酷似“小青柑”的气息，不但成熟感十足，还透着几分橙皮加普洱的独特清香。酒体结构稳健有力，回味之际带着甜美的余韵，绝对是2003年份不可多得的佳作。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau Ducru-Beaucaillou masterfully interprets the 2003 vintage, showcasing the elegance of a top-tier estate in the face of adversity. Despite the unexpected heatwave, this wine presents an astonishing freshness. The robust aromas of black pepper and blueberry are complemented by a citrusy note reminiscent of a small orange, exuding a sense of maturity and a hint of orange peel and Pu-erh tea. The wine's structure is robust and well-balanced, leaving a sweet aftertaste that makes it a standout in the 2003 vintage.

English pairs.original: Chateau Ducru-Beaucaillou’s interpretation of the 2003 vintage showcases the poise and composure of a top-tier estate when faced with challenges. Despite the unexpected heatwave, this wine exhibits a wonderful freshness. The robust aromas of mint-infused dark chocolate and juicy blueberry, coupled with hints reminiscent of “Xiao Qinggan” and Pu-erh tea, exude both maturity and a unique, fragrant blend of orange peel. With its strong and well-structured body, accompanied by a delightful lingering “sweetness” on the finish, it is undoubtedly a rare gem of the 2003 vintage.
English pairs.new: 杜克鲁-博卡略庄园2003年酒款的解读，展现了顶级庄园在面对挑战时的稳健和沉着。尽管遭遇了意外的高温波动，这款酒依然展现出令人惊艳的新鲜感。酒中浓郁的薄荷浸泡巧克力和浓郁的蓝莓风味，伴随着“小青柠”和普洱茶的余味，展现出成熟和独特的柑橘皮香气。酒体强健而结构良好，尾部留有令人愉悦的“甜感”，无疑是2003年酒款中的珍品。

Western reviews.review: On a rapid evolutionary track, you already find secondary notes of wet forest floor, tobacco leaf, red spicy berries and smoke. The wine is round soft and polished, with a tobacco, spicy, red berry and mocha tinted finish. I would drink this over the next decade or so.
Western reviews.translation: 在快速进化的道路上，你已经可以感受到次级的湿林地面、烟草叶、红辣椒果和烟雾的气味。酒精质地圆润、柔软、光滑，口感中带有烟草、辣椒、红果和巧克力味。建议在未来十年内饮用。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, kräftiger Kern, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung. In der Nase eher verhalten, tabakige Nuancen, etwas Unterholz, zarte Beerenfrucht. Am Gaumen kraftvoll, feste Tannine, die mürb sind, elegant und dunkelbeerig, frische Säurestruktur, zart nach Bitterschokolade, ist perfekt ausgewogen, süß und stoffig im Abgang, gute Länge, angenehme Kirschfrucht, aber auch erdige Nuancen im Nachhall, schon heute zugänglich, bietet viel Trinkspaß, verfügt aber auch über einiges Lagerpotenzial. Trinken/lagern +15
Western reviews.translation:
深红色葡萄酒色，浓密的核心，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。

酒香中，烟草味和一些林木气息，微微的浆果味。

口感强烈，坚实的橡皮味，细腻的口感，黑色浆果味，清新的酸度结构，微微的巧克力味，完美的平衡，甜美的尾部，厚重的口感，长长的尾部，清新的樱桃味，但也有一些土壤味在余味中，已经可以享用，带来很多乐趣，但也具有很好的储存潜力。

推荐储存时间：+15年

Western reviews.review: This is a solid, powerful wine packed with tannins and heavy black fruits. As so often, Ducru is taking its time, and this wine is still knitting itself together. But in future years, watch for the generosity, the richness as well as the finesse and freshness. Imported by Diageo Chateau & Estates.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶坚实、强劲的红酒，充满了坚果味和浓郁的黑果味。正如往常一样，杜克鲁（Ducru）酒庄在慢慢成熟，这瓶酒还在慢慢整合。但是，未来几年，人们将会看到它的慷慨、丰富、细腻和新鲜。由迪亚吉欧（Diageo）酒庄进口。

Chinese pairs.original: 橡木，黑醋栗，香料和黑莓的香气，浓郁芬芳。酒体饱满，圆润柔顺的单宁和一个长长的回味，精致，平衡，优雅。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich aromas of oak, black prune, spices, and blackberry. Full-bodied with smooth, rounded tannins and a long, refined finish. Elegant and well-balanced.

Western reviews.review: A blend of 81% Cabernet Sauvignon and 19% Merlot, this wine represents only 34% of Lafite's total harvest. In a less than perfect Medoc vintage, it has been spectacular since birth, putting on more weight and flesh over the last year. This opaque purple-colored 1998 is close to perfection. The spectacular nose of lead pencil, smoky, mineral, and black currant fruit soars majestically from the glass. The wine is elegant yet profoundly rich, revealing the essence of Lafite's character. The tannin is sweet, and the wine is spectacularly layered yet never heavy. The finish is sweet, super-rich, yet impeccably balanced and long (50+ seconds). Anticipated maturity: 2007-2035.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒是由81%卡波弗雷希诺和19%梅洛混合而成，仅占拉菲酒庄总产量的34%。在一个不太完美的梅多克产区年份中，这款红酒自诞生之日起就表现出色，过去的一年里它变得更加丰富和丰满。这款1998年的红酒呈现出深紫色的透明度，接近完美。从玻璃中飘出的笔直的铅笔、烟熏、矿物质和黑加仑果香令人惊叹。酒精优雅而深刻，展现出拉菲酒庄的独特风格。酒中的天然纤维是甜的，酒精层次丰富而又不沉重。酒尾甜美、超级丰富而又完美平衡，持久时间超过50秒。预计成熟年份：2007-2035。

Western reviews.review: Amazing aromas of crushed blackberries, toasted oak and currant, spices. Really a great nose. Full-bodied, with round and velvety tannins and a long, long finish. It lasts for minutes on the palate. Superb. Best wine of the Médoc, without a doubt.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气非常惊人，带有挤压的黑莓、烤橡木和黑加仑、香料的味道。酒鼻子非常出色。酒体丰富，口感圆润细腻，长长的尾部持续数分钟。非常出色。梅多克地区最好的红酒，毫无疑问。

Western reviews.review: Easy vintage until September, when conditions in the Médoc particularly became humid, which meant accelerating the harvest (it was one of those years when Lafite benefitted enormously from its ability to ramp up a bigger-than-expected team of pickers). Salin still calls this a lunch wine, because of its supple freshness, its balance that would work so perfectly with food.The vintage was a showcase for Bordeaux on the Right Bank, where it was considered great from the start. The Medoc and Graves were less well received at the time, but are ripe for rediscovering now. This still has a lovely deep ruby red colour, and on both the nose and palate you are getting to secondary aromas, a walk in the forest, mushrooms, cedars, heather, game – these are flavours you just don’t get in young wines, and amply reward the patience of holding bottles back. The surprise, and the Lafite signature, comes in its vibrancy, in its huge persistency and in the lift on the finish.
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的品质在初期相当容易获得，直到九月份，特别是在梅多克地区，湿度增高，这意味着采摘速度加快（这年里拉菲特酒庄大大受益于其能够迅速增加采摘团队规模的能力）。萨林仍然认为这是一瓶适合午餐的红酒，因为它的柔软清新感和平衡的口感，能够与食物完美搭配。

这一年是波尔多右岸的盛世，自始至终都被认为是极好的。梅多克和格雷夫地区在当时的评价不佳，但现在正是重新发现它们的好时机。这瓶红酒依然呈现出深红宝石色的美丽，鼻子和口感都呈现出次级香气，像是在森林中散步，蘑菇，松木，高山草，狩猎等，这些味道在年轻酒中很难找到，耐心地等待几年后会得到丰厚的回报。拉菲特的独特之处在于其生动的活力，持久的口感和酒尾的提升。

Chinese pairs.original: 香气很有穿透力，纯粹精致的香料和鲜嫩纯美的莓果在杯中随风飘扬，动感立体而又细腻芬芳。口感如汤圆般软糯，伴随着紧致的结构和修长的线条缓缓落下。整个品鉴过程一气呵成，是近几个年份中颇具活力的玛歌红亭。
Chinese pairs.new: The nose is incredibly piercing, with pure and refined spices and luscious, fresh berries wafting through the glass, dynamic and three-dimensional with a subtle fragrance. The palate is as soft and velvety as a dumpling, accompanied by a taut structure and elegant lines that unfold slowly. The entire tasting experience is seamless, a lively Magenta Ridge from recent vintages.

English pairs.original: Absolutely penetrating, the aromas of pure, delicate spices and fresh berries flow out of the glass, which is dynamic and solid, intricate and fragrant. It is as soft and mushy as rice dumplings on the palate, accompanied by tense structure and slender lines that attack your taste buds. The whole tasting process is smooth and fluid, and this is one of the most lively Pavillon Rouge in recent vintages.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的香气极其深入，纯净的细腻香料和新鲜的浆果香味从玻璃中流出，呈现出动态和坚实的风格，复杂而芬芳。口感软糯如粽子，伴随着紧张的结构和纤细的线条，激活你的味蕾。整个品尝过程流畅而顺滑，这是近年来最活跃的Pavillon Rouge之一。

Western reviews.review: The wine is rich, open and generous. The bold black fruits mask the tannins and bring out the fine balance between structure and fruit. Drink this very fine wine from 2026. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒富有味道，开阔且慷慨。浓郁的黑色水果掩盖了苦味，展现出结构和果味之间的精妙平衡。请于2026年品尝这款极品红酒。- 罗杰·沃斯

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, dezente Randaufhellung. Feine schwarze Beerenfrucht, Nuancen von Zimt und Edelholz, reife Herzkirschen und Noten von Orangenmarmelade sind unterlegt. Komplex, saftig und elegant, finessenreich strukturiert, gut integrierte Tannine, salzige Mineralität im Abgang, verfügt über eine tolle Frische, sicheres Entwicklungspotenzial, kann aber bereits angetrunken werden. Noch vor zehn Jahren wäre das wohl die Qualität des Grand Vins gewesen ... (2025–2040)
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，边缘有轻微的光泽。细致的黑色浆果风味，带有丁香和贵木的细微差别，熟透的樱桃和橘子酱的香气。复杂、鲜嫩、优雅，精致的结构，良好整合的纤维，尾部有盐味的矿物质，具有出色的清新感，具有良好的成熟潜力，可以立即饮用。十年前，这可能是顶级葡萄酒的质量...(2025-2040)。

Western reviews.review: (En Primeur, 76% Cabernet Sauvignon, 19% Merlot, 3% Petit Verdot, 2% Cabernet Franc. Verkostet am 22. Juli auf Château Margaux). Expressive Nase, feinwürzig, klar, zeigt Noten von Cassis, Kirschen, ein Hauch Lakritze. Im Gaumen gradlinig, sanft, eine leicht cremige Textur, wie Samt und Seide, enorm fein gewobenes Tannin, top Säurestruktur, die Frucht wirkt auf den Punkt gereift, enorm schöne Balance der Elemente. Im Abgang rotfruchtig und sehr langanhaltend. Eine sensationeller Pavillon Rouge. 93-94/100 vvPunkte
Western reviews.translation:
本酒是Château Margaux的En Primeur系列，酒中含有76%的卡波涅尔·萨旺吉翁、19%的梅洛、3%的佩蒂·维多和2%的卡波涅尔·法兰克。酒评于2022年7月22日在Château Margaux进行。

酒香浓郁、细腻、清晰，展现出黑加西、樱桃和薄荷糖的香气。

口感平滑、柔和，口感轻盈，像丝绸和绸缎一样细腻，纤维非常细致，酸度结构完美，果味成熟，各个元素之间的平衡非常好。尾部果味浓郁，持久。

这是一瓶出色的Pavillon Rouge，评分93-94/100。

Western reviews.review: Flowers, cherries and plums are the first things you notice before you get into all that silky, elegant, refined layers of ripe red, sweet, lifted fruits. Medium-bodied, elegant, luscious and fresh, this is a gorgeous Pavillon Rouge that is a scaled-down version of Chateau Margaux. The wine blends 76% Cabernet Sauvignon, 19% Merlot, 3% Petit Verdot and 2% Cabernet Franc, reaching 14.2% alcohol. 93-95 Pts
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的第一印象是花朵、樱桃和李子，之后你会发现一层层的细腻、优雅、精致的成熟红果味。体积中等，优雅、丰富、清新，这是一款美丽的Pavillon Rouge，是一款规模较小的Chateau Margaux。酒中混合了76%卡波弗雷蒙、19%梅洛、3%小皮诺和2%卡波弗朗克，酒精含量为14.2%。评分93-95分。

Western reviews.review: High ripeness with dark fruit, cassis and fine oak integration, balanced palate with good grip and weight, floral notes, crushed dark berries, plenty of fine tannin and a long pure finish.
Western reviews.translation: 酒体丰富，深色果味，黑加拿大浆果和精致的橡木融合，口感平衡，口感丰富，花香味道，黑莓味道，充满细致的坚果和长而纯粹的尾部。

Chinese pairs.original: 这是我第二次在酒庄垂直品鉴，与Etienne Charrier。这支历经10个月桶储的橡木桶样酒混酿比例与2018年份和2020年份相同。整排酒中最具表现力的酒款。微微的婴儿肥带来了些许圆润感，因此相比2021年份无疑要饱满许多，但整体依然颇为清晰、优雅，轻嗅酒透出复杂的紫罗兰甜花、香料（桂皮、黑色甘草、小茴香）和黑莓芬芳，与黑巧克力、灌木、杏和咸矿物的香味交织在一起。丝滑和清澈是口感上最引人注目的特征；张力十足的中段口感充满树莓般的酸度——为那富有层次及质地的柔和、持久收尾增添了一抹活力和生津感。非常棒的一款酒。
Chinese pairs.new: 这支酒是与Etienne Charrier合作的第二次垂直品鉴。酒款经过10个月的桶储，混合了2018年和2020年份的橡木桶样酒。它是整排酒中表现最突出的酒款。酒中有微微的婴儿肥感，给人一种圆润的感觉，相比2021年份要饱满许多，但整体仍然清晰优雅。酒的香味中有复杂的紫罗兰甜花、香料（桂皮、黑色甘草、小茴香）和黑莓芬芳，与黑巧克力、灌木、杏和咸矿物的香味交织在一起。酒的口感最引人注目的是丝滑和清澈，中段口感张力十足，充满树莓般的酸度，给酒的柔和持久收尾增添了一抹活力和生津感。

English pairs.original: The second time to do the vertical tasting at the winery, with Etienne Charrier. The barrel sample (has spent 10 months in oak barrels) of the 2022 indicates the same blend as the 2018 and the 2020. The most expressive wine of the lineup. A hint of baby fat led to subtle roundness so that it's fuller-bodied than the 2021 without doubt, but overall still precise and refined on the complicated nose that was filled with sweet violet, spices (cinnamon, black liquorice, anise) and blackberry interwoven with black chocolate, scrub, apricot and savoury-mineral. The most striking feature of the mouthfeel was the silkiness while the limpidity was also thrilling; tension-filled on the mid-palate that was packed with raspberry-like acidity that added the vibrancy and the mouth-watering sense to supple end that revealed terrific layer, texture and persistence. Wonderful.
English pairs.new: 第二次在酒庄进行垂直品鉴，和埃蒂安·夏里埃（Etienne Charrier）一起。2022年酒款的木桶样品（在橡木桶中陈酿了10个月）与2018年和2020年的酒款混合比例相同。酒款最具表现力。酒款中有一点婴儿肥肉的味道，导致了细微的圆润感，使其比2021年酒款更丰富，但整体上仍然精确和精致。酒款的鼻子复杂，充满了甜蜜的紫罗兰、香料（丁香、黑胡椒、甘草）、黑莓、黑巧克力、灌木丛、杏子和矿物质的味道。酒款的口感最引人注目的是丝滑，而清澈度也令人惊叹；中口处充满了红莓酸的张力，使酒款更具活力和口水样感，柔和的末端展现出出色的层次、质地和持久性。非常棒。

Western reviews.review: Flowers, blackberries, currants, espresso, and plums with a touch of cocoa form the nose. On the palate, the wine is loaded with lusciously-textured, ripe, polished fruits. There is a solid depth of flavor, good energy, and layers of black and red fruits on the mid-palate and in the creamy, fruit-packed finish. Drink from 2027-2055. 94-96 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中包含着花朵、黑莓、黑加仑、浓缩咖啡和浆果的味道，伴随着巧克力的微妙气息。口感上，酒体丰富、浓郁、细腻，充满了成熟的果实味道。酒中有着深厚的味道、充满活力和黑色和红色果实的层次，口感丰富、果实丰富的尾部。建议从2027年到2055年饮用。评分94-96分。

Western reviews.review: Reife Frucht, Kirschen, Zwetschgen, Cassis und frisch geschnittene Kräuter. Im Auftakt harmlos, dann packt der Gerbstoff zu, die Frucht ist hier leider etwas im Hintergrund, der Wein endet trocknend und rotfruchtig. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / CVBG / Château Belgrave) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感丰富，带有浓郁的果香，包括草莓、浆果和黑berries，伴随着新鲜的香草味。起初口感平和，但随后干酪味逐渐显现，果香味则相对较淡。最后，口感干净，留下深红色的果味。 (评分时间：2023年4月 / CVBG / Château Belgrave)

Western reviews.review: Good level of extraction and structure, in good harmony. Intense black cherries, attrac tive floral note, on the nose and palate. Firm mid palate, crunchy with moderate finish, quite spicy. The shape of tannins feels flattened out and sticking on the palate until the finish. Some tea leaves flavour.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的提取度和结构都很好，和谐度高。酒鼻中有浓郁的黑樱桃和吸引人的花香。口感中有坚实的中口feel，口感清脆，尾部温和，略带辣味。橡皮的感觉变得平坦，留在口中直到尾部。还有一些茶叶的味道。

Western reviews.review: Le nez est minéral avec une certaine puissance maîtrisée. Il est franc avec des notes de mûres sauvages fraîches pulpeuses, de petits fruits rouges frais et plus légèrement de violette associée à une touche de fraise écrasée ainsi qu’une pointe de bergamote. La bouche est minérale, fraîche avec un fin côté infusion. Elle a de la tension, de la droiture, de la justesse et des notes de mûres fraîches pulpeuses et de cassis pulpeux frais et plus légèrement de violettes associées à des touches de bergamote, de minéralité saline et à une discrète pointe d’épices ainsi qu à une note de toast.
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的香气是矿物质的，具有控制的力量。它清晰明了，带有新鲜的野生浆果、红色新鲜水果和轻微的紫罗兰花香，以及压榨的草莓和 bergamote 的点缀。

口感矿物质，新鲜，细腻。它具有张力、直率、准确性和新鲜的浆果和浓缩的黑currant 的味道，以及轻微的紫罗兰花香， bergamote 的点缀、矿物质的盐味和微妙的香料，以及轻微的烤面包味。

Western reviews.review: Deep ruby, opaque core, purple reflections, brightening on the rim. Fruity bouquet, ripe wild berries and cherries, fine spicy nuances, candied orange zest. Complex palate, juicy and fresh, a touch of chocolate, mineral and lasting, good length, certain ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，透明核心，紫色反射，边缘明亮。果香 bouquet，成熟的野生浆果和樱桃，精致的辣味细微，糖化橙皮。复杂的口感， juicy 和新鲜，一点点巧克力，矿物质和持久，良好的长度，确定的成熟潜力。

Chinese pairs.original: Bonneau du Martray是勃艮第唯一一家只生产特级园葡萄酒的酒庄（Jean-Charles le Bault de la Moriniere那11公顷位于的Corton坡地上的葡萄园总共只出产两款葡萄酒：Corton-Charlemagne和Corton Rouge）。这间生物动力法酒庄的主要地块，集中在En Charlemagne和Le Charlemagne（事实上，这是款Charlemagne，而非Corton-Charlemagne），以种植霞多丽为主。平均树龄为45年的老藤种植在富有多样性的土壤之上。在酿造方面，这家酒庄是极少数没有任何氧化问题的勃艮第白葡萄酒生产商，通过精心挑选软木塞、橡木桶发酵和减少搅桶来降低被氧化的概率。瓶醒一个半小时。这支无与伦比的Corton-Charlemagne混合了15个不同的地块，展现仅有微微淡金色调的年轻色泽（即便是支22年的老酒），伴随多少有些成熟但依然清新、宜人而且异常纯净的香气，依次呈现引人入胜的柑橘果酱、榛子、香草、奶油蛋糕、白花、岩石、香料、酸橙、油桃、梨、黄苹果和些许酒庄招牌式的菠萝蜜香味。均衡、清澈并且空灵的口感同样十分典型，表现出标志性的纤细感和通透感以及成线性的良好酸度；口中的风味持久到让人难以置信——在口腔中逗留超过一分钟；我也非常喜欢那在油膏般滋味十足的收尾中达到顶点的层次，留下一抹复杂的太妃糖、黄油、杏仁、咸矿物、柠檬和菠萝味。
Chinese pairs.new:
Bonneau du Martray是勃艮第唯一一家专门生产特级园葡萄酒的酒庄。他们的葡萄园位于Corton坡地，总共只有两款葡萄酒：Corton-Charlemagne和Corton Rouge。酒庄采用生物动力法，主要地块位于En Charlemagne和Le Charlemagne，种植霞多丽。老藤平均树龄为45年，种植在多样性的土壤上。

酿造方面，这家酒庄是极少数没有氧化问题的勃艮第白葡萄酒生产商。他们通过精心挑选软木塞、橡木桶发酵和减少搅桶来降低被氧化的概率。瓶醒一个半小时。

这支无与伦比的Corton-Charlemagne混合了15个不同的地块，展现年轻色泽（即便是22年的老酒）。伴随成熟但依然清新、宜人而且异常纯净的香气，呈现引人入胜的柑橘果酱、榛子、香草、奶油蛋糕、白花、岩石、香料、酸橙、油桃、梨、黄苹果和菠萝蜜香味。

口感均衡、清澈并且空灵，表现出标志性的纤细感和通透感以及成线性的良好酸度。口中的风味持久到让人难以置信——在口腔中逗留超过一分钟。收尾中达到顶点的层次，留下一抹复杂的太妃糖、黄油、杏仁、咸矿物、柠檬和菠萝味。

English pairs.original: Bonneau du Martray is the only domaine in Burgundy that produces exclusively Grand Cru wines (Jean-Charles le Bault de la Moriniere merely makes two wines in total from his 11 hectares vineyards on the Corton hill: Corton-Charlemagne and Corton Rouge). This bio-dynamic producer's key holdings are in the 'lieux-dits' of En Charlemagne and Le Charlemagne (in fact, it's a Charlemagne rather than Corton-Charlemagne), which are planted predominantly with Chardonnay. The vines average 45 years of age and are planted on a variety of soil types. For the vinification, this domaine is one of the very few in Burgundy that has never had a premature oxidation problem, through the careful selection of natural corks, barrel fermented and avoiding the increasing batonnage. Aeration in bottle for one and a half hours. This unparalleled Corton-Charlemagne is a blend of fifteen microclimate blocks, with an astonishingly youthful color despite it was a 22-year-old white wine (showing just a hint of light gold tints), accompanied by a somewhat evolved but still delightfully fresh and startlingly pure smell that displayed a riveting array of marmalade, hazelnut, vanilla, cream cake, white flowers, stone, spices, lime, nectarine, pear, yellow apple and a trace of jackfruit which could be a signature of Bonneau du Martray. The well-proportioned, lucid and ethereal palate was exceedingly quintessential as well, revealing the hallmark finesse and penetration as well as a fine line of acidity; the persistence of the flavour in mouth was incredible--could lingered for over a minute; I also adored the layer that culminated in an unctuous and flavoursome finale adorned with complex notes of toffee, butter, almond, savoury-mineral, lemon and pineapple.
English pairs.new: 波纳杜马特雷（Bonneau du Martray）是勃艮第唯一一家专门生产格兰克鲁（Grand Cru）葡萄酒的酒庄（仅有让-夏尔·勒博（Jean-Charles le Bault de la Moriniere）在科尔顿（Corton）山上拥有11公顷的葡萄园，仅生产两瓶葡萄酒：科尔顿-夏尔曼（Corton-Charlemagne）和科尔顿红（Corton Rouge））。这家生物动力（bio-dynamic）酒庄的主要产区位于夏尔曼（Charlemagne）和勒夏尔曼（Le Charlemagne），主要种植霞多丽（Chardonnay）。葡萄园平均年龄45年，种植在各种土壤类型上。酒庄在发酵和陈化过程中非常谨慎，避免了早期氧化问题，使用天然塞拉（natural corks），在酒桶发酵，并避免了增加的搅拌（batonnage）。瓶内氧化1.5小时。波纳杜马特雷的这瓶科尔顿-夏尔曼是来自15个微气候区块的混合，尽管是22岁的白葡萄酒，但颜色仍然非常年轻，仅有轻微的金色调。酒庄的这瓶葡萄酒具有非常典型的气味，展现出橙子酱、杏仁、香草、奶油蛋糕、白花、石头、香料、柠檬、蜜桃、梨、黄苹果和一丝芭乐的复杂气味。酒庄的这瓶葡萄酒具有非常典型的口感，展现出精致的质地和深入的味道，口感清晰，具有非常好的酸度和持久性，口感可以持续超过1分钟。酒庄的这瓶葡萄酒的尾部非常丰富，具有复杂的气味，如糖浆、黄油、杏仁、咸味矿物质、柠檬和菠萝。

Western reviews.review: Dezente Nase, leicht buttrig, Blütennoten, reifer Apfel, still, tiefgründig, Creme Brulé, sehr komplex. Cremig im Gaumen, grosse Harmonie, vollmundig, rund, mit gut verpacktem Säurenerv, top verpacktes Holz, aromatisch mit viel Länge, Schmelz und nussige Rückaromen. Grosses Chardonnay Kino.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

酒体轻盈，微微带有奶油味，带有花香和成熟苹果的香气，口感平稳，深度丰富，类似于奶油布朗尼，非常复杂。

口感丰富，口感滑顺，具有完美的和谐感，口感丰富，圆润，带有适度的酸度，木质味道完美包裹，具有浓郁的香气，持久的口感，带有融化和坚果的回味。

这是一个极具魅力的香槟酒！

Western reviews.review: Closed, with some caraway, chalky mineral notes and burnt almond (high quality wood). On the palate, an even balance of ripe, subtle acidity, silky body, suppleness and tactile-mineral polish. Spicy notes on the finish. Generous yet discreet, truly aristocratic.
Western reviews.translation: 封闭的口感，带有些许孜然、石灰质矿物质和焦糖杏仁（高质量木质）的味道。口感平衡，带有成熟的、细微的酸度，滑顺的体感，柔软的质感和细腻的矿物质光泽。尾部带有些许辣味。富有品质却又谦逊，真正的贵族风范。

Western reviews.review: The quintessence of Corton-Charlemagne. The wrapping aromas are of aromatic herbs, spice and ripe fruit which to the palate is pulpy and salty with iodine nuances. The finish is complex, taut and with an impressive persistence.
Western reviews.translation: 科尔顿-夏勒曼的精髓。酒中的香气是芳香植物、香料和成熟水果的混合，口感是浓郁的、咸的，带有海盐的矿物质味。酒尾复杂、紧致，持久感极强。

Western reviews.review: Still very reductive, vivid oak character. On the nose marigold and fresh corn. Quite juicy acidity, austere, defensive fruit accompaniment, just becoming more supple, juice and spiciness are good, length too, the complexity remains rather middleweight, with salty notes.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒仍然非常有氧化性，洋香料的味道非常浓郁。酒鼻中有金盏花和新鲜玉米的香气。口感酸度很高，果味干净清晰，但略带干涩，随着时间的推移，口感越来越顺滑，果味和香料的结合越来越好，酒尾长度也很长，复杂度虽然不算高，但有着清晰的盐味。

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Gelb, schöner Glanz. Was für eine Nase, umwerfend dieser Duft, einerseits tief, mineralisch mit Feurstein, dann aber auch unglaublich floral mit Anflügen von Kräutern, weissen Blüten und einer feinen Würzigkeit, das ist wunderbar komplex, mal einladend zugänglich, dann wieder verhalten, Ein Schnüffelwein. Am Gaumen straff im Auftakt, dann breitet sich der Wein aus, wunderbar weich und vollmundig, Zitrusfrüchte, feine Holzaromen, dazu exotische Früchte, weisser Pfirsich, grossartige Struktur, dicht und doch elegant, wunderbarer Wein, langanhaltend, fast nicht enden wollend. 2017-2032, 19 vvPunkte, (95/100) (AvV)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

深黄色，光泽美丽。闻起来真的是惊人，既深沉又矿物质，带有火石味，接着又是花香，带有草香、白花香和细微的辛香料味，非常复杂，有时入口宽广，有时又很谨慎，是一个让人迷醉的酒。口感紧绷的开始，接着酒液扩散，非常柔软和丰富，带有柑橘味、细微的木头味和异国情调的果味，白梨味，结构完美，密集又优雅，非常出色的酒，持久度极好，几乎没有尽头。推荐饮用时间：2017-2032，19分（95/100）(AvV)。

chateau pichon longueville comtesse de l.name: chateau pichon longueville comtesse de lalande 2018

Chinese pairs.original: 才华横溢的Nicolas Glumineau曾是Chateau Montrose的技术总监，他如今掌管Louis Roederer旗下所有的波尔多酒庄（Chateau Pichon Longueville Comtesse de Lalande、Chateau de Pez、Chateau Haut Beausejour和Chateau Bernadotte）。他希望能够在未来创造一个不出产任何副牌酒的完美葡萄园。事实上，Reserve de la Comtesse的品质于2014年后每年都稳步提升。与Nicolas Glumineau在酒庄一同品鉴了这款期酒。混酿比例为71%赤霞珠、23%梅洛、5%品丽珠和1%小维多。深紫红色。即便此酒的香气略显含蓄，但那种圆润、奢华同时优雅的香气依然相当迷人，大量薰衣草的芬芳占据了主导地位，夹杂百合、灌木、香料（桂皮、肉豆蔻、白胡椒）、生姜、碎岩石、黑布林、枇杷、苹果皮和栗子蛋糕味，以及下层微微黑橄榄和黑巧克力所带来的深邃。圆润感延续到那如同香气般美轮美奂的华丽口感中，赋予其异常清晰而且多少有些结实的中段口感宛如添加了滑石粉般的丰满质地，严肃同时均衡、悠长的多矿物收尾展现令人难以置信的清晰、细腻及成线性的漂亮酸度。我相信这支酒在装瓶后的表现将会更为惊人，可以轻松陈年30-40年。
Chinese pairs.new:
才华横溢的Nicolas Glumineau曾是Chateau Montrose的技术总监，他如今掌管Louis Roederer旗下所有的波尔多酒庄（Chateau Pichon Longueville Comtesse de Lalande、Chateau de Pez、Chateau Haut Beausejour和Chateau Bernadotte）。他希望能够在未来创造一个不出产任何副牌酒的完美葡萄园。事实上，Reserve de la Comtesse的品质于2014年后每年都稳步提升。与Nicolas Glumineau在酒庄一同品鉴了这款期酒。 

酒款的混酿比例为71%赤霞珠、23%梅洛、5%品丽珠和1%小维多。酒液呈深紫红色。酒的香气虽然略显含蓄，但仍然具有圆润、奢华同时优雅的特质，大量薰衣草的芬芳占据了主导地位，夹杂百合、灌木、香料（桂皮、肉豆蔻、白胡椒）、生姜、碎岩石、黑布林、枇杷、苹果皮和栗子蛋糕味，以及下层微微黑橄榄和黑巧克力所带来的深邃。

酒的圆润感延续到其华丽的口感中，赋予其异常清晰而且多少有些结实的中段口感，宛如添加了滑石粉般的丰满质地。酒的收尾展现令人难以置信的清晰、细腻及成线性的漂亮酸度。 

我相信这支酒在装瓶后的表现将会更为惊人，可以轻松陈年30-40年。

English pairs.original: The gifted Nicolas Glumineau was the previous technical manager of Chateau Montrose, he's now in charge of all the Louis Roederer Bordeaux properties (Chateau Pichon Longueville Comtesse de Lalande, Chateau de Pez, Chateau Haut Beausejour and Chateau Bernadotte). His ambition is to create an ideal vineyard without producing the second label. In fact, the quality of the Reserve de la Comtesse was indeed increasing year by year since the 2014. Tasted this en primeur with Nicolas Glumineau at the winery. The 2018 is an integration of 71% Cabernet Sauvignon, 23% Merlot, 5% Cabernet Franc and 1% Petit Verdot. Dark purple-red in color. Although the scent was faintly restrained, but that kind of rounded and opulent while refined perfume was still fairly fetching, boasting a massive amount of lavender that assumed a dominant position, mixed with lily, scrub, spices (cinnamon, nutmeg, white pepper), ginger, crushed stone, black plum, loquat, apple peel and chestnut cake as well as a dash of underlying depths of black olive and black chocolate. The sense of roundness reappeared on the taste that was as sumptuous as the nose, giving a voluptuous and talc-like texture to the highly precise and somewhat firm mid-palate that exhibited incredible refreshment and delicateness plus a superb line of acidity, all terminating in a serious and mineral-drenched finale that was also well-balanced and enduring. I was pretty sure this would become even more spectacular after the bottling and it would last 30-40 years without problem.
English pairs.new: 尼古拉斯·格鲁米诺（Nicolas Glumineau）是一位天赋的葡萄酒技术家，他曾担任查塔纽蒙罗（Chateau Montrose）的技术经理，现在负责路易·罗德雷尔（Louis Roederer）在波尔多的所有葡萄园（查塔普尚龙维尔孔特斯德拉兰德（Chateau Pichon Longueville Comtesse de Lalande）、查塔德佩兹（Chateau de Pez）、查塔奥贝索（Chateau Haut Beausejour）和查塔贝尔纳多特（Chateau Bernadotte））。他希望创造一个理想的葡萄园，而不生产第二标签葡萄酒。事实上，自2014年以来，拉康特斯储备（Reserve de la Comtesse）的质量确实在逐年提高。与尼古拉斯·格鲁米诺一起在葡萄园品尝了这瓶原瓶（en primeur）。2018年产的葡萄酒是由71%卡波弗雷蒙（Cabernet Sauvignon）、23%梅洛（Merlot）、5%卡波弗雷蒙（Cabernet Franc）和1%佩特维多（Petit Verdot）组成。酒色深紫红。虽然香气有些抑制，但那种圆润而丰富的、精致的香气仍然很吸引人，具有大量的兰花香气，占据主导地位，混合了百合、灌木丛、香料（丁香、肉豆蔻、白胡椒）、姜、碎石、黑浆果、柿子、苹果皮和栗子蛋糕，以及黑橄榄和黑巧克力的底层深度。口感圆润，味道丰富，给出了丰富的、细腻的中口感，展现出惊人的清新和细致，伴随着出色的酸度线条，所有这些都在一个严肃的、矿物质浸润的结尾中终止，也是平衡和持久的。我很确定，这瓶酒在瓶装后会变得更加spectacular，并且不会有任何问题地存活30-40年。

Western reviews.review: Offers a deep well of dark currant, blackberry paste and plum preserves fruit that needs time to unwind fully, as it’s shrouded in warm earth, tobacco, singed cedar, sweet bay leaf and savory notes. A ramrod of graphite adds to the strident, structured feel. Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot. Best from 2030 through 2050.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒呈现出深度丰富的黑葡萄、黑莓果酱和浆果果酱风味，需要时间来完全展现其风格，因为它被温暖的土壤、烟熏的红木、甜的迷迭香和咸味的风味所包围。图形的坚硬结构使其具有坚硬的结构感。酒款包含卡贝网索维涅、梅洛、卡贝网法兰克和佩蒂特韦多。最佳饮用时间为2030年至2050年。

Western reviews.review: Lovely grilled and graphite notes right off the bat; this is big and muscular, and extremely Pauillac. There is grace here too, with raspberry purée, cassis, fig and blackberry fruits set against charcoal and fine tannins that quickly build up to suggest how well this will age. 1% Petit Verdot completes the blend. 60% new oak used. 13% press wine. Drinking Window 2026 - 2038
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感非常好，入口就能感受到焦糖和石墨的味道，体积大，肌肉丰满，典型的波尔多风格。虽然如此，它也展现出优雅的面貌，黑莓果酱、黑加仑、枣子和黑莓的果味与焦炭和细致的橡木味相互融合，预示着它将会有很好的陈年潜力。酒中还包含了1%的佩蒂·维多特葡萄，60%的新橡木桶，13%的挤压酒。建议饮用时间为2026-2038年。

Western reviews.review: This famous estate at the southern end of Pauillac has produced a powerful wine. Packed blackberry fruits, laced with acidity, are just starting out on a long journey along with the tannins. The wine’s elegance is beautifully preserved within the structure. With considerable potential, the wine should not be drunk before 2027. Cellar Selection
Western reviews.translation: 巴约利克（Pauillac）南端著名庄园的这款红酒具有强大的力量。黑莓果味浓郁，带有酸度，正开始与坚果味一起展开长途跋涉。酒中优雅的风格在结构中得到了完美的保留。酒有很大的潜力，建议在2027年之前不要饮用。 cellar Selection。

Western reviews.review: The 2018 Château Pichon-Longueville Comtesse De Lalande is a monster of a wine with an almost Château Latour-like stature and structure, offering deep, backward, slightly reductive notes of blackcurrants, crushed stone, scorched earth, lead pencil shavings, and tobacco leaf. Based largely on Cabernet Sauvignon mixed with 23% Merlot, 5% Cabernet Franc, and 1% Petit Verdot, it's full-bodied, concentrated, and powerful on the palate, with masses of tannin's, beautiful mid-palate density, and a great finish. As I've commented previously, the up-front, sexy style of the past (due to the larger Merlot content, I believe) has been replaced by a more regal, at times austere profile. Nevertheless, it's still its own wine and very Pichon Longueville Comtesse de Lalande in style. This 2018 is going to need 5-7 years of bottle age and will evolve for 40+ years. Rating : 98+
Western reviews.translation: 2018年夏朗德庄园皮尚-隆维尔-孔特斯德拉拉朗德是一瓶巨大的红酒，拥有几乎与夏朗德庄园拉托尔相似的体型和结构，展现出深邃、逆向、略微有减色的黑currant、碎石、焦土、铅笔削片和烟草叶的香气。以卡波涅-萨万为主，混合了23%梅洛、5%卡波涅-法兰克和1%佩蒂-韦尔多特，口感丰富、浓缩、强劲，具有大量的纽维素、美丽的中口厚度和出色的尾部。正如我之前评论过的那样，过去的前端性感风格（我认为是由于梅洛含量较大）已经被更庄严、有时苍白的风格所取代。然而，它仍然是自己的酒，并且风格独特。这个2018年将需要5-7年的瓶龄才能发挥最佳，预计会演变40年以上。评分：98+。

Western reviews.review: The 2018 Pichon Longueville Comtesse de Lalande is a blend of 71% Cabernet Sauvignon, 23% Merlot, 5% Cabernet Franc and 1% Petit Verdot with a pH of 3.85, an IPT (total polyphenol index) of 87 and 14% alcohol. The grand vin represents 50% of the crop this year. Deep garnet-purple colored, it charges out of the gate with bold scents of baked plums, ripe blackcurrants and wild blueberries, followed by hints of cedar chest, pencil lead, bouquet garni and charcuterie, plus a waft of lilacs. The medium-bodied palate is beautifully crafted with its seamless freshness and firm, grainy tannin's supporting the compelling, finely knit black fruits and savory nuances, finishing on a lingering fragrant-earth note. This will need a good 5 years to come around and should easily cellar for another 30 years or more. Rating : 97+
Western reviews.translation: 2018年皮尚朗维尔公爵夫人拉兰德（Pichon Longueville Comtesse de Lalande）是一款由71%卡波弗雷蒙（Cabernet Sauvignon）、23%梅洛（Merlot）、5%卡波弗雷蒙（Cabernet Franc）和1%佩蒂·韦多（Petit Verdot）组成的红酒，pH值为3.85，总多酚指数（IPT）为87，酒精含量为14%。今年的首酒占了葡萄采收的50%。深红紫色，酒精充满了浓郁的果香，包括烤石榴、成熟黑currant和野蓝莓，随后是cedar胸、铅笔、香草和肉类香气的提示，伴随着一缕紫罗兰的香气。中等体积的口感是精心打造的，具有无缝的新鲜感和坚实的颗粒性纤维，支持着令人着迷的细致黑果和咸味细节，酒尾留下了一种持久的香草气息。这需要5年左右的时间来成熟，应该可以贮存30年以上。评分：97+。

Chinese pairs.original: 2019年份是对高级别车库酒的完美诠释。烘焙和香料气息非常突出，黑胡椒、甘草、孜然的香气让我感觉好像是在品鉴左岸的赤霞珠而不是右岸的美乐。浓郁的口感伴随着舒畅的酸度，单宁丰富而细密，酒体结构中还藏着一股罕见的石灰岩清冽质感。和之前的年份相比，这款酒对风土的诠释更加清晰了。
Chinese pairs.new: 2019年份是对高级别车库酒的完美诠释。烘焙和香料气息非常突出，黑胡椒、甘草、孜然的香气让我感觉好像是在品鉴左岸的赤霞珠而不是右岸的美乐。浓郁的口感伴随着舒畅的酸度，单宁丰富而细密，酒体结构中还藏着一股罕见的石灰岩清冽质感。和之前的年份相比，这款酒对风土的诠释更加清晰了。

English pairs.original: The vintage of 2019 is a perfect textbook of Garage Wine. Both the toasted aromas and spicy notes are very impressive on the nose. Those black pepper, licorice, and cumin aromas will make you feel that you are tasting a left bank’s Cabernet rather than a Merlot from the right bank. The highly concentrated palate is fulfilled with streamlined acidity, rich and refined tannins, and a sense of limestone mineral note on the after taste. Compared with the previous vintages, this wine explains better the concept of Terroir.
English pairs.new: 2019年的这款红酒是Garage Wine的典范。酒鼻中充满了烤香和辣味，非常令人印象深刻。黑胡椒、甘草和大蒜的香气让人感觉就像是在品尝左岸的卡伯涅特（Cabernet）一样，而不是右岸的梅洛（Merlot）。口感浓郁，酸度平衡，纤维柔顺，尾部留有石灰矿的矿物质感。与之前的几年相比，这款酒更好地解释了“土壤特征”（Terroir）的概念。

Western reviews.review: Almost opaque in color, the wine exudes a complex aromatic profile with dark chocolate, tobacco leaf, licorice, smoke, flowers, cherries and plums. Rich, concentrated, full-bodied and deep. The wine has staying power as the finish clocks in at 50 seconds! The endnote delivers a wealth of ripe, sweet fruits, supple, polished tannins and richness with a vibrancy to the fruit that does not want to quit. As I said from the barrel, this could be the best wine yet from Croix de Labrie! The wine is a blend of 97% Merlot and 3% Cabernet Sauvignon. Drink from 2024-2042.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的颜色接近黑色，酒香复杂多样，带有巧克力、烟草、甘草、烟雾、花朵、樱桃和李子等味道。酒体丰富浓郁，口感深厚持久。酒尾持久达50秒，尾韵中充满了成熟甜美的果味，柔顺的纹理和丰富的口感，果味的活力丝毫不减。正如我之前从酒桶中预测的，这可能是克罗伊德拉比酒庄（Croix de Labrie）至今最好的酒款。该酒款是由97%梅洛（Merlot）和3%卡波弗雷（Cabernet Sauvignon）组成的。建议在2024-2042年间饮用。

Western reviews.review: Tiefdunkles Rubingranat, opaker Kern, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung. Mit einem Hauch von kandierten Veilchen floral unterlegte dunkle Waldbeerfrucht, zart rauchige Edelholzwürze, attraktives Bukett. Saftig, elegant, reif Kirschen, feiner Nougat, gut integrierte Tannine, mineralisch und frisch, extraktsüß und lange anhaftend im Abgang, zarter Schokotouch im Nachhall, sicheres Entwicklungspotenzial, schöner Vieilles Vignes-Charakter.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，透明的葡萄核，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。带有糖化紫罗兰花香的黑莓果香，微微的烟熏味和高档木头香气，非常吸引人的香气。口感丰富，优雅，成熟的樱桃，细腻的牛奶糖，完美融合的纤维，矿物质和清新，极度甜和持久的尾部，回味中有微微的巧克力味，发展潜力大，老树葡萄酒的美好风格。

Western reviews.review: Bright and dark viscous purple colour. Ripe and layered nose with blackberry, cassis, mocha, fine spice, discreet oak and some black truffle notes. Very dense and concentrated palate with plenty of stuffing like ample dark fruit, liquorice, truffle and mocha flavours with good oak integration, an abundance of very fine and grainy tannin, there´s a vibrant freshness underneath, stylish and voluminous with a very long and powerful finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深紫红色的，浓稠而有光泽。酒鼻子上充满了黑莓、黑加仑、摩卡、细微的香料、隐约的橡木和一些黑松露的香气。口感丰富浓郁，充满了黑果、甘草、松露和摩卡的味道，橡木的融合非常好，非常细致的纤维质的苦味，酒中有着生动的清新感，风格优雅，体积丰富，酒尾长达数秒，非常持久和强烈。

Western reviews.review: Rares sont les vins qui, comme celui-ci, peuvent prétendre au cercle restreint des vins vecteurs d’émotions. Cela requiert non seulement du talent, des compétences, de la rigueur et un grand terroir, mais aussi une grande écoute, un important souci du détail, une obsession du meilleur et une sensibilité exceptionnelle muent par une passion peu commune. C’est ce qui habite Axelle Courdurié qui élabore ce magnifique vin. La douceur du Merlot s’y exprime autant dans la profondeur de la structure que dans la rondeur du vin. D’une élégance rare pour un vin de cette puissance, il semble empreint d’une extraordinaire sensation d’onctueuse harmonie, d’équilibre suave, de sérénité gourmande et d’une magnifique longueur en bouche, si caractéristique des vins du Château Croix de Labrie. Plus qu’un vin, un instant inoubliable... Oxygéner en carafe 1 heure et servir à 17 °C. Somptueux avec le tournedos Rossini aux champignons, le gigot d’agneau, le filet mignon de veau aux pruneaux, le magret de canard, ou le filet d’autruche.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一个红酒评论，翻译成中文如下：

极少有红酒能像这个一样，能够进入情感的高端圈子。要达到这一点，不仅需要天赋、专业技能、严谨的品质和优质的产区，还需要细致的听觉、对细节的关注、追求完美的执着和异常的敏感性，这些都源于一种罕见的激情。正是这种激情使Axelle Courdurié能够创作出这个美丽的红酒。梅洛的甜美在结构的深度和酒的圆润度中都得到了体现。这种品质在这种强大的酒中是罕见的，似乎充满了异常的滑腻和谐感、平衡的甜感、饱满的口感和美丽的长尾，这些都是Château Croix de Labrie的典型特征。这个红酒不仅仅是一个酒，更是一个难忘的瞬间。氧化1小时后，17°C的温度下饮用。与松露的罗宋牛排、羊腿、牛排、鸭胸或鸵鸟肉一起食用，会带来极大的享受。

Chinese pairs.original: 2017年的Clos Saint Martin香气并不复杂，但却十分精致。樱桃和杨梅的香气特别清晰，完全没有高比例橡木桶发酵（Integral Fermentation ）所留下的痕迹。除此之外，酒庄在2017年份首次使用陶罐陈酿（20-25%左右），从我当天的品鉴来看，除了酒体变得更加平柔之外，收尾时的粉笔灰单宁也显得更加清晰可见。和2017年份一些缺乏集中度的葡萄酒不同，Clos Saint Martin 拥有不逊色大年份的浓郁。和酿酒团队聊完得知，晚采收是Clos Saint Martin 2017 成功的秘诀（冒着灰霉的风险，等到了10月初才开始采收）。
Chinese pairs.new: 2017年的Clos Saint Martin酒香并不复杂，但却十分精致。樱桃和杨梅的香气特别清晰，没有高比例橡木桶发酵的痕迹。酒庄在2017年份首次使用陶罐陈酿（约20-25%），酒体变得更加平柔，收尾时的粉笔灰单宁也显得更加清晰可见。与一些缺乏集中度的葡萄酒不同，Clos Saint Martin拥有不逊色大年份的浓郁。晚采收是Clos Saint Martin 2017 成功的秘诀（冒着灰霉的风险，等到了10月初才开始采收）。

English pairs.original: Clos Saint Martin 2017 may not exhibit a complex bouquet, but it exudes an exquisite charm. The fragrances of cherry and blackberry are remarkably distinct, devoid of any traces of high oak barrel fermentation (Integral Fermentation). Additionally, for the first time in the estate’s history, they employed amphoras for aging (20-25%). According to my tasting, it was evident that aside from rendering the wine’s structure more velvety, this choice accentuated the chalky tannins on the finish, making them more lucid. In contrast to some 2017 vintage wines that lacked concentration, Clos Saint Martin boasts a richness that doesn’t pale in comparison to its grander vintages. After conversing with the winemaking team, it was revealed that late harvest was the key to the success of Clos Saint Martin 2017 (risking gray rot, they began harvesting in early October).
English pairs.new: 克洛圣马丁2017年红酒可能不会展现出复杂的香气，但它却散发着优雅的魅力。樱桃和黑莓的香气清晰可辨，完全没有高级橡木桶发酵的痕迹（整体发酵）。此外，这是克洛圣马丁庄园历史上第一次采用陶器（20-25%）进行陈化。根据我的品尝体验，这个选择不仅使得酒的结构更加细腻，还使得酒尾的石灰质的苦味更加清晰。与一些2017年产季的红酒相比，克洛圣马丁的酒精度确率高，酒的厚度不输于更好的产季。与酒庄的制作团队交谈后，晚收获被认为是克洛圣马丁2017年红酒的成功之道（冒着霉烂的风险，他们从10月初开始收获）。

Western reviews.review: Feinduftig, ausladend, mit Würze und eine wunderbaren Frucht. Der Gaumen ist schlanker als 2018, delikate Frucht, feinkörniges Tannin, in keiner Weise überladen, nein äusserst balanciert und ohne jegliche Grüntöne. Lange und charmant. Ein jetzt schon Verführerischer Wein, wer das im Keller hat, sollte unbedingt eine Flasche anknacken. Bis 2033+
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感丰富，展现出浓郁的果香和微妙的辛香料。口感比2018年更细腻，果香清脆，纤维度细致，绝无过载之感，反而呈现出极佳的平衡，完全没有青涩的味道。酒体长长绵绵，充满魅力。现在就已经是一瓶诱人无比的佳酿，若你有这瓶酒在家，绝不应该错过享用它的机会。建议储存至2033年。

Western reviews.review: Black cherries, licorice, espresso and fudge are the first thing you'll notice. From there, you'll quickly move to the creamy, silky textures, lush, polished tannins and the decadently ripe, dark fruits and espresso-filled finish.
Western reviews.translation: 你会首先感受到黑莓、甘草、咖啡和巧克力味道。随后，你会迅速进入到这款红酒的丰富、细腻的口感中，体验到丰富的、光滑的苦味和浓郁的、成熟的黑果和咖啡的余味。

Chinese pairs.original: 面对2022年高温干旱的挑战，通常早熟的Chateau Calon Segur展现出了出乎意料的沉稳。我在味蕾上感受到了软糯的莓果芬芳，脂粉般的单宁，还有花开富贵的牡丹。尽管与2020年相比，该年份或许缺少一些华丽的画面，收尾时也带着些许温热。然而，其精致的口感仍然给我们展现了如同少女般的温婉与柔情。
Chinese pairs.new: In the face of the 2022 heatwave and drought, the usually precocious Chateau Calon Segur has shown an unexpected sense of maturity. On the palate, I experience a soft, velvety raspberry fragrance, silky tannins, and the opulence of peonies in bloom. Although it may lack some of the 2020's grandeur, this vintage ends with a hint of warmth. Nevertheless, its refined texture still presents a gentle, feminine charm.

English pairs.original: Faced with the challenges of the hot and dry conditions of 2022, the typically early-ripening Chateau Calon Segur demonstrated an unexpected composure. On the palate, I experienced the the mellow charm of ripe berries, the velvety finesse of tannins, and the noble bloom of peonies. Though, compared to the vintage of 2020, this wine might lack a bit of inspiration and the finish carries a hint of warmth. Nevertheless, its delicate mouthfeel continues to evoke an image of gentleness and tenderness.
English pairs.new: 面对2022年的炎热干燥天气，通常早熟的沙隆塞古酒庄展现出意想不到的镇定。口感上，我体验到了成熟的浆果的温和魅力、细腻的橡胶感和牡丹的高贵芬芳。与2020年的产量相比，这款酒可能缺乏一些灵感，尾部带有一丝余热。然而，其细腻的口感仍然让人感受到温柔和温馨的气质。

Western reviews.review: Inky dark in color, the wine pops with crème de cassis, blackberries, smoke, lead pencil, 5 spice, and flowers in the aromatics. The wine explodes with endless waves of cassis, peppery blackberries, Asian spice, espresso, and dark chocolate on the palate. Everything is in place here. The wine coats your teeth, palate, and gums with fruit, and freshness that sings. The seamless finish is made even better with a refreshing hit of chocolate mint at the end. The wine builds, and expands in the finish as it crosses the 60 second mark. The wine blends 70% Cabernet Sauvignon, 24% Merlot, 5% Cabernet franc and 1% Petit Verdot. 15% ABV, 3.8 pH. The harvest took place September 6 - September 27. The is the earliest harvest in the history of the property. Yields were 26 hectoliters per hectare. Only 53% of harvest was placed into the Grand Vin. The wine is aging in 100% new, French oak barrels for 20 months before bottling. Drink from 2028-2060. 97-99 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色深如墨汁，酒香中充满了黑加斯（crème de cassis）、黑莓、烟雾、铅笔、五香和花朵的味道。口感上，酒精爆发出无尽的黑加斯、辣黑莓、亚洲五香、咖啡和黑巧克力的味道。所有的元素都完美地融合在一起。酒精在口腔、舌头和牙齿上留下了果味和清新感。酒精的尾部完美地平滑，没有任何突兀的感觉。酒精的尾部还伴有清新的巧克力薄荷味。酒精在尾部逐渐增强并扩展，直到60秒后。酒精的成分中，卡波涅（Cabernet Sauvignon）占70%，梅洛（Merlot）占24%，卡波弗朗（Cabernet franc）占5%，佩蒂·韦尔多（Petit Verdot）占1%。酒精的酒精度为15%，pH值为3.8。酒庄的收获时间为9月6日至9月27日，这是酒庄历史上最早的收获时间。产量为每公顷26公升。只有53%的收获量被纳入到Grand Vin中。酒精在100%的新法兰克尔橡木桶中陈化20个月后才被装瓶。建议在2028-2060年之间饮用。评分：97-99分。

Western reviews.review: (70% Cabernet Sauvignon, 24% Merlot, 5% Cabernet Franc, 1% Petit Verdot, 15% Alkohol). Tiefgründig, finessenreich, mit grossem aromatischen Potential, klar und rein wie ein Bergbach, mit fast schon einer burgundischen Ausstrahlung. Im Gaumen dicht, konzentriert, ungemein knackige Frucht, die Tannine sind omnipräsent, halten sich dennoch im Hintergrund, der Wein hat Rasse und Präzision, viel Würze und zeigt im Abgang eine aromatische Länge, die seinesgleichen sucht. Hey, keine Angst vor 15% Alkohol, das ist alles super verpackt und ich lege meine Hand ins Feuer, hier schlummert ein grosser Calon Ségur im Fass, der Kraft und Frische mit Eleganz und Charme verbindet. Hervorragend. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 auf Château Calon Ségur) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论，翻译如下：

(70% 卡波内尔·萨万, 24% 梅洛, 5% 卡波内尔·法兰克, 1% Petit Verdot, 15% 酒精度)

深度丰富, 精致细腻, 具有强烈的香气潜力, 清澈纯净如山泉水, 具有近乎勃艮第风格的气质。口感浓密集中, 果味清脆, 丝毫不显腻, 叶绿素味道浓郁, 酸度清晰, 酒体充满活力, 酒尾留有丰富的香气, 果味清晰, 酒体平衡, 酒尾长而持久。

别担心15%的酒精度, 这些酒精都被完美地包裹起来了, 我敢打赌, 这个酒会成为卡隆塞古尔的经典之作, 它将力量和新鲜感与优雅和魅力完美结合。极品! (评分于2023年4月在卡隆塞古尔酒庄) #primeurs22

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby garnet, inky, opaque core, purple reflections, delicate rim brightening. Ripe black forest berries, blackberry confit, some cassis, nougat, subtle noble wood nuances, a hint of candied purple fruit. Very powerful, ripe cherries, vivid, supporting tannins, mineral and lively structure, dark chocolate on the finish, lingers, will benefit from years of maturity.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红宝石色，浓密的紫色核心，透明的边缘，微微发亮。酒中充满了熟透的黑森林莓、黑莓酱、黑currant、白糖杏仁、微妙的高级木质香气和糖浆紫色水果的味道。酒的味道非常强烈，熟透的樱桃味道浓郁，支持性的纤维，矿物质和生动的结构，酒尾有巧克力味，持续时间较长，需要几年的成熟才能发挥最佳效果。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark, virtually opaque black-purple color holds well to a vivid purple rim. The aromas are of restrained dark fruits. The palate has a superbly fresh Cabernet cassis & leafiness that is well integrated with cedar, vanilla & sweet cinnamon notes. Juicy fruit combines with incredibly fine, silky tannins. Alcohol is balanced. Graphite notes & a hint of salinity are overlaid by juicy cassis & black-cherry fruit on the finish. 04/23 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的黑紫色，几乎透明的紫色边缘。酒中有着抑制的黑果香气。口感上，新鲜的卡贝网（Cabernet）黑果和叶子味与松木、香草和甜柑橘味完美融合。果味丰富，细腻的纤维化（tannins）让人印象深刻。酒精平衡。酒尾留有石墨味和微微的咸味，覆盖在丰富的黑果和黑樱桃果味上。评分：04/23（ep）DCAMW。

domaine armand rousseau pere et fils cha.name: domaine armand rousseau pere et fils chambertin 2007

Chinese pairs.original: 就我个人而言，我真的非常欣赏此酒标——让人情不自禁地将其与Chambertin的标志性君王形象联系到了一起。Armand Rousseau是Le Chambertin最大的持有者，拥有4片总计2.15公顷的面东地块。这是一支具有无上平衡感及优雅力度的佳酿，也可以说是对于Le Chambertin最令人惊叹的表达了。此酒宛如万花筒般的多肉但却异常漂亮的香气在杯中华丽绽放，逐一展现白色及黄色花朵、越橘、草莓果冻、枣泥、太妃糖、奶油蛋糕、栗子、香料（桂皮、小茴香）、灌木、咸香、岩石、橙子皮、泥土、皮革和若隐若现的烟草叶。即便口感不如香气那般扣人心弦，但足以令我感到满意了：美妙的层次令人沉醉，同时完美结合了通透感和集中度；轻快的甜美果实滋味充盈着其精细、圆滑而且浓稠的回味，而柔顺得出奇的单宁则构建了这款酒的骨架及庄严的美感。
Chinese pairs.new: Personally, I'm absolutely enamored with this wine label - it's impossible not to associate it with the iconic king-like image of Chambertin. Armand Rousseau is the largest owner of Le Chambertin, with a total of 4 plots covering 2.15 hectares of east-facing land. This is a wine that exudes unparalleled balance and elegance, and is arguably the most stunning expression of Le Chambertin. The bouquet unfurls in the glass like a kaleidoscope of fruit, yet remains stunningly beautiful, revealing white and yellow flowers, yuzu, raspberry sorbet, prune, caramel, butter cake, hazelnut, spices (cinnamon, nutmeg), underbrush, saltiness, rocks, orange peel, earth, leather and a hint of tobacco leaf. While the palate may not be as show-stopping as the nose, it's still satisfying: the beautiful layers are hypnotic, and the perfect balance of transparency and concentration is combined with a light, sweet fruitiness that fills the refined, smooth and dense finish, while the silky tannins build the wine's structure and majestic beauty.

English pairs.original: Personally, I very much admired the label which remind of the emperor that allied to the image of this esteemed grand cru. Armand Rousseau is the largest holder of Le Chambertin, which owns 2.15 hectares of four different parcels that are exposed due east. A wine of supreme equilibrium and refined power--it's arguably the most breathtaking expression of Le Chambertin. The kaleidoscopically fleshy but peculiarly stylish perfume bloomed pleasantly in the glass, with an array of white&yellow flowers, lingonberry, strawberry jelly, jujube paste, toffee, cream cake, chestnut, spices (cinnamon, anise), undergrowth, savoury, stone, orange peel, earth, leather and subtle tobacco leaf. Although the palate was not as thrilling as its nose, but still rather satisfying, offering bewitching layer while it flawlessly combined penetration and concentration; airy, naturally sweet fruit imbued the fine, sleek and dense finish underpinned by unusually supple tannins, forming the backbone and austerity of this wine.
English pairs.new: 个人而言，我非常欣赏这瓶酒的标签，它让人联想到与这瓶尊贵的格兰克鲁相配的皇帝形象。阿曼德·罗素（Armand Rousseau）是莱尚贝尔坦（Le Chambertin）的最大持有者，拥有4个不同地块的2.15公顷土地，全部朝东暴露。这个酒的平衡和精致的力量是无与伦比的，它可能是莱尚贝尔坦最令人惊叹的表达。酒精的香气在玻璃中悄然绽放，展现出白色和黄色花朵、蓝莓、草莓果酱、枣泥、糖浆蛋糕、栗子、香料（丁香、八角）、林地、咸味、石头、橙皮、土壤、皮革和微妙的烟草叶的多彩风景。虽然口感没有鼻子那么令人惊叹，但仍然令人满意，提供了迷人的层次感，同时完美地结合了渗透和浓度；空气中的自然甜味果酱浸润了细致、光滑和密集的尾部，底下支撑着异常柔软的纹理，形成了这瓶酒的骨架和严谨性。

Western reviews.review: This strangely has a clear color, perhaps because the year did not offer much structure. However, this may be intentionally misleading because the aroma fully expresses the cru the grapes came from with significantly intense aromas and an intriguing complexity.
