The mineral component in the bouquet is elegant and the initial foxy note cleans up to become one of fine leather and accompanies those of wild strawberry. The mouthfeel is sumptuous, rich and austere.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色异常清澈，可能是因为当年的葡萄品质不佳。但这可能是故意的，因为酒中的香气完全展现了葡萄来自的葡萄酒产区的特点，具有强烈的香气和迷人的复杂性。酒中的矿物质成分在香气中优雅，最初的浓烈气味消失后变成细致的皮革味，伴随着野生草莓的香气。口感丰富、富有层次，充满了质感。

Western reviews.review: Strong ruby, ochre reflections, subtle brightening on the edge. Herbal-spicy aromas, in the underlay dark berries and ripe cherries, less floral than mineral, develops better with every minute in the glass, then shows red-fruity nuances after ten minutes. Taut and complex on the palate, vivid, well-integrated tannins and acidity, fine salty terroir savouriness, pleasant fruit expression lends depth and length; an elegant, emphatically mineral Grand Cru that is still years away from its first drinking maturity, patience will undoubtedly pay off. (cellar 12/2023 - 2060).
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色，边缘有浅黄色的反射。酒香中有草药和辣味的气息，底层有黑berry和熟透的樱桃的味道，较少有花朵的气息，更多是矿物质的味道。随着时间的推移，酒香会变得更加丰富，十分钟后会有红果味的细微变化。

口感上，这瓶红酒是紧致复杂的，酸度和坚果味的平衡很好，矿物质的风味很明显，果味的表达很舒适，给人一种深度和长度的感觉。这种Grand Cru红酒的风格很优雅，很明显地带有矿物质的味道，需要耐心等待几年才能达到最佳饮用状态。建议将其放入酒窖，2023年12月至2060年。

Chinese pairs.original: 这款酒以华丽丰韵开场，以绵长咸鲜收尾，是一款大开大合而的强劲型美乐混酿。除了在Croix de Labrie中常见的西梅果酱、酒渍樱桃以及桑葚浆果以外，这款酒还在摇杯之后散发出一缕精巧的紫罗兰芳香。7%的赤霞珠和3%的品丽珠能够在香浓的热巧克力中透着一缕清凉感，和薄荷巧克力颇有几分相似。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine opens with a lavish, full-bodied taste, finishing with a long, salty, and fruity note. It's a bold and harmonious blend. In addition to the usual flavors of plum jam, pickled cherries, and blackberry puree found in Croix de Labrie, this wine also releases a subtle hint of lavender after swirling. The 7% Cabernet Sauvignon and 3% Pinot Noir add a refreshing touch to the rich, chocolatey flavors, reminiscent of mint chocolate.

English pairs.original: This wine starts with opulence and finishes with lingering saltiness. It is a grand and magnificent Merlot blend in the world. Besides the ripe dark fruits that I always find in Croix de Labrie, like plum jam, kirsch, and crushed brambleberry, it also delivers a strand of handy violet after swirling the glass. 7% of Cabernet Sauvignon and 3% of Cabernet Franc provide a strand of freshness in the fully concentrated body, like a piece of minty chocolate melting on the palate.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒以奢华开场，余味悠长的咸甜。它是世界上最出色的梅洛系列之一。除了我在克罗伊德拉比（Croix de Labrie）常常发现的成熟黑果，如黑枣酱、柠檬酒和挤压的黑莓，酒中还带有旋转玻璃后释放出的紫罗兰香气。7%的卡伯涅·索瓦宁和3%的卡伯涅·法兰克为酒体的浓度中加入了一丝清新，如在舌尖融化的薄荷巧克力。

Western reviews.review: This wine from Pierre and Axelle Courdurié's small Saint-Émilion estate is a powerful reminder of the richness of the vintage. Its solid tannins and concentrated black fruits are impressive, dark with a structure that needs to age. The wine will take its time, so don't drink before 2025. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 来自皮埃尔和阿克塞尔·库尔迪里（Pierre and Axelle Courdurié）的圣埃米利昂小酒庄的这瓶红酒，是这瓶酒的丰富性质的强有力的证明。它的坚实的苦味和浓缩的黑色水果令人印象深刻，黑暗而且结构坚实，需要时间来成熟。酒会慢慢成熟，所以不要在2025年之前饮用。- 罗杰·沃斯（Roger Voss）

Western reviews.review: Espresso, plum, smoke, incense, black coffee, black cherry and wet earth notes are on the nose and palate. The wine is rich, ripe, lush, full-bodied, round and fruity. The fruits are ripe, sweet, opulent and fresh with real staying power, silky tannins and freshness. The wine is a blend of 90% Merlot, 7% Cabernet Sauvignon and 3% Cabernet Sauvignon. This is the second vintage for Hubert de Bouard as the consultant for Croix de Labrie.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中包含了浓缩咖啡、浓郁的浆果、烟熏味、香料、黑咖啡、黑浆果和潮湿的土壤等元素。口感上同样展现出浓郁、成熟、丰富、圆润和浓郁的果香。酒中的水果成熟、甜美、丰富且新鲜，具有持久的滋味，具有细腻的纤维和清新感。酒中主要由90%的梅洛、7%的卡波内山白葡萄酒和3%的卡波内山红葡萄酒组成。这是Hubert de Bouard担任Croix de Labrie咨询顾问的第二个产季。

Western reviews.review: En Primeur. Kräftiges Rubin. Was für eine schöne Nase, ein zaberhafter Duft, noch leicht vom Holz geprägt, dieses aber von höchster Güte, dahinter viel dunkle Beerenfrucht, reife Himbeeren, Brombeeren, Sommerwiese, Zitronenmelisse. Der Auftakt ist straff, gradlinig und frisch, keinerlei Überextraktion, zarte, feine, saftige Frucht, gepaart mit fein gewobenen Tanninen, die Struktur harmoniert sehr gut mit dem Körper, der Abgang ist würzig, fast schon pfeffrig und lang. Auch dieses Jahr sehr gelungen. 2025-2040 (Verkostet auf Château Ripeau, am 31.3.2019)
Western reviews.translation: 新酒。深红色。酒香非常美丽，浓郁的气味，略带木头味，但木头味非常高级，后面是大量的黑色浆果，熟透的蓝莓，黑莓，夏日草原，柠檬百里香。开头是紧致的，直线的，清新的，没有过度提取，细腻的，细致的，水果味浓郁，搭配细致的纤维，结构与身体非常和谐，尾部是辛辣的，几乎是辣椒味的，长长的。今年也是非常成功的。推荐储存时间：2025-2040（评分于Château Ripeau，2019年3月31日）。

Western reviews.review: Inky dark purple colour. Exuberant nose displaying new oak, toast and mocha paired with ripe unctuous fruit like cassis, black cherry, plum and violet notes. Ample and powerful palate with layers of spicy dark fruit underlined by fine oak notes, plentiful but ripe tannin and a very long dense finish, stylish and polished.
Western reviews.translation: 深紫色酒液。酒香浓郁，新橡木、烤面包和摩卡与浓郁的果香如黑加斯、黑杏、浆果和紫罗兰相融合。口感丰富强烈，层次丰富的辣椒黑果香伴随着细致的橡木味，充足的但成熟的鞣质和极长的浓密尾韵，风格优雅光滑。

Chinese pairs.original: 复杂又微妙的香气，紫罗兰，雪松和黑莓的芬芳，酒体丰满，天鹅绒般的单宁，非常长的回味。
Chinese pairs.new: Complex and nuanced aromas of lavender, pine, and blackberry, full-bodied texture, silky tannins, and a very long finish.

Western reviews.review: Dark, ruby-red in color & deeply pigmented, but not quite opague. Aromas are very ripe, with over-mature, black-fruit & rasin notes. The palate is rich, ripe & heady with soft acidity & high alcohol. Full-bodied with a fine tannic structure. The wine lasts well, but is a wine of power rather than balance. 11/10 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色，浓郁但不完全透明。酒香非常浓郁，带有成熟的黑果和枣子的味道。口感丰富、浓郁、浓厚，酸度柔和，酒精含量高。酒体丰满，口感细腻。虽然酒的持久性不错，但它更注重力量而不是平衡。评分：11/10

Chinese pairs.original: 自从Alfred Tesseron在94年接管了酒庄后，庞特卡奈品质有了大幅的上升。作为一个生物动力法的信徒，Alfred积极的鼓励左岸的其他酒庄采用生物动力法，而07是酒庄使用化学物质的最后一个年份。葡萄园共80公顷，葡萄树的平均树龄约为45年。酒液在木桶和水泥缸内进行发酵；在法国橡木桶和独特的粘土罐（内壁由葡萄园内的石灰石所打造）内陈年。Pontet-Canet是波尔多列级酒庄中产量最大的酒庄之一。混酿比例为70%赤霞珠、25%梅洛、4%品丽珠和1%小维多。我仿佛置身于普罗旺斯的薰衣草花园中，空气里弥漫着非常细腻、芳香的薰衣草及紫罗兰的花香，入口丝滑、细致，并且相当平衡。超赞的一款酒！还可陈放很久。
Chinese pairs.new: 自从Alfred Tesseron接管酒庄后，品质大幅上升。作为生物动力法的信徒，他鼓励左岸其他酒庄采用这种方法，07年是酒庄最后一次使用化学物质。葡萄园面积80公顷，平均树龄45年。酒液在木桶和水泥缸内发酵，陈年于法国橡木桶和独特的粘土罐中。Pontet-Canet是波尔多列级酒庄中产量最大的之一。酒款比例为70%赤霞珠、25%梅洛、4%品丽珠和1%小维多。酒的香气让我想起普罗旺斯的薰衣草花园，细腻、芳香的薰衣草和紫罗兰花香弥漫在空气中。入口丝滑、细致，非常平衡。超赞的一款酒！还可陈放很久。

English pairs.original: Since Alfred Tesseron took over in 1994, this property has continued to improve year after year. As a bio-dynamic believer, Alfred has inspired others on both banks to work more organically as well as consider bio-dynamic farming, 2007 was the last vintage where chemicals were used. On average, the vines are close to 45 years of age in its 80 hectares vineyard. Fermentation takes place in wooden vats and concrete vats; aging in French oak barrels and unique clay jars (the insides are made from the limestone comes from the vineyards). Pontet-Canet has one of the largest productions of any classified growth in the Medoc. A blend of 70% Cabernet Sauvignon, 25% Merlot, 4% Cabernet Franc and 1% Petit Verdot. It painted a picture of Provence's lavender garden, with very delicate and romantically floral fragrances of lavender and violet, silky, refined and balanced on the palate. This awesome stuff still could keep for long time.
English pairs.new: 自1994年阿尔弗雷德·特塞龙（Alfred Tesseron）接管以来，这家酒庄每年都在不断改进。作为生物动力学信徒，阿尔弗雷德鼓励两岸的酒庄采用更加有机的生产方式，并考虑生物动力学种植。2007年是最后一次使用化学品的葡萄酒季节。酒庄的葡萄园总面积约80公顷，平均年龄约45岁。发酵在木桶和混凝土桶中进行，陈酵在法国橡木桶和独特的泥土罐中进行（罐内壁由葡萄园的石灰岩制成）。波内特-卡内（Pontet-Canet）是美多克地区（Medoc）中产量最大的分类酒庄之一。酒庄的葡萄酒以70%卡波弗莱（Cabernet Sauvignon）、25%梅洛（Merlot）、4%卡波弗莱（Cabernet Franc）和1%佩蒂·韦尔多（Petit Verdot）为主。酒庄的葡萄酒呈现出普罗旺斯（Provence）紫罗兰花园的景象，具有非常细致和浪漫的紫罗兰和紫丁香香气，口感 silky、精致和平衡。这瓶葡萄酒可以长时间保存。

Western reviews.review: Medium/full bodied, showing age in its color, the wine has entered its secondary stage, with its tobacco, cassis, forest floor and cherry pipe tobacco aromatics. There is fruit in the finish, which has a bit of rusticity in the finish. Drinking well today, you can age it for a few more years if you like, or pop a cork to check it out 92 Points
Western reviews.translation: 体积中等到中等以上，酒色表明了它的年龄，已经进入了次级阶段，酒中有烟草、黑加仑、森林地板和红樱桃烟草的香气。酒尾有果味，但酒尾有一点原始的味道。酒现在喝得很好，如果你喜欢，可以再存几年，也可以现在就打开瓶子品尝。评分92分。

Western reviews.review: Slowly the potential of this impressive wine is coming out. It is rich, the new wood flavors blending with the ripe blackberry sweetness and tight tannins. Chocolate flavor power through this concentrated wine.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的潜力逐渐显现出来。它富有滋味，新橡木的风味与成熟黑莓的甜味和紧密的苦味相融合。巧克力风味在这瓶浓郁的红酒中展现出强大的力量。

Western reviews.review: Deep red. Crunchy fruit and a spicy touch on the nose. Supple, melted mouthfeel boasting lovely aromatic expression. A very coherent, well-structured, robust effort with the classic liquoricy finish of Cabernet.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色。酒鼻中充满了果酱般的果味和一丝辣味。口感丰富细腻，具有迷人的香气。酒体结构紧致，酒尾典型的黑加拿大风味。

Western reviews.review: Tiefdunkles Rubingranat, jugendliche Reflexe, violetter Rand. In der Nase einladende dunkle Beerenfrucht, zart nach Nougat, zart tabakig-balsamisch. Am Gaumen saftig und frisch, schokoladige Textur, eher mittlerer Körper, gut ausgewogen, gut integrierte Tannine, hat Schliff, Kirschen im Nachhall, zart nach Bitterschokolade im Rückgeschmack.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，年轻的反光，紫色边缘。酒鼻中有诱人的黑色浆果香味，轻微的牛奶糖味，轻微的烟草和乳香味。口感丰富、清新，巧克力质感，中等体积，平衡好，整合的苦味，带有锋利的口感，回味中有樱桃味，回味中有轻微的苦巧克力味。

Western reviews.review: (2008) Plenty of creamy, slightly resinous new oak is a touch raw at present, with tightly-wound black fruit behind. Is it just a touch green too? On the palate the fruit is ripe and expansive, and just the merest olive touch is in there. Racy and refined tannins, and good length.
Western reviews.translation: 2008年：酒中充满了奶油般的、略带树脂味的新橡木味，目前还略带生涩，黑果味紧紧裹在一起。酒中是否带有略带青涩的味道？口感上，果味成熟丰富，仅有微微的橄榄味。酒中有着清脆的、精致的纤维，酒尾长而持久。

chateau pichon longueville comtesse de l.name: chateau pichon longueville comtesse de lalande 2019

Chinese pairs.original: 混酿比例为71%赤霞珠、23%梅洛和6%品丽珠。有别于2020年份（我同时品鉴了2019年份和2020年份），2019年份Pichon Lalande非常讨喜，并且能够在杯中迅速打开，主导此酒香气的是大量的甜美果香和白花香（水仙、百合），打底的则是些许还原味。不如2020年份清澈、高贵、庄严而且陈年能力亦略逊一筹，但却更圆润、易饮。坚实的多汁酸度赋予那紧实、漂亮的轻柔收尾活力。这款质地优雅的美酒适合在接下来的20年内享用。
Chinese pairs.new: 本酒的混酿比例为71%赤霞珠、23%梅洛和6%品丽珠。相比2020年份，2019年份Pichon Lalande更为讨喜，能够迅速打开，杯中充满了甜美的果香和白花香（水仙、百合）。底部则是些许的陈年味。虽然它不如2020年份清澈、高贵和庄严，但它更圆润、易饮。酒中的坚实多汁酸度赋予了紧实、漂亮的轻柔收尾。这种质地优雅的美酒适合在接下来的20年内享用。

English pairs.original: An assemblage of 71% Cabernet Sauvignon, 23% Merlot and 6% Cabernet Franc. Differ from the 2020 (I tasted the 2019 and the 2020 together), the 2019 Pichon Lalande was endearing, and it opened rapidly in the glass, with a large number of sweet fruits and white flowers (narcissus, lily) occupied the nose where the backdrop emitted a hint of reduction. Revealing less lucidness, nobility, solemnity and longevity but more roundness and approachability than the 2020. Solid and succulent acid added the vibrancy to the tense ending that was stylish and feminine. This elegantly textured beauty should be drinkable indeed over the next two decades.
English pairs.new: 本款红酒的组成比例为71%卡波内托（Cabernet Sauvignon）、23%梅洛（Merlot）和6%卡波内托法兰克（Cabernet Franc）。与2020年相比，2019年皮尚拉兰德（Pichon Lalande）更为亲和，酒液在玻璃中迅速开启，鼻子中充满了甜美的水果和白色花朵（ narcissus、lily）的香气，背景中隐约带有轻微的减少感。相比2020年，2019年皮尚拉兰德展现出更圆润、更接近消费者的特点，少了一些清晰度、尊贵感和长久性。酒液中坚实的酸度为紧张的尾部带来了生动的感觉，呈现出时尚和女性化的风格。这款优雅的口感美酒应该在接下来的二十年内都可以品尝。

Western reviews.review:
Crazy aromas of sweet tobacco and black fruit. Tar and lead pencil, too. Blackcurrants and blackberries. Solid core of fruit and ripe tannins here. It’s full-bodied and chewy. Extremely long. Fascinating wine. Structure with elegance. Extremely creamy and very, very melted together. A classically proportioned wine. 71% cabernet sauvignon, 23% merlot, and 6% cabernet franc.
Barrel Sample: 98-99
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的芳香令人疯狂，带有甜 Tobacco 和黑果的味道。还可以闻到焦油和铅笔的味道，黑currants 和黑berries 的味道也很浓郁。果实的核心坚实，苦味也很成熟。酒体丰富，口感厚重。酒尾极长。这个酒非常有趣，结构优雅。口感极其丰富，非常顺滑。酒的比例非常典型。酒中含有 71% 的卡波涅尔·沙维尼翁，23% 的梅洛，6% 的卡波涅尔·法兰克。 

酒样：98-99分。

Western reviews.review: Pure class, the 2019 Château Pichon-Longueville Comtesse De Lalande is another brilliant wine from director Nicolas Glumineau that checks in at the top of the vintage. A blend of 71% Cabernet Sauvignon, 23% Merlot, and 6% Cabernet Franc that was harvested from mid-September through October 8th. Brought up in roughly 60% new French oak, it hit 14.1% natural alcohol with a pH of 3.7. More elegant and poised from bottle than barrel, it offers a brilliant perfume of crème de cassis, lead pencil shavings, tobacco leaf, damp earth, and graphite. Deep, full-bodied, and pure perfection on the palate, it has this incredible marriage of Latour-like stature and regalness buffered by wonderful, sexy, seamless fruit, which no doubt comes from the higher Merlot content and makes Comtesse de Lalande so singular and unique. It builds slowly with time in the glass and has remarkable purity of fruit, ultra-fine tannins, perfect balance, and a finish that just begs you to pour another glass. Best After 2029
Western reviews.translation: 2019年夏布勒罗什-朗日维尔公爵夫人拉拉朗德庄园的红酒是一瓶纯粹的精品。酒庄的总监尼古拉斯·格鲁米诺(Nicolas Glumineau)再次推出了一瓶来自该年份的顶级佳酿。该酒的组成比例为71%卡波弗列诺(Cabernet Sauvignon)、23%梅洛(Merlot)和6%卡波弗列诺法兰克(Cabernet Franc)，采摘时间从9月中旬到10月8日。该酒在大约60%的新法兰克新橡木桶中陈酿，酒精含量为14.1%，pH值为3.7。与酒桶相比，瓶装的酒更为优雅和稳重，酒香中充满了黑加仑浆果、铅笔削片、烟草叶、潮湿土壤和石墨的芬芳。口感深厚、饱满，酒体纯粹完美，酒中有着拉图尔(Latour)般的气势和尊严，但又被丰富的、性感的、无缝的果肉所缓解，这无疑是由于梅洛的比例较高而使得拉拉朗德庄园的酒独特和特殊。酒在玻璃中缓慢积累，酒中有着极高的果肉纯度、极细的纹理、完美的平衡和一口气就让你忍不住要再倒一杯的酒尾。建议在2029年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: A serious, muscled Pichon Comtesse that grabs you from the first nose. The width and texture is evident, feeling both more plush and supple in its fruit character. It's elegant and balanced but packed full of textured raspberries, blueberries and cassis, juicy, with a rise on the finish and clear tannic grip. Very Pauillac in style, more so than the 2018 with great length. Not as structured as the 2016 or the 2010 but not far off and this is easily one of the wines of the vintage. Its heft shares some similarities to its neighbour Latour, which is not always the case in this most feminine of Pauillac wines. Closes down pretty quickly on the finish, suggesting the initial rich fruit is a hint of what is to come but that it will take its time to show itself in bottle. Tasted twice, four weeks apart and it delivered both times. No Petit Verdot in this vintage. Barrel Sample: 98
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶严肃的、肌肉丰满的皮尚公爵酒庄（Pichon Comtesse），从第一口气就能感受到它的宽广和质感。酒中的果味丰富、柔软，具有典型的皮尚风格。酒中充满了有质感的红莓、蓝莓和黑加仑的味道，口感丰富、果味浓郁，尾部有明显的干酪感和清晰的纤维感。酒的风格非常典型的巴约克（Pauillac），比2018年更为典型。酒的结构不如2016年或2010年，但也没有太大差距，这是一瓶当年酒庄的精品酒。酒的重量与邻近的拉图尔酒庄（Latour）有相似之处，这在皮尚公爵酒庄中并不常见。酒尾部迅速收敛，表明酒中的初期丰富果味只是酒中未来的一个预告，酒会在瓶中慢慢展现。酒庄在本年没有使用佩蒂·维多（Petit Verdot）。酒样评分：98分。

Western reviews.review: One of the wines of the vintage, the 2019 Pichon Longueville Comtesse de Lalande soars from the glass with complex aromas of wild berries, tobacco leaf, loamy soil, burning embers and hints of violets and rose petals. Full-bodied, deep and complete, it’s velvety and seamless, with a broad attack and a multidimensional core of lively, succulent fruit. Concluding with a long, expansive finish, it’s a remarkable young Pauillac that will offer many years of thrilling drinking. Congratulations to Nicolas Glumineau and his team, who are ushering in a new golden age at an address where standards were always very high. Best After 2027
Western reviews.translation: 2019年皮尚隆维尔孔特斯德拉兰德（Pichon Longueville Comtesse de Lalande）是当年的一款顶级红酒，酒香复杂多样，带有野生莓果、烟草叶、土壤、燃烧的炭火和紫罗兰和玫瑰花瓣的微妙气息。酒体丰富、深厚、完美，滑顺无缝，入口宽广，核心丰富多彩的活力果味。酒尾长达数秒，展现出令人惊叹的完美结尾。这是一款出色的年轻巴约讷酒，会带给消费者多年的惊喜体验。恭喜尼古拉斯·格吕米诺（Nicolas Glumineau）和他的团队，他们带领着皮尚隆维尔进入了一个新的黄金时代，一个标准一直很高的酒庄。建议在2027年后饮用。

Western reviews.review:
This is a stylish wine that offers rich, smoky tannins and layers of black currant fruits. The tannins are dominant at this stage of barrel aging but the intense fruits are intent on pushing forward. The beautiful aftertaste is all freshness as well as density. It's for long-term aging.
 Barrel Sample: 96-98
Western reviews.translation:
这是一个时尚的红酒，呈现出丰富的烟熏质感和黑加仑果实的多层次。目前，酒中的烟熏质感占据主导地位，但强烈的果实仍在努力突破。美妙的余味既有清新感又有厚重感。这瓶酒适合长期陈酿。

酒桶样品：96-98

Chinese pairs.original: 在酒庄与Lilian Barton Sartorius一同品鉴。实际上，现在只有极少数波尔多左岸列级酒庄的庄主像Lilian那样还在亲自酿酒。赤霞珠占据了2016年份混酿中的86%，剩余的全是梅洛。此酒壮丽的香气展现清晰、高贵的红花、糖渍树莓、蔓越莓、黑莓和甜香料（肉桂、甘草）芬芳，夹杂岩石、薄荷脑、可丽露和些许黑巧克力味。香气和口感的底部隐藏着细微的绵密感。强劲有力但细腻、圆滑的单宁在庄严、通透的矿物质映衬下十分夺目，并且造就了在其深邃得恰到好处同时富有高酸度的活泼、多肉回味中达到顶点的紧实感和张力。这是一款个性十足且陈年能力绝佳的美酒。
Chinese pairs.new: 在酒庄与Lilian Barton Sartorius一同品鉴。实际上，现在只有极少数波尔多左岸列级酒庄的庄主像Lilian那样还在亲自酿酒。赤霞珠占据了2016年份混酿中的86%，剩余的全是梅洛。此酒的香气壮丽，展现清晰、高贵的红花、糖渍树莓、蔓越莓、黑莓和甜香料（肉桂、甘草）芬芳，夹杂岩石、薄荷脑、可丽露和些许黑巧克力味。香气和口感的底部隐藏着细微的绵密感。强劲有力但细腻、圆滑的单宁在庄严、通透的矿物质映衬下十分夺目，并且造就了在其深邃得恰到好处同时富有高酸度的活泼、多肉回味中达到顶点的紧实感和张力。这是一款个性十足且陈年能力绝佳的美酒。

English pairs.original: Tasted with Lilian Barton Sartorius at the winery. In fact, nowadays only a few owners of the Grands Crus Classes in left bank like Lilian still make wines themselves. Cabernet Sauvignon accounts for 86% in the amalgamation of the 2016, and the rest is Merlot. The nose provided a splendid spectacle, evincing precise and noble aromatics of red flowers, candied raspberry, cranberry, blackberry and sweet spices (cinnamon, liquorice) interlarded with stone, menthol, canele and a smidgen of black chocolate. There was imperceptible density shrouded in the backdrop of both scent and mouthfeel. Mighty yet detailed and suave tannin stood out against the austere and bright minerality, leading to the conspicuous compactness and tension that culminated in a fleshy and acidic aftertaste that presented stupendous vibrancy and decent depth. It offered plenty of character in a patently age-worthy package.
English pairs.new: 在酒庄与Lilian Barton Sartorius一起品尝了这瓶红酒。事实上，目前只有极少数左岸的格兰克鲁斯级别的酒庄主人仍然亲自酿造酒，如Lilian Barton Sartorius。2016年的酒中，卡波涅尔·萨维尼格占了86%，其余是梅洛。酒鼻子呈现出精致而高贵的花香，包括红色花朵、糖化莓果、蔓越莓、黑莓和甜香料（丁香、甘草）等，伴有石头、薄荷、康乃馨和少量黑巧克力。酒体中隐含着细致的密度，酒口和口感都有所体现。酒中的坚果味和矿物质味相互呼应，形成了紧张而有层次感的口感，酒尾呈现出丰富的酸度和深度。酒呈现出明显的个性，酒庄的酿造水平令人印象深刻。

Western reviews.review: Terrific intensity of dark berries, almost peppery blackcurrants and violets with attractive and integrated, spicy oak and an earthy edge. The palate has a super powerful and long, linear core with plenty of fruit flesh strapped in tight for a long and thrilling ride into the finish. A blend of 86 per cent cabernet and 14 per cent merlot. Try from 2024.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的强度非常出色，带有浓郁的黑berries、几乎有辣椒般的黑currants和迷人的紫罗兰花香，配上有吸引力的、融合的、带有辣味的橡木和泥土味。口感强烈、线性、持久，充满了丰富的果肉，紧紧地被束缚在一起，带来一场长达终点的刺激之旅。酒中含有86%的卡波网和14%的美丽。建议从2024年开始品尝。

Western reviews.review: This is so vivid as it brims with pastis-soaked plum, blackberry, black currant and blueberry paste flavors, all carried by a perfectly integrated brambly spine. Tar and ganache notes give the finish an extra kick while everything stays within the mouthwatering roasted apple wood frame. Both regal and rambunctious, this is St.-Julien to a T. Best from 2025 through 2040.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的味道非常鲜明，充满了浸泡在白兰地中的李子、黑莓、黑加仑和蓝莓酱的风味，所有的风味都被一根完美融合的荆棘状脊柱所带动。焦炭和甘油的味道在尾部给了它额外的冲击力，而所有的味道都在烤苹果木的味道中保持着口水流淌的感觉。这款红酒既是尊贵的又是狂野的，这是圣朱利安的典型代表。建议在2025年至2040年之间饮用。

Western reviews.review: A brilliant young wine, the 2016 Léoville Barton unwinds in the glass with aromas of cassis, dark berries and cigar box mingled with subtle hints of loamy soil. Medium to full-bodied, deep and concentrated, it's seamless and exquisitely balanced, with beautifully refined tannins, bright acids and a long, penetrating finish. Its structural refinement is such that it's far from forbidding to open right now, yet patience will be richly rewarded.
Western reviews.translation: 一款出色的年轻红酒，2016年莱奥维尔巴顿在玻璃中释放出黑加斯、黑莓和雪茄盒的芳香，伴随着细微的土壤气息。中等到中等以上的体积，深度和浓度均衡，具有细致的纤维、明亮的酸度和长长的深入的尾部。其结构的精致使得它不需要等待即可打开，但耐心会带来丰厚的回报。

Western reviews.review:
The Barton family’s flagship wine benefits hugely from the age of the vines. This wine is ripe and concentrated, rich in tannins but with the wonderful black fruits that can be conjured from this vineyard. It will age well and is likely to be ready to drink from 2026.

Cellar Selection
Western reviews.translation:
巴顿家族的旗舰酒受到了老 vines 的益处。这瓶酒成熟且浓缩，富含天然的苦味物质，但也带有来自这片葡萄园的美味黑色水果。酒会在陈化过程中得到改善，并且预计从2026年开始就可以饮用。

陈列酒。

Western reviews.review:
Deep purple-colored and a classic Saint-Julien with its pure crème de cassis, graphite, liquid rock, and essence of lead pencil shavings, the 2016 Château Léoville Barton is full-bodied, concentrated, and backward, with bright acidity and ripe yet certainly present and building tannins. This old-school, classic Léoville Barton has a fine thread of acidity keeping the wine focused and fresh. It’s a beauty, but mostly potential at this point, although it does have beautiful fruit. Savvy readers will hide bottles at the back of their cellar, and I wouldn’t start to think about opening bottles for a least a decade. It’s going to be incredibly long-lived. The blend of the 2016 is 86% Cabernet Sauvignon and 14% Merlot, brought up in 60% new French oak.

Rating: 96+
Western reviews.translation:
2016年沙特奥莱维尔巴顿（Château Léoville Barton）是一款典型的圣朱利安（Saint-Julien）红酒，呈现深紫色，具有纯正的黑currant（黑樱桃）风味、石墨、液态岩石和铅笔削片的香气。这种酒体积大、浓缩、保守，具有明亮的酸度和成熟但仍在增长的坚果味。这种老派的沙特奥莱维尔巴顿酒具有细致的酸度，保持酒的焦点和新鲜感。虽然它是一款美酒，但目前它的潜力更大。酒中有美丽的果味。有经验的读者会将酒瓶放置在酒窖的后面，至少要等待十年才能开始考虑打开瓶子。这种酒将会非常持久。2016年的酒款中，卡波弗雷（Cabernet Sauvignon）占86%，梅洛（Merlot）占14%，使用60%的新法兰克酒桶进行陈化。

评分：96+

Chinese pairs.original: Canon La Gaffeliere 2019 丰满柔美而又和蔼可亲的性格很讨人欢喜。淡淡的草本植物和兰花幽香仿佛给酒插上了翅膀，让鲜甜成熟的莓果芳香变得轻巧修长。无论是绵柔的结构还是丝滑的单宁，每一个细节都透着迷人的微笑。不但可以年轻时饮用，也可以长时间窖藏。是一款能够让消费者和专业酒评人都拍手叫好的圣埃美隆佳酿。
Chinese pairs.new: The Canon La Gaffeliere 2019 boasts a charming and approachable personality. Delicate herbal and floral notes give the wine a lift, making its ripe and luscious fruit flavors feel light and elegant. Whether it's the wine's silky texture or its refined tannins, every detail is infused with a captivating smile. Enjoyable now, it also has the potential to age beautifully, making it a Saint-Émilion that will delight both consumers and critics alike.

English pairs.original: Canon La Gaffeliere 2019 is likably full-bodied, feminine and amiable. The faint aroma of herbal notes and orchids seems to enable the wine to fly, allowing the sweet and ripe berry aroma light and slender. No matter it’s the supple structure or the silky tannins, every detail is permeated with a charming smile. It can be drunk at youth as well as after aging. It is an excellent Saint-Emilion that can be applauded by both the consumers and professional wine critics alike.
English pairs.new: 康诺 La Gaffeliere 2019 的口感丰富、女性化、温和。酒中微微的草本香和兰花香让酒体轻盈飞扬，甜美的浓郁果香也变得轻盈细致。无论是柔软的结构还是细腻的橡皮质，所有细节都被温和的笑容所包围。它既可以在年轻时饮用，也可以在陈化后享用。它是一款出色的圣埃米利翁葡萄酒，既能让消费者喜爱，也能得到专业酒评人的赞誉。

Western reviews.review: Aromas of dark plums, blueberries, bark, dried leaves, mahogany, licorice and nutmeg. It’s medium-to full-bodied with silky, ripe tannins. Layered and supple with a stylish and polished finish. Voluptuous. One of the best in a long time.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中包含着黑浆果、蓝berries、树皮、干叶、红木、甘草和肉豆蔻的味道。口感中等到中厚，具有细滑的成熟橡胶质。层次丰富，柔软的口感，优雅的完美结尾。丰富的口感。很久没有品尝过这样好的红酒了。

Western reviews.review: The 2019 Château Canon-La-Gaffelière is another brilliantly perfumed wine in the vintage that shines for its complexity, finesse, and nuances. Giving up awesome notes of red and black currants, tobacco, exotic flowers, cedarwood, and loamy earth, it hits the palate with medium to full-bodied richness, beautifully polished, integrated tannins, no hard edges, and a great, great finish. This is serious juice that warrants at least 4-5 years of bottle age and will evolve for 30 to 40 years. Best after 2026.
Western reviews.translation: 2019年夏多尔-卡诺-拉-加费里埃（Château Canon-La-Gaffelière）是这瓶红酒的另一个精彩的香气，表现出其复杂性、细腻和微妙。它释放出红和黑葡萄的精美香气、烟草、异国花卉、松木和泥土的香气，口感丰富中等到中等以上，口感细腻光滑，纤维柔顺，没有硬边，尾部长达数秒。这种酒非常值得珍藏，需要至少4-5年陈化，预计会在30-40年内逐渐成熟。建议2026年后品尝。

Western reviews.review: The 2019 Canon la Gaffelière has turned out brilliantly, bursting from the glass with a dramatic bouquet of wild berries, blood orange, exotic spices, rose petals, violets and burning embers. Full-bodied, ample and layered, it's supple and perfumed, with a deep core of lively fruit, melting tannins and a long, saline finish. This contains the highest proportion of Cabernet Franc of any of Stephan Von Neipperg's wines, which no doubt helps to account for its singular personality. Best after 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 2019年佳芳利红酒表现出色，酒瓶中释放出一阵阵野生莓果、血橙、异国风味香料、玫瑰花瓣、紫罗兰和熊熊燃烧的烈焰的香气。酒体丰富、充满层次、柔软、芬芳，深层果实核心、融化的纽带和长长的盐味尾韵。这瓶酒中含有史蒂芬·冯·内普佩尔格（Stephan Von Neipperg）所有葡萄酒中含有最多的法兰克葡萄，毫无疑问，这也使得它具有独特的个性。建议在2025年后品尝。

Western reviews.review: I love the balance on display here, of powerful and softly whispering fruits, a tightrope of acidity and tannins giving structure. Great stuff, with the impact of 2018 but more freshness, although still with the signature glamour of a Neipperg wine in full flight.Barrel Sample: 95
Western reviews.translation: 我非常喜欢这瓶红酒的平衡，强劲的水果和柔和的水果完美结合，酸度和纤维素的紧张感给了酒精结构。非常出色，带有2018年的冲击感，但更有新鲜感，尽管仍然保留了Neipperg酒的典型魅力。酒评：95分

Western reviews.review: Pepper, bay and roasted tobacco notes give this a distinct persona out of the gate, while sous bois and mulled plum, black currant and black cherry fruit flavors fill in behind. Singed juniper and alder hints add form through the finish. Serious kudos for its range and character, but may be a touch too old school for some folks. Merlot, Cabernet Franc and Cabernet Sauvignon. Best from 2024.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有独特的个性，开头就有了辣椒、樟叶和烤烟的味道，之后是林地和浓缩的梅子、黑加仑和黑樱桃的果味。酒尾有烧焦的松树和白桦的味道，给了酒以结构和形状。值得称赞的是它的多样性和个性，但可能有些人会觉得它太过传统。酒中含有梅洛、卡伯涅 Franc和卡伯涅 Sauvignon。建议2024年后再饮。

Chinese pairs.original: 能够把圣爱美隆坡地的风土特性用清风拂面的方式表达出来，放眼整个产区唯有Chateau Canon La Gaffeliere 能够做到。喜欢清雅型葡萄酒的朋友一定会对它清甜爽朗的口感着迷：汁水饱满的同时还带着满满的清脆感。16个月的耐心陈酿赋予了这款酒高质量的粉状单宁，伴随着收尾时的几缕花香和一抹清苦，整个品鉴体验渐入高潮…
Chinese pairs.new: This Chateau Canon La Gaffeliere perfectly captures the essence of Saint-Émilion's terroir, with a refreshing and elegant style that sets it apart from the rest of the region. Fans of crisp and refined wines will adore its sweet and lively taste, with a full-bodied texture and a crisp finish. The 16-month aging process has imbued this wine with high-quality, powdery tannins, complemented by subtle floral notes and a hint of bitterness that culminates in a truly unforgettable tasting experience.

English pairs.original: In this appellation, only Chateau Canon La Gaffeliere can express the terroir of the Saint-Emilion slopes in such a gentle way. Friends who are into elegant wine will definitely be fascinated by its fresh, sweet, and bright palate: juicy and full of crispness. 16 months of patient bottle aging gives this wine high-quality powdery tannins. Accompanied by whiffs of floral fragrance and a touch of beautiful bitterness, the whole tasting experience gradually reaches its climax…
English pairs.new: 在圣埃米利昂山坡的产区中，只有佳堡加法利埃（Chateau Canon La Gaffeliere）能够以如此温和的方式展现出圣埃米利昂的风土特征。对精致葡萄酒的朋友来说，这款酒的新鲜、甜美和明亮的口感一定会让他们深深着迷：果酱般的口感充满清脆感。经过16个月的耐心陈酿，这款酒获得了高质量的粉末状苦味。伴随着花香的微妙气息和美丽的苦味的点缀，这整个品酒体验逐渐达到高潮……

Western reviews.review: Quite possibly the finest vintage of this cuvée I've tasted, the 2020 Château Canon-La-Gaffelière offers that rare mix of richness and elegance that makes this vintage so compelling. Classic notes of cassis, ripe black cherries, spring flowers, and truffly earth define the aromatics, and it's full-bodied and perfectly balanced, with beautiful tannins and a great finish. This is another stunningly good Saint-Emilion that will benefit from 4-6 years of bottle age and have 2-3 decades of overall longevity.
Western reviews.translation: 2020年佳堡加费利埃（Château Canon-La-Gaffelière）可能是该系列中最出色的年份之一。它完美地结合了丰富和优雅的特质，使得这一年份如此令人着迷。酒中的典型香气包括黑加仑、熟黑樱桃、春花和土壤的香气。酒体丰富，平衡完美，口感柔和，尾部长达数秒。这种优质圣埃米利翁酒需要4-6年的瓶龄才能发挥最佳效果，并且可以享受20-30年的长久美味。

Western reviews.review: The 2020 Canon La Gaffelière is heady, sumptuous and totally exotic. A wine of depth and striking intensity, the 2020 possesses tremendous balance right out of the gate. Ripe red plum, blood orange, pomegranate, spice and leather all meld together effortlessly. There's real presence and depth here. Time in the glass brings out the purity of the flavors. The blend is 55% Merlot, 30% Cabernet Franc and 15% Cabernet Sauvignon. I can't wait to see how it ages. –Antonio Galloni
Western reviews.translation: 2020年佳福利埃尔（Canon La Gaffelière）是一款浓郁、丰富且极具异国情调的红酒。它深度丰富、强烈的味道，初次接触就能感受到完美的平衡。酒中融合了成熟的红樱桃、血橙、石榴、香料和皮革等元素，呈现出极高的层次感。随着时间的流逝，酒中的纯度和味道会变得更加清晰。酒的搭配比例为55%梅洛、30%卡波弗朗克和15%卡波弗朗克。等待着它的成熟过程。 –安东尼奥·加隆尼（Antonio Galloni）

Western reviews.review: Such clarity to this with redcurrants, stems, fresh herbs, blackcurrants, and cherries on the nose. Medium to full body. Very tight, fine tannins. It builds nicely and has excellent length. Class and reality here.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气清晰明了，带有红葡萄、葡萄枝、新鲜香草、黑葡萄和樱桃的味道。口感中等到中厚。口感紧致，纤维细腻。酒体逐渐展开，持久度出色。整体气质优雅，真实感强烈。

Western reviews.review:
A richly structured wine, this shows great density. The blackberry flavors, layered with impressive tannins, are expressively ripe and promise considerable aging.
Barrel Sample: 94-96
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒结构丰富，呈现出极高的密度。黑莓的风味层次丰富，搭配着令人印象深刻的苦味，成熟度高且有很大潜力可长期陈化。

Western reviews.review: Ripe, fresh and expressive, with beautiful mulberry, boysenberry and blackberry puree notes that work well with light sanguine, black tea and singed apple wood details throughout. Merlot, Cabernet Franc and Cabernet Sauvignon. Best from 2029 through 2040.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感丰富、清新、生动，具有美丽的黑杏、蓝莓和黑莓果酱香气，配以轻微的红葡萄酒、黑茶和焦炭苹果木细节。酒中含有梅洛、卡贝尔法兰克和卡贝尔萨维尼格。建议在2029年至2040年之间饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有肉汁、黑覆盆子，巧克力，意大利浓咖啡的香气，并带有些许松露油和烟熏的气息。酒体饱满，单宁甜美，酒质完美无瑕，并独具复杂感。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich aromas of beef broth, blackberry, chocolate, and Italian espresso, with subtle hints of truffle oil and smokiness. Full-bodied with sweet tannins, this wine is flawless and complex.

Western reviews.review: Dark in color, almost purple black, with pure tapenade and hints of ripe plum and berry. Full-bodied, with layer upon layer of velvety tannins and chocolate, berry, vanilla and tea flavors. Lasts for minutes. I am blown away by this wine. This has been amazing since the moment I tasted it from barrel. Reminds me of the superb 1950. Best after 2015.
Western reviews.translation: 颜色深暗，接近紫黑色，带有纯粹的橄榄酱和成熟的浆果和黑berries的味道。酒体丰富，层次丰富的细腻橡胶和巧克力、浆果、香草和茶的味道。酒香持续数分钟。 我被这个酒震撼了。自从从酒桶中品尝它以来，这个酒就一直惊人。让我想起了1950年的超级酒。建议在2015年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: L’Evangile’s sublime 2005, a blend of 85% Merlot and 15% Cabernet Franc, is the first wine made in their brand new cuverie. Sadly, there are fewer than 3,500 cases of this deep purple-colored offering. A gorgeous nose of meat juices, black raspberries, chocolate, espresso, and notions of truffle oil as well as smoke is followed by a full-bodied Pomerol displaying sweet tannin, a flawless texture, and stunning complexity. While surprisingly showy and forward for a l’Evangile, it will undoubtedly shut down over the next year or so. Anticipated maturity: 2012-2030.
Western reviews.translation: 莱万吉尔的2005年佳酿，是由85%梅洛和15%卡波弗朗克混合而成的。它是莱万吉尔新酿酒厂的第一瓶酒。遗憾的是，这瓶深紫色的佳酿仅有不到3500瓶。它的香气优美，带有肉汁、黑莓、巧克力、咖啡、烟熏和松露油的味道。它是一瓶体积丰富的波美罗酒，具有甜润的牙齿、完美的质地和惊人的复杂性。虽然它的风格比莱万吉尔的其他酒精品质要明显，但它将在未来一两年内逐渐闭合。预计成熟年份：2012-2030。

Le Vieux Donjon Chateauneuf du Pape 2009.name: Le Vieux Donjon Chateauneuf du Pape 2009

Chinese pairs.original: 樱桃、黑加仑、黑莓、熏肉、橙花、胡椒、可可、烟熏等气息，口感新鲜圆润，酒体复杂，结构感好，回味较长。
Chinese pairs.new: Notes of cherry, blackcurrant, blackberry, smoked bacon, orange blossom, pepper, cocoa, and smokiness. Fresh and rounded texture, complex body, good structure, and a long finish.

Western reviews.review: Surprisingly forward and open, as the wine is often late in offering pleasure, the combination of kirsch, black raspberry, pepper and garrigue scents paired with luscious, ripe, sweet, peppery, fruits made this quite nice indeed. 92 Points
Western reviews.translation: 令人惊讶的是，这款红酒在通常较晚呈现乐趣的同时，展现出前卫开朗的风格。酒中融合了柠檬柑、黑莓、胡椒和灌木草的香气，与丰富、成熟、甜美、带有胡椒味的果实相结合，呈现出非常不错的口感。评分：92分。

Chinese pairs.original: 酒庄的理念正逐步向自然派风格靠拢：继有机认证后又进一步取得了生物动力法认证；硫的使用极其有限，仅在装瓶前添加微量的硫；陈酿容器包含了数个陶罐以及一个水泥罐和一个蛋形水泥罐，以增强原始的果味。这是我第二次在酒庄进行垂直品鉴。梅洛在此年份的混酿中占86%，剩余的则是品丽珠。我在上一次拜访酒庄时和Alain Moueix一起桶边试饮了2019年份Fonroque，当时我就已经能感受到这是款非同小可的佳酿了。略显含蓄但新鲜、活泼的香气在杯中展开，主要是红花、树莓为主的红色水果和草药的芬芳。这支迷人的美酒无疑能够使绝大多数饮家满意，不出意料，具有令人兴奋不已的清澈感及绝佳的质地和结构。多矿物的细腻中段口感充满刺激性的漂亮酸度——强化了 缎子似的多汁收尾处的清新感。如果保存良好的话，此酒可以轻松陈年至少30年。
Chinese pairs.new:
酒庄的理念正逐步向自然派风格靠拢：继有机认证后又进一步取得了生物动力法认证；硫的使用极其有限，仅在装瓶前添加微量的硫；陈酿容器包含了数个陶罐以及一个水泥罐和一个蛋形水泥罐，以增强原始的果味。这是我第二次在酒庄进行垂直品鉴。梅洛在此年份的混酿中占86%，剩余的则是品丽珠。

我在上一次拜访酒庄时和Alain Moueix一起桶边试饮了2019年份Fonroque，当时我就已经能感受到这是款非同小可的佳酿了。略显含蓄但新鲜、活泼的香气在杯中展开，主要是红花、树莓为主的红色水果和草药的芬芳。这支迷人的美酒无疑能够使绝大多数饮家满意，不出意料，具有令人兴奋不已的清澈感及绝佳的质地和结构。

多矿物的细腻中段口感充满刺激性的漂亮酸度——强化了缎子似的多汁收尾处的清新感。如果保存良好的话，此酒可以轻松陈年至少30年。

English pairs.original: The philosophy of the estate is moving toward a more and more naturalism style: now being certified bio-dynamic as the next step of being certified organic; the restriction of the using of sulphur--tiny sulphur is only added before the bottling; the maturation includes a couple of ceramics alongside with a concrete tank and an egg concrete in order to increase the pristine fruitiness. The second time for me to do a vertical tasting at the winery. 86% Merlot and the rest is Cabernet Franc. I have known the 2019 Fonroque was something when I tasted it in the barrels with Alain Moueix during my last visit to the chateau. Unfurling in the glass with a somewhat restrained yet fresh and lively aroma that was dominated by red flowers, raspberry-like red fruits and herb. Not surprisingly, this enthralling beauty showed thrilling precision and clarity as well as superb architecture, which should pretty much satisfy every drinker. Exquisite on the mineral-laced mid-palate that was packed with pungent while stylish acidity that amplified the refreshment on the satiny end where the keystone was the agreeable juiciness. Well-cellared bottles would easily see out 30 years at a minimum.
English pairs.new:
这是一篇关于红酒评论的文章。以下是翻译成中文：

这家酒庄的理念正在逐渐转向自然主义风格：现在已经获得了生物动力学认证，这是获得有机认证的下一步；在使用硫黄方面施加限制——只有在装瓶之前才会添加极少量的硫黄；成熟过程包括陶瓷和混凝土罐，以及一个特殊的蛋形混凝土罐，以增加原始的果味。第二次在酒庄进行垂直品鉴。酒中含有86%的梅洛和剩余部分是卡波弗朗克。去年我在酒庄品尝了2019年福诺克酒时，就知道它是一瓶什么样的酒。酒在玻璃中展开，具有某种程度的克制，但却是新鲜活泼的香气，主要是红花、红果和草药的味道。毫不奇怪，这瓶酒展现出令人惊叹的精确度和清晰度，以及出色的建筑结构，这应该能满足每个品酒者。酒中矿物质的中口是精致的，充满了强烈而优雅的酸度，增强了酒的清新感，酒尾的光滑感是由可爱的果味构成的。经过良好的贮存，酒瓶很容易在30年以上的时间内保持完美。

Western reviews.review: The nose comes through with its leafy floral, spicy nuances that mesh perfectly with all of its ripe, dark red fruits and hints of cocoa on the nose and on the medium-bodied palate. Fresh, vibrant, elegant and refined, the wine finishes with elegance, energy and lift. Drink from 2023-2034. 91 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中充满了青葱的花香、辛辣的味道，完美地融合了成熟的黑红果实和巧克力味的香气。口感中鲜活、生动、优雅、精致，酒尾以优雅、精力充沛和轻盈的感觉结束。建议从2023年到2034年饮用。评分：91分。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, dezente Ockerrandaufhellung. Schwarze Beerenfrucht, Nuancen von Trüffeln und grüne Oliven, etwas Nougat, Kräuter, individuelles Bukett. Saftig, elegant, feine Fruchtsüße, tragende, reife Tannine, mineralischer Stil, gutes Reifepotenzial, frischer Stil, braucht noch Zeit.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，微微的橙色边缘。黑色浆果风味，松露和绿色橄榄的细微差别，些许奶油糖，香草，独特的香气。口感丰富，优雅，细腻的果糖，承托的成熟的坚果，矿物质风格，良好的成熟潜力，新鲜的风格，需要时间来成熟。

Western reviews.review: (86% Merlot, 14% Cabernet Franc. 14.5%. Verkostet im Dezember 2021 in Windisch). Achtung, bei diesem Wein bin ich vorbelastet, denn ich liebe ihn... Kräftiges Rubin. Die Nase ist expressiv, fruchtbetont, zeigt Brombeeren und schwarze Johannisbeeren, auch Holunder, blumige Noten die mich an Rosen und Lilien erinnern übernehmen, ein herrlicher Duft, ein Schnüffelwein. Der Gaumen ist weich und rund im Auftakt, die Frucht ist knackig, die Tannin- und Säurestruktur harmoniert, kein Element überlagert das andere, alles ist gut proportioniert und in sich ruhend. Die Gerbstoffe sind von ausgezeichneter Qualität, stützen das Fruchtbündel bis in den langen, feinwürzigen Abgang. Ich kann nicht anders, aber was Alain Moueix und sein Team hier Jahr für Jahr leisten ist einfach grandios. Klarer Kauftipp! 2024-2045
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论，翻译如下：

86% 梅洛，14% 卡波弗雷斯科。14.5% ABV。2021 年 12 月在温迪施进行品尝。

注意：我对这个酒有偏见，因为我非常喜欢它...

酒色深红。

酒香浓郁，果香浓郁，带有浆果和黑莓的味道，还有杏仁和花朵的香气，令人想起玫瑰和百合花的香气，一个美妙的香气，一个嗅觉上的享受。

口感柔软圆润，果味清脆，坚果和酸度结构和谐，各个元素都很好地平衡，没有一个元素超过另一个，所有元素都很好地平衡和沉着。酒中的颜料质地优良，支持果味团体直到长长的，细微的尾部。 我无法不这样说，但阿兰·穆埃克斯和他的团队每年都做得非常出色。毫无疑问，这是一个值得购买的酒！推荐饮用时间：2024-2045。

Chinese pairs.original: 从我个人的感受来说，2023年份的Chateau Ducru-Beaucaillou 多了几分老牌梅多克的矜持，少了一些骨子里的张扬和热血。昔日华丽的果香在这一年演化为典雅的红茶、黑枸杞、发菜以及石墨气息，如果将往日的Chateau Ducru-Beaucaillou 比作是一道壮丽的水果瀑布，那今年则宛如一条平静的河流。标志性的浓郁和成熟在温柔地萃取下尽显高贵气质，顺滑细腻的单宁质感如同一床高级天鹅绒被，将我团团包裹。因为特殊的剪枝方式，以及更多的“绿色采收”，该年份的平均产量只有35hl/ha（低于Saint-Julien 产区的平均水平），但在品质方面无可挑剔。
Chinese pairs.new: 从我个人的感受来说，2023年份的Chateau Ducru-Beaucaillou 多了几分老牌梅多克的矜持，少了一些骨子里的张扬和热血。昔日华丽的果香在这一年演化为典雅的红茶、黑枸杞、发菜以及石墨气息，如果将往日的Chateau Ducru-Beaucaillou 比作是一道壮丽的水果瀑布，那今年则宛如一条平静的河流。标志性的浓郁和成熟在温柔地萃取下尽显高贵气质，顺滑细腻的单宁质感如同一床高级天鹅绒被，将我团团包裹。由于特殊的剪枝方式和更多的“绿色采收”，该年份的平均产量只有35hl/ha（低于Saint-Julien 产区的平均水平），但在品质方面无可挑剔。

English pairs.original: In my personal experience, the 2023 Chateau Ducru-Beaucaillou shows more of the classic Medoc restraint, dialing back some of its inherent boldness and intensity. This year, the traditionally lavish fruit aromas have transformed into a refined blend of black tea, black goji berries, black moss, and graphite. If Chateau Ducru-Beaucaillou used to be like a dramatic fruit waterfall, this year it resembles a calm river. The iconic richness and maturity are elegantly displayed through gentle extraction, and the velvety tannins envelop me like a luxurious velvet blanket. Special pruning techniques and more “green harvest” have reduced the average yield to only 35hl/ha (lower than the average production of Saint-Julien), but the quality remains flawless.
English pairs.new: 在我的个人体验中，2023年杜克鲁-博凯洛酒庄展现出经典的梅多克风格，调低了其固有的豪放和强烈性。这年，传统的丰富果香转变为黑茶、黑枸杞、黑苔藓和石墨的精致混合。如果杜克鲁-博凯洛酒庄以前像一场戏剧性的果汁瀑布，这年它更像是一条平静的河流。酒庄的标志性丰富和成熟通过轻柔的提取体现出优雅，细致的橡胶纤维包裹着我像一件奢华的绵羊毛毯一样。特殊的修剪技术和更多的“绿采”减少了平均产量到每公顷35公升（低于圣朱利安的平均产量），但质量仍然完美无缺。

Western reviews.review: This wine is delightfully fruity and refreshingly crisp, characterized by its delicate tannins and a smooth, juicy texture. Matured in 100% new oak for 18 months, it offers a slight touch of salinity that enhances the attractive fruit flavors. Currently, it may lack some complexity, but its overall profile is quite pleasant and shows promise for further development
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有令人愉悦的果香和清新爽口的口感，特点是细腻的苦味和滑顺的口感。经过18个月的100%新橡木陈化，酒中带有轻微的咸味，增强了吸引人的果味。目前，酒可能还缺乏一些复杂性，但整体风格很舒适，展现出进一步发展的潜力。

Western reviews.review: Medium to deep purple-ruby color is not quite opaque. There are fabulous perfumed aromas of peonies & black-cherry jam & lifted , juicy mulberry fruit. The wine has excellent freshness & fine tannins, It is medium to full bodied & has well balanced alcohol. The very long structured finish is chocolatey with fresh juicy cassis fruit that is followed by saline notes. 04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深紫红色，略微不透明。酒中有浓郁的花香，闻起来像玫瑰花和黑樱桃酱，果香清新多汁，像熟透的黑莓。酒体中有极好的新鲜感和细致的纤维，酒口中酒精度合适，酒体中酒精度合适。酒尾长达数秒，味道中有巧克力和新鲜黑樱桃的味道，最后是盐味的余韵。评分：4.24分（DCAMW）。

Chinese pairs.original: Clerc Milon 2016拥有“傲世”级别的浓郁度，初闻酒杯，立刻被千万缕香气线条所包裹，每拨开一层香气，你都会看到更加精彩的繁盛景象。漫天飞舞的蓝莓果粒、蹦蹦跳跳的花椒辛香、色彩斑斓的鲜花物语，仿佛身处“阿凡达”的仙境，美的令人神往。酒体苍劲有力、单宁却细如膏脂，如此深邃的葡萄酒不绵延，用一个法语词汇来来形容，那便是：“infini”。
Chinese pairs.new:
Clerc Milon 2016拥有“傲世”级别的浓郁度，初闻酒杯，立刻被千万缕香气线条所包裹，每拨开一层香气，你都会看到更加精彩的繁盛景象。漫天飞舞的蓝莓果粒、蹦蹦跳跳的花椒辛香、色彩斑斓的鲜花物语，仿佛身处“阿凡达”的仙境，美的令人神往。酒体苍劲有力、单宁却细如膏脂，如此深邃的葡萄酒不绵延，用一个法语词汇来来形容，那便是：“infini”。

Translated Review:

The Clerc Milon 2016 boasts an "infinite" level of opulence, as soon as the glass is poured, it's enveloped by a multitude of aromatic threads. With each layer of aroma lifted, the scene unfolds with even greater splendor. Blueberry fruit notes dance across the palate, alongside peppery spice and a kaleidoscope of floral nuances, evoking a sense of paradise. The wine's tannins are robust yet silky, and its depth is simply infinite.

English pairs.original: Clerc Milon 2016 has a distinguished intensity that could hold the entire world. The moment you smell the glass, you’ll immediately wrap into millions of aromas lines, with more layers revealing more fabulous scenes of prosperity you will detect. It is like walking in an “Avatar” wonderland with the soaring blueberry fruit, bouncing pepper spices, and flamboyant flowers. Its body is concentrated yet the tannins are as fine as a serum, and the finish is persistent enough that the only french word for it is: “Infini”.
English pairs.new: 克莱尔米隆2016年红酒具有出色的强度，足以征服整个世界。 一旦你闻到玻璃中的气味，你就会立即沉浸在数百万的香气线条中，更多的层次会揭示出更加繁荣的场景。 就像走在“阿凡达”奇迹般的世界中，蓝莓果香、跳跃的胡椒香料和华丽的花朵会让你惊叹不已。 它的体积集中，但纤维素细如丝，尾部持久到足以用法语称之为：“无限”。

Western reviews.review: Hot crushed stones and dark berries jump out of the glass. Full body, very dense fruit and powerful tannins, yet it remains agile and bright with beauty and energy. So muscular and toned. Truly outstanding Clerc for the future. Unwavering nature to this. Try after 2024.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感非常丰富，果实丰富且坚实的口感，然而仍保持着轻盈和活力。酒体非常健硕，肌肉丰满。未来必定会是这瓶酒的辉煌时刻。酒的性格坚定不移，建议在2024年后再次品尝。

Western reviews.review: Always more muscular and powerful than Armailhac, there's no surprise that this has closed down more than its sibling. The complexity of the layers are still on display, showcasing fresh menthol, cranberry, white pepper, black olive, rose and blackberry, all wrapped up in a tight tannic hold. There are some wonderful toasted caramel notes, subdued but rich and tight, waiting to show their exuberance on the finish. There's no doubt that this is as good as I thought en primeur, but it needs time to open up, and I would suggest the full 10 years. 2% Petit Verdot and 1% Carmenere finish up the blend.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒比阿马伊拉克（Armailhac）更加肌肉发达和强劲，没什么奇怪的，它的口感比同伴更紧闭。酒中的层次仍然清晰可见，展现出新鲜的薄荷、蔓越莓、白胡椒、黑橄榄、玫瑰和黑莓等风味，所有这些都被紧密的苦味质所包围。酒中有许多美妙的焦糖味，虽然被抑制，但富有深度和紧致，等待在后续的口感中释放。毫无疑问，这款酒的口感和我在原瓶时的预期一样好，但它需要时间来展现全貌，我建议至少等待10年。酒中含有2%的佩特·韦多特（Petit Verdot）和1%的卡门埃雷（Carmenere），它们是酒的完美组合。

Western reviews.review:
Dark and concentrated, this wine offers depth and
intensity. It has great ripeness as well as fine tannins that are integrated into the fruit. It is so juicy and exuberant that it’s hard to remember the tannins that will allow the wine to age. Drink from 2023.
Editors' Choice
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒深度浓郁，具有强烈的风味。酒中充满成熟的果味，且具有细腻的橡木味。酒的口感丰富多样，令人难以察觉其持久的橡木味。建议从2023年开始饮用。编辑推荐。

Western reviews.review: I was able to taste the 2016 Château Clerc Milon on multiple occasions and it was always brilliant, showing a deep ruby/purple color as well as sexy aromas and flavors of crème de cassis, new saddle leather, spicy oak, and graphite. Deep, powerful and beautifully concentrated, it’s a rock star of a Pauillac that’s going to keep for 30 years or more. The blend is 55% Cabernet Sauvignon, 29% Merlot, and the balance Petit Verdot and Carménère, all aged 16 months in 50% new French oak.
Western reviews.translation: 我有幸多次品尝了2016年克莱尔米隆庄园的红酒，每次都非常出色，呈现出深红紫色的颜色，以及诱人的黑currant、新皮革、香料橡木和石墨的香气和味道。深厚、强烈、浓缩的口感，让人感觉像摇滚明星一样的巴约克红酒，能耐受30年以上的时间。酒款的比例为55%卡波弗列诺（Cabernet Sauvignon）、29%梅洛（Merlot），以及小部分的佩蒂·维多（Petit Verdot）和卡门雷（Carménère），全部在50%新法兰克橡木桶中陈酿16个月。

Western reviews.review: A fresh and stylish version, with chalky minerality running from start to finish. Succulent plum and cassis fruit flavors coil around this and absorbs this easily at first. Then pretty violet and lilac notes guild the finish, with the minerality taking a slightly firmer stand. Best from 2023 through 2035.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶新鲜而时尚的红酒，矿物质的风味从开头到结尾都有所体现。初期的浓郁黑桃和黑加仑果味会让人感到愉悦，但随着时间的推移，花朵的香气会逐渐显现，尤其是紫罗兰和百合花的芬芳会在尾部留下深刻的印象。矿物质的风味在尾部变得更加坚定。建议在2023年至2035年之间品尝。

Chinese pairs.original: 香气略显收敛但非常清晰，摇杯之后缓缓散发出清脆的蓝莓杨梅和花果茶的独特芳香（一小部分全梗发酵）。入口先是有些害羞，而后便开启了钢铁侠变身的节奏，气势豪迈的矿物感和强劲有力的单宁构建出宏大的结构，气场之强让人无法招架。对于这款酒，最好办法就是让它在酒窖静静地睡上20年，经过时光的淬炼，必定会再次惊艳我们的味蕾。
Chinese pairs.new:
Aroma is slightly closed but very clear, after swirling, it slowly releases crisp blueberry and lychee with floral tea notes (a small part of full bunch fermentation). 

The palate is initially shy, but then transforms into a bold rhythm, with a majestic mineral feel and powerful tannins building a grand structure, its presence is so strong that it's hard to resist. 

The best way to enjoy this wine is to let it sleep quietly in the cellar for 20 years, and after being refined by time, it will undoubtedly surprise our taste buds again.

English pairs.original: The aroma is slightly restrained but very precise. After swirling the glass, it slowly emits the unique aroma of crisp blueberry, waxberry and scents of fruit tea (a part of the whole bunch fermentation). The entry of the palate brings a little shyness with it, and then it transforms like Transformers does. The gripping minerality and powerful tannins build a grand structure; the power is too strong to not be overwhelmed. For this wine, the best way to enjoy it is to let it sleep silently in the cellar for 20 years. After the tempering of time, it will surely surprise our taste buds again.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的香气虽然有些克制，但非常精确。将酒杯旋转后，慢慢释放出清新的蓝莓、蜂蜜梅子和果茶香气（这是整个采摘过程中的部分发酵）。口感入口时有些谦逊，但随后像变形金刚一样迅速变化。矿物质的抓握感和强大的纽扣构建起了壮观的结构；力量太强，无法不被征服。对于这瓶酒，最好的享受方式是让它在酒窖里静静地睡眠20年。经过时间的磨合，它一定会再次惊艳我们的味蕾。

Western reviews.review: A dense wine, coming from a small vineyard just above Château Pavie, has powerful tannins and weight. Its structure and concentrated black fruits are rich, spicy with a strongly mineral texture. The wine will age well. Drink from 2026. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 一款来自巴约地区小型葡萄园的红酒，具有强烈的苦味和重量。其结构和浓缩的黑色果味丰富，带有辣味和强烈的矿物质质感。该酒有很好的储存潜力。建议2026年后饮用。 - 罗杰·沃斯

Western reviews.review: Inky in color, the wine is rich, dense, lush, and shows a liqueur-influenced nose. The sensation of the fruits here is intense. The layers of intensely ripe, dark fruits, blackberries, plums, and black cherries come in waves. There is flesh and and flash, with length that provides a long, fruit-packed finish. drink from 2027-2050. 94 Points
Western reviews.translation: 酒色深红，酒体丰富、浓郁、醉人，酒香浓郁似果酒。酒中的水果感极强，层次丰富，波澜起伏。酒中黑果、黑莓、黑杏和黑樱桃的味道强烈，酒中有肉感和闪光，酒尾长且果实丰富。建议2027-2050年饮用。评分94分。

Western reviews.review: Tiefdunkles Rubingranat, opaker Kern, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung. Frische Waldbeeren, ein Hauch von Cassis, mineralische Nuancen, zarte Edelholzwürze ist unterlegt. Saftig, reife Kirschen, rotbeerige Nuancen, präsente, tragende Tannine, lebendig strukturiert, mineralischer Nachhall, bleibt lange haften, salziger Nachhall, sicheres Reifepotenzial
Western reviews.translation:
深红色酒液，微暗的橙色中间，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。

酒中充满新鲜的森林果实香气，带有一点黑加西斯的味道，矿物质的细微变化和细微的贵木香。

口感丰富，熟透的樱桃，带有红酒的细微变化，现成的坚韧的苦味，生动的结构，矿物质的余味，留在口中很久，带有咸味的余味，具有明确的成熟潜力。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有波森莓，蓝莓，黑醋栗，甘草，松露和沥青的气味，酒体丰满，令人惊叹的甘油感和丰富的层次，以及美妙的新鲜度和精度。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts aromas of boysenberry, blueberry, black truffle, honey, truffle, and asphalt. It has a full-bodied texture, astonishing glycerin feel, and rich layers, along with beautiful freshness and precision.

Western reviews.review: If you are seeking a thrill ride, and Pomerol is your type of thrill, look no further. This is pure bottled decadence. The wine is silky, sexy, sensuous and concentrated. There is a beautiful purity in the fruit and a finish that could break the 50-second mark. And the wine still sells for a song for a wine at this level of quality. 98 Points
Western reviews.translation: 如果你正在寻找一场刺激的体验，波美罗（Pomerol）是你的风格，那么你找到了。 这是一瓶纯粹的奢华。酒精滑顺、性感、诱人且浓缩。果味美丽纯净，尾部可以达到50秒以上。 而且，这种酒的质量如此高尚，价格却如此便宜。 评分98分。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby with purple reflections and subtle rim brightening. A multi-faceted bouquet with background black berry fruits, savoury oak notes, liquorice and subtle hints of tangerine. Juicy, taut and sweet on the palate with elegance, charm and a very long finish. Definite ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色酒液，带有紫色反射和微妙的边缘亮度。酒香复杂多面，背景中有黑莓果味、干酪味橡木、甘草和柑橘味的微妙呼吸。口感丰富、紧致、甜美，带有优雅、魅力和极长的尾部。酒品有明显的陈化潜力。

Western reviews.review: 92-94 New wood mint aromas give this wine its great polished feel. The tannins offer a counterpoint of richness here, firm and dense. The fruit takes a while to show through, then brings the fine plum skin flavors suffusing through the wine.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒评分为92-94分。新橡木味和薄荷味使得这款红酒具有光滑的质感。酒中的天然纤维素提供了丰富的对比，坚实而密集。果味需要一段时间才能显现出来，然后带来细腻的浆果皮味，充满了这款红酒。

Western reviews.review: (2011) There's a certain meatiness here, a touch of dankness that makes me worry about this sample slightly. Certainly a gamey element to this, but the bloody ripeness of the fruit comes through. Quite silky too, the tannins fine and the acidity good in a wine that ends very long and harmonious. Could be even better than this if this sample was indeed a little past it.
Western reviews.translation: 2011年，这款红酒有一定的厚实感，带有一丝潮湿的味道，让我对样品有些担忧。当然，这款红酒带有一定的野味，但果实的鲜红味道依然显著。口感非常滑顺，橡皮质的味道细腻，酸度也很好，这款红酒的尾韵非常长且和谐。如果样品的确已经过了最佳时期，那么它可能会表现得更好。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark ruby-red color that holds right to the rim. The nose shows intense jammy black & red fruit with dusty & spicy notes. Fruit on the palate is of a redcurrant nature with coffee notes. The fruit is perhaps a touch baked. There are fine tannins, but the mid palate is quite flat, perhaps lacking a little acid & overlaid by plentiful new oak. Alcohol is balanced but the finish is only of mid-length. 11/14 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色深红色，几乎到边缘。酒香中充满浓郁的黑果和红果味，伴有尘土和辣味的调味。口感中果味呈现出红果的特点，伴有咖啡的调味。果味可能略微烤焦。口感中有细致的纤维，但中口略微平淡，可能缺乏酸度，覆盖在新橡木的丰富调味中。酒精平衡，但尾韵仅为中等长度。评分：11/14

Chinese pairs.original: 黑加仑、蜜糖，奶油、上橡木，肉挂的香气，入口单宁非常柔顺，结构扎实，非常有陈年的潜力，果味非常浓郁，清新，回味带有奶油，肉桂的味道.
Chinese pairs.new: "Blackcurrant, honey, creamy, toasted oak, meaty aromas. Smooth tannins on the palate, solid structure, great aging potential. Rich, fresh fruit flavors, with a long, creamy finish and hints of cinnamon."

Western reviews.review: 2005 Cheval Blanc continues getting better and better with every tasting. Straddling the fence between hedonistic and classic, with air, the wine displays an intriguing perfume of potpourri, mint, truffle, cherry blossom, and plums. The perfect blend of vibrance and sensuality, while still in its infancy, it is impossible not to be enthralled by its concentration, balance, energy, and layers of sweet, ripe, very ripe, and slightly under-ripe red and black fruits. Drink from 2025-2060.
Western reviews.translation: 2005 年的雪兰堡红酒每次品尝都越来越好。它在风格上既有享受主义，又有经典风格。随着空气的流通，酒中展现出一股迷人的香味，包括花卉、薄荷、松露、樱桃花和浆果。酒的完美结合了生动和诱人的性格，尽管它还在成熟的早期阶段，但它的浓度、平衡、能量和各种成熟、成熟、非常成熟和略微未成熟的红、黑果味层次使人无法不被它的魅力所吸引。建议从2025年到2060年饮用。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung. In der Nase intensive, exotische Gewürzanklänge, feinstes rotbeeriges Konfit, zarte Reifenuancen in der Frucht, Noten von reifen Pflaumen, ein Hauch von blättriger, mineralischer Cabernet-Franc-Würze. Am Gaumen feste, süße Tannine, hochelegant, perfekt strukturiert, dunkler Fruchtschmelz, delikater Wein, ausgestattet mit wirklich überzeugender Länge, tolles Zukunftspotenzial.
Western reviews.translation:
深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。鼻子里有强烈的、异国情调的香料味道，细腻的红酒果酱味，果味中有轻微的陈酿味，熟透的浆果味，特别是熟透的李子味，还有叶子和矿物质的Cabernet Franc味。

口感上有坚实的、甜的橡皮感，高雅的、完美的结构，深红色的果酱味，细腻的口感，配有真正令人信服的长度，未来发展的巨大潜力。

Western reviews.review: Plump, padded and comfortable is the initial impression. But this is also finely structured and dense, with tannins that are sweet, flavors of dark chocolate to go with the roundness and the enticing Cabernet Franc perfumes. In all, this is a great wine, with considerable aging potential, but with enough sweet fruit to make it attractive now.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的第一印象是丰满、舒适、柔软。但是，它也具有精细的结构和密度，具有甜蜜的苦味、黑巧克力般的风味和圆润的质感，以及诱人的卡波弗朗克香气。总体来说，这是一款出色的红酒，具有很好的陈化潜力，但同时也具有足够的甜美果味使其现在就具有吸引力。

Western reviews.review: (2007) The nose is darker, denser and less expressive at this stage, with a layering of chocolate and a dark, juicy plum richness. There is a depth of spicy, tobacco-tinged warmth. Beautiful fruit on the palate, with terrific elegance. Though marginally more concentrated than the Petit Cheval, it is elegantly structured and lithe, with slightly more polished tannins, and so it is seems lighter, though more elegant at this stage. Beautiful wine.
Western reviews.translation: 2007年，酒鼻更深沉、浓郁，表达力较弱，带有巧克力和浓郁的黑浆果味。酒中有深度的烟熏味和浓郁的烟草味。口感上美丽的果味，带有优雅的风格。虽然比Petit Cheval略微更浓郁，但结构优雅，轻盈，纤细的纹理略微更光滑，似乎更轻盈，但更优雅。是一款美丽的葡萄酒。

Western reviews.review: Medium to deep ruby-red color, is not quite opaque. The dark fruits on the nose are restrained with distinct cedar notes. Cassis & liquorice fruit on the palate is enlivened by vigorous acidity, but a firm structure of fine tannins closes up the mid-palate somewhat. This is not as muscular as some other leading 2005s, but the wine has balanced alcohol, a long, lean, elegant structure & a drying finish. 11/09 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，透明度不高。酒香中有浓郁的黑果味和明显的松木味。口感中有浓郁的黑加斯和酒精味，酸度高，结构紧密，细致的橡木味在中口处略微封闭。虽然这款2005年红酒不如其他同年份的红酒那样强劲，但酒精度衡平，结构长长，细致优雅，干净的尾部。评分：11/09 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Clinet 2018的香气可以用“五彩斑斓”来形容，让人沉醉在樱桃、蓝莓、酸梅的浓郁果香中；只需轻轻摇动酒杯，便能感受到丁香、桂皮以及花椒粉的气息层层叠叠地飘散开来。单宁质感犹如新疆的长绒棉，滑过舌尖时感觉有无数柔软的绒毛在恣意游走。我相信，这款鲜艳夺目、充满魅力的葡萄酒无人能够抵挡其诱惑，它就像一位永远都能够触动你心弦的美人，无论何时何地，都能让你为之动容。
Chinese pairs.new: The aroma of Chateau Clinet 2018 is a kaleidoscope of flavors, transporting you to a world of intense cherry, blueberry, and sour cherry notes. With a gentle swirl of the glass, the subtle hints of cinnamon, nutmeg, and pepper waft up, layer upon layer. The tannins glide smoothly across the palate, like the softest cashmere, sending shivers down your spine. I'm convinced that this vibrant, captivating wine will leave you under its spell, a timeless beauty that touches your heart, wherever you are, whenever you taste it.

English pairs.original: Chateau Clinet 2018 emits an aroma that can be described as “colourful,” enchanting one’s senses with the rich fragrances of cherry, blueberry, and sour plum. With a gentle swirl of the wine glass, the scents of clove, cinnamon, and Sichuan pepper unfold slowly, creating a delicate cascade of aromas. The texture of the tannins resembles the finest cotton, gliding over the palate, as if countless soft fibers whimsically dance upon it. I firmly believe that this vibrant, charismatic wine possesses an irresistible allure, much like a captivating enchantress who always stirs the depths of your soul, leaving you deeply moved, regardless of time or place.
English pairs.new: 克莱内酒庄2018年红酒释放出一种色彩斑斓的芳香，让人迷醉于浓郁的樱桃、蓝莓和酸梅的香气中。酒杯轻轻旋转，丁香、肉桂和四川椒的香气缓缓展开，形成一种细致的香气瀑布。酒中的纤维素质如同最细致的棉花，轻柔地滑过口腔，仿佛无数柔软的纤维在口腔上轻舞飞扬。 我坚信，这种充满生机的、魅力非凡的红酒具有不可抗拒的魅力，像一位迷人的女巫一样，总是能深深地触动你的灵魂，无论时间或地点如何。

Western reviews.review: Including slightly more Cabernet Sauvignon than usual, the 2018 Château Clinet is 85% Merlot and 15% Cabernet Sauvignon that was brought up in 75% new French oak. One of the superstars of the vintage, it has incredible elegance and finesse as well as gorgeous richness and depth. Notes of cassis and truffly dark fruits as well as tobacco, damp earth, chocolate, and lead pencil shavings emerge from the glass, and it's full-bodied, with a seamless, multi-dimensional texture, gorgeous tannins, and a great, great finish. It already offers incredible pleasure, but it won't hit maturity for another 5-7 years and should evolve for 30 years or more. This magical wine is in the same league as the 2015 and 2016, and drinking these beauties over the coming decades will be an incredible treat.
Western reviews.translation: 2018年克莱内酒庄（Château Clinet）的葡萄酒中，含有比平常略多的卡波内尔（Cabernet Sauvignon），总共85%梅洛（Merlot）和15%卡波内尔。该葡萄酒在75%的新法兰克酒桶中发酵。该葡萄酒是当年最出色的之一，具有极高的优雅和细致，丰富的口感和深度。从酒杯中可以闻到黑加仑和菌类黑果的香味，以及烟草、潮湿土壤、巧克力和铅笔削片的香味。该葡萄酒口感丰富，质地细腻，纤维柔顺，尾部长达数十年。该葡萄酒已经可以享受，但需要5-7年才能达到成熟期，预计可以持续30年以上。该葡萄酒与2015年和2016年的葡萄酒同属于顶级品种，未来几十年享用这些美酒将是一种难得的享受。

Western reviews.review: Lush in feel, with boysenberry reduction and crushed plum flavors, carried by a polished, solid structure. A mineral hint filters through on the finish, adding length and cut. Barrel Sample: 95-98
Western reviews.translation: 口感丰富醇厚，带有草莓果酱和压榨的浆果风味，均由光滑坚实的结构支撑。尾部带有矿物质的微妙余韵，增添了长度和清晰度。酒评：95-98分。

Western reviews.review: Closed and coiled right now, with ripped layers of fruit. A ton of graphite, bitter dark chocolate and finessed berry fruits. Definitely need to give this time and respect its muscular from. A seriously impressive Clinet that has held its form over ageing.
Western reviews.translation: 目前这个红酒紧闭，层层纠缠的果味。有大量的石墨、苦巧克力和精致的浓郁果味。这个红酒需要时间来展现其肌肉感。这个Clinet红酒经过时间的考验，仍然保持着其出色的风格。

Western reviews.review: The 2018 Clinet is a blend of 85% Merlot and 15% Cabernet Sauvignon, aged for approximately 16 months in French oak barriques, 75% new. Deep garnet-purple colored, the nose is locked down tight at first sniff, requiring a good amount of air to begin to reveal profound notions of stewed black plums, mulberries and black cherry compote, plus hints of black truffles, damp soil, tobacco leaf and chargrill with an emerging waft of cedar. The full-bodied palate is a full-on volcano of black fruit and molten rock waiting to erupt, with a solid frame of firm, grainy tannins and bold freshness, finishing with amazing length. There is a lot going on here, but it is a wine for the patient. Give it a good 5-7 years in bottle, at least, and drink it over the next 30+ years. Rating: 97+
Western reviews.translation: 2018年克林特红酒是一款由85%梅洛和15%卡波弗雷希白葡萄酒组成的混合红酒，-aged约16个月在法国橡木桶中，75%新橡木。深红紫色，鼻子在初次闻时紧紧锁住，需要大量空气才能开始展现深刻的黑浆果、黑莓和黑樱桃酱的概念，伴有黑松露、潮湿土壤、烟草叶和烤焦味的微妙气息，以及渐渐出现的松木气味。全口感的口感像一座黑色浓缩果实和熔岩的火山，具有坚实的、粗糙的坚果纤维和强劲的新鲜感，口感长达30年以上。这里有很多东西在发生，但这是一款需要耐心的红酒。至少在瓶子里放置5-7年，随后在30年以上的时间内享用。评分：97+

Western reviews.review: Blackberries and blueberries with subtle black chocolate and violets on the nose, following to a full-bodied palate with polished, creamy tannins. Beautiful balance and really refined texture. Drink after 2024, but already so gorgeous.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中带有黑莓、蓝莓和微妙的黑巧克力和紫罗兰的味道。口感丰富，具有光滑的、奶油般的纹理。酒体平衡美妙，质感细腻。建议在2024年后饮用，但即使现在也已经非常美味。

Chinese pairs.original: 精准甜美、平滑如初。2020年份的La Chapelle de la Mission Haut-Brion给人一种匠心独运的柔润感。入口轻巧多汁、酒体圆润丝滑，赤霞珠的辛香气息与杨梅、话梅彼此交融，就像品味着一块铺满酸甜果酱的巧克力慕斯。收尾时的酒精度略显温热，但整体保持了一流的平衡感。陈年8-15年后会再度绽放。
Chinese pairs.new: Smooth and luscious, the 2020 La Chapelle de la Mission Haut-Brion exudes a masterful sense of refinement. The entry is light and juicy, with a round and silky texture, as the Cabernet Sauvignon's spice and the blackberry and cranberry flavors meld together like a rich chocolate mousse topped with a tangy fruit sauce. A hint of warmth from the alcohol lingers at the finish, but the overall balance is impeccable. This wine will continue to shine after 8-15 years of aging.

English pairs.original: I am completely enchanted by the beautiful white wines of Chateau La Mission Haut-Brion 2020. It has a honey-like palate, oily yet refreshing, sweet and long-lasting; it has a sea breeze-like saltiness, serene and natural. Mixed with the complex aromas of white pepper, fennel, bay leaf, and grapefruit peel, the wine creates a graceful palate that resembles spicy soup on the taste buds. Coupled with the mild note of fresh and bitter tea stem on the finish, it can steal your heart without you even realizing it.
English pairs.new: 我完全被查塔窑酒庄2020年的白酒迷住了。它的口感像蜂蜜一样，油腻却又清新，甜美且持久；它的海风般的咸味，宁静而天然。与白胡椒、荜茸、迷迭香和葡萄柚皮的复杂香气混合在一起，酒精在舌头上留下了一种优雅的口感，类似于香辣汤。与新鲜苦茶的轻微味道相结合，酒精在尾部留下了一种令人心动的感觉，甚至你自己都没有意识到。

Western reviews.review: Le nez est élégant et offre un fin charnu, une certaine puissance du grain ainsi qu’une certaine petite richesse du fruit. On y retrouve des notes de pomme charnu, de pêche charnue et plus légèrement de poire Williams croquante/fraiche associées à de petites touches de fleurs blanches, à de délicates pointes de pamplemousse frais ainsi qu’à un très discret côté enrobant du boisé. La bouche est fruitée et offre de la jutosité, une trame fraiche/acidulée, une jolie définition, de la tension, de la finesse, une certaine légèreté dans son gras et dans sa relative richesse. Tout en maitrise et justesse. En bouche ce vin exprime des notes de pêche pulpeuse/juteuse, de petits fruits blancs pulpeux/éclatants et plus légèrement de quénette associées à des touches de citron, de fleurs blanches ainsi qu’à de discrètes pointes presque pamplemousse et kumquat frais. Une subtile pointe d’amande mûre en fond. Jolie persistance.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气优雅，具有细腻的质感，果实的力量和富有的小细节。它带有熟苹果、熟桃和略带点儿Williams梨脆甜的气息，伴随着白花、新鲜柑橘和木质的轻微包裹。口感果实丰富，具有清新、酸性和美丽的定义，具有张力、细腻和轻盈的质感。整个口感都充满着控制和准确。口中这瓶红酒展现了熟桃的质感、白果的爆发和略带点儿柠檬、白花和新鲜柑橘的气息，伴随着轻微的木质包裹和熟杏仁的底调。美丽的持久性。

Western reviews.review: Le nez est élégant et offre un fin charnu, une certaine puissance du grain ainsi qu’une certaine petite richesse du fruit. On y retrouve des notes de pomme charnu, de pêche charnue et plus légèrement de poire Williams croquante/fraiche associées à de petites touches de fleurs blanches, à de délicates pointes de pamplemousse frais ainsi qu’à un très discret côté enrobant du boisé. La bouche est fruitée et offre de la jutosité, une trame fraiche/acidulée, une jolie définition, de la tension, de la finesse, une certaine légèreté dans son gras et dans sa relative richesse. Tout en maitrise et justesse. En bouche ce vin exprime des notes de pêche pulpeuse/juteuse, de petits fruits blancs pulpeux/éclatants et plus légèrement de quénette associées à des touches de citron, de fleurs blanches ainsi qu’à de discrètes pointes presque pamplemousse et kumquat frais. Une subtile pointe d’amande mûre en fond. Jolie persistance.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气优雅，具有细腻的质感，果实的力量和富有的小细节。它带有熟苹果、熟桃和略带点儿Williams梨脆甜的气息，伴随着白花、新鲜柑橘和木质的轻微包裹。口感果实丰富，具有清新、酸性和清晰的结构，具有张力、细腻和轻盈的质感。整个口感都充满着控制和准确。口中这瓶红酒展现了熟桃的浓郁、白果的爆发和略带点儿柠檬、白花和新鲜柑橘的气息，伴随着细微的木质包裹和几乎新鲜的柑橘和柚子的气息。底层有熟杏仁的微妙气息。酒体持久。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby garnet, purple reflections, deep core, delicate rim brightening. Attractive black berry fruit, a touch of juniper, dark cherries, delicate hints of nougat, fresh orange zest. Juicy, ripe cherries and plums, fine, silky tannins, finesse-rich acidity, salty minerality, very balanced, lingers long, a delicate wine with good drinking appeal and certain ageing potential. (2025-2065).
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色调，紫色反射，深色核心，细微的边缘闪烁。吸引人的黑berry果味，柠檬桉树的微妙味道，黑樱桃，细微的核桃味，新鲜橙子皮的味道。 juicy、成熟的樱桃和浆果，细致的、丝滑的纤维，精致的酸度，咸矿物质，非常平衡，余味长久，细致的酒品，具有很好的饮用价值和一定的陈化潜力。 (2025-2065)

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby garnet, purple reflections, deep core, delicate rim brightening. Attractive black berry fruit, a touch of juniper, dark cherries, delicate hints of nougat, fresh orange zest. Juicy, ripe cherries and plums, fine, silky tannins, finesse-rich acidity, salty minerality, very balanced, lingers long, a delicate wine with good drinking appeal and certain ageing potential. (2025-2065).
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色调，紫色反射，深色核心，细微的边缘光亮。吸引人的黑berry果味，柠檬桉树的微妙味道，黑樱桃，细微的核桃味，新鲜橙子皮的味道。 juicy、成熟的樱桃和浆果，细致的、丝滑的纤维，精致的酸度，咸矿物质味，非常平衡，余味长久，细致的酒品，口感良好，具有明显的陈化潜力。 (2025-2065)

Western reviews.review: (48.6% Merlot, 43.2% Cabernet Sauvignon, 8.2% Cabernet Franc, 14.7% Alkohol) Tiefgründig, nobel, super feine Nase, florale Noten, Veilchen, dazu etwas Tabak, Blütentee, ein Gedicht, man möchte stundenlang daran schüffeln. Im Gaumen distinquiert, ruhig, mit delikater Frucht, einer umwerfenden Präzision und viel Frische, der Wein baut am mittleren Gaumen zwar viel Druck auf, wird immer vollmundiger, versteckt sein Volumen nicht, bleibt dabei aber federleicht, tänzelt förmlich über die Zunge, sensationelle Tanninqualität, grossartige Länge. Ein Gedicht! 2026-2050 (April/Mai 2021)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一瓶红酒评论。以下是翻译成中文：

(48.6% 美丽诺, 43.2% 卡波弗雷, 8.2% 卡波弗雷, 14.7% 酒精含量) 

深度丰富, 高贵, 超级细致的鼻子, 花朵的香味, Forget-me-not, 还有烟草, 花茶, 一首诗, 你会想一直嗅着它。

在口中, 独特, 平静, 有细腻的果味, 一种惊人的精确度和多余的新鲜感, 酒精在中口处产生了很多压力, 口感越来越丰富, 不会隐藏它的体积, 但仍然轻盈, 在舌头上跳舞, 感觉非常惊人, 果酱质量, 长度惊人。是一首诗!

推荐饮用时间：2026-2050 (2021年4月/5月)

Chinese pairs.original: 没想到Clos Fourtet 2014 小巧的酒体中却藏着这么优秀的集中度！闻香时感觉它特别含羞涩，我尝试着通过摇杯来打开它的心扉，但它就是不接我的话茬。然而，当我细细品尝时，柔嫩多汁的莓果芬芳开始逐渐伸开臂膀，红樱桃和杨梅的香气在粉状的单宁映照下显得层次有加。尾韵里淡淡的清冽感非常引人注目，在略显温热的尾韵中静静流淌。是一款高性价比的Clos Fourtet。
Chinese pairs.new: I was surprised to find such concentrated depth in this petite-bodied Clos Fourtet 2014. When I first sniffed it, I found it to be shy and reserved, but as I swirled the glass, it slowly began to open up. Upon closer inspection, the wine revealed its luscious fruit flavors, with notes of red cherry and lychee unfolding against a backdrop of powdery tannins. The finish is notable for its subtle crispness, which flows smoothly through the slightly warm aftertaste. This is a great value for a Clos Fourtet.

English pairs.original: I was surprised by the remarkable concentration hidden within the delicateness of Clos Fourtet 2014! Its aroma initially seemed shy and reserved, as if hesitant to reveal its true essence. I attempted to coax it open by swirling the glass, but it remained unresponsive to my advances. However, as I taste it, the tender and juicy berries began to unfurl, while the fragrances of red cherries and mulberries danced gracefully amidst the powdery tannins, creating a captivating layering of flavors. The subtle and refreshing finish was particularly noteworthy, gently flowing amid the warm aftertaste. Truly a nice vintage that offers exceptional value for its quality.
English pairs.new: 我惊讶于2014年克洛斯福特（Clos Fourtet）的惊人浓度，它隐藏在细致的外表之下。它的香气最初似乎羞怯且保守，似乎不愿意揭示其真正的本质。我试图通过旋转玻璃来唤醒它，但它对我的进攻仍然保持沉默。然而，当我品尝它时， tender 和 juicy 的黑berries 开始展开，而红樱桃和多肉樱桃的香气则优雅地在粉末状的鞣质中跳跃，创造了令人着迷的层次感。细微且清新味道尤其值得注意，温暖的余味中流动着。确实是一款好酒，提供了出色的质量与价格比。

Western reviews.review: A sleek, lean cat, with distilled currant and raspberry fruit that races from start to finish, maintaining tension throughout thanks to a riveting chalky spine. A light floral hint hangs in the background. Should develop into a perfumy beauty with time. Best from 2022 through 2035.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的风格如同一只细长的猫，果香清晰，葡萄酒中有浓缩的黑currant和莓果味道，从开头到结尾都保持着紧张感，所有这一切都归功于酒中的白 chalky 脊柱。酒中有一丝轻微的花香味道，随着时间的推移，酒会变得更加香艳。建议在2022年至2035年之间品尝。

Western reviews.review:
Ripe black-cherry aromas lead the nose of this wine that's fruity while having just enough structure to promise aging. It's fresh and crisp, with a cut of structure in the background. The aftertaste brings out a smokier, toasty character that does show its future maturation potential.
Barrel Sample: 93-95
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的鼻子中充满了成熟的黑樱桃香气，既有浓郁的果香，又有足够的结构让人预计它会有长久的陈化潜力。酒口清新爽口，结构清晰，后味中出现了烟熏、烘烤的特征，展现出它的未来成熟潜力。

酒评：93-95分（酒桶样品）

Western reviews.review: The 2014 Clos Fourtet has developed a very perfumed bouquet with pure black cherry, raspberry and mineral aromas that seem very precise and relatively sophisticated compared to its Saint Emilion peers. The palate is medium-bodied with supple red cherry and cranberry fruit, the tannins both fine but firm. This is a supremely well-focused Clos Fourtet, perhaps one that shows more restraint than previous vintages, yet there is genuine focus and intensity towards the almost piercing finish with vivid black, mineral-soaked fruit. This is a superb Clos Fourtet that transcends the promise from barrel.
Western reviews.translation: 2014年克洛斯福特（Clos Fourtet）红酒已发展出一种非常芬芳的香气，具有纯粹的黑樱桃、草莓和矿物质香气，似乎比圣埃米利翁（Saint Emilion）同辈更精确和更高级。口感中等体积，具有细腻的红樱桃和草莓果肉，纤维既细腻又坚韧。这是一款极其专注的克洛斯福特红酒，可能比之前的几年更谨慎，但其焦点和强度却是真实的，几乎是刺耳的终曲，具有生动的黑色、矿物质浸泡的果肉。这是一款出色的克洛斯福特红酒，超越了从木桶中释放的承诺。

Western reviews.review: One of my go-to Saint-Émilions from the great crus, the 2014 Clos Fourtet exemplifies how well the Right Bank displays its elegance. The wine offers loads of bright red and black fruit, with notes of earth, dust, and spice. This is one of the world's most serious wines and this vintage is nothing short of excellent. (Tasted: January 27, 2017, San Francisco, CA)
Western reviews.translation: 这是一个来自圣埃米利昂的经典红酒，2014年克洛斯福尔特（Clos Fourtet）是右岸葡萄酒中典型的典雅风格。酒中充满了鲜红和黑色果味，带有泥土、尘土和香料的气息。这是一款世界级的红酒，2014年的品种堪称绝佳。

Western reviews.review: Super wine. Lovely pitch of ripeness. Tiny berry fruit on the nose. Exquisite tannins and texture. Smooth, fine boned and fresh, the limestone terroir evident. Tannins abundant but finely etched. Long, persistent finish. Poised.
Western reviews.translation: 极品红酒。酒体完美的成熟度。鼻子上有细小的浆果果香。口感细腻，纤维柔顺，石灰质土壤的特点明显。纤维丰富但细致。长长的持久尾韵。稳重。

Chinese pairs.original: 能在2021年份酿出这么清澈灵动的Sauternes，我必须向Chateau La Tour Blanche 的技术团队脱帽致敬。品尝这款酒就像吃了一枚千层酥，而且还是夹着冰镇花蜜的千层酥。初始香气比较腼腆，摇杯之后便散发出糖水梨、槐花蜜、茶树菇以及冰皮月饼的复杂芬芳。姜片和花椒粉的辛辣气息赋予这款酒理想的韵律感，而收尾时的酸度又让身形显得玲珑修长。在我看来，这是一款馥郁甜美而又温润细腻的顶级贵腐酒，加上其稀有的产量，值得大家争相收藏。
Chinese pairs.new:
能在2021年份酿出这么清澈灵动的Sauternes，我必须向Chateau La Tour Blanche 的技术团队脱帽致敬。品尝这款酒就像吃了一枚千层酥，而且还是夹着冰镇花蜜的千层酥。初始香气比较腼腆，摇杯之后便散发出糖水梨、槐花蜜、茶树菇以及冰皮月饼的复杂芬芳。姜片和花椒粉的辛辣气息赋予这款酒理想的韵律感，而收尾时的酸度又让身形显得玲珑修长。在我看来，这是一款馥郁甜美而又温润细腻的顶级贵腐酒，加上其稀有的产量，值得大家争相收藏。

Translated Wine Review:

I must tip my hat to the technical team at Chateau La Tour Blanche for crafting such a clear and dynamic Sauternes in 2021. Tasting this wine is like biting into a layered pastry, with the added bonus of frozen honey. The initial aromas are shy, but after swirling, the wine releases a complex bouquet of sugar water pear, acacia honey, mushroom tea, and ice cream pastry. The spicy notes of ginger and pepper add a perfect rhythm to the wine, while the acidity at the finish gives it a lithe and agile shape. In my opinion, this is a sumptuous and refined top-tier dessert wine, made all the more desirable by its rare production, making it a must-collect for many.

English pairs.original: I must tip my hat to the technical team at Chateau La Tour Blanche for making such a clear and lively Sauternes in 2021. Tasting this wine is akin to biting into a multi-layered cake, especially one filled with chilled honey. Initially timid, the aromas blossom after swirling, revealing complex scents of syrup pear, acacia honey, shiitake mushrooms, and ice-skin mooncakes. The spicy notes of ginger and Sichuan pepper lend an ideal rhythmic sensation to the wine, while the acidity towards the finish creates a refined, elegant profile. In my view, this is a luxuriously sweet, yet warmly delicate and smooth top-tier sweet wine. Its rarity and limited production make it a highly coveted item for all Sauternes collectors.
English pairs.new: 我要向沙特酒庄Chateau La Tour Blanche的技术团队致敬，他们在2021年成功制作出如此清晰和生动的沙特酒。品尝这款酒就像咬了一块多层的蛋糕，尤其是那种充满了冷冻蜂蜜的蛋糕。最初的气味很害羞，但旋转后，气味会开花，展现出复杂的香气，如浆果糖浆、阿卡西花蜜、香菇和冰皮月饼。姜和四川胡椒的辣味让酒的节奏变得理想，而酒尾的酸度则创造出一种优雅的、典雅的风格。在我看来，这是一款奢华甜美的酒，但又温暖细腻和平滑的顶级甜酒。由于其稀少和有限的生产量，使得它成为所有沙特酒收藏家追求的珍贵品。

Western reviews.review: Precise and essential, it shows notes of mixed white flowers, crushed stone, ginger, ginseng and chamomile. Full-bodied, harmonious and balanced in the sip, it shows a pleasantly composed and essential sweetness. A blend of 69.5% Sèmillon, 8% Sauvignon and 22.5% Muscadelle. Drink now.
Western reviews.translation: 精致而纯粹，展现出混合白花、碎石、生姜、人参和蒲公英的香气。口感丰富、和谐、平衡，呈现出一种愉悦的纯粹甜度。酒款为69.5%塞米隆、8%索维涅和22.5%穆斯卡德的混合。建议立即饮用。

Western reviews.review: Light yellow-green with silver highlights. A little restrained, notes of peach, ripe gooseberry and white pear, subtle honey nuances. Medium complexity, elegant, well-integrated sweetness, pineapple on the finish, fine minerality, shows balance and length.
Western reviews.translation:
酒色：浅黄绿色，带有银色光泽。

口感：酒味稍微有些克制，带有桃子、成熟的 gooseberry 和白梨的香气，微妙的蜂蜜味。

复杂度：中等，优雅，甜度与酒体完美融合，尾部有菠萝味，矿物质味细腻，表现出平衡和持久性。

Western reviews.review: The wine is a vibrant medium lemon color. The aromas are of citrus (lemon curd) marzipan & vanilla. The palate is very sweet & shows peach, apricot & lifted mandarin-orange peel, followed by a hint of green fruit & cinnamon spice. Alcohol is balanced & the finish is honeyed. The acidity is fresh, but there are perfumed honeysuckle & slightly bitter botrytis notes at the finish. The wine ends sweet, honeyed & a little sticky. 04/22 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒呈现出明亮的中度柠檬色。酒中的香气是柑橘（柠檬酱）、杏仁糖和香草。口感非常甜，展现出桃子、杏子和提亮的橙子皮，随后是绿果和丁香香料的味道。酒中的酒精平衡，尾韵是蜂蜜般的甜。酒中的酸度是新鲜的，但尾韵中有honeysuckle和略带苦的botrytis味道。酒尾是甜的、蜂蜜般的和略带粘稠。 评分：04/22 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 相比期酒时的状态，装瓶后的香气明显更加平和。丰富的烤制化香气已经充分融入浓郁的黑莓和蓝莓果粒中，摇杯之后还泛着奶油黑加仑的香甜气息。高浓郁度的Merlot赋予了这款酒傲人的丰韵感，层层叠叠的草果、孜然以及甘草辛香令口感活泼起来；单宁的质感也比期酒时柔化了不少，还带着一股铅笔芯的回甘，结构庞大扎实且不失平衡感，对于喜欢力量型波尔多的爱好者来说，是最佳选择之一。
Chinese pairs.new: Compared to its state at the same age as the control wine, the aromas after bottling are noticeably smoother. Rich toasted oak aromas have fully integrated into the dense blackberry and blueberry fruit, with a creamy vanilla note emerging after swirling. The high concentration of Merlot lends an impressive velvety texture, with layered notes of grassy herb, cinnamon, and licorice adding a lively feel to the palate; the tannins have also softened significantly, with a pleasant pencil lead sweetness. The structure is massive and solid, yet remains balanced, making it an excellent choice for fans of full-bodied Bordeaux.

English pairs.original: The aromas of the wine are much subtler after bottling than they were en primeur. Well-integrated rich, roasted aromas from the blackberry and blueberry fruit are revealed along with sweet notes of creamy blackcurrant after swirling the glass. The high Merlot concentration gives this wine a sense of proud roundness, with layers of amomum, cumin, and licorice that make the palate so vigorish. The tannins are softer than its en primeur, and there is a smell of pencil-shave on the finish. The structure is large and solid without losing any balance, making it one of the most excellent choices for fans of powerful Bordeaux wine.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的香气在瓶装后比在原瓶时要更加微妙。经过摇晃玻璃后，黑莓和蓝莓的果味呈现出丰富的烤香气，伴随着黑currant的甜味。高浓度的梅洛葡萄使得这瓶酒具有自豪的圆润感，口感丰富，层次感强，带有安息香、孜然和甘草的味道。与原瓶相比，这瓶酒的苦味更柔和，尾部有木屑的味道。酒的结构大而坚实，没有失去平衡，适合喜欢强劲波尔多红酒的酒迷。

Western reviews.review: Lots of blackberry, iodine and crushed stone here. Some black pepper and graphite, too. Full body and medium, fine tannins that have a powdery texture and open in the mouth. So much going on. Iodine and iron undertones with some raw mushroom bring you back for more. Muscular. This is for the cellar.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感丰富，体积中等，纤维细腻，口感柔滑。酒中充满黑莓、碘和碎石的味道，还有黑胡椒和石墨的味道。酒体中还有一些铁和生蘑菇的味道，让人忍不住想要再喝一口。这种酒很有力量，适合放入酒窖中储存。

Western reviews.review: The 2020 Pape Clément is outrageously beautiful. Dark, virile and imposing, the 2020 is a rare vintage of Pape Clément that is vertical and statuesque in feel. Dark fruit, chocolate, new leather, licorice and cloves infuse the palate with tremendous depth. In a word: magnificent. - Antonio Galloni
Western reviews.translation: 2020 年的巴布莱蒙（Pape Clément）简直是美丽无比。深色、雄健、威严，2020 年的巴布莱蒙是一种罕见的品种，具有立体感和高大感。口感丰富，黑果、巧克力、新皮革、甘草和丁香充满了深度。用一句话来说：绝美。 - 安东尼奥·加隆尼（Antonio Galloni）

Western reviews.review: I loved the 2020 Château Pape Clément, and this beauty is up there with the top wines in Pessac. Checking in as equal parts Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot, aged 18 months in 90% barrels and 10% in foudre, it offers a deep purple hue to go with a powerful, concentrated profile displaying both red and black fruits, lots of spicy, chocolate, flowery incense nuances, full-bodied richness, and an almost salty, bloody character on the finish. This beauty shows the concentrated yet utterly classic, focused, elegant style of the vintage and has so much to love.Rating: 97+
Western reviews.translation: 我非常喜欢2020年沙泰乌克莱门特（Château Pape Clément），这瓶美酒与佩萨克（Pessac）地区的顶级葡萄酒齐名。由卡波弗雷蒙（Cabernet Sauvignon）和梅洛（Merlot）两种葡萄酒组成，18个月的陈酿过程中，90%的酒桶和10%的法德（foudre）储存，呈现出深紫色的颜色和强烈浓郁的口感，展现出红果和黑果的风味，伴有大量的香料、巧克力、花香和烟熏味，口感丰富饱满，尾部带有咸味和血液的特征。这瓶美酒展现了浓郁而典雅的风格，具有极高的品质，值得喜爱。评分：97+

Western reviews.review:
This ancient estate, an oasis in the suburbs of Bordeaux city, offers a wine that is packed with promising tannins. The important and rich black fruits reveal concentration, density and the potential of the development of a fine balance and structure as it matures.
Barrel Sample: 94-96
Western reviews.translation:
这座古老的庄园，位于波尔多市郊外，是一个宁静的避风港，生产的红酒充满了有前途的坚果感。重要且丰富的黑色水果展现出浓缩、密度和成熟后细腻平衡和结构的潜力。

酒样评分：94-96分

Western reviews.review: Tannic heft from the get-go, though this does have a lovely fresh, clean and precise core with a narrow, focused frame so the elements come across as quite tight and severe right now but well worked. It has class, no doubt, on the high-toned scale, potent and upfront but there's gorgeous detail and precision to the fruit, acidity and tannins. Slick and classy with lots of glamour that plays to the strengths of the vintage.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒从一开始就展现出厚重的苦味，但它也拥有清新的、干净的、精确的核心，框架窄小，聚焦，元素之间的关系紧密，严谨。它拥有高贵的品质，强烈而直接，但果实、酸度和苦味的细节和精确度令人惊艳。它滑顺、优雅，充满魅力，充分展现了当年酒庄的优势。

Chinese pairs.original: 2019年份的Calon Segur给我展现出了一副“润物细无声”的美好画面，口感柔软的好像是吹弹可破的美人肌肤。摇杯之后所散发出的樱桃和酸枣芬芳十分讨巧，与通透的酒体和绵柔的单宁交相呼应。不知道是不是因为高酒精的原因，2019年份的单宁数量比我想象中更高一些。好在整个结构平衡而扎实，因此毫无违和感，期待陈年后更加精彩的表现。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2019 Calon Segur presented a beautiful picture of "润物细无声" (a Chinese idiom meaning "to make something smooth and subtle"), with a silky texture that felt like delicate skin. After swirling the glass, the aromas of cherry and apricot were released, complementing the wine's transparency and soft tannins. Although the high alcohol content may have contributed to a slightly higher tannin level than expected, the overall structure was well-balanced and solid, resulting in a harmonious taste experience. I look forward to seeing how it will evolve with aging.

English pairs.original: The 2019 Calon Segur offers me a beautiful picture of “moisturizing and silent”, with a soft taste like the glowing skin. The bouquet of cherries and jujubes is charming after swirling the glass, echoing the transparent body and soft tannins. It seems the tannins in 2019 are higher than I thought, I don’t know whether it’s because of high alcohol. Fortunately, the whole structure is balanced and stable. I am looking forward to a more remarkable performance after aging.
English pairs.new: 2019年卡隆塞古尔给我呈现出了一幅美丽的画面——“滋润而安静”，口感柔和如同光滑的皮肤。酒中樱桃和枸杞的香气在旋转酒杯后变得迷人，反映了酒体的透明度和柔韧的苦味。看起来2019年的苦味比我想象的要高一些，我不确定是因为酒精含量太高。幸运的是，整体结构是平衡和稳定的。经过陈化，我期待着酒会表现出更出色的表现。

Western reviews.review: Dark, firm with great intensity and rich fruits, this is a powerful wine. Its richness is opened up by the succulent acidity and fine freshness coming from the fruit. Together, the elements work well, power and fruit in harmony. Drink the wine from 2027. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒深色、坚实，具有强烈的浓郁果味，是一款强劲的葡萄酒。其丰富的口感由果味中的清新酸度和细致的新鲜感打开。所有元素之间的和谐使得这款葡萄酒的力量和果味得到了完美的平衡。建议从2027年开始饮用。- 罗杰·沃斯

Western reviews.review: Power, purity, complexity, and richness combine to produce stunning levels of intensity, length, and freshness. The depth of fruit here is almost off the charts. Almost opaque in color, the wine is all about its display of spices, blackberries, black plums, black currants, mint, espresso, and tobacco leaf character. Perfectly balanced, poised, and rich, the tannins are polished and refined, making this beauty effortless to drink. This is a very textural wine that is clearly one of the stars of the vintage. Drink from 2030-2060. 98 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的力量、纯粹性、复杂性和丰富性完美结合，产生了惊人的强度、长度和新鲜感。酒中的水果深度几乎达到极限。酒色几乎透明，酒的香气展现出各种香料、黑莓、黑杏、黑樱桃、薄荷、咖啡和烟草叶的特征。酒的平衡、姿势和丰富感完美，纤维素细致、精致，使得这瓶美酒轻松饮用。这是一瓶非常丰富的酒，显然是当年最好的酒之一。建议从2030年到2060年饮用。评分98分。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby, opaque core, purple reflections, delicate rim brightening. Black berries, a hint of bergamot and Darjeeling tea, blueberry and cedar wood, exotic bouquet. Powerful, juicy and sweet, chocolaty nuances, firm, supporting tannins, savoury on the finish, has great savouriness and length, characterised by the use of wood, which helps to overcome the lack of density, almost peppery nuances in the aftertaste, ripe heart cherry in the back, certain ageing potential for many years.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，透明核心，紫色反射，细微的边缘亮度。黑莓、 bergamot 和 Darjeeling 茶的微妙混合，蓝莓和红木，异国情调的香气。强烈、浓郁、甜美，巧克力般的细微差别，坚实的、支持性的纤维素，口感咸淡，持久，木质味道的特点，帮助弥补密度不足，几乎有辣椒般的余味，熟透的樱桃在后面，多年来都有很好的陈化潜力。
