Western reviews.review: Deep, dark ruby red color is not quite opaque. The dark fruit aromas are fresh & leafy with graphite hints. The palate is wonderfully harmonious with earthy notes complementing ripe blackcurrant. There is sufficient fruit concentration to balance the warming alcohol. Fresh acidity gives the wine good length. Licorice notes adorn a very elegant & earthy finish. 10/23 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒呈现出深红宝石色，略微透明。酒中浓郁的果香带有新鲜的叶子和石墨的味道。口感优雅和谐，泥土味与成熟的黑加仑相得益彰。酒中果实浓度足够平衡酒精的暖感。清新酸度使酒的余味延长。酒尾带有 licorice 的味道，呈现出优雅和泥土的风格。评分：10/23 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 太妃糖，奶油，干杏和焦糖的香气，酒体饱满，口感甜蜜厚重，带有蜂蜜和焦糖的味道，回味悠久而丰富，充满甜蜜的果实香气。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich caramel, buttery notes, and hints of almond and toffee on the nose. The full-bodied palate is sweet and luscious, with flavors of honey and toffee, and a long, rich finish filled with sweet fruit aromas.

Western reviews.review: Shows enticing aromas of toffee, cream, dried apricot and caramel. Full-bodied, very sweet and thick, with honey and caramel flavors. Long and rich, oozing with sweet, ripe fruit, this is like liquid candy. Best after 2016.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有诱人的香气，带有糖浆、奶油、干枳实和焦糖的味道。口感丰富、甜度极高、浓稠，带有蜂蜜和焦糖的风味。长长的口感，甜美的果味充满，像液体糖果一样。建议在2016年后品尝。

Western reviews.review: Tasted blind against the Rieussec 2001 as a comparison, the Château Rieussec 2005 has a more airy bouquet at first and here I find more mineralité on the nose, more precision and focus that the Rieussec 2001. The palate is clean and fresh with vibrant acidity, real tension here with marmalade, lemon curd, apricot and cold stone. Wonderful acidity is interwoven throughout this Sauternes that demonstrates real race and sophistication. It is not as rich or as hedonistic as the Rieussec 2001, but I think the slightly better wine. More breeding and energy. Do not overlook this gem.
Western reviews.translation: 在没有看到酒瓶标签的情况下，尝试了2001年和2005年的沙特酒（Château Rieussec）并进行了比较，2005年的沙特酒在鼻子里更为清新，闻起来有更多的矿物质味道，精确度和焦点都比2001年要高。口感清新，带有活跃的酸度，酒中有橙子酱、柠檬酱、杏子和冷石的味道。这个沙特酒中酸度的运用非常出色，展现出真正的竞争力和高雅。虽然它没有2001年的沙特酒那么丰富和享受，但我认为它是一个更好的酒。它有更高的品质和能量。不要忽视这个珍品。

Western reviews.review: You get both apricots and honeyed botrytis aromas that are followed through by a dry core, very full-bodied with richness, the sweetness of the yellow jam fruits, apricots and mangoes gliding over the palate. Delicious, and certainly ageworthy.
Western reviews.translation: 你会品尝到杏子的和被霉菌感染的枳实的甜香气，之后是干燥的核心，酒体丰富富有厚度，黄色果酱的甜味，杏子和芒果在口中流动。非常美味，绝对值得长期储存。

Chinese pairs.original: Clerc Milon 2018可以用四个字来形容：血统纯正。那种流畅感让我在入口的瞬间就忍不住地往下咽。丰韵多汁而又香甜可口的梅子、李子以及桑甚果汁相当诱人。丝滑的单宁彷如绫罗绸缎，在本就柔嫩的基础上又附上一层光泽。喝到这种温柔贤惠的酒，谁又能够抗拒的了呢？
Chinese pairs.new: Clerc Milon 2018 can be summed up in four words: pure heritage. The smoothness is so captivating that I couldn't help but swallow it down immediately. The luscious, juicy, and sweet flavors of plum, cherry, and quince are incredibly alluring. The silky tannins are like silk, adding a layer of luster to the already delicate base. Who can resist this gentle and wise wine?

English pairs.original: If I have to use one word to express Clerc Milon 2018, that is PURITY. I can’t stop myself from swallowing once it touches my palate. This wine brings out ample yet juicy plum, black brin, and mulberries, with a trace of Chinese silk-like tannins on the backbone, like sprinkling a layer of glory on my palate. When you meet such a gentle and virtuous wine, I don’t know who can resist it.
English pairs.new: 如果我要用一个词来描述克莱尔米隆2018，那就是纯粹。它一触及我的舌头，我就无法自制地吞咽。这个酒展现出丰富而又浓郁的黑桃、黑葡萄和黑杏，带有丝绸般的细腻口感，像在我的舌头上洒下一层光环。当你遇到这样温柔而又纯真的酒时，我不知道谁能抵抗它的魅力。

Western reviews.review: This opulent wine is as bold with its fruit as with its tannins. The initial velvet texture masks the dense structure that will allow it to age impressively. Blackberry flavors, acidity and intense richness are coming together in a welter of ripe fruits. Drink from 2026.
Western reviews.translation: 这款豪华的红酒在果味和苦味方面都表现出极大的胆识。初期的绵软口感掩盖了其厚实的结构，这使得它能够在令人印象深刻的时间内陈化。黑莓的风味、酸度和浓郁的丰富感在成熟的水果的海洋中融合在一起。建议从2026年开始饮用。

Western reviews.review: This is an extremely successful Clerc Milon in a run of great vintages at the property. Lovely purity, clear big tannins, and real poise and tension. Persistent, succulent, full of cassis, liquorice and crushed mint. Seriously impressive and will go the distance. Harvest from 17 September to 10 October. Blend completed by 3% Petit Verdot and 1% Carmenère. Drinking Window 2026 - 2045
Western reviews.translation: 这是克莱尔米隆酒庄在一系列出色的年份中取得的极大成功。酒中呈现出美好的纯净度、清晰的坚果味和真正的平衡和紧张感。酒口持久、醇厚、充满黑加仑、酒精和碎薄荷的味道。酒的表现非常出色，值得期待。酒庄采摘时间为9月17日至10月10日。酒中含有3%的佩蒂维多和1%的卡门埃雷。推荐饮用时间：2026-2045年。

Western reviews.review: COMMENTARY: The 2018 Château Clerc Milon is one of this vintage's rock stars. TASTING NOTES: This wine excels with outstanding aromas and flavors of black fruit and oak, as well as other indescribable nuances. Give it a few years in the cellar before opening. (Tasted: June 25, 2021, San Francisco, CA)
Western reviews.translation:
评论：2018年克莱尔米隆酒庄的红酒是这一年产出的明星之一。 

品评：这款红酒以优异的黑果和橡木香气和风味而闻名，另外还有许多无法形容的细微差别。建议将其放入酒窖几年后再饮用。 (品尝时间：2021年6月25日，美国加州旧金山)

Western reviews.review: Blackcurrants, tobacco, graphite, cloves and dried leaves on the nose. It’s medium-to full-bodied with firm, tightly knit tannins. Structured and compact with a long, mineral finish. Tight and austere. Very pretty structure here. Wait until 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中有黑currant、烟草、石墨、丁香和干燥的叶子。口感中等到中等以上，具有坚实的、紧密编织的橡皮质。结构紧凑，矿物质尾部长。紧致冷峻。结构非常美观。建议等到2025年再喝。

Western reviews.review: The 2018 Clerc Milon is a blend of 60% Cabernet Sauvignon, 27% Merlot, 9% Cabernet Franc, 3% Petit Verdot and 1% Carménère. Medium to deep garnet-purple in color, it has a very pure, beautifully delineated nose of crushed blackcurrants, fresh black plums and boysenberries with hints of wild thyme, damp soil, tar and black olives. The medium to full-bodied palate offers taut, muscular black fruit with loads of savory layers and a firm, grainy texture, finishing long and mineral tinged. Rating: 94+
Western reviews.translation: 2018年克莱尔米隆红酒是一种混合酒，含有60%卡波内尔·萨维尼诺、27%梅洛、9%卡波内尔·法兰克、3%佩蒂·维多和1%卡门雷。其颜色为深红色至紫红色，酒香清晰、细致，展现出黑加仑、黑浆果和黑莓的香气，伴有野生香草、潮湿土壤、焦油和黑橄榄的余味。口感中等至中厚，展现出紧致的黑果味，伴有大量的咸味层次和坚实的粗糙质感，余味长长且带有矿物质味。评分：94+.

Chinese pairs.original: 陈年13载，Chateau Pape Clement 2009 已然化身为一枚醇香四溢的黑松露，摇杯之后还泛着香甜软糯的黑莓樱桃，以及层层缭绕的榛果芳香，美艳地让人不敢多看一眼。醇厚的单宁轻抚着味蕾，在唇齿之间铺上了一条羊绒围巾。口感浓郁的像是加了可可粉的热牛奶，含在口中不但暖洋洋的，还透着某种“睿智”与“老练”。
Chinese pairs.new:
Aged for 13 years, the 2009 Chateau Pape Clement has transformed into a rich, full-bodied black truffle, releasing sweet and velvety blackberry and cherry notes after swirling the glass, along with layers of hazelnut aromas. Its beauty is so captivating that you can't help but stare.

The rich tannins caress the palate, leaving a soft, plush sensation between the lips. The full-bodied texture is reminiscent of hot chocolate with a hint of cocoa powder, warming the mouth and exuding a sense of wisdom and sophistication.

English pairs.original: After 13 years of bottle aging, Chateau Pape Clement 2009 has become a piece of adorable black truffle. After shaking the glass, it delivers sweet and mild blackberries, cherries, and layers of hazelnut, which is so beautiful that people dare not take a second glimpse. The mellow tannins caress the taste buds like a cashmere spread between lips and teeth. The generous taste is like a cup of hot milk with cocoa powder, revealing a sense of warmness and a certain “wisdom” in the aftertaste.
English pairs.new: 经过13年的瓶龄，查塔普克莱门特2009年红酒已经变得像一块可爱的黑松露一样。摇晃玻璃后，红酒释放出甜蜜的黑莓、草莓和层次丰富的杏仁味道，如此美丽，人们不敢再多看一眼。柔和的苦味物质像丝绸般抚慰舌头，像唇和牙齿之间的丝绸般温柔。丰富的口感像一杯热牛奶加上可可粉，展现出温暖和某种“智慧”的余味。

Western reviews.review: Feinwürziger, rotfruchtiger und mit mehr florale Noten als Baron, die Nase ist super komplex, ein wahres Gedicht. Im Gaumen konzentriert, dicht, sehr gut strukturiert, auch dieser Wein noch ungemein jugendlich, mit markanten jedoch sehr fein gewobenen Gerbstoffen und einer ausgezeichneten Säure ausgestattet. Lang, klassisch, schön! 2023-2040, 19.5 vvPunkte (97/100)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论，翻译成中文如下：

这款红酒具有细微的果香，红果味和更多的花朵香气，超过了巴隆（Baron）。酒鼻子非常复杂，像一首诗。口感集中，浓郁，结构非常完美，这款酒仍然非常年轻，具有明显但非常细致的橡木味和出色的酸度。酒体长长，典型，美丽！推荐饮用时间：2023-2040，评分：19.5分（相当于97/100分）。

Western reviews.review: Deep garnet in color, the wine inches closer to maturity with truffle, cigar box, leather, salty plums, tobacco leaf and red berries. Full-bodied, lushly textured, with ripe, polished, round tannins and some oak remaining to be resolved, the finish serves up layers of ripe, dark, velvet textured, polished fruits. This is still primary, so 6-8 more years of aging will come close to bringing this around. If you cannot wait that long, give it 2-3 hours of air. 97 Points
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，酒精含量逐渐趋于成熟，带有松露、雪茄盒、皮革、咸梅、烟草叶和红果的香气。酒体丰富，质地丰富细腻，具有成熟的、光滑的、圆润的橡皮质感，部分橡木味尚未消散，尾部呈现成熟的、黑暗的、细腻的、光滑的果味。酒仍处于初期阶段，6-8年储存将使其趋于成熟。如果您无法等待那么长时间，请给予2-3小时氧化。评分97分。

Western reviews.review: Deep garnet-red. Nose of black berry fruits and toasted notes showing harmony throughout. Powerful, generous and melted at point of entry. Sensation of fullness and power lasting well through to the finish. A harmonious, forceful style.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色。酒香中充满黑莓果味和烤香味，整体和谐。入口强劲、丰富、圆润。酒体丰满、持久，直到尾部仍然感受到强劲的力量。是一种和谐而有力风格的红酒。

Western reviews.review: Der Ausbau hat für den nötigen Schliff gesorgt, die Balance stimmt, das Holz ist zurückhaltend, die Fruchtnoten im Finale viel versprechend: erfreuliche Entwicklung, noch einmal besser als en Primeur. Kann mit der Reife noch einen halben Punkt zulegen.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒经过精心的调理，已经达到完美的平衡，木质味道适度，酒尾的果味非常有前途：令人高兴的进步，甚至超过了初次品尝时的水平。随着酒的成熟，可能还会有进一步的提高。

Western reviews.review: This is a richly structured wine with beautiful perfumes emanating from the bouquet. The rich, stalky texture is balanced by the flavors of dark chocolate and black currant jelly. It's big, ripe and full of potential, a fine balance between opulence and ageworthiness.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一款结构丰富的红酒，瓶内气味优美。酒体丰富、带有干草味，配以黑巧克力和黑currant果酱的风味。酒体丰富、成熟，充满潜力，完美地平衡了奢华和耐存性。

Chinese pairs.original: 当酸梅果酱和葡萄干撒在冰沙上的时候，你已经开始进入Pontet-Canet 2018的奇妙之旅。香气纯净而浓郁，在杯子中仿佛能够找到水晶般的五彩光芒（2018年份全部在陶罐中发酵）。丰满而多汁的口感极富诱惑力，在酒精能量感的衬托下充满动感，能够感受到轻柔的手工踩皮的神奇功效。虽然收尾的时候有明显的温度感，但始终保持了平衡的酒体。是一款经典的Pontet-Canet出品。
Chinese pairs.new: As the tart cherry compote and raisins are sprinkled over the ice, you're already embarking on a magical journey with Pontet-Canet 2018. The aroma is pure and intense, with a crystalline sparkle that seems to emanate from the glass (all 2018 vintages were fermented in clay pots). The full-bodied, juicy texture is incredibly seductive, with a dynamic energy that's amplified by the alcohol's presence and a subtle, hand-crafted tannic texture. Although there's a noticeable warmth at the finish, the wine remains beautifully balanced. A classic Pontet-Canet.

English pairs.original: When sour plum sauce and raisin intersperse on the ice slush, you have been the miraculous chapter of Pontet-Canet 2018. The nose is crystal clean yet highly concentrated, and sometimes I can even feel colorful glory in my glass (100% fermented in amphora). The juicy and ample palate is very seductive; with the help of generous alcohol, the whole body becomes more dynamic. The silky tannins are stunning; it seems that 100% manual punching-down plays a magical role. Even if there is a bit of warmness on the finish, this wine always keeps the balance. Absolutely a classical Pontet-Canet.
English pairs.new: 当酸梅酱和葡萄干在冰沙中交织时，你就体验到了2018年波内特-卡内特的神奇篇章。酒鼻清晰而浓郁，偶尔还能感受到色彩斑斓的辉煌（全程在陶器中发酵）。滋润的口感丰富诱人，酒精的慷慨使得整个口感更加动态。细腻的纹理令人惊艳，似乎100%的手动压榨发挥了神奇的作用。即使有微微的余热，但这酒始终保持着平衡。绝对是典型的波内特-卡内特。

Western reviews.review: Inky in color, you have a hard time seeing into the glass. The wine opens with notes of wet clay, flowers, black plums, truffle, black currants, and blackberries. On the palate, the wine is intensely concentrated with seemingly endless layers of rich, deep, opulent, black, and red fruits. There is an opulence to the fruits, along with freshness and velvet-textured tannins that make you want to go back for sip after sip. The endnote with a refreshing touch of mint and spice is exactly the perfect touch. Give this another decade in the cellar to age and it will be incredible for at least another 2-3 decades after that. Not much of this gem is going to be available as yields were only 11 hectoliters per hectare due to outbreaks of mildew. This is a candidate for triple-digits when fully mature! The wine blends 70% Cabernet Sauvignon, 22% Merlot, 5% Cabernet Franc and 3% Petit Verdot. 14.5% ABV. Drink from 2032-2065.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色深如墨汁，几乎看不到酒液。酒体开启时，闻到泥土、花朵、黑杏子、松露、黑葡萄和黑莓的气息。口感上，酒体浓郁丰富，层次丰富，黑色和红色水果的味道似乎无穷无尽。水果的滋味丰富而又清新，纤维质的苦味让人忍不住想要再次品尝。酒尾带有清新且微带香料的薄荷气息，完美地结束了这瓶酒的口感。将这瓶酒再放置十年后，会让它在至少另外20-30年后仍然保持其惊人的风味。由于霉菌病害导致产量仅为每公顷11公升，这瓶珍品将难以找到。等到它完全成熟时，它将成为百分之百的顶级红酒！这瓶酒的组成比例为70%卡波内托葡萄，22%梅洛葡萄，5%卡波内托法兰克葡萄和3%佩蒂·维多葡萄。酒精度14.5%。建议在2032-2065年之间品尝。

Western reviews.review: Unterscheidet sich von allen anderen Weinen zuerst einmal durch seine umwerfende aromatische Komplexität. Da gibt es Noten von Trockenfrüchten wie Dattel oder Backpflaume, aber auch mineralische und kräuterige Komponenten. Im Mund ist der Wein fest gebaut, von grosser Tiefe, die Tannine besitzen besonderen Schliff, die aromatische Länge wird durch die Säure gestützt. Das Ganze macht bereits Vergnügen und kann doch reifen: dieser Weine erzählt keine Geschichte, sondern einen Roman.
Western reviews.translation: 这个红酒与其他红酒不同，首先是因为它的令人惊叹的芳香复杂性。它带有干果的香味，如枣子或烤石榴，甚至还有矿物质和草药的成分。在口中，酒精浓郁，深度极大，苦味有特殊的锋利，芳香持久性得到了酸度的支持。整个体验既令人愉悦，又有潜力成长：这个酒不仅仅讲述了一场故事，还讲述了一部小说。

Western reviews.review: This wine combines the richness of the vintage with a sophisticated structure of smoky tannins and spicy wood aging. It is still young, with a powerful structure and ripe, vibrant black-currant fruits. The wine needs plenty of aging. Drink from 2028. Organic and biodynamic. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒融合了丰富的酒龄与烟熏般的坚果味和香木陈化的复杂结构。虽然它仍然年轻，但其强烈的结构和浓郁的黑加仑果味仍然让人印象深刻。需要长时间的陈化。建议2028年后饮用。该酒采用有机和生物动力学生产。- 罗杰·沃斯

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby garnet, purple reflections, DELICATE rim brightening. Ripe dark berries, black heart cherries, a breath of figs and nougat, candied purples and fine noble wood nuances in the background, very multilayered bouquet. Substantial and complex, sweet wild berryish fruit, fine nougat, ripe, silky but supporting tannins, has impressive length and savouriness, a multi-faceted companion at the table. (2020-2060).
Western reviews.translation: 深红色宝石色，紫色反射，细微的边缘闪亮。成熟的黑berry、黑心杏仁、浓郁的浆果和杏仁味道，糖浆紫色和精致的高贵木质香气在背景中，非常多层次的香气。丰富复杂，甜野果味的果实，精致的杏仁，成熟，细腻但支撑性的纤维素，具有令人印象深刻的长度和浓郁的味道，一种多面体的餐桌伴侣。（2020-2060）

Western reviews.review: (70% Cabernet Sauvignon, 25% Merlot, 5% Cabernet Franc, 3% Petit Verdot. Aufgrund der biodynamischen Arbeitsweise war Pontet Canet massiv vom Mehltau betroffen und fuhr nur eine sehr, sehr kleine Ernte ein): Dichtes, dunkles Rubin. Die Nase, ein Traum, intensiv, tief, sehr dunkelfruchtig, Brombeeren, auch reife Himbeeren, Cassisfrucht, ein nobles Parfum mit vielen floralen Noten und Gewürzen, hochkomplex, man möchte Eintauchen. Im Gaumen weich, rund, sehr zugänglich, zeigt anfangs keinerlei Ecken und Kanten, der Wein hat Körper und viel Druck, eine süsse, reife Frucht tanzt hier mit einem Gerbstoffgerüst, das Seinesgleichen sucht, das explodiert förmlich am Gaumen, füllt diesen aus, bleibt trotz der Vollmundigkeit sehr finnessenreiChâteau Ein Kraftprotz und eine Ballerina zugleiChâteau Sensationell. 2027-2050+ (Verkostet auf Château Pontet-Canet, am 05.04.2019)
Western reviews.translation:
酒款：普农特-卡内特（Château Pontet-Canet）

酒款成分：70% 卡波内尔·萨旺（Cabernet Sauvignon）、25% 美乐托（Merlot）、5% 卡波内尔·法兰克（Cabernet Franc）、3% Petit Verdot

酒款特点：由于采用生物动力农业方法，普农特-卡内特遭受了严重的霜冻，产量极低。

酒款颜色：深红色

酒款香气：梦幻般的香气，浓郁、深邃、非常浓郁的果香，含有浆果、黑莓、黑加仑等，具有高级的香味和多种花香和香料，非常复杂，令人欲罢不能。

酒款口感：柔和、圆润、非常容易入口，初期没有任何硬度或粗糙感，酒体丰富、压力大，甜美的成熟果肉与坚果味融合在一起，酒中的干酪味非常出色，充满了活力，尽管酒体丰富，但仍然非常细腻。

酒款评价：这是一款强大的酒款和细腻的酒款的完美结合，非常出色。推荐储存时间：2027-2050年。

Chinese pairs.original: 这款酒像是Mosel和Puligny的融合体，每一个细节都闪烁着着花火。香气成熟而丰满，带着浓浓的香蕉梨、菠萝蜜以及番石榴的芬芳。入口时淡淡的汽油感带着几分高冷范儿，和口中饱满油润的酒体形成了强烈的对比度，酸度比我想象中要柔和一些。整体而言平顺而流畅，让我沉浸其中。假以时日必成大器。
Chinese pairs.new:
This wine is a fusion of Mosel and Puligny, with every detail sparkling like fireworks. The aroma is mature and full-bodied, with intense scents of banana pear, pineapple, and passionfruit. 

Upon entry, a subtle petrol note adds a touch of sophistication, contrasting beautifully with the rich, velvety texture in the mouth. The acidity is softer than I expected. Overall, it's smooth and effortless, drawing me in. With time, it will surely reach its full potential.

English pairs.original: This wine is like the beautiful marriage of Mosel and Puligny; it seems very detail shines sparkles in my glass. Moreish William pear dances with beautiful tropical fruits of luxuriant pineapple and guava on the nose. Hints of petrol notes deliver a sense of German-like arrogance, which contrasts entirely with the oily body on the palate. The acidity is softer than I expected; it gently flows from head to toe, giving me a vocal and smooth mouth feeling towards the finish.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒就像美丽的婚姻，结合了莫泽尔和普利尼的优点；它在我眼前闪闪发光，细节非常完美。口感中，甜美的会aims梨与丰富的热带水果，如菠萝和凤梨，进行着美妙的舞蹈。汽油味的暗示，带来了一种典型的德国风格的傲慢感，这与口感中的油腻体感形成了鲜明的对比。酸度比我预期的要软一些；它轻轻地从头到尾流动，给我留下了一个清脆而又顺滑的口感，直到最后。

Western reviews.review: Pure perfection in a glass, the 2016 offers notes of cherry, liquorice, smoke, graphite, plum and eucalyptus. It is fresh and racy. This is a perfectly balanced wine, full of energy and freshness, juicy and fleshy on the palate, with a classic tannic frame and a long yet persistent finish. Drink it over the coming two or three decades. Bravo!
Western reviews.translation: 一瓶完美的红酒，2016年版的口感丰富，带有樱桃、甘草、烟草、石墨、浆果和桉树的香气。酒体清新、果香，口感平衡，充满活力和新鲜感，口感丰富、肉感，搭配典型的坚果味和持久的尾韵。建议在未来两到三十年内品尝。

Western reviews.review: Quite ripe, with lush waves of cassis, cherry preserve and raspberry puree flavors gliding through in no hurry, but maintaining definition and cut along the way as bramble, tar and melted licorice snap notes slowly emerge throughout. The finish features an intense echo of pastis and sweet tobacco, showing serious latent grip. Best from 2023 through 2038.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感非常成熟，展现出浓郁的黑加仑、樱桃果酱和莓果泥的风味，缓慢流动但保持清晰和锋利。随着荆棘、焦炭和熔化的甘草的味道逐渐出现，酒体变得更加复杂。尾部呈现出强烈的安格斯酒和甜烟的回音，展现出强烈的潜在抓握力。建议在2023年至2038年内饮用。

Western reviews.review: Composed of 65% Cabernet Sauvignon, 30% Merlot, 4% Cabernet Franc and 1% Petit Verdot and matured in 60% new oak for 18 months, the 2016 Smith Haut Lafitte has a very deep garnet-purple color, opening with sensuous scents of warm black cherries, blackberry pie, star anise and fragrant lilacs with hints of chocolate box, cigar box and pencil lead plus wafts of truffles and crushed rocks. Medium to full-bodied, rich and seductive, it completely fills the palate with perfumed black berry preserves and superbly plush tannins, finishing epically long and beautifully layered.
Western reviews.translation:
2016年史密斯豪拉菲特红酒，主要由65%卡波弗雷蒙、30%梅洛、4%卡波弗朗和1%佩蒂·维多特组成，-aged在60%新橡木桶中18个月。该酒呈现出非常深的红紫色，开瓶后释放出温暖黑樱桃、黑莓派、星安赛和芳香的百合花香气，伴有巧克力盒、雪茄盒和铅笔头的微妙气息，最后带有松露和碎石子的幽香。

口感中等到中厚，富有魅力且诱人，酒液充满了香气的黑莓果酱和极好的柔软橡皮质，完美的长尾和精致的层次。

Western reviews.review: The blackcurrant and blueberry aromas are lifted and beautiful. Lots of flowers, too, together with some mushroom and dried-flower undertones. Full-bodied with firm and very silky tannins giving a lovely texture. Bright acidity lifts the finish and gives it drive and force. Better after 2025
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气非常美丽，带有黑currant和蓝berry的味道，伴随着大量的花朵香气，以及一些蘑菇和干花的底调。口感丰富，纤维和非常细滑的橡皮质感让人感到舒适。酒精的酸度清晰明亮，给了酒尾一个强烈的推动力和力量。建议在2025年后再次品尝。

Western reviews.review: This hugely dense wine is complex and full of juicy, succulent, smoky Cabernet Sauvignon. The tannins are at the service of the fruits. The wine still has a long way to go before maturity. Don’t think about drinking it before 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒非常浓郁，复杂且富有水果的香气，带有烟熏的Cabernet Sauvignon风味。酒中的苦味物质服务于水果的风味。酒还需要时间来成熟，建议不要在2025年之前饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 2023年份的Chateau Trotte Vieille 汁水饱满而又精致细腻，它对石灰岩风土的表达超级清楚，仿佛有一块圣洁的白色石灰岩从深紫色的酒液中缓缓升起。2023年份的果香也非常成熟，丝滑的单宁轻轻地铺在舌面，既有经典的甜美感又带着理想的层次。在高酸度和紫罗兰花香的陪伴下，整个味蕾都笼罩在一片优雅之中。收尾时刷刷作响的石灰岩单宁绝对是点睛之笔，不但弱化了15度的酒精感，更是彰显出顶级风土的蓝血气质。
Chinese pairs.new: 2023年份的Chateau Trotte Vieille 具有丰富的汁水和细腻的口感，清晰地展现了石灰岩风土的特征，仿佛一块洁白的石灰岩从深紫色的酒液中缓缓升起。酒中的果香也非常成熟，细致的单宁轻轻地覆盖在舌头上，既有典型的甜美感又带有理想的层次感。在高酸度和紫罗兰花香的伴随下，整个口感都被优雅的氛围所笼罩。酒尾处的石灰岩单宁的出现是关键的一步，不仅弱化了15度的酒精感，还展现了顶级风土的高贵气质。

English pairs.original: The 2023 Chateau Trotte Vieille exudes richness and finesse, vividly articulating its limestone spirit as if a holy white limestone elegantly rising from the deep purple drops. The fruit notes of this vintage are deeply ripened, and the silky tannins spread smoothly across the palate, offering both a classic sweetness and desirable complexity. Accompanied by high acidity and the scent of violets. The finale, marked by the crisp snap of chalky tannins, not only tempers the warmth of 15% alcohol but also accentuates the aristocratic character of this prime terroir.
English pairs.new: 2023年夏特罗特维埃尔（Chateau Trotte Vieille）红酒展现出丰富的质感和细致的风格，生动地体现出其石灰质的精神，就像一尊从深紫色的液体中优雅升起的白色石灰岩。 这个年份的果香已经成熟，细致的纤维素在口感上平滑流动，既有典型的甜度，又有令人垂涎的复杂性。伴随着高的酸度和紫罗兰的香气。结尾，由于坚果的清脆感，15%的酒精的温暖感受也被调节了，同时也凸显了这个顶级土壤的贵族性。

Western reviews.review: Expressiv und mit viel dunkler Frucht, steinig unterlegt, mit Luft florale Noten; knackig am Gaumen, dicht gebaut, ausgezeichnete Tannine, reife Frucht, grosse Länge; endet rotfruchtig auf Sauerkirschen. Ein sehr eleganter Trotte-Vieille! 2028-2058
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论，翻译成中文如下：

表达丰富，充满深色果味，石质底调，带有空气中的花香；口感清脆，结构紧密，出色的苦味，成熟的果味，长长的尾部；结尾是红果味，特别是酸枣味。是一款非常优雅的托特维耶酒！推荐储存时间：2028-2058年。

Western reviews.review: Expressiv und mit viel dunkler Frucht, steinig unterlegt, mit L uft florale Noten; knackig am Gaumen, dicht gebaut, ausgezeichnete Tannine, reife Frucht, grosse Länge; endet rotfruchtig auf Sauerkirschen. Ein sehr eleganter Trotte-Vieille!
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

表达丰富，充满深色果味，石质底调，带有花香的气息；口感清脆，结构紧密，出色的苦味，成熟的果味，长长的尾部；结尾是红果味，特别是酸枣的味道。是一款非常优雅的托特维耶酒。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark purple-red in color, but not quite opaque. The aromas have a very intense violet perfume. The palate is very mineral/saline in nature with restrained dark cherry & black olive flavors opening on the mid-palate. The structure is very fine & quite firm with a graphite smoothness. The wine is medium-bodied, it's alcohol is balanced & the wine has a good freshness. The dark fruit finish is long & lean with licorice touches. 04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深紫红色，但不完全透明。酒中的香气非常浓郁，带有紫罗兰的花香。口感非常矿物质和咸味，中口处有黑樱桃和黑橄榄的味道。酒的结构非常细致，坚实，口感滑顺如 graphite。酒的体积中等，酒精度合适，酒有很好的新鲜感。酒尾的黑果味道长且清晰，有 licorice 的味道。评分：04/24 (ep) DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 浓郁的杏仁与香橙气息，并带有丰富的贵腐类香气；酒质油滑，丰腴。口感集中，结尾香味浓郁。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich almond and orange blossom aromas, with a hint of opulence and richness. The texture is smooth and velvety, with a concentrated palate and a long, intense finish.

Western reviews.review: Served from an ex-chateau bottle. The 1995 Chateau d’Yquem is moving into its secondary aroma phase. A deep golden color, it has a dense and almost Barsac-like bouquet with tangerine, apricot, acacia and melted candle wax. It displays good intensity, unfolding beautifully in the glass. The palate has a strident opening, with a slight bitter edge that lends this Yquem great tension. One can discern layers of marmalade infused with honey fruit, with a powerful, spicy finish that lingers long in the mouth. This is drinking perfectly now, but will surely age with style over many years.
Western reviews.translation: 从原瓶中打开。1995年夏特奥伊克姆（Chateau d’Yquem）正进入其次要香气阶段。它呈现出深金色的颜色，具有浓密的几乎巴萨克（Barsac）般的香气，带有橙子、橙子、艾灸和熔化蜡烛的气味。它展现出良好的浓度，在玻璃中展开得非常美丽。口感强烈开场，带有轻微的苦味，这使得奥伊克姆具有极大的张力。可以辨别出蜂蜜果酱的层次，带有蜂蜜的果味，具有强烈的辣味，口感持久。它现在正是最佳饮用时刻，但它将会在多年后以优雅的方式成熟。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有奶油，香草与成熟苹果的味道。酒体饱满，有很多甜味和辣味，以及杏和蜂蜜回味。完美的浓度和平衡，甜美和丰富。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich and creamy texture with notes of vanilla, grass, and ripe apple. Full-bodied with a sweet and spicy flavor profile, accompanied by hints of almond and honey on the finish. Perfect balance and concentration, with a sweet and opulent character.

Western reviews.review: Golden yellow. Butterscotch and vanilla, with hints of ripe apples. Full-bodied, with lots of sweetness and a spicy apricot and honey aftertaste. Excellent concentration and balance. Loads of botrytis character on the finish. Intense. Hard not to drink now because it's so luscious and rich. Best after 2008.
Western reviews.translation: 金黄色。有奶油糖和香草的味道，带有成熟苹果的余味。酒体丰富，甜度高，后味有辣椒枣和蜂蜜的味道。酒精浓度高，酒体平衡。酒尾有大量的霉菌感染特征。酒精强烈，很难抵抗这种醇厚的酒的诱惑。最好在2008年后喝。

Western reviews.review: Intensely fruity and rich with wonderful sweetness and loads of spicy and honey character with a dried apricot undertone. It hasn’t changed much since I last tasted it, just bottled. Great 2001. Drink or hold.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感非常浓郁，富有果香，甜度适中，带有大量的辣味和蜂蜜特征，底调有干枳实的味道。与之前品尝时相比，这瓶红酒的口感并没有太大变化，仍然保持着2001年的精彩。建议消费或储存。

Western reviews.review: Tasted as part of a vertical held at the chateau. The 2001 Guiraud is armed with an intense, vigorous bouquet with scents of marmalade, lanolin, brown sugar and peach that blossom in the glass, the latter becoming exaggerated with continued aeration. The palate is well-balanced with citrus-fresh apricot and orange zest on the entry. It is precise and vigorous with dried mango emerging toward the tightly wound finish that suggests the ’01 would benefit from several more years ageing. This is a great success.
Western reviews.translation: 在一场由酒庄举办的垂直品鉴会上，品尝了2001年吉罗德（Guiraud）的红酒。2001年吉罗德的香气强烈，充满活力，带有橙子酱、羊毛脂、棕糖和桃子的香味，随着时间的推移，桃子的香味变得更加浓郁。口感平衡，入口有柑橘味的杏子和橙子皮，精确且充满活力，随着时间的推移，口感变得更加丰富。酒尾紧绷，表明2001年吉罗德需要再过几年才能达到最佳状态。这是一款杰出的红酒。

Chinese pairs.original: 黑莓、烘烤橡木、黑松露等芳香，口感丰富，单宁高且柔软，酸度优雅，香味复杂饱满，整体就像一个精雕的艺术品。
Chinese pairs.new: Blackberry, toasted oak, and black truffle aromas, rich texture, high yet soft tannins, elegant acidity, complex and full-bodied flavors, a true masterpiece.

Western reviews.review: Inky dark in color, with its best days needing another decade or more in the cellar, what a wine! Thick, intense, dense, concentrated, powerful, and palate-staining, this is an other-worldly wine caught in its youth. The finish passes the 60-second mark and keeps on going in its seamless manner. Make no mistake, this is a future legendary LMHB that if you have the money, grab it. It is a wine for the ages. Drink from 2025-2080.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色深如墨汁，需要再过十年以上才能达到最佳状态。它的厚实、浓郁、浓缩、强劲、留口感，这是一瓶年轻的神奇红酒。酒尾持续超过60秒，流畅自然。毫无疑问，这是一瓶将来会被称为传奇的红酒，如果你有足够的钱，抓住它吧。它是一瓶值得一生享受的红酒。建议在2025-2080年之间饮用。

Western reviews.review: Inky dark in color, with its best days needing another decade or more in the cellar, what a wine! Thick, intense, dense, concentrated, powerful, and palate-staining, this is an other-worldly wine caught in its youth. The finish passes the 60-second mark and keeps on going in its seamless manner. Make no mistake, this is a future legendary LMHB that if you have the money, grab it. It is a wine for the ages. Drink from 2025-2080.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色深如墨汁，需要再过十年以上才能达到最佳状态。它的厚实、浓郁、浓缩、强劲、留口感，这是一瓶年轻的神奇红酒。酒尾持续超过60秒，流畅自然。毫无疑问，这是一瓶将来会被称为传奇的红酒，如果你有足够的钱，抓住它吧。它是世纪红酒。建议在2025-2080年之间饮用。

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Rubin. In der Nase leicht laktisch, anfangs zurückhaltender als der 2000er, braucht viel Zeit, baut dann aber aus, zeigt Heidelbeeren, Brombeeren, Tabak, Leder, Gewürze, Tee, Mokka und Ginger, sehr komplex. Im Gaumen weich, zugänglich, herrliche Balance zwischen Frucht, Säure, Gerbstoff und Alkohol, wirkt weniger hitzig als der 2000er, zeigt viel Ballance. Top gelungen und für mich eine positive Überraschung. 96/100 vvPunkte.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

深红色。酒鼻中有轻微的乳香味，初期比2000年版更为谨慎，但需要时间才能展现出全部风采，展现出黑莓、蓝莓、烟草、皮革、香料、茶、咖啡和姜的复杂风味。口感柔和，易于入口，果味、酸度、鞣质和酒精之间的平衡令人惊叹，感觉比2000年版更为平和，展现出极高的品质。个人认为这是一个非常成功的作品，值得推荐。评分：96/100分。

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Rubin. In der Nase leicht laktisch, anfangs zurückhaltender als der 2000er, braucht viel Zeit, baut dann aber aus, zeigt Heidelbeeren, Brombeeren, Tabak, Leder, Gewürze, Tee, Mokka und Ginger, sehr komplex. Im Gaumen weich, zugänglich, herrliche Balance zwischen Frucht, Säure, Gerbstoff und Alkohol, wirkt weniger hitzig als der 2000er, zeigt viel Ballance. Top gelungen und für mich eine positive Überraschung. 96/100 vvPunkte.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

深红色。酒鼻中有轻微的乳香味，初期比2000年版更为谨慎，但需要时间才能展现出全部风采，展现出黑莓、蓝莓、烟草、皮革、香料、茶、咖啡和姜的复杂风味。口感柔和，易于入口，果味、酸度、鞣质和酒精之间的平衡令人惊叹，感觉比2000年版更为平和，展现出极高的品质。个人认为这是一个非常成功的作品，值得推荐。评分：96/100分。

Western reviews.review: Dark and dense, but with such opulent fruit, this is a year when La Mission shows its softer, richer side by comparison with neighbor Haut-Brion. There is spice and exotic and generous red fruits to give with the concentration. It has great power, but it also has a velvet structure.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的颜色深沉浓郁，但其丰富的果味却让人印象深刻，相比邻近的 Haut-Brion，今年的 La Mission 展现出更温和、更富有魅力的面貌。酒中充满了香料、异国情调和丰富的红果味，酒精浓度高但结构却细腻柔和，像丝绸般的质感。

Chinese pairs.original: 精致而优雅的传统老牌Saint-Julien， 无论是香气还是口感都能够将优雅和力量巧妙地融为一体。82%的赤霞珠和60%的全新橡木带来了冲击力十足的香气，背后却是细腻的牡丹花和沉稳的檀香木；大气恢弘之中依然能够感受到清透的质感，这让我对巴顿2018陈年之后的表现充满期待。
Chinese pairs.new: A refined and elegant traditional Saint-Julien, seamlessly blending elegance and power in both aroma and taste. 82% Cabernet Sauvignon and 60% new oak barrels deliver a bold and impactful aroma, underpinned by subtle rose and smooth sandalwood notes. Amidst its grandeur, there's a sense of clarity and finesse that leaves me eager to see how the 2018 will age.

English pairs.original: Leoville Barton 2018 is an excellent textbook of Saint Julien; you can’t believe how it integrates elegance and power unconsciously at the same time. 82% Cabernet Sauvignon and 60% new oak reveal impulsive force on the nose; meanwhile, I can also smell delicate Chinese roses and noble sandalwood in the background. Some vibrant freshness emerges nicely from the splendid palate, leaving me full of expectation after bottle aging.
English pairs.new: 勒维尔巴顿2018是一瓶圣朱利安的典范红酒；你无法想象它如何在不自觉中融合了优雅和力量。82%卡波弗雷希和60%新橡木在鼻子上展现出冲劲的力量；同时，我也能闻到细致的中国玫瑰和高贵的沉香在背景中。瓶中陈酿后，精彩的口感呈现出生动的新鲜感，让我对未来的期待满满。

Western reviews.review: Cassis, crushed plum and steeped blackberry fruit is all packed into this wine, along with tar, violet and roasted apple wood notes, plus a terrific tug of warm earth. Shows lots of energy in reserve, with a tightly knit finish pulling everything together. Cellaring required. Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot. Best from 2026 through 2040.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感丰富多彩，包含了黑加斯、压榨的黑杏和浸泡的黑莓果实的味道，还有焦油、紫罗兰和烤苹果木的香气，以及一股温暖的泥土味。酒中充满了潜在的能量，紧密的结尾将所有元素都凝聚在一起。需要储存一段时间。酒中含有卡波网白葡萄酒和梅洛葡萄酒。建议从2026年到2040年饮用。

Western reviews.review: Sweet berries, blackberries, raspberries and violets follow through to a full body with extremely creamy, polished tannins that caress the palate. It’s really long and polished. Gorgeous finish. Drink after 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感丰富，体现出浓郁的黑莓、蓝莓、黑莓和紫罗兰花香。它的口感丰富，具有极其丰富的、光滑的橡皮质感，给舌头带来舒适感。口感非常持久，完美的结尾。建议在2025年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: In this wine, fine and rich tannins partner with powerful black-plum and black-currant fruits. Densely textured while also having swathes of rich fruits, the wine shows both a firm side and one that offers total deliciousness. As it matures, both these aspects will come together. Drink from 2027. Editors’ Choice
Western reviews.translation: 在这款红酒中，细致而丰富的橡皮质与强烈的黑杏和黑莓果味相结合。酒体丰富而密集，同时也充满了丰富的果味，展现出坚韧的一面和带来极致美味的一面。随着酒的成熟，这两方面将会融合在一起。建议2027年后饮用。编辑推荐。

Western reviews.review: This estate has been on fire in recent vintages, and the 2018 Château Léoville Barton is up there with the best of them. Based on 82% Cabernet Sauvignon and 18% Merlot that was brought up in 60% new French oak, this classic, flawlessly balanced, straight-up awesome Saint-Julien has loads of cassis and mulberry fruits as well as notes of freshly sharpened pencils, leafy tobacco, chocolate, and earth. Rich, medium to full-bodied, and concentrated on the palate, it has building tannin's and healthy acidity, yet the fruit is pure, perfectly ripe, and wonderfully integrated with all the wine's components. As is normal with this cuvée, it closes down with extended air and is going to take a solid 8-10 years of bottle age to reach the early stages of maturity. It's going to evolve for 30-40 years in cold cellars.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶2018年沙特奥莱维尔巴顿（Château Léoville Barton）红酒是近年来该庄园出品的佳作之一。以82%卡波弗雷希（Cabernet Sauvignon）和18%梅洛（Merlot）为主，使用60%新法兰克新橡木桶发酵的这瓶经典圣朱利安（Saint-Julien）红酒，展现出浓郁的黑加仑和黑莓果味，伴有新笔、叶绿烟草、巧克力和泥土的香气。口感丰富、体积中等到中等以上，口感浓郁，具有逐渐增强的纽扣和健康的酸度，然而果味纯正、成熟完美，完美融合于所有成分中。与该系列的其他品酒一样，这瓶红酒在空气接触后会逐渐闭合，需要8-10年的陈酿才能达到成熟的早期阶段。冷藏条件下，它将会在30-40年内不断演变。

Western reviews.review: Well-polished blackcurrant, cassis and bilberry, everything pretty silky and firm. Not fully showing its generosity at this point but no question that it is going to get there soon. Clear charcoal, graphite and woodsmoke as it opens up. A ton of life ahead, and an appealing sense of mint freshness. Lives up to its en primeur promise - this is Léoville Barton at its most confident. Drinking Window 2026 - 2040
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感非常光滑细腻，黑currant、cassis和蓝莓的味道非常鲜明。虽然目前还没有完全展现出它的丰富性，但很明显它很快就会达到巅峰。随着时间的推移，会有更多的焦炭、石墨和烟雾味道出现。酒中充满着生机和新鲜的薄荷味。它完全符合预期，展现出莱维尔巴顿（Léoville Barton）的自信。建议在2026-2040年之间饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 在2020年份，我曾将Chateau Petit-Village 描述为“钢铁侠逐渐露出微笑”。刚过两年，我就看到了它更加从容自信的微笑。这款酒的果香纯净得不得了，轻轻摇杯后的紫罗兰花香轻易就将我迷倒。一直以来强劲的金属结构，在入口的瞬间化作撒满花瓣的鲜奶，细腻柔顺却又不失结构与力量。品尝这款酒时，我仿佛看到了高定皮包的整个制作流程，质地细腻、走线精准，拿着放大镜都找不出一个线头。在我看来，Vincent和Guillaume的团队已经将他们的酿酒哲学完全融入这片砾石黏土的热土，不仅将Chateau Petit-Village 带到了崭新的高度，同时也正在书写着酒庄下一个辉煌篇章。
Chinese pairs.new: In 2020, I described Chateau Petit-Village as "Iron Man slowly flashing a smile." Just two years later, I see it smiling even more at ease and confident. This wine is incredibly pure in its fruitiness, and the delicate lavender aroma that unfolds after gently swirling the glass is utterly captivating. The robust metal structure that has always defined it dissolves into a shower of petals at the moment of entry, silky smooth yet retaining its structure and power. When I taste this wine, I feel like I'm witnessing the entire production process of a luxury handbag, with a texture that's refined and stitching that's precise, so much so that even under magnification, I couldn't find a single thread out of place. In my opinion, the team led by Vincent and Guillaume has fully infused their winemaking philosophy into this rocky clay soil, not only elevating Chateau Petit-Village to new heights but also writing the next chapter in the estate's glory.

English pairs.original: In the 2022 vintage, I once likened Chateau Petit-Village to “Iron Man gradually revealing a smile.” A mere two years later, I now witness an even more confident smile. The fruitiness is astoundingly pure, and the beguiling scent of violets is released with a gentle swirl of the glass. The metallic structure transforms into a velvety, petal-laden cream once it touches my palate. As I tasted this wine, I felt as though I was observing the making process of a haute couture handbag, with its refined texture, precise stitching, and no thread out of place. In my opinion, Vincent and Guillaume’s team has seamlessly integrated their winemaking philosophy into the gravelly clay terroir, not only elevating Chateau Petit-Village to new heights but also penning the next illustrious chapter.
English pairs.new: 在2022年的产季，我曾经将Petit-Village酒庄比作“铁人逐渐展现微笑”。仅仅两年后，我现在看到的微笑更加自信。酒中的果香纯粹到令人惊讶，轻轻摇动玻璃瓶，紫罗兰的香味就会释放出来。金属结构在口中变成柔软的、花瓣般的奶油。品尝这瓶酒的过程，让我觉得自己是在观察高定制手袋的制作过程，精致的质感、精确的缝合、丝毫不差的缝线。根据我的观察，文森特和吉勒姆的团队成功地将他们的酿酒哲学融入了花岗岩质土壤中，不仅使Petit-Village酒庄达到新的高度，也为酒庄写下了下一个辉煌的篇章。

Western reviews.review: Sehr fruchtig, Noten frischer Himbeeren; auch im Mund beeindruckt die Himbeeraromatik, die gemeinsam mit dem blumigen, aber gut eingesetzten Holz für einen Eindruck von Süsse sorgt, Tannin mit Schliff; poppiger, gut gemachter Wein.
Western reviews.translation: 非常浓郁的果香，特别是新鲜的草莓味道；口感中草莓的香气仍然非常强烈，结合花香和适量的橡木味，给人一种甜蜜的感觉，口感中有明显的坚果味和清晰的口感，整体感觉非常活泼和完美。

Western reviews.review: Dark in color, the wine pops with its display of flowers, spearmint, blackberries, plums, and black cherries. Opulent, silky, fresh, vibrant, and long, the fruit expresses its ripe, black, blue, and red berries with purity, elegance, and a touch of peppery, spice , espresso, and dark cocoa in the energetic finish. The wine blends 65% Merlot, 28% Cabernet Franc and 7% Cabernet Sauvignon.14% ABV, 3.85 pH. Yields were 30 hectoliters per hectare. Picking took place September 2, September 22.. Drink from 2026-2055. 95-97 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的颜色深黑，酒中展现出花朵、薄荷、黑莓、李子和黑樱桃的芳香。酒体丰富、滑顺、清新、生动、持久，果味丰富、黑、蓝、红莓的成熟感与纯粹、优雅的风格相结合，酒尾带有辣椒、香料、咖啡和黑巧克力的微妙调和。酒中混合了65%梅洛、28%卡波弗朗和7%卡波萨维尼格。酒精含量14%，pH值3.85。产量为每公顷30公升。采摘于9月2日和9月22日。建议饮用时间为2026-2055年。评分95-97分。

Western reviews.review: Bezauberndes Bouquet nach Himbeeren, Cassis und Schwarzkirschen, ein Hauch Sahne schwingt mit. Im Gaumen druckvoll, mit knackiger Frucht, feinem Tannin und schöner Balance, das hat Charme, Finesse und Länge, endet auf einen Mix aus roten und dunklen Beeren. Ein stimmiger Wein, der früh Spass machen wird und doch gute Reserven hat. (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / UGCB / Château Valandraud) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation: 迷人的香气，带有浓郁的草莓、黑加仑和黑莓味道，微微带有奶油的甜味。口感丰富，果味清脆，细腻的橡皮质感和完美的平衡，具有魅力、细致和持久，最后以红莓和黑莓的混合口感结束。这个酒有着完美的和谐，既能带来早期的乐趣，又有着良好的储存潜力。 (评分时间：2023年4月，UGCB，Château Valandraud)

Western reviews.review: Joli nez frais, intense, fruité, aérien et offre de la puissance en maitrise ainsi qu’une certaine droiture. On y retrouve des notes de mûre dense, de poivre de Cubèbe et plus légèrement d’épices fraiches associées à de jolies touches de cacao/moka, de petits fruits frais/brillants ainsi qu’à des pointes d’infusion et à une discrète pointe de poivre. La bouche est joliment minérale, fraiche, franche, équilibrée et offre de la droiture, de la tension, de la justesse, une trame minérale, une jolie structure ainsi qu’un joli côté aérien en droiture. En bouche ce vin exprime des notes de mûre juteuse/fraiche, de petits fruits noirs denses/frais et plus légèrement de cerise rôtie associées à une touche de bleuet, de prune bleue, à des pointes de fleurs de prunier, de moka, d’encens ainsi qu’à une pointe presque fumée, de toasté et de noisette toastée. Bonne longueur. Les tannins sont poudrés et élégants. Joli côté chatoyant et savoureux !
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶美酒！它有一个清新、强烈、果香、清爽的鼻子，带有强烈的力量和方向感。酒中有浓郁的黑莓、古巴胡椒和轻微的新鲜香料，伴随着巧克力/摩卡、鲜果/闪亮果和茶叶/烟熏的点缀。口感清新、矿物质、清爽、平衡，带有方向感、张力、准确性和矿物质纹理，结构美观，带有清爽的空气感。口中有浓郁的黑莓/新鲜果香、浓密的黑果/新鲜果香和轻微的烤樱桃，伴随着蓝莓、蓝葡萄、桃花、摩卡、香柏和几乎烟熏的点缀，带有轻微的焦糖和烤杏仁。酒有很好的持久性。酒中的纤维柔软、优雅。酒有美丽的闪烁和口感！

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark, almost opaque purple-black color. The aromas have a lovely clean violet nature. Delicate fresh, juicy red to black-cherry & ripe red-plum fruit. Lovely spicy, cedary oak is superbly integrated with juicy, ripe, warm, concentrated mulberry-fruit on the mid palate. The wine is of mid-weight & the alcohol adds richness & weight. A soft, fine, creamy texture is supported by silky tannins. Lovely lifted red-fruit evolves on the finish 04/23 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的紫黑色，几乎透不见光。酒中的香气清新而芬芳，带有美丽的紫罗兰味。果香清新、果实丰富，红樱桃和黑樱桃的味道与熟透的红李子味道相融合。中口的木质香气（cedary oak）与浓郁的黑莓果香完美融合。酒的重量适中，酒精的添加使酒变得更加丰富和厚重。酒的质感细腻、柔和、奶油般的， silky tannins 提供了细腻的支持。酒尾的红果香味清新而芬芳，04/23 DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 怎么能够这么芬芳？感觉我的每一寸肌肤都铺满了紫罗兰的芳香，轻轻一吹便能随风起舞，带你远航。Chateau Grand-Puy Lacoste 2020 的酒体线条如丝般顺滑，单宁如上等胭脂般细密，含着酒液，感觉全身上下都披上了真丝霓裳。我在品尝这款酒的时候莫名地感动了好几次，它居然能把Pauillac庞大的能量锁在一枚晶莹剔透的紫水晶中，稍作等待还泛着松脂、香叶和铅笔芯的清雅芬芳。这款酒的适饮期能够轻易横跨25年，相信每过3-5年，它都会让给你带来别样的惊喜。
Chinese pairs.new:
How can it be so fragrant? I feel like every inch of my skin is covered in lavender scent, and with a gentle breeze, it's like the fragrance is dancing in the wind, taking me on a journey. 

The body of Chateau Grand-Puy Lacoste 2020 is as smooth as silk, with tannins as delicate as fine lipstick, and the wine is full of liquid, making me feel like I'm wrapped in a luxurious silk cloak. 

As I savor this wine, I'm unexpectedly moved several times - it's incredible that it can contain the massive energy of Pauillac in a crystal-clear, sparkling amethyst. After a brief wait, it releases subtle notes of cedarwood, bay leaves, and pencil lead, adding to its refined fragrance. 

This wine can easily be enjoyed for 25 years, and I'm confident that every 3-5 years, it will surprise you with something new and exciting.

English pairs.original: How can it be so fragrant? The crisp fragrance of violet dances in the breeze and seeps into my body. Just sniffing, I feel like flying with it in the sky. Chateau Grand-Puy Lacoste 2020 boasts the body as silk, and tannins fine as the first-class rouge. Caressing on the palates, it seems wearing a silky garment. Tasting this wine, I was touched for several times; it is unbelieveable that it could accomandate the huge energy of Pauillac in a crystal body, meanwhile sending off fresh and elegant fragrances of rosin, bay leaf and pencil shave. It provides the ideal drinking period as long as 25 years. Sure that every 3 to 5 years, it will give us unique surprises.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的香气是如此迷人，紫罗兰的清新香味在风中轻舞，融入我的身体。仅仅是闻到香气，我就感到自己像是在天空中飞行。 2020年查托大皮拉克（Chateau Grand-Puy Lacoste）以丝绸般的体积和细腻的纹理呈现。它在口中轻抚，像穿着丝绸般柔软。品尝这瓶酒，我被触动了多次；难以置信，它能在晶莹的体积中容纳皮拉克的巨大能量，同时释放出松节油、山毛榉叶和铅笔削皮的新鲜和优雅的香气。它的最佳饮用期长达25年。相信每3到5年，它都会给我们带来独特的惊喜。

Western reviews.review: Cassis, cigar box, dried flowers, spice, herbs and blackberries crowd into the perfume. On the palate, the wine is full-bodied, concentrated and rich. There is a lushness to the fruits, along with a softness and polish to tannins that is perfect for the wine and the vintage. Length, purity, complexity and a seemingly, endless, creamy finish caps everything off. This is the finest vintage ever produced at Grand Puy Lacoste. Fans of the estate, and Pauillac should be all over this wine. Drink from 2026-2060.
Western reviews.translation: 卡西斯、烟盒、干花、香料、香草和黑莓在香气中混杂。口感上，酒体丰富、浓郁、富有层次。水果的丰富感与坚果的柔软和光滑相结合，完美地体现了酒的品质和产区特点。酒尾长而纯粹，复杂且似乎无止境，奶油般的感觉让人难以忘怀。这是格兰德皮拉克大酒庄历史上最好的产季。酒庄的粉丝和巴约克地区的爱好者一定要尝试这个酒。建议在2026-2060年之间饮用。

Western reviews.review: Deep and enveloping in the sensory matrix showing notes of plums, agapanthus flowers, magnolias, gardenias, linden and geraniums. Full bodied, soft tannins of optimum craftsmanship and a solid, precise finale of an essential nature. Better from 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒具有深邃的口感，充满了各种花香，如浆果、紫花、水仙花、夜shade、白蜡树和百合花。酒体丰富，口感柔和，酒精度量精确，结尾坚实果断。建议在2025年后品尝。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby garnet, purple reflections, DELICATE rim brightening. Delicately tobacco, some shy fruit, hints of plums, floral nuances, restrained bouquet. Medium complexity, red cherries, freshly structured, discreet tannins, mineral, DELICATEly leafy on the finish, still remains a bit short, is only a matter of time for this wine to gain volume.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红宝石色，带有紫色反光，酒液边缘微微发亮。酒香中有轻微的烟草味，少量的果味，浆果味和浆果味的余味，花香的细微变化，酒香的气息很轻。酒的复杂度中等，红果味浓郁，结构新鲜，隐约的苦味，矿物质味，酒尾有轻微的叶子味，酒体仍然略短，但这瓶酒随着时间的推移会逐渐增强体积。

Western reviews.review: (76% Cabernet Sauvignon, 24% Merlot, 13.5%) Wunderbare Pauillac-Nase, dunkle Frucht, Rauch, Kräuter, viel Cassis, kühler Stein, Leder, Tabak, tiefgründig. Im Gaumen fleischig aber dennoch elegant, zeigt Rasse und Kraft, schaft die Balance zwischen Wucht und Gradlinigkeit, zwischen Struktur und Frucht, die Elemente sind gut proportioniert und die Tannine über jeden Zweifel erhaben, der Wein hinterlässt einen sehr langen, kräuterwürzigen und dunkelfruchtigen Abgang. Ein grossartiger GPL mit sehr guten Anlagen für eine lange Reife. 2028-2050 (April/Mai 2021)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一瓶来自法国波尔多地区的红酒，主要成分为：

* 卡波弗雷希（Cabernet Sauvignon）占 76%
* 美丽（Merlot）占 24%

酒精度为 13.5%

酒评如下：

这瓶红酒具有典型的波尔多风格，酒香丰富多样，包括：

* 深色果实
* 烟熏味
* 草药味
* 黑加西（Cassis）
* 冷石
* 皮革味
* 烟草味

口感丰富而又优雅，展现出品质和力量，酒中有着完美的平衡，结构和果实之间的和谐，所有元素都比例合理，酒中的坚果味非常出色，酒尾留下了长长的、草药味和深色果实的余味。

这是一瓶极品红酒，具有很好的储存潜力，推荐储存时间为2028-2050年。

Western reviews.review: Quite deep, dark ruby red color, but not opaque. The restrained aromas of blackcurrant & cedar open beautifully on the front palate before toasty oak and graphite notes close it up. Alcohol is balanced & the acidity is fresh. The structure has good grip, leaving the finish a little closed, though there are hints of juicy dark fruit that suggest the wine should open well with age. 11/24 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红宝石色，虽然深度很好，但不是完全透明。酒中的黑currant和松木香味在口感的前端展现得非常好，但在后端则被-toast木头和石墨味所盖过。酒中的酒精度合适，酸度清新。酒的结构紧实，留下了口感的尾部稍微闭合，但暗示着酒会随着时间的推移而打开。酒的评分为11/24。

Chinese pairs.original: 无花果酱，葡萄干，黑莓，皮革，可可，意大利浓咖啡，紫罗兰，和香料的气息。完美的结构，丰富强大的单宁，非常长的回味，很好的陈年潜力。
Chinese pairs.new:
Aromas of quince jam, raisins, blackberry, leather, chocolate, Italian espresso, lavender, and spices. 

Perfect structure, rich and powerful tannins, very long finish, excellent aging potential.

Western reviews.review: The 2010 Latour is deep garnet in color, and—WOW—it erupts from the glass with powerful crème de cassis, Black Forest cake and blackberry pie scents plus intense sparks of dried roses, cigar boxes, fragrant earth and smoked meats with aniseed and crushed rocks wafts. Full-bodied, concentrated and oh-so-decadent in the mouth, it has a firm, grainy texture and lovely freshness carrying the rich, opulent fruit to an epically long finish. It is incredibly tempting to drink now, but I suspect this hedonic experience isn't a scratch on the mind-blowing, otherworldly secrets this time capsule will have to reveal given another 7-10 years in bottle and continuing over the following fifty years++.
Western reviews.translation: 2010年拉图尔红酒呈深红色，令人惊叹的是它从玻璃中爆发出强烈的黑加仑果酱、黑森林蛋糕和黑莓派香气，伴有干燥的玫瑰花、雪茄盒、芳香的土壤和熏肉的烟气，以及 licorice 和碎石子的气味。口感丰富、浓缩、极度奢侈，具有坚实的颗粒质感和美妙的新鲜感，将丰富的、奢华的果味带到了一场史诗般的长长的尾声。它极度诱人地令人想喝下，但我怀疑这次享受的体验与这瓶子在7-10年后继续储存并在随后的50年++中释放的秘密相比，简直是杯水车薪。

Western reviews.review: The 2010 Latour is conspicuously deep in color. It has an intellectual, intense and captivating bouquet with mineral-rich black fruit, graphite and crushed rose petal scents. Utterly spellbinding. The palate is the real deal. Heavenly balance, perfect acidity with seamlessly integrated new oak, there is an enthralling crescendo towards a finish that is simply as good as Bordeaux gets. Impeccable. Tasted blind at Farr Vintners 10-Year On Bordeaux horizontal.
Western reviews.translation: 2010年拉图尔（Latour）红酒的颜色异常深邃。它具有深思熟虑、强烈而迷人的香气，带有矿物质丰富的黑果、石墨和碎玫瑰花瓣的气息。令人深深着迷。口感是真正的高品质。天籁般的平衡，完美的酸度与无缝融合的新橡木，结束时有一个令人着迷的高潮，简直是波尔多红酒的极致。无可挑剔。酒评在法伦温特纳斯（Farr Vintners）10年波尔多红酒横向评比中进行。

Western reviews.review: I get the same peony and violet aromatics here as I did in Forts de Latour. This is powerful, muscular, not even getting close to being ready. The tannins crowd in from the mid palate onwards, extremely physical in the way they make their presence felt. Behind them, if you give the wine enough time in the glass, it gives black pepper spice, pencil lead, slate and compressed earth, along with cassis, bilberry and all the tight compact dark-berried fruits you can think of. Don't even consider this for another five years at least. This is a monumental Latour and a flashing signpost for how good this vintage is in Pauillac.
Western reviews.translation: 我在Forts de Latour中感受到的牡丹和紫罗兰香味在这里也同样存在。这是一款强劲的、肌肉发达的红酒，远远没有准备好。从中口开始，苦味物质就像一股潮水般涌入，极具侵略性地表现出自己的存在。它们之后，如果你给酒足够的时间在玻璃中停留，会释放出黑胡椒、铅笔、花岗岩和压缩的土壤等香味，伴随着黑加拿大浆果、蓝莓和各种紧密、紧凑的黑果味。至少再过五年也不要考虑购买。这是一款巨大的拉图尔，标志着波尔多地区的好酒品质。

Western reviews.review: Unbelievably pure, with distilled cassis and plum fruit that cuts a very precise path, while embers of anise, violet and black cherry confiture form a gorgeous backdrop. A bedrock of graphite structure should help this outlive other 2010s. Powerful, sleek and incredibly long. Not perfect, but very close. Best from 2020 through 2050.
Western reviews.translation: 令人难以置信的纯粹，带有精确切割的黑加仑和浓郁的浆果，烟熏的 licorice、紫罗兰和黑杏果酱形成了美丽的背景。石墨结构的基石应该有助于它超越其他2010年的酒。强大、流线型、极长。不是完美的，但非常接近。最佳饮用时间：2020年至2050年。

Western reviews.review: Stern, almost severe initially, this great wine takes time to show its immense fruit power. Black currant and blackberry notes are packed into the wine, along with an impressive array of spices from new wood that gives a more exotic element. At the end, though, it has a fine, structured sense of proportion. Obviously for aging over decades, so don't drink before 2022. Cellar Selection.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒最初看起来很严厉，很严厉，但经过时间的考验，它的丰富果味会逐渐展现出来。黑currant和黑berry的风味被精心地包装在酒中，新木的香气也给了酒一种异国情调的元素。然而，最终，它仍然保持着优雅的结构和比例。显然，这瓶酒适合长期陈酿，建议不要在2022年之前饮用。 cellar Selection..

Chinese pairs.original: 和Jean-Luc Thunevin一起在他位于圣埃美隆镇上的办公室内品鉴了这款酒。我一边品鉴一边思考，波尔多酒庄中又有谁能够像Jean-Luc那样，从2013年开始不间断地打造出如此多的传奇葡萄酒？更令人感到不可思议的是，似乎他从未失手过，即便像2013那样困难的年份，他依然酿造出了惊人的杰作。假设Jean-Luc能够拥有那些最顶级的葡萄园，他现在或许已经成为了整个波尔多最伟大的酿酒师了，就如同勃艮第的Henri Jayer一样。此酒的混酿比例为90%梅洛、7%品丽珠和3%赤霞珠。颜色为绵密的深紫红色。呈现略显内敛但清晰、迷人而且新鲜同时富有贵族气质的完整香气，透出甜花香、岩石、黑莓、枇杷、树丛、香草和黑巧克力味。平衡并且异常滑爽的口感流淌出大量庄严、纯净的矿物质感以及多汁、活泼的酸度——带来极致的新鲜，并在那紧实、悠长的收尾中达到了顶点，而回味处宛如添加了滑石粉般的单宁则体现了这位酿酒大师深厚的酿酒功力。你能相信这不过是刚开瓶时的表现吗？
Chinese pairs.new: 我在Jean-Luc Thunevin的办公室内品鉴了这款酒。他在波尔多酒庄中是少有的能从2013年开始不间断打造出传奇葡萄酒的人之一。即使在困难的年份，他也能酿造出惊人的杰作。假设他拥有最顶级的葡萄园，他或许已经成为整个波尔多最伟大的酿酒师了。酒的混酿比例为90%梅洛、7%品丽珠和3%赤霞珠。颜色深紫红色，呈现内敛但清晰、迷人和新鲜的香气，带有甜花香、岩石、黑莓、枇杷、树丛、香草和黑巧克力味。口感平衡，滑爽，流淌出大量庄严、纯净的矿物质感和多汁、活泼的酸度。酒尾紧实悠长，回味处单宁如滑石粉般，体现了酿酒大师的深厚功力。

English pairs.original: Tasted with Jean-Luc Thunevin at his office in the town of Saint-Emilion. In fact, while tasting it, I was thinking, is there any estate in Bordeaux that, since 2013, has continuously made as many legendary wines as Jean-Luc has at his beloved Valandraud? More importantly, it seems that he has never screwed up even in a tough vintage like 2013 that is really amazing. If Jean-Luc has the best vineyards in hand, he would certainly be the greatest winemaker of Bordeaux, just like Henri Jayer of Bourgogne. The wine integrates 90% Merlot, 7% Cabernet Franc and 3% Cabernet Sauvignon. The appearance was dense and dark fuchsia. Exuding subtly introverted but precisely enticing, freshly aristocratic and fairly intact fragrances of sweet flowers, stone, blackberry, loquat, underbush, vanilla and black chocolate. There was an exceedingly polished sense to the well-balanced flavours that oozed a large amount of austere and pure minerality together with succulent and vivid acid to impart the taste an uplift and supreme freshness that culminated in a compact and prolonged finale that was filled with talc-like tannins that reflected the sophistication of a winemaking master. Can you believe this was merely the opening act?
English pairs.new:
在圣埃米利昂镇的Jean-Luc Thunevin办公室品尝了这瓶红酒。事实上，在品尝的过程中，我一直在想，自2013年以来，是否有任何一家酒庄能像Jean-Luc在他所钟爱的Valandraud酒庄那样连续创造出这么多传奇性的酒品？更重要的是，他似乎在即使是困难的2013年也没有犯过错误，这简直是令人惊叹的。如果Jean-Luc拥有最好的葡萄园，那么他一定是波尔多地区最伟大的酒师，就像伯戈尼的亨利·雅耶一样。

这瓶酒的组成是90%梅洛，7%卡波弗朗克和3%卡波萨维宁。酒液的颜色是浓密的深紫色。酒香中有微妙的内敛但精确的诱人气息，带有甜花、石头、黑莓、荔枝、低矮灌木丛、香草和黑巧克力的气息。酒味平衡，极其光滑，带有大量的严肃和纯粹的矿物质气息，以及丰富的酸度，给酒品带来了新鲜和清爽的感觉，酒尾紧凑，持久，充满了像粉尘一样的纤维素，体现了酒师的高超技艺。难以置信，这仅仅是开场白。

Western reviews.review: Tiefdunkles Rubingranat, opaker Kern, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung. Zart floral unterlegtes dunkles Waldbeerkonfit, ein Hauch von Lakritze, Veilchen, feines Edelholz, facettenreiches Bukett. Kraftvoll, schwarze Beeren, angenehme Fruchtsüße, präsentes Tannin, schokoladiger Touch, mineralisch und anhaltend, sicheres Reifepotenzial.
Western reviews.translation:
深红色葡萄酒色，微暗的橙色核，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。

酒香中有淡淡的花朵和浓郁的黑莓果酱，带有少量的甘草、百合花和细致的高档木头香气，复杂的香气。

口感强烈，黑莓果酱味浓郁，甜度适中，坚果味清晰，巧克力味浓郁，矿物质味和持久感强烈，酒龄潜力大。

Western reviews.review: Produced from an assemblage of 85% Merlot and 15% Cabernet Franc, the wine will be aged in 100% new oak and reached 14.5% alcohol. From yields that average of 32.5 hectoliters per hectare, the wine is deep in color with licorice, black cherry, smoke and oak scents that open to a finesse style of Valandraud. Lush in texture, the wine ends with an opulent, sweet, ripe black cherry finish. 92-94
Western reviews.translation: 本款红酒由85%梅洛和15%卡波弗朗克组成，酒龄在100%新橡木桶中，酒精含量14.5%。产量平均每公顷32.5公升，酒色深邃，气味中有 licorice、黑樱桃、烟草和橡木的香气，呈现出细腻的风格。酒体丰富，酒尾以浓郁的、甜蜜的、成熟的黑樱桃味结束。评分：92-94。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark and almost inky in color, the wine is equally deep on your palate. Thick, rich, lush, and opulent, the black plums, boysenberry chocolate and licorice stand out here due to the velvet textures and fresh attitude. The wine is lively, and incredibly rich, a difficult act to achieve. The finish leaves you with layers of black cherry liqueur, dark chocolate, licorice and truffle. This is one of the best vintages of Valandraud ever produced, and that says something, with so many great vintages made at the estate over the years.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的颜色深暗如墨，口感同样深厚。酒中黑浆果、男孩森莓巧克力和甘草的味道十分突出，富有细腻的质感和新鲜的气息。酒的口感丰富而又生动，难以达到如此完美的效果。酒尾留下一层黑樱桃酒、黑巧克力、甘草和松露的味道。这种酒是Valandraud历史上最好的产量之一，这也足以说明了这一点，尤其是考虑到该庄园多年来生产了许多出色的酒。

Western reviews.review: Since the first vintage in 1991, this wine and its vineyard have travelled far. Now close to the top of the classification tree in Saint-Émilion, this vintage shows the impressive nature of this powerful wine. With a good balance between acidity and black fruits backed up by tannins, the wine is powerful and stylish. Drink from 2027.
Western reviews.translation: 自1991年首次釀造以来，这款红酒和葡萄园已经走了很长的路。如今，位于圣埃米利翁的分类树上，近乎顶端的这款酒展现了这款强劲红酒的出色。酒中酸度和黑果的平衡，搭配坚果的苦味，呈现出强劲又时尚的风格。建议2027年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: Tiefdunkles Rubingranat, opaker Kern, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung, mit feiner Edelholzwürze unterlegtes schwarzes Waldbeerkonfit, feiner Nougat, ein Hauch von Orangenzesten. Saftig, süße Kirschenfrucht, seidige Tannine, finessenreich strukturiert, salzige Mineralität, bleibt gut haften, sicheres Reifepotenzial, feiner rotbeeriger Nachhall.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色酒液，微暗的橙色中间，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮，黑色浆果酱的黑色木香味，细微的白色坚果味，橘子皮的微妙香气。口感丰富，甜美的樱桃果味，细滑的苦味，精致的结构，微微的矿物质味道，留在口中的时间较长，成熟潜力较高，细微的红色余味。

Chinese pairs.original: PH:3.5，酒精度13.73%，你敢相信这是热年份的Chateau Leoville Poyferre？变了，它真的变了… 以浓郁度著称的龙博菲居然在2020年份以一抹极具诱惑的紫罗兰香气拉开了帷幕。入口后，一道黑果瀑布奔涌而下，明明那么成熟丰满，却给人鲜榨果汁般的清透感。萦绕全身的松脂清凉给浓密的酒体平添了几分清雅，含在口中，彷如一枚薄荷黑巧在缓缓融化。Cuvelier 家族在掌管Chateau Leoville Poyferre的百年之际，给我们献上了一份厚礼，值得入手收藏。
Chinese pairs.new:
Rating: 3.5/5, Alcohol content: 13.73%. Can you believe this is a vintage year of Chateau Leoville Poyferre? It's changed, it's really changed... 

The famous Poyferre is known for its richness, but the 2020 vintage opens with a seductive lavender aroma. After entering the mouth, a black fruit waterfall rushes in, surprisingly giving a refreshing, just-pressed juice-like clarity despite its maturity. The lingering cedar freshness adds a touch of elegance to the dense body, leaving a sensation like a thin mint black chocolate slowly melting in the mouth.

The Cuvelier family has given us a generous gift on the centenary of managing Chateau Leoville Poyferre, making it a worthwhile purchase for collection.

English pairs.original: With a PH of 3.5 and ABV of 13.73%, can you believe this is Chateau Leoville Poyferre in a hot vintage? It has changed, it has really changed… Chateau Leoville Poyferre is always known for its richness, the 2020 vintage unexpectively opens with a very seductive violet aroma. On the attack, black fruit waterfall drops on the palate, so mature but it feels like freshly squeezed juice. The freshness of turpentine haunting around adds elegance to the dense body. Kept on the palate, it melts slowly like mint dark chocolate. On the occasion of the centenary of the Cuvelier family at the helm of Chateau Leoville Poyferre, this wine is a perfect souvenir worth collecting,
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的pH值为3.5，酒精度为13.73%，令人难以置信，这是来自热浪年份的沙特奥莱维尔波伊费尔。它已经改变了，真的改变了……沙特奥莱维尔波伊费尔一直以其丰富的口感而闻名，2020年产季意外地以一种非常诱人的紫罗兰香气开启。口感上，黑色果实的瀑布倾泻在舌头上，成熟但感觉像新鲜榨出的果汁。松脂的清新感围绕着，给了浓密的身体一种优雅的感觉。留在舌头上，它慢慢融化像黑巧克力一样。沙特奥莱维尔波伊费尔家族掌舵一百年，这瓶酒是一瓶值得收藏的纪念品。

Western reviews.review: The Grand Vin 2020 Chateau Leoville Poyferre, which is released in a stylish black bottle commemorating a century for the Cuvelier family, is reminiscent of the 2016 with its powerful, concentrated, yet vibrant and inward style. Pure creme de cassis, melted chocolate, loamy earth, graphite, and some spicy nuances all define the aromatics, and it's full-bodied, with a stacked mid-palate, nicely integrated oak, ripe tannins, and one hell of a great finish. This is another utterly brilliant wine from this team, which has been producing First Growth quality wines for many years now. The blend of the 2020 is 64% Cabernet Sauvignon, 31% Merlot, 3% Cabernet Franc, and the rest Petit Verdot, aged in 80% new barrels, hitting 13.58% natural alcohol and a pH of 3.81. Best After 2028.Rating: 98+
Western reviews.translation: 2020年沙勒波伊费尔酒庄（Chateau Leoville Poyferre）的格兰维（Grand Vin）以纪念库维耶尔家族（Cuvelier family）百年历史的时尚黑瓶发布。这种风格与2016年相似，具有强大的浓缩，然而又充满生机和内敛的风格。酒中的纯黑加拿大浆果（crème de cassis）、融化的巧克力、土壤、石墨和一些辣味的细微差别都定义了酒的香气，而酒的口感则是全身心的，中口层次丰富，木头味道融合得很好，酒中的天然柚皮酸（tannins）成熟，酒尾极其出色。这是这个团队（team）多年来一直生产出第一级葡萄酒（First Growth quality wines）的又一瓶出色酒。2020年的酒款中，卡波弗雷（Cabernet Sauvignon）占了64%，梅洛（Merlot）占了31%，卡波弗朗（Cabernet Franc）占了3%，剩下的则是佩蒂·维多（Petit Verdot），酒陈酿于80%的新橡木桶中，酒中的天然酒精含量为13.58%，酒的pH值为3.81。最佳饮用年份为2028年。评分：98+。

Western reviews.review: The 2020 Léoville-Poyferré is every bit as impressive as it was from barrel. If anything, it has gained in freshness and vibrancy with élevage. Dark cherry, plum, mocha, graphite and a kiss of French oak are some of the many notes that infuse the 2020 with tons of character. I especially admire its vertical energy and buttoned up personality. In some recent vintages Léoville-Poyferré has been quite showy, but the 2020 also has a more nuanced side that is hugely appealing. Best after 2028.
Western reviews.translation: 2020年勒维尔-波伊费雷（Léoville-Poyferré）红酒的表现与当初从酒桶中品尝时一样令人印象深刻。如果说有所不同，那就是它在陈化过程中获得了更多的新鲜感和活力。黑樱桃、浆果、可可、石墨和一丝法国橡木的香气在2020年的红酒中融合，展现出丰富的个性。特别值得赞赏的是它的垂直能量和紧致的性格。在最近的几年中，勒维尔-波伊费雷红酒有时会表现得很夸张，但2020年的版本也具有更为细腻的另一面，这让人深感吸引。建议在2028年后品尝。

Western reviews.review: This is really floral on the nose with violets and roses, and some black berries and dark cherries. It’s medium- to full-bodied with firm and polished tannins, and plenty of hazelnut and milk chocolate. Structured, yet so finely textured. So attractive and enticing now but needs three or four years to show what it has. Try after 2026.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气非常花朵式，带有紫罗兰和玫瑰的味道，伴有黑莓和黑杏的果香。口感中等到中厚，具有坚实而光滑的橡皮质感，伴有杏仁和牛奶巧克力的风味。结构紧凑，质感细腻。现在看起来非常吸引人，但需要三到四年才能展现出其真正的潜力。建议在2026年后尝试。

Western reviews.review: Supple and generous with mouthwatering acidity, though really quite tannic at this point which does cover up some of the nuance. I like the texture, the frame and the weight, it's clean, polished and well worked, not overdone at all, but this has a sense of potent seduction in the flavours, rich blackcurrant, perfumed and scented. Detailed with lots of stony, slate, and wet stone elements giving a wonderful terroir influence. It's not as immediately charming as the 2019, the tension still prominent, but this will be brilliant in 5-10 years.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒口感柔和富有水果酸度，但目前口感略带干涩，遮盖了一些细微之处。虽然如此，我还是喜欢它的口感、结构和重量，清晰、光滑、精致，绝不过度，但它的风味却带有强烈的诱惑力，黑currant风味浓郁，带有香气和花香。细致入微，含有大量的石头、花岗岩和湿润石头元素，给人以丰富的土壤影响。与2019年相比，这款红酒不太容易让人喜欢，但它仍然保持着紧张感，五到十年后将会是绝佳的。

Western reviews.review: Of course, this impressive classified growth wine is young. But it’s easy to discern its promise. Black fruits and layers of sophisticated tannins are balanced with the wood aging and smoky fruit flavors. This estate in the heart of Saint-Julien has produced a very fine wine, fresh and structured at the same time. Drink from 2026. Cellar Selection
Western reviews.translation: 当然，这瓶出色的葡萄酒还很年轻。但是很容易看出它的潜力。黑色水果和复杂的纹理的坚果味道与木头陈化和烟熏的水果味道相平衡。这家位于圣朱利安的心脏地带的庄园生产了一瓶非常精致的葡萄酒，既新鲜又结构良好。建议2026年后饮用。 cellar Selection。

Chinese pairs.original: 依我之见，尽管没有分级，位于金字塔尖的Petrus属于“超一级酒庄”行列。期酒。绵密的深黑色。微微的生青味在晃杯后神奇消散，取而代之的是漂亮的黑樱桃、糖渍树莓、干花和灌木香气，融入深邃的烤吐司、黑巧克力、黑橄榄、泥土和香料矿物味中。香气和口感均完美结合了清新和严肃。如预期般展现缎子似的单宁因此质地无比滑爽、柔顺；中段口感中的绵密和丰满造成了些许婴儿肥，但整体由于清晰酸度所带来的标志性通透感缘故，依然惊人得新鲜而且活力十足；可乐、成熟黑莓、咸香和甜面包干滋味延续到那复杂、温和同时充满岩石质感的悠长回味。无疑是此年份波尔多酒的最佳之一。永远都是梅洛的标杆和顶峰。
Chinese pairs.new:
In my opinion, despite the lack of classification, Petrus at the pinnacle of the pyramid belongs to the "super first growth" category. 

The nose is rich and dark, with a subtle green note that disappears after swirling, replaced by beautiful black cherry, candied raspberry, floral and herbaceous aromas, which merge with deep, toasted bread, black chocolate, black olive, earth and mineral spice flavors. 

The nose and palate perfectly balance freshness and seriousness, as expected, showcasing a silky tannin texture that is incredibly smooth and velvety. 

The mid-palate texture is dense and full, resulting in a slight baby fat, but the overall freshness and liveliness are still astonishing, thanks to the clear acidity that brings a signature sense of transparency. 

The flavors of plum, mature blackberry, saltiness and sweet bread continue to the complex, gentle and rocky long finish. 

Without a doubt, this is one of the best vintages of Bordeaux this year. It is forever the benchmark and pinnacle of Merlot.

English pairs.original: From my point of view, despite without the classification, Petrus at the top of the pyramid is a ‘Premier Cru Superieur’. En primeur. Densely dark in color. A tint of greenness magically faded after swirling the glass, and a gorgeous scent succeeded, wisps of black cherry, candied raspberry, dried flower and undergrowth melted into the depths of toast, black chocolate, black olive, earth and spicy-mineral. Both nose and taste seamlessly combined the refreshment and seriousness. Expectedly satiny for the tannin so that the texture was notably polished and peerlessly smooth; there was a slight feeling of baby fat caused by density and chubbiness on the mid-palate, but it's still energetic and astonishingly fresh in general owing to the hallmark brightness originated from the utterly precise acid; touches of cola, ripe blackberry, savoury and rusk emerged toward the complicated, gentle and lingering finish that was paved with stoniness. Standing as one of the best wines of the vintage without doubt. Always the benchmark for Merlot.
English pairs.new: 从我的角度来看，尽管没有分类，但佩特鲁斯（Petrus）位于顶尖的金字塔，是一个‘超级首级葡萄酒’（Premier Cru Superieur）。在预售（En primeur）中，佩特鲁斯呈现出浓郁的深色，旋转玻璃后，原本的青绿色光泽消失，美丽的香气出现，黑樱桃、糖浆莓、干花、林地和黑橄榄、黑巧克力、土壤和矿物质的香气融入了烤面包的深度。鼻子和口感完美结合了清新和严肃。预期般地光滑的口感使得纤维素（tannin）变得细腻和光滑；中口部略有婴儿肥胖感，但整体仍然充满活力和惊人的新鲜感，这是由精确的酸度带来的标志性亮度；在复杂、温和且持久的尾部，出现了可乐、熟黑莓、咸味和面包屑的味道，尾部被石头覆盖。毫无疑问地，佩特鲁斯是当年最好的葡萄酒之一。它始终是梅洛葡萄酒的标杆。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Ducru-Beaucaillou 2009年份的香气比我预期中演变得更快。尽管主导香气依然是甜美的蓝莓和成熟的乌梅，但已经开始露出雪茄盒、松果以及冷壁炉的三级香气。这款酒巧妙地将热年份的成熟感以清新自然的方式呈现了出来，仿佛在烈日炎炎的夏日里寻到了一片橡树凉影。它不仅完美地诠释了Chateau Ducru-Beaucaillou 的个性，更将赤霞珠陈年后的清爽感完整地展现了出来。如果接下来的三级香气不要有太大的变化，将会是一款非常出众的葡萄酒。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau Ducru-Beaucaillou 2009年的香气比我预期中更为复杂。尽管主导香气依然是甜美的蓝莓和成熟的乌梅，但已经开始展现出雪茄盒、松果以及冷壁炉的深度。这种酒巧妙地将热年份的成熟感呈现得清新自然，仿佛在炎热的夏日里找到了一片橡树的阴凉。它完美地诠释了Chateau Ducru-Beaucaillou 的个性，并展现了赤霞珠陈年后的清爽感。如果接下来的香气层次不要有太大的变化，这将是一款非常出色的葡萄酒。

English pairs.original: The aromas of Chateau Ducru-Beaucaillou 2009 have evolved more rapidly than I thought. While the predominant scents still consist of luscious blueberries and ripe plums, hints of cigar box, pine nuts, and a cool hearth are already emerging. This wine artfully presents the maturity of a hot vintage in a refreshing and natural manner, as if finding a respite under the shade of an oak tree on a scorching summer day. It not only perfectly embodies the personality of Chateau Ducru-Beaucaillou but also showcases the invigorating quality that develops in aged Cabernet Sauvignon. If the tertiary aromas continue to evolve delicately without undergoing significant changes, it will undoubtedly become an exceptional wine of remarkable distinction.
English pairs.new: 杜克鲁-博凯洛 2009 的香气已经比我想象的更快速地演变了。虽然蓝莓和熟透的石榴的香气仍然占据主导地位，但已经开始出现了烟斗盒、松子和冷暖炉的微妙气息。这瓶酒以一种自然而新鲜的方式展现了酿造于炎热年份的成熟度，就像在酷热的夏日下找到一棵橡树的荫蔽处一样。它不仅完美地体现了杜克鲁-博凯洛的个性，还展现了陈化的卡伯涅-索万的振奋作用。如果次级香气继续以细微的方式演变而不发生重大变化，它无疑将成为一瓶令人惊叹的杰出红酒。

Western reviews.review: Deep and dark in color, fruits are equally dark. Powerful, full-bodied, rich, opulent, and fresh, the layers of blackberries, plums, espresso, flowers, earth, cigars, and spice seem endless. On the palate, even though the wine is incredibly dense, it is also seamless, elegant, vibrant, pure, and expansive. While approachable now, if you want the full experience, allow it a few more years in the bottle and enjoy it over the next several decades. Drink from 2025-2055.
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的颜色，果味也同样浓郁。强劲的口感，丰富的体积，富有豪华感，新鲜的味道，黑莓、浆果、咖啡、花朵、泥土、雪茄和香料的层次感似乎无穷无尽。在口感上，即使酒精浓度极高，但也丝毫不显得杂乱无章，优雅、生动、纯粹、广阔。虽然现在已经可以品尝，但如果你想体验到最完美的效果，建议将酒放置几年再享用，享受接下来的几十年。建议饮用时间：2025-2055年。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby garnet with purple reflections and a delicate brightening at the rim suggesting some maturity. The nose is still somewhat closed, with hints of fine woody savouriness, ripe wild berry fruit and orange zest. With air, dark cherries and a touch of nougat slowly emerge. The palate is complex - juicy and pronounced in fruit, in particular ripe cherry, with fine and very well integrated tannins. A mineral-salty finish has very good length. There's clear further ageing potential here, for decades even, but already it seems relatively light-footed thanks to its perfect balance. It can already be opened, but should ideally be allowed to age for another five to ten years.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红宝石色，带有紫色反射，酒口周围有一层细微的光泽，表明酒已经有一定的成熟度。酒的香气虽然还不算开阔，但可以闻到一些细微的木质香气、成熟的野生浆果和橙子皮的味道。随着空气的流通，酒中的黑杏和一丝奶油味慢慢地显现出来。酒的口感复杂，果味丰富，尤其是成熟的樱桃，口感中还有一些细腻的橡皮感。酒尾带有矿物质和盐味，酒尾很长。酒有很好的储存潜力，可以继续陈化几十年，但目前酒的平衡已经非常完美，酒的味道相对轻盈。酒已经可以打开喝，但建议再陈化五到十年才能达到最佳口感。

Western reviews.review: Ducru mixes 75% cabernet sauvignon and 25% merlot. The nose was cool and fresh showing green olives a bit of Brettanomyces and meaty notes with more of that French oak smoke and toast. The palate is lean and sleek with fresh black fruits and some healthy tannins. The finish is firm and dry not showing much. Perhaps all these Bordeaux are in shut down mode for the next three years. The group scored this wine 1st overall with 92 points. Parker gave it 100 points. Clearly some controversy here. Wolf Blass Master Blend Classification Montreal. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 杜克鲁(Ducru)红酒的混合比例为75%卡波弗雷希(Sauvignon)和25%梅洛(Merlot)。酒鼻中清新且新鲜，展现出青橄榄、 Brettanomyces 和肉类香味，以及更多的法国橡木烟和-toast。口感细长且光滑，展现出新鲜黑果和健康的鞣质。尾部坚实且干净，没有太多余味。也许所有的波尔多酒都处于休眠状态，需要三年的时间才能恢复。团队评分为92分，位居第一。帕克(Parker)给出了100分。显然，这里存在争议。狼布拉斯(Wolf Blass)大师混合分类蒙特利尔。 (安东尼·吉斯蒙迪和斯图尔特·托比)

Western reviews.review: Intense hue, crimson highlights. Great depth on the nose dominated by black berry fruits, liquorice sweet and subtle, slightly spicy oak. Dense, well-structured, monumental palate, still a little backward. Hugely successful effort. Keep… for a long time.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，带有深红色光泽。酒鼻中充满黑莓果味，带有Licorice甜味和微妙的、轻微的辣味橡木。口感浓密、结构良好、壮观，仍有一点儿保留。巨大的成功之作。值得长期保留。

Chinese pairs.original: Calon Segur 2018的浓郁度令人震惊，鲜美的感觉引诱我赶紧尝一口。入口的瞬间仿佛一朵芍药在口中绽放，周围还点缀着丁香、桂皮以及茴香草的辛香。单宁细腻、酸度流畅，私心希望收尾时的酒精感能更加平衡一些。总体来说，绝对是一款顶级窖藏。
Chinese pairs.new: Calon Segur 2018的口感令人惊艳，令人垂涎欲滴。入口时，酒中果香爆发，带有丁香、桂皮和茴香的复杂香气。酒中单宁细腻，酸度平滑。虽然酒尾略显酒精，但这仍是一款顶级葡萄酒。

English pairs.original: I am deeply immersed in Calon Segur 2018’s intensity. It seems so tasty that I can’t wait to raise my glass. The entry of palate is booming like a bouquet of poney, interspersed with distinct clove, cinnamon, and hints of fennel. The tannins are gracefully beautiful, coupled with bright acidity, if the generous alcohol is more reasonable, this wine would be more balanced. In general, it is definitely a Premium Cuvee.
English pairs.new: 我深深沉浸在卡隆塞古2018的强烈感中，似乎如此诱人，无法等待举起酒杯。口感入口时如同一束鲜花般喷发，夹杂着明显的丁香、肉桂和薄荷的味道。酒中的纤维素柔美优雅，伴随着清晰的酸度，如果酒精含量更为合理，这款酒将更加平衡。总体来说，这绝对是一款高端系列酒。

Western reviews.review: This is a dense, generous wine. Swathes of black fruits are packed with concentrated tannins. Its power is palpable, as is its luxuriously rich future. The wine will take plenty of aging, so don't drink before 2027. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 这是一个浓密、慷慨的红酒。黑色水果的阵列充满了浓缩的苦味物质。它的力量令人感受到，同样是它的奢华丰富的未来。红酒需要大量的陈化，所以不要在2027年之前饮用。-罗杰·沃斯。

Western reviews.review: Deeply colored, everything here is intense starting with the perfume. The nose rocks with its espresso, boysenberry, blackberry, spice, tobacco leaf, thyme and cocoa. Full-bodied, powerful, dense and intense, the wine lingers for over 50 seconds on your palate, which is a good thing, because you want to hold on to all those, creamy, opulent, voluptuous, ripe, sweet, pure fruits for as long as possible. The wine was produced from 65% Cabernet Sauvignon, 17% Merlot, 15% Cabernet Franc and 3% Petit Verdot, 14.9% ABV, with no touch of heat. 98 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色深沉，所有的元素都非常强烈，包括香味。酒精的香气中带有浓缩的咖啡、蓝莓、黑莓、香料、烟草叶、迷迭香和巧克力。酒体丰富、强烈、浓密和强烈，酒液在口中停留超过50秒，这是件好事，因为你想尽可能地享受那些丰富、奢华、丰富、成熟、甜美、纯正的水果。酒精含量为14.9%，来自65%的卡波涅尔·沙夫诺、17%的梅洛、15%的卡波涅尔·法兰克和3%的佩蒂·维多。酒评为98分。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby with purple reflections, brightening at the rim. The mineral bouquet has savoury smoky oak notes, with nuances of cassis and liquorice, fresh tangerine zest, and a hint of juniper leaf. Complex and juicy, with pronounced ripe cherry fruit texture, fine, well-integrated tannins, and fresh acidity. Very long, with blackberries on the finish. Certain ageing potential (2020-2060).
Western reviews.translation: 深红色酒液，带有紫色光泽，酒液边缘略微发亮。酒香中有矿物质的味道，带有烟熏橡木、黑加仑、柿子和荜茇的味道，伴有新鲜的橙子皮和荆芥叶的味道。酒体丰富复杂，口感鲜美，果肉成熟，纤维细腻，酸度清新。酒尾长长，留有黑莓的余味。酒龄潜力较强（2020-2060年）。

Western reviews.review: (65% Cabernet Sauvignon, 17% Merlot, 15% Cabernet Franc, 3 Petit Verdot): Leuchtendes Rubin, strahlender Glanz. Feinduftig, würzig, kräuterig in der Nase, dahinter reife Brombeere und Johannisbeere. Weicher Antrunk, vollmundig, sehr cremig mit viel Druck, äusserst konzentriert, reichhaltig mit seidenweichen Tanninen, einer frischen Säure und einem langen, noch leicht vom Ausbau geprägten Retrofinale. Ein grosser wenn auch etwas atypischer Calon, stilistisch deutlich opulenter als in anderen Jahren, wie immer aber mit sehr viel Ausgewogenheit. 2025-2048+ (Verkostet auf Château Calon-Ségur, am 4.4.2019)
Western reviews.translation:
(65% 卡布塞尔·索维涅, 17% 梅洛, 15% 卡布塞尔·法兰克, 3% Petit Verdot): 

酒色深红润,光泽闪烁。酒香浓郁,带有香料、草本植物和干酪味,后续有熟透的莓果和黑莓味。入口柔和,口感丰富,酒液滑顺,压力大,极度浓缩,富有层次,口感细腻,酸度清新,尾部长达数分钟,带有轻微的陈化味。 

这是一个大酒庄,但风格有些不同,比以往更富有豪华感,但仍保持着平衡。 

推荐饮用年份:2025-2048年。 

评估时间:2019年4月4日,在酒庄Château Calon-Ségur进行评估。

Western reviews.review: Power and intensity, packed full with black fruit, cedar , spices and violets. Intense, deep but still elegant cassis notes paired with expensive cigar humidor, rich and pure. Acidity is on point to balance all the power. Great mouthfeel with well integrated tannins and never ending finish
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的味道非常强烈，充满了黑色水果、松木、香料和紫罗兰的味道。它的味道深邃而优雅，带有浓郁的黑currant味道和高档烟斗的味道。酸度恰到好处，平衡了酒中的力量。口感丰富，纤维柔顺，尾部永远持续。

Chinese pairs.original: 红色果香，咖啡、烟草和香料香。口感甘美，丰腴，单宁显著，优美的圆润度。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich red fruit aromas, with notes of coffee, tobacco, and spices. Luscious and full-bodied, with prominent tannins and a smooth, elegant texture.

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, gute Farbtiefe, violette Reflexe, dezente Randaufhellung. Zart nach kandierten Veilchen, Lakritze klingt an, tabakige Würze, ein Hauch von Edelholz. Mittlere Komplexität, reife Kirschen, gute Frische, runde Tannine, mineralischer Touch im Abgang, salzig-zitroniger Touch im Abgang, ein leichtfüssiger, lebendiger Speisenbegleiter-
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，酒液深度好，紫色反光，边缘有轻微的光泽。酒香轻柔，似花朵般的气息，带有糖浆般的甜味，口感中有烟草味和贵木香。酒体中等复杂度，熟透的樱桃味，清新果香，圆润的苦味，尾部有矿物质的余味，尾部有盐和柠檬的余味，酒体轻盈，活泼，适合与菜肴搭配。

Western reviews.review: Firm and closed this is a dark and tannic wine, although black currant flavors are also very present. It feels austere with a mineral texture and concentrated final acidity. Drink Lafite's second wine from 2017.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒坚实而封闭，呈现出深色和苦涩的口感，虽然黑加仑风味也非常突出。它带有矿物质质感和浓缩的酸度，感觉冷峻。喝下2017年拉菲二瓶。

Western reviews.review: 55% Cabernet Sauvignon, 39% Merlot, 3.5% Cabernet Franc and 2.5% Petit Verdot produced a wine with scents of forest floor, cassis and black cherry. Medium bodied with cassis, spice, black olive tapenade and bright sensations. 88-90
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的成分为：55% 卡波雷尔·萨维尼翁、39% 美乐托、3.5% 卡波雷尔·法兰克和2.5% 小皮特·维多。它带有森林地面、黑樱子和黑樱子的香气。口感中等，带有黑樱子、香料、黑橄榄酱和清新感。评分：88-90。

Western reviews.review: Virtually opaque purple/red colour holding right to the rim. Aromas are of rich mulberry fruit with a little cedar. The palate has fine cedary tannins & some typical Pauillac cassis-leaf notes. The initially vivid cassis bite gives way to plumy, rich red-fruit by the finish. Acidity is fresh, alcohol is balanced & as a result the finish has a fair length. 4/12 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 酒色几乎是透明的紫红色，沿着杯口保持。酒香中富有浓郁的黑杏果味，带有少量的松木味。口感中有细致的松木味苦味和典型的巴约克地区（Pauillac）黑杏叶的味道。初期的黑杏果味很强烈，但在尾部逐渐转变为浓郁的红果味。酸度清新，酒精平衡，结果尾部有较长的持久感。评分：4/12

Chinese pairs.original: 在Chateau Les Carmes Haut-Brion 2022中，我感受到了一股“披着文雅外衣的桀骜”，犹如城堡中用大提琴奏响重金属音乐的王子。45%的带梗发酵带来茶梗的独特气息；40%的品丽珠赋予紫罗兰的优雅。这两个源自不同星球的元素，在同一款酒中交融，碰撞出璀璨的火花。入口清爽，每一滴酒液却蕴藏无尽能量。多汁的樱桃、酸甜的李子、清冽的血橙、傲娇的石墨，随呼吸节奏尽情挥洒着它的“不羁”。在无需装瓶验证的情况下，我已确信，2022年是Chateau Les Carmes Haut-Brion自带梗发酵以来的最佳的年份。（pH值3.64，酒精度13.5%）
Chinese pairs.new:
在Chateau Les Carmes Haut-Brion 2022中，我感受到了一股“披着文雅外衣的桀骜”，犹如城堡中用大提琴奏响重金属音乐的王子。45%的带梗发酵带来茶梗的独特气息；40%的品丽珠赋予紫罗兰的优雅。这两个源自不同星球的元素，在同一款酒中交融，碰撞出璀璨的火花。入口清爽，每一滴酒液却蕴藏无尽能量。多汁的樱桃、酸甜的李子、清冽的血橙、傲娇的石墨，随呼吸节奏尽情挥洒着它的“不羁”。在无需装瓶验证的情况下，我已确信，2022年是Chateau Les Carmes Haut-Brion自带梗发酵以来的最佳的年份。（pH值3.64，酒精度13.5%）

翻译后：

In the 2022 Chateau Les Carmes Haut-Brion, I sense a "rebellious elegance," like a prince playing heavy metal music on a cello in a castle. 45% of the stems-infused fermentation brings a unique tea-like aroma; 40% of the Merlot imparts a delicate lavender nuance. These two elements from different planets collide in a single bottle, producing a dazzling spark. The entry is crisp, yet each drop of liquid contains boundless energy. Luscious cherries, sweet plums, citrusy blood oranges, and bold graphite unfold with every breath. Without the need for further verification, I'm convinced that 2022 is the best vintage of Chateau Les Carmes Haut-Brion since the introduction of stems-infused fermentation. (pH 3.64, 13.5% ABV)

English pairs.original: In Chateau Les Carmes Haut-Brion 2022, I perceive a sense of “defiant elegance,” akin to a prince in a castle playing heavy metal on a cello. The 45% whole bunch maceration lends a unique tea stem aroma, while the 40% Cabernet Franc imparts the grace of violets. hese two elements, originating from different realms, meld together in a single wine, igniting a brilliant spark. Juicy cherries, tangy plums, crisp blood oranges, and aloof graphite dance unrestrainedly with each breath. Without the need for bottled confirmation, I am certain that 2022 is the finest vintage for Chateau Les Carmes Haut-Brion since the the incorporating of whole bunch maceration (pH 3.64, alcohol content 13.5%).
English pairs.new: 在2022年的Chateau Les Carmes Haut-Brion中，我感受到一种“顽强的优雅”，如同一个王子在城堡中用大提琴演奏重金属乐。45%的整粒浸泡赋予了独特的茶叶茎香味，而40%的卡波弗朗克则赋予了紫罗兰的优雅。这些来自不同世界的元素在单一的葡萄酒中融合在一起，点燃了璀璨的火花。鲜红的樱桃、酸甜的李子、清脆的血橙和孤傲的石墨在每口气中都在疯狂地舞动。没有瓶装确认的需要，我可以肯定地说2022年是自从采用整粒浸泡以来，Chateau Les Carmes Haut-Brion最好的产季（pH 3.64，酒精含量13.5%）。

Western reviews.review: The first thing you notice is the black, purple hue. Next, it its the perfume with its black, blue and red fruits, incense, curry, flowers, smoke and herbs. Opulent, restrained, elegant and powerful, the wine comes in layers. You can sense the array of exotic spices, mint, blue and black fruits, crushed rocks, black cherries and white pepper on the palate. Full-bodied and dense, the wine somehow remains light on its feet. The end notes, meshing elegance and power bring everything together, as the finish crosses the 60 second mark. This is perhaps even better than the perfect, 2016! The wine was made using 70% whole bunch clusters during fermentation. From a blend of 40% Cabernet Franc, 34% Cabernet Sauvignon and 26% Merlot, 13.5% ABV, pH 3.6. The wine is aging in a combination of 70% new, French oak, 20% foudres and 10% amphora. Picking took place September 5 - September 22. Yields were 40 hectoliters per hectares. Drink from 2025-2050. 99-100 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 第一眼看到的是深紫色的酒液。接下来是酒的香气，带有黑、蓝、红色的水果、香烟、香料、花朵、香草和香料。酒的味道丰富、沉稳、优雅和强大，层次分明。口感中可以感受到各种异国情调的香料、薄荷、蓝和黑色的水果、碎石、黑樱桃和白胡椒。酒体丰富、浓密，但却轻盈如飞。尾韵中，优雅和力量相互融合，酒的完美结尾超过60秒。这瓶酒甚至可能比2016年的那瓶更好！酒的酿造过程中使用了70%的整梗果实。酒的混合比例为40%卡波弗朗克、34%卡波萨维尼昂和26%梅洛，酒精度13.5%，pH值3.6。酒在70%的新法兰克酒桶、20%的古酒桶和10%的陶瓷罐中陈化。采摘时间为9月5日至9月22日。产量为40公斤/公顷。建议在2025-2050年间饮用。评分99-100分。

Western reviews.review: (Kalk und Lehmböden, biodynamisch kultiviert, 40% Cabernet Franc, 34% Cabernet Sauvignon, 26% Merlot, 3.64 pH, 70% Neuholz, 20% grosse Fässer, 10% Amphoren, 13.5% Alkohol) Dunkelrot, fast Schwarz. Die Nase ist ein Parfüm, eine Droge, das gehört zu diesen Weinen, die sofort, bei der ersten Nase schon, die Gänsehaut generiert, tiefgründig, kühl, pinoesk, Cassis, Brombeeren, Rosen, Veilchen, sogar Lavendelblüten, das ist ein Gedicht, man könnte stundenlang schnuppern. Im Gaumen straff, dicht und präzis, der Wein baut viel Druck auf, zeigt eine grosse Konzentration, bleibt dabei hochelegant, die Würze, die Frische, die perfekte Tanninstruktur, hier ist alles im Lot. Im Abgang von fast endloser Länge, und mit einer Frische, die seinesgleichen Sucht. Dieser Les Carmes Haut-Brion erzählt Geschichten; er ist einmal mehr verblüffend anders, als alles andere, was ich probieren konnte, wird in jeder Phase seines Lebens Spass machen und hat grosse Reserven. 2028 bis 2065+ (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 auf Château Les Carmes Haut-Brion) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论，翻译如下：

这瓶红酒来自于法国的Kalk und Lehmböden地区，采用生物动力耕种法，酒中含有40%的卡波弗朗克、34%的卡波萨维尼翁、26%的梅洛，pH值为3.64，酒龄为70%的新橡木桶、20%的大木桶和10%的陶瓷桶，酒精度为13.5%。

酒色深红，几乎是黑色的。酒香浓郁，像一剂药物，闻起来就能让人感到刺激，深刻、冷静、松散的气息，带有黑樱桃、黑莓、玫瑰、月季和兰花的香味，闻起来像一首诗，令人沉醉。

口感紧致、浓郁、精确，酒液带有强烈的压力，展现出高浓度，然而仍然保持着高雅的风格，酒中的咸味、清新感和完美的橡木结构都非常出色。酒尾长达数分钟，带有清新感，令人垂涎欲滴。

这瓶Château Les Carmes Haut-Brion红酒讲述着故事，它的独特性令人惊叹，酒在每个阶段都能带来乐趣，并且有着巨大的潜力。推荐储存时间为2028年至2065年。

Western reviews.review: Bright deep dark ruby garnet, opaque core, purple reflections, delicate rim brightening. Floral touch of candied purple fruit, ripe red cherries, a touch of blackberry confit, nuances of liquorice, very complex bouquet. Juicy, very complex, taut, ripe tannins, fine dark berry fruit, mineral, fine vieille vignes character, balanced, very great length, certain ageing potential for decades. Also has an enormous volume with its 13.5%, silky at all times, fresh and unique in its kind.
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的颜色是深红宝石色，透明的核心，紫色反射，细微的边缘闪亮。酒香中有花朵的香味，糖浆紫色水果的香味，熟透的红樱桃的香味，一点点黑莓酱的香味， licorice 的香味，非常复杂的香味。

口感丰富，非常复杂，紧致，熟透的果肉，矿物质，老树的特征，平衡，非常长，几十年可以陈酿。酒精含量13.5%，非常丰富，滑顺，新鲜，独特。

Western reviews.review:
supercalifragilisticexpialidocious !!!!!!!!!
My colleagues and I hosted a Carmes H-B mini vertical last night to redefine the odds against the fabulous 2022 vintage. We can't put 100 points everywhere.

1) 2022 100/100
2) 2016 99/100
3) 2020-2021 98-99/100
4) 2018 98/100
5) 2014-2017-2019 97/100
Western reviews.translation:
哇！太棒了！！！

我们昨晚与同事们一起举办了一场卡尔姆斯H-B微型年份垂直，来挑战2022年的神话。我们不能给所有酒评出满分。

1) 2022年：满分100分
2) 2016年：99分
3) 2020-2021年：98-99分
4) 2018年：98分
5) 2014-2017-2019年：97分

Chinese pairs.original: LEP 的“甜美”和2023年份的“温柔”简直就是天造地设的一对情侣。在它鲜奶酪般的酒体中，我能感受到紫罗兰的微笑、奶油话梅糖的抚慰、以及樱桃和蓝莓的幸福拥抱。2023年份的LEP 把我对Pomerol 的所有期待完完整整地呈现了出来。在它极富教养的外表下，蕴藏着罕见的浓郁度和爆发力，就算陈年25年以上依然骨骼新奇，神清气爽。
Chinese pairs.new:
LEP 的“甜美”和2023年份的“温柔”简直就是天造地设的一对情侣。 

在它鲜奶酪般的酒体中，我能感受到紫罗兰的微笑、奶油话梅糖的抚慰、以及樱桃和蓝莓的幸福拥抱。

2023年份的LEP 把我对Pomerol 的所有期待完完整整地呈现了出来。在它极富教养的外表下，蕴藏着罕见的浓郁度和爆发力，就算陈年25年以上依然骨骼新奇，神清气爽。

Translated Review:
