The "Sweet" LEP and the 2023 "Gentle" are a match made in heaven. 

In its creamy texture, I feel the subtle smile of lavender, the soothing comfort of raspberry jam, and the happy hug of cherries and blueberries.

The 2023 LEP perfectly lives up to all my expectations of Pomerol. Beneath its refined exterior, it holds a rare depth and explosive power, remaining youthful and vibrant even after 25 years of aging.

English pairs.original: The “sweetness” of LEP and the “gentleness” of the 2023 vintage are a match made in heaven, like a couple destined to be together. In its fresh cheese-like body, I can sense the smile of violets, the comfort of cream-flavored plum candies, and the joyful embrace of cherries and blueberries. The 2023 LEP captures all my expectations for Pomerol perfectly. Beneath its well-mannered appearance lies a rare intensity and explosive power, maintaining a fresh and vibrant character even after aging for over 25 years.
English pairs.new: 2023年莱普（LEP）红酒的甜度和温和性是天造地设的一对，如同命中注定要在一起的伴侣。 在其新鲜的奶酪样身体中，我能感受到紫罗兰花的微笑、奶油味浆果糖果的舒适感和樱桃和蓝莓的欢乐拥抱。 2023年莱普红酒完美地满足了我对波美罗（Pomerol）的期望。 在其优雅的外表下，蕴藏着罕见的强度和爆发力，甚至在超过25年的陈酿后仍保持着新鲜和活力的特质。

Western reviews.review: Flowers, spice, black raspberries, espresso, cherries, and licorice are abundant in the aromatic profile. On the palate, this is sensuous, silky, and sexy. It is polished, rich, and velvety, with layers of dark chocolate-covered black cherries, mint, spice, licorice, smoke, espresso, and plums. This is long, as well as intense, with energy, and complexity. You can enjoy this with pleasure with only a few years in the cellar. But give it a decade, and this is going to offer incredible drinking. The wine blends 96.5% Merlot, 3% Cabernet Franc, and .05 Petit Verdot. The harvest took place September 7 - September 19. Drink from 2029-2050. 96-98 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中充满了鲜花、香料、黑莓、咖啡、樱桃和甘草的味道。口感丰富、滑顺、性感。它的口感光滑、丰富、细腻，具有黑樱桃、薄荷、香料、甘草、烟草、咖啡和石榴的多层次口感。这种红酒长久耐饮，具有强烈的味道和丰富的复杂性。您可以在几年后享受它，但如果您愿意等待十年，它将提供出色的口感。该酒的混合比例为96.5%梅洛、3%卡波弗朗克和0.05%佩蒂·维多。收获于9月7日至9月19日。建议饮用时间为2029-2050年。评分96-98分。

Western reviews.review: Wie immer mit zauberhaftem Duft, sehr floral, rauchig, dunkelfruchtig, Süssholz, Fenchel, Kirschen, verspielt, man möchte Eintauchen; am Gaumen wie Samt und Seide, perfektes Tannin stützt die satte Frucht, viel Druck, kein Gramm Fett zu viel, hat Biss, Länge, endet würzig. Eine Pomerol-Delikatessen sondergleichen. (En Primeur Tasting April 2024)
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶迷人的红酒，带有神奇的香气，非常花朵般的、烟熏的、深色的果味、甜木头、荠菜、樱桃、轻佻的味道，让人想入非非。口感如丝绸般的柔滑，完美的坚果味支持丰富的果味，酒中充满了压力，但又不腻，具有嚼劲，持久，最后留下了辛辣的味道。这是一瓶独一无二的波美罗（Pomerol）佳酿。

Western reviews.review: This wine displays perfumed aromatics, vividly expressive on both nose and palate. It exudes great elegance and liveliness, underpinned by spring-like acidity. The tannins are super fine, creating a silky texture with delicate, thin layers that accumulate gracefully. Collectively, these elements forge a magnificent wine, distinguished by its refined structure and exquisite balance.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒展现出优雅的香气，既在鼻子里闻起来又在口中品尝起来都非常生动。它散发着典型的春天般的清新和活力，酸度清晰明亮。酒中的纤维素细致，形成了一种细腻的口感，层次分明，柔和细致。所有这些元素共同构成了一个完美的红酒，体现出其优雅的结构和精致的平衡。

Western reviews.review: Wie immer mit zauberhaftem Duft, sehr floral, rauchig, dunke lfruchtig, Süssholz, Fenchel, Kirschen, verspielt, man möchte eintauchen; am Gaumen wie Samt und Seide, perfektes Tannin stützt die satte Frucht, viel Druck, kein Gramm Fett zu viel, hat Biss, Länge, endet würzig. Eine Pomerol-Delikatessen sondergleichen.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一杯迷人的红酒，带有神奇的香气，非常花朵般的、烟熏的、浓郁的果味、甜木香、荠菜、樱桃、轻巧的味道，让人想入非非。口感如丝绸般细腻，完美的坚果味支持丰富的果味，酒中充满了压力，但又不腻，具有嚼劲，持久，最后留下了辛辣的味道。这是一杯独一无二的波美罗（Pomerol）佳酿。

Western reviews.review: The deep, dark black-mauve color has a red rim. Aromas are classic for Fleur Petrus with juicy red mulberry/raspberry perfume & clean vanilla, cedar & cinnamon spices. The palate has beautiful freshness, it is medium to full bodied, smooth textured & elegant. beautiful freshness lifts red cherry & red-plum fruit as they combine seamlessly with oak derived exotic spice notes. Alcohol is balanced but a touch warming. The fine finish has lovely length.  04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深紫黑色，带有红色的边缘。酒中的香气典型地表现出Fleur Petrus的特点，具有浓郁的红樱桃/草莓香味和干净的香草、松木和肉桂香料。口感清新美丽，酒体中等到中厚，滑顺细腻。清新的口感使得红樱桃和红李子果味得以完美结合，和来自橡木的异国风味香料一起融合。酒精平衡但略微有暖意。酒尾细腻，持久。评分：04/24 (ep) DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 装瓶之后的Chateau Montrose 2020 一如既往地大气磅礴。虽然该年份的果香比较含蓄，但依然无法掩饰它五彩斑斓的芬芳世界。丁香、肉桂、可可粉、黑橄榄、迷迭香…从墨一般的酒液中探出脑袋，待紫罗兰现身之后一同奔向温暖的太阳。和以往深不见底的结构不同，2020年份更加温润，单宁的质感也更加平柔。一看酒精更是吓了一跳，只有13.4%。能够在干热年份表现得如此这么从容不迫，Chateau Montrose 地下的黏土就是它的护身符。
Chinese pairs.new: The post-bottled Chateau Montrose 2020 is as majestic as ever. Although the fruit aromas are relatively restrained this year, they cannot conceal the wine's kaleidoscopic bouquet. Cinnamon, nutmeg, cocoa powder, black olives, and thyme emerge from the dark liquid, before lavender bursts forth and joins the warm sunshine. Unlike its deep and impenetrable structure in the past, the 2020 vintage is more approachable, with a smoother tannin texture. And a glance at the alcohol content is a surprise - a mere 13.4%. To perform so effortlessly in a dry and hot year, the underground clay of Chateau Montrose is its guardian.

English pairs.original: After bottling, the Chateau Montrose 2020 is as magnificent and glorious as ever. Although the fruity aromas of this vintage are relatively reserved, they still cannot conceal its colorful world of fragrance. Clove, cinnamon, cocoa powder, black olive, rosemary… All poke their heads out of the inky wine and run together towards the warm sun after the violet appears. Different from the previous bottomless structure, the 2020 vintage is more tender, and the texture of the tannins is smoother and softer. The alcohol is even more shocking, for it is only 13.4%. For being able to perform so composedly in a hot and dry vintage, the clay underneath Chateau Montrose is its talisman.
English pairs.new: 2020年夏托蒙罗斯红酒在瓶装后依然如故，光彩照人。虽然这瓶红酒的果香相对保守，但仍然无法掩盖其丰富的香气世界。丁香、肉桂、可可粉、黑橄榄、罗勒……所有这些香气都从深色的酒液中冒了出来，随着紫罗兰的出现，向温暖的阳光奔去。与之前的底less结构不同，2020年版更为温柔，纽维的质地更加光滑柔顺。酒精含量甚至更低，为13.4%。在炎热干燥的年份中，夏托蒙罗斯的粘土底层成为其成功的法宝。

Western reviews.review: Surpassing the 2019 and rivaling the 2016 as this estate's finest vintage of the last few decades, the 2020 Montrose is a monument in the making. Wafting from the glass with aromas of violets, dark berries, licorice, loamy soil, black truffle and subtle spices, it's full-bodied, deep and layered, with a seamless, elegantly muscular profile, terrific purity and energy, beautifully powdery tannins and a long, resonant finish. It checks in at 13.7% alcohol, the same as the superb 2009, but it is even deeper, more vibrant and more complex than the 2009.
Western reviews.translation: 2020年蒙特罗斯（Montrose）是近几十年来该庄园最出色的产酒年份，甚至超过了2019年和与2016年相比。这个酒庄的2020年产物正在成为一座纪念碑。酒精从玻璃中飘散，带来紫罗兰、黑莓、甘草、土壤、黑松露和微妙香料的芳香。它是全口感的，深度丰富，层次分明，具有光滑的肌肉，terrific纯度和能量，美丽的粉末状纤维和长达音叉的尾部。酒精含量为13.7%，与出色的2009年相同，但它比2009年更深、更生动、更复杂。

Western reviews.review: The nose is really fantastic with lead pencil shavings, iron shavings, blackcurrants and lavender. Full- to medium-bodied with ultra-fine tannins that run the length of the wine. Wonderful persistence and personality. Juicy and savory finish. Always classy and sophisticated at the end.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气非常出色，带有铅笔屑、铁屑、黑currant和百里香的味道。酒体丰富中等，具有极细的橡皮质，酒液在口中流动。酒尾持久，个性十足，口感鲜美且带有咸味。总之，这瓶红酒始终保持着优雅和高贵的风范。

Western reviews.review: Scented and perfumed on the nose with a delicate charm. Striking, full, round, juicy and crisp - this has bite and a sense of strictness in the frame that keeps things relatively narrow at this point but comes with excellent definition of elements. Great classicism with lots of freshness. Really very seductive, the black and blue fruit, graphite and touch of smoke grow and expand with richness and intensity but staying friendly at the same time thanks to the soft sweetness and juicy acidity. I just love the interplay between being serious and generous, structured but racy, intense yet precise. Such purity, and focus. Energetic and pent up, this is raring to go to show off its beauty but just being held back. Effortless, complex and compelling. I loved it a tiny bit less than the 2019 but it’s still one of the best in 2020.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气优雅迷人，带有轻微的花香。口感丰富饱满，圆润 juicy 和清脆，具有强烈的嚼劲和严谨的框架，保持着相对狭窄的风格，但元素的定义却非常出色。它展现出典型的古典风格，充满新鲜感。黑色和蓝色水果、石墨和一丝烟味的香气非常诱人，随着酒精的增加而变得更加丰富和强烈，但由于软糖和 juicy 酸度的平衡，仍保持着友好的口感。酒中严谨和慷慨的平衡，结构和快速的结合，强烈但精确的风格，让我深深爱上了它。酒的纯度和焦点令人惊叹。酒的能量和蓄势待发，让它迫不及待地想要展现自己的美丽，但却被抑制着。它的口感轻松自然，复杂而引人入胜。虽然我对它的评价略低于 2019 年，但它仍然是 2020 年中的一流红酒。

Western reviews.review: The Grand Vin 2020 Chateau Montrose is brilliant and unquestionably in the lineup of the truly greats from this chateau, including the 1989, 1990, 2009, 2010, 2015, 2018, and 2019. With an IPT of 80 and a natural alcohol of 13.4%, its deep, saturated purple hue is followed by quintessential Saint-Estephe notes of pure cassis, graphite, tobacco leaf, acacia flowers, and loamy earth. Full-bodied, concentrated, and powerful, it nevertheless stays incredibly pure, elegant, and seamless, with perfectly ripe tannins. A blend of 71% Cabernet Sauvignon, 23% Merlot, 5% Cabernet Franc, and the rest Petit Verdot, is shines even today for its purity and balance, and it should be in the early stages of its prime drink window within a decade.
Western reviews.translation:
蒙罗斯庄园2020年格兰德温（The Grand Vin 2020 Chateau Montrose）是绝对的杰作，堪称蒙罗斯庄园历史上最出色的作品之一，包括1989年、1990年、2009年、2010年、2015年、2018年和2019年。 

其酒精度为13.4%，色泽深紫，浓郁，带有典型的圣埃斯泰夫（Saint-Estephe）风格的黑加斯（cassis）、石墨（graphite）、烟草叶（tobacco leaf）、紫罗兰花（acacia flowers）和泥土（loamy earth）等特征。 

这是一款充满体积、浓缩、强大的红酒，尽管如此，它仍保持着极高的纯度、优雅和流畅，具有完美成熟的橡木味。 

该酒的组成比例为71%卡波弗（Cabernet Sauvignon）、23%梅洛（Merlot）、5%卡波弗朗（Cabernet Franc）和其余为佩蒂·维多（Petit Verdot）。即使在今天，它也闪耀着其纯度和平衡，预计在十年内将处于其最佳饮用阶段。

Western reviews.review: Gorgeously rendered for the vintage, with a well-endowed core of loganberry, mulberry and cassis flavors that roll through and are laced with a cast iron hint, while tobacco, warm stone and black tea accents swirl in the background. The long, authoritative finish steadily melds the fruit with the cast iron edge. Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的品质非常出色，酒中富有浓郁的loganberry、黑莓和黑加思（cassis）风味，滚动流动，伴有铁锈的微妙味道，酒中还带有烟草、温暖石头和黑茶的余味。酒尾长长，果味与铁锈味道逐渐融合。酒中含有卡波网（Cabernet Sauvignon）、梅洛（Merlot）、卡波网法兰克（Cabernet Franc）和佩蒂·维多（Petit Verdot）等葡萄品种。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有很多牛奶巧克力、浆果和雪松，咖啡的香味，耐嚼的单宁和酸度，结构复杂，余味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich with milk chocolate, berry, and pine notes, coffee undertones, chewy tannins, and acidity, this wine has a complex structure and a long, lingering finish.

Western reviews.review:
Dark chocolate and mocha flavors, very dark and intense, this is a big, concentrated wine, flavored with bitter cherries and structured. Certainly a great Cheval Blanc. 

Barrel Sample: 96-98 Points
Western reviews.translation:
深度的巧克力和摩卡味道，非常浓郁和强烈，这是一款大型、浓缩的葡萄酒，带有苦杏仁和结构紧致的味道。毫无疑问，这是一款出色的Cheval Blanc。

酒桶样品：96-98分。

Western reviews.review: The brilliant 2006 Cheval Blanc performed better from bottle than from barrel. A blend of equal parts Cabernet Franc and Merlot grown in a superb vineyard site facing La Conseillante and l’Evangile at the very edge of the sandy, gravelly soils of St.-Emilion, it boasts a dense ruby/purple color as well as a sweet perfume of menthol, charcoal, boysenberries, black currants, and hints of cocoa and caramel. Lush, textured, and opulent with superb purity, medium to full body, savory flavors, and sweet, sexy tannins, this stunning Cheval Blanc may be even better than the 2005. Anticipated maturity: 2012-2030.
Western reviews.translation: 2006年佳宝酒庄的表现超过了酒桶中的表现。佳宝酒庄是由同等比例的卡波弗朗克和梅洛两种葡萄品种组成，种植在圣埃米利昂地区的沙质和砾石质土壤上，面向拉孔西亚兰和埃旺吉尔两家酒庄。酒液呈现出浓郁的红色，酒香甜美，带有薄荷、焦炭、黑莓、黑currant、巧克力和焦糖的味道。酒体丰富、细腻、丰满，口感纯粹，体积中等到中等以上，带有咸味和甜美的牙齿。这个佳宝酒庄可能比2005年更出色。预计成熟期：2012-2030年。

Western reviews.review: Displays lots of milk chocolate, cedar, berry and cappuccino aromas. Full-bodied, with chewy tannins, this is structured and layered for the vintage. Mouthpuckering. Needs time. This is one of the wines of the vintage. Best after 2015.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒展现出大量的牛奶巧克力、红 cedar、浆果和咖啡风味。口感丰富，具有嚼劲的橡皮质感，这瓶酒结构严谨，层次丰富，适合当年产酒的典范。口感非常强烈，需要时间来发酵。 这是当年产酒中的精品酒，建议在2015年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: A supple and heady vintage of Cheval, this gains power and amplitude over the course of several days. What sets it apart is the relaxed sophistication cabernet franc can yield from these 50-year-old vines. That adds vinosity to the Cheval's tight build, while the beautiful richness of the wine is classic merlot. It's the color of a black cherry, with the ripe flavor of that fruit darkened by the scent of figs, brightened by a floral note of violets. The tannins are supple, with a depth that will sustain the wine for decades.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶柔韧而浓郁的红酒，随着时间的推移，它的力量和音量会不断增加。它与众不同的原因是来自50年老树的卡伯内特法兰克葡萄，能够带来一种放松的高雅感。这种风格为切瓦尔的紧密结构带来了丰富的味道，而美丽的酒精度是经典的梅洛葡萄。酒的颜色如黑樱桃，味道像黑樱桃那样成熟，但又带有浓郁的浆果味和浆果的气味，伴随着一丝花香的紫罗兰。酒中的纤维柔软，深度会让酒精在几十年后仍然保持。

2023 Chateau Leoville-Las Cases 'Grand V.name: 2023 Chateau Leoville-Las Cases 'Grand Vin de Leoville'

Chinese pairs.original: 在我的印象中，Chateau Leoville Las Cases 总会给人一种大气磅礴、盛气凌人的狮心王形象，让人心甘情愿地臣服在它的威严之下。而在2023年份，我却看到了一个性格温和、面容和蔼的“盛事君王”，它不需要长达百米的仪仗队来彰显威严，而是站在民众之间，享受着人们的鲜花和礼赞。2023年份的香气和口感都变得格外温和，杨梅、桑果以及樱桃的四周缭绕着阵阵紫藤的芳香，这些香气随着清澈的酸度在杯中悠闲地散步，怎一个舒心了得。口感如苏绣般精致，冰鲜爽滑，而不知从什么时候开始，一股石墨粉的回甘开始拉开序幕，在我以为品鉴即将结束之际，开启了第二道味觉旅程…
Chinese pairs.new: 在我的印象中，Chateau Leoville Las Cases 总是给人一种气势恢弘、威严的形象，让人甘愿臣服于它的权威之下。但是，2023年份的版本却呈现出一种温和、和蔼的面貌，它不需要长长的仪仗队来展示威严，而是站在民众中间，享受着人们的赞美和鲜花。2023年份的香气和口感都变得格外温和，杨梅、桑果和樱桃的香气被紫藤的芳香所包围，这些香气随着清澈的酸度在杯中轻松地流动，令人感到非常舒心。口感细致如丝绸，冰冷而滑爽，突然，一股石墨粉的回甘开始出现，开启了第二道味觉旅程，令我感到惊喜。

English pairs.original: Chateau Leoville Las Cases has always been known for projecting a grand and imposing image, like a lion-hearted king who commands respect and admiration. However, in the 2023 vintage, I noticed a different side to this wine – a more approachable and gentle side that anyone can enjoy. This king does not need a hundred-meter-long ceremonial guard to assert his authority but instead stands among the people, basking in their flowers and praises. The aromas and flavors of the 2023 vintage are exceptionally mild. The scents of waxberry, mulberry, and cherry are accompanied by the gentle fragrance of wisteria that leisurely meanders through the glass. This wine has a precise acidity that soothes the soul, and the palate is as exquisite as Suzhou embroidery, which is ice-fresh and smooth. When you think the tasting concludes, a resurgence of graphite powder rises again, heralding a second journey on the finish.
English pairs.new: 勒维尔拉斯凯斯庄园（Chateau Leoville Las Cases）一直以其高贵和威严的形象而闻名，如一位雄心勃勃的国王，令人尊敬和赞叹。然而，在2023年的产季，我注意到这款酒有了不同的面貌——更温和和亲切的面貌，任何人都可以享受。这个国王不需要一百米长的仪仗队来断言其权威，而是站在人群中，沐浴在他们的赞美和鲜花中。2023年产季的香气和风味异常温和。蜡梅、桑葚和樱桃的香气伴随着悠闲地穿过玻璃的紫荆花的温和香气。这款酒具有精确的酸度，能够抚慰灵魂，口感如苏州刺绣般精美，冰凉而光滑。当你认为品酒已经结束时，图像粉末再次升起，宣告着第二次的旅程。

Western reviews.review: 97-99. Barrel Sample. With 86% of the blend, this is a Cabernet Sauvignon wine. With its fragrant fruit aromas and well-packed black-currant flavors, the wine has succulence, allied to tannins. The wine's impressive structure goes with its stylish character giving plenty of aging.
Western reviews.translation: 97-99分。酒桶样品。该酒的混合比例中有86%，这是卡贝网酒（Cabernet Sauvignon）的酒。酒的香气中有浓郁的果香和黑加仑（black-currant）风味，酒的口感丰富，搭配有坚果的味道。酒的结构优良，风格优雅，酒有很好的储存潜力。

Western reviews.review: A magnificent wine, detailed and showing amazing energy. Vibrant mid-palalte, the evenly distributed layers of flavour create a sensation of grandeur. Superbly fine tannins coat the mouth with laserlike precision. A maginficent, clearly defined grand wine.
Western reviews.translation: 一瓶极品红酒，细致入微，充满了精力。酒液在口中呈现出生动的中部口感，各层次的风味均匀分布，令人感受到豪华的气势。细致的橡皮质感在口中流动，犹如激光般精确。是一瓶极品的典范，清晰明了的豪华红酒。

Western reviews.review: Einmal mehr eine Nase zum Wegträumen, tief, nobel, floral, v erspielt, pure Emotion; am Gaumen dicht gebaut, ein Monument, mit Eleganz und beeindruckender Leichtigkeit, sensationelle Tanninqualität, knackige Frucht, alle Elemente sind perfekt austariert, grosse Länge. Ein majestätischer Las Cases.
Western reviews.translation: 一次又一次地，令人陶醉的鼻子，深邃、优雅、花朵般的香气，纯粹的情感；在口中紧密构建，一个纪念碑，充满优雅和令人印象深刻的轻盈，惊人的坚果质感，脆脆的果味，所有元素都完美地平衡，长长的尾部。一个雄伟的拉斯卡斯（Las Cases）。

Western reviews.review: Deep & dark with a vivid black purple color. The aromas are of  blackcurrant, licorice & cedar. Lifted cassis fruit on the nose is framed by very fine cedary oak. Cassis and elderberry fruit combines on the attack & continues on to the long finish. Fruit on the mid-palate is rich & concentrated, the tannic structure is fine & the wine is medium to full bodied. The wine is concentrated yet elegantly balanced  04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深度丰富、黑紫色酒液。酒中有黑currant、 licorice 和 cedar 的香气。酒鼻子上有浓郁的黑currant 和 elderberry 的果香，伴随着细致的cedar 木香。酒口入口果香浓郁，持续到长长的尾部。中口果香丰富浓郁，纤维结构细致，酒体中等到中等以上。酒精浓度高但又有着优雅的平衡。评分：4.24（ep）DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 2018年份的滴金简直和蜂蜜一样浓。相比其他贵腐菌较多的年份来说，这个年份的风味更为纯净，也更加新鲜。藏红花、南姜、咖喱粉这些由贵腐菌所带来的香气比较收敛，而像橙花、杏铺、黄桃罐头以及焦糖这类风干葡萄的味道更加突出。入口后的甜度非常出众，残糖的数据居然达到了惊人的145g/l。酸度的数值并不是特别高，但得益于滴金近些年来偏修长的风格表达，这款酒自始至终都保持了绝佳的平衡感。
Chinese pairs.new: 2018年份的滴金酒浓郁如蜂蜜。相比其他贵腐菌较多的年份，这个年份的风味更为纯净和新鲜。藏红花、南姜和咖喱粉的香气相对收敛，而橙花、杏核和黄桃罐头的风干葡萄味道更加突出。入口后的甜度非常出众，残糖达到了惊人的145g/l。虽然酸度不算特别高，但滴金近些年来的风格表达使得这款酒始终保持了绝佳的平衡感。

English pairs.original: Yquem 2018 is concentrated like a pot of honey. Compared to some vintages with more noble rots, the aromas are fresher and purer in the vintage of 2018. Those noble rots-driven fragrances like saffron, southern China ginger, curry powder are more discreet; however, the flavors of orange flower, dried apricot, yellow peach, and caramel that we often found in late harvest wines are more prominent. I am deeply surprised by its highly concentrated sweetness (with 145 g/l residual sugar.) The total acidity is not very high, but the palate is magically balanced from head to toe, thanks to Yquem’s taller and lingering expression.
English pairs.new:
雅克姆 2018 年的口感浓郁如蜜糖，相比于一些更为高贵的发酵年份，2018 年的雅克姆更为清新、纯粹。那些高贵的发酵带来的香气，如香料、南中国姜、咖哩粉，更加低调；然而，晚收葡萄常见的香气，如橙花、干枣、黄桃、焦糖，在雅克姆 2018 年更为突出。

我对其极高的浓度甜度（含糖量145 g/l）感到深感惊讶。总酸度并不高，但雅克姆的口感却从头到尾都保持着完美的平衡，这得益于雅克姆独特的持久表达。

Western reviews.review: Since 1959, world-famous Premier Cru Classe Supérieur Château d’Yquem has produced a dry white wine “Y” (pronounced “Ygrec”) in addition to their ultra-famous sweet wine. The Château only produces this rare wine in certain years when conditions permit. This Bordeaux Blanc is comprised of 75% Sauvignon Blanc and 25% Sémillon, with lifted aromatics of crisp white pear, lemon, elderflower, orange rind, and hints of sea spray. The palate is expansive, filling the mouth with layers of yellow fruit that complements the ever-present minerality. lt is unquestionably one of the great whites of Bordeaux.---- Miranda Franco
Western reviews.translation: 自1959年以来，世界闻名的超级首级葡萄酒庄园Château d’Yquem开始生产干白葡萄酒“Y”（发音为“Ygrec”），除了他们极为著名的甜酒。 该庄园仅在某些年份下生产这种罕见的酒，条件允许。 该波尔多白葡萄酒由75%萨伏ignon Blanc和25%塞米隆组成，具有清新的白梨、柠檬、 elderflower、橙皮和海浪水的气味。口感丰富，充满了黄色水果的层次，完美地与矿物质的存在相得益彰。毫无疑问，这是波尔多的伟大白葡萄酒之一。---- 米兰达·弗朗科。

Western reviews.review: Ungemein verführerische, gefällige und doch vielschichtige Aromatik, Noten von Backgewürzen, Dörraprikose, aber auch Zitrusfrüchte, Kräuter, Botrytis; voller Ansatz, grosse Dichte, Fülle und Länge, aber auch ideale Struktur, ewige Länge, entwickelt nach 24 Stunden sogar eine erste Ahnung von Eleganz, mit floralen Noten von Minze; überwältigend gut, beeindruckend, gross: unbedingt reifen lassen oder ausgiebig belüften.
Western reviews.translation:
这段红酒评论的中文翻译如下：

极具诱惑力的、优雅的、但又复杂的香气，带有烘烤香料、干燥辣椒、柑橘类水果、香草、Botrytis等调味；充满体积、密度、丰富感和持久感，但也具有理想的结构、永恒的持久感，24小时后甚至会展现出优雅的气质，带有薄荷的花香；非常出色、令人印象深刻、极品：一定要让它发酵或充分氧化。

Western reviews.review: Medium greenish yellow with silver reflections. Ripe yellow tropical fruit underlaid with fine savoury noble wood, candied orange and grapefruit, peach and blossom honey with some cookie notes in the background. Substantial, elegant, balanced ripeness, delicate coconut and lychee, creamy, silky texture, very poised, ripe peach, honey and white pepper on the very long finish. Shows great promise.
Western reviews.translation:
酒色：中等绿黄色，银光闪闪。

香气：成熟的黄色热带水果味，伴有细微的香料和高级木头味，糖化橙子和葡萄柚，桃子和花蜜味，背景中有饼干味。

口感：丰富、优雅、平衡的成熟度，细微的椰子和荔枝味，奶油般的滑顺，非常稳重，成熟的桃子，花蜜和白胡椒味在长长的尾部留下深刻印象。

酒表现出极大的潜力。

Western reviews.review: Elegant, creamy, fresh, sweet charmer. While this lacks the density and verve found in the very best vintages, there is more than enough ripe and overripe pineapple, vanilla, roasted apricot, mango, candied orange rind and honey to keep any taster busy. Luscious textured, rich and opulent, this will be delicious in its youth, and it also has the ability to age for decades. 97 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒优雅、奶油般的、清新、甜美。虽然这款红酒没有最好的年份那样丰富和生动，但它仍然拥有足够的成熟和超熟的菠萝、香草、烤石榴、芒果、糖浆橙皮和蜂蜜来让任何品酒者都能忙不迭。丰富的口感、丰富的口感、奢华的风格，这款红酒在年轻时会非常美味，并且也能在几十年后继续发酵。 97 分。

Chinese pairs.original: 17.7% 的品丽珠让我感受到了Chateau La Mission Haut-Brion 从未有过的清新和优雅，一朵”不怀好意”的紫罗兰逐渐打开花瓣，像是从遥远的海面传来的海妖的歌声，诱惑着你不断向它靠近。2023年份入口时的单宁质感略显突出，但很快就在温润的酒体中化为无形。略显温热的酒精散发出理想的能量感，和开场时优雅的花香形成了鲜明的对比。这款酒真正做到了层次分明、掷地有声，老牌波尔多该有的模样，它不仅一样都不少，还带着难以形容的魅惑。
Chinese pairs.new:
This 17.7% wine has left me with an unparalleled sense of freshness and elegance from Chateau La Mission Haut-Brion. A "mischievous" purple bloom gradually unfurls its petals, like the siren's song from a distant sea, beckoning you closer.

At the 2023 vintage entry, the tannins are slightly prominent, but they soon dissolve into the wine's velvety texture. A warm, slightly spicy alcohol radiates an ideal energy, contrasting sharply with the elegant floral notes at the beginning. This wine truly embodies the classic Bordeaux style, with none of the subtlety lost, but instead, an irresistible charm that's hard to put into words.

English pairs.original: The 17.7% Cabernet Franc imparts a refreshing and elegant dimension to Chateau La Mission Haut-Brion, like never before. It’s akin to a “mischievous” violet slowly unfolding its petals, with a siren’s song wafting over from a distant sea, calling you closer. The tannins of the 2023 vintage are initially prominent but quickly dissolve into the silky body. The slightly warm alcohol exudes an ideal energy, contrasting sharply with the elegant floral aromatics on the entry. This wine achieves a distinct layering and impactful presence, epitomizing the classic Bordeaux style—not only meeting all expectations but also delivering an indescribable allure.
English pairs.new: 这款17.7%的卡伯内特法兰克红酒为沙特奥马仕高布里昂酒庄带来了前所未有的清新和优雅的层次。它像一朵顽皮的紫罗兰花，慢慢地展开花瓣，远方海洋的海鸥般的歌声呼唤着你靠近。2023年产的酒精含量最初显著，但迅速融入到细滑的身体中。酒精的温暖感散发着理想的能量，与入口的优雅花香相互对比。这种酒取得了独特的层次和强烈的存在感，体现了经典的波尔多风格，不仅满足了所有期望，还带来了无法言说的魅力。

Western reviews.review: 96-98. Barrel Sample. This fine wine has a rounded edge along with aromas of spice and black fruits. The wine is dense but with layers of acidity and with complex tannins. Showing the opulent black fruits so often found at this estate, and with a smooth texture, there is great promise of long-term aging.
Western reviews.translation: 96-98分。酒桶样品。这瓶美酒具有圆润的口感，带有香料和黑色水果的香气。酒精浓度高但有层次的酸度和复杂的橡木味。展现了这家庄园常见的丰富黑色水果风味，并且具有光滑的口感，预示着长期陈化的巨大潜力。

Western reviews.review: 96-98. Barrel Sample. This fine wine has a rounded edge along with aromas of spice and black fruits. The wine is dense but with layers of acidity and with complex tannins. Showing the opulent black fruits so often found at this estate, and with a smooth texture, there is great promise of long-term aging.
Western reviews.translation: 96-98分。酒桶样品。这瓶美酒具有圆润的口感，带有香料和黑色水果的香气。酒精浓度高但有层次的酸度和复杂的橡木味。展现了这家庄园常见的丰富黑色水果风味，并且具有光滑的口感，预示着长期陈化的巨大潜力。

Western reviews.review: Tief, nobel, faszinierend, ungemein feinduftig, Veilchen, Kirschen, Cassis; feinziselierter Gaumen, wie aus dem Stein gemeisselt, knackig, saftig, hochelegant, tänzerisch leicht und mit hervorragender Länge. Eine hervorragende La Mission, klassisch im Stil des Hauses. (En Primeur Tasting April 2024)
Western reviews.translation: 深邃、优雅、迷人、极其浓郁的果香，带有紫罗兰、樱桃和黑加仑的味道；细腻的口感，如雕刻般精致，清脆、丰富、优雅、轻盈和持久。是一款出色的拉美仕酒，典型的拉美仕风格。

Western reviews.review: Tief, nobel, faszinierend, ungemein feinduftig, Veilchen, Kirschen, Cassis; feinziselierter Gaumen, wie aus dem Stein gemeisselt, knackig, saftig, hochelegant, tänzerisch leicht und mit hervorragender Länge. Eine hervorragende La Mission, klassisch im Stil des Hauses. (En Primeur Tasting April 2024)
Western reviews.translation: 深邃、优雅、迷人、极其浓郁的果香，带有紫罗兰、樱桃和黑加思的味道；细腻的口感，如雕刻般精致，清脆、丰富、优雅、轻盈和持久。是一款出色的拉美仕酒，典型的拉美仕风格。

Western reviews.review: This wine features very delicate tannins and judicious oak usage, supporting the energetic fruits at its core. Its expression is a bit quieter compared to usual, even more discrete and sublime, which enhances its charm. The lovely density and silky tannins contribute to a pleasingly smooth finish. Overall, this wine is distinguished by its quality, surpassing many others from the same appellation.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有非常细腻的橡木味和适度的橡木处理，支持其核心的活力果味。它的表达相比平常更为低调，更加隐秘和优雅，这使得它更具魅力。美丽的密度和丝滑的橡木味使得尾部更加顺滑。总体来说，这款红酒以其品质而闻名，超过了同级别的许多其他红酒。

Chinese pairs.original: 红色和黑果子加上甘草味、烟草味和欧洲酸樱桃复杂的香气。口感丰富饱满，柔软的单宁，持久的回味并带有咖啡的味道。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich and dark fruit flavors, along with hints of honey, tobacco, and European cherry notes, make up the complex aroma. The palate is full-bodied and plush, with soft tannins, a long finish, and a coffee-like aftertaste.

Western reviews.review: Thyme, spearmint, flowers, forest floor, and red fruits are found in the nose. Medium-bodied, with a strong tobacco edge to the fruits on the palate, the wine is a bit drying in the otherwise, sweet, red currant filled finish. The wine blends 60% Cabernet Sauvignon, 35% Merlot, 4% Cabernet Franc and 1% Petit Verdot, 13.5% ABV. Drink from 2025-2055. Drink from 2022-2035.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中包含了薄荷、山楂、花朵、森林地面和红果的味道。口感中果味带有强烈的烟草味，整体来说口感中带有一丝干涩，但结尾是甜的，红葡萄味道浓郁。该酒的混合比例为60%卡波内托萨万（Cabernet Sauvignon）、35%梅洛（Merlot）、4%卡波内托法兰克（Cabernet Franc）和1%佩蒂·维多（Petit Verdot），酒精度13.5%。建议从2025年至2055年饮用。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, dezente Ockerrandaufhellung. Zart floral unterlegte dunkle Waldbeernuancen, ein Hauch von kandierten Veilchen, etwas Nougat, Cassis, tabakige Anklänge, ein Hauch von Lakritze im Hintergrund. Saftig, elegant, frische rote Herzkirschen, reifes, integriertes Tannine, das dem Wein einen schönen Rückhalt gibt, finessenreicher Säurebogen, mineralisch und anhaftend, ein kleine Spur leichtgewichtiger als sein kräftiger Vorgänger 2010, der etwas höhere Merlotanteil ist spürbar, bereits gut entwickelt, ein ausgewogener Begleiter bei Tisch.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，微微的橙色边缘。酒中有轻微的花香，深色的黑莓味道，糖浆般的花朵味道，略带奶油味，黑莓味道，烟草味道，后面有薄荷糖味道。酒口滑顺，优雅，新鲜的红樱桃味道，成熟的坚果味道，酒中的酸度和矿物质味道很好，酒尾留有轻微的余味，略带轻薄的感觉，相比于2010年的酒，酒口更轻盈，酒中有更高的梅洛葡萄比例，酒已经很好地成熟，适合与菜肴一起享用。

Western reviews.review: So smooth, this is a rich, grandiose wine. Although it is full of black currant fruits and spice flavors, the texture is most impressive. Dusty tannins are integrated with juicy fruits seamlessly. The purest fruit flavors are allied to linear tannins in a precise yet generous way. The wine is evolving beautifully, but do not drink before 2020.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒非常顺滑，富有豪华感。虽然它充满了黑加仑果和香料的风味，但最令人印象深刻的是它的口感。干酪质的苦味和鲜美的果味融合得非常完美。纯正的果味与线性的苦味紧密结合，呈现出精确又丰富的风味。这款红酒正在美丽地演变，但请不要在2020年之前饮用。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark, purple/red colour, virtually opaque. Rich, powerful dark fruit aromas, cocoa-butter, smoke & clove are overlaid by classic dusty/pencil shaving notes. There are plentiful, fine, drying tannins, warming alcohol & cedary & sweet spice touches from new oak. Balanced acidity enlivens a flavour spectrum from black cherry fruit & blackberry to ripe mulberry. Drying tannins at the finish are smooth and fresh black-fruit & olive notes endure to the end. 4/12 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的紫红色，几乎透明。酒中富有强烈的黑果香气，巧克力油脂、烟熏味和丁香味与典型的灰尘/铅笔削痕味相融合。酒中充满细致的干性苦味，温暖的酒精和新橡木的松香和甜香味。酸度平衡，酒中的味道谱从黑樱桃果到黑莓再到成熟的桑葚。干性苦味在尾部保持平滑，黑果和橄榄味持续到最后。评分：4/12 DCAMW。

Western reviews.review: Lean to medium body. Very elegant and fine. 4.5h decant due to young age. Tannins present but well integrated. Pleasurable to drink but light on fruit and secondary/tertiary flavors. Very enjoyable, even if from off year in Pauillac.
Western reviews.translation: 体积轻至中等。非常优雅、细致。由于年轻，建议4.5小时放置。存在但已很好融合的苦味。口感愉悦，但果味和次级/三级风味较轻。即使来自帕乌拉克的不佳年份，也非常令人愉悦。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Haut-Bailly 一直是波尔多高洁与矜持的象征，它“荣曜秋菊，华茂春松”的美好形象，往往需要陈年才能逐渐显现。然而，在性格温和的2023年份，这款酒居然在年轻时就完全展现出了Chateau Haut-Bailly 精髓：我所钟爱的青墨，早早奠定了沉稳的基调；我所爱恋的松柏，静静散发着古朴的清香。杨梅和桑果滑过舌尖，保持多汁口感的同时，还沾染了一缕墨色的清雅，古香古色、韵味悠长。2023年份的Chateau Haut-Bailly 回归到了经典的混酿比例，在它看似清雅婀娜的酒体中，实则蕴藏着深邃的能量。
Chinese pairs.new:
Chateau Haut-Bailly 一直是波尔多高洁与矜持的象征，它展现出“荣曜秋菊，华茂春松”的美好形象，往往需要陈年才能逐渐显现。然而，在性格温和的2023年份，这款酒居然在年轻时就完全展现出了Chateau Haut-Bailly 精髓：我所钟爱的青墨，早早奠定了沉稳的基调；我所爱恋的松柏，静静散发着古朴的清香。杨梅和桑果滑过舌尖，保持多汁口感的同时，还沾染了一缕墨色的清雅，古香古色、韵味悠长。2023年份的Chateau Haut-Bailly 回归到了经典的混酿比例，在它看似清雅婀娜的酒体中，实则蕴藏着深邃的能量。

Translated Wine Review:

Chateau Haut-Bailly has always been a symbol of elegance and refinement in Bordeaux, with a beautiful image of "autumn chrysanthemums and spring cedars" that often requires aging to fully reveal itself. However, in the gentle 2023 vintage, this wine surprisingly showcases the essence of Chateau Haut-Bailly from the start: my beloved blue ink sets a stable tone early on; my cherished cedars quietly release a subtle, rustic aroma. The flavors of mulberries and blackberries glide across the palate, maintaining a juicy texture while picking up a hint of blue ink's elegance, with a rich, lingering flavor. The 2023 Chateau Haut-Bailly returns to its classic blend ratio, with a seemingly refined and delicate body that actually conceals deep energy.

English pairs.original: Chateau Haut-Bailly has always been a symbol of Bordeaux’s nobility and restraint. Its beauty is compared to “autumn chrysanthemums and flourishing spring pines” and typically reveals itself gradually with age. However, the 2023 vintage has a gentle character, which allows this wine to express the essence of Chateau Haut-Bailly from its youth. The wine has a stable foundation from the start and exudes a rustic fragrance of pines and cypresses. As the waxberry and mulberry flavors glide across the palate, they maintain a juicy texture while also picking up a touch of the ink’s elegance. This offers an ancient charm and a lingering taste. The 2023 Chateau Haut-Bailly returns to the classic blending ratio, harboring profound energy within its seemingly delicate and graceful body.
English pairs.new: 夏维·奥·贝利（Chateau Haut-Bailly）一直是波尔多的象征，代表着高贵和克制。它的美丽被比喻为“秋季菊花和繁荣的春季松树”，并且随着年龄的增长而逐渐展现。然而，2023年产的酒却具有温和的性格，使得它能够从年轻时就展现出夏维·奥·贝利的本质。酒的基础稳固，从一开始就散发着松树和柏树的原始香气。酒中的红枣和桑椹的风味在口中流动，保持着清脆的口感，同时也带有墨色般的优雅。这种古典风格的酒带来了一种古老的魅力和持久的味道。2023年夏维·奥·贝利恢复了经典的混合比例，内藏着深厚的能量，似乎是轻盈和优雅的身体。

Western reviews.review: 96-98. Barrel Sample. The wine has dark fruit and smoky aromas, with ripe black-currants and rich tannins. This is a fine vintage showing the complexity from this estate. It is full bodied but with layers of acidity to keep it fresh. Impressive and ageworthy.
Western reviews.translation: 96-98分。酒桶样品。酒中有浓郁的黑果和烟熏气味，带有成熟的黑加仑和丰富的苦味。这个品种展现了庄园的复杂性，是一瓶精美的酒。酒体丰富，但酸度层次丰富，保持了新鲜感。令人印象深刻，值得长期储存。

Western reviews.review: This wine showcases an almost Burgundian style, highlighted by its lively and crisp red fruits, accompanied by a relatively light body that imparts a refreshingly delicate quality. It exudes a sense of elegance and refinement, delivering a lively and flavourful experience to the palate. Despite these admirable characteristics, it does exhibit a modest level of concentration when compared to the estate’s finest vintages.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒展现出近似于勃艮第风格的特点，通过其生动的、清脆的红果味，伴随着相对轻薄的体积，赋予了令人愉悦的轻盈质感。它散发着典雅和精致的气质，带给舌尖生动的、丰富的体验。尽管它表现出令人钦佩的特质，但相比于庄园最好的年份，它的浓度略有不足。

Western reviews.review: Tiefgründig, kühl im Ausdruck, glasklare Carbernet-Frucht, Br ombeere, Kirsche, Cassis, Veilchen, steinig unterle> druckvoll am Gaumen, hat Fleisch am Knochen, bleibt elegant, seidiges Tannin umgarnt die Frucht, im Abgang ausgesprochen lang, endet auf rote Beeren und Lakritze. Ein ausgezeichneter, charmanter Haut-Bailly, der in jeder Phase seines Lebens Spass machen wird.
Western reviews.translation: 深度丰富，冷静的风格，透明的卡伯内特果味，浓郁的黑莓，樱桃，黑加仑，紫罗兰，岩石般的紧实感，口感丰富，有肉的质感，保持着优雅的风格，细致的纹理包围着果味，尾部非常长，结束于红莓和甘草的味道。是一瓶出色的，迷人的哈特-白利酒，随着它的成熟过程，会带给你无限的乐趣。

Western reviews.review: The wine is a deep, dark, not quite opaque purple-ruby color. The aromas are initially quite closed, but eventually yield lovely lifted cassis & redcurrant perfume. The palate has a good freshness & shows an excellent concentration of refined dark-plum fruit. The fine tannins give a touch of grip. The wine is of mid-weight with balanced alcohol. The long, structured finish combines graphite touches with dark red-plum fruit. A very polished wine. 04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒呈现出深暗的紫红色，几乎透明。酒精气味在一开始是封闭的，但随后释放出美妙的黑加仑和红 gooseberry香味。口感清新，展现出精致的黑浆果风味。细致的纤维素提供了适当的抓握感。酒体中等，酒精度衡适宜。长而结构化的尾部结合了石墨和黑红浆果风味。是一瓶非常光滑的红酒。 评分：04/24 (ep) DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 成熟的黑莓、李子、雪松和烟草的香气，完整成熟的单宁，口感丰富浓郁，带有黑莓、烟草和茶叶的味道，悠长的回味和极强的陈年能力。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of mature blackberry, plum, pine, and tobacco. Full-bodied tannins, rich and intense flavors of blackberry, tobacco, and tea, with a long finish and exceptional aging potential.

Western reviews.review: Deep garnet colored, the 2010 Montrose opens with classic notions of warm blackcurrants, plum preserves, cedar chest and pencil shavings plus touches of menthol and underbrush. Full-bodied, concentrated and built like a brick house in the mouth, the densely packed, muscular black fruit is superbly supported by firm, ripe, grainy tannins, finishing with great length and depth.
Western reviews.translation: 2010年蒙特罗斯红酒呈现深红色，酒体开启时带有典型的黑currant、黑枣、松木箱和铅笔削痕的香气，伴有薄荷和灌木丛的微妙气息。酒体丰富、浓郁，口感坚实，黑果酒的密集度令人惊叹，完美地被坚实、成熟、细粒的橡木味所支撑，酒尾长而深。

Western reviews.review: And on to the tighter, more intellectual vintage of the two sparring partners of 2009 and 2010. You can feel the quality, the intensity, the more cerebral aspect of 2010 where the tannins are matched step for step by acidity and fruit. A wonderful wine, it will run and run and even now it floats somewhere on your palate, keeping itself hidden from view. If you want to understand why acidity can be a good thing, get to know Montrose 2010. There is an abundance of autumnal black fruit, certainly, even touches of bitter dark chocolate and dark pepper spicing, but this is going to unfurl at its own pace.
Western reviews.translation: 让我们来看一下2010年和2009年的两瓶红酒。2010年的红酒更为精致，质地更好，味道更浓郁。它的酸度和果味与坚果的苦味相互平衡，非常出色。即使现在，2010年的红酒仍然在口中留下深刻的印象，似乎在隐身一般。想要了解酸度的好处吗？那就来品尝一下2010年的蒙特罗斯红酒吧。果味丰富，带有秋季黑果的味道，甚至有微微的苦巧克力和黑胡椒的香气，但这瓶红酒会在自己的节奏上展现出全部的魅力。

Western reviews.review: Rock solid, displaying a dense core of plum, steeped currant and braised fig fruit, with racy charcoal and ganache notes. Intensely chalky, offering flesh and refinement to match the bracing minerality, this shows hints of grilled savory, iron, warm paving stone and bitter orange on the riveting finish. Should age very slowly. Best from 2019 through 2038.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感坚实，展现出浓郁的浆果风味，如浓缩的黑杏和烤枣，伴有焦炭和巧克力般的甘油味。矿物质的味道非常强烈，提供了丰富的口感和细腻的质感，酒尾留有焦烧的烟熏味、铁矿味、热砖头味和苦橙味。建议慢慢陈化，最佳饮用时间从2019年到2038年。

Western reviews.review: A perfumed and pure Montrose, with lots of currants, berries and spices that evolve to chocolate and light coffee. Full body, with super racy tannins and bright and clean finish. Very fine and structured. A balance and freshness to it all as well as beautiful form and tension.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒是典型的蒙特罗斯风格，具有浓郁的香气，果香和浓郁的果实味道，如黑currant、berries和香料，随着时间的推移，会逐渐转变为巧克力和轻微的咖啡味。酒体丰富，具有极其精致的纤维和清晰的口感。酒尾清晰干净，非常精致和结构良好。酒中有着完美的平衡和新鲜感，外加优美的形态和紧张感。

Western reviews.review: This is such an elegant wine that has all the structure of the vintage. Surrounding the tannins, the wine is sweet and ripe, with smokiness from the wood. It's powerful, elegant and sophisticated with a strong sense of poise. The tannins promise long-term aging. Cellar Selection.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一款典雅的红酒，拥有这一年份的典型结构。酒中充满了甜润的果味和木头烟熏的味道，酒质强劲而优雅，具有典雅的风格和稳重的气质。酒中的纤维质保证了长期的陈化潜力。 cellar Selection。

Chinese pairs.original: 当酒精更加柔和，但口感依旧粉嫩的时候，Chateau Calon Segur 的貂蝉气质变的愈发耀眼，它的妩媚甚至从每一个毛孔散发出来，举手抬足之间，令人忍不住地想要将其占有，狠狠地占有… 摇杯时，无数的粉色樱花在眼前盛开，走近一看，布满了一颗颗挂着露珠的奶油草莓。嫩豆腐般的酒体吹弹可破，既泛着淡雅的光泽，又不失水嫩的质地。品完2023年份我更加确定，温和年份比炎热年份更适合Chateau Calon Segur 抒发内心的感受，2023年份你值得拥有。
Chinese pairs.new: When the tannins soften but the texture remains delicate, Chateau Calon Segur's seductive charm shines even brighter, its allure radiating from every pore, making it impossible to resist. With every swirl of the glass, a profusion of pink cherry blossoms unfurls before your eyes, only to reveal a cluster of dew-kissed strawberries. The wine's tender body is as fragile as silken tofu, boasting a subtle sheen and a freshness that's simply irresistible. After tasting the 2023 vintage, I'm convinced that Chateau Calon Segur is best suited to mellow years, and the 2023 vintage is one you won't want to miss.

English pairs.original: As the alcohol becomes gentler, yet the palate remains tenderly soft, the Diao Chan-like charm of Chateau Calon Segur grows increasingly dazzling. Its allure seems to emanate from every pore, compelling one to possess it utterly… Swirling the glass, countless sakura blooming in my eyes. Take a closer look, they are even covered with dew-dropped strawberries. The body is as delicate as soft tofu, fragile to the touch, yet it radiates a subtle luster without losing its juicy texture. Having tasted the 2023 vintage, I am even more convinced that mild vintage suit Chateau Calon Segur better than hot ones. The 2023 vintage is indeed one to cherish.
English pairs.new: 酒精的味道越来越轻柔，口感仍然细腻柔和，Chateau Calon Segur的魅力如同《洛神赋》中的貂蝉，越来越令人倾倒。它的魅力似乎从每一个细节中都散发出来，令人深深迷恋。旋转酒杯，我的眼前出现无数的樱花，细看更是被露珠覆盖的草莓。酒体如同软豆腐般细腻，轻轻一碰就碎，然而它仍然散发着细微的光泽，且保持着其丰富的口感。品尝了2023年的酒后，我更加确信温和的年份更适合Chateau Calon Segur，而不是炎热的年份。2023年的酒确实是一款值得珍藏的佳酿。

Western reviews.review: 95-97. Barrel Sample. Dark-chocolate and licorice aromas show a wine that has great structure and promise. It is rich with generous Merlot and dense with concentration and dark power. It has the acidity that marks out the year.
Western reviews.translation: 95-97分。酒桶样品。巧克力和甘草的香气表明这是一瓶结构坚实，充满希望的红酒。它富有丰富的梅洛葡萄，浓密且充满黑色力量。它具有标志着这一年风格的酸度。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark, not quite opaque ruby red. The aromas are of chocolate, mocha & cocoa over red-plum. The palate shows dark-plum fruit, fine cedar, chocolatey tannins & a lifted, almost leafy cassis fruit shows on the mid-palate. The wine is medium to full bodied, rich & elegant with fine velvety texture. Alcohol is balanced & acidity is fresh The finish is structured, dusty & rich with enduring juicy black-plum fruit, cocoa, coconut & vanilla notes. 04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，几乎透明。酒香中充满了巧克力、摩卡、可可和红浆果的味道。口感中有黑浆果、细致的松木、巧克力般的苦味和中口的几乎叶绿的黑浆果味。酒体中等到中等以上，富有层次，优雅，细致的纹理。酒精平衡，酸度新鲜。酒尾结构坚实，尘土般的味道，富有黑浆果、可可、椰子和香草的味道。评分：4.24（ep）DCAMW。

Chinese pairs.original: 在2022年份，我原本以为会遇到一款极为浓郁的Le Pin，但令人惊喜的是，它却在一上来就给我递上一朵优雅的紫罗兰。精致的烘焙香气掩盖不住成熟莓果的热情，还没等我摇完酒杯，就被一筐一筐的蓝莓、樱桃和黑枸杞所包围，被一颗一颗的太妃糖所环绕。细腻的单宁带来极致柔滑的口感，含在口中居然还散发着甘草和丁香味道。Le Pin的甜美感并未因2022年的干热而变得热烈，反而在酷热中逐渐显露出不可思议的优雅，是一朵在酷热中孤勇绽放的珍奇之花。
Chinese pairs.new: In the 2022 vintage, I expected a rich and intense Le Pin, but what I got was a delicate, velvety purple flower instead. Subtle baking spices can't mask the passion of ripe berries, and before I even finished swirling the glass, I was surrounded by a basket of blueberries, cherries, and black currants, all wrapped in a layer of caramel. The refined tannins deliver an incredibly smooth texture, and as I hold it in my mouth, I'm hit with hints of licorice and cinnamon. Le Pin's sweetness hasn't become overbearing due to the hot and dry 2022 vintage, but rather, it has revealed an astonishing elegance, like a rare flower blooming bravely in the heat.

English pairs.original: In the 2022 vintage, I initially expected a Le Pin with immense power; however, it offers me an elegant violet right from the start. The delicate toasted notes couldn’t conceal the passion of the ripe berries. Before I even finish swirling the glass, I find myself enveloped by baskets of blueberries, cherries, and black goji berries. The refined tannins provide incredible smoothness, revealing hints of licorice and clove as they lingered. The sweetness of Le Pin is not intensified by the arid heat of 2022; instead, it displays remarkable elegance amid sweltering conditions, blossoming like a rare, resilient flower in the fire.
English pairs.new: 2022年产的莱平红酒，我最初期待的是一种强大的莱平红酒；然而，它却从一开始就展现出优雅的紫色。细微的烤香味无法掩盖成熟的浆果的激情。即使我还没完成摇晃玻璃，我就被蓝莓、樱桃和黑枸杞的味道所包围。精致的纤维素提供了出色的光滑感，留下了 licorice 和 cloves 的余味。莱平红酒的甜度并没有因2022年的干热而增强；相反，它在酷热的环境中展现出出色的优雅，像是一种罕见的顽强的花朵在烈火中绽放。

Western reviews.review: Quite floral in nature, it is the vivacious nature, sensuality, and freshness in the fruits that stand out. Picture, velvety-textured, black plums with dark chocolate, saffron, orange peel, cumin and black raspberries that caress and paint your palate with layers of fruit. There is a sublime sense of purity, paired with elegance and vivacity that sticks with you in the precise finish for close to 60 seconds. Produced from 100% Merlot, 14.4% ABV, 3.77 pH, the harvest took place September 6 - September 17. Yields were only 29 hectoliters per hectare. Drink from 2026-2055. 98-100 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的特点是花香浓郁，果味生动、性感、清新。想象一下，黑杏的软绵质，融合了巧克力、花椒、橙皮、黑莓和黑醋栗的味道，会在你的口中留下一层层的果味。这种纯粹、优雅和生动的感觉会在口感的最后60秒左右持续存在。该酒由100%梅洛特葡萄制成，14.4%的酒精度，3.77的pH值，收获时间为9月6日至9月17日。产量仅为29公顷每公顷。建议在2026-2055年间饮用。评分：98-100分。

Western reviews.review: A wide spectrum of aromatics: floral, fruity and spice. Highly vibrant acidity, firm and fu ll mid-palate, wrapped up in the dark chocolate like tannins, yet also gentle and polished! It deserves an American style of cry: OMG! Lots of scents on the palate lingering at the finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的芳香层次丰富，包含花香、水果香和香料香。口感清新活泼，中口坚实饱满，黑巧克力般的苦味纤维柔和细腻。值得惊叹！口感中充满了各种香味，持续到最后的余韵。

Western reviews.review: Le nez est frais, fruité, élégant et joliment aérien. Il offre de l’onctuosité aérienne, de l’harmonie, de la complexité et de la délicatesse, un fin côté infusion, associées aux notes de mûre de boysen éclatante, de myrtille pulpeuse/éclatante, de bleuet ainsi qu’à de fines pointes de cerise bigarreau, presque une discrète pointe de rôti ainsi qu’à de délicates pointes de graphène, de vanillé et à une imperceptible pointe presque fumée. La bouche est joliment menée, joliment fraiche, élégante, aérienne et offre une jolie délicatesse et intensité dans sa fraicheur et dans sa densité, un joli côté velouté/aérien, tout en délicatesse et subtilité. Elle exprime les notes de mûre pulpeuse/juteuse, de cassis frais/éclatant et plus légèrement – de violette associées à des touches de minéralité racée/fraiche, une fine pointe séveuse/infusion en fond ainsi qu’à des fines pointes de cerise rôtie et fraiche et à des discrètes pointes de tabac blond frais, de rose et à une subtile ponte de chocolat noir. Les tannins sont souples, élégants et polis. Bonne longueur. Petite sapidité en fond. Belle harmonie, une jolie délicatesse et un fin côté presque crayeux en fond. Une très belle fraicheur et une subtile pointe de chocolaté en fond.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

酒的香气清新、果香、优雅、轻盈。它带来的是空气般的滑顺感、和谐、复杂性和细腻感，伴有黑莓爆发式的、蓝莓浓郁的、蓝莓的、以及杏仁般细腻的、几乎是隐约的烤肉味和细腻的烟草味。

口感优雅、清新、细腻、空气般的，带来的是清新的和浓郁的感觉，伴有浓郁的黑莓、酸甜的黑currant和轻微的紫罗兰味，伴有矿物质的清新感、细腻的浓郁感和细腻的烟草味。

酒的口感清新、细腻、优雅、空气般的，带来的是清新的和浓郁的感觉，伴有浓郁的黑莓、酸甜的黑currant和轻微的紫罗兰味，伴有矿物质的清新感、细腻的浓郁感和细腻的烟草味。

酒的苦味柔和、优雅、光滑。酒的持久度很好。酒底有轻微的甜感。酒的和谐感很好，带来的是清新的和细腻的感觉，酒底有细腻的烟草味和轻微的巧克力味。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark purple-red color is not quite opaque. Aromas are restrained but precise dark-plum fruit with clean cedary spices. A fabulously opulent texture is so juicy with black-fruit & perfectly integrated exotic oak. The wine is medium to full bodied with well-balanced alcohol. Very fine, earthy-textured tannins give hints of truffle on the mid-palate. Juicy, elegant dark-cherry fruit emerges from the earthy notes, giving a long, silky-textured finish. 04/23 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深紫红色，几乎透明。酒香清晰，果香浓郁，带有干酪香和干净的松木香。酒体丰富，口感丰富，黑果味浓郁，橡木味完美融合。酒体中等到中重，酒精平衡。酒中含有细腻的土质纤维，中口有松露的香气。酒尾长长，黑樱桃果香从土质味中升起，呈现出细腻的口感。评分：04/23 DCAMW

Western reviews.review: Spectacular fruit concentration. Very long finish with a great definition of the fruit and complexity. Blueberries, blackberries, cherries and violet. Outstanding balance between freshness, powdery firm tannins and body. Unbelievable aging potential, simply a masterpiece.
Western reviews.translation: 惊人的果实浓度。极长的尾部，果实和复杂性都非常清晰。蓝莓、黑莓、草莓和紫罗兰。新鲜度、粉末般的坚实的苦味和体积之间的完美平衡。令人难以置信的储存潜力，简直是一幅杰作。

Chinese pairs.original: 在1999年被LVMH所买下。酒体呈现明亮的金黄色泽，香气真是妙不可言，充满了集中的坚果味道，但十分平衡，富含烤栗子、榛子、太妃糖、柑橘果酱、奶油蛋糕、蜂蜜、酒渣、橘子及些许椰子、青橄榄和酸橙气息，入口精细且活泼，带有直冲脑门的绝高酸度，所谓的“一片祥和之气”所指的也不过如此吧！伴随悠长、极为纯净的矿物质余韵，但感觉不到一丝严肃，还能有比这更幸福，更美好的了吗？难怪说“所有的库克都是顶级佳酿”，看来是很有道理的！
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts a bright golden hue, with an aroma that is nothing short of enchanting, packed with concentrated nutty flavors in perfect balance. Notes of caramelized hazelnuts, praline, orange marmalade, butter cake, honey, wine sediment, orange zest, coconut, green olive, and a hint of lemon and acidity leap from the glass. The palate is refined and lively, with an electrifying acidity that hits the palate like a bolt of lightning. A long, pure mineral finish follows, leaving no sense of seriousness in its wake. Is this truly the epitome of happiness and beauty? It's no wonder they say "all great vintages are top-notch."

English pairs.original: Purchased by LVMH in 1999. Bright golden color, intensely nutty but still very balanced, awesome noses of roasted chestnut, hazelnut, toffee, marmalade, cream cake, honey, lees, citrus, with slight coconut, green olive and lime, ultra-high but very fine and zingy acidity, perfectly balanced and harmonious, its enduring and purely mineral-driven length had not any solemnity, really enjoyable. No wonder it is said ‘all Krugs are prestige cuvees’.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒是由LVMH于1999年收购的。酒色金黄明亮，具有强烈的坚果味道，但仍然非常平衡，酒香中有烤栗子的味道、杏仁、糖浆、马铃薯饼、蜂蜜、陈年酒、柑橘类水果、淡淡的椰子味、青橄榄和lime，酸度极高但非常细腻和清脆，酒体完美平衡和和谐，酒尾持久纯净无任何沉重感，非常令人愉悦。难怪有人说“所有的克鲁格都是精酿”。

Western reviews.review: (2015) The regular 2000 vintage Krug has a wonderful freshness and a subtle, tight character, with biscuit and brioche, but a delightful floral and soft herb quality giving layered complexity. Fabulous orange and lime sweetness and intensity on the palate, real mid-palate concentration and weight. The cream and gentle almond richness rounds out the finish, the salt and minerals and the juice of the lime acidity into the finish is marvellous, in a wine that has obvious cellaring potential for a decade and more - probably much more.
Western reviews.translation: 2015年克鲁格（Krug）常规2000年款红酒，具有迷人的新鲜感和细致的紧致性，带有饼干和布里奥奇的味道，但具有令人愉悦的花朵和柔和的草本质味，给人层次丰富的复杂感。口感上有美妙的橙子和柠檬甜度和强度，真正的中口浓度和重量。奶油和轻柔的杏仁丰富感圆满结束，盐和矿物质和柠檬酸的滋味融入结束，是一个明显有着十年以上储存潜力的红酒，可能更长时间。

Western reviews.review: Óptimo aspecto visual, bolha muito delicada, muito rico de aromas, notas de flores brancas e resinas. Muita complexidade na boca, notas de tosta e frutos secos, bela acidez. Um vinho que é classe em estado puro.
Western reviews.translation: 优美的外观，气泡细致，酒香丰富，带有白花和树脂的香气。口感复杂，带有烤焦和干果的味道，酸度适宜。是一瓶纯粹的高品质红酒。

Western reviews.review: Unterschiedlicher könnten sie nicht sein, die beiden verkosteten Jahrgänger von Krug, und beweisen damit nur, das Jahrgänge kein Marketinggag sind. Der 2000er entspricht dem reifen Stil eines Krug, mit dezenten Rancio-Aromen, Vanille, Haselnüsse, ein Hauch Zitrus, im Mund ungemein cremig und delikat und abgerundet und weise - jetzt voll ausgereift und zu geniessen.
Western reviews.translation: 两款来自克鲁格(Krug)的年份红酒的口感差异极大，证明了年份并不是一个营销手段。2000年产的红酒符合克鲁格的成熟风格，带有微妙的陈年气味、香草、杏仁、柑橘的余味，口感极其丰富细腻，圆润而智慧，现已成熟完美，值得品尝。

Western reviews.review: The Millennium Krug is more advanced than the 1998. Broader richer fuller with big aromatic notes of pear toasted almonds and oyster liqueur. More mineral in the mouth with brightness and acidity mixed with caramel, nougat and salt. Complex to say the least but there is an approachable side to this wine that may tune out to peak earlier than most editions. Cellar this through 2020 than let the drinking begin. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 千禧年克鲁格（Millennium Krug）比1998年更为成熟。它更广阔、更丰富、更饱满，具有大气的桃子、烤杏仁和蠔油的香气。口感更矿物质，带有亮度和酸度的混合，伴有焦糖、核桃糖和盐的味道。说它复杂是低估了，但它也有一个可以接近的方面，可能会在其他版本达到巅峰之前更早达到巅峰。将其贮存到2020年，然后开始品尝。 (安东尼·吉斯蒙迪和斯图尔特·托比)

Western reviews.review: Medium greenish-yellow, fine, persistent mousse. Finely scented nuances of stone fruit, a hint of roasted hazelnuts, delicate herbal spiciness, underlaid with pleasant fresh apple notes. Juicy and elegant, fine white pear and mango tones, elegant structure, harmonious, minerality on the finish, exceedingly fresh, understated brioche notes on the finish. Good length, good ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是中等的绿黄色，泡沫细腻持久。酒中有石果的细微香气，烤杏仁的微妙味道，轻微的草药香气，底层有新鲜苹果的愉悦味道。酒口滑顺，白梨和芒果的味道清新典雅，结构优雅，完美和谐，矿物质味道在尾部留下深刻印象，酒尾清新自然，低调的面包味道在尾部留下余韵。酒的长度适中，储存潜力较强。

Chinese pairs.original: 这就是我喜欢的 “鲜花大将军”：“耍的一手好花枪，写的一手好文章”，坐拥气吞山河的霸气却又不失文人墨客的儒雅。香气看似超级集中，但其实藏着数不尽的香气线条。天生的成熟莓果在血柚、血橙、甘草、八角的帮助下尽显层次感；它们从四面八方不断刺激着味蕾，每品一次都能戳中你的 “软肋”。粉末状的单宁铺满味蕾，扎实又细密。陈年30载后依旧是鹤发童颜。这样的酒还不赶紧入手等啥啊？
Chinese pairs.new:
This is my ideal "Floral General": a masterful display of floral complexity, paired with elegant writing. It exudes a commanding presence, yet retains the refinement of a scholar. The aroma appears concentrated, but is actually layered with an endless array of subtle nuances. 

The natural sweetness of the berries is expertly balanced by the blood orange, blood tangerine, licorice, and star anise, creating a rich and multi-dimensional taste experience. Each sip is a masterful stroke, hitting your "soft spot" every time.

The powdery tannins coat your palate, providing a solid yet refined texture. Even after 30 years of aging, it remains youthful and vibrant. What are you waiting for? Get your hands on this wine before it's too late.

English pairs.original: Like the legendary General Flower, this wine embodies both strength and grace, showcasing a commanding spirit and the elegance of a true “Literati”. Its bouquet is rich and complex, revealing countless layers of fragrance with each sniff. The ripe berries blend effortlessly with notes of blood grapefruit, blood orange, licorice, and star anise, creating a symphony of flavors that will hit your “soft spot” with each sip. The powdery tannins sweep across your palate, leaving behind an intense and creamy texture that will linger long after you’ve finished your glass. And after aging for 30 years, this wine remains as fresh and invigorating as ever, a true masterpiece that you simply cannot afford to miss.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒就像传说中的“将军花”，展现出强大的力量和优雅的风范，展现出真正的“文人气质”。酒香丰富复杂，随着每一次闻气，层次丰富的香气不断展现。成熟的果实与血橙、血柚、甘草和八角香料融合在一起，演奏出一首美妙的风景，让每一口都能触动你的“软肋”。粉末状的苦味物质在口中流动，留下一道浓郁的、奶油般的口感，持续存在于你喝完杯子后很长时间。经过30年的陈酿，这款红酒依然保持着新鲜和振奋的味道，是一个真正的杰作，你绝不能错过。

Western reviews.review: The 2020 Pavie Macquin is sensational. Rich, dark and explosive, the 2020 balances the natural richness that is such a signature of the estate with a level of energy and vibrancy I have not seen here in the recent past. The result is a towering, imposing Pavie Macquin that hugely delivers. In this vintage, regisseur Nicolas Thienpont did not use the Cabernet Sauvignon, so the blend is 80% Merlot and 20% Cabernet Franc, with the Franc lending aromatic presence, energy and depth. What a total knock out! - Antonio Galloni
Western reviews.translation: 2020年帕维马昆（Pavie Macquin）酒是极具惊艳的。富有深度、黑暗且爆发力十足，2020年的帕维马昆完美地平衡了这家庄园的自然丰富性和我近期来看从未见过的活力和生机。结果是，帕维马昆呈现出一座高耸的、令人印象深刻的酒庄，巨大的表现。 在这个年份，庄园主尼古拉斯·蒂恩邦特（Nicolas Thienpont）没有使用卡波内尔·萨夫维（Cabernet Sauvignon），所以酒的比例是80%梅洛（Merlot）和20%卡波内尔·法兰克（Cabernet Franc），法兰克的气味、活力和深度为酒增添了新的魅力。真的是一场完美的胜利！ - 安东尼奥·加隆尼（Antonio Galloni）

Western reviews.review: I have never had a Pavie Macquin like this. It’s so fresh and vivid with black cherry, currant and raspberry character, as well as citrus. Some mineral and spice. Salt, too. The palate is full and linear with a verticality that takes you so deep and long. Endless. Transparent.
Western reviews.translation: 我从未品尝过这样一瓶帕维马昆。它如此新鲜生动，带有黑樱桃、黑加仑和草莓的特征，以及柑橘的味道。还有矿物质和香料。还有盐的味道。口感丰富线条整齐，垂直性使你深入长久。无尽。透明。

Western reviews.review: Vivid and vibrant nose, full of rose petals, lilac floral edges, strawberries and black cherries. Forward, expressive, perfumed, alive. Sensual on the palate, smooth, velvety soft, intense but well balanced with a gorgeous plush, mouthful of ripe tannins. Really very good with the right intensity, structure and push. Powerful but controlled, poised yet plush, wild and raw yet pretty too with tons of energy and St-Emilion glamour. Has a core of juicy, bright red fruits with a grainy, herbal edge to the strawberries, a lovely bitterness, and edges of liquorice, slate and wet stone - nuanced and aromatic. I love this, they haven't pushed too far and the acidity is brilliant. Clean and precise.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气丰富多彩，带有玫瑰花瓣、百合花、草莓和黑杏的香味。口感丰富、生动、芬芳、充满活力。口感丰富、滑顺、细腻，强烈但平衡，具有优雅的丰富口感，满满的成熟的橡皮质。非常适合，结构合理，推动力强。强大但控制良好，稳重而丰富，野性而原始，但也很美丽，充满能量和圣埃米利昂的魅力。酒中有一个核心的鲜红果肉，带有草莓的颗粒状草药味，草莓的美味， licorice、 slate 和湿石的边缘，具有细腻的味道和香气。

Western reviews.review: The dense purple-hued 2020 Château Pavie Macquin checks in as a blend of 80% Merlot and 20% Cabernet Franc from yields of 31 hectoliters per hectare and a selection of 85% of the production. Incredibly pure cassis and blueberry fruits as well as complex spring flowers, liquid violets, white truffle, and a liqueur of limestone-like minerality define the aromatics, and it's medium to full-bodied on the palate, with ultra-fine tannins, the vintage's pure, focused, structured profile, and a great finish. As in most vintages, this beauty is not for instant gratification and needs 7-8 years, if not a decade of cellaring to show its potential. It's another true vin de garde from the team of Nicolas Thienpont (Stéphane Derenoncourt also consults) that readers will love to have in their cellar.Rating: 96+
Western reviews.translation: 2020年夏托帕维麦昆（Château Pavie Macquin）是一款深紫色的红酒，来自80%梅洛（Merlot）和20%卡波弗朗（Cabernet Franc）的混合，产量为每公顷31公升，选择了85%的生产。酒中的浓郁黑currant和蓝berry果香，复杂的春花、液体紫罗兰、白松露和石灰岩矿物质的香气，让人难以忘怀。口感中等到中厚，纤维细腻，酒体结构紧致，矿物质味道清晰，酒尾长而持久。与大多数年份一样，这款美酒不适合立即享用，需要7-8年甚至十年以上的陈酿才能展现其潜力。尼古拉斯·蒂恩邦特（Nicolas Thienpont）团队（斯蒂芬·德雷诺库尔也提供咨询）再次推出了一款真正的陈年红酒，让读者会喜欢将其放入自己的酒窖中。评分：96+

Western reviews.review: This full wine’s ripe black fruits are velvety in texture and density. Inherently powerful, the wine keeps a great sense of proportion and balance. It has good acidity, with the freshness and balance coming together.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的成熟黑果充满细腻的质感和密度。酒中天然的力量与完美的比例和平衡相得益彰。它具有良好的酸度，新鲜和平衡的感觉融合在一起。

Chinese pairs.original: Rauzan-Segla 2019是一款极致唯美的玛歌佳酿。香气迷人而优雅，闻杯之后仿佛走进了铺满紫罗兰的繁花世界。口感鲜嫩多汁、柔和细腻，些许孜然、茴香的香料气息在味蕾上萦绕，伴随着淡奶油般细滑的单宁，像是一张散发着东方香料的波斯绒毯。浑然天成的品鉴盛宴。
Chinese pairs.new: Rauzan-Segla 2019 is a quintessential Margaux wine. The aroma is captivating and elegant, transporting you to a world of blooming lavender after taking a sip. The palate is fresh, juicy, and silky smooth, with subtle notes of cumin and coriander lingering on the finish, accompanied by a delicate, creamy texture of tannins, reminiscent of a Persian rug infused with Eastern spices. A harmonious and indulgent tasting experience.

English pairs.original: Rauzan-Segla 2019 is a sublime and gorgeous top-quality Margaux. The aromas are arresting and elegant, just one sniff seems to lead you in a floral world covered with violet. The palate is fresh and juicy, soft and refined, with the scent of cumin and fennel lingering on your taste buds, accompanied by creamy and fine-grained tannins, which is like a furry Persian carpet emitting the fragrance of oriental spices. Absolutely a noble and sublime feast for tasting.
English pairs.new: 拉赞-塞格拉 2019是一款极品马尔格斯葡萄酒。酒香迷人优雅，仅一口气就能领略到花卉世界的美丽，尤其是紫罗兰的芬芳。口感清新果香，柔软细腻，余味中带有孜然和小茴香的香气，伴随着细腻的纤维质，酿造得像一件散发东方香料芬芳的细软地毯。绝对是一场高雅的美食盛宴。

Western reviews.review: Silky, seductive and sensuous, the nose, with its blend of flowers, tobacco leaf, espresso bean, violets, roses and red pit fruits is already quite showy. Medium/full-bodied, fresh, vibrant, clean and pure, the fruit offers length, depth and complexity. But it will need a bit of time to fully express its essence. If you have a bit of patience, it will be worth the wait. Drink from 2030-2060. 97 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气丰富多彩，带有花朵、烟草叶、咖啡豆、紫罗兰、玫瑰和红果的味道，非常引人注目。口感中等到中重，清新活泼，干净纯粹，果味丰富，具有长度、深度和复杂性。但是，它需要一些时间才能完全展现出其本质。如果你有耐心，等待的价值将会得到回报。建议在2030-2060年之间饮用。评分97分。

Western reviews.review: (Verkostet am 9. März in Windisch). Kräftiges Rubinrot. Die Nase ist hochkomplex und gleichzeitig subtil, da sind intensive, florale Noten, Veilchen, noble Röstaromen unterlegt von einem Mix aus roten und schwarzen Beerenfrüchten, der Wein gewinnt mit Luft deutlich an Komplexität, zeigt auch rauchige und steinige Noten, faszinierend. Der Auftakt ist angenehm weich und zugänglich, die Tannine sind von höchster Güte, fein verwoben mit der delikaten Frucht, sie sind sehr präsent, machen sich jedoch erst hinten im Gaumen bemerkbar, verleihen dem Wein eine ausgezeichnete Struktur, das ist wie ein Seidentuch, das einen leckeren Beeren-Dessert umhüllt. Druckvoll und gleichzeitig mit grosser Eleganz schwebt der Wein über die Zunge und hallt im Abgang sehr lange nach. Ein Elexier mit Finesse und Präzision. Sensationell! 2024-2044+
Western reviews.translation:
评估日期：2023年3月9日，地点：Windisch

酒色：深红色

酒香：复杂而微妙，具有强烈的花香，含有紫罗兰、贵族烟熏味和红、黑浆果的混合，随着空气的变化，酒香变得更加复杂，出现了烟熏和石头的味道，令人着迷。

入口：柔和舒适，口感细腻，高质量的鞣酸与精致的果肉完美融合，虽然鞣酸很强，但直到后口才显现出来，赋予酒精优良的结构，像丝绸一样包裹着甜美的浆果甜品。

酒体：充满活力，优雅地滑过舌头，余味持久。酒精精致细致，准确无误。惊人！推荐储存时间：2024-2044年。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung. Florales Bukett, kandierte Veilchen und Lakritze, reife Herzkirschen, ein Hauch von Bourbonvanille. Saftig, elegant, rote Waldbeeren, stoffige Tannine, schokoladig im Kern, bleibt haften, ein Hauch von Karamell im Abgang, ein angenehmer Speisenwein mit sicherem Entwicklungspotenzial.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。花香气息，糖化紫罗兰和薄荷糖，成熟的樱桃，波本威士忌香味。口感丰富，优雅，红莓，粗糙的纤维，巧克力核心，留存，尾部有糖漠味，适合食用，发展潜力可靠。

Western reviews.review: Medium to deep, dark ruby-red in color. The aromas display a juicy, open red fruit aroma. Fresh raspberry, redcurrant & red plum fruit on the palate has touches of leafiness. The wine is mid-weight with a with a mouthwatering combination of fine tannins fresh acidity. Coffee notes overlay the fruit on the mid-palate. The warming alcohol is balanced by plumy fruit. The enduring finish has a vivid violet perfume & well-integrated sweet cinnamon & cedar spices. 10/23 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深红色，中到深的红宝石色。

香气：浓郁的红果香，新鲜的草莓、红 gooseberry 和红杏果味。

口感：果味丰富，带有叶子的感觉。酒体中等，口感清新，细致的苦味和新鲜的酸度相互平衡。

中口：有浓郁的咖啡味和果味。

尾韵：酒尾有暖意的酒精感和浓郁的果味。尾韵中有清晰的紫罗兰香气和融合的甜柠檬和松木香气。

评分：10/23 DCAMW

louis roederer cristal brut with gift bo.name: louis roederer cristal brut with gift box 2006

Chinese pairs.original: 柑橘、香蕉、蜜瓜和菠萝的香气，口感丰实细致、酸度怡人，回味愉悦。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of citrus, banana, honeydew, and pineapple. Rich and refined texture, refreshing acidity, and a delightful finish.

Western reviews.review: Deep pinot-driven presence is the first and lasting impression. Power with control. Superfine bead, bread and spiced biscuits, candied ripe red fruits and a sense of tight-knit complexity. Some grapefruit, lemon pith & gently flinty notes too - impressive nose. In the mouth it is rich, powerful, mouth-filling and flavorsome with a core of the same biscuity red fruit flavor, savory nutty notes and a wrap of assertive, persistent acidity that holds rich powerful flavor deep and focused whilst maintaining a polished, gently creamy texture. Long chalky bread and biscuit finish. A superb pinot-driven vintage.
Western reviews.translation: 深刻的品红葡萄味是这瓶红酒的第一印象和持久印象。它拥有强大的力量和精确的控制。细致的气泡，面包和烤饼的香气，糖化的成熟红果和紧密复杂的感觉。还有一些柑橘味，柠檬皮和轻微的火石味——令人印象深刻的鼻子。口感丰富、强大、充满口感，同样的面包味和红果味的核心，咸味坚果的味道和持久的、坚定的酸度包裹着丰富强大的味道，保持着光滑、轻微的奶油质感。长长的面包和饼干味的尾韵。是一瓶出色的品红葡萄酒。

Western reviews.review: Fantastic from the start. A colossal power of beautiful rumbling Pinot maturity. It's like chewing on the ripest grapes from Ay and Verzenay. At the same time ultra stylish: unmistakable Cristal essence of peach and mango sweetness, pineapple, coconut, vanilla, sprightly acidity and citrus blossom. Many similarities with 2002 but with a clearer Pinot touch.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒从一开始就非常出色。它拥有美丽的波浪状品质，充满了成熟的品红葡萄的力量。喝起来就像嚼着来自阿伊和韦尔泽奈的最成熟的葡萄一样。同时又极其时尚：不可否认的克里斯塔（Cristal）风格的桃子和芒果甜味，菠萝，椰子，香草，生动的酸度和柑橘花香。与2002年相比，有更多的品红葡萄的风味。

Western reviews.review: This elegant version shows beautiful texture and a sense of finesse despite the underlying power of vibrant acidity and smoky minerality. The palate offers a finely layered mesh of blackberry, poached pear, almond pastry, lemon zest and pickled ginger flavors.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒优雅典雅，展现出细腻的口感和精致的质感，尽管其底层的活力和烟熏矿物质味道仍然十分强烈。口感上呈现出黑莓、生梨、杏仁酥、柠檬皮和泡菜姜的复杂层次。

Western reviews.review: Although it is still young, this vintage of Cristal promises great things. There’s an impressive balance between ripe fruit and crisp acidity, rich and food friendly, but also a fine apéritif. Apricot and grapefruit flavors are round and rich, but with considerable minerality as well.
Western reviews.translation: 尽管这瓶克里斯塔尔酒还很年轻，但它的前景却很有希望。酒中有着完美的平衡，既有成熟的果味，又有清脆的酸度，既适合与食物搭配，又适合作为清酒。酒中有着丰富的橄榄球和葡萄柚味道，但也带有明显的矿物质味道。

Western reviews.review: The 2006 Cristal shows rich and ripe (tropical) fruit on the nose along with delicate brioche notes. Round and textured on the palate, this is a generous but fresh, fine and salty Cristal with a very long and greatly finessed finish. Tasted in New York, November 2018.
Western reviews.translation: 2006 年克里斯塔红酒展现出丰富的、成熟的（热带风味）果香，以及细致的面包酵母香气。口感圆润、细腻，这是一款慷慨但又清新、细腻、带有盐味的克里斯塔红酒，具有极长且精致的尾韵。评分于2018年11月在纽约。

Chinese pairs.original: Alexandre 和Guillaume 父子二人一直等到了9月18日才开始采收，比很多Pomerol 酒庄晚了近两周的时间。我原本以为会遇到一个成熟度异常突出的VCC，但它却意外地给我捧来了满怀的紫罗兰，外加清雅流畅的口感。有时候你真的不得不佩服父子二人对优雅的驾驭能力。 2023年份集中表现了VCC近些年来的很多特质，多汁的莓果芬芳、细密的单宁质感、流畅的味觉感受，优雅的紫罗兰花香，就优雅而言，VCC在Pomerol 产区不是第一也是前二的水准，不接受任何反驳。
Chinese pairs.new:
Alexandre 和 Guillaume 父子二人一直等到了 9 月 18 日才开始采收，比很多 Pomerol 酒庄晚了近两周的时间。我原本以为会遇到一个成熟度异常突出的 VCC，但它却意外地给我捧来了满怀的紫罗兰，外加清雅流畅的口感。有时候你真的不得不佩服父子二人对优雅的驾驭能力。 

2023 年份集中表现了 VCC 近些年来的很多特质，多汁的莓果芬芳、细密的单宁质感、流畅的味觉感受，优雅的紫罗兰花香，就优雅而言，VCC 在 Pomerol 产区不是第一也是前二的水准，不接受任何反驳。

English pairs.original: Alexandre and Guillaume, a father-son team, started harvesting on September 18, which is almost two weeks later than most Pomerol estates. I was expecting to find a VCC with exceptional maturity, but to my surprise, it had an abundance of violet fragrance accompanied by a refined and smooth palate. Sometimes, one cannot help but admire their mastery of elegance. The 2023 vintage encapsulates many of VCC’s recent characteristics such as juicy berry aromas, fine tannins, a seamless taste experience, and the elegance of violet fragrances. When it comes to elegance, VCC ranks either first or second in the Pomerol, beyond any dispute.
English pairs.new: 亚历山大和吉勒姆（Alexandre and Guillaume），一对父子团队，于9月18日开始收获，这几乎比普洛莫尔（Pomerol）大多数庄园晚了两周。 我期待着在VCC中发现出色的成熟度，但意外的是，它拥有丰富的紫罗兰香气伴随着细腻和平滑的口感。有时，人们无法不赞叹他们对优雅的掌握。 2023年产季囊括了VCC近期特征的许多方面，如浓郁的浆果香气、细致的纤维、无缝的口感体验和紫罗兰香气的优雅。 在优雅方面，VCC在普洛莫尔（Pomerol）中排名第一或第二，无可争议。

Western reviews.review: A very fine and polished young VCC with subtle density and a racy backbone of tannins. Compact with well-toned muscles and a persistent finish. Very silky. Really grows at the end. 82% merlot and 18% cabernet franc.Barrel Sample: 97-98
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶非常精致的年轻红酒，具有细腻的密度和一根坚实的鞭子般的坚果味。肌肉紧致，持久的尾部。非常滑顺。酒尾逐渐升高。82%梅洛，18%卡波弗朗克。酒桶样品：97-98分。

Western reviews.review: The 2023 Vieux Château Certan is like a drug. Its exotic aromatics, deeply layered fruit and sublime textures are just captivating. I tasted the 2023 from an assembled base blend and four core components. Every wine was nothing short of breathtaking. When I think of the archetypes of greatness in Bordeaux, VCC is one of them. The 2023 is a blend of Merlot and Cabernet Franc. Like all producers, Alexandre and Guillaume were forced to decide whether to pick their Cabernets before or after the September rains. As it turned out, none of the lots picked before the rain made it into the Grand Vin. Only those picked later were deemed of high enough quality. –Antonio GalloniBarrel Sample: 96-98
Western reviews.translation:
2023 年维尤沙泰奥酒庄的红酒就像是一种毒品。其异国情调的香气、丰富的果味和细腻的口感令人深深着迷。 我尝试了2023年从混合底酒和四个核心成分组成的酒。每一瓶酒都令人惊叹不已。当我想起波尔多的伟大典范时，维尤沙泰奥酒庄就是其中之一。2023年酒庄的酒是由梅洛和卡波弗朗克混合而成。像所有酒庄一样，亚历山大和吉勒姆也必须决定是否在9月的雨季前或后采摘卡波弗朗克。结果，雨季前采摘的所有批次都没有进入大酒。只有雨季后采摘的批次被认为质量足够高。 –安东尼奥·加隆尼

酒庄酒样评分：96-98分

Western reviews.review: Beautiful purple colour in the glass, vibrant and alive. Great florality; raspberry, cherry, cranberry, lots of fresh red summer berries and lots of aromatics. Broad and expansive on the palate, delicate yet powerfu with flavours of crushed herbs, stones and mint - sappy and saline. Feels very VCC on the palate, combining grippy Cabernets with fruity, fleshy Merlot. A statuesque and structured wine with no harshness. Effortless and totally moreish. I love it, classicism in the very best way. There’s something incredible about this wine, full of life and juiciness. Excellent. 3.74pH (lower than usual). 4% press wine. Ageing two thirds new oak. 42hl/ha yield.Barrel Sample: 98
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深紫色的，酒液充满活力。酒中有丰富的花香，包括草莓、樱桃、蔓越莓和各种新鲜的红色夏季水果。口感宽广，丰富而又细腻，带有捣碎的香草、石头和薄荷的味道，口感清新且带有盐味。酒体中有很强的结构感，没有任何的粗糙感。酒的口感非常顺滑，非常令人垂涎欲滴。酒中有很多生动的生命力和汁液感。非常出色。酒的pH值为3.74（比平常低），含有4%的压榨酒，使用了两分之三的新橡木桶进行陈化，产量为42hl/ha。酒样评分：98分。

Western reviews.review: Not harvested until after the rains in the middle of September, the 2023 Vieux Château Certan is based on 82% Merlot and 18% Cabernet Franc that was brought up in roughly 60% new oak. It's another ripe, medium to full-bodied, aristocratic, beautifully textured Pomerol that has ample black cherry, mulberry, chocolate, and tobacco-like aromatics, medium to full-bodied richness, flawless overall balance, and ripe tannins, as well as a certain salinity on the finish. Checking in at 14% alcohol and a pH of 3.74, it should surpass the 2014 and is a beautiful, elegant, classic wine that every reader would love to have in their cellar.Barrel Sample: 96-98
Western reviews.translation: 2023 年维尤沙泰奥（Vieux Château Certan）红酒，直到9月中旬的雨季后才采摘。该酒款以82%梅洛（Merlot）和18%卡波弗朗克（Cabernet Franc）为主，使用大约60%新橡木桶发酵。它是另一个成熟的，中等到中等以上的体积，高贵的，美丽的质地的波美罗（Pomerol）红酒，具有丰富的黑樱桃、黑莓、巧克力和烟草类香气，中等到中等以上的体积，完美的平衡，柔软的牙齿，酒尾有一定的盐味。酒精含量为14%，pH值为3.74，预计将超过2014年，酒款风格典雅，优雅，经典，每个读者都希望在自己的酒窖中拥有它。酒桶样品：96-98分。

Western reviews.review: The 2023 Vieux Château Certan bursts from the glass with demonstrative aromas of dark berries, pencil shavings, violets mingled with notions of burning embers, iris, crushed mint and black tea. Medium to full-bodied, velvety and sensual, with a gourmand attack that segues into a layered, enveloping mid-palate, it's polished and perfumed, with a sweet core of fruit and a long, gently oak-inflected finish. This year's blend of 82% Merlot and 18% Cabernet Franc checks in at 14% alcohol and a pH of 3.74.Barrel Sample: 94-96
Western reviews.translation: 2023 年维尤沙泰奥红酒从玻璃中爆发出浓郁的黑莓、铅笔削片、紫罗兰和燃烧的炭火、百合花、碎碎的薄荷和黑茶的芳香。口感中等到中等以上，滑顺而感官，入口丰富，过渡到层次丰富的中口，精致而芬芳，果肉甜美，长长的轻微橡木味的尾部。今年的82%梅洛和18%卡波弗朗克的混合比例，酒精含量为14%，pH值为3.74。酒桶样品：94-96分。

Chinese pairs.original: 李子、黑莓、红干枣子和雪松的香气，酒体在适中到饱满之间，香气微妙，层次复杂，单宁在口中的感觉若隐若现，活力十足。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of lychee, blackberry, red dates, and pine, with a medium to full-bodied texture, subtle nuances, complex layers, and a hint of tannins that linger on the palate, finishing with vibrant energy.

Western reviews.review: The finest wine ever made by proprietors Daniel and Florence Cathiard, the 2009 Smith-Haut-Lafitte exhibits an opaque blue/purple color in addition to a glorious nose of acacia flowers, licorice, charcoal, blueberries, black raspberries, lead pencil shavings and incense. This massive, extraordinarily rich, unctuously textured wine may be the most concentrated effort produced to date, although the 2000, 2005 and 2010 are nearly as prodigious. A gorgeous expression of Pessac-Leognan with sweet tannin, emerging charm and delicacy, and considerable power, depth, richness and authority, it should age effortlessly for 30-40+ years. Bravo!
Western reviews.translation: 卡蒂亚德兄弟丹尼尔和弗洛伦斯的杰作，2009年史密斯-豪特-拉菲特展现出深蓝色透明的颜色，伴随着芳香的白色花朵、黑糖、焦炭、蓝莓、黑浆果、铅笔削片和香烟味。 这是一款巨大的、极其丰富、滑腻的葡萄酒，可能是目前最浓郁的一款，尽管2000年、2005年和2010年的葡萄酒也非常出色。 这是一款美丽的佩萨克-莱昂甘葡萄酒，具有甜润的口感，展现出渐渐成熟的魅力和细腻的风格，具有强大的力量、深度、丰富和权威，应该能轻松地存储30-40年以上。 Bravo!

Western reviews.review: The 2009 logically displays the hallmarks of a wine from a sunnier vintage than the 2008 and shows a complex yet elegant bouquet with spices, graphite, blackberries, liquorice and slightly smoky aromas. It's full-bodied, with a spectacular balance, an elegant tannic frame and a racy freshness on the finish. As with many 2009 wines, it has a persistent and long finish that allows it to drink well today and during the next decade.
Western reviews.translation: 2009年的这款红酒展现出比2008年更阳光的风格，具有复杂而优雅的香气，带有香料、石墨、黑莓、甘草和微微烟熏的气息。它的口感丰富，平衡完美，具有典雅的纤维结构和清脆的口感。与许多2009年的红酒一样，它具有持久的长尾，能够在今天和未来十年内享用。

Western reviews.review:
This is really loaded, with crushed plum, blueberry, cassis, fig and blackberry paste flavors all melded together, along with notes of tar, pastis and violet. Very long and dark, but polished and pure, with terrific fruit offset by a great tug of earth on the finish. Should cruise easily in the cellar. Best from 2015 through
2035.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒非常浓郁，具有压榨的浆果、蓝莓、黑加仑、浆果和黑莓酱的风味，混合了烟草、苦艾酒和紫罗兰的香气。非常长且黑暗，但光滑纯粹，果味非常出色，尾部有很好的土壤拉力。应该在陈藏中轻松行进。建议从2015年到2035年最佳。

Western reviews.review: Aromas of flowers, dried citrus fruit and blueberries follow through to a full body, with firm and silky tannins and a long, long finish. Gorgeous fruit and structure. Polished and powerful. Best red ever from Smith. Best in 2018.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中带有花朵、干燥的柑橘果和蓝莓的味道，口感丰富，口感坚实而细滑，长长的尾部。果味美丽，结构完美。光滑而强大的口感。史密斯的最佳红酒，2018年最佳。

Western reviews.review: Very dense and firm, this has powerful tannins as well as a blackberry jam flavor. The wine is complex, full of both dark tannins and the richest fruits, layered with notes of herb, spice and a concentrated structure.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感非常浓密坚实，具有强烈的苦味和黑莓果酱般的风味。酒中充满了复杂的元素，既有深度的苦味，又有丰富的果实，伴有香草、香料和浓缩结构的复杂层次。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau L’Eglise Clinet 已经在无数个年份证明了自己的伟大，在多酚和单宁充分成熟的时候，只需要遵循老子的“无为而治”，就能够酿造出精彩绝伦的佳酿。黑莓、桑果、奶油蓝莓的香气完全改变了2023年份温婉的印象，略带咸感的回甘又让整个味蕾散发着一股高级感，深藏不露的紫罗兰花香，在你准备离开的时候才款款而至，并且随着甘草、花椒、八角的每一次亲吻逐层绽放。石墨、可可粉以及金属铁粉的质地大幅提升了收尾的深度，像是一枚从石墨山洞中闪烁的紫水晶，神秘而又优雅。
Chinese pairs.new:
Chateau L'Eglise Clinet 已经在无数个年份证明了自己的伟大，在多酚和单宁充分成熟的时候，只需要遵循老子的“无为而治”，就能够酿造出精彩绝伦的佳酿。黑莓、桑果、奶油蓝莓的香气完全改变了2023年份温婉的印象，略带咸感的回甘又让整个味蕾散发着一股高级感，深藏不露的紫罗兰花香，在你准备离开的时候才款款而至，并且随着甘草、花椒、八角的每一次亲吻逐层绽放。石墨、可可粉以及金属铁粉的质地大幅提升了收尾的深度，像是一枚从石墨山洞中闪烁的紫水晶，神秘而又优雅。

Translated Wine Review:

Chateau L'Eglise Clinet has consistently proven its greatness over numerous vintages, and when tannins and polyphenols are fully mature, it's as if following Lao Tzu's "non-action" principle allows for the creation of a truly exceptional wine. The aromas of blackberry, elderberry, and creamy blueberry completely transform the impression of the 2023 vintage, which was previously delicate. The subtle saltiness and lingering finish evoke a sense of sophistication, while the hidden lavender notes arrive just as you're about to leave, unfolding with each kiss of licorice, pepper, and star anise. The texture of graphite, cocoa powder, and metallic iron powder significantly enhances the depth of the finish, reminiscent of a purple crystal shining from a graphite cave, mysterious and elegant.

English pairs.original: Chateau L’Eglise Clinet has proven its greatness across numerous vintages, demonstrating that with fully mature polyphenols and tannins, minimal intervention (Laozi’s principle of “action through inaction”) can create outstanding wines. The aromas of blackberry, mulberry, and creamy blueberry transform the typically gentle impression of the 2023 vintage, while a hint of salinity in the finish lends a sophisticated touch to the palate. Subtle violet fragrances emerge just when you drop down the glass, gracefully unfolding with each layer intensified by the kisses of licorice, Sichuan pepper, and star anise. The texture of graphite, cocoa powder, and metallic iron dust significantly deepens the finish, like a sparkling amethyst emerging from a graphite cave, both mysterious and elegant.
English pairs.new: 克莱斯克莱内庄园（Chateau L'Eglise Clinet）在多个年份中证明了其卓越的品质，表明完全成熟的多酚和鞣质通过最小的干预（即“无为而无不为”的道理）可以创造出出色的葡萄酒。黑莓、牛肉莓和奶油蓝莓的香气转变了2023年典型的温和印象，而在尾部的微妙盐味赋予了口感更高尚的味道。随着你将酒杯倾倒时，细微的紫罗兰香气出现，优雅地展开，每一层都被 licorice、四川胡椒和星安息香的亲吻加深。图形、可可粉和金属铁尘的质感显著加深了尾部，像一颗闪闪发光的紫水晶从图形洞穴中出现，既神秘又优雅。

Western reviews.review: Gänsehaut garantiert, eine Nase zum Eintauchen, floral, steinig, dunkelfruchtig, erhaben; fleischiger Gaumen, satte Frucht, markantes Tannin kontert, ungemein energetisch, spannungsvoll, mächtig, langanhaltend im Abgang. Ein monumentaler l'Église Clinet, für eine kleine Ewigkeit gebaut. (En Primeur Tasting April 2024, 14.6 Alkohol)
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶保证能给你带来极度愉悦的红酒，酒鼻深入，花香四溢，石子味浓郁，黑果味丰富，气势恢宏；口感丰富，果味饱满，坚果味浓郁的苦味与之相互呼应，酒精饱满，充满能量，紧张感十足，气势恢宏，余味悠长。是一瓶令人惊叹的Église Clinet，足以让你沉醉其中。

Western reviews.review: Gänsehaut garantiert, eine Nase zum Eintauchen, floral, stei nig, dunkelfruchtig, erhaben; fleischiger Gaumen, satte Frucht, markantes Tannin kontert, ungemein energetisch, spannungsvoll, mächtig, langanhaltend im Abgang. Ein monumentaler L'Église Clinet, für eine kleine Ewigkeit gebaut.
Western reviews.translation: garantuee会给你鸡皮疙瘩，一个可以沉浸其中的鼻子，花香，坚果味，深色果味，高贵；丰富的口感，饱满的果味，明显的苦味平衡，异常的能量，紧张的感觉，强大的力量，持久的尾部。一个宏伟的L'Église Clinet，建造于一小段永恒之中。

Chinese pairs.original: 2016年份的Chateau Pape Clement是我心目中酒庄的巅峰之作，能把高比例Merlot酿出左岸的精髓，打着灯笼都难找。和Chateau Pape Clement一贯的浓郁风不同，2016年份明显更加直率、干练、神采飞扬，从入口时的清爽酸度到收尾时的紧致结构，无不透着清晰的肌肉线条。绵柔的单宁与圆润的酒体相拥起舞，含在口中好似一片正在融化中的薄荷黑巧。单宁数量颇丰，但质地相当细腻，划过味蕾几乎找不到任何厚重感。收尾时的一丝甜美感来的恰到好处，在增加圆润度的同时令人倍感愉悦。
Chinese pairs.new: 2016年份的Chateau Pape Clement是我的心目中酒庄的巅峰之作，它成功地将高比例的Merlot酿造出左岸的精髓，难得的佳作。与Chateau Pape Clement一贯的浓郁风格不同，2016年份的酒显得更加直率、干练、神采飞扬，从入口时的清爽酸度到收尾时的紧致结构，无不透着清晰的线条。柔和的单宁与圆润的酒体相互融合，口中好似一片正在融化中的薄荷黑巧。单宁数量丰富，但质地细腻，几乎没有厚重感。收尾时的一丝甜美感恰到好处，增加了圆润度，令人倍感愉悦。

English pairs.original: In my opinion, the vintage of Chateau Pape Clement 2016 is the crown jewel of the winery. It is difficult to find a wine with a high Merlot percentage that captures the essence of the Left Bank. This vintage, in contrast to Chateau Pape Clement’s usual richness, is noticeably more precise, sophisticated, and angelic, with a clear, muscular line on the palate from the crisp acidity to the tight structure towards the finish. The soft tannins dance with the wine’s round body, and it tastes like a piece of melting minty chocolate. The tannins are abundant, but the texture is fine, and without any heaviness on the palate. A hint of sweetness at the end comes just at the right point, adding roundness while doubling pleasant.
English pairs.new: 在我看来，庄园酒庄 Chateau Pape Clement 2016 的产季是庄园的珍宝。难得能找到一瓶高含量梅洛的红酒能抓住左岸的精髓。这瓶酒与庄园酒庄 Chateau Pape Clement 的典型风格相比，显得更加精致、优雅和神圣，口感清晰，肌肉线条明显，从清脆的酸度到紧致的结构，直到尾部。柔软的橡皮纤维与酒体的圆润结合，口感像融化的薄荷巧克力。橡皮纤维丰富，但质地细腻，没有在口感上带来任何沉重感。酒尾的微妙甜度恰到好处，添加了圆润感，同时也增强了愉悦感。

Western reviews.review: Stunning concentration of perfectly ripe blackcurrants here with a delicate whiff of vanilla oak and extremely fine tannins that are almost perfectly integrated on the seductive and delicate palate, right through the almost literally breathtaking, super-long and very polished finish. Try from 2022.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的浓度惊人，黑currant成熟到极致，带有轻微的香草橡木气味，口感细腻，几乎完美地融合了极细致的橡木味和柔和的苦味，口感优雅，持续时间极长，极其光滑。建议从2022年开始品尝。

Western reviews.review: Tasted on two separate occasions, the 2016 Château Pape Clément never failed to disappoint, offering a huge, powerful, full-bodied personality as well as beautiful notes of cassis, graphite, high-class cigar tobacco, asphalt, and graphite. About as sexy as it gets in the vintage, with silky tannins and loads of fruit, it’s perfectly balanced and has a great finish. The 2016 is a blend of 60% Merlot, 36% Cabernet Sauvignon, and the balance Petit Verdot and Cabernet Franc, all raised in 60% new barrels.
Western reviews.translation: 2016年夏普克莱门特庄园的口感在两次品尝中都没有让我失望，展现出巨大的、强大的、充满体验的性格，以及美丽的黑加仑、石墨、高级雪茄烟草、沥青和石墨的香气。它在当年产量中性感程度堪比最高，具有细滑的纽扣和丰富的果香，完美平衡，口感持久。该酒是由60%梅洛、36%卡波弗雷蒙和余下的佩蒂特维多和卡波弗雷蒙混合酿造的，全部在60%新桶中陈酿。

Western reviews.review: This takes a slightly different tack than many of its Pessac colleagues, relying less on bramble and tar and more on alluring toast, with mocha, anise, wood spice and black tea notes draped liberally over the core of sappy kirsch and cherry preserve flavors. Plush and suave through the finish, though this needs a bit of time for the wood elements to be fully integrated with the fruit. For fans of the flashier, cashmere-textured style. Best from 2023 through 2037.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒与许多佩萨克同行不同，更多依赖于诱人的-toast、咖啡、丁香、木质香和黑茶的风味，而不是荆棘和焦炭。厚实的果酱和樱桃果酱风味在核心中自由散布。通过尾部，虽然这需要一些时间，让木质元素与果味完全融合。对于喜欢闪亮、软绵绵质感的风格的粉丝。建议在2023年至2037年之间饮用。

Western reviews.review: Blended of 60% Merlot, 36% Cabernet Sauvignon, 3% Petit Verdot and 1% Cabernet Franc, the 2016 Pape Clement has a deep garnet-purple color and quite a serious, earthy nose with truffles, tilled soil, underbrush and smoked meats over a cassis, baked plums and redcurrants core plus a touch of lavender. Medium to full-bodied, firm and grainy, the palate is built like a brick house, supporting muscular black fruit and earthy notions and finishing very long and mineral laced.
Western reviews.translation: 2016年巴布莱蒙特（Pape Clement）红酒的组成比例为60%梅洛（Merlot）、36%卡波弗雷蒙（Cabernet Sauvignon）、3%佩蒂弗雷蒙（Petit Verdot）和1%卡波弗雷蒙（Cabernet Franc）。这款红酒呈现深红色，气味浓郁，带有土壤、松露、烟熏肉和干酪的气息，伴有黑加仑、烤石榴和红樱桃的核心，微带兰花香。口感中等到中厚，坚实且有颗粒感，黑果和土壤的味道并存，尾部长且矿物质味道浓郁。

Western reviews.review: This rich, warm wine offers tannins cushioned within layers of black fruits. It is dense with structure and fruit while also having the freshness and acidity typical of this vintage. The wine will age for several years, becoming richer and more opulent. Drink from 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒富有丰富的口感，具有暖暖的感觉，黑色果实的层次中充满了柔和的苦味。酒体结构紧密，果实丰富，同时也保留了典型的这一年份的清新和酸度。酒会在几年后变得更加丰富和奢华。建议2025年后饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Le Pin 2023 的甜美感能够跃过高山，跨过大海。说实话，我从来没有在任何年份看到这么易饮的Chateau Le Pin，甘草、丁香、石墨、铁粉伴随着莓果芬芳飞翔，温柔的单宁像是爱人的抚摸，妥帖而温暖。当酒精度更加温和，且多酚完全成熟的时候，Chateau Le Pin 粉嫩欲滴的气质更加活灵活现。品尝这款酒时，我眼前浮现出的是手持羽扇半遮面的小乔，透过扇面，我能看到它妩媚的桃花眼…
Chinese pairs.new: The sweetness of Chateau Le Pin 2023 can soar over mountains and cross the sea. To be honest, I have never seen a Chateau Le Pin so easy to drink in any vintage. Licorice, cloves, graphite, and iron powder dance with raspberry aromas, while gentle tannins caress like a lover's touch, soft and warm. As the alcohol becomes even more gentle and the tannins fully mature, the delicate charm of Chateau Le Pin becomes even more vibrant. When tasting this wine, I am reminded of a young Jojo holding a fan, half-covering her face, with her alluring cherry blossom eyes peeking through the fan.

English pairs.original: The sweetness of Chateau Le Pin 2023 transcends mountains and crosses seas. Honestly, I’ve never seen a Chateau Le Pin as approachable as this in any other vintage.
