Notes of licorice, cloves, graphite, and iron dust soar alongside the fragrant berries, while the gentle tannins feel like a lover’s caress, comforting and gentle. With a milder alcohol content and fully ripe polyphenols, the delicate essence of Chateau Le Pin becomes even more vivid. As I taste this wine, I envision a coy maiden holding a feather fan, her blossom-eyes peering through, revealing its alluring charm…
English pairs.new: 2023年沙吕酒庄的奇迹：甜度超越山海。诚实地说，我从未见过如此接近的沙吕酒庄酒款。 licorice、丁香、石墨和铁粉的香气与浓郁的浆果香气相互融合，细致的纤维感如情人般的抚慰，温柔而舒适。酒中酒精含量较低，多酚成分成熟，沙吕酒庄的精致魅力更加鲜明。每当品尝这款酒时，我都会想象一位妩媚的少女手持羽扇，花蕾般的眼睛透过扇子，展现出其迷人的魅力……

Western reviews.review: Quite a rich version with intense and dense flavours. An impression of sweetness but filled with charming salinity. Lovely vibrancy and great, velvety texture. Oak is currently clearly present but well supports the wine. Very long finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感丰富，味道浓郁且复杂。虽然有甜度的印象，但又带有迷人的咸味。酒液呈现出美丽的活力，口感细腻柔滑。目前可明显感受到橡木的味道，但它很好地支持了这款酒的风格。酒尾长长持续。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark purple-red in color with a purple rim. The nose comprises lifted, pure dark-berry fruit aromas. The palate is elegant & fresh, opening with red plum fruit & chalky, saline notes. Chocolatey, ripe, dark red-cherry fruit opens on the mid-palate, where alcohol adds a hint of warmth. The finish is very finely structured & the wine's freshness leaves it long & elegant, with sweet licorice touches at the end. 04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深紫红色，带有紫色边缘。酒鼻子中充满了清新的黑果香气。口感优雅且新鲜，开头是红杏果和盐味的感觉。中口处是巧克力味的熟黑樱桃果，酒精带来了一丝温暖。尾部结构非常精致，酒的新鲜感让它长长的，尾部还带有甜的甘草味。评分：4.24分（ep）DCAMW。

2019 Michel & Stephane Ogier Cote Rotie.name: 2019 Michel & Stephane Ogier Cote Rotie La Belle Helene

Chinese pairs.original: La Belle Helene 2019所散发的能量感能够照亮整个世界，很难想象如此丰富多彩的葡萄酒居然还能保持这么精致优雅的香气线条。这不是传说中的“举重若轻”又是什么。紫罗兰和蔷薇花的清香、多汁的莓果芬芳在流畅的酸度面前显得那么轻盈优雅。在加上贯穿始终的丝滑单宁，喝起来就是一个字“爽”。
Chinese pairs.new: La Belle Helene 2019释放出的能量令人惊艳，难以想象如此丰富多彩的葡萄酒仍能保持如此精致优雅的香气线条。这不是传说中的“举重若轻”又是什么。紫罗兰和蔷薇花的清香、多汁的莓果芬芳在流畅的酸度面前显得那么轻盈优雅。在加上贯穿始终的丝滑单宁，喝起来就是一个字“爽”。

English pairs.original: La Belle Helene 2019 has an energy that lights up the whole world, and it is hard to imagine that such a colorful wine can maintain such a refined aromatic line. How brilliant it is effortlessly! Aromas of violets and roses, juicy berry fruit are light and elegant against the smooth acidity. With the silky tannins throughout, it’ll make you feel so refreshing that you won’t believe your mouth!
English pairs.new: 拉贝尔海伦 2019 的魅力令人惊艳，难以想象如此丰富多彩的酒能够保持如此精致的香气线条。它的精彩无比，毫不费力。酒中弥漫着紫罗兰和玫瑰的香气，浓郁的浆果味道轻盈优雅，搭配细腻的酸度。酒中的细致纤维让你感到清新refreshing，仿佛置身于美丽的世界中。

Western reviews.review: Dark in color, the wine displays a smoke-filled perfume packed with spice, black cherries blackberries, flowers, and crushed stone. The wine stains your palate with its layers of ripe, polished, elegant, energetic, vibrant fruits. Full-bodied with a serious depth of flavor, and purity to the fruits, this stunning wine will age for 3 decades with ease. The seamless finish hangs with you for 60 seconds, or longer. The fruit comes from 2 parcels on the Cote Rozier, with one parcel just below La Landonne. The grapes are whole bunch fermented and aged in an average of 15% new, French oak for the first year before being moved to demi-muids for the second year of aging. Drink from 2030-2055.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的颜色深黑，酒香中充满了烟火味、香料、黑樱桃、黑莓、花朵和碎石的味道。酒液在口中留下了成熟、光滑、优雅、充满活力的果味的层次。酒体丰富，口感深厚，果味纯正，这款惊艳的红酒可以轻松存放30年。酒尾顺滑，持续60秒或更长时间。酒中的果实来自科特罗西埃(Côte Rôtie)的2个地块，其中一个地块位于拉兰多讷(La Landonne)下方。酒用整梳葡萄进行发酵并在新法兰克式橡木桶中平均15%的新橡木桶中陈化一年后，再转移到半桶中陈化第二年。建议从2030年到2055年饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: Chateau Haut-Brion 2021年份的白葡萄酒闻起来香甜可口，吃起来如果冻一般Q弹爽滑，不但纯度极高还无比清澈。如果说2020年份的Haut-Brion让我看到的是隐形的结构和力量，那2021年份就是一把刀光闪闪的冰霜寒剑，能够让触碰到它的一切事物变为冰霜。而那么高酸凛冽的葡萄居然在收尾时化作一缕圆润和清甜，这是我万万没有想到的。如此内涵丰富的葡萄酒，除了用“极品”来形容以外，我找不到其他更好的词汇了。
Chinese pairs.new: Chateau Haut-Brion 2021年份的白葡萄酒闻起来非常香甜可口，口感像刚刚冻住的水果，清澈透明。相比2020年份的Haut-Brion，它更像一把锋利的冰剑，能够让所有接触它的东西都变得冰冷。令人惊讶的是，这种高酸度的葡萄酒在尾部却呈现出圆润和清甜的味道。这是一瓶内涵丰富的葡萄酒，除了用“极品”来形容以外，我找不到更好的词汇了。

English pairs.original: Chateau Haut-Brion 2021 white wine has an alluringly sweet aroma and a texture as smooth and bouncy as a frozen jelly, boasting both high purity and clarity. If the vintage of 2020 showed me invisible structure and strength, then the 2021 is like a glinting frost sword, turning everything it touches to ice. Surprisingly, the grapes, with their biting acidity, transform into a round and sweet finish – a big variation I never anticipated. For such a wine, rich in nuance, the only description I can find is ‘exquisite’.
English pairs.new: 夏图·奥-布里昂 2021 年白酒具有诱人的甜香气，口感如同冰冻的果冻般滑顺和弹性，展现出高纯度和清晰度。如果2020年版的酒展现出不可见的结构和力量，那么2021年版就像一把闪闪发光的冰霜剑，触碰到的一切都变成冰。令人惊讶的是，这些带有刺激性酸度的葡萄，转变成圆润甜美的尾韵——我从未预料到的巨大变化。对于这种富有细微差别的酒，唯一能描述的词就是“精致”。

Western reviews.review: The solid and serious structure of this wine is reflected in the wood aromas and spice from wood aging. It is dense, packed with tannins at the core, and its concentration gives a dry character to the wine. Ready to drink from 2028.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的坚实和严肃的结构体现在木质香气和木龄陈化的香气中。酒体浓密，核心充满了坚果感的苦味，酒精浓度使得酒体呈现出干爽的口感。建议2028年后开始饮用。

Western reviews.review: The solid and serious structure of this wine is reflected in the wood aromas and spice from wood aging. It is dense, packed with tannins at the core, and its concentration gives a dry character to the wine. Ready to drink from 2028.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的坚实和严肃的结构体现在木质香气和木龄陈化的香气中。酒体浓密，核心充满了坚果感的苦味，酒精浓度使得酒体呈现出干爽的口感。建议2028年后即可饮用。

Western reviews.review: Vivid ruby, with real depth of colour at the core and purple hues on the rim. Fine cassis, black cherries, a touch of noble wood, a hint of nougat. Good complexity, dark wild berries, fine fruit sweetness, ripe, integrated tannins, elegant and endowed with good length. Full of finesse, fresh and very accessible; a great food companion.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色的，中间有真正的深度，边缘有紫色的光泽。酒中有浓郁的黑加仑、黑草莓、少量的高档木头和杏仁的味道。酒的复杂性很好，黑野莓的味道浓郁，果味甜美，口感柔软，纤维化的味道完美融合，优雅而且有很好的持久感。酒的质感细腻，新鲜而且非常容易入口，非常适合与食物搭配。

Western reviews.review: Vivid ruby, with real depth of colour at the core and purple hues on the rim. Fine cassis, black cherries, a touch of noble wood, a hint of nougat. Good complexity, dark wild berries, fine fruit sweetness, ripe, integrated tannins, elegant and endowed with good length. Full of finesse, fresh and very accessible; a great food companion.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色的，中间有深度，边缘有紫色的光泽。酒中有浓郁的黑加仑、黑草莓、少量的高档木头和杏仁的味道。酒的复杂性很好，黑野莓的味道浓郁，果味甜美，口感圆润，纤维化的味道完美融合，酒的质地优雅，持久度良好。酒的质感细腻，新鲜，非常容易入口，非常适合与食物搭配。

Western reviews.review: Flowers, tobacco wrapper, chocolate, burning wood, ash, cigar box, currants, black cherries, and spice. On the palate, the wine is fresh, bright, vibrant, lifted, and floral. The wine is elevated, refined, soft, and silky with a refreshing, silky edge to the fruits in the finish. There is richness and waves of fruit on the palate, but the waves are small and continuous. This is a good example of a modern classic Haut-Brion. The wine blends 50% Merlot, 38% Cabernet Sauvignon and 12% Cabernet Franc, 13.85% ABV. Harvesting took place September 13, finishing October 8, making this one of the longest harvest periods for Haut Brion. 48 hectoliters per hectare, with 43% of the harvest placed into the Grand Vin. Drink from 2027-2060. 95-97
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中包含了花朵、烟草纸、巧克力、燃烧的木头、灰烬、雪茄盒、黑加仑和香料等元素。口感上，酒精清新、明亮、生动、轻盈和花朵般的气息。酒精细致、优雅、柔和、滑顺，酒尾带有清新、滑顺的果味。酒中富有丰富感和果味波动，但波动小且连续。这是一款典型的现代经典黑白勃罗。酒中混合了50%梅洛、38%卡波弗雷蒙和12%卡波弗兰克，13.85%的酒精含量。收获于9月13日，至10月8日，收获期长达一个月，是黑白勃罗历史上最长的收获期之一。每公顷产量48公斤，43%的收获用于制作大酒。建议于2027-2060年饮用。评分95-97分。

Chinese pairs.original: 任凭风吹雨打，我自岿然不动。2021年份的Chateau Margaux用硬实力告诉我们，凉年份照旧酿大酒。这款酒拥有玛歌产区、甚至整个梅多克少见的醇厚感和集中度，那感觉像是口中含着一块Mozzarella奶酪在缓缓融化。甘草、红茶、雪松、铅笔芯的气息抚摸着我的每一寸肌肤，那种沁人心脾的温柔能够让你忘记所有忧愁。论“纯美”，没有哪个酒庄能够像玛歌这样出色，它是2021年份少有的珍宝，是能够在陈年后惊艳世人的顶级佳作。
Chinese pairs.new: No matter the wind or rain, I remain unshaken. Chateau Margaux's 2021 vintage proves that a cool year can still produce a full-bodied wine. This wine boasts a richness and concentration rarely seen in the Margaux region, or even all of Medoc, with a sensation of slowly melting mozzarella cheese in the mouth. The scents of licorice, red tea, pine, and pencil lead caress every inch of my skin, a soothing gentleness that can wash away all worries. When it comes to "purity," no chateau can match Margaux's excellence, making it a rare gem of 2021 and a top-tier masterpiece that will dazzle the world even after aging.

English pairs.original: Unshaken by wind and rain’, Chateau Margaux 2021 demonstrates that great wines can still be made in cool vintages This wine boasts a richness and intensity rarely seen in Margaux, even unique alone the entire Medoc. Tasting this wine is like a piece of Mozzarella slowly melting on the palate. The aromas of licorice, red tea, cedar, and pencil lead gently caress every inch of the tongue, offering a heartwarming tenderness that helps to forget all sorrows. In terms of ‘pure beauty,’ no other winery excels like Chateau Margaux. It stands as a rare treasure in the vintage of 2021, a top-tier creation destined to amaze after maturation.
English pairs.new: 风雨不动，尚堡酒庄2021年红酒证明了即使是在寒冷的年份，仍然可以酿造出出色的葡萄酒。 这款酒具有尚堡酒庄中罕见的丰富和强烈度，甚至在整个梅多克地区也独一无二。 品尝这款酒就像慢慢融化的摩泽尔奶酪一样，味道中的 licorice、红茶、松木和铅笔味轻轻地抚摸着舌头，带来温暖的柔情，让人忘却所有的忧愁。 在“纯粹的美丽”方面，尚堡酒庄无人能及。 它在2021年年份中是一种罕见的珍宝，一瓶顶级的作品，经过成熟后将会令人惊叹。

Western reviews.review: The purity of fruit here is terrific, with redcurrants, blackcurrants, licorice, lead pencil and hints of fresh basil—so aromatic—that follow through to a full body with creamy, round tannins and lots of volume and fluidity in the center-palate for the vintage. Very structured at the end. 87% cabernet sauvignon, 8% merlot, 3% cabernet franc and 2% petit verdot. Leave this for at least five or six years. Try after 2030.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的水果味道非常纯粹，带有红葡萄、黑葡萄、甘草、铅笔和新鲜香草的味道，非常香甜。这种味道在口感中持续存在，体积丰富，口感圆润，中口层有很多体积和流动感。最后部分结构非常完善。酒中含有87%卡波雷尔葡萄，8%梅洛葡萄，3%卡波雷尔法兰克葡萄和2%佩蒂特韦多葡萄。建议至少放置五到六年，尝试于2030年后。

Western reviews.review: It is the blackberry fruits that leap from the glass in this fine wine. Its structure is there, but in a way that is so elegant. The wood tannins give structure and layers of concentration. The wine is juicy with black-currant flavors giving great density of freshness.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒中，黑莓果味立即从玻璃中跳出。它的结构是存在的，但以一种优雅的方式呈现。木质的苦味物质为酒精提供了结构和浓缩的层次。酒精丰富，黑currant味道给人以新鲜的厚度。

Western reviews.review: The 2021 Château Margaux is creamy and supple, a classy Margaux with the volume turned down just a bit. Succulent dark cherry, red plum, spice and rose petal infuse the 2021 with layers of succulent depth. This is a quiet wine, but one that possesses notable richness for the year. Time in the glass brings out the aromatics, but this remains very much built on its fruit. –Neal Martin
Western reviews.translation: 2021年夏多布里昂酒庄的红酒是奶油般的、柔滑的，具有典雅的夏多布里昂风格，酒量相对较低。酒中充满了浓郁的黑樱桃、红樱桃、香料和玫瑰花香，层次丰富，深度感极强。这是一款低调的红酒，但其丰富的口感却令人印象深刻。酒在玻璃中陈化后，会释放出更多的香气，但这款红酒仍然以果实为主。

Western reviews.review: Lovely soft floral aromatics, pretty and perfumed with red cherries, raspberries and blackcurrants, some liquorice and toasty hints. Round and smooth, silky yet concentrated, there's a fleshy aspect to the fruit and texture while a lean core of salty minerality and high acidity keeps things straight and direct. It's a little reserved now, but this is suave, playful and sharp, full of energy and texture but not yet at the charming, graceful stage and a little atypical for the vintage. The estate picked late, bled the wine more to keep the structure and the result is mouthfilling and succulent, with Margaux charm.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有迷人的柔和花香，带有红樱桃、莓果和黑加仑的清新气息，伴有 licorice 和 Toasty 的微妙味道。口感圆润细腻，滑顺而集中，果肉和口感都有丰富的质感，而矿物质和高酸度的平衡则保持了清晰和直接的风格。虽然现在还有一点保留，但这款红酒充满了活力和质感，具有典型的 Margaux 风格。酒庄晚季采摘，减少了酒液的量，以保持结构，结果是这款红酒充满了口感和滋味，具有典型的 Margaux 风格。

Western reviews.review: In the running for the wine of the vintage, the 2021 Château Margaux is stunning in its concentration, depth, purity, and length. Pure cassis and black raspberry fruits as well as graphite, ripe tobacco, and spicy oak all define the aromatics, and it hits the palate with medium to full-bodied richness, ultra-fine, building tannins, and a gorgeous finish. The style actually reminds me slightly of the 1996, and while it offers pleasure even today, it deserves 5-7 years of bottle age and will evolve for 20-30 years gracefully. It's a classic Château Margaux. The blend is 87% Cabernet Sauvignon, 8% Merlot, and the rest Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot, aged all in new French oak.Rating: 96+
Western reviews.translation: 2021年夏多布里昂（Château Margaux）是当年红酒的强力竞争者。它在浓度、深度、纯度和持久性方面都表现出惊人的集中力。它的香气中充满了纯净的黑樱子和黑莓果味，伴随着石墨、成熟的烟草和香气的法国橡木。它在口感上呈现出中等到中等以上的丰富度，拥有极细致的、逐渐增强的坚果感和美丽的尾部。它的风格与1996年相似，尽管它即刻就能带来愉悦的体验，但它仍需要5-7年的陈化时间，并将在20-30年内优雅地演变。它是一款典型的夏多布里昂。酒款中，卡波弗列（Cabernet Sauvignon）占87%，梅洛（Merlot）占8%，其余是卡波弗列（Cabernet Franc）和佩蒂·韦尔多（Petit Verdot），全部陈化于新法国橡木桶中。评分：96+

Chinese pairs.original: 2022年份的Chateau Ducru-Beaucaillou 能将你带入“极致平衡”的天际。一方面，2022年份的酷热天气带来了炽烈的火焰；另一方面，Chateau Ducru-Beaucaillou的基因中蔓延着澎湃的激情。但神奇的是，当两股强大的能量相互碰撞时，它们竟化身为一团没有温度的蓝色火焰，你甚至可以用手触摸它炙热的心脏。Chateau Ducru-Beaucaillou 标志性的桑葚和黑枸杞浆果，在甘草、丁香以及橘梗的映衬下漫天飞舞。而当浓郁的酒液触碰味蕾时，它又马上化为一缕清润。面对如此美艳动人，却又毫不矫揉造作的葡萄酒，试问谁能不为之倾倒？在我看来，2022年份是一款能够与2010年份一决高下的传世之作。
Chinese pairs.new:
2022年份的Chateau Ducru-Beaucaillou 将带你进入一个极致平衡的世界。酷热的天气带来了炽烈的火焰，但Chateau Ducru-Beaucaillou 的基因中却蕴含着澎湃的激情。当两股强大的能量相互碰撞时，它们化身为一团没有温度的蓝色火焰，炙热的心脏让你可以用手触摸。 

Chateau Ducru-Beaucaillou 的标志性桑葚和黑枸杞浆果在甘草、丁香和橘梗的映衬下飞舞。然而，当浓郁的酒液触碰味蕾时，它又化为一缕清润。面对如此美艳动人的葡萄酒，试问谁能不为之倾倒？在我看来，2022年份是一款能够与2010年份一决高下的传世之作。

English pairs.original: Chateau Ducru-Beaucaillou 2022 takes you to the heights of sublime balance. On one hand, the sweltering heat of 2022 gives rise to fervent flames; on the other, the inherent character of Chateau Ducru-Beaucaillou exudes a surge of passion. Remarkably, when these two powerful forces meet, they transform into a gentle, blue flame, so mild that you could even touch its incandescent core. The signature mulberry and black goji berry flavors dance amidst a backdrop of licorice, clove, and orange stem. As the opulent wine graces your taste buds, it immediately shifts into a refreshing, delicate caress. Who could resist such an enchantingly alluring wine, free from pretense or affectation? In my view, the vintage of 2022 is a timeless masterpiece that stands shoulder to shoulder with Chateau Ducru-Beaucaillou 2010.
English pairs.new: 杜克鲁-博凯洛 2022年版带你进入了完美平衡的高度。 一方面，2022年的酷热天气使得酒款燃烧得如火如荼；另一方面，杜克鲁-博凯洛的固有特质则释放出激情的冲动。 值得注意的是，当这两股强大的力量相遇时，它们会转化为温和的蓝色火焰，如此温和到你甚至可以触摸到它的辉煌核心。 杜克鲁-博凯洛的标志性黑莓和黑枸杞果味在 licorice、丁香和橙梗的背景下跳跃舞蹈。 当这瓶豪华的酒款触及你的味蕾时，它立即转变为清新、细致的抚慰。 谁能抵抗如此迷人的酒款，毫无矫饰或装腔作势？ 在我看来，2022年的杜克鲁-博凯洛是永恒的杰作，与2010年的杜克鲁-博凯洛并驾齐驱。

Western reviews.review: 96-98 Barrel sample. This is a velvet wine on the surface. But its density and concentration are balanced by the superb acidity and perfumed black fruits from the dominant Cabernet Sauvignon. The wine has a seriously long-term future.
Western reviews.translation: 96-98 桶样评分。这是一瓶表面如丝绸般的红酒。但是，其密度和浓度被优质的酸度和来自主导的卡波内尔·萨维尼（Cabernet Sauvignon）黑果的芳香完美平衡。该酒有着长期的前景。

Western reviews.review: Inky dark in color, the wine exudes blackberries, smoke, currants, nutmeg, flowers, Cuban cigar wrapper, black cherries, smoke, and spice in the nose. On the palate, the wine is dense, and intense, yet light on its feet with seemingly, endless waves of deep, black and red, spicy fruits. There is symmetry, balance, and freshness on the palate. The tannins are present, silky, and refined. The wine is silky, supple, creamy, and seamless in the finish, which moves from black fruits, to red fruits and back to black fruits with spice, and accents of mint and a touch of citrus at the very end of the finish, which lingers for at least 60 seconds. Ducru Beaucaillou has been on an unstoppable roll since 2009. Produced from blending 81% Cabernet Sauvignon and 19% Merlot, 14% ABV, 3.8 pH. Picking took place September 7 -- October 4. Drink from 2028-2065. 98-100 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色深如墨，酒香中弥漫着黑莓、烟草、黑葡萄、肉豆蔻、花朵、古巴雪茄纸、黑樱桃、烟草和香料的味道。口感浓密、强烈，但又轻盈，似乎有无尽的黑色和红色深度的浓郁果味。口感上有着完美的平衡、鲜明的味道和新鲜感。酒中的纤维素细腻、精致。酒尾滑顺、柔软、丰富、无缝，酒尾从黑色果味转变为红色果味，然后再转回黑色果味，伴有香料、薄荷和柑橘的余味，持续时间至少60秒。自2009年以来，杜克鲁-博卡略（Ducru Beaucaillou）一直在不断攀升。该酒由81%卡波弗雷希（Cabernet Sauvignon）和19%梅洛（Merlot）组成，14%的酒精含量，3.8的pH值。采摘时间为9月7日至10月4日。建议饮用时间为2028-2065年。评分：98-100分。

Western reviews.review: 100% Neuholz. 82% Cabernet Sauvignon, 18% Merlot. Die Nase duftet unglaublich schön, florale Noten über viel dunkler Frucht, die schwarzen Johannisbeeren tanzen mit frisch geschnittenen Kräutern, super tiefgründig und klar und rein. Im Gaumen delikat, gradlinig, mit unemein viel Frische, der Wein hat einen knackigen Fruchtkern, das Holz ist kaum wahrnehmbar, energiegeladen, mit einem Spannungsbogen, sensationellen Tanninen und einer sehr feinen Säure, die dem Wein trotz 14% Alkohol Leichtigkeit und Frische verleiht. Lang und ausgwogen. Voller Finesse! (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 / UGCB / Château Ducru-Beaucaillou) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation: 100% 新橡木 barrels。82% 卡波弗雷希（Cabernet Sauvignon），18% 梅洛（Merlot）。酒鼻中弥漫着令人惊艳的花香，花朵和黑莓的香气交织在一起，伴随着新鲜的香草，深度和清晰度都非常出色。口感轻盈，平衡，充满新鲜感，酒中有坚果的核桃味，橡木味很轻微，充满活力，具有张力，具有极好的坚果味和细腻的酸度，酒中14%的酒精使得酒感轻盈和新鲜。酒体长长，平衡。充满细腻感！ (评分时间：2023年4月/UGCB/ Château Ducru-Beaucaillou)

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby in colour with an inky, opaque core, purple reflections, and subtle brightening on the rim. On the nose, delicate nuances of fine oak, ripe black cherry, currants, sweet spices, candied orange zest and nougat. The full-bodied, elegant palate has good freshness, with pronounced integrated tannins, fine fruit expression and notes of dark wild berries and nougat on the lengthy, mineral finish. Certain potential for future ageing for many years.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红宝石色，带有暗紫色的核心，边缘有细微的光泽。酒鼻子上，细微的橡木味，成熟的黑樱桃，黑currant，甜的香料，糖化的橙子皮和果冻。口感丰富，优雅，带有良好的新鲜感，整合的显著的坚果感，精致的果实表达和暗黑的野生浆果和果冻的长尾矿物质。酒有很大的潜力，未来可以长期陈化。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark purple-black color holds well to a dark-purple rim. Chocolatey aromas overlay ripe, dark black-cherry fruit & exotic, cedary sweet spices. The palate has structure from the outset with ultra-fine grained tannins making the mid-palate drying & giving mouth-watering interactions with the lean cassis fruit. Alcohol seems balanced. Fine tannins give the finish excellent length & leaves mouth-watering black fruit at the end. 04/23 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深度的紫黑色，持久的深紫色边缘。酒中充满了巧克力般的香气，覆盖着成熟的黑黑樱桃果实和香料甜香。口感结构良好，从开头就有细致的纤维质的苦味，中口干燥，和干净的黑樱桃果实产生互动。酒精平衡。细致的苦味使得尾部延长，留下了口水的黑果实。 评分：04/23 DCAMW

Chinese pairs.original: 鲜花，可乐和香料的气息，酒体饱满，口感辛辣，强劲有力的，回味带有水果味道。
Chinese pairs.new: Floral, cola, and spice aromas, full-bodied wine, with a bold and spicy taste, and a lingering fruit finish.

Western reviews.review: This could be the best 1953 I have ever tasted, as well as competing for being one of the best older vintages of Lafite I have ever tasted! This bottle had everything a great Lafite should have. Soaring, complex, aromatics, elegant, soft, refined, textures, layers of spicy, sweet, vibrant, pure, red fruits, and a seamless finish that did not want to quit. This bottle was simply mesmerizing. If you have the money, and you can find a bottle with good provenance, and you want one of the best, wine-tasting experiences of your life, look no further! Drink from 2024-2033.
Western reviews.translation: 这可能是我尝过的最好的1953年拉菲酒，也可能是我尝过的最好的拉菲老酒之一。这瓶酒拥有一个伟大的拉菲应该拥有的所有特质。它的芳香高昂、复杂、优雅、柔和、细致、多层次的口感，带有浓郁的香料、甜美的果香、生动的味道、纯粹的红果味，完美的结尾。这种体验简直令人着迷。如果你有足够的钱，并且能找到一瓶有良好证明来源的酒，并且想要一次终身难忘的美酒体验，别再找了！建议在2024-2033年之间饮用。

Western reviews.review: Medium ruby in colour with orange reflections and brightening on the broad rim. The nose is multi-faceted and inviting with aromas of sweet fruit, dried fruit, dark confit, delicate balsamic, truffle nuances, liquorice, and mint. The palate is rich in finesse, with a highly elegant texture, fine, quite racy acidity, fully grown-up tannins, full of nuances of candied orange, chocolate and exotic spices, the wine has real depth and charisma, with cherry fruit and pleasant notes of truffles and herbal spice on the convincingly long finish. Now at a real peak of age. A great wine, from the single bottle perhaps already a step above its zenith.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色，边缘有橙色反射，酒杯边缘有明亮的光泽。酒的香气丰富多样，带有甜水果、干水果、黑果酱、细微的巴拉米卡、松露、薄荷和牛膝的香味。口感丰富细腻，酒体细致，酸度清晰，口感丰富，带有糖化橙子、巧克力和异国风味的香气，酒有着深度和魅力，口感长且持久，留有樱桃水果和松露和香草的香味。酒现在已经达到顶峰，单瓶的品质可能已经超过了它的巅峰。

Chinese pairs.original: 黑醋栗，黑莓，樱桃，矿物质，烟草，巧克力酱和意大利浓咖啡的香气，酒体饱满，单宁丝滑超过1分钟的回味。
Chinese pairs.new: Dark plum, blackberry, cherry, mineral, tobacco, chocolate syrup, and Italian espresso aromas. Full-bodied with smooth tannins lingering over 1 minute.

Western reviews.review: Deep garnet colored, the 2009 Latour is unashamedly youthful with bold blackcurrants, black cherries and warm plums notes plus nuances of cedar chest, aniseed, beef drippings, truffles and tapenade with a waft of tilled black soil. Full, concentrated and powerful in the mouth, it has a rock-solid frame of super ripe, grainy tannins and fantastic freshness, finishing very long and wonderfully minerally. Just a baby—this needs time!
Western reviews.translation: 2009年拉图尔红酒呈现深红色，具有明显的青春气息，黑currant、黑樱桃和熟透的黑杏的浓郁果香，伴有松木箱、丁香、牛肉渣、松露和橄榄酱的复杂香气，背景中还有黑土的泥土味。口感丰富浓郁，坚实的结构，细腻的砂粒般的橡胶质感，口感清新持久，尾部长长且矿物质丰富。这个酒还只是个小孩，需要时间来成熟。

Western reviews.review: Dark and chocolatey with a lot of richness, but also a cool herbal freshness this is a very impressive Medoc wine that's already delicious to drink. Very long, surprisingly supple finish for this château. A perfect wine. Drink or hold.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的颜色深沉，带有巧克力般的味道，富有丰富的口感，但也带有清新的草药味。这是一款非常出色的梅多克葡萄酒，已经可以直接饮用。酒尾长且柔和，令人惊讶的舒适感。是一款完美的葡萄酒。可以直接饮用，也可以储存。

Western reviews.review: A big, powerful wine that sums up the richness of the vintage. It is densely fruity, spicy with an enormous black plum and berry fruit character to go with the acidity. It's concentrated while still showing such wonderfully pure fruit. The aging potential is immense. Cellar Selection.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶大而强劲的红酒，体现了当年的丰富性。酒体浓密，果香浓郁，带有强烈的黑杏和浓郁的黑莓果香，配以酸度的平衡。酒精浓度高，果香纯正。酒的储存潜力极大。

Western reviews.review: This seems to come full circle, with a blazing iron note and mouthwatering acidity up front leading to intense, vibrant cassis, blackberry and cherry skin flavors that course along, followed by the same vivacious minerality that started things off. The tobacco, ganache and espresso notes seem almost superfluous right now, but they'll join the fray in due time. The question is, can you wait long enough? Best from 2020 through 2040.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒似乎又回到了起点，前端的铁锈味和口感清新酸度引领着强烈的黑樱子、黑莓和樱桃皮风味，随后是同样的生动的矿物质味道。烟草、甘油和咖啡的味道似乎现在还不太重要，但随着时间的推移，它们会加入到风味中。问题是，你能等待多久？建议在2020年至2040年之间品尝。

Western reviews.review: This is still closed, although a softening of the tannins is apparent. It has a gorgeous nose full of Pauillac power and finesse, with brambled fruits and touches of hedgerow as the Cabernet Sauvignon count heads upwards. The fresh core is clear from start to finish, giving that high-wire feeling that makes great Médocs so thrilling. There's a sense of drama to the cassis fruits, controlled but with impact and a sense of purpose, leading to a chewy finish. This is barely bedded down and has the shoulders and backbone to carry it for years. Don't approach it yet.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒仍然紧闭，尽管已经有了些许的橡质柔化。它具有典型的巴约讷风格的鼻子，富有力量和细腻感，带有浓郁的黑berries和一些灌木丛的气息，随着卡伯涅-索瓦宁的比例逐渐增加。酒精的清新核心始终清晰可见，从头到尾都给人一种高难度的感觉，这使得美度酒庄的红酒如此令人兴奋。酒中有着控制感的黑currant风味，具有冲击力和目的感，带来了一种咀嚼感的尾部。酒还未完全成熟，具有坚实的肩膀和骨架，足以承载多年。不要轻易打开。

Chinese pairs.original: 石墨、黑樱桃、黑醋栗、皮革、矿物、香料和雪茄盒的香气，口感浓郁，单宁平衡细致，酒体醇厚强大，非常长的回味，陈年潜力无限。
Chinese pairs.new:
Dark, smoky, and mysterious aromas of graphite, black cherries, black plums, leather, minerals, and cigar boxes. 

Rich and full-bodied texture, with refined tannins and a long, lingering finish.

Western reviews.review: A great wine, the summation of a great vintage in Bordeaux. The core of richness, the dense, bone-dry tannins, the black currants, red berries and black plum skins are the elements, but it’s the way they have been integrated that makes this such an impressive wine. There is great elegance as well, a fabulous counterpoint to such power. Cellar for at least 15 years, but this will keep forever.
Western reviews.translation: 一瓶出色的红酒，体现了波尔多地区的经典佳酿。酒中富有厚实的质感，干酪味的坚果味，黑莓和黑草莓的果香，以及黑草莓皮的深度，都是它的组成部分，但它的魅力在于这些元素的完美融合。酒中也充满了优雅的风格，完美地平衡了它的力量。建议将其贮存至少15年，但它将会长久地保持其美味。

Western reviews.review: The 2005 Latour was mind-blowingly profound in two recent tastings for this report. Deep and sensual to the core, the 2005 is utterly captivating. All the elements are so seamlessly put together. Graphite, crème de cassis, licorice, dark spice and lavender infuse the 2005 with so much energy. More than anything else, though, the 2005 is a Latour of texture and resonance. Even after several hours, the 2005 is fresh and full of energy. Wines like this are just life affirming. That's about all I can really say. Tasted two times.
Western reviews.translation: 2005 年拉图尔在最近的两次品酒会上给我留下了深刻的印象。它深邃而诱人，完全迷住了我。所有元素都如此完美地融合在一起。石墨、黑加仑、甘草、黑胡椒和百里香等成分使2005年拉图尔充满了能量。然而，最重要的是，2005年拉图尔是一种质感和共鸣的拉图尔。即使经过几个小时，它仍然新鲜而充满能量。像这样的葡萄酒简直是人生的一大肯定。

Western reviews.review: How rare to confront a wine of this inner strength and perfect form. Grown at a 116-acre vineyard at the southern border of Pauillac, some of the vines now reaching 100 years of age on a gravel bar overlooking the Gironde, Latour harvests cabernet sauvignon with natural power. I could describe it as colors, from glistening ruby to purple-black then back to scarlet tannins that vibrate in red. Or just the pure, unadulterated flavor of black currant, unformed as a child is unformed, beautiful as a child is beautiful. However I might describe it, the wine is stronger than I am and will outlast me by decades. This is the most provocative and most brilliant Latour I have tasted on release.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一个令人难以置信的红酒，拥有强烈的内在力量和完美的形态。产于巴约克（Pauillac）南部边缘的一座116英亩的葡萄园，部分葡萄树已经达到100岁，矗立在格龙河（Gironde）边缘的礫石台上。拉图尔（Latour）以天然力量收获卡波弗雷希（Cabernet Sauvignon）。我可以用颜色来描述它，从闪闪发光的红宝石到紫黑色，然后再回到红色。或者说它纯粹、未经雕琢的黑加仑（black currant）味道，像孩子一样纯粹、美丽。无论我如何描述它，这杯酒都比我强大，会比我活得长得多。这个是最具挑战性和最出色的拉图尔（Latour）我尝过的。

Western reviews.review: A very complex nose of lavender, currants, spices, and hot stones. Full and dense on the palate, with a very tight structure. The tannins have a perfect polish to their density, and the finish is very intense, with wonderful fruit and truffle character. This turns almost decadent, with tremendous energy and a constantly changing profile. This is a very challenging wine to get to know, please leave this for at least ten years.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气非常复杂，带有紫罗兰、葡萄干、香料和热石的味道。口感丰富浓密，结构紧密。酒中的纤维素质具有完美的光泽，尾部非常强烈，带有美味的果味和松露的特征。这瓶酒几乎到了极致，充满了巨大的能量和不断变化的风格。这是一瓶非常挑战性的酒，需要至少十年才能真正了解它。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby black in color. Brilliant, intense aromas of mineral, blackberry and currant, with hints of Indian spices and cigar box, lead to a full-bodied palate, with ultrafine tannins and a beautiful balance of blackberry, raspberry and mineral. There's subtlety, yet also great depth. Lasts for minutes on the palate. This is a Latour with fabulous tone and vigor. Best after 2018. 12,500 cases made.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色黑葡萄酒。酒精浓郁的矿物质、黑莓和黑加仑气味，带有印度香料和雪茄盒的微妙气息，展现出丰富的口感，细致的橡木味和黑莓、草莓和矿物质的完美平衡。酒中有细微的变化，也有深度。酒在口中停留数分钟。这个拉图酒具有出色的音调和活力。建议在2018年后饮用。生产12,500箱。

Chinese pairs.original: 入口强劲、致密、有复杂度；依旧年轻，香料、黑色水果、李子和甜软的土壤气息；充盈在口中，单宁平衡细致，有很长的生命周期和窖藏能力。
Chinese pairs.new: Powerful entry, dense and complex; still youthful, with aromas of spices, black fruit, plum and sweet earthy notes; full-bodied on the palate, with refined tannins, a long lifespan and aging potential.

Western reviews.review: Mittleres Karmingranat, violetter Kern, rubinrote Reflexe, breiter Ockerrand. In der Nase ungemein vielschichtig, feine florale Nuancen, ein Hauch von Eibisch, süße Gewürze, saftige dunkle Beeren, mineralische Noten. Am Gaumen trotz aller Komplexität noch feingliedrig, hochdelikate Struktur, frisch und duftig, Aromen von kandierten Veilchen, zarte ätherische Nuancen, stoffige Beerenfrucht, seidige Tannine, finessenreich und lang anhaltend, ein großes Zukunftsversprechen. (Lagern/+40)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

中度红色色调，紫色核心，琥珀色反光，宽广的橙色边缘。酒香极其丰富多彩，细微的花朵香气，微微的荔枝味，甜的香料，浓郁的黑色浆果，矿物质的味道。口感尽管复杂，但仍然细腻，结构高雅，新鲜和芬芳，糖浆花朵香气，轻微的精油味道，浓郁的浆果味道，细致的纤维，精致的口感，持久的尾韵，未来前景广阔。 (建议储存/40年以上)

Western reviews.review: (2005) A pale and delicate ruby colour, almost ethereal on the nose, this wine exudes class. Highly fragrant, with pure summer berry fruit aromas, graceful and feminine. The palate is sublimely concentrated with layers of fruit and spice. Refreshingly crisp acidity, elegant tannins, velvety smooth body, tremendous concentration and phenomenal length, this wine is sensational. Outstanding quality.
Western reviews.translation: 2005年：酒液呈现出浅红色，几乎是神秘的香气，酒体散发着高贵的气质。酒香浓郁，带有纯粹的夏季果实香气，优雅而女性化。口感浓郁集中，层次丰富的果实和香料。酒液带有清新爽口的酸度，优雅的纤维，滑顺的口感，酒液的浓度和持久度都非常出色，这款酒简直是惊艳。品质出色。

Chinese pairs.original: 优雅、优雅，无尽的优雅… 宛若白天鹅在紫色的湖水中央缓缓游过，泛起阵阵涟漪，这便是Chateau La Conseillante在2020年份呈现给我的美好画面。当那朵熟悉的紫罗兰在酒杯中盛开时，我也随之心花怒放。流畅清晰的酒体线条、纯净清透的莓果芬芳、清香怡人的草本香料，它们像是清泉一般在口中流淌，完全看不出任何干热年份的痕迹(14度的酒精和3.6度的pH值就是最好的佐证)。我很好奇酿酒师Marielle Cazaux是如何挥动她的魔法棒的，为什么总能够酿出一些违反常理的神酒。致敬！
Chinese pairs.new: 优雅、优雅，无尽的优雅… 白天鹅在紫色的湖水中央缓缓游过，泛起阵阵涟漪，这便是Chateau La Conseillante在2020年份呈现给我的美好画面。当那朵熟悉的紫罗兰在酒杯中盛开时，我也随之心花怒放。流畅清晰的酒体线条、纯净清透的莓果芬芳、清香怡人的草本香料，它们像是清泉一般在口中流淌，完全看不出任何干热年份的痕迹。酒精14度，pH值3.6，酿酒师Marielle Cazaux的魔法棒似乎在这里施展了神奇的力量，酿出了一些违反常理的神酒。致敬！

English pairs.original: Elegant, extremely elegant! Chateau La Conseillante 2020 is like a white swan swimming in the lake of violet, with layers of sending purple ripples. When the familiar fragrance of violet blooms in the glass, my heart also blooms with joy. With precise body line, translucent mixed berries fragrances, and delightful herbal spiciness, tasting this wine seems flowing in the clear spring, without any hint of the dry and hot vintage. (ABV of 14 and pH of 3.6 are the best evidence.) I’m curious about how winemaker Marielle Cazaux moves her magic stick, why she always manages to make some unconventional divines. Salute!
English pairs.new: 优雅，极其优雅！2020年夏洛特拉孔塞拉丹特酒庄的红酒如一只白天鹅在紫罗兰色的湖面上轻舞飞扬，层层波纹荡漾。酒杯中飘散的紫罗兰花香，让我的心也随之绽放开来。精致的体型，透明的混合果香，令人愉悦的香草和辣椒味，品尝这瓶酒就像在清澈的春天中流动一样，完全没有干燥和炎热的季节的痕迹。（酒精度14%，pH值3.6是最好的证据。）我很好奇，酒庄的制作人玛丽埃尔·卡佐（Marielle Cazaux）如何运用她的魔法棒，为什么她总是能创造出一些非凡的作品。敬酒！

Western reviews.review: One of the wines of the vintage is the 2020 La Conseillante, a blend of 86% Merlot and 14% Cabernet Franc that wafts from the glass with inviting aromas of raspberries, red cherries and mulberries mingled with exotic spices, violets and rose petals. Medium to full-bodied, satiny and vibrant, it's a beautifully elegant, sensual wine with a deep core of fruit framed by powdery tannins, concluding with a long, extravagantly floral finish. This is a Pomerol of striking purity and sophistication. Congratulations to Marielle Cazaux and her team for surpassing even what they achieved in 2016 and 2019 with this brilliant 2020! Best after 2027.
Western reviews.translation: 2020年拉孔塞拉丹（La Conseillante）是当年的一款杰作，酒中以86%梅洛（Merlot）和14%卡波弗朗（Cabernet Franc）为主，酒香中融合了浓郁的红莓、红樱桃和黑莓果味，伴随着香料、紫罗兰和玫瑰花的芬芳。酒体中富有中等至中高的体积，细滑且充满活力，酒中果实丰富，粉末状的橡皮质感包围着果实，酒尾长达数秒，芬芳四溢。拉孔塞拉丹以其纯粹和高雅的风格而闻名，恭喜玛丽埃尔·卡佐（Marielle Cazaux）和她的团队，他们在2020年创造了比2016年和2019年更出色的佳酿。建议在2027年后品尝。

Western reviews.review: So much black truffles here with dried earth, too. Black berries. Crushed stone. Plus violets. Full-bodied. Very plush with velvety tannins. Gentle yet very structured. Succulent. Clear and bright. Superb depth and length. Goes on and on. Thoughtful. Soulful. Try after 2028.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒中充满了黑松露的味道，伴随着干燥的土壤和黑莓的风味，还有石头的味道和紫罗兰的芬芳。口感丰富，非常丰富且细腻。虽然柔和，但结构却非常完善。口感丰富，清晰明亮。酒中有着深度和长度，持续不断。酒的思考和灵魂都非常深刻。建议在2028年后再次品尝。

Western reviews.review: Another utterly brilliant wine from this team, the 2020 Château La Conseillante is based on 87% Merlot and 13% Cabernet Franc that saw 70% new French oak. Unquestionably in the same league as the 2019, this beauty offers an incredible bouquet of pure blue fruits, cassis, violets, spring flowers, and truffle. This carries to a full-bodied, seamless, incredibly elegant, layered Pomerol offering perfect tannins, the vibrant, focused, structured style of the vintage, impeccable balance, and a gorgeous finish. As always, this wine is more about purity, finesse, and elegance than power.
Western reviews.translation: 来自这支团队的又一瓶绝佳红酒，2020年沙特劳孔西拉纳（Château La Conseillante）以87%梅洛（Merlot）和13%卡波弗朗（Cabernet Franc）为基础，使用了70%新法式橡木桶。毫无疑问，这瓶美酒与2019年同样出色，展现出纯粹的蓝色水果、黑加仑、紫罗兰、春花和松露的芳香。这瓶酒的口感丰富、光滑、优雅、层次分明，具有完美的牙齿感，体现了当年风格的活力、集中和结构，具有出色的平衡和美丽的尾部。正如往常一样，这瓶酒更注重纯粹性、细致和优雅，而不是力量。

Western reviews.review: There are some beautifully fragrant floral aromatics here with concentration through the mid palate and effortless balance. A little more width and opulence in the 2019 perhaps, but here you get precision and purity, and a feeling of 2010 levels of concentration. An elegant 2020, bright, confident, bursting with life. 70% new oak. A yield of 39hl/ha. 3.67pH. Gravel and clay soils, and to keep freshness they left crop cover on the old vines but on the young ploughed it into the soil so as not to have too much competition for the water. Lowered canopy also but kept shade and leaves around the bunches to protect from the sun. Barrel Sample: 96
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有优美的花香气息，口感丰富，平衡自然。相比2019年，2020年版可能略显宽广和奢华，但它更注重精确和纯粹，集中度达到了2010年级别。2020年版是一款优雅的红酒，生动、自信、充满活力。酒中含有70%新橡木，产量为39hl/ha，pH值为3.67。酒用来自碎石和黏土土壤，为了保持新鲜度，他们在老树上保留了作物覆盖，但在年轻树上则将其翻入土壤，以避免水分竞争。同时，他们还降低了树冠，保留了树叶和果实之间的阴影，以保护果实不受阳光的影响。酒样评分：96分。

Western reviews.review: The wine is dense but the tannins are velvety. The combination gives a wine with obvious power and concentration wrapped in fruit that is perfumed, ripe and shot through with terrific acidity. In the end, those tannins will give the essential structure for long-term aging. Barrel Sample 94-96
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒浓郁但口感细腻。浓郁的口感与细腻的苦味结合，展现出明显的力量和浓度，伴有芳香的果味、成熟的果味和出色的酸度。最后，苦味会为长期陈化提供基础结构。酒评：94-96分。

Chinese pairs.original: “美杜莎”的紫罗兰芳香再次绽放，2023年份的Chateau La Conseillante 又将虏获多少人的芳心… 我很好奇，为什么泉水般清新的酒液，会在舌面旋转了一圈后变成了“绕指柔的钢铁”；牛轧奶糖般的单宁尚未融化，一股奇特的咸感油然而生。从优雅到强劲的过度是如此自然，让人忍不住想要拥抱她、亲吻她… 多汁的黑李子和蓝莓芬芳背后散发着无数的石墨粉和甘草糖气息，它们在清澈酸度的帮助下伸开臂膀，架着七彩祥云迎风飘扬… 在我看来，2023年份是近些年来最具波尔多传统气质的Chateau La Conseillante，妥妥的大年出品。
Chinese pairs.new: The lavender aromas of "Medusa" once again burst forth, and the 2023 Chateau La Conseillante will undoubtedly captivate many hearts... I'm intrigued by how the crystal-clear liquid transforms into "silken steel" after a whirl around the palate; the caramel-like tannins remain unblended, giving rise to a peculiar salty sensation. The transition from elegance to intensity is so natural, it's hard to resist embracing and kissing her... The luscious blackberry and blueberry fragrances are accompanied by an abundance of graphite and licorice notes, which stretch out their arms, supported by the crisp acidity, and soar into the sky like a rainbow... In my opinion, the 2023 vintage is the most classically Bordeaux in recent years, a truly outstanding year for Chateau La Conseillante.

English pairs.original: The 2023 Chateau La Conseillante is back with the captivating violet fragrance of “Medusa,” sure to win the hearts of wine enthusiasts. It’s intriguing how the wine’s crystal-clear appearance turns into a “soft steel” texture upon the palate. The tannins, reminiscent of nougat, haven’t melted yet, but a unique saltiness follows. The seamless transition from elegance to power is so natural that it’s impossible not to want to embrace and kiss it. Hints of graphite powder and licorice candy accompany the juicy black plum and blueberry aromas. With the help of crisp acidity, they spread their arms wide, hoisting a rainbow aloft to flutter in the wind. I believe the 2023 vintage of Chateau La Conseillante is one of the most quintessentially Bordelaise in recent years – a truly magnificent vintage.
English pairs.new: 2023年沙龙拉孔塞拉丹特酒庄的新品，带来了迷人的紫罗兰香气，堪称迷人之美，必定会让酒爱好者心动不已。酒的晶莹透明外观在口中变为“软钢”质感，令人惊奇。酒中的坚果味，似杏仁，尚未融化，但随之而来的是独特的咸味。从优雅到强劲的过渡如此自然，令人无法抗拒地想要拥抱和亲吻它。图形粉末和 licorice糖果伴随着 juicy黑浆果和蓝莓的香气。随着清脆的酸度的帮助，它们张开双臂，举起彩虹，飘荡在风中。 我认为2023年沙龙拉孔塞拉丹特酒庄的新品是近年来最典型的波尔多风格的酒庄之一——一个真正的壮观的酒庄。

Western reviews.review: Overall the nose was not very open at the tasting, but can still detect some subdued violet aromas with the black fruit profile. Quite a bit of extraction, showing rusticity and austerity at the moment. But the mid-palate until the finish is quite perfumed and flavoured. A somewhat sweet sensation at the very end. Used 5% amphora for ageing.
Western reviews.translation: 总体来说，酒的鼻子在品尝时并不十分开放，但仍然可以察觉到一些低调的紫罗兰香气和黑色果味。酒体中有相当多的提取，目前呈现出粗犷和严谨的风格。但是，中口到尾部的口感却非常香艳和丰富。酒尾带有一丝甜感。酒用了5%的陶器进行陈化。

Western reviews.review: Klar und rein wie immer, das ist pure Eleganz, sensationeller Duft, floral, dunkelfruchtig, da ist dieser Gänsehautduft, der einen nicht loslassen will; gradlinig und kompakt am Gaumen, wie aus dem Stein gemeisselte Tannine, knackig, energiegeladen und mit hervorragender Länge. Ein klassischer Conseillante, der hervorragend reifen wird.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒清澈透明，典雅优雅，酒香极佳，花香和黑果香混合，令人难以忘怀；口感平滑，坚果味浓郁，果香清新，酒尾长长。是一瓶典型的孔塞尔瓦特红酒，酒龄会越来越好。

Western reviews.review: The deep, dark, purple-ruby color is not quite opaque. Generous ripe, dark, chocolatey aromas show vibrant, perfumed black-cherry & black-plum fruit. On the palate rich, rounded black-cherry notes are superseded by denser black-plum fruit. Tannins are ripe & velvety and cedary oak notes are well handled. The mid-palate is dense, & ripe with a chewy texture. Alcohol adds a little warmth but is balanced by concentrated fruit on the long finish. 04/24 (ep) DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深紫红色，略微透明。酒中的气味丰富，带有浓郁的巧克力味，伴随着鲜艳的黑樱桃和黑杏果香。口感丰富，黑樱桃的味道在入口时占据主导地位，但随后被黑杏果的味道所取代。酒中的纤维素是成熟的，质地细腻，带有松木味。中口部的口感浓郁，质地坚实，酒中的酒精略微带来温暖，但被浓郁的果味所平衡。酒尾长达很久，留下深刻的印象。评分：04/24 (ep) DCAMW。

Western reviews.review: Chateau La Conseillante's latest vintage is a tour de force, offering a mesmerizing bouquet of blackberries, violets, lilac, seamlessly integrated with hints of fine oak. On the palate, it exhibits an opulent yet impeccably balanced structure, with velvety tannins and an exquisitely prolonged finish
Western reviews.translation: 夏娃拉孔赛良园最新的产季是一场艺术之作，展现出黑莓、紫罗兰、百日花的迷人香气，完美融合了细致的橡木味。口感丰富却又完美平衡，细腻的橡皮感和优雅延长的尾韵，让人难以忘怀。

Western reviews.review:
Sublime, as big as the 2022. It reminds me of the grandiose 2005 (when it came out) but it will finish better thanks to more modern techniques.
In the leading trio on the right bank with Lafleur and Trotanoy 98-99/100
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒是极品，规模与2022年相似。它让我想起了2005年初期的豪华版本，但由于采用了更现代的技术，它的完美程度会更高。

在右岸的前三强中，Lafleur和Trotanoy与之并驾齐驱，评分98-99/100。

Chinese pairs.original: 一款兼具风、雅、颂的顶级佳作，与Haut-Bailly一贯的“阴阳和谐之美”一脉相承。成熟的杨梅李子，温和的烤制醇香、纯正的玫瑰花香与醇厚清雅的黑墨相融，看似若隐若现，实则韵味十足。入口鲜嫩多汁，酒体饱满圆润，质感光滑的单宁贯穿始终，整个品尝过程就好像是在抚摸着一条细嫩柔滑而又光可鉴人的东方丝绸。
Chinese pairs.new: A top-tier masterpiece that embodies elegance, sophistication, and refinement, in line with Haut-Bailly's signature "yin-yang harmony." Ripe black plums and subtle oak nuances mingle with pure rose petal aromas and rich, refined black ink, evoking a sense of subtlety and depth. The palate is bursting with fresh, juicy flavors, the full-bodied texture is round and generous, and the smooth, velvety tannins persist throughout. The entire tasting experience is akin to caressing a delicate, silky, and luminous Eastern silk.

English pairs.original: This vintage expresses perfectly Haut-Bailly’s “harmonious beauty of Yin and Yang “, it is absolutely a masterpiece of Chinese aesthetic <Delicateness, Elegance and Melody>. Ripe waxberry, plum, mild toasted scents, pure rose flowers and refined black ink are well integrated on the nose, it seems partly hidden and partly visible but contains full of charm and harmony. The entry of the palate is tender and juicy, the body is ample and round, the tannins are sleek and smooth. The whole tasting process is like touching an airy and shining oriental silk.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒完美地体现了豪白利（Haut-Bailly）的“阴阳和谐之美”，绝对是一幅中国美学的杰作 <细致、优雅和和谐的旋律>。酒鼻中充满了成熟的红果、梅子、轻微的烤香、纯净的玫瑰花和精致的黑墨，各个元素之间融合得天衣无缝，既隐约又清晰，充满了魅力和和谐。口感入口柔软多汁，体积丰满圆润，纤维细腻光滑。整个品酒过程就像触摸一件轻盈的、闪闪发光的东方丝绸。

Western reviews.review: (56% Cabernet Sauvignon, 36% Merlot, 4% Cabernet Franc, 4% Petit Verdot). Rubinrot und mit einer Nase, die schlicht umwerfend ist, da könnte man stundenlang schnüffeln und immer wieder etwas neues finden. Neben einem Mix aus Brombeere, Kirschen, Cassis findet man auch exotische Gewürze, Vanille, blonden Tabak, florale Noten, ein Parfum sondergleichen ist das. Im Gaumen mit der gewohnten Eleganz von Haut-Bailly, gradlinig, schlank, dennoch druckvoll, Frische, Würze, gepaart mit knackiger Frucht, einer grandiosen Balance, perfekte Tanninqualität und eine Säure die den Wein lebhaft macht. Im Abgang fast endlos. Auch zwei Jahre nach der Arrivage ein zweifellos sensationeller Haut-Bailly. Eine Grazie und ja, grosse Weine sind immer gross - auch jetzt schon. Bis 2045+
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

(56% 卡伯涅-萨万, 36% 美乐托, 4% 卡伯涅-法兰, 4% Petit Verdot)

酒色深红，酒香简直令人惊艳，闻之不止，似乎可以花上几个小时不断地嗅闻，总是能发现新的香气。除了浓郁的黑莓、樱桃和黑加香果之外，还有异国情调的香料、香草、金黄色的烟草、花朵香气，独特的香味令人难以忘怀。

口感典雅优雅，典型的巴伊利酒庄风格，平衡、细长、富有张力，新鲜、有嚼头，果味清脆，完美的天然纤维和酸度使得酒精充满活力。尾部几乎无限延续。即使是两年后，这仍然是无可争议的巴伊利酒庄。酒庄的优雅和大酒的魅力，确实是永恒的。预计可享受至2045年。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby, purple reflections, subtle ochre brightening on the rim. A very closed bouquet with tobacco, hints of lemon balm, liquorice and blackberry undertones but savoury, earthy nuances dominate the fruit. Powerful on the palate, sweet plum, the savoury notes again, good freshness and dark nougat on the finish. Somewhat encapsulated at the moment, merely hinting at its great ageing potential, please wait until at least 2030. (Store +40)
Western reviews.translation:
酒色：深红色，紫色反射，酒杯边缘有微妙的黄土色光泽。

酒香：非常封闭，具有烟草、柠檬苣苔、甘草和黑莓底调，但果味被土味和泥土味所主导。

口感：强烈，甜的浆果味，土味和泥土味再次出现，口感清新，酒尾有暗巧克力味。

目前酒品尚未完全展现，仅仅透露其巨大的陈年潜力，建议至少等到2030年再饮用。 (建议储存+40年)

Western reviews.review: The wine has precision, power and density, concentration and layer upon layer of fruit. The wine's spicy edge complements the impressive tannins, ripe texture and certainly promises much for the future. It will age well, drink from 2026. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒具有精确、强劲和浓密的特质，果味层次丰富，复杂多样。酒中的辣味与坚实的苦味、成熟的口感相得益彰，未来必定会有很大的发展潜力。酒将会在未来几年中逐渐成熟，建议从2026年开始饮用。 - 罗杰·沃斯

Western reviews.review: Incredibly rich, lush, powerful, full-bodied and concentrated, as well as poised, balanced, and harmonious and fresh, the wine opens with an array of flowers, tobacco leaf, currants, black plums, espresso, smoke and herbs. Vibrant, seductive, long and complex, the wine is a beautiful expression of the vineyard with all of its complexities and nuances. It should drink a bit earlier than the 2015, 2016 and 2018. But it will still need time in the cellar. Drink from 2030-2060. 97 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒极其丰富、浓郁、强劲、充满体积和浓缩，同時又平衡、和谐、清新。酒体开启时，展现出一系列花朵、烟草叶、黑加仑、黑杏、咖啡、烟雾和香草的芳香。酒体生动、诱人、长久且复杂，是葡萄园的美丽体现，展现出其复杂性和细微差别。相比2015年、2016年和2018年产的酒，今年的酒可能会稍早些饮用。但是仍需要在酒窖中陈化。建议从2030年至2060年饮用。评分97分。

Western reviews.review: Medium to deep ruby red colour. Aromas & flavours are of lovely fresh blackcurrants & fine cedar notes. Medium to full-bodied, with balanced alcohol & soft acidity. Tannins are fine & gripping with a milky smooth texture. A harmonious wine that lasts well. 6/11 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深红色，中到深红色。

香气：新鲜黑currant的芳香，细致的松木味。

口感：中到全口感，酒精平衡，酸度柔和。纤维细腻，持久感强。

总体评价：这是一瓶和谐的红酒，口感持久。评分：6/11

Chinese pairs.original: 芳香的鲜花，黑松露，雪松，铅笔和红色水果的气息，强大的结构，酒体适中，天鹅绒般的质感和单宁，丰富的，平衡的，至少可以存放30年或以上。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of fragrant flowers, black truffle, pine, pencil lead, and red fruit waft through the senses. A powerful structure supports a medium-bodied wine with a silky texture and refined tannins. Rich and balanced, this wine has the potential to age for at least 30 years or more.

Western reviews.review: If any bottle deserved 101 Pts, this is it! What a wine tasting experience. Unforgettable in every sense of the word, perhaps majestic captures the essence of this wine. The nose, with its non-stop bouquet of cedar, tobacco leaf, Cuban cigar box, spice, graphite, leaf, herbs, dried flowers, and currants created an incredible perfume. But the star of the show was the powerful, elegant, refined, intense display of red fruits, spice, earth, and tobacco on your palate. Absolutely seamless, the elegant character was as mindblowing as was the over 60 seconds of resonating fruits that had you wondering how a wine could be this good! This was from a magnum, so standard bottles might not be quite at this level.
Western reviews.translation: 如果有瓶子值得获得101分，这就是它！这是一个令人难忘的酒评体验，可能“壮观”更能捕捉到这瓶酒的精髓。酒鼻子里，各种香味不断变化，包括松木、烟草叶、古巴雪茄盒、香料、石墨、叶子、香草、干花和黑currant，创造了一个令人惊叹的香味。但是，酒的真正魅力在于其强烈、优雅、精致、浓郁的红果、香料、土壤和烟草味道。酒口感丝滑无余，优雅的性格令人惊叹，超过60秒的余音让你不禁问：这瓶酒怎么这么好！这瓶酒是从一瓶大瓶装的，所以标准瓶装可能不及此。

Western reviews.review: Mittleres Rubingranat, Ockerreflexe, breitere Randaufhellung. Süße eingelegte Pflaumen, Noten von Cassis, Lakritze, ätherische Anklänge an Minze und Eukalyptus, etwas Grafit und Zedernholz. Am Gaumen präsentes, seidiges Tanninkleid, frische, rassige Säurestruktur, stoffig und extraktsüß, kraftvoll und delikat zugleich, sehr klare schwarzbeerige Frucht, Orangenanklänge, zart nach Schokolade und Honig im Abgang, überzeugende Länge, hat stattliche Reifereserven. - Peter Moser
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，表面有橙色反光，边缘有明显的光泽。酒中有熟透的浆果味，特别是熟透的浆果，黑加香果、薄荷糖和薄荷的气味，微微带有石墨和松木的味道。口感丰富，细腻的橡皮感，清新的酸度结构，厚重的口感，甜度高，强劲而又细致，黑色浆果味清晰，橙子味和巧克力味在尾部留下了轻微的余味，酒的长度令人信服，酒中有着丰富的成熟储备。 - 彼得·莫瑟

Chinese pairs.original: 铅笔、矿石、鲜花和黑醋栗的气味。强劲和饱满的单宁，很高的复杂度。
Chinese pairs.new: Graphite, stone, floral, and blackberry aromas. Powerful and full-bodied tannins, high complexity.

Western reviews.review: This is compelling, with a bright, forward currant fruit that is opening well now to show the nuance of game, earth, and gunflint to the ripe, dark fruit. The texture is tannic and fresh, with tannins starting to loosen but still in evidence. A luminous, radiant wine that will doubtless improve for another half-century. Drinking Window 2022 - 2082.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶令人深感满意的红酒，具有明亮的、前景开阔的黑枣果味，目前正逐渐展现出复杂的风味，如野味、泥土和硫磺味。酒体坚实新鲜，纤维开始松弛但仍然明显。这种光彩照人的、辉煌的酒会在未来半个世纪内不断改善。建议饮用时间：2022-2082年。

Western reviews.review: The 1996 Lafite-Rothschild was remarkably deep in color considering that it is now 20 years in age. The bouquet is classic Pauillac with pencil shavings and sous-bois infusing the black fruit, masculine and a little aloof, yet focused and very well delineated. The palate is very well balanced with crisp blackberry and boysenberry fruit, spicier than I recollect, a crescendo of flavors so that it seems understated at first but fans out with a sense of confidence towards the finish.
Western reviews.translation: 1996 年拉菲-洛氏（Lafite-Rothschild）红酒的颜色深度惊人，考虑到它已经有20年的历史了。酒香典型的波尔多风格，带有木屑和森林底座的黑果味，男性化，略带冷漠，但聚焦且非常清晰。口感非常平衡，带有清脆的黑莓和黑莓果味，香气比我记忆中更浓郁，味道层次丰富，似乎在开始时低调，但在尾部展现出自信的风格。

Western reviews.review: The beauty and balance of this are phenomenal. Seamless tannins and fruit. Full body yet so balanced and refined. Sweet tobacco and berries. Minerals and cedar. A beautiful wine. The depth is superb.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的美丽和平衡是令人惊叹的。它的纹理和果味完美融合。酒体丰富却又如此平衡和细腻。酒中有甜的烟草和浆果的味道，还有矿物质和松木的气息。是一瓶美丽的酒。酒的深度非常出色。

Western reviews.review: Gorgeous aromas of currant, berries and licorice. Full-bodied, with supersilky tannins and a long, caressing finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气非常美丽，带有浓郁的黑枣、浆果和甘草的味道。口感丰富，纤维细腻，余味长长地延续。

Chinese pairs.original: 2022年份的Chateau Montrose正是我所期待的旷世之作，一款兼具能量、张力、野性、力量，同时还能保持谦逊姿态的葡萄酒；一朵用热血滋养的生命之花。此次品鉴完全颠覆了我记忆中浓郁浆果与高度烘焙的固有印象，在摇杯之间便展现出花海迷踪的美好画面。紫罗兰、玫瑰的花香与松子、炒瓜子的醇香交织缠绵，沐浴其中能够感知到大自然的祝福。砾石高地下的黏土层以及轻柔的萃取工艺赋予了它无与伦比的流畅度，令大量超高浓度的黑色水果化作奔腾而下的雅鲁藏布江。这就是我所期待的巅峰之作，它将是Chateau Montrose永恒的丰碑。
Chinese pairs.new:
2022年份的Chateau Montrose是我的梦幻之作，它完美地结合了能量、张力、野性和力量，同时保持着谦逊的姿态。它是一朵由热血浇灌的生命之花。 

这次品鉴彻底打破了我对浓郁浆果和高度烘焙的固有印象，摇杯之间展现出花海迷踪的美好画面。紫罗兰和玫瑰的花香与松子和炒瓜子的醇香交织缠绵，沐浴其中可以感受到大自然的祝福。 

砾石高地下的黏土层和轻柔的萃取工艺赋予了它无与伦比的流畅度，使大量超高浓度的黑色水果化作奔腾而下的雅鲁藏布江。这就是我所期待的巅峰之作，它将是Chateau Montrose永恒的丰碑。

English pairs.original: Chateau Montrose 2022 is the epoch-defining masterpiece I had envisioned, a wine exuding energy, tension, wildness, and power, while simultaneously maintaining a humble demeanor. It is a flourishing flower of life, nurtured by passion. This tasting experience wholly changes my established memory of rich berries and intense toasting, revealing a captivating floral landscape with a mere swirl of the glass. The intertwined fragrances of violet and rose mingle with the rich aroma of pine nuts and toasted pumpkin seeds, bathing the blessing of nature. The clay layer beneath the gravelly highlands and the delicate extraction grant it unparalleled smoothness, transforming the copious, highly concentrated black fruits into the surging Yarlung Tsangpo River. This is the apex I had longed for, an everlasting monument to Chateau Montrose.
English pairs.new: 蒙托罗斯庄园2022年红酒，是我心中理想的杰作，展现出生机勃勃的能量、紧张感、野性和权力，而又保持着谦逊的态度。它是一朵繁荣的生命之花，得益于激情的呵护。这次品酒体验彻底改变了我对丰富的黑berries和强烈的烤香的记忆，展现出一幅迷人的花卉风景，只需轻轻旋转玻璃瓶就能感受到。紫罗兰和玫瑰的香气交织在一起，与松子和烤南瓜籽的浓郁香气融合在一起，感受自然的恩赐。高原上的碎石和细致的提取使其拥有无与伦比的光滑度，将丰富的浓缩黑果转化为汹涌的雅鲁藏布江。这就是我梦寐以求的巅峰，永恒的纪念碑，铭刻在蒙托罗斯庄园的历史上。

Western reviews.review: Zurückhaltende, besonders komplexe Aromatik, feinwürzig, fruchtig und blumig; glaskarer Auftakt, gemächliche Entwicklung über tragenden, festen, gleichsam granitenen Gerbstoffen, enorme Tiefe, Spannkraft und Länge; grandioser Montrose, gehört zu den Knüllern des Jahres.
Western reviews.translation:
这段红酒评论的中文翻译是：

回味悠长，特别复杂的香气，细腻的矿物质味道，果香和花香融合在一起；清澈的开头，缓慢发展在坚实的、坚硬的、类似花岗岩的橡木味道中，深度、张力和持久性都非常出色；这是一款非常出色的蒙特罗斯红酒，属于当年最好的几款。

Western reviews.review: Almost opaque in color, the wine is equally dark in character with its core of blackberries, black currants, black cherries, and licorice. In the nose, you also find flowers, citrus, and a kitchen full of spices. The level of depth on the palate is almost off the charts, yet, the wine somehow remains light on its feet. There is intensity matched with purity, elegance and seamlessness in the finish that holds your focus for at least 60 seconds. Clearly, this is one of the great vintages of Montrose with a uniqueness of character that fans of the estate should have in their cellar. Lastly, it is important to note there is no feeling of heat, jam or over ripeness here. The wine is a blend of 66% Cabernet Sauvignon, 25% Merlot, 8% Cabernet Franc and 1% Petit Verdot. 14.5% ABV, pH 3.78. Harvesting took place September 2 - September 22. Yields were 31 hectoliters per hectare. The Grand Vin was produced using only 58% of the harvest. The wine is aging in 60% new, French oak barrels for 18 months before bottling. Drink from 2030-2065. 98-100 Pts.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色接近透明，酒体同样深沉，黑莓、黑葡萄、黑樱桃和甘草的黑色核心让人印象深刻。在鼻子里，你还能嗅到花朵、柑橘和满满的香料。口感的深度几乎是无限的，但酒体却轻盈如飞。酒中强度与纯粹性、优雅和流畅的完美结合，让你沉浸其中至少60秒。显然，这是蒙罗斯（Montrose）历史上的一大杰作，拥有独特的个性，值得蒙罗斯的粉丝在酒窖中珍藏。最后，需要注意的是，这瓶酒没有任何的热度、果酱或过度成熟感。酒的组成是66%卡波弗雷（Cabernet Sauvignon）、25%梅洛（Merlot）、8%卡波弗雷（Cabernet Franc）和1%佩蒂·维多（Petit Verdot）。酒精度14.5%，pH值3.78。收获时间为9月2日至9月22日，产量为31公顷/公顷。只有58%的收获用于生产大酒（Grand Vin）。酒用60%新法国橡木桶陈酿18个月后才被装瓶。建议在2030-2065年之间饮用。评分98-100分。

Western reviews.review: (66% Cabernet Sauvignon, 25% Merlot, 8% Cabernet Franc, 1% Petit Verdot, 14.5%, knapp 50% Grand Vin wurden dieses Jahr produziert. Dichtes Rubin, im Kern fast Schwarz. Die Nase ist mind-blowing, tiefgründig und mit grosser, aromatischer Komplexität, Cassis, Herzkirschen, Heidelbeeren, Pfeffer, dazu die fast schon obligaten Veilchennoten, die in diesem Jahrgang Bordeaux prägen, viel Mineralik, ungemein nobel und kühl anmutend. Der Gaumen beginnt harmlos, baut dann aus, der wein füllt den Mund, eine Wand von superfeinen Tanninen umgarnen die Frucht, die Tannine sind sehr seidig, immer da, nie im Vordergrund, das ist ein Konzentrat aus Frucht, Struktur und Frische, wer Montrose kennt, der weiss, welche Kraft in diesem Wein steckt, hier haben wir es mit einer Eisernen Faust im Seidenhandschuh zu tun. Grosse Länge, sehr mineralisches Finish, ein Montrose-Monument, das für eine kleine Ewigkeit gebaut ist. 2030-2065+ (Verkostet "En Primeur" im April 2023 auf Château Montrose) #primeurs22
Western reviews.translation:
本酒款为红酒，酒龄为14.5%，酒中含有：

*   66% 卡波弗莱（Cabernet Sauvignon）
*   25% 美乐（Merlot）
*   8% 卡波弗莱（Cabernet Franc）
*   1% 小皮多（Petit Verdot）

今年生产的酒中约有50%为Grand Vin。酒液呈深红色，几乎是黑色的。

酒香深邃，复杂，具有强烈的香气，包括黑加仑、黑樱桃、蓝莓、胡椒等，几乎是典型的百日红葡萄酒风味，具有强烈的矿物质味道，非常优雅和清凉。

口感平和，随后逐渐增强，酒液充满口腔，细致的纤维包围着果味，纤维非常细腻，始终存在但不突出，酒液是果味、结构和清新度的集中体现。对于熟悉蒙罗斯酒的人来说，这酒的力量是显而易见的。我们面对的是一瓶在丝绸手套中握着铁拳的酒。酒的长度非常长，矿物质味道的尾部非常长，这是一瓶蒙罗斯酒的纪念品，足以保存数百年。推荐饮用时间：2030-2065年。

Western reviews.review: Un joli nez élégant, précis, qui offre de la minéralité, de la puissance maîtrisée, un joli côté infusion maitrisée. Il exprime les notes de cerise bigarreau pulpeuse/fraîche, de violette et plus légèrement – de mûre crémeuse, associées à des touches de poivre frais, de bâton de réglisse, de petits fruits denses/assez mûrs, à des pointes de badiane presque séveux et à une très discrète pointe de clou de girofle, de fumée, de bergamote/thé bleu, d’amande mûre et de poivre. La bouche est joliment minérale et offre de la fraîcheur, de la tension, de la justesse, une jolie énergie et pureté du fruit, de la gourmandise, de la minéralité, un joli côté enrobant. Elle exprime les notes de cerise pulpeuse/juteuse, de petits fruits noirs denses/éclatants, ainsi que des pointes de bleuet, de petits fruits rouges rôtis, de prune bleus pulpeuse, une superbe minéralité, des fines pointes de fève tonka, d’amande, de tabac blond frais, de macération/infusion, ainsi que des fines pointes de bergamote, d’épices douces. La bouche est joliment précise et minérale. Bonne longueur, une jolie sapidité et gourmandise, les tannins sont fondus et élégants. Une très discrète pointe de café en fond, du moelleux. Jolie profondeur du nez, de la matière et un côté texturé. Jolie fraicheur, de l’onctuosité en fraîcheur et une belle tension, générosité et souplesse. Une très belle persistance et sapidité
Western reviews.translation:
这是一瓶美酒，具有典雅的气味，精确的口感，带有矿物质和控制好的力量。酒中有浓郁的杏仁和鲜果味，紫罗兰和轻微的浓郁黑berry味，伴随着新鲜胡椒、蜂蜜棍、浓郁的小果实、几乎浓郁的丁香和极其微妙的丁香、烟草、柑橘和蓝茶、熟杏仁和胡椒味。

酒口清新、紧张、准确，具有美丽的果实、丰富的口感、矿物质和美丽的包裹。酒中有浓郁的果实、浓郁的小黑果实，以及微妙的蓝莓、烤红果实、蓝果实、浓郁的矿物质、细微的豆蔻、杏仁、淡烟草、浓郁的浸泡和微妙的柑橘、甜味。

酒口清新、准确和矿物质。酒有很好的持久性和口感，苦味柔和、典雅。酒底有极其微妙的咖啡味和丰富的口感。酒有典雅的气味、丰富的口感和细腻的口感。酒有极其美丽的清新、丰富的口感和美丽的紧张、慷慨和灵活性。酒有极其美丽的持久性和口感。

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby in colour with an inky, opaque core, purple reflections, and subtle brightening on the rim. Immensely multi-faceted and seductive on the nose, with aromas of ripe cassis, fine cherry fruit and hints of crystallised violets. The juicy, powerful palate has great freshness, with perfect tannins, notes of black cherry and blackberry, mineral, saline and enormously long lasting, with a hint of fine chocolate on the finish. This wine has huge potential for the future.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红宝石色，中间有浓密的黑色核心，紫色反射，酒口边缘有细微的光泽。酒鼻子上充满了多种复杂的香气，包括熟透的黑加仑、优质的樱桃果味和浓缩的紫罗兰花香。酒口上充满了新鲜的水果味，口感丰富，口感强劲，完美的纤维，黑樱桃和黑莓的味道，矿物质、盐味和极长的尾韵，酒尾有细微的巧克力味。这个酒有巨大的未来发展潜力。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有可爱的李子香味，蓝莓、薄荷、黑醋栗、草药、雪松、皮革味道突出。优雅的风格，酒体饱满成熟，结构复杂平衡。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts charming plum and blackberry notes, with hints of mint, black truffle, herbal undertones, pine, and a prominent leather character. It's a refined style with a full-bodied, mature texture and a complex, well-balanced structure.

Western reviews.review: Soft, round and wonderful with currants, licorice and delicate berries with a stony, wet earth undertone. Full and velvety texture.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感非常柔和，圆润，带有浓郁的葡萄干、 licorice 和细微的浆果味，底部有石头和潮湿的土壤的味道。口感丰富，滑顺。

Chinese pairs.original: 2018年份的高柏丽给人一种热情好客、落落大方的气质。无论是口感还是香气都散发着满满的力量、错落有致的层次以及浑然天成的自然魅力。每一个细节都控制的恰当好处，彷如在针尖上舞蹈。 甜美的香料气息和成熟的黑果芬芳紧密交织，包裹着黑巧克力融化般的绵密质感。整个味蕾沐浴在流畅的线条和新鲜感之中，在热年份实现这样的平衡，简直让人无法想象。当这款酒以深邃的铅笔芯味道画上句号的时候，我真希望段这旅程没有尽头，一直延续下去。。。
Chinese pairs.new: 2018年份的高柏丽展现出一种热情好客、落落大方的气质。无论是口感还是香气都散发着满满的力量、错落有致的层次以及浑然天成的自然魅力。每一个细节都控制的恰当好处，彷如在针尖上舞蹈。 甜美的香料气息和成熟的黑果芬芳紧密交织，包裹着黑巧克力融化般的绵密质感。整个味蕾沐浴在流畅的线条和新鲜感之中，在热年份实现这样的平衡，简直让人无法想象。当这款酒以深邃的铅笔芯味道画上句号的时候，我真希望这段旅程没有尽头，一直延续下去。

English pairs.original: Haut-Bailly 2018 is pretty generous, sending off full of energy, depth, and natural charisma. Every detail is perfectly maintained, like dancing on the point of a needle. Sweet spices and dark ripe fruits stick together, covered with a layer of melting black chocolate texture. The palate graces me with a sleek line and incredible freshness; it is hard to believe it comes from a hot vintage. When it ends up with the profound pencil shave, you can’t even imagine where its destination will be.
English pairs.new: 2018年哈特-贝利(Haut-Bailly)红酒非常慷慨，充满了能量、深度和自然魅力。每个细节都完美地保留着，像是在针尖上跳舞。甜香料和黑熟透的水果紧密结合，覆盖着融化的黑巧克力质感。口感优雅流畅，带有令人惊讶的新鲜感，难以相信它来自于炎热的产季。当它以深刻的铅笔剃须味结束时，你甚至无法想象它的终点将会是哪里。

Western reviews.review: (55% Cabernet Sauvignon, 35% Merlot, 5% Cabernet Franc, 5% Petit Verdot): Expressiv und bereits wunderbar zugänglich, ganz im Sinne von "grosse Weine sind immer gross"; viel dunkle Frucht, rauchige Noten, Veilchen, Orangenzesten; druckvoller Gaumen, top strukturiert, markante, reife, runde Gerbstoffe tanzen mit der satten Frucht, ausgesprochen lang und mit würzigen Rückaromen. Für eine kleine Ewigkeit gebaut. 2028-2050
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的成分是：55% 卡波雷尔·沙维尼翁（Cabernet Sauvignon）、35% 美乐（Merlot）、5% 卡波雷尔·法兰克（Cabernet Franc）、5% 小皮特·韦多（Petit Verdot）。

这瓶红酒的口感非常丰富，已经非常容易入口，正如“大酒总是大”的说法。酒中有大量的黑色果味，烟熏味，紫罗兰花香，橙子皮香。口感丰富，结构完美，具有明显的果味和坚果味，酒中的橡木味和果味非常完美地融合在一起，酒尾长达数分钟，留下了深刻的香味。这种酒的品质非常高，足以享受数十年。建议在2028-2050年之间品尝。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby, opaque core, purple reflections, subtle ochre brightening on the rim. An inviting bouquet with subtle notes of leather and bergamot, black berries and cherries and a hint of sweet tobacco. Complex, juicy and silky on the palate with a sweet texture, supported by ripe but powerful tannins, mineral notes and a touch of dark nougat. Just starting to open up slowly now, great length and definite further ageing potential. (Age / Drink +40).
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，透明核心，紫色反射，酒杯边缘有微妙的黄土色光泽。酒香诱人，带有细微的皮革和bergamot、黑莓和樱桃以及甜烟的味道。口感复杂， juicy 和 silky，口感甜润，支持着成熟但强有力的纤维素、矿物质味道和一丝黑棕糖的味道。酒正开始缓慢地打开，酒尾长且有明显的进一步陈化潜力。 (年龄/饮用 +40)

Western reviews.review: Haut-Bailly is an ancient estate with a recorded history of wine production dating back to 1461; the renowned Irish Barton family assumed control in 1736. Intriguingly, Haut-Bailly commanded prices equal to Lafite, Latour, Margaux, and Haut-Brion in the 19th century. Owned since 1955 by Belgian negociant Daniel Sanders, in 1998, Haut-Bailly was purchased by American Robert G. Wilmers, but Veronique Sanders continues to steer the cru classé estate to greatness, year after year. The 74-hectare lies in the heart of gravelly Pessac-Leognan, and the 2018 vintage blends 55% cabernet sauvignon with 35% merlot and equal soupcons of petit verdot and cabernet franc. The estate's core is 10 acres of 100 year old vines, concentrated further this vintage with yields around 20 ha/hl. Complex, perfumed, and mesmerizing creme de cassis, ripe cherries, fine oak spice, mocha, and dusty minerals, it is unbelievably cohesive now, a testament to the excellent 2018 vintage. The wine is structured for long and graceful ageing, as only great classic claret can do. This vintage commands $275, and it is worth every penny. Be disciplined and let evolve for a few years. (DJ Kearney).
Western reviews.translation: 巴顿家族的豪特-贝利(Haut-Bailly)酒庄拥有悠久的历史，酒庄的酒生产历史可以追溯到1461年。1736年，著名的爱尔兰巴顿家族(Barton家族)接管了酒庄。值得注意的是，在19世纪，豪特-贝利的价格甚至高于拉菲(Lafite)、拉图尔(Latour)、马戛尼(Margaux)和豪特-布里昂(Haut-Brion)。自1955年以来，酒庄一直由比利时商人丹尼尔·桑德斯(Daniel Sanders)所有。1998年，美国人罗伯特·G·威尔默斯(Robert G. Wilmers)收购了酒庄，但韦罗妮克·桑德斯(Veronique Sanders)仍然负责酒庄的运营，年复一年地带领酒庄走向辉煌。酒庄占地74公顷，位于石灰质的佩萨克-莱奥纳根(Pessac-Leognan)地区。2018年产酒的比例为55%卡波弗列诺(Cabernet Sauvignon)、35%梅洛(Merlot)和小等份的佩蒂·维尔多(Petit Verdot)和卡波弗列诺(Cabernet Franc)。酒庄的核心是10英亩的100年老 vines，今年的产量更为集中，产量约为20公斤/公顷。酒庄的酒风味复杂，具有浓郁的黑加仑果酱、熟透的樱桃、精致的橡木香、摩卡和尘土矿物质的风味。酒庄的酒风味现在已经非常协调，证明了2018年产酒的品质。酒庄的酒结构适合长期陈化，仅有伟大的经典克莱雷特酒才能做到这一点。这瓶酒的价格为275美元，值得每一分钱。请保持纪律，耐心等待几年。 (DJ Kearney)

Western reviews.review: The balance between Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon in this wine gives it swathes of rich fruit and a classic structure. Blackberry flavors layered with firm, dense tannins convey elegance and richness. This is a ripe wine, generously proportioned and ready for aging. Roger Voss
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的梅洛和卡波弗雷希诺的平衡使其拥有丰富的果味和典型的结构。黑莓的风味与坚实的、密集的纤维相结合，展现出优雅和丰富的风格。这是一款成熟的红酒，体积充足，适合长期陈酿。- 罗杰·沃斯

Western reviews.review: The nose is off the charts with its cornucopia of black and red fruits, smoke, wet earth, spice box and Cuban cigar profile. On the palate the wine offers almost unequaled depth of flavor, concentration, richness, silky tannins and wave after wave of perfectly ripe, fresh, pure black and red fruits. The seamless finish seems almost endless as it builds and expands. Haut Bailly is not a flashy wine. It often shows much better with cellaring. Give this at least 10 years before pulling a cork. The wine was made from 55% Cabernet Sauvignon, 35% Merlot, 5% Petit Verdot and 5% Cabernet Franc. 2018 was produced from some of the lowest yields in the history of the estate at 21 hectoliters per hectare, cutting the production in half. If this is your style of wine, you might want to grab a few bottles.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的鼻子（香气）非常丰富，包含黑色和红色水果、烟雾、湿土、香料盒和古巴雪茄的香气。口感上，这瓶红酒提供了几乎无与伦比的深度和浓度，富有细腻的口感和完美成熟的黑色和红色水果。酒尾（尾部口感）非常顺滑，似乎永无止境地延伸。黑白利（Haut Bailly）不是一瓶耀眼的红酒，它通常在陈化后表现得更好。建议至少等待10年后再打开瓶盖。该酒由55%卡波内尔·萨维尼诺（Cabernet Sauvignon）、35%梅洛（Merlot）、5%小皮诺（Petit Verdot）和5%卡波内尔·法兰克（Cabernet Franc）组成。2018年的产量是该庄园历史上最低的，仅为21公斤/公顷，减少了产量的一半。如果这瓶红酒符合你的口味，你可能会想要购买几瓶。

2020 Chateau Pichon Longueville Comtesse.name: 2020 Chateau Pichon Longueville Comtesse de Lalande

Chinese pairs.original: 只需要轻轻一闻，就能让你感受到顶级赤霞珠混酿的灵魂，那是一种永不褪色的致命诱惑力… 冰镇牛奶一般的酒液中蕴藏着丰富的内涵，丁香、桂皮的香气在摇杯之后居然转变为石墨和黑巧醇香；多汁的樱桃果汁在可可粉和紫罗兰的簇拥下慢慢舞动霓裳，纤细的单宁线条如同丝丝缕缕的飘带织入其中，画面之美令人陶醉。作为一款准生物动力酒庄，女爵已经在 “纯净之路” 上习得了真谛，对她的未来，我翘首以待。
Chinese pairs.new: A single sniff is enough to transport you to the soul of this top-notch Cabernet Sauvignon blend, an irresistible allure that never fades. Rich undertones are hidden within the chilled milk-like liquid, with cinnamon and nutmeg aromas transforming into graphite and black chocolate notes after swirling the glass. Luscious cherry juice sways to the rhythm of cocoa powder and lavender, as delicate tannins weave in like a delicate lace, creating a breathtaking scene that leaves you enchanted. As a biodynamic estate, Dame has mastered the path of purity, and I eagerly await her future.

English pairs.original: Just sniff gently, you will understand the soul of a top Cabernet Sauvignon blend and the unfading charm of it. The wine is mellow as milk. After you swirl the glass, surprisingly, rich aromas of clove and cinnamon will transform into mellow aromas of graphite and black chocolate. Surrounded by the aromas of cocoa powder and violet, fragrance of cherry juice dances slowly in the glass with slender tannins lines intertwined. As a quasi biodynamic chateau, Chateau Pichon Comtesse has understood the essence of purity. I am looking forward to its future.
English pairs.new: 轻轻嗅一口，你就能感受到顶级卡波内尔（Cabernet Sauvignon）混合酒的灵魂和它的永恒魅力。酒体柔和如牛奶。搅拌玻璃后，令人惊讶的是，丁香和肉桂的浓郁香气会转变为石墨和黑巧克力的柔和香气。周围是可可粉和紫罗兰的香气，樱桃汁的香气在玻璃中缓慢舞动，细长的鞣质线条相互纠缠。作为一个近似生物动力学（quasi biodynamic）的酒庄，皮尚公爵夫人酒庄（Chateau Pichon Comtesse）已经理解了纯粹的本质。我期待着它的未来。

Western reviews.review: Tannins and fruits march in step with each other to give this wine style and elegance. The structure is supple and the tannins smoothing, while still keeping great aging potential. Drink the wine from 2027.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的果味和苦味（tanins）完美融合，展现出优雅的风格。酒体柔和，苦味平滑，仍然保留了很好的陈年潜力。建议2027年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: A riveting wine in every sense of the word, the perfume grabs you with its array of flowers, spices, tobacco, currants, smoke, cedar and roasted plums. There is intensity, purity, precision and length, which is perfect for allowing you to experience all the layers of silky, sensuous fruits and freshness. The finish crosses the 50 second mark with ease and never looks back. With time in the bottle, this gem could hit triple digits, it is that good! Drink from 2027-2065.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒在每个方面都令人着迷，芳香层次丰富，花朵、香料、烟草、黑currant、烟雾、红檜和烤石榴的味道让人难以抗拒。酒中充满了强烈的气势、纯粹的味道、精确的结构和持久的尾韵，让你能够体验到细腻柔滑的果味和清新感。酒尾超越50秒，毫不费力地延续着。随着时间的推移，这款珍品可能会达到百分之百的高度，它的确非常出色！建议在2027年至2065年之间饮用。

Western reviews.review: There's Pauillac in the glass with strong notes of cassis, Mediterranean herbs, ginseng and gentian roots, white almonds, elderflowers and lavender. Medium to full bodied, extremely elegant tannins and a graceful, juicy finale. It lengthens beautifully showing absolutely no signs of austerity from the start. Better from 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 酒中有巴约克（Pauillac）的风味，带有浓郁的黑加仑（cassis）、地中海香草、参茸和甘菊根的味道，白杏仁、白菊花和紫罗兰。酒体中等到中等以上，极其优雅的橡木味和优雅的果香尾韵。酒展现出优美的长度，完全没有 austerity 的迹象。建议从2025年开始饮用。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby garnet, purple reflections, delicate rim brightening. Fine nuances of cassis, blackberries and licorice, noble wood savouriness in the background, notes of candied orange zest. Juicy, elegant, ripe cherries, harmonious and fresh, fine, ripe tannins, chocolaty touch on the finish, shows length and has certain ageing potential, great future.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色宝石色，紫色反射，细微的边缘闪亮。黑加仑、黑莓和甘草的细微差别，背景中的高贵木质香气，糖浆橙皮的香气。水果清新、典雅、成熟的樱桃，和谐、清新，细致、成熟的苦味，口感巧妙的巧克力味，展现出长度和一定的陈化潜力，未来前景佳。

Western reviews.review: (77% Cabernet Sauvignon, 17% Merlot, 6% Cabernet Franc, 13.6% Alkohol) Was soll ich sagen? Es gibt Weine, deren Nase mich einfach in eine andere Welt befördern. Diese Comtesse springt förmlich aus dem Glas, zeigt neben floralen Aromen viel Würze, grüne Paprika, Minze, pfeffrige Würze, blonder Tabak, Tee, eine wahre Droge. Der Gaumen ist hochelegant, mit Tanninen, deren Qualität über alle Zweifel erhaben sind, mittlerer Körper, viel Präzision, alles ist an seinem Platz, tänzerisch leicht, mit Schmelz, Charme und einer bestechenden Länge. Viel besser geht's in Bordeaux wohl nicht... Big Wine. 2026-2050 (Verkostet am 8. November 2022 in Zürich)
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的成分是：77% 卡波涅尔·沙维尼翁，17% 美丽托，6% 卡波涅尔·法兰克，酒精含量13.6%。

我想说的是，有些酒会让我闻到一股令人惊艳的香味，让我仿佛置身于另一世界。这个Comtesse酒就像从玻璃杯里跳出来一样，展现出花香、香料、青椒、薄荷、胡椒、金色烟草、茶等多种复杂的香味。

口感优雅，具有高品质的坚果味，中等体积，精确到位，所有元素都在合适的位置，轻盈如舞蹈，具有融化感、魅力和令人惊叹的持久度。说实话， Bordeaux地区可能再也找不到比这更好的红酒了。这是一瓶大酒，推荐储存时间为2026-2050年。

Chinese pairs.original: 蜂蜜、熟的苹果、柠檬、黄油、干杏的香气。酒体丰满，有蜜饯的风味。非常好。
Chinese pairs.new: Honey, ripe apple, lemon, butter, and dried apricot aromas. Full-bodied with a jammy flavor. Excellent.

Western reviews.review: The 1988 d'Yquem has an incredibly profound nose of orange marmalade, dried apricots, honeycomb, musk and dried pineapple with hints of marzipan and crystallized ginger. The palate is seamless with a great line of crisp acid cutting through the densely packed dried tropical fruit and honeyed flavour layers. The finish just goes on and on.
Western reviews.translation: 1988 年的伊克姆（d'Yquem）红酒具有令人惊叹的深邃的香气，带有橙子马拉糕、干枳实、蜂蜜蜂巢、麝香和干菠萝的味道，伴有杏仁糖和糖化姜的微妙气息。口感光滑顺滑，清晰的酸度穿过紧密的干热带果和蜂蜜味道的层次。尾韵延续不断，令人难以忘怀。

Western reviews.review: Lots of of beeswax, botrytis spice and honey, with hints of toffee. Full-bodied, very sweet, thick and layered. Caramel, toffee, spice. Molasses too. Very, very powerful. Muscular and rich. Fabulous Sauternes. Nothing comes close in this vintage.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感丰富，非常甜，厚重且层次分明。有蜂蜡、白色念珠菌香气和蜂蜜的味道，伴有焦糖和糖浆的味道。非常强烈，肌肉发达，富有肉感。是一瓶出色的萨旺酒，今年的产量中没有一瓶能与之相比。

Chinese pairs.original: 淡淡的薄荷、蓝莓、树莓和鲜花的香味。花香萦绕，口感浓郁，这是另一个可以窖藏50年的酒。
Chinese pairs.new: Delicate notes of mint, blueberry, raspberry, and floral hints. The floral bouquet lingers, with a rich, full-bodied taste, making this another wine that can be aged for 50 years.

Western reviews.review: Deep garnet in color and made of 54% Cabernet Franc and 46% Merlot, the nose of the 2010 Cheval Blanc is a bit subdued to begin, measuredly opening out to reveal achingly provocative notions of molten chocolate, preserved Morello cherries, baked blackberries, boysenberries and blueberry compote with wafts of underbrush, cigar box, cumin seed and sandalwood. Full-bodied, the palate is a full-on atomic bomb waiting to go off, with very tightly coiled, slowly maturing black fruits eking out glimpses of a vast array of nuances. Still very youthful, it finishes with an incredibly persistent, jaw-dropping display of earth and mineral fireworks. I’d leave this one for another 5 years and drink it over the next 50.
Western reviews.translation:
2010年Cheval Blanc的颜色深红色，酒精含量为54%卡波弗朗克和46%梅洛。酒鼻子开始有些低调，但随着时间的推移，会逐渐展现出令人着迷的巧克力、保留的莫罗洛樱桃、烤黑莓、蓝莓酱和烟熏樱桃的诱人气味，还有灌木丛、雪茄盒、孜然和沉香的气息。

口感丰富，酒体像一颗等待爆炸的原子弹，黑果味道紧紧裹挟着各种细微差别。酒仍然非常年轻，酒尾呈现出令人惊叹的持久性，展现出丰富的矿物质和泥土风味。建议再等5年后再饮用，预计可以享受50年的美酒时光。

Western reviews.review: This is the finest Cheval Blanc for many years. It is, quite simply, magnificent. The wine shows the greatness of Cabernet Franc in the vintage, with 57% of the variety in the blend. It is beautifully structured and perfumed with velvety tannins, balanced acidity and swathes of black-currant and black-cherry fruits. It's well on course to becoming a legendary wine. Cellar Selection.
Western reviews.translation: 这是近年来最好的Cheval Blanc。它简直是壮观的。酒中展现了卡波弗朗克(Cabernet Franc)品种的伟大，占酒中57%。酒体结构优美，芳香醇厚，酸度平衡，黑currant和黑樱桃果味丰富。它有望成为一款传奇酒。推荐入藏。

Western reviews.review: The aroma in this wine is crazy with flowers, mushroom, forest floor, and fruit. It seems like I am walking through a row of the vines in Cheval Blanc when I have my nose in the glass. It's full-bodied, with fabulous layers of ultra-fine tannins and milk chocolate, raspberries, and a phenomenal finish. Truly one of the greatest Chevals ever. Better than 2009. Try in 2020.
Western reviews.translation: 这个红酒的香气简直是疯狂的，带有花朵、蘑菇、林地和水果的味道。每当我把鼻子放进酒杯里，我就像走在Cheval Blanc的葡萄园里一样。它是全口感的，具有极细致的纤维和牛奶巧克力、莓果的层次，以及令人惊叹的尾韵。它是Cheval Blanc历史上最伟大的之一。甚至比2009年还要出色。建议在2020年尝试。

Western reviews.review: Showing even better than a bottle a few years ago, the 2010 Cheval Blanc is perfection in a glass and wine doesn’t get any better. As with the 2009, it’s a powerful, concentrated Cheval Blanc, yet it has a slightly dark, cooler profile in its smoky black fruits, graphite, new leather, crushed rocks and cured meat aromas and flavors. Where the 2009 hits the palate with a sunny, sexy style, this stays more inward and masculine, yet it still has incredible sweetness of fruit, flawless integration of its fruit, tannins, and acidity, a great mid-palate, and a finish that goes on for over a minute. It opens up with time in the glass and offers incredible pleasure today, with an exotic masculine yet sexy style, but feel free to enjoy this legendary wine any time over the coming 3-4 decades.
Western reviews.translation: 2010年夏朗克红酒展现出比几年前更出色的表现，简直是完美的酒品，难以再有更好的了。与2009年一样，这款红酒具有强大的浓度，但它的烟熏黑果、石墨、新皮革、碎石和腌肉的气味和口感略带暗淡、冷酷。相比2009年那款阳光、性感的风格，这款红酒更内敛、男性化，但仍然具有令人惊叹的水果甜度，果、纤维、酸度完美融合，中口丰富，尾部延续超过一分钟。随着时间的推移，它在杯子中打开，提供了令人惊叹的享受，具有异国情调的男性化但性感的风格。您可以随时在未来3-4个十年内享受这款传奇酒品。

Western reviews.review:
Lush and very rounded, with lots of muscle and heft, but also great polish and pose to the gorgeous boysenberry, plum and fig notes. Supercreamy on the finish, with bittersweet cocoa, violet, mint, anise and tobacco in reserve.

Barrel Sample: 95-98 Points
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的口感丰富饱满，肌肉丰厚，但也具有极高的光泽和姿态，展现出美丽的蓝莓、浆果和枣子的香气。完美的奶油口感，余味中带有苦巧克力、紫罗兰、薄荷、安息香和烟草的复杂味道。

酒评：95-98分（酒桶样品）

Chinese pairs.original: 完美的艺术品，只需要黑白两个颜色就能让你癫狂的极简风格艺术品。2019年份的Canon泛着一股隐形的能量感，能够以极为克制的方式把无穷无尽的内涵跟你娓娓道来。鲜爽的黑果周围点缀着淡淡的甘草、八角和草果的辛香，香气精致的令人情不自禁地深呼吸。入口的瞬间，我脑子里马上蹦出来这两个字：“空灵”，那柔美的单宁，那修长的线条，还有那咸咸的回甘无不彰显着水晶般的剔透感。在我看来，Canon 2019已经超出了葡萄酒的认知世界，品尝它的过程就好像在和“智慧女神”的一次心灵对话。
Chinese pairs.new:
A masterpiece of art, reduced to just two colors, yet it's an extreme minimalist art piece that drives you crazy. The 2019 Canon exudes an invisible energy, conveying endless depth with utmost restraint. Fresh black fruit is adorned with subtle hints of licorice, cinnamon, and green fruit, creating an intricate aroma that makes you involuntarily take a deep breath.

The moment it enters your mouth, two words instantly pop into my mind: "ethereal". The soft tannins, the elegant lines, and the lingering saltiness all showcase a crystal-clear transparency. In my opinion, the 2019 Canon has transcended the world of wine, and tasting it is like having a spiritual conversation with the "Goddess of Wisdom".

English pairs.original: The perfect artwork, a minimalist style artwork that only requires two colors (black and white) to make you lose your mind. The 2019 Canon has an invisible sense of energy, and is to tell you endless connotations in a very restrained way. The fresh black fruit is dotted with hints of licorice, star anise and hints of Amomum, the aroma is so delectable that you can’t help but take a deep breath. At the moment of entering the palate, a word immediately pop out of my mind: “ethereal”. The silky tannins, the slender lines, and the salty finish all show the crystal clarity. In my opinion, Canon 2019 has gone beyond the cognitive world of wine, and the process of tasting it is like having a spiritual conversation with the “goddess of wisdom”.
English pairs.new: 完美的艺术品，一幅简约风格的艺术品，只需两种颜色（黑色和白色）就能让你迷失在其中。2019年佳能红酒具有无形的能量感，通过极度的克制告诉你无尽的含义。新鲜的黑色水果中带有 licorice、星安息香和安息香的味道，芳香如此诱人，无法不深深地吸气。进入口腔的那一刻，脑海中突然闪现一个词语：“飘渺”。滑腻的纹理、细长的线条和咸淡的尾韵都展现出晶莹的清晰。根据我的观察，佳能2019年已经超越了酒的认知世界，品尝它的过程就像与“智慧女神”进行着一种精神的对话。

Western reviews.review: Sleek, elegant and appealing even before you get your nose near the glass. Aromatically it is deep and rich, and then it revs up and takes off. Dense, compact and intense, zingy limestone vibrancy and grip. Winemakers say they are looking for balance all the time, but here you feel it, with tiny pulses of electricity that appear from beginning to end of the palate. Salinity on the finish with gunsmoke and extremely moreish blueberry and blackberry fruit, with a creamy texture as things open up. 50% new oak.Barrel Sample: 98
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的外观优雅、典雅，令人印象深刻，即使没有接近酒杯也能感受到。酒精气味深厚、丰富，随着时间的推移变得更加复杂。酒体紧密、浓郁、强烈，带有石灰岩的清新感和持久的味道。酒庄的制作人一直在追求平衡，但在口感中你可以感受到这种平衡，口感从开始到结束都充满了活力。酒尾带有盐味和烟火味，伴有极其诱人的蓝莓和黑莓果味，酒体在打开后变得更加丰富。酒用了50%的新橡木桶。酒样评分：98分。

Western reviews.review: The 2019 Château Canon is another brilliant wine from this talented team that delivers everything you could want from this incredible terroir located on the upper limestone plateau. Based on 74% Merlot and 26% Cabernet Franc, it has a pure, incredibly refined, yet still powerful profile that takes time to unwind. Offering up beautiful notes of black raspberries, wild strawberries, spring flowers, chalky minerality, and graphite, it hits the palate with medium to full-bodied richness, a layered, multi-dimensional mouthfeel, ultra-fine tannins, and a finish that's something to behold. This isn't the massive style of the 2015 and reminds me slightly of the 2016. It's perfectly balanced and, again, the purity and finesse are off the charts. It needs to be forgotten for 4-5 years and enjoyed over the following 2-3 decades. Hats off to Nicolas Audebert for another sensational wine.
Western reviews.translation: 2019年夏诺酒庄的佳酿再次证明了这个团队的才华，带给我们来自上层石灰岩高原的无与伦比的风土。以74%梅洛和26%卡波弗朗克为基础，这款酒具有纯粹、精致、但仍然强大的风格，需要时间来展现。酒中展现出黑莓、野生草莓、春花、石灰质矿物质和石墨的美丽香气，口感丰富中等到中等以上，层次丰富的口感，细致的纤维和令人惊叹的长尾。与2015年相比，这款酒风格更为谦逊，略似2016年风格。酒精平衡完美，纯粹和细腻程度令人惊叹。需要放置4-5年后，享用2-3个十年的美酒。对尼古拉·奥德伯特的致敬，他再次为我们带来了一款惊人的佳酿。

Western reviews.review: The 2019 Canon is creamy and layered. A wine of immense charm and sensuality, the 2019 is immediately appealing today, but also clearly has the potential to age for many decades. The 2019 is not as exuberant as most recent vintages, and yet its balance is simply magnificent. Readers can expect an aristocratic Saint-Emilion that is holding so much in reserve. Patience is key. Tasted three times.
Western reviews.translation: 2019年卡农红酒富有层次感，口感丰富。它是一款充满魅力和诱惑力的红酒，目前即可享用，但也具有长期储存的潜力。相比于近年来的其他年份，2019年卡农红酒的风格较为低调，但其平衡性却令人惊叹。读者们可以期待一款典雅的圣埃米利翁红酒，它保留了大量的潜力。耐心是关键。

Western reviews.review: Blackberries, blueberries and dark chocolate with bark, mushrooms and chalk. Lavender, too. Full-bodied with firm tannins that are polished and velvety. White pepper, gesso and crushed stone. It’s full-bodied and layered with tightness and focus and a long finish. It’s solid and stalwart, as usual.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感丰富，具有坚实的口感，且有光滑的纹理。它的味道中包含了黑莓、蓝莓、巧克力、松露、石灰和白胡椒等元素。酒体中还可以感受到花草的香气。这种红酒的口感紧致，具有焦点和持久的尾韵。它的品质稳定，符合我们对它的期望。

Western reviews.review: The 2019 Canon has turned out brilliantly in bottle, wafting from the glass with complex aromas of raspberries and red plums mingled with notions of raw cocoa, dark chocolate, pencil shavings and rose petals. Medium to full-bodied, seamless and multidimensional, it's one of the most refined, elegant right bank wines of the vintage, with a deep core of fruit, beautifully refined tannins, lively acids and a long, perfumed finish. This is a superb achievement for Nicolas Audebert and his team.
Western reviews.translation: 2019年佳农红酒瓶装表现出色，酒香复杂多变，带有浓郁的红莓和红杏气味，混合着生巧克力、黑巧克力、铅笔削片和玫瑰花的气息。酒体中等到中等以上，细腻平滑，多维度，酒中有着深厚的果实，精致的纹理，生动的酸度和长长的香气尾。这个酒是尼古拉·奥德伯特和他的团队的杰作。

Chinese pairs.original: 2019年份的玛歌像是一幅墨色匀称而又韵味十足的山水画，在我心中，她就是我2019年份的“国色天香”，代表了玛歌产区的巅峰之作。酒体如珍珠般的细嫩，感觉每个毛孔都散发着高洁之气。丰富的香料是那么的精致平和，在隐形的单宁结构背后静静地萦绕。收尾时那股绵密质感好像奶酪在口中融化，如此醇厚丰富而又清新脱俗的美酒怎能让人不动容？这哪里是葡萄酒，简直就是顶级艺术品的化身。
Chinese pairs.new: 2019年玛歌酒如一幅完美的山水画，充满韵味。它是玛歌产区的巅峰之作，代表了2019年的“国色天香”。酒体细腻如珍珠，清新而高洁。酒中丰富的香料精致平和，静静地在单宁结构的背后萦绕。酒尾的质感绵密，如奶酪在口中融化。这种醇厚丰富而又清新的美酒，怎能不让人深深感动？它简直是葡萄酒的化身，顶级艺术品。

English pairs.original: Chateau Margaux 2019 is the “National Beauty and Heavenly Fragrance” in my heart. It is like a well-proportioned and charming landscape painting, representing the masterpiece of the Margaux appellation. The refreshing berry wine flows in the glass just like the spring, tender and crystal clear. The full-bodied wine contains a wealth of details so that you can feel softer and more mellow wine through the layered fruity and aromas. Knowing that it only contains 10% of the Merlot, I felt surprised, I didn’t expect that 90% Cabernet Sauvignon blends could be so pure and mild.
English pairs.new: 夏娃玛格诺 2019 年是我的心中“国色天香”。它就像一幅完美比例的风景画，代表了玛格诺产区的杰作。酒液在玻璃中流动如春天般清新，晶莹透明。酒体丰富，细节丰富，让你感受到柔和的口感和层次丰富的果香和香气。知道它只含有 10% 的梅洛，我感到惊讶，没想到 90% 的卡波涅尔萨万能葡萄酒可以如此纯粹和温和。

Western reviews.review: Amazing aromas of crushed stones and wet soil with fresh mushrooms, then going on to violets and other flowers. Dark fruit, too. Full-bodied, yet agile and fine, with a linear flow of tannins that run through the center of palate. The finesse of the tannins is exceptional, like raw silk and changing all the time. Cool and energetic, yet reserved. Zen-like. 37% of the production and 90% cabernet sauvignon, 7% merlot, 2% cabernet franc and 1% petit verdot.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的芳香令人惊艳，带有石头和潮湿土壤的味道，伴随着新鲜蘑菇的气息，然后是紫罗兰和其他花朵的香味。还有一种浓郁的黑果味。口感丰富却又轻盈细致，纤维线条流动顺畅，通过整个口腔。纤维的质感出色，像未经加工的丝绸一样，变化多端。口感清凉活泼却又谦逊。这种感觉像是在冥想一样。该酒的产量中有37%，主要是90%的卡波涅尔·索维涅，7%的梅洛，2%的卡波涅尔·法兰克和1%的佩蒂·维多。

Western reviews.review: Another utterly heavenly wine from this estate is the 2019 Château Margaux, a blend of 90% Cabernet Sauvignon, 7% Merlot, 2% Cabernet Franc, and 1% Petit Verdot coming from a selection of just 37% of the total production. Deep purple, with an incredible array of ripe currants, blueberries, sweet tobacco, sandalwood, and toasted spices, it hits the palate with medium to full-bodied richness, a seamless, powerful, yet incredibly sexy mouthfeel, polished tannins, and a great, great finish.
