Western reviews.translation: 这瓶2019年夏多布里昂酒庄的红酒是绝对的天籁之音。它的酒精含量为90%卡波弗雷蒙，7%梅洛，2%卡波弗朗，1%佩特·维多。酒庄仅从总产量的37%中选择了最好的葡萄来酿造这瓶酒。酒色深紫，口感丰富，带有成熟的黑currant、蓝莓、甜烟草、檀木和烤香料的复杂气味。酒体中等到中等以上，口感滑顺，强劲而性感，纤维细腻，尾部长长。

Western reviews.review: Is the 2019 Château Margaux the wine of the vintage? A strong case in its favor could certainly be made. Soaring from the glass with aromas of blackberries, raspberries, rose petals, violets, pencil shavings and vine smoke, it's full-bodied, layered and sensual, with a strikingly vibrant core of fruit that's framed by ripe, powdery tannins and bright acids, concluding with a penetrating, mouthwateringly saline finish of almost interminable duration. Complex, elegant and utterly compelling, this is a brilliant Bordeaux that anyone with the requisite disposable income is going to want to own. Best after 2029.
Western reviews.translation: 2019年夏多布里昂（Château Margaux）是否是当年最好的红酒？确实可以为它辩护。从玻璃中升起的黑莓、红莓、玫瑰花瓣、紫罗兰、铅笔削片和烟草烟气的芳香，让人难以抗拒。它是全口感的、层次丰富的、令人愉悦的，果肉的核心充满生机，柔软的粉末状橡胶和清晰的酸性构成了框架，结尾是几乎无止境的、令人垂涎的、带有明显海盐味的口感。复杂、优雅、极具吸引力，这是任何有能力购买的人都想拥有的出色的波尔多红酒。建议在2029年后品尝。

Western reviews.review: This wine, packed with Cabernet Sauvignon, is dense but shows a majestic structure. By contrast and equally stunning, it has such perfumed fruits that are poised between power and elegance. The balance of this magnificent wine is there, bringing together black currant fruit and rich, sumptuous tannins. There is amazing aging potential here.Barrel Sample: 98-100
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒以卡波涅尔（Cabernet Sauvignon）为主，浓密但结构优雅。与此相比，酒中有着令人惊艳的芳香果味，既有力量又有典雅。这种美酒的平衡是显著的，黑currant果味与丰富的绵软橡皮味相结合。酒中有着惊人的陈化潜力。酒桶样品：98-100分。

Western reviews.review: This expands sideways, vertically and downwards, with a creamy mid palate and a rose petal, peony, raspberry and cassis collision on the nose. This is chewy in its tannic structure, full on and yet delicate and sappy. Fresh, elegant, perfumed and concentrated - clearly will age for decades. This is close in character to the 2009 or 2015, two exceptional vintages at Margaux and classic to the graceful yet concentrated signature of the property. 1% Petit Verdot to complete the blend, 100% new oak although barely discernible already. 37% of overall production in the 1st wine this year.Barrel Sample: 98
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒展现出横向、纵向和下沉的特点，口感丰富而且奶油般的中口，鼻子上则是玫瑰花瓣、牡丹花、草莓和黑加思（一种黑色水果）混合的香气。这种红酒的口感坚实而且充满纽扣感，尽管如此仍然细腻且有余韵。这种红酒新鲜、优雅、芬芳且浓缩，显然会在几十年内逐渐成熟。这种红酒的风格与2009年和2015年的两款杰出年份相似，都是马尔加克酒庄的经典代表，具有优雅而浓缩的特征。完成这款红酒的配方中，仅有1%的佩蒂·维多（一种红酒品种），并且使用了100%的新橡木桶，尽管已经很难察觉到。今年这款红酒的产量中，占了37%。酒评人评分：98分。

Chinese pairs.original: 2018是玛歌近几个年里香气表现最为生动鲜活的一个年份，轻轻摇一下酒杯就能立刻感受到层次丰富的樱桃、杨梅以及话梅糖的香甜气息。然而如此芬芳的香气却以一种欲言又止的方式来呈现，在我看来，这就是玛歌在“奔放”年份（年代）固守的那份“矜持”。精准控制的酒精在入口的一瞬间就能够把所有风味细节推上高潮，伴随着极为特别的干墨气息在口中流淌，回甘之长有种“余音缭绕”的感觉。试想，如此血统纯正而又精美绝伦的玛歌不知道要迷倒多少爱酒之人。
Chinese pairs.new: 2018年是玛歌近年来最为出色的年份之一，轻轻摇动酒杯，立刻就能感受到层次丰富的樱桃、杨梅和梅子糖的香甜气息。然而，这种芬芳的香气却以一种欲言又止的方式呈现，似乎是玛歌在“奔放”年份中保持的矜持。酒精精准控制，入口瞬间就能把所有风味细节推向高潮，伴随着极为特别的干墨气息在口中流淌，回甘之长有种“余音缭绕”的感觉。想象一下，这样血统纯正又精美绝伦的玛歌会迷倒多少爱酒之人。

English pairs.original: Once you swirl the glass, the nose sends out multi-layered cherry, waxberry, and salty dried plum. However, all of these materials are expressed in a “self-control” manner, slowly and gently. From my point of view, it is the low-key DNA that Margaux is trying to play in a hot vintage. Well-controlled alcohol sublimates all of the details once it touches my tastebud, lingering with unique black ink powder towards the never-ending finish. I can’t imagine how many wine lovers will fall in love with its pedigree Margaux.
English pairs.new: 一旦你在杯子里翻动红酒，鼻子就会释放出层次丰富的樱桃、蜂蜜柿子和咸干枣的香气。然而，这些材料的表达都是在“自我控制”的状态下，缓慢而温柔地释放出来。从我的角度来看，这是马格努（Margaux）在炎热的葡萄成熟季节中试图展现的低调基因。酒精的控制使得所有细节在舌尖上升华，留下独特的黑色墨水般的余味，直到永无止境的尾部。 我无法想象有多少酒爱好者会为其优雅的马格努血统而倾倒。

Western reviews.review: So much ash, tobacco and earth to the bright blackberry and currant aromas. Flowers too. Fresh. Full-bodied with seamless tannins that spread across your palate and caress every square centimeter. It’s shows loads of ripe-berry, cherry, currant and chocolate character, as well as walnut and light cedar. Then the finish goes on for minutes. Extremely refined and elegant, despite the structure. 90% cabernet sauvignon, 4% cabernet franc, 4% merlot and 2% petit verdot. A joy to taste, but drink after 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中充满了烟草、土壤和黑莓、蓝莓的气息，伴有花朵的芬芳，非常新鲜。口感丰富，细腻的橡皮质纤维在口中流动，细致地抚摸每一寸口腔。酒中展现出成熟黑莓、樱桃、蓝莓和巧克力的特征，以及核桃和轻微的红木的味道。酒尾延续了数分钟。酒的结构非常精致和优雅，尽管如此，酒仍然非常完美。酒的成分为90%卡波雷尔·索维涅，4%卡波雷尔·法兰克，4%梅洛，2%小皮诺。品酒非常愉快，但建议在2025年后饮用。

Western reviews.review: The 2018 Château Margaux is composed of 90% Cabernet Sauvignon, 4% Merlot, 4% Cabernet Franc and 2% Petit Verdot, representing 36% of the crop this year. The wine has a pH of 3.8 and 14% alcohol. Deep purple-black in color, it slowly unfurls to reveal tantalizing scents of crème de cassis, wild blueberries and Black Forest cake with hints of redcurrant jelly, rose oil, dark chocolate and cedar chest plus a touch of star anise. The medium to full-bodied palate bursts with opulent black fruit, fragrant earth and floral layers, supported by a rock-solid structure of exquisitely ripe, finely grained tannins and seamless backbone of freshness, finishing with fantastic length. This is classic Margaux at its most seductive, although it is, rather amazingly, approachable and absolutely delicious right now. But, to enjoy its full glory, you will want to cellar it for at least 6-8 years and then watch it metamorphize over the next 40+ years.
Western reviews.translation: 2018年夏娃玛格奥克酒庄的酒款由90%卡波内尔·沙夫诺、4%梅洛、4%卡波内尔·法兰克和2%佩蒂·维多特组成，占今年酒庄产量的36%。酒款的pH值为3.8，酒精含量为14%。酒款呈深紫黑色，缓慢展开，释放出浓郁的黑加拿大干果、野蓝莓和黑森林蛋糕的香气，伴有红果酱、玫瑰油、黑巧克力和松木箱的微妙气息，最后带有一丝五味子。酒款的口感中等到中厚，爆发着丰富的黑果、幽香的土壤和花朵的层次，受到精致成熟的、细致的纤维和完美的新鲜度的支撑，酒款以出色的长度结束。这是玛格奥克酒庄最迷人的典范，但令人惊讶的是，它现在就可以享用，而且非常美味。但是，如果你想体验到它的全部辉煌，你需要将其贮存至少6-8年，然后在接下来的40多年中观察它的变化。

Western reviews.review: Based on 90% Cabernet Sauvignon, 4% each of Merlot and Cabernet Franc, and 2% Petit Verdot, the 2018 Château Margaux is a magical, incredibly sexy expression of this Château that sports a dense purple color as well as a thrilling bouquet of blueberries, cassis, acacia flowers, scorched earth, sandalwood, and violets. Incredibly concentrated and full-bodied on the palate, it nevertheless has an almost Burgundian sense of finesse and elegance, with an ethereal texture, silky yet massive amounts of tannin's, notable freshness, and brilliant length. The alcohol hit a whopping 14%, which is high by this estate's standards, but everything is flawlessly integrated, the balance is perfect, and I certainly can't find anything that could be better. This 2018 is going to be relatively drinkable at an early age (do your best to hide bottles for 7-8 years) yet last for 75+.
Western reviews.translation: 2018年夏多布里昂酒庄的葡萄酒以90%卡波弗雷蒙，4%每种梅洛和卡波弗雷蒙，2%佩蒂·韦多特为主。这种葡萄酒呈现出浓密的紫色，气味中充满了蓝berries、黑加仑、紫罗兰花、焦土、沉香木和紫丁香的芬芳。口感浓郁、体积大，然而仍然具有近乎勃艮第风格的细腻和优雅，具有神秘的质地、丝滑的质感、巨大的纽斯、出色的新鲜度和出色的持久度。酒精含量高达14%，这是该庄园的标准之上，但所有成分都完美融合，平衡完美，我找不到任何可以改进的地方。这一瓶2018年夏多布里昂酒庄葡萄酒将在较早的年龄就可以饮用（尽量将瓶子藏起来7-8年），但也可以长时间保存（75年以上）。

Western reviews.review: This is extremely powerful, with high tannin levels that are beautifully velvety and a real presence that is going to need a good 15 years before it softens. There are layers and layers of subtlety here, charcoal, earth, fresh acidity - a ton of serious character that needs time to inch towards opening. Grips on like a limpet - this needs a good half an hour in the glass to even begin to open, but as it does so you see clearly the finesse and precision of the fruit construction. Exceptionally good. 3.64pH, 2% Petit Verdot completes the blend, 36% of the harvest in the first wine. Bottled mid-September. Drinking Window 2030 - 2050
Western reviews.translation: 这是一款极具力量的红酒，具有高的苦味物质水平，质地细腻柔和，具有强烈的存在感，需要至少15年才能软化。酒中有着层次丰富的细微之处，包括焦炭、泥土、清新酸度等，具有深刻的个性，需要时间才能逐渐展现。酒的味道像海蛤一样牢固地附着在舌头上，需要在杯子里放置半小时以上才能开始展开，但当它展开时，你才能看到酒中果肉的精细和精确的构造。酒的品质极高。酒的pH值为3.64，2%的佩蒂·维多特葡萄酒完成了酒的混合，酒中36%的收获用于第一瓶。酒瓶于9月中旬装瓶。推荐饮用时间：2030-2050年。

Western reviews.review: While this wine reflects the richness and density of the vintage, it also shows all the elegance of which a great Margaux is capable. The wine is powerful and beautifully structured, both ripe and restrained. It will age magnificently. Start to think about drinking from 2028. Cellar Selection
Western reviews.translation: 这个红酒体现了当年的丰富和浓密，但也展现了出色的马格努（Margaux）酒的典雅。酒精强劲而结构优美，既成熟又克制。它将会在陈化过程中表现出极大的潜力。考虑到从2028年开始饮用。 cellar selection。

Chinese pairs.original: 这个年份的滴金拥有你想要的一切。如果一生只能品尝一次滴金，那2009年必须是首选。无论是贵腐菌的沾染程度、葡萄的糖分、宝贵的酸度，还是味道的复杂度，2009年份都是史诗级的，能够把这么多元素在同一个年份中集中展现出来，不仅是人类智慧的结晶，更是上天的馈赠。在这里我不想描述滴金2009的香气和味道，因为这场盛大空前的香气和味蕾盛宴一页纸根本不够写。我想给所有热爱贵腐、热爱甜酒的消费者留下一个想象空间，当你人生中有幸举起2009年份的滴金时，请你用心感受它的“小夜曲”、它的“欢乐颂”，亦或是它金蛇狂舞般的“狂想曲”。
Chinese pairs.new: This vintage of Opus One has it all. If you only get to taste Opus One once in a lifetime, 2009 must be the choice. Whether it's the level of botrytis, the sugar levels of the grapes, the precious acidity, or the complexity of the flavors, 2009 is epic, capable of bringing together so many elements in one vintage, not just a human achievement, but a gift from heaven. I don't want to describe the aromas and flavors of Opus One 2009, because this grand, unprecedented aroma and palate feast can't be captured in a single page. I want to leave a space for all the lovers of botrytis and sweet wine to imagine, when you're lucky enough to hold Opus One 2009 in your life, please savor its "Nocturne", its "Hymn to Joy", or its "Rhapsody in Gold".

English pairs.original: This vintage grants you everything you want. If one could only taste Chateau d’Yquem for only one time in his or her life, 2009 must be the first choice. Whether viewing from the contamination level of botrytis, the sugar content of grapes, the precious acidity, or its flavors’ complexity, Yquem 2009 can be ranked as an epic. It must be the fruit of human wisdom as well as the gift of God to combine all these elements in the same vintage. I would not bother to describe the aroma and taste of Yquem 2009 here, for it is beyond my competence to portray this unprecedentedly grand banquet on a page. Let’s leave the space for all of “Nectar’s” lovers. If you have the privilege to drink a glass of Chateau d’Yquem 2009, carefully savor the “serenade”, the “Ode to Joy” or the wild “rhapsody” it plays on your palates.
English pairs.new: 这瓶酒给了你想要的一切。如果你只有一次机会品尝香格里拉酒庄的酒，那么2009年一定是你的首选。无论从霉菌感染的程度、葡萄的糖含量、酸度的珍贵性还是其风味的复杂性来看，Yquem 2009都可以被认为是史诗般的。它一定是人类智慧的结晶，也是上帝的礼物，能够将所有这些元素融合在同一瓶酒中。 我不想在这里描述Yquem 2009的香气和口感，因为这超出了我的能力来在纸上描绘这场前所未有的盛宴。让我们留出空间给所有“蜜酒”的爱好者。如果你有幸品尝到香格里拉酒庄2009年的酒，那么请细细品味它的“序曲”、“欢乐颂”或是它在你的味蕾上演奏的“狂想曲”。

Western reviews.review: Young, rich, opulent, silky, fresh, vibrant, full, and deep, with enough blazing acidity to allow all the layers of vanilla and honey-coated orange and yellow tropical fruits to bathe your palate again and again with this stunning, sweet treat. OK, so this is still obviously young, and primary, but it is such a delicious experience now, that it was impossible to put my glass down. Patience might be a virtue. But there are times when patience is over rated.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感丰富多彩，具有年轻、富有、滑顺、清新、生动、饱满和深度的特征。它的强烈酸度使得所有的香气，如香草和蜂蜜浸泡的橙黄色热带水果，能够不断地在你的口中流动。虽然这瓶红酒仍然显得年轻和初级，但它的口感如此美味，令我无法放下杯子。耐心可能是一种美德，但有时耐心被低估了。

Western reviews.review: Leuchtendes mittleres Goldgelb, silberfarbene Reflexe. Frische Orangenblüten, ein Hauch von Bourbonvanille, frische Marille, ein Touch von Grapefruitzesten, floraler, ungemein facettenreicher Duft. Saftig, elegant, cremige Textur, reife Ananas und gelber Pfirsich, fein eingebundene Holznuancen, zartes Karamell im Abgang, verfügt über gute Frische. Bereits antrinkbar.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一瓶美酒的评论。以下是翻译成中文：

闪亮的中等金黄色，银色反光。新鲜的橙花香，布朗威士忌香味的微妙，新鲜的杏仁，柑橘的薄荷味，花香，极其复杂的香味。口感丰富，优雅，奶油般的质地，成熟的菠萝和黄桃，精心调和的木质细节，轻微的糖浆在尾部，具有良好的新鲜感。已经可以饮用。

Western reviews.review: 98-100 Barrel sample. The aromas are so rich and powerful, with great ripe apricots. There are honey, spice and beautiful sweet spiced pears. This is an extraordinary wine in an extraordinary year in Sauternes.
Western reviews.translation: 98-100 桶样品。酒香极其丰富和强烈，带有成熟的杏子气味。还可以闻到蜂蜜、香料和美味的甜香料梨。这个酒是萨涅斯(Sauternes)这个特殊年份的奇迹之作。

Chinese pairs.original: 散发着阵阵扑鼻而来的樱桃派和浓郁烤面包味的味道。入口酒体紧凑，回味中长。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of cherry pie and rich toasted bread waft through the senses. The palate is compact and full-bodied, with a lingering finish.

Western reviews.review: Typically herbal but ripe with bay leaf notes, spice and plenty of cassis notes. The palate is super smooth and pleasantly ripe and round. It is very easy to drink and frankly sip for a cabernet. A real success for the price and would be perfect with grilled burgers, flank steak or roast beef. Bravo effort here. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 典型的草药味，但带有樟叶、香料和黑加仑果酱的成熟味道。口感非常滑顺，圆润，令人愉悦。非常容易饮用，甚至可以直接品尝。考虑到价格，这是一次成功的尝试。它与烤汉堡、牛排或牛排 flank steak 配对非常完美。值得称赞。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有黑莓，黑醋栗，李子和香草的香气，入口圆润，果味爽口，结构平衡，回味较长且有浆果味。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of blackberry, black cherry, plum, and subtle hints of vanilla. The palate is smooth and fruity, with a balanced structure and a lingering finish featuring notes of plum.

Western reviews.review: The opening boasts fresh red-berry aromas and prickle. Feels racy and energetic, with zesty red-cherry and red-plum flavors. Edgy, jumpy and mostly harmonious, but more tangy than deep, rich or complex.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的开头带有新鲜的红果香气和微微的刺激感。口感轻快、充满活力，带有柠檬味的红樱桃和红李子风味。虽然整体上比较和谐，但这款红酒的味道比较鲜明，带有明显的酸度，缺乏深度和丰富感。

Robert Mondavi Winery Private Selection.name: Robert Mondavi Winery Private Selection Cabernet Sauvignon 2008

Chinese pairs.original: 散发出诱人的黑色樱桃、浆果的果香和巧克力的香味。单宁柔软、十分完整且美味的橡木味。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of alluring black cherry, plum, and chocolate waft through the senses. Soft tannins, complete and delicious oak flavors.

Western reviews.review: Leafy, tobacco, roasted bell pepper, compost, cassis aromas. Round, supple, fresh, slightly sweet palate with cassis, prune, peppery, leafy, cedar, tobacco, herbal flavours. A surprisingly green style for California. (Anthony Gismondi).
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中带有叶子、烟草、烤红椒、堆肥和黑加斯的味道。口感圆润、柔滑、清新、略带甜度，带有黑加斯、李子、辣椒、叶子、红木、烟草和草药的味道。它的风格在加州来说相当出乎意料地绿色。

Chinese pairs.original: 紫色边缘的深石榴红色，丰富的李子、黑醋栗和甘草的辛辣香味。柔滑的质地和丰富的口感，深色水果的风味。余味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Deep plum red with purple edges, rich flavors of plum, blackberry, and licorice, with a hint of sweetness. Smooth texture and full-bodied taste, with a deep fruit flavor that lingers.

Western reviews.review: Lifted cedar and pine notes interspersed with appealing woodsy scents give way to a surprisingly intense palate that shows some nice peppery notes but ultimately falls short on the finish. Nearly imperceptible tannins suggest early consumption.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中充满了松柏和松木的气息，令人愉悦的森林香气弥漫其中。然而，口感却意外地强烈，带有些许辣椒味，但最终在口感上却略显不足。几乎不可察觉的苦味素意味着应该尽早饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 典型梅洛的黑色水果香气，入口顺畅，单宁成熟，含有樱桃味，简单易饮。
Chinese pairs.new: Typical Merlot flavors of black fruit, smooth entry, mature tannins, with hints of cherry, easy to drink.

Western reviews.review: Wild berry aromas come with a cool hint of herbal mint. This is full, grabby and solid in the mouth. Flavors of dark fruits come across lightly stewed and pruny, while the finish dishes up a final taste of prune and foresty notes.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有野生莓果的香气，伴有清凉的薄荷草味。口感丰富、抓人心弦、坚实。口感中黑果的味道轻微烹饪，带有浆果味。最后的余味是浆果和森林的味道。

Chinese pairs.original: 具有革质，绿叶，草药的气息。口感紧多汁，高酸，具有红色浆果和胡椒，温和的草药味道。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine has a leathery, herbaceous, and grassy aroma. The palate is tight and juicy, with high acidity, flavors of red fruit and pepper, and a subtle herbal note.

Western reviews.review: Starts out mildly murky and leafy, with a leathery, dry nose. The palate is herbal, tight and juicy due to a high acid level, with red berry and peppery, mildly herbal flavors. A good, average wine with oak showing up on the finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感开始时略微混浊，带有叶子和干草的气味。口感清新、紧致、有酸度，带有红果和辣椒、微微的草药味。酒尾有橡木的味道。

Chinese pairs.original: 野浆果蜜饯、无花果和李子皮的气味，余味中带有少许香料、紫罗兰和石墨气息。
Chinese pairs.new: Notes of wild plum jam, quince, and plum skin, with a hint of spice, lavender, and graphite lingering in the finish.

Western reviews.review: Crios spends 9 months in a 50/50 mix of French and American oak giving the 95/5 mix of malbec and bonarda from Luján de Cuyo, Tunuyán and San Carlos (all above 1100 metres) a smooth, glossy attack. You will love its aromatic floral/violet, black fruit notes on the nose. The palate is a sweet and savoury mix of black fruit, spice in balanced measured way. Grilled beef and or chicken all work here. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 克里奥斯（Crios）在法国和美国橡木中储存9个月，给来自卢贾恩德库约（Luján de Cuyo）、图努亚南（Tunuyán）和圣卡洛斯（San Carlos）的95/5混合马尔贝克和博纳达的葡萄酒（所有产区海拔超过1100米）带来光滑、光泽的入口。您会喜欢它的鼻子上的花香/紫罗兰、黑果的香气。口感是黑果、香料的甜和咸的平衡混合。烤牛肉或鸡都适合这里。 (安东尼·吉斯蒙迪和斯图尔特·托比)

Chinese pairs.original: 开瓶为红樱桃香气，经橡木桶呈现出的香草和雪松非常可人，酒体轻盈、单宁柔顺。
Chinese pairs.new: The wine opens with aromas of cherry blossoms, followed by charming notes of lavender and pine from oak aging. The palate is light-bodied with smooth tannins.

Western reviews.review: Another solid follow up here. Spicy, black cherry, orange, leather, floral aromas with a slightly smoky, dried herb scent. Dry, round, fresh, supple but tight palate. Cherry jam, orange peel, tobacco, peppery, cranberry, leather, licorice and coffee flavours with a hint of dill and roast meat. Good fruit and balance for food. Solid, newer style Crianza without big oak. Well done. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的表现很稳固。酒中有辣椒、黑樱桃、橙子、皮革、花香等气味，伴有轻微的烟熏和干燥草本植物的香气。口感干净、圆润、新鲜、柔软但紧致。口味中有樱桃酱、橙子皮、烟草、辣椒、蔓越莓、皮革、甘草和咖啡等，伴有薄荷和烤肉的味道。酒中有很好的果味和平衡，适合与食物搭配。这种新型的克里安萨（Crianza）红酒没有过多的橡木味，表现出色。

Western reviews.review: Earthy and briary aromas lack fruit except for a pinch of cherry. The palate is tight and choppy, with herbal, oaky flavors that again show little to no fruit. Dry and lightly toasted on the finish, which is tangy.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的气味带有泥土和荆棘的味道，几乎没有水果的香气，只有微微的樱桃味。口感紧绷且不平滑，具有草药和橡木的味道，同样几乎没有水果的味道。干燥且轻微焦糖的口感，尾部略带酸味。

Chinese pairs.original: 成熟黑樱桃、薄荷和甜美的橡木芳香，光滑如丝的单宁，馥郁的黑浆果、黑醋栗口味和若隐若现，与辛辣香兰橡木口味相辅相成，回味无穷。
Chinese pairs.new: Ripe black cherry, mint, and sweet oak aromas, silky smooth tannins, luscious black fruit and black walnut flavors that unfold with hints of spicy sandalwood oak, complementing each other in a never-ending finish.

Western reviews.review: Menthol, black olive, herbal, coffee, rooty, earthy, resin aromas. Dry, somewhat tart, astringent entry with coffee, black olive, resin, savoury, resin, leaf compost, minty, soupy cherry flavours with a sweet chocolate finish. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中包含了薄荷、黑橄榄、草本、咖啡、根状、泥土、树脂等元素。口感干净、略带苦涩、略带干涩，入口时有咖啡、黑橄榄、树脂、咸味、树脂、叶子堆肥、薄荷、浓稠的樱桃等味道，最后以甜巧克力味结束。

Western reviews.review: A sweetly ripe amalgam of cassis, vanilla and cedar, this medium-bodied Cabernet is pleasant enough, if a little lacking in distinctiveness. It turns faintly dusty on the finish, making it suited to pair with burgers or steak.
Western reviews.translation: 这款中等体积的卡贝网酒（Cabernet）是一种甜美的浓郁混合体，带有黑currant、香草和红木的风味。虽然它的口感不错，但略显缺乏独特性。酒尾略带干涩，适合与汉堡或牛排搭配。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有樱桃、李子、胡椒等的香气，酒体厚重，带有辛辣气息，与黑色水果的果香完美的融合，口感饱满、层次丰富，回味持久。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of cherry, plum, and pepper, with a full-bodied texture and a spicy kick, perfectly balanced with dark fruit flavors. The palate is rich and complex, with a long, lingering finish.

Western reviews.review: Starts with peppery, leafy aromas that morph toward dry and earthy. The palate, like with all of Torres' basic '07 wines, is crisp and acidic, which brings tang to the wine's red cherry and plum flavors. Spicy, peppery and fresh on the finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气以辣椒、叶绿的味道开头，逐渐转变为干燥、土壤的味道。口感清爽、酸度高，带有红樱桃和浆果的味道。酒尾带有辣椒、辣味和新鲜的味道。

Western reviews.review: Slightly reductive, screwcap nose that blows off after about 10 minutes. Expect a soft, juicy style red with earthy, spicy black fruit flavours and dash of orange peel. Simple but solid red for those rustic winter stews, hamburgers and mushroom dishes. Good value. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的气味略微有些减少，螺丝盖的鼻子在大约10分钟后就会消失。预计这是一种软绵、水果味浓郁的红酒，带有泥土、辣椒的黑果味和橙皮的味道。适合那些喜欢土气冬季汤、汉堡和蘑菇菜肴的人。价格合理。 (安东尼·吉斯蒙迪和斯图尔特·托比)

Chinese pairs.original: 带有烧焦的香料，甘草，石楠木，樱桃和李子的香气，单宁丝滑，余味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Smoky spices, licorice, heather, cherry, and plum aromas, silky tannins, and a long finish.

Western reviews.review: Spiced meat, chocolate and brambly berry notes lead the bouquet of this wine and follow through to the medium-weight palate. It's juicy, with a short finish and easy structure. Drink now.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中带有肉类调味品、巧克力和浓郁的黑莓果香。口感中等，口感丰富，带有果香，口感短暂，结构轻松。建议立即饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 散发着烟草，黑加仑，咖啡和烤李子味道，回味像淡淡的糖浆，单宁强劲。
Chinese pairs.new: Smoky, blackcurrant, coffee, and caramelized plum notes, with a lingering finish of subtle sweetness and robust tannins.

Western reviews.review: Classic cabernet nose with bits of black fruit, green pepper, leaf and cassis aromas. The attack is fresh and clean with medium weight tannins and spicy floral fruit and more spicy red liquorice notes in the finish. The blend is traditionally an 85/15 cabernet sauvignon and tempranillo mix that is all estate grown. This needs another three to five years in bottle or serves now with your favourite cut of steak. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气典型地具有黑果、青椒、叶子和黑加思（cassis）等特征。口感清新、干净，中等重量的苦味和带有花香和辣椒味的果味，以及在尾部的辣椒味和红甘草味。该酒的混合比例传统上是85%的卡布ernet·索维涅和15%的特曼尼奥，全部来自酒庄的葡萄。酒需要在瓶子里再过三年到五年才能达到最佳状态，或者可以现在与您喜爱的牛排一起享用。（安东尼·吉斯蒙迪和斯图尔特·托比）

Western reviews.review: Notes of baked-berry, herb and savory spice come together well on the bouquet. It feels chunky and round but lively, with plum and cassis flavors that carry an herbal, tomatoey shading. This is fresh and herbal enough so that you know it's Old World.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中融合了烘烤的浆果、香草和调味料的味道。口感厚实圆润但又充满活力，带有浆果和黑加思的风味，伴有草药和西红柿的余味。这款红酒的新鲜和草药味道让人知道它是欧洲风格的。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有蓝莓，覆盆子，香料和热石的香气，中等至浓郁，单宁饱满，新鲜多汁。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of blueberry, blackberry, spice, and warm stone, medium to full-bodied, with full tannins and fresh, juicy flavors.

Western reviews.review: A touch foxy and reduced on the nose, with jumpy berry aromas, this feels edgy and shows a grating tannic bite. The wine's plum, herb and candied berry flavors are solid, finishing with a dose of blueberry.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的鼻子上有轻微的浓缩和草味，气味跳跃且带有浓郁的浆果香气，感觉有些刺激，口感略带苦涩。酒中的浆果、草药和糖化浆果味道都比较稳定，尾部带有蓝莓的余味。

Chinese pairs.original: 清爽、刺激的香气，口感紧致、尖锐，带有红李子、香料、樱桃风味。它多汁、清爽、活泼、轻快。余味掠过，唇齿留香。
Chinese pairs.new: Crisp and stimulating aromas, a tight and sharp texture, with flavors of cherry, spice, and tart cherry. It's juicy, refreshing, lively, and light. The finish lingers, leaving a pleasant aftertaste.

Western reviews.review: A bit minty and sharp on the bouquet, with a tight, angular palate featuring red plum, spice and cherry flavors. Juicy, bright, active and zesty, with some scour to the finish. Gets better as it breathes.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中带有薄荷的味道，略带刺激感。口感紧致，呈现出红杏、香料和樱桃的风味。口感鲜美、清新、活跃，带有轻微的苦味。随着时间的推移，口感会越来越好。

Western reviews.review: A steady red if ever there was one at this price point. A touch reduced on opening so be sure to splash decant and get some air on the wine. The attack is pretty with smoky, black cherry jam and savoury aromas with dried herbs, black cherry, liquorice, caraway flavours. A well-made red that will excel with most simply preferred foods. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 这个价格点下的稳定红酒。开瓶时有轻微的减少，确保将酒倒入分酒器中并让酒与空气接触。酒的攻击性不错，带有烟熏、黑樱桃果酱和干香草、黑樱桃、 licorice 和 caraway 等香气和味道。制作得很好，这款红酒适合大多数人喜爱的简单食物。

Robert Mondavi Winery Napa Valley Merlot.name: Robert Mondavi Winery Napa Valley Merlot 2010

Chinese pairs.original: 成熟水果，黑樱桃、烤药草和咖啡的味道为主，单宁细致柔软，口感柔滑。
Chinese pairs.new: Ripe fruit, black cherry, smoky herbs, and coffee flavors dominate, with refined and silky tannins.

Western reviews.review: This pleasant Merlot is a little tough and gritty, but it's rich and candied in blackberry and cherry, roasted almond and vanilla flavors. Give it some time to breathe in the glass.
Western reviews.translation: 这款美味的梅洛酒有一点坚韧和粗糙，但它富有黑莓和樱桃的糖果味，烤杏仁和香草味。让它在杯子里呼吸一会儿。

Chinese pairs.original: 雪松的香味，潮湿的泥土，草药，香料，以及蓝色的水果，伴随着淡淡的巧克力味柔顺复杂，具有良好的平衡和适中的长度。
Chinese pairs.new: The scent of pine, damp earth, herbs, spices, and blue fruits, accompanied by a subtle chocolate note, smooth and complex, with good balance and moderate length.

Western reviews.review: Dark and a touch baked, with blackberry and spice aromas along with carob and creamy oak. Feels solid, saturated and healthy, with weight and herbal dark-berry flavors. Warm and scratchy on the finish, with length and depth.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色深暗，带有烘烤的味道，气味中有黑莓、香料、可可和奶油橡木的香气。口感厚实饱满，带有健康的感觉，口感中有重量和草药般的黑莓味。完美的结尾，带有暖意和粗糙感，持久且深刻。

Chinese pairs.original: 清新的水果清香夹杂着巧克力、胡椒、熏烤橡木味，酒体带有丰富的莓果味，天鹅绒般平滑的丹宁。
Chinese pairs.new: Crisp fruit aromas, intertwined with notes of chocolate, pepper, and smoky oak, complemented by rich berry flavors and a silky, smooth tannin.

Western reviews.review: Forceful on the nose, with herbal, saucy, rubbery aromas. It's weighty in the mouth, with blackberry, herbal tomato and dry spice flavors. Feels pretty good on the finish, which comes with a lasting herbal accent. A little grating but solid enough.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的鼻子很强烈，带有草药、酱汁、橡胶的香气。口感重，口味有黑莓、草药番茄和干香料。尾部感觉还不错，留有持久的草药味。虽然有一点刺激，但整体来说还是不错的。

Chinese pairs.original: 香料盒、李子、蓝莓及薰衣草的香味，随之而来的是丰富且甘甜的果香，并伴有层次丰富且浓缩度极高的风味。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromatic notes of spice box, plum, blueberry, and lavender give way to rich and luscious fruit flavors, accompanied by complex and intensely concentrated nuances.

Western reviews.review: Dusty fruit and chemical/plastic aromas are a little off-putting. This feels tight and shows moderate snappy tartaric acid. Flavors of mint, herbs and spiced plum are fair for the variety but green.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的气味有些不太舒服，带有干果和塑化物的味道。口感紧致，酸度适中，略带点刺激感。口味中有薄荷、香草和烤石榴的味道，虽然符合品种的特点，但略带点青涩。

Terrazas De Los Andes Cabernet Sauvignon.name: Terrazas De Los Andes Cabernet Sauvignon 2007

Chinese pairs.original: 干净的浆果和樱桃的香气，口感劲道，中等密度，具有平衡的单宁和酸度，相当不错的黑醋栗，黑莓和香料的味道，与烤面包，咖啡和胡椒末味，余味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Clean fruit and cherry aromas, full-bodied taste, medium density, balanced tannins and acidity, excellent black walnut, blackberry, and spice flavors, with notes of toasted bread, coffee, and pepper, long finish.

Western reviews.review: Standard but clean berry and cherry aromas greet you, followed by a little funk and wet dog. The palate is chewy and medium in density, with broad, balanced tannins and reasonably good cassis, blackberry and spice flavors. With toast, coffee and pepper late, it finishes in stride.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中有典型的浆果和樱桃味道，伴随着一些特殊的气味和湿狗味。口感丰富，中等密度，口感平衡，具有典型的黑樱桃、黑莓和香料味道。酒尾带有 Toast、咖啡和胡椒的味道，完美收尾。

Chinese pairs.original: 新鲜的覆盆子香气、新鲜的酸度，温和的单宁，圆融的口感，活力四射的一款酒。
Chinese pairs.new: Fresh blueberry aromas, crisp acidity, gentle tannins, smooth texture, and a lively finish.

Western reviews.review: Strawberry, barnyard, compost, spicy, tobacco, carrot aromas. Round, dry, fresh, supple palate but slightly lean. Rooty, herbal, tobacco, rhubarb, strawberry, cola, and compost flavours. A simple, direct, food wine. (Anthony Gismondi).
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的气味中有浓郁的草莓、田间、堆肥、辣椒、烟草和胡萝卜的香气。口感圆润、干净、清新、柔软，但略带些瘦削。口味中有土质、草药、烟草、萝卜、草莓、可乐和堆肥的味道。是一瓶简单直接的食用红酒。

mount langi ghiran cliff edge shiraz 200.name: mount langi ghiran cliff edge shiraz 2009

Chinese pairs.original: 酒体呈现中等偏上的红宝石色泽，香气中等集中，带有烤肉、红醋栗、蓝莓、黑胡椒、泥土和少许黑樱桃、矿物及生姜气息，酒体中等，中等余韵十分柔和，带有冰凉矿物质感。
Chinese pairs.new: The wine presents a medium-plus garnet color. The aroma is medium concentrated, with notes of grilled meat, red cherry, blueberry, black pepper, earth, and subtle hints of black cherry, mineral, and ginger. The body is medium, with a very smooth and lingering finish, featuring a refreshing mineral quality.

English pairs.original: Medium ruby color, medium bouquet of roasted meat, red currant, blueberry, black pepper, earth, hint of black cherry, mineral and ginger, medium-bodied, followed by a medium smooth length with cool minerality.
English pairs.new:
颜色：深红色

香气：中等浓度，带有烤肉、红葡萄、蓝莓、黑胡椒、泥土、黑樱桃、矿物质和姜的味道

口感：中等体积，中等平滑度，带有清凉矿物质的尾韵

Western reviews.review: A great value in ready-to-drink, savory, complex Shiraz, the 2009 Cliff Edge boasts plenty of smoky, bacony notes, which add a Rhône-like edge to the blueberry and plum fruit. Black olives chime in, adding even more savory complexity, while the tannins are silky. Drink now–2020.
Western reviews.translation: 2009年克里夫边（Cliff Edge）红酒是一款值得推荐的可直接饮用的佳酿，具有浓郁的口感和复杂的风味。酒中充满了烟熏、培根的香气，赋予了蓝莓和黑桃的果味以罗讷河风格的特点。黑橄榄的加入进一步增强了酒的浓郁和复杂性，而纤维素则是细腻的。建议立即饮用至2020年。

Chinese pairs.original: 这支酒闻上去真的很像一些陈年后的波尔多酒，轻嗅酒透出砖茶叶、青椒、铅笔芯、泥土、茴香和甘草。其充满了棱角的口感至少对于我而言不是那么平衡和细致，带有些轻微的粗糙感和或许是由不一律的成熟所造成的稍许的蔬菜气味，然而那种依然咀嚼的单宁和新鲜、尖锐的酸度的确是算是一种莫大的惊喜了；深邃的回味能够很好地中和掉那些由高度残糖所带来的稍许甜味。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine has a nose that's reminiscent of an aged Bordeaux, with subtle hints of brick tea, green pepper, pencil lead, earth, anise and licorice. The full-bodied texture, at least for me, is not particularly smooth or refined, with a slightly rough edge and a hint of vegetal notes that may be due to uneven aging. However, the lingering tannins and the fresh, sharp acidity are a delightful surprise; the deep finish effectively balances out the slight sweetness brought on by the high residual sugar.

English pairs.original: This really scented like some bottles of mature Bordeaux with the noses of brick tea leaf, capsicum, pencil lead, earth, fennel and liquorice. The pointed taste at least was not very balanced and detailed for me, which had got tiny harshness and vegetal undertone might comes from the uneven ripeness, however, the chewy tannin and freshly pungent acid were actually a big surprise; its deep finish was a nice way to neutralize the slight sweetness from high residual sugar.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的香气非常浓郁，类似于成熟的波尔多葡萄酒，带有砖茶叶、辣椒、铅笔、泥土、荜拌和甘草的味道。虽然口感有些不平衡，但我还是能感觉到一些略带苦涩和植物性的底调，可能是由于成熟度不均匀所致。然而，厚实的纤维和新鲜的酸味却让我感到惊喜，它们使得这瓶红酒的深度和持久感更加出色，高余糖分的甜味也被它们所抵消。

Western reviews.review: In Cape Mentelle's typically polished and tightly wound style, this classy Margaret River Cab opens with notes of cherry chocolate, baking spice, pipe tobacco, fennel seeds and fresh eucalyptus. Fruit on the palate is clean and tart, cinched by ultrafine and incredibly taut tannins. You can see where this wine is going, but right now it's virtually closed its doors. Give this the time it needs and reap the rewards. Drink 2021–2039 and likely beyond. Christina Pickard
Western reviews.translation: 卡佩门特勒（Cape Mentelle）以典型的精致和紧绷的风格呈现，这款玛格丽特河（Margaret River）佳酿开启时带有樱桃巧克力、烘培香料、烟草烟、荜茸和新鲜桉树叶的气息。口感上的果味清新且酸甜，紧密的纤维和极细致的橡皮质感将其紧紧束缚。可以看出这款酒的方向，但现在它几乎是关闭了大门。给它需要的时间，才能享受到它的回报。建议饮用时间：2021-2039年，甚至可能更长。- Christina Pickard。

Western reviews.review: Silky and plush, this textural harmony is one of the characters that define Margaret River Cabernets. Ample cassis and plum notes are sweet and pick up savory nuances, while subtle hints of tomato leaf and red bell pepper add complexity without being distractingly vegetal. Drink now–2030.
Western reviews.translation: 这款玛格丽特河卡伯内特的口感丰富细腻，充满柔软感。浓郁的黑加仑和黑桃果味甜美，带有微妙的咸味。同时，轻微的西红柿叶和红甜椒味增添了复杂性，但不会让人感到过于草本。建议立即饮用，至2030年。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有香料、樱桃、果浆和香料的香气，口感清脆，伴着淡淡的烟熏风味，余味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of spice, cherry, fruit preserves, and aromatic notes, with a crisp palate and subtle smokiness, lingering finish.

Western reviews.review: Kaiken malbec is actually a 94/6 blend of malbec and cabernet sauvignon grown at a generous 9 tons to the hectare. Black fruits and blackberries mix with cigar/tobacco and vanilla on the nose. The attack is rich and smooth with smoky, peppery, savoury black cherry jam fruit with bits of floral/mineral notes and red liquorice underneath. A full-bodied red made for meat. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 凯肯马尔贝克红酒实际上是由94%马尔贝克和6%卡波弗里亚诺组成，产量为每公顷9吨。酒鼻中充满黑色水果和黑莓的香气，混合着烟草/烟草和香草的味道。酒口入口丰富而顺滑，带有烟熏、辣椒、咸味的黑樱桃果酱口感，伴有花香和矿物质的细微味道，以及红糖浆的底层。是一款适合搭配肉类的全口感红酒。

Chinese pairs.original: 香气紧闭，带有矿物、甜泥土和生姜香料味，且融合少许的木桶和干花特征，入口非常集中，矿物感明显，愉悦悠长的酸度一支延续到余韵。
Chinese pairs.new: The nose is tight, with mineral, sweet earth, and ginger spice notes, along with subtle oak and floral hints. The palate is very focused, with a pronounced mineral character, and a long, pleasant acidity that lingers on the finish.

English pairs.original: Tight on nose, some mineral, sweet earth and gingery spices, slight oaks and dried floral characters, the wine revealed a very intensely mineral-driven palate with persistently fantastic acidity moving into the finish.
English pairs.new: 酒 nose紧凑，带有矿物质、甜土壤和姜味调料的气息，略带橡木和干花香。酒体呈现出强烈的矿物质驱动，伴有持久的酸度，延续到尾部。

Western reviews.review: This was an interesting showing for Dry River's 2008 Pinot, which seems to be showing more structure now than when I first tasted it last November. Now it's a bit blockier than I remember it, with potent cherry-berry fruit, a bit of vanilla and an long finish that ultimately smooths out and turns silky. Try 2013–2020.
Western reviews.translation: Dry River 2008 年的红酒品尝非常有趣。与我上一次品尝时相比，现在它的结构更加明显。现在它的口感比之前更浓郁，带有强烈的樱桃和黑莓果味，伴有轻微的香草味，长而圆润的尾部最终变得 silky。建议品尝2013-2020年。

Chinese pairs.original: 黑巧克力、香料、甜泥土、姜、橙香花和矿物的香气完美融合，尽管酒液与酒渣浸渍超过一年时间，但却感觉不到丝毫的咸味，有点严肃，矿物滋味十足，称得上是典型的Dry River。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of black chocolate, spices, sweet earth, ginger, orange blossom and minerals blend perfectly together. Despite being aged for over a year, there's no hint of saltiness, a bit serious, with a pronounced mineral taste, truly characteristic of Dry River.

English pairs.original: A great mixture of black chocolate, spices, sweet earth, ginger, orange blossom and mineral, without any savoury here even it has undergone long time lees contract in barrels (one year), a little austere, very mineral-driven which probably can regarded as a symbol of ‘Dry River’.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的风格是黑巧克力、香料、甜土壤、姜、橙花和矿物质的完美结合，没有任何咸味，尽管它在桶中陈化了一年（一年的干酿），但仍然有一点严肃的味道，非常矿物质驱动，这可能被视为“Dry River”的象征。

Western reviews.review: NZ Syrahs are often called Rhône-like, but while this one does show some lovely floral and hickory-smoke nuances, it also comes across as slightly raisiny or jammy, with cassis notes that even lean toward being chocolaty. Whatever you think of the aromas and flavors, it's a richly concentrated, velvety textured wine with plenty to recommend it.
Western reviews.translation: 新西兰的辛那 (Syrahs) 通常被称为罗讷风格，但这个酒虽然展现出一些美丽的花香和烟熏木香，但也带有略带浓缩的或果酱味，带有黑加仑 (cassis) 的味道，甚至接近巧克力味。无论你对酒的香气和口感怎么看，它都是一个丰富浓郁的酒，具有细腻的口感，值得推荐。

Chinese pairs.original: 散发着香料、咖啡、腌肉和浆果的香味。口感爽脆且活力十足，伴有烤浆果、腌肉和药草的风味。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of spice, coffee, cured meat, and fruit waft through the senses. The palate is crisp and lively, with flavors of toasted fruit, cured meat, and herbal notes.

Western reviews.review: Warm, rubbery berry aromas mixed with smoked meat and herbal accents make for a solid nose, and while the palate has clampy acidity and herbal notes, there's ample body, roundness and berry fruit to bring it home. Both leafy and candied on the finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的气味温暖、橡胶般的浓郁果香与烟熏肉和草药的香气混合，构成了一个稳固的鼻子。虽然口感酸度较高，带有草药味，但酒体丰富、圆润，果香丰富，带回了家的感觉。酒尾有叶绿和糖果般的味道。

Western reviews.review: (2010) From Colchagua, all the rest of this range aged in oak. Spicy, cedary, very good fruit and lots of complex, quite Bordeaux-like savour. Palate is juicy and has a lovely edge to the ripe, red berry fruit. Very silky tannin structure and fresh.
Western reviews.translation: 2010年产自智利科尔查瓜地区的这款红酒，其他系列均在橡木桶中陈化。酒中带有香料、松木的味道，果味丰富，复杂多层，类似于波尔多风格的口感。口感丰富，带有熟透的红果味。酒中有细致的纤维结构和清新感。

Western reviews.review: Spicy, cedar-y, minty, chocolate nose with bay leaf, vanilla, coffee flecks. Round, dry, slightly tannic palate with some astringency. Cedar, tobacco, peppery, cherry, vanilla, clove, bay leaf, olive and coffee flavours. A youthful, elegant style that needs a few years to soften or serve now with pork or duck. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中有着辣椒、红木、薄荷、巧克力等味道，伴有樱草、香草、咖啡的余味。口感圆润、干爽，略带苦涩。口中有着红木、烟草、辣椒、樱桃、香草、丁香、樱草、橄榄和咖啡的复杂味道。这种年轻的、优雅的风格需要几年时间才能变得更加柔和，也可以现在与猪肉或鸭肉一起食用。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有香料和香草的气息，中等浓郁，有明显的单宁酸沉淀在周围，樱桃和黑醋栗果实的风味。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromatic with notes of spice and herbs, medium-bodied with a noticeable tannin presence and flavors of cherry and black plum fruit.

Western reviews.review: Light, elegant and lithe on the nose, with a touch of stemminess to the core plum and cherry aromas. Feels just right, with a feminine touch and snap to the mouthfeel. Flavors of red plum, raspberry, herbs, tomato and dried spice lead to a fresh, focused finish. Top level for under $15.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气轻盈、优雅，带有樱桃和浆果的清新气息。口感柔和，带有女性般的细腻感。口感中有红浆果、草本植物、番茄和干香料的味道，结尾清新、集中。价格仅15美元，堪称顶级佳酿。

Robert Mondavi Napa Valley Cabernet Sauv.name: Robert Mondavi Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2009

Chinese pairs.original: 口感紧实，香气和风味精准 ，带有迷人的醋栗干、薄荷、烟草、雪松和茴芹的味道。
Chinese pairs.new: Tight texture, precise aroma and flavor, with enticing notes of chestnut, mint, tobacco, pine, and anise.

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, zarter Ockerrand. Ätherische Nuancen, Minze und Cassis, mit schwarzer Beerenfrucht unterlegt, ein Hauch von Honig. Saftig, elegant, extraktsüße Pflaumenfrucht, kräftige, gut integierte Tannine, feine nussige Aromen im Abgang, bereits antrinkbar, ein vielseitiger Speisenbegleiter.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，金黄色边缘。有着清新的香气，带有薄荷和黑加思果的味道，底层是黑莓的果味，带有蜂蜜的甜味。口感丰富，优雅，浓郁的石榴味，坚实的但又很好融合的苦味，尾部有细微的坚果香气，已经可以直接饮用，适合与多种菜肴搭配。

Western reviews.review: Big minty, leafy, cassis, tobacco, black olive, herbal, coffee, cedar, menthol aromas. Dry, fresh, round, slightly tart and tannic palate. Coffee, cedar, vanilla, black olive, cassis, sappy, minty, leafy flavours. Warm and tart finish with grippy tannins. Needs 2-4 years to round out. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的香气中有着大蒜的清新味道、叶子味道、黑加西斯、烟草味道、黑橄榄、草本植物味道、咖啡味道、红檜木味道和薄荷味道。

口感干净、清新、圆润、略带酸和苦味。

口感中有咖啡、红檜木、香草、黑橄榄、黑加西斯、浓郁的、清新的大蒜和叶子味道。

尾韵温暖、略带酸，苦味的橡皮味道。

建议在2-4年后再次品尝，以使口感更加圆润。

Western reviews.review: Textbook Napa Cab. It's dry, smoothly tannic and subtle, with blackberry, cassis and dark chocolate flavors nicely intrigued with herbs, tobacco and cedar. Just delicious now and for the next few years.
Western reviews.translation: 典型的纳帕红酒。干净、滑顺的口感，黑莓、黑加仑和黑巧克力味道与香草、烟草和红木巧妙地融合。现在和未来几年都非常美味。

Chinese pairs.original: 颜色深，果香浓郁，中等集中的香气，带有桑莓、黑樱桃、成熟的黑莓&蓝莓、树莓果酱、甘草以及少许的雪茄、桉树和焦糖气息，口感饱满、顺滑，结构结实，带有悠长、爽脆的余韵。
Chinese pairs.new: Deep color, intense fruit aromas, medium-bodied with concentrated scents of raspberry, black cherry, blackberry, blueberry, raspberry jam, honey, and subtle hints of cigar, eucalyptus, and caramel. Full-bodied, smooth texture, robust structure, with a long, crisp finish.

English pairs.original: Deep color, very fruity, medium noses of mulberry, black cherry, ripe blackberry and blueberry, raspberry jam, liquorice, hint of cigar, eucalyptus and caramel, full and smooth, firm structure with a long, crisp length.
English pairs.new: 深度的颜色，非常浓郁的果味，中等鼻子气味有黑杏、黑草莓、熟黑莓、蓝莓、草莓酱、甘草、烟草、桉树和焦糖，口感丰富而平滑，结构坚实，长而清脆的尾部。

Western reviews.review: This is a throwback to the Penfolds style of the past, with plenty of stuffing and tannin packed into a dark red wine. Chocolate and plum flavors pick up hints of eucalyptus and leathery notes on the firm finish. Drink 2008–2015.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒回归了Penfolds过去的风格，充满了浓郁的口感和坚实的苦味。巧克力和浆果的风味在坚实的尾部留下了柏树和皮革的余味。建议饮用时间：2008-2015年。

Chinese pairs.original: 辛香中混合着微妙的梅子风味，同时拥有蓝莓酱、可可、烟草和薄荷的气息。中等酒体，果香和橡木风味在口腔中达到良好的平衡，单宁饱满而柔软，回味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: A complex blend of subtle plum notes, with hints of blueberry jam, cocoa, tobacco, and mint. Medium-bodied, with a well-balanced harmony of fruit and oak flavors in the mouth, full yet soft tannins, and a long, lingering finish.

Western reviews.review: Dense and a bit green on the nose, with oak-based aromas of coffee to go with graphite and blackberry. Feels thick, creamy and resiny, with oak-led flavors of coconut, chocolate, vanilla and herbs along with black fruit. Finishes minty, with tobacco notes and heat.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的鼻子里充满了浓密的气息，带有些微的青涩味，混合着咖啡、石墨和黑莓的木质香气。口感丰富厚实，像奶油一样滑顺，木质味道浓郁，带有椰子、巧克力、香草和香草的味道，伴随着黑色水果的味道。口感结束时带有薄荷味，伴随着烟草味和热度。

Leyda Single Vineyard Las Brisas Pinot N.name: Leyda Single Vineyard Las Brisas Pinot Noir 2011

Chinese pairs.original: 含有焦糖、树莓、李子和孜然味，口感独具异域风情，单宁柔顺，回味感强。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts flavors of caramel, raspberry, plum, and a hint of cinnamon, with a unique exotic character and smooth tannins that linger on the palate.

Western reviews.review: This Pinot is aromatic; rhubarb, dried raspberry, rubber, prickly herbal notes and spice scents all vie for attention. This is solid and creamy in feel, with cutting acidity and herbal, lightly leafy flavors of dried, spicy red fruits. A lightly herbal tasting finish is the finale.
Western reviews.translation: 这款比诺特酒具有浓郁的香气，含有红莓、干燥草莓、橡胶、刺激性的草药和香料的气味。口感坚实、丰富，具有切割性的酸度和干燥、带有香料的红果味。干燥草药的味道在口感的最后留下了深刻的印象。

Chinese pairs.original: 香料、樱桃、果浆和香料的香气，口感清脆，伴着淡淡的烟熏风味营造一个悠长的收结。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of spice, cherry, fruit pulp, and spices, with a crisp texture and a subtle smokiness that creates a long, lingering finish.

Western reviews.review: Hot on the nose, with earthy berry aromas and touch of animal fur, this is a rich wine with a blanket-like mouthfeel. Concentrated, almost stewy flavors of spice and chocolate-infused blackberry finish oaky, chocolaty and medicinal.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的鼻子很热烈，带有土质的浆果香气和动物皮毛的味道，口感丰富，像被厚厚的毯子覆盖。浓缩的口感，几乎像烩菜一样，带有香料和巧克力浸泡黑莓的味道，口感坚实，带有橡木、巧克力和药膏的味道。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有李子、黑莓和黑胡椒的香气，柔滑辛香的单宁，清新的酸度，平衡的口感。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of plum, blackberry, and black pepper, smooth and spicy tannins, crisp acidity, and a balanced finish.

Western reviews.review: Sharp and jangled on the nose, with a strong “varietal” aroma package of olive, herbs and stem. The palate is forward and less thick than the winery's reserva from 2009, while the flavors are lean and a little green, with finishing acidic bite. Imported by Ecovalley Quality Wine Group and National Refrescos Import Company, LLC.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的气味非常清晰和刺激，带有橄榄、香草和茎叶的特有香气。口感前端，口感比2009年产的储存版要轻薄一些，味道清淡且带有青涩的感觉，最后留下了酸味的尾韵。

Chinese pairs.original: 香气集中、成熟，散发着澳洲老酒特有的典型焦糖塔、酒渣、谷物、奶油可可、半干山楂以及若隐若现的薄荷和甘草香料味，口感丰满，酸度多汁，单宁结实，回味充满岩石质感。相比其他老年份的Nine Popes，这支更具结构感，是唯一尚存陈年能力的一支。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas are concentrated and mature, releasing classic Australian aged wine notes of caramel, raisin, grain, chocolate mousse, dried apricot, and subtle hints of mint and licorice. The palate is full-bodied, with juicy acidity, firm tannins, and a lingering rocky texture. Compared to other aged vintages of Nine Popes, this one stands out for its structure and is the only one that still shows aging potential.

English pairs.original: Intensely mature bouquets of old Australian wine's typical caramel tar, lees, cereal, cream cocoa, semi-dry hawthorn, and hint with mint and liquorice spices, richly textured, juicy acidity, firm tannin, with a stony length. More structured than other nine vintage's Nine Popes during tasting and this one still could keep.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的气味非常成熟，典型的澳大利亚老酒风味，包括焦糖烟草、陈酵、谷物、奶油巧克力、半干的山楂、薄荷和 licorice 的香气。口感丰富，酸度清新，坚实的苦味，长长的尾部。与其他九年的九位教皇相比，这瓶红酒结构更为完善，仍然保持着惊人的风味。

Western reviews.review: A disappointing showing for a wine that is usually very good or excellent. Has aromas of cracker and cola, and a hefty dose of dusty bark and sour cherry on the palate. Lighter in weight than usual, too. Just isn't singing for me this year; tasted twice. Imported by Epic Wines.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒今年的表现令人失望，通常来说它的品质很好或是极品。酒中有饼干和可乐的香气，口感中有厚重的干土和酸苹果味。今年的体积比平常轻一些。今年的品酒体验让我很失望，品尝了两次。进口商是Epic Wines。

Western reviews.review: Mint and bread flour on the nose, with raspberry and red plum flavors on the palate. Its smooth, oaky tannins continue through to the finish, where there's bread-flour and graham-cracker flavors. A terrific GSM.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中有薄荷和面粉的味道，口感中有草莓和红桃的风味。它的滑顺的橡木味的苦味持续到尾部，尾部还有面粉和饼干味道。是一瓶非常出色的GSM红酒。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung. In der Nase reifes dunkles Beerenkonfit, zart nach Quittenkäse, Dörrfeigen, ein Hauch von Nougat, mit Luft rauchig und würzig, dunkler Nougat. Saftig, elegante Textur, reife Kirschenfrucht, finessenreiche Struktur, angenehme Mineralik, hat eine erste Trinkreife erreicht, feiner Holzeinsatz, extraktsüßer Nachhall.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。酒香中充满成熟的浓郁果酱味，微带杏仁味、干枣味和一丝奶油味，随着空气的流动，酒香变得更加烟熏和浓郁，带有深层次的奶油味。口感丰富细腻，成熟的樱桃果酱味，结构精致细致， Mineral味道清晰，酒已经达到初期成熟期，木头味道柔和，余味丰富浓郁。

Western reviews.review: Shows the wonderfully silky side of Grenache—the main part of the blend—in its diaphanous, delicate texture that manages to be soft but not too soft, beautifully framing flavors of cherries, spice and cola. Long on the finish, trailing away slowly and elegantly. Drink now–2015.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒展现出格雷纳奇(Grenache)的优雅面貌，呈现出细腻、轻盈的口感，既软又不至于太软，完美地衬托出樱桃、香料和可乐的风味。口感持久，缓慢而优雅地消退。建议立即享用，至2015年最佳。

Western reviews.review: Nine Popes is a grenache-based red that is mixed with old 80-year old parcels of Barossa shiraz and mourvèdre in between Williamstown and Ebenezer. It is all whole bunch fermented and the cap is managed via pigeage and hand plunging, as well as daily pump-overs throughout fermentation. The wine aged in a high percentage of French oak for 20 months. Look for a fragrant spicy red with a slightly soupy texture. The palate is a mix of red and black liquorice and plummy, dark red berry fruit with earthy, cinnamon, savoury. A bit soft and unkempt it the back end but otherwise solid. Serve with lamb or beef dishes. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 《九位教皇》是一款以格纳什为主的红酒，混合了80年老的巴罗萨希拉兹和穆尔韦德葡萄，产自威廉斯敦和埃本泽之间。酒液全部采用整株发酵，顶盖管理通过踩压和手动浸泡，以及整个发酵过程中的日常泵送。酒液在法国橡木桶中陈化20个月。酒体香气浓郁，带有香料味，口感略微浓稠。口感呈现出红色和黑色甘草和浓郁的红色浆果，带有泥土、肉桂、咸味等风味。酒尾略微软弱，但整体上仍然坚实。建议与羊肉或牛肉菜肴搭配。

concha y toro casillero del diablo reser.name: concha y toro casillero del diablo reserva privada cabernet sauvignon/syrah 2009

Chinese pairs.original: 酒体呈现深红宝石色泽，带有紫色边缘，香气集中、柔和，展现香草奶油、黑樱桃、黑莓、山楂、盐渍梅、甘草、陈皮、雪茄和些微铅笔盒味，酒体饱满，口感顺滑，单宁丝滑，酸度较高，余韵中等偏上。
Chinese pairs.new: The wine presents a deep ruby-red color with purple edges. The aroma is concentrated and smooth, showcasing notes of vanilla, black cherry, blackberry, quince, salty plum, licorice, orange peel, cigar, and subtle pencil box. The full-bodied wine has a smooth texture, silky tannins, and a relatively high acidity. The finish is medium to long.

English pairs.original: Deep ruby color with purple rim, intensely soft noses of vanilla cream, dark cherry, blackberry, hawthorn, salty plum, liquorice, dried orange peel, cigar and a hint of pencil box, full-bodied, with very smooth texture, silky tannin and high acidity, followed by a medium+ length.
English pairs.new: 深红色酒液，带有紫色边缘，酒香浓郁，带有香草奶油、黑樱桃、黑莓、山楂、咸梅、甘草、干橙皮、雪茄和铅笔盒的味道。酒体丰富，口感细腻，纤维度平滑，酸度高，余味持久。

Western reviews.review: Con un 10% de syrah, este cabernet sauvignon de viñedos en el Valle del Maipo tiene un carácter suculento, jugoso, amplio, lleno de madurez. Los taninos firmes y punzantes, rodeados de sabores suculentos a frutas confitadas y maduras. Un cabernet para cordero.
Western reviews.translation:
这个红酒评论翻译成中文如下：

这个来自马伊波谷的卡贝网酒（Cabernet Sauvignon）中含有10%的西拉（Syrah），具有丰富的口感，充满成熟的味道。坚实的橡皮质感和刺激的口感，伴随着浓郁的果酱和成熟的果味。适合与烤羊肉一起享用。

Western reviews.review: This is pure carmenere juice, which in practical terms means that herbal notes mix with ripe red fruits in a medium body and unusually firm acidity for the variety and friendly tannins that spread through the mouth like butter. This carmenere comes from Peumo, on the northern bank of the Cachapoal River, one of the areas that has given the best examples of the variety in the last two decades.
Western reviews.translation: 这是纯正的卡门埃雷酒，实际上是指香草味与成熟红果在中等体积中混合，且酸度比卡门埃雷酒通常要高，友好的苦味在口中像黄油一样均匀分布。这款卡门埃雷酒来自于佩穆（Peumo），位于卡查波阿尔河（Cachapoal River）的北岸，是过去两十年中卡门埃雷酒品种最好的产区之一。

Western reviews.review: Tinto elaborado exclusivamente a partir de Cabernet Sauvignon, com estágio de 12 meses em barricas de carvalho. Repleto de frutas negras maduras, seguidas de notas tostadas, de especiarias doces e de ervas, que se repetem no palato. Gostoso de beber, tem acidez refrescante, taninos intensos e de boa textura e final médio/longo, com toques de ameixas, de chocolate e balsâmicos. Álcool 14%.
Western reviews.translation: 纯种卡波内尔·沙夫宁（Cabernet Sauvignon）红酒，陈酿12个月于橡木桶中。酒中充满了成熟的黑果味，后续有烤香、甜香料和香草的味道，口感持久。口感清新，酸度适中，酒中有强烈的橡木味和细腻的口感，尾部长达中等，留有杏仁、巧克力和浓郁果酱的余味。酒精度14%。

Western reviews.review: This is a selection of vineyards growing on alluvial soils in the Buin zone, on the southern terrace of the Maipo River. With 16 months in barrels, it has a pleasing sensation of sweetness and sweet, ripe aromas, while friendly tannins, red and black fruits, and spices fill the mouth.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一款来自马伊波河南岸的布因区（Buin zone），种植在全uvial土壤上的葡萄酒。经过16个月的橡木桶陈化，酒中带有甜感和浓郁的果香，口感丰富，友善的苦味，红、黑果味和香料充满口腔。

Western reviews.review: 100% Cabernet Sauvignon, com e stágio de 12 meses em barricas de carvalho. Apresenta os aromas típicos da variedade, com frutas negras, balsâmicos, ervas e toques de especiarias doces e empireumáticos. Em um conjunto harmonioso e suculento, seu estilo mais maduro está bem sustentado pela acidez refrescante e pelos taninos numerosos e de boa textura, além de final médio, com notas de cassis e de alcaçuz. Álcool 13,5%.
Western reviews.translation: 100% 卡波弗列（Cabernet Sauvignon）红酒，陈酿12个月于橡木桶中。酒中展现出典型的卡波弗列风格，带有黑果、浓郁的果酱、香草和甜香料的香气。酒体丰富、圆润，成熟的风格得益于清新果酸和丰富的多种口感的橡木味，酒尾中带有黑加仑和荆芥的余味。酒精含量13.5%。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有蜜饯的香气，新鲜漂亮，口感饱满，肥美的甜瓜，柑橘和覆盆子口味，平衡良好的酸度。
Chinese pairs.new: Honeyed aromas, fresh and vibrant, full-bodied with a luscious sweetness of ripe melon, citrus, and plum flavors, balanced acidity.

Western reviews.review: Always a consistent rosé from Rioja. The nose is candied but fresh and nice, while the palate is full but standard, with plump melon, citrus and raspberry flavors. Finishes short but sturdy, with balance and good acidity.
Western reviews.translation: 里奥哈地区的这款玫瑰酒一直保持着一贯的品质。酒鼻中有着糖果般的气味，但又带有清新的味道，很是舒适。口感丰富但标准，带有水蜜桃、柑橘和莓果的鲜味。酒尾短暂但坚实，具有平衡和好的酸度。

Chinese pairs.original: 散发着药草、橄榄和黑色水果的香味，伴有黑莓和深色李子的味道。余味多汁且带有香料和甘草的味道，十分优雅怡人。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts aromas of herbs, olives, and dark fruit, accompanied by notes of blackberry and plum. The finish is lush and spicy, with hints of licorice and honey, making for a refined and delightful experience.

Western reviews.review: An excellent value, this dark, full-bodied red tastes deep and rich, with a faintly herbal undertone, and a surprisingly long, layered finish. It’s rare to find wines at this price point that offer so much character. Earthy but at the same time full of fruit, it serves as a reminder that first-class wine need not cost a small fortune.---- Paul Lukacs
Western reviews.translation: 一瓶出色的价值红酒，深色、浓郁的口感，带有微妙的草药味，且有着令人惊讶的持久、层次丰富的尾韵。 在这个价格点上，很难找到这样的红酒能带来如此多的个性。 这瓶酒既有泥土的味道，又有丰富的果味，证明了高品质的葡萄酒不一定要花大钱才能品尝。

Chinese pairs.original: 这里的气候非常凉爽，因而梅洛成熟的很好，但赤霞珠却不行。桶边试饮，桶内陈放12个月，轻度过滤后装瓶。此酒带有中等厚重的果味，同时有紧实的香料及泥土气息，十分干净。
Chinese pairs.new: The climate here is quite cool, which has allowed the Merlot to ripen well, but the Cabernet Sauvignon has not fared as well. Tasted from the barrel, aged for 12 months, lightly filtered before bottling. This wine has a medium-full fruitiness, along with tight spices and earthy notes, very clean.

English pairs.original: The site is very cool, so the Merlot still can ripe very well while the Cabernets not. I preferred this wine than the 2012 during the barrel tasting, the wine has been spent 12 months in oaks with light filtration before bottling as well. Middle weight fruit with tightly spicy and earthy touches, very clean.
English pairs.new: 网站很酷，梅尔洛特酒仍然可以很好地成熟，而卡贝网酒则不然。我在酒桶品尝时更喜欢这个酒，酒已经在橡木桶中陈化12个月，并进行了轻度过滤后才装瓶。中等重量的果味，带有紧密的辣椒和泥土的触感，非常清澈。

Western reviews.review: This wine is from a tiny wine region halfway between the Margaret River and Great Southern regions of Western Australia. This blend offers notes of currant and dried tobacco, with undertones of cherry, baking spices and dried violet. The palate harmonizes power and elegance with fine savory tannins, bright acidity, tangy fruit and a long spicy finish. Several years in bottle have made this highly drinkable now but capable of aging until 2027. Christina Pickard
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒来自西澳大利亚州的玛格丽特河和大南方两大酒区之间的一个小酒区。 这款混合红酒的口感复杂，带有浆果和干烟草的味道，底层有樱桃、烘烤香料和干紫罗兰的味道。口感中有强劲的风味和优雅的风格，细致的咸味和果味，长长的辣味尾部。几年瓶龄后，这瓶红酒已经变得非常容易饮用，但仍有能力在2027年之前继续陈化。- Christina Pickard。

Western reviews.review: Has roasted, ripe flavors of prune or date, plus a hint of volatility on the nose. Has a dusty feel on the palate, with coffee, leather and blackberry flavors taking center stage. Finishes narrow and a little tart. Imported by The Country Vintner.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感非常丰富，鼻子中有浓郁的浆果和干果味，如浆果干或日期干果，伴有轻微的酒精味。口感干净，带有咖啡、皮革和黑莓的味道。口感紧致，略带酸。

Western reviews.review: Exciting and vibrant red- with good concentration and lovely acid and tannins to balance. Deep strawberry and underbrush in the nose. Energetic raspberry fruit dances with lively and mouth watering acids in a complex array of subtle flavors. Neither dense nor fat, yet full of emphatic and ripe fruit. A wonderful mix of new world ripeness paired with a taut and powerfull old world structure and flavor nuance. Seems quite youthful--this one could last for many more years. Yowsa.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒非常有活力和生动，口感浓郁，酸度和苦味都很好地平衡。酒鼻中充满了深红莓和林地的香气。果酱般的莓果味在酸度和口水的刺激下跳跃着，呈现出复杂的、细微的风味。虽然不厚重也不肥腻，但却充满了浓郁的、成熟的果味。新世界的成熟与老世界的结构和风味细腻完美结合。看起来这个酒还很年轻，可能会持续很多年。

Chinese pairs.original: 紫罗兰、黑莓、蓝莓和烟草的浓郁香气，单宁细腻，口感优雅平衡。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich aromas of lavender, blackberry, blueberry, and tobacco, with fine tannins and a refined, balanced palate.

Western reviews.review: Colour: Cherry, garnet rim;Aroma: fruit preserve, medium intensity, toasty;Flavour: powerful, flavourful, fleshy;Colour: deep cherry, garnet rim;Aroma: toasty, spicy, candied fruit, fruit preserve;Flavour: powerful, flavourful;Colour: black cherry, garnet rim;Aroma: wet leather, tobacco;Flavour: spicy, bitter;Colour: dark-red cherry;Aroma: ripe fruit, spicy, toasty, old leather, animal reductive notes;Flavour: toasty, round tannins;

Chinese pairs.original: 碎黑醋栗，李子和甘草的香气，浓郁的口感，强烈的水果味道，平衡的酒体。
Chinese pairs.new: Notes of crushed blackberries, plums, and licorice, rich texture, intense fruit flavors, balanced body.

Western reviews.review: This Amarone has somewhat rustic aromas that recall animal and meat juices. You'll also detect whiffs of burned rubber. The palate is better, showing ripe fruit and smooth tannins. While the fruit is delicious and immediate, this also reflects the heat of the vintage and is shy on fresh acidity.
Western reviews.translation: 这款阿马罗内红酒有着一些原始的香气，带有动物和肉汁的味道。还可以闻到烧焦的橡胶味。口感上更好，展现出成熟的果味和细腻的纹理。虽然果味丰富且立即可感，但这也反映了当年酿酒的炎热天气，缺乏新鲜的酸度。

leeuwin estate art series cabernet sauvi.name: leeuwin estate art series cabernet sauvignon 2008

Chinese pairs.original: 这支酒的香气始于不成熟的青椒味，但分分钟便消失，富含顶级黑色水果香气（黑醋栗、黑樱桃），隐约可见橡木桶气息（椰子片、香草、红豆巧克力），入口展现优雅的矿物质感，体现了这是一支来自偏凉气候的葡萄酒，酒体相当顺滑、悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine begins with an unripe green pepper note, but it quickly disappears, revealing a rich array of top-tier black fruit aromas (black truffle, black cherry). Subtle hints of oak barrel (coconut, vanilla, red chocolate) are also present. On the palate, it showcases a refined minerality, characteristic of a wine from a cooler climate. The texture is silky and long-lasting.

English pairs.original: The wine started with some unripe capsicum noses, but disappeared in a minute, fantastic dark fruits (black currant, black cherry) aromas hint of oaks (coconut chip, vanilla, red bean chocolate), elegant minerals on the mouth showed the cooler climate of region, quite smooth and long.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的开头有一些未成熟的辣椒味道，但在一分钟后就消失了，酒中展现出丰富的黑色水果香气（黑加仑、黑樱桃），还有木头香气（椰子片、香草、红豆巧克力），口感中展现出矿物质的优雅，体现出该地区的凉爽气候，口感非常平滑且持久。

Western reviews.review: (2014) One of Margaret River's original and best estates, it's great that The Wine Society can afford release this with a little maturity, as they have done with French wines for many years. Big and bold, there is mint and there is intense cassis, but in the background still a hint of the greener aspect of Cabernet Sauvignon, that tiny herbal nuance that is complex and delicious. The palate has loads of fruit, loads of ripe sweetness, with a juiciness at the core that stops it from being at all OTT: this is model Margaret River, with elegance and abundant ripeness in perfect harmony.
Western reviews.translation: 2014年，玛格丽特河区的老牌酒庄终于可以通过The Wine Society的努力推出了一款成熟的红酒了。与法国酒庄一样，他们也能在适当的时机推出成熟的红酒。这种红酒大胆豪放，带有薄荷和浓郁的黑加仑果味，但在背景中仍然保留了卡波涅尔的青葱味，微妙的草药味让人感到复杂和美味。口感丰富果实，充满成熟的甜度，核心处有浓郁的果汁感，没有过于浓烈的感觉。这是玛格丽特河区典型的红酒，优雅和成熟的果实完美和谐。

Western reviews.review: Mint and eucalypt on the nose. Also some vanilla. Lots of acidity. Fine tannins. But lacking in fruit and volume and depth. Flat, not structured. Almost like chewing gum leaves. Disappointing relative to what I know this wine can be. Not worth the money at this price point.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的气味中有薄荷和桉树的香气，还有些香草味。口感酸度很高，纤维度细腻。但是缺乏水果的味道和体积和深度。口感平淡，没有结构。令人失望，感觉像嚼口香糖一样。相比之下，这瓶红酒的价格不值得。

Chinese pairs.original: 浓郁持久的芬芳，具有丰富的红色水果和李子及香草的香气，良好的酒体结构感与单宁使酒表现出平衡感，口感饱满持久。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich, long-lasting aromas of rich red fruit and plum, with hints of herbaceous notes. A well-structured wine with good tannins, offering a balanced and full-bodied taste with a long finish.

Western reviews.review: Plump, ripe notes of blackberry jam, prune, spice cake, tobacco and black tea steal the show and make for a very prominent, sweet and intense nose. The mouthfeel is less bulky but it does offer the length you should expect.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气非常浓郁，带有浓郁的黑莓果酱、浆果、香料蛋糕、烟草和黑茶的味道。口感虽然不如香气那么浓厚，但仍然具有持久的长度。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有黑莓、黑樱桃、覆盆子、黑李子、黑巧克力、香料如肉桂、丁香和香草的香气，回味持久。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of blackberry, black cherry, blackberry, black plum, black chocolate, and spices like cinnamon, nutmeg, and vanilla, with a long-lasting finish.

Western reviews.review: Freemark Abbey is best known for its long-lived Cabernet Sauvigon, so its Merlot is often overlooked. This vintage is lighter than some, but the lack of heft can be appealing and the firm structure points to a wine that has every right to improve with a few additional years in the cellar. It shows plum and blackberry fruit with an inviting floral note and warm spice accents on the finish.---- Robert Whitley
Western reviews.translation: 弗雷马克艾伯里（Freemark Abbey）以其长存的卡波涅尔（Cabernet Sauvignon）而闻名，因此其梅洛（Merlot）常常被忽视。这个年份的梅洛相对较轻，但缺乏重量可以让人产生好感，而坚实的结构表明酒精有理由在几年后在酒窖中继续改善。酒中展现出浆果和黑莓的风味，伴有令人愉悦的花香和温暖的香料的余味。

Western reviews.review: Grill up or pan sear a steak, put some brown butter sauce on it, and enjoy with this luscious Merlot. The wine, which is blended with other Bordeaux varieties, is rich in blackberries, cherries, currants and oak, while the low alcohol, onlyby volume, reaffirms its Merlot delicacy.
Western reviews.translation: 烤肉或煎肉，放上一些焦糖色浇头，和这款丰富的梅洛酒一起享受。这种酒是由其他波尔多品种混合而成的，富含黑莓、樱桃、黑加仑和橡木的风味，而酒精含量较低，仅仅只有普通酒精含量，体现了梅洛酒的优雅。

Chinese pairs.original: 酒体呈现集中的红宝石色泽，香气成熟，散发焦糖、葡萄干、蔓越莓、皮革、黑巧克力和一些上梅多克酒般的动物皮毛味，入口展现新鲜樱桃水果滋味，酒体饱满，酸度中等偏上，口感和顺，伴随着中长的葡萄干余韵。
Chinese pairs.new:
The wine presents a concentrated ruby red hue, with mature aromas of caramel, raisins, cranberries, leather, dark chocolate, and some animal hide notes reminiscent of a Medoc wine. 

Upon entry, it reveals a fresh cherry fruit flavor, with a full-bodied texture, moderate to high acidity, and a smooth mouthfeel, accompanied by a lingering raisin finish of medium to long length.

English pairs.original: Focused ruby color, aged bouquets of caramel, raisin, cranberry, leather, dark chocolate and some Haut-Medoc-like animal fur notes, fresh cherry fruit on the palate, full body with medium+ acidity, smooth texture and a medium raisin length.
English pairs.new: 深红色葡萄酒，陈酿的香气中带有焦糖、葡萄干、蔓越莓、皮革、黑巧克力和一些类似于波尔多风味的动物皮革味道，口感中带有新鲜樱桃果味，口感丰富，酸度中等以上，滑顺的口感，余味持久中等。

Western reviews.review: In '01 the fruit comes off estate vineyards in Stag's Leap and Rutherford and 89 per cent of the blend is cabernet sauvignon. Look for spicy, vanilla, clove, tobacco, plum and blackberry jam aromas jump from the glass with some barnyard, coffee and pencil lead streaks. Rich, ripe and concentrated with good supple tannins and grip. Intense cassis jam, black berry, creamy vanilla, peppery clove flavours. Nice length and acidity with coffee, vanilla, orange peel on the finish. A touch warm but Insignia is back in a big way in 2001. One to put away for a minimum five years. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 2001年，来自斯塔格利普和拉弗特的庄园葡萄园的果实被采集，酒款中有89%是卡波涅尔。酒中有香料、香草、丁香、烟草、浆果和黑莓果酱的香气，伴有马厩、咖啡和铅笔的线条。酒口丰富、成熟、浓郁，具有良好的柔软的纹理和抓握感。酒中有浓郁的黑加仑果酱、黑莓、奶油香草、辣椒丁香的味道。酒尾有咖啡、香草、橙皮的味道。酒有一点点的温暖，但2001年的Insignia酒款重新回归。建议将酒存放至少五年。

Western reviews.review: A triumph. Aged nearly two years in all-new French oak, this massive wine stuns with its superb balance. Manages the elusive challenge of reining in hugely ripe black currant, cherry and oak flavors and sweet tannins while keeping the palate impression soft and alluring, almost feminine. Just gorgeous right out of the bottle, but should develop effortlessly through the decade and beyond.
Western reviews.translation: 绝对的杰作！在全新的法国橡木桶中陈酿近两年，这款酒精浓度极高的红酒令人惊艳，酒体平衡出色。它成功地控制了浓郁的黑加仑、樱桃和橡木味，以及甜润的橡皮质，保持口感柔和诱人，几乎是女性化的。直接从瓶子里就美味无比，但也能轻松地在十年以上的时间里不断发展和完善。

Western reviews.review: This wine is not my personal style, too bold and fruity, even though it is 17 years old. Nevertheless it is well made, intense, fruity, with a long finish. I would be curious to try older vintages. I would rate the 2001 with 94 points
Western reviews.translation: 这个红酒不是我的个人口味，太浓烈和果香，尽管它已经17年了。然而，它的制作很好，浓郁，果香，口感持久。 我很想尝试更老的年份。 我会给2001年的评分94分。

Chinese pairs.original: 香气以愉悦的红果为主，如草莓和红醋栗，伴随深邃的泥土和木桶气息，同时还有无花果干及草本味，酒体中等，酸度极高，中等余韵。
Chinese pairs.new: The aroma is dominated by a pleasant red fruit profile, featuring notes of strawberry and red currant, accompanied by deep earthy and oak undertones, along with hints of dried quince and herbal nuances. The palate is medium-bodied, with extremely high acidity and a medium-length finish.

English pairs.original: A lovely red fruits (strawberry, red currant) predominately wine which hint of deeply earthy and oaky tones, also some dried fig and herbaceous here, medium-bodied, with very high acidity, silky tannin and a medium+ length.
English pairs.new: 这是一瓶美丽的红酒，主要是以草莓、红葡萄等红果味为主，带有深度的泥土和橡木香气，另外还有一些干燥的枣子和草本植物的味道。酒体中等，酸度高，纤维柔滑，口感持久。

Western reviews.review: This is a full-bodied, well structured Cabernet, with plenty of intense cassis fruit tinged with minty, herbal overtones that give it a slightly medicinal cast. Give it 2-3 years to develop additional complexity, then drink it over the next 7-8 years.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一个充满体积的、结构良好的卡贝网酒，具有丰富的黑加仑果味，带有薄荷和草药的香气，给人一种微微的药味。建议在2-3年后再次品尝，之后可以持续饮用7-8年。

Western reviews.review: (2008) There's and earthiness and fine, slightly vegetal ripeness here, with plenty of class French oak. The palate has immaculate black fruit, with a slightly pastille quality. Grippy, with tight tannins and juicy acidity.
Western reviews.translation: (2008) 这款红酒带有泥土的味道和精致的植物性成熟感，伴有丰富的法式橡木味。口感上，黑果味清晰细腻，带有糖果般的质感。口感紧绷，具有坚实的纤维和清脆的酸度。

Western reviews.review: Heavily extracted and heavily oaked, this Cabernet starts with a rush of vanilla and cedar, then backs that up with tobacco and cassis. It's practically chewy in the mouth, ending with coffee and additional cedar flavors.
Western reviews.translation: 这款卡波网红酒（Cabernet）采用了强烈的提取和橡木桶陈化工艺，口感丰富。酒体中充满了香草和红木的香气，随后是烟草和黑加仑的味道。口感丰富厚实，最后留下了咖啡和更多的红木味。

Western reviews.review: This is a full-bodied, well structured Cabernet, with plenty of intense cassis fruit tinged with minty, herbal overtones that give it a slightly medicinal cast. Give it 2-3 years to develop additional complexity, then drink it over the next 7-8 years.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一个富有体积的、结构良好的卡贝网酒，具有丰富的黑加仑果味，带有薄荷和草药的香气，给人一种微微的药味。建议在2-3年后再次品尝，之后可以持续饮用7-8年。

Western reviews.review: (2008) There's and earthiness and fine, slightly vegetal ripeness here, with plenty of class French oak. The palate has immaculate black fruit, with a slightly pastille quality. Grippy, with tight tannins and juicy acidity.
Western reviews.translation: (2008) 这款红酒带有泥土的味道和精致的植物性成熟感，充满了高级法式橡木的风味。口感上，黑果味道清晰细致，带有轻微的糖果质感。口感紧致，具有紧密的纤维和清脆的酸度。

Robert Mondavi Winery Napa Valley Merlot.name: Robert Mondavi Winery Napa Valley Merlot 2008

Chinese pairs.original: 散发出黑醋栗和咖啡的香味，带有黑樱桃和茴香的味道。酒体饱满，结构良好。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of black prune and coffee waft from the glass, with flavors of black cherry and anise. The full-bodied wine has a well-structured palate.

Western reviews.review: A lovely Merlot, light and spicy. It has pretty flavors of cherries, mocha and cinnamon, with fine, ripe tannins, with a sweetness from glycerine. An elegant Merlot at a good price.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶美丽的梅洛酒，口感轻盈，带有辛辣的味道。它具有鲜美的樱桃、摩卡和肉桂的风味，具有细腻的成熟的橡皮感，来自甘油的甜感。是一瓶优雅的梅洛酒，价格合理。

Chinese pairs.original: 成熟的红樱桃，糖果，黑醋栗，烟熏，橡木的香气，丰富的单宁，扎实的酒体。
Chinese pairs.new: Ripe red cherry, candy, black walnut, smoky, oaky aromas, rich tannins, full-bodied wine.

Western reviews.review: Smoky, resin, tobacco leaf, black olive, rooty, cool menthol aromas. Round, dry, tart, slightly tannic palate with cassis, herbal, olive, tobacco, resin, coffee and cedar flavours. Very tart and hot finish. Lacks fruit and balance. Not much to enjoy here. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 烟熏、树脂、烟草叶、黑橄榄、根状、冷刺激的气味。口感圆润、干、酸、略带苦的口感，带有黑加斯、草本、橄榄、烟草、树脂、咖啡和红檜的味道。非常酸和热的尾韵。缺乏水果和平衡。这里没有太多可享受的东西。 (安东尼·吉斯蒙迪和斯图尔特·托比)

bodegas ramirez de la piscina gran reser.name: bodegas ramirez de la piscina gran reserva 2001

Chinese pairs.original: 酒体呈中等红色并带有砖色调，扑鼻而来的香气，一一展现风干的红色水果香气（红樱桃、草莓、无花果、红醋栗），隐约夹杂木桶味，入口柔软，酒体中等，带有出色的黏稠度，优异的酸度，以及标准的余韵。
Chinese pairs.new: The wine has a medium-bodied red color with brick undertones. The nose is filled with the scent of dried red fruits (cherry, strawberry, quince, cranberry), with subtle hints of oak. The palate is smooth and silky, with a medium body, excellent viscosity, outstanding acidity, and a standard finish.

English pairs.original: Medium red with some brick hues, noses of dried red fruits (red cherry, strawberry, fig and red currant), hints with oaks, very soft mouthfeel on the palate, medium body, good viscosity, excellent acidity with a standard finish.
English pairs.new:
颜色：深红色，带有砖红色调。

香气：干红果香（红樱桃、草莓、枣子和红 gooseberry），有轻微的橡木味。

口感：口感非常柔和，体积中等，口感丰富，酸度出色，完美的余韵。

Western reviews.review: Good for a mature wine but it does smell a bit flat and damp. That murkiness blows off somewhat, leaving a solid, aged Rioja wine with acidic zap and lightly baked berry, cherry, tomato and spice flavors. Mild on the finish. Drink now.
Western reviews.translation: 适合成熟的红酒，但闻起来有一点儿闷和潮湿的味道。这种浑浊感会逐渐消失，留下了一个坚实的、成熟的里奥哈红酒，带有酸性和轻微烤的浆果、樱桃、西红柿和香料的风味。口感较轻。建议立即饮用。

los vascos grande reserve cabernet sauvi.name: los vascos grande reserve cabernet sauvignon 2011

Chinese pairs.original: 红醋栗，野生浆果，李子和矿物的香气，口腔带有烘焙香料的味道，精致持久的回味。
Chinese pairs.new: Cranberry, wild plum, cherry, and mineral aromas. Flavors of baked spices linger on the palate, with a refined and lasting finish.

Western reviews.review: This cabernet's meaty character is marked by notes of tart black fruit. The tannins remain untamed, needing Charcuterie or other meats to calm them down.
Western reviews.translation: 这款卡贝网酒的口感是以黑色水果的酸味为主。它的坚果味和苦味仍然很强烈，需要搭配一些肉类食物，如火腿等来平衡口感。

Western reviews.review: This is firm and lightly chewy with subtle smoked meat and berry. Full body, fine tannins and a fruity finish. A delicious bottle. 75% cabernet sauvignon, 10% carmenere, 10% syrah, and 5% malbec.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒口感坚实，略带嚼劲，带有微妙的烟熏肉和浆果味。酒体丰富，纤维细腻，果香持久。是一瓶非常可口的红酒。酒中含有75%卡波雷尔葡萄，10%卡门埃雷葡萄，10%席尔瓦葡萄和5%马尔贝克葡萄。

Chinese pairs.original: 薄荷，烤鼠尾草和烤面包的香气，口感丰富，圆润，回味充满黑樱桃和李子的水果味道。
Chinese pairs.new: Mint, smoky lemongrass, and toasted bread aromas, rich and rounded texture, with a lingering finish of black cherry and plum fruit flavors.

Western reviews.review: One of the things I like about the Santa Rita 'Reserva" series is the wines consistently deliver at a higher level. Texture and fruit dominate this bottle along classic carmenère notes of lead pencil, dark chocolate, tobacco and briar. Perfect with barbecue ribs. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 我喜欢圣塔里塔（Santa Rita）"Reserva"系列的其中一项原因是，这系列的葡萄酒始终表现出高水准。酒体和果味是这瓶酒的主导风格，经典的卡门埃尔（Carmenère）风味包括铅笔、黑巧克力、烟草和荆棘。与烧烤排骨（barbecue ribs）完美搭配。

Chinese pairs.original: 深红宝石色，香气中等偏上，集中散发焦糖咖啡、培根、咖啡、红醋栗、肉桂、黑巧克力、薄荷与香菇气息，酒体中等偏上，口感顺滑，单宁结实，酸度迷人，带有中等余韵。
Chinese pairs.new:
Deep ruby gemstone color, moderate to full-bodied aroma, with concentrated scents of caramel, coffee, bacon, cherry, cinnamon, dark chocolate, mint, and mushroom. 

Medium to full-bodied texture, smooth mouthfeel, firm tannins, and an alluring acidity with a moderate finish.

English pairs.original: Very deep ruby color, medium+ bouquet of caramel coffee, bacon, toffee, red currant, cinnamon, dark chocolate, mint and dried mushroom, medium+ body with smooth texture, firm tannin and nice acidity as well as a medium finish.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的颜色非常深红，酒香浓郁，带有焦糖、咖啡、培根、糖浆、红葡萄、肉桂、黑巧克力、薄荷和干燥蘑菇的味道。口感丰富，质地细腻，口感坚实，酸度适宜，余味持久。

Western reviews.review: Shows the soft, sensual mouthfeel you want in a nice Merlot, like silk gliding across the tongue, and the cherry and herb flavors are just fine. Misses some depth and complexity, but it's an elegant, restaurant-style wine for the money.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒展现出优质美丽的梅洛特口感，如丝绸般轻柔地滑过舌头，果香和草药味道也很不错。虽然缺乏深度和复杂性，但这款酒的优雅和高品质值得称赞，价格合理，适合在餐厅享用。

Terrazas de los Andes Reserva Cabernet S.name: Terrazas de los Andes Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon 2010

Chinese pairs.original: 鲜果的精华和薄荷，桉树等绿叶香料的气息复杂而浓郁。口感浓郁，活力十足。单宁结构稳健，风味浓郁持久。
Chinese pairs.new: The essence of fresh fruit and the complex, rich aroma of eucalyptus and other green herbs. Rich and full-bodied, with a lively texture. The tannins are well-structured, with a long, intense finish.

Western reviews.review: A wide, jammy nose is the greeting on this fleshy, full-bodied Cab. Additional aromas of rubber, latex and smoke give it weight and masculinity. This runs spicy and lightly herbal in terms of flavors, while wood spice, cinnamon and herbs compete with mocha and chocolaty black-fruit notes on the finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这款Cabernet Sauvignon的酒香宽广浓郁，类似于果酱般的甜美。酒中还带有橡胶、乳胶和烟熏的味道，增添了酒的重量和男性化的特质。口感上则带有轻微的辣味和草药味，木质香、丁香和香草与巧克力和黑果的味道在尾部竞争。

Chinese pairs.original: 此酒的香气和口感都很厚实，特别的香气中富含红豆香精、皮革、咖啡豆、杨梅、粉笔、山楂干、盐渍梅、樱桃果酱、湿泥土、石墨、芦笋、薄荷、成熟蓝莓、甘草、草药、树皮、陈皮、松仁、焦糖咖啡及花茶芳香，结构非常复杂，隐约带有咸矿物的味道，酸度怡人，伴有丝滑、粉末状但略显干涩的余味，比起1999年份的要好很多。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine has a rich and full-bodied aroma and palate, with a particularly complex bouquet featuring notes of red bean, leather, coffee, mulberry, chalk, dried apricot, pickled plum, cherry jam, damp earth, graphite, asparagus, mint, ripe blueberry, licorice, herbs, bark, orange peel, pine nut, caramel coffee, and floral tea. The structure is highly complex, with a subtle hint of saltiness. The acidity is refreshing, accompanied by a smooth, powdery but slightly dry finish. Compared to the 1999 vintage, this wine is significantly better.

English pairs.original: Quite thick and fleshy for its nose and palate, revealing very special aromas of red bean essence, leather, coffee bean, waxberry, chalk, dried hawthorn, salty plum, cherry jam, damp earth, black lead, asparagus, mint, ripe blueberry, liquorice, herb, bark, dried orange peel, pine nut, caramel coffee and a delicate fragrance of flower tea, complex structure, hint with savoury-minerality, very fine acidity, with a silky length that was chalky and dry, much better than the 1999.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的口感丰富厚实，气味独特，带有红豆的香气、皮革味、咖啡豆味、蜂蜜柿子味、石灰味、干枳实味、咸梅味、樱桃果酱味、潮湿土壤味、黑铅味、芦笋味、薄荷味、成熟蓝莓味、甘草味、香草味、树皮味、干橙子皮味、松子味、焦糖咖啡味和花茶的清香。结构复杂，带有矿物质的咸味，酸度非常好，口感滑顺，末端干爽，略带石灰味。与1999年相比，这瓶红酒更出色。

Western reviews.review: Enticing whiffs of spice, dried herb and ripe, briary berries emerge from this rich, structured wine. The fruit on the palate is lavish, almost pulpy, but it's framed by lush tannins and brisk acidity. The finish is herbal and bracing.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中充满了诱人的香料、干燥的香草和成熟的浓郁黑berry味。口感上的果实丰富，几乎是浓郁的果肉，但它被丰富的纤维和清脆的酸度所包围。尾部是香草味和清爽的感觉。

Chinese pairs.original: 此酒的香气富含甜美的红色水果和以无花果干为主的果干味，伴有些微酒渣、矿物和花香，入口呈现奶油质感，中段口感顺滑，而多岩石的余韵则显得有些严肃。这支是在垂直品鉴过程中，最为平衡的一支酒。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts a rich aroma of sweet red fruits and dried apricots, accompanied by subtle hints of oak, minerals, and floral notes. The silky texture coats the palate, with a smooth mid-palate, while the lingering finish is marked by a rugged, serious tone. This wine stands out as the most balanced in our vertical tasting.

English pairs.original: The nose was filled with mellow red fruits, dried fruits such as dried fig characterized with slight lees, mineral and flowers, very creamy and smooth mid-palate with a long and austerely stony aftertaste, the most balanced one during the vertical tasting.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的鼻子中充满了温和的红果味，干果如干的枫树，带有轻微的陈酿味，矿物质和花朵，口感非常丰富且细腻的中口，尾韵长且干净的石质味，整个品酒过程中最为平衡的一瓶。

Western reviews.review: A disappointing showing for a wine that is usually very good or excellent. Has aromas of cracker and cola, and a hefty dose of dusty bark and sour cherry on the palate. Lighter in weight than usual, too. Just isn't singing for me this year; tasted twice. Imported by Epic Wines.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒今年的表现令人失望，通常来说它的品质很好或是极品。酒中有饼干和可乐的香气，口感中有厚重的干土和酸苹果味。今年的体积比平常轻一些。今年的品酒体验让我很失望，品尝了两次。进口商是Epic Wines。

Western reviews.review: Mint and bread flour on the nose, with raspberry and red plum flavors on the palate. Its smooth, oaky tannins continue through to the finish, where there's bread-flour and graham-cracker flavors. A terrific GSM.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中有薄荷和面粉的味道，口感中有草莓和红桃的风味。它的滑顺的橡木味的苦味持续到尾部，尾部还有面粉和饼干味道。是一瓶非常出色的GSM红酒。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung. In der Nase reifes dunkles Beerenkonfit, zart nach Quittenkäse, Dörrfeigen, ein Hauch von Nougat, mit Luft rauchig und würzig, dunkler Nougat. Saftig, elegante Textur, reife Kirschenfrucht, finessenreiche Struktur, angenehme Mineralik, hat eine erste Trinkreife erreicht, feiner Holzeinsatz, extraktsüßer Nachhall.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。酒香中充满成熟的浓郁果酱味，带有轻微的李子干味和干枣味，微微带有牛奶糖味，随着空气的流动，酒香变得更加烟熏和浓郁，深层的牛奶糖味。口感丰富，细腻，成熟的樱桃味，结构精致，矿物质味道舒适，酒已经达到初期成熟，木质味道细致，余味丰富。

Western reviews.review: Shows the wonderfully silky side of Grenache—the main part of the blend—in its diaphanous, delicate texture that manages to be soft but not too soft, beautifully framing flavors of cherries, spice and cola. Long on the finish, trailing away slowly and elegantly. Drink now–2015.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒展现出格雷纳奇(Grenache)的优雅面貌，呈现出细腻、轻盈的口感，既软又不至于太软，完美地衬托出樱桃、香料和可乐的风味。口感持久，缓慢而优雅地消退。建议立即享用，至2015年最佳。

Western reviews.review: Nine Popes is a grenache-based red that is mixed with old 80-year old parcels of Barossa shiraz and mourvèdre in between Williamstown and Ebenezer. It is all whole bunch fermented and the cap is managed via pigeage and hand plunging, as well as daily pump-overs throughout fermentation. The wine aged in a high percentage of French oak for 20 months. Look for a fragrant spicy red with a slightly soupy texture. The palate is a mix of red and black liquorice and plummy, dark red berry fruit with earthy, cinnamon, savoury. A bit soft and unkempt it the back end but otherwise solid. Serve with lamb or beef dishes. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 《九位教皇》是一款以格纳什为主的红酒，混合了80年老的巴罗萨希拉兹和穆尔韦德葡萄，产自威廉斯敦和埃本泽之间。酒液全部采用整株发酵，顶盖管理通过踩压和手动浸泡，以及整个发酵过程中的日常泵送。酒液在法国橡木桶中陈化20个月。酒体香气浓郁，带有香料味，口感略微浓稠。口感呈现出红色和黑色甘草和浓郁的红色浆果，带有泥土、肉桂、咸味等风味。酒尾略微软弱，但整体上仍然坚实。建议与羊肉或牛肉菜肴搭配。

Chinese pairs.original: 深色水果、李子及药草的芬芳与微妙的香草、丁香及来自橡木桶的香料气息交织融合，酒质复杂，极富表现力，酒体适中，颇为平衡，回味持久而稳固。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich, dark fruit flavors of plum and herbal notes are intertwined with subtle hints of vanilla, cinnamon, and aromatic spices from oak aging, resulting in a complex and expressive wine with a balanced body and a long, solid finish.

Western reviews.review: One of Chile’s go-to Best Buy Cabernets. Always solid and well made, with this vintage giving off hickory, rubber and blackberry aromas in front of a rich, tannic palate of wild berry, mesquite and leathery flavors. Roasted and heady on the finish, with big bones and structure.
Western reviews.translation: 智利的最佳选择之一的卡伯内特。每次都坚固而精致，今年的品种带来了烟熏木、橡胶和黑莓的香气，伴随着丰富的、坚实的口感，带有野生莓果、墨西哥干树和皮革的味道。口感浓郁、浓厚，结构坚实，骨架强大。

Chinese pairs.original: 强烈的果味，樱桃和李子的香气，完整的单宁，回味带有巧克力的感觉，不算特别卓越，但很好。
Chinese pairs.new: Intense fruit flavors, notes of cherry and plum, full tannins, and a lingering chocolate finish, not particularly exceptional but very good.

Western reviews.review: Punchy and fruity up front, this Cab doesn't seem to be trying to do too much and thus it succeeds on many fronts. The cherry and plum flavors are clean if unspectacular, while the finish shows full tannins, some bitter chocolate and pretty good feel. Nothing out of the ordinary but perfectly fine.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒入口果香浓郁，果味清新，虽然不夸张，但却成功地表现出了它的特点。樱桃和李子风味清晰但不突出，尾部有充分的苦味，伴有巧克力苦味和不错的口感。没有什么特别的，但却非常合适。

Chinese pairs.original: 近乎黑色基调的红色，带紫色边缘，酒体不是非常清澈，有少许酒石酸结晶，典型的Bin 389香气，带有黑色水果（黑莓、黑醋栗）和橡木桶味（香草、烤吐司、葡式蛋挞），入口展现甜美、新鲜而且无比圆润的口感，果味和单宁平衡，酸度迷人，并且在余韵中亦能感到一抹酸爽。
Chinese pairs.new: Deeply colored red wine with purple edges, not particularly clear in the glass, with a few crystals of tartaric acid present. Aromas of Bin 389 are classic, with black fruit (blackberry, blackberry jam) and oak influences (vanilla, toasted bread, Portuguese custard tart). The palate is sweet, fresh, and incredibly smooth, with balanced fruit and tannins, a lovely acidity, and a lingering finish with a hint of crispness.

English pairs.original: Dark red color with a purple rim, not completely clear, a little tartaric crystal, classic Bin 389's nose at still youthful stage, with dark fruits (blackberry, cassis) and oaks (vanilla, toast, portuguese egg tart), sweet and fresh, a surprisingly round taste with a good balance of fruit and tannin, the acidity was sufficient which had a nice presence on the aftertaste.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色，带有紫色的边缘，略微不透明，出现少量的葡萄糖晶。酒香典雅黑，仍然保持着青春的活力，带有黑berry、黑加仑和香烟的味道，以及橡木的香气，如香草、-toast和葡萄牙蛋挞。酒口甜而新鲜，惊人的圆润，果味和纤维素的平衡非常好，酸度适中，留在舌尖的滋味非常好。

Western reviews.review: This opaque Cab-Shiraz blend needs plenty of aeration before revealing its charms. When it does, it's led by blackberry and blood plum with undercurrents of charred root vegetables, coffee and licorice, and a lick of toasty oak. Tightly wound, chalk-dust tannins make room for the supple fruit on the dense, shapely palate. One for the cellar, this should really start to shine in another 7-10 years.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的颜色是浓郁的，混合了卡布ernet和雪利酒。需要充分的氧化后才能展现出它的魅力。展现出来后，主要是黑莓和血橙的味道，伴随着烤土豆、咖啡和甘草的底调，和一丝焦糖的味道。紧绷的矿物质质感的牙齿让果肉在浓密的口感中占据了主导地位。这个红酒适合放入酒窖中，7-10年后它将会真正地闪耀。

Western reviews.review: In outstanding years, 389 always wins because the best of its fruit is not required higher up the chain, and the cuts from 707 and Grange additionally bolster this classic cabernet sauvignon shiraz blend.
