Penfolds Winemaker Andrew Baldwin says this is one of those years, and we should all be stocking up. The attack is rich and dense, with the shiraz bolstering the cabernet. I'm not always bowled over by 389 compared to the Oz critics, but the '21 is all it can be and more. Indeed, it is one of the best I have tasted. The shiraz falls short of the 50% mark, topping out at 47%, and the cabernet sauvignon comes in at 53%. The fruit is a tour of South Australia with stops at McLaren Vale, Barossa Valley, and Wrattonbully, and all spends 12 months in 37% new American oak hogsheads. 'Baby Grange' is used as a moniker for Bin 389 primarily because components of the wine are matured in the same barrels used in the previous vintage of Grange, one-year-old American oak. Deep, dark, and plummy with cigar and chocolate covered blueberries, this is a fabulous 389. The winemaking team talks about Black Forest cake as a marker, but you can add several descriptors, from coffee and cola to chocolate and spice. The texture sings here, and the acidity keeps it fresh and humming along the palate. You are supposed to drink 389 while waiting for the Grange. (Anthony Gismondi).
Western reviews.translation: 在杰出的年份里，389 luôn会赢得好评，因为它的最佳果实不需要更高的链条，而707和格兰杰（Grange）切下的部分也会增强这个经典的卡波涅（Cabernet Sauvignon）-谢里（Shiraz）混合酒。Penfolds的酒师安德鲁·巴尔登（Andrew Baldwin）说，这是其中一个这样的年份，我们应该都要备货。酒的攻击性强烈，浓密，谢里加强了卡波涅。虽然我并不是每次都被389的表现所打动，但‘21年的确是它可以做到的和更多。事实上，它是其中最好的之一。谢里占比不及50%，最高达到47%，卡波涅占比53%。酒的果实来自南澳大利亚各地，包括麦克劳伦谷（McLaren Vale）、巴罗萨谷（Barossa Valley）和沃顿布利（Wrattonbully），所有酒都在37%的新美国橡木桶中陈酿12个月。酒被称为“小格兰杰”（Baby Grange），主要是因为酒的组成部分在同一批橡木桶中陈酿，用于前一年的格兰杰陈酿。深色，黑色，浓郁的酒，带有雪茄和巧克力覆盖的蓝berries味道，这是一个了不起的389。酒师团队谈到黑森林蛋糕（Black Forest cake）作为一个标志，但你可以添加几个描述符，从咖啡和可乐到巧克力和香料。酒的质感非常好，酸度保持酒的新鲜和流畅的口感。你应该在等待格兰杰的时候喝389（Anthony Gismondi）。

Western reviews.review: An almost even split of Cab and Shiraz, this is a muscular, reticent red you could cut with a knife. Plump plum and blackberry aromas are followed by peppery, dusty spices and chocolatey oak. Tannins are powerful and sinewy, wrapping around the tongue like a vice, leaving just enough room for the dark fruit to shine. Drink 2024–2034.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的酒精含量接近于50/50的比例，分別是卡巴（Cabernet）和希拉兹（Shiraz）。这是一款肌肉感十足的红酒，口感沉稳，几乎可以用刀子切割。酒中浓郁的浆果和黑莓香气，随后是辣椒、尘土和巧克力木头的香气。酒中的纤维素强大且坚韧，像夹子一样紧紧包裹在舌头上，只留下足够的空间让黑色水果的风味闪耀。建议在2024-2034年内饮用。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby in colour with purple reflections and subtle brightening on the ochre rim. The "Baby Grange" is still a little buttoned up on the nose at the moment, with delicate aromas of nougat and fig, underlaid by cranberry with some pleasant fine oak spice and a touch of eucalyptus in the background. The palate is subtly fresh with integrated tannins, juicy, ripe cherry and a citrus-minerality on the aftertaste. Still young this needs further bottle ageing.
Western reviews.translation: 酒色深红色，带有紫色反射和浅黄色边缘。"Baby Grange" 的鼻子还有一点紧绷，目前有细微的杏仁和枣子的香味，底层有浆果味和一些愉悦的细微橡木香和背景中的薄荷在背景中。口感清新，纤维素整合，水果味浓郁，柑橘矿物味在余味中。还年轻，这需要进一步的瓶子成熟。

Western reviews.review: ‘Baby Grange’ is used as a moniker for Bin 389 primarily because components of the wine are matured in the same barrels that held the previous vintage of Grange, i.e. one-year-old American oak. Wood aside, 389 has always been crafted as red wine with the structure you expect from a cabernet but the richness you find in a great bottle of shiraz. In 2019 the mix is 53/47 cabernet sauvignon/shiraz. It is a multi-regional blend involving Padthaway, McLaren Vale, Coonawarra, Wrattonbully, and Barossa Valley. This spends a year in oak (25 percent new). The winemaking team talks about black forest cake as a marker for this red, so if it didn’t have your interest before, it may now. Coffee, cola, chocolate, and spice penetrate the wine through the finish. It’s the textures that attract, so lush and smooth but all balanced by the appropriate acidity that keeps it fresh and humming along the palate. There is no rush to drink this wine; it will easily age for a decade and likely for another one after that. It is a very good 389. (Anthony Gismondi).
Western reviews.translation: 《宝贝格兰奇》(Baby Grange)这个名称主要是因为这瓶酒的成分部分在之前的格兰奇(Grange)酒的木桶中发酵和成熟过的。也就是说，这些木桶里曾经装过一年的美国橡木桶。除了木桶外，389系列一直以红酒的结构和Cabernet的风格，但又有Shiraz的丰富感。2019年的混合比例是53%的Cabernet Sauvignon和47%的Shiraz。这个酒是来自多个地区的混合，包括帕德瑟威(Padthaway)、麦克劳伦谷(McLaren Vale)、库纳瓦拉(Coonawarra)、沃顿布利(Wrattonbully)和巴罗萨谷(Barossa Valley)。酒精在木桶中停留了一年（25%新木桶）。酒庄的制作团队将这个红酒比作黑森林蛋糕，如果之前你对这个酒没有兴趣，现在可能会有了。咖啡、可乐、巧克力和香料在酒尾留下了深刻的印象。酒的质感是吸引人的，丰富而光滑，但又被适当的酸度平衡，保持了酒的新鲜感和流畅感。没有必要急着喝这个酒，它可以轻松地存放十年以上，甚至可能再存放十年以上。它是一个非常好的389系列。 (安东尼·吉斯蒙迪)

Chinese pairs.original: 即便颜色清淡，但也呈现了品种本身带有的典型金黄色泽，起初有点狐臭味，而后被水果干、水果蛋糕、蔬菜、杏、药材、矿物和金银花的香气所掩盖，口感很有分量，伴随多矿物质且集中、悠长的余韵。
Chinese pairs.new: The wine presents a pale yet quintessential golden hue characteristic of its varietal. Initially, it displays a hint of foxiness, which is soon overpowered by aromas of dried fruit, fruit cake, vegetables, apricot, herbs, minerals, and jasmine. The palate is substantial, with a concentrated and lingering finish that showcases a multitude of minerals.

English pairs.original: Even it was pale, but still showed typically golden color, a little foxy, but covered by dried fruits, fruit cake, vegetables, apricot, medicine, mineral, honey and honeysuckle noses, full of volume on the mouth, with a very intense, mineral and long finish.
English pairs.new: 即使酒色较浅，但仍然展现出典型的金色，带有少许的浣熊味，但被干果、水果蛋糕、蔬菜、杏子、药膏、矿物质、蜂蜜和honeysuckle所掩盖的鼻子，口感丰富，口味强烈，矿物质和持久的尾韵。

Western reviews.review: Yangarra is a biodynamic McLaren Vale producer focusing on single-vineyard Rhone variety wines. Roussanne, rarely seen in Oz, shines on these soils of sand and ironstone gravels. Wild yeasts and a lack of sulphur and fining have created a savoury, textured, waxy white, herbal and wild meadow flower aromas, fresh with grapefruit and lychee acidity, and plumped with honeysuckle, nutty lees, florals and musk melon. The finish is spicy and lemon peel lingering. Pour with roast poultry or sablefish, or hold for three to five years. (Treve Ring).
Western reviews.translation: 杨加拉(Yangarra)是一家以生态农业(McLaren Vale)为主的葡萄酒生产商，专注于单品种罗讷(Rhone)葡萄酒。罗讷(Roussanne)葡萄酒在澳大利亚并不常见，但在杨加拉的葡萄酒中却表现出色。这种葡萄酒的风味特点是由野生酵母、无硫化和无精酿制成的，具有丰富的口感、蜡质感、香草和野花香气、柑橘和荔枝酸度，以及蜂蜜、坚果和花朵的风味。这种葡萄酒的口感丰富、清新、果香和花香。这种葡萄酒的尾韵是辛辣的柠檬皮味。建议与烤鸡或沙白鱼搭配，或者将其储存3-5年。

Chinese pairs.original: 酒体轻盈，散发着柑橘香，并伴有淡淡的樱桃及李子味，微微带红色水果的酸味，余味清脆而悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Light-bodied with citrus aromas and subtle hints of cherry and plum, accompanied by a touch of red fruit acidity, finishing crisp and lingering.

Western reviews.review: Aromas of cherry and raspberry bring a slight earthy stemminess, while the palate is light and zesty, with semisharp plum and pie cherry fruit flavors and a dash of red sucking candy. Medium-long at best on the finish, with citrus, tang and pepper notes.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的气味中带有浓郁的樱桃和草莓香气，伴有微微的泥土味。口感轻盈、清爽，果味清脆，带有半甜的浆果和果酱风味，最后还有些柑橘和辣椒的余味。

Chinese pairs.original: 紫罗兰，薰衣草，辛香料香气，香料和浓郁而持久的李子，树莓，椰子和黑色浆果风味，余味酸爽，单宁紧实。
Chinese pairs.new: Violet, lavender, and spicy aromas, rich and long-lasting flavors of plum, raspberry, coconut, and blackberry, with a tangy finish and firm tannins.

Western reviews.review: This blend seems to combine the best of the popular, fruity Shiraz with the more exotic, animal Mourvèdre grape. The palate shows only faint tannin and a few undertones of vanilla and coconut that glide through to the finish on a streak of acidity. An ideal choice for smoked meats. Drink now to 2012.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的混合似乎结合了受欢迎的、果香的辛茅利酒和更为独特、带有动物味的摩尔维德葡萄的优点。口感上只有微弱的苦味和几丝香草和椰子味的底调，随着酸度的流动而在尾部流淌。适合与烟熏肉搭配。建议立即饮用至2012年。

Chinese pairs.original: 丰满的李子和黑莓香味，带有一点点辛辣，摩卡咖啡等味道，复杂而平衡，咖啡喝肉蔻的香味突出，紧致收敛同事优雅而持久。
Chinese pairs.new: Luscious plum and blackberry flavors with a hint of spice, accompanied by notes of mocha coffee, complex and balanced. Prominent cinnamon-like flavors from the coffee, with a tight, refined, and elegant finish that lingers.

Western reviews.review: Spicy, tobacco leaf, rhubarb, smoked meat, celery root, resin, peppery aromas. Dry, round, supple palate with smoked herb, tobacco leaf, resin, coffee, rhubarb, meaty, cedar, dill flavours. New World pinot at a fair price. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的口感是:

有辣味、烟草叶、萝卜叶、熏肉、芹菜根、树脂、胡椒味的香气。

口感干净、圆润、柔滑，带有熏草、烟草叶、树脂、咖啡、萝卜叶、肉味、红木、芫荽的味道。

这是一瓶新世界品种的红酒，价格合理。

barossa valley estate e&e black pepper s.name: barossa valley estate e&e black pepper shiraz 2003

Chinese pairs.original: 这片无灌溉的葡萄园的土壤由深砂石壤土和红棕色的黏土所组成。这是一支传统的巴洛萨设拉子，通常在数年窖藏后会演变出谷物般的成熟滋味。在这支酒中我感到“澳洲老酒”的气味不是那么明显，但却拥有更多的严肃的矿物质以及宜人的深度，比如说松脂、香料、皮革以及巧克力泡芙。其饱满集中而且强劲的口感被更为厚实、多肉的回味所覆盖。
Chinese pairs.new: This dry-farmed vineyard's soil is composed of deep sandy loam and reddish clay. This is a traditional Barolos-style wine, which typically develops a grainy, mature flavor after several years of aging. In this wine, I sense a less pronounced "Australian old wine" aroma, but it has more serious mineral notes and a pleasant depth, such as cedar, spice, leather, and chocolate mousse. Its full-bodied, concentrated and powerful palate is covered by a more substantial, fleshy finish.

English pairs.original: The soils of this dry grown vineyard are deep sandy loams and red-brown clays. A conventional Barossa Shiraz usually evolved kernel-like ripe flavours after few years cellaring. I could find less ‘Aussie old wine’ bouquet in this bottle, while it possessed austerer minerality and joyful depths such as pine gum, spices, leather and chocolate puff. Its richly intense and powerful texture was coated by an even thicker and fleshier finish.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒来自于干种葡萄园，其土壤深厚，质地细砂质和红棕色粘土。一般来说，巴罗萨地区的传统干种谢拉斯红酒经过几年的陈酿后会展现出核桃般的成熟风味。但是，这瓶红酒却没有典型的澳大利亚老酒的香气，而是展现出干净的矿物质和欢乐的深度，如松树胶、香料、皮革和巧克力味。它的丰富浓郁的口感被一层更厚更丰富的尾部所覆盖。

Western reviews.review: Winemaker Stuart Bourne calls 2003 a thinking man's vintage, and he was clearly on form, crafting a delicious wine filled with blackberry tea aromas and flavors. It's just slightly creamy on the palate, but still firm, turning a bit crisp at the end. Drink 2008–2013. Imported by Pacific Wine Partners.
Western reviews.translation: 酒庄的 Stuart Bourne 先生称 2003 年的葡萄酒是思想家们的葡萄酒，显然他表现出色，酿造了一款充满黑莓茶香气和口味的美味葡萄酒。口感略微奶油，但仍然坚实，最后变得略微清脆。建议饮用时间：2008-2013年。进口商：太平洋葡萄酒合作社。

Western reviews.review: Tasting in 2024. Holding up quite well. Still retains loads of blackberry and black currant undertones, as well as the creamy overlay mentioned in earlier tasting notes. Delivers taste variety across the entire palate and compares well with younger syrahs given its long legs.
Western reviews.translation: 2024 年的品酒体验。酒精度还不错，依然保留了大量的黑莓和黑加仑的底调，以及早期品酒笔记中提到的奶油覆盖层。酒精在整个口感中呈现出多样性，与年轻的辛拉斐相比，酒精的持久度也很好。

Chinese pairs.original: 酒体呈深红宝石色泽，香气含蓄，带有紫罗兰、水果蜜饯、樱桃利口酒、草菇、芝麻、奶油、黑醋栗和微微牛奶巧克力及丁香气息，酒体中等，篮式压榨赐予口感很棒的顺滑度，结构结实，酸度较高，伴随略带香草奶油滋味的悠长余韵。
Chinese pairs.new: The wine has a deep garnet color, with a subtle aroma featuring notes of lavender, fruit preserves, cherry liqueur, mushroom, sesame, butter, black walnut, and hints of milk chocolate and nutmeg. The body is medium, with a smooth texture courtesy of the basket press, and a robust structure. The acidity is high, with a long, lingering finish that includes hints of vanilla and creamy notes.

English pairs.original: Deep ruby color, restrained bouquets of violet, preserved fruits, kirsch, straw mushroom, sesame, cream, black currant, tinge of milk chocolate and clove, medium-bodied, basket press added good smoothness for palate, firm structure, high acidity, with a long length that hint of vanilla cream notes.
English pairs.new: 深红色葡萄酒，淡雅的紫罗兰、保鲜水果、柠檬水果、麦麸、芝麻、奶油、黑加仑、牛奶巧克力和丁香的香气，中等体积，篮压添加了口感的平滑度，坚实的结构，高酸度，长长的尾部带有香草奶油的味道。

Western reviews.review: Interessantes Bouquet, duftet nach sonnengetrockneten Tomaten, Sugo und frisch gemahlenem Pfeffer, dann folgt die intensive, dunkle Frucht. Sehr guter Trinkfluss mit viel Frische am Gaumen, dann reifem Tannin und einer saftigen Säure, diskrete Rauchnoten im Finale. Der Wein für's Barbecue.
Western reviews.translation: 这个红酒的香气很有趣，闻起来像晒干的番茄、番茄酱和新磨的黑胡椒，接着是浓郁的黑果味。口感非常流畅，舌头上有很多新鲜的感觉，然后是成熟的苦味和清脆的酸度，最后是微微的烟味。这个红酒非常适合烧烤。

Western reviews.review: Typischer Neue-Welt-Shiraz mit generösem Pflaumenkompott, reife Johannisbeere, dazu Minze, Rosmarin, Eukalyptus und schwarzer Pfeffer mit Rauch und Würze. Am Gaumen viel Süsse und viel Alkohol, dazu dichte, feinporige Tannine. Barocke Wucht!
Western reviews.translation: 典型的新世界红酒，带有丰富的浓郁果酱风味，包括熟透的浆果和浓郁的黑莓，伴随着薄荷、罗勒、桉树和黑胡椒的香气，带有烟熏和调味的味道。口感上充满了甜度和酒精感，伴随着密集的细腻橡皮感。酒的力量惊人！

Chinese pairs.original: 结实，风格独特，带有纯净的覆盆子、红色李子的味道，酸度爽脆，余味中带有花香。
Chinese pairs.new: Full-bodied, with a unique style, featuring pure flavors of blackberry and cherry, crisp acidity, and a floral finish.

Western reviews.review: Plum and berry aromas are expressive and a touch gritty. This Malbec feels round and medium to full in body, with present but controlled tannins. Oak, lactic notes and black-fruit flavors finish minty and with natural herbal hints along with healthy, bracing acidity.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有浓郁的浆果和浆果香气，略带粗糙感。这种马尔贝克酒的口感圆润，体积中等到中等以上，具有明显但控制好的橡皮感。酒尾带有橡木、乳酸和黑果味，伴有清新薄荷和天然的草药味，口感清新爽口。

Western reviews.review: Trotz seiner 14,5 Vol.-% ist dieser Malbec ein Ausbund an Eleganz mit einer kühlen glasklaren Frucht und den typisch balsamischen Noten von Lakritze. Seidig am Ansatz, saftige Säure, reife Kirschen und Zwetschgen, in perfekter Harmonie zum reifen, feinkörnigen Tannin. Bleibt lang und endet auf perfekt konzentrierte Frucht.
Western reviews.translation: 尽管酒精度为14.5%，这个马尔贝克酒依然展现出优雅的风格，具有清澈的果香和典型的薄荷糖味。入口滑顺，酸度丰富，口感丰富的浆果和黑杏，完美和谐的与细腻的橡木味。酒尾长长，结尾是浓郁的果香。

Chinese pairs.original: 黑莓，樱桃等成熟浆果芳香，口感柔滑平衡，单宁细致，有甜果实及摩卡巧克力香气，余味很讨人欢喜。
Chinese pairs.new: Blackberry, cherry, and other ripe plum aromas abound, with a smooth and balanced texture, fine tannins, sweet fruit flavors, and hints of mocha chocolate, leaving a delightful aftertaste.

Western reviews.review: (2016) A very typical, traditional and extremely well done example of a big, American oak-aged South Australian Shiraz, crammed with spice, tobacco and dusty blue/black fruit, a great mulberry warmth and open-armed style. On the palate it delivers much the same, the rich, thick, dark fruits layered with the chariness and spice of the barrels, but it does not lack definition: the tannins are grippy, the acidity feels natural and fresh, and the berry fruit and spice finish goes on with considerable length.
Western reviews.translation: 2016年，一个典型的、传统的、极其出色的澳大利亚南部州（South Australian）谢里兹（Shiraz）红酒，充满了香料、烟草和灰尘般的蓝黑色果味，带有浓郁的樱桃味和开放的风格。口感上，它呈现出与之相似的风格，丰富的、厚实的、黑暗的果味与木桶的焦糖和香料味层层叠加，但它并没有失去清晰性：坚果味的苦味感强烈，酸度自然且新鲜，果味和香料的尾韵长达数秒。

Western reviews.review: Spicy, black berry jam, cedar, vanilla, chocolate, peppery, savoury, ginger aromas with a smoky, black licorice streak. Full, fresh, round, juicy palate with some light, grainy tannins. Inky, black pepper, lack cherry, savoury, vanilla, chocolate, slightly gamey flavours with a bit of coffee, rosemary and tobacco on the finish. Good concentration and intensity but youthful, needs 2-5 years to round out. (Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感丰富、清新、圆润、水果 juicy，口感中有轻微的粗糙感。酒体中有黑 pepper、黑 cherry、咖啡、玫瑰mary、烟草等复杂的味道。酒精浓度高，但仍需要2-5年时间才能达到最佳状态。

Western reviews.review: Tiefdunkles Rubingranat, opaker Kern, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung. Intensives schwarzes Waldbeerkonfit, ein Hauch von Lakritze, eingelegte Kirschen, vermittelt fruchtige Süße, ein Hauch von Brombeeren unterlegt. Saftig, elegant, mittlere Komplexität, reife Kirschen, eingebundene Tannine, zart nach Nougat im Abgang, ein vielseitiger Speisenbegleiter.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，透明的葡萄核，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。强烈的黑莓果酱味道，带有薄荷糖味，腌制的樱桃，传达出果甜的味道，带有浆果味。口感丰富，优雅，中等复杂度，成熟的樱桃，融合的苦味，尾部带有轻微的牛奶糖味。是一种多功能的食物伴侣。

Western reviews.review: Named for one of Barossa's top vineyards, this blends fruit from Barossa, McLaren Vale, Clare Valley and Langhorne Creek into a splendid warm-climate Shiraz. It's full bodied, dense and dusty in texture, with rich dark-fruit flavors of dates, blackberries and blueberries. Hints of baking spices and mocha from the barrel-aging should integrate nicely over the next several years. Drink 2017–2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒以巴罗萨地区顶级葡萄园命名，混合了来自巴罗萨、麦克劳伦谷、克莱尔谷和朗霍恩溪的葡萄，呈现出一款出色的温带红酒。酒体丰富、密度高、质地粗糙，口感丰富的黑果风味，如干枣、黑莓和蓝莓。酒桶陈化的烘烤香料和摩卡味道会在未来几年内融合得很好。建议饮用时间：2017-2025年。

Chinese pairs.original: 酒液100%桶内发酵及陈年。酒体呈现淡稻草黄色泽，香气中等集中，富含打火石、烤腰果、西柚、青苹果、白色雏菊、奶油甜玉米、酸橙、甘草及少许香草和白胡椒气息，入口干净，充满矿物质、同时浓稠且厚重的口感，伴有坚果（榛子）、蜜瓜及柠檬皮滋味，纯净的高酸度，伴随悠长的烤坚果余韵。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine is 100% barrel-fermented and aged. The color is a pale hay yellow. The aroma is medium-intense, with notes of gunpowder, toasted pecan, grapefruit, green apple, white daisy, buttery sweet corn, orange peel, licorice, and a hint of herbs and white pepper. The palate is clean, full of minerals, and has a rich, heavy texture. Flavors of hazelnut, honeydew, and lemon zest accompany a crisp, high acidity and a lingering toasted nut finish.

English pairs.original: 100% barrel fermented and matured. Pale straw color, medium noses of flint, roasted cashew, grapefruit, green apple, white daisy flower, cream sweet corn, lime, liquorice, hint of vanilla and white pepper, clean and mineral while weighty and dense on the palate with nuts (hazelnut), melon and lemon peel flavors, high and pure acidity, with a long roast nuts length.
English pairs.new: 本酒是100%在橡木桶中发酵和成熟的。酒液呈现出淡黄色，酒香中有火石、烤腰果、葡萄柚、绿苹果、白百合花、甜玉米、酸橙、薄荷、香烟、淡淡的香草和白胡椒等味道。口感清爽、矿物质，重量感和密度均衡，口味中有杏仁、瓜果和柠檬皮等味道，酸度高纯，尾部长达杏仁的味道。

Western reviews.review: Bold, muscular and showing a bit of alcoholic warmth, this is a full-throttle Chardonnay loaded with flavor. Smoke, buttered popcorn, grilled mango and a squeeze of citrus on the finish add up to a wine that's a bit clumsy in a soft, lovable way. Drink now.
Western reviews.translation: 这款佳酿充满了味道，具有强烈的风格和肌肉感，略带酒精的暖意。它的口感丰富，带有烟熏味、爆米花味、烤芒果味和柑橘味的尾韵，虽然有些不太协调，但又让人难以抗拒。建议尽快享用。

Chinese pairs.original: 橄榄油，香草和浆果的香味，植物的气息与黑色水果的味道混合在一起，结构坚固，回味持久，并带黑醋栗和巧克力味道。
Chinese pairs.new: "Notes of olive oil, herbs, and fruit, with a blend of earthy undertones and dark fruit flavors. A robust structure, with a long finish, and hints of black truffle and chocolate."

Western reviews.review: Briary red-fruit aromas are earthy and mellow, with notes of red-apple skin and raspberry. This is medium in body, fresh and feels good on the palate. Plum, raspberry and vanilla flavors are lightly herbal, while the finish is largely smooth and mild.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有浓郁的浓果香气，带有泥土和平和的味道，伴有红苹果皮和莓果的香气。口感中等，清新且在口中感觉舒适。酒中有浓郁的浓果味，如浆果和莓果，伴有轻微的草药味。酒尾平滑温和。

Western reviews.review: This all Maipo fruit cabernet exhibits the regional aromas of cassis/menthol/bay leaf with an earthy, chocolate undercurrent. The attack is dry and fresh the tannins light with blackcurrant, black olives and mocha/chocolate flavours rubbed with 'boldo' or wild dried herbs. Some 60% of the wine is aged in American oak barrels the remainder in stainless steel vats. A great value for cabernet drinkers who love to grill meat on the barbecue. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 这款来自马伊波地区的卡波内特红酒展现出典型的风味特征，包括黑加仑、薄荷和山楂的香气，以及土壤和巧克力的底调。酒体干净清新，苦味轻微，黑加仑、黑橄榄和巧克力味道融合在一起，伴随着野生干香草的味道。酒中有60%的酒龄在美国橡木桶中陈化，余下的在不锈钢罐中陈化。对于喜欢在烧烤架上烤肉的卡波内特爱好者来说，这是一款极好的选择。

Chinese pairs.original: 此酒的香气非常封闭，但却十分独特，有西柚、彩虹糖、岩石、牛轧糖气息，以及一点可爱的蜂蜜味打底。厚实、饱满而且干净的中段口感，伴随着平衡了口中甜味的细致酸度和浓稠、悠长的岩石质余味。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine has a very closed nose, but it's incredibly unique, with notes of grapefruit, rainbow sugar, rock, and a hint of honey sweetness underneath. The full-bodied, rich, and clean mid-palate is accompanied by a delicate acidity that balances the sweetness in the mouth and a long, dense, and lingering stony finish.

English pairs.original: Its nose was still fairly restrained, but a unique expression of grapefruit, rainbow candy, stone, nougat and a background of lovely honey. Thick and rich but clean on mid-palate with finely detailed acid to balance the sweetness, with a viscously long and stony length.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的鼻子虽然还比较谦逊，但却展现出独特的风味，如柑橘、彩虹糖、石头、果仁和一层美妙的蜂蜜的味道。口感丰富厚实，但中口清爽细腻，酸度细致平衡了甜度，长尾丰富持久，带有石头般的质感。

Western reviews.review: Soft and relatively open in style, with captivating aromas of wet mossy stones and ripe melon and hints of pear and lychee on the palate. Very approachable now for a young Prüm.
Western reviews.translation: 风格温和，相对开放，具有迷人的湿石和成熟的瓜果香气，口感中有梨和荔枝的余味。适合年轻普吕姆的现在品尝。

jim barry the mcrae wood shiraz 2006.name: jim barry the mcrae wood shiraz 2006

Chinese pairs.original: 此酒的香气能感到一些非常棒的花香，同时还有细腻的杏仁牛轧糖、巧克力、桉树、椰子、西莓干及焦糖气息，入口极其集中，带有相当多的矿物质，余韵悠长且强有力。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts an alluring bouquet of vibrant floral notes, complemented by subtle almond nougat, rich chocolate, eucalyptus, coconut, dried cranberries, and caramel undertones. The palate is intensely concentrated, with a robust mineral presence, a long and powerful finish.

English pairs.original: Some really nice floral perfumes with delicate almond nougat, chocolate, eucalyptus, coconut, prune and caramel, the wine was very intense on palate and quite mineral, with a long and powerful length.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒具有非常美好的花香，口感细腻，带有杏仁糖、巧克力、桉树、椰子、浆果和焦糖的味道。口感非常浓郁，矿物质味道浓郁，长长的尾部非常有力。

Western reviews.review: A wonderful year has yielded an amazing edition of McRae Wood replete with fabulous texture and intense cedar minty blueberry, black plum fruit. The mid-palate is awash in dense dark spicy fruit flecked with smoky tobacco and dried herbs and a wallop of new oak. A hedonistic, glossy red that should easily age twenty years in bottle but you could enjoy it today with a grilled butterflied leg of lamb on the barbecue. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 麦克雷伍德（McRae Wood）今年的产量令人惊叹，具有优雅的口感和强烈的红 cedar、薄荷、蓝莓、黑浆果等风味。中口充满了浓密的黑色浓郁果味，带有烟熏的烟草和干燥的香草味，新橡木的味道也非常浓郁。这种让人沉醉的红酒应该能在瓶子里存活二十年，但你也可以现在就享受它，搭配在烤架上的烤羊腿来品尝。

Western reviews.review: (2012) Again there is a hefty 15.5% ABV here, though the nose seems a little purer, a little more peppery too, focused on lean and sinewy black berry fruit, a layer of cocoa and a whisper of exotic, almost floral top notes adds lovely complexity. On the palate this is firm, taut, with a fine depth of blackcurrant and some red fruit tones, and those spicy and peppery edges again. The tannins seem a little finer, though still grippy, and this has an air of precision that is just missing on the otherwise impressive 2005. Indeed the 2005 is the more highly regarded vintage, but based on the evidence of these two bottles, the 2006 get the nod from me.
Western reviews.translation: 2012年，这款红酒的酒精度为15.5%，虽然闻起来似乎更纯粹、更有辣味，但焦点仍然在黑莓果味上，伴有巧克力和花香的微妙复杂。口感坚实、紧致，黑currant和红果味的深度非常出色，辣味和辣椒味的边缘再次出现。纤维素似乎更细腻，但仍然有抓握感，这款红酒有着精确的味道，远远超过2005年那款虽然令人印象深刻但缺乏精确的红酒。事实上，2005年是更受推崇的产季，但根据这两瓶红酒的证据，我更倾向于选择2006年。

Western reviews.review: This full-bodied Shiraz starts off with blackberry aromas tinged with menthol, then delivers concentrated blackberry flavors framed by vanillin oak. It's a full-bodied, creamy-textured wine, with a long, slightly warming finish. Drink now-2018.
Western reviews.translation: 这款充满体积的雪利司令酒以黑莓的香气开场，带有薄荷的味道，然后呈现浓缩的黑莓口感，伴有香橙木的味道。它是一款充满体积、奶油般质地的酒，口感长且略带温暖。建议立即饮用至2018年。

Chinese pairs.original: 黑樱桃、矿物、和咖啡、黑色水果，果酱味，单宁扎实，结构感强，平衡性好有烘烤过后的黑色浆果的口感。适宜短暂陈放。
Chinese pairs.new: Black cherry, mineral, and coffee notes, black fruit, jammy flavors, robust tannins, strong structure, good balance, with a sense of baked black fruit. Suitable for short-term aging.

Western reviews.review: Big intense smoky, tobacco, black olive, cedar, black cherry, spicy garrigue nose with streaks of meaty, saddle leather. Dry, round, slightly tannic palate but elegant on the palate. Fresh, round, ripe black cherry jam, orange, licorice, mineral, menthol, fig and coffee flavours. Long, fresh, drier style finish that has finesse and elegance. Needs a year or two yet or try with food. Well done, serious modern red. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气强烈，带有烟熏味、烟草味、黑橄榄味、红檀木味、黑樱桃味、辣味的干橡树味和肉类味。口感干、圆润、略带苦味，但在口中却是优雅的。口感中有新鲜、圆润、成熟的黑樱桃果酱味、橙子味、甘草味、矿物味、薄荷味、枇杷味和咖啡味。口感长、新鲜、干燥的风格，具有优雅和典雅的风格。需要再储存一年左右或与食物一起品尝。很好，严肃的现代红酒。

Western reviews.review: Expect no shortage of power and pounding tannins from this modern-styled, heavily extracted Tempranillo. The nose is dark, sweet and jammy, but all pleasantries cease there; the palate is tannic as nails, with baked plum and other roasted dark-fruit flavors. To this taster, it's a hard, tough wine. Others may find it more appealing.
Western reviews.translation: 这款现代风格的特普拉尼奥酒，绝不会让你失望。它的酒香浓郁，甜美，果酱般的味道，但一旦品尝到口感，就完全不同了。酒口非常坚硬，苦涩，带有烤石榴和其他烤熟的黑果味。对我来说，这是一款非常硬朗，难以入口的酒。其他人可能会觉得它更有吸引力。

De Martino Single Vineyard Alto Los Toro.name: De Martino Single Vineyard Alto Los Toros Syrah 2008

Chinese pairs.original: 带有树莓和黑莓的香气，以及淡淡的石墨和茴香的回味，酒体饱满，单宁细腻，余味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of raspberry and blackberry, with subtle notes of graphite and anise, full-bodied texture, fine tannins, and a long lingering finish.

Western reviews.review: (2010) From the 1950 metres vineyard in Elqui that I visited, this has 15% Petit Verdot in the blend. Around 600 cases only, and will be shipped to the UK early in 2010 at a price level between Legado and the single vineyard range. Very deep, suave, spice and pepper wine. Lots of damson fruit, but a little exotic spice and herbal lift and some balsamic notes. The mouth retains very good freshness, with lots of dry extract and a spicy, gravelly quality to the tannins. The power is there, but it has a certain freshness and balsamic strawberry fruit quality.
Western reviews.translation:
2010年产自智利埃尔基（Elqui）1950米高海拔葡萄园的这款红酒中，含有15%的佩蒂特韦尔多（Petit Verdot）。产量仅600箱，预计于2010年初运往英国，价格介于Legado和单一葡萄园系列之间。 

这款红酒深度丰富，细腻，具有辣椒和胡椒的香气。酒中充满了浆果风味，尤其是浆果风味，但也带有少量的异国情调香气和草药味，以及一些巴斯米酸的味道。口感保持着很好的清新感，含有大量的干提取物和坚果味的质地。 

这款红酒具有强大的力量，但也带有清新感和巴斯米酸风味的浆果风味。

Chinese pairs.original: 散发出可乐和甘甜浆果的香气，入口饱满，香味浓郁，平衡感良好，酸度怡人.
Chinese pairs.new: Releases aromas of cola and sweet fruit, full-bodied entry, rich flavors, excellent balance, refreshing acidity.

Western reviews.review: Warm dark fruit aromas of blueberry are accented by rubber and earth. The palate is deep and racy, with no dead weight and good flavors of berry, cassis, spice and chocolate. Bright in feel, focused and just oaky and dry enough to not be jammy and soft.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中充满了暖暖的黑果香，蓝莓的气味尤其浓郁，伴随着橡胶和泥土的味道。口感深厚、清脆，口味丰富，带有蓝莓、黑加仑、香料和巧克力的味道。口感轻盈，焦点明确，适度的橡木和干酪味，避免了过甜和过软的感觉。

Chinese pairs.original: 毫无疑问，这是款“水果炸弹”，此酒刺鼻且多汁、甜美的香气展现大量成熟的黑樱桃、蔓越莓、杏脯和西莓味，以香料和紫罗兰的香味做点缀。口感的顺滑感很怡人，但并没有遮住在那新鲜、滑爽的多矿物收尾中达到顶点的坚实感。
Chinese pairs.new: This is undoubtedly a "fruit bomb," with a pungent and luscious aroma that showcases a wealth of ripe black cherries, raspberries, apricots and blackberries, accented with spices and a hint of lavender. The smooth texture is delightful, but it doesn't mask the solid, fresh and velvety mineral finish that reaches its peak.

English pairs.original: Obviously, it's a fruit-bomb, the pungent and succulently sweet aroma showed loads of ripe black cherry, cranberry, preserved apricot and prune laced with spices and violet. The nice smoothness was delightful in mouth and it didn't covered the firmness that culminated in a fresh, polished and mineral-inflected finale.
English pairs.new: 显然，这是一款果味爆炸的红酒，浓郁的、甜美的香气中充满了成熟的黑樱桃、蔓越莓、罐装的杏子和浸泡的李子，伴有香料和紫罗兰的味道。口感细腻柔顺，令人愉悦，并没有掩盖酒中坚实的底蕴，最后呈现出清新、光滑、矿物质味道的完美结尾。

Western reviews.review: Colour: bright cherry;Aroma: violets, balsamic herbs, red berry notes, fruit preserve, spicy, waxy notes, complex;Flavour: elegant, good acidity, fruity aftertaste, spicy, balsamic, long, mineral;Colour: Cherry;Aroma: complex, expressive, mineral, scrubland;Flavour: full-bodied, long, great length, balsamic;
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：亮丽的樱红色。

香气：紫罗兰、白兰地香草、红果味、果酱、辣味、蜡味、复杂。

口感：优雅、酸度良好、果味余韵、辣味、白兰地味、长久、矿物质。

颜色：樱红色。

香气：复杂、富有表现力、矿物质、荒野草原。

口感：浓郁、长久、长尾、白兰地味。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby colour with a purple hue. Floral and balsamic notes with red and dark berries, fine spiciness of ginger, clove and vanilla. The palate has medium weight and a rounded texture offering sweet red fruit, citrus and ginger notes, rather Burgundian/Pinot-like. Long juicy finish, well balanced in a lighter style with good drinkability and freshness.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，带有紫色调。酒中有花香和柠檬酸的味道，伴有红和黑berries的风味，细微的姜、丁香和香草的香气。口感中等，圆润的口感，甜的红果味，柑橘味和姜味，类似于勃艮第/品红葡萄酒。酒尾长长，清新，平衡，轻质，易于饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 这款酒呈现微妙、优雅、平衡的果香，富含李子、黑胡椒、甘草、红醋栗、草药及些许山楂、香草和雪松气息，口感丝滑，酸度爽脆，单宁坚挺，带有悠长的木桶余韵。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine presents a subtle, elegant, and balanced fruit aroma, rich in plum, black pepper, licorice, red cherry, herbs, and hints of quince, vanilla, and pine. The palate is smooth, with crisp acidity, firm tannins, and a long, oaky finish.

English pairs.original: Nice, elegant and harmoniously fruity on nose of plum, black pepper, liquorice, red currant, herb, hint of hawthorn, vanilla and cedar, silky texture with firm tannin&acidity, followed by a long oaks length.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的气味非常好，优雅而和谐，带有浓郁的浆果味，如浆果、黑胡椒、甘草、红 gooseberry、香草、 Hawthorn、香草和红木，口感滑顺，具有坚实的苦味和酸度，尾部长长的橡木味。

Western reviews.review: This blend ofShirazCabernet SauvignonMerlot andCabernet Franc starts off with herbal, smoky, green-peppercorn aromas, but really rounds into shape on the palate, where it offers blueberry fruit and hints of maple syrup and vanilla. It's full-bodied and lush in texture, suggesting early maturation. Drink now–2013.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒是由夏拉斯、卡伯涅特·索维涅、梅洛和卡伯涅特·法兰克四种葡萄品种混合而成。酒体开头带有草药、烟熏、青椒的香气，但在口感上更加圆润，展现出蓝莓果味和蜂蜜和香草的余味。酒体丰富、富有质感，表明酒早早成熟。建议尽快饮用，至2013年。

Chinese pairs.original: 此酒之前的酒名为“Gamekeeper's Reserve”。不使用橡木桶。甜美的花香、甜香料、动物皮毛和野味组成了此酒的香气。酒体饱满、浓郁，单宁强劲，伴有微苦。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine was previously known as "Gamekeeper's Reserve". It's aged without oak barrels. The aroma is a sweet blend of floral notes, sweet spices, animal hide, and wild game. The full-bodied wine has a rich texture, strong tannins, and a hint of bitterness.

English pairs.original: Formerly this wine was labeled as 'Gamekeeper's Reserve'. No oaks (all tanks). Sweet flowers, sweet spices, animal fur and game made up the nose. Rich, full-bodied and tannic, with a hint of bitterness.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒以前被标记为“猎人储备”。没有橡木桶的使用（全部使用钢罐）。酒鼻中充满了甜蜜的花朵、甜蜜的香料、动物皮毛和猎物的气息。酒口丰富、浓郁、有嚼头，带有微微的苦味。

Western reviews.review: Full bodied and supple, this nicely balanced Barossa Shiraz shows that value still exists even in big-name regions of Australia. Intense blueberry and spice aromas give way to mixed berries and vanilla on the palate, and if it's not overly complex, it's a still a concentrated mouthful of Shiraz at a bargain price.
Western reviews.translation: 这款巴罗萨地区的深色酒精酒（Shiraz）酒体丰富，口感细腻，平衡完美。即使是在澳大利亚的大名鼎鼎地区，仍然可以找到这样的价值之选。酒中浓郁的蓝莓和香料香气，口感中混合了各种果味和香草味。虽然它可能不够复杂，但仍然是一瓶浓郁的酒精酒，价格却非常便宜。

Western reviews.review: A basic blend, super-juicy and jammy. It fills the mouth with upfront wild berry, stone fruit and pepper flavors that drink dry and crisp and richly textured with thick, dusty tannins. A blend of Grenache, Mourvedre, Shiraz and Touriga.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶基本的混合红酒，口感丰富、果酱般的口感。入口时充满了野生莓果、石果和胡椒的味道，口感干净清爽，富有质感，具有厚重的、尘土般的苦味。酒中混合了格雷纳奇、穆尔韦德、希拉兹和图里加等几种葡萄品种。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有黑色水果，樱桃和香料的气息，浓郁的成熟果香中却不乏清新感，单宁突出。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of black fruit, cherry, and spice, with a rich, mature fruitiness that's surprisingly fresh, and prominent tannins.

Western reviews.review: Attractive and inviting notes of black fruit, cherry and spice characterize the bouquet of this dark ruby Barbera. The grape's acidity makes for a clean finish and would match any pasta dish that includes cheese or butter.
Western reviews.translation: 这款深红色的巴雷拉酒具有诱人的黑果、樱桃和香料的香气。酒中的酸度使得口感清爽，适合配以奶酪或黄油的意大利面食。

Chinese pairs.original: 这是支瓶中发展完美，来自上好年份的复古南澳葡萄酒，香气中暗藏墨水、草本和花朵香气，融合木桶气息，入口彰显矿物质感，中段饱满，余韵很出彩。
Chinese pairs.new: This bottle showcases a perfectly developed, vintage-style South Australian wine, with subtle hints of ink, herb, and floral notes in the aroma, complemented by a rich oak influence. The palate is marked by a mineral presence, with a full-bodied mid-palate and a lingering finish.

English pairs.original: A perfectly developed, old-fashioned SA wine that crafted from a really good vintage, slightly inky, herbal and floral nose balanced with some oaks, very minerally and rich on mid-palate, with an excellent length.
English pairs.new: 这是一瓶完美发酵的传统风格的南非红酒，来自一个非常好的产季，酒色深红，鼻子中带有些许墨色、草药和花香，平衡了些许橡木味，口感中矿物质和丰富，尾部长而持久。

Western reviews.review: This opaque Cab-Shiraz blend needs plenty of aeration before revealing its charms. When it does, it's led by blackberry and blood plum with undercurrents of charred root vegetables, coffee and licorice, and a lick of toasty oak. Tightly wound, chalk-dust tannins make room for the supple fruit on the dense, shapely palate. One for the cellar, this should really start to shine in another 7-10 years.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的颜色是浓郁的，混合了卡布ernet和雪利酒。需要充分的氧化后才能展现出它的魅力。展现出来后，主要是黑莓和血橙的味道，伴随着烤土豆、咖啡和甘草的底调，以及一丝焦糖的味道。紧绷的矿物质质感的牙齿让出位给柔软的果肉，形成了一个浓密而有形的口感。这个红酒适合放入酒窖中，7-10年后它将会真正地闪耀。

Western reviews.review: In outstanding years, 389 always wins because the best of its fruit is not required higher up the chain, and the cuts from 707 and Grange additionally bolster this classic cabernet sauvignon shiraz blend. Penfolds Winemaker Andrew Baldwin says this is one of those years, and we should all be stocking up. The attack is rich and dense, with the shiraz bolstering the cabernet. I'm not always bowled over by 389 compared to the Oz critics, but the '21 is all it can be and more. Indeed, it is one of the best I have tasted. The shiraz falls short of the 50% mark, topping out at 47%, and the cabernet sauvignon comes in at 53%. The fruit is a tour of South Australia with stops at McLaren Vale, Barossa Valley, and Wrattonbully, and all spends 12 months in 37% new American oak hogsheads. 'Baby Grange' is used as a moniker for Bin 389 primarily because components of the wine are matured in the same barrels used in the previous vintage of Grange, one-year-old American oak. Deep, dark, and plummy with cigar and chocolate covered blueberries, this is a fabulous 389. The winemaking team talks about Black Forest cake as a marker, but you can add several descriptors, from coffee and cola to chocolate and spice. The texture sings here, and the acidity keeps it fresh and humming along the palate. You are supposed to drink 389 while waiting for the Grange. (Anthony Gismondi).
Western reviews.translation: 在杰出的年份里，389 luôn会赢得好评，因为它的最好的果实不需要更高的链条，而707和格兰奇（Grange）切下的部分也会增强这个经典的卡波涅（Cabernet Sauvignon）-谢里（Shiraz）混合酒。Penfolds的酒师安德鲁·巴尔金（Andrew Baldwin）说，这是其中一个这样的年份，我们应该都要备货。酒的攻击性强烈，浓密，谢里加强了卡波涅。虽然我并不是每次都被389的表现所打动，但‘21年的确是它可以做到的和更多。事实上，这是其中最好的酒之一。谢里的比例略低于50%，达到47%，卡波涅的比例达到53%。酒的果实来自南澳大利亚各地，包括麦克劳伦谷（McLaren Vale）、巴罗萨谷（Barossa Valley）和沃顿布利（Wrattonbully），所有酒都在37%的新美国橡木桶中陈化12个月。酒被称为“小格兰奇”（Baby Grange）主要是因为酒的组成部分在同一批橡木桶中陈化，这些橡木桶曾用于之前的格兰奇酒的陈化，橡木桶已经陈化了一年。深色、黑色、浓郁的酒，带有雪茄和巧克力覆盖的蓝berries味道，这是一个了不起的389。酒师团队谈到黑森林蛋糕（Black Forest cake）作为一个标志，但你可以添加几个描述符，从咖啡和可乐到巧克力和香料。酒的质感非常好，酸度保持酒的新鲜和流畅的口感。你应该在等待格兰奇的时候喝389（Anthony Gismondi）。

Western reviews.review: An almost even split of Cab and Shiraz, this is a muscular, reticent red you could cut with a knife. Plump plum and blackberry aromas are followed by peppery, dusty spices and chocolatey oak. Tannins are powerful and sinewy, wrapping around the tongue like a vice, leaving just enough room for the dark fruit to shine. Drink 2024–2034.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的酒精含量接近于50/50的比例，主要由卡巴ernet和希拉兹两种葡萄品种组成。这种红酒的口感强劲，沉默寡言，几乎可以用刀切开。酒中的浓郁黑桃和黑莓香气，随后是辣椒、尘土和巧克力木头的香气。这种红酒的苦味很强，像铁钳一样紧紧地包裹在舌头上，只留下足够的空间让黑色水果的风味闪耀。建议在2024年至2034年之间饮用。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby in colour with purple reflections and subtle brightening on the ochre rim. The "Baby Grange" is still a little buttoned up on the nose at the moment, with delicate aromas of nougat and fig, underlaid by cranberry with some pleasant fine oak spice and a touch of eucalyptus in the background. The palate is subtly fresh with integrated tannins, juicy, ripe cherry and a citrus-minerality on the aftertaste. Still young this needs further bottle ageing.
Western reviews.translation: 酒色深红色，带有紫色反射和浅黄色边缘。"Baby Grange" 的鼻子还有一点紧绷，目前有细致的杏仁和枣子的香气，底层有浆果味和一些愉悦的细木香和背景中的薄荷味。口感清新，纤维素整合，果实丰富的樱桃和柑橘矿物质味在余味中。这个酒还很年轻，需要进一步的瓶子陈化。

Western reviews.review: ‘Baby Grange’ is used as a moniker for Bin 389 primarily because components of the wine are matured in the same barrels that held the previous vintage of Grange, i.e. one-year-old American oak. Wood aside, 389 has always been crafted as red wine with the structure you expect from a cabernet but the richness you find in a great bottle of shiraz. In 2019 the mix is 53/47 cabernet sauvignon/shiraz. It is a multi-regional blend involving Padthaway, McLaren Vale, Coonawarra, Wrattonbully, and Barossa Valley. This spends a year in oak (25 percent new). The winemaking team talks about black forest cake as a marker for this red, so if it didn’t have your interest before, it may now. Coffee, cola, chocolate, and spice penetrate the wine through the finish. It’s the textures that attract, so lush and smooth but all balanced by the appropriate acidity that keeps it fresh and humming along the palate. There is no rush to drink this wine; it will easily age for a decade and likely for another one after that. It is a very good 389. (Anthony Gismondi).
Western reviews.translation: 《宝贝格兰奇》(Baby Grange)这个名称主要是因为这款酒的成分部分在之前的格兰奇(Grange)酒的木桶中发酵和陈酿的。也就是说，这些木桶里曾经存放过一年的美国橡木桶。除了木桶外，389系列一直以红酒的结构和Cabernet的风格，但又带有Shiraz的丰富感。2019年的混合比例是53%的Cabernet Sauvignon和47%的Shiraz。它是一款来自多个地区的混合酒，包括帕德瑟威(Padthaway)、麦克劳伦谷(McLaren Vale)、库纳瓦拉(Coonawarra)、沃顿布利(Wrattonbully)和巴罗萨谷(Barossa Valley)。这款酒在橡木桶中陈酿了一年（25%新橡木桶）。酒庄的制作团队将这款酒比作黑森林蛋糕，如果之前你对这款酒不感兴趣，现在可能会改变心意。咖啡、可乐、巧克力和香料在酒尾留下了深刻的印象。酒的质感是吸引人的，丰富而光滑，但又被适当的酸度平衡，保持了酒的新鲜感和流畅感。没有必要急着喝这款酒，它可以轻松地存放十年以上，甚至可能再存放十年以上。这是一款非常出色的389系列。

Chinese pairs.original: 具有风味独特的干草药，樱桃，橡木的气息，单宁丝般顺滑，酒体饱满平衡。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts a unique blend of dry hay, cherry, and oak aromas, with silky tannins and a full-bodied, well-balanced texture.

Western reviews.review: Medium deep ruby-purple in color, the 2010 Pinot Noir opens with intense notes of red cherries, black raspberries, pepper and toast followed by hints of cedar, meat and underbrush. Medium to full-bodied, it has juicy fruit and vibrant acidity framed by a medium level of fine tannins. It finishes refreshing and fruity with good persistence.
Western reviews.translation: 2010年品诺酒的颜色是深红紫色，酒体中充满了红樱桃、黑莓、胡椒和烘烤的香气，之后还有松木、肉类和灌木的微妙气息。酒体丰富中等，果味丰富，酸度清新，细致的纤维结构。酒尾清新果香持久。

Chinese pairs.original: 醒酒超过2小时。漂亮的香气中弥漫着香料矿物味、雪茄、雪松、黑莓、黑色甘草、烤吐司、咸香、干茶叶以及每每晃杯都会浮现的青椒气味。爽滑的口感完全被紧绷的单宁和突出的咸矿物质所覆盖，虽然有些严肃但还未达到使得发干的口腔的地步，同时恰到好处的酸度中和了其相当浓稠的回味。至少这酒的价格还蛮给力的。
Chinese pairs.new:
This wine has been decanted for over 2 hours. The beautiful aroma is filled with notes of spice, mineral, cigar, cedar, blackberry, black licorice, toasted bread, saltiness, dried tea leaves, and a hint of green pepper that appears with every swirl of the glass.

The smooth texture is completely covered by tight tannins and prominent mineral saltiness, which is somewhat serious but not yet dry. The perfectly balanced acidity also helps to balance out the rich aftertaste. At least, the price of this wine is quite reasonable.

English pairs.original: Decanted for over 2 hours. A stylish nose of spicy-mineral, cigar, cedar, blackberry, black liquorice, toast, savoury, dried tea leaf and some capsicum after swirling the glass. The polished taste was coated by tense tannin and pointed savoury-minerals, not drying the mouth but still a bit austere here, meanwhile the decent acid nicely balanced its fairly dense finish. At least the price was reasonable.
English pairs.new: 酒瓶倒置超过2小时。酒香中带有辛辣矿物质、雪茄、红木、黑莓、黑甘草、烘烤、咸味、干茶叶和少量辣椒的风格。摇晃玻璃杯后，酒香变得更加丰富。酒口光滑，但被紧张的纤维和咸味矿物质所覆盖，口感不干，但仍有一点严肃。酒中的酸度很好地平衡了酒尾的密度。至少价格是合理的。

Western reviews.review: The 2007 Cabernet Sauvignon has just 5% Malbec blended-in. Very deep garnet-purple colored, it gives pronounced blackberry / black currant and bay leaf notes with some dark chocolate and a whiff of cigar boxes. Concentrated, crisp and full bodied with a medium level of very fine tannins, it has a nice long finish. Just beginning to drink now, it should develop nicely over 3-7 years and cellar to 2018+.
Western reviews.translation: 2007年卡贝内特·索维尼（Cabernet Sauvignon）红酒中仅有5%的马尔贝克（Malbec）混合。酒色深红紫色，气味中有浓郁的黑莓和黑加仑（黑currant）和樟叶（bay leaf）等香气，伴有暗巧克力和烟斗盒（cigar boxes）的微妙气息。酒体浓郁、清脆、饱满，纤维（tannins）细腻，口感持久。酒此时刚刚开始可饮用，未来3-7年会有所发展，适合贮存至2018年后。

Western reviews.review:
Firm in texture, with a juicy feel to the berry and earth flavors,
finishing with judicious balance, fine tannins and a lilt to the aftertaste.
Best from 2012 through 2017
Western reviews.translation: 口感坚实，果实和泥土味道丰富，余味中带有细腻的口感和轻微的尾韵。适合2012年至2017年饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 此酒的香气展现大量成熟但新鲜的果味以及打底的桶味，完全没有生青气息。口中的单宁非常强劲，被回味中富有活力的通透果味所抵消。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine showcases a profusion of mature yet fresh fruit aromas and a subtle oak undertone, with no green notes in sight. The palate is dominated by robust tannins, which are beautifully balanced by a lively, fruit-driven finish.

English pairs.original: The smell showed lots of ripe but fresh fruit that pushed the oaks to the background, and with no sense of greenness. Very tannic, offset by brightly energetic fruit on the finish.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的气味中充满了成熟但新鲜的水果味，掩盖了橡木的味道，没有任何青涩的感觉。口感非常坚实，完美地平衡了果味的活力。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, dezenter Wasserrand. Reife Kirschenfrucht, ein Hauch von Pflaumen, rotes Waldbeerkonfit, tabakige Würze. Elegant, mittlere Komplexität, rote Kirschen, frisch strukturiert, mineralisch, betont salzig im Abgang, ein facettenreicher Speisenbegleiter.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，淡水边缘。成熟的樱桃果肉，浓郁的杏仁味，红色山楂果酱，烟熏的调味料。优雅，中等复杂度，红樱桃，新鲜结构，矿物质，强调咸味尾部，多面体的食物伴侣。

Chinese pairs.original: 入口感觉很好，应该到了颠峰期，富含经典的里奥哈香气，如雪松、香草、红色水果和泥土气息，口感柔和，余韵中等，具有很好的陈年能力，自始至终都感觉和谐、愉悦。
Chinese pairs.new: The palate is very good, it should be at its peak, rich in classic Rioja aromas such as pine, vanilla, red fruit and earthy notes. The texture is smooth, the finish is medium, and it has excellent aging potential. It feels harmonious and pleasant from start to finish.

English pairs.original: Drinking really well at the moment, probably at its peak, classic Rioja noses of cedar, vanilla, red fruits and earth, smooth and developed mouthfeel with fruity and medium long taste, good aging really well, harmony throughout, it's very pleasant.
English pairs.new: 当前品酒非常好，可能是它的巅峰时刻，典型的里奥哈风格，鼻子里有松木、香草、红果和泥土的味道，口感平滑，成熟，果味丰富，中等持久的口感， aging 得非常好，整体和谐，非常愉悦。

Western reviews.review: Der Altmeister gehört jetzt wieder zu den Besten: majestätischer modernisierter Klassiker mit Zimt und Toastnoten, feinster Kirschfrucht, großer Dichte und dennoch mit der atlantischen Eleganz der Rioja, die reifen Tannine halten sich zurück, edles Säurefinale.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒重新登上巅峰：恢弘的现代化经典，带有姜香和烤面包的味道，细腻的樱桃果味，厚实的口感，仍然保留着大西洋风情的里奥哈风格，成熟的橡木味保持沉默，优雅的酸度结尾。

Western reviews.review: Textbook Rioja gran reserva in every way. It's light and smoky smelling, with brown sugar, fine cologne and cedary aromas. Generous but well-cut in the mouth, with fig, mushroom, raspberry and spiced plum flavors. Fresh on the finish, with light herb flavors and good weight. Drink now through 2018.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒是典型的里奥哈格兰雷莎（Rioja Gran Reserva）风格。它的气味轻柔，带有烟熏味，伴有棕糖、精致的香水和松木香气。口感丰富但剪裁得当，带有干枣、蘑菇、莓果和浓郁的梅子味。口感清新，尾部带有轻微的香草味和良好的重量。建议立即享用，至2018年。

kay brothers amery vineyards hillside sh.name: kay brothers amery vineyards hillside shiraz 2010

Chinese pairs.original: 酿造这款酒的葡萄来源于6号地块的新藤以及4号地块的葡萄园。极好的、奔放的香气，散发烘培咖啡豆、咸味、野味、巧克力酱和香料味。口感中具有明显的棱角，丝滑但却肌肉感十足；我非常喜欢那种矿物质所带来的优雅，但是对于那种收尾时所表现出的暴露的酒精度却不敢恭维。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine is crafted from grapes sourced from Block 6's Nebbiolo and Block 4's vineyard. The aroma is excellent and exuberant, with notes of roasted coffee beans, saltiness, wild herbs, chocolate sauce, and spices. The palate is marked by sharp edges, smooth but muscular; I love the elegance brought by the minerality, but the exposed alcohol at the finish is a concern.

English pairs.original: This is crafted from the new Block 6 (younger vines) and Block 4 vineyards. A superbly expressive nose of roasted coffee bean, savoury, meaty, chocolate sauce and spices. The palate showed notable pointedness, and it was silky but muscular; I pretty loved its fineness of minerality but not really enjoyed the bare alcohol at the end.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒是从新种植的Block 6和Block 4葡萄园采摘的。酒 nose 强烈，带有烤咖啡豆、咸味、肉味、巧克力酱和香料的味道。口感上，酒呈现出明显的锋利度， silky 但肌肉发达；我很喜欢它的矿物质 finesse，但不太喜欢酒尾的纯酒味。

Western reviews.review: A McLaren Vale standard bearer, the 2010 Hillside is a complex, beguiling example of Shiraz. Toast and vanilla notes frame hints of raspberries, herbs and espresso on the nose, while the flavors add olive-tinged elements. Despite showing ample weight, this isn't the biggest wine, just one that shows impressive harmony and length. Drink now through at least 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 麦克拉伦维尔的标志性酒款，2010年希尔赛德是沙拉斯的一种复杂迷人的例子。toast和香草的味道包围了在鼻子里闻到的红莓、香草和咖啡的味道，而口感则加入了橄榄油的元素。尽管表面看起来很重，但这并不是最大的酒款，而是一种表现出令人印象深刻的和谐和长度的酒款。建议立即饮用，至少到2025年。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有加仑和黑樱桃的香气，口感优雅清新，结构良好，酒体丰满，单宁厚实，余味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of gallon and black cherry, with an elegant and crisp palate, well-structured, full-bodied, rich tannins, and a long finish.

Western reviews.review: Kaiken's 2008 Cabernet Sauvignon Ultra is reticent aromatically but with coaxing reveals aromas of cedar, spice box, floral notes, black currant and blackberry. Medium- to full-bodied on the palate, it has generous quantities of spice, layered fruit, as well as good balance and volume. It is slightly short in the finish which prevents an outstanding rating. It can be approached now although it is likely to evolve for 1-2 years.
Western reviews.translation: 卡伊肯2008年卡贝内特·索维尼昂（Cabernet Sauvignon Ultra）红酒的香气相当谨慎，但经过一些诱导，会释放出松木、香盒、花香、黑加仑和黑莓的香气。口感中等到中厚，口味丰富，具有大量的香料、层次丰富的果味以及良好的平衡和体积。然而，完美的口感被略短的尾部所阻碍，导致无法给予出色的评分。虽然可以立即享用，但更可能在1-2年内逐渐成熟。

Chinese pairs.original: 酒体呈现淡金黄色泽，有绿色边缘，香气浓郁，蕴含蘑菇、杏仁、香草、黄油、苹果、柠檬、鸡蛋糕、芝麻、酸橙及少许矿物质气息，口感很干，酒体中等偏上，酸度高，伴随甜美的余韵。
Chinese pairs.new: The wine presents a pale golden hue with greenish edges, boasting a rich aroma that includes notes of mushroom, almond, grass, butter, apple, lemon, pound cake, sesame, orange, and a hint of mineral. The palate is dry, with a medium-plus body, high acidity, and a sweet lingering finish.

English pairs.original: Pale golden color with green rim, pronounced aromas of mushroom, almond, vanilla, butter, apple, lemon, egg cake, sesame and lime with subtle mineral, very dry on the palate, medium+ body, high acidity, with a mellow length.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的颜色是浅金色，带有绿色边缘。酒中有强烈的香气，包括蘑菇、杏仁、香草、黄油、苹果、柠檬、蛋糕、芝麻和酸橙等。口感干爽，体积中等偏大，酸度高，余味平和。

Western reviews.review: (2012) Sourced entirely from the Adelaide Hills district, the fruit for Bin 10A is whole bunch pressed before being filled straight into French oak barriques (72% new) where it undergoes wild yeast fermentation and natural malolactic fermentation. It has a bold, light green colour and lovely nose of oily green beans and fig in a pungent style, with creaminess and apple fruit and a wisp of smokiness. On the palate terrific clarity and precision, brimming with lemon and lime and the nutty, gently toasty richness filling in. Long, balanced and delicious. Penfolds suggest this will drink well until 2019.
Western reviews.translation: 2012年，Bin 10A的葡萄全部来自阿德莱德山区。 Bin 10A的葡萄采用整梳压榨法，然后直接装入法国橡木桶（72%新桶）中进行野酵发酵和天然乳酸发酵。 Bin 10A呈现出深绿色的外观，具有浓郁的气味，带有油腻的青豆和浆果的风味，具有奶油和苹果的风味和轻微的烟熏味。 Bin 10A的口感清晰精确，具有柠檬和青柠的风味，伴有坚果和轻微的烘烤风味。 Bin 10A的口感长长平衡，非常美味。 Penfolds建议Bin 10A将在2019年前喝得很好。

anakota helena montana vineyard cabernet.name: anakota helena montana vineyard cabernet sauvignon 2011

Chinese pairs.original: 深黑的宝石红色。此酒极富表现力的新鲜香气宛若水果炸弹，透出甜美的成熟黑莓、黑樱桃、香草、桂皮、咸矿物、烟熏和少许可可味。酒体非常饱满，单宁强劲，展现大量咸味、黑醋栗和岩石滋味，一同延续到其结构感十足的严肃收尾中。
Chinese pairs.new: Deep, gemstone-like purple. This wine boasts a vibrant, expressive nose that's akin to a fruit bomb, releasing sweet, ripe blackberry, black cherry, lavender, spice, salty minerals, smokiness, and a hint of cocoa. The full-bodied palate is robust, with powerful tannins, showcasing a wealth of savory flavors, black walnut, and rocky minerality, all culminating in a structured, serious finish.

English pairs.original: Dark ruby. The fresh and expressive sniff was almost a fruit-bomb, with sweet noses of ripe blackberry, black cherry, vanilla, cinnamon, savoury-mineral, smoke and cocoa undertone. Very full-bodied and tannic, showing loads of savoury, cassis and rock flavours that concluded in an austere and structured finale.
English pairs.new: 深红色。酒精的新鲜和表达性的气味几乎像一颗果实炸弹，带有成熟黑莓、黑杏、香草、肉桂、矿物质、烟和可可的甜香气。酒体丰富，具有大量的矿物质、黑加仑和岩石味，结尾是严谨和结构化的。

Western reviews.review: Interestingly, I did not taste the 2012s, but the 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon Helena Montana Vineyard is an outstanding wine offering notes of crushed rocks, graphite, blueberries and blackcurrants. With lots of tannin as well as surprising density and richness, it is a successful 2011 that requires 3-4 years of cellaring. It should keep for 15 or more years.
Western reviews.translation: 值得注意的是，我没有尝试2012年的红酒，但2011年卡布ernet·萨维尼翁（Cabernet Sauvignon）海伦娜·蒙大拿葡萄园（Helena Montana Vineyard）是一瓶出色的红酒，带有碎石、石墨、蓝莓和黑加仑的味道。它具有大量的纤维和令人惊讶的密度和丰富感，是一个成功的2011年红酒，需要3-4年陈酿。它应该可以保存15年或更久。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有黑莓的香气，并且伴有蓝莓和黑椒辣的口感，给人以优雅的感觉。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of blackberry with hints of blueberry and black pepper, evoking an air of elegance.

Western reviews.review: The companion to the Noble Baron Cabernet is this juicy and concentrated Barossa Shiraz. Aged in French oak for 24 months, it has a very deep black-ruby color, toasted oak, spice and subtle berry aromatics. The flavors are textured, with dark fruits and anise notes, 14.5% alcohol and good length. It’s powerful, concentrated and a little hot in the finish, but this Noble Baron Shiraz will not disappoint those who like their Shiraz big and gutsy.---- Gerald D. Boyd
Western reviews.translation: 这款巴罗萨山谷（Barossa Shiraz）的红酒是与诺布尔男爵（Noble Baron）卡贝网（Cabernet）搭配的佳品。经过24个月的法兰克（French）橡木陈酿，这款红酒呈现出深黑红色的颜色，具有焦糖橡木、香料和淡淡的浆果香气。口感丰富，带有黑色水果和 licorice（甘草）味道，酒精含量14.5%，口感持久。虽然这款红酒在尾部略带热烈，但对于喜欢强烈、豪放的山谷红酒的人来说，这款诺布尔男爵山谷红酒绝不会让他们失望。

Chinese pairs.original: 微微的挥发性酸在7小时透气后消散，展现优雅的红色&黑色水果、水果干、薄荷、岩石和干花香。所有这些芬芳的香味都延续到了那轻盈的口感中，伴有锐利的酸度以及充满果味的收尾。
Chinese pairs.new: Delicate effervescent acidity dissipates after 7 hours of aeration, revealing elegant red and black fruit, dried fruit, mint, stone and floral notes. These aromatic nuances persist through the wine's light texture, accompanied by crisp acidity and a fruit-filled finish.

English pairs.original: A hint of sense of volatile acid disappeared after 7 hours' aeration, with elegant noses of red&black fruits, dried fruits, mint, stone and dried flower. All those perfumed flavours continued onto the lightly textured mouthfeel that had keen acid and a fruity end.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒经过7小时的氧化后，原本存在的酸性味道已经消失了。酒中的香气变得更加优雅，带有红色和黑色水果、干果、薄荷、石头和干花的味道。这些香气在口感轻盈的口感中持续存在，口感中酸度清晰，尾部果味丰富。

Western reviews.review: Ca'Marcanda é o projeto de Gaja, mítico produtor do Piemonte, em Bolgheri, na Toscana. Blend de 55% Cabernet Sauvignon, 35% Syrah e 10% Sangiovese, com estágio de 18 meses em barricas usadas de carvalho francês. Desde o início, mostra exuberantes aromas de frutas vermelhas e negras acompanhadas de notas florais, de ervas e de especiarias doces. Estruturado e balanceado, tem acidez refrescante, taninos de ótima textura e final persistente, com toques terrosos e de ameixas. Definitivamente, um ótimo exemplar da região, com a mão elegante e precisa, presente em todos os vinhos de Angelo Gaja. Álcool 13,5%
Western reviews.translation: 卡马尔坎达（Ca'Marcanda）是皮埃蒙特地区的传奇酒庄Gaja在托斯卡纳的博尔赫里（Bolgheri）地区的项目。该酒的组成比例为55%卡波弗雷斯科（Cabernet Sauvignon）、35%席拉（Syrah）和10%桑乔韦塞（Sangiovese），在法国橡木桶中陈酿18个月。从一开始，酒就展现出丰富的红、黑果味，伴有花香、草香和甜香料的气息。酒的结构和平衡，带有清新果酸，细腻的橡木味和持久的尾韵，带有泥土和杏仁的味道。毫无疑问，这是一款出色的代表酒，展现了安杰洛·加雅（Angelo Gaja）的精湛手艺。酒精度13.5%。

Chinese pairs.original: 此酒轮廓清晰的芬芳充满了泥土气息，略带干花及咖啡般的桶味。口感浓郁且果味十足，但依然优雅；温润的酒精度带出了咸香回味中的些许甜味。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts a clear and defined bouquet, rich with earthy notes, subtle hints of dried flowers, and a coffee-like oakiness. The palate is full-bodied and fruit-forward, yet remains elegant; a smooth, velvety texture brings out a touch of sweetness in the lingering saltiness.

English pairs.original: The defined smell was utterly earthy and perfumed, with a tinge of dried flower and coffee-like oaks. Rich, fruity and nevertheless elegant; the warm alcohol generated slight sweetness on its saline finish.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的香气非常清晰，带有泥土和花香的味道，伴有干燥花朵和咖啡般的橡木味。酒体丰富、果香而又优雅，酒中的酒精味道温暖，给了酒尾一丝甜美的感觉。

Western reviews.review: Christian Mouiex lowered the price this year. The glut or the vintage? This Dominus is almost as good as the '99. It's not a lavish blockbuster, but the cassis and herb flavors are delicious, and well oaked. The prettiest part is the mouthfeel, all soft and velvety. Shows plenty of class and elegance.
Western reviews.translation: 克里斯蒂安·穆埃克斯今年降低了价格。是因为过剩还是因为佳酿？这个多尼莫斯（Dominus）几乎和99年的佳酿一样好。它不是一个豪华的爆炸级佳酿，但黑加仑和香草的风味非常美味，木桶陈酿得很好。最美丽的部分是口感，软绵绵的，非常舒适。展现出很多品质和优雅。

Chinese pairs.original: 颜色几近黑色，美好的香气，集中体现黄油、巧克力、烟熏、铁矿石、皮革、紫罗兰、黑醋栗、黑莓、白胡椒及少许的香草和丁香气息，口感十分柔顺，单宁结实，酸度较高，中等偏上的酒精度，悠长余韵中夹杂无花果干滋味。
Chinese pairs.new: Deeply dark in color, with a beautiful aroma that showcases notes of butter, chocolate, smokiness, iron, leather, lavender, black cherry, blackberry, white pepper, and subtle hints of vanilla and cloves. The palate is smooth and velvety, with firm tannins and a crisp acidity, moderate to full-bodied alcohol, and a lingering finish with hints of dried apricot.

English pairs.original: Dark color, nice bouquets of butter, chocolate, smoke, ironstone, leather, violet, cassis, blackberry, white pepper, slight vanilla and clove, very smooth texture, firm tannin, high acidity, medium+ alcohol, with a long dried fig length.
English pairs.new: 深色红酒，具有丰富的香气，包括奶油、巧克力、烟熏、铁矿石、皮革、紫罗兰、黑加仑、黑莓、白胡椒、轻微的香草和丁香。口感细腻，坚实的苦味，高的酸度，中等以上的酒精含量，长长的干枣尾韵。

Western reviews.review: Tiefdunkles Rubingranat, opaker Kern, violette Reflexe. Vollreife Weichselfrucht, feine Edelholzanklänge, Herzkirschen, kandierte Orangenzesten, etwas Nougat. Stoffig, rotbeeriger Touch, etwas fordernde Tannine, salzige Nuancen, etwas vegetal im Abgang, mittlere Komplexität, es fehlt etwas an Länge, sollte von weiterer Flaschenreife profitieren.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色调，透明的葡萄核，紫色反光。成熟的红色水果，细微的贵族木质香气，黑樱桃，糖浆橙子，略带奶油味。厚重的口感，红色啤酒的余味，略带挑战性的坚果味，盐味，尾部有植物味，中等复杂度，略短缺，需要进一步的陈化。

Western reviews.review: RWT (unromantically derived from “Red Wine Trial”) isBarossa Valley Shiraz, aged inFrench oak. In some vintages, like this one, the combination is incredibly sumptuous, offering layers of blueberry and blackberry fruit intermingled elegantly with hints of French vanilla. It's long, subtle and complex on the finish—a stunning effort. It's approachable now, but should age well through 2030 or so.
Western reviews.translation: RWT（不浪漫地来源于“红酒试验”）是巴罗萨谷（Barossa Valley）产的红酒，使用法国橡木 barrels aging。 在某些年份，如本次年份，组合的效果极为丰富，呈现出蓝莓和黑莓的果味，优雅地与法国香草的味道相融合。 该酒的尾部长、细腻、复杂，令人惊艳。 该酒现在已经可以享用，但预计可以保存至2030年左右。

Western reviews.review: Tiefdunkles Rubingranat, violetter Reflex, zarter Wasserrand. In der Nase attraktive süße Edelholznote, exotische Gewürze, feiner Nougat, balsamisch, ein Hauch feuchter Blumenerde. Saftig, komplex, feine schwarze Beerenfrucht, feste Tannine, die den Wein tragen, schokoladiger Touch im Abgang, noch nicht ganz entwickelt, aber vielversprechend, schwarze Kirschen im Nachhall, gute Balance, sichere Zukunft.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫红色的反光，细微的水边缘。酒香中有诱人的甜木香味，异国情调的香料，细微的牛奶糖味，柏油味，湿润的花园土味。口感丰富，复杂，细微的黑berry果味，坚实的橡皮味，托起酒的味道，末端有巧克力味，尚未完全发育，但很有前途，黑berry果味在余味中持续，酒的平衡很好，未来前景很好。

Western reviews.review: (2012) Another regional expression aged only in French oak, so an alternative take on the established house philosophy. Fruit is chosen largely on its aromatic qualities apparently, and ageing is for 14 months in French hogsheads, 60% new. It is dramatically dark and deep, reflected in the nose too which has a muscular depth of black fruit, little notes of espresso and sweet aromatic spices, a plummy richness beneath. The palate is bold, plush and structured, with a lot of fleshy weight and the support of oak, but it is fresh and juicy, the depth cut by tantalising acidity into a crisp finish. Penfolds suggest drinking 2013-2030.
Western reviews.translation: 2012年，Penfolds推出了另一种地区表达，这种红酒仅在法国橡木桶中陈化，因此是对已建立的房子哲学的另一种解读。酒庄选择的果实主要是根据其香气质量，陈化14个月在法国猪头桶中，60%新。酒液呈现出深沉的黑色，鼻子也同样深沉，具有黑果的肌肉深度，少量的咖啡和甜香料，底层有浓郁的浆果。口感丰富、丰满、结构良好，具有丰富的肉感和橡木的支持，但酒液保持新鲜和果甜，酸度的深度切割了酒液，使其具有清脆的口感。Penfolds建议在2013-2030年饮用。

Western reviews.review: Offene, elegante Nase, reife Weichseln, Schokolade, dazu ein Hauch Rum und Gewürznelken. Frisch, Schwarztee im Ansatz, fordernde, saftige Säure, dazu geschliffenes Tannin, exzellentes Finish auf offene, reife Frucht. Herz, was willst Du mehr?!
Western reviews.translation:
这是一杯美味的红酒！以下是翻译：

开放、优雅的鼻子，成熟的水果，巧克力，伴随着一丝朗姆酒和香料柠檬。入口清新，像黑茶一样，富有挑战性的，水果酸度丰富，伴随着细腻的苦味，完美的尾韵，展现出开放的成熟水果。心脏，什么都没有了！

Chinese pairs.original: 成熟并带有适度烤面包味的白葡萄酒，伴有奶油无花果、梨和奶油蛋卷的风味。余味甘美，带有榛果味。
Chinese pairs.new: A mature white wine with subtle toasted bread notes, accompanied by flavors of buttery quince, pear, and creamy croissant. The finish is sweet and nutty, with hints of hazelnut.

Western reviews.review: The ripe pineapple and crunchy Gala apple flavors are married to baking spice and pastry cream notes in this rich yet fresh white, ending with a smoky accent.
Western reviews.translation: 这款白酒的口感丰富而新鲜，具有浓郁的果香，包括熟透的菠萝和脆甜的 Gala 苹果，伴随着烘焙香料和奶油酱的风味，最后以烟熏的余味结束。

Chinese pairs.original: 浓郁的黑醋栗、黑加仑子、巧克力、薄荷、雪茄、烟草的香气，酒体中等，口感圆润成熟，单宁丝滑，结构平衡，余味绵长。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich blackberry, black currant, chocolate, mint, cigar, and tobacco aromas. Medium-bodied with a smooth, rounded texture and mature flavors. Silky tannins and a balanced structure, with a long, lingering finish.

Western reviews.review: Dense and full, with charred meats, charcoal and campfire leading this full-bodied dry-farmed cabernet from Colchagua. Potent black fruit, pipe tobacco and wood blanket the palate. Thick and camphor-heavy tannins add extra intensity to the potent fruit, before a powdery finish. The opposite of shy, even four years along, this would suit (needs) big grilled meats. (Treve Ring).
Western reviews.translation: 这款来自科尔查瓜（Colchagua）的干农法卡贝网（Cabernet）红酒，浓郁而充满，带有烧焦的肉类、焦炭和篝火的味道。强烈的黑果、烟草和木头味充斥口感。厚重的木香味和高浓度的苦味素使得果味更加强烈，之后是粉末般的尾韵。即使经过四年，这款红酒仍然不失豪放，适合与大块的烤肉一起享用。

Western reviews.review:
•	Deep bright purple color. Intensive smell- black current, black cherries, slight green leafy, bell pepper
•	More tannin, with balancing tannin. Silky sweet crystalized flavour  new world
tasted blind in 20180917
Western reviews.translation:
•	深紫红色。强烈的香气-黑加仑、黑樱桃、微微的绿叶和青椒。
•	更有嚼头，平衡的嚼头。滑顺的甜晶味新世界风格。
•	 blind品尝日期：2018年9月17日。

Chinese pairs.original: 颜色深，香气集中、丰富，门多萨酒经典的蓝莓和香草气息，同时夹杂烟熏、丁香及些微草药、雪松、白胡椒和黑樱桃味，天鹅绒般丝滑的单宁非常强劲，酸度细腻优质，酒体饱满，高酒精度，很好的集中度和结构，余韵悠长且深沉，具有绝佳的陈年潜力。
Chinese pairs.new: Deep color, concentrated and rich aromas, with classic Mendoza notes of blueberry and lavender, alongside subtle hints of smokiness, cloves, herbs, pine, white pepper, and black cherry. The silky smooth tannins are incredibly powerful, with refined acidity, a full-bodied texture, high alcohol content, excellent concentration and structure, a long and profound finish, and exceptional aging potential.

English pairs.original: Deep color, intense and complex aromas of Mendoza's classic blueberry and vanilla with smoke, clove, hint of herb, cedar, white pepper and dark cherry, velvety but very strong tannin, fine acidity, full body and high alcohol, good intensity, nice structure, with a very long and deep finish, very good aging potential.
English pairs.new: 深度的颜色，强烈复杂的香气，典型的蓝莓和香草味，带有烟草、丁香、草本植物、白胡椒、红檜木和黑樱桃的味道，口感滑顺但有很强的纤维感，酸度细致，酒体丰富，酒精含量高，酒香浓郁，结构紧致，长长的深深的尾部，酒龄潜力极高。

Western reviews.review: Savoury, cedar, tobacco, peppery, black liquorice, vanilla, smoky, black cherry aromas with a floral streak. Ripe, round, smooth, suave and warm palate with fresh acidity. Coffee, roast mushroom, poultry spice, black cherry, black plum, vanilla, smoky herb and tobacco flavours. Good flavour intensity and balance if pretty warm on the finish. Has some finesse to go with beef, lamb, turkey and even pork. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation:
这款红酒的香气中包含了以下元素：咸味、松木、烟草、辣椒、黑甘草、香草、烟熏、黑樱桃的花朵气息。

口感丰富、圆润、滑顺、温暖、清新酸度。口感中包含了咖啡、烤蘑菇、家禽香料、黑樱桃、黑浆果、香草、烟熏草和烟草的风味。

整体风味强度和平衡良好，但尾部略微偏暖。适合搭配牛肉、羊肉、火鸡和猪肉等食材。

Western reviews.review: Approachable, high in quality and made from a mix of Malbec, Cabernet and Bonarda. Smells of lead pencil, blackberry and dark plum. Feels friendly and smooth, with lightly buttered oak leading licorice, black pepper, chocolate and roasted berry flavors. Offers a lot of good things for the price. Drink now–2015.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感舒适，品质高，混合了马尔贝克、卡贝网和博纳达等葡萄。酒香中带有铅笔、黑莓和黑浆果的味道。口感友善，滑顺，轻微的奶油橡木味带来 licorice、黑胡椒、巧克力和烤黑莓的风味。价格合理，品质高，值得推荐。建议尽快享用，最佳饮用时间为现在至2015年。

yarra yering dry red wine no.1 2009.name: yarra yering dry red wine no.1 2009

Chinese pairs.original: 与首席酿酒师Paul Bridgeman在酒庄一起品鉴了新发布的酒款。即便是极其炎热的年份，但感觉整支酒依然清凉，中等酒体，吸引人的香气中透出山楂干、清咖、皮革、泥土、番茄酱、桉树、半干无花果、暗藏茶、草药及香草气息，单宁丝滑，酸度自然，中等偏上的余韵中略带矿物质。
Chinese pairs.new: Tasted with chief winemaker Paul Bridgeman at the winery, this wine still feels refreshing despite being from an extremely hot vintage. The medium-bodied wine has an alluring aroma that reveals notes of dried quince, green tea, leather, earth, tomato sauce, eucalyptus, dried apricot, subtle tea, herbs and floral hints. The tannins are smooth, the acidity is natural, and the finish is medium to full with a hint of minerality.

English pairs.original: Tasted those current release wines with the chief winemaker Paul Bridgeman in the winery. Even made from a very hot vintage, it was still cool, medium-bodied for its style, inviting noses of dried hawthorn, black coffee, leather, earth, tomato sauce, eucalyptus, semi-dry fig, with a tinge of tea, herb and vanilla, silky tannin, natural acidity, followed by a medium+ length hint with minerals.
English pairs.new: 与首席酒师Paul Bridgeman一起品尝了当前的新酒。即使来自一个非常炎热的产季，它仍然保持着清凉的中度体积，带有干燥的山楂、黑咖啡、皮革、土壤、番茄酱、桉树、半干的枣子、茶、香草和香料的诱人鼻香，滑润的纤维素，天然的酸度，随后是矿物质的中等以上长度的余味。

Western reviews.review: This is a little slow out of the gate, starting off with some rather cabbage-like aromas. Over time, the odors evolve toward smoke and ash, and, finally, into a complex, cedary aroma. The flavors of this medium-bodied blend (80% Cabernet Sauvignon, 10% Malbec, 8% Merlot, 2% Petit Verdot) feature blackberry and cassis, but also fold in hints of smoked meat and vanilla before finishing crisp and long. This really evolves and improves in the glass, suggesting 10-plus years of potential longevity.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒初期气味较为迟缓，最初的气味类似于青菜。随着时间的推移，气味逐渐转变为烟和灰烬的味道，最终演变为复杂的松木气味。这种中等体积的混合酒（80% 卡波雷尔·沙维尼翁，10% 马尔贝克，8% 美丽托，2% 小皮特·维多）具有黑莓和黑加仑的风味，但也融入了烟熏肉和香草的味道，最后以清脆和持久的口感结束。这种酒在杯子里逐渐演变和改善，表明它有10年以上的潜在寿命。

Western reviews.review: This classic Bordeaux-inspired red blend shows its Yarra Valley origins in its crisp, mouthwatering acids and medium body. The flavors are dark and earthy, with blackberry and cherry flavors wrapped in a coat of cedar and molasses. The track record suggests cellaring up to 15 years, although it's approachable now.
Western reviews.translation: 这款经典的波尔多风格红酒，展现了雅拉谷的特点，口感清新，酸度饱满，体积中等。酒中黑莓和樱桃的风味与松木和黑糖的香气融合在一起，呈现出深沉的土壤味道。根据酒的历史记录，建议将其贮存15年，但现在也可以直接享用。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有深色水果，雪松，皮革和雪茄盒的香气，口感滑腻​​，扣人心弦，黑浆果和李子的味道充满口腔，有百里香，甜香料和烟草叶的回味。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich, dark fruit aromas, pine, leather, and cigar box, smooth and seductive texture, blackberry and plum flavors that linger on the palate, with hints of thyme, sweet spices, and tobacco leaf.

Western reviews.review: Ripe and dense, but sleek and focused, with a lovely core of mulled black currant, warm fig paste and tobacco, laced with mouthwatering dark olive and iron notes that help the finish stretch out nicely. Has solid grip in reserve, too. Cabernet Sauvignon, Cabernet Franc and Merlot. Drink now through 2011. 1,400 cases imported.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感丰富浓郁，但又细致入微，具有黑加仑浆果的美妙核心，烤焦的枣泥和烟草味，口感中还带有令人垂涎的黑橄榄和铁矿味，帮助尾部延长。还保留着坚实的抓握感。酒中含有卡波网索维涅、卡波网法兰克和梅洛三种葡萄品种。建议立即饮用至2011年。进口量1,400箱。

Chinese pairs.original: 此酒年轻、封闭但非常优雅的香气透出硫、海盐、岩石、红布林、草莓干和干花香。口感结合了新鲜、活力和飘逸；回味兼具果味和矿物质。
Chinese pairs.new: This young, closed wine reveals a very elegant aroma of sulfur, sea salt, stone, red currant, dried strawberry, and floral notes. The palate combines freshness, vitality, and a sense of lift; the finish is a balance of fruit and minerality.

English pairs.original: Youthfully tight but very elegant aromas of sulphur, sea salt, stone, red plum, dried strawberry and dried flower. The palate combined freshness, vibrancy and ethereality; the finish possessed both fruitiness and minerality.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的香气中充满了年轻的活力和典雅的气质，带有硫磺、海盐、石头、红枣、干枯的草莓和干花的味道。口感中融合了新鲜、生动和飘渺的元素，尾部则同时展现了水果和矿物质的特征。

Western reviews.review: Classic Pinot noir bouquet the palate is full of dark cherries full flavoured with wonderful length and firm tannins it is still in its youth with a long life ahead of it!
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气典型的品红葡萄酒风味，口感丰富，充满黑杏的风味，口感长且坚实的口感，仍然处于青春期，未来有很长的生命周期。

Chinese pairs.original: 酒体新鲜且年轻，有典型Wendouree的优雅花香，亦有白垩和巧克力味，果味馥郁，还没有发展出任何墨水滋味，余韵有些颗粒状。我预测2011年对于Wendouree来说将会是一个伟大的年份，且这支酒能够窖藏非常久。
Chinese pairs.new: The wine has a fresh and youthful texture, with elegant floral aromas typical of Wendouree, along with notes of limestone and chocolate. The fruit flavors are rich and intense, with no inkiness or astringency yet developing. The finish is slightly grainy. I predict 2011 will be a great vintage for Wendouree, and this wine has the potential to age for a long time.

English pairs.original: Fresh and young, with elegant Wendouree's floral elements, a bit chalky and chocolaty, the wine has not developed any inky characters yet, while more fruit-driven instead, slightly powdery on the finish. I predicted the 2011 would be another very great vintage for Wendouree and this could be an incredible wine after many years' cellaring.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒新鲜而年轻，具有优雅的韦多雷风格的花朵元素，略带 chalky 和巧克力味，酒中尚未展现出深色的颜色，而是更倾向于果味，口感略带粉末感。 我预计2011年将是韦多雷的另一个极佳的产季，这瓶酒经过多年的陈酿后可能会成为一瓶不可思议的佳酿。

Western reviews.review: One of the lightest in colour. The nose is fresh and youthful showing simple but intense primary fruit. The palate is similar with leafy, cassis, red fruit and spice notes with a sprinkling of chocolate. It has bit of that sweet and sour aspect and it finishes fairly dry. Solid but not in the same league as the upper half of wines in the tasting. The blend is an unusual 60/40 mix of cabernet sauvignon and malbec. Wolf Blass Master Blend Classification Montreal. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 颜色非常浅。酒香清新、年轻，展现出简单但强烈的初级果味。口感与酒香相似，带有叶绿、黑加拿大浆果、红果和香料的味道，伴有巧克力味。酒体带有甜和酸的平衡，干爽的口感。虽然酒质坚实，但不及评酒会的上半部分酒的水平。酒的混合比例非常特别，60%的卡伯涅-索瓦宁和40%的马尔贝克。 (安东尼·吉斯蒙迪和斯图尔特·托比)

Western reviews.review: One of the lightest in colour. The nose is fresh and youthful showing simple but intense primary fruit. The palate is similar with leafy, cassis, red fruit and spice notes with a sprinkling of chocolate. It has bit of that sweet and sour aspect and it finishes fairly dry. Solid but not in the same league as the upper half of wines in the tasting. The blend is an unusual 60/40 mix of cabernet sauvignon and malbec. Wolf Blass Master Blend Classification Montreal. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 颜色非常浅。酒香清新、年轻，展现出简单但强烈的初级果味。口感与酒香相似，带有叶绿、黑加拿大浆果、红果和香料的味道，伴有巧克力味。酒体带有甜和酸的平衡，干爽的口感。虽然酒质坚实，但不如评酒会中上等酒的水平。酒款采用了非传统的60/40比例的卡波内尔和马尔贝克混合。 (安东尼·吉斯蒙迪和斯图尔特·托比)

Western reviews.review: One of the lightest in colour. The nose is fresh and youthful showing simple but intense primary fruit. The palate is similar with leafy, cassis, red fruit and spice notes with a sprinkling of chocolate. It has bit of that sweet and sour aspect and it finishes fairly dry. Solid but not in the same league as the upper half of wines in the tasting. The blend is an unusual 60/40 mix of cabernet sauvignon and malbec. Wolf Blass Master Blend Classification Montreal. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 颜色非常浅。酒香清新、年轻，展现出简单但强烈的初级果味。口感与酒香相似，带有叶绿、黑加拿大浆果、红果和香料的味道，伴有巧克力味。酒体带有甜和酸的平衡，干爽的口感。虽然酒质坚实，但不如评酒会中上等酒的水平。酒款采用了非传统的60/40比例的卡波涅-梅尔洛混合。 (安东尼·吉斯蒙迪和斯图尔特·托比)

Western reviews.review: One of the lightest in colour. The nose is fresh and youthful showing simple but intense primary fruit. The palate is similar with leafy, cassis, red fruit and spice notes with a sprinkling of chocolate. It has bit of that sweet and sour aspect and it finishes fairly dry. Solid but not in the same league as the upper half of wines in the tasting. The blend is an unusual 60/40 mix of cabernet sauvignon and malbec. Wolf Blass Master Blend Classification Montreal. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 颜色非常浅。酒香清新、年轻，展现出简单但强烈的初级果味。口感与酒香相似，带有叶绿、黑加拿大浆果、红果和香料的味道，伴有巧克力味。酒体带有甜和酸的平衡，干爽的口感。虽然酒质坚实，但不及评酒会的上半部分酒的水平。酒的混合比例非常特别，60%的卡伯涅梭和40%的马尔贝克。 (安东尼·吉斯蒙迪和斯图尔特·托比)

Western reviews.review: One of the lightest in colour. The nose is fresh and youthful showing simple but intense primary fruit. The palate is similar with leafy, cassis, red fruit and spice notes with a sprinkling of chocolate. It has bit of that sweet and sour aspect and it finishes fairly dry. Solid but not in the same league as the upper half of wines in the tasting. The blend is an unusual 60/40 mix of cabernet sauvignon and malbec. Wolf Blass Master Blend Classification Montreal. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 颜色非常浅。酒香清新、年轻，展现出简单但强烈的初级果味。口感与酒香相似，带有叶绿、黑加拿大浆果、红果和香料的味道，伴有巧克力味。酒体带有甜和酸的平衡，干爽的口感。虽然酒质坚实，但不如评酒会中上等酒的水平。酒款采用了非传统的60/40比例的卡波涅-梅尔洛混合。 (安东尼·吉斯蒙迪和斯图尔特·托比)

Chinese pairs.original: 和David Middleton及他儿子Sam一同品鉴了所有2012年份的新酒。漂亮的紫红色。极好的干净香气由樱桃果味、糖渍水果、矿物、香料矿物味和新鲜草药所主导，被一点点的花香所补完。口感一如既往的淡雅，同时余味展现了大量的使得口腔发干的单宁以及酸度，但是总体依然和谐。
Chinese pairs.new: David Middleton和他的儿子Sam一起品尝了2012年份的新酒。酒色深紫红。酒香清新，带有樱桃果味、糖渍水果、矿物质和香料矿物味，配上新鲜草药和花香。口感轻盈，余味中有强烈的单宁和酸度，但整体仍然平衡。

English pairs.original: Tasted all 2012 new release with David Middleton and his son Sam. Stylish purple-red color. Its superbly neat nose was predominated by cherry fruits, candied fruits, spicy-mineral and fresh herb, which complemented by a tinge of flowers tint. Lightly textured as usual, and the length displayed abundance of tannins and acids which drying the mouth while still in harmony.
English pairs.new:
与大卫·米德尔顿（David Middleton）和他的儿子萨姆（Sam）一起品尝了2012年新推出的所有红酒。 

这款红酒呈现出典雅的紫红色。其优美的鼻子气味以樱桃果味、糖果果味、辣味矿物质和新鲜香草为主，伴有花朵的微妙余味。 

口感轻薄如常，长度展现出丰富的鞣质和酸度，使口腔感到干燥，而仍保持和谐。

Western reviews.review: The iconic Mount Mary Quintet is one of the jewels of the Yarra Valley. This Bordeaux field blend personifies the refined, cool climate wines of the region. The vineyard was planted in 1971 on sandy clay loams, farmed organically, and has been dry farmed from the start. These fermented on skins for 14 days, followed by 22 months of barrel maturation, with 25% of the blend in large format oak (1500L or larger), and 30% in new barriques (225L). This was bottled with minimal fining and filtration. Savoury cherry, wild blackberry is lined with graphite and iron, running a long, dusty gravels palate. Tannins are similarly lengthy and fine grained, leading this to an herbal mint finish. Incredibly elegant, and savoury, with the bright lifted fruit expected of the Yarra. Sample tasted at Global Comparative Tasting: Cabernet Sauvignon. (Treve Ring).
Western reviews.translation: 玛丽山山丘系列（Mount Mary Quintet）是亚拉河谷（Yarra Valley）的一颗珍珠。这款波尔多风格的混合葡萄酒（Bordeaux field blend）完美地体现了该地区的精致、凉爽气候葡萄酒的特点。该葡萄园于1971年种植在沙质粘土中，采用有机耕作，并从一开始就采用干农法。这些葡萄酒在皮肤上发酵14天，随后在225L新橡桶和1500L或更大的大型橡桶中进行22个月的橡桶成熟，混合酒中有25%使用大型橡桶，30%使用新橡桶。酒瓶中使用了极少量的精细和过滤。酒中有浓郁的樱桃和野生黑莓，伴有石墨和铁的矿物质味道，口感长长，沙沙的鹅卵石味道。同样，纤维素也很长，细致，带来了一种清新的薄荷味的尾部。酒精度非常优雅，具有亚拉河谷的典型特征。样品在全球比较品酒会：卡波涅尔·沙夫宁（Cabernet Sauvignon）中品尝。

Western reviews.review: (2021) From sandy clay-loam soils and again very old vines planted in 1971, these are farmed organically and the wine spent 20 months in 225L barriques, 35% new oak. There's a creamier, mintier profile than the Yarra Yering, slightly more lush and juicy, some very nice graphite notes and a little hint of that violetty, floral lift again. Certainly more sweet, dense and direct than the Yarra Yering, but not without light and shade, a lovely softness and poise to the tannin structure that it gentle but supportive. The acids also soft giving this a sweet but balanced finish.
Western reviews.translation:
来自沙质黏土土壤和再次非常老的1971年种植的葡萄藤，这些葡萄是有机耕种的，酒精在225升新橡木桶中陈化了20个月，35%是新橡木。 

与Yarra Yering相比，这款酒的风味更丰富、更清新，带有更多的草药味和浓郁的口感，伴有很好的石墨笔记和一丝紫罗兰般的花香。 

这款酒比Yarra Yering更甜、更浓密、更直接，但并非没有光和影，酒中有柔和的质感和优雅的韧性，酸度也较软，使得酒尾甜美但平衡。

Western reviews.review: A very delicate wine. On the nose, it has focused berry fruit and a stably undercurrent that follows through on the palate. It's smooth in the mouth, subtle in that it shines with the impression of bright berry fruit, but its size doesn't knock you over. Pretty, feminine and best of all, different. Imported by Old Bridge Cellars.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶非常细致的红酒。酒鼻中有着浓缩的浆果果香和稳定的底调，这些特征在口感中得到了延续。口感平滑，细腻，酒中闪烁着明亮的浆果果香，但酒的体积并不强烈。它的风格优雅，女性化，最重要的是独特。

Western reviews.review: This is a nice Bordeaux-style blend with pretty cherry and currant fruit and some cedar shadings, but lack the complexity of others in its style. It's straight forward, polite and restrained.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一个不错的波尔多风格的混合红酒，具有漂亮的樱桃和黑currant的果味和一些松木的阴影，但缺乏其他同类酒的复杂性。它的风格直接、礼貌、克制。

Chinese pairs.original: 具有黑醋栗，无花果，雪松和咖啡的香气，优雅和复杂的结构，使酒体丰满而细腻。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich aromas of black prune, fig, pine, and coffee, with an elegant and complex structure, resulting in a full-bodied and velvety texture.

Western reviews.review: Tinto composto a partir de uvas 5 5% Cabernet Sauvignon e 45% Malbec, cultivadas em Altamira, no vale do Uco, com estágio de 11 meses em barricas de carvalho, sendo 85% novas. Mostra perfil mais maduro e concentrado de suas frutas vermelhas e negras (retrato de uma época), seguidas de notas florais e de ervas frescas, tudo apoiado por acidez pulsante e taninos firmes e de textura de giz. Chama atenção pela juventude, não aparentando ter quase 15 anos. Álcool 15%.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒由5%的卡贝网索维涅和45%的马尔贝克两种葡萄组成，产于阿尔塔米拉，乌科河谷。酒龄11个月，85%的陈酿在橡木桶中。酒呈现出成熟、浓郁的红酒和黑酒风味（代表了某个时期），随后是花香和新鲜香草的味道，所有的风味都由强有力的酸度和坚实的木质感支持。酒的年轻感令人印象深刻，尽管它已经接近15岁。酒精含量15%。

Western reviews.review: CARO, from CAtena and ROthschild, opens with a vanilla, coffee, cassis, black cherry nosed flecked with leather, meaty, savoury, menthol and tobacco notes. The attack is round with rich, smooth fine-grain tannins and good acidity. There a sense of grace under its chocolate, liquorice, vanilla, cedar, poultry spice, blackberry and cassis flavours. Finish is youthful with some barnyard, menthol, black cherry and tea flavours. Good fruit and intensity but needs another two to four years in bottle. Serve now with T-bone steak. 55-65 per cent cabernet sauvignon 25 to 35 per cent malbec. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 卡罗（Caro）由CAtena和ROthschild联合出品，口感丰富，入口圆润，细腻的纤维和良好的酸度使得口感更加平滑。酒中有巧克力、肉桂、香草、红木、黑莓和黑加思等复杂的风味。尾部年轻有活力，带有草场、薄荷、黑加思和茶叶的风味。酒中有很好的果味和强度，但需要在瓶子里再储存两到四年。建议现在就喝，搭配T-bone牛排。酒中含有55-65%的卡波萨（Cabernet Sauvignon）和25-35%的马尔贝克（Malbec）。

Chinese pairs.original: 这支酒是三片Bannockburn葡萄园的混酿。如我所料，这是支很好的黑品诺，眼前闪现的是一幅30岁左右成熟美女的画面。无论是香气还是口感都很丰富，具备了纤细度和优雅度，同时亦不乏深度。果实味和新鲜度得以保留缘于酒庄通常都会采取的较早采收。馥郁的香气中透出莲雾、皮革、半干的无花果、煮烂的蔬菜、红枣、氧化的泥土、香煎蘑菇、森林土地、干花、茴香、桂皮、矿物、青苹果和雪茄。口感饱满干净、丝滑柔顺，余韵略干，伴随些许的咸矿物滋味，高酒精带来了少许的苦味，但绝对可以接受。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine is a blend of three blocks from Bannockburn Vineyard. As expected, it's a great Cabernet Sauvignon, evoking a 30-year-old woman at her prime. Both the aroma and palate are rich, with finesse and elegance, yet depth is not lacking. The fruit flavors and freshness are preserved due to the early harvest, a common practice at the winery. The bouquet is complex, with notes of lavender, leather, dried quince, cooked vegetables, red cherries, oxidized earth, pan-seared mushrooms, forest floor, dried flowers, nutmeg, cinnamon, minerals, green apple, and cigar box. The palate is full-bodied, clean, and silky smooth, with a dry finish and a hint of salty minerality. The high alcohol brings a touch of bitterness, but it's perfectly acceptable.

English pairs.original: This wine is a blend of three Bannockburn vineyards. A really good pinot as what I expected, the image portrayed was a 30 years old beautiful lady. Sappy on the nose and palate, it had got fineness and elegance as well as deepness. At the meantime, the freshness and fruitiness come from always earlier picking. The intense nose showed wax apple, leather, semi-dry fig, boiled vegetable, red date, oxidative earth, fried mushroom, forest floor, dried flower, fennel, cinnamon, mineral, green apple and cigar. Rich and clean palate coupled with silky structure, a bit dry with slight mineral and savoury notes on the finish, tiny bitterness might from the high alcohol (14.5%), but still already a good control could be seen here.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒是由三块班诺克堡葡萄园的葡萄混合而成。酒的风格正如我预期的那样，酒的形象是30岁的美丽女性。酒的鼻子和口感都很浓郁，具有细腻和优雅的质感，同时也具有深度。同时，酒的新鲜和果香来自早期采摘。酒的强烈鼻子中表现出蜂蜜苹果、皮革、半干的枣子、煮熟的蔬菜、红枣、氧化土壤、煎锅蘑菇、森林地面、干花、荜拌、肉桂、矿物、绿苹果和雪茄等味道。酒的口感丰富清晰，结构细腻，略带干涸和矿物和咸味的尾韵，酒中的微微苦味可能来自高酒精含量（14.5%），但酒的控制还是很好的。

Western reviews.review: A rich and juicy wine with plum and dried strawberry character. Aromatic with beet root. Velvety tannins. This is a blend of three vineyards: Calvert, Bannockburn, and Cornish Point. Drink or hold. Screw cap.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶富有滋味、浓郁的红酒，具有浓郁的浆果和干枯的草莓特征。酒中还带有甜菜根的芳香。酒质细腻柔和。这瓶红酒是由三块葡萄园的葡萄酒混合而成：卡尔维特、班诺克伯恩和康什点。适合立即饮用或储存。酒瓶盖。

Western reviews.review: Smooth and elegant, with pretty touches of white pepper, fresh herb and dried rose petal to the crisp cherry and cranberry flavors. The tannins firm up on the finish, but never get in the way of the wine. Drink now through 2022.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感非常平滑优雅，带有白胡椒、新鲜香草和干玫瑰花的清新气息，搭配着鲜红樱桃和蔓越莓的果味。酒尾的苦味渐渐增强，但从未干扰到酒的风味。建议立即享用，至2022年最佳。

Chinese pairs.original: 在酒庄品鉴的新年份，比那些个老年份好上很多，少了许多桶味，风格上更加新鲜，干净且纯净。香气的集中度非常出色，展现了干水果（红枣、无花果、山楂）、烤草药、萨拉米肠、干花、甘草李子蜜饯、红茶、黑胡椒、红醋栗、焦糖及番茄的气息，中等酒体，冰凉的中段口感，单宁丝滑，中等偏上的余韵中带有一丝咸味。
Chinese pairs.new: The new vintage at this winery is a significant improvement over the older vintages, with much less oak influence and a fresher, cleaner style. The aromas are highly concentrated, showcasing notes of dried fruits (apricots, quince, prunes), toasted herbs, salami, dried flowers, licorice, red tea, black pepper, red pomegranate, caramel, and tomato. The medium-bodied palate is cool and refreshing, with smooth tannins and a lingering finish that's slightly salty.

English pairs.original: The current vintages for Yarra Yering I tasted in winery were better than those back ones, less oak-driven but fresher, cleaner and purer in style. Great intensity, charming noses of dried fruits (red date, fig and hawthorn), roasted herb, salami, dried flower, liquorice candied plum, black tea, black pepper, red currant, caramel and tomato, medium-bodied with cool mid-palate, silky tannin, followed by a medium+ length with some savoury notes.
English pairs.new: 我在酒庄品尝的最近几年产的雅拉耶林红酒比之前的版本更好， oak味道减少，风格更加清新、干净、纯粹。酒体强烈，气味诱人，带有干燥水果的香气（红枣、枣子和山楂），烤香草、火腿、干花、糖浆枣子、黑茶、黑胡椒、红 gooseberry、焦糖和番茄。酒体中等，口感凉爽，纤维柔滑，尾部长中等，有些咸味。

Western reviews.review: Shiraz complexity in a glass: herbal, smoky and meaty, all tied together by a core of berryish fruit.
