This is classic cool-climate Shiraz, combining concentration and flavor intensity with medium body and barely perceptible tannins. It's elegant and nuanced, never rich or heavy, with a long finish. Drink now-2025.
Western reviews.translation: 在玻璃中，雪利酒的复杂性展现出：草药、烟熏和肉类的味道，所有这些都被浓郁的浆果味道所连接。这是典型的冷气候雪利酒，结合了浓度和风味强度与中等体积和几乎不可察觉的苦味。它优雅而细致，永远不会丰富或沉重，具有长长的尾部。现在-2025年饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 醇厚的黑莓、香草、黑醋栗香气，单宁结实成熟，含香料味，果味也很充足，余味是淡淡的橡木气息。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich blackberry, vanilla, and black walnut aromas, with firm, mature tannins, hints of spice, and plenty of fruit flavors, finishing with a subtle oak note.

Western reviews.review: I can't tell you how happy I am to taste an Australian wine that doesn't have that odd acidified flavoured. The '03 389 is suitably dark and well wrapped in cassis, chocolate, vanilla and black pepper aromas without any green character. The mouth is ripe and supple as always with more sweet tobacco, chocolate and smoky, herbal black currant flavours. A very fine effort. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 我非常高兴地品尝到没有那种奇怪酸味的澳大利亚红酒。03年389的酒色深沉，气味中有浓郁的黑加仑、巧克力、香草和黑胡椒的香气，没有任何青涩的味道。口感丰富柔和，味道中有甜的烟草、巧克力和烟熏黑加仑的风味。是一款非常出色的酒。

Western reviews.review: Dense and slightly pruny, with scents of overripe or baked plum and flavors that include black olive and earth. It's weighty and rich enough to get the job done with a fatty steak.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感浓密，略带干酪味，气味中带有烤石榴和熟透的石榴，口感中有黑橄榄和泥土的味道。它的重量和丰富的口感足以与肥肉的牛排相配。

miguel torres mas la plana cabernet sauv.name: miguel torres mas la plana cabernet sauvignon 2006

Chinese pairs.original: 此酒充满泥土味的优雅香气中夹杂香料、黑松露、绿茶、薄荷、成熟黑莓和蓝莓的芬芳。典型的轻盈、多矿物口感中富有强劲的单宁同时展现活泼的果味、细致的结构以及浓郁的回味。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine is filled with elegant aromas of earthy notes, spices, black truffle, green tea, mint, ripe blackberry, and blueberry. It boasts a classic light, mineral-driven palate with robust tannins, lively fruit flavors, refined texture, and a rich, lingering finish.

English pairs.original: A refined, earth-infused nose intermixed with spices, black truffle, green tea, mint, ripe blackberry and blueberry. The typically ethereal, utterly tannic and mineral-inflected palate exhibited vivid fruit, detailed structure and a rich finish.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的香气中融合了泥土、香料、黑松露、绿茶、薄荷、熟黑莓和蓝莓的味道。口感典型地是轻盈、充满坚果味和矿物质的同时也展现出鲜明的果味、细致的结构和丰富的尾韵。

Western reviews.review: From the cellar. Mas La Plana was a ground breaking wine, one of the first cabernet sauvignons in Spain, and planted by Torres in Penedes in 1966. This 1970 bested blind cab sauvs from first growth Bordeaux in the 1979 Gault-Millau Wine Olympiad in Paris, and it's been a jewel of the Torres portfolio since. Potent, concentrated black fruit is beneficially worn with a decade of bottle age into a potent, leathery, red. Ripe black cherry, medicinal cherry, anise, cured meats, dried salted tobacco on a concentrated and full palate, met with a firm, bright acidity. Tannins are still grippy and strident, with fresh cedar boughs and a lick of eucalypt on the finish. Even with a day's decant this requires roasted beef or lamb to match. (Treve Ring).
Western reviews.translation: 来自酒窖。马斯拉普拉纳（Mas La Plana）是一款开创性的红酒，1966年是托雷斯（Torres）在佩内德斯（Penedes）种植的第一瓶卡波雷特（Cabernet Sauvignon）红酒。1970年的马斯拉普拉纳在1979年的高尔夫米洛（Gault-Millau）葡萄酒奥林匹克（Wine Olympiad）中击败了来自波尔多第一级葡萄酒的卡波雷特红酒，自此成为托雷斯葡萄酒系列的珍品。经过十年的陈酿，浓郁的黑果味被包裹在一层浓郁的、带有皮革味的红色中。口感浓郁、饱满，带有熟黑樱桃、药材樱桃、荜茇、腌肉、干烟草味。酒精度高，口感清晰，仍然有较强的纽扣感，余味中带有新鲜松柏和柠檬香。即使经过一天的脱颈，也需要与烤牛肉或羊肉相配。

Western reviews.review: Mocha, toasty smoke and pure berry aromas ring the bell, and the palate follows with fine balance and flavors of vanilla-infused raspberry, plum and cassis. A little rich and creamy now but still structured and ageable for another 10 years. A seriously good Spanish Cabernet with world-class character. Best from 2013–2018.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中带有巧克力、烟熏和浓郁的浆果味。口感平衡，味道中有浓郁的莓果、浆果和黑加仑的风味。虽然现在略带油腻，但仍然具有结构和可储存10年的潜力。是一款具有世界级品质的西班牙卡贝网酒。建议在2013-2018年之间品尝。

Western reviews.review: (2012) Gorgeous lift to this wine, with much more of a cherry and red fruit brightness, lots of exotic incense notes and just fine, delicate floral aromas. The palate is all edge and agility against the Sassicaia's fuller, meatier depths, but has superb structure and focus. One to age for a decade or more.
Western reviews.translation: 2012年：这款红酒具有极好的气势，带有更多的樱桃和红果味，充满了异国风情的香烟味和细致的花朵香气。口感干净利落，具有出色的结构和焦点。与萨西卡亚（Sassicaia）更丰富的肉味相比，这款酒更为轻盈，但仍然值得储存十年以上。

Western reviews.review: Huge spicy, peppery, black olive nose with tobacco, barnyard, cassis, coffee, vanilla, smoky, dried cranberry aromas with a touch of saddle leather. Dry, fresh, elegant, juicy palate with light, grainy tannins and a touch of austerity. Cassis, coffee, vanilla, herbal, tobacco, smoky, saddle leather, barnyard, olive, green bean and savoury flavours with a bit of Band-Aid and cedar on the finish. Good finesse and structure that will benefit from 3-7 years aging. Definitely improves with decanting and shows more intense fruit. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气非常强烈，带有辣椒、胡椒、黑橄榄、烟草、马厩、黑加仑、咖啡、香草、烟熏、干 cranberry 等味道，伴有马鞍皮革的味道。口感干净、清新、优雅、 juicy，具有轻微的砂粒质感和一丝严谨。口感中有黑加仑、咖啡、香草、草本、烟草、烟熏、马鞍皮革、马厩、橄榄、绿豆和咸味等味道，尾部带有创可贴和红木味。酒体具有良好的质感和结构，适合在3-7年后饮用。酒瓶经过脱颈处理后，酒味会更加丰富。 (安东尼·吉斯蒙迪和斯图尔特·托比)

Western reviews.review: An opening salvo of coffee, tobacco and pure berry fruit give this Cabernet a fine lift-off. The palate exhibits freshness and full-bodied power, while the flavors run toward deep black fruits, tobacco, herbs, vanilla and cocoa. Long and rich as well on the finish. Best to set this aside for at least four years before revisiting, but drinkable now with decanting.
Western reviews.translation: 这款卡贝网红酒的开场即是浓郁的咖啡、烟草和纯净的浓果味，给人以极好的开场。口感清新且富有体积，味道则向深色果实、烟草、香草、香料和可可方向发展。酒尾长且丰富。建议将酒放置至少四年后再次品尝，但经过脱颈后即可享用。

wynns coonawarra estate black label cabe.name: wynns coonawarra estate black label cabernet sauvignon 2009

Chinese pairs.original: 呈现近乎黑色的深红色泽。刚开瓶时香气非常紧闭，需要至少15分钟的透气时间，香气散发着华美的成熟李子、黑樱桃、蓝莓及树莓香气，而后是甘草和尤加利树赐予的桉树味，奶油巧克力香在20分钟后出现，口中漫溢着香草、青椒和少许的可可、烟草、雪茄的味道，中等酒体，口感丝滑，平衡感完美，伴随着沉闷、柔和的单宁余韵。这是Wynns酒庄的系列中我最喜欢的一支酒。
Chinese pairs.new: Deep, near-black red color. The aroma is initially very tight, requiring at least 15 minutes of aeration to unfurl, releasing opulent scents of ripe plums, black cherries, blueberries, and raspberries, followed by hints of licorice and eucalyptus, and then the emergence of chocolatey notes at 20 minutes. The palate is awash with vanilla, green pepper, and subtle hints of cocoa, tobacco, and cigar, with a silky texture and perfect balance, accompanied by a lingering, soft tannin finish. This is my favorite wine from the Wynns stable.

English pairs.original: Almost black from crimson color. Too taut at the beginning, needed at least 15 minutes airing to open up its nose, showing an array of wonderfully ripe plum, dark cherry, blueberry, raspberry, liquorice and eucalyptus comes from eucalyptus tree around vineyards (very common in Coonawarra), cream chocolate appeared in glass after 20 minutes, offering vanilla, capsicum, and a hint of cocoa, tobacco, cigar, cinnamon notes on the palate, freshly high acidity, medium body with silky texture, nice balance, followed by a dusty length with supple tannins. My favorite wine for Wynns.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的颜色接近黑色，深红色。初尝时过于紧绷，需要至少15分钟的空气氧化才能打开鼻子的香气，展现出丰富的熟透的浆果、黑樱桃、蓝莓、草莓、甘草和桉树香气（来自附近的葡萄园中常见的桉树），20分钟后在玻璃中出现了奶油巧克力，提供了香草、辣椒和一丝可可、烟草、雪茄、肉桂的口感，口感清新高酸度，中等体积，滑顺的质地，平衡好，尾部有尘土般的长度，柔软的纹理。对于Wynns来说，这是我的最爱。

Western reviews.review: Deep cherry purple colour. Open ripe cassis, blackberry, mint, earth and tobacco with lots of spice and pepper. Ripe, round and elegant with balanced, supple tannins. Peppery, earthy, tobacco flavours with ripe cassis jam, mint, cherry and coffee flavours. Young with a slightly tannic, acid finish but can drink now or over the next 10 years. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 深红紫色。开瓶后释放出浓郁的黑加仑、黑莓、薄荷、泥土和烟草的香气，伴有大量的香料和胡椒。酒体丰富圆润，口感优雅平衡，纤维柔软。口感中有胡椒、泥土、烟草的味道，伴有成熟的黑加仑果酱、薄荷、樱桃和咖啡的味道。酒龄较轻，略带纤维和酸的尾部，但可以立即饮用，也可以在未来10年内饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 有辛香、红色水果和精妙的橡木味，红色和黑色水果的口感丰润清爽，和辛香味恰到好处的融合，成熟细致的单宁和口感的集中度为这款酒构造了完美的结构和均衡度，余味持久绵长。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts a rich blend of spices, red fruit, and subtle oak notes. The texture is plush and refreshing, with a perfect balance of fruit flavors and spices. The mature tannins and concentrated flavors come together to create a harmonious structure and balance, with a long and lingering finish.

Western reviews.review: Duval prefers the SGM blend to the GSM thus Plexus Red because it is less confected by the grenache fruit thus the blend is a 50/30/20 mix of shiraz grenache and mourvèdre with the latter two grapes coming off old bush vines. The shiraz provides a rich blackberry backbone and now a few years down the road a wonderful open aroma of rich black fruits and spice all with a savoury edge. The grenache is old as is the mataro but the fruit is clean and rich. A delicious style with a warm milk chocolate undercurrent it perfectly illustrates what was a lovely warm vintage with a dry summer. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 杜瓦尔更喜欢SGM混合红酒而不是GSM混合红酒的Plexus红酒，因为后者不受grenache果实的影响。因此，混合红酒的比例为50/30/20，分别是霞多丽、grenache和摩尔维德雷。后两种葡萄来自老树藤。霞多丽提供了丰富的黑莓骨架，现在经过几年的时间，酒香变得更加开阔，具有丰富的黑果和香料味道，带有咸味。grenache和马托葡萄都很老，但果实清晰富有。这种风格非常美味，具有温暖的牛奶巧克力底调，完美地展现了一个温暖的好年份和干燥的夏季。

Western reviews.review: The 2006 Plexus is showing a little more grit and obvious tannin than the '04 and '05 did at a similar stage, but still features plenty of dark, savory notes of cassis, coffee and chocolate, with a bit of an herbal streak thrown in for complexity. Drink 2010–2016.
Western reviews.translation: 2006 年的Plexus酒相比04和05年份的酒稍微有更多的粗糙感和明显的坚果味，但仍然具有浓郁的黑果、咖啡和巧克力风味，并带有少量的草药味以增加复杂性。建议在2010-2016年饮用。

Santa Carolina Reserva De Familia Cabern.name: Santa Carolina Reserva De Familia Cabernet Sauvignon 2008

Chinese pairs.original: 果香浓郁迷人，相继而来的是香草、巧克力和橡木味，入口顺滑细腻，圆润饱满。
Chinese pairs.new: Intense and alluring fruit aromas unfold, followed by notes of vanilla, chocolate, and oak. Smooth and silky texture, with a full-bodied and rounded mouthfeel.

Western reviews.review: Perfectly good and very much as expected. The nose is firm, crusty and a bit herbal in that patented Maipo way. The flavors are a mix of dark berry, cassis, herbs and medicinality, while the mouthfeel is solid. Very nice Cabernet for the money; the only quibble is that it's highly regular and not all that individual or unique.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒非常好，完全符合预期。酒鼻子坚实、干酪味、带有典型的马伊波风味。口感复杂，包括黑berry、黑加仑、香草和药味。口感坚实。价格合理的好卡布ernet，唯一的抱怨是它太平凡，没有独特性。

quinta do vale dona maria cv-curriculum.name: quinta do vale dona maria cv-curriculum vitae 2008

Chinese pairs.original: 这是至今为止，我最喜欢的一支葡萄牙酒，属于新派里奥哈风格。香气集中展现黑色水果风味，同时带有明显的木桶香草气息，口感足够饱满，但中段依然保有优雅度，整体活泼、丝滑，非常平衡。
Chinese pairs.new: This is my favorite Portuguese wine to date, belonging to the modern Rioja style. The aroma showcases concentrated black fruit flavors, accompanied by a distinct oak vanilla note. The palate is full-bodied, yet maintains elegance in the mid-palate, with a lively, silky texture and excellent balance.

English pairs.original: One of my favorite Portugese wine till now, modern Rioja style. There was a great concentration of dark fruit on the nose, with noticeable vanilla oaks, rich enough texture while remained elegant on mid-palate, it was bright, silky and well-balanced indeed.
English pairs.new: 这是我至今最喜欢的葡萄牙红酒，现代风格的里奥哈风味。酒鼻中有浓郁的黑果味，显著的香橙味，口感丰富而细腻，中口保持优雅，酒体明亮、滑顺、平衡。

Western reviews.review: Tiefdunkles Rubingranat, opaker Kern, violette Reflexe. Intensive Frucht, nach Cassis und Brombeerkonfit, etwas Nougat, Gewürze und Edelholznoten klingen an, mit etwas Luft ungemein facettenreich. Kraftvoll, extraktsüß und stoffig, präsente Nuancen vom neuen Holz, zedriger Touch, ein sehr konzentrierter Wein, schokoladige Anklänge, reife dunkle Frucht im Nachhall, bleibt lange haften, zeigt noch etwas Babyspeck, sicheres Entwicklungspotenzial.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色调，透明的葡萄核，紫色反光。浓郁的果香，带有黑加斯和浓缩草莓味，略带奶油、香料和高档木头味，随着空气的变化变得异常复杂。强烈、浓缩甜和厚重，新木头的细微变化，细致的触感，非常浓缩的葡萄酒，巧克力般的余味，熟透的黑色果肉在余音中持续存在，留下深刻的印象，仍然有余裕发展，充满了成熟的潜力。

Chinese pairs.original: 膜拜级的Noon的酒以无可比拟的浓缩度和力量而闻名。十分年轻，散发薰衣草和草药香气，以传统的蓝莓果香和香料味平衡。入口展现庞大、多肉的口感，具有至高无上的丰富度。这是一支严肃且富有厚度的设拉子葡萄酒。
Chinese pairs.new: 这是一款膜拜级的Noon葡萄酒，知名于其无与伦比的浓缩度和力量。酒体十分年轻，带有薰衣草和草药的香气，配以传统的蓝莓果香和香料味，达到完美的平衡。入口时，酒体展现出丰富的多肉感，具有极高的丰富度。这是一款严肃且厚度十足的设拉子葡萄酒。

English pairs.original: Noon Winery has become a cult figure in the wine world since their opulent red wines that are known for the concentration and power. Still very young, aromas of lavender and herb balanced with traditional fruit notes of blueberry and spices. ‘Big’ and fleshy on the palate while still showing supreme complexity. This is a Shiraz with serious weight and body.
English pairs.new: 诺恩酒庄自从推出浓郁的红酒以来，已经成为葡萄酒界的偶像。尽管年轻，但这款红酒带有清新的茉莉花和草本香气，结合了传统的蓝莓和香料的果香。口感丰富饱满，复杂性仍然非常高。这种夏拉酒具有严重的重量和体积。

Western reviews.review: Dieser Wein ist ein Schwergewichtsboxer mit K.-o.-Wumms. 16 Vol.-% Alkohol verdeutlichen die Power und Reife dieses besonderen Shiraz. Eingelegte Johannisbeeren mit reifer Süsse, wahnsinniger Extrakt, massive, aber extrem reife Tannine. Dieser Wein hat von allem viel. Wirkt am Gaumen fast wie ein Portwein – nur ohne Säure.
Western reviews.translation: 这个红酒是重量级的拳击手，具有强烈的击倒力。酒精含量达16%，展现了这款特殊的雪利司令的力量和成熟度。酒中有浸泡的黑莓，带有成熟的甜味，极度浓缩的果实，巨大的但极度成熟的苦味。这个酒有很多东西。口感上几乎像葡萄酒一样，但没有酸度。

Western reviews.review: Breit aufgefächerte schwarze Beerenfrucht, Nuancen von Brombeere und schwarzer Kirsche, im Hintergrund von Eukalyptus und Minze, mineralischer Touch, entwickelt sich gut im Glas. Stoffig, kraftvolle Textur, extraktsüßer Kern, gut verpackte Tannine, opulent, Gewürznoten und reife Pflaumen im Abgang, mineralische Nuancen im Finale, kann bereits angetrunken werden.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一杯黑酒的评论。翻译如下：

酒体丰富，黑色浆果味道广泛分布，带有浆果和黑樱桃的细微差别，背景中有欧柠檬和薄荷的气息，矿物质的味道，酒体在杯中逐渐发酵。酒体厚重，力量十足，果实浓郁，坚果味浓郁，酒中的苦味很好地被控制，酒体丰富，香料味和成熟的石榴味在尾部，酒尾有矿物质的味道，酒可以立即饮用。

shafer vineyards hillside select caberne.name: shafer vineyards hillside select cabernet sauvignon 2001

Chinese pairs.original: 中等偏上的红宝石色，陈年的香气富饶多变，起初有明显的焦糖、卡布基诺、湿树叶及香草气息，而后黑樱桃果酱、奶油和青椒一一呈现，并以草莓酸奶收尾，酒体中等偏上，酸度较高，口感清淡顺滑，伴随着中等焦糖余韵。
Chinese pairs.new:
Medium-plus garnet color, aged aromas are rich and complex, initially showing prominent notes of caramel, cannoli, damp earth, and herbal hints, followed by black cherry jam, butter, and bell pepper, finishing with strawberry yogurt. 

Medium-plus body, high acidity, and a light, smooth texture, with a lingering caramel aftertaste.

English pairs.original: Medium+ ruby color, evolved, complex and variable noses of caramel, notable cappuccino, wet leaf, vanilla at the beginning, then followed by dark cherry jam, cream, capsicum, and finished with strawberry flavored yogurt, medium+ body with high acidity, lightly smooth texture, with a medium caramel length.
English pairs.new:
颜色：深红色，成熟，复杂的气味，变化多端，初期有焦糖、咖啡、湿叶、香草，随后有黑樱桃酱、奶油、辣椒、最后是草莓味的酸奶。

口感：中等体积，高酸度，轻微光滑，中等焦糖长度。

Western reviews.review: Perhaps the most elegant, sledge hammer I have ever encountered. There is all the power, purity, tannin and length you could ask for. The layers of black, blue and red fruits just kept on coming, again and again. Seamless, and without any hard edges, the tannins were soft and polished. This is a mouth-coating wine indeed. In magnum, this tasted like it was at least 10 years younger. This is no shy, wallflower of a wine. There is an intensity of flavor that just does not want to quit. Could this be a 50 year wine in the making? 98 Points
Western reviews.translation: 我遇到的最优雅的强劲红酒。它拥有所有你需要的力量、纯粹度、苦味和长度。黑、蓝和红色的水果层次不断涌现，令人惊叹。苦味柔和光滑，没有硬边。这种酒确实会覆盖口腔。瓶装的酒，味道至少比10年年轻。这不是一种害羞的酒，它的味道强烈而持久。这种酒是否能在50年后仍保持如此强劲？我给予98分。

Western reviews.review: No Cabernet smells better. This is an enormously attractive, well-oaked wine constituted from the best possible fruit. In the mouth, it immediately seduces. Shafer knows it has to rise to expectations with this wine, and the 2001 does not disappoint. The fruit is spectacular, all cassis. The oak is rich, flamboyant and delicious. Structurally, the wine has the best tannin-acid structure Napa is capable of. Immediately delicious now, this wine should develop over the next 10 years.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒绝对是最好的Cabernet Sauvignon。酒精度高，口感丰富，酒香浓郁。口感入口即感染，果味丰富，口感丰富。酒庄Shafer以最好的葡萄为基础，酿造出一瓶极具吸引力的陈酿酒。酒中的木头味道浓郁，丰富，口感极好。酒的结构完美，酸度和坚果味道的平衡是纳帕谷最好的表现。酒现在就可以享用，未来10年会有更好的表现。

Chinese pairs.original: 高贵、典型的黑皮诺香气，充满了湿玫瑰、矿物、小茴香香料和些许树丛。漂亮且极淡的口感带有矿物的纤细感，平衡的酸度和结构感十足的单宁；只可惜回味被略显粗糙的严峻单宁所覆盖，导致了整支酒有些不平衡。
Chinese pairs.new: Elegant and quintessential Pinot Noir aromas, rich with damp rose, mineral, and subtle nutmeg spice notes, along with a hint of forest floor. The palate is lovely and extremely delicate, with a fine-grained minerality, balanced acidity, and a robust tannin structure; unfortunately, the finish is somewhat marred by a slightly rough and austere tannin that throws the wine slightly out of balance.

English pairs.original: An elegant and stylized pinot nose of semi-dry rose, mineral, anise spices and underbush overtone. Stylish and very light texture featured finesse of minerality, balanced acid and structured tannin; what a shame that the finish was coated by astringency which led to tiny harshness.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的香气优雅典雅，带有半干的玫瑰味、矿物质、丁香和灌木的余味。口感轻盈，矿物质的细腻感、酸度的平衡和结构紧致的纤维，使得它具有极高的品质。但令人遗憾的是，尾部被苦涩感所覆盖，导致口感略微的刺激。

Western reviews.review: Restraint is one of the buzzwords in Australian wine, which might be one reason that for all of this winery's cult status in Australia, it remains relatively unknown in America. This medium-bodied wine's black cherry fruit is definitely restrained, flecked with delicate herbal notes and rounded out by supple tannins. It's well made and well balanced, but lacks sizzle.
Western reviews.translation: 澳大利亚葡萄酒中，克制（restraint）是一个热门词汇，这也许是为什么尽管这个酒庄在澳大利亚拥有极高的知名度，但在美国却相对不为人知的原因之一。这个中等体积的红酒果味果实性果味果实性果味果实性果味果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果实性果

Chinese pairs.original: 香气辛辣而浓烈，散发着黑莓和樱桃的气味，弥漫着一抹甘草和黑胡椒的香气，非常清新，单宁成熟，酒味持久，酒体饱满。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromatic intensity with bold notes of blackberry and cherry, accompanied by a subtle hint of licorice and black pepper, offering a crisp and refreshing character. The tannins are well-integrated and mature, resulting in a long-lasting finish and a full-bodied texture.

yao family wines yao ming family reserve.name: yao family wines yao ming family reserve cabernet sauvignon 2015

Chinese pairs.original: 酒庄的创始人是中国篮球巨星姚明。此酒的香气充满糖渍樱桃、香料和皮革味。口感非常通透，酸度则十分锐利，伴有诱人的清新感以及充沛的果味。
Chinese pairs.new: The winery was founded by Chinese basketball legend Yao Ming. This wine boasts aromas of candied cherry, spices, and leather. The palate is incredibly smooth, with a sharp acidity that's accompanied by an alluring freshness and a rich fruitiness.

English pairs.original: Founded by Chinese basketball superstar Yao Ming. The nose was filled with candied cherry, spices and leather. The mouthfeel was bright, and the acid was sharp, with attractive refreshment and plentiful fruitiness.
English pairs.new: 由中国篮球巨星姚明创立。酒香中充满了糖浇过的樱桃、香料和皮革的味道。口感清新，酸度锋利，带有吸引人的清新感和丰富的果味。

Western reviews.review: Blended with 3% Petit Verdot, this dark-garnet wine bursts with aromas of herb, clove, tobacco and cedar. Aged entirely in new French oak for two years, it shows a decadent, sumptuous texture built by soft, integrated tannins around a core of dark chocolate and cassis. Virginie Boone
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒以3% Petit Verdot为混合，呈现出深红色，气味中充满了香草、丁香、烟草和红木的芬芳。经过两年的新法兰克式橡木陈化，这款红酒展现出丰富、奢华的口感，由柔软的、融合的纤维素构建，周围是黑巧克力和黑加仑的核心。—Virginie Boone

Chinese pairs.original: Dan Pannell（Picardy）的哥哥Stephen Pannell在2004年创立了这家小型作坊。此酒在500升的法国橡木桶内醇化20个月，其中20%为新桶。和Stephen Pannell一同品鉴。这是一支充满了细致花香的佳酿，口感漂亮同时回味干涩、滑爽。不复杂但却非常易饮。
Chinese pairs.new: "Dan Pannell（Picardy）的兄弟Stephen Pannell在2004年创立了这家小型酿酒厂。这个酒在500升的法国橡木桶中陈化了20个月，其中20%是新桶。和Stephen Pannell一起品尝。这是一款充满细致花香的佳酿，口感优雅同时回味干涩、滑爽。它并不复杂，但非常容易饮用。"

English pairs.original: S.C.Pannell wine is a small winery found in 2004 by Stephen Pannell who's the brother of Dan Pannell (Picardy). The wine spent 20 months in 500l French oak puncheons, which 20% in new oaks. Tasted with Stephen Pannell. A detailed, floral-driven wine with stylish texture as well as a polished and very dry finish. Not complex but very approachable.
English pairs.new: 斯蒂芬·潘内尔酒庄（S.C.Pannell wine）是一家成立于2004年的小型酒庄，由斯蒂芬·潘内尔（Stephen Pannell）创立，他是丹·潘内尔（Dan Pannell，Picardy的兄弟）的兄弟。酒庄的葡萄酒在500升法国橡木桶中陈化20个月，其中20%的橡木桶是新陈化的。与斯蒂芬·潘内尔一起品尝，这款酒呈现出详细、花香的风格，具有优雅的质感和非常干的口感。虽然不复杂，但非常容易接受。

Western reviews.review: Tempranillo is a grape variety most commonly associated with Spain. However, this Iberian Peninsula variety is also climatically suitable to the South Australian wine-growing region, resulting in wines with brilliant balance, complexity, and flavor like this McLaren Vale Tempranillo. This vibrant and complex wine comes from Stephen Pannell, one of Australia’s most imaginative winemakers. He’s a Jimmy Watson Trophy winner, a McLaren Vale Bushing King winner, a two-time Max Schubert Trophy winner, International Red Winemaker of the Year, and Decanter Magazine’s 50 Most Influential Contributors to the World of Wine. His 2017 "Dead End" (referencing vineyards at the dead end of Amery Road) is vibrant and complex with flavors of fresh red and black cherries, sweet licorice, black tea, and orange peel that lead to persistent tannins that carry through to a long and opulent finish.---- Miranda Franco
Western reviews.translation: 特普拉尼奥(Tempranillo)是一种最常与西班牙相关的葡萄品种。然而，这种来自伊比利亚半岛的品种也适合澳大利亚南部葡萄种植区，结果是产生了如麦克劳伦谷(McLaren Vale)特普拉尼奥这样具有出色的平衡、复杂性和风味的葡萄酒。这款充满活力的复杂葡萄酒来自澳大利亚最具创造力葡萄酒制作人的斯蒂芬·潘内尔(Stephen Pannell)。他是吉米·沃森奖(Jimmy Watson Trophy)的得主，是麦克劳伦谷葡萄酒王(McLaren Vale Bushing King)的得主，是两次获得马克斯·舒伯特奖(Max Schubert Trophy)的得主，是国际红葡萄酒制作人年度奖(International Red Winemaker of the Year)的得主，是《葡萄酒杂志》(Decanter Magazine)50位对葡萄酒界做出最大贡献的人之一。他的2017年"死胡同"(Dead End)系列葡萄酒（以阿梅里路(Amery Road)的死胡同命名）充满活力且复杂，具有新鲜红和黑樱桃的风味、甜的甘草、黑茶和橙皮的风味，持续的苦味纤维延续到长而丰富的尾部。---- 米兰达·弗朗科(Miranda Franco)

Chinese pairs.original: 中等偏上的柠檬色，明显的香草、黄油、蘑菇及柠檬香气，入口彰显柑橘、柠檬及矿物质滋味，酒体中等偏上，酸度偏高，是一支非常细腻的酒款。
Chinese pairs.new: Medium-bodied lemon hue, pronounced notes of grass, butter, mushroom, and lemon, with citrus, lemon, and mineral flavors on the palate, a well-balanced wine with high acidity and a silky texture.

English pairs.original: Medium+ lemon color, notable vanilla, butter, apple, mushroom and lemon on the nose, citrus, lemon and mineral notes on the palate, medium+ body with high acidity, this was a delicate wine.
English pairs.new:
颜色：中度的柠檬色。

香气：有明显的香草、奶油、苹果、蘑菇和柠檬味。

口感：柠檬、矿物质等味道。

口感体积：中度。

酸度：高。

总体：这是一个细致的酒。

Western reviews.review: This impressive operation covers much of eastern Waiheke, although only a small portion of the property is planted to vines. The 2010 vintage was especially good on the island, and this wine is crammed with ripe, peachy fruit, framed by smoky oak and roasted nuts. Despite being weighty and round in the mouth, it finishes well, on a lingering citrusy note. Drink it over the next couple of years.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的生产过程非常出色，覆盖了怀赫基岛东部的大部分地区，尽管只有小部分土地种植葡萄。2010年的产量在岛上特别出色，这瓶酒充满了成熟的桃子味的果实，伴随着烟熏橡木和烤坚果的味道。尽管口感重而圆润，但酒尾却留下了一种持久的柑橘味。建议在未来两年内饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 酒体呈现明亮的柠檬黄色泽，带有明显的金色边缘，香气集中，伴随精致的木桶（香草冰激凌、果仁）、黄油、绝妙的芝麻、腰果、烤肉、甘草、海盐及矿物味。入口极为集中，始终以坚果和矿物质为主要风格，相当干，悠长的余韵带有奶油质感。
Chinese pairs.new:
The wine presents a bright lemon yellow hue with distinct golden edges, concentrated aromas of fine oak (vanilla ice cream, almond), butter, perfect sesame, pecan, grilled meat, honey, sea salt, and mineral notes. 

The palate is extremely concentrated, always with a dominant nutty and mineral character, very dry, with a long, creamy finish.

English pairs.original: Bright lemon color with notable golden hue, very intense, superbly oaky (vanilla ice cream, kernel) and buttery on nose: fantastic sesame, cashew, roasted meat, liquorice, sea salt and mineral. Very concentrated, nutty and mineral-driven, quite dry, with a very long and creamy length.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的颜色是亮丽的柠檬色，带有明显的金色调，非常浓郁，鼻子上有优质的橡木味（香草冰淇淋、核桃仁）和奶油味：非常出色的芝麻、腰果、烤肉、甘草、海盐和矿物质味。非常浓缩，坚果味和矿物质味居多，口感非常干净，长长的尾部非常丰富且奶油般滑顺。

Western reviews.review: (2012) Sourced entirely from the Adelaide Hills district, the fruit for Bin 10A is whole bunch pressed before being filled straight into French oak barriques (72% new) where it undergoes wild yeast fermentation and natural malolactic fermentation. It has a bold, light green colour and lovely nose of oily green beans and fig in a pungent style, with creaminess and apple fruit and a wisp of smokiness. On the palate terrific clarity and precision, brimming with lemon and lime and the nutty, gently toasty richness filling in. Long, balanced and delicious. Penfolds suggest this will drink well until 2019.
Western reviews.translation: 2012年，Bin 10A的葡萄全部来自阿德莱德山区。 Bin 10A的葡萄采用整梳压榨，然后直接装入法国橡木桶（72%新桶）中进行野酵发酵和天然乳酸发酵。 Bin 10A呈现出深绿色的外观，具有浓郁的气味，带有油腻的青豆和浆果的风味，具有奶油和苹果的风味和轻微的烟熏味。 Bin 10A的口感清晰精确，具有柠檬和青柠的风味，伴有坚果和轻微的烘烤风味。 Bin 10A的口感长长平衡，非常美味。 Penfolds建议Bin 10A将在2019年之前饮用。

Piccini Villa al Cortile Brunello di Mon.name: Piccini Villa al Cortile Brunello di Montalcino 2006

Chinese pairs.original: 红色水果，干果以及香料香气，口感简单平衡，有葡萄干，肉桂茴香等香料风味，回味有点草本植物感。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich red fruit flavors, with notes of dry fruit and spices, a simple and balanced palate with flavors of raisins, cinnamon, and nutmeg, finishing with a hint of herbal undertones.

Western reviews.review: Piccini's Brunello Villa al Cortile is an interesting wine with its own unique personality. It offers distinct aromas of mesquite, cedar and pine forest followed by rounder tones of plum and rum cake. The more immediate approach means it's almost ready to drink now.
Western reviews.translation: 皮奇尼的布伦诺(Brunello) Villa al Cortile是一瓶有着独特个性的红酒。它带有浓郁的烟枯木、松木和松林香气，随后是浓郁的浆果和朗姆蛋糕的味道。这种直接的风格使得它几乎可以立即饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 酒体呈深沉的红宝石色泽，中等集中的华丽香气，富含烤吐司、迷迭香、青椒（随后便消失）、香草、松仁、薄荷、黑巧克力和湿岩石气息，中等酒体，口中满是酸樱桃滋味，酸度极高，单宁丝滑，伴有冰凉薄荷味的悠长余韵。
Chinese pairs.new: Deep, rich garnet color.  Medium to full-bodied.  Lavish aromas of toasted bread, thyme, green pepper (which quickly dissipates), grass, hazelnut, mint, black chocolate, and wet stone.  Flavors of tart cherry fill the mouth, with extremely high acidity and smooth tannins.  Long, refreshing finish with a cooling mint note.

English pairs.original: Deep ruby color, medium intense and gorgeous bouquets of toast, rosemary, capsicum (disappeared latter), vanilla, pine nut, mint, black chocolate and wet stone, medium-bodied with full sour cherry notes on the palate, very high acidity, silky tannin, with a long length of cool mint notes.
English pairs.new: 深红色葡萄酒，中度浓郁的香气，带有烤面包、迷迭香、辣椒（后期消失）、香草、松子、薄荷、黑巧克力和湿石的味道。口感中等，口味中有浓郁的樱桃味，酸度高，纤维滑顺，长尾中带有清凉薄荷味。

Western reviews.review: (2012) This is the inaugural release of this wine, very different in style from the Bin 707 Cabernet, coming from a single district and aged in French, not American, oak. The fruit is from two prized blocks of Penfolds' own vineyards, and is aged for 14 months in new French oak hogsheads. At first it is quite closed, but there's a delicate, almost floral and mint leaf edge here, then a rush of cassis begins to fill in. The oak adds a smoky incense note. The palate has a really firm backbone, the tight, powerful tannins framing really juicy fruit that bursts onto the mid-palate with sweet blackcurrant. Savoury and fresh on the finish, this is concentrated but long and elegant too. Penfolds suggest drinking 2014-2032.
Western reviews.translation: 2012年，这是本酒的首次推出，风格与Bin 707卡布塞尔不同，来自单一地区，陈酿于法国橡木 barrels，而不是美国橡木 barrels。酒中的果实来自Penfolds的两块珍贵的葡萄园，陈酿14个月于新法国橡木桶。起初，酒很封闭，但有一个细致的，几乎是花朵和薄荷叶的边缘，然后是一种黑加仑的味道开始填充。橡木添加了一种烟熏的香烟味。口感坚实，紧密的强有力的纤维包围了真正的浓郁果实，甜黑加仑在中口中爆发。口感咸淡且新鲜，这是浓缩的，但也长且优雅。Penfolds建议饮用2014-2032年。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung, reife dunkle Waldbeerfrucht, zart nach Nougat und Honig, floral, ein Hauch von Lakritze und Veilchen. Saftig, elegant, mittlere Komplexität, feine Tannine, wirkt sehr frisch, zitronige Nuancen, angenehme Extraktsüße im Abgang, rotbeerige Anklänge im Nachhall, etwas Karamell, Rostanklänge im Finish, toller Speisenbegleiter.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮，成熟的黑莓果味，微微带有牛奶糖和蜂蜜的香气，花香，薄荷糖和月季花的味道。口感丰富，优雅，中等复杂度，细腻的橡皮质感，非常清新，带有柠檬味，尾部有愉悦的浓缩果味，余味中有黑啤酒的回味，带有焦糖和焦糖味的尾韵，非常适合与食物搭配。

Chinese pairs.original: 此酒的外观充满了沉淀物。香气有点紧，伴有深邃的烤吐司和香料味以及打底的岩石气息。新鲜得惊人的严肃口感同样富有张力。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine has a murky appearance. The aroma is tight, with deep notes of toasted bread and spices, accompanied by a rocky undertone. The palate is surprisingly fresh and serious, with equal tension.

English pairs.original: Full of sediments on the appearance. Slightly closed on the scent, with subtle depths (toast, spices) and a very stony background. Tense on the palate too, which was surprisingly fresh and austere.
English pairs.new: 外观上满满的沉淀物。酒香中略带封闭感，具有细微的深度（有 Toast 和香料的味道），背景中有很强的石质味。口感紧绷，令人惊讶的是它仍然保持着清新和干净的味道。

Western reviews.review: A disappointing showing for a wine that is usually very good or excellent. Has aromas of cracker and cola, and a hefty dose of dusty bark and sour cherry on the palate. Lighter in weight than usual, too. Just isn't singing for me this year; tasted twice. Imported by Epic Wines.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒今年的表现令人失望，通常来说它的品质很好或是极品。酒中有饼干和可乐的香气，口感中有厚重的树皮和酸苹果味。今年的体积比平常轻一些。今年的品酒体验让我很失望，品尝了两次。进口商是Epic Wines。

Western reviews.review: Mint and bread flour on the nose, with raspberry and red plum flavors on the palate. Its smooth, oaky tannins continue through to the finish, where there's bread-flour and graham-cracker flavors. A terrific GSM.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中有薄荷和面粉的味道，口感中有草莓和红桃的风味。它的滑顺的橡木味的苦味持续到尾部，尾部还有面粉和饼干味道。是一瓶非常出色的GSM红酒。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung. In der Nase reifes dunkles Beerenkonfit, zart nach Quittenkäse, Dörrfeigen, ein Hauch von Nougat, mit Luft rauchig und würzig, dunkler Nougat. Saftig, elegante Textur, reife Kirschenfrucht, finessenreiche Struktur, angenehme Mineralik, hat eine erste Trinkreife erreicht, feiner Holzeinsatz, extraktsüßer Nachhall.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。酒香中充满成熟的浓郁果酱，轻微的青柠味，干枯的葡萄，微微的牛奶糖味，随着空气的流动，烟熏味和浓郁的香气渐渐显现。口感丰富，细腻，成熟的樱桃果酱，精致的结构，舒适的矿物质感，已经达到初期成熟，细致的木质味，浓郁的余味。

Western reviews.review: Shows the wonderfully silky side of Grenache—the main part of the blend—in its diaphanous, delicate texture that manages to be soft but not too soft, beautifully framing flavors of cherries, spice and cola. Long on the finish, trailing away slowly and elegantly. Drink now–2015.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒展现出格雷纳奇(Grenache)的优雅面貌，呈现出细腻、轻盈的口感，既软又不至于太软，完美地衬托出樱桃、香料和可乐的风味。口感持久，缓慢而优雅地消退。建议立即享用，至2015年最佳。

Western reviews.review: Nine Popes is a grenache-based red that is mixed with old 80-year old parcels of Barossa shiraz and mourvèdre in between Williamstown and Ebenezer. It is all whole bunch fermented and the cap is managed via pigeage and hand plunging, as well as daily pump-overs throughout fermentation. The wine aged in a high percentage of French oak for 20 months. Look for a fragrant spicy red with a slightly soupy texture. The palate is a mix of red and black liquorice and plummy, dark red berry fruit with earthy, cinnamon, savoury. A bit soft and unkempt it the back end but otherwise solid. Serve with lamb or beef dishes. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 《九位教皇》是一款以格纳什为主的红酒，混合了80年老的巴罗萨希拉兹和穆尔韦德葡萄，产自威廉斯敦和埃本泽之间。酒液全部采用整株发酵，顶盖管理通过踩压和手动浸泡，以及整个发酵过程中的日常泵送。酒液在法国橡木桶中陈化20个月。酒体香气浓郁，带有香料味，口感略微浓稠。口感呈现出红色和黑色甘草和浓郁的红色浆果，带有泥土、肉桂、咸味等风味。酒尾略微软弱，但整体上仍然稳固。建议与羊肉或牛肉菜肴搭配。

Chinese pairs.original: 黑醋栗、樱桃、李子、拿铁、甘草、黑巧克力等香气，味道浓郁，单宁紧实，酸度清脆，回味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich aromas of blackberry, cherry, plum, espresso, licorice, and dark chocolate. Full-bodied with firm tannins, crisp acidity, and a long, lingering finish.

Western reviews.review: Leathery berry aromas are dense and earthy, while not showing any of the green character that sometimes plagues Carmenère. A flush mouthfeel is solid and fruity, with berry and plum flavors that are roasted and meaty. Savory notes on the finish suggest a pairing with barbecue.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的气味浓郁，带有干酪般的浓厚黑berry香气，带有泥土的味道，完全没有绿色的味道，这是卡门涅尔(Carmenère)常有的问题。口感丰富，果味浓郁，带有黑berry和浓郁的黑枣味，口感丰富，带有烤肉的味道。酒尾带有浓郁的肉味，建议与烧烤食物搭配。

Western reviews.review: From the calcium-rich soils of the San Julián Vineyard, 30 kilometers from the sea in the Limarí Valley, this wine was aged for at least a year in barrels (15% new). The fruit is very red, with sharp-focused varietal expression. 10% was whole-cluster fermented to support the structure and set the acidity. And it worked in this refreshing yet very well-structured red. This is Limarí pinot at one of its finest moments.
Western reviews.translation: 来自圣胡利安葡萄园（San Julián Vineyard）的这款红酒，产自利马里谷（Limarí Valley），距离海岸30公里。该酒在15%新橡木桶中陈化至少一年。酒中的果味非常鲜红，具有清晰的品种特征。其中10%的葡萄采用整梗发酵（whole-cluster fermentation），以支持酒的结构和调节酸度。这种方法在这款清新而结构完善的红酒中得到了体现。这是利马里地区品诺（Pinot Noir）酒的最佳表现之一。

Chinese pairs.original: 新鲜的黑樱桃，咖啡，巧克力，细腻的碎薄荷香气，饱满多汁的酒体，浓郁，柔软，带有奶油的味道。
Chinese pairs.new: Fresh black cherries, coffee, chocolate, subtle mint notes, full-bodied and juicy texture, rich, smooth, with a creamy finish.

Western reviews.review: Fresh black cherries, coffee, chocolate, and delicate notes of crushed mint characterize this plump, juicy Merlot. It boasts a dark ruby color and nice concentration that feels supple and creamy in the mouth. There's just enough structure to avoid flabbiness and to suggest a pairing with braised lamb or grilled meat.
Western reviews.translation: 这款黑梅酒的口感丰富，带有新鲜黑樱桃、咖啡、巧克力和细微的薄荷叶香气。酒液呈深红宝石色，口感丰富细腻，结构紧致，避免了过于软弱的感觉。这种黑梅酒适合与烤羊肉或烤肉搭配。

Western reviews.review: Funkelndes, sattes Rubin; eröffnet in der Nase mit betont rauchigen Noten, leicht nach Speck, dahinter feine Brombeere; geschmeidig und samtig in Ansatz und Verlauf, öffnet sich sehr geradlinig, viel saftige und klare Brombeerfrucht, geschmeidig.
Western reviews.translation:
这段红酒评论翻译成中文如下：

闪闪发光的深红色; 在鼻子里打开时，具有明显的烟熏味和轻微的培根味，之后是细微的蓝莓味; 在入口和口感中，滑顺且绵软，非常直接地展开，充满了清澈的蓝莓果味，滑顺。

stag's leap wine cellars s.l.v. cabernet.name: stag's leap wine cellars s.l.v. cabernet sauvignon 2008

Chinese pairs.original: 带有干草药，雪松，浆果和香料的香气。酒体醇厚复杂，单宁强劲柔滑，回味中草药和雪松的味道突出。
Chinese pairs.new:
Aromas of hay, pine, berries, and spices. 

Full-bodied and complex texture, with robust yet smooth tannins. Herbal and pine notes linger on the finish.

Western reviews.review: The 2008 Cabernet Sauvignon SLV Estate emerges from the glass with dark plums, black cherries, smoke, licorice and tar as well as terrific intensity and depth. It is one of the better and more complete of the 2008s here. Anticipated maturity: 2013-2023.
Western reviews.translation: 2008年SLV庄园的卡贝内特·索维尼昂起瓶后，酒液呈现出深紫红色，气味中充满了黑浆果、黑樱桃、烟雾、甘草和焦油等复杂的香气，酒体丰富、深度感强烈。它是2008年产季中较好的品种之一，预计在2013-2023年之间达到最佳成熟度。

Chinese pairs.original: 得益于低温浸渍的工艺，这款酒的花果芳香尤为活泼，入口满是清凉多汁的酸梅和酸枣味道。作为Ornellaia旗下的入门款葡萄酒，它在突显清雅感的基础上始终带着Ornellaia的经典审美：平衡感。倘若收尾时的单宁能够更加柔和，想必会更加讨喜。
Chinese pairs.new: Thanks to the low-temperature maceration process, this wine boasts lively floral and fruity aromas, with a refreshing and juicy taste of sour plums and sour cherries on the palate. As the entry-level wine under the Ornellaia label, it strikes a perfect balance between elegance and classic style, showcasing the signature balance that Ornellaia is known for. If the tannins could be even smoother at the finish, it would be even more delightful.

English pairs.original: Thanks to the low-temperature maceration, the floral and fruity aromas of this wine are particularly lively, cherished with juicy jujube and sour plum on the palate. As an entry-level wine of the entire family of Ornellaia, based on highlighting elegance, it always demonstrates the classic aesthetic principle of Ornellaia: BALANCE. If the tannins become calmer on the finish, this wine will be more adorable.
English pairs.new: 感谢低温浸泡，这款红酒的花香和果香气味尤其活跃，口感中充满了 juicy 的枣子和酸甜的李子。作为整个Ornellaia家族的入门级酒款，基于突出优雅的理念，它始终坚持Ornellaia的经典美学原则：平衡。如果在尾部，苦味变得更加平和，这款酒将更加可爱。

Western reviews.review: Vivace e maturo mostra note di fragole, amarene e pietra sbriciolata. Corpo medio, tannini soffici che avranno bisogno ancora di tempo per distendersi ed un finale luminoso e fragrante. Bevi ora.
Western reviews.translation:
这段红酒评论翻译成中文如下：

这款红酒充满活力和成熟，展现出浓郁的草莓、酸橙和碎石的味道。口感中等，柔软的苦味需要时间才能展开，结尾清晰、芳香。现在就来品尝吧！

Western reviews.review: Leuchtendes Rubin. In der Nase mit sehr reifer Frucht, wunderbar expressiv, direkt nach dem Öffnun voll da, Kirschen, Brombeere, auch würzige Noten. Im Gaumen rund und weich, strahlt Wärme aus, hat Rundungen, ist dennoch saftig und erstaunlich frisch, die knackige Säure belebt, verleiht Zug und trägt den Wein in einen mittellangen, balancierten Abgang. Ein unklomplizierter Begleiter, z.B. zu Grilladen, so der Sommer dann endlich mal kommt. Jetzt bis 2027
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是亮红宝石色。酒鼻中充满了成熟的果味，非常有表现力，打开后立即释放出浓郁的气味，带有浆果和黑莓的香气，还有些许的香料味道。口感圆润柔滑，散发着温暖的感觉，酒体丰富细腻，口感丰富而且非常新鲜，清脆的酸度使得酒体更加活跃，给人一种轻松舒适的感觉，酒尾平衡中等，非常适合与夏日的烧烤菜肴相伴。建议在2027年前享用。

Chinese pairs.original: 强烈浓郁黑樱桃和香草的气息，口感细腻厚重，具有丰富的单宁和悠长的回味。
Chinese pairs.new: Intense, rich aromas of black cherry and vanilla, with a smooth, full-bodied texture and a rich, lingering finish.

Western reviews.review: Earthy, leathery aromas of baked red fruits fit the classic style. This is full on the palate but not heavy, with cola, molasses, coffee and heady raspberry and plum flavors. A warm finish with fine tannins and ripe flavors of chocolate, lightly baked black fruits and vanilla. Drink 2015–2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有典型的风格，带有土壤、皮革的气味，伴随着烘烤的红果味。口感丰富但不沉重，带有可乐、黑糖、咖啡和浓郁的草莓和黑桃味。酒尾温暖，具有细腻的橡皮质和成熟的巧克力、轻烤的黑果和香草味。建议饮用2015-2025年。

Western reviews.review: Colour: dark-red cherry, garnet rim;Aroma: balanced, expressive, ripe fruit, tobacco;Flavour: balanced, ripe fruit, long;Colour: Cherry, garnet rim;Aroma: balanced, ripe fruit, spicy, fine reductive notes, elegant;Flavour: good structure, flavourful, balanced, fine tannins;
Western reviews.translation:
颜色：深红色樱桃色，边缘有 garnet色光泽。

香气：平衡，富有表现力，成熟的果味，烟草味。

口感：平衡，成熟的果味，持久。

颜色：樱桃红色，边缘有 garnet色光泽。

香气：平衡，成熟的果味，辛辣，细微的还原性香气，优雅。

口感：结构良好，丰富的口感，平衡，细腻的苦味。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Karmingranat, opaker Kern, violette Reflexe, zarter Ockerrand. Reifes Bukett nach Nougat und Blutorangen, feine Gewürze, ein Hauch von Dörrzwetschken, tabakig-mineralische Nuancen. Kraftvoll, extraktsüß, rotes Waldbeerkonfit, gut integrierte Holzwürze, stoffig im Abgang, Nuancen von schwarzen Kirschen und Brombeeren, dunkle Schokolade im Rückgeschmack, sicheres weiteres Reifepotenzial, klassischer Stil.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，透明的核，紫红色的反光，轻微的橙色边缘。成熟的香气，牛奶糖和血橙的味道，细微的香料，干枯的樱桃的余味，烟草和矿物质的微妙变化。强烈的口感，极度甜的口感，红莓果酱的味道，很好地融合的木质香气，底部有厚重的感觉，黑莓和浆果的余味，黑巧克力的回味，确保了进一步成熟的潜力，典型的风格。

Chinese pairs.original: 明显的黑莓、黑醋栗等复杂果香，逐渐出现香料和香草、烟熏味，浓郁强劲；口中表现精致，单宁集中，略显清瘦。
Chinese pairs.new: Prominent blackberry and black walnut complexities give way to aromatic spices and herbal notes, with a smoky undertone, full-bodied and intense. The palate is refined, with concentrated tannins and a lean, elegant finish.

Western reviews.review: The 2008 Phoenix Cabernet displays amply concentrated notes of cherry, cassis and tobacco. There's plenty of stuffing here, with a long finish that fades slowly away to notes of dried tea leaves.
Western reviews.translation: 2008年鳳凰赤霞珠酒展现出浓郁的樱桃、黑加仑和烟草的香气。酒中充满了丰富的口感，长长的尾部缓慢地消退，留下了干燥的茶叶香气。

Chinese pairs.original: 这款新鲜、绵密的香气充满黑樱桃味，以圣诞布丁、香料和灌木味做点缀。口感的基石是那杰出的酸度，延续到其集中但优雅的回味中。
Chinese pairs.new: This fresh and velvety wine is packed with black cherry flavors, accented by notes of Christmas pudding, spices, and a hint of underbrush. The foundation of its taste is a remarkable acidity, which carries through to its concentrated yet elegant finish.

English pairs.original: The fresh and dense aroma was infused with black cherry laced with Christmas pudding, spices and underbrush. The remarkable acid was the keystone of mouth, leading to an intense but elegant finish.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的气味新鲜浓郁，带有黑樱桃和圣诞布丁、香料和灌木的味道。酒口酸度出众，带来强烈但优雅的尾韵。

Western reviews.review: A chewy and rich red with tannic and berry character. Dark chocolate and walnut undertones. Medium to full body, bright acidity and a clean and flavorful finish. Drink now but better in 2019 for the tannins to resolve.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒口感丰富、厚实，具有坚果和浓郁的黑莓特征。暗巧克力和核桃底调。中等到中等以上的体积，清晰的酸度和干净的口感。建议立即饮用，但建议在2019年饮用以使坚果味更好地融合。

Chinese pairs.original: 此酒多香料且颇为油质的香气中还夹杂着一些干花、薄荷、烤吐司和摩卡，这些美妙的滋味全部都流淌到了其深邃同时还富有锐利酸度的中段口感中，并在其巧克力般的收尾中达到了顶点。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts a rich, aromatic bouquet with notes of spices, oiliness, dried flowers, mint, toasted bread, and mocha. These complex flavors seamlessly transition into a full-bodied mid-palate with a sharp acidity, culminating in a decadent chocolate finish.

English pairs.original: It offered a spicy and slightly oily bouquet intermixed with dried flower, mint, toast and mocha to go with awesome mid-palate depth and layer of pointed acidity, all culminating in a chocolate-like finale.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒具有浓郁的香气，混合了干花、薄荷、烘烤面包和巧克力等味道，口感丰富，酸度清晰，结尾像巧克力一样丰富。

Western reviews.review: (2012) >From the Penfolds home estate vineyard in front of their original winery close to Adelaide, this is made in the 160-year-old winery in big, square open fermenters and then basket-pressed. Ageing is in 67% new French and 25% new American hogsheads, the balance in second use French oak. A bit of real meaty concentration here, a lovely sense of cool earthiness and dark, sinewy black fruit. The palate has a delicious dry, savoury character with a touch of spice and pepper, a touch of leather too. There is sweetness on the palate, a big raft of glossy black fruit, but then that serious, creamy, dark and structured character asserts giving this a long, rich finish. Penfolds say drink 2014-2030.
Western reviews.translation: 2012年，来自澳大利亚阿德莱德附近的Penfolds家园葡萄园，这是用160年历史的酿酒厂的大型方形开口发酵罐和篮子压榨制作的。陈酿是在67%新的法国橡木桶和25%新的美国橡木桶中进行的，余下的在第二次使用的法国橡木桶中。这里有真正的肉类浓度，带有清新的土壤气息和黑色、坚韧的黑果。口感干燥、咸味，带有香料和胡椒的味道，带有皮革味。口感上有甜度，黑果的光泽，但然后严肃、丰富、黑暗和结构化的特性出现，使得口感长且丰富。Penfolds建议饮用2014-2030年。

Western reviews.review: Kühle, recht komplexe Aromatik, filigrane Frucht, Tonic Water. Am Gaumen seidig mit klarer, kühler Frucht, feinkörniges Tannin, perfekt umhüllt von einer frischen, reifen Säure. Bleibt lang und endet auf diskrete Röstnote. Grosse Klasse!
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论，翻译成中文如下：

冷静，复杂的香气，细致的果味，类似于汽水。口感滑顺，清晰的冷静果味，细腻的纤维，完美地被清新的成熟酸性所包围。口感持久，最后留下了一种细微的烤香味。极品！

Western reviews.review: This full-bodied Shiraz features ample blueberry and blackberry fruit, embellished with lashings of vanilla- and brown sugar-laden oak. The tannins are somewhat chewy and the acids fresh, suggesting longevity. Finishes long and compelling. Drink now–2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这款充满体积的雪利司令酒具有丰富的蓝莓和黑莓果味，伴有浓郁的香草和棕糖味的橡木味。酒中的纤维素略微坚韧，酸度清新，预示着酒的长久保存。酒尾长而令人着迷。建议立即饮用至2025年。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung. In der Nase intensive balsamische Nuancen, ein Hauch von Minze und Bergamotte, rauchig, zart nach Veloursleder, angenehme Kräuterwürze, sehr eigenständiges Bukett. Saftig, reife Herzkirschen, rotbeerige Nuancen, angenehme Extraktsüße, finessenreicher Säurebogen, mineralisch und anhaltend, finessenreich wie ein Syrah von der nordlichen Rhone, diesmal besonders gut gelungen. Kann sofort probiert werden, verfügt aber auch über gutes Reifepotenzial.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。酒香浓郁，带有樟脑味和薄荷和柑橘的香气，烟熏味和丝绒般的味道，舒适的草药味，独特的香气。口感丰富，熟透的樱桃，红酒味，舒适的浓缩甜度，精致的酸度，矿物质和持久，精致如北方罗讷河的西拉，今年特别成功。可以立即品尝，但也具有很好的成熟潜力。

Western reviews.review: Tiefdunkles Rubingranat, opaker Kern, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung. Verhalten, zarte schwarze Beerenfrucht, zart floral, zurückhaltend. Saftig, wirkt im Moment etwas schlank, süße Tannine, finessenreich strukturiert, feiner Schokotouch, etwas Röstaromen im Nachhall, sehr vielversprechend, jetzt heißt es: bitte warten....
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色调，透明的葡萄核，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。气味轻微，黑berry果香，花香，回味中等。口感丰富，目前略显瘦长，甜度适中，结构细致，巧妙的巧克力味，余味中有轻微的烤果味，非常有前途，目前请耐心等待......

Chinese pairs.original: 此酒的颜色呈标准的金黄色。香气是经典的Picardy，栗子蛋糕、香料矿物味、蜂蜡、黄油硬糖、柑橘和少许的香草。相当淡，但也不是完全没有厚度，中段口感展现出极好的集中度；酸度随着温度的上升不断地增强；回味显得复杂而且悠长，富有坚果、柑橘、岩石和菌菇的滋味。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine has a standard golden color. The aroma is classic Picardy, with notes of almond cake, spice mineral, beeswax, toffee, citrus, and a hint of grass. It's quite light, but not completely lacking in depth. The mid-palate shows excellent concentration; acidity increases with temperature; the finish is complex and long, with flavors of nuts, citrus, stone, and mushroom.

English pairs.original: Standardly gold color. The nose was a classical expression of Picardy Chardonnay, chestnut cake, spicy-mineral, beeswax, butterscotch, citrus and subtle vanilla. Rather light but not weightless, and the mid-palate showed remarkable intensity; the acid was constantly increased with the temperature; its finish was complex and enduring, displaying the notes of nuts, citrus, stone and mushroom.
English pairs.new: 标准的金色。酒鼻子呈现出典型的皮卡第白葡萄酒风味，包括栗子蛋糕、辣味矿物质、蜂蜡、糖浆、柑橘和微妙的香草。酒体轻盈但不轻飘，中口呈现出惊人的强度；酸度随着温度的升高而不断增加；尾韵复杂持久，展现出坚果、柑橘、石头和蘑菇的风味。

Western reviews.review: From a little-known region of Western Australia, this is a restrained, structured example of Chardonnay that may drink well for 5–6 years. Subtle vanilla and bacon shadings upfront add nuance to the melon and pear aromas. Flavors are of soft, fully ripe tree fruit and melon, but held in check by citrusy notes and crisp acids.
Western reviews.translation: 来自西澳大利亚的一个不太知名地区，这是一款典型的、结构良好的白葡萄酒，可能会在5-6年内保持最佳口感。酒中的香气中，轻微的香草和培根味道与水蜜桃和梨的香气相互融合。口感中，软熟的果实和水蜜桃味道被柑橘味和清爽的酸度所平衡。

Chinese pairs.original: 桶边试饮，其实这支酒再过几个月就会装瓶（还有对酚类物质的澄清）。同为桶边试饮，比起2013年份来说，这支酒的香气显得更加新鲜，而且桶味比较少，富含雪松、雪茄盒、香料、松脂、黑巧克力、焦油及少许矿物质感，整体极度平衡并且干净，伴有纯净、丝滑的余韵。
Chinese pairs.new: Tasting at the barrel, this wine will be bottled in a few months (with further clarification of tannins). Compared to the 2013 vintage, this wine has a fresher aroma and less oakiness, with notes of pine, cigar box, spices, resin, dark chocolate, tar and a hint of minerality. The overall balance is extreme and clean, with a silky and pure finish.

English pairs.original: Barrel tasting, this wine would be bottling in the next few months after fining (phenolic compounds). Its bouquet was less fresh and woodier than the 2013, with the noses of cedar, cigar box, spices, pine gum, black chocolate, tar and slight mineral, very balanced and clean, with a silky and pure aftertaste.
English pairs.new: 酒庄正在进行酒桶品尝，这款红酒将在几个月内进行瓶装，经过了纤维素沉淀（去除酶和色素）。这款酒的香气比2013年版本要稍微不新鲜一些，木质味更浓郁，闻起来有松木、雪茄盒、香料、松树胶、黑巧克力、焦油和微妙的矿物质味道，非常平衡和清澈，口感滑顺纯粹。

Western reviews.review: Perhaps the best young wine I've tasted from Margaret River, this makes a compelling case for the region's Cabernet. Pure cassis fruit is lifted and framed by hints of toasted cedar, making for soaring aromatics and flavors, but what sets this wine apart is the tender, silky texture married to ample weight and richness. The finish lingers, with a supple, dreamy character that speaks to a gentle climate and careful winemaking. Drink now–2030.
Western reviews.translation: 我认为这是玛格丽特河区最好的年轻红酒之一，这让这个地区的卡贝网酒有了说服力。纯粹的黑加仑果味被烤松木的微妙气味所包围，产生了令人惊艳的香气和口感，但这瓶酒的独特之处在于它的细腻、滑顺的口感与丰富的重量和丰富的口感。酒尾延续着，具有柔软、梦幻般的特质，这表明了温和的气候和谨慎的酿酒工艺。建议立即饮用至2030年。

Western reviews.review:
13.5% Screwcap
Deep nose with black berries, a bit of graphite and a touch of violet and eucalyptus. Very polished and silky  palate packed with ultra-ripe tannin which is woven into the fruit with good juiciness. Impressive concentration. Very textured and plump on mid-palate. But alcohol seems to be much higher than 13.5%. Brooding length and very youthful. (Zekun Shuai)
Rating: 92/100 or 17.5/20
05/2017, Beijing
Drink to 2026
Western reviews.translation:
酒精含量：13.5%
瓶盖：螺丝盖

酒香深邃，带有黑莓、石墨和紫罗兰的气息，伴有柏树的香味。口感光滑细腻，果肉丰富，纤维柔软，口感丰富。酒中浓度高，口感丰富。中口富有质感，酿造精良。酒中酒精感较高，似乎超过13.5%。酒尾长而深邃，酒气持久，酒体年轻有力。

评分：92/100 或 17.5/20
评语：2017年5月，北京
推荐饮用时间：2026年

Chinese pairs.original: 除2004年外，所有我喝过的Yattarna 都很好。酒体呈现中等金黄色泽，香气浓郁，伴随苹果、柠檬、酸橙、桃子、木桶（木头、香草奶油、甘草）、菌菇、杏仁及榛子气息，入口带有苹果、柠檬、矿物及酸奶油滋味，酒体中等偏上，极高的酸度相当持久，伴随悠长优雅的余韵。
Chinese pairs.new: All Yattarna wines I've tried, except for 2004, are excellent. The wine presents a medium golden hue, with a rich aroma featuring notes of apple, lemon, orange, peach, oak (wood, vanilla cream, honey), mushroom, almond, and hazelnut. The palate offers flavors of apple, lemon, minerals, and creamy yogurt, with a medium-plus body and extremely high acidity that lingers persistently, accompanied by a long, elegant finish.

English pairs.original: Except for the 2004, most of Yattarna I've tried were good. Medium golden color, pronounced bouquets of apple, lemon, lime, peach, oaks (wood, vanilla cream, liquorice), mushroom, almond and hazelnut, with apple, lemon, mineral and sour cream flavors on the palate, medium+ body, with very high and long-lasting acidity, followed by a long and elegant length.
English pairs.new:
除了2004年， 我尝试过的大部分Yattarna酒都很好。 

颜色：中等金色

香气：苹果、柠檬、橙子、桃子、橡木（木质、香草奶油、甘草）、蘑菇、杏仁和花生味

口感：苹果、柠檬、矿物质和酸奶味

体积：中等+

酸度：非常高且持久

尾韵：长且优雅

Western reviews.review: Penfolds' 2009 Yattarna blends fruit from Tasmania, Victoria and South Australia, but remains a lean, taut Chardonnay. Flavors are crisp and citrusy, primarily kumquat, lemon and lime at this young age. Give it several years to see if it comes around.
Western reviews.translation: Penfolds 2009 年 Yattarna 纯正来自塔斯马尼亚、维多利亚和南澳大利亚的葡萄，然而仍然是一款清爽、紧致的白葡萄酒。酒中的风味清新果香，主要是青橘、柠檬和柑橘等，年轻时的风味。建议在几年后再次品尝，以观察是否会有所改善。

Western reviews.review: (2012) Though also from a different vintage, the stylistic difference in this wine is huge. This 2009 was sourced from Tasmania (50%), Victoria (43%) with only 7% from Adelaide Hills, but the recipe changes each year, always aimed at hitting a distinctively cool but concentrated style. Ageing is in 40% new and 60% one-year-old French oak barriques. This still has a vivid green tinge to the colour, but a much funkier, more earthy nose with all sorts of complex fragrances, the wild yeast nutty complexity more obvious under less new oak. Big, bold, lemony and with a savoury, tangy presence, it has excellent length and finishes with broad flavours yet tight, very youthful structure. One to revisit over coming years. Penfolds say drink now-2016.
Western reviews.translation: 2012年，这款红酒的风格与之前的版本有着巨大的不同。虽然也是来自不同年份的酒，但这款2009年的酒是从塔斯马尼亚（50%）、维多利亚（43%）以及阿德莱德山（7%）采集的。每年酒的配方都会有所不同，但总是以追求独特的冷却风格和浓缩风格为目标。酒龄在40%的新法兰克酒桶和60%的1年份法兰克酒桶中进行。酒的颜色依然带有明亮的绿色调，但酒的香气更加复杂，带有更多的地质味道和各种复杂的香气，野生酵母的坚果复杂性在较少的新橡木下更加明显。酒的口感大胆、果香浓郁，带有咸味和酸味，酒的长度出色，酒尾广泛的风味但结构紧致，非常年轻。值得在未来几年中再次品尝。Penfolds建议在现在到2016年之间饮用。

Western reviews.review: This is an improvement over the 2009, which was overly lean. The 2010 is still tightly focused and linear—so much so that one wonders whether it will ever truly flesh out—but bright, citrusy fruit comes through on the long finish, offering hope for the future.
Western reviews.translation: 相比2009年产的酒，这一瓶2010年产的酒更为出色。虽然2010年产的酒仍然保持着紧致的线条，但在长尾部果味清新且带有柑橘味的特点让人对未来充满希望。

Western reviews.review: Mittleres Grüngelb. Rauchig und röstig, attraktives Bukett, das an Meursault erinnert, reife gelbe Apfelfrucht, zart nach Melone und Nougat. Saftig, mittlere Komplexität, elegant, feine Steinobstanklänge, finessenreiche Säurestruktur, feine Extraktsüße, zeigt eine gute Länge, ein gut balancierter Speisenbegleiter, salzig im Abgang, gutes Entwicklungspotenzial. Wird mit etwas Flaschenreife noch zulegen.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是中等的绿黄色。酒体中有烟熏和烤焦的味道，酒香很吸引人，类似于梅奥尔（Meursault）的风格，具有成熟的黄苹果味，微微带有水蜜桃和牛奶糖的味道。口感丰富，中等复杂度，优雅，细腻的石榴味，精致的酸度结构，细腻的果酱味，酒尾长，平衡的口感，适合与菜肴搭配，酒尾带有咸味，具有很好的发展潜力。随着酒瓶的陈化，酒的风格还会有所提升。

Western reviews.review: Mittleres Grüngelb, Silberreflexe. Feine Zitruszesten, zart rauchig, Feuersteinakzente, intensive weiße Blütenaromen, ein Hauch von Blutorangen. Saftig, elegant, feine Fruchtsüße, cremige Textur, gelbe Tropenfrucht, zarter Blütenhonig im Abgang, deutlich weniger Holznoten als früher üblich, mineralisch und straff, bringt Tasmaniens kühle Nuancen perfekt ins Glas, mit 13% Alkohol auch ungemein trinkanimierend, sicheres Reifepotenzial.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

中度绿色金黄色，银色反光。细致的柑橘果香，轻微的烟味，火石般的味道，浓郁的白色花朵香气，橙子的微妙味道。口感丰富，优雅，细致的果糖味，奶油般的口感，黄色热带果味，轻微的花朵蜜味在尾部，明显比以前少了木头味，矿物质和紧致，完美地将塔斯马尼亚的冷色调带入玻璃中，酒精含量13%也非常容易喝，具有明确的成熟潜力。

Chinese pairs.original: 这支酒深厚、多巧克力的香气带有微微打底的木桶香料味，以及增加新鲜度的花香。丝滑的口感十分迷人，单宁强劲、咀嚼，回味则非常结实。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts a rich, chocolatey aroma with subtle hints of oak and floral notes that add freshness. The smooth texture is captivating, with robust tannins that linger and a long, satisfying finish.

English pairs.original: Profound and chocolaty on bouquet with evident oak spices in the background and a hint of florality added the freshness. The silkiness was appealing, but the tannin was chewy, leading to a sturdy finish.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的香气深邃，带有巧克力和橡木香味，背景中还有花香的清新感。口感细腻，但苦味略重，导致了坚实的尾韵。

Western reviews.review: Blackened aromas of prune, licorice and fennel announce a syrupy palate that's sticky and sappy in feel. Following the nose and palate, this tastes heavy, saturated and lactic. The 2015 vintage was hot and dry in Chile, and at 15% abv this comes across as rich, hot and bulky—more so than in prior years. Drink through 2024. Michael Schachner
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的气味中有浓郁的浆果、甘草和小茴香的味道，口感则是甜腻的，感觉像糖浆一样粘稠。与鼻子和口感相符，这款红酒的味道很重，饱满，带有乳酸味。2015年在智利的产季是炎热干燥的，酒精含量达15%，因此这款红酒显得很丰富，很热，很厚重，甚至比之前的年份还要显得如此。建议在2024年前饮用。 ——迈克尔·沙克纳 (Michael Schachner)

Western reviews.review: In addition to being a blend of varieties (46% carménère, 30% cabernet, 19% merlot, and 5% franc), Clos Apalta is also a blend of vineyards, all in Apalta, including some very old vines (especially the carménère and cabernet) dating to 1920 that have been the base of this wine since its debut vintage in 1997. And even though it’s not the monster of ripeness and oak that it was at the beginning, it’s still a voluptuous wine with an enveloping, succulent character that fills every corner of the palate with its spice tones and ripe black fruit.
Western reviews.translation: 除了是各种葡萄品种的混合（46% 卡门埃雷，30% 卡贝网，19% 美洛托，5% 法兰克），Clos Apalta 还是来自阿帕尔塔（Apalta）的葡萄园混合，包括一些非常老的葡萄树（尤其是卡门埃雷和卡贝网），这些葡萄树的年龄可以追溯到1920年，自1997年首瓶推出以来，这些葡萄树一直是这款酒的基础。尽管这款酒已经不再是最初的那种浓郁和橡木味，但它仍然是一款丰富的酒，具有包围性的、滋润的口感，酒中的香料和成熟黑果味充满了口感的每个角落。

Chinese pairs.original: 酒体颜色很年轻，如墨水一般，甜美的气息，带有巧克力、樱桃利口酒、黑加仑、桑莓、玫瑰、雪茄盒、菌菇以及强烈霸气的香料味道（桂皮、丁香、黑胡椒），酒体饱满，口感丝滑，单宁柔和，整体非常干，中等偏上的酒精度，是一支优秀的典型新世界风格的酒。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine has a youthful, inky color and a sweet aroma with notes of chocolate, cherry liqueur, blackcurrant, raspberry, rose, cigar box, mushroom, and a bold, spicy flavor profile featuring cinnamon, nutmeg, and black pepper. The full-bodied wine has a smooth texture, soft tannins, and a dry finish with moderate acidity. It's an excellent representation of a classic New World style.

English pairs.original: Youthful in appearance, inky color, mellow bouquets of chocolate, kirsch, cassis, mulberry, rose, cigar box, mushroom and greatly strong spices (cinnamon, clove, black pepper), full body, silky for the texture and tannin, very dry, medium+ alcohol, an excellent New World wine.
English pairs.new: 外观年轻，墨色浓郁，巧克力、柠檬水、黑加仑、黑莓、玫瑰、雪茄盒、蘑菇和强烈香料（丁香、肉豆蔻、黑胡椒）等香气浓郁，口感丰富，滑腻，干口，中等以上酒精含量，新世界佳酿。

Western reviews.review: Sehr tiefe Farbe. Die (zu Beginn noch etwas verschlossene) Nase zeigt viel üppige Bordeaux-Stilistik, komplex, Waldbeeren, Leder, Cassis, Rumtopf, Eukalyptus, aber auch Blumiges... Der Gaumen vermag die Erwartungen zu erfüllen: Der Wein ist körperreich, hat eine ausgesprochen präsente Säure, gut eingebautes, aber noch sehr spürbares Tannin. Auch am Gaumen vielfältige Aromen wie Zwetschgen,Schokolade und Zigarrenkiste. Leicht bittres Finale
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的红酒颜色。酒鼻虽然在开始时有些封闭，但却展现出丰富的波尔多风格，复杂的气味，包括森林莓、皮革、黑加仑、朗姆酒、桉树、以及一些花朵的香气。口感上，酒精的丰富感和明显的酸度让人满意，口感中仍然有明显的坚果味和坚果纤维感。口感中还可以品尝到多种复杂的香气，如浆果、巧克力和雪茄盒。酒尾略带苦味。

Western reviews.review: Simply put, this is one of New Zealand's flagship reds, and it is a shame it is no longer being imported to the U.S. Lifted hints of dried flowers and herbs impart great complexity to the aromas, and the wine's cassis, cedar and chocolate flavors come across as intense without being overbearing. This is firmly structured, with plentiful but fine tannins. Drink 2015–2025.
Western reviews.translation: 简而言之，这是新西兰的标志性红酒之一，遗憾的是它不再进口到美国。酒中带有干花和香草的微妙气味，酒的黑加仑、松木和巧克力味道强烈但不突出。这是一种结构坚实的酒，具有丰富但细腻的橡木味。建议饮用2015-2025年。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dark ruby-red in color is not quite opaque. The red fruit aromas have a slightly savory/meaty character. The tannins are firm without being very astringent. The tannins have a chalky texture & there are leafy notes on the finish. Acidity is soft & the alcohol adds a touch of warmth & roundness to the finish which is of passable length. 02/19 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色，接近透明。酒中的红果香有略带咸味和肉味。酒中的纤维素坚实但不太苦。纤维素的质感像石灰，酒尾有叶子味。酒中的酸度软，酒精带来酒尾的温暖和圆润感，酒尾的长度是可接受的。评分：02/19 DCAMW。

Western reviews.review: Deep, dense, opaque ruby-red color. The nose is dominated by chocolatey aromas. On the palate the smooth, ripe red-fruits also has a chocolatey richness. The fruit opens on the mid-palate to reveal warm, ripe plum fruit tinged with hints of cedar & spices. The tannic structure is of mid-weight.   Alcohol adds a touch of warmth to the finish, which is slightly foreshortened by astringent tannis. 02/19 DCAMW
Western reviews.translation: 深度丰富的红酒，呈现出浓郁的深红色。酒鼻中充满了巧克力般的香气。口感上，滑顺的成熟红果也带有巧克力般的丰富感。果味在中口处逐渐展开，展现出温暖的成熟杏仁果，带有松木和香料的微妙气息。酒中的纤维结构中等。酒精在尾部带来温暖的感觉，但略微被苦涩的纤维所削弱。评分：02/19 DCAMW。

Santa Rita Medalla Real Gran Reserva Cab.name: Santa Rita Medalla Real Gran Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon 2005

Chinese pairs.original: 带有黑醋栗，葡萄干，烟草，皮革，雪松，烤面包的香气，酒体层次分明，单宁丰腴。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich aromas of black prune, raisin, tobacco, leather, pine, and toasted bread. Full-bodied with distinct layers and plush tannins.

Western reviews.review: This is really an amazing wine for the price when you consider it comes from a single estate in the Alto Jahuel district of the Maipo Valley. Look for a spicy dried herbs nose with rich black fruit/cassis cedar and more bay leaf flavours wrapped into a full-bodied mid-palate and finish. The tannins are rich and soft but should easily melt into your steak. Fine value here. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶价格合理的出色红酒，尤其是考虑到它来自马伊波谷的阿尔托贾胡埃尔地区的单一庄园。酒中有着浓郁的黑果、干草和干香料的香气，口感丰富，中口和尾部都有着复杂的黑果、干草和干香料的味道。酒中的纤维软绵，容易与牛排融合。值得购买。

Western reviews.review: In the 2005 vintage, Medalla Real again ranks as one of Chile's most elevated under-$20 wines (after a few less impressive years). The nose veers between herbal and ripe, while the palate shows nothing but pure cassis, cherry and Maipo terroir. It's tight, structured and still ready to drink. Juicy more than beefy; a real treat.
Western reviews.translation: 2005年产季，Medalla Real再次成为智利最好的20美元以下红酒之一（在前几年表现不佳之后）。酒鼻子在草药和成熟之间来回徘徊，而口感则呈现出纯粹的黑加斯、樱桃和马伊波土壤的风味。它紧致、结构良好，仍然可以立即饮用。口感丰富而不是厚重，非常值得一试。

Chinese pairs.original: 比我去年喝的那瓶好。此酒严肃的香气展现微微的紫罗兰花香及泥土、香料、皮革和黑巧克力味。中等酒体，伴有优雅的酸度和清晰的矿物质感。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine is better than the one I had last year. It presents a serious aroma with subtle hints of lavender, earth, spices, leather, and dark chocolate. The medium-bodied wine has elegant acidity and a crisp mineral feel.

English pairs.original: Better than that bottle I've tasted last year. The aroma showed a hint of violet-like florality combined with other serious notes such as earth, spices, leather and black chocolate. Medium-bodied, with refined acid and clear minerality.
English pairs.new: 比去年品尝的那瓶更好。酒中有紫罗兰般的花香味，结合了其他严肃的香气，如土壤、香料、皮革和黑巧克力。口感中等，酸度细腻，矿物质清晰。

Western reviews.review: (2016) 58% Cabernet Sauvignon, 15% Carmenere, 15% merlot, 7% petit Verdot, 5% Cabernet Franc. 22 months in barrel, 75% new. Slightly higher, with a little elegant volatile note, graphite and pencil-shavings, the fruit just a little more lifted – slightly cooler, slightly less new oak? It is juicier and really fresh, a tarty cherry sourness adding to the sweet mid palate fruit to give this balance and polish. Long and really a terrific wine.
Western reviews.translation:
2016年产酒，酒中含有：

* 卡波内尔·沙夫宁（Cabernet Sauvignon）58%
* 卡门埃雷（Carmenere）15%
* 美丽托（Merlot）15%
* 小皮特·维多（Petit Verdot）7%
* 卡波内尔·法兰克（Cabernet Franc）5%

酒龄22个月，75%的酒桶是新桶。酒中有轻微的高调气味，带有石墨和铅笔削痕的气味，果味更加清晰，略微凉爽，新橡木味也略微减少。酒口 juicy，非常新鲜，带有酸性樱桃味，增加了中度果味的甜度，使酒口平衡和光滑。酒尾长，非常出色。

Western reviews.review: Last tasted in December, there is little change here. 2019 Seña mixes 60% Cabernet Sauvignon, 21% Malbec, 15% Carmenere, and 4% Petit Verdot from a cool year, at least in Panquehue. It opens with earthy, red fruit streaked with cedar and tobacco. It is tightly wound, linear, and youthful at this point, but a calm balance suggests it will have a long future in the bottle. The current finish is dry and savoury while flashing plenty of refreshing acidity. Its greatest asset is its elegance, so be patient. It is primarily fermented in stainless steel, with only 10% coming out of concrete vats, keeping the wine taut and restrained. It soaks up 80% new French oak barrels and 10% in larger wood, where it’s aged for 22 months. (Anthony Gismondi).
Western reviews.translation: 2019 年的塞纳红酒（Seña）是由60%卡波弗雷希（Cabernet Sauvignon）、21%马尔贝克（Malbec）、15%卡门雷（Carmenere）和4%佩蒂特维多（Petit Verdot）组成的。这种红酒来自于一个凉爽的年份，至少在潘克韦（Panquehue）地区是如此。这种红酒的开头是以泥土、红果和松木和烟草的味道为主。这种红酒紧紧地缠绕在一起，线性和年轻，但平衡的气质表明它将在瓶子里有一个长久的未来。这种红酒的当前尾部是干的和咸的，同时闪烁着大量的新鲜酸度。这种红酒最大的优点是它的优雅，所以请耐心等待。这种红酒主要是在不锈钢中发酵的，仅有10%来自混凝土罐中，保持着红酒的紧张和克制。这种红酒浸泡在80%的新法兰克木桶中和10%的大木桶中，共计22个月。

Western reviews.review: Dark ruby, with a deeply coloured core and purple reflections, subtly lighter at the rim. Multi-layered bouquet, characterized by floral and fruity nuances reflecting the cooler summer, fresh berries, zest, subtle nutty oak notes and a mineral touch. It is complex, with fine nuances of cherry and fruits of the forest, and silky tannins. Overall the wine has finesse and precision with a tight and persistent finish. It will only benefit from further bottle aging; a successful anniversary wine.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，中间深色，紫色反射，边缘略微浅色。层次丰富的香气，具有花香和果香的细微差别，反映了凉爽的夏天，新鲜的浆果，柑橘味，微妙的坚果木味和矿物质味。它复杂，具有樱桃和森林果树的细微差别，以及细腻的纤维。整体来说，酒精精致，精确，紧致的持久尾韵。酒会从进一步的瓶装陈化中受益；是一款成功的周年纪念酒。

Western reviews.review: Ano moderadamente quente, m enos que o de 2017, mas com mais estrutura que o 2018. Blend tinto composto a partir de 60% Cabernet Sauvignon, 21% Malbec, 15% Carménère e 4% Petit Verdot, com estágio de 22 meses em carvalho francês, sendo 90% em barricas (80% novas) e 10% em foudres. Austero, vertical e tenso, impressiona pelo volume de boca, pelos taninos firmes e de fina textura e pela acidez refrescante, tudo envolto por frutas vermelhas e negras maduras no ponto certo. Nesse momento, é mais introspectivo e fechado, quando comparado ao 2018, porém com o mesmo refinamento, balanço, nitidez e precisão. Tem final profundo, com toques de alcaçuz, de cassis e de grafite. Álcool 13,5%.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一瓶红酒评论。翻译成中文后如下：

这是一瓶温和的红酒，温度比2017年稍高，但比2018年更有结构。酒款是由60%卡波涅尔、21%马尔贝克、15%卡门雷和4%佩蒂·维多特组成的。酒龄22个月，全部在法国橡木桶中陈化，90%在新橡木桶中，10%在大型橡木桶中。酒体坚实，口感丰富，口感清晰，酸度清新，酒中充满了成熟的红色和黑色果味。目前，这瓶酒比较内敛和封闭，但与2018年相比，它的精致、平衡、清晰和准确性保持不变。酒尾深长，带有藜芦、黑加仑和石墨的味道。酒精度13.5%。

Western reviews.review: Twenty-five vintages ago, an exuberant Robert Mondavi and a quite young Eduardo Chadwick launched Seña, intending it to be an iconic Chilean wine. Without doubt, it has fulfilled that prophecy. “It was a great 10 years with Bob and Tim,” Chadwick said in a recent Zoom interview, but, after the Mondavi winery was sold to Constellation, Chadwick and his Errázuriz wine business gained full ownership. This 25th edition represents the continued evolving of their dream – less Cabernet Sauvignon (60%) than the original with 21% Malbec, 15% Carmenere and 4% Petit Verdot. Merlot, an early component, has been dropped out. “Carmenere gives spiciness and balsamic, and Malbec provides chocolate and floral notes,” Chadwick says. The 2019 is rich without being dense, and it walks a dazzling tightrope with velvety purple fruits – chiefly blackberries and blueberries – balanced by savory, earthy notes, chalky minerality and almost tart acidity with a final, lightly creamy persistence on the palate.---- Roger Morris
Western reviews.translation: 二十五年前，罗伯特·蒙达维（Robert Mondavi）和年轻的埃德华多·查德维克（Eduardo Chadwick）共同创立了塞纳（Seña），希望它成为一款标志性的智利葡萄酒。毫无疑问，它已经实现了这一预言。“与鲍勃和蒂姆（Tim）一起的十年非常棒，”查德维克在最近的Zoom采访中说，但蒙达维酒厂被康斯坦丁（Constellation）收购后，查德维克和他的埃拉苏里兹（Errázuriz）葡萄酒业务获得了完全的所有权。这款二十五周年版代表了他们梦想的继续演进——比原来的酒中有更少的卡波弗雷（Cabernet Sauvignon）酒（60%）和更多的马尔贝克（Malbec）酒（21%）、卡门埃雷（Carmenere）酒（15%）和佩蒂·韦多（Petit Verdot）酒（4%）。早期组成部分的梅洛（Merlot）酒已经被移除。“卡门埃雷酒带来辛辣和巴斯麦克（balsamic）味道，而马尔贝克酒提供巧克力和花朵的香味，”查德维克说。2019年的塞纳酒丰富而不沉重，走钢丝般的紧张感，具有细腻的紫色水果——主要是黑莓和蓝莓——平衡了由土壤、矿物质和几乎酸性的味道，口感中有轻微的奶油感。

Chinese pairs.original: 红宝石酒裙，黑莓、橡木、巧克力香气，口感平衡，单宁细腻，水果味充足，还带咖啡芳香。
Chinese pairs.new: Ruby-red wine with aromas of blackberry, oak, and chocolate. The palate is balanced, with fine tannins and a full fruit flavor, complemented by subtle coffee notes.

Western reviews.review: Stout and compact out of the blocks, with ripe cassis and berry aromas and only a pinch of herbal spiciness. It's creamy, big and warm in the mouth, with a ton of mocha, chocolate, cassis and blackberry. Intense and dark late, with a coconut sweetness to the finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒在口感上非常厚实和浓郁，开瓶后释放出浓郁的黑加斯和浆果香气，仅有微微的草药香气。口感丰富、浓郁且温暖，口中充满了巧克力、摩卡、黑加斯和黑莓的味道。酒尾部分则呈现出强烈的黑色风味，伴随着椰子般的甜味。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有樱桃，黑醋栗，紫罗兰的香气，中等浓郁，强劲有力的单宁，回味漫长而持久。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of cherry, black prune, and lavender, with medium intensity and robust tannins, offering a long and lingering finish.

Western reviews.review: Guidalberto is a blend of Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot, with soft tannins and a lingering spice flavor on the finish. The bouquet is marked by cherry, blackberry, leather and tobacco notes. The intensity is present but not overdone.
Western reviews.translation: 吉达尔贝托（Guidalberto）是一款由卡波内托（Cabernet Sauvignon）和梅洛（Merlot）两种葡萄品种混合而成的红酒。它的口感柔和，尾部留有持久的香料味。酒香中充满了樱桃、黑莓、皮革和烟草的味道。酒的强度充分，但不至于过度。

Western reviews.review: Leuchtendes, intensives Rubin. Fein gezeichnete, offene Nase mit Noten nach reifen Himbeeren, Zwetschgen und dunklen Mirabellen. Am Gaumen kompakt und präsent, zeigt feine würzige Noten, öffnet sich mit herzhaftem, dichtem Tannin, baut sich schön auf, im Finale salzig und lang.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一杯亮丽的、浓郁的红酒。酒鼻细致，开放，带有成熟的草莓、浆果和黑色葡萄的香味。口感紧致，富有表现力，带有细微的香料味道，口感丰富，结尾带有咸味和持久的口感。

Chinese pairs.original: 此酒在颜色上展现少许的陈年色调。多矿物质的香气以焦糖玛琪朵、桉树、松露和香料味做点缀。奢华的风味中带有覆盖口腔的中段口感集中度，以及完美中和那甜美、成熟但细致单宁的浓郁果味。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine displays a hint of aged character in its color. Mineral-driven aromas are nuanced with caramel macchiato, eucalyptus, truffle, and spice. The luxurious flavors feature a concentrated mid-palate texture, perfectly balancing sweet, mature yet refined tannins with rich, intense fruit flavors.

English pairs.original: It showed subtly aged hues in color. A mineral-inflected bouquet laced with caramel macchiato, eucalyptus, truffle and spices. The opulent flavors possessed excellent mid-palate concentration that coated the palate with rich fruitiness that buffered well the sweet and ripe but detailed tannins.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒呈现出微妙的陈化色彩。酒香中融合了矿物质的味道、焦糖玛奇朵、桉树、松露和香料。酒的丰富口感具有出色的中口浓度，覆盖了口腔，富有丰富的果味，缓解了甜美的和成熟的但细致的坚果感。

Western reviews.review: Powerful, full-bodied, concentrated, rich, and intense, the nose kicked off with roasted Espresso beans, blackberry, smoke, and licorice with hints of dark red and blue fruits. Huge, yet poised, balanced, long, clean, and fresh, there was a touch of heat in the finish, yet the heat seemed lost in the wealth of all that ripe fruit.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的味道非常强烈，浓郁，浓缩，丰富，深刻。酒香中有烤咖啡豆、黑莓、烟雾和甘草的味道，伴有暗红色和蓝色水果的余味。酒口大而稳重，平衡，长长的尾部清新，干净，带有微微的热度，但热度似乎被成熟的水果的丰富感所掩盖。

Western reviews.review: Dark, superextracted in fruit, and with oak detailing, the '02 Eagle is drinkable now, due to its soft, creamy mouthfeel. Floods the palate with black cherry, crème de cassis and milk chocolate flavors. Has enough rich tannins and acids to balance and hold through 2010.
Western reviews.translation: "02年老鹰红酒"的口感非常深邃，果味浓郁，橡木味清晰。由于其软绵的口感，这瓶红酒已经可以饮用了。口感丰富，黑樱桃、黑加仑和牛奶巧克力味道充满整个口腔。由于其丰富的苦味和酸度，能够保持平衡，直到2010年。

Chateau Ste. Michelle Canoe Ridge Estate.name: Chateau Ste. Michelle Canoe Ridge Estate Merlot 2005

Chinese pairs.original: 混合蓝色和黑色水果，新鲜的药草和甜面包的香气，中等酒体，单宁紧实，余味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: A blend of blue and black fruits, fresh herbs, and sweet bread aromas, medium-bodied, firm tannins, and a long finish.

Western reviews.review: A strong contender for the best $22 Merlot in the country. Sculpted, dense and deeply layered, it's loaded with mixed blue and black fruits, fresh herb and sweet toast. The use of new oak is restrained and appropriate, extending the finish with nicely applied streaks of coffee around ripe, tight, dry tannins.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒是全国最好的22美元梅洛酒之一。它的结构紧密、丰富、层次深厚，充满了混合的蓝色和黑色水果、新鲜香草和甜的面包味。新橡木的使用得当，延长了口感，并在干净紧致的干酪味中留下了美妙的咖啡味。

Chinese pairs.original: 浓郁的红李子，香料和奶油的香味，人口圆润，成熟的单宁，樱桃巧克力和摩卡咖啡香气突出。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich plum, aromatic spices, and creamy notes, smooth mouthfeel, mature tannins, prominent cherry chocolate and mocha coffee aromas.

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, zarter Wasserrand. Zunächst etwas verhalten, dunkles Beerenkonfit, Herzkirschen, feine Holzwürze, Nuancen von roten Früchten. Mittlere Komplexität, gut integrierte Tannine, reife Waldbeerenfrucht, mineralisch, festes Rückgrat, wird von weiterer Flaschenreife profitieren. Eleganter
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，细微的水边缘。初次尝试时有些谨慎，深色浓果酱，黑樱子，细微的木质香气，红果的细微变化。中等复杂度，良好整合的坚果，成熟的森林浆果，矿物质，坚实的脊柱，会从进一步的陈化中受益。优雅。

Western reviews.review: Um aroma rico em fruto silvestre e ameixa bem maduros, algum cacau, mineral e fumo. Na boca mostra um excelente equilíbrio entre o doce do fruto em drops, a acidez fresca e viva e o leve amargo especiado, taninos finos e bem polidos. Conjunto muito bem arquitectado, com final longo e harmonioso que promete evoluir bem em garrafa durante os anos mais próximos.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气丰富，带有浓郁的野果和成熟的杏仁，伴有巧克力、矿物质和烟熏味。口感平衡，甜度来自果实的滋味，酸度来自清新活泼的口感，轻微的苦味和细腻的木质味。整体结构精致，长长的尾部非常和谐，预示着在未来几年里，瓶装的红酒会有很好的发展前景。

Western reviews.review: The latest vintage of the joint venture between Bruno Prats, formerly of Cos d'Estournel in Bordeaux, and the Symington family in the Douro is a rich, opulent wine, packed with intense, concentrated, sweet black fruits. Made in a Bordeaux style, it still manages to capture the heat and mineral character of great Douro wines.
Western reviews.translation: 布鲁诺·普拉茨（Bruno Prats）曾经是波尔多的科斯·德·埃斯图尔内尔（Cos d'Estournel）的一员，他与多罗河谷的辛明顿家族（Symington family）合作的最新一瓶葡萄酒，是一款丰富豪华的葡萄酒，充满了浓郁的、浓缩的、甜美的黑色水果。以波尔多风格制作的葡萄酒，仍然能够捕捉到多罗河谷葡萄酒的热度和矿物质特征。

Western reviews.review: A wine which aged amazingly well, at 17 years tasting very bright, med+ acidity, med alc balanced by med+ very soft tannin. a whole plethora of aromas and flavours going on, still plenty of juicy red fruit, cherry, raspberry, plum in contrast with dried fig and plum. lots of spice and cedar, cocoa.
Western reviews.translation: 一瓶经过精心陈年的红酒，17年后仍然呈现出亮丽的颜色，中等酸度，中等酒精度被中等以上的柔软橡皮质平衡。酒中充满了各种复杂的香气和口感，仍然保留了丰富的鲜红果味，樱桃，草莓，浆果，与干的枫树和浆果形成对比。酒中充满了各种香料和松木，巧克力等。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有香料、红色浆果的香气，酸度和结构良好，单宁细腻，余味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromatic with spice and red fruit notes, well-balanced acidity and structure, fine tannins, and a long finish.

Western reviews.review: Colour: bright cherry;Aroma: sweet spices, creamy oak, expressive, red berry notes;Flavour: flavourful, fruity, toasty, round tannins;Colour: Cherry, garnet rim;Aroma: spicy, creamy oak, toasty, complex, mineral, earthy notes, fruit expression;Flavour: powerful, flavourful, toasty, round tannins;

Chinese pairs.original: Magill Estate是超过60年老藤的单一园，为奔富的发源地（酒厂位于阿德莱德市区内）。香气富含成熟的果酱气息，但在总体风格上依然清凉优雅。中等集中的香气，富含蓝莓果酱、奶油李子干、黑胡椒、雪茄盒、菌菇、姜糖、葡萄干、蔓越莓干、橙味巧克力、薄荷及烤吐司滋味，伴随淡雅、丝滑，且回味丰富的悠长余韵。
Chinese pairs.new: Magill Estate是超过60年老藤的单一园，为奔富的发源地。酒香气息丰富，带有成熟的果酱味，但风格仍然清凉优雅。酒中有中等集中的香气，包括蓝莓果酱、奶油李子干、黑胡椒、雪茄盒、菌菇、姜糖、葡萄干、蔓越莓干、橙味巧克力、薄荷和烤吐司味。酒口感淡雅、丝滑，余韵悠长且丰富。

English pairs.original: A single vineyard Shiraz sourced from the hand-picked 60 plus old vines at Penfolds birth place (the winery is located in the Adelaide city). A bit jammy and ripe on nose but overall elegant and cool. Medium aromas of blueberry jam, cream dried plum, black pepper, cigar box, cedar, mushroom, ginger candy, raisin, dried cranberry, orange chocolate, mint and toast, light style but silky, complex and long.
English pairs.new: 这是一瓶来自澳大利亚Penfolds酒庄的单一葡萄园夏露士（Shiraz）红酒。酒庄位于阿德莱德市（Adelaide city），酒款使用来自60多岁的手选葡萄。酒香中有浓郁的果酱和成熟的气息，但整体上仍然优雅和清爽。酒中有中等浓度的蓝莓果酱、干酪干枣、黑胡椒、雪茄盒、红木、蘑菇、姜糖、葡萄干、干 Cranberry、橙巧克力、薄荷和-toast等复杂的香气。酒体轻盈但滑顺，复杂且持久。

Western reviews.review: (2012) >From the Penfolds home estate vineyard in front of their original winery close to Adelaide, this is made in the 160-year-old winery in big, square open fermenters and then basket-pressed. Ageing is in 67% new French and 25% new American hogsheads, the balance in second use French oak. A bit of real meaty concentration here, a lovely sense of cool earthiness and dark, sinewy black fruit. The palate has a delicious dry, savoury character with a touch of spice and pepper, a touch of leather too. There is sweetness on the palate, a big raft of glossy black fruit, but then that serious, creamy, dark and structured character asserts giving this a long, rich finish. Penfolds say drink 2014-2030.
Western reviews.translation: 2012年，来自澳大利亚阿德莱德附近的Penfolds家园葡萄园，这是用160年历史的酿酒厂的大型方形开口发酵罐和篮子压榨制作的。陈酿是在67%新法兰西和25%新美国桶中进行的，余下的在第二次使用的法兰西橡木桶中陈酿。这里有真正的肉类浓度，带有清新的土壤气息和黑色、坚韧的黑果。口感干燥、咸味，带有香料和胡椒的味道，带有皮革味。口感上有甜度，黑果的光泽，但然后严肃、丰富、黑暗和结构化的特性出现，使得口感长且丰富。Penfolds建议饮用2014-2030年。

Western reviews.review: Kühle, recht komplexe Aromatik, filigrane Frucht, Tonic Water. Am Gaumen seidig mit klarer, kühler Frucht, feinkörniges Tannin, perfekt umhüllt von einer frischen, reifen Säure. Bleibt lang und endet auf diskrete Röstnote. Grosse Klasse!
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论，翻译成中文如下：

冷静，复杂的香气，细致的果味，类似于汽水。口感滑顺，清晰的冷静果味，细腻的纤维，完美地被一股清新的成熟酸性所包围。口感持久，最后留下了一种细微的烤味。极品！

Western reviews.review: This full-bodied Shiraz features ample blueberry and blackberry fruit, embellished with lashings of vanilla- and brown sugar-laden oak. The tannins are somewhat chewy and the acids fresh, suggesting longevity. Finishes long and compelling. Drink now–2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这款充满体积的雪利司令酒具有丰富的蓝莓和黑莓果味，伴有浓郁的香草和棕糖味的橡木味。酒中的纤维素略微坚韧，酸度清新，预示着酒的持久性。酒尾长而引人入胜。建议立即饮用至2025年。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung. In der Nase intensive balsamische Nuancen, ein Hauch von Minze und Bergamotte, rauchig, zart nach Veloursleder, angenehme Kräuterwürze, sehr eigenständiges Bukett. Saftig, reife Herzkirschen, rotbeerige Nuancen, angenehme Extraktsüße, finessenreicher Säurebogen, mineralisch und anhaltend, finessenreich wie ein Syrah von der nordlichen Rhone, diesmal besonders gut gelungen. Kann sofort probiert werden, verfügt aber auch über gutes Reifepotenzial.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。酒香浓郁，带有樟脑味和薄荷和柑橘的香气，烟熏味和丝绒般的味道，舒适的草药味，独特的香气。口感丰富，熟透的樱桃，红酒味，舒适的果汁甜度，精致的酸度，矿物质和持久，精致如北方罗讷河的西拉，今年特别成功。可以立即品尝，但也具有很好的成熟潜力。

Western reviews.review: Tiefdunkles Rubingranat, opaker Kern, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung. Verhalten, zarte schwarze Beerenfrucht, zart floral, zurückhaltend. Saftig, wirkt im Moment etwas schlank, süße Tannine, finessenreich strukturiert, feiner Schokotouch, etwas Röstaromen im Nachhall, sehr vielversprechend, jetzt heißt es: bitte warten....
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色调，透明的葡萄核，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。气味轻微，黑berry果香，花香，回味中等。口感丰富，目前略显瘦长，甜度适中，结构细致，巧妙的巧克力味，余味中有轻微的烤果味，非常有前途，目前请耐心等待......

Marques de Casa Concha Cabernet Sauvigno.name: Marques de Casa Concha Cabernet Sauvignon 2011

Chinese pairs.original: 充满樱桃、巧克力和烟熏的气息，质地丝滑，坚实的单宁，余味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich aromas of cherry, chocolate, and smokiness, with a smooth texture, firm tannins, and a long-lasting finish.

Warwick Three Cape Ladies Cape Blend 201.name: Warwick Three Cape Ladies Cape Blend 2010

Chinese pairs.original: 薄荷饼干和鸢尾花的香味，并与突出的黑莓、蓝莓和无花果的香味完美地融合在一起。结构平衡，结构紧实，余味芬芳悠长.
Chinese pairs.new: The wine boasts a delicate aroma of mint cookies and irises, perfectly complemented by prominent notes of blackberry, blueberry, and quince. It has a balanced structure, a tight texture, and a lingering finish that's full of fragrance.

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung. Zarte rote Beerenfrucht, ein Hauch von frischen Herzkirschen, feine Minzanklänge, wirkt zunächst etwas verhalten. Mittlere Komplexität, rote Waldbeerfrucht, präsente Tannine, zart nach Edelschokolade im Abgang, wird von weiterer Flaschenreife profitieren.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。细腻的红果味，带有淡淡的鲜心柿子味，微微的薄荷香气，初次尝试时略为谨慎。中等复杂度，红莓果味，明显的苦味，尾部带有细腻的巧克力味，需要进一步的陈化才能发挥最佳。

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung. Zarte rote Beerenfrucht, ein Hauch von frischen Herzkirschen, feine Minzanklänge, wirkt zunächst etwas verhalten. Mittlere Komplexität, rote Waldbeerfrucht, präsente Tannine, zart nach Edelschokolade im Abgang, wird von weiterer Flaschenreife profitieren.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。细腻的红果味，带有淡淡的鲜心柿子味，微微的薄荷味，初期感觉有些谨慎。中等复杂度，红莓果味，明显的苦味，尾部带有细腻的巧克力味，需要进一步的陈化才能发挥最佳。

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung. Zarte rote Beerenfrucht, ein Hauch von frischen Herzkirschen, feine Minzanklänge, wirkt zunächst etwas verhalten. Mittlere Komplexität, rote Waldbeerfrucht, präsente Tannine, zart nach Edelschokolade im Abgang, wird von weiterer Flaschenreife profitieren.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。细腻的红果味，带有淡淡的鲜心柿子味，微微的薄荷香气，初次尝试时略为保守。中等复杂度，红莓果味，明显的苦味，尾部带有细腻的巧克力味，需要进一步的陈化才能发挥最佳。

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung. Zarte rote Beerenfrucht, ein Hauch von frischen Herzkirschen, feine Minzanklänge, wirkt zunächst etwas verhalten. Mittlere Komplexität, rote Waldbeerfrucht, präsente Tannine, zart nach Edelschokolade im Abgang, wird von weiterer Flaschenreife profitieren.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。细腻的红果味，带有淡淡的鲜心柿子味，微微的薄荷味，初期感觉有些谨慎。中等复杂度，红莓果味，明显的苦味，尾部带有细腻的巧克力味，需要进一步的陈化才能发挥最佳。

Ruffino Riserva Ducale Oro Chianti Class.name: Ruffino Riserva Ducale Oro Chianti Classico Riserva 2004

Chinese pairs.original: 带有浓郁的烟草，甜红樱桃，野菜和烤橡木的香气，单宁精致，酒体浓郁，余味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich tobacco, sweet cherry, herbaceous and smoky oak aromas. Finesse tannins, full-bodied texture, lingering finish.

Western reviews.review: There's a distinctive mineral aspect that sets this wine apart. Those aromas recall white stone or slate and enhance the wine's elegance and food pairing potential. The mouth is bright and ripe with red cherry and fresh berry notes on the close. It would pair well with braised meat.
