Western reviews.translation: 这个红酒独特的矿物质特征使其脱颖而出。酒中的香气让人想起白色石头或花岗岩，增强了酒的优雅感和与食物搭配的潜力。口感清新果甜，余味中有红樱桃和新鲜莓果的味道。这种红酒与红烧肉相得益彰。

Chinese pairs.original: 深色半透明的宝石红，新鲜的黑樱桃、黑莓香气、铅笔芯香料、烘焙香，风味独特优雅，结构均衡、余韵绵长。目前适饮。
Chinese pairs.new: Deep, translucent garnet color. Aromas of fresh black cherries, blackberries, pencil lead spices, and baking notes. Unique and elegant flavor profile, with a balanced structure and a long, lingering finish. Drinking well now.

Western reviews.review: A fresh and appealing style of Rioja with aromas of dried cheese, dill, cedar, tobacco and kirsch. The palate has a pleasing juiciness and layered flavors of cherry, rapsberry and vanilla. Mocha and coffee flavors accent the well-oaked finish, and overall this is pure and kicking, but not too hefty or extracted. Drink now through 2013.
Western reviews.translation: 这款里奥哈红酒的风格新鲜动人，气味中带有干酪、芹菜、红木、烟草和柠檬口味。口感清新果甜，层次丰富的风味中有草莓、樱桃和香草。咖啡和浓缩咖啡风味点缀着完美的陈化尾部，整体风格纯粹而有力，但不至于太重或过度提取。建议立即享用或保存至2013年。

Chinese pairs.original: 核果、白巧克力和一抹烟熏香气。精致优雅、口感集中爽口，回味持久。
Chinese pairs.new:
Blackberry, white chocolate, and a hint of smokiness. 

Refined and elegant, with a concentrated and crisp texture, and a long-lasting finish.

Western reviews.review: Nicely balanced between a creamy texture and crisp acidity, this offers fresh fruit flavors of lime, grapefruit, peach and melon, with spice and dried floral accents and a minerally edge on the finish. Drink now through 2020.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感平衡，既有丰富的奶油质感，又有清新的酸度。它展现出新鲜的水果风味，如柠檬、葡萄柚、桃子和瓜果，伴有香料和干花香的点缀，最后的余味带有矿物质的味道。建议立即饮用，至2020年。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有黑树莓，橘子皮和全麦饼干的香气，甜黑莓和李子的口感，新鲜多汁，酒体扎实，有无花果饼，石墨和烤面包味。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of blackberry, orange peel, and whole wheat biscuit, flavors of sweet blackberry and plum, fresh and juicy, with a solid body, hints of apricot, graphite, and toasted bread.

Western reviews.review: Tobacco, poultry spice, peppery, black cherry, blackberry, perfumed nose. Ripe, round, supple, fresh, juicy palate with black cherry, plum, savoury, vanilla, spicy, milk chocolate, tobacco and olive flavours. Good fruit and intensity but the finish is warm and tart. Best with roast meat. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 烟草味、家禽香料、辣椒味、黑樱桃、黑莓、香味的鼻子。口感丰富、圆润、柔滑、新鲜、水果味浓郁，黑樱桃、李子、咸味、香草、辣椒、牛奶巧克力、烟草和橄榄味。酒中有丰富的水果和强烈的味道，但尾部略微带有温暖和酸味。最适合与烤肉搭配。

Western reviews.review: A stacked wine with deep fruit on the nose as well as notes of orange peel and graham cracker. With its lush palate of sweet blackberry and plum flavors, this pours on the stoutness that Argentine Malbec is known for. A real-deal wine with size and balance. Maybe the best Broquel Malbec to date.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的气味中充满了浓郁的果味，伴有橙皮和饼干的香气。口感丰富，甜黑莓和浆果的味道让人印象深刻，这瓶红酒展现了阿根廷马尔贝克酒的典型特点——厚实的口感。是一瓶真正的好酒，具有体积和平衡。可能是布罗克尔马尔贝克系列中最好的酒之一。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有焦油，香肠，潮湿的壤土，黑松露，黑色李子和黑莓的香味。酒体饱满，新鲜多汁，柔和的单宁，清脆的酸度，余味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich, smoky, and savory aromas of bacon, damp earth, black truffle, black plum, and blackberry. Full-bodied with a fresh, juicy texture, soft tannins, crisp acidity, and a long, lingering finish.

Western reviews.review: Endowed with plenty of fruit, this wine swirls together notes of raspberry and vanilla, then tops off that delicious blend with hints of mint and other herbs. The lovely creamy texture turns silky and fresh on the finish. Drink now–2020.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒富有丰富的果味，融合了莓果和香草的风味，然后在上面添加了薄荷和其他香草的微妙味道。酒体的丰富奶油感在尾部变得丝滑和新鲜。建议立即饮用至2020年。

Chinese pairs.original: 植物、草药、香料、雪松，果感等复杂香气，酒体饱满度偏厚，有果味，香料等风味，单宁不厚但顺畅，酸度中高。
Chinese pairs.new: Complex aromas of botanicals, herbs, spices, pine, and fruit notes. Full-bodied with a rich texture, flavors of fruit and spices, smooth tannins, and a medium to high acidity.

Western reviews.review: One of the nicest red wines to emerge from the Mediterranean island of Sardinia, Barrua presents lush berry fruit woven with delicate notes of spice, leather and sweet chocolate. The wine is smooth, rich and long-lasting thanks to the delicious quality of its fruit.
Western reviews.translation: 来自地中海岛屿撒丁尼亚的其中一款最好的红酒，巴鲁瓦（Barrua）呈现丰富的浓郁果实，混合着细致的香料、皮革和甜巧克力。酒精平滑、丰富且持久，得益于其果实的品质。

Chinese pairs.original: 草莓、醋栗等红色水果的香气清新，淡淡的烟熏花香气息，中等酒体，酸度活跃，回味中长，口感纯净。
Chinese pairs.new: Strawberry and red fruit aromas, including persimmon, with a subtle smokiness. Medium-bodied, with lively acidity and a long, clean finish.

Western reviews.review: Rosso di Altesino is an 80/20 split of sangiovese mixed with 20 percent merlot and cabernet sauvignon that like everything is hand-picked from estate vineyards. This is made to drink young or as soon as it is released some nine to twelve months after vintage which includes three months in bottle. The merlot and cabernet temper the natural acidity and elegance of the sangiovese making it a little rounder and softer in its youth. Love the spicy, savoury, plummy fruit and the Altesino balance and harmony. Drink now with spaghetti Bolognese, stuffed roasted game hen or artisanal sausages. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 阿尔特西诺红酒是由桑吉韦塞和梅洛、卡贝网白葡萄酒混合而成，比例为80:20。所有葡萄均由estate葡萄园手工采摘。该酒款适合新酒饮用，或者在采摘后9-12个月左右即可饮用，包括在瓶中陈化三个月。梅洛和卡贝网白葡萄酒调和了桑吉韦塞的天然酸度和典雅风格，使其在年轻时更加圆润和柔和。我们喜欢这款酒的辣椒、咸味、浓郁的果味，以及阿尔特西诺的平衡和和谐。建议与意大利面条肉酱、烤全鸡或手工香肠一起饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 黑色水果、黑莓、辛辣的橡木和天竺葵的香气，浓郁的酒体，强劲的口感，丰富密集的单宁，需要长时间陈年。
Chinese pairs.new: Dark fruit, blackberry, spicy oak, and a hint of lavender, full-bodied with a robust texture, rich and concentrated tannins, requires long-term aging.

Western reviews.review: New World Cabernet Sauvignon rarely achieve the degree of elegance and liveliness on the palate of the Wynns bottling. Drawn from the famous terra rossa soils of South Australia’s Coonawarra district, the 2010 Wynn’s reflects the classic style of the region. Plush blackcurrant and blackberry fruit aromas are underscored by lovely nuances of mint, vanilla, savory green herbs and baking spices. The flavors are lifted, layered and long with opulent black fruits enhanced by hints of smoke, herbs, cinnamon and vanilla. This is a beautifully balanced Cabernet that exhibits a remarkably refreshing style that others would do well to emulate. Although very attractive now, the 2010 Wynns Cabernet will develop added nuance and interest with another five years of more of age.---- Wayne Belding
Western reviews.translation: 这款新世界风格的卡波内特酒（Cabernet Sauvignon）很少能达到温恩斯（Wynns）酒款的典雅和口感的程度。来自澳大利亚南部的库纳瓦拉（Coonawarra）地区著名的红土土壤（terra rossa soils），2010年的温恩斯酒款反映了该地区的经典风格。酒中充满了丰富的黑加仑和黑莓果香，伴随着迷人的薄荷、香草、生绿草和烘烤香料的细微之处。酒的口感丰富、层次分明、持久，黑果的香气被烟草、草本植物、肉桂和香草的微妙之处所增强。这是一款完美平衡的卡波内特酒，展现出一种令人惊艳的清新风格，其他酒款也值得学习。尽管现在很吸引人，但2010年的温恩斯卡波内特酒在五年后将会有更多的细微之处和趣味。

Western reviews.review: Black Label has been made since 1954 and is considered the classic Coonawarra red. Chief winemaker Sue Hodder only uses the top 20 - 25% of cabernet fruit off the Wynns estate. Built to age the 'Black Label' fruit averages about 33 years in age and the delicious 2010 is the 55th year it has been made. Expect a highly expressive cool red fruit style that spends about 16 months in a mixture of new and older French barriques & hogsheads. The attack is classic Coonawarra albeit with excellent ripeness. The nose is a mix of black cherry, earth and brambles with a strong core of dark blackberry fruit with floral undertones. The differences in previous decades are the glossy, rich soft tannins. You can drink this now with powerful meat dishes or cellar for a decade. Excellent value. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 威恩斯黑标（Wynns Black Label）自1954年开始酿造，是考纳瓦拉（Coonawarra）地区的经典红酒。主酿酒师苏·霍德（Sue Hodder）只使用威恩斯庄园（Wynns estate）顶级20-25%的卡波内托（Cabernet）果实。黑标红酒的平均年龄约为33年，2010年产量是该酒酿造的第55年。预计黑标红酒将呈现出高调的酷红果风格，酿造时间约16个月，使用新旧法式白桉木桶和猪头桶混合。酒体攻击力典型的考纳瓦拉风格，但口感丰富。酒香中混合黑樱桃、土壤和荆棘，带有强烈的黑莓果风和花朵底调。与之前几十年的不同之处在于，黑标红酒的口感丰富、软滑的苦味。您可以现在与强烈肉类菜肴一起享用，也可以将其贮存10年。价格合理。 (安东尼·吉斯蒙迪和斯图尔特·托比)

Chinese pairs.original: 很多澳洲雷司令在装瓶前就会有汽油味道，甚至会有“错误”的煤油般气息，一支好的雷司令，必须要通过瓶中发展，自然地演变出陈化的香气，Grosset是最为出名的雷司令专家，多年以来一直都持续稳定地出产高品质、自然，且极具个性的雷司令葡萄酒。酒体呈现柠檬绿色泽，散发着大量打火石的香气，同时有柑橘、泰国柚、青苹果、青柠、酸橙、蜜瓜及少许椰子气息，酸度颇高且新鲜，伴随悠长的余韵。
Chinese pairs.new:
Many Australian Rieslings have petrol notes before bottling, and some even have an "incorrect" kerosene-like aroma. A good Riesling must develop its aged flavors naturally through bottle aging. Grosset is renowned for its expertise in Riesling, consistently producing high-quality, natural, and uniquely expressive wines.

The wine presents a lemon-green hue, releasing a plethora of gunpowder aromas, accompanied by citrus, pomelo, green apple, green lime, orange, honeydew, and subtle coconut notes. The acidity is high and fresh, with a lingering finish.

English pairs.original: A couple of Australian Riesling has already got petrol like aromas before bottling, even sometimes including the fault aromas such as kerosene; a good Riesling should evolve the naturally developed nose with aging, and Grosset--the most well-known Riesling expert in Australia, continue to make very fine, natural and distinctive Riesling wine for many years. Lemon-green color, amply flinty aromas, with citrus, Thailand pomelo, green apple, green lemon, lime, melon and a bit coconut, freshly high acidity, with a long finish.
English pairs.new:
澳大利亚的一对白酒已经在瓶装之前就有汽油味的气味，甚至有时还包括汽油味的错误气味；一瓶好的白酒应该在陈化过程中自然发展出独特的鼻子，格罗斯（Grosset）是澳大利亚最知名的白酒专家，他多年来继续制作出极好的、自然的、独特的白酒。 

颜色是柠檬绿色，气味是充满火花的，带有柑橘、泰国柚子、绿苹果、绿柠檬、酸橙、瓜melon和一点椰子味。口感酸度高，长长的尾部。

Western reviews.review: Epitome of Clare riesling and typifies the Polish Hill minerality and precision. Lime pith, pink grapefruit, lime blossom, melon fragrance. There's a linear, silken fluidity to the ripe palate, with subtle pear, fine cream and graceful generosity. Lime cream through the lingering and persistant finish. Very young, through astutely balanced and seamless. Will hold for next 10+ years. (Treve Ring).
Western reviews.translation: 克莱尔地区的典型白葡萄酒，体现了波兰山矿物质和精确的特质。酒中有柠檬皮、粉红葡萄柚、柠檬花和瓜果的香气。酒口丰富饱满，线条流畅细腻，入口有细腻的梨子、轻微的奶油和优雅的丰富感。尾部有柠檬奶油的余味。酒精度很高，但平衡得很好，非常顺滑。酒龄很长，至少可以存放10年以上。

Chinese pairs.original: 通过其纯粹的果味以及干净的矿物质来判断，这是一支非常好的酒。细致的香气，彰显奶油李子、无花果、矿物、粉笔、干花和焦糖气息，结构坚实，口感丝滑略带辛辣，极为悠长的盐渍李子余韵中，隐约有矿物质感。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine is exceptional, judged by its pure fruit flavors and crisp mineral notes. The subtle aromas reveal hints of buttery plum, fig, mineral, graphite, dried flowers, and caramel. The wine has a solid structure, a smooth and slightly spicy texture, and a very long finish of salty plum notes with a subtle mineral undertone.

English pairs.original: I've realized it should be a premium wine through its pure fruity and clean mineral characteristics. Fine noses of cream plum, fig, mineral, chalk, dried flower and caramel, firm structure, silky texture, a bit spicy mouthfeel, with a very long salty plum length that hint of minerality.
English pairs.new: 我发现这款红酒应该是一款高端酒款，因为它纯粹的水果和清澈的矿物质特征。酒鼻子上有奶油浆果、枣子、矿物质、石灰、干花和焦糖的芬芳，结构坚实，质地细滑，口感稍微有辣味，尾部非常长，带有矿物质的浆果味。

Western reviews.review: The flagship wine from a relatively new Barossa producer, the 2004 Benno features smoky, savory, spice- and meat-driven aromas that easily move into complex and well-integrated flavors of spice and dark berries. Despite its labeledalcohol, the wine isn't heavy, instead offering medium body and a creamy smooth texture. Finishes long, with lingering dark fruit flavors. Drink now–2020.
Western reviews.translation: 巴罗萨地区新兴酒庄的旗舰酒，2004年版的本诺酒（Benno）展现出浓郁的烟熏、咸味、香料和肉类香气，随后转变为复杂的香料和黑莓的风味。尽管标注的酒精含量较高，但本诺酒并非重口感，反而呈现出中等体积和细腻的滑顺口感。酒尾长长，余味黑莓风味。建议立即饮用至2020年。

Western reviews.review: The flagship wine from a relatively new Barossa producer, the 2004 Benno features smoky, savory, spice- and meat-driven aromas that easily move into complex and well-integrated flavors of spice and dark berries. Despite its labeledalcohol, the wine isn't heavy, instead offering medium body and a creamy smooth texture. Finishes long, with lingering dark fruit flavors. Drink now–2020.
Western reviews.translation: 巴罗萨地区新兴酒庄的旗舰酒款，2004年版的本诺酒（Benno）展现出浓郁的烟熏、咖啡和肉类香气，随后转变为复杂的香料和黑莓风味。酒中酒精度不高，酒体中等，口感丰富细腻。酒尾长长，余味黑果风味。建议尽快享用，至2020年最佳。

Chinese pairs.original: 醒酒一个小时后，出现丰富，光滑，成熟的黑色水果以及带有烘烤橡木的咖啡风味口感，单宁结构强，酸度漂亮，余味中长。
Chinese pairs.new: After an hour of decanting, rich, smooth, and mature black fruit flavors emerge, accompanied by a coffee-like note with toasted oak undertones, robust tannins, beautiful acidity, and a long, lingering finish.

Western reviews.review: Sattes, dunkles Rubin mit Violettschimmer. Eröffnet in der Nase mit würzigen Noten, nach eingelegten Kirschen, Brombeeren, einladend. Kompakt und geschliffen am Gaumen, öffnet sich mit viel feinmaschigem Tannin, im Kern süßer Schmelz, baut sich schön auf, anhaltend im Finale.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色，带有紫色光泽的葡萄酒。酒鼻中充满了香气，带有香料、浸泡的樱桃和黑莓的味道，非常诱人。口感紧致，口中有细致的橡皮味，中间有甜蜜的融化，酒体逐渐升高，尾部持久。

Chinese pairs.original: 除了酒庄引以为傲的设拉子，Jasper Hill还在30年间持续酿造出了令人动容的雷司令。这是一支高雅的、花香四溢的酒，散发着桂花、西柚、柠檬、柑橘、白垩、芦荟、矿物以及些许的咸香。令人激动的干净酸度穿过其细致明亮的口腔，来到了那充满了矿物质的回味。妙极了！这支酒颠覆了我对于雷司令新酒的看法。
Chinese pairs.new:
除了酒庄引以为傲的设拉子，Jasper Hill还在30年间持续酿造出了令人动容的雷司令。这是一支高雅的、花香四溢的酒，散发着桂花、西柚、柠檬、柑橘、白垩、芦荟、矿物以及些许的咸香。令人激动的干净酸度穿过其细致明亮的口腔，来到了那充满了矿物质的回味。妙极了！这支酒颠覆了我对于雷司令新酒的看法。

Translated Wine Review:

In addition to the estate's renowned Heathcote, Jasper Hill has consistently produced captivating Shiraz over the past 30 years. This is a refined, floral wine that exudes notes of guava, grapefruit, lemon, orange blossom, limestone, asparagus, minerals and a hint of saltiness. The thrilling clean acidity cuts through its delicate, bright palate, leading to a finish rich in minerality. Brilliant! This wine has turned my perception of new-release Shiraz on its head.

English pairs.original: In addition to the benchmark Shiraz, Jasper Hill has long made a beautiful Riesling for over 30 years. This was a graceful, floral-driven wine which displayed the noses of sweet olive, grapefruit, lemon, citrus, chalk, aloe, mineral and savoury hints. Cleanly zesty acid came through the bright, refined palate to its mineral-suffused finish. So good! The wine changed my mind on the young Riesling.
English pairs.new: 除了标杆级的雪利酒，贾斯珀山（Jasper Hill）已经在30多年里生产出优美的莱斯林葡萄酒。这个酒展现出优雅、花香的风格，气味中有甜橄榄、葡萄柚、柠檬、柑橘、石灰、芦荟、矿物质和咸味的暗示。清晰的柠檬酸在明亮、精致的口感中流动，直到矿物质充盈的尾部。太棒了！这个酒让我改变了对年轻莱斯林的看法。

Western reviews.review: This is a dry, fairly full-bodied Riesling that's approachable now, but should hold well through at least 2024. It's fairly dark in hue for a young white wine, with smoky notes of grilled toast, honey and citrus that linger on the lip-smacking finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一个干白葡萄酒，口感丰富，目前已经可以享用，但至少到2024年都可以保存。这种年轻的白葡萄酒的颜色较深，口感中有烤面包、蜂蜜和柑橘的烟熏味道，余味持久。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有烤面包，李子，黑醋栗，茴香的气味，香气甜美开放，口感饱满，单宁细滑，有香料和烤浆果果实的味道，余韵悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts aromas of toasted bread, plum, black currant, and anise, with a sweet and open bouquet. The palate is full-bodied, with smooth tannins and flavors of spices and baked stone fruits, lingering on the finish.

Western reviews.review: Sweet and open on the nose, with blackberry and pure grape aromas. The palate has a tight, drawing texture but rewarding flavors of spice and roasted berry fruit. Long and flavorful on the finish, with bite and tannic residue. A wine with positive components but a rough young feel.
Western reviews.translation: 酒 nose 上甜美开朗，带有黑莓和纯葡萄的香气。口感紧致，带有调味和烤黑莓果的风味。尾部长且风味丰富，有嚼头和坚果感。虽然酒中有许多优点，但仍然有年轻的粗糙感。

Chinese pairs.original: 这家酒庄之前有一段时间被改名为“Niebaum-Coppola Estate”，随后再次更名为“Rubicon Estate”，现在又恢复了最初的名字“Inglenook”。此酒的香气以皮革和石墨味为主，以草本、香料、泥土和黑色水果的香味做点缀。纹理细致的单宁十分丝滑；回味展现微微的矿物质感。
Chinese pairs.new: This winery was previously known as "Niebaum-Coppola Estate" and later as "Rubicon Estate" before reverting back to its original name "Inglenook". The aroma of this wine is dominated by leather and graphite notes, with subtle hints of herbs, spices, earth and black fruit. The fine-grained tannins are silky smooth; the finish reveals a subtle minerality.

English pairs.original: Rubicon Estate was formerly known as ‘Niebaum-Coppola Estate’ and has subsequently had the original ‘Inglenook’ estate name restored. The bouquet was dominated by leather and graphite laced with herb, spices, earth and black fruits. The tannins were fine-grained and silky; the finish showed a hint of minerality.
English pairs.new: 鲁比康庄园（Rubicon Estate）原名为“尼鲍姆-科波拉庄园”（Niebaum-Coppola Estate），后来恢复了原来的“英格诺克”（Inglenook）庄园名称。酒中的香气以皮革和石墨为主，伴有草药、香料、泥土和黑色水果的味道。酒中的纤维素细腻光滑，尾部带有矿物质的味道。

Western reviews.review: Intensely scented bouquet of dark forest berries, dried plum and blackberry jam. In addition fresh hints of grapefruit and sour cherry as well as some herbaceous notes. On the palate full-bodied with a powerful structure superseded by notes of dark forest berries and caramel as well as liquorice. Fine silky tannins and a long finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气强烈，带有浓郁的黑森林浆果、干燥的李子和黑莓酱的味道。另外还有一些柑橘味和酸橙味，以及一些草本的香气。口感丰富，结构强烈，但被黑森林浆果、焦糖和甘草的味道所取代。口感细腻，纤维度良好，尾部长而持久。

Chinese pairs.original: 散发着樱桃香，伴有淡淡的新鲜药草香，带有樱桃和黑醋栗的味道，口感丝滑柔顺，余味持久，单宁柔和。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine exudes cherry aromas accompanied by subtle fresh herbal notes, with flavors of cherry and black currant. It has a smooth and silky texture, a long-lasting finish, and soft tannins.

Western reviews.review: Coffee, cedar, smoky, cassis jam, pencil lead, blueberry, vanilla, peppery aromas. Dry, tart, somewhat lean entry with slightly lean tannins. Smoky, coffee oak, peppery, black olive, cassis, blueberry, tobacco leaf flavours. Needs a few years to soften but the acidity will still poke through. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的口感特点包括：

* 醇度：干（dry）
* 酸度：酸（tart）
* 口感：略偏瘦（somewhat lean）
* 口感：略带干涩（slightly lean tannins）

这瓶红酒的香气和口感包括：

* 咖啡、松木、烟熏、黑加仑果酱、铅笔、蓝莓、香草、辣椒等香气
* 烟熏、咖啡、松木、辣椒、黑橄榄、黑加仑、蓝莓、烟草叶等口感

这瓶红酒需要几年的时间来软化，但酸度仍会突出。

Western reviews.review: Fresh herbal notes add a cool-climate touch to this wine's cherry aromas, while on the palate chocolaty oak frames the cherry and cassis flavors. It's silky in texture, with a finish that's filled with soft but persistent tannins. Drink now through 2012.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中，新鲜的草药味道给人一种清凉的感觉，融合在浓郁的樱桃香气中。口感上，巧克力味的橡木味道包围着樱桃和黑加思的风味。口感细腻，尾韵中充满了柔软但持久的苦味。建议立即饮用，至2012年。

Wolf Blass Black Label Cabernet Shiraz M.name: Wolf Blass Black Label Cabernet Shiraz Malbec 2002

Chinese pairs.original: 浓郁的黑醋栗、咖啡、黑巧克力、薄荷、樱桃、黑橄榄、橡木烟熏、香草、雪松气息，酒体丰腴，果香醇厚，且精致、典雅、平衡。陈年能力较强。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich black prune, coffee, dark chocolate, mint, cherry, black olive, smoky oak, vanilla, pine notes. Full-bodied texture, rich and thick fruit flavors, refined, elegant, and balanced. Aged well.

Western reviews.review: Big spicy, peppery, coffee, vanilla, smoky, blueberry, cassis, black berry, leather and licorice root nose. Rich, round, smooth grained tannins on a warm palate with fresh acidity. Coffee, vanilla, peppery, cassis jam, black berry, licorice, black olive, tobacco and clove flavours. Warm, ripe, fat and intense finish, needs 2-5 years, good effort. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的香气非常丰富，带有浓郁的辣椒、胡椒、咖啡、香草、烟熏、蓝莓、黑加仑、黑莓和 licorice 根的味道。

口感丰富、圆润、滑顺，带有新鲜的酸度。口感中可以品尝到咖啡、香草、胡椒、黑加仑果酱、黑莓、 licorice、黑橄榄、烟草和丁香的味道。

这瓶红酒的尾韵温暖、成熟、丰富且强烈，需要2-5年才能达到最佳状态。 (安东尼·吉斯蒙迪和斯图尔特·托比)

Western reviews.review: There's nothing to dislike about the 30th anniversary release of this iconic Australian wine—only the price is hard to swallow. Cedar, earth and mint frame the nose, while the dark-fruit and rich cola flavors ease across the palate in a wave of creamy tannins. It even firms up a little on the finish; could age until 2020.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶澳大利亚名酒的30周年纪念版，令人难以抗拒——唯一让人难以接受的就是价格了。鼻子中充满了松柏、泥土和薄荷的味道，而黑果和浓郁的可乐味道则在口中流淌，带来一波波的奶油质感的苦味。即使在最后的口感中也会变得更加坚实；它甚至可以储存到2020年。

Chinese pairs.original: 1985年份的酒标依然是绿色的，由于1987年的葡萄园火灾，Ron在那之后便将酒标的颜色换成了红色。展现大量三级香气，比如仓库、烟熏、草菇、咸矿物和黑色甘草味，但新鲜依然得以保留。香气和口感均有深厚的可可香味。异常干净、通透的酸度令人惊讶；轻盈的回味充满岩石滋味。
Chinese pairs.new:
This 1985 vintage wine label still features a green color, but after the 1987 vineyard fire, Ron changed the label color to red. 

The wine showcases a rich array of tertiary aromas, including warehouse, smoked, mushroom, salty minerals, and black licorice, yet still retains freshness. Both the aroma and palate are deeply infused with chocolate flavors. The acidity is remarkably clean and transparent, leaving a surprising lightness; the finish is filled with a rocky minerality.

English pairs.original: The 1985's label was still in green, Ron has changed the color to red since 1987 due to the bushfire. Displaying a mass of tertiary aromas such as barnyard, smoke, straw mushroom, savoury-mineral and black liquorice, but the freshness still retained. Profound cocoa notes on both nose and palate. I was so surprised by the acid that was very clean and bright; stony and light on the finish.
English pairs.new: 1985年的标签仍然是绿色的，罗恩从1987年开始将标签颜色改为红色，因为受了大火的影响。酒中展现出大量的次级气味，如马厩、烟火、干草蘑菇、咸淡矿物质和黑甘草，但仍然保留了清新感。酒中深度的可可味道出现在鼻子和口感中。酒的酸度非常清晰明亮，口感坚硬且轻盈，留下了石头般的清爽感。

Western reviews.review: This is a charming paradox of a wine, one that manages to be full-bodied and creamy-textured without being heavy or overly alcoholic, resulting in a wine of great elegance. The raspberry and cherry fruit offers some herbal nuances as well, ending on a spicy, tobacco-leaf note. Drinkable now, but should evolve positively through 2015 at least.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶迷人的红酒，既富有体积又富有乳酪质感，但又不沉重或过度酒精化，结果是一瓶极具优雅的红酒。红莓和樱桃的果味带有些草药的细微差别，最后以一丝辣椒和烟草叶的味道结束。可以立即饮用，但应该至少到2015年会有积极的演变。

Western reviews.review: Being inland and dry-farmed, Jasper Hill wines tend to show considerable vintage variation. This 2007 is slightly raisiny and warm, with hints of chocolate and dried berries allied to firm tannins. Cellar it and hope for the best; try after 2015.
Western reviews.translation: 由于是内陆地区的干农法葡萄园，贾斯珀山庄的葡萄酒品质会有较大的年份差异。这瓶2007年的葡萄酒略带干枯和温暖的味道，带有巧克力和干枯的浆果的味道，搭配坚实的橡胶质。建议将其放入酒窖，希望最好的结果；尝试在2015年后。

Western reviews.review: This powerful, broody, single-vineyard wine offers a nose of briney black olives, tangy blackberries, stoney minerals, tarmac and a strong savory streak. The palate balances power with poise. It's silky in texture and laces together plush fruit with savory, chewy tannins, closing with a long, juicy, herb-flecked finish. Drink now–2028. Christina Pickard
Western reviews.translation: 这款来自单一葡萄园的红酒，具有强烈的风格和深沉的性格。酒鼻中弥漫着海盐黑橄榄、酸甜黑莓、矿物质和沥青的气息，伴随着强烈的浓郁口感。口感平衡，细腻，富有层次。酒中丰富的果实与坚韧的苦味纤维完美融合，结尾长长的，带有香草味的口感。建议立即享用或储存至2028年。- Christina Pickard

Western reviews.review: It's easy to overlook this wine in a sea of ripe, flashy South Aussie Shiraz. But give this broody, cool climate wine your time as well as time in decanter and its singularity and precision shine. Notes of brambly berries and orange rind are accompanied by savory, earthy spices, dark chocolate and something sanguine and mineral-driven. The palate is big and a tad austere, with powerful, taut, chalky tannins, lifted acidity and layers of fruit and spice. Showing more elegance than past vintages of this wine. Drink 2021–2035. Christina Pickard
Western reviews.translation: 在南澳大利亚的浓郁、夺目红酒中，这款酒容易被忽视。但是，如果你给它时间，并且在酒瓶中放置一段时间，它的独特性和精确性就会显现出来。酒中有浓郁的浆果和橙皮的香气，伴随着浓郁的土味、干酪味、黑巧克力和矿物质味。口感丰富，略带干涩，具有强烈的、紧绷的、有矿物质的橡果感，酸度高，果香和香料层次丰富。与过去的几年相比，这款酒更具优雅。建议饮用时间：2021-2035年。- Christina Pickard。

Western reviews.review: Dusty, firm, powerful: just a few apt descriptors for this vintage of one of Heathcote's top wines. Mocha, licorice and blackberries feature on the nose, while the palate delivers more of the same—dark fruit, chocolate and plenty of spice. Best after 2020.
Western reviews.translation: 这款来自希思科特（Heathcote）的顶级红酒，具有厚重、坚实、强大的风格。酒鼻中充满了巧克力、Licorice和黑莓的香气，而口感则呈现出同样的风格——黑色水果、巧克力和丰富的香料。建议在2020年后饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 黑胡椒、黑李子、蓝莓、烟熏香气复杂浓郁，单宁中等偏高，入口厚实粗犷雄壮。
Chinese pairs.new: Dark pepper, blackberry, blueberry, and smoky aromas come together in a rich, intense bouquet. Medium to full tannins provide a robust, full-bodied texture.

Western reviews.review: Minty and toasty upfront, this is layered with blackberry, licorice, leather and toast aromas. It feels raring and ready to go, courtesy of firm acidity and good overall framing. Flavors of wild berry are bright, with herb and oak accents. Long, toasty and solid on the finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感是清新且有烟气的，入口有黑莓、甘草、皮革和烘烤的香气。酒体紧致，酸度强劲，结构整体均衡。口感中有野生莓果的鲜味，伴有草本和橡木的调味。酒尾长长，烘烤且坚实。

Chinese pairs.original: 清晰的干花、甜香料、黑果的香气，口感是樱桃、香料、谈谈泥土香气，整体圆润，平衡，单宁成熟有力，能留到余尾。
Chinese pairs.new: Crystalline dry florals, sweet spice, and black fruit aromas. Flavors of cherry, spice, and subtle earthy notes. Smooth, rounded, and balanced, with robust tannins that linger on the finish.

Western reviews.review: Carob, sour cherry, bramble, leafy greens and exotic spice are some of the eclectic aromatic components of this wine's bright bouquet. The more you sniff, the more you get pipe tobacco, forest fruit and blackberry. The mouthfeel is firm, tonic and compact.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气丰富多样，包括红柿子、酸橘子、荆棘、叶绿植物和异国风味等。随着闻气次数的增加，会逐渐闻到烟草味、森林水果和黑莓的香气。口感坚实、清爽、紧致。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有黑李子、香草、鲜花、矿物的香气，饱满的酒体，单宁柔软细腻，口感圆润。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of blackberry, lavender, floral notes, and minerals. Full-bodied with soft, silky tannins and a smooth, rounded finish.

Western reviews.review: One of Sicily's best expressions of Syrah, Planet's rich and velvety wine offers elegant aromas of blackberry, cherry, smoked ham and crushed white pepper. The wine is smooth and long on the finish with loads of chocolate intensity.
Western reviews.translation: 西西里岛最好的雪利酒之一，Planet的这款酒以其丰富的口感和细腻的质地而著称，酒中展现出黑莓、樱桃、熏肉和白胡椒的优雅香气。酒尾长而平滑，充满了巧克力般的强烈味道。

Chinese pairs.original: 成熟甜润，烤面包味突出，带有烟熏和香料的味道，并融合了成熟黑莓和梨子的香味，余味中保持了这些风味。
Chinese pairs.new: Ripe and smooth, with a prominent toasted bread flavor, accompanied by smoky and spicy notes, and a blend of mature blackberry and pear aromas, lingering with these flavors on the finish.

Western reviews.review: Compact and grapy up front, this is showing pure berry power on the nose. Lush and intense but also bright and balanced in feel, this Malbec is pumping out fleshy blackberry flavors offset by meaty notes. A full, mellow finish is deep and pure, with absorbed oak. Drink through 2020.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感紧凑，果香浓郁，入口果味丰富，主要是浓郁的黑莓味。口感丰富、浓郁，但也保持清晰、平衡。这种马尔贝克酒展现出丰富的黑莓口感，伴有肉类香气。酒尾丰满、平和，深度纯粹，带有轻微的橡木味。建议在2020年前饮用。

Western reviews.review: Ripe and rich, with a core of dark plum, kirsch and cocoa powder flavors. Well-structured, featuring medium-grained tannins and a long, sumptuous finish loaded with mocha and spice details. Drink now through 2020.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感丰富饱满，主要风味包括黑浆果、可可粉和果酒。结构紧致，中等粒度的苦味和长长的醇厚尾部，尾部带有巧克力和香料的细节。建议立即饮用，至2020年。

Western reviews.review: Dark and dense, rich and showing concentrated plum, blackberry and spice; balanced and intense, earthy and long.
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁，富有层次的黑色果味，浓郁的黑莓和香料味道，平衡而强烈的土味和持久的尾韵。

Western reviews.review: The 2012 Malbec Golden Reserve showed restraint and elegance. It's a textbook example of ripe, powerful and commercial Malbec form Mendoza with the cherries, violets and spicy oak that you'd expect. The palate is medium to full-bodied, it's very tasty and has some grainy, slightly dusty tannins. It's impressive that they produce 240,000 bottles of this wine at this quality and price.
Western reviews.translation: 2012年马尔贝克金牌储存版展现出克制和优雅。它是门多萨地区典型的成熟、强劲且商业化马尔贝克葡萄酒，带有你期望的樱桃、紫罗兰和香烟橡木的风味。口感中等到中等以上，非常可口，带有些许砂粒状、微微尘土般的苦味。值得称赞的是，他们能够在这种质量和价格下生产240,000瓶这样的葡萄酒。

Chinese pairs.original: 入口时非常清新，单宁成熟，酒味持久，酒体饱满。香气辛辣而浓烈，一抹甘草和黑胡椒香气弥漫在成熟水果香气之上。
Chinese pairs.new: Upon entry, it's incredibly crisp, with mature tannins, a long-lasting wine flavor, and a full-bodied texture. The aroma is spicy and intense, with a hint of licorice and black pepper wafting above the mature fruit aromas.

Chinese pairs.original: 淡金色。这支珍藏级的雷司令展现了非常细致的香气，打火石、栗子、酸橙、金银花、加利福尼亚柑橘、甜薄荷、冰糖以及香料蛋糕。明亮、厚重但是纯净的中等酒体的口感；其晶莹剔透且略带微苦的、多矿物质的回味衬托出了那极好的、令人口齿生津而且十分干净的酸度。
Chinese pairs.new: Pale gold in color, this reserve Chardonnay showcases an incredibly nuanced aroma, featuring notes of gunpowder, hazelnut, orange peel, honeysuckle, California citrus, sweet mint, sugar cookie and spice cake. The bright, full-bodied yet pure palate feel is complemented by a crystal-clear, slightly astringent finish that highlights the excellent, refreshing and very clean acidity.

English pairs.original: Light gold color. This Museum Reserve Riesling offered a very refined nose of flint, chestnut, lime, honeysuckle, California citrus, sweet mint, crystal sugar and spices cake. Bright, weighty but pure on a medium-bodied palate; it showed stunning, mouth-watering and very clean acid, underlining by its crystalline, mineral finish that hint with tiny bitterness.
English pairs.new: 这款博物馆级别的莱斯林白酒呈现出浅金色。酒香精致优雅，带有火石、栗子、酸橙、honeysuckle、加州柑橘、甜薄荷、晶糖和香料蛋糕的味道。口感中等体积，清澈明亮，重量感十足，但又不失纯粹感。酒中酸度惊人，清新可口，结尾呈现出晶莹透明的矿物质味道，带有微微的苦味。

Western reviews.review: How can one not applaud a winery that holds back some of its top Riesling for a museum release at such a reasonable price? Developed honey and cinnamon notes accent citrus fruit, adding weight and richness to the midpalate while still finishing crisp and completely dry. It's drinking well now, but should easily hold another 10 years under its screw cap.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒值得喝！这家酒庄在这样的价格下，将其顶级白葡萄酒的一部分储存起来，准备在博物馆中展出，这是值得赞赏的。酒中融合了蜂蜜和肉桂的香味，增添了柑橘果味，给了口感重量和丰富感，尽管如此，酒尾仍然清爽干净。酒现在已经可以喝了，但应该可以在螺丝盖下储存10年。

Western reviews.review: Thank the folks at Pewsey Vale for aging this stellar wine five years before its release. The result is what Australian Rieslings aspire to become, a medium-bodied wine of uncommon elegance. Orange marmalade, honey and toast characters mingle easily yet finish crisp, long and completely dry. Drink now or hold through 2015, possibly longer.
Western reviews.translation: 感谢Pewsey Vale的团队为这瓶红酒提前五年陈化。结果是一瓶典型的澳大利亚白酒风格，体积中等，优雅典雅。橙子马拉糕、蜂蜜和-toast的特征融合得很好，但干净、长长的口感。可以立即饮用，也可以保存到2015年甚至更久。

Western reviews.review: (2017) Quite a deep colour, the most fragrant floral and jasmine edges to that buttery wax development. The palate has great richness, but shot through with pure shimmering mineral acidity. Delightful.
Western reviews.translation: 2017年：酒色深邃，具有强烈花香和茉莉花香味的蜡质发展。口感丰富，但透着清澈闪亮的矿物酸度。非常令人愉悦。

Chinese pairs.original: 清脆酸爽，口感柔顺，带有黑莓、醋栗、李子和香料浓淡适中的风味。余味悠长迷人，稍带黑胡椒味。
Chinese pairs.new: Crunchy acidity, smooth texture, with flavors of blackberry, persimmon, plum, and spices in perfect balance. A long, alluring finish with a hint of black pepper.

Western reviews.review: Crisp, open-textured and beguiling for its beautifully proportioned blackberry, currant, plum and spice flavors, hinting at black pepper as the finish sails on enticingly. Best from 2011 through 2018. 13,000 cases imported.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感清新、开阔，黑莓、黑currant、黑枣和浓郁的果香与香料味道完美融合，余味中带有黑胡椒的味道。建议在2011年至2018年期间饮用。进口量13,000箱。

Western reviews.review: The 2006 Bin 128 Coonawarra Shiraz is purple-colored with a nose of mineral, menthol, black pepper, and assorted black fruits. It exhibits some elegance, ripe fruit, and good balance leading to a silky, fruit-filled finish. Drink it from 2011 to 2018.
Western reviews.translation: 2006 Bin 128 科纳瓦拉拉红酒（Coonawarra Shiraz）呈现深紫色，酒香中带有矿物质、薄荷、黑胡椒和各种黑色水果的味道。它展现出优雅的风格、成熟的果味和完美的平衡，口感细腻，果味丰富。建议在2011年至2018年饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 胡椒味，还带有红色水果及茴香的味道，结构紧致，酸度深厚，单宁怡人，回味悠长.
Chinese pairs.new: Peppery notes with hints of red fruit and anise, a tight structure, rich acidity, soothing tannins, and a long, lingering finish.

Western reviews.review: Big and ripe, with inviting aromas of cola, mint, dark chocolate and black fruit. The feel and flow on the wine are just right, while the blackberry and chocolate chip-mint flavors are tasty and even a bit complex. Long and layered on the finish, with a round, succulent final wave of meaty, serious flavors.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的气味丰富，带有可乐、薄荷、黑巧克力和黑果的诱人香气。酒体和口感都很舒适，黑莓、巧克力片和薄荷的味道很好，甚至有一点复杂。酒尾长而丰富，最后一波的口感圆润，带有浓郁的肉类和严肃的味道。

Chinese pairs.original: 此酒异常清晰的香气充满鲜花和甜香料味，以及延续到那多矿物、飘逸口感中的微微奶油质感，伴有上等的酸度、活泼的果味以及咸香的收尾。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts an exceptionally clear aroma, filled with floral and sweet spice notes, which carry over to the subtle creamy texture in the finish, accompanied by excellent acidity, lively fruit flavors, and a salty finish.

English pairs.original: Utterly precise, freshly floral and sweetly spicy aromas with a hint of creaminess that continued onto the ethereal and mineral-inflected flavours that had classy acid, vivid fruit and a saline end.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的香气精确、清新、花香、甜辣，带有轻微的奶油味。口感轻盈、矿物质味道浓郁，酸度高，果味鲜美，尾部带有盐味。

Western reviews.review: From one of Barossa's Shiraz masters, this is an earthy, herbaceous and almost delicate rendition of the grape that is known for richness and power. This wine's focus is on red forrest berries, plums, black pepper and dried leaves. The herbaceousness really shines on the palate, which, thanks to lifted acidity and fine, savory, structured tannins, makes this more than drinkable now, though it's capable of aging nicely over the next decade, too. Drink now–2028. Christina Pickard
Western reviews.translation: 巴罗萨地区著名的雪利酒大师的作品，这是一款以泥土、草本和细致的风格呈现的雪利酒。酒中以红色森林浆果、浆果、黑胡椒和干燥叶子为主。酒口中草本味道非常突出，酒的酸度和细致的、咸味的、结构化的橡木味道使得这款酒在现在就可以品尝，尽管它也可以在未来十年中继续陈化。建议在现在至2028年之间饮用。- Christina Pickard。

Chinese pairs.original: 鼻子是成熟的浓缩果汁味，入口愉悦，单宁结实，橡木味主导口感，入口后有点甜茶叶的味道。
Chinese pairs.new: The nose is mature concentrated fruit, entry is pleasant, tannins are solid, oak flavors dominate the palate, with a hint of sweet tea notes on the finish.

Western reviews.review: A very youthful adventure now, the 2010 Penfolds Bin 407 Cabernet Sauvignon serves up an aromatic and almost developed aromas of red fruits and savor. But on the palate, the wine is young and in need of a few years in the bottle. Rascally tart in the flavors, I see this wine as one of the world's most elegant cabernets! Tasted: 12/2/14 (Best Served: 2016-2024)
Western reviews.translation: 2010年Penfolds Bin 407 卡布塞利诺（Cabernet Sauvignon）是一款充满青春活力的红酒，带来一系列的红果和浓郁口感的香气。但是，在口感上，这款酒还比较年轻，需要在瓶子里再过几年才能发挥最佳。口感中有着顽皮的酸度，我认为这是一款世界上最优雅的卡布塞利诺酒！评分时间：2014年12月2日（最佳饮用时间：2016-2024年）。

Western reviews.review: Deep garnet-purple colored, the 2010 Bin 407 Cabernet Sauvignon offers up pure creme de cassis and blackberry preserve aromas accented by lovely menthol, carob and espresso notes plus a hint of marmite. Very tightly structured with a great backbone of medium-firm, very fine tannins, it remains rich and muscular with nice acid freshness through the long finish. Approachable now, it drinks to 2022+.
Western reviews.translation: 2010 Bin 407 卡布塞利特酒呈现深红紫色，酒中展现出浓郁的黑加香和黑莓果酱香气，伴有美妙的薄荷、可可和咖啡豆香味，微微带有马尔麦特的味道。酒体结构紧密，中等坚实的纤维质，酒口富有肌肉感，酸度清新，长尾持久。酒目前可立即享用，预计可持续至2022年。

Western reviews.review: Tight and vibrant, with currant, cherry and floral flavors, this pushes through a layer of firm tannins, glowing alluringly on the expressive finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒紧致而生动，展现出浆果、樱桃和花朵的风味，通过一层坚实的橡胶质，展现出迷人的尾韵。

Chinese pairs.original: 在干热的2017年份，Paelo似乎少了些许灵气，虽然莓果的香气依旧纯净，Balamic的草本芬芳也依旧清新，但在结构和力量方面确实超出了我心目中对Cabernet Franc的审美极限。需要着重肯定的是，酿酒团队对平衡感的把控一流。精心打磨过的粉末单宁让整个回甘充满醇厚之感。
Chinese pairs.new: In the dry and hot 2017 vintage, Paolo seems to have lost a bit of its soul, although the raspberry aroma remains pure and the herbaceous notes of Balsamic are still fresh, but in terms of structure and power, it has exceeded my aesthetic limits for Cabernet Franc. Notably, the winemaking team has mastered the balance. The carefully polished powdery tannins fill the palate with a rich, velvety texture.

English pairs.original: In the dry and hot vintage like 2017, Paelo seems to have less liveliness comparing with its iconic image. Although the fruity fragrance is still precise, and the herbal scent of Balsamic remains fresh, its structure and strength do go beyond the aesthetic limits of Cabernet Franc in my mind. What needed to be praised is the winemaking team’s superb control of THE BALANCE. The carefully polished chalky tannins increase the mellowness of the aftertaste.
English pairs.new: 在干燥炎热的产季如2017年，帕洛（Paelo）似乎比其标志性形象要少了一些生机。尽管果香依然精确，巴尔萨米克（Balsamic）的草药香气仍然新鲜，但其结构和力量似乎已经超出了卡伯涅特（Cabernet Franc）在我心中的美学极限。值得赞扬的是，酒庄团队对平衡的控制极为出色。精心打磨的石灰质苦味增加了余味的圆润感。

Western reviews.review: Violettschwarz. In der Nase schwarze Brombeeren, sowie Holunder und Heidelbeeren. Dazu Wacholder, Lakritze und gut eingebundene Röstaromen. Im Gaumen gut gebaut und elegant. Getragen von einer saftigen Säure und feinkörnigem Tannin.
Western reviews.translation: 紫罗兰黑。鼻子中有黑莓、黑莓和蓝莓的气息。伴有冬青、甘草和完美融合的焦糖味。口感丰富细致，带有清新果酸和细致的橡皮质感。

Western reviews.review: The nose is initially shy but eventually reveals aromas suggesting leather, cedar, Mediterranean brush and espresso. The firm, full-bodied palate shows the heat of the vintage, offering dried blackberry, roasted coffee bean, licorice and grilled sage. Compact, close-grained tannins grip the finish. Kerin O’Keefe
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气起初很谦逊，但逐渐展现出皮革、红檜、地中海灌木和浓缩咖啡的香味。酒体坚实，口感丰富，体现了当年酿造的热度，展现出干燥的黑莓、烤咖啡豆、甘草和烤香薷的味道。紧密的、细致的纤维素在尾部紧紧抓住。 —— Kerin O’Keefe

Western reviews.review: Incandescente e tridimensionale attrae nella matrice ricca di fragoline di bosco, prugne nere, foglie di tè arse, pepe nero, buccia di peperone verde e terra calda. La scena secondaria alterna sandalo e bacche di ginepro fuse a ricordi di paprika dolce che gli conferiscono insieme un'anima orientale. Corpo pieno, solido e compatto mostra un uso sapiente del legno nuovo e si distende lentamente al palato mostrando precisione e dolcezza. Il finale radioso incanta raccontando al mondo di che stoffa è fatta Bolgheri. Cabernet Franc in purezza. Un piccolo capolavoro da provare dopo il 2023.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的味道是如此绚烂和立体，带领我们进入一片丰富的黑莓、黑杏、焦茶叶、黑胡椒、青椒皮和温暖土壤的世界。次要的风景则交替出现了沉香和青檬的融合，带回了甜椒的回忆，让整体呈现出东方风情。酒体丰满、坚实、紧密，巧妙地运用了新橡木，缓慢地展开在口中，展现出精确和甜美。光彩夺目的结尾，向世界展示了Bolgheri的品质。纯正的卡波弗朗克。值得在2023年之后品尝的小杰作。

Western reviews.review: Bright, rich ruby with light purple shimmer. Very expressive nose, shows notes of wild blueberries, fruit and spice, strong tobacco, exciting. On the palate there's dense tannin, substance with fine spice, slightly brittle on the finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是亮丽的深红色，带有微微的紫色光泽。酒香非常丰富，展现出野蓝莓、水果和香料的特征，强烈的烟草味令人兴奋。口感上，酒体丰富，具有细致的香料味，尾部略微干脆。

Chinese pairs.original: 出乎意料，这款异常年轻的Unico表现杰出，轻嗅酒透出大量甜花香，夹杂胡桃、蜜枣、话梅、可可、谷物、香料矿物和灌木味。绵密、平衡的中段口感充满成线性的酸度——在那略带奶油质的刚劲但细腻回味中达到了顶峰。
Chinese pairs.new: This exceptional Unico defies expectations, showcasing a remarkably youthful character. A light sniff reveals an abundance of sweet floral notes, accompanied by hints of hazelnut, honeyed apricot, cherry, cocoa, grain, spice, mineral, and underbrush. The full-bodied mid-palate is characterized by a linear acidity that reaches its peak in a creamy yet refined finish.

English pairs.original: Unexpectedly, this exceedingly young Unico had outstanding performance, sniffing of loads of sweet flowers intermixed with walnut, preserved date, preserved plum, cocoa, grain, spicy-mineral and scrub. Dense yet balanced on the mid-palate that was packed with linear acid that culminated in a masculine but detailed finish that had slight creaminess.
English pairs.new: 令人惊讶的是，这个极为年轻的Unico表现出色，闻起来充满了大量的甜花香，混合着杏仁、干枣、梅干、可可、谷物、矿物质和干草的香气。口感浓密却又平衡，中口处充满了线性的酸度，最后以强烈的 masculinity 和细节完美的尾韵结束，尾韵中带有轻微的奶油感。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, zarter Ockerrand. Schwarze Waldbeerenfrucht, Brombeerfrucht, angenehme Kräuternote. Am Gaumen stoffig und komplex, angenehme Zwetschkenfrucht, ausgestattet mit präsenten Tanninen, mineralischer Abgang, extraktsüßes Finale und tolle aromatische Länge. Dieser Único ist definitiv bereits gut antrinkbar, verfügt aber über gute Reserven. (99.480 Flaschen; trinken/lagern +25)
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，微黄色边缘。黑色森林果实、莓果味，伴有舒适的草药味。口感丰富复杂，黑杏味，带有明显的坚果味，矿物质尾部，甜度高的结尾，优雅的香气持久。这个 Único 已经可以享用，但仍有很好的储存潜力。 (产量 99,480 瓶；可饮用/可储存 +25 年)

Western reviews.review: Meaty, spicy, tobacco, peppery, saddle leather, sandalwood, black olive, chocolate, mineral, vanilla aromas. Rich, round, elegant but dry palate with light grainy tannins. Vanilla, black cherry, peppery, meaty, smoky, chocolate, orange, mineral, tobacco, olive flavours. Finish is long and fine with intense orange peel, plum and smoky leather flavours. Acidity is still lively with some tannins to shed. Needs another 10 years. Great complexity. Bravo tempranillo. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的香气中包含了:

肉类、辣椒、烟草、胡椒、马鞍皮革、沉香、黑橄榄、巧克力、矿物质、香草等多种复杂的气味。

口感丰富、圆润、优雅但干净，具有轻微的砂粒般的苦味。

口感中包含了：

香草、黑樱桃、胡椒、肉类、烟熏、巧克力、橙子、矿物质、烟草、橄榄等多种复杂的味道。

尾韵长且细腻，具有强烈的橙子皮、浆果和烟熏皮革的味道。

酸度仍然活跃，仍有部分苦味需要消化。

这瓶红酒需要再储存10年才能达到最佳状态。它的复杂性令人惊叹。 Bravo tempranillo！（安东尼·吉斯蒙迪和斯图尔特·托比）

Western reviews.review: Strong ruby with a discreetly lightened rim. On the nose dark berries, fresh cherry, delicate notes of seltzer and a touch of rosehip. All this with clear roasted notes underlaid. On the palate at first an elegant roast aroma. Seems complex and has sweetish berry fruit. Really powerful, enormous length and has considerable ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色，边缘略微微亮。酒香中有浓郁的黑berries、鲜红的樱桃、微妙的苏打水和玫瑰果的味道。所有这些都伴随着清晰的烤味底调。口感上，初期有优雅的烤香味，似乎复杂且有甜的浆果味。酒力强大，长度极长，具有显著的陈化潜力。

Western reviews.review: A luminous and hypnotic fiery-red color with intense aromas of blueberry, oriental spice and even minerals. This before breathing brings out unexpected scents of flint, prune jam and a smoky hint. The mouthfeel is fresh and upheld by a bold and structured body offering unbridled pleasure. A magnificent wine that will last 100 years. The intense aromatic persistence is eternal.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒呈现出灿烂的深红色，具有强烈的蓝莓、东方香料和矿物质的香气。初次接触时，会释放出令人惊讶的火石、浆果酱和烟熏味。口感清新，酒体强壮，带来无尽的愉悦。是一款令人惊叹的红酒，能长存100年。酒香持久，令人难以忘怀。

Western reviews.review: Lovely tobacco, dried fruit, spice and leather create that unique, classy nose that is Vega Sicilia Unico. This may not be the best recent vintage of this high-flying wine (1991 and 1994 were better), but it is still quite impressive. The palate is maturing but shows vitality, and the flavors of cherry, tobacco, cracked spice and roasted plums are sublime and backed up by lots of spicy oak. Entirely drinkable now but with the inherent structure to last another decade or two. A Europvin, Christopher Cannan selection, imported by multiple importers, including Michael Skurnik Wines.
Western reviews.translation: 维加西利亚独特的香气是由烟草、干果、香料和皮革组成的，这是维加西利亚独一无二的高贵气息。虽然这可能不是近年来最好的产季（1991年和1994年更好），但它仍然非常令人印象深刻。口感成熟但仍然充满活力，樱桃、烟草、碎香料和烤石榴的味道非常美味，并且由大量的辣橡木味道所支持。现在完全可以饮用，但其固有的结构可以让它持续十年左右。欧洲葡萄酒，克里斯托弗·卡南（Christopher Cannan）选择，多家进口商进口，包括迈克尔·斯库尼克葡萄酒（Michael Skurnik Wines）。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有李子皮和黑樱桃的香气，酒体强劲，单宁饱满，酸度平衡，回味是亚洲香料，铁和水果的的味道，余味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts aromas of plum skin and black cherry, with a robust body, full tannins, and balanced acidity. The finish is a lingering blend of Asian spices, iron, and fruit flavors.

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, Wasserrand. Intensive dunkle Beerenfrucht, ätherische Nuancen, nach Cassis, Brombeernuancen und Lakritze, feine Edelholzanklänge, etwas Nougat. Saftig, feine Extraktsüße, reife Herzkirschen, runde Tannine, zarter Schokoanklang, bereits sehr harmonisch und zugänglich, mineralischer Nachhall, bleibt gut haften, ein vielseitiger Speisenbegleiter mit Reifepotenzial.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色光泽，边缘清晰。浓郁的黑果味，芳香的气息，带有黑加斯、黑莓和薄荷的味道，细微的贵木香味，略带奶油味。口感丰富，细微的浓缩果味，熟透的黑莓，圆润的苦味，微妙的巧克力味，已经非常和谐且易于接受，矿物质余味，留在口中，适合多种菜肴配对，酒体有成熟潜力。

Western reviews.review: Gritty, charred and herbal on the nose, this has aromas of earthy black fruit and ground coffee. It feels wide and full bodied, bearing flavors of savory spice, tobacco and cinnamon, with roasted and syrupy qualities. The finish is thick, sweet and dense.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气强烈，带有焦炭和草药的味道，闻起来像黑色果实和磨碎的咖啡。口感丰富饱满，带有浓郁的香料、烟草和肉桂味，口感像烤焦的和浓稠的糖浆。尾部厚重甜美浓郁。

Western reviews.review: Open spicy, peppery, tobacco nose laced with menthol, bay, coffee, cassis, cedar, chocolate, five spice aromas. Rich, round, ripe, smooth palate with light, grainy tannins. Vanilla, coffee, peppery, chocolate mint, savoury, poultry spice, cassis, orange peel, coconut, black cherry and celery salt flavours. Warm and gloss with some fine tannins on the finish. Drinkable now with beef but will improve within 2-4 years. The Purple Angel mix is 92 per cent carmenère and 8 per cent petit verdot (Anthony Gismondi).
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的香气开阔、辣、胡椒、烟草味，带有薄荷、迷迭香、咖啡、黑加仑、雪松、巧克力、五香等复杂的香味。

口感丰富、圆润、成熟、滑顺，口感轻微、颗粒的苦味。

口感中有香草、咖啡、胡椒、巧克力薄荷、咸味、家禽香料、黑加仑、橙皮、椰子、黑草莓和芹菜盐等复杂的味道。

口感温暖、光滑，最后有细腻的苦味。

可以现在就喝，配牛肉食材，但在2-4年内会有所改善。

紫色天使混合酒中，卡门埃尔占92%，佩蒂·韦多占8%（安东尼·吉斯蒙迪）。

Chinese pairs.original: 颜色很通透。展现大量三级香气（甘草、可乐、咸香、蘑菇、皮革），但依然新鲜。香气和口感都有明显的巧克力味。令人惊讶的是，在如此炎热的年份，拥有那般漂亮的酸度和平衡；粉末状的健壮单宁十分滑爽。
Chinese pairs.new: The wine has a very transparent color. It presents a rich array of tertiary aromas (licorice, cola, saltiness, mushroom, leather), yet still feels fresh. Both the aroma and taste have a distinct chocolate note. What's impressive is that, despite being a hot vintage, it boasts a beautiful acidity and balance; the powdery tannins are silky smooth.

English pairs.original: Showing lovely brightness in color. Lots of tertiary aromas (liquorice, cola, savoury, mushroom, leather) here, but still quite fresh. Chocolaty on both nose and palate. Surprisingly, the wine had such beautiful acid and balance in a hot vintage; polished for the sturdy and powdery tannin.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒呈现出亮丽的颜色。酒中充满了复杂的香气（含有 licorice、 cola、 savoury、 mushroom 和 leather 等），但仍然保持着清新感。口感上也带有巧克力味。令人惊讶的是，这瓶酒在炎热的产季中仍然保持着美丽的酸度和平衡，口感上有着细致的粉末质感和坚实的纤维质感。

Western reviews.review: Sourced from one of the world's oldest surviving vineyards (planted in 1843), this is a full-bodied, velvety-textured rendering of Barossa Shiraz. An ample dusting of licorice and baking spices add zest to ripe blackberry and plum fruit flavors, and the wine finishes long and lush, with a flash of vanilla. Drink now–2025+.
Western reviews.translation: 来自世界上最古老的存活着的葡萄园之一（1843年种植），这是巴罗萨地区的深度、细腻的雪利酒。浓郁的黑莓和浆果风味中，含有适量的 licorice 和烘烤香料，酒尾长而丰富，带有一丝香草味。建议立即饮用至2025年。

Western reviews.review: Named for the year the vineyard was planted, this is a full-bore Barossa fruit bomb—in a positive way. Waves of lush berry fruit are framed by hints of vanilla and mint in this full-bodied, creamy-textured wine that somehow manages to retain a sense of elegance and proportion.
Western reviews.translation: 这款酒以葡萄园种植的年份命名，这是一款典型的巴罗萨风格的果酒——正面意义上的果酒爆炸。酒中充满了丰富的浓郁果味，伴随着一丝丝的香草和薄荷的味道，这款酒的口感丰富、滑顺，令人惊讶的是它仍然保持着优雅和谐的风格。

Chinese pairs.original: 成熟丰盈的黑莓、黑樱桃、李子、和香料的香气，同时又带有一丝烟熏、香草和摩卡的味道，单宁强劲而细腻。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich, full-bodied aromas of ripe blackberry, black cherry, plum, and spice, with a hint of smokiness, vanilla, and mocha. Tannins are strong and refined.

Chinese pairs.original: 带有复杂及辛辣的肉桂，丁香和香草味，与丰富的黑莓水果和腊肉的香气融合，咖啡和焦糖味带出一些橡木的气味，酒体丰满，单宁厚重，余味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts complex and spicy notes of cinnamon, cloves, and herbs, blended with rich blackberry fruit and savory bacon aromas. Coffee and caramel flavors evoke hints of oak, while the full-bodied texture is supported by robust tannins and a lingering finish.

Western reviews.review: Complex and spicy, with cinnamon, clove and vanilla notes that blend seamlessly with rich blackberry fruit and hints of cured meat. Coffee and caramel imparted by oak stick out a little at present; try after 2005.
Western reviews.translation: 复杂而有辣味，带有肉桂、丁香和香草的香气，与浓郁的黑莓果味和咸肉的余味融合得非常完美。目前，来自橡木的咖啡和焦糖味稍微突出了一些；建议在2005年后再次品尝。

Chinese pairs.original: 富含烟熏气息，黑樱桃，李子及甘草的香气，醇熟而馥郁。酒体丰腴，单宁如天鹅绒般柔顺，回味充满果香。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich with smoky aromas, black cherry, plum, and licorice, this wine is full-bodied and velvety. The tannins are as smooth as silk, and the finish is filled with fruit flavors.

Western reviews.review: Romitorio di Santedame is Ruffino's top wine. It is a big, plump wine and is almost too thick and powerful in places, making it well suited to succulent cuts of red meat. But it's hard not to love its extraction, sophisticated mouthfeel and blockbuster tannins. Drink after 2010.
Western reviews.translation: 罗米特里奥·迪·桑泰达梅（Romitorio di Santedame）是鲁菲诺（Ruffino）的顶级红酒。它是一种厚实的、丰富的红酒，在某些地方甚至太厚太浓，适合烤红肉。然而，很难不喜欢它的提取力、复杂的口感和强大的纤维。建议在2010年后饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 少量的沉淀物。此酒非常庄严的香气含蓄、优雅，打底的是泥土、岩石、白花和些许黑布林气息。质地曼妙且单宁顺滑；多矿物的清新回味充满颇为锐利的酸度。
Chinese pairs.new: A hint of sediment. This wine boasts a majestic, understated aroma with a base of earth, stone, white flowers, and a hint of black pepper. The texture is silky and smooth, with a refreshing minerality and a crisp acidity that cuts through.

English pairs.original: Tiny sediments. An aroma of restrained elegance and notable austerity, with a background touch of earth, stone, white flowers and subtle black plum. Beautifully textured and smoothly tannic; rather sharp acidity suffused the freshly precise and mineral-infused finish.
English pairs.new: 细微的沉淀物。酒中有着优雅而克制的气息，具有明显的严谨性，伴有泥土、石头、白色花朵和细微的黑浆果的背景。酒口细腻，口感平滑，具有明显的果酸，酒尾清新，矿物质味道浓郁。

Western reviews.review: Wine for ageing, with the cold wet winter and warm ripening season, this wine has developed a classic tight character and structure which means it needs time to reveal itself. Delicate yet pure cassis laced with crushed clove flavours revealing earthy, spice and leather on the finish.
Western reviews.translation: 适合陈酿的红酒，受冷湿冬季和温暖成熟季节的影响，这款红酒展现出典型的紧致性和结构，需要时间才能展现出其全部风采。细腻而纯粹的黑加仑风味伴随着捣碎的丁香味，酒尾展现出泥土、香料和皮革的味道。

Western reviews.review: This is a bold and powerful yet layered and nuanced wine, with hints of green peppercorn, tobacco leaf, cigar box and leather that add depth and interest to the cassis and brambly blackberry core. The gripping palate offers structured, mouthcoating tannins that are framed by ample acidity and ripe black berry tones. Notes of spicy black licorice and espresso unfold on the long finish. It's delicious now, but this will age beautifully through 2020.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一款强烈而复杂的红酒，具有绿胡椒、烟草叶、雪茄盒和皮革的深度和趣味，完美地融入黑加西和黑莓的核心。强烈的口感带有结构化的、覆盖口腔的苦味，伴有充足的酸度和成熟的黑莓味。长长的尾部带有黑甘草和浓缩咖啡的香气。这瓶酒现在已经很好喝了，但它将在2020年之前继续美化。

Western reviews.review: Dark and inky color. Nice nose of cassis, plum, cigar box and spices, quite Bordeaux-like with an austere texture, layers of dark fruit, cedar wood and a long fresh finish, elegant fruit, still dense and tight but with fine potential. Classy.
Western reviews.translation: 深色浓郁的酒液。酒香中有浓郁的黑加斯、黑桃、雪茄盒和香料，非常似波尔多风格，具有严谨的质地，黑果层次丰富，松木味和长而清新的尾韵，优雅的果味，仍然浓密紧致但具有优良潜力。高雅的口感。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有白胡椒和黑胡椒的气息，入口后则风味中带有爽脆的小红莓、黑樱桃和石榴的味道，清新柔顺。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of white pepper and black pepper, with flavors of crisp red currants, black cherries, and watermelon on the palate, refreshing and smooth.

Western reviews.review: Rather full-bodied and chunky in style, this nonetheless shows considerable potential. Intense mocha and black cherry notes ride alongside tomato and beet shadings, ending in a steady stream of crisp acids and dusty tannins. Try in 2015.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的风格是丰富而厚实的，尽管如此，它仍然展现出很大的潜力。强烈的巧克力和黑樱桃味道与番茄和甜菜色的阴影相伴，最后以清晰的酸度和干燥的纽扣结束。建议在2015年尝试。

Chinese pairs.original: 淡宝石色——要比2014年份的颜色淡，并且更为透亮。此酒的香气非常芬芳，透出甜美、怡人的红色水果（草莓、树莓、红布林）、黑樱桃、无花果、花香、咸矿物、薄荷糖、蛋白、香料和松露味。几乎感觉不到重量的滑爽、干净口感同样诱人，伴有大量活泼的果味及优雅的酸度。
Chinese pairs.new: Delicate garnet hue – lighter and more transparent than the 2014 vintage. The wine's aroma is incredibly fragrant, releasing sweet and enticing red fruit notes (strawberry, raspberry, red currant), black cherry, quince, floral, salty mineral, mint, toffee, protein, spice and truffle. The almost weightless, silky and clean texture is equally alluring, accompanied by a lively fruitiness and elegant acidity.

English pairs.original: Pale ruby--lighter and brighter than the 2014. The aroma was notably fragrant and admirably sweet, sniffing of red fruits (strawberry, raspberry, red plum), black cherry, fig, flowers, savoury-mineral, mint candy, egg white, spices and truffle. The mouthfeel was also inviting, which was weightless, polished and precise, with loads of vibrant fruitiness supported by refined acidity.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的颜色是浅红色，明亮而鲜艳，比2014年更轻更亮。酒香非常浓郁，甜美可口，闻起来像红果（草莓、蓝莓、红桃子）、黑杏、枣子、花朵、矿物质、薄荷糖、蛋清、香料和松露。口感也很吸引人，轻盈、光滑、精确，充满活力果味，受到精致的酸度的支持。

Western reviews.review: (2016) 20% whole cluster, wild yeasts and a little more new oak than in the Pizzaras Chardonnay. Subtle earth and iron oxide character, but less bloody than the Arbolada Pinot. Quite tight, with a real finesse, the juiciness of the cherry and herb freshness, and a touch of polished wood, with balsamic notes, but ebony tight and polished, smooth tannins. Delicious. This will retail for around £70.
Western reviews.translation: 2016年：20%的整梳集群，野生酵母和比Pizzaras Chardonnay少一点新橡木。有细微的土壤和铁氧化物特征，但比Arbolada Pinot少一点血腥味。非常紧致，具有真正的细致，樱桃和香草的新鲜味道，和一丝光滑的木头，伴有巴兰酸的味道，但黑曜石般紧致光滑，平滑的纤维素。非常美味。这将在市场上售价约£70。

Chinese pairs.original: 这支酒轮廓清晰、清新而且复杂的香气透出黑色水果（黑莓、黑樱桃）、蔓越莓、橙子果酱、皮革、黑巧克力、香草和香料味。多汁、集中的口感富有美妙的质地以及出色的深度和恰到好处的浓度，引领其深厚但清晰、活泼的回味。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts a clear, crisp, and complex aroma that showcases black fruits (blackberry, black cherry), cranberry, orange marmalade, leather, dark chocolate, vanilla, and spice notes. The juicy, concentrated palate is rich in texture, with outstanding depth and perfectly balanced intensity, leading to a long, full-bodied finish that's both rich and refreshing.

English pairs.original: Defined, refreshing and complex aromas of black fruits (blackberry, black cherry), cranberry, orange jam, leather, black chocolate, vanilla and spices. There's lovely texture to the intense and juicy flavours that possessed remarkable depth and decent density that led to a profound but precise and vibrant finish.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒具有明确、清新且复杂的黑果香气（黑莓、黑樱桃、草莓）、橙果酱、皮革、黑巧克力、香草和香料。酒体丰富、果香浓郁，具有深度和密度，完美的口感，结尾强烈但精确且生动。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, dezente Randaufhellung. Feiner Nougat, reife dunkle Pflaumenfrucht, dunkles Beerenkonfit, ein Hauch von Orangenzesten, ein Hauch von Minze. Rund und elegant, auf gewisse Weise"süffig " feine Säurestruktur, präsente Tannine im Hintergrund, angenehme Würze, trocknet den Gaumen ab, klasse Speisenbegleiter, bereits antrinkbar, dunkler Nougat im Rückgeschmack. Peter Moser
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。细腻的杏仁味，成熟的黑浆果味，黑berry浓缩，橙子皮和薄荷的微妙香气。圆润优雅，某种程度上是“口感丰富”的，细腻的酸度结构，背景中的细致的苦味，愉悦的调味，干净的口感，适合各种菜肴配餐，已经可以饮用，杏仁味在回味中持续。- 彼得·莫瑟。

Western reviews.review: Huge dill and vanilla aromas wrap around intense mixed-berry fruit, ending on notes of espresso and dark chocolate. It's full bodied and richly textured, but perhaps a bit coarse as well. This may not be the biggest, baddest or longest-lived Grange, but it maintains the Grange standard of excellence. Drink 2020–2030.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有强烈的芹菜和香草香气，包围着浓郁的混合浆果果味，最后留下了浓缩咖啡和黑巧克力的余味。它的口感丰富、富有质感，但也许略微粗糙。虽然这可能不是最强大的或最持久的格兰奇（Grange），但它仍然维持了格兰奇的高品质标准。建议饮用时间为2020-2030年。

Western reviews.review: Definitely a high end wine. Powerfull nose, long in the mouth, very long finish. Beautifull colour. Tanins are quite crisp and definitely should wait another 5 years before they get integrated. First impression is very velvety but tanins are so high that you can use this wine to explain people what tanic means. Structure is complex. Considering it is a Shiraz wine, low level of pepper, would say as much as in a great Bordeaux from the left side of the bank. Rich as a good Barollo. Considering the price tag, I give 4 stars for the taste but you can find Top Bordeaux, Languedoc or Barollo's or Macciole for les than 1/3 of the price, I would not consider buying Grange Bin 95. Very good yes, extremely overpriced as well...
Western reviews.translation: 这个红酒非常高档。酒香强烈，口感长久，余味持久。颜色美丽。口感清脆的橡木味非常明显，建议再等5年才能完全融合。初次印象非常滑顺，但橡木味非常强烈，足以让人理解什么是橡木味。结构复杂。考虑到这是一个夏拉酒，辣椒味非常低，甚至比左岸的波尔多酒还要低。酒质丰富，像一瓶好的巴罗洛酒。考虑到价格，口感给4星，但你可以在1/3的价格买到顶级波尔多、朗格多克或巴罗洛酒或马乔莱酒，我不会考虑买格兰奇酒庄95。非常好，但价格也非常过高。

Western reviews.review: Tar, mint, lifted blueberry and chocolate ganache dance on the nose. The midpalate is seamless, there is an exquisite textural finesse that shines with tar, cocoa, vanilla and blueberry while an edge of minty brightness lends freshness. It is this freshness that characterises the entire wine and lends it timeless poise. Wonderful now but will evolve.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中，焦烟、薄荷、蓝莓和巧克力酱的味道交织在一起。口感平滑细腻，焦烟、可可、香草和蓝莓的味道在口中流转，薄荷的清新味道则带来新鲜感。这瓶红酒的新鲜感贯穿始终，使其拥有永恒的风范。现在它很美味，但随着时间的推移，它还会有所进步。

Western reviews.review: This has all the size and weight you've come to expect from Australia's most famous wine. Huge fruit and huge oak combine in a full-bodied, richly textured package that delivers waves of toasted coconut, vanilla and intense dark berries yet remains embryonic more than five years after the harvest. That said, the texture isn't quite as tight or as fine as some other vintages—expect this to be early maturing by Grange standards, and best from 2020–2040.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒拥有澳大利亚最著名的葡萄酒所应有的体积和重量。丰富的果味和浓郁的橡木味结合在一起，呈现出一瓶充满体积、富有质感的酒精，带来一波波的烤椰子、香草和浓郁的黑莓味道。然而，这款酒的质感并没有像其他几年那样紧密或细腻——按照格兰奇（Grange）的标准，这款酒会较早成熟，最佳饮用时间在2020年至2040年之间。

Chinese pairs.original: 甘草，橡胶，柠檬皮和烟草，浆果的香味扑面而来，但随后，又散发出更加浓郁的黑莓和奶油感的味道，单宁丝滑柔顺，酒体饱满，余味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich notes of licorice, rubber, lemon peel, and tobacco give way to a wave of juicy fruit aromas, but are soon overtaken by a deeper, more intense blackberry and creamy sensation. The tannins are smooth and velvety, the full-bodied texture is satisfying, and the finish is long-lasting.

Western reviews.review: The 2008 Eolo Malbec is blended with 5% Cabernet Sauvignon and 2% Petit Verdot and sees 18 months in French new oak. It is utterly refined on the nose with dark cherries, rose petals, Asian spices and a hint of bay leaf. The palate is medium-bodied with supple, filigree tannins. It is a feminine Malbec with a satin-like texture and a caressing finish of blood orange and creme de cassis. This is a hideously expensive, but undeniably beautiful, succinctly crafted Malbec. Wonderful.
Western reviews.translation: 2008 年 Eolo 马尔贝克红酒中混合了 5% 卡波雷特·萨旺吉翁和 2% 小皮特·维多特，-aged 在法国新橡木桶中 18 个月。酒鼻上呈现出典雅的风格，带有黑樱桃、玫瑰花瓣、亚洲香料和一丝樟叶的味道。口感中等，纤维化的纹理细腻，柔和的口感。它是一款女性化的马尔贝克，具有丝绸般的质感和血橙和黑加仑的温柔结尾。这是一款令人惊叹的美丽的马尔贝克，简洁而精致。

Western reviews.review: Eolo is apparently on the upswing in just its 3rd incarnation. The nose is deep and sweet, with licorice, rubber, lemon peel and tobacco to go with bold berry aromas. Shows immensity and structure in the mouth, with layered blackberry flavors and creaminess. Fades well, with tobacco and leather gracing the finish.Editors' Choice
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒似乎正在第三次版本中迅速崛起。酒鼻深邃甜美，带有 licorice、橡胶、柠檬皮和烟草的气息，伴随着果实丰富的黑莓香气。口感强烈，结构完美，层次分明的黑莓风味和丰富的奶油感。尾部烟草和皮革的余味渐渐消退。编辑推荐。

Western reviews.review: An ambitious wine, with ripe linzer torte, plum preserves and berry coulis fruit that's well-integrated with toasty notes of apple wood and tarry mineral, leading to the long, fruit-filled finish. An impressive effort for the vintage. Malbec, Cabernet Sauvignon and Petit Verdot.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶雄心勃勃的红酒，具有成熟的林格尔蛋糕、浓郁的浆果和浓缩的浆果果酱风味，与苹果木和焦土矿物质的烘烤味道完美融合，延续到长长的果酱般的尾部。对于这一年份来说，这是一份令人印象深刻的努力。酒中含有马尔贝克、卡波弗雷蒙和佩蒂特韦尔多等葡萄品种。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有明显的黑醋栗味，同时带有深色李子味和野味，酒体丰满而细腻，平衡与协调。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts prominent black prune flavors, accompanied by rich plum notes and a hint of earthiness, with a full-bodied and velvety texture that's perfectly balanced and harmonious.

Western reviews.review: Tinto composto a partir de 60% C abernet Sauvignon e 40% Malbec, com estágio de 17 meses em barricas de carvalho, sendo 60% novas. Já mostra sinais de evolução, com notas terciárias, terrosas e de ervas secas envolvendo suas frutas vermelhas e negras de perfil mais maduro, com sua acidez vibrante e seus taninos finos e tensos, conferindo fluidez ao vinho. Aqui, a Cabernet mostra seu lado através das notas mentoladas. Preciso e refinado, tem final longo e persistente, com toques de ameixas, de alcaçuz. Grata surpresa!. Álcool 14%.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒由60%卡伯涅特萨万和40%马尔贝克组成，陈酿17个月，使用60%新橡木桶。酒中已经开始展现出成熟的特征，带有泥土、干草和干果的复杂风味，覆盖着深红色和黑色果实的风味。酒的酸度清晰，细致的橡木味和紧绷的果皮味使酒体流畅。卡伯涅特的风味在这里表现得尤为突出，带有薄荷的风味。酒精度14%，酒的结尾长而持久，带有杏仁和荆芥的风味。

Western reviews.review: After an earthy, aggressive, almost sweaty start, this joint-venture red from Nicolas Catena and Eric de Rothschild finds its course and manages to improve. The palate is full of acid-driven, amplified cherry and plum flavors, and while there's a hint of buttery oak resting on the finish, that should subside with airing and a good food pairing. Imported by Pasternak Wine Imports.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶由尼古拉斯·卡塔纳（Nicolas Catena）和埃里克·德·罗得希尔德（Eric de Rothschild）联合出品的红酒，起初有着泥土、强烈、几乎是汗臭的味道，但随着时间的推移，它找到了自己的方向并逐渐改善。口感上充满了酸度强烈的樱桃和浆果风味，而在后味中有一丝奶油橡木的味道，但随着时间的推移和合适的食物搭配，这种味道应该会消失。

Chinese pairs.original: 此酒甜美、微妙的香气非常芬芳。丝滑的单宁、新鲜的矿物质以及怡人的果味组成了那诱人的口感。香气中微微的生青味延续到了其口感和回味中。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts a sweet and subtle aroma that is incredibly fragrant. Silky tannins, fresh minerality, and a soothing fruitiness come together to create an alluring palate. A hint of green notes lingers in the aroma, palate, and finish.

English pairs.original: Perfumed for the sweet and delicate aroma. Silky tannin, fresh minerality and admirable fruitiness made up the attractive mouthfeel. It showed a tinge of greenness on nose that extended to the palate and finish.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒具有甜美的花香。它的口感细腻，矿物质清新，果味丰富，非常吸引人。然而，在鼻子和口中都有微微的青涩味。

Western reviews.review: Il Carisma - Generosità, potenza e grazia: Das sind die Eigenschaften, die Ornellaia seinem Jahrgang 2015 zugute hält. Und das ganz zu recht: Der Wein braucht zwar einiges an Belüftung, dann aber entwickelt er vielschichtige Aromen von reifem Steinobst, frischen Blüten, Macchia und Unterholz; superber Bau mit geschliffener Komplexität, das Tannin präzise und noch sehr jung, wunderbar unterstützt von der Säure, endet lang und verführerisch. Grosser Wein.
Western reviews.translation: 伊尔卡里斯玛 - 慷慨、力量和优雅：这些是奥尔内利亚对其2015年产量的评价。完全正确：酒精需要一定的氧化，之后就会展现出成熟的石榴、鲜花、灌木丛和灌木丛的多层次香气；超级结构，具有光滑的复杂性，坚果味道精确，仍然非常年轻，酸度完美地支持着，长长的尾部令人难以抗拒。是一瓶大酒。

Western reviews.review: Sattes, tiefdunkles Rubin mit schwarzem Kern. Kompakte und dichte Nase, nach dunklem Johannisbeersirup, dazu Heidelbeere und Minze, im Hintergrund nach Tabak. Kompakt und dicht auch am Gaumen, baut sich mächtig auf, viel dichtmaschiges Tannin, sehr konzentriert, im Finale fester Druck, sehr langer Nachhall. Othmar Kiem, Simon Staffler
Western reviews.translation: 深度浓郁的红酒，酒色为深红色，带有黑色核。酒香浓郁，气味浓密，带有黑莓糖浆、蓝莓和薄荷的味道，背景中有烟草的味道。口感浓郁，酒体厚实，酒精浓度高，口感丰富，尾部坚实，余味持久。 -  Othmar Kiem, Simon Staffler

Western reviews.review: (53% Cabernet Sauvignon, 23% Merlot, 17% Cabernet Franc, 7% Petit Verdot): Kräftiges Rubin, sehr schöner Glanz. Feinduftige Nase, tief und sehr komplex, dunkelfruchtig mit Aromen von Brombeeren, schwarzen Johannisbeeren, Kirschen, Pflaumen, Süssholz, Oregano, Zedern und Pinienharz. Im Auftakt weich und bereits erstaunlich zugänglich, mittlerer Körper, sehr gute Struktur, die Frucht wirkt reif aber nicht verkocht, die Tannine sind von hervorragender Qualität, eine moderate, gut integrierte Säure stützen das Fruchtbündel, der Alkohol ist ebenfalls perfekt dosiert, hier ist alles an seinem Platz. Der Wein ist wunderbar cremig aber nicht plump, seine sagenhaft feinen Tanninen umgarnen die Zunge und verwöhnen im ausgezeichnet langen Abgang mit Aromen von dunklen und roten Beeren, Pflaumen, etwas Brotrinde und Piemontkirsche. Das ist wie ein Spaziergang an einem lauen Sommerabend, eine milde Briese streichelt die Haut, ein fein gewobenes Seidentuch schützt die Dame in Begleitung von der aufkommenden Frische der Nacht. Ein Sommernachtstraum! Jetzt bis 2040+, 19.5 vvPunkte (97/100)
Western reviews.translation:
这是一瓶红酒评论。以下是翻译成中文：

(53% 卡波内尔·萨旺尼, 23% 美乐, 17% 卡波内尔·法兰克, 7% 小皮诺): 深红色, 光泽很好。酒香浓郁, 深度很大, 果香复杂, 有浆果、黑莓、黑加仑、李子、石榴、苏木、松脂和松脂香气。入口柔和, 已经很容易喝, 中等体积, 果味成熟但不甜腻, 坚果味很好, 果酸适中, 整合良好, 酒精量也很好, 每个元素都很完美。酒精很丰富, 不过不腻, 果味细腻, 坚果味很好, 酒尾很长, 有浆果、李子、石榴、面包屑和皮埃蒙特李子香气。就像一个温暖的夏日晚上, 微风轻拂, 一件细软的丝绸衬衫保护着女伴, 避免了夜晚的新鲜气息。是一场夏日梦! 可以保存到2040年, 得分19.5/20 (97/100)。

Western reviews.review: This is a fine Rosso to drink while your waiting for the famed Ornellaia flagship wine to rest and become fabulous in your cellar. That said, this wine is no slouch, delivering classic super-Tuscan style and oodles of bang for your buck. Bright fruit, lively savory flavors, a rich texture and moderate tannic structure make for a food friendly wine to savor. No surprise from this producer. Contains 67% Merlot, 20% Cabernet Sauvignon and 13% Sangiovese.---- Rich Cook
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶适合在等待奥尔内拉亚（Ornellaia）旗舰酒成熟的红酒。虽然如此，但这瓶酒也绝不输给它的前辈，提供了典型的超托斯卡纳风格和超值的口感。酒中充满了鲜艳的果味、生动的咸味、丰富的口感和适度的苦味结构，使其成为美味的佳酬。这个酒厂的出品再次令人满意。酒中含有67%梅洛、20%卡波弗雷什和13%桑吉韦塞。---- 评分：理查德·库克（Rich Cook）

Chinese pairs.original: 散发出黑色水果，檀香和甘草的香气和味道。如丝般光滑的单宁，口感粘稠。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine offers aromas and flavors of black fruit, sandalwood, and molasses. Silky smooth tannins and a rich, velvety texture.

Western reviews.review: Very peppery, savoury, spicy, cola, smoked meat, barnyard, cedar, smoked leather aromas. Dry, full but somewhat lean palate with juicy acidity and some light tannins. Smoky, meaty, peppery, black cherry, licorice root, vanilla, coffee, rooty, prune and tobacco leaf flavours. Finish is warm and fresh with some light tannin to shed. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的香气非常复杂，带有以下特征：有大量的辣椒味、咸味、辣味、可乐味、烟熏肉味、田间味、松木味和烟熏皮革味。

口感干净、丰富但略带纤细，带有清新果酸和轻微的橡皮质感。口感中有烟熏味、肉味、辣椒味、黑樱桃味、甘草味、香草味、咖啡味、根茎味、浆果味和烟草叶味。

尾韵温暖清新，有轻微的橡皮质感。

Chinese pairs.original: 此酒相当封闭、严肃的香气富有生姜和岩石味；微微的动物皮毛和干花香。单宁滑爽，强劲、庄严的回味则富有新鲜的酸度。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine has a tightly closed, serious aroma with notes of ginger and stone; subtle animal hide and dried floral hints. The tannins are smooth, with a powerful, austere finish that boasts fresh acidity.

English pairs.original: Rather closed on scent that was serious, gingery and stony; a hint of animal fur and dried flower. Polished for the tannin, and freshly acidic on the finish that was forceful and austere.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的香气闭合严实，具有严肃、姜香和石头的味道，伴有动物皮毛和干花的微妙气息。口感上，酒中的鞣质经过精心打磨，余味清新酸爽，强烈而严谨。

Western reviews.review: This is a charming paradox of a wine, one that manages to be full-bodied and creamy-textured without being heavy or overly alcoholic, resulting in a wine of great elegance. The raspberry and cherry fruit offers some herbal nuances as well, ending on a spicy, tobacco-leaf note. Drinkable now, but should evolve positively through 2015 at least.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶迷人的红酒，既富有体积又具有丰富的质感，但又不显得沉重或过度酒精化，结果是一瓶充满优雅的酒。红莓和樱桃的果味带有些草药的细微差别，最后以一丝辣椒和烟叶的味道结束。可以立即饮用，但应该至少到2015年会有积极的发展。

Western reviews.review: Being inland and dry-farmed, Jasper Hill wines tend to show considerable vintage variation. This 2007 is slightly raisiny and warm, with hints of chocolate and dried berries allied to firm tannins. Cellar it and hope for the best; try after 2015.
Western reviews.translation: 由于是内陆地区的干农法葡萄园，贾斯珀山庄的葡萄酒品质会有较大的年份差异。这瓶2007年的葡萄酒略带干枯和温暖的味道，带有巧克力和干枯的浆果的味道，伴随着坚实的橡胶质。建议将其放入酒窖，希望最好的结果；尝试在2015年后。

Western reviews.review: This powerful, broody, single-vineyard wine offers a nose of briney black olives, tangy blackberries, stoney minerals, tarmac and a strong savory streak. The palate balances power with poise. It's silky in texture and laces together plush fruit with savory, chewy tannins, closing with a long, juicy, herb-flecked finish. Drink now–2028. Christina Pickard
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶来自单一葡萄园的红酒，具有强烈的风格和深沉的性格。酒鼻中弥漫着海盐黑橄榄、酸甜黑莓、矿物质和沥青的气息，伴随着强烈的浓郁口感。口感平衡，细腻，富有层次。酒中丰富的果实与坚韧的口感相结合，结尾是长长的、带有香草味的余韵。建议立即饮用至2028年。- Christina Pickard

Western reviews.review: It's easy to overlook this wine in a sea of ripe, flashy South Aussie Shiraz. But give this broody, cool climate wine your time as well as time in decanter and its singularity and precision shine. Notes of brambly berries and orange rind are accompanied by savory, earthy spices, dark chocolate and something sanguine and mineral-driven. The palate is big and a tad austere, with powerful, taut, chalky tannins, lifted acidity and layers of fruit and spice. Showing more elegance than past vintages of this wine. Drink 2021–2035. Christina Pickard
Western reviews.translation: 在南澳大利亚的浓郁、夺目红酒中，这款酒容易被忽视。但是，如果你给它时间，并且在酒瓶中放置一段时间，它的独特性和精确性就会显现出来。酒中有浓郁的浆果和橙皮的香味，伴随着浓郁的土味、干酪味、黑巧克力和矿物质味。口感丰富，略带干涩，具有强烈的、紧绷的、有矿物质的橡果感，酸度高，果味和香味层次丰富。与之前的几年相比，这款酒更具优雅。建议饮用时间：2021-2035年。- Christina Pickard。

Western reviews.review: Dusty, firm, powerful: just a few apt descriptors for this vintage of one of Heathcote's top wines. Mocha, licorice and blackberries feature on the nose, while the palate delivers more of the same—dark fruit, chocolate and plenty of spice. Best after 2020.
Western reviews.translation: 这款来自希思科特（Heathcote）的顶级红酒，具有厚重、坚实、强大的风格。酒鼻中充满了巧克力、Licorice和黑莓的香气，而口感则呈现出同样的风格——黑色水果、巧克力和丰富的香料。建议在2020年后饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 装瓶前3个月的桶边试饮。此酒极富表现力的香气充满红色水果（草莓、蔓越莓、树莓）芬芳，以香料矿物和干花香做点缀。芬芳、活泼但庄严的口感富有轮廓分明的矿物质感。
Chinese pairs.new: Tasted from the barrel 3 months prior to bottling, this wine boasts an expressive nose full of red fruit aromas (strawberry, raspberry, blackberry) with subtle hints of spice, minerals and dried flowers. The palate is both lively and dignified, with a clear mineral presence.

English pairs.original: Barrel tasting (3 months before the bottling). Expressive on the nose with loads of red fruits (strawberry, cranberry, raspberry) laced with spicy-mineral and dried flower. Perfumed and vivid but solemn on the taste with defined minerality.
English pairs.new: 酒庄品尝（酒瓶装备前3个月）。酒香丰富，展现出大量的红果味（草莓、蔓越莓、蓝莓），伴有辛辣矿物质和干花的香气。酒口芬芳清新，但庄重典雅，矿物质味道清晰可辨。

Western reviews.review: This wine is the perfect intro to the Bindi style, unfurling its charms one layer at a time. First come plump, brambly blueberries and currants, then violets and rose petals, then warm spices, coffee beans, mocha and a flicker of smoky bacon. It's silky and woven with ultrafine, textural tannins. Christina Pickard
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒是Bindi风格的完美入门，逐层展现其魅力。首先是丰富的蓝莓和黑currant，接着是紫罗兰和玫瑰花瓣，随后是温暖的香料、咖啡豆、摩卡和一丝烟熏的培根。它的口感细腻，纤维度极细的纹理让人感到舒适。 —— Christina Pickard

Chinese pairs.original: 成熟的黑醋栗、黑莓糖浆芳香，口感多汁，毛绒般细滑，单宁成熟，整个结构非常平衡，果味余香持久。
Chinese pairs.new: Ripe blackberry and blackcurrant jam aromas, luscious texture, silky smooth, with mature tannins and a beautifully balanced structure, lingering fruit flavors.

Western reviews.review: Several tasters commented on the kinetic aspect of the flavors, the purity of the cherry-scented fruits, its depth of gentle tannins and high notes of violets and roses lending contrast and energy.
Western reviews.translation: 多位品酒者都提到了酒的风味动态性，清澈的樱桃香气，柔和的苦味和高调的紫罗兰和玫瑰花香，形成了对比和动力。

Western reviews.review: Made with a blend of fruit from Wrattonbully, Padthaway, McLaren Vale, Coonawarra and Langhorne Creek, the 2012 Bin 407 Cabernet Sauvignon has a deep garnet color with a hint of purple and a nose exuding warm blackberry compote notes, blueberry preserves, spice cake and mocha plus a touch of menthol. Medium to full-bodied, it offers mouth-filling black berry and cassis flavors with a touch of mint, a crisp line of acid and firm grainy tannins to shape the long finish.
Western reviews.translation: 本款2012年Bin 407卡波内尔酒（Cabernet Sauvignon）以来自沃特顿布利（Wrattonbully）、帕德瑟威（Padthaway）、麦克劳伦谷（McLaren Vale）、库纳瓦拉（Coonawarra）和朗霍恩克里克（Langhorne Creek）五个地区的葡萄混合酿造而成。酒液呈深红色，带有浅紫色，酒香中充满了烤黑莓、蓝莓果酱、香料蛋糕和摩卡的味道，伴有薄荷的微妙气息。口感中等到中厚，酒液中充满了黑莓和黑加仑的味道，伴有薄荷的微妙气息，酸度清晰，坚实的砂粒般的纹理使得酒尾延长。

Western reviews.review: One of top Cabernet wines on the marquee, the 2012 Penfolds Bin 407 Cabernet Sauvignon nicely defines the category. Shows a lot of bold, black fruit and a strong note of barrel at the moment (a bit of coconut in the mid-range). Time will be really fine for this one, making it one of the world's best values for a serious cellaring wine. Whenever I look for top cabernets, I always put this one on my shopping list. I would pair this one with a well-marbled rib eye of beef. (Tasted: April 18, 2015, San Francisco, CA)
Western reviews.translation: 这款2012年Penfolds Bin 407红酒是当中最顶级的卡贝网酒之一。它以黑色果味和强烈的木桶味（中段有椰子味）而闻名。随着时间的推移，这款酒将会越来越好，成为世界上最好的储存红酒之一。每当我寻找顶级卡贝网酒时，我都会把这款放在购物清单上。建议与高质量的牛排（如带有多层脂肪的牛排）一起食用。

Western reviews.review: Taut, focused and juicy, with blackberry and black currant fruit. Hints of tar and sage-seasoned meat add interest to the flavor profile as the finish persists against moderate tannins
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感紧致、集中且充满水果味，主要是黑莓和黑currant。酒中还带有焦炭和用sage调味的肉类味道，给了酒的风味带来新的层次。酒尾持久，口感中等的苦味。

Chinese pairs.original: 野生夏日浆果、甘草和烟草的风味，复杂辛辣的酒体，该酒略显粗犷。
Chinese pairs.new: Wild summer fruit, honey, and tobacco flavors, with a complex, spicy body, this wine is a bit rustic.

Western reviews.review: Zinfandel's briary, brambly personality is front and center on this wine, which wears its slightly rustic cloak proudly. It's the quintessential California Zin, dry, complex and peppery, offering a profusion of wild summer berry, licorice and tobacco flavors. One of the great successes of the vintage.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒展现出浓郁的浓果风味，带有坚果和烟草的复杂性。它是典型的加州辛法兰德酒，干性、复杂、带有辣味，展现出丰富的夏季野果、 licorice 和烟草风味。是当年产量中的一大成功。

Chinese pairs.original: 具有丰富复杂的成熟黑莓、覆盆子、黑樱桃、黑巧克力、药草的香气，口感饱满，单宁圆润，余味长并带有淡淡的甘草和香草味。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich and complex aromas of mature blackberry, blackberry, black cherry, dark chocolate, and herbal notes. Full-bodied with smooth tannins, a long finish, and subtle hints of licorice and vanilla.

Western reviews.review: Ripe, floral aromas of blackberry and minerals filter into a grapy, grabby palate. Flavors of iodine, licorice, black plum and cassis finish salty and leathery tasting, with a firm tannic grip and rubbery notes. This is short on refinement but generous in terms of body and fruit content.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有成熟的花香，黑莓和矿物质的气味。口感浓郁，果实丰富。口感中还可以感受到盐味和皮革味。口感坚实，具有坚实的苦味和橡胶味。虽然这款红酒不够精致，但它的体积和果实含量却非常丰富。

Chinese pairs.original: 复杂的红色果实香气，味道浓郁，内敛而有深度，丹宁甜美而平衡，口感饱满，和谐典雅！
Chinese pairs.new: Complex red fruit aromas, rich and intense flavors, with a deep and subtle character, sweet and balanced tannins, full-bodied and harmonious.

Western reviews.review: A cool year, although not as much as 2002, which produced an elegant and taut Sassicaia. The color is a bright garnet and the aromas balsamic, ‘Bordeaux-esque’, with notes of eucalyptus, bon bon anglais (chocolate and mint), blackcurrant and sweet spice. The mouthfeel is taut with a nice acidity that makes it agile and nicely drinkable. The finish is subtle yet persistent.
Western reviews.translation: 一个凉爽的年份，尽管不如2002年那样冷，后者生产了一个优雅而紧致的萨西卡亚。酒液呈亮红色，气味浓郁，带有巴尔萨米克香气，类似于波尔多风格，伴有柠檬香，英式巧克力和薄荷香，黑加仑和甜香料。口感紧致，带有适度的酸度，使其灵活且口感良好。尾韵细腻但持久。

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Rubingranat, violette Reflexe. Deutlich nach Karamell, Stollwerck, zart nach reifer Banane. Sehr süß und eher weich in der Textur, frisch und bereits sehr gut antrinkbar, charmant, mineralischer Nachhall, eleganter Speisenbegleiter.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光。酒中有明显的焦糖、巧克力糖果和成熟香蕉的味道。酒口非常甜，口感柔软，新鲜且已经非常容易入口，具有迷人的矿物质余味，适合精致的食物配对。

Chinese pairs.original: 带来黑醋栗，摩卡，甘草，甜烟草，鼠尾草，亚洲香料和烟熏橡木的香气，优雅，余味悠长，草本和矿物的回味。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of black prune, mocha, licorice, sweet tobacco, sage, Asian spices, and smoked oak unfold elegantly, lingering with herbal and mineral notes.

Western reviews.review: Black currant richness expands beyond the tailored restraint of this wine's structure, giving a sense of elegance and generosity at once. The tannins have a crisp cut, the fruit plenty of juice. A pungent hint of tobacco and herbs places it with roast lamb.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的结构优雅而富有体贴，黑currant的丰富感超出了它的控制，给人一种优雅和慷慨的感觉。酒中的tanin有清脆的味道，果味丰富多汁。酒中有一丝浓郁的烟草和香草味，非常适合与烤羊肉搭配。

Western reviews.review: An appealing wine showing likeable softness and flashy flavors. The palate brings cassis, mocha, licorice, sweet tobacco, sage, Asian spice and smoky oak; finisheds long and rich. Notable for its superb structure.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有可爱的柔软感和闪亮的口感。口感中带有黑加仑、摩卡、甘草、甜烟草、山楂、亚洲香料和烟熏橡木的味道，口感长且丰富。值得注意的是，这款红酒的结构非常出色。

Chinese pairs.original: 这款酒优雅、清晰的香气充满香料、花香和黑樱桃味。口感展现一贯的通透和新鲜，以及锐利的酸度，一并延续到那富有活泼果味的回味中。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts an elegant and crisp aroma, filled with spices, floral notes and black cherry flavors. The palate presents a consistent transparency and freshness, accompanied by a sharp acidity, which continues through to the lively fruit flavors in the finish.

English pairs.original: The refined and precise sniff was full of spices, flowers and black cherry. The mouthfeel showed hallmark brightness and freshness as well as keen acid, all concluding in a fruity and vivid finish.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的气味精致细致，充满了香料、花朵和黑樱桃的芬芳。口感清新明亮，酸度清晰，结尾果香浓郁，生动鲜活。

Western reviews.review: This blends 56% Cabernet Sauvignon, 15% Merlot, 11% Cabernet Franc, 11% Malbec and 7% Petit Verdot. Tight-grained tannin structure dominates a full-bodied brawny expression of wood and oak as well as ripe cherry, clove and cinnamon.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的混合比例为：卡波涅尔·沙维尼昂占56%，梅洛占15%，卡波涅尔·法兰克占11%，马尔贝克占11%，佩蒂·维多占7%。紧密的纤维结构占据了木头和橡木的浓郁风味，以及成熟的樱桃、丁香和肉桂的风味。

Chinese pairs.original: 这是第二次和Sandra de Pury在酒庄一同品鉴了这款2010年份的酒。此酒的香气结合了新鲜和严肃，透出草莓、无花果、干花、岩石、烟熏和红色甘草味，伴有微微的黑巧克力、胡桃和松香。口感如预期般飘逸，新鲜、多汁的酸度增添了清晰、干净和活力。
Chinese pairs.new: This is the second time I've tasted this 2010 vintage with Sandra de Pury at the winery. The aroma combines freshness and seriousness, revealing notes of strawberry, quince, dried flowers, stone, smokiness and red licorice, accompanied by subtle hints of dark chocolate, hazelnut and pine. The palate is as expected, with a silky texture, fresh and juicy acidity that adds clarity, dryness and vitality.

English pairs.original: It's the second time to taste the 2010 with Sandra de Pury at the winery. The aroma combined the freshness and austerity, sniffing of strawberry, fig, dried flower, stone, smoke and red liquorice, with a tinge of black chocolate, walnut and resin. Expectedly ethereal, with freshly juicy acid that added the precision, cleanness and vibrancy.
English pairs.new: 这是我第二次品尝2010年的酒款，和Sandra de Pury一起在酒庄品酒。酒中融合了新鲜和严谨的气息，闻起来有草莓、枣子、干花、石头、烟雾和红糖浆的味道，伴有黑巧克力、核桃和树脂的余味。酒的味道清晰、精确、生动，带有新鲜的酸度，令人感到神秘而优雅。

Western reviews.review: From a historic, traditional winery and a fantastic Yarra Valley vintage, this is in top form. It's more intense and tightly structured than the '18 vintage, suggesting a long life ahead. Heady aromas of raspberry tea and plum preserve are followed swiftly by cedar, clove and sweet but subtle mocha oak. The palate displays elegance, finesse and a sense of place. The juicy blueberry and plum fruit is wound in beautifully textured spicy tannins. Drink now–2040. Christina Pickard
Western reviews.translation: 来自历史悠久的传统酒庄和出色的亚拉谷（Yarra Valley）产季，这款红酒表现出顶级的水平。它比2018年产季更浓郁、结构紧密，预示着长期的生命力。酒中充满了浓郁的红莓茶和浆果酱香气，紧接着是松木、丁香和甜但细微的摩卡橡木香气。口感优雅、细致、具有地方特征。酒中充满了 juicy 蓝莓和浆果的果味，纠缠在一起的细腻的辣椒类鞣质中。建议立即饮用至2040年。 Christina Pickard.

Chinese pairs.original: 带有的黑醋栗和李子风味虽然伴有香草和雪松的味道，但是仍然略显肥腻，盖过了其中的梅子风味。
Chinese pairs.new: The plum and prune notes are accompanied by hints of lavender and pine, but still feel slightly heavy and overpower the underlying cherry flavors.

Western reviews.review: Open black berry jam, blueberry, floral, black licorice, black olive, vanilla, chocolate, and tobacco and resin aromas. Full, rich, ripe and intense palate with some smooth, grainy tannins. Coffee, licorice, resin, tobacco, cassis, black berry jam, savoury, peppery, vanilla and dried herb flavours. Long, smoky bacon, cassis and rosemary finish. Still youthful, needs 3-7 years. Very fine, rich, warm 389 with balance. One to keep. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中包含了黑莓果酱、蓝莓、花朵、黑甘草、黑橄榄、香草、巧克力和烟草和树脂等复杂的气味。口感丰富、富有层次、成熟且强烈，具有些许光滑的、颗粒性的纤维。口感中包含了咖啡、甘草、树脂、烟草、黑加索、黑莓果酱、咸味、辣味、香草和干燥的香草等多种复杂的风味。长长的、烟熏的培根、黑加索和罗勒的尾韵。仍然年轻，需要3-7年才能达到最佳状态。非常精致、丰富、温暖的389，具有完美的平衡。值得收藏。

Chinese pairs.original: 相比2009和2012年份更新鲜、优雅。生姜、干花和咸矿物的香气延续到了那富有质地、高酸度和异常顺滑单宁的口感。
