Chinese pairs.new: Compared to the 2009 and 2012 vintages, this wine is fresher and more elegant. Notes of ginger, dried flowers, and salty minerals carry through to the rich, high-acid palate with exceptionally smooth tannins.

English pairs.original: Fresher and more elegant than the 2009 and the 2012 of the lineup. Ginger, dried flower and savoury-mineral aromas continued onto the acidic and textured palate that showed very smooth tannins.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒比2009年和2012年的版本更新鲜、更优雅。酒中带有姜、干花和矿物质的香气，口感酸度高、质地丰富，且有非常细腻的橡木味。

Western reviews.review: An intense high-octane wine, this bursts from the glass with aromas of ripe black current, black cherries, mocha and Middle Eastern spices, including tangy sumac. Tannins are powerful and tightly wound around plump tangy currant fruit and more earthy sumac spice. This wine needs protein now but mostly it needs time. Drink now, with plenty of time in decanter and through 2034. Christina Pickard
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒强烈而高能量，酒香中充满了成熟的黑加仑、黑草莓、摩卡和中东风味，包括有刺激的苏马克。酒中的纤维素强烈且紧紧包裹着丰富的黑加仑果肉和更为泥土的苏马克风味。这款红酒现在需要配以蛋白质食物，但更多的是需要时间。建议现在饮用，放置在酒壶中并且可以持续到2034年。- Christina Pickard。

Western reviews.review: There's lots for big red drinkers to like about this wine. It offers a mélange of licorice, plush dark berries, coffee and chocolate notes, with a prominent earthy core of something smoky and charred, like the dying embers of a campfire. It's full bodied but restrained, with a nice line of acidity and ultrafine sinewy and savory tannins. There's enough structure to back the juicy berry fruit. Drink 2020–2034. Christina Pickard
Western reviews.translation: 这个红酒对喜欢大型红酒的消费者来说是一个很好的选择。它带来了一系列的口感，包括 licorice、浓郁的黑berries、咖啡和巧克力等，伴随着一股浓郁的土味和像篝火余烬一样的烟熏味。酒体丰富但控制在合适范围内，酸度清晰，纤维细腻，口感丰富。酒中的结构能够支撑果实的甜度。建议饮用时间：2020-2034年。 - Christina Pickard

bodegas r.lopez de heredia vina tondonia.name: bodegas r.lopez de heredia vina tondonia reserva 2001

Chinese pairs.original: 酒体呈现红宝石色泽，带有明显但却平衡的香草、蓝莓、紫罗兰和矿物气息，无论是香气还是口感，都能够感受到干净的矿物质，中等酒体，单宁中等偏上，酸度中等偏上，这支优雅且别具一格的酒款带有悠长的矿物质余韵。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine presents a deep ruby hue, with pronounced yet balanced aromas of grass, blueberry, lavender, and mineral notes. Clean mineral undertones are evident in both the nose and palate. The medium-bodied wine has moderate tannins and acidity, finishing with a long, elegant mineral aftertaste.

English pairs.original: Ruby color, noticeable but balanced vanilla noses with blueberry, violet and mineral, clean minerality noticed on the nose remained perceptible on the palate, medium body, medium+ tannin, medium+ acidity, with a long mineral length, very elegant and distinctive.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色，酒香中有明显但平衡的香草味，伴有蓝莓、紫罗兰和矿物质的气息，酒口中清晰的矿物质味道持续存在。酒体中等，苦味和酸度均为中等以上，口感长且矿物质味道持久，非常优雅且独特。

Western reviews.review: Since when is the current red vintage on our shelves more than a dozen years old? Gracias Rioja. And especially the majestic Bodegas R. López de Heredia, the epitome of old school, timeless, individualistic and ritualistic winemaking. Their wines respect historic traditions, and released when ready to drink. Luckilly for us. This old vines Reserva (tempranillo, garnacha graciano, mazuelo) opens with worn books, old cherry wood and dried strawberries. The palate feels well-worn and welcoming: dried cherry, sweet wild strawberries, aged leather, dried rose petals, earthy salinity a lift of fresh cranberries and a thin rasp of bitter cherry tannins before the mineral-lingering finish. Classic, timeless and excellent value. (Treve Ring).
Western reviews.translation: 自从什么时候开始，我们店里的红酒都超过十几年了？感谢里奥哈（Rioja）。尤其是博德加斯·R·洛佩斯·德·赫雷迪亚（Bodegas R. López de Heredia），这是一家典型的老派葡萄酒厂，注重传统，注重品质，注重独特性。他们的葡萄酒尊严地遵循历史传统，等到成熟时才会释放。幸好对我们来说。这个老藤的储存版（Tempranillo, Garnacha, Graciano, Mazuelo）打开时，闻到旧书的味道，旧樱桃木的味道和干枯的草莓味道。口感舒适，像久经风雨的家：干枯的樱桃，甜的野草莓，陈年的皮革，干枯的玫瑰花瓣，泥土的咸味，新鲜的蔓越莓的味道和薄薄的苦樱桃的苦味，最后是矿物质的余味。经典，永恒，价格合理。

Western reviews.review: Colour: Rubí, brick rim edge;Aroma: cedar wood, sweet spices, ripe fruit, wild herbs, waxy notes;Flavour: powerful, flavourful, spicy, smoky aftertaste;Colour: Rubí, brick rim edge;Aroma: spicy, fine reductive notes, aged wood nuances, fruit liqueur notes, varnish;Flavour: spicy, fine tannins, elegant, long;Colour: Rubí, brick rim edge;Aroma: fine reductive notes, wet leather, aged wood nuances, fruit liqueur notes, complex;Flavour: spicy, fine tannins, elegant, long;
Western reviews.translation:
红酒评分：

颜色：深红色，边缘有砖红色光泽。

香气：樟木、甜香料、成熟水果、野生香草、蜡状香气。

口感：强烈、丰富、辣、烟熏味。

颜色：深红色，边缘有砖红色光泽。

香气：辣味、精致的还原性香气、老木香、果酒香气、漆油香气。

口感：辣味、细腻的苦味、优雅、持久。

颜色：深红色，边缘有砖红色光泽。

香气：精致的还原性香气、湿革、老木香、果酒香气、复杂。

口感：辣味、细腻的苦味、优雅、持久。

注：本评分适合中国消费者理解，内容不需要解释。

Western reviews.review: Noble, klare Frucht, rote Beeren mit feiner Würze und zarten Teer- und Lederaromen. Sehr eleganter Gaumen mit seidiger Textur und sehr feinen Tanninen, tolle Konzentra­tion, saftig, mit mineralisch-lebendigem Nerv, lang, schließt mit delikater Süße und wirkt noch immer sehr jung. Sehr langlebiger Rioja.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

优雅的、清澈的果香，红色浆果带有细微的辛香料和轻柔的树脂和皮革香味。口感优雅，滑顺的口感，非常细微的苦味，浓度极高，水分丰富，矿物质和活力充足，长长的尾部，结尾是细微的甜味，仍然显得非常年轻。是一款非常持久的里奥哈红酒。

Western reviews.review: (2011) 13% abv, Cork. Quite subdued, some creamy and earthy berries, but not exuberant. Nice little gamy notes have developed. The palate has a cherry and orange freshness, with a cool character and very nice balance, though perhaps the fruit could sing a little more, it has lovely elegance and length and will probably age extremely well.
Western reviews.translation: 2011年，13% alc，塞拉瓶。酒味相对低调，带有奶油和土壤的浆果味，但不夸张。酒中有了一些野味的香气。口感清新，带有樱桃和橙子的味道，酒体凉爽，平衡好，但可能还需要更多的果味来表现。酒有着优雅的风格和长尾，应该会在未来非常好地陈化。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有漂亮的干樱桃和干草药的香气，酒体饱满，单宁柔滑，余味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of dried cherry and hay, full-bodied with smooth tannins and a long finish.

Western reviews.review: This was the least convincing vintage of the 1980s and while it is an excellent wine, it came as a disappointment after the exceptional ’85. The ruby color has some garnet reflections and is of medium intensity. The aroma has a nice persistence with its notes of vanilla and red fruit but it lacks a bit of complexity. The mouthfeel is balanced and the tannins are still present but not aggressive, while the persistence of the aftertaste is not exceptional.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒是1980年代中最令人失望的一瓶。虽然它是一瓶非常出色的红酒，但它无法超越1985年的那瓶。酒液呈深红色，带有些微的 garnet色调，酒液浓度适中。酒香持久，带有香草和红果的味道，但缺乏一些复杂性。口感平衡，苦味仍然存在但不强烈，余味持久度不够突出。

bird in hand nest egg shiraz 2013.name: bird in hand nest egg shiraz 2013

Chinese pairs.original: 与Kym Milne在酒庄进行了一场Nest Egg Shiraz和Nest Egg Chardonnay的双垂直品鉴。深紫红色。此酒的香气在三小时后变得异常芬芳而且无比优雅，以黑莓、灌木、白花、咸矿物和香草味为主。咸味和矿物质感延续到了其酒体饱满同时滑爽的口感中，伴有大量纹理细致的单宁——为那巧克力般的收尾增添了怡人的丝滑；我同样也十分欣赏由生津的酸度所带来的清新感。
Chinese pairs.new: 我与Kym Milne在酒庄进行了一场Nest Egg Shiraz和Nest Egg Chardonnay的双垂直品鉴。深紫红色。酒的香气在三小时后变得异常芬芳而且无比优雅，以黑莓、灌木、白花、咸矿物和香草味为主。酒体饱满同时滑爽，伴有大量纹理细致的单宁，为巧克力般的收尾增添了怡人的丝滑；生津的酸度也带来了清新感。

English pairs.original: Doing a double vertical tasting (Nest Egg Shiraz and Nest Egg Chardonnay) with Kym Milne at the winery. Dark purple-red. The scent became very perfumed and surprisingly refined after three hours, where the predominant elements were blackberry, scrub, white flowers, savoury-mineral and vanilla. The salinity and minerality continued onto the palate that was full-bodied and polished, with loads of fine-grained tannins that added admirable smoothness to the chocolate-like finale; I also liked the refreshment generated from the mouth-watering acidity.
English pairs.new: 与Kym Milne一起在酒庄进行了双重垂直品鉴（Nest Egg Shiraz和Nest Egg Chardonnay）。酒液呈深紫红色。三小时后，酒香变得非常芬芳且令人惊讶地精致，主要元素包括黑莓、灌木丛、白花、咸味矿物质和香草。口感中仍然保留了盐度和矿物质，酒体丰富而光滑，具有大量细致的纤维，纤维为巧克力般的尾部带来可敬的光滑感；我也喜欢口水流出的酸度带来的清新感。

Western reviews.review: This Adelaide Hills Shiraz shows its cooler climate roots with its restrained nature and medium-body. A bouquet of plum pudding, mint jelly and dried green herbs is knit together by dusty, savory tannins. Christina Pickard
Western reviews.translation: 阿德莱德山区的雪利酒展现出其凉爽气候的特点，表现出谨慎的性格和中等体积。酒中有浓郁的浆果、薄荷糖和干燥的绿色香草的香气，受到干燥、咸味的橡木酯的连接。- Christina Pickard

Chinese pairs.original: 在橡木桶内使用野生酵母进行发酵；不添加二氧化硫。此酒芬芳、新鲜的香气透出金银花、碾碎的柠檬皮、杏、黄苹果、柚子和岩石味。中等偏上的酒体，伴有干净的酸度及清晰的矿物质。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine undergoes fermentation using wild yeast in oak barrels and is not sulfured. It boasts a fragrant and fresh bouquet of jasmine, crushed lemon peel, apricot, golden apple, orange blossom and a hint of minerality. The medium-plus body is accompanied by crisp acidity and clear minerality.

English pairs.original: Fermenting in the oak barrels with wild yeast; without SO2. Fragrantly fresh aromas of honeysuckle, crushed lemon peel, apricot, yellow apple, pomelo and stone. Medium plus body, with clean acidity and precise minerality.
English pairs.new: 在橡木桶中使用野生酵母发酵；无SO2。honeysuckle、柠檬皮、杏子、黄苹果、橙子和石头的清新香气。中等以上的体积，清晰的酸度和精确的矿物质。

Western reviews.review: This pale gold wine offers a nose of ripe orchard fruit, fresh spring blossoms, honey and a touch of salted nuts. The palate is quite ripe and oily in texture, with more nuttiness. There's enough acidity to keep this from feeling flabby, but just barely. Christina Pickard
Western reviews.translation: 这款金色葡萄酒具有成熟的果园果味、春天的花朵香气、蜂蜜和一丝盐味坚果的鼻子。口感丰富、油腻，坚果味更加浓郁。虽然有足够的酸度避免口感过于松软，但仅此而已。- Christina Pickard

Chinese pairs.original: 散发着诱人的黑莓酱、甘草和草莓的香气；酒体丰满，单宁含量高，但丝滑柔顺；余味悠长，带有果香。整体上讲，这款酒果味突出，酸爽提神，令人振奋。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts alluring aromas of blackberry jam, honey, and strawberry. The full-bodied texture is smooth and silky, with high tannin levels. The finish is long and fruity, leaving a refreshing and invigorating taste. Overall, this wine is a standout for its bold fruit flavors, crisp acidity, and energizing effect.

Western reviews.review: An impressive Solaia nose. Cassis, floral, meaty, saddle leather, tobacco, smoky game notes with vanilla, barnyard and coffee aromas. Ripe, rich, round, supple, slightly grainy, chalky tannins. Vanilla, coffee, peppery, meaty, smoky, cassis, black cherry, eucalyptus, floral, mineral, tobacco, leather flavours. Long, fat, rich finish if a bit warm but good acidity balance. Will improve with 5-7 years bottle aging but drinkable now with beef or veal steak. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶出色的索拉亚红酒。酒鼻子中充满了黑加斯（黑加斯果实）、花香、肉香、马鞍革、烟草、烟熏野味的气息，还有香草、谷仓和咖啡的香味。口感丰富、圆润、细腻、略带砂粒、矿物质的牙齿感。口味中有香草、咖啡、辣椒、肉香、烟熏、黑加斯、黑樱桃、桉树、花香、矿物质、烟草、革类的味道。酒尾长长、丰富、圆润，如果略带温暖，但酸度平衡良好。如果放置5-7年，酒会更好，但现在也可以与牛排或牛排一起饮用。

Western reviews.review: Despite the heat, this vintage lives up to the Solaia reputation with a slightly more ripe rendition. Toasted and oak spice aromas hit the nose first followed by strawberry and blackberry preserves. The elegance is not lost and the wine performs nicely in the mouth with chewy succulence, dusty tannins and a long finish.
Western reviews.translation: 尽管夏天的炎热，这款酒依然符合Solaia的品质，呈现出更为成熟的风格。酒香中首先出现的烤面包和橡木香味，随后是草莓和黑莓果酱的甜美气息。酒的优雅感并未丧失，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感丰富，口感

Robert Mondavi Winery Reserve Cabernet S.name: Robert Mondavi Winery Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon Napa Valley 2009

Chinese pairs.original: 浓郁的黑色樱桃和黑醋栗的果味，结合了黑巧克力、茴芹和月桂叶的香气。单宁强烈，入口柔顺，收结悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich black cherry and black plum fruit flavors, combined with notes of dark chocolate, anise, and bay leaf. Strong tannins, smooth entry, long finish.

Western reviews.review: Black pepper, spicy, blackberry, cassis, coffee, vanilla, cedar, tobacco and black olive aromas. Dry, rich, full, concentrated palate with grainy tannins. Warm and juicy with black berry, cassis, coffee, vanilla, smoky leather, black pepper, earthy, tobacco, minty, black olive flavours. Good concentration and intensity with a few herbal notes. Still young, needs 3-7 years to develop. A blend of 88 cabernet sauvignon and the rest mixes cabernet franc and petit verdot. Impressive Napa style you can serve with your favourite cut of steak. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的香气中包含了黑胡椒、辣味、黑莓、黑加斯、咖啡、香草、红檜、烟草和黑橄榄的味道。

口感干、丰富、饱满、浓缩，具有砂粒般的苦味。

口感中包含了黑莓、黑加斯、咖啡、香草、烟熏皮革、黑胡椒、泥土、烟草、薄荷和黑橄榄的味道。

这瓶红酒的浓度和强度很好，伴有几种草药味。

这瓶红酒还比较年轻，需要3-7年才能发挥最佳效果。

这瓶红酒是由88%的卡伯涅特·索维涅和其他混合的卡伯涅特·法兰克和佩蒂特·韦多特组成的。

这瓶红酒的风格很出色，可以与您喜爱的牛排一起享用。

Western reviews.review: Tiefdunkles Rubingranat, opaker Kern, violette Reflexe, zarter Wasserrand. Anklänge von feiner Minze, Brombeeren und Cassis, noch etwas verhalten. Am Gaumen engmaschig, komplex, schwarzes Waldbeerkonfit, perfekte Tannine, von frischer Säurestruktur getragen, wirkt noch extrem jung, zeigt eine tolle Länge und Mineralik, sollte man unbedingt weiter reifen lassen. Ab 2018 antrinken, verfügt über sicheres Reifepotenzial.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，透明的葡萄核，紫色反光，细微的水线。酒中有细微的薄荷、黑莓和黑加仑的气息，味道还不明显。口感紧密复杂，黑莓酱的味道，完美的牙齿感觉，由新鲜的酸性结构支撑，感觉仍然非常年轻，展现出出色的长度和矿物质感，建议继续陈化。从2018年开始饮用，具有可靠的陈化潜力。

Chinese pairs.original: 这款芬芳、甜美同时怡人、活泼的黑品诺展现优雅的质地和漂亮的酸度，伴有以矿物质打底的红色水果（树莓、草莓）、甜香料（桂皮、红色甘草）、干花、树丛、白巧克力和奶油蛋糕蛋糕香气。
Chinese pairs.new: This fragrant, sweet and lively black wine showcases elegant texture and beautiful acidity, accompanied by red fruit notes (raspberry, strawberry) on a mineral base, sweet spices (cinnamon, red licorice), dried flowers, underbrush, white chocolate and creamy cake aromas.

English pairs.original: This fragrantly sweet and delightfully vivacious Pinot Noir was elegantly textured and beautifully acidic, with aromas of red fruits (raspberry, strawberry), sweet spices (cinnamon, red liquorice), dried flower, underbush, white chocolate, cream cake and underlying mineral.
English pairs.new: 这款美丽的红酒具有强烈的香气和甜美的口感，具有优雅的口感和美丽的酸度。它的香气中包含了红果味（草莓、莓果）、甜香料（肉桂、红糖浆）、干花、灌木丛、白巧克力、奶油蛋糕和矿物质的味道。

Western reviews.review: This has very attractive, ripe red-cherry and plum aromas with spicy and sappy complexity, sitting in such a pure mode. The palate has a very composed and compact, layered feel with pristine blueberry, dark-cherry and plum flavors, delivered in an elegant, regal style. From biodynamically grown grapes. Drink or hold.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有非常吸引人的浓郁红樱桃和浓郁黑桃果味，带有复杂的香料和胶质感，呈现出纯粹的风格。口感紧致、层次分明，呈现出清新的蓝莓、黑樱桃和黑桃果味，呈现出优雅、王室的风格。来自生物动力耕种的葡萄。适合 immediate 或保留。

Western reviews.review: The 2017 Burn Cottage Vineyard Pinot Noir shows considerable intensity and length, but it starts off with charming floral notes, hints of thyme and cedar and lashings of black cherries. It's that elusive combination of concentration and complexity, wrapped in a silky coat of ripe tannins, that raises this wine to the next level. It should drink well for a decade or more.
Western reviews.translation: 2017年Burn Cottage Vineyard的品诺特红酒展现出显著的强度和持久性，但它以迷人的花香开场，带有薄荷和松木的微妙气息和黑樱桃的浓郁风味。这种难以捉摸的结合，浓缩和复杂的风味，包裹在成熟的鞣质的细致外衣中，使得这款酒上升到新的高度。它应该在十年或更长时间内保持品质。

Western reviews.review: If you thought Central Otago was all about bright, fruit-driven Pinot, then get this in your glass. This biodynamic vineyard overlooking Cromwell has produced a mellow, savoury and nuanced expression with the most beautifully handled tannins of the vintage - they are mouthcoating yet provide structure in combination with the fresh acidity.
Western reviews.translation: 如果你认为中央奥塔戈（Central Otago）红酒都是以鲜果味为主的品种，那么就让这个葡萄园的红酒进入你的玻璃吧。这个生物动力（biodynamic）葡萄园位于克罗默威尔（Cromwell）附近，生产出了一种温和、咸味、细腻的口感，酒中的天然纤维（tannins）处理得非常出色，既能给口感丰富的感觉，又能与新鲜的酸度相结合，提供结构。

Chinese pairs.original: 2013年份将成熟馥郁和草本清凉完美地合二为一，在它丰润的酒体中，似乎藏着一个五彩的万花筒，醇厚的单宁、丰满的果香、高级的咸感、平和的烘焙… 它们在你的味蕾上不断变换色彩，折射出七彩光芒。我喜欢2013年份的沉稳和专注，也喜欢它的落落大方，在我看来，这才是气质型澳洲葡萄酒该有的模样。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2013 vintage perfectly balances its rich, herbaceous freshness, like a kaleidoscope hidden within its plush body. Luscious tannins, full-bodied fruit flavors, refined saltiness, and subtle baking notes dance across your palate, radiating a kaleidoscope of colors. I adore the 2013's poise and focus, and its effortless elegance – to me, this is what a sophisticated Australian wine should be.

English pairs.original: The 2013 vintage masterfully blends mature richness with herbal freshness, akin to a kaleidoscope hidden within its voluptuous body. Its rich tannins, ripe fruitiness, sophisticated salinity, and gentle toasting continually shift hues on your palate, refracting into a spectrum of colors. I admire the 2013 vintage for its composure and focus, as well as its generous nature; in my opinion, this is the epitome of an Australian wine with character.
English pairs.new: 2013年产的这款红酒，完美地融合了成熟的丰富感和草药般的清新感，犹如一面色彩斑斓的风景画，隐藏在其丰满的身体中。其丰富的苦味、成熟的果味、复杂的矿物质感和温和的烤感不断在口中变化，呈现出多彩的色彩。 我对2013年产的这款红酒赞赏不已，尤其是它的沉着和专注，以及其慷慨的性格；在我看来，这是澳大利亚酒类中最具特色的代表。

Western reviews.review: Plenty of distinctive cabernet character, all black olive and cassis, dusty oak notes and a gently leafy undertone, some redder fruits too. The palate's assertive, taut and crunchy, this is an upbeat cabernet with attractive purity, oak rides in time with the fruit, cassis and hints of chocolate. Acidity stretches the finish, tannins frame it straight and true. Best from 2018.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒具有典型的卡贝网特征，黑橄榄和黑加思（一种黑色水果）味道浓郁，带有干酪味的橡木和轻微的叶子味道。还有一些红色水果的味道。口感坚实、紧致、清脆，这是一瓶充满活力的卡贝网，具有吸引人的纯粹度，橡木和水果的味道完美融合，黑加思和巧克力味道也很明显。酸度延长了尾部，纤维素框架稳固，完美。建议从2018年开始饮用。

Western reviews.review: One of the world's most beautiful expressions of Cabernet Sauvignon, the 2013 Penfolds Bin 407 shows up with fine and persistent aromas and flavors—ripe red fruits, delicate savory herbs and pleasing black earth notes. The wine's long finish invites a pairing with a well-aged white cheddar. Drinking pretty well now. (Tasted: May 9, 2016, San Francisco, CA)
Western reviews.translation: 世界上最美丽的卡贝网酒之一，2013年品福伦斯宾407展现出细致而持久的香气和口感——成熟的红果味、细致的香草味和令人愉悦的黑土味。酒精的长尾巴邀请您与成熟的白奶酪一起享用。目前口感相当不错。 (品尝时间：2016年5月9日，美国加州旧金山)

Western reviews.review: Deep garnet-purple colored, the 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon Bin 407 opens with notes of menthol, eucalyptus, blackcurrant cordial and black cherry pie plus underlying cedar, toast and dark chocolate hints. Full, generously fruited and wonderfully forward with firm tannins and lively acidity, it offers a beautiful expression of the best of South Australia Cabernet. Range: 91(+?)
Western reviews.translation: 2013 Bin 407 卡比ernet Sauvignon 的颜色是深红紫色。酒中的香气包括薄荷、桉树、黑加仑和黑樱桃派，伴有暗木、烤面包和巧克力的微妙气息。酒口丰富、果实丰富、前景广阔，具有坚实的纤维和活跃的酸度，展现了南澳大利亚卡比ernet的最佳风貌。评分：91(+?)

Western reviews.review: A perfumy note adds some grace to the juicy, minty blackberry and blueberry flavors, with a pleasantly chewy tannic backbone and plenty of licorice and Earl Grey tea accents. Lingers on the finish. Drink now through 2030.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中加入了一些花香，完美地融合了黑莓和蓝莓的浓郁口感和清新薄荷的味道。酒中还带有 licorice 和 Earl Grey 茶的香气，口感丰富且有嚼劲。酒尾留有持久的余味。建议尽快享用，至2030年最佳。

Villa Maria Reserve Merlot Cabernet Sauv.name: Villa Maria Reserve Merlot Cabernet Sauvignon 2009

Chinese pairs.original: 带有甜浆果、咖啡、石墨和干药草的香气和风味，凝练迷人，单宁细腻，果味同橡木味紧密融合，余味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas and flavors of sweet fruit, coffee, graphite, and dry herbs, concentrated and captivating, with refined tannins and a seamless integration of fruit and oak notes, leading to a long and lingering finish.

Western reviews.review: Over the past several vintages, Villa's tannin management in its Reserve Cab-Merlot has evolved to make the wines more approachable young. This blend ofCabernet andMerlot is fleshy and supple without being soft, with leafy cassis fruit framed by hints of vanilla and charred oak. Drink now–2023.
Western reviews.translation: 在过去的几年中，维拉(Villa)在其储备系列的卡布ernet和梅洛(Cab-Merlot)的鞣质管理方面有了进步，使得这些酒更容易在年轻时品尝。这款由卡布ernet和梅洛组成的酒，富有肉感和柔软，但不至于软弱，带有叶绿的黑加仑果实和焦香的香气。建议立即饮用至2023年。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有红色浆果，紫罗兰和香料的气息，口感紧实，单宁饱满，辛辣的回味。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of red fruit, lavender, and spices, with a firm texture, full tannins, and a spicy finish.

Western reviews.review: Glänzendes, sattes Rubingranat. Fein gezeichnete Nase, intensiv und klar, Noten nach Kirschen, etwas eingelegter Pfirsich, Himbeere, einladend. Stoffig und satt am Gaumen, zeigt viel dichtmaschiges Tannin, breitet sich lange aus, saftige Frucht, im hinteren Bereich fest und zupackend, wirkt noch sehr jung, hat beste Anlagen.
Western reviews.translation:
这是一篇红酒评论的翻译：

闪亮的、浓郁的红色葡萄酒色。细致的鼻子，强烈而清晰，带有浓郁的樱桃、略微腌制的桃子、蓝莓的香味，非常诱人。口感丰富、浓郁，展现出密集的橡木味，长时间持久，带有浓郁的水果味，后端坚实、果断，感觉非常年轻，具有极好的前景。

Western reviews.review: Gaja's latest Barbaresco shows deep aromatic layers of ripe fruit, leather, black licorice, dried herb and savory tobacco. It is extremely velvety and smooth, with firm tannins and a richly extracted fruit finish.
Western reviews.translation: 加雅最新的巴巴雷斯科红酒展现出深度的香气层次，包括成熟的水果、皮革、黑甘草、干燥的香草和浓郁的烟草。它极其细腻和光滑，具有坚实的纤维和浓郁的果肉尾韵。

Chinese pairs.original: 散发着浓郁的烟熏、鼠尾草和成熟水果的香气；酒体丰满，单宁丝滑柔顺，口感耐嚼；余味悠长干涩。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich smoke, sage, and mature fruit aromas waft from the glass. The full-bodied wine coats the palate with smooth, velvety tannins and a lingering, dry finish.

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges Rubingranat, violette Reflexe. Tabakig-würzig unterlegte Zwetschkenfrucht, ein Hauch von Himbeeren. Mittlere Textur, rassig und gut anhaltend, feine Weichselfrucht im Abgang, mineralisch, die lebendige Säurestruktur wird den Wein noch lange tragen.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光。烟熏味和浆果味的浆果味，微微带有草莓味。中等体积，坚实而持久，尾部有细微的软果味，矿物质，活跃的酸性结构将使葡萄酒长久存在。

Chinese pairs.original: 2017年份的香气相当开放，蓝莓、黑樱桃、桑果的香气在摇杯的瞬间就开始奏响了远航的号角。甘草、丁香、桂皮的辛香气息在果香身后推波助澜，巧妙地营造出略带辛辣的层次感。这款酒对单宁的打磨堪称经典，其沉稳而细密的质地充分展现出了热产区赤霞珠的的醇熟感，看的出来酿酒团队对品控的要求相当高。
Chinese pairs.new: The 2017 vintage is remarkably open, with blueberry, black cherry and plum aromas bursting forth as soon as the glass is swirled. A subtle wave of sweetness from licorice, cinnamon and nutmeg follows, adding depth and complexity to the fruit. This wine's tannins are expertly polished, showcasing the rich, velvety texture that's characteristic of the region's Cabernet Sauvignon. It's clear that the winemaking team has high standards for quality control.

English pairs.original: The aroma of the 2017 vintage is quite open, with scents of blueberries, black cherries, and mulberries heralding the journey the moment you swirl the glass. Notes of licorice, cloves, and cinnamon add a hint of spiciness behind the fruitiness, cleverly creating a multi-layered texture on the palate. The classic refinement in the tannins fully demonstrates the maturity of Cabernet Sauvignon from a hot climate, a testament to the rigorous quality control.
English pairs.new: 2017年产的红酒气味相当开阔，蓝莓、黑樱桃和桑椹的香气在旋转酒杯时立即呈现出来。 licorice、丁香和肉桂的香气在后面添加了一丝辛辣的味道，巧妙地在口感中创造了多层次的质感。Cabernet Sauvignon在炎热气候下的成熟度被典型的精致的纽扣完美体现出来，这是对严格质量控制的证明。

Western reviews.review: This has a duality between some cooler-climate sourcing (some downgraded Bin 707 material went here) and warmer-region fruit from McLaren Vale and the Barossa, delivering impressive flesh and fruit weight. Really builds and fills and holds a wide-open finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有双重性质，部分来自冷气候地区（一些降级的Bin 707原料被运用到这里），部分来自麦克劳伦谷和巴罗萨地区的暖气候地区果实，呈现出令人印象深刻的肉感和果实重量。酒精度确地建构并充盈，展现出宽敞的开阔尾部。

Western reviews.review: This is a strong vintage of Bin 407, a multiregional South Australian Cab. It opens with aromas of chocolate, cola, plush plum and black cherry, backed by accents of mint and other crushed herbs. On the palate, fine, chalky tannins slink around silky fruit and savory herbs. Poised and harmonious, this has the potential to age until 2030, but is drinking well right now
Western reviews.translation: 这是407系列的强劲一款，来自南澳大利亚的多地区酿造的卡波涅什红酒。酒体开启时，释放出巧克力、可乐、浓郁的浆果和黑樱桃的芳香，伴随着薄荷和其他碎叶香的点缀。口感上，细致的石灰质纤维素在滑顺的果肉和咸淡的香草之间流动。这种平衡和谐的风格有潜力在2030年之前继续成熟，但现在也已经可以品尝。

Western reviews.review: Supple currant ripeness centers this latest vintage of Bin 407, the less-ambitious sibling of 707. It’s dark and formally structured, the substantial oak notes completely saturated by velvety plum-skin richness. The clean fruit lasts, with cabernet’s herbal identity present, the wine ringing clear as a bell. This should mature well over the next decade.
Western reviews.translation: 本次Bin 407的新一代，依然以丰富的黑currant为主。相比于其兄长Bin 707，这个版本更为低调。酒中充满了黑暗的结构和丰富的橡木味，然而这些都被浓郁的黑杏仁味所淹没。清澈的果味持续存在，Cabernet Sauvignon的草药特征也清晰可辨。酒体丰富，结构紧致，预计未来十年会逐渐成熟。

Western reviews.review: Another beautiful effort in the lineup this year is the 2017 Cabernet Sauvignon Bin 407, which is a multi-region cuvée brought up in both French and American oak hogsheads. Classic notes of blackcurrants and cassis interwoven with hints of dill, tobacco, and graphite all flow to a full-bodied Cabernet Sauvignon that’s fabulously balanced, with good acidity as well as ripe tannins. Give bottles another year or two and it should cruise for a decade or more.
Western reviews.translation: 今年的系列中又一美丽的作品是2017年卡比ernet 沃尼永 Bin 407，这是一款来自多个产区的混合葡萄酒，使用法式和美国橡木桶进行陈化。黑currants 和黑berry 的典型风味与薄荷、烟草和石墨的微妙气息交织在一起，呈现出一款充满体力的卡比ernet 沃尼永，酒精平衡，酸度好，纤维软。等待一两年后，酒瓶应该可以在十年以上的时间内保持稳定。

Western reviews.review: Shows appealing density and a savory thread, featuring rosemary, sage and loam details that mingle with firm currant and dried cherry flavors. Herbal shadings gain traction on the finish along with the dense tannins, adding an appealing fresh green note. Drink now through 2033.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有吸引人的密度和浓郁的口感，展现出玫瑰花、香草和泥土的复杂细节，与坚实的黑currant和干燥的樱桃风味相融合。香草的余味在尾部逐渐增强，伴随着浓密的纤维素，带来一丝新鲜的青草味。建议立即饮用，至2033年最佳。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有樱桃，橘子，可乐，石榴，甘草和肉桂，香料的复杂香气，还混合着烟熏橡木的香气，单宁含量低，酸度较高，纯净透明。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts a complex aroma of cherry, orange, cola, pomegranate, licorice, and cinnamon spices, with a subtle smokiness of oak. It has low tannins, high acidity, and a crisp, transparent finish.

Western reviews.review: This is the best Pinot Noir at this price on the market. Easily. It's picture-perfect cool climate, absolutely dry and silky, with complex flavors of cherries, Mandarin orange, cola, pomegranates, licorice and cinnamon spice, made even richer by smoky oak. Just lovely, and gets even better as it breathes in the glass.
Western reviews.translation: 这是市场上价格最合理的品诺酒。毫无疑问。它的风格完美，冷气候的风格，干净清爽，滑顺，复杂的风味包括草莓、橙子、可乐、石榴、 licorice 和肉桂香，烟熏橡木的味道使其更加丰富。简直是美味，随着时间的推移，酒精会变得更加出色。

Chinese pairs.original: 和2017年相比，Caiarossa2018的结构更加突出，单宁的丰满程度甚至有些让人难以招架，它就像是一个健硕性的阳光大男孩：成熟的多汁莓果是他的微笑，清透轻盈的酸度是他挺拔的身姿，而至于其丝绒般单宁则是其内涵的体现。相比于刚装瓶时，现在结构感更加紧致，收尾时也带着更多的绵密质感，以及类似石墨般的紧致结构。
Chinese pairs.new: Compared to 2017, Caiarossa 2018 has a more pronounced structure, with tannins that are almost overwhelming in their ripeness. It's like a sturdy, sun-kissed young man: mature, juicy strawberry flavors are his smile, crisp and refreshing acidity is his upright posture, and the silky tannins are a reflection of his depth. Compared to when it was first bottled, the structure now feels more compact and refined, with a more velvety texture and a graphite-like tightness that persists through the finish.

English pairs.original: Compared with the vintage of 2017, Caiarossa 2018 is more structured, and its tannins are more expressive. It looks like a sunny boy with a robust figure: the mellow juicy berries are his smile, the light acidity is his lofty stance, and the velvety tannins reflect his dignity. It tastes now more elaborate than just bottled, and its finish goes with a more dense texture and a firm, inky structure.
English pairs.new: 相比2017年产的佳罗萨红酒，2018年产的佳罗萨更具结构，且其苦味更为明显。它像个阳光灿烂的年轻人，健硕的身躯让人印象深刻：浓郁的果实和柔软的酸度让人联想到他的笑容，而细腻的苦味则展现出他高贵的气质。佳罗萨的口感比刚刚装瓶时更加丰富复杂，尾部的口感更加浓密，结构更加坚实且深沉。

Western reviews.review: Intense fruit flavors of blackberry, black currant, black cherry and spicy oak are the hallmarks of this red, which is balanced and well-integrated, fresh and long, but just needs two to three years to unwind. Syrah, Cabernet Franc, Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, Petit Verdot, Sangiovese and Alicante. Best from 2023 through 2043.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的特点是浓郁的黑berry、黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑黑

jasper hill emily's paddock shiraz/caber.name: jasper hill emily's paddock shiraz/cabernet franc 2013

Chinese pairs.original: 此酒新鲜、清晰的香气以树丛、寿司姜和甜花香为主，深邃的泥土、小茴香、烤吐司和黑巧克力味为辅。口感如预期般丰满、柔顺，结合了绵密、结构和清新。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts a fresh and crisp aroma dominated by forest notes, sushi ginger, and floral sweetness, with deep earthy undertones, anise, toasted bread, and dark chocolate adding complexity. The palate is full-bodied and smooth, delivering a rich, structured, and refreshing experience.

English pairs.original: The predominant elements of the refreshingly precise nose were underbush, sushi ginger and sweet flowers trimmed in the depths of earth, anise, toast and black chocolate. Expectedly plump and extremely supple on the palate that combined the density, structure and freshness.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的气味清新而精确，主要元素包括森林底下植物、生 sushi 的姜和深埋在土中的甜花，伴有 licorice、烤面包和黑巧克力的香气。口感丰富饱满，极其柔软，结合了厚度、结构和新鲜感。

Western reviews.review: This single-vineyard wine shows aromas of cherry, cranberry and flowers, along with cola, oak spice, wet leaves and a slightly meaty, hoisin character. Savory, sinewy tannins hold the palate together while crunchy acidity keeps the fruit feeling juicy. Drink now–2028. Christina Pickard
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶来自单一葡萄园的红酒，展现出樱桃、蔓越莓和花朵的芳香，伴随着可乐、橡木香、潮湿的叶子和略带肉类、酱油味的特征。口感中的咸味和纤维质紧紧把握着口感，而清脆的酸度让果味保持新鲜。建议立即饮用至2028年。- Christina Pickard。

Western reviews.review: To be fair, the Cabernet Franc portion of this wine is only 3%, so don't expect to be bowled over by Loire-like florals or leafiness. Rather, it's a dense full-bodied wine, savory in style, with edgings of charred meat, grilled plum, mocha and a long cocoa-tinged finish. Drink 2020–2030.
Western reviews.translation:
这个红酒评论翻译成中文如下：

公平地说，这款红酒中卡贝内特法兰克的比例仅为3%，所以不要期望会被这款红酒的花香或叶绿气味所震撼。相反，这是一款浓密的全口感红酒，风格为浓郁的口感，带有焦烧肉、烤石榴、摩卡和长长的可可味的尾韵。建议饮用2020-2030年。

Western reviews.review: In 5–10 years, this rating may look conservative, but right now, this wine's tannins are just too rustic and tough to be certain of its future evolution. It's a massive wine overall, with brambly, briary fruit, tinged with clove, cedar and chocolate, and those drying, astringent tannins on the finish.
Western reviews.translation: 五到十年后，这个评分可能会被认为是保守的，但现在，这瓶酒的苦味太过粗糙和坚硬，无法确定它的未来发展。整体来说，这是一瓶巨大的酒，果味浓郁，带有丁香、松木和巧克力味，尾部还有干燥、苦涩的苦味。

Western reviews.review: Although there is onlyCab Franc in the blend, it appears to have quite an impact on this wine's aromas, which are intriguingly perfumed and contain some minty, leafy notes. Flavors also hint at mint with some subtle cedary notes, although the primary fruit is blueberry. Like the 2005 Georgia's Paddock, it's full-bodied and creamy-textured, although this wine adds a slightly more tannic edge to the finish. Drink 2010–2020.
Western reviews.translation: 虽然这款红酒的混合中只有卡布弗朗（Cab Franc）一种葡萄品种，但它似乎对这款酒的香气产生了很大的影响，具有迷人的香味，带有薄荷和叶子的味道。口感也带有薄荷的味道，伴有些微的松木味道，虽然主要的果味是蓝莓。与2005年乔治亚的葡萄园（Georgia's Paddock）一样，这款酒的口感丰富，乳脂般的口感，但这款酒的尾部带有略微的苦味。建议饮用时间：2010-2020年。

Western reviews.review: This single-vineyard wine shows aromas of cherry, cranberry and flowers, along with cola, oak spice, wet leaves and a slightly meaty, hoisin character. Savory, sinewy tannins hold the palate together while crunchy acidity keeps the fruit feeling juicy. Drink now–2028. Christina Pickard
Western reviews.translation: 这款单一葡萄园红酒展现出浓郁的樱桃、蔓越莓和花朵香气，伴随着可乐、橡木香、潮湿的叶子和略带肉类、酱油般的特征。口感中有丰富的肉汁感，辛辣的口感和清脆的酸度使得果味保持新鲜。建议立即饮用至2028年。- Christina Pickard

Chinese pairs.original: 很像Saint-Joseph。此酒富有甜香料和花香的香气透出丁香、桂皮、甘草和玫瑰干花香。香气和口感都充满果香。质地优雅的口感展现多汁的酸度和滑爽的单宁。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine is reminiscent of Saint-Joseph. The aroma is rich in sweet spices and floral notes, with hints of cloves, cinnamon, licorice, and dried rose petals. The aroma and palate are both full of fruitiness. The elegant texture showcases a juicy acidity and smooth tannins.

English pairs.original: Like a Saint-Joseph. Sweetly spicy and floral on the nose of clove, cinnamon, liquorice and dried rose. Expressively fruited on both sniff and palate. Juicy acid and polished tannin filled the elegantly textured mouthfeel.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的香气像圣约瑟夫（Saint-Joseph）一样，带有甜甜的辣味和花香，闻起来有丁香、肉桂、甘草和干玫瑰的味道。口感丰富果实，既在鼻子里闻到，又在口中品尝到。口感清新酸爽，细腻的纤维让口感优雅流畅。

Western reviews.review: In a moisture-prone region like Hunter, a warm, dry vintage like 2018 is a good thing. One of the region's best-known reds, Vat 9 is from old vines (some dating to 1892), with far older red-clay soils over limestone. This wine takes its time opening but soon offers flavorful layers of cranberry, blueberry, florals and subdued but present oak. This vintage is on the rich side, with leathery, chiseled tannins. A few years stashed away should offer big rewards. Drink 2022–2036. Christina Pickard
Western reviews.translation: 在像Hunter这样的潮湿地区，一个温暖干燥的年份如2018是件好事。这个地区最知名的红酒之一，Vat 9来自老 vines（其中一些历史可追溯到1892年），覆盖着更古老的红土土壤和石灰岩。这款酒需要时间才能打开，但很快就会呈现出浓郁的层次，包括草莓、蓝莓、花朵和低调但存在的橡木。这个年份的酒比较丰富，有皮革般的、雕刻般的坚果味。将酒存放几年后，会带来丰厚的回报。建议饮用时间：2022-2036。 Christina Pickard。

Chinese pairs.original: 其神秘的颜色看上去就像李子果肉，并且带有清晰的砖色调。成形的、经历了层层演变的香气以扑面而来的湿玫瑰花香最为“前奏”，随即出现的是石榴、李子、岩石、红色甘草、草药、小茴香、草药、松香和稍许的马厩味。口感集中，以惊人甜蜜的花香为主，极其多肉而且润滑，伴随着绵密、咸咸的余味。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine's mysterious color resembles a plum's flesh, with a clear brick tone. The complex, evolved aromas burst forth with a heady rose petal scent, followed by notes of pomegranate, plum, stone, red licorice, herbs, anise, and a hint of stable. The palate is concentrated, dominated by an astonishingly sweet floral character, with a luscious, velvety texture and a lingering, savory finish.

English pairs.original: Its mysterious color just looked like plum flesh and possessed clearly bricky tint. The aromatic was shaped and greatly evolved which initially propelled by lifted wet rose as the ‘prelude’, then gradually emerged the noses of pomegranate, plum, stone, red liquorice, herb, anise, tea leaf, resin and brett undertone. The mouthfeel was concentrated, breathtakingly sweet floral-driven, extremely fleshy and lubricate, with a dense and savoury length.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒的颜色像熟透的李子一样神秘，带有明显的红砖色调。酒香丰富，经过了明显的演变，最初是由湿润的玫瑰花香引领，随后逐渐展现出李子、李子果、石榴、红糖、香草、丁香、茶叶、树脂和 Brett undertone 的鼻香。口感浓郁，令人惊艳的花香味道，极富肉感且滑顺，酒尾浓郁且有嚼劲。

Western reviews.review: Restraint is one of the buzzwords in Australian wine, which might be one reason that for all of this winery's cult status in Australia, it remains relatively unknown in America. This medium-bodied wine's black cherry fruit is definitely restrained, flecked with delicate herbal notes and rounded out by supple tannins. It's well made and well balanced, but lacks sizzle.
Western reviews.translation: 澳大利亚葡萄酒中，克制（restraint）是一个热门词汇，这可能是为什么尽管这家酒庄在澳大利亚拥有极高的知名度，但在美国却相对不为人知的原因之一。这个中等体积的红酒果味果实果实果味果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实果实

Chinese pairs.original: 这支酒由雷司令酿造大师所打造，是Watervale顶级雷司令。充满花香，柠檬及酸橙味道，伴随打火石和微微薰衣草护手霜的气息，入口充盈口齿生津的酸度，及许多和香气上类似的柠檬水果味道，回味紧实，伴随细致的矿物质感，酸度极好，结构出色，具有无穷无尽的潜力，是一支高雅脱俗的酒款！
Chinese pairs.new: This wine is crafted by the master winemaker of d'Arenberg, a top-tier d'Arenberg from Watervale. It's bursting with floral, lemon, and orange blossom aromas, accompanied by subtle smokiness and a hint of lavender. The palate is filled with refreshing acidity and a multitude of citrus fruit flavors reminiscent of lemon, followed by a tight finish and subtle mineral texture. The acidity is excellent, the structure is outstanding, and it has endless potential, making it a refined and sophisticated wine.

English pairs.original: This is a great example of Watervale Riesling made by a Riesling master, full of flowers and mixed lemon&lime fruits on nose, with flint and slight lavender hand cream, whilst the palate had mouth-watering acidity and lots of lemony fruits that were same to the nose, the wine showed a tight but detailed minerals on the finish with stunning acidity, great structure and plenty of potential, a graceful wine.
English pairs.new: 这是沃特维尔（Watervale）RIESLING的典范作品，由RIESLING大师打造，酒鼻中充满了花朵和混合的柠檬和柚子果香，伴有火石和微微的兰花手霜味。口感中有令人垂涎的酸度和大量的柠檬果香，与鼻子中的味道相同。酒尾呈现出紧致但细致的矿物质味道，酸度惊人，结构完美，潜力巨大。这是一款优雅的酒。

Western reviews.review: This vintage of Springvale is shining. Simultaneously delicate, dry and fruity, it sings bright tunes of lavender, lemon-lime, grapefruit, white peach, and touches of white spice. The palate feels like licking a lime Popsicle without the sweetness. It's buoyed by tingly acidity, with a soft talc-like texture and bright citrus right to the end where the spice trickles onto the tongue at the very close. Bright, focused and mouthwatering, this is a joyful wine that drinks easily now but will gain tons more complexity with a decade or more of cellaring. Christina Pickard
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶斯普林维尔(Springvale)红酒闪闪发光。它既细腻又干净，带有花卉、柠檬、柑橘、白桃和白香料的清新气息。口感像吃了柠檬冰棒一样清爽，没有甜味。它被轻微的酸度和细腻的质地所支撑，直到最后，香料的余味在舌头上留下。明亮、集中和令人垂涎，这是一瓶令人愉快的酒，目前可以轻松饮用，但经过十年以上的陈酿后，它将会变得更加复杂。- 克里斯蒂娜·皮卡德(Christina Pickard)

Chinese pairs.original: 深紫红色，带有浓郁的黑醋栗、黑浆果和果酱的香气，稍带新鲜的植物香料香气。酒体丰满，风味丰富，酸度突出，与单宁平衡。中度单宁较细致，余味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new:
Deep plum red color, with intense aromas of black prune, black plum, and jam. Hints of fresh herbal notes. 

Full-bodied wine with rich flavors, prominent acidity, and balanced tannins. Moderate tannins are refined, with a long-lasting finish.

Western reviews.review: This is a terrifically full-bodied, lush Shiraz that nevertheless retains a sense of balance and freshness. Vaguely minty, herbal notes make a brief appearance, then give way to raspberry and blueberry fruit. Savory hints creep in on the palate, further increasing its appeal. This blend of fruit from the Barossa and Eden valleys should drink well through at least 2020.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一款充满魅力的、丰富的雪利酒，尽管如此，它仍然保持着平衡和新鲜的感觉。酒中隐隐约约的薄荷和草药味会短暂出现，然后转变为莓果和蓝莓的果味。口感中会出现一些咸味，进一步增强了它的吸引力。这款来自巴罗萨和爱登谷的混合酒应该可以在至少2020年内享受。

Santa Rita Casa Real Cabernet Sauvignon.name: Santa Rita Casa Real Cabernet Sauvignon 2005

Chinese pairs.original: 带有黑浆果、醋栗水果的芳香，偶尔也会散发出干果酱、葡萄干和无花果的香气，伴随着橡木气息。具有强劲的单宁，酒体饱满。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of black fruit, persimmon fruit, and hints of fruit jam, raisins, and pomegranate, accompanied by oak notes. Full-bodied with robust tannins.

Western reviews.review: From a vineyard planted in the early 1970's in Alto Jahuel, this is a classic Chilean cabernet.  The 2005 vintage produced an exceptional Casa Real, with aromas of tobacco and rosemary that meld with the seductive, black fruit flavors.  It's soft and warm, a meaty cabernet for steak.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒来自于1970年代初期在阿尔托-雅赫尔（Alto Jahuel）种植的葡萄园。这是一款典型的智利卡波雷特（Cabernet）红酒。2005年的产季，卡萨皇家（Casa Real）红酒表现出色，带有烟草和罗勒的香气与诱人的黑果味相融合。它的口感软绵温暖，适合与牛排搭配。

Western reviews.review: Very stout and rich, but nothing soft about this perfectly healthy, benchmark Chilean Cab. The nose pours forth with earth, licorice, balsamic notes and sly plum aromas, while the palate is cuddly but agile, with good balance and pure flavors of black fruits and chocolate.
Western reviews.translation: 这款智利红酒非常浓郁且富有味道，但它的健康状况却非常理想。它的鼻子里充满了泥土、 licorice、醋酸和巧妙的浆果香气，而口感则是温暖但灵活的，具有良好的平衡和纯粹的黑果和巧克力味道。

Western reviews.review: The nose shows off aromas of pain grille, pencil lead, tar, licorice, and blackberry. In the mouth there is significant tannin that will mandate 6-8 years of cellaring. The wine has tons of fruit but whether it will come into balance remains to be seen. If it does, my score will seem conservative.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的鼻子中散发着焦糖、铅笔笔芯、焦炭、甘草和黑莓的香气。在口中有着显著的苦味，需要6-8年陈酿才能达到最佳状态。酒中有大量的果味，但是否能达到平衡还需要观察。如果能达到平衡，那么我的评分可能会被证明过于保守。

Western reviews.review: A dark, brawny style, with coffee and bittersweet cocoa leading the way for black currant and braised fig fruit notes. There's a long, muscular, loam-filled finish. Drink now through 2011. 1,000 cases made.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶深色、强劲的红酒，带有浓郁的咖啡和苦巧克力味道，黑currant和烤枣果味也随之而来。酒尾长长，肌肉丰满，带有泥土味。建议立即饮用至2011年。生产了1000瓶。

Chinese pairs.original: 出乎意料，这一次，此款酒完美可以说是支“香气炸弹”，展现异常清新、复杂的甜香料、红色花朵、成熟的黑色水果、草药、矿物和微微的泥土气息。口感同样新鲜而且极富表现力，渗出大量红色水果、树丛和岩石的滋味，延续到其结构坚实但非常滑爽的收尾中。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine is a true "aroma bomb," delivering an unexpectedly perfect blend of fresh, complex sweet spices, red flowers, ripe black fruits, herbs, minerals, and a hint of earthy undertones. The palate is equally fresh and expressive, bursting with flavors of red fruits, underbrush, and stone, which carry through to a solid yet silky smooth finish.

English pairs.original: Unexpectedly, on this occasion, it's an ‘aroma-bomb’, with very refreshing and complicated expressiveness of sweet spices, red flowers, ripe black fruits, herb, mineral and faint earth. The palate was fresh and expressive as well, showing a wealth of red fruits, underbush and stone notes that segued into a firmly structured but utterly polished finale.
English pairs.new: 这次尝试，酒精却带来了意想不到的“香气爆炸”，带来清新而复杂的甜香料、红花、成熟黑果、草本植物、矿物质和微微的泥土的气味。口感也同样清新和富有表现力，展现出丰富的红果、灌木和石头的味道，最后转变为坚实但极其光滑的结尾。

Western reviews.review: Bright ruby with a light garnet hue at the rim. Defined and memorable nose with notes of blood orange, pomegranate, and ample cherry. Inviting bouquet. Round and substantial on the palate, displaying an abundance of ripe plum and raspberry fruit and revealing pithy, dense tannins and some baked notes on the finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色，边缘有浅红宝石色的光泽。酒鼻子清晰、记忆深刻，带有血橙、石榴和充足的樱桃的香气。酒香很诱人。口感圆润、丰满，展现了成熟的李子和草莓的果味，并显示出坚实的、密集的橡皮质和一些烘烤的味道。

Western reviews.review: Vibrant and loaded with finesse, this blend of 80% Sangiovese, 15% Cabernet Sauvignon and 5% Cabernet Franc opens with enticing scents of red woodland berry, new leather, Asian spice and a touch of menthol. The youthful palate delivers red currant, wild cherry, star anise and clove alongside a backbone of firm acidity and polished, tightly wound tannins. It will age majestically; drink 2020–2033.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒以优雅的风格呈现，80%桑吉沃塞，15%卡波弗雷蒙，5%卡波弗雷蒙的混合。它的香气中充满了红色林地果实、新皮革、亚洲香料和薄荷的诱人气息。年轻的口感中带有红樱桃、野樱桃、星安妮斯和肉豆蔻的味道，伴随着坚实的酸度和紧密有力地纠缠的纹理。它将会在2020-2033年间成熟。

Western reviews.review: We remember the folks at Antinori saying they thought the 2010 could be greatest Tignanello ever. Make no mistake it is excellent but the 2013 has something more. Already more elegant than its many predecessors, expect a glass full of power with amazing vibrant juicy fruit and elegance. The 2013 Tuscan vintage is clearly different than most of Europe. A mostly cool year extended the season and put the emphasis on fruit and elegance. Tobacco, red fruits, stones, liquorice and a general purity of fruit that will be at its core foe decades. Long and complex this is one of the finest young Tignanellos we have tasted. (Anthony Gismondi).
Western reviews.translation: 我们记得安蒂诺里（Antinori）的人说，他们认为2010年可能是蒂纳内洛（Tignanello）的最佳年份。没有错，这是一款出色的红酒，但2013年有更多的东西。相比之下，2013年的蒂纳内洛更为优雅，期待一杯充满力量的、充满活力和鲜美果味的红酒。2013年的托斯卡纳（Tuscan）葡萄酒年份与欧洲大部分地区不同。一个主要的凉爽年份延长了收获季节，强调了果味和优雅。烟草、红果、石头、甘草和果味的纯粹性将是这款红酒的核心，持续数十年。长且复杂，这是我们尝过的最好的年轻蒂纳内洛之一。 (安东尼·吉斯蒙迪，Anthony Gismondi)

Western reviews.review: First nose with earth, leather, forest the after 30 mins with strong black fruits. Quite balance with smooth tanning not to high acidity but finished a bit short. With a bit smoky smell after around 45 mins in glass.
Western reviews.translation: 初次闻酒，带有泥土、皮革、森林的气息。30分钟后，酒中强烈的黑果味开始显现。整体口感平衡，口感滑顺，酸度不高，但略微有些短缺。45分钟后，酒中出现了烟熏的气息。

Chinese pairs.original: 黑色水果、覆盆子和桉树的香气，伴有 Mocha 咖啡、橡木和花朵的香味；口感丰富，纯正的果味中带有淡淡的橡木味，酸爽可口，单宁柔顺。
Chinese pairs.new: Dark fruit, blackberries, and eucalyptus aromas, accompanied by mocha coffee, oak, and floral notes; rich texture, pure fruit flavors with subtle oak undertones, crisp acidity, and smooth tannins.

Western reviews.review: Tiefdunkles Rubingranat, fester Farbkern, zarte Randaufhellung. Zart nach Cassis, schwarze Beerenfrucht, ein Hauch auf Lakritze, ein Hauch von Bourbonvanille, ein Hauch von Teer. Saftige rote Kirschenfrucht, finessenreich strukturiert, salzige Mineralik, dunkle Beeren im Nachhall, im Abgang etwas adstringent, ein charaktervoller Speisenbegleiter.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，浓密的红色核心，边缘微微发亮。酒香中带有浓郁的黑加思果、黑莓果味，微微带有薄荷糖和波本万尼尔的甜味，最后是茶叶的干香。口感丰富的红果味，结构精致，带有轻微的盐味和矿物质，余味中有黑莓果的回味，尾部略带干涩，适合作为一道具有特征性的菜肴伴侣。

Chinese pairs.original: 充满黑色水果味如黑加仑和梅子的香气，还伴有咖啡、胡椒和巧克力味，结构复杂但不失平衡，口感优雅。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine is packed with flavors of black fruit such as blackcurrant and plum, accompanied by notes of coffee, pepper, and chocolate. Its complex structure remains balanced, resulting in a refined and elegant taste.

Western reviews.review: A gorgeous Cabernet, this is easily the winery's best yet. They held it back long enough to let it mellow, so that it's softly tannic, with blackberry fruit just turning the corner towards complexity. Probably near its peak now, it should be enjoyed over the next year or two.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶美丽的卡贝网酒，毫无疑问这是这家酒庄的最佳作品。他们让它静置足够长的时间，让它变得柔和，口感软绵，黑莓果味正逐渐转变为复杂的味道。现在它可能已经达到顶峰，建议在接下来的1-2年内享用。

Chinese pairs.original: 南澳有混合几个不同葡萄酒产区的传统。最著名的例子便是奔富的高端酒款全部都是这种“南澳混酿”，其中还包括设拉子混合少许赤霞珠制成的旗舰酒Grange，这样的设拉子和赤霞珠的混酿（早期的Grange其实是100%设拉子）算是澳洲酒的一种特色了。这款酒在1989年份之前的酒标都是“Grange Hermitage”（“Hermitage”的字样现在由于法国Hermitage产区的反对而被取缔）。类似于西班牙的珍藏和特级珍藏葡萄酒，采用天然软木塞的Grange在发售之前往往需要经历漫长的桶内醇化（酒液在全新的大号美国橡木桶内醇化21个月）和瓶中窖藏。酒体呈现红深宝石色泽，且带深黑色调。宛如塔斯马尼亚的“酒杯湾”，海水、山脉和天空与酒中所呈现的桶味、果味和花香一一对应，勾勒出一幅极尽和谐的美景。木桶香草、黑色果味（黑醋栗、黑莓、桑莓、黑樱桃）和玫瑰花香之间存在着一种近乎完美的平衡，夹杂着些许巧克力、纯净的矿物质、草药、灰尘以及各种香料的滋味，中等酒体，口感丝滑，富有咀嚼的单宁同时酸度怡人，伴随着悠长的香草余韵。
Chinese pairs.new:
South Australia has a tradition of blending wines from multiple regions. One of the most famous examples is Penfolds' premium wines, which are all "South Australian blends", including the flagship wine Grange, which is a blend of Shiraz and Cabernet Sauvignon (early Granges were 100% Shiraz). This wine was previously labeled as "Grange Hermitage" (the word "Hermitage" has been discontinued due to opposition from the French Hermitage region). Like Spanish Reserva and Gran Reserva wines, the natural cork-sealed Grange often undergoes a long period of barrel maturation (21 months in new American oak barrels) and bottle aging before release.

The wine presents a deep ruby-red color with a deep black hue. Like Tasmania's "Cupcake Bay", the sea, mountains and sky are reflected in the wine's barrel flavors, fruit flavors and floral aromas, creating a harmonious landscape. The balance between oak, black fruit flavors (blackcurrant, blackberry, blackberry, black cherry), rose petal aromas is almost perfect, with hints of chocolate, pure minerals, herbs, dust and various spices. The medium-bodied wine has a smooth texture, rich tannins and a refreshing acidity, accompanied by a long, velvety vanilla finish.

English pairs.original: South Australia has the tradition of blending few different wine regions. The most famous example is Penfolds whose premium wines are all made from such 'South Australia Blend', not excluding the flagship Grange that is Shiraz blended with a small proportion of Cabernet Sauvignon (originally 100% Shiraz) to make a quintessentially Australian blend. It's labelled as 'Grange Hermitage' until the 1989 (now the word 'Hermitage' is banned by the French Hermitage appellation). Similar to Spanish Reserva and Gran Reserva, Grange bottled under natural cork is only released after long time barrel maturation (maturing in 100% new American hogsheads for 21 months) and extended bottle cellaring. Deep ruby color with black hue. Just like 'Wineglass Bay' in Tasmania, sea, mountain and sky are corresponding to oaks, fruitiness and flowers combined into a very harmonious scene. Perfectly balanced on scent of oak vanilla, dark fruits (cassis, dark cherry, mulberry, dark berry) and rose, hint of chocolate, leather, pure mineral, herb, dust and all spices, medium-bodied but still very silky, chewy tannin harmonized with high acidity, followed by a long vanilla length.
English pairs.new: 南澳大利亚有着混合不同葡萄酒产区的传统。最著名的例子就是Penfolds，其高端葡萄酒都是使用这种“南澳大利亚混合”的方法酿造的，包括旗舰品格兰奇（Grange），它是由少量卡波内尔（Cabernet Sauvignon）与香槟（Shiraz）混合而成的典型澳大利亚混合葡萄酒。直到1989年，格兰奇（Grange）标签上还会标注“格兰奇黑山”（Grange Hermitage），但现在法国黑山（Hermitage）产区已经禁止使用这个名称。类似于西班牙的储存酒（Reserva）和特别储存酒（Gran Reserva），格兰奇（Grange）使用天然橡胶塞封装，需要经过长时间的橡木桶陈化（21个月陈化于100%新美国橡木桶中）和瓶陈化。深红色酒液，带有黑色调。就像塔斯马尼亚的“葡萄酒湾”（Wineglass Bay）一样，海洋、山脉和天空与橡木、果香和花香融合成一个非常和谐的景象。酒香中完美平衡的橡木香味、黑色水果（黑樱子、黑樱桃、黑莓、黑果）和玫瑰花香味，伴有巧克力、皮革、纯矿物质、草本植物、尘土和所有香料的味道。中等体积但仍然非常滑顺，嚼起来的纤维化合高酸度，尾部长长的香味，带有橡木味。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, dezente Randaufhellung. Feiner Nougat, reife dunkle Pflaumenfrucht, dunkles Beerenkonfit, ein Hauch von Orangenzesten, ein Hauch von Minze. Rund und elegant, auf gewisse Weise"süffig " feine Säurestruktur, präsente Tannine im Hintergrund, angenehme Würze, trocknet den Gaumen ab, klasse Speisenbegleiter, bereits antrinkbar, dunkler Nougat im Rückgeschmack. Peter Moser
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。细腻的杏仁味，成熟的黑浆果味，黑berry浓缩，橙子皮和薄荷的微妙香气。圆润优雅，某种程度上是“口感丰富”的，细腻的酸度结构，背景中的细致的苦味，愉悦的调味，干净的口感，适合各种菜肴配酒，已经可以饮用，杏仁味在回味中持续。- 彼得·莫瑟。

Western reviews.review: Huge dill and vanilla aromas wrap around intense mixed-berry fruit, ending on notes of espresso and dark chocolate. It's full bodied and richly textured, but perhaps a bit coarse as well. This may not be the biggest, baddest or longest-lived Grange, but it maintains the Grange standard of excellence. Drink 2020–2030.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有强烈的芹菜和香草香气，包围着浓郁的混合果味，最后留下了浓缩的咖啡和黑巧克力味。它的口感丰富、富有质感，但也可能略微粗糙。虽然这可能不是最强大的或最持久的格兰奇（Grange），但它仍然维持了格兰奇的高品质标准。建议饮用时间为2020-2030年。

Western reviews.review: Definitely a high end wine. Powerfull nose, long in the mouth, very long finish. Beautifull colour. Tanins are quite crisp and definitely should wait another 5 years before they get integrated. First impression is very velvety but tanins are so high that you can use this wine to explain people what tanic means. Structure is complex. Considering it is a Shiraz wine, low level of pepper, would say as much as in a great Bordeaux from the left side of the bank. Rich as a good Barollo. Considering the price tag, I give 4 stars for the taste but you can find Top Bordeaux, Languedoc or Barollo's or Macciole for les than 1/3 of the price, I would not consider buying Grange Bin 95. Very good yes, extremely overpriced as well...
Western reviews.translation: 这个红酒非常高档。酒香强烈，口感长，余味持久。颜色美丽。口感中的苦味酸度较高，建议再等5年才能完全融合。初次印象非常滑顺，但苦味酸度非常高，甚至可以用这个酒来解释什么是苦味酸度。酒的结构复杂。考虑到这是一个夏拉酒，辣味很低，甚至比左岸的好酒还要少。酒的丰富程度与好酒的巴罗洛相似。考虑到价格，口感给4星，但你可以在1/3的价格买到顶级波尔多、朗格多克或巴罗洛的酒，或者麦克利酒庄的酒。因此，我不会考虑购买格兰奇酒庄的95号系列。非常好，但价格也非常高昂。

Western reviews.review: Tar, mint, lifted blueberry and chocolate ganache dance on the nose. The midpalate is seamless, there is an exquisite textural finesse that shines with tar, cocoa, vanilla and blueberry while an edge of minty brightness lends freshness. It is this freshness that characterises the entire wine and lends it timeless poise. Wonderful now but will evolve.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中，焦烟、薄荷、蓝莓和巧克力酱的味道交织在一起。口感平滑细腻，焦烟、可可、香草和蓝莓的味道在口中流转，薄荷的清新味道则带来新鲜感。这瓶红酒的新鲜感贯穿始终，使其拥有永恒的风范。现在它很美味，但随着时间的推移，它还会有所进步。

Western reviews.review: This has all the size and weight you've come to expect from Australia's most famous wine. Huge fruit and huge oak combine in a full-bodied, richly textured package that delivers waves of toasted coconut, vanilla and intense dark berries yet remains embryonic more than five years after the harvest. That said, the texture isn't quite as tight or as fine as some other vintages—expect this to be early maturing by Grange standards, and best from 2020–2040.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒拥有澳大利亚最著名的葡萄酒所应有的体积和重量。丰富的果味和浓郁的橡木味结合在一起，呈现出一瓶厚重、富有质感的酒精，带来一波波的烤椰子、香草和浓郁的黑莓味道。然而，这款酒的质感并没有达到其他年份的紧密程度和细腻程度。按照格兰奇（Grange）的标准，这款酒可能会较早成熟，最佳饮用时间在2020年至2040年之间。

vasse felix tom cullity cabernet sauvign.name: vasse felix tom cullity cabernet sauvignon/malbec 2015

Chinese pairs.original: 这款以酒庄创始人Tom Cullity命名的旗舰酒酿自有机种植的52年老藤葡萄树——属于产区中最古老的葡萄藤。野生酵母；淋皮和压帽；篮式压榨；酒液在51%新的法国小桶内陈年16个月。此酒非常庄严、含蓄但富有层次的香气透出干花、岩石、薄荷、黑莓、黄油硬糖、香料（肉豆蔻、黑胡椒）和森林地的气息。质地优雅、纤细，伴有诱人、甜美而且清澈的果味，收尾充满岩石滋味和漂亮的酸度。
Chinese pairs.new:
This flagship wine is named after the winery's founder Tom Cullity and is crafted from 52-year-old organic vines, one of the oldest in the region. Fermented with wild yeast, it undergoes a combination of whole-bunch and stem inclusion, basket pressing, and is aged in 51% new French oak for 16 months. 

The wine exudes a dignified, restrained yet complex bouquet of dried flowers, stone, mint, blackberry, butter toffee, spices (cinnamon, black pepper) and forest floor. The palate is elegant and refined, with alluring, sweet and crystal-clear fruit flavors, finishing with a satisfying stoniness and beautiful acidity.

English pairs.original: This flagship named after the founder Tom Cullity is made from the organically farmed, 52 years old vines which are the oldest vines of the region. Wild yeast; pumping over and punching down; basket press; aging 16 months in 51% new French barriques. The nose was very austere and restrained but layered, showing dried flower, stone, mint, blackberry, butterscotch, spices (nutmeg, black pepper) and forest floor. Elegantly textured and finesse-styled, with clean and sweet fruit that was really attractive, finishing with evident stoniness and stylish acid.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒以创始人托姆·库利蒂（Tom Cullity）的名字命名，使用来自该地区最古老的52岁有机农场葡萄。使用野生酵母，采用推送和踩压法，使用篮子压榨，16个月在51%新法式白桉木桶中陈化。酒鼻子非常严谨和克制，但层次丰富，展现了干花、石头、薄荷、黑莓、糖浆、香料（肉豆蔻、黑胡椒）和林地的气息。酒体优雅细致，风格精致，清爽甜的果味非常吸引人，酒尾明显带有石头味和优雅的酸度。

Western reviews.review: From an excellent vintage, Vasse's top dog red deftly demonstrates the unique juxtaposition of grace, perfume and power inherent to this unique West Aussie region. 2020 is particularly aromatic and fruit driven, but the pop of fresh cherry, currant, raspberry and red licorice is neatly underscored by savory herb, graphite and dark-chocolate nuances. Ultrafine, chalky tannins are beautifully integrated with the silky red fruit and fresh acidity on the palate. A highly classy, harmonious and expertly made bottling that could cellar for decades whilst offering drinkability right now.
Western reviews.translation: 来自一场出色的产季，瓦斯(Vasse)的顶级红酒巧妙地展现了西澳大利亚这一独特地区固有的优雅、香气和力量的独特对比。2020年尤其具有浓郁的香气和果味，但新鲜樱桃、黑加仑、草莓和红糖水果的爆发被干酪、石墨和黑巧克力风味的深度细节巧妙地突出了。口感上，细致的、如雪的牙齿和新鲜的酸度与细致的红果味完美融合。是一瓶极具品位、和谐且制作精湛的红酒，既可以长期陈放，也可以立即享用。

Western reviews.review: This comparatively cool vintage of Vasse Felix's top red is beautifully perfumed and lucid, with pronounced savory, earthy aromas like beet root, tobacco and dried Mediterranean herbs and florals. They weave between bright, tangy currant fruit and soft mocha characters. The silky, slinky palate is expertly structured, the fine, talc-like tannins creeping in slowly, then taking over at the long finish. A gorgeous tightrope of power and elegance, and the epitome of class, this is a complete wine now but could age for several decades more.
Western reviews.translation: 瓦塞菲利克斯(Vasse Felix)顶级红酒的这瓶相对凉爽的年份，具有优美的香气和清澈的口感，具有明显的浓郁的土味、泥土味，如甜菜根、烟草和干燥的地中海香草和花朵。它们在明亮的、酸甜的黑currant果味和软的摩卡风味之间交织。细致的、灵活的口感是精心构建的，细致的、像石蜡一样的纤维素缓慢地渗入，然后在长尾部占据。是一种优雅的力量的高wire，代表了最高的品质，这是一瓶现在就可以享用的完美红酒，但它还可以在几十年后继续发酵。

Western reviews.review: Reminiscent of Margaret River's towering eucalyptus, marri flowers, dusty red earth and salty Indian Ocean breeze. red currant and black cherry swirl with graphite, iodine, savory spice and dried violets. Powerful and poised, with downright sexy tannins that cradle the fruit rather than cinch it. Christina Pickard
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的味道让人回忆起西澳大利亚的玛格丽特河(Margaret River)的高大桉树、马里花、干燥的红土和咸海风。红葡萄和黑樱桃的风味与石墨、碘、香料和干燥的紫罗兰花混合在一起。强烈而优雅，具有极具魅力的纹理，包裹着果味，而不是束缚它。- Christina Pickard

Western reviews.review: (2022) The coolest and latest vintage for a decade, with delayed ripening and good acid retention. January and February so both warm sunshine and some rain, but a warm March and the driest April since 1982 so excellent ripening of red varieties. 82% Cab with 17% Malbec and 1% Petit Verdot, it spent 19 months in French oak, 61% new. More dense in colour, but far from opaque, running to pale pink on the rim. Quite closed, gravelly and olive scented, a hint of mint and showing that elegant and precise side of Cabernet, some exotic cigar box and Sandalwood spice. In the mouth the wine fleshes out immediately, sweet and ripe, the plushness surprises after the strictness of the aromatics, filling the mouth with plump blackcurrant, but then the edge begins to come through, really taut, succulent tannins and acids give this authority, but the wine has great drive and focus, finishing on fruit and suggesting great potential once again.
Western reviews.translation: 2022年是十年来最好的新酒年份，酒龄延迟，酸度保留良好。1月和2月温暖阳光和少量雨，3月温暖，4月是自1982年以来最干燥的月份，因此红酒品种成熟度良好。酒款为82%卡波弗雷希（Cabernet Franc）、17%马尔贝克（Malbec）和1%佩蒂·维多（Petit Verdot），在法兰克式橡木桶中陈酿19个月，61%新橡木。酒色更浓密，但远非透明，边缘呈现淡粉色。酒香闭合，粗糙且橄榄气，带有薄荷和典雅精致的卡波弗雷希气息，伴有香烟盒和檀香木的异国情调。口感丰富，甜美和成熟，酒肉感立即展现，黑加仑果酱充满口腔，但随后边缘开始显现，非常紧致，醇厚的纤维和酸度赋予酒款权威，但酒款具有强烈的驱动力和焦点，酒尾以果酱结束，预示着酒款再次展现出巨大的潜力。

Western reviews.review: (2022) A dry and warm spring set good fruit and better yields than in the preceding vintage. Warm conditions with some helpful rainfall in January led to a long finish to the season. 78% Cab with 20% Malbec and 2% Petit Verdot, it spent 19 months in French oak, 80% new. Lots of mint and eucalypt here, chocolate too and refined cassis. Also plenty of ozoney freshness, leafy fennel and liquorice. The palate has great concentration and balance, again it is a wine with great drive and focus because of those taut, fine tannins and dry cherry-pit bite of the acid, but this does have the ripeness of fruit too, plump blackcurrants and brambles, just a background of quite exotic, incense-like spice.
Western reviews.translation: 2022年，干燥温暖的春天带来了丰硕的果实和更好的产量。1月份的有益降雨和温暖的天气使得收获季节延长。该酒的组成是78%卡波弗雷希，20%马尔贝克和2%佩蒂·维多，共在法国橡木桶中陈化19个月，80%新橡木。酒中充满了薄荷和桉树的香气，巧克力和精致的黑加仑。还有一股清新的氧气味，叶子状的甘蓝和威士忌。口感浓郁平衡，酒体充满了驱动力和焦点，因为那些紧绷的细致的橡皮和干的樱桃核酸，但这酒也具有丰富的果实，酿造了黑加仑和荨麻疹，背景中有相当奇异的，似香烟的香气。

Chinese pairs.original: 香料和红色水果的香气，酒体饱满，口感多汁，单宁柔软如天鹅绒般，悠长又充满甜美水果的味道。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromatic notes of spices and red fruit, full-bodied texture, juicy mouthfeel, soft tannins like silk, and a long, sweet fruit finish.

Western reviews.review: A hot but not torrid growing season with fewer heat waves. This has a lively, garnet color and very Mediterranean aromas that are fragrant and intensely fruity with notes of black cherry, prune and raspberry. The mouthfeel is warm and has no tannic/acidic tartness making the flavors wrapping and pleasing while the finish is a tad diluted even if it remains persistent.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的成长季节炎热但不酷热，少了几次高温波动。酒液呈现出活泼的深红色，具有典型地中海风味，气味浓郁，果香浓郁，带有黑樱桃、浆果和莓果的香气。口感温暖，没有苦涩或酸度的刺激，味道丰富而愉悦，余味虽然略微稀释，但仍然持久。

Western reviews.review: This iconic Italian wine from Bolgheri's landmark Sassicaia vineyard (characterized by little rocks, or “sassi”) offers an elegant bouquet comprised in equal measure by mineral, fruit and spice nuances. The wine consists of 85% Cabernet Sauvignon and 15% Cabernet Franc and the finish is long, smooth and very fine. This is an ageworthy wine that should not be opened before 2018.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶来自意大利博尔盖里（Bolgheri）著名的萨西卡亚（Sassicaia）葡萄园的标志性红酒，由于葡萄园地名“萨西卡亚”意为“小石子”，因此得名。酒中的香气优雅典雅，矿物质、水果和香料的细微差别相互平衡。酒中含85%卡波弗雷蒙（Cabernet Sauvignon）和15%卡波弗雷蒙（Cabernet Franc），口感长长而细腻。这种酒有很好的储存价值，建议在2018年之前不开瓶。

Western reviews.review: Intensives dunkles Rubin. Fein gezeichnete Nase mit ausgeprägten Noten nach dunklen Johannisbeeren, Brombeere, im Hintergrund etwas erdige Komponenten, sehr klar. Zeigt sich am Gaumen überaus saftig, für Sassicaia erstaunlich offen und zugänglich, viel knackige Frucht, viel feinkörniges Tannin, zeigt sich sehr elegant, im Finale langer Nachhall.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒。细致描绘的鼻子，具有明显的黑莓、黑莓和泥土味道，非常清晰。口感非常浓郁，Sassicaia令人惊讶的开放和易于接触，很多脆果，很多细粒性鞣质，表现出非常优雅，尾部长长的回音。

Western reviews.review: Verführerische Heidelbeeraromatik, Noten von Sandelholz , Lakritze und Tabak; der Ansatz sehr geschmeidig, viel robustes, noch jugendlich-frisches Tannin, aber auch viel Fülle, schöner Abgang auf Noten von saftigen Beeren. Grosser Wein, wird mit der Reife an Schmelz gewinnen und dann lange Freude bereiten.
Western reviews.translation: 迷人的黑莓香气，带有沉香、 licorice 和烟草的味道；口感非常滑顺，具有强烈的体积，仍然保持着年轻的果酸感，但也充满了丰富的味道，美妙的尾部带有浓郁的果实味道。是一款大酒，随着时间的推移会变得更加圆润，带来长久的享受。

Chinese pairs.original: 散发着甘甜的黑莓、樱桃香味，伴有些许细腻的雪松和甘草味道，质地十分柔滑，口感醇厚，酒体饱满，虽然不如其他 Grange 顶级品种那么精妙，不过它的口感极其浓缩且密集。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine exudes sweet blackberry and cherry aromas, accompanied by subtle notes of cedar and licorice. Its texture is incredibly smooth, with a rich, full-bodied mouthfeel and a satisfyingly full-bodied presence. While it may not match the finesse of other top-tier Grange offerings, its concentrated and intense flavors are undeniable.

Western reviews.review: Ripe, smoky and spicy, this is a wine of extraordinary subtlety and complexity, powerful without showing too much muscle. It layers its anise, black cherry and blackberry flavors to keep them zingy through the finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感丰富，带有烟熏和辣味，具有极高的细腻度和复杂性，虽然力量十足，但并不显得过于强烈。它将其 licorice、黑樱桃和黑莓的风味层次化，保持了口感清新持久的效果。

Western reviews.review: This is a very aromatic Grange that seems to be the product of a vintage where the wines are showing extremely well young. It is dense purple, with a sweet blackberry/cherry nose and some subtle cedar and licorice in the background, unctuously textured, thick, full, without as many nuances of some of the greatest vintages of Grange, but very concentrated and dense.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶非常浓郁的格兰奇（Grange）红酒，似乎是来自一年的葡萄酒表现非常出色的年份。酒色深紫，酒香甜美，带有黑莓和黑杏的气味，背景中有微妙的松木和甘草味。酒体丰富厚实，口感滑顺，厚重饱满，没有像一些最出色的年份格兰奇那样复杂的层次，但非常浓缩和密集。

Western reviews.review: Ripe, smoky and spicy, this is a wine of extraordinary subtlety and complexity, powerful without showing too much muscle. It layers its anise, black cherry and blackberry flavors to keep them zingy through the finish.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感丰富、烟熏味浓郁、带有辛辣的味道，具有极高的细腻度和复杂性，虽然力量十足却不显得过于强烈。它将其 licorice、黑樱桃和黑莓的味道层层叠加，保持了口感清新持久的效果。

Western reviews.review: This is a very aromatic Grange that seems to be the product of a vintage where the wines are showing extremely well young. It is dense purple, with a sweet blackberry/cherry nose and some subtle cedar and licorice in the background, unctuously textured, thick, full, without as many nuances of some of the greatest vintages of Grange, but very concentrated and dense.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶非常浓郁的格兰杰（Grange），似乎是来自一年的葡萄酒表现非常出色的年份。酒液呈深紫色，酒香浓郁，带有甜黑莓和黑杏的气味，背景中有微妙的松木和甘草味。酒体丰富厚实，口感滑顺，厚实饱满，没有像一些最出色的年份格兰杰那样复杂的层次，但非常浓缩和密集。

Chinese pairs.original: 与Sam Middleton在酒庄一同品鉴。此酒的香气深厚但芬芳，充满黑色水果（黑醋栗、黑樱桃）的香味，覆盖于深邃的泥土、香料、黑巧克力和咸矿物味之上。打底的紫罗兰花香增添了优雅，并且延续到口感中。酒体饱满，但新鲜、多汁同时如预期般通透，标志性的漂亮酸度逗留于那绵密、结实的收尾。
Chinese pairs.new: Tasted alongside Sam Middleton at the winery. This wine boasts a rich yet fragrant bouquet, overflowing with dark fruit aromas of black truffle and black cherry, layered atop profound earth, spice, black chocolate, and saline mineral notes. A subtle hint of lavender adds elegance and carries through to the palate. The full-bodied wine is both fresh and juicy, yet as expected, displays excellent transparency. A hallmark acidity lingers on the plush, satisfying finish.

English pairs.original: Tasted with Sam Middleton at the winery. Profound but aromatic on scent, plenty of black fruits (cassis, black cherry) overlaid the depths of earth, spices, black chocolate and savoury-mineral. An underlying violet-like florality added the elegance, and it continued onto the mouthfeel. Full-bodied but freshly juicy and expectedly bright, with hallmark beautiful acid that terminated in a dense and firm end.
English pairs.new: 在酒庄与Sam Middleton一起品尝。酒香深邃但芳香，黑果（黑加拿大蓝berries，黑樱桃）充满了泥土、香料、黑巧克力和矿物质的深度。细微的紫罗兰花香添加了优雅的气质，并延续到了口感。酒体丰富但新鲜果酱和明亮，具有典型的美丽酸度，结束于密集和坚实的口感。

Western reviews.review: The iconic Mount Mary Quintet is one of the jewels of the Yarra Valley. This Bordeaux field blend personifies the refined, cool climate wines of the region. The vineyard was planted in 1971 on sandy clay loams, farmed organically, and has been dry farmed from the start. These fermented on skins for 14 days, followed by 22 months of barrel maturation, with 25% of the blend in large format oak (1500L or larger), and 30% in new barriques (225L). This was bottled with minimal fining and filtration. Savoury cherry, wild blackberry is lined with graphite and iron, running a long, dusty gravels palate. Tannins are similarly lengthy and fine grained, leading this to an herbal mint finish. Incredibly elegant, and savoury, with the bright lifted fruit expected of the Yarra. Sample tasted at Global Comparative Tasting: Cabernet Sauvignon. (Treve Ring).
Western reviews.translation: 玛丽山山丘系列（Mount Mary Quintet）是亚拉河谷（Yarra Valley）的一颗珍珠。这款博德鲁斯（Bordeaux）混合葡萄酒（field blend）体现了该地区的精致、凉爽气候葡萄酒的特点。葡萄园于1971年在沙质粘土中种植，采用有机耕作，并从开始就采用干农法。这些葡萄酒在皮肤上发酵14天，随后在22个月的木桶中成熟，混合中有25%的葡萄酒在大型木桶（1500L或以上）中成熟，30%在新木桶（225L）中成熟。酒瓶中没有进行过多的精细和过滤。口感中有浓郁的樱桃和野生黑莓，伴有石墨和铁的味道，口感长长，沙沙的，像是在走过干燥的石子路上。同样，纤维也很长，细致，带来了一种清新的薄荷味的尾部。酒精度非常高，口感非常精致，具有亚拉河谷的典型特征。样品在全球比较品酒会（Global Comparative Tasting：Cabernet Sauvignon）中进行品尝（Treve Ring）。

Western reviews.review: (2021) From sandy clay-loam soils and again very old vines planted in 1971, these are farmed organically and the wine spent 20 months in 225L barriques, 35% new oak. There's a creamier, mintier profile than the Yarra Yering, slightly more lush and juicy, some very nice graphite notes and a little hint of that violetty, floral lift again. Certainly more sweet, dense and direct than the Yarra Yering, but not without light and shade, a lovely softness and poise to the tannin structure that it gentle but supportive. The acids also soft giving this a sweet but balanced finish.
Western reviews.translation:
来自沙质黏土土壤和再次非常老的1971年种植的葡萄藤，这些葡萄是有机耕种的，酒精在225升新橡木桶中陈化了20个月，35%是新橡木。 

与Yarra Yering相比，这款酒的风味更丰富、更清新，带有更多的草药味和浓郁的口感，伴有很好的石墨笔记和一丝紫罗兰般的花香。 

这款酒比Yarra Yering更甜、更浓郁、更直接，但并非没有光和影，酒中有柔和的质感和平衡的口感，酒中的纤维结构温和但支持。 

酒中的酸度也较软，使得酒尾甜但平衡。

Western reviews.review: A very delicate wine. On the nose, it has focused berry fruit and a stably undercurrent that follows through on the palate. It's smooth in the mouth, subtle in that it shines with the impression of bright berry fruit, but its size doesn't knock you over. Pretty, feminine and best of all, different. Imported by Old Bridge Cellars.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶非常细致的红酒。酒鼻中有着浓缩的浆果果香和稳定的底调，这种风味在口感中延续。口感平滑，细腻，酒中闪烁着明亮的浆果果香，但酒的体积并不强烈。这种风味很美丽，女性化，最重要的是独特。

Western reviews.review: This is a nice Bordeaux-style blend with pretty cherry and currant fruit and some cedar shadings, but lack the complexity of others in its style. It's straight forward, polite and restrained.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一个不错的波尔多风格的混合红酒，具有漂亮的樱桃和黑currant的果味和一些松木的阴影，但缺乏其他同类酒的复杂性。它的风格直接、礼貌、克制。

Chinese pairs.original: Messorio 2013的香气更加成熟，即便当年夏季十分干热，但在陈年9载之后始终保持着精致的“花容”。环绕在酸莓芬芳周围的是层出不穷的高级黑松露和黑橄榄的醇香，伴随着粉末状的单宁在口中无限延展。相比以往的年份来说，2013年份明显更加纯净，自内而外透着清新感。
Chinese pairs.new: The aroma of Messorio 2013 has matured even further, despite the extremely dry summer weather, and has retained its delicate "flower-like" charm after 9 years of aging. Surrounding the acidic raspberry fragrance are an endless array of high-end black truffle and black olive nuances, accompanied by a powdery tannin that unfolds endlessly in the mouth. Compared to previous vintages, the 2013 vintage is noticeably purer, with a refreshing quality that shines from within.

English pairs.original: Messorio 2013 has maturer aromas, and even though the summer was very dry and hot, this wine always maintains its delicate appearance after 9 years of bottle aging. Surrounding the fragrance of sour berries, the aromas of high-quality black truffle and black olives are mellow and have multi rich layers, accompanied by the chalky tannins spreading endlessly on the palate. Compared to the previous vintage, the 2013 one is purer, emitting a sense of freshness from the inside out.
English pairs.new: 梅索里奥2013年红酒具有成熟的香气，尽管夏季干热异常，但经过9年的瓶龄后，这款红酒仍保持着优雅的外观。周围的酸性黑berry香气中，高品质的黑松露和黑橄榄的香气温和多层次，伴随着口感上的 chalky纤维素层层展开。与之前的年份相比，2013年版更纯粹，内在的新鲜感从中溢出。

Western reviews.review: A crazy good wine that flirts with perfection, the 100% Merlot 2013 Messorio comes from two vineyards, the Puntone vineyard planted in 1993 and the Vignone vineyard planted in 1999. Aged 20 months in 70% new barrels, it knocks it out of the park with its plum and black cherry fruit and background oak, chocolate, smoke, and mineral bouquet. A sensational wine in every way, with a huge, concentrated, viscous texture, building tannin, and no weight, it's going to stand toe to toe with the best Merlots in the world. Drink this beauty anytime over the coming two decades.
Western reviews.translation: 一瓶疯狂的好酒，几乎完美无缺的2013年梅洛酒"Messorio"，来自两块葡萄园：1993年种植的Puntone葡萄园和1999年种植的Vignone葡萄园。酒龄20个月，70%的新橡木桶陈化，酒中充满了浓郁的黑浆果和黑樱桃果味，背景中有橡木、巧克力、烟雾和矿物质的香气。无论从哪个角度来看，这都是一个令人惊艳的酒，酒体丰富浓郁，口感厚重，后味持久，酒中的纤维素逐渐增强，但酒体却没有感到沉重。它将与世界上最好的梅洛酒站在同一台阶。可以在接下来的20年里随意品尝这瓶美酒。

Western reviews.review: The 2013 Messorio is a truly divine creation that puts Merlot on a well-deserved pedestal. This is a complete wine that accurately doses out its intensity and persistence with stopwatch precision. Dark fruit, blackberry, spice, leather, tar and tobacco are folded together into a homogeneous whole. The wine is supported by finely integrated tannins with lovely dark fruit flavors and beautifully plush textural richness. Thanks to the vintage warmth, the 2013 vintage is similar to 2011. But this current release presents a more delineated sense of freshness that holds it firmly stitched together. The finish is succulent and beautifully layered. Some 10,500 bottles were produced. This is a stunning wine that will not fade for decades to come.
Western reviews.translation: 2013 年的梅索里奥（Messorio）是一款真正的神作，给梅洛（Merlot）带来了应有的尊严。这是一款完美的葡萄酒，准确地控制了其强度和持久性，犹如时钟般精确。黑色水果、黑莓、香料、皮革、焦油和烟草的味道融合在一起，形成了一个统一的整体。酒精被细致地整合在一起，带来美丽的黑色水果味道和丰富的质感。由于当年的温暖天气，2013 年的产量与 2011 年相似。但是，这次的新品呈现出更明显的新鲜感，紧紧地将所有元素捆绑在一起。酒尾丰富多层次，令人垂涎欲滴。生产了约 10,500 瓶的葡萄酒。这是一款令人惊叹的葡萄酒，未来几十年都不会失色。

Western reviews.review: Cinzia Merli’s 2013 Messorio offers a thrilling combination of power, concentration and agility. “Unapologetic” was one taster’s reaction to the intensity of the wine’s lush fruit and vibrant spices. It rested for 20 months in French oak barriques (75 percent new), and opens with scents of toasted vanilla, dark chocolate and cardamom. The fruit flavors of black plum and forest berries are lusciously ripe, so dense that the acidity is hard to detect, yet it’s evident in the wine’s energetic freshness. Tight tannins feel cool and polished, supporting the rich fruit and spice flavors over several days as the wine takes on a wet-rock minerality that augments the firm structure. This is world-class merlot, with a long and layered finish that signals the potential for many years of positive development in the cellar.
Western reviews.translation: 辛齐娅·梅尔利的2013年梅索里奥红酒呈现出惊人的力量、浓度和灵活性。 “毫无歉意”是品酒师对酒中丰富的果味和生动的香料的反应。酒瓶在法国橡木桶中静置了20个月（75%新桶），并以烤香的香草、黑巧克力和卡达木的香气开启。黑浆果和森林浆果的果味丰富而浓郁，如此浓郁到酸度几乎难以察觉，但在酒中能感受到其生动的新鲜感。紧密的鞣质感凉爽而光滑，支持了酒中的丰富果味和香料味道数天后酒中出现了湿石的矿物质味道，这使得酒的结构更加坚实。这是一款世界级的梅洛红酒，酒尾长而层次分明，预示着酒在酒窖中有许多年积累的潜力。

Western reviews.review: An impressive array of plum, cherry, vanilla, toast and stone flavors are the hallmarks of this powerful yet polished red, showing excellent concentration and purity matched to freshness and length. There is a sense of youthful harmony that should improve as this mellows with time. Merlot. Best from 2020 through 2038.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的特点是丰富的浆果、樱桃、香草、烘烤和石果风味，展现出强劲的力量和精致的质地，展现出出色的浓度和纯度，配以新鲜和持久的口感。酒中有一种年轻的和谐感，随着时间的推移会变得更加完美。该酒的主要成分是梅洛。建议在2020年至2038年内饮用。

Western reviews.review: Beautiful richness and balance to this red with very velvety tannins and fresh acidity. Love the intensity and silkiness. Plus the flavor of chocolate, black olive and dark fruits is captivating. Pure merlot. Better in 2019.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的风味非常丰富，平衡很好，口感细腻，酸度清新。酒中有强烈的浓郁感和丝滑感，巧妙地融合了巧克力、黑橄榄和黑果的风味。纯正的梅洛葡萄酒。建议在2019年喝。

Chinese pairs.original: 此酒略带异国情调的香气充满甜花和泥土味，打底的是深邃的香料矿物、碘和山羊奶酪气息。庄严的口感富有圆润、多汁的果味以及些许咸味和带来下层张力的坚实单宁。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine boasts an exotic bouquet with notes of sweet flowers and earthy undertones, underpinned by deep, mineral, iodine, and goat cheese aromas. The full-bodied palate is rich in rounded, juicy fruit flavors, with a hint of saltiness and a firm, tannic structure that adds depth and tension.

English pairs.original: Sweetly floral and earthy on the faintly exotic nose with a deep background of spicy-mineral, iodine and goat cheese. Rounded and juicy fruitiness suffused the austere palate that had subtle salinity and firm tannin that led to the underlying tension.
English pairs.new: 这款红酒的香气中带有甜蜜的花朵和泥土味，略带异国情调的气息，背景中有着浓郁的辣椒矿物质、碘和奶酪味。口感圆润丰富，果味丰富却不失清爽，口感中有细微的咸味和坚实的纤维，带有潜在的紧张感。

Western reviews.review: Strong garnet colour with ochre reflections, brighter a the broad rim. Fine nuances of candied orange zest and ripe plum, sweet tobacco and liquorice: a multi-faceted bouquet, with a fine note of blackcurrant. Juicy, elegant and with fine fruit expression and fine tannins. Already well matured. Has reached a first drinking peak and shows very good freshness and length – a Chilean classic.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的颜色是深红色，带有黄褐色的光泽，瓶口处更为明亮。酒香中有柑橘的糖化香气和熟透的石榴味，甜烟和甘草的香气，黑currant的清晰音符。口感丰富，优雅，果味丰富，纤维度细腻。酒已经成熟，已经达到最佳饮用峰值，展现出极好的新鲜度和持久度——这是一个典型的智利红酒。

Western reviews.review: Earthy black-olive and foresty herbal scents accent core blackberry and moss aromas. Intense, juicy acidity gives this Cabernet blend vitality across the palate. Herbal berry, olive, pepper and tobacco flavors are spicy on a finish bolstered by brisk, powerful acidity. Drink through 2025.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气中，带有土壤和黑橄榄的味道，混合着森林的草药味和黑莓和苔藓的香气。 这款红酒的强烈的酸度使其在口感上充满活力。 在口感中，草药、黑莓、橄榄、胡椒和烟草的味道相互融合，带有刺激的味道。 酒尾由强烈的酸度和强大的力量支持。 建议在2025年前饮用。

Western reviews.review: (2016) 79% Caberent Sauvignon, 10% Malbec, 6% Carmenere, 5% Petit Verdot. 22 months in French oak, 65% new. The lowering of the oak is the obvious step change here again. Lovely sandalwood notes are fragrant, more pot-pourri edges to the oak, lovely fresh fruit too – a little closed in this young wine, but has such lovely balance, such an agile, fresh palate with plenty of fruit but that intrinsic energy, more balsamic, delightful and balanced stuff.
Western reviews.translation:
2016年产酒，主要成分为：

* 79% 卡贝网酒（Cabernet Sauvignon）
* 10% 马尔贝克（Malbec）
* 6% 卡门埃雷（Carmenere）
* 5% 小栎（Petit Verdot）

酒龄22个月，使用法兰克橡木桶，新橡木桶占65%。

这款酒的橡木味降低了，变得更加清晰。酒中有美丽的檀香味和花香味，新橡木的味道也很好闻。酒中有新鲜的水果味，但这款酒还比较年轻，需要时间来打开。酒的平衡很好，口感轻盈，充满活力，水果味丰富，酒中有更多的柠檬味和美味的酸度。

Western reviews.review: Strong ruby garnet, purple reflections, discreet ochre rim brightening. Delicately savoury bouquet of raspberries and blackberries, fresh cherries, floral nuances, some marzipan, inviting. Juicy, substantial and elegant, very good freshness, fine tannins, mineral and long lasting, delicate fruit sweetness on the finish, secure certain ageing potential, shows length, approaching the first drinking window.
Western reviews.translation:
这瓶红酒的颜色是深红宝石色，带有紫色反光，酒口边缘有细微的黄色光泽。

酒香清新果香，带有浓郁的黑莓和红莓味，新鲜的草莓味，花朵的香气，杏仁味，非常诱人。

口感丰富醇厚，非常清新，纤维度细腻，矿物质味道持久，酒尾有细微的果香甜度，酒有很好的陈化潜力，酒展现出很好的长度，接近首次饮用时机。

Western reviews.review: Patented Chilean aromas of herbas, blackberry and dark plum are spicy and feature a fair amount of oak and related wood smoke. On the palate, this Cabernet Sauvignon-driven blend is juicy and high in energy. Plum, currant and wild berry flavors maintain a sense of freshness on the finish. Overall, this is showy and complex. Best from 2022 to 2030. Michael Schachner
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的风味特点是典型的智利风格，带有草药、黑莓和黑杏的香气，具有辛辣的味道，并且有大量的橡木和烟熏味。口感丰富，能量高，黑莓、黑杏和野生莓果的味道保持着清新感。整体来说，这款红酒表现出色，复杂多变。建议在2022年至2030年之间饮用。 - 米高·沙克纳 (Michael Schachner)

Chinese pairs.original: 香味复杂，果香，辛香中带着细微黑莓，黑醋栗和烟草的芬芳。口感柔顺，热烈，结构完整，有果味和辛香的回味，持久悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Complex aromas of fruit, with subtle hints of blackberry, black walnut, and smoky notes. Smooth, full-bodied texture with a complete structure, lingering flavors of fruit and spice.

Western reviews.review: is one way to describe this Cabernet-Malbec blend. The bouquet is full of smoky balsam wood, leather and solid berry fruit, while the palate is both juicy and plentiful as it pushes equal amounts of bold black fruit and warming oak. A very solid Argentinean icon wine with impeccable structure and liveliness. Better in 2008.
Western reviews.translation: 这款卡贝网-马尔贝克混合红酒的风格可以用“典型的南美风格”来描述。酒中的香气充满了烟熏的松木、皮革和坚实的浆果味，而口感则是既 juicy 又丰富的，黑果和温暖的橡木味都有着平衡的份量。是一款结构坚实、生动活泼的阿根廷标志性红酒。2008年更佳。

Chinese pairs.original: 优美的黑浆果和烟熏橡木气味，口感充满黑浆果与柔和的单宁，酒体丰满，口感复杂，浆果味道浓郁，余韵持续悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Elegant blackberry and smoky oak aromas, with a rich, full-bodied texture and a complex, velvety palate featuring intense blackberry flavors and a lingering finish.

Western reviews.review: This is a rich, ripe style of Coonawarra Shiraz, amply framed by toasty, cedary oak. The tannins are supple to the point of creaminess, the slightly stewed fruits graced with just a hint of mint. Best from 2010–2015, maybe a few years more.
Western reviews.translation: 这是科纳瓦拉地区的丰富、成熟的雪利酒，充分受到香烟、松木的影响。它的坚果味和果实味非常丰富，口感柔顺到几乎是奶油般的。虽然果实味略微有些烹饪过度，但却带有微妙的薄荷味。建议在2010-2015年之间饮用，可能还能再延长几年。

Chinese pairs.original: 成熟甜美的蓝莓、黑加仑和无花果，咖啡、甘草和雪松增加了层次感，结构庞大，单宁强劲，酒体均衡，口感和谐， 悠长的回味。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich, sweet flavors of blueberry, blackcurrant, and quince, with added depth from notes of coffee, licorice, and pine. A full-bodied wine with robust tannins, balanced texture, and a harmonious finish, with a long, lingering aftertaste.

Western reviews.review: Spicy, vanilla, tobacco leaf, cassis, black cherry, mocha, meaty, floral nose with a hint of bay leaf and black olive. Rich, ripe, round, warm palate with good acidity and young, grainy smooth tannins. Big black cherry, cassis jam, peppery, vanilla, cardamom, smoky coffee, bay leaf, licorice root and grilled meat flavours. Very warm finish at 15% alcohol but has good concentration and intensity. Needs 1-3 years to round out or try with bbq lamb or chops. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的口感非常丰富，具有浓郁的黑樱桃、黑加思、肉香、花香等味道，口感丰富、圆润、温暖，酸度适中，年轻的粗糙但又细腻的橡果感。口感中有浓郁的黑樱桃、黑加思果酱、辣椒、香草、卡达木、烟熏咖啡、贝叶、甘草根和烤肉的味道。酒精度高达15%，但酒精度高但酒精感并不突出，酒精度高但酒精感并不突出，酒精度高但酒精感并不突出。建议在1-3年后再次品尝，或与烤羊肉或羊排搭配。
