kay brothers amery vineyards block 6 shi.name: kay brothers amery vineyards block 6 shiraz 2018

Chinese pairs.original: Kay家族于1892年从Thomas Hardy的Tintara园取得插穗，从而建立了Amery Vineyard Block 6 ——1.5公顷Block 6的127年老藤葡萄树种植在坡地上，土壤由铁矿石、石灰石、片岩、砾石和黏土所组成。葡萄手工采摘；在水泥缸中进行开罐式发酵；压帽；篮式压榨；酒液在40%新、比例各半的法国和美国小桶内陈年。在酒庄和酿酒师Duncan Kennedy垂直品鉴，其中包括2018年份的桶边试饮（离装瓶还差两个月）。此酒展现令人兴奋的纯净感和新鲜感。杯中散发大量黄色花朵、蔓越莓、黑莓、杏、碎岩石和甜香料（桂皮、红色甘草）的香味，与圣诞布丁及泥土气息交织在一起。纤细的口感充满轮廓分明的矿物质感，带来些许庄严感——被那来自坚实但丝滑单宁的美妙顺滑感所抵消，一并延续到其富有成线性的多汁、锐利酸度以及果味的绵密、高雅回味。Kay Brothers或许是非美国酒庄中最会用美国桶的生产者了。
Chinese pairs.new: Kay家族于1892年从Thomas Hardy的Tintara园取得插穗，从而建立了Amery Vineyard Block 6。Block 6的127年老藤葡萄树种植在坡地上，土壤由铁矿石、石灰石、片岩、砾石和黏土所组成。葡萄手工采摘；在水泥缸中进行开罐式发酵；压帽；篮式压榨；酒液在40%新、比例各半的法国和美国小桶内陈年。在酒庄和酿酒师Duncan Kennedy垂直品鉴，其中包括2018年份的桶边试饮（离装瓶还差两个月）。此酒展现令人兴奋的纯净感和新鲜感。杯中散发大量黄色花朵、蔓越莓、黑莓、杏、碎岩石和甜香料（桂皮、红色甘草）的香味，与圣诞布丁及泥土气息交织在一起。纤细的口感充满轮廓分明的矿物质感，带来些许庄严感——被那来自坚实但丝滑单宁的美妙顺滑感所抵消，一并延续到其富有成线性的多汁、锐利酸度以及果味的绵密、高雅回味。Kay Brothers或许是非美国酒庄中最会用美国桶的生产者了。

English pairs.original: Kay family collected Shiraz cuttings from Thomas Hardy's Tintara Vineyard to create the Block 6 of Amery Vineyard on 1892--the 1.5 hectares vines of Block 6 are now 127 years old and are grown on the slope where the soils are a mixture of ironstone, limestone, schist, gravel and clay. The grapes are hand-picked; open fermentation in concrete vats; punching down; basket press; maturing in 40% new small French and American oak barrels (half and half). A vertical tasting with the winemaker Duncan Kennedy at the winery, including the barrel tasting of the 2018 (2 months before the bottling). Showing thrilling purity and freshness. A wealth of yellow flowers, cranberry, blackberry, apricot, crushed stone and sweet spices (cinnamon, red liquorice) aromas radiated from the glass, entangled with Christmas pudding and earth. The finesse-styled mouthfeel was laden with chiseled minerality that resulted in a lick of solemnity counteracted by wonderful smoothness generated from solid yet talc-like tannin that carried over to the dense but dignified and fruited finish propped up by juicy, linear and pointed acid. Perhaps the most skillful user of American oak outside America.
English pairs.new: 凯家族从托马斯·哈迪的蒂纳拉葡萄园（Tintara Vineyard）收集了雪利酒（Shiraz）葡萄苗木，于1892年创立了阿梅里葡萄园（Amery Vineyard）的第6块葡萄园。现在，第6块葡萄园的1.5公顷葡萄园已经有127年历史，种植在斜坡上，土壤是铁石、石灰岩、片岩、碎石和粘土的混合物。葡萄采摘手工；在混凝土罐中进行开放发酵；踩下；篮子压榨；在40%新的小法国和美国橡木桶中成熟（半半）。与酒庄的制酒师邓肯·肯尼迪（Duncan Kennedy）一起进行垂直品鉴，包括2018年的桶酒品鉴（2个月前瓶装）。展现出令人惊叹的纯净和新鲜感。黄色花朵、蔓越莓、黑莓、杏子、碎石和甜香料（丁香、红糖浆）等香气从玻璃中辐射出来，缠绕着圣诞布丁和泥土。细致的口感充满了雕刻般的矿物质，结果是严肃的味道被美妙的光滑感所抵消，由坚实但如滑石般的纤维素所产生，纤维素在浓密但庄严和果实的结尾中延续，受到果汁、线性和尖锐的酸的支撑。也许是美国以外最擅长使用美国橡木的酒庄。

Western reviews.review: This is another powerful and austere bottling from this historic McLaren Vale estate. Vanilla and cola aromas sit beside plump plum and berry fruit, licorice and dusty spice. In the mouth, there's freshness alongside powerful, granular tannins. Drink 2023–2032. Christina Pickard
Western reviews.translation: 这是麦克劳伦谷历史悠久的庄园再次推出的强劲而严谨的酒款。酒中有香草和可乐的香气伴随着丰富的浓郁果实，如浆果和莓果， licorice 和尘土般的香料。口感中有清新感与强劲的粗糙橡胶感。建议饮用时间：2023-2032。 Christina Pickard。

Western reviews.review: Extrovertierte Aromatik: Marzipan, Fruchtgelée, Kamille, altes Leder, ätherisch, Eukalyptus. Am Gaumen diskrete Röstaromen, präsentes, feinkörniges Tannin, gute Textur, bleibt lang und endet auf feine Mineralik sowie reife Aprikose, die einen frischen Kontrapunkt zur extravaganten Aromatik in der Nase setzt.
Western reviews.translation: 外向的香气：杏仁糖、果冻、菊花、旧皮革、芳香、桉树。口感中有细微的红酒味道，清晰、细腻的苦味，良好的口感，持久且以细腻的矿物质和成熟的杏子结束，杏子与鼻子中的豪放香气形成鲜明的对比。

Chinese pairs.original: Langi Shiraz酿自种植于1969年的Old Block园。每一个地块的葡萄都独立手工采摘；在开罐式发酵罐中压帽；酒液在少于20%新的法国小桶内陈年。2005年开始使用螺旋盖。在酒庄与葡萄种植者兼总经理Damien Sheehan以及总酿酒师Adam Louder垂直品鉴。花岗岩土壤和从西南吹来的冷风造就了此酒独特的风格。激动人心的诱人香气充满以野生牡丹为主的芬芳花香，打底的岩石气息埋藏于雅致的蔓越莓、黑莓、杏、甜香料（桂皮、红色甘草）、灌木、泥土、烤吐司和些许格兰皮恩斯设拉子常有的白巧克力香味之下。富有甜美、通透果味的口感展现了不起的新鲜度、飘逸感和纯净感——被成线性的锐利酸度所增强，酸度还赋予那层次感、滋味十足的滑爽回味生津感和多汁感，而收尾处的一点坚实感则来源于刚劲但细腻的单宁。这支酒可以优雅陈年25年。风格更为新派的2018年份相比2017年份少了一份深邃和还原。
Chinese pairs.new:
Langi Shiraz

This wine is crafted from the 1969 Old Block vineyard. Each block is hand-picked, foot-trodden and fermented in open-top vats. The wine is aged in less than 20% new French oak barrels. Since 2005, screwcaps have been used. Winemaker Adam Louder and winery owner and viticulturist Damien Sheehan conducted a vertical tasting of the wine. The wine's unique style is shaped by its granite soils and the cool winds from the southwest.

The wine's alluring aroma is filled with wild rose, dominated by floral scents, with a subtle rocky undertone buried beneath elegant raspberry, blackberry, peach, sweet spices (cinnamon, red licorice), bush, earth, toasted bread and a hint of white chocolate. The palate is rich, transparent and fruity, showcasing excellent freshness, elegance and purity – enhanced by a linear, sharp acidity that adds depth, flavor and a silky, refreshing finish with a juicy texture. A subtle tannin structure provides a firm but refined finish.

This wine can be aged elegantly for 25 years. The more modern 2018 vintage is less profound and less intense than the 2017 vintage.

English pairs.original: Langi Shiraz is made from the Old Block Vineyard planted in 1969. The grapes from each parcel are harvested separately and are only picked by hand; punching down in the open fermenters; using less than 20% new French barriques. Bottled under screw-cap closures since 2005. A vertical tasting with the viticulturist/general manager Damien Sheehan and the chief winemaker Adam Louder at the winery. The granitic soils (with tiny red clay loams) and cold, south-westerly winds are influential in producing its distinctive flavour profiles. Fragrantly floral (wild peony predominately) on the temptingly breathtaking smell with a rocky background concealed in the stylish notes of cranberry, blackberry, apricot, sweet spices (cinnamon, red liquorice), scrub, earth, toast and a thimbleful of white chocolate commonly found in Grampians Shiraz. Sweet and bright fruit suffused the palate that possessed terrific freshness, ethereality and purity underlined by linear and keen acid that gave the salivary and juicy sense to the polished, flavoursome and layered finish that showed subtle sturdiness generated from the structured yet detailed tannin. This would mature gracefully for 25 years. Revealing less depth and reduction than the 2017, the 2018 was much more modern in style.
English pairs.new: 朗吉希拉兹（Langi Shiraz）是由1969年种植的老块葡萄园（Old Block Vineyard）生产的。每个葡萄包装都单独收获，并仅由手工采摘；在开放式发酵罐中进行压榨；使用少于20%的新法式白桉木桶。自2005年以来，该酒瓶都使用螺丝盖封闭。与葡萄园管理人兼总经理达米恩·希恩（Damien Sheehan）和首席酒师亚当·劳德（Adam Louder）一起进行垂直品鉴。该酒的风味特征受到其风化岩土壤（含有微小的红色粘土）和冷、西南风的影响。酒的香气中充满了花香（野百合花居多），伴有岩石背景，风格的笔记中包含了蔓越莓、黑莓、杏子、甜香料（肉桂、红糖浆）、灌木丛、土壤、烤面包和白巧克力（常见于格拉彭山希拉兹）的味道。酒的口感甜美、清新，具有出色的新鲜度、轻盈感和纯粹度，酸度线性、锐利，给了酒的口感清脆、果香浓郁、层次丰富的尾部，表明了由结构化的、详细的鞣质产生的细微的坚韧性。这酒将在25年内成熟。相比2017年，2018年酒的风格更加现代化。

Western reviews.review: The sort of wine that really needs to be experienced, rather than written about, because comments about it don't do justice to how attractive it is. It smells like acorns and iron ore—metallic, yes, but powerfully so, and not at all shrill. In the mouth it offers thick, wooly tannins and an iron-steely spine, with juicy plum and black cherry flavors. Atypical and very enjoyable. Imported by Epic Wines.
Western reviews.translation: 这个红酒的魅力难以用文字描述，需要亲自体验。它的香气像橡树和铁矿石一样，金属味道强烈但不刺耳。在口中它带来厚实的纤维质和铁锈般的坚韧感，伴随着浓郁的浆果和黑杏子的风味。这种风格独特而令人愉悦。

Western reviews.review: This well-respected winery is located in the cool climes of the Great Dividing Range, west of Melbourne. Langi is its top red, from rare, pre-phylloxera Shiraz clones planted in 1969. It offers a lovely lift of red cherry, violet, tobacco and spice with a spine of vanilla cola from the oak. The medium- to full-bodied palate follows through on the freshness factor with lifted acidity and fruit purity, wound in leathery, herbal tannins. Drink now–2031, at least. Christina Pickard
Western reviews.translation: 这家享有盛誉的酒庄位于墨尔本西面的大分水岭山脉的凉爽地区。 Langi 是它的顶级红酒，来自于1969年种植的罕见的前phylloxera时期的雪利酒。它带来了一种美丽的红樱桃、紫罗兰、烟草和香料的气味，以及来自橡木的香味。中等到全口感的口感继续保持了清新感，带来了一种提拔的酸度和果实纯粹感，缠绕在了皮革、草药的坚果味的纽带上。建议尽快饮用，至少到2031年。 Christina Pickard。

Chinese pairs.original: 香气活泼而馥郁，蓝莓、黑樱桃的饱满香气中透出些许摩卡的清香，口感强劲而丰富，有着浓郁的红色浆果、乌梅的香味，与柔顺的单宁形成极佳平衡。
Chinese pairs.new: Vibrant and intense aromas of blueberry and black cherry, with a hint of mocha, lead to a robust and full-bodied palate, featuring rich red fruit and umami flavors in perfect harmony with smooth tannins.

Western reviews.review: Katnook's Prodigy Shiraz is full bodied and creamy in texture, combining authentic Shiraz aromas and flavors with easy-drinking, open-knit appeal. Scents of tar, black olive and blackberry give way to flavors of red peppercorn and mixed berry. Drink now–2018.
Western reviews.translation: 卡特诺克的天才红酒（Katnook's Prodigy Shiraz）是一款充满体积和奶油质感的红酒，结合了真正的雪利酒香气和口感，以及轻松饮用、开阔的魅力。焦油、黑橄榄和黑莓的香气逐渐转变为红胡椒和混合莓果的口感。建议立即饮用至2018年。

Chinese pairs.original: 充满了甘草、黑醋栗、木炭、黑橄榄和石墨的味道。酒体饱满，口感香醇而丰裕，单宁适中。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich with molasses, black walnut, charcoal, black olive, and graphite flavors. Full-bodied with a smooth, rich texture and moderate tannins.

Western reviews.review: Plush layers of fresh blackberry, dark cherry jam, coffee, bitter chocolate and boysenberry, ripe tannins and a silky, ripe, vanilla tinged, fruit forward finish are found in this vintage of Phelps Insignia.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶费尔普斯（Phelps）Insignia红酒的风味丰富多彩，展现出新鲜黑莓、黑酱果、咖啡、苦巧克力和男孩莓的层次感。酒中充满了成熟的苦味和细滑的口感，尾部带有浓郁的香气和果味，尤其是浓郁的香草味。

Western reviews.review: There are $15 Cabs that are better to drink now. This is so strong and fruity, so oaky, so tannic, it just overwhelms the palate in its extreme youth. Just massive in blackberries, black currants, coffee, cocoa, dried herbs andnew, smoky-sweet French. Ridiculous to open it anytime soon. Desperately needs time in the bottle, and the point score reflects potential. Try 2012–2018.
Western reviews.translation: 有15种佳酿更适合现在饮用。这种红酒太强烈、太浓郁、太苦涩，太年轻，简直让人难以品尝。它的黑莓、黑加仑、咖啡、可可、干燥香草和新鲜烟熏甜的法国风味都非常浓郁。完全不适合现在打开。它迫切需要在瓶子里放置一段时间，评分反映了它的潜力。建议在2012-2018年之间品尝。

Chinese pairs.original: 酒庄16公顷葡萄园内的葡萄藤均采取单高登式培型方式。手工采摘并去梗的果实在全新的法国小桶内酿制，其中包括18个月的桶储。以庄主名字命名的旗舰酒Maurizio Fuselli年产量仅1500瓶，是一款百分百小维多。瓶醒超过7小时。深紫红色。此酒略带异国情调的优雅、芬芳香气颇为均衡，轻嗅酒透出大量紫罗兰和甜香料（肉豆蔻、黑色甘草）味，与石墨、香草、黑巧克力、黑莓、燕窝果和金橘蜜饯交织在一起，延续到坚实口感的些许碎岩石滋味增添了一抹庄严，粉末状但纹理细致的强劲单宁使口感显得愈发丝滑，成线性的清晰酸度是那深厚、饱满却又细腻、活泼而且无比清澈回味的主旋律，因此整体完全没有任何过于庞大的感觉。无疑是小维多单品的标杆。
Chinese pairs.new:
位于葡萄园16公顷的葡萄藤采用单高登式培型方式。手工采摘并去梗的葡萄在全新的法国小桶中酿制，包括18个月的桶储。以庄主名字命名的旗舰酒Maurizio Fuselli，每年仅生产1500瓶，是一款纯正的小维多。瓶醒超过7小时。酒色深紫红。

酒香优雅、芬芳，略带异国情调，气味均衡。酒香中透出大量紫罗兰和甜香料（肉豆蔻、黑色甘草），与石墨、香草、黑巧克力、黑莓、燕窝果和金橘蜜饯交织在一起。坚实的口感中有碎岩石的味道，增添了一抹庄严。强劲的单宁使口感丝滑，清晰的酸度是深厚、饱满、细腻、活泼和清澈的主旋律。整体感觉完全没有过于庞大的感觉。无疑是小维多单品的标杆。

English pairs.original: Vines in the estate's 16 hectares vineyards are all grown in single cordon spur training method. The hand-picked and de-stemmed fruits are vinified exclusively in entirely new French barriques, including 18 months' maturation. Produced in merely 1500 bottles per year, the flagship Maurizio Fuselli named after the proprietor is made from 100% Petit Verdot. Aeration in bottle for more than 7 hours. Dark purple-red. Elegantly fragrant and faintly exotic on the beautifully poised sniff that was suffused with violet and sweet spices (nutmeg, black liquorice) interwoven with graphite, vanilla, black chocolate, blackberry, bird's nest fruit, preserved kumquat and a speck of crushed stone that added subtle solemnity that continued onto firmly structured mouthfeel that possessed fairly silky texture enlarged by somewhat powdery and forcefully fine-grained tannins, all terminating in a profoundly full-bodied yet delicately energetic and strikingly lucid finish where the keystone was the precisely linear acidity so that there was completely no overwhelming sensation. Indubitably the benchmark for the straight Petit Verdot.
English pairs.new: 这瓶红酒来自于一座葡萄园，葡萄园的16公顷葡萄园中，每一株葡萄都是采用单根葡萄训练法。手采摘并去梗的葡萄全部在新法国白桉木桶中酿造，包括18个月的发酵。每年仅生产1500瓶，这瓶名为Maurizio Fuselli的旗舰酒以100% Petit Verdot为原料。瓶内氧化超过7小时。酒色深紫红。酒香优雅芬芳，略带异国情调，闻起来有紫罗兰和甜香料（肉豆蔻、黑糖浆）与石墨、香草、黑巧克力、黑莓、鸟巢果、蜜橘和碎石的味道交织在一起，酒口结构坚实，口感滑腻，由于粉末状和细致的纤维质，酒尾深度饱满，能量充沛，清晰明了，酸度线性精确，完全没有过载感。毫无疑问，这是纯 Petit Verdot的标杆酒。

Western reviews.review: Estremamente coinvolgente ed estroverso mostra un profilo visivo scuro quasi impenetrabile ma un carattere sensoriale armonico e disteso. Le note di china e ginseng si fondono a presenze di varia intensità che ricordano il bergamotto, i limoni, le foglie di tè nero, il sandalo, l'incenso, la noce moscata ed i chiodi di garofano. Corpo pieno, tannini molto rigidi al momento che creano l'ossatura del vino ed un finale ricco e vibrante che si muove nel migliore dei modi nel sorso. Avrà bisogno di diverso tempo per distendersi al meglio. Meglio dal 2028.
Western reviews.translation:
这个红酒评论翻译成中文如下：

极具吸引力和开朗的风格，展现出一个几乎不可穿透的深色视觉面貌，但却拥有一个和谐而舒展的感官特质。中国和 Ginseng 的香味融合在一起，伴随着各种强度不同的存在，回忆起柠檬、柚子、黑茶叶、沉香、檀香、肉桂和丁香的味道。酒体丰富，刚刚开始的坚硬的苦味在形成酒的骨架中发挥作用，而富有活力的结尾在口感中流动得非常好。它需要一些时间才能完全放松。建议从 2028 年开始品尝。

Chinese pairs.original: 2021年份的Chadwick 似乎更加注重对纯净度的表达，品尝之际，我所感到的不是传统智利酒的热情和喜庆，而是勃艮第式的矜持和优雅。果实的成熟度非常出色，没有印象中又熟又青的感觉，取而代之的是颗颗多汁酸爽的樱桃、杨梅。其丝绸似的单宁细致如发，回味之时仿佛漫步在一个梦境中。
Chinese pairs.new:
2021年份的Chadwick似乎更加注重对纯净度的表达，品尝之际，我所感到的不是传统智利酒的热情和喜庆，而是勃艮第式的矜持和优雅。果实的成熟度非常出色，没有印象中又熟又青的感觉，取而代之的是颗颗多汁酸爽的樱桃、杨梅。其丝绸似的单宁细致如发，回味之时仿佛漫步在一个梦境中。

Translated to English:

The 2021 Chadwick seems to focus more on expressing purity, and when tasting, I felt neither the traditional warmth and festivity of Chilean wine nor the Burgundian restraint and elegance. The ripeness of the fruit is exceptional, without the impression of being both overripe and underripe, instead, it's like a bunch of juicy and tart cherries and raspberries. The silky tannins are as fine as silk, and when savoring, it's like walking in a dream.

English pairs.original: The vintage of 2021 Chadwick seems to place a heightened emphasis on the expression of purity. Upon tasting, what I perceive is not the exuberance and festivity commonly associated with traditional Chilean wines, but rather a Burgundian sense of restraint and grace. The ripeness of the fruit is remarkably impressive, unlike the familiar sensation of <ripe yet green> in lots of Chilean wines, it offers succulent and tangy notes of cherry and blackberry. Its silky tannins are as delicate as a strand of hair, and in the lingering finish, it feels akin to strolling through a dream.
English pairs.new: 2021年查德威克红酒似乎更加强调了纯粹的表达。品尝后，我感受到的并不是传统智利红酒常见的热情和庆祝感，而是勃艮第风格的克制和优雅。果实的成熟度令人印象深刻，与许多智利红酒中常见的“成熟但仍然青涩”的感觉不同，它提供了浓郁的樱桃和黑莓味道。它的细腻的纤维质如同一根头发般轻柔，在余味中，它仿佛是在梦游中漫步。

Western reviews.review: Blend tinto composto de 97% Ca bernet Sauvignon e 3% Petit Verdot, com estágio de 22 meses em barris de carvalho francês, sendo 80% em barricas (80% novas) e 20% em foudres. Austero nos aromas e nos sabores, chama atenção pela nitidez e precisão de suas frutas vermelhas e negras, maduras no ponto certo, com sua acidez vibrante e seus taninos firmes, tensos e de grãos finos trazendo fluidez e verticalidade ao vinho. Cheio de finesse e ainda jovem, tem final longo, com toques terrosos, redutivos, de cassis, de amoras, de grafite e de alcaçuz. Apresenta as melhores qualidades dos anos de 2016 e de 2018. Une a fluidez, a verticalidade e o frescor da safra 2016, com o equilíbrio e a nitidez de fruta da safra 2018. Seguramente entre os melhores vinhos chilenos provados por ADEGA até o momento, tem tudo para ficar ainda melhor nas próximas décadas. Álcool 14%.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶混合红酒，主要由97%的卡伯内特·萨维尼昂和3%的佩蒂·维多特组成。酒龄22个月，全部陈酿于法国橡木桶中，80%的桶是新桶，20%的桶是大型陈酿桶。酒的气味和口感都比较严谨，酒中的红色和黑色果味清晰可辨，果味成熟，酸度生动，坚果味丰富，酒体流畅，结构紧致。酒尾长，带有泥土、焦糖、黑加仑、黑莓和烟草的味道。酒呈现出2016年和2018年的最佳品质，结合了两年的优点，酒体流畅，结构紧致，口感清新。酒精度14%。

Western reviews.review: Deep dark ruby with an opaque core and purple reflections, delicately brighter at the edge. Subtle notes of cassis, mocha, vanilla caramel, dark fruits of the forest, a hint of fresh fig, very subtle precious wood notes and orange zest. Complex, juicy, sweet texture, with ripe, sweet red cherry. Vivid, supporting tannins, pronounced in fruit and mineral-salty. Still extremely young and somewhat closed in this phase, but shows very good length and enormous ageing potential. Patience is required here but the ageing potential is clearly recognisable. Undoubtedly the greatest red wine produced in Chile to date.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的颜色是深红宝石色，核心是透明的，边缘有紫色的反射。酒中有樱桃、摩卡、香草糖、森林黑果、新鲜枣子的微妙气味，还有非常微妙的贵木和橙子皮的气味。酒的口感复杂、浓郁、甜美，带有成熟的甜樱桃味。酒中的纤维素清晰、支持果味和矿物质盐味。虽然这款酒还非常年轻，但它的酒龄潜力非常明显。需要耐心等待，但这款酒的酒龄潜力是非常值得期待的。毫无疑问，这是迄今为止产自智利的最出色的红酒。

Western reviews.review: La cosecha 2021 fue fresca en el Alto Maipo, especialmente en época de maduración de las uvas, lo que se ha traducido en frutas más rojas y frescas, pero sobre todo en la expresión de taninos finos y punzantes de la zona de Puente Alto. Esta versión de Chadwick responde a esa descripción, las frutas rojas, la tensión de la acidez que parece resaltar la textura de los taninos, las notas a flores y hierbas que se muestran hacia el final. Una versión de las mejores que hemos probado. La primera edición de este Viñedo Chadwick fue en 1999, y desde entonces se ha basado en cabernet sauvignon, con algo de petit verdot. Viene de los suelos aluviales del viñedo Tocornal, la misma fuente de grandes vinos chilenos, como Almaviva o Don Melchor. Desde la cosecha 2014 este vino venía cambiando, moviéndose a territorios más frescos, con menos madera y menos alcohol. La cosecha 2016 fue una suerte de "salida del clóset", un año frío fue la coartada perfecta para mostrar esta nueva cara.
Western reviews.translation:
2021 年的收获在阿尔托马约（Alto Maipo）地区非常新鲜，尤其是在葡萄成熟的季节，这导致了更红、更新鲜的果味，但更重要的是，表达了普恩特阿尔托（Puente Alto）地区的细致、锋利的鞣质。Chadwick 的这款酒正是对应了这种描述，红果味、酸度的紧张感使得鞣质的质地更加明显，最后出现了花香和草香的笔记。这是我们尝过的最好的版本。

Chadwick 的第一瓶是在 1999 年推出的，自那时以来，它一直以卡贝网（Cabernet Sauvignon）为主，少量的佩蒂特维多（Petit Verdot）加入其中。这款酒来自托科尔纳葡萄园（Tocornal Vineyard）的冲积土地区，这也是许多著名的智利葡萄酒的来源，如阿尔马维瓦（Almaviva）和多恩梅尔霍尔（Don Melchor）。从 2014 年的收获开始，这款酒开始转变，向更新鲜的地区迁移，减少了木头和酒精的使用。2016 年的收获是这一变化的关键年份，冷的天气成为展示新面貌的绝佳机会。

Western reviews.review: A hundred point wine, tannins silky fine, red cherry acidity with fruits of the forest underlay, long finish, everything in perfect balance. Majestic, a blend of Lafite and Latour. Technically way to early to drink the 2021 but this was supreme from the getgo. I haven’t tasted a better bottle from South America.
Western reviews.translation: 一瓶百分百的好酒，口感细腻柔滑，带有红樱桃酸和森林果实的底调，长长的尾韵，所有元素都处于完美的平衡之中。 Majestic 是拉菲和拉图尔的混合体。技术上来说，2021 年的酒还太早喝了，但从一开始就表现出超凡的品质。 我还没品尝过南美洲的酒能与之相比的。

Chinese pairs.original: Joey Tensley于1998年建立了这间家族式酒庄。Colson Canyon Vineyard Syrah酿自种植于1997年的葡萄树，2016年份的产量为1900箱。20%的法国新橡木桶。这款美酒表现出无与伦比的纯净、优雅和持久。带深红酒心的紫红色。此酒的香气在杯中迅速打开，爆发出宛如高级香水的庄严、高贵同时芬芳、均衡的香气：花香（紫罗兰、金银花）、黑胡椒、岩石、杏、黑莓、新鲜西梅、树莓、红布林、蔓越莓、柚子和皮革。通透、锐利的李子般酸度为中段口感提供了极致的清晰感，这里虽然展现了绝佳的集中度和中等偏上的酒体，但神奇的是，居然还能够找到一丝飘逸；15度的酒精度潜藏于甜美、多汁的果味中，果味包裹着那略带皮革滋味并富有稍显粉末状却如同天鹅绒般丝滑的回味。适合在接下来的20年内享用。作为一支水准一流的西拉，这支酒的价格好到简直让人难以置信。
Chinese pairs.new:
Joey Tensley于1998年建立了这间家族式酒庄。Colson Canyon Vineyard Syrah酿自种植于1997年的葡萄树，2016年份的产量为1900箱。20%的法国新橡木桶。这款美酒表现出无与伦比的纯净、优雅和持久。带深红酒心的紫红色。

酒香迅速打开，释放出高级香水般的庄严、高贵同时芬芳、均衡的香气：花香（紫罗兰、金银花）、黑胡椒、岩石、杏、黑莓、新鲜西梅、树莓、红布林、蔓越莓、柚子和皮革。

口感清晰，中段口感带有极致的清晰感，酒体集中度高，酒体中等偏上，神奇的是，居然还能够找到一丝飘逸。15度的酒精度潜藏于甜美、多汁的果味中，果味包裹着那略带皮革滋味并富有稍显粉末状却如同天鹅绒般丝滑的回味。

适合在接下来的20年内享用。作为一支水准一流的西拉，这支酒的价格好到简直让人难以置信。

English pairs.original: Joey Tensley set up this family business in 1998. Colson Canyon Vineyard Syrah is made from the 1997-planted vines, and is produced in 1900 cases for the 2016 vintage. 20% new French oak. A beauty of unrivalled cleanness, grace and durability. Fuchsia with a carmine core. The aroma opened fast in the glass, exploding with an austerely noble and fragrantly poised sniff that was almost like a premium perfume: flowers (violet, honeysuckle), black pepper, stone, apricot, blackberry, fresh prune, raspberry, red plum, cranberry, pomelo and leather. Bright, keen and plum-like acid gave the supreme precision to the mid-palate that revealed sensational intensity and medium plus body but also magically possessed subtle ethereality; the 15% alcohol was skillfully hidden in the sweet and juicy fruit that packed the leather-laced finish underpinned by slightly powdery while beautifully velutinous tannin. Drink it over the following two decades or so. The price is incredibly reasonable as a top-notch Syrah.
English pairs.new: 乔伊·特恩斯利（Joey Tensley）于1998年创立了这家家族企业。科尔森峡谷（Colson Canyon Vineyard）辛拉（Syrah）是从1997年种植的葡萄中酿造的，2016年产量为1900箱。20%新法兰克式橡木桶。清晰、优雅、耐久的美酒。酒色为粉红色，中间有深红色。酒香迅速在玻璃中打开，爆发出高贵、优雅、芬芳的气味，几乎像一瓶高档香水：紫罗兰、honeysuckle、黑胡椒、石头、杏子、黑莓、新鲜李子、草莓、红李子、蔓越莓、柑橘和皮革。中度酸度明亮、锐利、浓郁的果味使得中口部呈现出惊人的强度和中等以上的体积，但也具有神奇的轻微的飘渺感；15%的酒精在甜美的果味中被巧妙地隐藏在皮革般的尾部下，尾部由轻微的粉末状而又美丽的柔软的纤维素质所支撑。建议在接下来的20年左右饮用。价格非常合理，作为一款顶级辛拉酒。

Western reviews.review: From the estate vineyard located high up in the hills above Los Olivos, the 2016 Syrah Colson Canyon Vineyard has an exotic, beautifully pure bouquet of blueberries, wild strawberries, crushed violets, menthol, and cracked pepper. One of the more pure, elegant and ethereal examples of this Syrah I can recall, it's a sensational, incredibly compelling, weightless beauty that does everything right. It too can shine today yet has the capacity to age gracefully for 10-15 years.
Western reviews.translation: 来自洛斯奥利沃斯（Los Olivos）附近高地上的庄园葡萄园，2016年科尔森峡谷（Colson Canyon）辛拉（Syrah）酒的香气是蓝莓、野生草莓、碎兰花、薄荷和碎胡椒的奇异而纯粹的混合。 这是辛拉酒中更纯粹、更优雅和更神秘的例子之一，它是一种令人惊叹的、极具吸引力的、轻盈美丽的酒，它做得一切都正确。 它也可以在今天闪耀，但它有能力在10-15年内优雅地成熟。

Western reviews.review: A distinctive red, with power, polish and structure, offering floral blueberry and garrigue aromas and dynamic huckleberry, river stone and smoky meat flavors that take on momentum toward the refined tannins. Drink now through 2028.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶独特的红酒，具有强大的力量、光滑的口感和完美的结构，展现出花香的蓝莓和 Garrigue 气味，以及具有动感的黑莓、河石和烟熏肉的风味，随着精致的纤维素逐渐增强。建议立即饮用至2028年。

Chinese pairs.original: Masseto 2019有颗大心脏，是那种越陈年越精彩的超级潜力股，和我印象中2016年份的波美侯颇有几分相似之处。得益于超高的浓度（三个原因：100%全新橡木桶、蓝黏土、2019年份），这款酒在入口的瞬间就迸发出气吞河山的能量感。虽然现阶段的香气细节尚未雕琢完毕，但展现出的纵深感已令人惊叹不已。Masseto对平衡度的理解让我深受启发，能够在本就强劲的酒体上不断累加，同时还能稳如泰山，除了优秀的风土以外，还展现出了酿酒师的匠心独运。
Chinese pairs.new: Masseto 2019是一款大有前途的超级红酒，随着时间的推移，它将变得越来越精彩。它与我印象中的2016年波美侯有着一些相似之处。酒的高浓度（三个原因：100%全新橡木桶、蓝黏土、2019年份）使得它在入口时爆发出惊人的能量感。虽然香气细节尚未完全成熟，但酒的深度感已经令人惊叹。Masseto对平衡的理解让我深受启发，它能够在酒体上不断累加，同时保持稳定，除了优质的风土外，还展现出了酿酒师的匠心独运。

English pairs.original: Masseto 2019 is a lord of brave. It is the kind of superb prospect getting better with age, which is similar to the vintage of 2016 in Pomerol from my memory. Thanks to the extraordinary concentration (three reasons: 100% new oak, blue clay, and the 2019 vintage), this wine bursts forth with a sense of energy that shakes the mountains from head to toes. Although the aromas’ details have not been fully expressed at a young age, the depth and profundity are already dramatic. I was inspired by Masseto’s brilliant understanding of balance. It can gather countless materials to the inherent powerful body while remaining stable structure. It is a masterpiece of excellent terroir and a unique sign of the winemaker’s ingenuity.
English pairs.new: 马塞托 2019是一瓶勇敢的王者。它是一种在年长后会越发精彩的超级前景，类似于我记忆中的2016年波尔多的佳酿。由三大原因而成的极度浓缩（100%新橡木、蓝色粘土和2019年产季），使得这瓶酒爆发出一种能震撼山脉的能量，从头到脚都能感受到。尽管年轻的酒香细节尚未完全展现，但深度和深邃感已经非常惊人。马塞托对平衡的理解让我深感惊叹，它能将无数的元素汇聚到内在强大的躯体中，同时保持稳定的结构。它是出色的土壤和酿酒师的独特创造力之作。

Western reviews.review: Intense aromas of blackberries and black olives, together with hints of rosemary bush and lavender. Perfumed and nuanced. Full-bodied, yet so tight and integrated, with weightless tannins that frame the wine in a precise and curated fashion. Very structured and built for aging. It’s rather shy now, but will reward those who are patient. A kind of stealth in its nature. A more thought-provoking edition of Masseto. Needs time to show its true self. Try after 2027.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有强烈的黑莓和黑橄榄的香气，伴有玫瑰灌木和百里香的微妙呼吸。芳香而细致。酒体丰富，但紧致且完美融合，带有无重量的橡胶质，精确且精心打造的框架。结构严谨，适合长期陈酿。目前较为谦逊，但对耐心的酒友会给予回报。这种酒的性格像是一种隐形。Masseto系列的另一种深思熟虑的版本。需要时间才能展现出真正的自己。建议在2027年后再次品尝。

Western reviews.review: Tightly wound now, with blackberry, black currant, iron, rosemary, cedar and toasty oak spice aromas and flavors. Though firm and compact, this has plenty of fruit that persists on the vibrant, lingering and complex finish. Reveals very refined tannins. Merlot. Best from 2024 through 2042. 350 cases imported.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒现在紧紧裹着，具有黑莓、黑加仑、铁、罗勒、红木和烤橡木香味和口感。尽管坚实而紧凑，但这瓶红酒仍然有丰富的果味，持续在生动、持久且复杂的尾部。展现出非常细致的橡胶质。梅洛。2024年至2042年最佳。进口350瓶。

Western reviews.review: This bottle opens a new chapter for one of Italy's most celebrated and collected wines. The first vintage made entirely in its dedicated state-of-the-art winery (and the first vintage with a 10% dabble of Cabernet Franc added to what has historically aways been a pure expression of Merlot), the Masseto 2019 Masseto has two main themes at heart: concentration and elegance. And managing those two seemingly contrasting elements requires a little bit of magic. That's the Masseto magic we look for. The 2019 vintage delivers it in spades with lovely concentrated fruit, blackberry, integrated spice, tobacco, crushed slate, pencil shaving and lots of texture and fiber to push a lasting mouthfeel. The wine's richness translates into density and power to the palate, meanwhile the bouquet reveals fluidity and new sides as the wine opens in the glass. The finish is tapered and focused.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶酒为意大利最受欢迎和收藏的葡萄酒开启了新篇章。第一瓶完全在其专门的先进酿酒厂生产的葡萄酒（也是第一瓶加入了10%卡波弗朗克的葡萄酒，之前的葡萄酒一直是纯粹的梅洛葡萄酒），2019年马塞托葡萄酒以集中和优雅为两大主题。管理这两个似乎相互矛盾的元素需要一点点魔力。这就是我们寻找的马塞托魔力。2019年葡萄酒以美丽的浓缩果味、黑莓、融合的香料、烟草、碎石、铅笔削片和大量的纹理和纤维来推动持久的口感。酒的丰富性转化为口感的密度和力量，而酒的香味则在酒瓶打开后在玻璃中展现出流动性和新面貌。酒尾是精确和集中。

Western reviews.review: The 2019 Masseto is a remarkably potent wine woven with layers of incense, polished leather, and macchia herbs. The palate is full and refined, with well-managed and fine tannin structure. Luxurious with red and black fruits, it offers notes of pure red apple, blackberry, graphite, and lavender, and it is long and persistent while retaining a transparent nature with a refreshing feel. A beautiful wine, it is showing its pedigree now but should certainly be cellared, as this is going to be a wine to enjoy over the next several decades. Rating: 98+
Western reviews.translation: 2019 年的马塞托是一瓶令人惊叹的强劲红酒，内蕴着香烟、精致的皮革和野生草本植物的复杂层次。口感丰富细腻，纤维结构精心管理，细腻。富有豪华感的红黑果味，带有纯红苹果、黑莓、石墨、紫罗兰的香气，持久且持久，保持清澈的性质，带有清新感。是一瓶美丽的酒，现已展现出其优良品种，但仍应储存，因为这将是一瓶值得享受数十年之久的酒。评分：98+

Western reviews.review: Savoury notes on the nose, woodland fragrances, cedar, tobacco, blackcurrant and violets. Lovely fresh acidity fills the mouth, lifting the slightly grippy tannins and ripe cherry and plum fruit. Tannins are mouthcoating but fine, supportive and they have a nice feel giving structure to the overall feel. I like the texture here, the wine feels well worked with nothing sticking out. It's perhaps a little sombre and not so overtly vibrant right now with stand out dark chocolate, mint and liquorice elements but there is elegance here despite the power and concentration and the wine feels extremely well made. Malolactic fermentation began in 100% new oak barriques with all the individual lots kept separate for the first 12 months of ageing before being blended and aged for another 12 months in barrel. The wine was then aged for a final 12 months in bottle before being released.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的香气中有浓郁的香料味道，带有森林的芬芳，cedar、烟草、黑currant和紫罗兰花的味道。口感清新，酸度适宜，能够平衡酒中的略微有嚼头的纤维和成熟的樱桃和黑桃果味。纤维质口感丰富，但细腻，支持性强，给整个口感带来结构感。酒体质感很好，感觉经过精心打造，没有突出的地方。虽然现在酒的颜色可能不够鲜艳，但它仍然具有典雅的风格，酒中的黑巧克力、薄荷和甘草元素并没有突出，但酒的力量和浓度仍然很明显。酒的制作非常出色。酒的酿造过程中，100% 的新橡木桶进行了全程的乳酸发酵，每个批次的酒都单独储存了12个月后再进行混合和再次在桶中储存12个月。最后，酒在瓶中储存了12个月后才被释放。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有醋栗、黑莓和新鲜树叶、蘑菇、烟草、雪茄、木炭和潮湿泥土的气味。中等至饱满的酒体，单宁细腻柔滑，收尾浓郁而美味。
Chinese pairs.new: Aromas of persimmon, blackberry, and fresh leaves, mushrooms, tobacco, cigar, charcoal, and damp earth. Medium to full-bodied, with fine-grained tannins and a rich, satisfying finish.

Western reviews.review: A very pure red with currants, blackberries and fresh leaves. Mushrooms and wet earth. Some tobacco. Cigars. Charcoal. Medium-to full-bodied with fine, silky tannins and an intense, flavorful finish. It grows on the palate with chewy yet polished tannins. Delicious. Turns to currants. Needs two or three years to soften. Better after 2023.
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒非常纯粹，带有黑葡萄、黑莓和新鲜叶子的味道。还有蘑菇和潮湿的泥土的味道。一些烟草味和雪茄味。还有焦炭味。口感中等到中重，具有细致的、滑顺的纤维和强烈的、丰富的尾部。口感在口中生长，具有嚼劲但又细腻的纤维。非常美味。口感逐渐转变为黑葡萄。需要两到三年才能变得更加柔和。2023年后更好。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有浓郁的浆果、草莓、黑醋栗和李子的味道，余味精妙，伴有雪松和橡木味。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich plum, strawberry, blackberry, and cherry flavors abound, with a lingering finish that's complemented by notes of pine and oak.

Western reviews.review: Leafy, mentholatum, cedar, black olive, resin aromas. Dry, somewhat astringent, fresh palate with cedar, herbal, coffee, peppery, rooty, riparian, cassis flavours. Rustic and ready for that hamburger but way too herbaceous for the money and our palate. (Anthony Gismondi and Stuart Tobe).
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶红酒的气味中有青草、薄荷、松木、黑橄榄和树脂的味道。口感干净、略带苦涩，带有松木、草本、咖啡、辣椒、根茎、河流和黑加斯的味道。这种风格的红酒适合与汉堡一起享用，但价格太高，味道太草本，不太适合我们的口味。

Chinese pairs.original: 与Ron Laughton及他的继任者Emily McNally在酒庄进行一场垂直品鉴。Ron认为他的葡萄园很大程度上得益于种植在充满了氧化铁的红色土壤上的葡萄藤深根以及适合耕种设拉子的低海拔和较为温暖的气候。另一方面，他喜欢将自己称为种植者和“调整员”而不是酿酒师。这支产自杰出2006年份的Georgia's Paddock设拉子展示了年轻的红木色，伴随异常迷人、芬芳、高雅而且轮廓分明同时富有层次的香气，微微深邃的松仁、森林地、灌木和清咖香并没有掩盖住香气中由复杂花香（玫瑰、金银花、薰衣草）、寿司姜、岩石、香料（桂皮、黑色甘草）、杏、枇杷和黑布林所组成的愉悦新鲜感。那些标志性的香味（灌木、岩石、花香）延续到了中等酒体、飘逸并且矿物质感十足的口感中；结构非常结实但依然极其滑爽、平衡，得益于口中活泼的果味和绵密、生津的酸度；庄严、深邃但清新、持久的收尾充满上等的多汁感。潜力非凡的一款美酒，或许再放三年左右才能真正绽放。
Chinese pairs.new:
Join Ron Laughton and his successor Emily McNally for a vertical tasting at the winery. Ron credits his vineyard's success to the deep roots of the vines planted in iron-rich red soil, as well as the low elevation and warm climate suitable for Setra. He prefers to think of himself as a grower and "tuner" rather than a winemaker.

This 2006 Setra from Georgia's Paddock shows a youthful red hue, accompanied by an irresistible, fragrant, elegant and defined aroma, with subtle depth of hazelnut, forest floor, underbrush and tea leaf that doesn't overpower the complex floral notes (rose, jasmine, lavender), sushi ginger, stone, spice (cinnamon, black licorice), apricot, quince and blackberry. The signature aromas (underbrush, stone, floral) carry over into the medium-bodied, elegant and minerally palate, with a very solid structure that remains silky smooth and balanced, thanks to lively fruit flavors and a rich, refreshing acidity; the finish is dignified, deep but fresh, with a persistent juiciness. A wine of great potential, perhaps to truly shine after another three years or so.

English pairs.original: A vertical tasting with Ron Laughton and his successor Emily McNally at the winery. Ron thought his vineyards benefit a lot from the very deep roots grown on those red soils rich in oxidized iron and low altitude with warmer climate which is suitable for planting Shiraz. On the other hand, he loved to call himself as vigneron and 'adjustor' rather than the maker. This awesome Georgia's Paddock Shiraz made from the remarkable 2006 vintage exhibited young mahogany color that was accompanied by exceedingly enthralling and fragrantly defined aromas that were so graceful and layered, a tinge of depths such as pine nut, forest floor, undergrowth and black coffee didn't hide the joyful freshness included complex flowers (rose, honeysuckle, lavender), sushi ginger, stone, spices (cinnamon, black liquorice), apricot, loquat and black plum. Those hallmark notes (underbrush, rock, florality) were also found on the palate that was medium-bodied, ethereal and mineral-driven; the structure was notably firm but overall it's still highly polished and nicely poised attributed to the quite sprightly fruit and densely salivary acid; there was classy succulence to the austere and deep end that remained refreshing, precise and enduring. Showing solid potential, though it would need another three years or so for this to really blossom.
English pairs.new: 罗恩·劳顿（Ron Laughton）与他的接班人艾米丽·麦克纳利（Emily McNally）在酒庄举行了一场垂直品鉴会。罗恩认为他的葡萄园受益于那些富含氧化铁的红土和较低的海拔高度，以及温暖的气候，这使得在那里种植夏多尔（Shiraz）非常合适。他喜欢把自己称为葡萄酒生产者和“调节师”（adjustor），而不是“制造者”。来自2006年的这款来自乔治亚的草坪（Georgia's Paddock）夏多尔酒展现出年轻的枫木色，伴随着极具吸引力和芬芳的定义气味，优雅而层次分明，带有松果、林地、灌木丛和黑咖啡的深度，但也包含了欢乐的新鲜感和复杂的花朵（玫瑰、honeysuckle、lavender）、 sushi ginger、石头、香料（丁香、黑甘草）、杏子、柚子和黑杏。这些标志性笔记（灌木丛、岩石、花香）也出现在口感中，口感中等体积，轻盈和矿物质驱动；结构坚固但整体仍然非常光滑和平衡，得益于果实的活力和密集的唾液酸；酒尾带有典雅的滋味，深度和清新感仍然保持着精确和持久。酒展现出坚实的潜力，但需要另外三年左右的时间才能真正成熟。

Western reviews.review: This is a charming paradox of a wine, one that manages to be full-bodied and creamy-textured without being heavy or overly alcoholic, resulting in a wine of great elegance. The raspberry and cherry fruit offers some herbal nuances as well, ending on a spicy, tobacco-leaf note. Drinkable now, but should evolve positively through 2015 at least.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶迷人的红酒，既富有体积又富有乳酪质感，但又不沉重或过度酒精化，结果是一瓶极具优雅的红酒。红莓和樱桃的果味带有些草药的细微差别，最后以一丝辣椒和烟草叶的味道结束。可以立即饮用，但应该至少到2015年会有积极的演变。

Western reviews.review: Being inland and dry-farmed, Jasper Hill wines tend to show considerable vintage variation. This 2007 is slightly raisiny and warm, with hints of chocolate and dried berries allied to firm tannins. Cellar it and hope for the best; try after 2015.
Western reviews.translation: 由于是内陆地区的干农法葡萄种植，贾斯珀山庄的葡萄酒品质会有较大的年份差异。这瓶2007年的葡萄酒略带干枯和温暖的味道，带有巧克力和干燥的浆果的味道，搭配坚实的橡木味。建议将其放入酒窖，希望最好的结果；尝试在2015年后。

Western reviews.review: This powerful, broody, single-vineyard wine offers a nose of briney black olives, tangy blackberries, stoney minerals, tarmac and a strong savory streak. The palate balances power with poise. It's silky in texture and laces together plush fruit with savory, chewy tannins, closing with a long, juicy, herb-flecked finish. Drink now–2028. Christina Pickard
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶来自单一葡萄园的强劲红酒，具有深沉的风格，酒鼻中弥漫着海盐黑橄榄、酸甜黑莓、矿物质和沥青的气息，伴随着强烈的浓郁口感。口感平衡，细腻的口感将丰富的果味与浓郁的坚果味和嚼劲的纤维结合在一起，结尾是长长的、带有香草味的果味。建议立即饮用至2028年。- Christina Pickard。

Western reviews.review: It's easy to overlook this wine in a sea of ripe, flashy South Aussie Shiraz. But give this broody, cool climate wine your time as well as time in decanter and its singularity and precision shine. Notes of brambly berries and orange rind are accompanied by savory, earthy spices, dark chocolate and something sanguine and mineral-driven. The palate is big and a tad austere, with powerful, taut, chalky tannins, lifted acidity and layers of fruit and spice. Showing more elegance than past vintages of this wine. Drink 2021–2035. Christina Pickard
Western reviews.translation: 在南澳大利亚的浓郁、夺目红酒中，这款酒容易被忽视。但是，如果你给它时间，并且在酒瓶中放置一段时间，它的独特性和精确性就会显现出来。酒中有浓郁的浆果和橙皮的香味，伴随着浓郁的土味、干酪味、黑巧克力和矿物质味。口感丰富，略带干涩，具有强烈的、紧绷的、有矿物质的橡果味，酸度高，果味和香味层次丰富。与之前的几年相比，这款酒更具优雅。建议饮用时间：2021-2035年。- Christina Pickard。

Western reviews.review: Dusty, firm, powerful: just a few apt descriptors for this vintage of one of Heathcote's top wines. Mocha, licorice and blackberries feature on the nose, while the palate delivers more of the same—dark fruit, chocolate and plenty of spice. Best after 2020.
Western reviews.translation: 这款来自希思科特（Heathcote）的顶级红酒，具有厚重、坚实、强大的风格。酒鼻中充满了巧克力、Licorice和黑莓的香气，而口感则呈现出同样的风格——黑色水果、巧克力和丰富的香料。建议在2020年后饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 散发出精美的水果，紫罗兰，香料及矿物质的气味，单宁柔滑，酒体醇厚，余味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: This wine releases a beautiful bouquet of fruit, lavender, spices, and minerals. The tannins are smooth and silky, the body is rich and full, and the finish is long-lasting.

Western reviews.review: Kräftiges, dichtes Rot mit aufgehelltem Rand; verhaltenes Bukett, reife, süße Steinfrüchte, verspricht Tiefe; weicher, voller Auftakt, viel Frucht, eher schlank, gut stützendes Tannin, präsente, saftige Säure; endet lang auf mineralischer Spur. Eleganter, dichter Wein mit Potenzial.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一杯充满活力的红酒，颜色深红，边缘微微发亮。酒香不太强烈，但却有着成熟的甜水果味道，预示着酒的深度。酒口入口柔和，充满果味，口感较瘦，但有着坚实的坚果味和清脆的酸度。酒尾长长的，留下了矿物质的余味。这是一杯优雅的、浓郁的红酒，具有很强的潜力。

Chinese pairs.original: 皮革、黑色水果、草本香气，重酒体，口感复杂强劲，单宁柔和，酸度低。
Chinese pairs.new: Leather, black fruit, herbal notes, full-bodied, complex and intense flavors, smooth tannins, low acidity.

Western reviews.review: Tinto composto a partir de 84% C abernet Sauvignon, 5,5% Merlot, 5,5% Cabernet Franc, 4% Petit Verdot e 1% Malbec, com estágio de 18 meses em barricas novas de carvalho francês. Está, em 2022, em um ponto ótimo para apreciá-lo, mas com muitos anos ainda pela frente. As duas Cabernet mostram-se claramente, com suas notas de ervas e de especiarias envolvendo sua fruta vermelha e negra madura, lembrando ameixas e amoras, tudo sustentado por taninos firmes e finos e vibrante acidez. Tem final persistente e cativante, com toques terrosos, florais, de cassis, de alcaçuz e de grafite. Álcool 14,5%.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒由84%卡伯涅特·沙维尼翁、5.5%梅洛、5.5%卡伯涅特·法兰克、4%佩蒂·维多和1%马尔贝克组成，-aged 18个月在法国橡木桶中。2022年，这款红酒已经达到最佳品质，但仍有许多年可以享受。卡伯涅特家族的两种品种表现突出，带有成熟红黑果实的香草和香料味道，类似于熟透的李子和黑莓，所有这些都由坚实细腻的橡木味和振动的酸度支持。酒尾持久迷人，带有泥土、花香、黑加仑、荆芥和石墨的味道。酒精含量14.5%。

Western reviews.review: Tinto composto a partir de 84% C abernet Sauvignon, 5,5% Merlot, 5,5% Cabernet Franc, 4% Petit Verdot e 1% Malbec, com estágio de 18 meses em barricas novas de carvalho francês. Está, em 2022, em um ponto ótimo para apreciá-lo, mas com muitos anos ainda pela frente. As duas Cabernet mostram-se claramente, com suas notas de ervas e de especiarias envolvendo sua fruta vermelha e negra madura, lembrando ameixas e amoras, tudo sustentado por taninos firmes e finos e vibrante acidez. Tem final persistente e cativante, com toques terrosos, florais, de cassis, de alcaçuz e de grafite. Álcool 14,5%.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒由84%卡伯涅特·沙维尼翁、5.5%梅洛、5.5%卡伯涅特·法兰克、4%佩蒂·维多和1%马尔贝克组成，-aged 18个月在法国橡木桶中。2022年，这款红酒已经达到最佳品质，但仍有许多年可以享受。卡伯涅特家族的两种品种表现突出，带有成熟的红色和黑色果实、草药和香料的风味，类似于熟透的杏子和黑莓，所有这些都由坚实而细腻的橡木味和振动的酸度支持。酒尾持久而迷人，带有泥土、花香、黑加仑、荆芥和石墨的味道。酒精含量14.5%。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung. Einladende dunkle Kirschnote, ein Hauch von Cassis und Edelholz, Orangenkonfit, zarter Nougat, zeugt von einem kühleren Jahrgang. Straff, hochelegant, feiner Schokotouch, süße schwarze Beerenfrucht, sehr komplex, engmaschig, Nougat im Abgang, mineralisch, dezente Frische unterlegt, wirkt bereits gut entwickelt, kann bereits angetrunken werden. Peter Moser
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。诱人的黑杏香味，带有一点黑加斯和贵木香，橘子果酱，微微的牛奶糖味，表明这是一个较冷的年份。紧致，高贵，细微的巧克力味，甜的黑berry果味，非常复杂，密集，牛奶糖味在尾部，矿物质，轻微的清新感，已经很成熟，已经可以饮用。- 彼得莫瑟。

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung. Einladende dunkle Kirschnote, ein Hauch von Cassis und Edelholz, Orangenkonfit, zarter Nougat, zeugt von einem kühleren Jahrgang. Straff, hochelegant, feiner Schokotouch, süße schwarze Beerenfrucht, sehr komplex, engmaschig, Nougat im Abgang, mineralisch, dezente Frische unterlegt, wirkt bereits gut entwickelt, kann bereits angetrunken werden. Peter Moser
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。诱人的黑杏香味，带有一点黑加斯和精致的木香，橘子果酱，微微的牛奶糖，表明这是一个较冷的年份。紧致，高贵，细微的巧克力味，甜的黑berry果味，非常复杂，密集，牛奶糖在尾部，矿物质，轻微的清新感，已经很成熟，已经可以饮用。- Peter Moser。

Western reviews.review: Luscious, silky textures, forward in style, and creamy, ripe, sweet, blackberries galore are impossible not to notice. With its concentration of flavor, balance and sensuous style, this is a truly, sublime style of California Cabernet Sauvignon. 95 Points
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的口感丰富细腻，风格前卫，黑莓的甜美和成熟味道令人难以忽视。其丰富的口感、平衡和诱人的风格，让这款加州卡波内特酒成为真正的佳品。评分：95分。

Chinese pairs.original: 由Ron Laughton创立的澳洲精品顶级酒庄，一部分的酿造方式可以被认为是有机/生物动力法(不做杂草控制并且只使用有机堆肥)。Ron认为他只是葡萄园间的调整者，他坚持“缔造葡萄酒的始终是葡萄而不是人”。就和其他一些澳洲顶级酒庄一样，Jasper Hill不进行任何的灌溉，土壤的水分均来自于自然的降雨。Georgia's Paddock的葡萄园距离酒庄大约有一公里的路程。葡萄园的土质是距今大约5亿年前的寒武纪留下的玄武岩。如今这片葡萄园内总共有5个不同的葡萄品种：维欧尼、赛美蓉、雷司令、纳比奥罗和设拉子。Georgia's Paddock园内的12公顷的设拉子早在1975/76便开始耕种，部分的葡萄藤在1987年的那场火灾中被损毁。在20%新的法国桶中陈年；不取清汁且不做澄清。前后一共醒了4个半小时，酒的持续力很好。感觉非常像超顶级的Hermitage希拉（Jean-Louis Chave？），刚开始香气上比较封闭，但却有如万花筒般千变万化，扑面而来的是黑莓、黑醋栗，紧接着绽放出石墨、皮革、香料（茴香、黑胡椒、肉桂、迷迭香）、矿物、焦糖玛琪朵、柿饼、干玫瑰、红枣、德芙葡萄干杏仁巧克力、无花果蜜饯、蔓越莓、桉树，摇晃一下酒杯后出现了一些灌木丛的气息，在最后一小时的醒酒中以芳香的黄桃和熟李子收尾。在整个过程中不断的变化，就像川剧中的变脸一样！口感上是典型的Jasper Hill的丰富、厚重，富有多汁的酸度同时口中充满了成熟、有深度并且集中的烟熏、西莓、黑樱桃、黑莓、乌梅、矿物、薄荷叶、皮革的滋味。这里同样能感觉到一些粉末状的巧克力，咸泥土的味道但依然在磅礴的果味冲击下被掩盖。在长时间的醒酒下，起初带有的一些闭塞、粗糙感完全得消失了，所有的棱角都完美得融合在一起，整支酒展现出无与伦比的丝滑、平衡、纤细和丰富性。最后在一次又一次狂风暴雨般的变化后，这支“怪物”终于平静了下来，所有的味道都融化在一起了，但又有种清咖啡和松仁的深沉和干净的酸度和矿物结构，极度得平衡。总的来说，这支酒有着恢弘的骨架和复杂度、极好的天鹅绒般的深度以及悠长的矿物&花香余韵。这的的确确是支伟大的葡萄酒，现在喝掉实在太可惜了！
Chinese pairs.new:
Jasper Hill是一家澳洲顶级酒庄，由Ron Laughton创立，采用有机/生物动力法酿造葡萄酒。酒庄坚持“葡萄酒的创造始终是葡萄而不是人”，不进行灌溉，土壤水分来自自然降雨。Georgia's Paddock葡萄园位于酒庄大约一公里外，土质为寒武纪玄武岩，种植5个不同品种的葡萄：维欧尼、赛美蓉、雷司令、纳比奥罗和设拉子。

这支设拉子葡萄酒来自12公顷的葡萄园，早在1975/76年就开始耕种，部分葡萄藤在1987年的火灾中被损毁。在20%新的法国桶中陈年，不取清汁且不做澄清。酒的持续力很好，前后共醒了4个半小时。

香气上比较封闭，但却有如万花筒般千变万化，扑面而来的是黑莓、黑醋栗，紧接着绽放出石墨、皮革、香料（茴香、黑胡椒、肉桂、迷迭香）、矿物、焦糖玛琪朵、柿饼、干玫瑰、红枣、德芙葡萄干杏仁巧克力、无花果蜜饯、蔓越莓、桉树。摇晃一下酒杯后出现了一些灌木丛的气息，在最后一小时的醒酒中以芳香的黄桃和熟李子收尾。

口感上是典型的Jasper Hill的丰富、厚重，富有多汁的酸度同时口中充满了成熟、有深度并且集中的烟熏、西莓、黑樱桃、黑莓、乌梅、矿物、薄荷叶、皮革的滋味。这里同样能感觉到一些粉末状的巧克力，咸泥土的味道但依然在磅礴的果味冲击下被掩盖。

在长时间的醒酒下，起初带有的一些闭塞、粗糙感完全得消失了，所有的棱角都完美得融合在一起，整支酒展现出无与伦比的丝滑、平衡、纤细和丰富性。最后在一次又一次狂风暴雨般的变化后，这支“怪物”终于平静了下来，所有的味道都融化在一起了，但又有种清咖啡和松仁的深沉和干净的酸度和矿物结构，极度得平衡。

总的来说，这支酒有着恢弘的骨架和复杂度、极好的天鹅绒般的深度以及悠长的矿物&花香余韵。这的的确确是支伟大的葡萄酒，现在喝掉实在太可惜了！

English pairs.original: Ron Laughton steers the good ship Jasper Hill, one of Australia's premier wineries for quality boutique wines. Ron thinks he's just a ‘regulator’ of his vineyards since ‘only grapes make wines’. He follows some parts of organic/bio-dynamic principles (without weed control and only use compost). Just like other Australian top producers, all vineyards are unirrigated and rely on the natural rainfall only. The location of Georgia's Paddock Vineyard is about 1 kilometre away from the winery. The soils are derived from Cambrian age basaltic rock (approximately 500 million years). Nowadays, there are totally five different varieties grown in this vineyard: Viognier, Semillon, Riesling, Nebbiolo and Shiraz. Georgia's Paddock has got 12 hectares of Shiraz planted in 1975/76 (in the same time Ron set up his property) with further small plantings done after the vineyard was ravaged by bushfire in 1987. Aging in 20% new French oak barriques; without racking and without fining. The wine has been 4 hours and a half decanted, the durability of the wine was extraordinarily good. The style of this wine was very close to the super-premium Hermitage Syrah (Jean-Louis Chave?). It displayed a kaleidoscopic and faintly tight nose, blackberry and cassis aromas patted down with some graphite, leather, spices (fennel, rosemary, black pepper, cinnamon), mineral, caramel macchiato, Chinese dried persimmon, wild rose, red date, Dove raisin&almond chocolate, preserved fig, cranberry and eucalyptus, sniffing of evident undergrowth after swirling the glass, yet finishing with perfumed yellow peach and ripe plum in the last hour. Changing with time going by, like ‘Sichuan Opera Face’. The palate had the rich, viscous weight that Jasper Hills often shows, but it offered very succulent acidity that suffused its ripe, deeply and concentrated fruited flavours of smoke, prune, black cherry, blackberry, dark plum, mineral, mint leaf and leather. There was a bit of savoury earth and powdery black chocolate in there somewhere, but such was the primacy of the fruit that it remained rather buried. After long-time decantage, the toughness and tightness disappeared: integrating all the pointedness together meanwhile showing adequate finesse, balance, richness and smoothness. Finally, after again and again changes and evolutions in the glass, this monster has regressed to a peaceful status, mixed all flavours together and became extremely balanced, released more deepness of black coffee and pine nut, but still quite acidic, clean and mineral-saturated. Overall, this possessed grand structure and complexity, splendidly velvety depth as well as a superbly mineral-inflected and floral length. This was an undeniably great wine, and it's still wasteful to drink it now!
English pairs.new:
让我们来翻译这个红酒评论：

罗恩·劳顿（Ron Laughton）是澳大利亚杰斯珀山（Jasper Hill）的一位顶级葡萄酒厂主，他的葡萄园遵循一些有机/生物动力学原则（不使用除肥料外的任何化学物质）。澳大利亚的葡萄园通常不使用灌溉，完全依赖自然降雨。杰斯珀山的乔治亚葡萄园（Georgia's Paddock Vineyard）距离葡萄酒厂大约1公里，土壤来自5000万年的碳酸盐岩石。目前，葡萄园种植了五种不同的品种：维奥尼亚（Viognier）、塞缪兰（Semillon）、雷司令（Riesling）、内布利奥（Nebbiolo）和雪利（Shiraz）。葡萄园中有12公顷的雪利种植于1975/76年（罗恩建立葡萄园的同年），之后在1987年的火灾后进行了小规模的种植。酒瓶中使用了20%的新法式橡木桶，未进行过搅拌和去除沉淀物。酒瓶经过4小时半的脱颈，酒的持久性非常好。酒的风格非常接近超高级的黑皮诺（Hermitage Syrah，Jean-Louis Chave）。酒的鼻子呈现出多彩的和紧致的风格，黑berry和cassis的香气被一些石墨、皮革、香料（丁香、罗勒、黑胡椒、肉桂）、矿物质、卡拉麦乔、中国干枣、野玫瑰、红枣、鸽子干果和杏仁巧克力、干的枣、樱桃和桉树的香气所盖住。酒的风格随着时间的推移而变化，如“四川歌舞面具”。酒的口感呈现出丰富、浓稠的重量，但也提供了非常丰富的酸度，酒的风味呈现出烟熏、干枣、黑樱桃、黑berry、黑葡萄、矿物质、薄荷叶和皮革。酒中有一些土壤和黑巧克力的风味，但由于酒的风味非常丰富，酒的风味被盖住了。酒瓶经过长时间的脱颈后，酒的紧致和紧张感消失了：酒的所有风味都融合在一起，呈现出适当的细腻、平衡、丰富和光滑。最后，酒瓶经过多次变化和演变后，酒的风味变得平静，所有风味都融合在一起，呈现出极其平衡的风味，释放出了黑咖啡和松子风味，但仍然保持着清晰和矿物质饱和的风味。总体来说，这个酒具有极其复杂的结构和风味，呈现出极其丰富的深度和矿物质和花香的长度。这是一个不可否认的极品酒，仍然浪费了喝它的时间！

Western reviews.review: This is a charming paradox of a wine, one that manages to be full-bodied and creamy-textured without being heavy or overly alcoholic, resulting in a wine of great elegance. The raspberry and cherry fruit offers some herbal nuances as well, ending on a spicy, tobacco-leaf note. Drinkable now, but should evolve positively through 2015 at least.
Western reviews.translation: 这是一瓶迷人的红酒，既富有体积又富有乳酪质感，但又不沉重或过度酒精化，结果是一瓶极具优雅的红酒。红莓和樱桃的果味带有些草药的细微差别，最后以一丝辣椒和烟叶的味道结束。可以立即饮用，但应该至少到2015年会有积极的演变。

Western reviews.review: Being inland and dry-farmed, Jasper Hill wines tend to show considerable vintage variation. This 2007 is slightly raisiny and warm, with hints of chocolate and dried berries allied to firm tannins. Cellar it and hope for the best; try after 2015.
Western reviews.translation: 由于是内陆地区的干农法葡萄种植，贾斯珀山庄的葡萄酒品质会有较大的年份差异。这瓶2007年的葡萄酒略带干枯和温暖的味道，带有巧克力和干燥的浆果的味道，配以坚实的橡皮质。建议将其放入酒窖，希望最好的结果；尝试在2015年后。

Western reviews.review: This powerful, broody, single-vineyard wine offers a nose of briney black olives, tangy blackberries, stoney minerals, tarmac and a strong savory streak. The palate balances power with poise. It's silky in texture and laces together plush fruit with savory, chewy tannins, closing with a long, juicy, herb-flecked finish. Drink now–2028. Christina Pickard
Western reviews.translation: 这瓶来自单一葡萄园的红酒，具有强烈的风格和深沉的性格。酒鼻中弥漫着海盐黑橄榄、酸甜黑莓、矿物质和沥青的气息，伴随着强烈的浓郁口感。口感平衡，细腻，富有层次。酒中丰富的果实与坚韧的咖啡味结合，结尾长长的，带有香草味的口感。建议立即享用，至2028年。- Christina Pickard

Western reviews.review: It's easy to overlook this wine in a sea of ripe, flashy South Aussie Shiraz. But give this broody, cool climate wine your time as well as time in decanter and its singularity and precision shine. Notes of brambly berries and orange rind are accompanied by savory, earthy spices, dark chocolate and something sanguine and mineral-driven. The palate is big and a tad austere, with powerful, taut, chalky tannins, lifted acidity and layers of fruit and spice. Showing more elegance than past vintages of this wine. Drink 2021–2035. Christina Pickard
Western reviews.translation: 在南澳大利亚的浓郁、夺目红酒中，这款酒容易被忽视。但是，如果你给它时间，并且在酒瓶中放置一段时间，它的独特性和精确性就会显现出来。酒中有浓郁的浆果和橙子皮的味道，伴随着浓郁的土味、干酪味、黑巧克力和矿物质味。口感丰富，略带严肃，具有强烈的、紧绷的、有矿物质的橡果味，高酸度和丰富的果实和香料层次。与之前的几年相比，这款酒更具优雅。建议饮用时间：2021-2035年。- Christina Pickard。

Western reviews.review: Dusty, firm, powerful: just a few apt descriptors for this vintage of one of Heathcote's top wines. Mocha, licorice and blackberries feature on the nose, while the palate delivers more of the same—dark fruit, chocolate and plenty of spice. Best after 2020.
Western reviews.translation: 这款来自希思科特（Heathcote）的顶级红酒，具有厚重、坚实、强大的风格。酒鼻中充满了巧克力、Licorice和黑莓的香气，而口感则呈现出同样的风格——黑色水果、巧克力和丰富的香料。建议在2020年后饮用。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有焦油，烟雾，玫瑰，紫罗兰，甜烤橡木的香气，优雅迷人，柔滑的单宁，余味悠长。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich, smoky, rose, lavender, and sweet vanilla oak aromas, elegant and alluring, with smooth tannins and a long, lingering finish.

Western reviews.review: Leuchtendes, sattes Rubin; verwobene Nase mit Aromen nach Lakritze, Gewürznelken, dunkler Waldhimbeere, sehr klar; rassig in Ansatz und Verlauf, viel feinkörniges Tannin, entfaltet sich mit großer Eleganz, seidig, langer Nachhall, süßes Finale.
Western reviews.translation:
这段红酒评论的中文翻译是：

闪亮的深红色; 醇厚的鼻子带有 licorice、肉桂、黑莓的香味，非常清晰; 入口和尾部都很有质感，细腻的苦味，展现出优雅的风格，滑顺的口感，长长的尾部，甜美的结尾。

Chinese pairs.original: 是一款极为平衡的酒，酒中的各种成分都恰到好处，是一款酒力强劲，余味悠长，优雅精致的葡萄酒。
Chinese pairs.new: This is a highly balanced wine, with all its components perfectly in harmony. It's a full-bodied wine with a long, lingering finish and a refined, elegant character.

Western reviews.review: Das spanische Garnacha-Monument schlechthin, von 90-jährigen Reben. In der Nase dunkle Beeren, auch florale Noten. Im Gaumen mächtig und fleischig, mit viel feinkörnigem Tannin und einer überraschend saftigen Säure. Neun Prozent Samsó (Carignan) und ein Prozent weisser
Western reviews.translation: 这是西班牙的 Garnacha 纪念品级红酒，来自90岁的葡萄树。酒鼻中有浓郁的黑果味和花朵香气。口感丰富厚实，具有细腻的橡木味和令人惊讶的清爽酸度。酒中含有9%的Samsó（Carignan）和1%的白葡萄。

Western reviews.review: Alvaro Palacios is one of the country's great drivers of quality, and his wines from the mountainous Priorat region have long been legendary. L'Ermita shines with a wonderful bouquet of cassis and floral nuances such as lavender. Juicy on the palate and endowed with silky tannins, convincing minerality on the finish, great ageing potential.
Western reviews.translation: 阿尔瓦罗·帕拉西奥斯是该国品质的推动者之一，他的来自山区普里奥拉特地区的葡萄酒已久负盛名。  L'Ermita酒瓶中散发着美妙的黑currant和花香，如兰花。口感丰富，具有细腻的纹理，尾部有令人信服的矿物质味道，酒龄潜力极大。

Chinese pairs.original: 蓝莓、黑莓、烟熏、吐司、烤药草和筑路焦油的味道，酒体饱满，口感丰富，十分醇厚奢华，爆发力强，细腻无瑕。
Chinese pairs.new: "Rich and full-bodied, with flavors of blueberry, blackberry, smoky notes, toasted bread, herbal hints and asphalt undertones. The texture is smooth and refined, with a powerful and luxurious finish."

Western reviews.review: Mittleres Rubingranat, gute Farbtiefe, zarter Ockerrand. Frische Kirschen, zarte Kräuterwürze, Nuancen von Sojasauce, zarte florale Nuancen. Gute Komplexität, Anklänge von schwarzen Kirschen, bereits etwas trockene Tannine, die schon eher dem Ende entgegen gehen, rotbeeriger Touch, mineralischer Nachhall, noch immer gut zu trinken. Peter Moser
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒，酒色浓郁，边缘微微泛黄。酒中有新鲜的樱桃和微妙的草药味，带有轻微的酱油和花朵的香气。酒的复杂性很好，带有黑樱桃的回味，已经有一些干的橡皮味，正在向尾部靠近，带有红色啤酒的余味和矿物质的回响，仍然很好喝。— Peter Moser

Chinese pairs.original: 要我为“超级托斯卡纳”选出一款展现审美巅峰的葡萄酒，Ornellaia 无疑是最佳选择。它的高贵和典雅已经完全刻进了骨髓，如同清泉滋润大地，无需刻意装点，就能散发出最原始的美。它低调的野蔷薇，恰似初恋的羞涩；它脂粉般的单宁，犹如烛光下的舞者；它层层叠叠的复杂辛香，则是Vivaldi的四季之歌。它们如同蛛网般将你团团包裹，待你反应过来时，已然被它俘获，动弹不得。这才是我心目中的托斯卡纳的顶级“波混”，谁品谁知道。
Chinese pairs.new: If I had to choose a wine from "Super Tuscan" that embodies the pinnacle of elegance, Ornellaia would undoubtedly be my top pick. Its refinement and sophistication are deeply ingrained, like a gentle spring nourishing the land, radiating its natural beauty without pretension. Its subtle rose petal notes are as shy as a first love; its velvety tannins shine like a dancer in candlelight; its layered complexity is like Vivaldi's Four Seasons, weaving a web that ensnares you, leaving you helpless to resist. This is my vision of the ultimate "Bolgheri" from Tuscany – a secret only those who taste it will understand.

English pairs.original: If I hade to select a wine from the realm of “Super Tuscan” that epitomizes the pinnacle of aesthetics, undoubtedly, Ornellaia would be the paramount choice. Its nobility and elegance have ingrained into the bones, much like a clear spring that nourishes the earth. Its subdued wild rose notes are akin to the bashfulness of first love; its velvety tannins akin to dancers in candlelight; its intricate layers of complex spiciness, sound like a symphony of Vivaldi’s Four Seasons. They envelop you like a spider’s net, when you realised, you have already captured. This wine, in my view, embodies the pinnacle of “Bolgheri” in Tuscany – a sentiment truly understood only by those who have tasted it.
English pairs.new: 如果我必须从“超级托斯卡纳”（Super Tuscan）中选择一瓶代表最高审美的红酒，那么我毫无疑问地会选择奥尔内利亚（Ornellaia）。它的高贵和优雅已经深深地融入其中，像清澈的泉水一样滋润大地。它的低调的野玫瑰香气像初恋的腼腆一样；它的细腻的橡胶感像在蜡烛光下跳舞的舞者一样；它的复杂的香料层次像维瓦尔第的四季交响曲一样。它们像蜘蛛网一样包围着你，当你意识到时，你已经被捕获了。这瓶酒，在我看来，是托斯卡纳博尔盖里（Bolgheri）的最高代表——只有品尝过它的人才能真正理解这种情感。

Western reviews.review: Alluring aromas of lead pencil and currants with crushed stone and iodine. Full-bodied with hemmed in tannins that are tight and focused. Very fresh and energetic with wonderful length and intensity for this vintage. Needs four or five years to come together. Better in 2028 and onwards.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒具有诱人的香气，带有铅笔、黑currants、碎石和碘的味道。口感丰富，且有紧绷的、集中在一起的苦味。酒精度非常高，具有极好的长度和强度。考虑到产区的特点，这款酒需要四到五年的时间才能达到最佳状态。预计2028年后酒的品质会更好。

Western reviews.review: Tasted from barrel, the 2020 Bolgheri Superiore Ornellaia will be presented in the fall but won’t hit the market until spring of the following year. This is a beauty, so generous and opulent with fully seamless transitions. The wine’s traditional blend is mostly Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot with tiny percentages of Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot, although this warm vintage makes do with a pinch less of the Cabernet Sauvignon. Fruit is selected across 107 hectares of Ornellaia vines, although the estate recently purchased an additional eight hectares next to Guado al Tasso in Castagneto Carducci, with terraces and vines aged between 15 and 28 years old. This broad and generous expression has a beautiful quality of fruit and oak that speaks to the very best of Italian winemaking.Barrel Sample: 95-97
Western reviews.translation:
2020年奥尔内利亚（Ornellaia）布尔盖里超级（Superiore）红酒将于秋季展出，但直到次年春季才会上市。这是一款美酒，富有慷慨和奢华的特质，过渡顺畅。酒款的传统配比主要是卡波弗雷蒙（Cabernet Sauvignon）和梅洛（Merlot），但含有少量卡波弗雷（Cabernet Franc）和佩蒂·维多（Petit Verdot）。然而，这个炎热的葡萄成熟季节使得酒款中卡波弗雷蒙的比例略有减少。酒款的葡萄来自奥尔内利亚葡萄园的107公顷，最近奥尔内利亚还购入了位于卡斯塔涅托·卡杜奇（Castagneto Carducci）的瓜多·阿尔·塔索（Guado al Tasso）附近的8公顷葡萄园，葡萄园的梯田和葡萄树年龄在15到28年之间。这种广泛而慷慨的表达方式具有优美的果味和橡木味，体现了意大利葡萄酒制造的最高水平。

酒款评分：95-97分（酒桶样本）

Western reviews.review: The 2020 Ornellaia is 50% Cabernet Sauvignon, 28% Merlot, and the rest Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot, raised in 70% new French oak for 18 months, with another 12 months in bottle prior to release. Flush with herbs and menthol, blackberry, and cedar, it is full bodied and fills the sides of the mouth with rounded fruit of luxurious plum, black cherry, and toast, with supple and velvety tannins. Drink 2026-2046.
Western reviews.translation: 2020年奥尔内利亚红酒的组成是50%卡波弗雷蒙（Cabernet Sauvignon）、28%梅洛（Merlot），以及余下的卡波弗朗（Cabernet Franc）和佩蒂·韦多（Petit Verdot），在70%新法兰克的橡木桶中陈酿18个月，之后再在瓶中陈酿12个月后才发布。奥尔内利亚2020年充满了香草和薄荷的香气，黑莓和红檀木的味道，口感丰富，酒液在口中流动，富有豪华的黑杏和黑樱桃味道，伴随着细腻的烟熏味，纤维柔软，口感细腻。建议饮用时间为2026-2046年。

Western reviews.review: Estate director Axel Heinz called 2020 ‘a classic Ornellaia,’ and picked the theme of ‘La Proporzione‘ (proportion) to describe its character. Indeed, the blend of 50% Cabernet Sauvignon, 32% Merlot, 13% Cabernet Franc and 5% Petit Verdot marks a return to a more typical blend following the pendulum swings of 62% Cabernet Sauvignon in 2019, and 51% Merlot in 2018. Fine-grained and beautifully textured, its finely integrated tannins support a concentration of black fruits lightened by red berries. Aromas of black cherry, liquorice, dark chocolate, cedar and damp earth make for a fragrant wine, accompanied by menthol and balsamic streaks which run through the wine and impart plenty of freshness. It finishes with a stony and salty element along with some chocolatey and woody hints. Tight and moreish, its ripeness of fruit combined with freshness and structure adeptly tells the story of this earlier-ripening vintage. It lacks complexity in the mouth – this will come with time – but the array of aromas gives a hint of what is to come.
Western reviews.translation: 奥尔内利亚庄园总监阿克塞尔·海因茨（Axel Heinz）称2020年为“典型的奥尔内利亚”，并将其特征命名为“比例”（La Proporzione）。的确，50%卡波弗雷蒙（Cabernet Sauvignon）、32%梅洛（Merlot）、13%卡波弗雷蒙（Cabernet Franc）和5%佩蒂·韦尔多（Petit Verdot）的混合比例，标志着2019年62%卡波弗雷蒙和2018年51%梅洛的摆动回归。细致的颗粒和美丽的纹理，其精细的天然纤维支持黑色水果的浓度，红色浆果的轻微调节。黑樱桃、薄荷、暗巧克力、松木和潮湿土壤的香气使酒精闻起来很香，伴随着薄荷和巴兰萨（balsamic）条纹穿过酒精，带来大量的新鲜感。酒精以石头和盐的元素结束，伴随着巧克力和木头的暗示。紧致且令人垂涎欲滴，其水果成熟度与新鲜感和结构完美地讲述了这个早熟的收获季节的故事。口感中缺乏复杂性——这将随着时间而来——但各种香气给出了未来的线索。

Western reviews.review: Inviting aromas of blackberry, black currant, anise, cedar, vanilla and tobacco draw you in to this red, which is sleek and open on the palate. This is so well-balanced, it's approachable now, yet there's a bit of reserve too. The fruit flavors are prominent on the finish, along with mineral and spice notes, while the lasting impression is a salty, flinty element. Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot.
Western reviews.translation: 这款红酒的香气诱人，带有黑莓、黑加仑、荳蔻、松木、香草和烟草的味道，让人无法抵挡。口感细长开阔，平衡得非常好，既可以现在品尝，又有着一定的保留。果味在尾部非常突出，伴随矿物质和香料的味道，而最终留下的印象是咸涩的、闪烁的元素。酒中含有卡波内尔·索维涅、梅洛、卡波内尔·法兰克和佩蒂·韦多特等葡萄品种。

Chinese pairs.original: 带有浓郁的黑莓，油墨，甜松露和洋槐花的香气，酒体丰满，单宁如天鹅绒般柔顺，酸味清爽怡人，余味悠长而馨香。
Chinese pairs.new: Rich blackberry, ink, sweet truffle, and lilac aromas. Full-bodied with silky smooth tannins, crisp acidity, and a long, fragrant finish.

Western reviews.review: Dunkles Rubingranat, violette Reflexe, zarte Randaufhellung. In der Nase intensive dunkle Beerenfrucht, zart nach Dörrobst, Minzetouch, feiner Nougattouch. Saftig, sehr kraftvoll, runde Tannine, Orangentouch, präsente Holznote im Abgang, wirkt etwas zu üppig, reife Zwetschgenfrucht im Nachhall, opulenter Wein, leicht portige Stilistik.
Western reviews.translation: 深红色葡萄酒色，紫色反光，边缘微微发亮。酒香浓郁，深色浆果味，微带干酪味和橡木味。口感丰富，非常强劲，圆润的苦味，橙子味和木头味在尾部留下印象，感觉略微过于丰富，酒尾留有成熟的浆果味，酒体丰富，风格接近葡萄酒。
